Ukunguut _ nengllugute t _ , _ sivunghi _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ tagi kau uq _ David-em _ nengllugutanganeng _ . _ David _ Abraham-enkuneng _ pi u uq _ .
abraham _ ata ke a _ Isaac-em _ , _ isaac _ ata ke a _ Jacob-em _ , _ Jacob _ ata ke aat _ Judah-nkut _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ,
Judah _ ata ke ak _ Perez-enkuk _ , _ Zerah-nkuk _ ( _ naange ak _ Tamar _ ) _ , _ perez _ ata ke a _ Hezron-em _ , _ hezron _ ata ke a _ Ram-em _ ,
ram _ ata ke a _ Amminadab-em _ , _ amminadab _ ata ke a _ Nahshon-em _ , _ nahshon _ ata ke a _ Salmon-em _ ,
salmon _ ata ke a _ Boaz-em _ , _ ( _ Boaz-em _ naa ke a _ rahab _ ) _ . _ Boaz _ ata ke a _ Obed-em _ , _ ( _ Obed-em _ naa ke a _ Ruth _ ) _ , _ Obed _ ata ke a _ Jesse-m _ ,
Jesse _ ata ke a _ umiileg m _ David-em _ . _ David _ ata ke a _ Solomon-em _ . _ ( _ Solomon-em _ naa ke a _ Uriah-m _ nulighqesaqanga _ . _ )
solomon _ ata ke a _ Rehoboam-em _ , _ rehoboam _ ata ke a _ Abijah-m _ , _ abijah _ ata ke a _ Asa-m _ ,
a sa _ ata ke a _ Jehoshaphat-em _ , _ Jehoshaphat _ ata ke a _ Joram-em _ , _ Joram _ ata ke a _ Uzziah-m _ .
Uzziah _ ata ke a _ Jotham-em _ , _ Jotham _ ata ke a _ Ahaz-em _ , _ ahaz _ ata ke a _ Hezekiah-m _ ,
Hezekiah _ ata ke a _ Manasseh-m _ , _ manasseh _ ata ke a _ Amos-em _ , _ amos _ ata ke a _ Josiah-m _ .
Josiah _ ata ke aat _ , _ Jechoniah-nkut _ anglegutkullghhiit _ allgegh kau ut _ tamaani _ Jews-et _ tugu luki _ aglagh te aqe yatki _ Babylon-mun _ .
kingu aneng _ aglagh te llghite a _ Babylon-mun _ , _ Jechoniah _ ata ke a _ Shealtiel-em _ , _ Shealtiel _ ata ke a _ Zerubbabel-em _ ,
zerubbabel _ ata ke a _ Abiud-em _ , _ Abiud _ ata ke a _ Eliakim-em _ , _ Eliakim _ ata ke a _ Azor-em _ ,
azor _ ata ke a _ Zadok-em _ , _ zadok _ ata ke a _ Achim-em _ , _ achim _ ata ke a _ Eliud-em _ ,
Eliud _ ata ke a _ Eleazar-em _ , _ Eleazar _ ata ke a _ Matthan-em _ , _ matthan _ ata ke a _ Jacob-em _ ,
Jacob _ ata ke a _ Joseph-em _ . _ Joseph _ ugu ikagh a _ Mary-m _ . _ mary _ naa ke a _ Jesus-em _ . _ Jesus _ Messiah-nguuq _ .
Sivunghi _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ whatete ut _ : _ 14-ngukaagut _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ Abraham-emeng _ David-mun _ . _ 14-ngukaagutlu _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ David-meng _ kenlanga _ Jews-et _ tugu luki _ aglagh te llegh itnun _ Babylon-mun _ . _ taagken _ Babylon-mun _ aglagh te llegh itneng _ 14-ngukaagutlu _ kingunegh ke te lghiit _ kenlanga _ Christ-am _ allgellegh anun _ .
Jesus _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ whaten _ : _ naange a _ mary _ aangʼghutngwaaqaq _ Joseph-mun _ , _ iwernga _ nengughte te llghite lukek _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ quminge stekagh a _ .
ugi kaghqagh an _ Joseph-em _ kenqigneghutmineng _ kayngusaakneghmeng _ mary _ pi luku _ , _ aksaqe luku _ pegge naqekagh a _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke ma luku _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh ni _ , _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ qavangugh kun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Joseph _ , _ David-em _ kingungha _ , _ alinge gpenang _ nulighqigu _ mary _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aqsa nge stekaqe a _ .
ighnegh nge naqngu uq _ ; _ atigh naken _ Jesus-meng _ qayughllak _ ellmi _ yug ni _ yuguliyaghqaqii _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ "
qamagte luni _ tawaten _ aneghtekau uq _ apeghiigh na luku _ Atanghem _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ ,
" _ aghnagh aq _ yug m _ atuqe llghite kanga _ quminge luni _ , _ ighnegh nge lleqe uq _ . _ ategh kete yaghqaqe a _ Emmanuel _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ whangkunnilnguq _ . _ "
enkaam _ Joseph _ taghtugh luni _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pi ke aq _ . _ mary _ nulighqegkaa _ ,
iwernga _ atuqe ma ite kanga _ kenlanga _ ighnegh nge llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ Joseph-em _ Jesus-meng _ ata iqe a _ .
Jesus _ allgegh aqngan _ Bethlehem-emi _ Judea-melngughmi _ , _ herod _ umiileg u lghii _ . _ allgellegh an _ kingu aneng _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ asivaghmeng _ kaate tke aat _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
Aapqughwaaqat _ , _ " _ naagu _ taghnughhagh _ allgegh lghii _ umiileg at _ Jews-et _ ? _ ighaleqetaagh a _ esghaamaaghput _ asivagh mete luku _ enkaam _ manigughyaghtughaqaghput _ . _ "
umiileg m _ Herod-em _ nagaqugh luku _ teggellghiigh ghllagkagh _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghlutengllu _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ maligte te luteng _ .
Tagsiqlighteghluki _ qamagte luki _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ nani _ Christ-a _ allgegh yaghqau a _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Bethlehem-emi _ Judea-melngughmi _ . _ Uuknaliqistem _ whaten _ igaqe kaqe a _ :
' _ elpek _ Bethlehem _ , _ Judah-melnguq _ , _ igleghutisteyaggiitneng _ Judah-m _ ukavantelleghpigaanghituten _ , _ qayughllak _ elpeneng _ tagi naqngu uq _ igleghte te i sta _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqagh _ yug mneng _ Israel-eghmiineng _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Herod-em _ aksaqe luku _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ , _ liigike na luku _ qavngaq _ aliigh yuwhaagh kau ta a _ ighaleqetaagh _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Bethlehem-emun _ aghulaqe lusi _ elngaatall _ ivagh teggu _ taghnughhagh _ . _ naalke gkufsigu _ ungipaate yaghtugh nakefsinga _ , _ whanga llu _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ umiileg m _ piyisteng _ igleghtekagh t _ . _ esghagh laataghkagh at _ ataasigh _ taana _ ighaleqetaagh _ asivagh mete luku _ , _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ . _ maligtekagh at _ kenlanga _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ taghnughhagh m _ ne an _ qule ani _ .
itegh luteng _ mangteghagh mun _ esghaghkagh at _ taghnughhagh _ , _ naange a llu _ mary _ . _ segesqughte uute luteng _ manigugh qu aat _ . _ taagken _ aqeftaghaagh teng _ qelpeghte luki _ tunqugh qu aat _ tunute yameng _ : _ gold-meng _ , _ frankincense-meng _ , _ myrrh-meng _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ qavangugh kun _ yitekagh i _ Herod-mun _ uteghnigh fqiita _ pisqelluki _ enkaam _ aglaghkagh t _ nuna meggnun _ alla tgun _ tume tgun _ .
ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ qavangugh kun _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vike luku _ Joseph _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ anag te kek _ Egypt-mun _ . _ Tamaanlleghhaten _ uteghnigh sqe lleg mnun _ kenlanga _ qayughllak _ Herod-em _ ivagh ste naqe a _ taghnughhagh _ tuqute ste na luku _ . _ "
enkaam _ unugmi _ tawani _ Joseph-em _ makete luni _ aghulaqe te gkakek _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ Egypt-mun _ .
Tamaantekat _ kenlanga _ Herod-em _ tuqu llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ apeghiigh kau uq _ Atanghem _ akuzi tkekagh a _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ whaten _ , _ " _ tuqlugh kaqe aqa _ ighnegh ka _ tagi sqellug qu _ Egypt-meng _ . _ "
Herod-em _ liigike yamigu _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag nun _ puughte ma ni luni _ sakrite ghllagkagh _ . _ taagken _ pilluwaghtet _ kayagtekagh i _ Bethlehem-emun _ , _ uvitanganunllu _ tuquqiisqelluki _ qamagte luki _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh neng _ , _ maalghug gnun _ ayumiqulleghtutka lghii nun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaakut _ taghnughhagh t _ nakmike kaqe ai _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh m _ allgellegh aneng _ maalghug ughte lghiik _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ liitekagh ghllag t _ apegh llegh itni _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh kun _ uuknaliqistem _ Jeremiah-am _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ apeghiighkagh _ :
" _ ramah- mi _ nagaqugh qu aat _ leghaghllagaataq _ . _ Rachel-nguftuq _ qiya lghii _ avaqutagh minun _ , _ repall _ ilutughsaghyaghqaaghhaagpenani _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ . _ "
Joseph-enkut _ Egypt-melluki _ herod _ tuqukagh _ , _ qavangugh kun _ Atanghem _ yaquleg an _ aliigh vikekagh a _ Joseph
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ uteghnigh te kek _ israel- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ tuqute i naqe yagh lghiit _ taghnughhagh meng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ . _ "
enkaam _ Joseph-em _ makete luni _ taghnughhagh llu _ naange a llu _ aglagh te gkakek _ israel- mun _ .
iwernga _ Joseph-em _ nagaqugh luku _ nutaghagh _ umiileg a _ Judea-m _ , _ Archelaus-nguniluku _ Herod-em _ ighnegh a _ , _ alingekagh _ tawavek _ aglagh nghmeng _ . _ qavangugh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh tke a _ Joseph _ Judea-tefqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ enkaam _ nazareth- mun _ aglaghkagh t _ Galilee-melngughmun _ . _ Tamaantekat _ uuknaliqistet _ whaten _ pillghat _ , _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ , _ " _ Messiah _ Nazareth-eghmiinguyaghqaaguq _ . _ "
Taakwaningani _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ aglagh luni _ kilgaa anun _ Judea-m _ , _ piinlegh iqe aq _ ungipaqimeng _ .
whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Avuteghqellusi _ taaqe tek _ seghleghqenneghmeng _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
John-nguuq _ uuknaliqistem _ Isaiah-am _ akuzi tkekagh a _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ kilgaa ni _ kina _ akilghuu aqe uq _ whaten _ : _ ' _ yataaghqe teggu _ Atanghem _ tume kaghqagh a _ , _ taklaghrukegte yagh teggu _ igleghavigkagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
John-em _ aatkagh i _ camel-em _ melqugh aneng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ meqagh meng _ tafsi luni _ , _ neqekluni _ locust-mengllu _ honey-mengllu _ .
yug t _ aglagh uute tke aat _ ellnga nun _ Jerusalem-emengllu _ Judea-mengllu _ uvitanganengllu _ kiiw m _ Jordan-em _ .
seghleghqe lleg teng _ qayvighqe nghatki _ , _ John-em _ paaptaayaaqegkangi _ Jordan-egni _ .
John-em _ esghagh luki _ Pharisees-elghutetlu _ Sadducees-elghutetlu _ tagi lghiit _ ellmi nun _ paaptaayesqelluteng _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ kitum _ anag sqe isi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleghqagh aneng _ kaate naqe lghii meng _ ?
sivuke lusi _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ ipapighqiteggu _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ avuteghqe llegh i _ .
Whatenʼngam _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte naanghite ainkut _ qayughllak _ kingunegh ke ainkut _ Abraham-em _ . _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ kingunegh ngllagh te nayagh aa _ maaken _ uyghag neng _ !
whaa _ maaten _ qalqalimayaqleggiinaghlluteng _ ayuqe ut _ uqfig t _ akugh itgun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ uqfig t _ pinigh lghii meng _ piite ste i nghite ngugh t _ kepe luki _ , _ kenghegnun _ miluute yaghqaa ut _ .
megh kun _ paaptaayeghiiqunga _ avuteghkegkanun _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ . _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh m _ kingu mneng _ paaptaaye lleqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng llu _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ kenegh meng llu _ . _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ whanga mneng _ , _ repall _ talwa _ kameg kek _ tugumiiqepagningite agka _ .
taana _ tagi yaghqagh _ nanqigtiyaqleggiinaaguq _ . _ aafte yaghqaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ yug t _ seghlegh neng _ , _ katam _ piitesiighaghtem _ pekete ta mineng _ malliigh llegh atun _ grain-et _ . _ kagpag luki _ grain-et _ mallagh _ tamaa na _ miluute yaghqaqe a _ qaame yaghqaa nghite ngugh gnun _ kenghegnun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ galilee- meng _ tagikagh _ Jordan-egnun _ , _ John-mun _ paaptaayesqelluni _ .
iwernga _ John-em _ akuzite naqutke kaqsagh kanga _ whaten _ , _ " _ whanga _ elpek _ paaptaayeyaghqaqsaghaghpenga _ . _ sangavek _ whanga mnun _ tagi ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ legan _ sa aqe ziin _ paaptaayenga _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pi kumtung _ apeghiighlleqaghpung _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ " _ enkaam _ John-em _ paaptaayekagh a _ .
Jesus _ paaptaayeyatni _ megh meng _ aanekagh _ . _ taagken _ qilag _ qelpegh luni _ esghagh kakek _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ uki lghiik _ dove-etun _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ nalugkagh k _ .
taagken _ me _ qilag meng _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Unanguuq _ piniqekagh ghllag ka _ ighnegh ka _ , _ efqugh ke pigte aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ aghulaqe tke a _ Jesus _ kilgaa nun _ , _ tughneghagh mun _ seghleghqe ste naqutke sqellug qu _ .
40 _ aghneq _ , _ 40 _ unuk _ Jesus _ negh ma ite ngughk _ ; _ taagken _ taakut _ aghnegh t _ kingu itneng _ iyataghkagh _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ neqe ughte sqe ki _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ yuug _ kiyaghte naanghite uq _ neqe inagh ghhagh kun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta akun _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ aglagh tke a _ Jerusalem-emun _ , _ agleghnagh lghii mun _ ne ghllag mun _ . _ tawani _ Temple-m _ uusqagh llegh akun _ nekeve ste luku
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ , _ qetgegh i _ tesamavek _ ; _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m nguq _ yaquleg minun _ paqnasightesaghtughlleqaaten _ ; _ iigge meggneng _ nuqnegh kete lleqe aaten _ luuraq _ itegagh ten _ uyghaghquunnayukata _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten llu _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ nanghiiqu gpenaan _ sa sqellug qu _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke nghite ka aneng _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ Jesus _ mayugh te luku _ uusqapiglleghiimun _ naayghagh mun _ keleg tke ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ ataneghpag u llegh i _ nuna m _ , _ pinighnagh llegh ghllag i llu _ .
enkaam _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Qamagtengngwaaghluki _ maakut _ tuune lleqe anka _ elpenun _ , _ segesqughte luten _ manigugh yagh kuvnga _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ , _ iqiten _ ! _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ manigugh yaghqaqe an _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh n _ , _ ellnginaaguqlu _ qepghagh te yaghqagh n _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh m _ unite yagu _ Jesus _ , _ yaquleg t _ aflengake yaghtugh qu aat _ .
Jesus-em _ nagaqugh luku _ John _ anusimingllaghvig mete ni luku _ , _ galilee- mun _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
nazareth- meng _ aglaghkagh _ Capernaum-emun _ tamaa uute na luni _ . _ Capernaum _ esne anite uq _ naayvagh m _ Galilee-m _ , _ nuna mi _ Zebulun-enkuk _ Naphtali-nkuk _ kingunghita _ kiyaghfig itni _ .
Jesus-em _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ uuknaliqistem _ Isaiah-m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ . _ Qavngarugllak _ Isaiah-m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna gkeni _ Zebulun-enkuk _ Naphtali-nkuk _ . _ taake uk _ nuna k _ naayvagh m _ tunganganilnguuk _ , _ nalla ani _ kiiw m _ Jordan-em _ , _ galilee- mete ngugh mi _ Gentile-et _ kiyaghfig itni _ !
Isaiah-m _ pi kaqe kangi _ whaten _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ seghleghqe llegh m _ mamleghqestellghani _ esghaate yaghqaa ut _ nighug ghllag meng _ . _ alinge llghite a _ tuqumeng _ llangaqa _ nuna at _ saape nga lghii _ taghneghagh nge te llegh aneng _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ aghtaghagh te aqe ai _ . _ "
galilee- mun _ uteghnigh llegh mineng _ kenle ke luku _ Jesus-em _ piinlegh iqe a _ ungipagh ke i lleg ni _ , _ " _ Avuteghqellusi _ seghleghqennanightek _ , _ qayughllak _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ igleghte te kete luku _ esne ani _ naayvagh m _ Galilee-m _ , _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ Simon-enkunguftuk _ ( _ ategh an _ allgha _ peter _ ) _ , _ Andrew-nkuk _ . _ iqalliniigh lghiik _ negaghpag ek _ miluute aqe luku _ naayvagh mun _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ , _ apeghtugh lleqe amtek _ iqalliniightengughtesqellutek _ yug neng _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ negaghpag tek _ unite luki _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Taaganiqaaghaq _ esghagh kakek _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ James-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ ighnegh kek _ Zebedee-m _ . _ angyagh meggni _ ata ke te lghiit _ negaghpag teng _ ilaaghtugh aqe ait _ . _ Jesus-em _ tuqlugh kakek _ .
Tawaninginaq _ angyagh tek _ unitekagh ak _ ata ek llu _ enkaam _ Jesus _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Jesus _ igleghakagh _ tea- ma anun _ galilee- mi _ , _ synagogue-ngitni _ apeghtugh i aqe luni _ . _ nani _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke aq _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ , _ naallghute qughkagh _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
ungipagh _ mingite kau lghii _ naallghute qugh llegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ Syria-mi _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagi tke ait _ ellnga nun _ qamagte luki _ qinuyug lghiit _ , _ allaaghhiinaaghneng _ aqnighnegh leg t _ , _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh leg t _ , _ sayugpagtagh kayug t _ , _ unegh ii iqe aat llu _ . _ qamagte luki _ Jesus-em _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii m _ maligtekagh at _ galilee- meng _ , _ Decapolis-meng _ , _ Jerusalem-emeng _ , _ Judea-meng _ , _ Jordan-emllu _ inglu aneng _ taagegken _ .
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maligte te lghiit _ , _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ aqumekagh _ . _ Maligsaaghtemi _ taku laghate te yatni _ ,
apeghtugh ikagh _ :
" _ tamaakut _ liisimake i lghiit _ aklukingalleghmeggneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
tamaakut _ qivghu lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutughsagh yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ qusevegngalghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe a _ nuna _ ellngit nun _ .
tamaakut _ atuqe i yu pigte lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh aneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqaqe ai _ piyuke llegh itneng _ .
tamaakut _ nangllegtagh lghiit _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ umyugaqegtagh t _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ esghagh yaghqaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i kayug t _ yug neng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ni yaghqaqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ amyuutke lleg nge lghiit _ atuqe te meggneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ qaatke te nga te meggneng _ quya ste lleg lgu ut _ , _ qayughllak _ yug ke ai _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ .
" _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ yug t _ seghlequuqangisi _ , _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ iqlengiqe tke kangisi _ maligte yaaghte u te gpesineng _ whanga mnun _ .
elngaatall _ quya ghllag tek _ qayughllak _ qilag mi _ pama _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh leg ghllag u usi _ . _ amenqun _ , _ neghigh luku _ uuknaliqistet _ amyuutkekagh it _ katam _ maaten _ amyuutkellghistun _ elpek si _ .
" _ taghyugh stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ iwernga _ taghyugh _ taghyughni igh u uute kuni _ , _ alla _ naten _ taghyughni ighsaghqagh u nghite uq _ . _ atugh u nanigh lleqe uq _ sa mun _ alngunak _ enkaam _ egte lleqe uq _ taagken _ yug t _ tutmaasghaqelleqaat _ . _ "
" _ nighug stun _ ayuqe usi _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ negh ghllag _ qemi m _ qaye anite ngughk _ talugh nga yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ kenegh lghutagh k _ kumaghllug kek _ sagnegh mun _ asi igh te naanghite ak _ . _ itupill _ quulvaqun _ lli lleqe ak _ nighug u te sqellug kek _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ ilunganilngughnun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ nighug i _ kuukgute steggu _ yug nun _ esghigh sqellug qu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ , _ enkaam _ usuqe nakangat _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenanga _ taaqesaghtugh u ni luki _ atuqe nghmeng _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i llu _ uuknaliqistetlu _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ tagi u nga _ apeghtugh te kete na luki _ ipa _ sa meng _ pisighpigaatangi _ .
ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ qilag nkuk _ nuna nkuk _ kenletghuutellghegkenun _ kenlanga _ , _ talwa _ sasquvegaghhaq _ allangughte naanghite uq _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ kenlanga _ qamagte luteng _ Liilightuusanilnguut _ apeghiigh llegh itnun _ .
Enkaangam _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ ataasigh _ liilightuusagh _ , _ apeghtuusagh ke gkunigu llu _ yug nun _ qaatke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ ukalighpigaaniluku _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ . _ Naqamenraq _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke gkumiki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ apeghtugh kumiki llu _ ila i _ yug t _ qaatkesqelluki _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi lleqe a _ aange yaghqaa ni luku _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ itegh naanghite usi _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ , _ wetku qun _ qaatkutngaaghataghaqufsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug neng _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ Pharisees-enengllu _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ yugtagh gpenasi _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yugtagh lghii _ nanqigsaqleguuq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi yagute kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ nanqigtivig mun _ aglaghsaqleguuq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ nallu ghllag _ ' _ , _ agghistenun _ aglaghsaqleguuq _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ sasii nghite ni kunigu _ yug lgute ni _ , _ aglaghsaqleguuq _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ hell- mun _ .
Enkaangam _ aghqefig gni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuune i naqe ma luten _ tunusagh gpeneng _ , _ neqagh u uute kuvgu _ sugagsimaniluku _ yug lgute n _ ,
tunute yan _ unite luku _ ilaliigh yaghtugh naken _ . _ taagken _ tagi luten _ tunute yan _ tuunaken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
" _ kitum _ avutke ma kangaten _ seghletun _ pi ma ni luni _ , _ ilaliigh aghte naken _ aglagh te ma luten _ nanqigtivig mun _ , _ luuraq _ avutkistegpek _ tuunayukangaten _ nanqigtistemun _ . _ taagken _ nanqigtistem _ kelengakistemun _ anusimingllagh ste na yu kangaten _ .
ipa _ pi amken _ , _ anusimingllaghtesimakangaten _ aanaanghituten _ kenlanga _ nanqigtistem _ llivike sqe llegh a _ qamagte luku _ llivike gkuvgu _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ gelgaghniigh gpenasi _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ qiliigh ke gkunigu _ taawa _ gelgaghniigh u uq _ qamagun _ ilu mikun _ .
enkaam _ aghenqignegh m _ iye gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ iike luku _ egte naken _ ! _ itagnagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ miluute lleghqagh aneng _ .
aghenqignegh m _ iigge gpek _ seghleghqe stegkangaten _ , _ kepe luki _ egte naketen _ ! _ pinigh aghagh yaghqaa uq _ yugusigh n _ nalighnegh ite ghngaaghmi _ , _ iingunagh mi _ hell- mun _ pi lleghqagh aneng _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kitum _ alngunak _ nuliigh ni _ pegtekunigu _ , _ igagh ngllagh te nakanga _ kelgute sighqagh meng _ pegte ma ni luku _ . _ '
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pegte yaghqaqe nghite a _ wetku qun _ gelgaghniigh kan _ . _ gelgaghniigh nghite ghngaan _ pegtekunigu _ , _ gelghaghniightesleqaa _ alla neng _ yug meng _ ugiigh kan _ . _ kitum _ nulighkegkumigu _ , _ taana _ yuug _ ellnga llu _ gelgaghniigh u lleqe uq _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i llu _ sivunegh si nguq _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ , _ ' _ akequsagh n _ avelghagh gpenaan _ , _ iwernga _ atanegh mun _ akequsagh n _ atuqe aqe gu _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ akeqe i gpenang _ atuqe luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh a _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ akeqe i gpenang _ qilag kun _ qayughllak _ aqumutagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh minun _ ,
nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ qayughllak _ itegagh iitagh ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ nalighmeng _ Jerusalem-kun _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag ke a _ Umiilegpagllagem _ .
akeqe i gpenang llu _ naasqugh gpegun _ qayughllak _ talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh _ nuyagh _ qategh snaanghite an _ nalighmeng _ tagnegh snaanghite an _ .
yeghlegi _ legan _ ' _ aangʼghhaasi _ ' _ , _ nalighmeng _ ' _ nakaaghhaasi _ ' _ . _ sa u aat _ ilate kufsiki _ taakugnun _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u ut _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ kina _ iye igh kuvgu _ elpek llu _ iye igh yaghqaa uten _ . _ kitum _ ggute a _ mughugaghtekuvgu _ elpek llu _ ggute n _ mughugaghsaghqaaguq _ ' _ .
" _ iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ seghletun _ pistesi _ akite gpenaki _ . _ kitum _ qasaghtegkangaten _ ullungag gpegun _ inglu a llu _ tuunaken _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ aglagh u uute kangaten _ nanqigtistemun _ , _ ggategken _ ellmi _ pi na lukek _ qaasligh gken llu _ tuunakegken _ ellnga nun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qelghuskagu _ akmagtagh ni _ igleghte te sqellug qu _ ataasigh mun _ mile- mun _ , _ alla _ ataasigh _ mile- a _ ilate naken _ .
kitum _ sa meng _ tungsigh vike kangaten _ , _ tuunaken _ . _ kitum _ sa meng _ navghagh vike kangaten _ , _ navghinnaken _ .
" _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ilakumtaagh si _ , _ ugumi ke luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ ' _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ pi amsi _ , _ ' _ piniqe luki _ ugumi ke i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ , _ yughagh te kaqe teki llu _ amyuutkistesi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quyastesqelluki _ ' _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aisi _ avaqutagh qu tsi _ ata gpesinun _ qilagmelngughmun _ . _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ tawateghlluwaaq _ pi aqe a _ . _ siqinegh ni _ piite sta qaa _ seghlegh nun llu _ pinigh lghii nun llu _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ qaatke te kayug nun llu _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akileghtughlleqisii-i _ piniqistenginaghhasi _ piniqe gkufsiki _ ? _ talwa _ tax-meng _ qerngughtistet _ piniqe aqe ait _ piniqisteteng _ .
enkaam _ ilakumtaghhiinasi _ quyake aatagh kufsiki _ , _ naten _ alla u lleqe tsi _ ila itneng _ yug t _ ? _ talwa _ maniguute igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quya kaqe ait _ ilakumtaagh teng _ !
elpek si _ avaqutagh ke u ta aneng _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ pinigh tek _ tawateghpigaq _ ata gpesi _ pinigh llegh atun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ pilleg si _ esghaghsaqegpenaki _ . _ Esghaghsaqegkufsiki _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ akileghtugh naanghite aisi _ .
" _ enkaam _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenang _ . _ qalghightagh ste i kayugu ut _ tuune i vagilgameng _ esghiisqelluteng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ synagogue-nillu _ tume ni llu _ usuqesqelluteng _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ akileghtuusangwaaghluteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ tuune i kuvek _ aklumalghii nun _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ,
kitumun _ alngunak _ nalluke sqellug qu _ tuune i i llegh n _ . _ ata gpek _ esghapag aqe aaten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ . _ "
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ piniiyugnegh stun _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh yuneghtu ut _ nekevghagh meng _ synagogue-nillu _ tume ni llu _ esghiisqelluteng _ yug nun _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ akileghtuusangwaaghluteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
iwernga _ yughagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ itegh luten _ ne gpenun _ umeg te luten _ yughagh aqe i _ ata gpenun _ aliinneghilgughmun _ . _ ata gpek _ liisimake a _ aksaqe luku _ sallghen _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh pig mun _ maniguusigalngughestun _ pi gpenasi _ . _ yughagh negh meggni _ uteghpagtagh aqe ait _ akuzite t _ sa meng _ pi sigh u nghite ngugh t _ . _ sumegh meggni _ akuzillegh ghllag megteggun _ kiimsigh lleqe ni luki _ yughagh lleg teng _ pi aqe ait _ .
ellngistun _ ayuqe gpenasi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ aklukegkaghsi _ , _ talwa _ aapte ste gpenasi _ .
" _ enkaam _ whaten _ yughagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ whangkuta _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ pamani _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ ategh n _ quulvallengli _ .
yughagh ukut _ ataneghpag u llegh n _ tagi sqellug qu _ , _ piyuke llegh n llu _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ katam _ qilagmelngughestun _ .
Neghyaghqaliteqeghtikut _ aghneghmi _ whani _ .
seghevute aghte ki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ seghevute ma luki _ seghletun _ pisteput _ .
nanghiiqu lleg nge ste gpenaamta _ , _ iwernga _ yugu likut _ taagken _ seghlegh meng _ . _ ataneghpag u llegh _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleq _ , _ nighughqelleq _ , _ elpek _ pi katen _ quunperugllag _ . _ amen _ . _ '
" _ seghevute kufsiki _ seghletun _ pistesi _ , _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ seghevute lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ seghevute nghite kufsiki _ seghletun _ pistesi _ , _ ata gpesi _ seghevute naanghite ai _ seghleghqe lleg si _ .
" _ Fast-eneghpesini _ iilqesugnighqegpenasi _ piniiyugnegh stun _ . _ aghmig igate ut _ , _ mesuuna igate ut _ liigikesqelluteng _ fast-enguniluteng _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ akileghtuusangwaaghluteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
Fast-eneghpeni _ aghmig aqe i llu _ mesuuna aqe i llu _ ,
ila gpenun _ nalluke sqellug qu _ fast-ellghen _ . _ iwernga _ ata gpek _ aliite nghite ngugh m _ liisimake a _ sa aqe uten _ enkaam _ akileghtugh lleqe aaten _ .
" _ nuna mi _ whani _ kagpag gpenasi _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ kingug m llu _ anaghtaa llegh m llu _ naafqe lleqe ai _ , _ teglegniightetlu _ naafqii luteng _ tegleg lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ qilag mi _ kagpag i tek _ aklungi meng _ qayughllak _ moth-ngituq _ , _ anaghtaangituq _ naafqii yaghqagh meng _ , _ tegleghniightengituqlu _ naafqii luteng _ teglegughyaghqameng _ .
Sumeghtaghaatkumanginaghlleqaghsi _ aklungi gpesinun _ kagpag vig i _ .
" _ iye k _ kenegh lghutagh stun _ ayuqe uk _ yugusigh mun _ . _ iiskegtekuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ nighug ghllag u lleqe uq _ ,
iwernga _ iyellug mete kuvek _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh n _ mamleg ghllagu lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ nighug _ ilu gpenite ngughk _ mamleg u kuni _ , _ elngaatall _ mamleg pigte uq _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ qepghagh te naanghite ak _ maalghug _ umiileg k _ . _ maalghug gneng _ umiileg lgu kuni _ ugumi ke lleqe a _ ataasigh _ , _ piniqe lleqe a _ ila a _ . _ qaatke te nga lleqe uq _ ataasigh mun _ , _ pite kete naanghite a _ ila a _ . _ enkaam _ piniqnaanghitaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ piniqe ma luku _ mat- ni _ .
" _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ ungvalleghsi _ , _ sa meng _ neghe lleghqagh i _ , _ meghe lleghqagh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ aate lleghqagh i _ . _ sumeghtaghagh qagh tek qun _ , _ unguvallegh _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ neqe meng _ , _ yugusigh llu _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ aatkagh neng _ .
esghaqagh teki qun _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh igate ut _ , _ unatagh igate ut _ , _ kagpag i igate ut _ . _ naqamllu _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ neghqe aqe ai _ ! _ elpek si _ megnunaghataghanghitsii _ qawaag neng _ ?
naligh gpesi _ nulqaviigh te kete luku _ unguvallegh ni _ taakughlleqaguu _ ?
" _ sangan _ nulqaviightaqetsi _ aate yaghqagh meng _ ? _ esghaqagh teki qun _ piitesighagh at _ piite llegh it _ , _ qepghagh igate ut _ talwa _ aatkagh ngllagh igate ut _ ellmeggneng _ .
ungipaate amsi _ talwa _ solomon _ aklungi ghllag mini _ aate igate uq _ piitesighaghestun _ pinightutka lghii meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh aqe ai _ vegaagh t _ , _ iwernga _ aga _ unaami _ quug ke aqe ait _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh kayugu kaki _ veghaaget _ , _ aasi ightugh aghagh naanghite i sagh i _ elpek si _ ? _ Ugpeqilleghqestaapigutsi _ !
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nulqaviightegpenasi _ whaten _ , _ ' _ sa meng _ negh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ megh naqe sta _ ? _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ sa meng _ aate naqe sta _ ? _ '
Gentile-et _ tamaa na _ nulqaviigh te kaqe aat _ . _ ata gpesi _ qilagmelnguum _ liisimake ai _ qamagte luki _ aklukegkasi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh ughte stekek _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ piyuke llegh a llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ aklukegkasi _ .
nulqaviigh tke gpenaan _ unaami igh lleghqagh _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami m _ seghleliigh i _ itagnagh yaghqaa ut _ tawavek _ aghnegh mun _ . _ seghlegh ligh u aagh _ pikayug u uq _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ ilaagh aghagh gpenaan _ unaami m _ seghleliigh lleghqagh aneng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ nanqigte i gpenasi _ ila gpesineng _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqiggneghillisi _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aisi _ tawatengngwaaq _ nanqigte i llegh gpesistun _ ila gpesineng _ . _ atuqe lleqe ai llu _ elpesi nun _ ataasigh t _ tamaakut _ pi kasi _ ila gpesinun _ .
sangan _ esghagh zigu _ yug lgute gpek _ iisqughute a _ , _ elpek _ katam _ iisqughute n _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ avelghagh luku _ ?
sa lghii meng _ yug lgute n _ pi zigu _ , _ ' _ entaa- a _ iisqughute igh qagh laken _ ' _ , _ elpek _ paninang _ iisqughute lgu luten _ unaghsigh ghllag meng _ ?
uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ sivuke luku _ unaghsigh igh ghllag _ iye gpeneng _ nusug luku _ elngaatall _ whateghlluwaaq _ esghagh luku _ yug lgute n _ iisqughute igh naken _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Legasiighwaghtenun _ apeghtuusagh ke gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ qikmigh stun llu _ kurugaghestunllu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ sa u aat _ agleghnagh lghiit _ tuune gpenaki _ qikmigh nun _ luuraq _ sughug na yu kangisi _ . _ akituqagh t _ sungagh t _ miluute gpenaki _ kurugaghnun _ , _ luuraq _ tutmaasghaqnayukatki _ .
" _ aapte tek _ , _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ ; _ ivagh i tek _ , _ naalkute lleqe usi _ ; _ tenglugtugh tek _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe aisi _ .
qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ aapte lghii _ , _ allgegh te yaghqaa uq _ ; _ kina _ alngunak _ ivagh i lghii _ , _ naalkute yaghqaa uq _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ tenglugtugh lghii _ amig kun _ , _ qelpegh u lleqe a _ .
kitum _ yug m _ ighnegh ni _ tungsigh kan _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ uyghag meng _ ?
nalighmeng _ tungsigh kan _ iqallug meng _ , _ tuune lleqe agu _ nemegh yameng _ ?
Seghleghughngaaghpesi _ , _ avaqutagh si _ tuune yaghqaqe asi _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ . _ ata i _ qilag mete ngughk _ tuune i yug aghagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ tunute yameng _ tamaakunun _ aapleghhinun _ ellmi nun _ .
" _ enkaam _ yug lgute gpesinun _ pinitun _ pi ste sug kufsi _ , _ elpek si llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe teki _ . _ tawaten _ apeghtugh i u ut _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh i llu _ , _ uuknaliqistetlu _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ itegh tek _ kagpestaaghhagh kun _ amig kun _ . _ amigh k _ hell- mun _ ayuqe lghii _ nuqutu uq _ , _ tume kegte uq llu _ enkaam _ uglagh _ taakwagun _ igleghte aqe uq _ .
iwernga _ amigh k _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghii _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ , _ tuumllugmetuqlu _ enkaam _ qafsinkuuragh ghhagh m _ naalke aqe ai _ tume t _ unguvallegh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ kelenga lusi _ uuknaliqistesighwaaghneng _ . _ taku lleqe aisi _ penniighsugnighqelluteng _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
liigike lleqe asi _ nangaghnegh itgun _ liigike llegh gpesistun _ uqfig t _ sa meng _ piite ste i llegh itgun _ . _ sikughllug t _ piite ste i igate ut _ grapes- meng _ nalighmeng _ figs- meng _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ pinitun _ pi igate ut _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i yaghqaa uq _ seghlegh meng _ .
uqfig _ pinigh lghii _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ , _ uqfig _ seghlegh _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
enkaam _ alngunak _ uqfig _ piite ste i nghite ngughk _ pinigh lghii meng _ kepe luni _ kumaghsaghqagh u uq _ .
Enkaangam _ tawatete llegh itgun _ liigike lleqe asi _ uuknaliqe i ste sighwaagh ta i _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh ni _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ ila i _ yug m _ whanga mnun _ maligsaaghtekniiqut _ enkaam _ pi aqe aatnga _ , _ ' _ atanegh ke amken _ ' _ iwernga _ itegh naanghite ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ Tamaakunginaat _ atuqe i lghiit _ piyuke llegh aneng _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ uglagh m _ pi yaghqaqe aanga _ whaten _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ ategh gpegun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ apegh qaghkagh ut _ . _ ategh gpegun _ aag negh squgh ke aqe aput _ tughneghagh t _ uglagh lghii neng _ yug neng _ . _ ategh gpegun _ allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaagukut _ uglagh ghngaan _ ! _ '
iwernga _ whaten _ pi lleqe anka _ , _ ' _ nallukngwaagh amsi _ , _ iqite tek _ whanga mneng _ , _ seghletun _ pisteni _ ' _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate lghii _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke gkumiki _ peghqinegh lghii tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ tawallima _ mangteghagh _ ullegh ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ uyghag kun _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
" _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ nagate ghngaaghmi _ apeghtugh i lleg mnun _ , _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ , _ nalluqagh tun _ yug tun _ ayuqe uq _ mangteghagh ngllaghkagh _ qenaaghllug kun _ .
eslallugughte ghllag yalghiimi _ , _ kiiw t _ uleve magh meng _ , _ anuqligh ghllag yalghiimi llu _ , _ aga _ mangteghagh _ uulegh ke aq _ naavngwaaghluni _ . _ "
Jesus _ tamaaken _ apeghtugh i nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yuke aat _ ,
qayughllak _ apeghtugh ikagh _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni _ , _ apeghtugh i kayug stun _ liilightuusagh meng _ pi gpenani _ .
Jesus _ qemi meng _ ukig yan _ , _ yug lghute ghllag m _ maligtekagh a _ .
taagken _ yuug _ , _ leprosy-lek _ , _ tagi luni _ ellnga nun _ , _ segesqughte vike luku _ , _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ , _ ukmangigh qagh nga _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ tawavek _ saafte luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke aqa _ , _ ukmangigh u aghten _ ! _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ leprosy-ngiitkaq _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ naallghute llegh gpeneng _ , _ yeghlegi _ aglagh a _ priest- mun _ esghagh ligu _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ taagken _ aghqerraaghhaaten _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ pi sqe llegh atun _ ipapighqesqelluku _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ Capernaum-emun _ pi ke aq _ . _ kaate aqe uq llu _ , _ Rome-em _ umiilwaaghan _ taku luku _ kayusiitaghtesqelluni _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ atanegh _ , _ whangkunni _ qepghaghteka _ , _ uniigh ma uq _ , _ ikfiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ naallghute yaghtugh naqe aqa _ . _ "
iwernga _ umiilwaaghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ itagnagh nghite unga _ elpenun _ itegh vike yaghqaa lunga _ mangteghagh mnun _ . _ legan _ tawanlluten _ naallghute sqe gu _ qepghaghteka _ enkaam _ naallghute li _ .
qelegh i kayug meng _ umiileg lgu unga _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ qelegh aqe anka _ pilluwaghtenka _ . _ ataasigh _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ ' _ aga _ aghulaqe lleqe uq _ . _ ila a _ whaten _ pi kumkun _ , _ ' _ tea- ai _ ' _ tagi lleqe uq _ . _ Qepghaghteka _ qelegh kumkun _ , _ ' _ una _ pi aghte gu _ ' _ , _ aga _ pi lleqe a _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luku _ saghiigha yuke aq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ maligte te lghiit _ ellmi nun _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nallagh te igate unga _ kitumeng _ alngunak _ Israel-eghmiimeng _ , _ uutun _ yug tun _ ugpeqe i neghtutka lghii meng _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ asivaghmengllu _ pakfalla meng llu _ yug lghute t _ tagi laghate te yaghqaa ut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ qilag m _ . _ tawani _ aqume uute luteng _ neghe lgusigh lleqe ait _ sivunegh put _ Abraham-enkut _ , _ Isaac-enkut _ , _ Jacob-enkut _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ataneghpag u llegh mete yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ aanesaghqagh u ut _ mamleg ghllag mun _ , _ tawani _ elngaatall _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ ggute teng _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ avuteghqem _ angtalanganeng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetun _ apeghiigh lleqe uq _ . _ " _ enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ umiilwaaghem _ qepghaghtenga _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
Jesus _ Peter-enkunun _ pi luni _ , _ esgha qaa _ aghnagh _ Peter-em _ saki a _ qavaghvig mete uq _ puqlegha luni _ .
Saafsaqminigu _ iiggagh kun _ puqlegha nga i tke aq _ , _ aga _ makete luni _ kepsiiqukagh a _ .
Ighivgaghyagu _ Jesus-mun _ tagi qugh tke ait _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ enkaam _ aag negh squgh ke ai _ tughneghagh it _ akuzillegh mikun _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ qinuyuget _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ apeghiigh na luku _ uuknaliqistem _ Isaiah-m _ whaten _ pillgha _ , _ " _ tugu kaqe ai _ qinuyug lleg put _ , _ iqite kaqe ai _ aqnighnegh put _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ esghagh luki _ uvitminilnguut _ yug lghute ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe sqekagh i _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ aghvigh na luteng _ .
taagken _ apeghtugh i kayug m _ liilightuusagh meng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ natmun _ alngunak _ pi kuvek _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ kaviigh t _ riigte lgu ut _ , _ qawaag t _ unglute lgu ut _ , _ iwernga _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ ingaghte vig ite aqe uq _ . _ "
ila yan _ maligte yaaghte yan _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ maligte lleqe amken _ iwernga _ sivuke luku _ ata ka _ llivegh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ tamaakut _ maligte te yu nghite ngugh t _ whanga mnun _ tuqu kau ut _ taghneghagh megteggun _ ; _ llivegh litki _ tuqumasliiteng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte yan _ maligsaaghtengillu _ uuglleghaatkat _ .
puglegh llghite a _ kiingungiighhaaneng _ esla _ nuuskagllagan _ naafte ghllagkagh _ , _ naayvagh llu _ imaghllug ughte ghllag magh mi _ , _ repall _ angyagh _ imighaataqegkaa _ . _ iwernga _ Jesus _ qavaa lghii _ .
Maligsaaghtet _ taku luku _ taghtughtekaat _ whaten _ pi magh an _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ yugu likut _ ! _ tuqu laghate te naqe ukut _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ alinge tsi _ ? _ Ugpeqilleghqestaapiguusi _ ! _ " _ taagken _ nekeve luni _ ineghtekakek _ anuqallu _ imaghllug t llu _ enkaam _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ .
qamagte luteng _ saghiigha yuke aat _ . _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Natelnguuwa _ yuug _ una _ ? _ talwa _ anuqe m llu _ imaghllug t llu _ qaatke kangat _ ! _ "
Jesus-enkut _ kaate yameng _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ , _ aglaghkagh t _ Gadara-ghmiit _ nuna itnun _ . _ taagken _ maalghug _ yug k _ tughneghagh leg k _ ilumegnegun _ tagi lutek _ llivegh neng _ nallaqagh ak _ Jesus _ . _ suugllug ghllag k _ repall _ kina _ alngunak _ taakwagun _ tume kun _ igleghte igate ngughk _ .
legan _ esghagh luku _ Jesus _ akilghuukagh k _ , _ " _ sa naqe zikut _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ ikfiqe ste naqe zikut _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ ? _ "
taawa nguq _ qantagha ni _ kurugagh lghute t _ , _ negh aqe ut _ .
tughneghagh t _ maniguute pigte luteng _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ aane stekufkut _ , _ kurugaghnun _ iteghaatesnakefkut _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ " _ aanleghaate luteng _ kurugaghnun _ iteghaatkat _ . _ aga _ kurugagh at _ pangaleg tke aat _ asitmun _ naayvagh mun _ nagnegh luteng _ megh mi _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
Kurugaghneng _ aflengake i lghiit _ qimaaguutkat _ ne mun _ . _ tawani _ aapqagket _ sa mate kek _ tughneghagh lgu yagh lghiik _ ilumegnegun _ , _ samatagh nge i llu _ kurugagh lghute t _ .
enkaam _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ tamaakumiit _ esghagh yaghtugh tke aat _ Jesus _ . _ esghagh yamegteggu _ maniguute pigte luteng _ aghulaqe sqekagh at _ nuna meggneng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ aghvag iqe aq _ . _ enkaam _ Capernaum-emun _ aglaghkagh _ ne minun _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ ellnga nun _ tagi tke aat _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ allighagh akun _ . _ Jesus-em _ liigike luki _ ugpeqilleghtulngit _ , _ pi ke aa _ unegh ii iqe aq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ quya _ ! _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ . _ "
taagken _ ila i _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ sumeghtaghaghkagh t _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ seghleghqe ghllag uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh u yug uq _ seghevute i llegh mikun _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake luki _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ seghlegh meng _ sumeghtaghagh tsi _ ?
naligh _ akuzillegh _ piyaqnagh u i te a _ , _ ' _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute ut _ ' _ nalighmeng _ ' _ makete luten _ piyug i _ ' _ ?
liigike ste naqe amsi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ seghevute i lleghqagh lgu ta a _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ " _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ makete luten _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh a _ ! _ "
yuug _ makete luni _ aglaghkagh _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ tallugh yuke aat _ , _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ tawatelngughmeng _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleliskangi _ yug t _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ igleghte te kete luku _ esgha qaa _ tax-em _ qerngughte i ste nga _ , _ aqume luni _ qepghagh vig mini _ ; _ Matthew-nguftuq _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ Matthew-m _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ .
mulu gpenateng _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ negh yaghtuqagh t _ Matthew-nkunun _ . _ neghe uute ma luki _ tax-meng _ qerngughtistelghutetlu _ , _ seghleghqestelghutetlu _ aqume luteng _ Jesus-enkut _ neghe lgusighkagh it _ .
ila ita _ Pharisees-et _ esghagh luku _ neghe lgute yu igh i lghii _ , _ maligsaaghtengi _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ sangan _ apeghtughiste gpesi _ neghe lgusigh aki _ tax-meng _ qerngughtistetlu _ , _ seghleghqestetlu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luki _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ yugunqegtagh t _ aghallegtaghsughniitut _ , _ tamaakunginaat _ qinuyug lghiit _ .
liite yaghtugh teggu _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ una _ akuzite nite ngughk _ igaqegkagh _ whaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ piyuke nghite anka _ aghqe te si _ , _ itupill _ nangllegtagh sug amsi _ . _ ' _ tagi u nghite unga _ tagsigh na luki _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tagi u unga _ tagsigh na luki _ seghleghqestet _ . _ "
taagken _ John-em _ Paaptaayestem _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ whangkuta llu _ Pharisees-etlu _ awen _ fast- u aqe sta _ , _ naqam _ maligsaaghteten _ fast-egpenateng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nulightugh yaghqagh m _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ qivghu nga yaghqau aat _ tawanlluku _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ iwernga _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate yaghqaa uq _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ iqite stekumegteggu _ , _ elngaatall _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ fast-ellequt _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaagh naanghite ak _ aatkagh lug k _ nutaghagh meng _ liiqnegh meng _ . _ ilaagh llegh _ qellughtekuni _ piig u lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ piig llegh _ sulleve lleqe uq _ .
talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ wine-eghraghaghmeng _ imigh naanghite a _ awataghpag lug _ qayughllak _ awataghpag lug _ imigh kuni _ aafkagh luni _ imaa igh u lleqe uq _ . _ enkaam _ awataghpag lug _ atugh u yaghqaa nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ iwernga _ awataghpagraghagh _ imigh kuni _ wine-eghraghaghmeng _ qerngagh egmek _ naave naanghite uk _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus _ akuzi ma luku _ Jews-et _ igleghutistengat _ itegh luni _ segesqughte luni _ manu akun _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panike a _ whaa _ tuqunʼghhaaguq _ , _ iwernga _ taku luku _ saaftekuvgu _ unguvagh lleqe uq _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ , _ maligsaaghtengillu _ maligte tke aat _ .
aglagh ma luki _ , _ qinuyug lghii m _ aghnagh m _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ tunutanganeng _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ kiitelqungigalnguq _ . _ whaten _ sumeghtagh aqe aq _ , _ " _ Saafteqeghsaqumkun _ aatkagh akun _ , _ naallghute nayagh unga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ saaftekagh a _ atkuyaagh an _ kenigh akun _ .
Jesus-em _ qiive te kete luku _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panig mni _ alinge gpenang _ ! _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ naallghute uten _ . _ " _ aga _ aghnagh _ naagh llegh u tke aq _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ kaate luni _ igleghutistenkunun _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ tuqu i lghii ni _ qalghightaghtetlu _ , _ yug lghute t llu _ qiya aghte tete te ghllag lghiit _ .
tawavek _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aanleghaate tek _ ! _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuqu llghite uq _ qavaa uq _ ! _ " _ iwernga _ nenglaqegkaat _ .
Aanleghaatesatki _ , _ itegh luni _ Jesus-em _ tugukagh a _ iiggagh kun _ , _ enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh _ unguvaqagh _ .
enkaam _ taana _ allaaghlluwhaghtilleq _ ungipagh kekagh at _ tea- ma ani _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ ne meng _ . _ ayaakagh k _ yug k _ maligte yu aqe ak _ , _ akilghuu magh egmek _ whaten _ , _ " _ ighneghagh ni _ David-em _ , _ nanglleg yagute kung _ ! _ "
aga _ mangteghagh mun _ itegh yan _ maligtekagh ak _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ Ugpeqestegneguu _ naallghute i lleghqagh ka _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe ak _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ iye gkenkun _ saafte lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh gpetegetun _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ esghagh yagutekagh k _ . _ Jesus-em _ ineghtengngwaaqakek _ , _ " _ ungipagh gpenatek _ kitumun _ alngunak _ . _ "
iwernga _ navek _ pinegh megteni _ apegh aqe ka ak _ Jesus-em _ apeghiigh qagh a _ ellmegnun _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ aghulaqe ma lukek _ , _ Jesus-mun _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ .
legan _ Jesus-em _ tughneghagh _ aane sta _ , _ yuug _ aga _ akuzikagh _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute t _ saghiigha yug te luteng _ whaten _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Whatelngughmeng _ allaaghlluwaghtilleghmeng _ esghaate igate ukut _ israel- mi _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Pharisees-et _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ umiileg ita _ tughneghagh t _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelisimaat _ aane ste qigh sqellug qu _ tughneghagh neng _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ galilee- mi _ , _ apeghtugh i magh mi _ synagogue-ngitni _ , _ ungipagh ke i magh mi llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qamagte luki _ aqnighnegh leg t llu _ qinuyug lghiit llu _ .
esghagh luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ nanglleg yagutekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh nga ghllaget _ , _ kayute ngunateng _ ; _ penniigh stun _ penniighnightengilngughestun _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ ugpeqe yug aqe ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ Tamaakunguut _ uspute nga lghiit _ nunivagseghagh nun _ unataghyaqleggiinaaghtekat _ . _ taawanginaq _ palapiguut _ qepghaghtet _ .
Enkaangam _ yughaghte k _ Atanghanun _ unataghyaghqagh t _ , _ kayagte i sqellug qu _ qepghaghtekaghqameng _ unataghyaghqagh anun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ qerngughte luki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelitkii _ aane ste i yaghqaa luki _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ naallghute i yaghqaa luki _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aqnighnegh neng llu _ , _ qinu yu gneng llu _ .
Ukunguut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ : _ sivuligh _ , _ simon _ ( _ alla _ ategh leg _ peter- meng _ ) _ , _ Andrew _ ( _ anglegutanga _ ) _ , _ James-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ ( _ Zebedee-m _ ighnegh kek _ ) _ ,
Philip-enkut _ , _ Bartholomew-nkut _ , _ Thomas-enkut _ , _ Matthew-nkut _ ( _ tax-meng _ qerngughte i ste u yagh lghii _ ) _ , _ James-enkut _ ( _ ighnegh a _ Alphaeus-em _ ) _ , _ Thaddaeus-enkut _ ,
Simon-enkut _ Zealot-a _ , _ Judas _ Iscariot-lu _ ( _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ Jesus-meng _ ) _ .
Jesus-em _ , _ taakut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-et _ kayagtekagh i _ qelghuumiita _ , _ " _ Gentile-etlu _ , _ Samaria-ghmiitlu _ nuna itnun _ pi fqaafsi _ .
yeghlegi _ Israel-eghmiinun _ pi tek _ qayughllak _ iflakagh stun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ .
navek _ alngunak _ pinegh gpesini _ whaten _ ungipagh aqe tek _ , _ ' _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ ! _ '
Qinuyuget _ naallghute ki _ , _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh teki _ , _ leprosy-lget _ naallghute ki _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ aane ste qugh teki _ yug neng _ . _ aki u na an _ allgegh te kau usi _ , _ enkaam _ aki u na an _ tuune tek _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ mani meng _ : _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ talwa _ copper-meng _ .
kelqe gpenasi _ akmagtagh meng _ , _ simiite kaghqagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ talwa _ ayaviigh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ qepghagh a _ aklukegkaaneng _ tuune yaghqaa uq _ .
" _ Town-enun _ nalighmeng _ village-enun _ kaate negh gpesini _ ivagh i aqe tek _ kitumeng _ pinigh lghii meng _ enkaam _ ellngan ite aqe tek _ kenlanga _ aghulaqe yaghqaaghte llegh gpesinun _ .
itegh kufsi _ mangteghagh anun _ quya ta qite ki _ tawanlenguut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a _ elpesi nite li _ . _ '
Upughaskangisi _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ tawantesnakesi _ . _ iwernga _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ , _ quya ste i llegh i _ veghte nakesi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ upugha tete nghite kangisi _ nalighmeng _ nagate nghite kangisi _ , _ aane te kete luku _ mangteghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ aghulaqe te kete luku _ town-meng _ , _ itegagh gpesi _ pagula i _ ufsug te nakesi _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ , _ Sodom-eghmiitlu _ Gomorah-ghmiitlu _ aghyuulleghqestaaghhaayaghqaagut _ taam _ ne m _ yug aneng _ ! _ "
" _ ukughsi _ ! _ kayagtekumsi _ penniigh stun _ qungangitnilngughestun _ amaa t _ lliighlequsi _ enkaam _ peghqinghulusi _ nemeghyagh stun _ , _ nekeggmellusi _ doves-tun _ .
kelenga lusi _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ tugu lusi _ aglagh u lleqe aisi _ agghistenun _ , _ kagsagmig lleqe aisi llu _ synagogue-meggni _ .
whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ , _ nekeve ste lleqe aisi _ sivu itgun _ igleghutistetlu _ umiileg t llu _ . _ enkaam _ liigikesaghqaaghlleqaghpesinga _ ellngit nun llu _ Gentile-enunllu _ .
Nanqigtestemun _ aglagh u uute kangisi _ , _ teggellghiigh gpenasi _ naten _ akuzi lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh gpesineng _ . _ akuzi yaghqaaghtekufsi _ akuzite kaghqagh lgu lleqe usi _ .
akuzite t _ elpek si _ pike nghite asi _ qayughllak _ ata gpesi _ taghneghagh kek _ akuzi lleqe uk _ elpesigun _ .
" _ yug t _ ellmeng _ katam _ anglegute teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ , _ ata t llu _ avaqutagh teng _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaqe ait _ . _ avaqutagh t _ angu yiite luki _ angayuqagh teng _ tuqute ste lleqe ait _ .
whanga mneng _ apallugh ke lusi _ yug m _ qamagte luni _ ugumi ke lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ nuqete neghtuqagh t _ kenlanga _ kenle mun _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ .
takukagh gpesini _ amyuutke kangisi _ , _ ila anun _ town-em _ qimag ggaasi _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ qamagte naanghite asi _ Israel-em _ town-ngi _ , _ sivungagh ni _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh an _ .
" _ maligsaagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ apeghtughiste mineng _ , _ talwa _ qepghagh a _ qaasghute i nga nghite uq _ umiileg mineng _ .
itagnaghi yaghqaa uq _ maligsaagh a _ apeghtughiste mitun _ lliigh kuni _ , _ qepghagh a llu _ umiileg mitun _ lliigh kuni _ . _ naasqugh u te i lghii _ nengllugute mineng _ , _ Beelzebul-meng _ atigh ma katgu _ , _ nengllugutangi _ seghleghataghaaluki _ atigh yaghqaqe ait _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ tamaakut _ amyuqetaghtet _ . _ sa u a _ alngunak _ nallukekagh _ liitesaghqagh u uq _ , _ qamagte luni llu _ aksaqekagh _ qayvighqesaghqagh u uq _ .
elpesi nun _ sa u aat _ apeghkagh nka _ apegh yaghqaqe asi _ tea- ma anun _ . _ sigutqugh tkekagh nka _ elpesi nun _ , _ ungipagh ke yaghqaqe asi _ mangteghagh t _ qaye itneng _ .
" _ enkaam _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ tuqute i kayug t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh meng _ iwernga _ tuqute i naanghite ut _ unguva sigh meng _ . _ itupill _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qayughllak _ hell- mi _ naafqii yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh gkeneng _ yugusigh meng llu _ unguva sigh meng llu _ .
Penny-meng _ tukfigh yaghqaqe agsi _ qawaaggaak _ , _ naqamllu _ aag llegh a _ ifkagh kan _ ata gpesi _ liisimake a _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ aflengake aghagh lusi _ ayuqe aisi _ , _ qayughllak _ talwa _ nuyagh gpesi _ uglaghtalngi _ liisimake ai _ .
enkaam _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ ata gpesi _ megnu ke aghagh aisi _ qawaaggaghneng _ !
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ , _ whanga mnun _ pikniluni _ , _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ pikniluku _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipaate kaki _ yug t _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luni _ whanga llu _ ata ka _ qilag mete ngughk _ ungipaate lleqe aqa _ whanga mnun _ pike nghite ni luku _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ paninang _ aleghqugh qu ai _ , _ " _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ nuna m _ yug anun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ nekeggmellegh nge ste i yaghtugh u nghite unga _ , _ taawanginaq _ pillugute ste i yaghtugh u unga _ .
tagi u unga _ yug mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ ata a _ , _ aghnagh mun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ naange a _ , _ ukaagh anun _ anguyag liite sqellug qu _ saki a _ aghnagh _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ nengllugutangita _ anguyag liite lleqe aat _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ata ni _ nalighmeng _ naa ni _ pakiggulluku _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ ighnegh ni _ nalighmeng _ panig ni _ pakiggulluku _ whanga mneng _ , _ whanga _ pikepagningite aqa _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ qaquuragh ni _ tugu yu nghite kunigu _ maligte naanghite aanga _ , _ enkaam _ whanga mni _ itagnagh nghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ ellmi nun _ piknikumigu _ ifla yaghqaqe a _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ unguvallegh ni _ pegtekunigu _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ unguvallegh pig _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ upughaskangisi _ , _ whanga llu _ upugha lleqe aanga _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ upughaskuminga _ , _ upugha lleqe a _ kayagte i steke _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ upughaskumigu _ uuknaliqe i sta _ uuknaliqe i ste u ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ uuknaliqe i stetu te _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ upughaskumigu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ yuug _ elqughute nga ta aneng _ , _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe uq _ elqughutngagh lghii tun _ yug tun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nenglekegte lghii meng _ meghsi kunigu _ ukalighpigaq _ maligte yaaghteke _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghtekete te mneng _ , _ ipa _ pi amsi _ akileghtuusagh nge pestaagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ apeghiigh yamiki _ apeghtughaneghmeng _ , _ tamaaken _ aghulaqekagh _ ila itnun _ town-et _ apeghtugh i na luni llu _ ungipagh ke i na luni llu _ .
anusimingllaghvig mete luni _ John-em _ Paaptaayestem _ nagaqugh luku _ Christ-a _ sa aqe ta a _ , _ ila i _ maligsaaghteni _ kayagtekagh i _ Jesus-mun _ .
aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ Elpengwaa _ tagi naqe nikagh at _ , _ nalighmeng _ kina _ tagi yaghqau a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teggu _ John _ nagatekagh gpesineng llu _ esghaghkagh gpesineng llu _ :
aya kaayagh lghiit _ esghagh yagute ut _ , _ piyug igate yagh lghiit _ piyug yagute ut _ , _ leprosy-lguyalghiit _ naallghute ut _ , _ tuuslagh yagh lghiit _ nagaqugh te yagute ut _ , _ tuqu kaayagh lghiit _ unguvagh ut _ , _ aklumalghii nun llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i nanigh nghite kuni _ whanga mneng _ quya stekau uq _ ! _ "
aga _ John-em _ maligsaaghtengi _ aghulaqe yata _ , _ Jesus-em _ akuzi tkekagh a _ John _ yug lghute nun _ , _ " _ kilgaa nun _ pi aqngafsi _ , _ sa u a _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ vegaagh _ anuqe m _ ufsuguskangaa _ ?
sa qu tsi mi _ ? _ Esghaghnalukuu _ aatkagh kegte aq _ yuug _ ? _ tamaaken _ aate kaqe lghiit _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ umiileg t _ mangteghagh itni _ !
sa u a mi _ esghagh yaghtugh steggu _ ? _ uuknaliqe i sta _ ? _ aa-a _ , _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ esghaghkagh i _ John _ uuknaliqe i ste inagh u nghite uq _ . _ megnu nagh aghagh uq
qayughllak _ ellnga u uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghkagh at _ whaten _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ sivu gpeni _ kayagte lleqe aqa _ ungipaghteke _ , _ yataaghqesaghtigh sqellug qu _ tume kaghqagh n _ ' _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ John _ paaptaaye sta _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ yug neng _ allgeqaghyaggaghneng _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ ukalighpigaq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ qilag m _ John-meng _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ .
John _ paaptaaye sta _ ungipagh ke i yuggaagh llegh aneng _ whavemun _ kenlanga _ , _ suugllug t _ wayagh naqutke aqe aat _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ .
qamagte luteng _ uuknaliqistetlu _ Moses-emllu _ liilightuusagh ita _ uuknaliqutkengngwaat _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ kenlanga _ John-em _ tagi llegh anun _ .
John-nguuq _ uuknaliqistet _ uuknaliqe tkekagh at _ taginaqnilleghmeggteggun _ elijah _ . _ ugpeqe yu kufsigu _ uuknaliqe llegh _ , _ John _ Elijah-nguuq _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ !
" _ maaten _ kiyaghlleghhit _ yug t _ sa mun _ uspute naqe zingi _ ? _ Taghnughhaaghestun _ ayuqe ut _ aqume uute luteng _ akilpegaghvig ni _ , _ naghaalgute meggnun _ akilghuu te lghiit _ whaten _ ,
' _ qalghightaute amsi _ , _ tukaleganghitusi _ ! _ qiyiqe te ukut _ , _ qiyiqe nghite usi _ ! _ '
" _ John _ tagi aqngami _ fast- u aqe uq _ , _ megh igate uq llu _ wine- meng _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ ' _ .
ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi aqngami _ , _ neghe lgusigh aqe ai _ , _ meghe lgusigh aqe ai llu _ yug t _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ Yuukqun _ taana _ esghaqagh teggu _ ! _ neghetu pigte uq _ , _ meghetu pigte uq _ , _ ilakumtaagh ke aat llu _ tax-em _ qerngughtistengita _ , _ seghleghqestetlu _ ! _ ' _ naqamllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh a _ ipapighqengngaaq _ sallghakun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ allute luki _ allaaghlluwhaghtilleni _ atuqe kaqe ai _ Chorazin-mi _ , _ Bethsaida-mi _ , _ Capernaum-emillu _ . _ iwernga _ yug it _ avuteghqelluteng _ taaqe llghite ngugh t _ seghleghqenneghmeng _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ aghyuughmikii _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi _ , _ Chorazin-eghmiini _ ! _ Seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi _ , _ Bethsaida-ghmiini _ ! _ elpesi ni _ allaaghlluwaghtilleghllaget _ apeghiighkagh t _ pi kaayagh kata _ Tyre-millu _ Sidon-millu _ , _ neghigh pigte luteng _ yug it _ avuteghqelluteng _ seghleghqennanighnayaghtut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ suvinagh lghii meng _ qiipaghaghqagh meng _ aate luteng _ aqume nayagh ut _ panetelleghteggun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ Tyre-eghmiitlu _ Sidon-eghmiitlu _ aghyulleghqestaaghhaayaghqaagut _ elpesi neng _ !
enkaam _ elpek si _ , _ Capernaum-eghmiini _ ! _ qaywa _ anglisteghllagyaghngaaghpesi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ repall _ sumegh gpesini _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe nighllug si _ qilag mi _ , _ yeghlegi _ ukig lleqe aisi _ hell- mun _ . _ Allaaghlluwhaghtilleghllaget _ pi kaayagh kata _ Sodom-emi _ , _ paninang _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nekevgha nayagh uq _ !
iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke aghagh yaghqaqe ai _ Sodom-eghmiit _ pakiggulluki _ elpesi neng _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ kaay _ a ta _ , _ atanegh ke aaten _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ ! _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ qayughllak _ liite kau nghite ngugh nun _ liite stekaqe an _ ipapighqelleq _ iigh kan _ liitekagh neng llu _ peghqinegh neng llu _ .
aa-a _ , _ Ataay _ , _ efqugh ke llegh gpetun _ pi kau uten _ .
" _ ata ma _ tagivagh kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ ighnegh _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ata m _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke a _ a ta _ , _ iwerngaqun _ ighnegh m _ , _ enkaam _ ighnegh m _ nakmikegkagh minun _ liite ste lleqe a _ a ta _ .
" _ tagi tek _ whanga mnun _ qamagte lusi _ ughleghilghiini _ , _ uqigtuqagh meng llu _ akmag leg ghllag ni _ , _ meghnaali ste lleqe amsi _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ aate lukek _ liite i vike tengnga _ , _ qayughllak _ yakumanginneghitunga _ , _ ilu ka _ qusevegngaaq _ . _ enkaam _ meghnaali lleqe usi _ unguva sigh gpesinun _ .
iisqaghmiitagh gka _ piyaqnagh u i te uk _ , _ akmag ka llu _ uqengestaaghhagh u uq _ . _ "
taagken _ Sabbath-em _ aghnegh ani _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ wheat-em _ piite vig akun _ . _ Maligsaaghtengi _ iyataghkagh t _ enkaam _ wheat-meng _ qesug te aqe luteng _ neghekagh t _ .
Pharisees-et _ esghagh luki _ maligsaaghtet _ wheat-meng _ qesug te aatagh lghiit _ , _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ Sabbath-mi _ maligsaaghteten _ qepghagh ut _ , _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe aat _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Atightuumangistegguu _ David-enkut _ yukullghiit _ sa kau ta i _ iyatagh aqngameng _ ?
itegh kau uq _ tabernacle-mun _ enkaam _ yukullghiit _ neghe kaqe aat _ neqekrangllagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunekagh _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ liilightuusagh _ naafqe kaqe aat _ qayughllak _ priest- nge i na ut _ negh yaghqaqe yagh kangat _ .
Atightiigasteggullu _ liilightuusagh nite ngughk _ priest-et _ temple- mi _ qepghagh negh meggni _ Sabbath-mi _ naafqe aqe kangat _ Sabbath-em _ liilightuusagh a _ ? _ naqamllu _ priest-et _ anaggute igate ut _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ whaante uq _ temple- mi _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ nangllegtigh sqe sug amsi _ yug lgute gpesinun _ pakiggulluku _ aghqe te gpesineng _ . _ ' _ taakut _ akuzite t _ liigikngwaaghyaqufsiki _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ , _ nanqigte nayagh nghite asi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ anaggute llghite ngugh t _ ,
qayughllak _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ atanegh ke a _ Sabbath-em _ . _ "
Taaken _ Jesus _ aglagh luni _ synagogue-ngitnun _ iteghkagh _ .
taawa nguq _ yuug _ iigge an _ inglu i _ unegh ii iqe aat _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ tawanlenguut _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ naalkefiknaluku _ anaggute llegh meng _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ itagnaghtaa- a _ naallghute i lleghqagh _ Sabbath-mi _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ naligh gpesi _ penniigh a _ kalefkagsaqan _ laawaagh mun _ Sabbath-mi _ , _ nusugnayaghestegguu _ ?
yuug _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ penniigh meng _ ! _ enkaam _ liilightuusagh ni _ itagnagh lghii u uq _ pinitun _ pi lleghqagh _ Sabbath-mi _ . _ "
taagken _ yuug _ uniigh nga lghii meng _ iigge leg _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nengug te ki _ iigge ten _ . _ " _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ , _ aga _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ , _ inglu megestun _ lli aqe aat _ .
taagken _ Pharisees-et _ aane luteng _ agghi saghtuqagh t _ naten _ tuqute na luku _ Jesus _ .
Jesus-em _ liisimake luku _ agghi llegh at _ , _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maliglleghaatkaat _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ qinuyug lghiit _ qamagte luki _ ,
ineghtekagh i llu _ ungipagh ke te qugh a mi _ pisqelluni _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ apeghiigh qagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pillgha _ uuknaliqe i stekete te _ Isaiah-kun _ whaten _ :
" _ una _ esgha _ nakmikegkagh ka _ qepghaghtenguluku _ . _ piniqe kaqe a _ unguva sigh gma _ efqugh ke pigte a _ . _ taghneghagh gka _ ellnga kun _ nekegte lleqe agka _ . _ ungipaate lleqe ai _ Gentile-et _ tawateghlluwaaq _ nanqigte i lleghqagh mneng _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ .
aaghtiiraagh naanghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akilghuu naanghite uq _ , _ tume ni _ iglagtu pigte luni _ akuzi naanghite uq _ .
iike naanghite a _ vegaagh _ ullegh nga lghii _ , _ qaame yaghtugh u ngestaghkagh k _ kenegh lghutagh k _ qaamnnaanghitaak _ . _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa uq _ kenlanga _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ whaten _ piyug luni _ lliigh kan _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte llegh a _ yug neng _ avutangituq _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh akun _ Gentile-et _ sighima lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-mun _ tagi tke aat _ yuug _ ayaakagh _ , _ akuzi igate ngughk _ qayughllak _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ Jesus-em _ naagh llegh u tke a _ enkaam _ akuzi yagutekagh llu _ esghagh u sag u tke aq llu _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ repall _ ellmeggneng _ aapqughaaghutkat _ whaten _ , _ " _ una _ David-em _ ighnegh ke nghite agu _ ? _ "
Pharisees-et _ nagate luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ yug neng _ aane ste aqe ai _ tughneghagh t _ qayughllak _ atuqe u kanga _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ Beelzebul-em _ , _ igleghutistengat _ tughneghagh t _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alngunak _ ataneghpag u llegh _ aafqugh te luni _ pillugute kuni _ , _ naave lleqe uq _ . _ tanemlleqa _ ne ghllag t _ nalighmeng _ nengllugute t _ aafqugh te luteng _ pillugute kumeng _ , _ qerngaghmennaanghitut _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ tughneghagh m _ aane stekunigu _ tughneghagh _ , _ taawa _ ellmi neng _ pilluwaaguq _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kenletghuullequq _ .
aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ Beelzebul-kun _ , _ naten mi _ yug gpesi _ aane ste qugh aqe atki _ tughneghagh t _ ? _ enkaam _ yug si _ nanqigte i stekete lleqe asi _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ aag negh squgh u u kuma _ tughneghagh neng _ , _ taawa _ taam _ ipapighqaa _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ kaate ma uq _ elpesi nun _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh yug kuni _ iknaqe lghii m _ yug m _ mangteghagh anun _ teglegughnaluni _ saghya aneng _ , _ sivuke luku _ yuug _ asighqesaghqagh ke a _ . _ taagken _ wayaghteghlleqii _ saghya i _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ whangamninneghilnguq _ kipullginaaghtekaqa _ ; _ kitum _ alngunak _ qerngughte i lgusigh nghite kuminga _ mingite i ste u uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipaate amsi _ yug t _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ alngunak _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ , _ alngunak llu _ seghlequulleghmeggneng _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequuqumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kunigu _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ , _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ kipullegmun _ sa meng _ pi kumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ maaten _ kiyaghtaalleghmi _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ .
" _ uqfig _ aflengakekagh _ pinigh lghii u uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ pinigh ut _ . _ uqfig _ aflengake llghite ngughk _ seghleghu uq _ , _ piite stekagh i _ seghleghu ut _ . _ piite ste i llegh akun _ liisimakelleqaghsi _ uqfig m _ nateghtu langa _ .
ukughsi _ nemeghyagh ni _ ! _ naten _ akuzi aqe tsi _ pinigh lghii meng _ seghleghughngaaghpesi _ ? _ sa u a _ alngunak _ yug m _ ilu anite ngughk _ aane kau yug u uq _ akuzillegh akun _ .
pinigh lghii _ yuug _ pinigh lghii meng _ ilumike i lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ . _ seghlegh _ yuug _ seghlegh meng _ ilumike i lghii _ seghlegh meng _ aane ste i kayugu uq _ .
" _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ yug t _ apegh yaghqagh pestaagh ke ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ akuzite t _ atuqekagh teng _ sangita _ atuqe ma ta i _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ akuzite gpegun _ . _ akuzite gpek _ ipapighqelleqaaten _ avute ite ni luten _ nalighmeng _ nanqigte lleqe aaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luten _ . _ "
taagken _ ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ liilightuusagh m _ , _ ila ita llu _ Pharisees-et _ pi ke aat _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ allaaghlluwhaghtilghiiten _ esghapagyuwamken _ liigike na luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghen _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi u ta a _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghnegh m _ uum _ yug i _ seghleghqe ma u ut _ , _ ataasiighneghilnguut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ naqam _ allaaghlluwhaghtitesqut _ whanga mnun _ . _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ Taananginaghhaq _ allaaghlluwhaghtilleq _ esghaghlleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ allaaghlluwhaaghtillgha _ Jonah-mun _ .
Jonah _ iqallug ghrugllag m _ aqsaqghwanitkaaguq _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ unuget _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ samansaghqaaguq _ nuna mi _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi nga yu t _ unuget _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ nekeve luteng _ anaggute ni lleqe aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni lusi _ . _ uuknaliqe i sta _ Jonah _ ungipagh yan _ nineveh-kagh mii t _ avuteghqelluteng _ seghleghqennaniqaagut _ . _ iwernga _ elpek si _ avuteghqellusi _ seghleghqennanillghitusi _ qaywa _ nagate kaqe ghngaaghpesigu _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ Jonah-meng _ .
nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtegkangisi _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ queen- nge an _ Sheba-m _ nekeve luni _ nanqigte yaghqaa ni lleqe aisi _ . _ tagi kau uq _ uyavaghpanilngughmeng _ ne mineng _ nagate na luku _ Solomon-em _ peghqinegh ghllag _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ kina _ aange aghagh lghii _ Solomon-meng _ whaante uq _ , _ tawalliima _ ighsakaqaghsi _ . _ "
" _ tughneghagh _ yug meng _ aane gkuni _ igleghte lleqe uq _ meqraggiilngughmi _ nuna mi _ , _ ivagh i lleqe uq _ meghnaali vigkagh meng _ . _ iwernga _ naalkute nghite yami _ ,
pi ke aq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghfig ke yagh ke mnun _ uteghte naqe unga _ . _ ' _ kaate yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ , _ aallwaaghluni _ , _ mingllegtengngwaaghluni _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ tagi tke ai _ maaghraghvinleg _ tughneghagh t _ ellmi neng _ seghleghataghalghiit _ . _ Iteghaalluteng _ yug mun _ tawantekat _ . _ enkaam _ taana _ yuug _ sivunghaneng _ wataqaaghaq _ seghleghwaaghughtekaq _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ayuqe yaghqaa ut _ seghlegh t _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ maaten _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ seghleghughtaghaghyaghqaagut _ sivugh nghaani _ pi llegh meggneng _ . _ "
paninang _ Jesus-em _ aleghqugh ma luki _ yug t _ , _ Jesus-em _ naange a llu _ anglegutangillu _ kaate luteng _ manughagh mi _ aleghqugh yug qu aat _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ ungipagh tke a _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ qakma _ naa n llu _ anglegute ten llu _ , _ aleghqugh yug aqe aaten _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ naa ka _ ? _ kinkungaawa t _ anglegute nka _ ? _ "
taagken _ kenigh luki _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Taakusta _ naa ka llu _ anglegute nka llu _ !
kina _ alngunak _ ata ma _ qilagmelnguum _ piyuke llegh atun _ pikumi _ , _ anglegute ke aqa _ , _ nayag ke aqa _ , _ naa ke aqa llu _ ! _ "
tawani _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ Jesus _ aane luni _ mangteghagh meng _ , _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ aqume luni _ apeghtugh ikagh _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ kangllu qaghte yatni _ , _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aqumekagh _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esne metekagh t _ .
ungipaghaate tgun _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ apeghtugh qu ai _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ piitesighagh a _ piitesighaghvig minun _ aglagh luni _ , _ ifkagh qughkagh _ piitute neng _ .
piitesighaghvig mini _ ifkaghqiyalghiimi _ piitute neng _ , _ ila i _ tume tgun _ tekite ke aat _ , _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ negh u qu ait _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ uyghagaghtuqagh kun _ sunapagilngughqun _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ piite tke aat _ qayughllak _ suna a _ ugmestaaghhagh _ .
iwernga _ siqinegh _ piite yalghiimi _ maatnegh an _ paneghtekagh i _ qayughllak _ akupagilnguut _ .
ila i _ piitute m _ tekite ke aat _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ , _ sikughllug t _ piite yalghiimeng _ piite vig iqe ait _ piitute t _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ piite ste ikagh t _ grain-meng _ , _ ila i _ 100 _ , _ ila i _ 60 _ , _ ila i _ 30 _ .
sigute lgu usi _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
taagken _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangan _ ungipaghaate meng _ atuqe aqe ziin _ apeghtugh nghpeki _ yug t _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite stekaqe a _ talugh nga lghii _ ipapighqellgha _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ qilag m _ , _ iwernga _ ellngit nun _ liite tesi mangite a _ .
enkaam _ yuug _ liigike lleg ngekagh _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ liigike lleg nge aghagh yaghqaa uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ liigikellepagilnguq _ liigike llegh a _ iqite lleqe uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtugh aqe anka _ ungipaghaate tgun _ , _ qayughllak _ esghaate ghngaaghmeng _ esghaate igate ngugh t _ , _ nagate ghngaaghmeng _ nagaqiigalnguut _ , _ talwa _ liigike igate ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ ellngitgun _ Isaiah-m _ uuknaliqe tke i llegh a _ apeghiigh uq _ . _ taaggun _ uuknaliqe llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ ellngit _ nagate pestaagh lleqe ut _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ ; _ esghaate pestaagh lleqe ut _ , _ taawanginaq _ liigike naanghite ait _ esghaghkagh teng _ ,
qayughllak _ ellngit a _ umyugagh it _ pi neghllugtekau ut _ . _ sigute it _ tusaqneghlluugtekaagut _ , _ iye teng llu _ quneghtekaqe ait _ . _ Tawatelnguunghisaqumeng _ iye meggneng _ esghaate nayagh ut _ , _ sigute meggneng _ nagaqugh te nayagh ut _ , _ umyugagh megteggun _ liigike nayagh ut _ , _ enkaam _ qiive nayagh ut _ whanga mnun _ naallghutesqelluteng _ . _ '
" _ iwernga _ quyanaghhalek _ elpek si _ ! _ iye si _ esghaate aqe ut _ , _ sigute si llu _ nagaqugh te aqe ut _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ uuknaliqistelghutetlu _ , _ yug lghutagh nge an llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ esghagh yug kaqsagh ait _ esghagh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ esghagh mangite ait _ . _ nagaqugh yug kaqsagh ait llu _ nagaqugh kasi _ , _ iwernga _ nagaqugh mangite ait _ .
" _ nagate ggu _ sa meng _ pi aqe ta a _ ungipaghaate ke kaqe a _ piitesighagh a _ .
piitute t _ tume t _ saaghw itgun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ liigike nghite kagu _ ungipagh _ tughneghagh m _ tagi luni _ wayagh lleqe a _ tekite kaayagh lghii _ ilu akun _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ uyghagtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ tawaninginaq _ ungipagh _ tugukligh iqe a _ quyake sigh ke luku _ .
iwernga _ ungipagh _ ilu ani _ mulu ma ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ akugh nge llghite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ seghleliigh yalghiimi _ nalighmeng _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge yalghiimi _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ ungipagh _ tawaninginaq _ ugpeqe i nanigh uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ suna kun _ tekite ke aat _ uspute nga ut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ nagaqugh te lghii mun _ ungipagh meng _ , _ taawanginaq _ teggellghiigh llegh an _ kiyaghtaaghusighqameng _ , _ aklungi igh i yu llegh ghllag an llu _ piite vig igh aqe a _ ungipagh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ piite ste i igate uq _ .
tamaakut _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ uspute nga ut _ yug nun _ nagaqugh te lghii nun llu _ liigike i lghii nun llu _ ungipagh meng _ . _ enkaam _ piite ste qugh aqe ut _ ila i _ 100 _ , _ ila i _ 60 _ , _ ila i _ 30 _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ila a _ ungipaghagh an _ ellngit nun _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yug tun _ piitesighaghkagh tun _ pinigh lghii meng _ piitute meng _ piitesighaghvig mini _ ayuqe uq _ .
Unugmi _ ataasigh mi _ qavasimaluki _ , _ anguyag a _ tagi luni _ piitesighagh ke aq _ weeds-meng _ akule itgun _ wheat-et _ , _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
nunivagseghagh t _ piite yalghiimeng _ , _ wheat-et _ akume luteng _ weeds-meng _ ayuqe ut _ .
piitesighagh a _ qepghaghtelghutngan _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ pinigh lghii meng mi _ piitute meng _ piitesigh u aghagh ziin _ piitesighaghvig gpeni _ ; _ naken _ weeds-et _ pi ut _ ? _ '
yug m _ kii msiigh ke ai _ , _ ' _ anguyag m _ tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ ' _ . _ aaptekagh at _ , _ ' _ Weeds-et _ ikuultekii _ ? _ '
kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ ' _ nakaa _ , _ qayughllak _ weeds-et _ ikugh kufsiki _ qemall _ wheat-etlu _ ila leg qite te lleqe asi _ .
qerngagh ita _ wheat-etlu _ weeds-etlu _ nagu steki _ kenlanga _ unatagh lleghqagh mun _ . _ enan _ unatagh yaghqaaghtekata _ unataghtet _ ungipaate naagh anka _ weeds-et _ sivukesqelluki _ , _ qepughluki _ paneghte yaghqaa luki _ . _ enkaam _ wheat-et _ unatagh ste luki _ kagpag ste naagh anka _ kagpag vig mnun _ . _ ' _ "
allameng _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ piitute atun _ mustard-em _ ayuqe uq _ . _ piitute m _ mekestaalleghpigaqaa _ , _ iwernga _ yug m _ piitesighagh nghminigu _ piitesighaghvig mikun _ nunivagseghaghyaggaghneng _ aange lleghpigagh u kayugu uq _ . _ uqfig ughte nghaani _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ avayagh akun _ unglute yagh u iqe ut _ . _ "
allameng _ Jesus-em _ aapte qugh a _ ungipaghagh an _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ yeast-atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ akuutuskanga _ avlawa ghllag mun _ , _ enkaam _ akuutagh ghllag a _ ghhuugh ste ghllag qagh a _ . _ "
