peghqinellegh ita _ pi ke ait _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ tea- ma ghhagh mnnun _ uqughqagh pagite ukut _ , _ akilpegaghtenun _ tukfigh i yaghtugh tek _ . _ '
enkaam _ nalluuqat _ uqughqagh nge yaghtugh tke aat _ . _ aviite ma luki _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ kaate tke aq _ . _ taakut _ yataaghqengngalghiit _ iteg lgu sigh ke aat _ nengughte te m _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ , _ enkaam _ amigh k _ umeg ke aat _ .
" _ kingu aneng _ nalluuqat _ aghnaghagh t _ kaate luteng _ , _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ atanegh _ ! _ qelpegh te aghte kut _ ! _ '
iwernga _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nalluke amsi _ kinku u tsi _ . _ ' _ "
Jesus-em _ ungipaghaate ni _ taaqe nigh ke a _ whaten _ , _ " _ Enkaangam _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukagh i _ natungutanga _ aghneq _ nalighmeng _ natungutanga _ aflu _ ighnegh an _ yug m _ tagi lleghqagh a _ .
" _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ qilag m _ uspute yaghqaa uq _ whavek _ ungipaghaate mun _ : _ taawa nguq _ yuug _ iglegha naqe lghii _ navek _ uyavagh nun _ . _ tuqlugh qu ai _ qepghaghteni _ aviillegh mini _ aflengake i ste u luki _ saghya minun _ .
ataasigh mun _ 5,000 _ mani t _ tuunekagh i _ , _ ila anun _ 2,000 _ , _ kinguligh mun _ 1,000 _ . _ tamaghhagh ita _ tunqugh qu ai _ pillegtulngistun _ . _ taagken _ aghulaqekagh _ .
yuug _ taana _ 5,000-nengegkaq _ , _ tawaninginaq _ aghulaqe luni _ akike yaghqagh meng _ tukfightuqagh _ . _ enkaam _ alla _ 5,000 _ allgeghtekaa _ .
taana llu _ 2,000-nengegkaq _ , _ allgegh tke aq _ alla _ 2,000-meng _ .
iwernga _ taana _ 1,000-nengegkaq _ aane luni _ laag te luki _ iiw iqe ai _ umiileg mi _ mani i _ .
" _ muluugh ghllag luni _ qepghaghtet _ umiileg at _ uteghnigh yami _ ungipaghsugh qu ai _ samatagh nge i _ mani ni _ .
5,000-nengegkam _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ tagivagh kaqe aten _ 5,000 _ mani t _ . _ taawa _ alla _ 5,000 _ allgeghsimaaqaa _ . _ '
umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ itagnagh pigte uten _ , _ pinigh uten _ ataasiighmelnguq _ qepghagh a _ ! _ ataasiighmete kau te gpeneng _ palaghhaghnun _ aflengake i ste ngughte ste naqe amken _ uglagh lghii nun _ . _ itegh i _ quya lgusigh yaghtugh nga _ ! _ '
taagken _ 2,000-nengegkam _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ tagivagh kaqe aten _ 2,000 _ mani t _ . _ taawa _ alla _ 2,000 _ allgeghsimaaqa _ . _ '
umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ seghleghhalek _ itagnagh pigte uten _ , _ pinigh uten _ ataasiighmelnguq _ qepghagh a _ ! _ ataasiighmete kau te gpeneng _ palaghhaghnun _ aflengake i ste ngughte ste naqe amken _ uglagh lghii nun _ . _ itegh i _ quya lgusigh yaghtugh nga _ ! _ '
taagken _ 1,000-nengegkam _ esnevagh luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ umiileg mni _ , _ liisimake amken _ elpek _ aaghte yaghqaa nghite uten _ . _ unatagh aqe uten _ piitesighagh kaqe nghite ke gpeneng _ . _ qerngughte aqe aten _ piite tke aat _ piitute it _ ifkagh qugh kaqe nghite ke teng _ .
enkaam _ alinge lunga _ laag te luki _ mani ten _ iigh kaqe anka _ . _ ang _ , _ taawa _ elpek _ pin _ . _ '
iwernga _ umiileg an _ pi ke aa _ , _ ' _ uyuq _ seghlegh _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii _ qepghagh a _ ! _ elpek _ piighpenga _ unatagh aqe ni lunga _ piitesighagh kaqe nghite ke mneng _ , _ qerngughte i aqe ni lunga llu _ piitekagh neng _ piitute it _ ifkagh qugh kaqe nghite ke mneng _ .
Sanganʼngam _ mani ka _ kanaghte nanigh zigu _ bank-amun _ ? _ tawaten _ pi kaqsagh kuvgu _ , _ uteghnigh lleg mni _ veghte nayagh aqa _ allgeghnelighluku _ . _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ qepghaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ tugu luku _ 1,000 _ mani a _ , _ tuune teggu _ tea- mete te _ 10,000-nelegmun _ .
tamaakut _ pi lget _ tuune aghagh yaghqaa ut _ enkaam _ siipte i uute lleqe ut _ . _ iwernga _ taana _ ava ite ngughk _ pi llgagh u yagh ghngaan _ iqite yaghqaqe ait _ ellnga neng _ . _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ pi ke ai _ , _ ' _ aane steggu _ taana _ sea-te u nghite ngughk _ qepghagh a _ qagavek _ mamleg ghllag mun _ . _ Tawaani _ yug t _ qiyaaghwagh ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ ggute teng llu _ terqitaagtagh magh ita _ . _ '
" _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tagi kuni _ nighughqelleghmikun _ , _ yaqulegtugh ma ghllag mi _ , _ taagken _ aqume lleqe uq _ nighughqengngalghiignekun _ aqumutagh gmikun _ .
sivungagh kun _ qerngughte te ste lleqe ait _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nuna m _ yug i _ . _ taagken _ avugh lleqe ai _ , _ katam _ penniighniightem _ avugh llegh atun _ penniigh t _ goat-neng _ .
penniigh t _ aghenqigneghminitesleqii _ , _ goat-et _ saghumignegh mini _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ aghenqigneghminilnguut _ pi lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ tagi tek _ , _ ata ma _ quya stekagh itni _ , _ pi liite ggu _ ataneghpag u llegh _ yataaghqekagh _ elpesi nun _ ima _ nuna _ ulima aqngan _ .
iyatagh iqe u lunga _ neghqegkaqaghpesinga _ ; _ meqsug u lunga _ meghsikaqaghpesinga _ ; _ allaneghtagh u lunga _ upughatkaqaghpesinga _ .
amsikaghmete lunga _ aasi ightuqagh qagh zinga _ , _ qinuyug u lunga _ laalighfikegkaqaghpesinga _ , _ anusimingllaghagh u lunga _ esghagh yaghtuqagh qagh zinga _ . _ '
taagken _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ qavngaq _ iyatagh iqe u luten _ neghesiken _ , _ nalighmeng _ meqsug u luten _ meghsi ziken _ ?
qavngaq _ allaneghtagh u luten _ upugha te ziken _ , _ nalighmeng _ amsikaghmete luten _ aasi ightugh ziken _ ?
qavngaq _ qinuyug u luten _ , _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllaghvig mete luten _ laalighfike ziken _ ? _ '
umiileg m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pikagh i _ ukalighpigaghnun _ anglegute mnun _ , _ whanga mnun _ pi aqe asi _ ! _ '
" _ taagken _ umiileg m _ saghumigneghminilnguut _ pi lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ elpesi u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqagh i _ . _ awite te k _ whanga mneng _ , _ aglagh tek _ kenle ite ngugh gnun _ kenghegnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqekagh anun _ tughneghagh mun llu _ , _ yaquleg anun llu _ !
iyatagh iqe u lunga _ neghestellghitaghpesinga _ , _ meqsug u lunga _ meghsillghitaghpesinga _ ,
allaneghtagh u lunga _ upughatellghitaghpesinga _ , _ amsikaghmete lunga _ aasi ightugh ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ qinuyug u lunga llu _ , _ anusimingllaghvig mete lunga llu _ laalighfike ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ '
taagken _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ qavngaq _ iyatagh iqe u luten _ , _ meqsug u luten _ , _ allaneghtagh u luten _ , _ amsikaghmete luten _ , _ qinuyug u luten _ , _ nalighmeng _ anusimingllaghvig mete luten _ , _ kayusiite mangite ziken _ ? _ '
taagken _ umiileg m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ tawaten _ pi nghite llegh gpesistun _ naligh ghhagh inagh itnun _ ukut _ ukalighpigaat _ , _ whanga _ pinghitaqaghpesinga _ . _ '
enkaam _ taakut _ aglagh lleqe ut _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ aglagh lleqe ut _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ unguvallegh mun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ taaqe yamiki _ apeghtuusagh ke nghmeng _ tamaakut _ , _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ liisimakagh i _ maalghug _ aghnegh k _ atugh lukek _ neqenghaghqe lleghqagh a _ Passover-em _ pi naqngu uq _ . _ enkaam _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuune lleqe aat _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ . _ "
tawani _ aghneghmi _ , _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte tke aat _ palace-ngani _ High _ Priest-em _ , _ Caiaphas-em _ .
agghi tkekagh at _ Jesus _ aksaqluklu _ tugu luku _ , _ tuqute na luku _ .
iwernga _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Neqenghaghqemmi _ pinaanghitaghput _ , _ luuraq _ yug t _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllag na yu kata _ . _ "
Jesus _ Bethany-metaqngami _ Simon-enkunitkaq _ leprosy-lguyalghiimi _ .
aghnagh m _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ , _ tugumiiqe lukek _ alabaster-ek _ aqimleghutagh k _ imaleg k _ akitu pigte lghii meng _ tepe ngllagh sigh meng _ . _ negh ma luku _ naasqwakun _ kuuve gkakek _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ .
iwernga _ maligsaaghtet _ esghagh luku _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ , _ ugumi yagutekagh at _ whaten _ pi magh meng _ , _ " _ sangan _ sakusiiqe akek _ ?
akike kaqsagh kumikek _ tepe ngllagh sigh k _ mani u tke ghllag lukek _ aklumalghii nun _ tunqugh nayagh aa _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ liisimake luki _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ seghlequughesteggu _ aghnagh _ ? _ pi niigh pigte uq _ whanga mnun _ tawaten _ pillgha _ .
akluma lghiit _ quunpeng _ tamaansaghqaagut _ , _ iwernga _ whanga _ quunpeng _ elpesinite naanghite unga _ .
Tepengllaghqelleghmikun _ yugusigh ka _ yataaghqengngwaa _ llivegh lleghqagh mnun _ .
ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nani _ alngunak _ una _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ ungipagh ke nghmegteggu _ , _ aghnagh m _ tawaten _ pillgha _ apegh aqe lleqe aat _ yug nun _ neqamike sqellug qu _ . _ "
taagken _ Judas _ iscariot _ ila at _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghtet _ , _ chief _ priest-enun _ pi luni _ ,
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa meng _ tuune lleqe ste ngnga _ Jesus _ elpesi nun _ tuune gkumkun _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ key-tu tete luku _ 30 _ silver _ mani meng _ llivikekagh at _ .
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ Judas _ pi lleghqagh nge naqekagh _ uvegh ghpagte te na luku _ Jesus _ .
sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ neqenghaghqe llegh an _ Yeast-alillghillnguum _ neqekrangllagh m _ , _ maligsaaghtet _ Jesus _ taku luku _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ nani _ yataaghqe te sug ziin _ whangkunnun _ Passover-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ neghesqelluten _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ Jerusalem-emun _ pi tek _ . _ yuug _ tea- magh an tuq _ ; _ ungipaate nakesi _ , _ ' _ apeghtugh i sta _ pi uq _ , _ pi lleghqagh ka _ kaate naqe uq _ . _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghii ni _ negh naqagh ut _ Passover-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ elpesi ni _ . _ ' _ "
Maligsaaghtet _ Jesus-em _ pi sqe llegh atun _ pikagh t _ , _ Passover-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh a _ yataaghqekagh at _ .
Ighivgaghyagu _ Jesus-enkut _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ tipelngi _ aqume te tke aat _ negh na luteng _ .
neghe uute ma luki _ , _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipa _ pi amsi _ , _ naligh gpesi _ uvegh ghpagte te naqngu aanga _ . _ "
Maligsaaghtet _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ tuungligh igh qutagh luteng _ aapte aataghkagh at _ , _ " _ atanegh _ , _ whanga u a _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ taananguuq _ negh ke ni _ neptekanga _ sagnegh mun _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ .
ipapestaaq _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ tuqu yaghqaa uq _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pinaqnillghistun _ . _ iwernga _ seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq _ taana _ yuug _ uvegh ghpagte te i lghii _ ighneghagh neng _ yug m _ ! _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ allgegh mangite yagh kuni _ ! _ "
Uveghpagutistem _ Judas-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ whanga u a _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ taawa _ elpeneng _ apegh uten _ . _ "
neghe uute u luteng _ Jesus-em _ tugu luku _ neqekrangllagh _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aavgugh luku _ tunqugh qu ai _ maligsaaghteni _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tugu luku _ neghe teggu _ , _ una _ yugusigh ke aqa _ . _ "
taagken _ tugu luku _ qayuusigh _ wine- meng _ imaleg _ iyamsiqa yug vike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ tuunekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ megh vike aatagh teggu _ qamagte lusi _ .
taana _ aaw kaqe a _ , _ taaggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ apeghiigh yaghqaa uq _ . _ tuqu kuma _ aaw ka _ kuuve lleqe uq _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ yug nun _ seghevute sigh u luni _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ wine- meng _ alla _ megh naanghite unga _ kenlanga _ aghneghmi _ tawani _ , _ wine-eghraghaghmeng _ meghe lgusigh lleqe amsi _ ata ma _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ . _ "
taagken _ ilagagh luteng _ aane luteng _ Mount _ Olives-mun _ pikagh t _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Unugmi _ whani _ , _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ uniqaghaalleqaghpesinga _ , _ qayughllak _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ tuqu lleqe aqa _ penniighniigh a _ enkaam _ penniigh t _ mingug iqe lleqe ut _ . _ '
iwernga _ unguvagh stegkanganga _ tuqu llegh meng _ sivu gpesini _ aglagh lleqe unga _ galilee- mun _ . _ "
Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ Jesus _ , _ " _ apallugh ke luten _ elpek _ qaywa _ ila ma _ uniqaghaateghngaaten _ , _ whanga _ uninnaanghitngwaaghamken _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ unukun _ rooster-a _ qalghigh ste gpenaan _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ketwell _ nallunqelleqaghpenga _ . _ "
Peter-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ qaywa _ tuquma lgusigh yagh ghngaamken _ , _ nallunqennaanghitamken _ . _ " _ Maligsaaghtetlu _ qamagte luteng _ ungipagh tke aat _ tawaten _ .
taagken _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ kaate tke aat _ tawavek _ atigh llegh ke lghii meng _ gethsemane- meng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aqumugh u tek _ taaggun _ , _ ingavek _ yughagh yaghtugh ma lunga _ . _ "
tazingavek _ kelqekagh i _ , _ peter _ , _ Zebedee-mllu _ ighnegh kek _ . _ taagken _ qivghughllagemllu _ seghleliighemllu _ kaate kestagh qagh a _ ,
enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qaame na ke _ qivghu ghllagu uq _ , _ repall _ tuqu yaghqaaghte lunga _ . _ Tawanllusi _ kelenga lgusigh tengnga _ . _ "
Tazingapighqaaghluni _ nuna mun _ sikmuute luni _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ ata mni _ , _ pi yaghqaa kan _ , _ meghe nghite langa _ whaken _ qayuusigh meng _ ; _ iwernga _ nakaan _ piyuke lleg mtun _ , _ elpek _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi gu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ takuyaqminiki _ pi nga yu t _ maligsaaghteni _ qavaa ut _ . _ enkaam _ peter _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Kelengalgusighpagningitestengngaa _ ataasigh _ aflu _ ?
kelenga tek _ , _ yughaghte k _ nanghiiqullengenghitesqellusi _ . _ Ipaapestaaq _ taghneghagh k _ pi yaghqaa ghngaaghmek _ , _ iwerngaqun _ yugusigh _ kayaate uq _ . _ "
allameng _ Jesus _ tazingavek _ aglagh luni _ yughaghkagh _ , _ " _ ata mni _ , _ megh yaghqaqe u kumkun _ una _ qayuusigh _ elpek _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
Takunqigsaqminiki _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ taawa _ qavaa te u ut _ , _ qayughllak _ qavagh m _ sakniqe stegkangi _ .
Jesus-em _ unite laatagh luki _ , _ tazingani _ pingayut iqe ai _ yughagh lleg ni _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ yughat _ atuqe luki _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghteni _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ taawa _ qavagh u aqe tsi _ , _ meghnaali aqe tsi _ ? _ taawa _ aflu _ kaa tuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ uvegh ghpagte te yaghqaaghte uq _ seghleghqestenun _ .
nekeve tek _ , _ igleghte lta _ . _ ii-i _ , _ uka _ uvegh ghpagte te i steke _ . _ "
Jesus _ paninang _ akuzi ma luku _ , _ Judas _ kaate tke aq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghtet _ ila at _ . _ yug lghute t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ ila i _ savigpag ligh luteng _ , _ ila i _ anagutagh ligh luteng _ . _ Chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ kayagtekagh it _ maligte sqellug qu _ Judas _ .
Uveghpagutistem _ Judas-em _ kaate vagilgameng _ ila ni _ sa lleghqagh mineng _ ungipaate kaqe kangi _ , _ " _ yuug _ naagh yaghqaqe a _ ellnga u uq _ piyukekagh i _ . _ tugu nakesi _ . _ "
Judas-em _ takuaghaghte luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ seghleghhalek _ , _ apeghtugh i sta _ ! _ " _ taagken _ naate qugh a _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ aga _ sa aqe ziin _ pi lleghqagh n _ pi gu _ ! _ " _ taagken _ taku luku _ Jesus _ akuqagh luku _ nuqneghteqaat _ .
tawani _ naligh ita _ yug t _ Jesus-melnguut _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ kepe qaghtekagh a _ sigute a _ High _ Priest-em _ qepghaghtelaaghan _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ savigpag n _ kanaghte gu _ qantagh nun _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ savigpag meng _ atuqe i lghiit _ savigpag kun _ tuqute yaghqaa ut _ .
Sumeghpenii-i _ ata ka _ kayute ngllagh naanghite ni luku _ piziguu _ ? _ aaptekumkun _ tawaninginaq _ 72,000-eneng _ uglagh lghiit _ yaquleg lghute ghllag t _ pilluwaghtet _ kayagte nayagh ai _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ pi naanghite unga _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghiigh yaghqaa lghiit _ igaqe llegh megestun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Tuguyaghtughestengngaa _ savigpagtuumagh gpesi _ , _ anagutaghtuumagh gpesi _ , _ nikimqun _ wayaghniightestun _ ayuqe lunga _ ? _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ aqume lunga _ apeghtugh i aqe unga _ temple- mi _ tugungigataghpesinga _ .
iwernga _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ tawaten _ pi u ut _ , _ apeghiigh na luki _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh it _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ . _ " _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ maligsaaghtet _ unite luku _ qimagugh tke aat _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ tugustengita _ aglagh tke aat _ High _ Priest-em _ , _ Caiaphas-em _ , _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ tawani _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
Uyavaqaanlluni _ Peter-em _ maligtekagh a _ courtyard-nganun _ High _ Priest-em _ mangteghagh an _ . _ itegh luni _ aqume lgusighkagh i _ kelengakistet _ esghapag na luku _ Jesus _ sa yaghqaa ta at _ .
Chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ agghistet _ iqlengiqutkestengnaqutkegkat _ Jesus _ tuqute ste pigesnagh na luku _ .
iwernga _ naalkute nghmeng _ aghtughkagh t _ . _ qaywa _ uglagh lghii m _ esnevagh aqe luteng _ apegh aatagh yagh ghngaaghmegteggu _ apeghkagh it _ allake tke aat _ . _ qenwat llu _ yug k _ esnevagh lutek
pikagh k _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ temple- a _ naafqesaqlegwaaqa _ enkaam _ nekefte lleqe aqa _ pingayani _ aghnegh m _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ High _ Priest-em _ nekeve luni _ aaptekagh a _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh ite ziin _ yug k _ apegh llegh gkenun _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus _ qalleg kau ma ite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ High _ Priest-em _ aapte laatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ ategh akun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh amken _ ungipaate kut _ Christ-anguziin _ ? _ ighnegh ke aten _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ pi llegh gpetun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ iwernga _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ uum _ kingu aneng _ esghaghlleqaghsi _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aqume luni _ aghenqignegh akun _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh m _ , _ esghaghlleqaghsillu _ tagi lghii _ qilawaagh itgun _ qilaga m _ . _ "
taagken _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ High _ Priest-em _ aatkagh ni _ piigugh magh ita _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ kiyaghnegh u ni luni _ pi lghii _ ! _ alla _ liisimakistengisaghngaamta _ pi lta _ . _ legan _ whaa _ nagataghsi _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ !
naten _ elpek si _ nanqigte steggu _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ tuqute yaghqaaghte ma uq _ . _ "
taagken _ gginagh akun _ qesigh qukagh at _ , _ tenglug agaataghkagh at llu _ , _ enkaam _ qasaghtestengita
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ elpek _ Christ-a _ uuknaliqe te kut _ ! _ kitum _ tenglug aten _ ? _ "
tawaten _ taakut _ pi ma luki _ courtyard-mi _ peter _ aqumgakagh _ . _ Qepghaghtem _ aghnaghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ elpek llu _ Jesus-metkaaguten _ , _ galilee-kagh mii mi _ . _ "
iwernga _ peter _ mesag igh aqe aq _ sivu itni _ tamaakut _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nalluke aqa _ sa meng _ pi aqe uten _ . _ "
aane yan _ courtyard-em _ iteghvig anun _ ila yan _ qepghaghtem _ aghnaghagh m _ esghagh luku _ peter _ , _ tawanlenguut _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ Jesus-metkaaguq _ Nazareth-eghmiimi _ . _ "
peter _ mesighagh laataghkagh _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ pi amsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ . _ "
mulunghituq _ , _ yug t _ nekevghatu aghte te lghiit _ tagi luteng _ , _ peter _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ ipa _ ila ke aaten _ Jesus-em _ malighsaghtengita _ qayughllak _ akuzillegh n _ galilee-kagh mii stun _ ayuqe uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ Peter-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ ungipaate amsi _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ ! _ iqlengiqe u kuma _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh linga _ ! _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ rooster-a _ qalghigh iqe aq _ .
taagken _ Peter-em _ neqagh tke a _ Jesus-em _ pillgha _ , _ " _ Rooster-a _ qalghigh ste gpenaan _ pi nga yu neng _ nallunqelleqaghpenga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ aane luni _ qiyaaghwagh ghllagkagh _ .
unaangu luku _ qamagte luteng _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ agghi tkekagh at _ tuqute ste na luku _ Jesus _ .
enkaam _ asighqellug qu _ aglagh te luku _ tuunekagh at _ pilate- mun _ , _ Rome-em _ governor-nganun _ .
Uveghpagutistem _ Judas-em _ , _ liigiksaqminiki _ agghistet _ nanqigte ma kangat _ Jesus _ tuqutesaghqagh u luku _ , _ qemall _ avuteghqe ghllagkagh _ . _ enkaam _ chief _ priest-enunllu _ , _ siivanllegh nun llu _ veghute yaghtugh qu ai _ 30 _ silver-et _ mani t _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ seghleghqe ma unga _ uvegh ghpagte te lleg mkun _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ yuug _ tuqute sqellug qu _ ! _ " _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Whangkunnun _ sasii lleqe a _ ? _ elpek _ tawaten _ pilqan _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Judas-em _ milugh tke ai _ mani t _ Temple-em _ ilu anun _ . _ taagken _ aghulaqe luni _ qemitekagh _ .
Chief _ priest-et _ saghna te kete luki _ mani t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ ukut _ mani t _ kanaghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ manilghutagh anun _ Temple-em _ qayughllak _ llivikuusaqegkaagut _ tuqute sighqagh u luteng _ yug mun _ . _ "
enkaam _ agghi tkekagh at _ mat- ni _ tukfigh i sigh ke na luku _ nuna mun _ ategh llegh ke lghii _ , _ " _ Potterʼs _ field _ " _ llivegh vigkagh u luku _ nakuumiinun _ .
enkaam _ whavemun _ kenlanga _ taam _ nuna m _ ateligh tke a _ , _ " _ nuna a _ aaw m _ " _ .
neghigh luku _ uuknaliqistem _ Jeremiah-m _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe ai _ whaten _ , _ " _ ila ita _ Israel-eghmiit _ itagnaqegkaqiit _ angtalangit _ 30 _ silver _ mani t _ , _ qayughllak _ sumegh meggni _ tawaten _ akitutka ni luku _ pi ke aat _ . _ taagken _ taakut _ mani t _ tukfigh i sigh kekagh it _ Potterʼs _ Field-mun _ . _ tawaten _ Atanghem _ qelqe aqe aanga _ . _ " _ Jeremiah-m _ uuknaliqe llegh a _ apeghiigh stekaqe aat _ chief _ priest-et _ tukfigh aqe yamegteggu _ Potterʼs _ field _ .
tawani _ Jesus _ nekevgha lghii _ sivungagh kun _ Rome-em _ governor-ngan _ . _ Governor-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ Jews-et _ Umiilkataan _ ? _ " _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ elpek _ tawatete ni luku _ pi an _ . _ "
iwernga _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ anaggute ni ghngaatni _ , _ sa meng _ pi ma nge i tke aq _ .
taagken _ Pilate-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ Nagasikii _ qamagte luki _ anaggute ni llegh it _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ kiimsigh ma ite kanga _ talwa _ ataasigh mun _ anaggute ni llegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ governor-a _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh _ .
ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ Passover-em _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ Rome-em _ governor-ngan _ iteme te aqe a _ ataasigh _ anusimingllagh aq _ yug lghute t _ nakmikegkagh at _ .
tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ tamaanteftuq _ apeghseghugh _ anusimingllagh aq _ , _ ategh a _ Barabbas _ .
enkaam _ yug lghute _ qerngughte yan _ , _ Pilate-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naligh _ iteme te sug steggu _ Barabbas _ nalighmeng _ Jesus _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ Christ-ameng _ ? _ "
Pilate-em _ liisimake u kangi _ Jews-et _ igleghutistengita _ aqinake luku _ Jesus _ tagite u kangat _ ellmi nun _ .
Pilate _ aqumga ma luku _ nanqigtivig mi _ , _ nulighh an _ ungipaatesaghtugh qu a _ , _ " _ sa naqe fqaan _ taana _ seghleghqe llghite ngughk _ yuug _ qayughllak _ qavangugh ke kaqe aqa _ enkaam _ aghnelqusiq _ seghleliigh sigh ke aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi ma luku _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ aaghqute aqekagh it _ yug lghute t _ iteme te sqellug qu _ Barabbas _ , _ Jesus _ tuqute sqellug qu _ .
Governor-em _ aapte laataghkagh i _ yug lghute t _ , _ " _ naligh _ iteme te sug steggu _ elpesi nun _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ Barabbas _ ! _ "
Pilate-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ Sanaqsikunʼngam _ Jesus _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ Christ-ameng _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
Pilate-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangan _ ? _ sa u a _ seghlegh _ pi kaqe agu _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ iglagtaaghalluteng _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ qaquuragh ste gu _ ! _ "
Pilate _ liigike luni _ alla _ sapagningite yami _ esghagh luki _ yug lghute t _ seghleliigh kestagh lghiit _ , _ tugu lukek _ aghmigusigh k _ uughtughkagh _ sivu itni _ yug lghute t _ . _ taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ whanga _ avute ite unga _ tuqute lleghqagh anun _ , _ elpek si _ tawaten _ pistengngwaaghsi _ ! _ "
yug lghute m _ iingunaghhaghmeng _ aki tke aat _ , _ " _ whangkuta _ kingunegh ke te lghii ni _ avute u lleqe ukut _ tuqute llegh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ Pilate-em _ Barabbas _ iteme te luku _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus _ kagsagmig ste luku _ tuunekagh a _ pilluwaghtenun _ qaquurigh sqellug qu _ .
taagken _ governor-em _ pilluwaghtengita _ aglagh tke aat _ Jesus _ qerngughtaaghvigmeggnun _ governor-em _ mangteghagh ani _ . _ tawani _ ila teng _ qerngughte luki _ kangllukagh at _ .
aatkagh i _ mataghte qugh luki _ , _ kavirrakegtagh gneng _ atkuyaagh gneng _ aate ste vikekagh at _ .
taagken _ sikughllugtuqagh meng _ avayagh meng _ qaghpa ngllagh luku _ naasqwakun _ aate stekagh at _ . _ aghenqignegh an llu _ iiggagh kun _ tugu ste luku _ unaghsiighwagh _ , _ segesqughte uute luteng _ sivungagh kun _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ Quulvaghamken _ umiileg at _ Jews-et _ ! _ "
taagken _ qesigh qu luku _ , _ tugu luku _ unaghsiighwagh _ naasqwakun _ anagu llegh ke aat _ .
legasiighwagh te kete nghmeng _ apeghiigh yamegteggu _ , _ atkuyaagh kek _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ katam _ aatkagh i _ aate te squgh ke ait _ . _ taagken _ qaquuragh yaghtugh qu aat _ .
aane ma luteng _ ne ghllag meng _ esghagh luku _ yuug _ , _ Cyrene-eghmii _ , _ ategh a _ simon _ , _ qelqe aat _ uyamig sqellug qu _ Jesus-em _ qaquuragh a _ .
kaate yameng _ Golgotha-mun _ ( _ golgotha _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ yug m _ Naasqwan _ nenge a _ " _ ) _ ,
pilluwaghtet _ Jesus-mun _ tuunekagh at _ megh sqellug qu _ wine- a _ sungaghnilngughmeng _ akumekagh _ . _ iwernga _ naasiigh luku _ meghyunghitkaa _ .
Pilluwaghtet _ qaquuragh yamegteggu _ , _ nengigh tke ait _ aatkagh i _ ateghteiiraagh te kaqe luki _ .
taagken _ tawani _ aqume uute luteng _ kelengakekagh at _ .
Naasqwan _ qule akun _ nekegtekagh at _ qaquuragh llegh anun _ apallugh _ igaqe nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ una _ JESUS-NGUUQ _ , _ umiileg at _ JEWS-ET _ .
maalghug llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ qaquuragh ke agket _ , _ aag llegh a _ aghenqignegh akun _ , _ ila a _ saghumignegh akun _ .
yug t _ naghughte lghiit _ , _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ naasqugh teng _ ufsug te magh ita
akilghuukagh at _ , _ " _ elpek _ pi kau uten _ temple- a _ naafqennaqniluku _ enkaam _ pingayut ni _ aghnegh ni _ nekefneqiggnaqniluku _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke u kangaten _ elpeneng _ katam _ yugu li _ , _ qaquuragh meng _ ukig i _ ! _ "
Tawateghpigaq _ Chief _ priest-et _ , _ maligte te luteng _ apeghtugh i kayug nun _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ siivanllegh nun llu _ , _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ ,
" _ yuguligh u iqe ai _ ila i _ , _ naqam _ ellmi neng _ katam _ yugulighpag nigh nge i tuq _ ! _ umiileg u kuni _ Israel-eghmiinun _ ukig li _ qaquuragh mineng _ enkaam _ ugpeqnayaghaghput _ .
neghyuke u a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ pi aqe uq llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ighnegh ke ni luni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke u kunigu _ yuguliligu _ maaten _ . _ "
qaquuragh lgute kenka llu _ wayagh niigh tek _ legasiighwagh tkekagh ak _ .
taagken _ qamagte luni _ nuna _ mamleghqwaakaq _ aghnegh m _ qukaa neng _ kenlanga _ three-klaagmun _ .
tea- ma ni _ nani _ three-klaagmi _ Jesus _ akilghuu ghllagkagh _ whaten _ , _ " _ Eli _ , _ Eli _ , _ lama _ sabachthani _ ? _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ kiyaghnegh mni _ , _ sangama _ unite zinga _ ? _ "
ila ita _ yug t _ tawanlenguut _ nekevgha te lghiit _ nagate luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Uum _ yug m _ elijah _ tuqlughagh aa _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ yuug _ ataasigh _ aqfaqughkagh _ nepsag sigh meng _ . _ taagken _ nepte luku _ quwaalghiimun _ wine- mun _ , _ unaghsiighwagh qun _ nekegte luku _ nengug tke a _ Jesus-mun _ melugrigh sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ wiintaku _ , _ esghapag kau lteggu _ Elijah-m _ yuguliyaghtughnayukagu _ ! _ "
allameng _ Jesus _ aragh ghllag luni _ pegtekakek _ taghneghagh gni _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ temple- mete ngughk _ safkaaghute _ , _ pikegken _ kanavek _ pike aq _ malghughqelluni _ . _ nuna _ ufsug te yan _ , _ uyghag t _ quupe aghtagh tke aat _ ,
llivegh t _ qelpegh aghtagh tke aat _ , _ uglagh lghiit llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ tuqu laghate te kaayagh lghiit _ unguvagh uute tke aat _ ,
enkaam _ llivegh meggneng _ aanleghagh tke aat _ . _ kingu aneng _ Jesus-em _ unguvaghtellghan _ aglagh uute tke aat _ agleghnagh lghii mun _ ne ghllag mun _ , _ tawani _ yug lghute m _ esghaghkagh it _ .
tawani _ qaquuragh vig mi _ , _ umiilwaaghenkut _ pilluwaghtekullghhiit _ kelengake kangat _ Jesus _ , _ esghagh yamegteggu _ nuna _ qaprag ghllag lghii _ , _ tamaa na llu _ sa u a _ pi yan _ , _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ una _ ighnegh ke ma yagh agu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ "
Tamaanteftut _ aghnagh lghute t _ esghapag lghiit _ uyavagh neng _ . _ galilee- meng _ maligtekagh at _ Jesus _ kayusiite na luki _ .
Akulngitniteftut _ mary _ Magdala-ghmii _ , _ mary- llu _ naange ak _ James-enkuk _ Joseph-enkuk _ , _ Zebedee-mllu _ ighnegh gkenka _ naange ak _ .
Whanikuyagu _ aklungilnguq _ yuug _ ategh a _ Joseph _ , _ Arimathea-ghmii _ , _ maligte yaaghte nga _ Jesus-em _ kaate tke aq _ .
pilate- mun _ pi luni _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ tungsigh iqe a _ . _ enkaam _ Pilate-em _ qelegh tke a _ yugusigh _ Joseph-mun _ tuune sqellug qu _ .
Enkaangam _ tugu luku _ yugusigh a _ , _ nutaghaghllug kun _ qiipaghakun _ imeg tke a _ .
taagken _ llikagh a _ ellmi _ lliveghraghagh mig qu te _ , _ uyghag ghrugllag kun _ laag stekagh mikun _ siklagh kumeng _ . _ taagken _ paye anun _ up- llghite aghte luku _ uyghag ghllag _ , _ apeghiigh yami _ aghulaqekagh _ .
Tawanteftuk _ mary _ Magdala-ghmiinkuk _ , _ aag llegh a llu _ mary _ llivegh mun _ ayuqe lutek _ aqumga lghiik _ .
unaami ani _ kingu aneng _ Yataghqefigem _ aghnegh an _ , _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ Pharisees-etlu _ aleghqugh yaghtugh qu aat _ Pilate _ .
pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yugu ni uq _ , _ neqamikaghput _ taana _ puughte i sta _ salin _ unguva luni _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ unguvagh ste lleqe unga _ . _ '
Enkaangam _ kayagte te gu _ llivegh a _ kelengakngwaaghesqelluku _ pi nga yu nun _ aghnegh nun _ , _ luuraq _ maligsaaghtengita _ yugusigh a _ tegleg luku _ ungipaate na yu katki _ yug t _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ . _ una _ iqlengaq _ seghleghataghaayaghqaaguq _ sivuligh meng _ . _ "
Pilate-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Kelengakistelguusi _ , _ elngaatall _ kelengakestengngwaaghteggu _ llivegh _ . _ "
enkaam _ llivegh mun _ aglagh luteng _ maghqate luku _ nallu na iqe aat _ uyghag _ qelpeghte na yu katgu _ . _ taagken _ qelegh tke aat _ pilluwaghtenun _ kelengake sqellug qu _ .
Sabbath-em _ kingu aneng _ , _ aghtaghagh aqe a llu _ sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ , _ mary _ Magdala-ghmii _ , _ ila a llu _ Mary-m _ , _ llivegh _ esghagh yaghtugh qu ak _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ nuna _ qaprag ghllagkagh _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ yaquleg a _ qilag meng _ ukikagh _ . _ llivegh m _ paye an _ uyghag a _ up- llghite aghtagh luku _ aqumekagh a _ .
esghaqaaluni _ nighugte pagte te te lghii stun _ nighugtu tekagh mi _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ qategh lghiit _ anigu stun _ .
Kelengakistet _ yaquleg meng _ alingruughkagh t _ repall _ ungelegte luteng _ , _ tuqukagh stun llu _ lli aqe aat _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh k _ yaquleg m _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ alinge gpenatek _ . _ liisimake amtek _ Jesus _ ivagh aqe aghte tek _ , _ qaquuragh kaayagh lghii _ .
Whaanneghituq _ ; _ unguvagh ma uq _ pi naqe ni llegh mitun _ . _ tagi tek _ , _ esghagh yaghtugh tegnegu _ llivike yagh kanga _ .
enkaam _ ungipaate qaghte yaghtugh tegneki _ maligsaaghtengi _ unguvagh ma ni luku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ aga llu _ sivullgaagh ma uq _ galilee- mun _ . _ taagani _ esghaghlleqaghsi _ ! _ taawa _ ungipaate amtek _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ tawaninginaq _ llivegh meng _ aghulaqekagh k _ , _ alinge magh egmek llu _ quya ghllag magh egmek llu _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu aik _ maligsaaghtengi _ .
Jesus-em _ aliigh aghte vike lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh _ elpetegnilli _ . _ " _ enkaam _ taake uk _ aghnagh k _ taku luku _ , _ itegagh i _ nuqneqluki _ manigugh qu ak _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ alinge gpenatek _ . _ ungipaate yaghtugh tegneki _ malighsaaghtenka _ anglegute yagh u i tke anka _ , _ Galilee-munʼnguq _ aglagh lit _ taagani nguq _ esghagh lleqe aatnga _ . _ "
aghnagh k _ igleghte ma lukek _ , _ lliveghmelnguut _ ila i _ kelengakistet _ Jerusalem-emun _ itegh luteng _ , _ chief _ priest-enun _ apeghkagh at _ qamagte luku _ tamaa na _ apeghiighkagh _ .
enkaam _ chief _ priest-etlu _ , _ siivanllegh t llu _ qerngughte luteng _ agghi tke aat _ . _ taagken _ maniliteghllagluki _ pilluwaghtet _ ,
pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ungipaate nakesi _ yug t _ , _ ' _ Unugmi _ qavaa te ma luta _ maligsaaghtengita _ tagi luteng _ tegleg ma ut _ yugusigh a _ . _ '
Governor-em _ nagaqugh ma kagu _ whangkuta _ aleghqughlleqaghput _ enkaam _ seghleliigh lleg nge naanghite usi _ . _ "
Kelengakistet _ mat- ni _ tugu luku _ pi sqe llegh megestun _ pikagh t _ . _ enkaam _ whavemun _ kenlanga _ Jews-et _ paninang _ apegh aqe aat _ Jesus-em _ yugusigh a _ tegleg kaqe ni luku _ maligsaaghtenganun _ .
tawaten _ pi ma luki _ , _ taakut _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghtet _ aglaghkagh t _ galilee- mun _ , _ naayghagh mun _ Jesus-em _ pi sqe llegh atun _ tawaten _ .
esghagh yamegteggu _ Jesus _ manigugh qu aat _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ aygughikekagh at _ ellnga u ta a _ .
Jesus-em _ taku luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ qamagte luni _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleq _ qilag mi llu _ , _ nuna mi llu _ whanga mnun _ tagivagh kau uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghulaqe lusi _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ maligte yaaghte ngllagh teki _ whanga mnun _ , _ paaptaayelaghteki _ ategh akun _ ata m _ , _ ighnegh m _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ .
apeghtuusagh qite ki _ qaatkesqelluki _ qamagte luki _ qelegh tke anka _ elpesi nun _ . _ elpesinite pestaagh lleqe unga _ quunpeng _ kenlanga _ kenletghuutellghanun _ nuna m _ . _ "
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piinligh kau ut _ whaten _ :
Uuknaliqistem _ Isaiah-m _ igaqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whaten _ pillgha _ , _ " _ ungipaghteke _ kayagte kestagh naqe aqa _ sivu gpeni _ yataaghqe sqellug qu _ tume kaghqagh n _ .
kilgaa ni _ me _ akilghuu aqe uq _ whaten _ , _ ' _ Atanghem _ tume a _ yataaghqe teggu _ , _ taklaghte ggu llu _ ! _ ' _ "
taana _ ungipagh a _ John-nguuq _ paaptaaye sta _ . _ kilgaa ni _ paaptaayelaghaquqlu _ ungipagh aqe uq llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ Avuteghqellusi _ , _ seghleghqennanighlusi _ paaptaayetek _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute lleqe aisi _ . _ "
Judea-ghmiitlu _ Jerusalem-eghmiitlu _ nagate yaghtugh tke aat _ John _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lleg teng _ apeghragh nghatki _ paaptaayaaqegkangi _ kiiw gni _ Jordan-meng _ ategh ke lghii gni _ .
John-em _ aatkagh i _ camel-em _ melqwaneng _ ulimaagh t _ , _ meqagh meng _ tafsi luni _ , _ negh aqe lghii _ locust-mengllu _ honey-mengllu _ .
ungipagh ke ikagh _ whaten _ , _ " _ kingu mneng _ yuug _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghitaghalghii _ whanga mneng _ . _ whanga _ sasii nghite unga _ repall _ itemtepagningitanka _ singigh a _ .
megh meng _ paaptaayaaqamsi _ , _ iwernga _ ellnga n _ paaptaaye lleqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ "
John _ tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ Jesus _ kaate tke aq _ nazareth- meng _ , _ Galilee-melngughmeng _ , _ enkaam _ John-em _ paaptaayekagh a _ Jordan-egni _ .
paaptaaye negh meng _ taaqe yatni _ Jesus-em _ tawaninginaq _ esghaghkagh i _ qilag t _ qelpegh lghiit _ , _ agleghnagh lghiik llu _ taghneghagh k _ uki lghiik _ ellmi nun _ dove-etun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
me m llu _ qilag meng _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ , _ piniqekagh mni _ . _ efqugh ke pigte amken _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ Jesus _ aghulaqe stekagh a _ kilgaa nun _ .
Ellnginaghhaakaq _ iwerngaqun _ nuyaagh lghiit _ teghig ke sagh t _ tamaantekat _ . _ Tamaansimaluku _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqukagh a _ ketwhell _ 40 _ aghneq _ , _ iwernga _ yaquleg t _ aflengakekagh at _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ kingu aneng _ John-em _ anusimingllagh llegh an _ , _ Jesus _ galilee-llug ni _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ kiyaghneghtagh neng _ .
pi ke aq _ , _ " _ pi lleghqagh _ whaa _ kaate ma uq _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whaa _ whaante uq _ ! _ Avuteghqellusi _ , _ seghleghqennanighlusi _ ugpeqe teki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ! _ "
Jesus _ igleghte te kete luku _ naayvagh m _ Galilee-m _ esne akun _ esghagh kakek _ maalghug _ iqalliniigh tek _ siifte i lghiik _ negaghpag meng _ . _ Simon-enkunguftuk _ Andrew-nkuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
Jesus-em _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ , _ apeghtugh naqe amtek _ yug meng _ naapsagutesqellutek _ . _ "
Tawaninginaq _ negaghpag tek _ unite luki _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Tazingapighqaaghluni _ esghagh laatagh kakek _ James-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ , _ ighnegh kek _ Zebedee-m _ . _ negaghpag megteneng _ ilaaghtu lghiik _ angyagh megteni _ .
Jesus-em _ esghaqagh inagh lukek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ maligte gnenga _ ! _ " _ enkaam _ angyagh kun _ unite luku _ ata ek _ Zebedee _ , _ taakut llu _ qepghaghtenguluki _ tugukagh teng _ , _ maligtekagh ak _ Jesus _ .
Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ Capernaum-emun _ kaate tke aat _ . _ Sabbath-ngughsagu _ , _ Jesus _ synagogue-elluni _ apeghtugh ikagh _ .
nagate lghiit _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ apeghtugh i llegh a _ , _ qayughllak _ apeghtugh ikagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ pilleghqalitellghakun _ , _ apeghtughistengistun _ liilightuusagh t _ pi gpenani _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ itegh luni _ synagogue-mun _ akilghuukagh _ ,
" _ Jesus _ , _ Nazareth-eghmii _ , _ sangamta _ qinuyug zikut _ ? _ Naafqesaghtuuzikuut _ ? _ kina nge uten _ liisimake aqa _ , _ yuguligh i ste u uten _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ kayagte lleqe ni luku _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aghyuugh qu a _ tughneghagh _ , _ " _ Nepngunang _ , _ aane i _ yug meng _ . _ "
tughneghagh m _ yuug _ sayugpagtagh ste luku _ , _ aragh ghllag magh mi _ aanekagh _ .
yug t _ saghiigha yug luteng _ ellmeggneng _ aapqughaaghutkat _ , _ " _ una _ sangaawa _ ? _ una _ apeghtuusaghraghagh u uq _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ uum _ yug m _ qelegh ai _ tughneghagh t _ aanesqelluki _ , _ legan _ qaatke aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ Galilee-lqaaghaghmi _ yug t _ ungipaqnginaamaan _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ aane ghesnagh luni _ synagogue-meng _ , _ Simon-enkuk _ Andrew-nkuk _ mangteghagh itnun _ pi ke aq _ , _ James-enkuklu _ John-enkuk _ maligtekagh ak _ .
Simon-em _ saki a _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ puqlegha luni _ . _ legan _ Jesus _ kaa tuq _ ungipagh tke aat _ aghnagh _ qinuyug u ni luku _ .
itegh luni _ aghnagh _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ nekeve stekagh a _ enkaam _ puqlegha nga i uute luni _ , _ kepsiiqu inagh magh ita _ pi ke ai _ .
Sabbath-em _ ighivgaani _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ Jesus-mun _ tagi qugh tke ait _ qinuyug lghiit _ , _ tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh leg t _ ilu megteggun _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ Capernaum-eghmiit _ mangteghagh m _ manughagh ani _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ uglagh lghiit _ naallghute qugh qu ai _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ aqnighnegh itneng _ , _ aag negh squgh ke ai llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug lghute t _ ilu itneng _ . _ tughneghagh t _ sa meng _ pi te ma ite kangi _ , _ qayughllak _ kina u ta a _ liisimake kangat _ .
salin _ aghsug niite ghllag luku _ , _ Jesus _ makete luni _ aanekagh _ yughagh na luni _ kilgaa ni _ .
Simon-enkut _ ilakulghiit _ ivagh yaghtugh qu aat _ ,
naalkesamegteggu _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yug t _ ivagh nghiighte te aqe aaten _ . _ "
yeghlegi _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ila itnun _ nuna t _ pi naqe ukut _ . _ ellngit ni llu _ ungipagh ke i yaghqaa unga _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tagi u unga _ . _ "
enkaam _ Galilee-lqaaghaghmi _ igleghte te kete luku _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ synagogue-nni _ , _ aag negh squgh ke ai llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug t _ ilu itneng _ .
yuug _ leprosy-lek _ tagi luni _ Jesus-mun _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ nangllegsipiglluni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke gkuvgu _ naallghute aghte nga _ ukmangiightesqellunga _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nanglleg yagute luku _ nengug luku _ sa uute te kete luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ piyuke llegh ke aqa _ , _ naagh llegh u te n _ ! _ "
Tawaninginaq _ yuug _ naallghute luni _ ukmangigh u aghtekagh _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ ineghtengngwaaqaa _ , _ " _ nagate aghten _ , _ wataghllak _ kinku t _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaki _ naallghute ni luten _ whanga mnun _ . _ itupill _ priest- mun _ yuvghiighsigh yagh a _ . _ enkaam _ aghqerraaghhaaten _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh ita _ pisqellghistun _ ipapighqesqelluku _ yug nun _ naallghute llegh n _ . _ " _ taagken _ tawaninginaq _ aghulaqe stekagh a _ .
iwernga _ yug m _ igleghte te kete luku _ nani _ alngunak _ apegh manginagh qagh a _ Jesus-mun _ naalghusimaniluni _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ Jesus _ alngunak _ ne nun _ pi na nigh ke aq _ , _ qayughllak _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taku aqe kangat _ , _ enkaam _ paaghqagh igh llegh ani _ kiyaghtekagh _ . _ iwernga _ naken _ alngunak _ yug lghute t _ paninang _ taku aqe kangat _ .
mulu gpenani _ Jesus _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ Capernaum-emun _ , _ enkaam _ ungipagh kekagh at _ nayuqaqegkemininniluku _ mangteghagh mi _ .
yuug _ tagi laghate te yalghiimi _ ellnga nun _ kangsugh tke aat _ repall _ manughagh mun _ qakmavek _ . _ Jesus _ ungipagh ke i ma luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ,
estamat _ yug t _ kevegtugh luku _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ tagi tke aat _ ellnga nun _ .
kaat ute te luku _ itghute nghmeng _ aghtugh qu aat _ , _ qayughllak _ yuug _ kangsuute ghllagu lghii _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghagh m _ qaye an _ tile- nge i _ ikugh luki _ reghighulluku _ , _ yuug _ allighagh akun _ ukigtekaat _ Jesus-em _ nalla akun _ .
Jesus-em _ liisimake kangi _ ugpeqilleghtulngit _ , _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute lleg nge ut _ . _ "
tawani _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ aqumga te lghiit _ sumeghtaghaghkagh t _ ,
" _ sangami _ yuug _ una _ tawaten _ akuzi a _ ? _ akuzillegh a _ seghleghu uq _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh u ni lghii _ ! _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ seghevute i yaghqagh _ ! _ "
Tawaninginaq _ Jesus-em _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ liisimakekagh i _ enkaam _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangan _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh tsi _ ?
Nalikek _ piyaqnagh u i aatagh aghte lleqe ak _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi yagh kumkun _ , _ ' _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ seghevute lleg nge ut _ ' _ nalighmeng _ , _ ' _ makete luten _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ piyug i _ ? _ '
iwernga _ liisimake sug aqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ seghevutiyaqleguuq _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ " _ enkaam _ unegh ii iqe aq _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ ,
" _ ungipaate amken _ , _ maketen _ , _ allighagh n _ tugu luku _ , _ elpesi nun _ aglagh a _ ! _ "
yug t _ esghapagkagh at _ yuug _ tawaninginaq _ nekeve luni _ , _ allighagh ni _ tugu luku _ aane lghii _ . _ enkaam _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ tawanlenguut _ saghiigha yuke aat _ , _ usuqekagh at llu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ Whatelngughmeng _ esghaate igate yagh ukut _ ! _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ , _ esne anun _ naayvagh m _ Galilee-m _ pi nqigtekagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taku laghate te yatni _ apeghtugh qu ai _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ esgha qaa _ tax-neng _ qerngughte i sta _ , _ ategh a _ levi _ , _ ighnegh a _ Alphaeus-em _ . _ aqumga uq _ qepghagh vig mini _ . _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ maligte nga _ . _ " _ Levi-em _ nekeve luni _ maligtekagh a _ .
tawani _ ighivgaghmi _ , _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ Levi-enkunun _ negh yaghtuqagh t _ . _ neghe lgusighkagh it _ tax-neng _ qerngughtistelghutetlu _ tamaakut llu _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ . _ ( _ Tawatelnguutlu _ yug t _ maligsaagh u kangat _ Jesus _ . _ )
ila i _ apeghtughiste it _ liilightuusagh t _ Pharisees-ngulghiit _ , _ esghagh yamegteggu _ Jesus _ neghe lgusigh i lghii _ , _ aaptekagh it _ maligsaaghtengi _ , _ " _ sangami _ Jesus _ negh aqa _ tax-em _ qerngughtistengitnillu _ seghleghqestenillu _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghallegtagh _ qinuyug lghii nun _ pi u uq _ , _ yugunqegtagh nun _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ungipaate yaghtugh u anka _ seghleghqestet _ avuteghqesqelluki _ , _ nakaan _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe igate ni luteng _ pi lghiit _ . _ "
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ , _ John-em _ Paaptaayestem _ maligsaaghtengillu _ Pharisees-etlu _ fast-engulghiit _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taku luku _ Jesus _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ sangameng _ John-em _ Paaptaayestem _ maligsaaghtengillu _ Pharisees-etlu _ maligsaaghtengit _ fast- u aqe aat _ , _ naqam _ elpek _ maligsaaghteten _ pi gpenateng _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ aqelqagh i _ fast-elleqaat _ neqenghaghqe llegh ani _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ nulightugh naqe lghii _ paninang _ tawanlluku _ tawaten _ pi naanghite ut _ .
nulightugh naqe lghii stun _ ayuqe unga _ , _ maligsaaghtenka _ nulightugh naqe lghii m _ aqelqiistun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ aghulaqe stegkanganga _ elngaatall _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ maligsaaghtenka _ fast-ellequt _ .
" _ kitum _ alngunak _ nutaghagh _ qiipaghagh _ qellughte ma ite ngughk _ ilaagh sigh ke naanghite a _ qaasligh lug gnun _ . _ ilaagh sigh ke gkunigu _ piigughtu aghagh lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ piig llegh _ sullevataghllequq _ .
enkaamllu _ kitum _ alngunak _ awataghpag lug _ imigh naanghite a _ wine-eghraghaghmeng _ . _ imigh kunigu _ awataghpag lug _ quupaghte lleqe uq _ enkaam _ wine- a _ sakusiiqe lleqe uq _ , _ awataghpag lug llu _ naave lleqe uq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ wine-eghraghaq _ awataghpagraghagh mete te _ kuuve yaghqaa uq _ ! _ "
ataasigh mi _ Sabbath-mi _ , _ Jesus _ igleghtekagh _ wheat-et _ piite vig itgun _ . _ Maligsaaghtengita _ iglegha lgusigh te kete luku _ wheat-et _ piigtu ta itneng _ ikute aghtagh qukagh t _ negh na luteng _ .
taagken _ Pharisees-et _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ki qun _ ! _ sangameng _ maligsaaghteten _ saghna ut _ wheat-et _ piigtu ta itneng _ ? _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ qepghagh ut _ Sabbath-mi _ , _ enkaam _ qaatke te nghite u ut _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Atightiigasteggu _ David-em _ pillgha _ qavngarugllak _ ? _ Yukullghiit _ iyatagh iqe aqngameng _ ,
David _ itegh luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh anun _ neghe kau uq _ neqekrangllagh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunekagh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ Abiathar _ , _ High _ Priest-nguluku _ . _ liilightuusagh mta _ pillghani _ priest- nge i nagh ghhaat _ negh yaghqaa yagh ut _ tamaaken _ neqekrangllagh meng _ , _ iwernga _ David _ negh luni _ yug ni llu _ tuune kaqe ai _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Sabbath-a _ nakmike kau uq _ meghnaliviguluni _ yug m _ pinighqe lleghqagh anun _ . _ Sabbath-a _ nakmike kau nghite uq _ yug mun _ ikfiqliighutkesqelluku _ .
Enkaangam _ whanga _ , _ ighneghagh ni _ yug m _ , _ Atanghuunga _ talwa _ Sabbath-mun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aglagh nqigtekagh _ synagogue-mun _ , _ tawanteftuq _ yuug _ inglu i _ iigge an _ unegh ii iqe aat _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ tawanlenguut _ riirngi u aqe aat _ Jesus-em _ naallghute na yu kagu _ Sabbath-mi _ . _ naallghute kagu _ whaten _ pi na luku _ , _ " _ anaggute uten _ ! _ "
uniighkagh meng _ iigge leg _ yuug _ Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ whavek _ . _ "
taagken _ yug t _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mta _ sa sqe inkut _ Sabbath-mi _ ? _ pinitun _ pisqinkuut _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghletun _ ? _ Yugulighisqinkuut _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuqutisqinkuut _ ? _ " _ iwernga _ yug t _ qallegnanighwaaghutkat _ .
Jesus-em _ esghapag ghngaaghmiki _ ugumi yagutekagh i _ , _ naqam _ iilqe tke magh ita _ pineghllug u llegh itneng llu _ waakigatngitnengllu _ . _ taagken _ Jesus-em _ qiive luku _ yuug _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iigge ten _ nengug te ki _ . _ " _ legan _ nengug te ai _ aga _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
enkaam _ Pharisees-et _ aane ghesnagh luteng _ synagogue-meng _ , _ Herod-em _ ilapgastengitnun _ aglagh luteng _ agghi tkekagh at _ naten _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ Jesus _ .
Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ naayvagh mun _ galilee- mun _ aglaghkagh t _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ maligtekagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh kaqe kangit _ Jesus-em _ allaaghllugwhaghtillghi _ . _ tamaa na _ yug lghute _ galilee- meng _ , _ Judea-meng _ , _ Jerusalem-emeng _ , _ Idumea-meng _ , _ Jordan-em _ kiiw m _ inglunganilngughneng _ nuna neng _ , _ Tyre-meng _ , _ Sidon-meng _ pi u lghiit _ .
yuug _ uglaghi ghllag yan _ Jesus _ maligsaaghteminun _ angyagh meng _ yataaghqe te sqekagh _ luuraq _ ighlleghnayukangatni _ megh mun _ .
yug lghute _ naallghute qugh kaqe ta aneng _ qamagte luteng _ qinuyuget _ ellnga nun _ kaate naqe ghllag ke aat _ saafte pigesnagh na luku _ .
tamaakut llu _ tughneghagh t _ yug t _ ilungitnilnguut _ esghagh nghmegteggu _ Jesus _ , _ sivungagh kun _ ullghaghlluteng _ akilghuu aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke aaten _ ! _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ ineghtengngwaaqii _ tughneghagh t _ kina u te ni _ apegh fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ qemi mun _ mayugh luni _ yug t _ piyukekagh ni _ tagsighteqii _ . _ tagi laghate te yata
nakmikegkagh i _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yug t _ apostle-nguluki _ . _ taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Whangamnitesqellusi _ nakmike amsi _ , _ kayagte lleqe amsi llu _ ungipaghyaghtiisqellusi _ .
Aghtughyaghqaanghillelgullequsillu _ tughneghagh t _ aanestesqelluki _ yug neng _ . _ "
ukut _ nakmike kaqe ai _ , _ simon _ , _ ( _ Jesus-em _ ateghagh iqe a _ peter- meng _ ) _ ;
James-enkuk _ John-enkuk _ , _ ighnegh kek _ Zebedee-m _ , _ ( _ Jesus-em _ atigh kakek _ Boanerges-meng _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh meng _ , _ " _ ighnegh kek _ kallug m _ " _ ) _ ;
Andrew-nkut _ , _ Philip-enkut _ , _ Bartholomew-nkut _ , _ Matthew-nkut _ , _ Thomas-enkut _ , _ James-llu _ ighnegh a _ Alphaeus-em _ , _ Thaddaeus-enkut _ , _ Simon-llu _ Zealot-a _ ,
Judas _ Iscariot-lu _ uvegh ghpagte te i yaghqagh _ Jesus-meng _ .
taagken _ Jesus _ tukugh minun _ aglaghkagh _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ aglagh uute laataghkagh t _ ellngit nun _ , _ repall _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ neghepagningite tke aat _ .
Nengllugutangan _ nagaqugh luku _ tawaten _ aneghte llegh a _ aqfakagh at _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ pi kangat _ nallungughte ni luku _ .
ila i _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ Jerusalem-emeng _ tagikagh t _ whaten _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ , _ " _ Beelzebul _ Jesus-em _ ilu anite uq _ ! _ enkaam _ aane ste qugh aqe ai _ tughneghagh t _ yug neng _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ Beelzebul-em _ , _ umiilwaaghitgun _ tughneghagh t _ . _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ tagsigh luki _ yug t _ ungipaghaate ke ai _ , _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ tughneghagh _ ellmi neng _ aane ste lleqe a _ ?
ataneghpag u llegh _ aafte uute kuni _ , _ taana _ ataneghpag u llegh _ qerngaghmennaanghituq _ .
nengllugute t _ aafte uute kumeng _ , _ taakut _ nengllugute t _ qerngaghmennaanghitut _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ tughneghaan- kut _ aafqugh te luteng _ pillugute kumeng _ , _ tughneghagh _ nekevghapagningite te luni _ kenle kaghqagh minun _ kaate lleqe uq _ .
" _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh naanghite uq _ iknaqe lghii m _ yug m _ mangteghagh anun _ wayaghteghnaluki _ saghya i _ . _ sivuke luku _ iknaqe lghii _ yuug _ asighqe aghte luku _ , _ taagken _ wayaghteghlleqii _ saghya i _ .
" _ ipa _ ungipaate amsi _ , _ yug t _ seghevute lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ , _ seghletun llu _ akuzi tke llegh itneng _ kiyaghnegh _ .
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke gkumikek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ seghevute lleg nge naanghite uq _ , _ qayughllak _ seghleghqengnguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute yaghqaqe nghite ka aneng _ . _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ kenglengilnguuguq _ . _ "
Jesus _ tawaten _ akuzikagh _ qayughllak _ ila ita _ pi kaqe kangat _ , _ " _ tughneghagh lgu uq _ ilu mikun _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ naange a llu _ anglegutangillu _ kaate tke aat _ . _ manughagh mete luteng _ aanesqekagh at _ esghagh yug ni luku _ .
yug lghute t _ aqume uute nga lghiit _ Jesus-em _ uvitangani _ ungipagh tke aat _ , _ " _ qakma _ naa gpek llu _ anglegute gpek llu _ esghagh yug aqe aaten _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ naa ka _ ? _ kinkungaawa t _ anglegute nka _ ? _ "
Yugsughaluni _ aqumga lghiit _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ naa ke amsi llu _ , _ anglegute ke amsi llu _ !
kitum _ alngunak _ atuqe gkunigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ anglegute ke aqa llu _ naa ke aqa llu _ . _ "
Taakwaningani _ Jesus _ apeghtugh i laataghkagh _ naayvagh m _ Galilee-m _ esne ani _ . _ elngaatall _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ tagi laghate te ghllag ke aq _ ellnga nun _ , _ repall _ angyagh mun _ uugte luni _ aqumekagh _ , _ llaaghanwha _ yug lghute t _ naayvagh m _ esnenganitkat _ .
ungipaghaate tgun _ allaaghiinaghmeng _ apeghtugh qu ai _ . _ apeghtugh i te kete luku _ pi ke ai _ ,
" _ nagate tek _ ! _ piitesighagh a _ aglagh luni _ piitesigh u aghagh vig minun
ifkagh qughkagh _ piitute neng _ . _ ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ tume tgun _ , _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ tagi luteng _ negh u qu ait _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ uyghagtuqagh kun _ sunapagilngughqun _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ piite tke aat _ , _ qayughllak _ suna a _ ugmestaaghhagh _ .
enkaam _ siqinegh _ piite yalghiimi _ maatnegh an _ paneghtekagh i _ piinneghhat _ , _ akugh nge llegh ite u te meggneng _ paligh rakegtekagh t _ .
ila i _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ , _ sikughllug t _ piite yalghiimeng _ piite vig iqe ait _ grain-et _ .
naqamalla _ tamaakut _ tekite ke aat _ suna kegtagh kun _ piite ste i ghllagkagh t _ grain-meng _ , _ ila i _ 30 _ , _ ila i _ 60 _ , _ enkaam _ ila i _ 100 _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ taaqe nigh ke ai _ whaten _ , _ " _ sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Jesus _ ellnginaaghsan _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghtengitallu _ ila ita llu _ tamaakut _ nagatekagh t _ aaptekagh at _ ungipaghaate kekagh aneng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike sta _ talugh nga lghii _ ipapighqellgha _ ataneghpag u llegh m _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ liite tesi mangite yagh aa _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ iqite nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ nagaqugh aqe ut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ungipaghaate tgun _ .
enkaam _ ' _ esghaate naqe aqe ut _ , _ esghaate naqe aqe ut _ esghaate gpenateng _ . _ nagate aqe ut _ , _ nagate aqe ut _ liigike gpenateng _ . _ pi kaayagh kumeng _ qiive nayagh ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ enkaam _ seghevute nayagh ai _ . _ ' _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ taana _ ungipaghagh an _ piitesighagh a _ liigikenghitestegguu _ ? _ naten mi _ liigike naqe steki _ alngunak _ ungipaghaate t _ ?
piitesighagh a _ ifkaghqagh igh lghii _ piitute neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ungipaghte ngatu te _ ayuqe uq _ .
ila i _ yug t _ qelli ghllagkagh stun _ tume stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ tekite nghata _ tume tgun _ qawaag t _ negh aqe ait _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh te nghata _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ tawaninginaq _ tughneghagh m _ puygu ste aqe ai _ .
ila i _ yug t _ uyghagtuqagh stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ akugh t _ uyghagtuqamelnguut _ asivagh pagigate ut _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh te negh meggni _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ tawaninginaq _ tugukligh aqe ait _ quyake sigh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqngwaaghigalkangit _ akuzi ta i _ enkaam _ ugpegh llegh it _ mulu igate ut _ . _ seghleliigh negh meggni _ , _ nalighmeng _ amyuutke lleg nge negh meggni _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ tawaninginaq _ ugpeqe i nanigh aqe ut _ .
ila i _ yug t _ sikughllugtuqagh stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ sikughllugtuqagh kun _ tekite ke aat _ nagu igate ut _ , _ qayughllak _ sikughllug t _ piite vig igh aqe kangit _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh nghmegteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ qaatke igate ait _ ,
qayughllak _ una _ unguvallegh _ nulqaaviighutkaqaat _ , _ teghhwaaghigh te kaqe aat llu _ aklungi _ , _ sa meng llu _ wata _ allgeghutaghaghyugaqut _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ sikughllug t _ piitfigillghistun _ piitute t _ , _ tamaakut _ yug t _ piyuke llghite a _ puygu ste aqe ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ yug t _ pinigh lghii stun _ suna stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ piitute t _ tekite ke aat _ pinigh lghii kun _ suna kun _ elngaatall _ nagu aqe ut _ . _ ila i _ piite ta iqe ut _ 30 _ , _ ila i _ 60 _ , _ ila i _ 100 _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ tamaakut _ yug t _ nagaqugh nghmegteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ qaatke aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ qepghagh aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ila i _ wataqaaghaq _ qepghaghataaghaghaqut _ ila meggneng _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ kenegh lghutagh k _ itghute lukek _ sagnegh m _ asi anun _ lli naanghite ak _ , _ nalighmeng _ qavaghvig m _ asi anun _ . _ itupill _ quulvaqun _ lli lleqe ak _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ iiw iqe aq _ qaye anun _ lliigh yaghqaa uq _ , _ sa u a llu _ alngunak _ saapekagh _ saaputagh igh yaghqaa uq _ .
sigute lgu kufsi _ nagatusighqagh meng _ , _ nagate tek _ ! _ "
whaten llu _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nagate u aghte ngnga _ ! _ Tuunilleghpesistungwaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe aisi _ , _ paninang _ tuune aghagh lleqe aisi _ .
yuug _ seal- k _ tuune aghagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ yuug _ sapagllagilnguq _ sangiighhagh i _ tugu yaghqaa ut _ . _ "
whaten llu _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ whatete uq _ : _ yuug _ ifkagh qugh aqe uq _ piitute neng _ piitesigh u aghagh vig mini _ .
piitute t _ piite luteng _ nagu aqe ut _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yuug _ qavaa yagh ghngaan _ , _ teghhumayaghngaan _ , _ paninang _ piitute t _ nagwaaqut _ . _ yug m _ nallu kaqe ai _ naten _ nagu aqe ta i _ .
suna inagh ghhagh m _ kayute ngunani _ piitute t _ nagu ste aqe ai _ enkaam _ piite steka nge aqe ut _ : _ sivuke luteng _ sungaghyug kegtagh ghhagh t _ piite aqe ut _ , _ taagken _ napaaziingaqut _ qenwat llu _ grain-engaqut _ .
Grain-et _ qigugh nghata _ unatagh yaghqaaghte aqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ yug m _ kepugh aqe ai _ kepugh sigh mikun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sa mun _ uspute naqe steggu _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ ? _ sa u a _ ungipaghagh te kete naqe steggu _ liigike ste i sigh u luku _ ?
ataneghpag u llegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ mustard-em _ piitute atun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ Mekestaalleghpigaaguq _ piitute neng _ nuna mi _ whani _ iwernga _ yug m _ piitesigh u aghagh nghminigu _ ,
angli ghllag aqe uq _ angegh lleghpigagh ughte luni _ nunivagseghaghyaggaghneng _ . _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ avayagh ghrugllag i _ enkaam _ qawaag t _ unglute yagh u iqe ut _ ququngagh an _ akule akun _ siqinghillghakun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ atuqe luki _ ungipaghaate lghute t _ yug nun _ akuzi tke kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ . _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ liigikelleghtulangistun _ .
quunpeng _ yug t _ apeghtugh aqe kangi _ ungipaghaate tgun _ , _ iwernga _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ ellnginaaghhneghmeggni _ whateghlluwaaq _ liigike ste aqe kangi _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ ungipaghaate t _ .
Taam _ ighivgaani _ Jesus-em _ angyagh mete luni _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ aghvigh lta _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ . _ " _ enkaam _ maligsaaghtet _ uugte luteng _ angyagh mun _ unitekagh it _ yug lghute t _ . _ ila ita llu _ angyagh t _ maligtekagh it _ .
taagken _ anuqligh ghllagkagh _ , _ repall _ imaghllug m _ imighaataqegkaa _ angyagh _ qenwat _ esleqe yaghtuqagh _ .
Jesus _ angyalligh mi _ qavagh _ akisigh luni _ . _ Maligsaaghtengita _ taghtughllug qu _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ tuquyaghngaamtaa _ pizikuut _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ taghtugh luni _ anuqallu _ imaghllug t llu _ ineghtekagh i _ , _ " _ anuqe _ taaqe i ngam _ , _ imaghllug t _ aghuliigh tek _ ! _ " _ enkaam _ ellmaaragte te kete luku _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghteni _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ alinge tsi _ ? _ taawa _ ugpeqigastengngaa _ ? _ "
saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ repall _ tallugh yug ghllagkagh t _ alingruugh magh meng _ , _ enkaam _ aapqughaaghutkat _ ellmeggneng _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ , _ talwa _ anuqe m llu _ imaghllug t llu _ qaatke kangat _ ? _ "
naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ kaate tke aat _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ , _ nuna itnun _ gerasa-kagh mii t _ .
legan _ Jesus _ angyagh meng _ qute mun _ uugg tuq _ yuug _ aane luni _ suflugh itneng _ llivghet _ , _ payegh qagh a _ .
taana _ yuug _ ilu mikun _ tughneghaghtuqagh _ llivegh ni te aqe lghii _ . _ awen _ qiipraghute neng _ asighte aqe yagh kangat _ iiggitgunllu _ itegagh itgun llu _ iwernga _ sakeqe aqe kangi _ qiipraghute t _ , _ kagimte aqe kangi llu _ savikenghaagh t _ itegaminilnguut _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ asighqepag nigh nge i tke a llu _ aghula i aghtepagningitekagh a llu _ , _ qayughllak _ iknaqe pigte lghii _ .
unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ igleghte aqe lghii _ llivegh t _ qungangitnillu _ qemi ni llu _ , _ quunpeng _ araghaatagh magh mi _ , _ uyghag tgun _ kiitigh qu magh mi _ ellmi neng _ .
Jesus _ esghagh yamigu _ uyavaqaanlluku _ ketanqusnaq _ taku luku _ segesqughte vike luku _ manigugh qu a _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ yug m _ ilu anite ngughk _ tughneghagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ seghlegh _ tughneghagh _ , _ aane i _ yug meng _ ! _ " _ tughneghagh m _ araghaatagh qagh a _ , _ " _ Jesus _ , _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sa naqe zinga _ ? _ akeqe i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ikfiqe stesaghqagh u fqaama _ pisqellunga _ ! _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ kina u ziin _ ? _ " _ yug m _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ ategh kaqe a _ ' _ uglagh ghllag _ ' _ qayughllak _ uglagh ghllag ukut _ ! _ "
elngaatall _ Jesus-mun _ aapute uute tke ai _ tughneghagh t _ aghulaqe ste fqiita _ pisqelluki _ taagken _ nuna meng _ .
taawa nguq _ qemi m _ mingle ani _ kurugagh lghute ghllag t _ , _ neghe uute lghiit _ .
tughneghagh t _ aapute uute tke aat _ Jesus-mun _ , _ " _ Kurugaghnun _ kayagte kut _ , _ ellngit nun _ itegh ste kut _ . _ "
enkaam _ angeghqe ma kekagh i _ . _ tughneghagh t _ yug meng _ aane ghesnagh luteng _ kurugaghnun _ iteghaatkat _ . _ entaqun _ 2,000-nguut _ kurugagh at _ , _ pennagh neng _ asitmun _ pangaleg te luteng _ naayvagh mun _ ateghagh tke aat _ enkaam _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
kurugagh at _ aflengakistengit _ qimagugh tke aat _ ne ghllag mun llu _ uvitanganilngughnunllu _ nuna nun _ . _ tamaani _ ungipagh kekagh it _ ilu mikun _ tughneghaghtuqagh llu _ , _ kurugagh at llu _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ esghagh yaghtugh tke ait _ samatagh nge i _ .
Jesus-mun _ kaate luteng _ esghaghkagh at _ yuug _ tughneghaghtu ghllag yagh lghii _ ilu mikun _ . _ taawa nguq _ aqumga uq _ piluguwaaghluni _ , _ umyugagh kek llu _ naallghute lutek _ enkaam _ alingruughkagh t _ .
tamaakut _ esghapagkagh t _ apeghkagh at _ naallghute ma ni luku _ yuug _ tughneghaghtu ghllag yagh lghii _ , _ apeghkagh it llu _ kurugagh at _ samatagh nge i _ .
taagken _ yug lghute t _ maniguute pigte luteng _ Jesus _ aghulaqe sqekagh at _ nuna meggneng _ .
Jesus _ uugte aqe uq llu _ angyagh mun _ , _ yug m _ tughneghaghtu yagh lghii m _ maniguute pigte luni _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ Maligllaken _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ ighsake luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ nengllugute gpenun llu _ , _ ilakumtaagh gpenun llu _ aglagh luten _ apegh naken _ Atanghem _ nanglleg ke pigte luten _ apeghiigh llegh a _ elpenun _ . _ "
enkaam _ yuug _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ tamaani _ nuna mi _ ategh ke lghii mi _ , _ qula _ ne ghllag t _ , _ ungipagh kekagh a _ Jesus-em _ apeghiigh llegh a _ ellmi nun _ , _ tamaakut _ nagaqugh tke aat _ allaaghlluwhaghyukat _ .
Jesus _ angyagh kun _ uteghnigh yan _ inglu anun _ naayvagh m _ , _ esne mi _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qerngughte tke aat _ uvitanganun _ .
taagken _ ataasigh _ synagogue-em _ umiilwaagha _ , _ Jairus-nguftuq _ ategh a _ , _ tagi luni _ Jesus-mun _ segesqughtekagh _ manu akun _ .
maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Paniggaqa _ qinuyug ghllagu uq _ , _ tuqu yaghtugh ngestagh ma uq _ . _ taku aghte gu _ saafte yaghtuqagh ghhu _ , _ enkaam _ naallghute luni _ kiyaghte li _ ! _ "
enkaam _ Jesus-em _ maligtekagh a _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t llu _ maliglleghaatkaat _ Jesus _ , _ repall _ kangllu qaghte luku _ .
aghnagh llu _ tawanteftuq _ aagtuqagh te aq _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngaan _ ayumiqullegh ni _ . _ talwa _ aghallegtagh lghute t _ kayusiite aqe yagh ghngaatni _ naallghute igate ngughk _ , _ yeghlegi _ naavnginalghii _ . _ qenwat _ maniqraggiighutkaq _ .
nagaqugh aqe kanga _ Jesus _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ akulangitgun _ tunutanganeng _ takukagh a _ .
sumeghtagh aqe aq _ , _ " _ aatkagh i _ saafteqeghsaqumki _ naagh llegh u nayagh unga _ . _ "
legan _ atkuyaagh kek _ saafte ak _ kii ii te inagh u magh mi _ pi ke aq _ , _ enkaam _ elpeg kekagh a _ naallghute llegh a _ qaamna mi _ .
Tawaninginaq _ Jesus-em _ liigikekagh a _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleq _ aane lghii _ ellmi neng _ , _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qiive luki _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kitum _ aatkagh nka _ saafte aki _ ? _ "
Maligsaaghtengita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ yug lghute ghllag t _ qungangitnilnguuten _ sangan _ kitumun _ saafte ni luten _ pi ziin _ ? _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ esghagh naqekagh a _ kitumun _ sa uute te ni _ .
aghnagh m _ liigike luku _ naallghute lleg ni _ alingem _ ungelegte magh mi _ takukagh a _ Jesus _ . _ taagken _ manu akun _ segesqughte luni _ ungipagh tke a _ sa llegh mineng _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ panig mni _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpek _ naallghute ste aaten _ . _ nekeggmellegh ligh luten _ aglagh a _ , _ naallghutngwaaghumaaten _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ aleghqugh ma luku _ aghnagh _ , _ kevgat _ tagi luteng _ ungipagh tke aat _ Jairus _ , _ " _ panig n _ tuquma uq _ , _ takusqegpenaanʼngam _ apeghtughiste mun _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagate ghngaaghmiki _ avelghaqiinagh luki _ Jairus _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ taawanginaq _ ugpegh i _ . _ "
taagken _ kitumun _ alngunak _ maligte ste na nigh ke aq _ , _ iwerngaqun _ kelqekagh i _ Peter-enkut _ James-enkut _ John-enkut _ , _ anglegutanga _ James-em _ .
Jesus-enkut _ kaate yalghiimeng _ Jairus-enkunun _ , _ yug lghute ghllag t _ elngaatall _ qiya aghte te te ghllag u ut _ metuumagh meng _ .
Jesus-em _ itegh luni _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ qiya aghte te te ghllag u tsi _ ? _ sangafsi _ nepugti i ghllagu tsi _ ? _ taghnughhagh _ tuqu llghite uq _ , _ qavaa uq _ ! _ "
iwernga _ nenglaqegkaat _ tawaten _ piyisteng _ . _ qamagte luki _ aanesamiki _ angayuqagh kek llu _ taakut llu _ maligsaaghteni _ itghutekagh i _ taghnughhagh m _ ne anun _ .
Jesus-em _ iiggagh kun _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Talitha _ kum _ ! _ " _ ( _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ makete sqe amken _ ! _ " _ )
Tawaninginaq _ makete luni _ piyuke aq _ . _ ( _ aghnaghaghhagh _ qula _ maalghug _ siipngaan _ uksughtutka uq _ . _ ) _ angayuqagh kek llu _ maligsaaghtetlu _ elngaatall _ saghiigha yuke aat _ !
taagken _ Jesus-em _ ineghtengngwaaqii _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ pi ke ai llu _ , _ " _ neghyaghqagh ghhagh meng _ tuune teggu _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus _ aghulaqekagh _ Capernaum-emeng _ , _ aglaghkagh _ ne minun _ nazareth- mun _ , _ maligsaaghtengitallu _ maligtekagh at _ .
Sabbath-ngughsagu _ synagogue-mi _ apeghtugh ikagh _ . _ yug lghute t _ nagate luku _ saghiigha yagutekagh at _ . _ Aapqughaaghutkat _ ellmeggneng _ , _ " _ naken _ liite aki _ ? _ kitum _ peghqinghughtestagu _ ? _ saghiigha yug na ghllagu ut _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghi _ !
naten _ tawaten _ pi a _ ? _ kaapenta u nghite a _ , _ Mary-m _ ighnegh a _ ? _ James-enkut _ , _ Joses-enkut _ , _ Judas-enkut _ , _ Simon-enkut _ anglegutkenghitakii _ ? _ nayag i llu lli _ maa nte aat _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ tugukligh ma ite kangat _ .
Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ uuknaliqe i sta _ sii vag kaqe a _ , _ iwerngaqun _ nuna lgu ta ita llu _ nalleqligh ita llu _ nengllugutangitallu _ pi igate aat _ . _ "
enkaam _ tamaani _ allaaghlluwhaghtipagningitkaq _ , _ iwerngaqun _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ saafte luki _ naagh llegh u tke ai _ .
enkaam _ Jesus _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ . _ taagken _ Jesus _ Nazareth-em _ uvitanganilngughnun _ ne nun _ pi aqe luni _ apeghtugh qu ai _ yug t _ .
tagsigh luki _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ maligsaaghteni _ , _ kayagte naqe nikagh i _ malghukaghte ai ta _ ungipaqisqellukillu _ naallghuqiisqellukillu _ . _ aghulaqe vagilgata _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleliquqii _ yug neng _ aanesqiisqelluki _ tughneghagh t _ .
liilightugh qu ai llu _ , _ " _ iglegha llegh gpesini _ sa meng _ alngunak _ kelqe gpenasi _ iwerngaqun _ ayaviigh meng _ . _ neqekrangllagh ngunasi _ , _ aqeftaghaagh ngunasi _ , _ mani ngunasi _ pi lghaasi _ .
iwernga _ kameg lusi _ , _ simiite kaghqagh meng _ ggaatmeng _ kelqe gpenasi _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ nani _ alngunak _ tukugh gpesi _ upughaskangisi _ tawanlleghhaasi _ kenlanga _ aghulaqe llegh gpesinun _ .
ne nun _ kaate kufsi _ upugha te i igate ngugh nun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nagate yug igate ngugh nun _ , _ unite nakesi _ taana _ nuna _ itegagh si _ pagulangigh magh ita _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kelenga sagh ughte lleqe asi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleghqagh aneng _ ! _ "
enkaam _ maligsaaghtet _ aghulaqe luteng _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ yug nun _ avuteghqelluki _ seghleghqennaniisqelluki _ .
tughneghagh lghute t _ aag negh squgh ke ait _ yug neng _ , _ mesiighqe aqe luki llu _ qinu yu lghute t _ naallghute qugh qu ait _ .
umiileg m _ Herod-em _ nagaqugh qu a _ qamagte luku _ Jesus-em _ tawaten _ pillgha _ , _ qayughllak _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ apegh kangit _ Jesus-em _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghi _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ John-nguuq _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ unguvagh ma uq _ enkaam _ esgha _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelek _ allaaghlluwhaghtilleghmun _ . _ "
iwernga _ ila it _ yug t _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Elijah-nguuq _ . _ " _ ila it _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ uuknaliqe i ste u uq _ , _ neghigh luku _ uuknaliqistestun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ "
Herod-em _ nagaqugh luku _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ John-nguuq _ paaptaaye sta _ , _ naasqwightestekaqa _ iwernga _ unguvagh ma uq _ ! _ "
qavnganghhaq _ Herod-em _ kayagte te kaqe kanga _ John _ tugu luku _ , _ asighqe ste luku _ anusimingllagh stekagh a _ . _ tawaten _ pi stekagh a _ , _ qayughllak _ John-em _ pi iigh aa ta qaa _ herod _ whaten _ , _ " _ liilightuusagh mnni _ anaggute ma uten _ tugu llegh gpegun _ anglegute gpek _ Philip-em _ nulighh a _ Herodias _ . _ "
enkaam _ Herodias-em _ ugumi yagute ghllag kaqe kanga _ John _ repall _ tuqute sug pigtekaqsagh kanga _ . _ iwernga _ pipag nigh nge i tke a _ qayughllak _ Herod-em _ tawaten _ pi stepag nigh nge i tke a _ .
Herod-em _ alike kaqe kanga _ John _ liisimake te mineng _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ , _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatke te nga ghllag lghii _ . _ enkaam _ kelengakestengngwaaqaa _ sa na yu katgu _ . _ Herod-em _ nagate yug aqe kanga _ John _ qaywa _ seghleghyug aqe ghngaaghmi _ nagate nghminigu _ .
taagken _ Herodias _ qenwat llu _ pi lleghqagh ngekagh _ . _ Herod-em _ allgeghvig ni _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ neqenghaghqe ste i ma lghii _ kavemem _ umiilwaaghitnun _ , _ pilluwaghtet _ umiilwaaghitnun _ , _ igleghutistengitnunllu _ galilee-kagh mii t _ .
taagken _ panig a _ Herodias-em _ itegh luni _ neghe uute lghii nun _ tukalegaqaq _ . _ Herod-enkut _ aqelqagh ke te lghiit _ elngaatall _ efqugh kekagh at _ . _ enkaam _ umiileg m _ pi ke aa _ aghnagh aq _ , _ " _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh vike gkuvnga _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ "
akeqekagh a llu _ whaten _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ tuune lleqe amken _ sa meng _ alngunak _ tungsigh kuvek _ , _ talwa _ umiileg u te i ma llegh ma _ aklungi an _ aveg llegh a _ ! _ "
taagken _ aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ naa ni _ aapte yaghtuqagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ tungsigh naqe zinga _ ? _ " _ naa an _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ John-em _ Paaptaayestem _ naasqwa _ tungsigh ghhu _ . _ "
aghnagh aq _ agliighwaghlluni _ umiileg mun _ tungsigh vikekagh a _ , _ " _ whaa _ maaten _ , _ John-em _ Paaptaayestem _ naasqwa _ piyug aqa _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ ! _ "
umiileg _ elngaatall _ qivghu ghllagkagh _ iwernga _ sa luku _ ighleke ligu _ , _ qayughllak _ akeqe u aqe aqe kanga _ aqelqagh lghute ni _ nagatestekluki _ .
enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ umiileg m _ kayagtekagh a _ kelengake i sta _ tagite sqe ste luku _ John-em _ naasqwa _ . _ kelengake i sta _ aane luni _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ aglaghkagh _ John-em _ naasqwa _ kepe na luku _ .
naasqugh _ qayuutaghraag kun _ lli luku _ aglagh te luku _ aghnaghagh mun _ tuunekagh a _ . _ enkaam _ aghnaghagh m _ naa minun _ tuunekagh a _ .
John-em _ maligsaaghtengita _ nagaqugh luku _ , _ yugusigh a _ aqfa luku _ llivegh ke aat _ .
Apostle-et _ uteghnigh uute luteng _ Jesus-mun _ apeghkagh it _ apeghtugh i lleg teng _ , _ naallghute qugh llegh eng _ , _ tughneghagh neng llu _ aane ste qugh llegh eng _ yug neng _ .
yug ghllag u lghii _ tagi magh meng llu _ aghulaqe magh meng llu _ pi lghiit _ repall _ Jesus-enkut _ maligte yaaghtekete te lghiit _ neghepagningite tke aat _ . _ enkaam _ maligsaaghteni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ natmun _ aghulaqe lta _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ , _ elpek si qun _ meghnaaliightesqellusi _ . _ "
enkaam _ angyagh kun _ paaghqagh igh llegh anun _ aghulaqekagh t _ ellnginaghhaaghhnaluteng _ ,
iwernga _ yug lghute m _ esghaghkagh it _ aghulaqe lghiit _ . _ liisimake luki _ navek _ pi naqe ta it _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ maligtekagh it _ . _ ne nun _ nallangigh te nghata _ legan _ yug t _ maligte aqe kangit _ . _ kaate tke aat _ takukagh meggnun _ ingyaghaghte luki _ Jesus-enkut _ .
Jesus-em _ angyagh meng _ uugte luni _ qute mun _ yug lghute t _ esghagh luki _ nanglleg yagutekagh i _ , _ qayughllak _ penniigh stun _ penniighniightengilngughestun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ apeghtughtagh ukagh i _ .
Whanikupigsagu _ maligsaaghtengita _ taku luku _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ maana _ paaghqite uq _ , _ whanikughllagaallu _ . _ yug t _ aglagh uute sqe ki _ piitesighaghtenunllu _ , _ nengiighhagh nun llu _ . _ Ellmeggneng _ neqenge yaghtugh lit _ neqhyaghqameng _ . _ "
iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ elpek si _ neghyaghqaliteki _ . _ " _ aaptekagh at _ , _ " _ Tukfighiyaghtughtesugsikuut _ 200 _ denarii-m _ aki aneng _ neqekrangllagh meng _ neghesqelluki _ ? _ "
Jesus-em _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ naten _ uglaghqakaan _ neqekrangllagh lgu tsi _ ? _ enta _ ivagh i aghte tek _ . _ " _ naalkute yameng _ ungipagh tke aat _ , _ " _ taawa _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maalghug llu _ iqallug k _ . _ "
taagken _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteminun _ qafsinkaghte ai ta _ aqume ste sqekagh i _ vegaagh kun _ .
enkaam _ aqume te tke aat _ 100-ngwaaqluteng _ 50-ngwaaqluteng _ .
Jesus-em _ tugu luki _ tallimat _ neqekrangllagh t _ , _ maalghug llu _ iqallug k _ , _ qule mun _ sivugte luni _ iyamsiqa yug vikekagh a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ neqekrangllagh t _ iigge mineng _ aavgugh luki _ maligsaaghteminun _ tunqugh qu ai _ uyegtesqelluki _ . _ iqallug k llu _ ii- gmineng _ aavgugh lukek _ tunqugh stekagh i _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluni _ negh te tke aq _ kepsugh te luni _ .
taagken _ maligsaaghtet _ tugulaghkagh it _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ paskete t _ esleqnga lghiit _ kagimlegh ughtekagh neng _ neqekrangllagh neng _ , _ iqallug neng llu _ .
yug t _ negh te tke aat _ 5,000-nguftut _ , _ kesutke gpenaki _ aghnagh t llu _ taghnughhagh t llu _ .
legan _ taaqe ut _ Jesus-em _ maligsaaghteni _ qelqe ai _ angyagh kun _ igleghtekestiisqelluki _ Bethsaida-mun _ , _ naayvagh m _ inglunganilngughmun _ . _ taagken _ ellnga n _ yug lghute t _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ ne itnun _ .
Aglaghtuutesamiki _ yughagh yaghtuqagh _ qemi mun _ .
Unugmi _ taakwani _ angyagh t _ naayvagh mete luki _ Jesus _ ellnginaghhaakaq _ qute mi _ .
esghaghkagh i _ malighsaaghteni _ aygugh naqutke lghiit _ yaavuqumeng _ , _ qayughllak _ anuqligh u uute kangi _ . _ akule gkeni _ three-kellaagenkuk _ six-ekellaagenkuk _ unaangu luku _ , _ takukagh i _ megh m _ qaye akun _ piyug meng _ . _ naghughte naqe aqe ai llu
esghaghkagh at _ megh kun _ piyug lghii _ . _ sumegh meggni _ taghneghagh u ni luku _ aragh ghllagkagh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ alingruugh tke aat _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ Jesus-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ilutughte tek _ ! _ whanga u unga _ , _ alinge gpenasi _ . _ "
legan _ angyagh mun _ uugg tuq _ ellmaaragllugughtekaq _ . _ Maligsaaghtet _ saghiigha yug ghllagkagh t _ ,
qayughllak _ paninang _ liigike igate kangat _ Jesus _ kina u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ esghapag ghngaaghmegteggu _ neqekrangllagh t _ nula stegkangi _ . _ tawatete kau lghiit _ qayughllak _ salin _ umyugagh it _ reghigh igate ngugh t _ .
taagken _ nagneqe aat _ naayvagh m _ inglu anun _ enkaam _ gennesaret- kun _ tamlag luteng _ angyagh eng _ petug qu aat _ .
legan _ angyagh eng _ unite aat _ yug t _ liisuqnginaamaan _ Jesus _ pi ke aat _ .
enkaam _ keleg qaghtagh te ragkiighkagh t _ Jesus _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ Jesus _ navek _ pi yagh ghngaan _ qinuyuget _ aglagh te aqe kangit _ allighagh itgun _ ellnga nun _ .
Jesus _ kaate nghmini _ ne ghllag nun llu _ , _ ne nun llu _ , _ eslamelngughnun _ akilpegaghvig nun _ aglagh aqe lghii _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ tagite aqe kangit _ qinuyuget _ akilpegaghvig nun _ Jesus-mun _ naallghutesqelluki _ . _ Jesus-mun _ manigugh ututka ait _ qinu yu gnun _ waran _ saafte sqellug qu _ kenu i _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ saafte i lghiit _ naagh llegh u tke aat _ .
Pharisees-etlu _ ila i llu _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ Jerusalem-emeng _ pi t _ , _ Jesus-em _ uvitanganun _ qerngughte tke aat _ .
esghaghkagh it _ maligte yaaghte yan _ ila i _ uughtugh gpenateng _ neghe lghiit _ . _ uughtugh llghite ngugh t _ Pharisees-et _ pisqellghistun _ .
( _ Pharisees-etlu _ Jews-etlu _ qamagte luteng _ negh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ wetku qun _ sivuke luteng _ uughtughwaaghluteng _ , _ qayughllak _ sivugh nghmeng _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe u kangit _ .
talwa _ akilpegaghvig meng _ tagi negh meggni _ negh igate ngugh t _ wetku _ sivuke luten _ ukmangighsaghwaaghaqelghiit _ . _ ila i llu _ sivugh nghmeng _ apeghtuusalghutangit _ atuqe u kangit _ . _ Atuqfagilgamegtiki _ qayuusigh teng _ , _ sagnegh teng _ , _ siilu t _ gaaghusigh teng _ sangighqughwaaghaqegkangit _ . _ )
enkaam _ Pharisees-etlu _ apeghtugh i kayug t llu _ liilightuusagh neng _ aaptekagh at _ Jesus _ , _ " _ sangameng _ maligsaaghteten _ uughtugh gpenateng _ negh aqe aat _ ? _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh it _ atuqe igate ait _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ kiimsigh iqe ai _ , _ " _ elqughte lusi _ Isaiah-m _ uuknaliqe tke ma kangisi _ piniiyugnegh ni _ elpek si _ . _ whaten _ igagh kau uq _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ akuzite megteggun _ quulvaghaqaatnga _ , _ nakaan _ ilu megteggun _ .
temngi _ manigugh aqe aatnga _ , _ qayughllak _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ait _ liilightuusagh ngllaghkagh teng _ katam _ whanga _ liilightuusagh ke pigte lghii stun _ . _ " _ '
enkaam _ elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ pakig luki _ qaatke aqe asi _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh it _ . _ "
Jesus-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ pakig i lleg pigu usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh itnun _ qaatke pigesnagh na luki _ elpek si _ katam _ apeghtuusagh si _ .
