Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul-enkuk _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ kayagsistek _ , _ Seleucia-tkak _ kelqellug qu _ John _ mark _ kayute u luku _ . _ tamaaken _ angyaghpag kun _ qiighqagh mun _ Cyprus-mun _ pikagh t _ . _ kaate yameng _ salamis- mun _ synagogue-ngitni _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
salamis- meng _ igleghakagh t _ inglu anun _ qiighqagh m _ Paphos-mun _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ nallaqagh at _ yuug _ alignagh lghii _ ategh a _ Bar-Jesus _ , _ uuknaliqestesighwaaq _ , _ Jews-a _ .
qiighqagh m _ Governor-ngan _ Sergius _ Paulus-em _ ilakumtaagh a _ . _ Sergius _ Paulus _ pilleg ghllag _ . _ aqfa stekakek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Saul-enkuk _ nagate na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
iwernga _ Bar-Jesus-em _ alignalghii m _ , _ ateghagh leg m _ elymas- meng _ , _ aaghtiiraagh kakek _ governor-a _ ugpegh na yu kan _ . _ ( _ ategh _ elymas _ , _ Greek-stun _ whaten _ pi sigh u lghii _ , _ alignagh lghii _ . _ )
taagken _ Saul-em _ , _ ateghagh ke lghii m _ Paul-meng _ , _ imigh nga lghii m _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ esghapagtugh luku _ alignagh lghii
pi ke aa _ , _ " _ uyuq _ tughneghagh m _ ighnegh a _ ! _ ugumi ke an _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pinigh lghii _ . _ iqlengasag ghllag u uten llu _ seghletun llu _ pi ste ghllagu uten _ . _ Taaqnaqenghisikii _ iqlengiqe sigh ke nghmeng _ Atanghem _ apeghtuusagh i _ ?
whaa _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh naqe aaten _ ayaastemmeng _ , _ enkaam _ esghaatelghaghtughnaanghituten _ aghnegh m _ nighug aneng _ . _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ Elymas-em _ iye kek _ mamleghqwaakak _ , _ enkaam _ tamaani _ eflughwaaghmeng _ ivagh ikagh _ kitumun _ tasluqiisqelluni _ .
Governor-a _ ugpeqe aq _ esghapag luku _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ , _ saghiigha yagutekagh a llu _ apeghtuusagh _ atanegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Paul-enkut _ iglegha lgutke te lghiit _ angyaghpag kun _ igleghtekagh t _ Paphos-meng _ , _ perga- mun _ Pamphylia-melngughmun _ . _ Tamaanlluki _ John _ Mark-em _ unite luki _ Jerusalem-emun _ uteghnigh iqe aq _ .
taagken _ Paul-enkut _ perga- meng _ , _ Antioch-etkat _ Pisidia-melngughmun _ . _ Sabbath-ngughsagu _ synagogue-ngitnun _ itegh luteng _ aqumekagh t _ .
Igleghutistengi _ synagogue-em _ , _ taaqe yameng _ atightugh nghmeng _ liilightuusagh neng llu _ uuknaliqistetlu _ igaqegkagh itneng _ , _ keveg aqe tke ait _ Paul-enkut _ whaten _ pisqelluki _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ ungipagh lgu kufsi _ iknaqsuugusighqameng _ ugpegh lleg mnnun _ , _ sa aqe tsi _ akuzite k _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul _ nekeve luni _ apaqu magh mi _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Israel-eghmiini _ , _ elpek si llu _ Gentile-eni _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ nagate ngnga _ !
whangkuta _ Israel-eghmiini _ manigughkagh mta _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ , _ nula ste ghllag kaqe ai llu _ nunatagh u aqngata _ Egypt-mi _ . _ Taakwaningani _ qepghaghtelaaghughtekat _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun _ aghulaqe te kaqe ai _ Egypt-meng _ .
kilgaa nite luki _ qaatkutepagllanghiteghngaata _ ellmi nun _ paninang _ aflengake kaqe ai _ ketwhell _ 40 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqesamiki _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ ramke t _ Canaan-melnguut _ nuna ke yagh kangat _ pi liite stekaqe a _ sivunegh mnnun _ pagite aqe sqellug qu _ .
entaqun _ 450-nguut _ ayumiqullegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike llegh aneng _ sivunegh put _ kenlanga _ nuna _ pi liite llegh itnun _ . _ " _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ nanqigte i ste ngestagh u aatagh kaqe ai _ igleghutesqelluki _ kenlanga _ samuel _ uuknaliqe i sta _ igleghte te i stekau aghte llegh itnun _ .
taagken _ umiilengyuwaqngata _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ Saul _ umiileg ke sqellug qu _ Kish-em _ ighnegh a _ , _ Benjamin-em _ ramke aneng _ pi _ . _ umiileg u kau uq _ 40 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ umiilgunanightesamigu _ Saul _ , _ David _ umiileg liite stekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ whaten _ , _ ' _ Jesse-m _ ighnegh a _ David _ umiileg ughte sug aqa _ . _ Tawatelnguq _ yuug _ piyuke aqe aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaqe a _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyuke kaqe a _ . _ '
" _ Taakwaningani _ David-em _ kingunghakun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe i llegh mitun _ allgegh stekaqe a _ yuguligh i sta _ Israel-eghmiinun _ . _ taana _ yuguligh i sta _ Jesus-nguuq _ .
Jesus-em _ salin _ qepghaqagh ni _ piinligh llghite luku _ John _ ungipagh ke i kau uq _ Israel-eghmiinun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ Avuteghqellusi _ , _ seghleghqennanighlusi _ , _ paaptaayetek _ . _ '
John-em _ qepghaqagh ni _ taaqe yaghtugh ngestagh luku _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ kina u ni lunga _ pi aqe ste ngnga _ ? _ whanga u nghite uq _ utaqakagh i _ . _ kingu mneng _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ aange ghllag lghii _ , _ repall _ whanga _ pinigh nghite unga _ singigh anun _ itemtistengulunga _ . _ '
" _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ Abraham-em _ kingunghitni _ , _ Gentile-enillu _ maniguute kayug ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ taana _ ungipagh a _ yuguligh llegh m _ whangkunnun _ pi u uq _ !
Jerusalem-eghmiit _ igleghte te i stekete te lghiit _ nalluke kaqe aat _ Jesus _ yuguligh i ste u ta a _ , _ qaywa _ Sabbath-a _ tamaghhagh an _ nagate ghngaaghmegteki _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh it _ . _ naqam _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh it _ apeghiigh kaqe ait _ agghi te kaqe yamegteggu _ Jesus _ tuqute na luku _ .
taawa _ legan _ temngi _ apallugh ite ghngaan _ tuqute sighqagh meng _ pilate- mun _ tuqute sqe kaqe aat _ .
legan _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pinaqnillghistun _ pi kaqe aat _ . _ taagken _ qaquuragh meng _ ateghte luku _ llivegh kaqe aat _ ,
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ iglegha lgutke ke ii te a _ Jesus-em _ galilee- meng _ , _ Jerusalem-emun _ esghagh aatagh kaqe aat _ qafsinegyag ni _ aghnegh ni _ . _ Ellnginguut _ ungipagh lghiit _ yug mnnun _ esghagh ma ni luku _ Jesus _ unguva luku _ .
" _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ , _ ' _ ungipaate amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ sivunegh mnnun _ .
apeghiigh ma a _ akequsagh ni _ whangkunnun _ kingunghitnun _ , _ unguvagh ste llegh mikun _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ ' _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ whaten _ Psalm _ 2-mi _ , _ ' _ elpek _ ighnegh ke amken _ , _ aghneghmi _ whani _ Ataliitaghpenga _ . _ '
kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaangam _ allameng llu _ tuqu naanghite uq _ aghyugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghiit _ akequsagh kekagh nka _ David-mun _ ipapestaaq _ quya ste i sigh ke lleqe anka _ elpesi nun _ . _ '
ilangani _ Psalms-em _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ ' _ agleghnagh lghii n _ aghu snaanghite aqa _ llivegh mi _ . _ '
" _ David-em _ unguvallegh mini _ atuqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ taagken _ qavagh yan _ qungugh kaqe aat _ sivunghan _ saaghw itgun _ , _ yugusigh a _ aghu kau uq _ llivegh mi _ .
iwernga _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekagh a _ tuqu llegh meng _ aghu mangite uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nun _ liite sqe sug aqa _ Jesus-kun _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ seghevute lleg nge kayugu ut _ . _ taana ta _ ungipagh ke kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
qaatke te llegh m _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh itgun _ kina _ alngunak _ iteme te naanghite a _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ , _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ ugpeqe gkunigu _ Jesus _ , _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh mineng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ uuknaliqistetgun _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nagate tek _ elpek si _ aygugh itagh lghii ni _ . _ sa aqe tsi _ saghiigha yug lusi _ tuqu tek _ , _ qayughllak _ unguva u lusi _ sa lleqe unga _ iwernga _ ugpeqnaanghitaghsi _ talwa _ kitum _ ungipaate ghngaisi _ . _ ' _ kelenga lusi _ , _ luuraq _ tawaten _ pinayukafsi _ . _ "
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ synagogue-meng _ aane ma lukek _ alla _ tagisqegkagket _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ Sabbath-em _ , _ wata _ ungipiqutesqelluteng _ .
aanleghaate yameng _ Jews-elghutetlu _ , _ Gentile-elghutetlu _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ Jews-estun _ , _ maligte tke aat _ Paul-enkugnun _ Barnabas-enkugnun _ . _ Apostle-ek _ kayemekagh ik _ kiyaghtekestiisqelluki _ sighimake luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ Sabbath-em _ qamagte vzigh luteng _ Antioch-eghmiit _ nagate yagh tke aat _ Atanghem _ ungipagh aneng _ .
Jews-et _ aqinake aat _ esghagh yamegteki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ enkaam _ Paul _ kipullginaqaat _ , _ seghleqekagh at llu _ .
iwernga _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ tetug gpenaki _ Jews-et _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ elpesi nun _ sivuke luni _ apegh yaghqaa yagh uq _ iwernga _ nagate yug mangite usi _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ ighsake kaqe te gpesineng _ , _ palaqe kau te gpesineng llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh nge lleghqagh gpesineng _ , _ whaa _ Gentile-enun _ ungipagh ke i naqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ .
tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ qelqe aqe ainkut _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nakmike kaqe amsi _ nighug u lusi _ Gentile-enun _ , _ apegh sqellug qu _ yuguligh llegh _ nunatagh ghhagh anun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ ' _ "
Gentile-et _ nagaqugh luki _ taakut _ akuzite t _ quya ghllagkagh t _ , _ pi kau lghiit llu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ pi niigh pigte uq _ . _ " _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallengesqelluki _ ugpeqe ikagh t _ ungipagh meng _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ Antioch-mi _ , _ uvitanganilngughnillu _ nuna ni _ Atanghem _ ungipagh a _ mingitekagh _ .
iwernga _ Jews-et _ takukagh it _ Gentile-et _ aghni ut _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ igleghutistengillu _ Antioch-em _ naavguunnalukek _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ amyuutkegkagket _ taake uk _ yug k _ , _ aghulaqestekagketlu _ nuna meggneng _ .
enkaam _ apostle-ek _ itegagh tek _ pagulangigh iqe aik _ kelgute na luku _ pegge ni luki _ kipullginaalghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh aneng _ . _ taagken _ Iconium-emun _ aghulaqekagh k _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh t _ Antioch-melnguut _ quya nga ghllaget llu _ , _ imigh nga lghiit llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
Iconium-emi _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ piiqelleghmegetun _ synagogue-mun _ aglaghkagh k _ . _ tawani _ whateghlluwaaq _ akuzikagh k _ repall _ Jews-elghutetlu _ , _ Gentile-elghutetlu _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
enkaam _ Iconium-emetelqinaqak _ , _ tamaani _ tetug gpenatek _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ atanegh meng _ . _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Atanghem _ allaaghlluwhaghtisteghllagaataqakek _ yug nun _ ipa u ta a _ liigike sqellug qu _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ Atanghem _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ iwernga _ ugpegh yug ma ite ngugh t _ Jews-et _ Gentile-enun _ seghletun _ sumeghtaghagh tke stekagh it _ ugpeqagh t _ .
enkaam _ Iconium-eghmiit _ malghughkegkat _ , _ ila i _ ila tke aat _ Jews-enun _ , _ ila i _ apostle-enun _ .
taagken _ ila ita _ Gentile-etlu _ , _ Jews-etlu _ maligte te luteng _ igleghutistemeggnun _ amyugh te kete yu ke agket _ apostle-ek _ , _ milughpagaataghhiinaqlu _ tuqute yu ke agket _ .
nagaqugh yamek _ yug nun _ tawaten _ pi naqe ni lutek _ , _ qimagkagh k _ Lycaonia-m _ ne ghllag gkenun _ Lystra-munllu _ , _ Derbe-munllu _ , _ uvitegkenilngughnunllu _ ne nun _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ ungipagh kekagh ik _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
Lystra-minguq _ taawa _ yuug _ itegagh i _ natelnguut _ allgegh nghhagh ghhagh u te mineng _ ima _ enkaam _ piyug igate ngughk _ .
aqumgagh mi _ tawani _ nagatekagh a _ Paul _ akuzi lghii _ . _ Paul-em _ liigikekagh a _ yuug _ ugpegh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ naallghute lleqe ni luni _ .
enkaam _ qiive luku _ tawavek _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Nekevngwaaghi _ itegagh gpegun _ ! _ " _ aga _ yuug _ nekefqaghte luni _ tamaani _ piyuke aq _ .
yug lghute t _ esghapag luku _ Paul-em _ naallghute i llegh a _ araghaatagh tke aat _ Lycaonia-ghmiistun _ , _ " _ yugu luteng _ kiyaghnegh t _ taku inkut _ ! _ "
Barnabas _ Zeus-ngunikaat _ enkaam _ Paul _ Hermes-ngunikaat _ kiyang _ akuzi ste u ta aneng _ .
priest- nge an _ Zeus-emllu _ , _ yug t llu _ aghqerraaghyukagket _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ . _ enkaam _ priest- a _ tagi tke aq _ teghig ke te yameng llu _ piitesiighaghmengllu _ Lystra-m _ mingllu ta an _ amig ghllag anun _ . _ ( _ temple- a _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ Zeus-mun _ amig ghllag m _ tunganganilnguq _ ) _ .
iwernga _ apostle-ek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Paul-enkuk _ liigike yamegneki _ sa naqe ta i _ aatkagh tek _ piigugh qu aik _ . _ taagken _ aqfaasnaq _ yug nun _ qungangiite tke ak _ aragh magh egmek _ ,
" _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ sangafsi _ tawaten _ pi tsi _ ? _ whangkutung llu _ yugu ukung _ elpesistungwaaq _ ! _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh u ukung _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ elpesi nun _ , _ tunute lusi _ sea-te u nghite ngugh neng _ manigughkagh gpesineng _ qiivesqellusi _ unguva lghii mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ ulima kaqe ai _ qilag _ , _ nuna _ , _ kellaag igh a _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaghhagh an _ taakunilnguq _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ Jews-ngunghilnguut _ piyukellghistun _ pi stekaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ tawateteghngaata _ paninang _ liisimake stekau uq _ unguva ni luni _ pinitun _ pi llegh mikun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ eslallugughte sta qaa _ nunivagseghagh t _ nagusqelluki _ . _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte luku _ piite ste aqe ai _ piite yaghqagh t _ piite vig it _ kaate nghata _ neqelgusqellusi _ , _ quyangasqellusillu _ . _ "
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ tawaten _ akuzi ghngaayek _ taawa _ paninang _ Lystra-ghmiit _ aghqerraaghnaqutkegkagket _ . _ iwernga _ pegnem _ pisneghitkak _ .
taagken _ ila i _ Jews-et _ Antioch-mengllu _ Iconium-emengllu _ kaate tke aat _ Lystra-mun _ . _ Lystra-ghmiinun _ naavguullukek _ ugumiitestekagket _ . _ enkaam _ Jews-etlu _ , _ Lystra-ghmiitlu _ Paul _ milugh agaatagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ ne m _ kelutanganun _ sumegh meggni _ tuquma ni luku _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ taku laghate te yatni _ Paul _ nekeve luni _ aglagh nqigtekagh _ ne mun _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ elkek _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Derbe-mun _ aglaghkagh k _ .
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ Derbe-mi _ enkaam _ uglagh _ maligte yaaghte ngughtekagh _ . _ taagken _ Lystra-mun _ pi nqigtekagh k _ , _ taagken _ Iconium-emun _ , _ Antioch-munllu _ pikagh k _ Pisidia-melngughmun _ .
takuughaghkagh megteni _ tamaani _ apeghtugh qu aik _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ wata _ iknaqughtesqelluki _ , _ kayemekagh ik llu _ ugpegh llegh it _ aghuliitesqelluki _ . _ pi ke aik _ , _ " _ uglagh pestaagh _ seghleliigh llegh _ atuqsaghqapestaaqaghput _ itegh yaghqaaghte na luta _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
takuughaghkagh megteni llu _ nakmiightuqagh k _ Elder-kaghqameng _ igleghutesqelluki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ yughagh magh egmek _ fast-ekak _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ atanegh mun _ ugpeqekagh megtenun _ yughagh tkekagh ik _ Elder-et _ aflengakesqelluki _ .
taagken _ Pisidia-kun _ igleghakagh k _ Pamphylia-mun _ .
tamaani _ perga- mi _ , _ Pamphylia-melngughmi _ ungipagh ke ikagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ taaqe yamek _ tesamavek _ Attalia-mun _ pikagh k _ .
taagken _ Antioch-mun _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh k _ . _ ( _ tamaani _ Antioch-mi _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ aghulaqe llghite lukek _ yughagh tke kaqe kegket _ . _ aapute kaqe kegket _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusiite sqellug kek _ ungipagh ke i llegh gkeni _ . _ Taananguuq _ qepghaqagh _ apeghiighkagh ak _ . _ )
kaate yamek _ Antioch-mun _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughtekagh ik _ . _ ungipagh tke aik _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ ellmetegnegun _ , _ apeghkagh ak llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpeqilleghqalitellghi _ Gentile-et _ .
tamaani _ muluugh ghllagkagh k _ ugpeqagh ni _ .
taagken _ Judea-meng _ ila i _ yug t _ tagi luteng _ Antioch-mun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh t _ , _ " _ yuguligh lleg nge naanghite usi _ wetku qun _ circumcise-ekufsi _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ "
iwernga _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ elngaatall _ aaghtiiraaghkagh ik _ taakut _ yug t _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmikegkagh it _ Paul-enkuk _ , _ Barnabas-enkuk _ , _ ila i llu _ yug t _ Antioch-meng _ pi t _ , _ Jerusalem-etesqelluki _ aapsaghtiisqelluki _ apostle-etlu _ Elder-etlu _ qerngaghmelnguut _ naligh _ apeghtuusagh _ elqughute nga ta a _ .
Kayagsisteng _ Paul-enkut _ iglegha te kete luku _ Phoenicia-kunllu _ , _ Samaria-kunllu _ ugpeqagh t _ tamaanlenguut _ ungipagh tke ait _ Gentile-et _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qiive uute ma ni luki _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ .
kaa sa ta _ Jerusalem-emun _ apostle-etlu _ , _ Elder-etlu _ , _ ugpeqagh t llu _ upugha tke ait _ . _ taagken _ Paul-enkut _ apegh laataghkagh at _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh a _ ellmegteggun _ .
ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ Pharisees-et _ nekeve luteng _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ tamaakut _ Gentile-et _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqaa nghite ut _ wetku qun _ circumcise-elutengllu _ , _ qaatke te luteng llu _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ "
taagken _ apostle-etlu _ Elder-etlu _ qerngughte tke aat _ agghi te kete na lukek _ taake uk _ .
Akuzitkenneghpagllakaat _ . _ taagken _ Peter-em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ qavngaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ Gentile-enun _ ungipaqisqellunga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ugpeghesqelluki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake i lghii m _ yug m _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng _ , _ tugukligh kaqe ai _ Gentile-et _ . _ kelgute kaqe a _ tugukligh i lleg ni _ ellngit neng _ tuune llegh mikun _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ katam _ tawaten _ whangkunnun _ tuune llegh mitun _ .
Whangkutestungwaaq _ kiyaghute aqe ai _ ; _ whangkutestungwaaq _ ukmangigh aqe ai _ ilu it _ ugpegh nghata _ .
enkaam _ sanganʼngam _ kiyaghnegh _ sakraasnaqutkengngusteggu _ qelegh llegh gpesigun _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh put _ kiyaghtesqelluki _ ? _ talwa _ sivunegh mta llu _ whangkuta llu _ qaatkepagningilkeput _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ yuguligh lleg nge na luta _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugulikaqiinkut _ kayusillegh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ tawateghpigaq _ Gentile-enun _ pi llegh mitun _ . _ "
taagken _ tawantullghiit _ qallegnanighwaaghulluteng _ nagatkagket _ Barnabas-enkuk _ , _ Paul-enkuk _ apegh kangik _ ellmetegnegun _ kiyaghnegh m _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghi _ Gentile-enun _ .
akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yayek _ James-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ nagate aghte ngnga _ !
simon _ Peter-em _ ungipaate ainkut _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikuqestallghi _ Gentile-et _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ liigike stekaqe ai _ ellngit llu _ piniqe ni luki _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ sallgha _ Gentile-enun _ elqughute uq _ uuknaliqistet _ igaqegkagh itnun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ atanegh _ pi kau uq _ :
' _ David-em _ mangteghagh a _ ullegh kau uq _ iwernga _ uteghnigh lunga _ nekefneqiglleqaqa _ . _ naavuma yagh ghngaan _ nallghusagh lleqe aqa _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ ila i _ yug t _ Gentile-eneng _ nakmikegkagh ma _ whanga mnun _ katam _ pi u luki _ , _ ellngit a _ liite yug lleqe aat _ atanegh _ .
Atanghuuq _ tawaten _ akuzikagh _ , _ ima _ qavngarugllak _ ellnga n _ liite stekaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ' _ "
James-em _ nagnegh tke ai _ , _ " _ enkaam _ whanga _ sume mni _ Gentile-et _ qiivekagh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatkutesqughaafqiita _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ pi lteki _ .
itupill _ lata tgun _ neghe snanigh lteki _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ , _ aaw meng _ ; _ ineghte lteki llu _ seghleghqe sigh ke fqaan _ sex _ pi sqellug qu _ .
tawaten _ pi yaghqaa nghite ut _ qayughllak _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ iinghute kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ . _ ima _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ Jews-et _ nagate aqe ait _ liilightuusagh t _ atightugh luki _ ungipaqenghatki _ Sabbath-a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ nani _ alngunak _ synagogue-ni _ . _ "
taagken _ apostle-et _ , _ Elder-et _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmiighkagh t _ yug meggneng _ maligte tesaghqagh meng _ Paul-enkugnun _ Barnabas-enkugnun _ Antioch-mun _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ . _ nakmikegkagh gket _ Silas-enkuk _ Judas-enkuk _ ateghagh ke lghii _ Barsabbas-meng _ . _ taake uk _ yug k _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ ugpeqagh ita _ siivakepigtekagket _ .
Elkegnekun _ tuyugh qu ait _ lata t _ whaten _ igaqegkagh t _ : _ " _ whangkuta _ apostle-enillu _ Elder-enillu _ lata aqe ukut _ Gentile-enun _ ugpeqaalgutemnnun _ Antioch-melngughnun _ , _ Syria-melngughnun _ , _ Cilicia-melngughnunllu _ , _ quyake amsi _ !
nagaqugh ma ukut _ yug mta nguq _ ila ita _ taku lusi _ sa meng _ pi lusi _ seghleghyugtekaqiisillu _ kukragyugtekaqiisillu _ . _ naqamllu _ whangkuta _ tawaten _ pi sqe mangite aput _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emta _ agghite luta _ nakmike agput _ Judas-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ maligte te sqellug kek _ piniqekagh mnnun _ ugpeqaalgutemnnun _ Barnabas-enkugnun _ Paul-enkugnun _ , _ elpesi nun _ pi naqe lghii gnun _ .
taake uk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Paul-enkuk _ tuqute yagh ghngaistek _ pi kau uk _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ .
Judas-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ kayagte naqe agput _ aapghwaaghesqelluki _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ lata tkekagh put _ elpesi nun _ .
agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ , _ whangkuta llu _ itagnaqamsi _ allute luki _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it _ atuqe nghite yagh ghngaaghpesiki _ pisqelluki _ . _ iwernga _ ukut _ liilightuusagh t _ elpesi nun _ atuqe sug aput _ :
neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ aaw meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ qemitekagh meng _ , _ nuqetutaqiteggullu _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ maligtekufsiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi lleqe usi _ . _ Tawatenginaq _ lata amsi _ . _ "
taagken _ taakut _ yug t _ aghulaqekagh t _ Jerusalem-emeng _ Antioch-mun _ . _ kaate yameng _ qerngughte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ tuunekagh it _ lata t _ .
atightugh luki _ lata t _ elngaatall _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ qayughllak _ ilutughlleghiit _ .
Judas-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ elkek llu _ uuknaliqe i ste u lghiik _ , _ enkaam _ ungipagh ke ii aghagh ta ghllag ke ak _ ugpeqagh nun _ ugpegh llegh it _ iknaqughtesqelluki _ .
Tamaantelqinaghlutek _ aghulaqe yu ke ak _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ aghulaqestekagket _ whaten _ pi lukek _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh lgute k _ iglegha llegh gpetegni _ . _ " _ taagken _ uteghnigh iqe ak _ kayagtistemegnun _ Jerusalem-emelngughnun _ .
iwernga _ silas _ tamaansukaq _ .
taake uk _ Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ Antioch-metaaghaqak _ . _ elkek llu _ maligte te lutek _ uglagh pigte lghii nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ apeghtugh ikagh k llu _ ungipagh ke ikagh k llu _ ungipagh aneng _ Atanghem _ .
tagtalmi _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ Barnabas _ , _ " _ takuughagh kau ltegneki _ ungipagh ke i vikekagh pung _ Atanghem _ ungipagh aneng _ , _ esghagh yaghtugh ltegneki _ nateghtu langi _ ugpeqaalgutepung _ . _ "
Barnabas-em _ kelqe sug qu a _ John _ mark _ ,
iwernga _ Paul-em _ kelqe sug ma ite kanga _ , _ qayughllak _ Pamphylia-melluteng _ John _ Mark-em _ unite kakek _ qepghaqagh eng _ taaqe ste gpenaan _ .
Paul-enkuk _ Barnabas-enkuk _ aaghtiiraagh tke ghllag luku _ pelleghmun _ aghulaqe te tke ak _ . _ Barnabas-em _ kelqellug qu _ mark _ angyaghpag kun _ Cyprus-mun _ pi ke aq _ .
enkaam _ Paul-em _ aghulaqe vagilgami _ nakmikegkagh a _ silas _ kelqennaluku _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqagh t _ yughagh tkellug kek _ neghyuke tke agket _ atanegh mun _ aflengake sqellug kek _ .
igleghtekagh k _ Syria-kunllu _ Cilicia-kunllu _ iknaqughsaamiita _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpegh llegh it _ .
Paul _ Derbe-tkaq _ enkaam _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ Lystra-mun _ , _ tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ ugpeqe aq _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ Timothy-meng _ . _ naange a llu _ ugpeqagh u lghii _ Jews-a _ , _ naqam _ ata a _ greek- a _ .
ugpeqagh t _ qamagte luteng _ Lystra-melnguutlu _ Iconium-emelnguutlu _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ Timothy _ pi niigh pigte ni luku _ .
Paul-em _ kelqe sug qu a _ Timothy _ kayute u luku _ enkaam _ circumcise-estekaa _ . _ tawaten _ pi stekagh a _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ Jews-enun _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaanlenguut _ Jews-et _ liisimake kangat _ ata a _ Greek-ngulghii _ .
taagken _ iglegha u luteng _ ne ghllag nun _ kaate negh meggni _ ugpeqagh t _ qaatke te sqe aqe kangit _ apostle-etlu _ , _ Elder-etlu _ liilightuusagh ngllagh qite te nun _ Jerusalem-emi _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ wata _ ugpeqagh igh aghaghkagh t _ , _ nula ma inagh ke aat llu _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ .
Paul-enkut _ igleghtekagh t _ akule gkenkun _ Phrygia-mllu _ , _ Galatia-mllu _ , _ qayughllak _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaghtesimangilkangi _ ungipagh meng _ Asia-mi _ .
tughwaagh luteng _ Mysia-mun _ nagnegh naqe kaayagh lghiit _ Bithynia-mun _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ taghneghagh gkenka _ pisneghitkii _ .
enkaam _ Mysia _ naghughte luku _ tesamavek _ Troas-mun _ pikagh t _ .
Unugmi _ tawani _ Paul-em _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ esgha qaa _ yuug _ Macedonia-ghmii _ tagsigh ragh lghii _ . _ yug m _ maniguute pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tagi luten _ Macedonia-mun _ kayusiite aghte kut _ ! _ "
legan _ Paul-em _ esghaghwaagh llegh an _ kingu aneng _ yataaghqe ukut _ Macedonia-mun _ pi na luta _ , _ qayughllak _ liigikegkefut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh qite yu kanginkut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ telanangameng _ nangaqaghte ukut _ Troas-meng _ Samothrace-mun _ . _ unaami ani _ Neapolis-mun _ pi ukut _ .
taagken _ qute kun _ kaate ukut _ ne ghllag mun _ philippi- mun _ Macedonia-melngughmun _ Rome-eghmiit _ neli ke ii te nun _ . _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ tamaantukut _ .
Tamaansimaluta _ Sabbath-ngughsagu _ mingllute m _ amig ghllag akun _ aane luta _ kiiw gnun _ pi ukut _ , _ Jews-et _ tawani _ yughagh te aqe na yu kata _ . _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ tawantuteftut _ enkaam _ aqume uute luta _ aleghqugh aput _ .
ataasigh _ nagate lghii _ Lydia-nguftuq _ , _ Thyatira-ghmii _ , _ akilpegagh qagh yu k _ esnegrukegtagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng _ , _ maniguute kayug _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Atanghem _ liigikestengngwaaqii _ Paul-em _ akuzi ta i _ Lydia-mun _ enkaam _ ugpeqekagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ paaptaayeyameng _ Lydia-m _ aqelqagh ngllagh ainkut _ , _ " _ sumegh gpesini _ ipapik _ ugpegh ma kuma _ atanegh kun _ , _ whangkunnitaghhnayanghitsii _ ? _ " _ enkaam _ sagiqe sigh nkut _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ kiiw m _ esnenganilngughmun _ yughagh te vig mun _ aglagh ma luta _ , _ nallaghaghput _ qepghaghtelaaq _ aghnagh aq _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg _ . _ Taam _ tughneghagh m _ uuknaliqe tke ste aqe kangi _ sa u aat _ sa yaghqagh t _ sivutghulluki _ . _ enkaam _ piliitestengita _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u kangat _ .
Taam _ aghnaghagh m _ maligsaagh ainkut _ Paul-llu _ whangkuta _ akilghuu magh mi _ , _ " _ ukut _ yug t _ qepghaghtekii _ Aangelleghpigaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ! _ ungipaate aqe aisi _ naten _ yuguligh lleg nge lleghqagh meng _ ! _ "
qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ tawaten _ pi uq _ . _ qenwat llu _ Paul-em _ qinuyagute luku _ tughneghagh _ ilu anite ngughk _ qiive luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ategh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qelegh amken _ aanesqelluten _ ellnga neng _ ! _ " _ Tawaninginaq _ tughneghagh _ ilu aneng _ aanekagh _ .
Piliitestengita _ liigike yamegteggu _ allgeghututkesaghqaananiimatseng _ aghnagh aq _ , _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ akugh ke aqe agket _ . _ Qamughsiighmeng _ aglagh tke agket _ igleghutistenun _ akilpegaghvigmelngughnun _ .
taagken _ igleghutistet _ aglagh te lukek _ Rome-eghmiit _ nanqigtistengitnun _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ yug k _ ukuk _ Jew-nguuk _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii u uk _ maani _ .
apeghtugh i aqe uk _ kiyaghtaalleghmeng _ whangkuta _ Rome-eghmiini _ liilightuusagh mta _ iinghute ke ii te neng _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apeghtuusagh ik _ atuqe naanghite aput _ . _ "
enkaam _ yug lghute _ ilate qaghtagh te luni _ sughukagh gket _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ . _ Nanqigtistet _ qelegh tke agket _ aatkagh ik _ qesugumeng _ mataghte qugh luki _ anagulghesqellukek _ .
Anaguleghtaaneghmeng _ taaqe lukek _ anusimingllaghvig mun _ kanaghtekagh gket _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg anun _ maghqatutngwaaghesqegkagket _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ tawaten _ kayagte yatni _ iluklighpigaghmun _ qamavek _ kanaghtekakek _ . _ taagken _ umughllagmeng _ unaghsigh meng _ tukughusighlukek _ , _ maghqatekagh it _ taakut _ tukughte te t _ qaprag yaghqaa gpenakek _ .
nani _ tamaani _ unugem _ qukaa ni _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ yughagh magh egmek _ ilagaghkagh k _ usuqe i llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ anusimingllaghagh t _ tawanlenguut _ nagatkagket _ .
nuuskagllagan _ nuna _ tuyepeghtaqaq _ , _ repall _ anusimingllaghvig _ tunemaghtuumagh an _ aghula tke a _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ amig t _ qelpegh aghtagh tke aat _ , _ anusimingllaghagh neng llu _ qiipraghute t _ ilefkaghaghtagh tke aat _ .
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ , _ amig t _ qelpatu te ut _ . _ sumegh mini _ anusimingllaghagh t _ qimagugh te ma ni luki _ savigpag ni _ nusug luku _ ellmi neng _ tuqute naqekagh _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ tuqute naqe gpenang _ elpeneng _ qayughllak _ qamagte luta _ whaantutukut _ ! _ "
anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ kenegh meng _ tungsigh luni _ itegh qaghtekagh _ . _ Alingruughem _ ungelegte magh mi _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ manu gkenkun _ segesqughtekagh _ .
taagken _ aanututkellukek _ aaptekakek _ , _ " _ yug gni _ ukughtek _ , _ naten _ sa lunga _ yuguligh lleg nge nayagh zinga _ ? _ "
pikagh ak _ , _ " _ ugpeqe gu _ atanegh _ Jesus _ enkaam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe uten _ , _ nengllugute ten llu _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ ungipagh kekagh ak _ atanegh _ ellnga nun llu _ nengllugutanganunllu _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ ughvughteqii _ taake uk _ yug k _ anagulellghegkenka _ kii ik _ . _ taagken _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ paaptaaye inagh magh meng _ pikagh t _ .
Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ ellmeggnun _ aglagh te lukek _ neghestekagket _ . _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ quya te ghllag ke aat _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
aghte yagu _ Rome-eghmiit _ nanqigtistengita _ keveg aqekagh it _ umiilwaateng _ ungipaate yaghtigh sqellug qu _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg a _ whaten _ , _ " _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ aane ste kek _ . _ "
enkaam _ anusimingllaghvig m _ umiileg an _ Paul _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Nanqigtistet _ kayagte te ii stek _ aaneslamtegnguq _ enkaam _ aane lghaatek _ , _ aghulaqe tek _ nekeggmellutek _ . _ "
iwernga _ Paul-em _ umiileg u aaghet _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Rome-eghmiingughngaamtung _ yugtuqagh mi _ anaguleghtaakaqiinkung _ , _ talwa _ ipapighqutkegpenaan _ sa meng _ anaggusimatfung _ . _ taagken _ anusimingllagh ainkung _ . _ Enraghngam _ whaa _ maaten _ aksaqe luku _ aanesnaqinkuung _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ Ellmeggneng _ nanqigtistet _ tagi luteng _ aane ste linkung _ . _ "
Paul-em _ tawaten _ piyisteng _ umiileg u aaghet _ ungipaate yaghtugh qu ait _ nanqigtistet _ . _ enkaam _ nanqigtistet _ alingekagh t _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ nagaqugh lukek _ Rome-eghmiingutkek _ .
taagken _ taku lukek _ qivghuke lukek _ aanestekagket _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ , _ aghulaqesqegkagketlu _ .
enkaam _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ aane yamek _ , _ Lydia-nkunun _ pikagh k _ . _ tawani _ laalighfike luki _ ugpeqagh t _ kayeme luki _ aghulaqekagh k _ .
Paul-enkut _ igleghtekagh t _ Amphipolis-kunllu _ , _ Apollonia-kunllu _ Thessalonica-mun _ kaate llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ Jews-et _ synagogue-elget _ .
Paul _ pi aqe llegh mitun _ synagogue-mun _ pi ke aq _ . _ pingayut ni _ Sabbath-eni _ Paul-em _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ yug t _ Christ-ameng _ akuzite tgun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ .
Uuknaliqelleghteggun _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ ipa _ Christ-a _ tuqu yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ unguvagh yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ Jesus _ apegh kegka _ elpesi nun _ Christ-anguuq _ . _ "
ila i _ Jews-et _ ugpegh luteng _ ila tke aat _ Paul-enkugnun _ Silas-enkugnun _ . _ tamaakut llu _ Greek-elghutet _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ aghnagh lghute t llu _ pingwaagh t _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
taagken _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ Jews-et _ aqinake lukek _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ tesqagantaqelghiineng _ sa igate ngugh neng _ yug neng _ qerngughte i luteng _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ qenwat _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ Thessalonica-ghmiit _ qapraghqegkiit _ . _ taagken _ ketanqusnaq _ Jason-enkunun _ aglagh luteng _ itegh qaghtagh tke aat _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ aane te na lukek _ yug lghute nun _ .
iwernga _ naalke nghite yamegtekek _ , _ Jason-llu _ ila i llu _ ugpeqagh t _ qamughsiighkagh it _ Thessalonica-m _ igleghutistengitnun _ . _ akilghuukagh t _ , _ " _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ navek _ alngunak _ pinegh megteni _ seghleliighqagh ii aqe uk _ , _ whaa _ maani llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe uk _ .
Caesar-em _ liilightuusagh i _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe aik _ whaten _ pilleghmegnegun _ , _ ' _ Jesus _ umiilegpigaaguq _ , _ Caesar _ umiileg u nghite uq _ . _ ' _ Jason-em _ ellmeggnitestaqaak _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi yata _ yug t llu _ igleghutistengillu _ Thessalonica-m _ sakraa ghllagkagh t _ .
taagken _ igleghutistet _ pi ke ait _ Jason-enkut _ , _ " _ qelegh te agput _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ elpesi nun _ aghulaqe ste sqellug kek _ Thessalonica-meng _ , _ iwernga _ sivuke lusi _ manilitikut _ . _ aghulaqe gkayek _ mani i _ veghulleqaghput _ . _ " _ taagken _ aglagh stekagh it _ .
mamlegte ghesnagh yagu _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ aghulaqestekagket _ Berea-mun _ . _ kaate yamek _ synagogue-mun _ pikagh k _ .
tamaakut _ Jews-ngit _ nagate yu kestagh lukek _ ayuqe kegket _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ , _ Thessalonica-melngughneng _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ Jews-et _ ellmeggneng _ liite naqekagh it _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ liigike na luki _ Paul-enkuk _ Silas-enkuk _ apeghtugh i llegh ik _ ipa u ta i _ .
enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ , _ uglagh pigte lghiit llu _ pingwaagh t _ Greek-et _ aghni ut llu _ yug it llu _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
iwernga _ Jews-et _ Thessalonica-melnguut _ nagaqugh yamegteggu _ Paul _ ungipagh ke i ni luku _ akuzi ta aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ Berea-mi _ , _ Berea-tkat _ . _ kaate luteng _ qapraghqiikat _ yug neng _ seghleliighqagh iikagh t _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul _ esne mun _ atghagh te qagh stekagh at _ iwernga _ Silas-enkuk _ Timothy-nkuk _ Berea-metkak _ .
yug t _ igleghte te i lghiit _ Paul-meng _ maligte tke aat _ athens- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ uteghnigh naqe yata _ Berea-mun _ Paul-em _ lipeghsagh kakek _ Silas-enkuk _ Timothy-nkuk _ takusqelluni _ pi yaghqaaghte ghesnagh kayek _ .
athens- mi _ Paul _ utaqa i te kete luku _ Silas-enkugneng _ Timothy-nkugneng _ , _ yuvghiigh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ seghleghyug ghllagkagh _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ngllagh qaghtu pigte uq _ .
enkaam _ Paul-em _ synagogue-mi _ Jews-etlu _ Gentile-etlu _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-anguniluku _ . _ akilpegaghvig mi llu _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kinku t _ alngunak _ tawanneghata _ apegh aqe kanga _ Christ-a _ .
ila ita _ apeghtughiste ita _ Epicurean-etlu _ , _ Stoic-etlu _ taku luku _ Paul _ aaghtiiraaghkagh at _ . _ ila ita _ ila teng _ aaptekagh it _ , _ " _ una _ akuzivallughllak _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ " _ tamaakut _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ llangaqa _ nakumiit _ kiyaghnegh it _ akuzite kaqe ai _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ Paul-em _ ungipagh ke u kanga _ Jesus _ , _ unguvallegh a llu _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
taagken _ Paul-mun _ maligte stekagh t _ agghistenun _ Areopagus-melngughnun _ . _ enkaam _ kaate yameng _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ taana _ nutaghagh _ apeghtuusagh ke aqe ken _ liisuwaghput _ .
sa u a _ taana _ apegh kan _ allaaghlluwhaaguq _ whangkunni _ , _ enkaam _ liigiksuwaghput _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ . _ "
( _ sa u aat _ nutaghagh t _ apeghtuusagh t _ pi nghata _ Athens-eghmiitlu _ , _ nakumiitlu _ tamaavek _ lli aqe aat _ apeghyuwaqiitlu _ nagate yug aqe ait llu _ . _ )
enkaam _ Areopagus-mi _ Paul-em _ nekeve luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Athens-eghmiini _ , _ liigike amsi _ elngaatall _ maniguute kayugu usi _ elpek si _ yug ni _ .
igleghte yalghiinga _ qagani _ akule mi _ , _ esghagh anka _ manigugh vig lghute si _ , _ aghqefig llu _ ataasigh _ igaqe vike nga lghii _ whaten _ , _ ' _ nallukekagh mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ' _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh _ nalluke ghngaaghpesigu _ manigughkagh i _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ .
Taam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ nuna _ , _ sa u a llu _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ nuna mete ngughk _ . _ atanegh ke a _ qilag m llu _ nuna m llu _ enkaam _ maniguutfingllaqanisigatuq _ .
Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh _ tuune i kayug _ unguvallegh meng _ , _ aneghnegh meng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ yug nun _ . _ aklu ke yaghqagh ke nghite a _ yug t _ kayusillegh at _ qayughllak _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ aklukigataa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ ataasigh _ yuug _ , _ enkaam _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ allgegh kau uq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ yuug _ nuna mete ngughk _ whani _ . _ Iingkerugllak _ yataaghqe kaqe ai llu _ qakun _ yug t _ allgegh yaghqaa ta i _ , _ nani llu _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ta i _ .
tawaten _ pi kaqe ai _ yug nun _ iviisqelluni _ luuraq _ naalkennayukangatni _ . _ naqamllu _ naligh ghhagh inagh mnneng _ uyavanneghituq
qayughllak _ ' _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghtengnguukutlu _ , _ qaprag u ukut llu _ , _ allgegh kau ukut llu _ . _ ' _ talwa _ ila i _ igangllaghtesi _ whaten _ pi kau lghiit _ , _ ' _ ipapestaaq _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ . _ '
" _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ sumeghtaghaatkesaghqaqenghitaghput _ yug t _ ulimaaghistun _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ uyghag meng _ ayuqe luki _ . _ yug t _ sumeghtaghallghistun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ yug t _ salin _ nalluke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghyuugh yug mangite ai _ aghyuusaqeghngaata _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ qelegh u ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ naansaghngaata _ avuteghqelluki _ , _ seghleghqennaniisqelluki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ qelqe aqe ai _ qayughllak _ nekegtekaqe a _ aghneq _ nanqigtivig u luku _ . _ nakmikegkagh mikun _ yug kun _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ tawateghlluwaaq _ nanqigte yaghqaqe a _ . _ liite ste na luku _ nakmikegkagh ni _ yuug _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ "
nagate luku _ Paul-em _ apegh kanga _ yuug _ unguvaghtesimaniluku _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ ila ita _ legasiighwagh tkekagh at _ , _ iwernga _ ila ita _ pi ke aat _ Paul _ , _ " _ wataqaaghaq _ nagasuwaghput _ alla _ apegh naqe gkuvgu _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul-em _ unitekagh i _ ,
iwernga _ ila ita _ maligsaagh luku _ Paul _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ . _ ataasigh _ Dionysius-nguftuq _ , _ Areopagus-mi _ agghi sta _ , _ aghnagh llu _ ategh ke lghii _ Damaris-meng _ , _ kinku t llu _ ila i _ ugpegh uute tke aat _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Paul _ Corinth-etkaq _ athens- meng _ .
tamaani _ nallagh qagh a _ Jew _ ategh a _ Aquila _ , _ Pontus-mi _ allgeghkagh _ . _ italy- meng _ kaate negh ghhagh u uk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ Priscilla-nkuk _ , _ qayughllak _ Umiilegpigaam _ Claudius-em _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ Jews-et _ Rome-emeng _ . _ Paul-em _ laalighfike lukek
elkegkenitkaq _ qayughllak _ qepghaqagh ak _ ellnga n _ qepghaqagh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ tiinta ngllagh llegh m _ aki a _ kiyaghusiqegkangat _ .
Sabbath-a _ tamaghhagh an _ Paul _ synagogue-mun _ pi luni _ ungipagh aqe lghii _ Jews-enunllu _ , _ Greek-enunllu _ ugpeghesqelluki _ .
Silas-enkuk _ Timothy-nkuk _ kaate tke ak _ Macedonia-meng _ , _ taagken _ kenle ke luku _ Paul _ ungipagh ke i inagh luni _ lli aqe aq _ . _ Jews-enun _ aapte qugh a _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-anguniluku _ .
Jews-et _ kipullginaaghyatnillu _ seghletun llu _ akuzite kete yatni _ , _ aatkagh mi _ pagula i _ ufsug te luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ifla kufsi _ elpek si _ pilqaghsi _ , _ whanga _ pilqennaanghitaqa _ . _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ Gentile-enun _ ungipagh ke i naqe unga _ . _ "
enkaam _ unite luki _ Jews-et _ Titius _ Justus-mun _ lli aqe aq _ , _ gentile- mun _ maniguute kayug mun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ mangteghagh a _ synagogue-em _ saaghw anite ngughk _ .
Synagogue-em _ igleghte te i ste nga _ Crispus-nguftuq _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ ugpeqekagh at _ atanegh _ . _ Corinth-eghmiilghutetlu _ nagate luku _ Paul _ ugpegh luteng _ paaptaayekagh t _ .
taagken _ unugmi _ ataasigh mi _ Paul _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun _ Atanghem _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ alinge gpenang _ , _ yeghlegi _ ungipagh ke i kestagh a _ iilqayug fqaavek
qayughllak _ elpenitaqunga _ . _ kitumun _ alngunak _ aqnigh snaanghite amken _ , _ qayughllak _ ne ghllag mi _ whani _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ whanga _ pi kaqe a _ . _ "
enkaam _ Paul _ tamaani _ apeghtugh ikagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
gallio _ , _ Rome-em _ umiileg ughte ste aqe yagu _ Greece-mun _ , _ Jews-et _ qerngughte te luteng _ sughug luku _ Paul _ aglagh tke aat _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
kaat ute te luku _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ Uum _ yug m _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh _ manigigh sqellug qu _ alla u luku _ liilightuusagh mnneng _ ! _ "
iiwenllu _ Paul _ akuzi naqe aqe uq _ , _ Gallio-m _ Jews-et _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ una _ yuug _ tegleg uqagh u yagh kan _ , _ yugtagh kaayagh kan _ nalighmeng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ seghlegh pestaagh _ pi kaqsagh kagu _ ilapga pestaagh nayagh amsi _ .
iwernga _ una _ yuug _ tawaten _ pi mangite uq _ . _ Aaghtiiraaghutkengngunghitasi _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ aaghtiiraaghutkengngwaasi _ elpek si _ katam _ liilightuusagh si _ , _ akuzite t llu _ ategh t llu _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ . _ tamaaken _ nanqigte i yaghqaa nghite unga _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi teki _ . _ "
enkaam _ eflegh ke te qugh u i _ aanesqelluki _ .
taagken _ yug t _ akuqagh luku _ synagogue-em _ igleghte te i ste nga _ Sosthenes _ , _ qevute i aqe aat _ nanqigtivig m _ manughagh ani _ iwernga _ Gallio-m _ avelghagh ke ii naqe ai _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ Paul _ paninang _ ugpeqanitkaq _ qafsineg ghllag _ aghneq _ Corinth-mi _ . _ taagken _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ Syria-mun _ kelqellug kek _ Priscilla-nkuk _ Aquila-nkuk _ . _ kaate yameng _ Cenchrea-mun _ Paul _ qigughkagh _ liigike sqellug qu _ akequsagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ apeghiigh llegh a _ .
kaate luteng _ ephesus- mun _ , _ tamaani _ Paul-em _ unite kakek _ Priscilla-nkuk _ Aquila-nkuk _ , _ synagogue-elluni _ liigike ste naqutkekagh a _ Jews-enun _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-anguniluku _ .
Ellmeggnitaghiisqegkaqsaqangat _ iwernga _ pipag nigh nge i tke aq _ .
enkaam _ aghulaqe naqe yami _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ alla _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ " _ taagken _ ephesus- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqekagh _ .
kaate luni _ Caesarea-mun _ nagneqe aq _ Jerusalem-emun _ laalighfike na luki _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ taagken _ Antioch-etkaq _ .
Tamaantaghlluni _ aghulaqekagh _ . _ igleghte te kete luku _ Galatia-kunllu _ Phrygia-kunllu _ , _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ .
Paul _ tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ apollos _ , _ ephesus- mun _ kaate tke aq _ . _ Jew-ngulghii _ allgeghkagh _ Alexandria-mi _ . _ elngaatall _ akuzi lleg ghllag llu _ liite te ghllag ke aq llu _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ .
salin _ Alexandria-melluku _ kitum _ apeghtugh kaqe kanga _ Atanghem _ tumanganeng _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe pigte luni _ akuzitkengngukangallu _ apeghtuusagh ke u kanga llu _ elqughaghte luku _ Jesus _ , _ apeghtuusagh i llu _ . _ naqam _ liisimake kanga _ paaptaaye llegh _ John-em _ apeghtugh te llegh igh u naaghtu te _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ephesus- mi _ apollos _ synagogue-elluni _ tetug gpenani _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ . _ Priscilla-nkuk _ Aquila-nkuk _ nagate luku _ aqelqagh ngllaghkagh ak _ liigikestaghaghnaluku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tumanganeng _ , _ wataqaaghaq _ elqughaghte luku _ .
apollos _ Greece-mun _ piyug yan _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ kayemekagh at _ enkaam _ lata ke aat _ Greece-eghmiit _ ugpeqagh itnun _ upugha te sqellug qu _ . _ taakut _ Greece-eghmiit _ ugpeqe kaqe kangat _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh akun _ . _ Apollos-em _ kaate luni _ elngaatall _ iknaqughsaqaqegkangi _ ugpegh llegh it _ apeghtugh i llegh mikun _ .
yugtuqagh mi _ aaghtiiraagh ghllagkagh i _ Jews-et _ , _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ ipapighqusiqluki _ Jesus _ , _ Christ-anguniluku _ .
apollos _ Corinth-melluku _ , _ Paul _ qute kun _ igleghakagh _ ephesus- mun _ kenlanga _ . _ tamaani _ ila i _ maligsaaghtet _ nallagh luki
aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ allgeghsimastekek _ ugpegh aqngafsi _ ? _ " _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ nakaa _ , _ nallukngwaagh agput _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ "
aapte laataghkagh i _ , _ " _ sa mun mi _ paaptaayematsi _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe aat _ , _ " _ John-em _ paaptaaye llegh atun _ . _ "
Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ John-em _ paaptaayeghillgha _ avuteghqelluteng _ seghleghqennanilghinun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ pi kaqe ai llu _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ kingu mineng _ tagi yaghqagh _ , _ taana _ Jesus-nguuq _ . _ "
nagaqugh yamegteggu _ taana _ , _ paaptaayekagh t _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ .
Paul-em _ saafsaqminiki _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ iteghkagh k _ ellngit nun _ . _ taagken _ akuzikagh t _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh stun _ ulu stun _ , _ uuknaliqe magh meng llu _ pikagh t _ .
entaqun _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yuug _ tawantuq _ .
pingayut ni _ tanqigh ni _ Sabbath-a _ tamaghhagh an _ Paul-em _ tetug qagh gpenani _ aleghqugh qu ai _ yug t _ synagogue-mi _ . _ aaghhe naqutkekagh i _ , _ liigike ste naqutkekagh i _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ pineghllug lghiit _ ugpeghyunghitkat _ , _ enkaam _ sivu itni _ yug t _ seghletun _ akuzi tkekagh at _ kiyaghtaalleq _ Atanghem _ apeghtuusagh a _ . _ enkaam _ Paul-em _ unitekagh i _ kelqelluki _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ taagken _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ Tyrannus-em _ apeghtugh i vig ani _ , _ Paul-em _ aleghqugh aqe kangi _ yug t _ .
tawaten _ pi ke aq _ maalghug _ ayumiqullegh k _ , _ enkaam _ tamaghhagh meng _ Jews-etlu _ Greek-etlu _ Asia-melnguut _ nagaqugh qu ait _ akuzi ta i _ Atanghem _ .
kiyaghnegh _ allaaghlluwhaghtiighaataqaq _ saghiigha nagh lghii meng _ Paul-kun _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ yug t _ Paul-em _ kakegllugiitagh i llu _ , _ aatkagh i llu _ lli nghmegteki _ qinu yu gnun _ naallghute aqe lghiit _ , _ tughneghagh t llu _ ilungitnilnguut _ aane aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ Jews-et _ iglegha u lghiit _ nuna nun _ , _ yug neng _ aag negh squgh u u kangit _ tughneghagh t _ . _ taagken _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ ategh a _ aane ste qugh sigh ke naqutke kaqsagh kangat _ . _ pikagh t _ , _ " _ qelegh amken _ aanesqelluten _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ Jesus-kun _ Paul-em _ ungipagh kekagh akun _ . _ "
Sceva-m _ maaghraghvilek _ ighnegh i _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ . _ ( _ taana _ sceva _ Jew-ngulghii _ high _ priest- a _ . _ )
iwernga _ tughneghagh m _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimake aqa _ Jesus _ , _ liisimake aqa _ Paul _ , _ elpek si _ kinku u tsi _ ? _ "
taagken _ yug m _ ilu mikun _ tughneghagh leg m _ qetgegh vike luki _ taakut _ yug t _ qevute i aqe ai _ , _ iknaqepigtutmineng _ qamagte luki _ ava igh lleg kekagh i _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghagh aneng _ aane qagh tate luteng _ qimagugh tke aat _ amsikagh meng _ , _ kiitigh qu lleg ligh luteng _ .
qamagte luteng _ Ephesus-eghmiit _ , _ Jews-etlu _ Greek-etlu _ alingruugh tke aat _ taana _ nagaqugh luku _ , _ enkaam _ ategh a _ Jesus-em _ wataqaaghaq _ quulvaqaat _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpenghhaqaniit _ yugtuqagh mi _ apeghraghkagh it _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ .
uglagh pigte lghiit _ alignaghtaagh kayugu yagh lghiit _ tagite uute luki _ alignaghtaagh sigh t _ igagh teng _ panegh qugh qu ait _ yug lghute t _ esghaamanghitni _ . _ igagh lghute t _ akitulesughyaqmegteki _ 50,000 _ silver _ drachmas-et _ akike ait _ .
tamaa na _ apallugh ke luku _ wataqaaghaq _ akuzi ta i _ Atanghem _ mingitekagh t _ , _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghiit _ ugpeqekagh it _ .
kingu itneng _ tamaakut _ Paul _ qakiqniqekagh _ Jerusalem-emun _ pi na luni _ , _ Macedonia-kunllu _ Greece-kunllu _ aag luni _ . _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ Jerusalem-etaghllunga _ taagken _ Rome-esaghqapestaaghuunga _ . _ "
taagken _ Paul-em _ kayute gni _ Timothy-nkuk _ Erastus-enkuk _ kayagtekakek _ aglagh kestigh sqellug kek _ Macedonia-mun _ , _ ellnga _ Asia-metaghaqaq _ .
nani _ tamaani _ pi llegh mi _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ Ephesus-eghmiit _ elngaatall _ seghleliigh tkekagh at _ kiyaghtaalleq _ Atanghem _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ .
tamaa na _ seghleliigh llegh _ Demetrius-em _ silver- meng _ ulimastem _ piinlegh iqe a _ . _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ qayughllak _ ulima lgutke te lghiit _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh sigh ke u kangit _ silver- meng _ ulimaagh t _ temple-engwaaghhaat _ . _ tamaakut _ temple-engwaaghhaat _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh mun _ artemis- mun _ maniguute vig stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Demetrius-em _ ulimalgutnillu _ ila i llu _ tawatelngughmeng _ ulima kayug t _ qerngughte luki _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ ukughsi _ yug ni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ elngaatall _ mani ngllagh aqe ukut _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
iwernga _ esghapagaghsillu _ nagataghsillu _ Paul-em _ pillgha _ . _ pi aqe uq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ kiyaghnegh pigu nghite ni luki _ . _ enkaam _ uglagh pigte lghii _ yuug _ allangughte qugh aa _ maani _ ephesus- mi _ , _ maaninginaagpenaan _ tea- ma ghhagh ani llu _ Asia-mi _ pi aqe uq _ .
seghleghhalek _ sa nghite kumta _ qepghaqagh ut _ ukavagh lleqe uq _ . _ liisimakagh i _ qamagte luteng _ Asia-ghmiitlu _ nunataghhaanilnguutlu _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghnagh _ kiyaghnegh _ artemis _ . _ sa nghite kumta _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh tke sag u lleqe aat _ temple- a _ megnu nagh ite ni luku _ , _ Artemis-emllu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ sea-te u nanigh lleqe uq _ . _ "
taakut _ yug t _ nagate luku _ Demetrius _ elngaatall _ sakraakagh t _ , _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t llu _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ Ephesus-em _ ! _ "
mulu gpenateng _ qamagte luteng _ Ephesus-eghmiit _ ketanqwaaghaatkat _ akilghuu magh meng _ nalluke ghngaaghmegteki _ sa aqe ta i _ . _ Paul-em _ igleghalgute kek _ Gaius-enkuk _ Aristarchus-enkuk _ Macedonia-ghmiik _ tamaanlenguuk _ uvitangitni _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ taake uk _ akuqagh lukek _ qamugh ke lukek _ ketarwakat _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ maligte luki _ yug lghute ghllag t _ .
Paul _ itegh yug kaayagh lghii _ yug lghute _ aleghqugh na luku _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh t _ ighlekekagh at _ .
talwa _ ila ita _ Asia-m _ igleghutistengita _ keveg aqe tke aat _ ilakumtaagh eng _ Paul _ wataghllak _ itegh fqaan _ qerngughte te vig ghllag mun _ pi sqellug qu _ .
taakut _ qerngughutfigllagmelnguut _ wanlegi _ nepug ghllag ughtekagh t _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ sa meng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ , _ ila i _ sa meng _ alla neng _ akilghuu ghllaget _ . _ kiyang _ allute luteng _ nalluke kangat _ sangameng _ qerngughusimatseng _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ategh ke lghii _ Alexander-meng _ , _ Jews-et _ apeghtughwaaghluku _ sa meng _ pi lleghqagh meng _ , _ akuzi yaghtigh sqekagh at _ sivu itnun _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ Alexander-em _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ nagatesqelluni _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ yug lghute ghllag t _ liigike yamegteggu _ alexander _ Jew-ngutanga _ , _ qerngaghllagmeng _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ aange ghllag uq _ artemis- nga _ Ephesus-em _ ! _ " _ tawaten _ akilghuukagh t _ ketwhell _ maalghug _ aflu k _ .
ataasigh m _ Ephesus-em _ umiilwaaghan _ nepiigh ste qaghte yamiki _ yug lghute t _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Ephesus-eghmiini _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh ghllag mi _ liisimake a _ ephesus _ aflengake i stekagh a _ aange lghii m _ Artemis-em _ temple- nge an _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ uyghag m _ ifkaghkagh m _ qilag meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aygughike naanghite ainkut _ taakugneng _ aflengakestengutfut _ enkaam _ nepiigh tek _ . _ sa u a _ teme igh ghllag _ apeghiigh vagilgafsigu _ sumeghtaghagh tek _ .
taake uk _ yug k _ whavek _ tagite kaqe agsi _ talwa _ sa meng _ tegleg nghite ghngaayek _ temple-eneng _ , _ akuzi tke nghite ghngaagnegu llu _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ kiyaghnegh ut _ artemis _ .
una _ nanqigtivig u nghite uq _ . _ Demetrius-enkut _ qepghaghtekullghiit _ sa meng _ apallugh lgu kumeng _ nanqigtivig mun _ aglagh lit _ . _ tawani _ nanqigtistenun _ apegh nakangit _ apallugh teng _ enkaam _ elngaatall _ avutkeiiraagh ghhaat _ .
wata _ sa meng _ pi yaghqagh lgu kufsi _ sa meng _ tamaaken _ qerngughutfigpigaghmi _ agghi te kete nakesi _ .
tawaten _ pi amsi _ qayughllak _ Rome-em _ umiileg ita _ nagaqugh kumegteggu _ una _ seghleliigh llegh _ aghneghmi _ whani _ , _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ qaatke te nghite ni luta _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi naqe ainkut _ . _ Samengʼngam _ pi lleqe steki _ qayughllak _ apallugh ite ukut _ seghleliighqagh ii lleg mnnun _ . _ "
Taam _ umiilwaaghem _ tawaten _ pi luki _ aglagh uute stekagh i _ .
taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ alpag yan _ Paul-em _ aqfa stekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ kayeme luki _ aghulaqekagh _ Macedonia-mun _ .
enkaam _ Macedonia-kun _ igleghte te kete luku _ laalighqwaagh vikekagh i _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ kayeme magh ita _ pi ke ai _ . _ taagken _ nagneqe aq _ Greece-mun _ ,
tamaantekaq _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ . _ yataaghqe aqe uq llu _ angyaghpag kun _ Syria-nnaluni _ , _ liigikekagh i _ Jews-enʼnguq _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ tuqute na luku _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ uteghte yu ke aq _ Macedonia-kun _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
Maligtestekeftii _ Sopater _ , _ ighnegh a _ Pyrrhus-em _ , _ Berea-ghmii _ , _ Aristarchus-enkuk _ Secundus-enkuk _ Thessalonica-ghmiik _ , _ Gaius _ Derbe-ghmii _ , _ Tychicus-enkuk _ Trophimus-enkuk _ Asia-ghmiik _ , _ Timothy-llu _ .
taakut _ aghulaqe kestagh luteng _ Troas-mun _ , _ tamaani _ utaqa i ut _ whangkunneng _ .
kingu aneng _ neqenghaghqe llegh an _ Yeast-aliimangilnguum _ neqekrangllagh m _ , _ philippi- meng _ angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ . _ tallimat _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ kaate aput _ ila put _ Troas-mi _ . _ Tamaantukut _ maaghraghvinleg _ aghneq _ .
sivuligh mi _ aghnegh ani _ santillegh m _ Troas-eghmiit _ ugpeqe ait llu _ whangkuta llu _ qerngughte te ukut _ negh na luta _ Atanghem _ neqenghaghqe llegh aneng _ . _ sivuke luni _ Paul _ ungipagh ke ikagh _ unugem _ qukaa nun _ kenlanga _ , _ qayughllak _ unaami _ aghulaqe yug u lghii _ .
Qemtamelnguukut _ kenegh lghutaghtuqagh mi _ .
nukalpigagh _ Eutychus _ , _ aqume luni _ qergese m _ esne akun _ nagatekagh _ . _ Paul _ ungipagh ke i ma luku _ qenwat _ Eutychus _ qavaghni ke aq _ . _ qenwat llu _ umu qite luni _ qavagh yalghiimi _ eslate mun _ ifkaghkagh _ pamaken _ pingayaaneng _ qemtagh m _ . _ aane luteng _ tuguyaqmegteggu _ tuqu luni _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ uki ragkiigh luni _ segesqughte vike luku _ qetekagh a _ . _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ alinge gpenasi _ , _ whaa _ unguvagh ma uq _ ! _ "
taagken _ mayugh uute luteng _ Paul-em _ neqekrangllagh _ aavgugh luku _ neghekagh t _ . _ aleghqugh tke aat _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kenlanga _ aghte llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ Paul _ aghulaqekagh _ .
ugpeqagh t _ nukalpigagh _ aglagh tke aat _ ne anun _ ilutu lleg nge ghllag luteng _ unguvallegh a _ apalluqlluku _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aghulaqe ukut _ Assos-mun _ sivungagh ni _ Paul-em _ , _ qayughllak _ qute kun _ Assos-mun _ pi luni _ wetku _ tamaani _ uugte naqe ni lghii _ angyaghpag mun _ .
kaate yan _ Assos-mun _ qaake luku _ angyaghpag mun _ Mitylene-etukut _ .
unaami ani _ Mitylene-meng _ aghulaqe luta _ aghuliigh ukut _ Chios-em _ tungangakun _ . _ taagken _ unaami ani _ kaate ukut _ Samos-mun _ , _ enkaam _ awakaghaani _ kaate ukut _ miletus- mun _ .
Paul-em _ naghughte yukagh a _ ephesus _ qayughllak _ Asia-mi _ kimaawi yu nghite ngughk _ . _ pi lleghqagh lgu kuni _ Jerusalem-emun _ kaasupigtengngulghii _ angiite na luni _ Pentecost-mun _ .
miletus- mete luni _ Paul-em _ tagsiqligh iqe ai _ ugpeqagh t _ elder-ngit _ Ephesus-melnguut _ .
kaa sa ta _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ liisimakagh i _ naten _ kiyaghtaalqa _ elpesi nite lunga _ Asia-mun _ kaate yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ ima _ .
qepghagh te kaqe aqa _ atanegh _ qusevegte pigte lunga _ , _ qunituumagh ma llu _ qaywa _ Jews-et _ seghleliighqeghllagngaatngallu _ , _ tuqute naqutke ghngaatnga llu _ .
iwernga _ liisimakagh i _ nuqetusigatanka _ sa u aat _ kayute kaghqagh si _ ungipagh ke i negh mni _ , _ apeghtunemsi _ yugtuqagh mi llu _ ne gpesini llu _ .
qevuute luki _ qelegh aqe yagh anka _ Jews-etlu _ Greek-etlu _ avuteghqelluki _ seghleghqennaniqata _ qiivesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ ugpeqisqellukillu _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ .
whaa _ maaten _ qaatke te lunga _ agleghnagh lghii gnun _ taghneghagh gnun _ Jerusalem-ennaqunga _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa yaghqaqe aatnga _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ .
iwerngaqun _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ nuna ni _ takukagh mni _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaate aqe aanga _ Jerusalem-emi _ seghleliigh lleqe ni lunga llu _ anusimingllagh lleqe ni lunga llu _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ katam _ unguvallegh ka _ waakigate aqa _ apeghiigh qaghte na luku _ qepghaqagh _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ qelegh tke a _ whanga mnun _ . _ apegh sqe kaqe ai _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
" _ liisimake aqa _ allameng _ esghaghnaanghitaghpesinga _ , _ elpek si _ ungipagh iqe tekagh mni _ ataneghpag u llegh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghneghmi _ whani _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ malghuklillngunaan _ , _ naligh i _ ifla kan _ whanga _ pilqenghitaqa _ ,
qayughllak _ nuqetusimangitaqa _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite sug qu a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nun _ aflengake sqe ai _ katam _ tawaten _ penniighniightem _ aflengake llegh atun _ penniigh ni _ . _ enkaam _ kelengangwaaghlusi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ yug i _ kelengakngwaaghluki _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tukfigh kaqe ai _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mikun _ .
liisimake aqa _ unite kumsi _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ taku lleqe aisi _ . _ katam _ tawatete ut _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ amaa stun _ naafqii naqe lghiit _ penniigh meng _ , _ naafqennaqutkelleqiit _ ugpeqagh t _ apeghtugh i llegh megteggun _ .
talwa _ ila i _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ iqlengiqe yaghqaa ut _ ugpeqesqelluki _ apeghtugh i lleg teng _ , _ ugpeghteqeghtekumegteki _ maligsaaghteknaluki _ .
enkaam _ kelengangwaaghlusi _ puughtellengnayukafsi _ . _ neqamike luku _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ qamagte lusi _ tamaaken _ aghneghtuumaan _ , _ unugtugh magh an _ seghleliighllaghngaaghma _ , _ qunituumagh ma _ .
" _ naange niite kete naqe aqa _ , _ neghyuke te amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflengakesqellusi _ , _ ungipagh mun llu _ piniqe llegh anun _ quyastesqellusi _ . _ nagate llegh gpesigun _ taana _ ungipagh _ ugpegh lleg si _ iknaqughllequtlu _ allgeghlleqaghsillu _ elpek si _ pi liite yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taana _ pi liite yaghqagh _ tamaakunun _ pi u uq _ aaftekagh minun _ ellmi nun _ katam _ yugu luki _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ mani gpesineng llu _ aatkagh gpesineng llu _ qiliigh mangite unga _ .
Liisimakaghpesinga _ sa u a _ aklukegkaqa _ , _ ila ma llu _ whangamnilnguut _ aklukegkiit _ qepghaatkayuwaanka _ allgeghhnaluki _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luku _ pi kaqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ usputagh u sqellug qu _ , _ whanga mtun _ ughleghiigh llegh gpesigun _ kayusiitesqelluki _ pipagningilnguut _ . _ neqamike luku _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ whaten _ pillgha _ , _ ' _ quyanagh aghagh uq _ tuune i i llegh _ allgegh te llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
Paul _ tawaten _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ , _ segesqughte luni _ yughagh lgusighkagh i _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiya magh meng _ Paul _ qete aqe luku _ naagh aataghkagh at _ .
qivghuke lleghpigagh ke kangat _ qayughllak _ pi kaqe kangi _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite ni luteng _ . _ taagken _ qanig ke aat _ angyaghpag mun _ .
unite yamteki _ ugpeqagh t _ angyaghpag mun _ uugg llu ta _ nangaqaghte ukut _ Cos-mun _ . _ unaami ani _ Rhodes-mun _ kaa llu ta _ taagken _ nagnegh ukut _ patara- mun _ .
tawani _ angyaghpag meng _ naalkute ukut _ Phoenicia-nnaqelghiimeng _ enkaam _ uugg llu ta _ aghulaqe ukut _ .
esghagh yamteggu _ qiighqagh _ Cyprus _ uughqa akun _ nagnegh ukut _ Syria-m _ esne akun _ Tyre-mun _ . _ tawani _ usingigh aat _ angyaghpag _ .
tamaani _ ivagh luki _ ugpeqagh t _ naalkesamteki _ ellngit nite ukut _ ataasigh _ santillegh _ . _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ ugpeqagh t _ Paul _ Jerusalem-etesnaniqaat _ .
Aghulaqsaghqaaghtengngamta _ ugpeqaalgutemta _ nulighh ghqu te lghiit _ , _ avaqutagh ke te lghiit _ maligte ainkut _ esnagh mun _ . _ tawani _ segesqughte uute luta _ yughagh te ukut _ .
taagken _ uugte ukut _ angyaghpag mun _ , _ qaniighisteput _ ne meggnun _ aglagh uute ut _ .
aghulaqe luta _ Tyre-meng _ kaate ukut _ Ptolemais-mun _ . _ tamaani _ quyake luki _ ugpeqaalguteput _ ataasigh _ aghneq _ ellngit nite ukut _ .
Unamingani _ Caesarea-mun _ kaa llu ta _ Philip-enkunitukut _ evangelist-emi _ . _ Maaghraghvinleqegkangat _ nakmikegkagh t _ kayute u luki _ .
Estamaneng _ panig leg _ ugiigh ma ite ngugh meng _ , _ qamagte luteng _ uuknaliqistet _ .
salin _ tamaansimaluta _ uuknaliqe i sta _ agabus _ , _ Judea-meng _ kaa tuq _ .
Whangkunnun _ tagi luni _ Paul-em _ tafsi a _ iike luku _ asighqelluki _ itegagh ni llu _ iigge ni llu _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ ' _ Jerusalem-emi _ tafsi m _ uum _ yumanga _ Jews-et _ asighqesaghqagh ke aat _ , _ taagken _ tuune lleqe aat _ Gentile-enun _ . _ ' _ "
whangkuta llu _ ila ita llu _ yug t _ nagate luku _ agabus _ tawaten _ pi lghii _ ighlegaatkesaghaghput _ Paul _ Jerusalem-etefqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ Paul-em _ pi inkut _ , _ " _ sangafsi _ qiya magh gpesi _ tawaten _ pi ste ngnga _ ? _ Seghleliighqaghpesinga _ ! _ whaa _ apeghiighwaaghlunga _ ayuqe unga _ asighqesaghqagh u lunga _ Jerusalem-emi _ , _ talwa _ tuqu yaghqaa lunga _ apallugh ke luku _ atanegh _ Jesus _ . _ "
Paul _ sagiqe yan _ iilqayagutaghput _ enkaangam _ piigh ut _ , _ " _ yeqay _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh li _ . _ "
enkaam _ qafsina _ aghneq _ atugh luku _ yataaghqelluta _ aghulaqe ukut _ Jerusalem-emun _ .
ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ Caesarea-ghmiit _ maligte ainkut _ , _ kaate yamta _ Jerusalem-emun _ aglagh te ainkut _ tukughqagh mnnun _ Mnason-enkunun _ , _ Cyprus-eghmiimun _ . _ Ugpeqaqsuwhaaghteggun _ maligte te luni _ ugpeqekagh a _ Jesus _ .
Jerusalem-emi _ ugpeqaalgutemta _ quyake luta _ upugha te ainkut _ .
unaami ani _ Paul _ maligte luku _ esghaghyaghtughyaqefut _ James _ , _ Elder-etlu _ qamagte luteng _ tawanteftut _ .
Paul-em _ quyakekagh i _ . _ taagken _ ungipagh tke ai _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh llegh aneng _ qepghagh llegh mikun _ Gentile-enilluni _ .
nagate luku _ usuqekagh at _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taagken _ pi ke aat _ Paul _ , _ " _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ liisima kan _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag t _ Jews-et _ ugpeqe aat _ Christ-a _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te manginagh yug aqe ut llu _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
Ungipaataqiinnguq _ apeghtughaqatennguq _ qamagte luki _ Jews-et _ , _ Gentile-et _ nunangitnilnguut _ qaatke te fqiita _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ pisqelluki _ . _ pi aqe aten llu nguq _ ighnegh it _ circumcise-enghisaghngaata _ , _ talwa nguq _ atuqe snanigh aqe an _ Jews-et _ kiyaghtaallghat _ .
kaate ma ni luten _ nagaqugh pestaagh naqngu aten _ . _ sa naqe sta ngam _ ?
itagnagh pigte nayagh uq _ pi sqe lleg mtestun _ pi yagh kuvek _ . _ estamat _ yug mta _ apeghiigh yaghtugh ngestagh ma ait _ akeqe i llegh eng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
elpek llu _ maligte luki _ temple- mun _ ukmangigh yagh a _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh an _ qelegh llegh atun _ . _ tukfigh naketen llu _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh si _ enkaam _ aghqerragh ghhaasi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ Taam _ kingu aneng _ yug t _ taakut _ taawa _ meqestengngwaaghluteng _ qigugh yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqellghistun _ . _ elpek llu _ ukmangigh kuvek _ qamagte luteng _ Jews-et _ liigike lleqe aat _ qaatke te nga llegh n _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ liigike lleqe aat llu _ nagaqughkagh eng _ tamaa na _ temngingu ta a _ .
taakut _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ ungipaate kaqe aput _ lata tgun _ qaatkesqelluki _ ukut _ , _ ' _ neghe gpenasi _ neqe meng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ aaw meng _ . _ neghe gpenasi _ qemitekagh meng _ teghig ke te yameng _ . _ nuqete aqe tek llu _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ ' _ "
enkaam _ unaami ani _ Paul _ ukmangigh yaghtuqagh _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqellghistun _ maligte luki _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangigh yaghtugh lghiit _ . _ taagken _ Paul _ temple- mun _ itegh luni _ priest-et _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ santillegh _ atugh luku _ estamat _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh eng _ apeghiigh naqe aat _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqellghistun _ . _ tukfigh lleqe anka _ teghig ke sagh t _ aghqe te kaghqagh it _ enkaam _ aghqerragh u aghte te aatagh qagh nakesi _ taakut _ yug t _ . _ "
iiwenllu _ santillegh _ naange naqe aqe uq _ taakut _ yug t _ ukmangighsagh llegh at _ , _ Asia-meng _ pi t _ Jews-et _ esghaghkagh at _ Paul _ temple- mete luku _ . _ aga _ akuqagh luku _ akilghuukagh t _ ,
" _ Israel-eghmiini _ , _ tagi aghte tek qun _ ! _ una _ yuug _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghmini _ seghlequughaqiinkut _ Jews-eni _ whangkuta _ , _ liilightuusagh put llu _ . _ wataqaaghaq _ seghleghataghaaguq _ tagite aqe yamiki _ Gentile-et _ temple- mun _ liilightuusagh t _ iinghutekagh it _ . _ sakusiiqe aqe a llu _ una _ agleghnagh lghii _ temple- a _ . _ "
( _ tawaten _ pi ke ait _ sumegh meggni _ Paul-mun _ gentile- a _ itghute ma ni luku _ temple- mun _ , _ qayughllak _ Jerusalem-emi _ esghagh kaqe kegket _ Trophimus-enkuk _ qerngaghmellukek _ . _ trophimus _ Gentile-ngulghii _ Ephesus-eghmii _ . _ )
Jerusalem-eghmiit _ ugumi yug ghllagkagh t _ , _ ketanqusnaq _ aglagh uute tke aat _ temple- mun _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagkagh t _ . _ temple- mi _ Paul _ akuqagh luku _ qamugh qu aat _ eslate mun _ . _ Tawaninginaq _ kitum _ amig ghllag t _ umeg ke ai _ .
tuqute naqutke ma luku _ Paul _ Rome-eghmiit _ pilluwaghtengita _ umiileg at _ ungipangekagh _ qaga _ iingunagh mi _ seghleliighqagh ii ghllagu ni luku _ .
Tawaninginaq _ Rome-eghmiit _ pilluwaghtengita _ umiileg at _ kelqekagh _ umiilwaaghnengllu _ pilluwaghtenengllu _ enkaam _ aqfaasnaq _ aglaghkagh t _ . _ yug lghute ghllag t _ esghagh luki _ pilluwaghtet _ qevute ta igh na nigh ke aat _ Paul _ .
taagken _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ tugu luku _ Paul _ asighqe stekagh a _ malghugnegh neng _ qiipraghute neng _ . _ Pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ aaptekagh i _ , _ " _ kinangaawa _ una _ yuug _ ? _ sa ma a _ ? _ "
ataasigh kun _ akilghuumeng _ kiimsiisaqmegteggu _ repall _ umiileg m _ liigikenghitkii _ sa meng _ pi ta i _ . _ enkaam _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ yug minun _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ Paul _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
Tutemqiiraaghnun _ kaat ute te luku _ pilluwaghtet _ kevegkagh at _ Paul _ , _ qayughllak _ yug lghute ghllag t _ suugllug ughte ghllag lghiit _ .
yug lghute ghllag t _ maliglleghaatkaat _ akilghuu te magh meng _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ "
Pilluwaghtet _ itghute naqe yatni _ Paul-em _ aaptekagh a _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ Greek-estun _ , _ " _ Aleghquqaghnayanghisikaan _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ awii _ Greek-estun _ akuzi kayugu ziin _ ?
Taanangunghisiin _ Egypt-eghmii _ qavnganghhaq _ qerngughte ikagh _ yug meng _ awite te na luku _ Rome-em _ kavemenga _ , _ kilgaa nun _ aghulaqe tke ai _ 4,000 _ yug t _ ategh leg t _ , _ Yugtaghtet _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ kiimsigh a qaa _ , _ " _ Jew-nguunga _ , _ Cilicia-ghmii _ , _ allgegh kau unga _ ne ghllag mi _ tarsus- mi _ . _ Aleghquqaghnayanghisingii _ yug t _ ? _ "
Pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ angeghqe ma ke yatni _ , _ Paul _ nekeve luni _ tutemqiiraaghteggun _ iigge ni _ nengug tke ai _ nepighesqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ qalleg nanigh yata _ aleghqugh qu ai _ Hebrew-stun _ .
Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ anglegute mni llu _ siivanllegh ni llu _ nagate aghte ngnga _ , _ liigike ste naqutke aghte naqe amsi _ sa aqe te mneng _ . _ "
Jews-et _ nagate yamegteggu _ akuzi lghii _ ellmegestun _ elngaatall _ qallegnanighwaaghutkat _ .
taagken _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew-nguunga _ allgeghkagh _ tarsus- mi _ Cilicia-melngughmi _ iwernga _ maani _ Jerusalem-emi _ angli kau unga _ . _ gamaliel _ apeghtughiste ke luku _ liite u aqe aqe anka _ liilightuusagh t _ sivunegh mta _ apeghtuusagh kekagh it _ , _ enkaam _ tuune kau unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qaatkengngwaaghnaluku _ katam _ tawaten _ elpesi stun _ .
elngaatall _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe anka _ tamaakut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh anun _ repall _ tuqute naqutke kaqe anka _ . _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ tugu ste aqe luki _ anusimingllagh ste qugh kaqe anka _ .
High _ priest-emllu _ agghistetlu _ ipa u ni naagh aat _ apegh llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ . _ whanga mkun _ lata t _ tuyugh ait _ Jews-elgutemnnun _ Damascus-melngughnun _ , _ lata tke ma kangatnga _ ivagh i yaghtugh u ni lunga _ ugpeqagh neng _ . _ naalke gkumki _ asighqelluki _ tagite naqngu yagh anka _ Jerusalem-emun _ aghyuugh na luki _ .
" _ taagken _ Jerusalem-emeng _ Damascus-mun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe unga llu _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ qilag meng _ nighug ghllag _ kuukgute qagh uq _ whanga mnun _ .
ullegh aghte lunga _ nuna mun _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ ' _ Saul _ , _ Saul _ , _ sangama _ amyuutke aqe zinga _ ? _ '
aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ kina u ziin _ , _ atanegh _ ? _ ' _ kiimsigh aanga _ , _ ' _ Jesus-nguunga _ Nazareth-eghmii _ amyuqetagh te kegken _ . _ '
tamaakut _ igleghalgute ma _ esghagh kaqe aat _ nighug _ iwernga _ aleghqughtema _ me a _ nagaqugh mangite aat _ .
enkaam _ aapte aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ sa langa _ ? _ ' _ Atanghem _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ nekeve luten _ aglagh a _ Damascus-mun _ . _ tawani _ kitum _ ungipaate lleqe aaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqekagh aneng _ elpenun _ . _ '
ayaa ma lghiinga _ nighug ghllag m _ angtalanganeng _ enkaam _ igleghalgute ma _ taslugh aatnga _ Damascus-mun _ .
" _ kaate yamta _ yug m _ Ananias-nguuniiqegkangita _ esghagh yaghtugh aanga _ . _ elngaatall _ qaatke te nga lghii _ liilightuusagh mnnun _ , _ Damascus-eghmiit _ Jews-et _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ akuzite kaqe kangat _ .
taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ anglegute mni _ Saul _ , _ esghasagunneqigten _ ! _ ' _ enkaam _ tawaninginaq _ esghaate yagute lunga _ esghagh aqa _ .
pi unga _ , _ ' _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ sivunegh mta _ manigugh qite te a _ , _ nakmike aaten _ elpenun _ liigike sqellug qu _ piyuke lleg ni _ , _ esghigh sqellug qu _ seghleghqe ma ite ngughk _ Qepghaghteni _ , _ nagate sqellug qu _ aleghqugh kangaten _ .
enkaam _ ungipaghtekete lleqe aaten _ tea- ma anun _ esghaate llegh gpeneng llu _ nagate llegh gpeneng llu _ .
sa meng _ utaqa i aqe ziin _ ? _ sa aqe ziin _ paaptaaye sten _ , _ seghleghqe llegh ten _ ughvugh ste ki _ tuqlugh i llegh gpegun _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ '
" _ taagken _ Jerusalem-emun _ tagi nqigte lunga _ , _ temple- mi _ yughagh ma lunga _ esghaghwaagh llegh kun
esghagh aqa _ atanegh _ . _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe ragkiigh i _ Jerusalem-emeng _ qayughllak _ maani _ tugukligh naanghite aat _ ungipagh n _ whanga mneng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ '
kiimsigh aqa _ , _ ' _ atanegh _ , _ Jerusalem-eghmiit _ liisimakngwaaghaat _ synagogue-nnun _ pi aqe lunga _ tugulagh kaqe anka _ ugpegh lghiit _ elpeneng _ , _ anaguleghtestaqankallu _ anusimingllagh ste aqe anka llu _ .
ungipagh ten _ stephen _ tuqute aqe yatgu _ legan _ itagnaqegkaqaqa _ , _ taakut _ tuqutistengita _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh it _ aflengake kaqe anka _ . _ '
Atanghem _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ aghulaqe i _ , _ kayagte naqngu amken _ agavek _ uyavagh nun _ Gentile-enun _ . _ ' _ "
tamaakut _ yug lghute t _ nagatekagh at _ Paul _ kenlanga _ Gentile-enun _ pi naqe ni llegh anun _ . _ taagken _ akilghuu ghllagkagh t _ , _ " _ tuqute ggu _ ! _ unguva u yaghqaa nghite uq _ ! _ "
Sakrituteghllagem _ angtalanganeng _ akilghuu te kete luku _ qaasligh at _ aatkagh teng _ nengug te luki _ aghula tke ait _ , _ suna meng llu _ qule mun _ milughmigkagh t _ .
Pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ esghapag luki _ pilluwaghteminun _ itghute sqekagh a _ Paul _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ . _ kayagte tke a llu _ kagsagmig sqellug qu _ apegh sqellug qu _ sangan _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ akilghuu tke ta a _ .
iwernga _ asighqesatni _ Paul-em _ aaptekagh a _ umiileg u aq _ , _ " _ Rome-em _ liilightuusagh itni _ itagnagh yaghqau a _ kagsagmig kufsigu _ Rome-eghmii _ , _ talwa _ nanqigte gpenaan _ sa meng _ anaggute ma ta a _ ? _ "
Paul-em _ tawaten _ pi yatni _ umiilwaaghem _ umiileg eng _ taku luku _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ sa naqe ziin _ ? _ una _ yuug _ Rome-eghmiinguuq _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg m _ taku luku _ Paul _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ ipa _ Rome-eghmiinguziin _ ? _ " _ kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ aa-a _ . _ "
Pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ llivike te ghllag lunga _ Rome-eghmiingughtekaagunga _ . _ " _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ whanga _ Rome-eghmiingulunga _ allgegh kau unga _ . _ "
taakut _ aapqughaaghtekaghqaqsaqangi _ tawaninginaq _ iqillaghaatkat _ ellnga neng _ . _ Pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ liigike yamigu _ Paul _ Rome-eghmiingutanga _ alingekagh _ qayughllak _ asighqe stekaqe kanga _ .
Pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ liigike sug qu a _ Jews-enun _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ Paul _ . _ enkaam _ unaami ani _ qiipraghute igh stekagh a _ . _ taagken _ chief _ priest-etlu _ agghistetlu _ qerngughte te ste luki _ aglagh tke a _ Paul _ ellngit nun _ .
Paul-em _ qiive luki _ agghistet _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew-lgutemni _ , _ aghnegh mun _ whavek _ kenlanga _ seghleghyug ta ite unga _ kiyaghte lleg mni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ "
aga _ High _ Priest-em _ Ananias-em _ nekevgha lghii nun _ Paul-em _ tungangani _ qelegh tke a _ Paul _ qasaghte sqellug qu _ qaanghakun _ .
taagken _ Paul-em _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe aaten _ , _ uyuq _ piniiyugnegh _ ! _ liilightuusagh tgun _ nanqigsaghqaqaghpenga _ iwernga _ elpek _ naafqe aten _ liilightuusagh t _ qasaghte ste llegh gpegun _ . _ "
Paul-em _ saaghwanilnguut _ nekevgha lghiit _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ seghletun _ aleghqugh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ high _ priest- nga _ . _ "
Paul-em _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew-lgutemni _ , _ liisimake yagh kumkun _ high _ priest- nge ta a _ tawaten _ pi nayagh nghite aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake yagh aqa _ akuzite i _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ pi llegh _ , _ ' _ igleghte te i lghiit _ yug gpesineng _ seghletun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe nghite asi _ . _ ' _ "
Paul-em _ liigike luki _ ila i _ Sadducees-ngutangi _ , _ ila i _ pharisees- nge ta i _ iglagtu luni _ pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Jew-lgutemni _ , _ pharisee- ngugh u nga _ , _ sivunghenkallu _ pharisees- ngugh t _ . _ whaa _ nanqigte na qagh zinga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kenka _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghsaghqagh u ta i _ . _ "
Paul _ tawaten _ pi yan _ Pharisees-etlu _ Sadducees-etlu _ aaghtiiraagh tke aat _ aga _ malghughqengnginaamaghmeng _ pikagh t _ .
( _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ qayughllak _ Pharisees-et _ ugpeqe u kangit _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh yaghqaa ni luki _ , _ yaqulegtu ni luku _ , _ taghneghaghtu ni luku llu _ , _ naqam _ Sadducees-et _ ugpeqe igate kangit _ tamaakut _ ) _ .
qenwat _ aaghtiiraagh te lghiit _ iglagtughtekat _ . _ ila ita _ Pharisees-et _ apeghtugh i kayug t _ liilightuusagh neng _ mesag ii aghagh tke aat _ Paul _ whaten _ , _ " _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ naalkefikneghmeng _ aghtughaghput _ , _ ipa _ entaqun _ taghneghagh m _ nalighmeng _ yaquleg m _ aleghqugh ma a _ . _ "
wanlegi _ aaghtiiraagh te ghllag yata _ repall _ Paul _ wayagh te luku _ lliigh yatgu _ , _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ yakugh yagute luku _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ pilluwaghteminun _ aqfa ste luku _ aw ite u te sqekagh a _ agghisteneng _ . _ enkaam _ aglagh te sqekagh a _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ Atanghem _ aliigh vike luku _ Paul _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ ilutu luten _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ Jerusalem-emi _ ungipagh ke llegh gpetun _ , _ Rome-emillu _ ungipaqelleqaghpenga _ . _ "
unaami ani _ 40-neng _ uglagh lghiit _ Jews-et _ agghite luteng _ tuqute naqekagh at _ Paul _ . _ Ellmeggneng _ akeqe tke aat _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ .
enkaam _ chief _ priest-enunllu _ siivanllegh nun llu _ aglagh luteng _ pi ke ait _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ akeqe i ukut _ negh naanghite ni luta _ kenlanga _ tuqute lleg mnnun _ Paul _ .
elpek si llu _ agghistetlu _ aapte ggu _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ taginneqigtesqelluku _ Paul _ aapqughaaghwaaghnaqniluku _ . _ enkaam _ tume mi _ taakwani _ whangkuta _ tuqulleqaghput _ . _ "
iwernga _ Paul-em _ uyghu an _ nagaqugh luki _ agghi llegh it _ ungipaate yaghtuqagh a _ Paul _ pilluwaghtet _ mangteghagh itnun _ .
ungipaate yatni _ Paul-em _ tuqlugh luku _ umiileg u aq _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ Uum _ nukalpigaam _ ungipaasuwaqaa _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ sa meng _ , _ aglagh te aghte gu _ . _ "
Umiilwaaghem _ tugu luku _ , _ aglagh te luku _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg at _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ anusimingllaghagh m _ Paul-em _ tagite sqe a _ elpenun _ una _ nukalpigagh _ , _ samenguq _ ungipaasuwaaten _ . _ "
umiileg m _ tasluqluku _ iqitute luku _ ellnginaaghsamek _ aaptekagh a _ , _ " _ sa meng _ ungipaate yug zinga _ ? _ "
kiimsigh iqe a _ , _ " _ Jews-et _ agghi te ma ut _ aapte na luteng _ Paul _ aglagh te aghte sqellug qu _ agghi vig mun _ unaami _ , _ aapqughwaghataghaghnaqniluku _ .
ugpeqe gpenaki _ , _ qayughllak _ 40-neng _ uglagh ut _ yug t _ iigh luteng _ tume mi _ utaqa i naqe ni lghiit _ tuqute na luku _ . _ akeqe i ma ut _ negh naanghite ni luteng llu _ , _ megh naanghite ni luteng llu _ kenlanga _ tuqute llegh meggnun _ Paul _ . _ apeghiigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ naten _ pi lleghqagh gpeneng _ . _ "
umiileg m _ ineghtengngwaaqaa _ nukalpigagh _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ ungipaate gpenaan _ ungipaate yaghtugh ma ni lunga _ . _ " _ taagken _ aane stekagh a _ .
taagken _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg ita _ tagsiqligh lukek _ umiileg u aaghek _ pi kakek _ , _ " _ ungipaate yaghtugh teki _ 200 _ pilluwaghtet _ , _ 70 _ kuunitistet _ , _ 200 _ panastet _ igleghsaqleggiinaaghllinnguq _ Caesarea-mun _ , _ ighivgaqun _ 9-eklaagmi _ .
Paul-llu _ kuuni meng _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ igleghusighqameng _ , _ wataghllak _ pinitun _ kaat ute na ke si _ Governor-mun _ Felix-mun _ . _ "
taagken _ governor-mun _ lata tkekagh a _ Paul _ :
ukut _ lata t _ Claudius _ Lysias-meng _ pi u ut _ angegh lleg mnun _ Governor-mun _ Felix-mun _ , _ quyake amken _ .
Jews-et _ tugu kaqe aat _ Paul _ , _ tuqute naqe aqe yaghpete aat llu _ iwernga _ liigike luku _ Rome-eghmiingutanga _ pilluwaghtekullghiini _ aqfaaghput _ aqnighte na yu katgu _ .
liigike yug luku _ Jews-enun _ sa meng _ apallugh ke ta a _ agghistengitnun _ aglagh te aqa _ .
iwernga _ liigike yaqegka _ sa meng _ apallugh ite uq _ tuqute yaghqaa luni _ , _ talwa _ anusimingllagh yaghqaa luni _ . _ taawanginaq _ Jews-et _ qaatkuuneghinniluku _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ pi aqe aat _ .
ungipaate yatnga _ Jews-ennguq _ tuqute naqe aqe aat _ Paul _ , _ tawaninginaq _ elpenun _ aglagh te ste aqa _ . _ taakut llu _ avutkistengi _ kayagte anka _ elpenun _ apegh yaghtigh sqellug qu _ apallugh at _ .
enkaam _ unugmi _ tawani _ pilluwaghtet _ kayagte llegh megestun _ aghulaqe tke aat _ Paul _ kenlanga _ antipatris- mun _ .
