Ikfiqliightelleghllagita _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg nge ste ghllag kaqe ait _ . _ qaywa _ akluma ghllag yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ paninang _ quya ma ghllag kau ut _ repall _ ighleg gpenateng _ tuune i kau ut _ kayusigh na luki _ ila i _ ugpeqagh t _ .
ungipaate amsi _ tuune i kau ut _ tuunyaghqaghtutalmegestun _ , _ talwa _ tuuniighataghaqaagut _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ ellngit _ tuune i yu lghiit _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ pi sqe mangite ai _ .
talwa _ aapute uute ghllag kau ut _ tuune i lgusigh i na luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
tuune i llegh at _ uglagh kau uq _ sighimake lleg mnneng _ . _ sivuke luteng _ ellmeggneng _ pegte ut _ atanegh mun _ , _ taagken _ whangkunnun _ piyuke llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
titus _ elpesi nite aqngami _ piinligh i kau uq _ qerngughte i llegh gpesineng _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ kayemaghput _ kayusiisaghtiisqellusi _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ nanglleg ke sagh i _ tunusagh _ .
sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ pinitun _ pi aqe usi _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ liisima llegh gpesigun _ , _ kayusigh i yu kestagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ piniqe i llegh gpesigun llu _ whangkunnun _ . _ mate- te mi llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe tek _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ .
qelegh u nghite amsi _ tuunisqellusi _ , _ iwernga _ ungipaate u amsi _ naten _ ila it _ tuune i ma ta i _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesi _ ipapighqelleqaa _ piniqe i llegh i _ ipa u ta a _ .
liisimakagh i _ piniqe i nga llegh ghllag a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ aklungi ghllag mini _ tawalliima _ ellmi neng _ katam _ akluma aghtekau uq _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aklungi igh i sqe qaghte lusi _ akluma llegh mikun _ .
awatangani _ elpek si _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh kau usi _ mani meng _ , _ tuune i kau usi llu _ qayughllak _ tuune i yu lghiisi _ . _ sume mni _ whatete luku _ pi yagh kufsigu _ , _ itagnagh nayagh usi _ ,
nagnegh te yagh kufsigu _ piinlighkagh i _ ! _ sagiqe nga kau usi _ qerngughte i yuwhaagh aqngafsi _ mani meng _ . _ enkaam _ sagiqe nqigte lusi _ apeghiigh teggu _ qerngughtekagh i _ . _ tuune tek _ tuune i lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
tuune i yu pigtekufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ tunute yasi _ . _ piyuke aqe a _ yuug _ tuune i sqellug qu _ tuune yaghqagh lgu kan _ , _ iwernga _ avangite kan _ tuune i nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
nuuqragti ste sug u nghite amsi _ ila si _ nuuqragtinghisimaluki _ .
maaten _ llilegh ghllag lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ kayusigh yaghqaqe asi _ tamaakut _ aklu lghiit _ . _ iwernga _ aklu kufsi _ taawa _ ellngit a _ kayusigh lleqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ kayu siightu lleqe usi _ enkaam _ atunem _ pi lleqe usi _ .
katam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ igaqellghistun _ , _ " _ yuug _ saghna ghllagkagh _ suyvaghte mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ yuug _ saghnapag ma ite ngughk _ aklu naanghite uq _ . _ "
iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ titus _ kayusigh i yug ste ghllag kanga _ elpesi neng _ katam _ whangkutestun _ .
titus _ angeghqe ma kau uq _ elpesi nun _ pisqesamteggu _ . _ elpesi nun _ piyug pigtekau uq _ , _ taana _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh ke a _ .
Ugpeqaalgutfut _ titus- mun _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ . _ Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig ni _ usuqe pigte aqe aat _ ungipagh ke i llegh aneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
Taananginaagpenaan _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ nakmike kaqe aat _ maligte te sqellug qu _ whangkutgun _ , _ tuune i yaghtugh kumta _ nanglleg ke te yameng _ tunute yameng _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi u ukut _ usuqe lleg nge sqellug qu _ atanegh _ , _ yug nun llu _ liite sqellug qu _ kayusigh i yu llegh ut _ .
piraamsi u ukut _ kitumun _ alngunak _ seghlequufqaamta _ pisqelluta _ naten _ aflengakaqutfut _ taana _ tunute yagh ghllag _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ atuqsugaqaghput _ kiyaghnegh mi _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ yug ni llu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ .
Titus-enkugnunllu _ maligte te ste naqagh ut _ ila a _ ugpeqaalgutfut _ . _ awen _ esghagh na luku _ nateghtu langa _ pi iqagh ut _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ iiwleng _ kayusigh i yu kestagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wanlegi _ maaten _ kayusighiyugllagughtuq _ qayughllak _ neghyuke ghllag kangisi _ .
titus _ qepghagh lgutke aqa _ , _ qepghagh lgusigh aqe aanga _ kayusiite na lusi _ . _ taake uk llu _ ugpeqagh u lgute tek _ ugpeqagh t _ yughaghvignilnguut _ kayagtekaqe agket _ . _ Quulvaghllagluku _ Christ-a _ ayuqe ak _ .
enkaam _ Corinth-eghmiini _ , _ esghaghte steggu _ piniqe i llegh i _ taakugnun _ yug gnun _ . _ taagken _ piniqe i llegh gpesi _ ipapighqesleqiit _ ugpeqagh t _ yughaghvignilnguut _ sangan _ qanatkellemnneng _ elpek si _ .
lata tke nghite yagh ghngaamkun _ ayuqe aqa _ tunusagh _ tuyugh yaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ Jerusalem-em _ .
liisimake amsi _ kayusigh i yug lusi _ ayuqe usi _ enkaam _ qanatkaqamsi _ ugpeqagh itnun _ Macedonia-m _ . _ whaten _ pi kau unga _ , _ " _ awatangani _ ima _ ugpeqaalgutet _ Achaia-melnguut _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tuune i na luteng _ . _ " _ sagiqe llegh gpesi _ allute luki _ ugpeqagh t _ maanlenguut _ tuune i yug stekaqe ait llu _ .
iwernga _ kayagte naqe anka _ ila i _ ugpeqaalguteput _ elpesi nun _ . _ apallugh ke aqa _ qanatkilqa _ elpesi neng _ temngingu fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ yataaghqe sqe sug amsi _ katam _ whanga _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ elpek si _ ,
luuraq _ Macedonia-ghmiit _ ila ita _ maligte na yu kangatnga _ Corinth-mun _ . _ esghagh kunisi _ yataaghqe llghite lusi _ tunute yaghqagh gpesineng _ , _ taawa _ whangkuta _ kayngete te yaag kete lleqe ainkut _ , _ elpek si llu _ kayngu yug lleqe usi _ .
enkaam _ sumeghtaghagh unga _ sivu mni _ kayagte kestagh na luki _ ila i _ ugpeqaalguteput _ . _ tawaten _ kayusiite lleqe aisi _ yataaghqe sqellug qu _ akequsagh kekagh i _ tunusagh _ . _ taagken _ kaate kuma _ tunusagh i _ apeghiigh nga lleqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ yug t _ liisimake lleqe aat _ tuune i yu llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ .
neqamike luku _ una _ , _ yuug _ palaghhaghmeng _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ palaghhagh an _ saghna lleqe uq _ . _ yuug _ uglagh luku _ piitute meng _ piitesighagh kuni _ , _ uglagh luku _ saghna lleqe uq _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sumeghtaghagh tke teggu _ tuune i lleghqaghtu ta leg si _ . _ ighleg magh gpesi _ tuune i gpenasi _ nalighmeng _ tuune i yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ iwernga _ quyake sigh ke luku _ tuune i aqe tek _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe ai _ tawatelnguut _ tuunistet _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuunyaqlegwiisi _ aklukegkaghpesineng _ qaayghute luku _ . _ enkaam _ iiwleng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ pi lgu aqe lleqe usi _ , _ siipngaan llu _ kayusiitesqelluki _ ila si _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ Ighlellngunani _ tuune i aqe uq _ aklumalghii nun _ ; _ pinitun _ pi nga llegh a _ nagnegh yaghqaa uq _ quunpeng _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuune i kayug _ piitute meng _ piitesighaghtemun _ , _ neqe meng llu _ neghyaghqagh meng _ . _ tuune lleqe a _ qamagte luku _ piitute _ aklukegkaghsi _ , _ nagu ste lleqe ai llu _ . _ Enkaangam _ unatagh ghllag lleqe usi _ qayughllak _ ighlegilnguusi _ .
sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ aklungi igh i ste lleqe aisi _ , _ naranʼngunaan _ tuunisqellusi _ sa llegh mi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ enkaam _ tuune i llegh gpesigun _ whangkutgun _ uglagh lghii m _ iyamsiqa yug vike lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ Jerusalem-emelnguut _ allgegh lleqe ait _ aklukegkateng _ tunusagh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ iyamsiqa yug llegh meng _ tevugha lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tuune yaghqagh gpesigun _ ipapighqellequsi _ ugpeqe i nga ni lusi llu _ qaatke te nga ni lusi llu _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ Christ-am _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ usuqe lleqe aat llu _ ighlellngunasi _ tuune i llegh gpesineng _ Jerusalem-eghmiinunllu _ ila itnun llu _ .
Enkaangam _ piniqe pigte lusi _ yughagh tke lleqe aisi _ apallugh ke luku _ piniqe llegh ghrug ghllag _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunʼngakanga _ elpesi nun _ .
yeqay _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ tunusagh anun _ akuzite t _ apeghpagningilkangat _ .
ila ita _ yug gpesi _ pi aqe aatnga _ tetugtagh ni lunga _ elpesinite negh mni _ , _ iwernga _ tetug igate na iqe aatnga _ elpesinite nghite negh mni _ . _ whanga _ Paul _ , _ whanga mneng _ katam _ , _ Christ-am _ qusevegngallghakunllu _ piniqe llegh akun llu _ ,
tetug ste nghite aghte nakefsinga _ laalighfike nqigtekumsi _ . _ iwernga _ tetug yaghqaqe nghite kumki _ tamaakut _ yug t _ pi lghiit _ kiyaghtengngunilunga _ nuna m _ yugistun _ , _ elngaatall _ tetug naanghite anka _ .
nuna mete u ghngaamta _ pilluwiigatukut _ nuna m _ yug an _ pilluwallghistun _ .
guutute t _ pilluwaasiput _ nuna m _ yug an _ guutute ke nghite ai _ . _ guutute put _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng _ pi lgu ut _ . _ Naafqesaqlegwiit _ ayepsugilnguut _ mingllute t _ anguyag m _ nekefte qugh qu ai _ yug t _ uvitangitgun _ .
Taakutgun _ guutute tgun _ naafqe aqe aput _ anguyag m _ iqlengagh u i _ , _ sumeghnegh it llu _ aangaayugneghet _ . _ apeghtugh i llghite a _ amig igh aqe ait _ yug t _ liite lleghqagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ katam _ pilluwaghtet _ tugutellghistun _ anusimingllagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ whangkuta llu _ tugwaaqaput _ qamagte luki _ sumeghnegh t _ qaatkutesqelluki _ Christ-amun _ .
Christ-amun _ qaatkutngngwaaqufsi _ , _ taawa _ aghyuugh i yaghqaaghte lleqe ukut _ qaatke te nghite ngugh nun _ .
nanqigte i aqe usi _ esghallghiinaghpesigun _ . _ Christ-amun _ pike pestaagh ni kufsi _ , _ neqamike luku _ whangkuta llu _ Christ-am _ pi ke ainkut _ , _ elpesi stun _ .
kayngu ke igate aqa _ qanatkivleghapalqa _ Atanghem _ igleghte te i ste ngughte stegkanganga _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ whangkunnun _ kayeme sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nakaan _ naafqennaluku _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ alingesnaqutkengngunilusi _ lata mkun _ .
ila ita _ pi aqe ait _ Paul-em _ lata i _ seghlegh ghllag u ni luki _ aghsaaghmikaghnganiluki _ , _ naqam _ whangkunninneghmini _ , _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe uq _ , _ akuzi yiite aqe uq llu _ !
tamaakut _ yug t _ tawaten _ pikagh t _ liigike litgu _ sa meng _ pi llegh ut _ lata tgun _ , _ tamaakunguut _ ataasigh t _ pi yaghqagh put _ ellngit nun _ pi kumta _ .
inglute naqute kete naanghite ukut _ tamaakunun _ aangaayugte lghii nun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh aqe ut _ aange ni luteng _ qayughllak _ ungipagh utu te aqe lghiit _ aange ni luteng _ . _ Nalluughhaghmeng _ !
Qukaayugutkennaanghitaghput _ alngunak _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte te ma ite kanga _ whangkunnun _ . _ iwernga _ qukaayugutkengnginaghlleqaghput _ qepghaqagh _ kayagte tke a _ whangkunnun _ . _ elpek si llu _ ilate nga usi _ qepghaqagh mnnun _ .
Sivulighpigaagukut _ ungipagh ke i yaghtuqagh ni _ elpesi nun _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ Christ-am _ . _ enkaam _ alpagigataghput _ qepghaqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte tke a _ whangkunnun _ .
Qukaayugutkelleqaghput _ taananginaq _ qepghaqagh _ pikagh ut _ , _ nakaan _ ila ita _ qepghaqagh at _ . _ Ugpelleghtughtekufsi _ sighima ukut _ kayusighataghiisqelluta _ qepghaqagh mnneng _ .
enkaam _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lleqe ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ila itnun _ nuna t _ . _ Qukaayugutkesugunghitaghput _ qepghaqagh _ ila ita _ apeghiighkagh at _ .
iwernga _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ qukaayugsukumi _ , _ qukaayug te kete ligu _ Atanghhiinaq _ . _ "
Atanghem _ tugukligh igate ai _ pinighnagh igh lghiit _ . _ itupill _ Atanghem _ tugukligh aqe ai _ tamaakut _ pinigh ni luki _ pikani _ .
sighimake amsi _ nekeggmetutesqellunga _ akuzi kuma _ temngitwha lghii stun _ natengiighhaq _ . _ Nekeggmetuteqaghtengnga _ .
qungyagh aqe unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ qungyaqe llegh atun _ elpek si _ , _ qayughllak _ tuute ma amsi _ Christ-amun _ . _ Pelungilngughestun _ ugiigh naqe lghii stun _ aangʼghusimaamsi _ ellnga nun _ , _ ugi ke sqellug qu _ ellnginaa _ .
iwernga _ alingutke aqe amsi _ anguyag m _ puughhe na yu kangisi _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ nemeghyagh m _ peghqiniqe te kete luku _ puughte llegh atun _ Eve _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ piniqnanighwaaghnayukafsigu _ Christ-a _ .
ungipagh kaqe yamteki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ elpesi nun _ , _ ugpeqegkaqaghsi _ Jesus _ , _ tugukligh agsi llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ iwernga _ nagate yu kestagh luki _ ayuqe kaqe asi _ ungipagh ke i yaghtugh lghiit _ ila aneng _ Jesus-em _ . _ tugukligh i yug usi llu _ ila aneng _ taghneghagh m _ , _ ugpeqe yukagh kasi llu _ ila i _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
tamaakut _ ungipaqistet _ apostle-nguniluteng _ pi aqe ut _ . _ sumegh meggni _ aangwaagh u na iqe ut _ apostle-et _ . _ iwernga _ liisimake anka _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
akuzi llgite ghngaaghma _ , _ liisima ghllag unga _ . _ uglagh ghngaan _ liigike ste aqe amsi _ liisima lleg mneng _ .
elpesi nun _ akileghtughsagh qu mangite unga _ ungipagh kaqe yamki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ qusevegte lunga _ quulvaghnalusi _ . _ Seghleghqesingaa-a _ tawaten _ pi lunga _ ?
ugpeqagh t _ ilangitnilnguut _ yughaghvig t _ akileghtugh kaqe aatnga _ elpesi nite lunga _ . _ Wayaqallghuughanka _ mani itneng _ kayusiite na lusi _ .
elpesi nite aqngama _ ughleghiightellghitamsi _ kayusiitesqellunga _ aklukegkamneng _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutet _ Macedonia-meng _ tagite kaqe aatnga _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aklukegkamneng _ . _ enkaam _ aapte vike llghite amsi _ aklukegkamneng _ , _ aapte vike naanghite amsi _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ Achaia-mi _ aghula i aghte naanghite a _ qukaayugtelqa _ taagken _ . _ tawaten _ pi unga _ Christ-am _ ipapighqellghakun _ whanga mnite ngugh qun _ .
kayute ngllagh nghite u te mneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ sumeghpesinii-i _ piniqe nghite ni lusi _ pi tsi _ whanga mnun _ ? _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ piniqe i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ .
taawa _ ighsa ke ii vike manginagh naqe amsi _ mani gpesineng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ qukaayuggnaniisqelluki _ apostle-esighwaaghet _ whangkutestun _ qepghagh ni lghiit _ akileghtuusagh ngunateng _ .
tamaakut _ yug t _ apostle-esighwaaghuut _ puughte i lghiit _ yug neng _ iqlengiqe llegh megteggun _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ Christ-amun _ apostle-epiikniluteng _ .
Taamengwhaqun _ . _ talwa _ tughneghagh _ allangughte aqe uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aliigh yaghqaa luni _ kuukgute nga lghii tun _ yaquleg tun _ .
enkaam _ saghiigha nagh ite ut _ tughneghagh m _ qepghaghtengi _ tawaten _ pi kumeng _ . _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke ste aqe ut _ elqughutngagh lghii u ni luteng _ qepghaghtengi _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ iwernga _ kenle mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ elqughutngagh lghii meng _ aghyuugh llegh meng _ anaggute llegh itnun _ .
alla _ pi amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tke nghite linga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ sumeghtaghaatkengngukufsinga _ , _ tugukligh qaghte ngnga _ temngitwha u lunga _ . _ taagken _ whanga llu _ qukaayugtevleghaghllequnga _ .
qukaayug tke llegh ka _ whanga mneng _ atanegh meng _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ itupill _ akuzi u unga _ temngi _ pi lghii stun _ .
uglagh lghiit _ ugpeqaanghilngughestun _ qukaayugtaqut _ qepghaqagh meggneng _ , _ enkaam _ whanga llu _ tawaten _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ .
sumegh gpesini _ peghqinegh pigte ni lusi _ pi aqe usi _ . _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ nagate aqe asi _ temngitwha lghiit _ .
tugukligh aqe asi _ qelegh llegh it _ nikimqun _ elpek si _ qepghaghtelaaghet _ ellngit nun _ . _ kagu kaqe ste aqe usi _ , _ tegleg vike ste aqe usi _ , _ ukaligh ke ste aqe usi llu _ , _ talwa _ gginagh gpesigun _ qasaghte ste aqe lusi _ .
kayngu yug unga _ kayaate pigte ukut _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ tamaakustun _ apostle-esighwaaghestun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qukaayugsaghqagh u kan _ , _ whanga llu _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh _ temngitwha u uq _ .
taakut _ apostle-esighwaaghet _ , _ Hebrew-ngwaat _ ? _ whanga llu _ Hebrew-nguunga _ . _ Israel-eghmiingwaat _ ? _ whanga llu _ Israel-eghmiinguunga _ . _ Abraham-em _ kingunqakii _ ? _ whanga llu _ kingunegh ke aanga _ .
Christ-am _ qepghaghtekakii _ ? _ iwernga _ whanga _ pinigh aghagh unga _ qepghagh a _ ellngit neng _ . _ taawa _ akuzi unga _ nallekaghnilngughestun _ . _ qepghagh aghagh kau unga _ ellngit neng _ , _ anusiminglaghvigmetaaghaqaagungallu _ ellngit neng _ . _ kagsagmig lleg nge kau unga _ kestekau nghite ngugh meng _ , _ uglagh ghngaan _ tuqu vzigh aatagh kau unga _ .
Tallimagyagneng _ Jews-et _ igleghutistengita _ kagsagmig ste aatagh aatnga _ . _ ( _ 39-ngwaaqut _ ataasigh t _ kagsagmig llegh t _ . _ )
Rome-eghmiit _ umiilwaaghita _ pi nga yu neng _ anaguleghtestekaqaatnga _ . _ ataasigh meng _ ila ita _ yug t _ milugh agaatagh aatnga _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ angyagh igh utu te aqe aanga _ enkaam _ ataasigh meng _ unug llegh ke sigh _ , _ aghnelqusiq _ ughhe te kaqe aanga _ kellii ni _ .
uglagh pigte lghii mi _ iglegha lleg mni _ elngaatall _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ kiiw ni _ , _ wayaghniighteneng _ , _ talwa _ yug lgute mneng llu _ , _ Gentile-enengllu _ . _ yakugh nagh igh unga llu _ ne ghllag ni _ , _ kilgaa ni _ , _ kellii ni llu _ . _ talwa _ yakugh nagh igh unga _ ugpeqaalgutesighwaaghneng _ .
ughleghiigh ghllag kau unga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh aqe lunga _ . _ ilangani _ qavagh gpenanga _ , _ iyatagh nga aqe lunga _ , _ meqsug nga aqe lunga _ . _ awen _ neqe ite aqe lunga _ , _ azigutigh te aqe lunga _ , _ ghhuute aqe lunga llu _ aatkagh ii te m _ .
tamaakut _ saaghw itgun _ , _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ sumeghyali tke kaqe anka _ ugpeqaalgutet _ tamaghhitni _ yughagvigni _ .
Ugpeqaalgutem _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ kayaate nghaani _ , _ whanga llu _ kayaate aqe unga _ . _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ kitum _ seghleghqe ste nghagu _ , _ sakrite aqe unga _ .
Qukaayuggnaqngukuma _ , _ qukaayug lleqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe naanghite unga _ . _ ellnga _ ata ke a _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ , _ usuqe yaghqagh _ quunperugllag _ .
Damascus-mellunga _ , _ governor-em _ tugu ste sug kaqe aanga _ . _ ( _ umiileg m _ Aretas-em _ governor-ngughtestekaqaa _ . _ ) _ enkaam _ tugusqellunga _ pilluwaghteni _ kelengake i stekaqe ai _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itni _ .
iwernga _ ilakumtaagh ma _ ukigtekaqaatnga _ pasketegnekun _ mingllute m _ qergese gkenkun _ enkaam _ anag kau unga _ governor-meng _ .
qukaayugsaghqagh u unga _ , _ aneghnegh ghqu sigh u nghite ghngaan _ . _ paninang _ ungipaate naqe amsi _ esghaghwaagh lleg mneng _ , _ Atanghemllu _ aliigh qughkagh aneng _ whanga mnun _ .
liisimake aqa _ yuug _ Christ-amelnguq _ . _ qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ ayumiqullegh ni _ agani _ naghughtekagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ pingayaanun _ qilag m _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ yugusiminitutanga _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ aanʼngakaatanga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
liisimake aqa _ taana _ yuug _ kiyaghnegh m _ mayugh te qaghtekaqe a _ Paradise-mun _ . _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ yuug _ yugusiminitutanga _ nalighmeng _ yugusigh mineng _ aanʼngakaatanga _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake a _ .
tawani _ nagate kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ apegh yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ . _ tamaakut _ iinghute kau ut _ yug mun _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luteng _ .
qukaayug te kete naqe aqa _ taana _ yuug _ , _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete naqe nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ iwerngaqun _ kayaaghlliqe sigh kekagh ghhagh inagh mneng _ .
qukaayug tke sug kuma _ whanga mneng _ , _ temngingu naanghite unga _ qayughllak _ apegh lleqe aqa _ ipapilleq _ . _ iwernga _ qukaayug te kete na nghite unga _ whanga mneng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug nun _ sumeghtaghagh tke sug unga _ elqughte lunga _ esghapag llegh itgun llu _ nagate llegh itgun llu _ whanga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe ghngaaki _ whanga mnun _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ sa u aat _ qilag mi _ , _ qukaayug ste sug nghite aanga _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ qusevegtesqellunga _ sikughllug ngestagh u nga _ yugusigh mkun _ . _ taana _ sikughllug _ ungipaghte u uq _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ Taam _ ikfiqe ste aanga _ qusevegngasqellunga _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ketwell _ atanegh mun _ yughagh aqe unga _ iqite sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ kayusillegh ka _ naama uq _ elpenun _ suflughte sqellug qu _ taana _ ikfiqe llegh _ qayughllak _ aghtughyaghqaanghilqa _ iknaqelleghpigaagwaquq _ kayaaghlliqe negh gpeni _ . _ " _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke luku _ qukaayug taqu nga _ kayaaghlliqe sigh mneng _ whangamnitesqelluku _ Christ-am _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ .
taana _ apallugh ke luku _ quya aqe unga _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ , _ seghlequullengnemni _ , _ piyaqli i negh mni _ , _ amyuutke lleg nge negh mni _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng llu _ seghleliigh negh mni _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ qayughllak _ kayaaghlliqe nga negh mni _ taawa _ iknaqe aqe unga _ .
akuzi u unga _ temngitwhastun _ , _ iwernga _ elpek si _ tawaten _ pistaghpesinga _ . _ elpek si _ pinitun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe yaghagh zinga _ ila gpesinun _ . _ qaywa _ sasii nghite ghngaaghma _ , _ tamaakut _ " _ aw nge aaghet _ apostle-et _ " _ aangwaagh u nghite ut _ whanga mneng _ .
elpesi nite lunga _ nekeglluwaan _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghet _ pi kaqe anka _ . _ tamaakut _ ipapighqaatnga _ apostle-epiigutka _ .
sa kaqe zingi _ ugpeqagh t _ ilangitnilnguut _ yughaghvig t _ elpesi nun _ pi ma ite ke mneng _ ? _ ataasigh ghhagh inagh _ alla u uq _ , _ akilguqe mangite amsi _ . _ seghevute aghte ngnga _ anagte ma kumsi _ !
laalighfike naqe aqe amsi _ pingayut ii te kun _ , _ iwernga _ ughleghiigh tke ste sug nghite unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ elpek si _ sumeghmike aqe amsi _ , _ nakaan _ saghya si _ . _ taghnughhagh ke lghii stun _ ayuqe amsi _ . _ taghnughhagh t _ aflengake i yaghqaa nghite ut _ angayuqagh meggneng _ , _ iwernga _ angayuqagh t _ aflengake yaghqaqe ait _ taghnughhagh teng _ .
tuune yaghqaaghte amsi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ whanga _ pi mneng _ , _ talwa _ whanga mneng _ tuune lleqe unga _ elpesi nun _ . _ Piniqataghanemsi _ , _ llangaqa _ elpek si _ piniqepagigataghpesinga _ .
elpek si llu _ whanga llu _ liisimakagh ut _ ughleghiightesimangitamsi _ . _ iwernga _ ila gpesi _ anaggute ma ni aatnga _ . _ pi aqe ut _ puughneqguunnilusi _ iqlengiqe lleg mkun _ .
naten _ tawaten _ pistemsi _ ? _ sakenge kau zinga _ elpesi neng _ kayagte aqe yamki _ yug t _ elpesi nun _ ?
kayagtekaqe aqa _ titus _ elpesi nun _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ ugpeqaalgutfutlu _ maligte te sqe aqa _ . _ Titus-em _ puughtekagh qite yu ai _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ Titus-lu _ whangkutung _ qepghaqagh ung _ ataasigh u uq _ , _ ataasigh kun _ taghneghagh kun _ .
Sumeghpesinii-i _ elpesi nun _ ipapighqennaqutkestegneguu _ anaggute llghite ni lutung _ ? _ nakaa _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagaqugh ma nghaani _ , _ akuzi aqe ukung _ Christ-am _ akuzi sqe llegh atun _ . _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ sangwa _ qamagte luku _ pi iqagh ung _ iknaqughsaghnaluku _ ugpegh llegh i _ .
sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ kaate kuma _ esghagh kumsi _ allake nayuke amsi _ whanga _ sighimake lleg mneng _ . _ elpek si llu _ whanga _ esghagh kufsinga _ allaknayukafsinga _ sighimake llegh gpesineng _ . _ sumeghyali te kaqe amsi _ aghivatngunayukafsi _ , _ aqinakutngunayukafsi _ , _ sakraatutngunayukafsi _ , _ ellnginaayugutngunayukafsi _ , _ seghlequughutngunayukafsi _ , _ yiillgitngunayukafsi _ , _ qukaayugutngunayukafsi _ , _ suuglliqutngunayukafsi _ .
sumeghyali aqe unga _ alla _ taku kumsi _ kiyaghnegh ma _ kayngusaaknayukanganga _ sivu gpesini _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ . _ enkaam _ qivghu ghllag lleqe unga _ qayughllak _ uglagh lghii ni _ elpek si _ seghleghqe manginagh u usi _ avuteghqe gpenasi _ . _ paninang _ sumeghtaghagh aqe usi _ sex-meng _ pelungite nghite ngugh meng _ , _ sex-a _ seghletun _ atugh qaghkagh i _ , _ sex-ellghetlu _ anagnga lghiit _ nuqetusigatasi _ .
una _ pingayut ii tke a _ laalighte naqe llegh ma _ elpesi nun _ . _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ anaggute ma ni katgu _ , _ maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ liisimakistet _ ipapighqesaghqaqaat _ anaggute llegh a _ . _ "
tuungligh ghhagh ani _ laalighfike aqe yamsi _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke amsi _ tamaakut _ sivugh nghaani _ seghleghqe lghiit _ . _ ila it llu _ kelenga sagh uqagh ke anka _ , _ tagi nqigtekuma _ aghyuughmiglleqniluki _ seghleghqe manginagh kata _ . _ tamaa uute nghite ghngaaghma _ kelengasaaghnaqanka _ .
whanga mnun _ ipapighqestesukesi _ Christ-a _ akuzi aqe ta a _ whanga mkun _ . _ Christ-a _ kayaate nghite uq _ aghyuughmikumisi _ , _ itupill _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
qaywa _ Christ-a _ kayaate kaayagh uq _ qaquuragh aqe yamegteggu _ , _ maaten _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ . _ whangkuta llu _ kayaate ukut _ katam _ Christ-am _ kayaate kaayagh llegh atun _ . _ iwernga _ elpesi nite kumta _ kayusiite lleqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ .
yuvghiigh tek _ elpesi neng _ liigike sqellug qu _ ugpeqepiigutsi _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ Liigikenghistegguu-u _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ kiyaghtengngutanga _ ilu gpesini _ ? _ Ilugpesininneghitngukan _ , _ taawa _ ugpeqepiillghitaghsi _ .
sunanguq _ liigike teggu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ .
yughagh aqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ kayusiitesqellusi _ anaggute fqaafsi _ pisqellusi _ . _ iwernga _ yughagh u u nghite ukut _ ipapighqennaluku _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnagh qu ma ni luta _ . _ itupill _ whangkuta _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ elqughute nga an _ pisqellusi _ , _ qaywa _ yug t _ pi ghngainkut _ itagnaqellghinniluta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Kipullginaaghpagningitaghput _ ipapilleq _ ; _ itupill _ ilapgayaghqaqaghput _ .
quya aqe ukut _ kayaate negh mta _ , _ iknaqe u negh gpesini _ . _ enkaam _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ veghunneqigtesqellusi _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ lata aqe amsi _ elpesi nun _ pi vagilgama _ qayughllak _ nanqigte yu nghite kemsi _ aghyuughmigyaghqaalusi _ . _ Atanghem _ qelqe aqe aanga _ nanqigte ste u lunga _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ nanqigte yug amsi _ kayusiite na lusi _ ugpeqilleghtughtesqellusi _ , _ nakaan _ kayaalisqellusi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tawatenʼngam _ pi unga _ . _ quya nga tek _ . _ veghute tek _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ pi sqe sug lleg mtun _ pi tek _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ itagnagh kete te lusi _ , _ nekeggmetullusi _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ tenemenga _ piniqe llegh m llu _ nekeggmellegh m llu _ elpesi nite li _ .
Quyakututaqitek _ agleghnagh lghii kun _ naagh llegh kun _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqaalgutet _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ piniqe llegh a llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ qerngaghmetellghallu _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ elpesi nite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ , _ apostle-meng _ . _ yug t _ nakmike llghite aatnga _ apostle-ngulunga _ , _ talwa _ kayagte llghite aatnga _ . _ Apostle-nguughtekaagunga _ Jesus _ Christ-akunllu _ kiyaghnegh kun llu _ ata kun _ , _ unguvagh ste ikagh _ ellnga neng _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
lata aqe amsi _ ugpeqagh ni _ Galatia-melngughni _ . _ qamagte luteng _ ugpeqaalgutma _ maanlenguut _ pinigh ke ii sigh nge uk _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luteng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmellelguslisilillu _ .
Christ-a _ ellmi neng _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe lleg mnnun _ , _ iteme te na luta _ whaken _ seghlegh meng _ kiyaghtaalleghmeng _ . _ kiyaghnegh mta _ ata m _ piyuke llegh atun _ pi kau uq _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
saghiigha yagute amsi _ aawallu _ pegtaghtaghsi _ tuqlughistezi _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ Christ-am _ , _ tugukligh aisi _ alla neng _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ .
Avaqraggiituq _ alla _ " _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ " _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ yug t _ teggellghiigh ste aqe aisi _ allangughte naqutke llegh megteggun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
qaywa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ naligh mta _ whangkuta _ ungipagh ke gkumteki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ungipagh kekagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ taana _ ungipaqilghi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ , _ whaa _ ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ungipagh ke gkumiki _ " _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ " _ alla u luki _ ugpeqekagh gpesineng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ligu _ aghyuugh llegh mun _ .
tawaten _ akuzillegh mkun _ efqughhnaqutkengngunghitanka _ yug t _ . _ nakaa _ , _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ efqughsukaqa _ . _ paninang _ yug nun _ efqughtinaqutkengngukuma _ , _ Christ-amun _ qepghaghtengunaanghitunga _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una _ liisimake sug aqa _ elpesi nun _ , _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ yug neng _ pi u nghite ut _ .
nagaqugh kaqe nghite anka _ yug neng _ , _ talwa _ kitum _ alngunak _ apeghtugh tke mangite ai _ whanga mnun _ . _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ aliightekaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ .
nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ natete yagh tke a _ maligtengnguluki _ Jews-et _ kiyaghtaallghit _ . _ elngaatall _ nangllegyullngunanga _ amyuutke kaqe anka _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ taakunginaghhaagneng _ aviighute ste naqutke kaqe anka _ .
ingyagh kaqe anka _ allute luki _ angtaagh lgute nka _ atuqe u luki _ Jews-et _ kiyaghtaallghit _ , _ qayughllak _ sagiqnegh ghllag u yagh unga _ sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh itnun _ .
iwernga _ allgegh mangite lunga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tuqlugh kaqe aanga _ .
enkaam _ whanga mnun _ aliightekaqe a _ kina u ta a _ ighnegh ni _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ Gentile-enun _ . _ kinku nun _ alngunak _ akuzi tkesaghtugh llghite aqa _ taana _ ,
talwa _ Jerusalem-etellghitunga _ akuzite kete na luku _ apostle-ngughtekanun _ sivu mni _ . _ yeghlegi _ Arabia-mun _ pi unga _ . _ tagtalmi _ uteghnigh unga _ Damascus-mun _ .
tamaani _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh luki _ Jerusalem-etunga _ aleghqugh na luku _ Cephas _ ( _ peter _ ) _ . _ ellnga nite unga _ aki mig aq _ unuk _ .
kina _ alla _ apostle-a _ aleghqugh nghite aqa _ iwerngaqun _ James _ , _ Atanghem _ anglegutanga _ .
apeghkagh nka _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liisimake aanga _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ .
taagken _ iglegha unga _ Syria-munllu _ Cilicia-munllu _ .
tamaani _ Judea-mi _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ-akun _ salin _ nallagh igate kangatnga _ gginasaghqugh lunga _ .
taawanginaq _ liisimake aat _ nagaqugh llegh eng _ whaten _ , _ " _ yuug _ amyuqetiqestekegkaghput _ , _ naafqii naqutkekagh llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mnneng _ Christ-ameng _ maaten _ whaa _ ungipagh kau iqe uq _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ Christ-akun _ ! _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe aqe aat _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
qula _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ uteghnigh unga _ Jerusalem-emun _ ; _ Barnabas-em _ maligte aanga _ Titus-lu _ kelqe aqa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liigike ste aanga _ Jerusalem-etesqellunga _ . _ kaate yamta _ ugpeqagh t _ igleghutistenginiit _ qerngughte te aghte sqe anka _ . _ tawani _ ungipamsug te anka _ naten _ Gentile-enun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mneng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau unga _ luuraq _ taakut _ igleghutistet _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ temngingu ni na yu katki _ sivugh nghaani llu _ maaten llu _ .
liigike anka _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ tugukligh ait _ qayughllak _ maligte i steke _ titus _ , _ Greek-ngughngaan _ , _ circumcise-esqenghilkangat _ .
iwernga _ ila i _ ugpeqasighwaaghet _ aksaqe luku _ ilate ut _ whangkunnun _ riirngi na luku _ iteme nga llegh ut _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ Qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigtesqelluta _ pi inkut _ liilightuusagh anun _ .
ellngit nun _ malighqutagh ke llghite ukut _ talwa _ natengiighhaq _ almesiqesqelluki _ ipa u llegh it _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apeghtuusagh ke lleg mtestun _ elpesi nun _ .
taakut _ ugpeqagh t _ igleghutistengita _ allangughte mangite ait _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ . _ ( _ Igleghutistenguyaghngaata _ , _ whanga mni _ allangughte te ite ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ tanem ii llghite uq _ . _ )
Igleghutistet _ liigike ma ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghyuke te ma ni luki _ whanga mnun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipaqesqelluki _ Gentile-enun _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ neghyuke te llegh atun _ peter- mun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipaqesqelluki _ Jews-enun _ .
katam _ kiyaghnegh _ qepghaqagh u uq _ peter- kun _ apostle-kennaluku _ Jews-enun _ , _ whanga mkun llu _ qepghaqagh u uq _ apostle-kennalunga _ Gentile-enun _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ igleghutistet _ , _ James-enkut _ Peter-enkut _ John-enkut _ , _ nekevgha te i lghiit _ ugpeqagh nun _ , _ liigike aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tunusalisimanilunga _ tawaten _ qepghiisqellunga _ Gentile-enun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Barnabas-lu _ iigge pung _ aghulate ait _ tugukligh ni luku _ qepghagh u u llegh ung _ Gentile-enun _ , _ ellngit _ Jews-enun _ .
Taananginaq _ puygu snanigh aat _ kayusiitesqelluki _ akluma lghiit _ , _ taana ta _ nagnegh te yu pigtegkegka _ .
tagtalmi _ taakwani _ peter _ Antioch-melluni _ sa meng _ anaggutekagh _ . _ enkaam _ sivu itni _ ugpeqagh t _ aghyuughmigaqa _ anaggute llegh aneng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
peter _ neghe lgusigh i kayugu yagh lghii _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqagh itneng _ kenlanga _ James-em _ yug t _ Antioch-etestellghitnun _ . _ iwernga _ kaa sa ta _ neghe lgusigh nanigh ai _ Gentile-et _ , _ aaftekagh llu _ ellngit neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau lghii _ qayughllak _ alinge lghii _ taakut _ yug t _ sagiqe te u kangit _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ circumcise-eyaghqaaniluki _ .
taagken _ qamagte luteng _ Antioch-eghmiit _ Jews-et _ ugpeqe ait _ maligte tke aat _ Peter-em _ anaggute llegh anun _ , _ talwa _ Barnabas-lu _ ilate luni _ .
liigike yamki _ qaatke te nghite llegh it _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ , _ sivu itni _ yug t _ peter _ pi aqa _ , _ " _ elpek _ qaywa _ Jew-ngughngaaghpek _ kiyaghte u uten _ Gentile-estun _ , _ nakaan _ Jews-estun _ . _ sangita ngam _ Gentile-et _ Jews-estun _ kiyaghte ste naqute kesi ki _ ? _ "
Jews-nguluta _ allgegh kau ukut _ , _ nakaan _ Gentile-et _ seghleghqestet _ .
naqamllu _ liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ nallghusagh naanghite a _ yuug _ qaatke te llegh akun _ liilightuusagh nun _ , _ tawatenginaq _ nallghusagh lleqe a _ ugpeqe i llegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ . _ talwa _ whangkuta _ Jews-eni _ ugpeqegkaqaghput _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ nallghusiisqelluta _ ugpeqe lleg mteggun _ Christ-a _ , _ nakaan _ qaatke te lleg mteggun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te llegh akun _ liilightuusagh nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ nallghusagh yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
Jews-eni _ whangkuta _ nallghusagh sug u kumta _ Christ-akun _ , _ nakaan _ liilightuusagh tgun _ , _ ila ita _ Jews-et _ seghleghqe ste u ni lleqe ainkut _ Gentile-estun _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-anguftaa _ seghleghqe ste ngughte ste i lghii _ ? _ yeghlegi llu _ !
liilightuusagh t _ pegtekaqe anka _ , _ atuqe nqigte yagute kumki _ taawa _ liilightuusagh nun _ anaggute lleqe unga _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ tuqu kau unga _ liilightuusagh nun _ kiyaghte yaghqaa lunga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qaquuragh te kau unga _ Christ-amun _ maligte te lunga _ , _ enkaam _ whanga u nanigh ma uq _ kiyaghte lghii _ ; _ Christ-angughsimaaq _ kiyaghte lghii _ ilu mni _ . _ Kiyaghtengngughngaaghma _ yugusigh mni _ , _ kiyaghtengnguunga _ ugpeqe i lleg mkun _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ piniqe kanganga _ , _ tuune kau lghii llu _ whanga mnun _ .
enkaam _ pakig igate aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ . _ yuug _ qaatke te llegh mikun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nallghusagh yaghqaa yagh kan _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh a _ temngingu nayagh uq _ .
Nallughhaghmeng _ elpek si _ Galatia-ghmiini _ ! _ kitum _ puughte isi _ ? _ Puygustegguu _ apegh u aqe aqe yaqegka _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh a _ qaquuragh kun _ ?
Aaptaghllamsi _ : _ naten _ allgeghtekaqestekek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ , _ qaatke te llegh gpesigun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun _ nagatekagh i _ ?
Nalluupigetsii _ ? _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ piinligh luku _ nutaghagh _ unguvallegh i _ , _ apeghiighnaqestegguu-u _ elpesi neng _ katam _ ?
ikfiqe llegh i _ temngingu a _ ? _ ugpeqe pestaagh aqa _ temngingu nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tuunegkaqisii-i _ taghneghagh gmineng _ , _ allaaghlluwhaghtikaawalluu _ akule gpesini _ qayughllak _ qaatke kesi _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ ugpeqe kesi _ nagaqughkagh i _ ?
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apegh kaqe aat _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh kaqe a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ liisimake lleqe asi _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i lleg leg t _ kiyaghnegh kun _ Abraham-em _ kinguneghpigaqii _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ aapqestaqaqaat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nallghusagh naqe ni luki _ Gentile-et _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ ugpeqe i llegh itgun _ . _ neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh kaqe a _ taana _ pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ Abraham-emun _ , _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ nuna m _ ramke i _ quya ste lleg nge naqngu ut _ elpegun _ . _ "
Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ enkaam _ quya ste lleg ngekagh _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugpeqe i lghii _ quya ste lleg nge yaghqaa uq _ ellnga tun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe ai _ tamaakut _ sighima lghiit _ qaatke te llegh megteggun _ liilightuusagh nun _ nallghusagh lleqe ni luteng _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ . _ qayughllak _ igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kaki _ tamaghhagh ita _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh itgun _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte lleg nge lleqe uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ . _ "
Whateghlluwaaq _ liigike nagh uq _ , _ kina _ alngunak _ nallghusagh yaghqaa nghite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ qaatke te llegh mikun _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh qagh a _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ ugpegh llegh mikun _ . _ "
iwernga _ qaatke te lghii _ liilightuusagh nun _ sighima u nghite uq _ ugpegh llegh kun _ , _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ sighima lghii _ liilightuusagh tgun _ kiyaghte lleqe uq _ qaute kete luki _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekaqe ainkut _ aghyuugh na luta _ apallugh ke luki _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ iwernga _ Christ-am _ naveghqellikaqiinkut _ nanqiglleghqamnneng _ tugu llegh mikun _ aghyuugh lleghqagh ut _ . _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ nanqigtekau uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ tamaghhagh mi _ agaghtekagh _ uqfig kun _ . _ "
Christ _ Jesus-em _ naveghqellikaqiinkut _ enkaam _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya stekaqe ai _ Gentile-et _ taagken _ ataasigh meng _ quya ste llegh meng _ akequsagh kekagh minun _ Abraham-emun _ . _ enkaam _ ugpegh llegh kun _ allgegh ta gput _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke gkakek _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ungipaataghllamsi _ usputaghqagh meng _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ pi aqe lghii neng _ : _ yug k _ akequskumek _ sa meng _ , _ igaqe luku _ igagh kun _ , _ ategh tek llu _ igaqe lukek _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ aghula i aghte yaghqaqe nghite a _ akeqututellghak _ nalighmeng _ ila yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
kiyaghnegh _ akequsangllaghteqaaguq _ Abraham-emunllu _ kingunghanunllu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ngllagh mangite ai _ , _ " _ Kingunghi _ , _ " _ Akequsangllaghteqaaguq _ ataasigh inagh mun _ kingunegh mun _ , _ taana _ Christ-anguuq _ .
taana _ liigike sug aqe yagh aqa _ : _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsagh ngllagh kau uq _ Abraham-emun _ enkaam _ akequsagh ni _ pi naqe ni kaqe a _ . _ 430 _ ayumiqullegh t _ kingu itneng _ akeqe i llegh mi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh i _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ taana _ akequsagh _ satngunanighqennaanghitaa _ nalighmeng _ naafqennaanghitaa _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ allgeghhnaqngukumteggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ , _ taawa _ akequsagh akun _ allgeghhnaanghitaghput _ . _ iwernga _ akeqe i llegh mikun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh ni _ tuune kaqe a _ Abraham-emun _ .
sangameng _ liilightuusagh t _ tuune kau aat _ ? _ tuune kau ut _ yug nun _ liigikesqelluki _ anaggute llegh it _ seghleghqe llegh u ni luki _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ tawatete kau ut _ kenlanga _ kingunegh _ tagi llegh anun _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ngllagh qagh a _ . _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg tgun _ tuune kaqe ai _ Moses-mun _ . _ taagken _ Moses-em _ uygukutistem _ tuune kaqe ai _ yug nun _ .
iwernga _ uygu ke te i stesugh niite uq _ ataasigh _ akeqe i kuni _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasigh ghhagh u te mineng _ uygu ke te i stesugh niite uq _ .
liilightuusagh at _ tengvimun _ ayuqatkii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh i _ ? _ nakaa _ , _ yeghlegi llu _ ! _ liilightuusagh m _ unguvallegh ngesaghqagh ke yagh kumikut _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh nayagh ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ taaggun _ liilightuusagh kun _ .
iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ seghleghqe llegh m _ anusimingllagh aqe ai _ . _ Enkaangam _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ tuune lleqe a _ ugpeqe ikagh ghhagh inagh nun _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ .
salin _ ugpegh llghite luku _ anusimingllaghagh u yagh ukut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ aaghqute aqe u yagh ainkut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ whangkunnun _ liite ste llegh anun _ ugpegh llegh _ .
liilightuusagh t _ apaqu te i steke yagh aput _ kenlanga _ Christ-am _ tagi llegh anun _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ Christ-akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nallghusagh yaghqaaghte ainkut _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ .
ugpegh llegh _ tagi ta aneng _ Christ-akun _ liilightuusagh t _ apaqutisteknanighaput _ .
ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ , _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ .
Paaptaayaaqngafsi _ Christ-amun _ , _ aate lghii stun _ Christ-a _ pikaqaghsi _ tawaten _ pilugug aqe llegh gpesistun _ .
allangughte te ite ut _ Jews-etlu _ Gentile-etlu _ ; _ allangughte te ite ut _ qepghaghtelaaghetlu _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu _ ; _ allangughte te ite ut _ yug t llu _ aghnagh t llu _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte lusi _ atunem _ ayuqe usi _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
Christ-am _ pikngukangisi _ taawa _ Abraham-em _ kingunegh ke aisi _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si llu _ piliilleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ Abraham-emun _ .
nagnegh te aghte lakun _ whaten _ , _ ighnegh _ pi liite i yaghqagh _ a ta mi _ saghya aneng _ qepghaghtelaaghestun _ kiyaghute kayugu uq _ mekestaaghhaa luni _ , _ qaywa _ ellnga n _ piksaghngaagu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ a ta mi _ pi a _ .
mekestaaghhaa luku _ yug t _ aflengake kaqe aat _ , _ sa u aat llu _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi kaghqagh i _ kenlanga _ ata an _ pi yaghqaaghte ni llegh anun _ .
whangkuta llu _ tawatete yagh ukut _ . _ taghnughhagh u luta _ qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtukut _ nuna m _ igleghutistengitnun _ tughneghagh nun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh a _ aghneq _ kaate yan _ kayagtekagh a _ ighnegh ni _ , _ allgeghkagh _ aghnagh kun _ . _ ellnga n _ qaatke kaqe ai _ liilightuusagh t
iteme te na luta _ liilightuusagh neng _ , _ avaqutaliitesqellutallu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
elpek si _ avaqutagh ke te mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ighnegh mi _ taghneghagh kek _ kayagtekaqe ak _ ilu mnnun _ , _ qevute lutek _ pikagh k _ , _ " _ Abba _ , _ a ta _ ! _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh kun _ qepghaghtelaaghunanightuten _ , _ avaqutagh ke aaten _ . _ Avaqutaqaaghtutmineng _ ellmi _ pi ni _ elpenun _ pi liite ste lleqe ai _ .
sivugh nghaani _ nalluksaghaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ enkaam _ qepghaghtelaaghuyaghtusi _ kiyaghnegh u nghite ngugh nun _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ liisimakagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nalighmeng _ ipapestaaq _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ liisimakistezi _ . _ sangafsi ngam _ uteghte yug tsi _ kayaalngughnun _ sasii nghite ngugh nun _ igleghte te i lghii nun _ tughneghagh nun _ ? _ sangan _ tamaakunun _ qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigsugetsi _ ?
paninang _ qaatke aqe asi _ apeghtughallghit _ aghnegh nun _ , _ tanqigh nun _ , _ ayumiqullegh nun _ aghnegh nun llu _ salqumsivikaqegkangitnun _ .
alingutke aqe amsi _ , _ qamagte luni _ qepghagh te i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ sasii nghite na yu kan _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tungsigh vike amsi _ , _ whanga mtun _ lliigh sqe qaghte lusi _ qayughllak _ whanga llu _ elpesi stun _ lliigh kau unga _ Gentile-estun _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ ungipagh qite aqe yamsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ seghletun _ pi ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ Neqamikaghsi _ tawani _ taku kaqe amsi _ qayughllak _ qinuyug u lghiinga _ .
qaywa _ qinuyug llegh ma _ seghlegh ligh u aghtesagh ghngaaghmisi _ ukavaghsimangitaghpesinga _ nalighmeng _ ighsake ma nge itagh zinga _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ upughatagh zinga _ nikimqun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg atun _ , _ nalighmeng _ Christ _ Jesus-etun _ .
naagu _ quya nga llegh kesagh kesi _ ? _ liisimake amsi _ piyaqleg u yagh kata _ iye si _ nusug luki _ tagivagh nayagh asi _ .
enkaam _ anguyiitestengngaa _ qayughllak _ ungipaate kemsi _ ipa pig meng _ ?
tamaakut _ yug t _ qaatke te sug kangisi _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ , _ piyuke pigte aisi _ ellmeggnun _ malighqutaqesqellusi _ , _ iwernga _ apallugh at _ pinigh nghite uq _ . _ ellngit a _ aafte sug aisi _ whanga mneng _ , _ ellnginagh meng _ maligtesqelluteng _ .
pinigh uq _ yug t _ sumegh ke gkumegteki _ yug lgute teng _ , _ taawanginaghhaq _ apallugh it _ pinigh kata _ . _ quunpeng _ taana _ ipa u uq _ , _ aviite yagh ghngaaghma _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh mni _ , _ katam _ aghnagh m _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ ighni yu llegh mini _ whanga llu _ tawaten _ aqnighqutkenneqigtengngwaamsi _ kenlanga _ Christ-atun _ lliigh lleghqagh gpesinun _ .
whaa tuq _ maaten _ elpesinilnguunga _ enkaam _ liisimake na yalghiinga _ naten _ aleghqugh yaghqaa lusi _ . _ sumeghyali tke ghllagu amsi _ .
elpek si _ atuqe i yu lghii ni _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh itneng _ , _ talwa _ liigike igate asi _ liilightuusagh t _ sa meng _ pi sigh u ta i _ .
igaqe nga uq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ Abraham-nguq _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh lgu uq _ , _ aag llegh a _ qepghaghtelaaghqun _ aghnagh kun _ , _ ila a _ qepghatelaaghunghilngughqun _ aghnagh kun _ .
ighnegh a _ qepghaghtelaaghqun _ allgegh kau uq _ yug stun _ kitumtu te _ alngunak _ . _ iwernga _ ila a _ ighnegh an _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilngughqun _ allgegh kau uq _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kanga _ .
taake uk _ aghnagh k _ usputagh u uk _ maalghug gnun _ akequsagh gkenun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ Qepghaghtelaaq _ Hagar _ akequsagh atun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayuqe uq _ Mount _ Sinai-mi _ enkaam _ allgegh kau ut _ qepghaghtelaaghqaaluteng _ .
Hagar _ Mount _ Sinai-nguluni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ Arabia-melnguq _ . _ Aghneghmimllu _ Jerusalem-ngatun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke te lghiit _ qepghaghtelaaghuut _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
iwernga _ paamna _ Jerusalem _ qepghaghtelaaghituq _ , _ ellnga _ naakagh ut _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ quya ghllag i _ , _ elpek _ quminge igate ngugh u te n _ , _ aqnighqe igate ngugh u te n _ ighni yu llegh meng _ . _ ugi gpek _ unite ghngaaten _ , _ aragh a _ quyaghllagem _ angtalanganeng _ qayughllak _ taghnughhaghtaaghasaghqaaguten _ aghnagh meng _ ugi leg meng _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ Isaac-etun _ ayuqe usi _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ apallugh ke luku _ akequsagh ni _ Abraham-emun _ .
tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ taana _ ighnegh _ allgeghkagh _ yug stun _ kitumtu te _ alngunak _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe a _ ighnegh _ allgeghkagh _ taghneghagh m _ pillghakun _ . _ paninang _ maaten _ tawatete uq _ .
iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ sa meng _ pi atgu _ ? _ " _ Qepghaghtelaaq _ aghnagh _ , _ ighnegh a llu _ aghulaqe stekek _ . _ qayughllak _ qepghaghtelaaghem _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh a _ nengigh naanghite uq _ a ta mi _ saghya aneng _ maligte te luni _ ighneghagh nun _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguum _ aghnagh m _ . _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ whangkuta _ avaqutagh ke nghite ainkut _ qepghaghtelaaghem _ aghnagh m _ , _ iwernga _ avaqutagh ke ainkut _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguum _ aghnagh m _ .
Christ-am _ whangkuta _ iteme te kaqe ta aneng _ , _ itemepiigumaakut _ . _ Enkaangam _ nekevgha tek _ aghuliilkaalusi _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghughhneqigtegpenasi _ liilightuusagh nun _ .
nagate tek _ ! _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ ungipaate amsi _ : _ circumcise-estekufsi _ liilightuusagh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ apeghiigh qagh a _ kayutkennaanghitaghsi _ .
alla _ kelenga sagh u aghagh ke _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ , _ circumcise-estekumi _ taawa _ qaatkengngwaaghyaghqaqii _ qamagte luki _ liilightuusagh t _ .
liilightuusagh tgun _ nallghusagh ste naqutke gkufsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ , _ aafte lleqe usi _ elpesi neng _ Christ-ameng _ , _ unilleqaghsillu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ utaqangwaaghput _ sighima llegh ut _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ . _ sighima llegh ut _ taananguuq _ : _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nallghusiisqelluta _ elqughutngagh llegh anun _ ugpeqe lleg mteggun _ Christ-a _ .
Christ _ Jesus-em _ pikngukanginkut _ , _ yuug _ megnu nagh nghite uq _ circumcise-ekaakumi _ nalighmeng _ circumcise-ellghilkumi _ . _ una _ esgha _ megnu nagh lghii _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh _ Christ-akun _ piniqe i ste i lghii _ yug lgute mnneng _ .
sivugh nghaani _ pinitungwaaq _ pi u yagh usi _ . _ kitum _ qaatke te nanigh ste isi _ ipapighqelleghmun _ ?
kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlughistegpesi _ pilqenghitaa _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ " _ Yeast-angiighhaam _ ghhuugh ste ghllag aqe a _ akuute aq _ . _ "
elpek si llu _ whanga llu _ pikutanganeng _ Atanghem _ , _ nalluneqsukenghitanka _ ugpeqe nanigh fqiita _ apeghtuusagh nka _ elpesi nun _ pisqelluki _ . _ liisimake aqa llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ seghleliighqagh igh lghii _ elpesi neng _ , _ kina u yagh ghngaan _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ungipagh ke i igate unga _ yug t _ circumcise-esqelluki _ . _ tawaten _ ungipagh ke i u yagh kuma _ Jews-et _ amyuqetagh te kete nanigh nayagh aatnga _ enkaam _ qaquuragh a _ Christ-am _ sugag niigh te kete nayagh nghite aat _ .
tamaakut _ seghleliighqagh igh lghiit _ elpesi neng _ circumcise-elleghmeng _ , _ ellngistuq _ circumcise-estengnguluteng _ eunuch-englallghiit _ ellmeggneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aisi _ iteme nga llegh mun _ Christ-akun _ . _ taawanginaq _ atuqe gpenaan _ iteme nga llegh i _ atugh yaghqaa luki _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ . _ itupill _ qepghagh te ki _ ila si _ piniqe llegh gpesigun _ .
qayughllak _ qaatke lleqe asi _ qamagte luki _ liilightuusagh t _ qaatke gkufsigu _ una _ liilightuusagh _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ katam _ . _ "
iwernga _ elpesi neng _ qani iqe te naqngu kufsi llu _ pillugute naqngu kufsi llu _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ teghig ke sagh stun _ , _ kelenga tek _ , _ qayughllak _ naafte qughtu tete naqe usi _ .
whaten _ pi amsi _ , _ kiyaghte tek _ qaatkellug kek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ atuqe naanghite asi _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ .
qayughllak _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh m _ kipullegngaat _ taghneghagh gnun _ , _ piyuke llegh i _ taghneghagh m _ kipullegngaat _ piyuke llegh anun _ yugusigh m _ . _ taake uk _ anguyag ke te uk _ enkaam _ atuqe naanghite asi _ piyuke lleg si _ .
taghneghagh m _ maghyaghqugh u u kangisi _ taawa _ liilightuusagh t _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh asi _ .
yugusigh m _ seghleghqe lleghtuqagh m _ piyuke llegh i _ nalluniite ut _ . _ Ukunguut _ : _ alngunaseghaq _ , _ seghletun _ atuqe te llegh _ , _ nuqete igate ngugh t _ alngunak _ atuqimun _ ,
maniiguutelleq _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ uyviinegh iqe llegh _ , _ anguyiqe llegh _ , _ pillugute llegh _ , _ qungyaqe i llegh _ , _ sakrite llegh _ , _ ellnginaayugtelleq _ , _ aafqemeraalleq _ , _ qerngughpagtaatelleq _ ,
aqina llegh _ , _ suume llegh _ , _ qerngughte te luteng _ aghsaghpaagtaqut _ seghletun _ pi llegh mun _ , _ ila aneng llu _ seghleghqe llegh neng _ . _ Kelengasaaghnaqlaataghamsi _ sivugh nghaani _ pilleg mtun _ , _ tamaakut _ tawaten _ kiyaghte lghiit _ ilate nga naanghite ut _ quyasleghaneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ .
Naqamenraq _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ piite stekagh i _ ukunguut _ : _ piniqe llegh _ , _ quya ma llegh _ , _ nekeggmellegh _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh _ , _ pinigh llegh _ , _ ataasiighmete llegh _ ,
yakumangingitelleq _ , _ nuqete llegh llu _ . _ taakut _ iinghute llghite ut _ alngunak _ liilightuusagh ni _ .
Christ _ Jesus-em _ pi ita _ qaquuragh te kaqe ait _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh it _ yugusigh meng _ .
Kiyaghtengngukumta _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ qaatke ltekek _ taghneghagh k _ .
Qukaayugneghufqaamta _ , _ qinuyugte i fqaamta _ , _ aqinake te fqaamta _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kina _ seghleghqe llegh m _ kaatfallugtekagu _ , _ elpek si _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ pinitungwaaq _ yakugh ke luku _ kayusiite ggu _ maligunneqigtesqelluku _ atanegh mun _ . _ elpek si llu _ , _ kelengangwaaghlusi _ luuraq _ nanghiiqullengnayukafsi _ .
Kayutkutullusi _ seghleliigh llegh gpesini _ ; _ tawaten _ qaatkelleqaghsi _ liilightuusagh _ Christ-am _ qelegh tke a _ .
kina _ sumeghtaghagh kuni _ sa u ni luni _ , _ sa u nghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ ellmi neng _ puughtengnguuq _ .
yeqay _ tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ yuvghiighwaaghligu _ kiyaghtaalleni _ . _ enkaam _ pinigh kan _ quyake nakanga _ ellmi _ katam _ apeghiighkagh ni _ usputaqellngunaan _ kitum _ apeghiighkagh anun _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ yug m _ igleghte te yaghqaqe ai _ ellmi _ pi yaghqagh ni _ .
kina _ alngunak _ apeghtuqagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh aneng _ , _ pinigh lghii meng _ tuune i li _ apeghtughiste minun _ .
sumeghtaghagh kuvek _ puughte lleqe ni luku _ kiyaghnegh _ elpeneng _ puughtengnguuten _ . _ yug m _ sa u a _ piitesigh u aghaghkagh ni _ unatagh yaghqaqe a _ .
piitesighagh kuvek _ efqughhnaluku _ seghleghqengngalghii _ piyuke llegh n _ , _ taagken _ unatagh lleqe an _ tuqu llegh _ . _ iwernga _ piitesighagh kuvek _ efqughhnalukek _ taghneghagh k _ , _ taagken _ taghneghagh gneng _ unatagh lleqe an _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
enkaam _ qinuyagute gpenaan _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ pi lteggu _ , _ qayughllak _ iilqayug nghite kumta _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate kan _ akileghtuusagh nge lleqe ukut _ .
enkaam _ pi lleghqagh lgu negh mta _ iiwleng _ pinitun _ pi aqe lteki _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ yug t _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakut _ anglegute ligh tke aput _ Christ-akun _ .
esghaqagh teki qun _ yaagtu ghllaget _ igagh llegh nka _ lata ma lusi _ !
yug t _ esghaghte yagh ke yug neghtuqagh t llu _ qanatkiyuneghtuqatlu _ pinitun _ qepghagh llegh meggneng _ , _ ellnginguut _ circumcise-esquughwaaghilghiit _ elpesi neng _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ qayughllak _ alinge aqe lghiit _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge na yukagh meng _ ungipagh ke gkumegteggu _ qaquuragh ghhagh inagh a _ Christ-am _ , _ avelghagh luku _ circumcise-elleq _ .
qaywa _ circumcise-ekaayaghngaaghmeng _ , _ ellngit _ katam _ qaatke te igate ut _ liilightuusagh nun _ . _ Circumcise-esqesugaqiisi _ qanatkepigesnaghnalusi _ ellmeggnun _ circumcise-estekaqnilusi _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ qananaanghitunga _ sa meng _ alngunak _ iwerngaqun _ qaquuragh aneng _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ tuqu llegh akun _ qaquuragh mi _ nuna _ qaquuragh ma uq _ whanga mnun _ , _ enkaam _ whanga _ qaquuragh ma unga _ nuna mun _ .
megnu nagh nghite uq _ yuug _ circumcise-ekaakumi _ , _ nalighmeng _ circumcise-ellghilkumi _ . _ una _ megnu nagh lghii u uq _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ainkut _ nutaghagh u luta _ yug ni _ .
tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ apeghtuusagh mnun _ , _ yeqay _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ nangllegtagh llegh a llu _ ellngit nite li _ , _ israel- nga ni llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
whaken _ kenle ke luku _ kitum _ alngunak _ alla _ seghleliigh ste fqaama _ pi linga _ qayughllak _ yugusimnilnguut _ maamellegh t _ kelgute u aat _ qephaghtelaaghulqa _ Jesus-mun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ yeqay _ piniqe i nga lghii _ kayusillegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ . _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ . _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ apostle-kaanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ . _ lata u unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ Ephesus-melngughnun _ , _ ataasiighmelnguut _ maligsaaghtengi _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmellelguslisillu _ .
usuqe lleg nge li _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ! _ Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyastengngwiinkut _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ tunute yameng _ qilag ta meng _ .
nuna _ ulima llghite luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ Christ-akun _ pelungitesqellutallu _ avutngitesqellutallu _ ellmi nun _ .
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe kanginkut _ , _ neghigh luku _ allughqinakegkaqiinkut _ avaqutagh u luta _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ piyuke kanga _ , _ efqugh ke kanga llu _ .
enkaam _ usuqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ ighleg gpenani _ nanglleg ke ghllag ainkut _ piniqekagh mikun _ ighnegh mikun _ .
Christ-am _ aaw akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ seghevute ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni
aqeghqusiqeghllakanga _ whangkunnun _ . _ Peghqinghustiinkutlu _ liigike ste ainkut llu
uspeqe llegh mineng _ salin _ aliighsigalkemmineng _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh a _ , _ pika qaa _ Christ-akun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqe lleg ni _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ pilleghqaghllugwaaghmi _ . _ Qamagtengngwaaghluki _ ulimaagh ni _ qilagmelnguutlu _ nunamelnguutlu _ qerngughte lleqe ai _ , _ Christ-amun _ igleghutesqelluki _ .
Christ-akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ ellmi nun _ yugu luta _ . _ Ayumirugllak _ piyuke llegh mitun _ uspeqe kaqe a _ . _ ellnga n _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ piyuke llegh mitun _ pi sta qaa _ .
whangkuta _ Jews-eni _ ugpeqagh ni _ sighimake i yuwhaagh kau ukut _ Christ-akun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghtaallemteggun _ usuqesleqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ .
Christ-akun _ elpek si llu _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ ipapik _ ungipagh _ . _ pinigh lghii u uq _ ungipagh _ ungipaate i lghii _ yuguligh llegh gpesineng _ . _ ugpeqe aqe yafsigu _ Christ-a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nalluniigh kaqe aisi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ , _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ tuune lleqe ni lukek _ .
agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ ipapighqestiinkut _ pagitaghqagh mnneng _ kenlanga _ whangkuta _ pi liite lleghqagh mnnun _ . _ enkaam _ usuqelleqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ !
nagaqugh ma aqa _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ , _ piniqe llegh i llu _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ,
neqamike aqe amsi _ yughagh negh mni _ , _ iyamsiqa yagute nghmeng _ taaqe igate amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
ata ghllag ke a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga nun _ tungsigh te aqe amsi _ peghqinghusqellusi _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ , _ liigikataghiisqellusi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
yughagh tke aqa _ nighug _ kuukgute sqellug qu _ ilu gpesinun _ , _ liigike sqellug qu _ sighima llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi nun _ pike stekagh a _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ . _ yughagh tke amsi llu _ liigikesqelluki _ kemnagh ghllaget _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ yug minun _ .
yughagh unga llu _ liigike sqellug qu _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaga _ qepghagh lghii _ whangkunni _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ . _ taana _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite llegh ghllag _ ataasigh u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtisiqegkaa _ Christ-amun _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ taagken _ qilag mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aqumesimaa _ aghenqignegh mikun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ qulighpigaaghtestekaqaa _ Christ-a _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ igleghutisteneng _ , _ qelegh i kayug neng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelegneng _ , _ umiileg neng llu _ . _ ategh a _ ingyagh te nga ghllag uq _ ateghyaggaghneng _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ nunaghraghaghqamillu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ lli kaqe a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ Christ-am _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ , _ naasquutistengllaqaqaallu _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ apallugh ke luki _ ugpeqagh t _ .
qamagte luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ yugusigh ke ai _ Christ-am _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ iighwigh uq _ . _ Christ-am _ iighwigh a _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nani _ alngunak _ .
sivugh nghaani _ taghneghagh si _ tuqu nga yagh ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke ma ite kesi _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ seghleghqe ste u yagh usi llu _ .
tawatete yagh usi _ kiyaghtengngulusi _ nuna m _ seghlegh mun _ igleghneghanun _ . _ Qaatkengnguyaghaghsillu _ igleghutistengat _ tughneghagh t _ qilagamelnguut _ . _ ellnga u uq _ aangwaagh lleghpigagh _ tughneghagh _ igleghte te i lghii _ yug neng _ qaatke te igate ngugh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qamagte luta _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ tamaakustun _ yug stun _ . _ atuqe kaqe aput _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh i _ yugusigh mta llu _ umyugagh mta llu _ . _ enkaam _ qamagte luta _ allgegh kau te mnneng _ seghleghqe ste u luta _ , _ aghyuugh lleg nge naqngu yagh ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh akun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh ghllag uq _ , _ piniqe pigte ainkut llu _ .
qaywa _ taghneghagh put _ tuqu nga yagh ghngaita _ apallugh ke luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtu inkut _ maligte te luta _ Christ-amun _ . _ ( _ Yugulikaagusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke llegh akun _ . _ )
kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtu inkut _ maligte te luta _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ , _ whangkunnunllu _ aqume lgusigh ste a _ qilag mi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ kinguliighaghnun _ liite sqellug qu _ piniqe llegh ghrukutaaghllag ni _ whangkunnun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ yugulikaagusi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ yuguligh llegh i _ elpesi neng _ pilqenghitaghsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh ke a _ elpesi nun _ .
yuguligh llghite aisi _ apallugh ke luku _ sa llegh i _ , _ enkaam _ qukaayugutkesaghqaqenghitaghsi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe ainkut _ tawatete luta _ . _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ ulima aqe ainkut _ qepghiisqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ qepghaqagh t _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ qepghaqagh t _ yataaghqengngwaaqaqii _ whangkunnun _ qepghiisqelluki _ kiyaghte lleg mnni _ .
neqamike luku _ gentile- ngugh lug si _ allgegh kau usi _ . _ Jews-et _ atigh aqe aisi _ " _ circumcise-ellghilnguut _ " _ , _ ellmeggneng _ atigh kayugu ut _ " _ circumcise-ekat _ " _ . _ ( _ Circumcise-ellghat _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh itnite uq _ . _ )
neqamike luku _ tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ nalluksaghaghsi _ Christ-a _ kina u ta a _ . _ nunatagh u yagh usi _ Israel-eghmiinun _ enkaam _ ilate llghite yagh usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh anun _ ellngit nun _ . _ nuna mi _ whani _ kiyaghtengnguyaghtusi _ sighimallngunasillu _ kiyaghnegh ngunasi llu _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ pi llegh mi _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ ilate ma usi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ awavansaghtusi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ pi llegh mi _ tughaaghusimaasi _ ellnga nun _ Christ-am _ aaw akun _ .
Christ-a _ ellnga _ katam _ nekeggmelqaghput _ . _ ellnga u uq _ ataasiighte ste i lghii _ Jews-enengllu _ Gentile-enengllu _ . _ naafqe kaqe a _ mingllu te a _ aafte i lghii _ whangkunneng _ , _ enkaam _ anguyag ke te nanighqe kaqe ainkut _ .
Christ-am _ tuqu llegh mikun _ atugh u nanighqe kaqe ai _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it llu _ qelegh sagh it llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ Jews-etlu _ Gentile-etlu _ ataasiightesqelluki _ ellmi kun _ . _ enkaam _ nekeggmellegh nge stekaqe ai _ .
tuqu llegh mikun _ qaquuragh kun _ , _ Christ-am _ ugumi ke te nanighqe ai _ Jews-etlu _ Gentile-etlu _ . _ taagken _ ataasiighte ste ai _ , _ ilaliigh te ste ai llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Christ-a _ tagi luni _ ungipagh ke i kau uq _ nekeggmellegh meng _ elpesi nun _ Gentile-enun _ , _ awavantengnguyalghiisi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ungipagh ke i kau uq llu _ nekeggmellegh meng _ Jews-enun _ , _ qantaghantengngulghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
enkaam _ Christ-akun _ Jews-enillu _ Gentile-enillu _ tagiyaqlegughtukut _ ata mun _ ataasigh kun _ taghneghagh kun _ .
Enkaangam _ elpek si _ Gentile-eni _ nunatagh u nanigh usi _ . _ itupill _ nuna lgu te kau aghte aisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ , _ ilate usi llu _ nengllugutanganun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
mangteghagh atun _ ayuqe usi _ nekeftekagh t _ tunemagh ngllaghkagh itgun _ apostle-etlu _ uuknaliqistetlu _ . _ Christ _ Jesus _ ellnga _ katam _ kangighagh m _ uyghag ke a _ .
qamagte luteng _ mangteghagh m _ nalighnegh i _ nekeghquutngaat _ qerngagh meng _ Christ-akun _ . _ taakut _ nalighnegh t _ nula yalghiimeng _ temple-ngughtengnguut _ atanegh mun _ . _ taana _ temple- a _ agleghnagh uq _ .
ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ Christ-amun _ , _ maligte te lusi _ ila itnun _ ugpeqagh nun _ nekeftengnguusi _ mangteghagh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghfig anun _ taghneghagh gmikun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ anusimingllaghvig mete unga _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uute kegka _ Christ _ Jesus _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ Gentile-eni _ .
entaqun _ nagaquumaaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ qepghaqalitkaqaanga _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ liite sta _ whanga mnun _ qayvighte llghite ngughk _ uspeqe lleg ni _ . _ qavnganghhaq _ lata te kaghtekaqe aqa _ taana _ .
atightugh kufsigu _ lata tke kaqe a _ liilleqaghsi _ liigike llegh ka _ qayvighte llghite ngughk _ uspeqe llegh _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate llghite ai _ yug t _ qayvighte llghite ngugh meng _ uspeqe llegh mineng _ . _ iwernga _ up-uni _ aghnegh ni _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ qayvighte a _ uspeqe lleg ni _ agleghnagh lghii nun _ apostle-minunllu _ uuknaliqisteminunllu _ .
whatete uq _ uspeqe llegh a _ : _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ilate ma ut _ Jews-enun _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste llegh anun _ . _ Nalighneqaaghsimii _ ataasigh m _ yugusigh m _ , _ enkaam _ ilate ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh anun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikunllu _ tunusagh lightu aanga _ qepghaghtengulunga _ ungipaqesqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
Ukalighpigaagunga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug aneng _ . _ Tawalliima _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tunusagh lightu aanga _ whaten _ : _ nakmike aanga _ Gentile-enun _ ungipaqesqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ Christ-am _ aklungi aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ aklungi i _ ingyagh te nga ut _ yug t _ liigike llegh itneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga llu _ liigikestesqelluki _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ uspeqe llegh mineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ulimaghikam _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ , _ qayvighte llghite a _ uspeqe lleg ni _ piinligh yuggaagh llegh meng _ maatemun _ .
taagken _ qilagnilnguut _ : _ igleghte te i lghiit llu _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelgetlu _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite ste lleqe ai _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ peghqinellegh mineng _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ yug mikun _ yughaghvignilngughteggun _ .
Tamaakunguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh i _ salin _ nunangllalghilluni _ . _ apeghiigh ma ai _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ atanegh mteggun _ .
ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ Christ-akun _ aglagh yaghqaaghte ma ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tetullngunaamtallu _ alingellngunaamtallu _ .
Enkaangam _ iilqayagute gpenaan _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ apallugh ke luku _ ikfiqutkengngukemsi _ . _ ikfiqe llegh ma _ quulvaghtesleqiisi _ .
enkaam _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ segesqughte unga _ sivungagh ni _ ata m _ .
ellnga u uq _ atigh i lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ nengllugute neng _ qilagmelngughnengllu _ nunamelngughnengllu _ .
yughagh unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aklungi ghllag aneng _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelitesqellusi _ iknaqughsiisqeluki _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ .
yughagh tke amsi _ Christ-a _ kiyaghte sqellug qu _ ilu gpesini _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ yughagh tke amsi _ akulgusqellusillu _ , _ tunemalgusqellusillu _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
yughagh tke amsi _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ liigiksaqlegusqelluku _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh an _ , _ iqetu langa _ , _ tagtala a _ , _ uusqaghtu langa _ , _ samavneghtulangallu _ .
elpesi nun _ liisimake sqe sug aqa _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh a _ , _ qaywa _ piyaqnagh ghngaan _ liigikngwaalleghqaa _ . _ taagken _ piniqe llegh akun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnegh atun _ wata _ lliigh lleqe usi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ qepghagh lghii kun _ ilu mnni _ , _ ellnga n _ piyaqlegwaa _ qaayghute luku _ sa u a _ alngunak _ aaptekagh ut _ nalighmeng _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh ut _ .
kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge li _ ugpeqagh tgun _ yughaghvignilngughteggun _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-kunllu _ . _ usuqe teggu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qayughllak _ qepghagh u uute kegka _ atanegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kayeme amsi _ kiyaghtesqellusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ .
iiwleng _ qusevegte lusi _ , _ yakumangighlliqe gpenasi _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi _ , _ tugukligh utu tete lusi _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ qerngughte te kaqe aisi _ nekeggmellegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ nanghiiqu ghllag tek _ iiwleng _ kiyaghte tek _ tawaten _ .
ataasigh u uq _ yugusigh _ , _ ataasigh u uk llu _ taghneghagh k _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ ataasigh mun _ sighima llegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh aisi _ .
ataasigh u uq _ atanegh _ , _ ataasigh u uq _ ugpeqe i llegh _ , _ ataasigh u uq _ paaptaaye llegh _ .
ataasigh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata ke aat _ saam _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ ellnga n _ igleghte te u a _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh anite uq _ , _ sa mete uq llu _ alngunak _ .
Christ-am _ tamaghhagh emta _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ tunute yameng _ qepghaqagh ni _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ tuune kaqe ai _ taakut _ tunusagh t _ tuune yu ke llegh mitun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe kau lghii _ , _ " _ mayugh aqngami _ uusqagh llegh mun _ tugu kaqe ai _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ wayagh ke aat _ , _ yug t llu _ tunusagh ligh quqagh ke ai _ . _ "
sa meng _ pisiiwa _ , _ " _ mayugh kau uq _ " _ ? _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ sivuke luni _ uki kau uq _ samavek _ asilighneghanun _ nuna m _ .
enkaam _ ellnga _ taana _ ukikagh _ samavek _ , _ ellnga u uq _ ataasigh _ taana _ mat- yuqagh _ pamavek _ ingyagh luki _ qilag t _ , _ imigh na luku _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nayute te nga llegh mineng _ .
ellnga u uq _ tunusagh ligh quqagh _ yug nun _ : _ ila i _ apostle-nguluki _ , _ ila i _ uuknaliqe i ste u luki _ , _ ila i _ evangelist- ngugh lug ke i _ , _ ila i _ yughaghte u luki _ , _ apeghtughiste u luki llu _ .
taakut _ tunusalitkaqii _ apeghtiisqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ ellngit nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ ellnga _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ nekefte sqellug qu _ Christ-am _ yugusigh a _ .
taana _ qepghaqagh _ nagnegh lleqe uq _ kenlanga _ ataasiighte lleg mnnun _ ugpeqe i lleg mteggun _ , _ liisimake lleg mteggun llu _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taagken _ angtaniitngwaaghluta _ Christ-atun _ lliigh lleqe ukut _ .
enkaam _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u nanigh lleqe ukut _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ puughte snaanghite ukut _ yug nun _ temngimeng _ apeghtugh i llegh itgun _ . _ apeghtugh i llegh it _ anuqe stun llu _ imaghllug stun llu _ ayuqe ut _ nuugte aatagh lghiit _ yug neng _ . _ tamaakut _ peghqinegh lghiit _ , _ iqlengagh lghiit _ yug t _ , _ iqlengateng _ ipate yug nighte yagh aqe ait _ maghyaghqugh neghllugte na luki _ yug t _ .
itupill _ akuzi tke lteggu _ ipapilleq _ piniqe llegh kun _ , _ enkaam _ wata _ Christ-atun _ lliigh lleqe ukut _ salleg mteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ . _ Christ-a _ naasqugh ke aat _ ugpeqagh t _ .
ugpeqagh ni _ yugusigh ke ainkut _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga kun _ iingunagh mi _ yugusigh _ qerngughte te kau uq llu _ nuverragh te kau uq llu _ yugusigh m _ ivalu akun _ . _ qamagte luteng _ nalighnegh t _ qepghanneghmeggni _ qepghagh lleghqagh megestun _ , _ taawa _ yugusigh _ nagwaaquq _ , _ iknaqughsaghaquqlu _ piniqe llegh kun _ .
Enkaangam _ Atanghem _ ategh akun _ whaten _ pi amsi llu _ kelengasaaghamsillu _ : _ kiyaghte gpenasi ngam _ Gentile-et _ kiyaghtaallghistun _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh it _ sasii nghite ngugh u ut _ ,
umyugagh it llu _ liigike i igate ngugh u ut _ . _ ilate nga nghite ut _ unguvallegh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh anun _ , _ qayughllak _ nallukngwaagh aat _ , _ pineghllug u ut llu _ .
talwa _ kayngu yug yaghqaa nanigh ma ut _ ; _ atuqe aqe ait llu _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ seghlegh t _ yugusigh meng _ piyukekagh it _ . _ nagnegh te yug aqe ait _ qamagte luki _ seghlegh t _ nuqetutegpenaki _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ liite llghite asi _ Christ-am _ apeghtuusagh itneng _ !
nagaqugh pestaagh qaghkagh i _ ellnga _ , _ qayughllak _ maligsaaghtekegkangisi _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtugh kau usi _ ipa _ apeghtuusagh aneng _ Jesus-em _ .
whaten _ apeghtugh kaqe aisi _ : _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ puughte lleqe aisi llu _ naafqe lleqe aisi llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pegte ki _ nangaghnegh lug si llu _ kiyaghtaalqesaqesillu _ .
itupill _ taghneghagh m _ nutaghte liki _ umyugagh si _ .
enkaam _ atuqe teggu _ nangaghneghraghagh i _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe a _ ellmi tun _ ayuqe luku _ : _ elqughutngapiigluku _ , _ agleghnagh luku llu _ .
enkaam _ iqlengiqnanightegngam _ ! _ itupill _ iiwleng _ apegh teggu _ ipapilleq _ ila gpesinun _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luta _ nalighnequghiinkut _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ .
sakrite tek _ iwernga _ seghleghqe gpenasi _ . _ siqinegh _ tevigh ste gpenaan _ paninang _ sakrite u lusi _ .
talwa _ tughneghagh _ pilleghqalitegpenaan _ nanghiiqusqellusi _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ .
Tegleghniighta _ tegleg nanigh li _ . _ itupill _ qepghagh li _ allgegh te yaghqaa luni _ aklukegkamineng _ , _ tuune i yaghqaaghte lleqe uq llu _ aklu ke igh lghii nun _ .
akuzi tke i gpenasi _ seghlegh meng _ . _ itupill _ aleghqugh teki _ pinitun _ yug t _ aklu ke igh llegh itni _ . _ pinigh lghiit _ akuzite t _ kayeme yaghqaqe ait _ , _ aneghneghqesaghqaqiit _ nagate lghiit _ .
qivghu ste gpenakek llu _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh kek _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taghneghagh gmineng _ nalluniigh kaqe aisi _ ellmi _ piknalusi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ iteme te lleqe aisi _ seghleghqe llegh gpesineng _ iteme te llegh m _ aghnegh a _ kaate kan _ .
pegte ggu _ ugumikeraaq _ , _ sakraa _ , _ sakraa ghllag _ , _ yupighqaghaataq _ , _ seghlequuq _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ seghlegh t _ .
yeghlegi _ nangllegtagh tek _ , _ nafughtagh tek _ ila gpesinun _ , _ seghevutullusillu _ , _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute kaqe kangisi _ Christ-akun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ elpek si _ avaqutagh ke ta aneng _ piniqe pigtekagh i _ , _ ayuqesighagh teggu _ .
Kiyaghtaallesi _ aaghqute aqe steki _ piniqe llegh mun _ , _ katam _ Christ-am _ piniqe kanginkut _ , _ tuquma tke kaqe kanginkut llu _ . _ tuqu llegh a _ tepkegtagh tun _ tunusagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ aghqe te u uq llu _ ellnga nun _ .
elpek si _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke kangisi _ , _ enkaam _ kitumun _ alngunak _ allaniigh ste u ni fqaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe ste u ni fqaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakig nigh ughte u ni fqaafsi _ . _ tamaakut _ seghleghu ut _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pi yaghqaqe nghite ait _ .
kayngusaghagh te gpenasi _ , _ temngitwhameng _ akuzi tke gpenasi _ sex-meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ amyughaagh tke gpenasi _ sex-meng _ . _ itupill _ iyamsiqayugviksaghqaqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Nalluneqnaghhiituq _ una _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ pagite yaghqagh ite uq _ ataneghpag u llegh ani _ Christ-amllu _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ seghleghqe lghii _ allaniighmeng _ , _ alngunak _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakigniighmeng _ . _ ( _ pakignegh t _ manig ughte u ut _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ . _ )
yug nun _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ungipaate kangisi _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ seghleghu nghite ni luki _ . _ iwernga _ tawatelnguut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ kiyaghnegh _ sakraa ste ghllag aqe aat _ qaatke te nghite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilate gpenasi _ tawatelngughnun _ yug nun _ .
yug stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ mamleg mi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ kiyaghtengnguusi _ nighug mi _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ pike kangisi _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghte tek _ yug stun _ nighugmelngughestun _ .
( _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte negh gpesini _ nighug mi _ pinigh ste aqe aisi _ , _ elqughute nga ste aqe aisi _ , _ ipa u ste aqe aisi _ . _ )
liite naqe teggu llu _ sa u a _ efqugh nagh lghii _ atanegh mun _ .
ilate qaghtagh gpenasi _ yug nun _ sea-te u nghite ngugh meng _ pi lghii nun _ mamleg mi _ . _ itupill _ liigike steki _ tawaten _ pillghit _ seghleghu ut _ .
kayngu nagh pigte ut _ talwa _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luteng _ tamaakut _ pi aqe kangit _ aksaqe luku _ .
iwernga _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ aliightekumeng _ nighug mun _ , _ taawa _ nateteghpigaatangi _ whateghlluwaaq _ aliigh lleqe ut _ , _ qayughllak _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ nighug m _ esghagh yaghqaaghte ste lleqe a _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ qavagh lghii mi _ , _ taghtugh ghhaaten _ . _ unguva a _ tuqu llegh meng _ enkaam _ Christ-am _ kukegte lleqe aaten _ . _ "
enkaam _ kelenga lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ . _ Peghqinghunghilngughestun _ kiyaghte gpenasi _ ; _ itupill _ peghqinghestun _ kiyaghte tek _ .
pinitun _ atuqe teggu _ tamaghhagh an _ pi lleghqagh i _ qayughllak _ aghnegh ni _ maaten _ yug t _ seghletun _ pi aqe ut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nallu fqaafsi _ , _ iwernga _ liigike teggu _ sa u a _ Atanghem _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ elpesi nun _ .
suume gpenasi _ wine- meng _ qayughllak _ naafqe lleqe aisi _ . _ iwernga _ imigh tek _ taghneghagh gneng _ ,
aleghquute aqe lusi _ akuzi ta itneng _ psalms-et _ , _ ilagaate t _ , _ taghneghagh kun llu _ ilagaate neng _ . _ ilagagh aqe tek _ ilagaate neng llu _ psalms-enengllu _ atanegh mun _ , _ usuqe i lleg ligh lusi _ ilu gpesigun _ .
ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ iyamsiqa yug vike manginagh teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ata a _ saam _ tamaghhagh an _ .
malighqutagh ke nga lusi _ ila gpesinun _ qayughllak _ siivakngukesi _ Christ-a _ .
nuliigh ni _ , _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ katam _ atanegh mun _ pi lghii stun _ .
qayughllak _ ugi _ naasqugh ke a _ nulighh an _ katam _ Christ-a _ naasqugh ke kangat _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ Christ-a _ yuguligh i stekagh at _ ugpeqagh t _ ; _ ellnga n _ yugusigh ke ai _ .
katam _ ugpeqagh t _ malighqutaqellghistun _ Christ-amun _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ sa llegh kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ nulighh t _ malighqutagh ke yaghqaa ut _ ugi meggnun _ .
ugi ni _ , _ piniqe luki _ nula isi _ katam _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh atun _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ piniqe pigtekaqe ai _ repall _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ .
ugpeqagh t _ agleghnaghsagh kaqe ai _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ akuzite mi _ , _ pelungighsagh kaqe ai llu _ aghvig luki _ megh kun _ .
