Christ-a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ aangʼghunnaluki _ ugpeqagh t _ ellmi nun _ katam _ pinighnagh lghii tun _ ugiigh naqe lghii tun _ . _ tuqu kau uq _ ugpeqagh t _ tagneqriitesqelluki _ , _ ungllevregiitesqelluki _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ afkuyiitesqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ nuliighqagh a _ agleghnagh lleqe uq _ , _ avute ite lleqe uq llu _ .
ugi m _ piniqe yaghqaqe a _ nuliigh ni _ piniqe llegh mitun _ yugusigh ni _ . _ ugi _ piniqe i lghii _ nuliigh mineng _ ellmi neng _ piniqe u uq _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ugumi ke igate a _ ellmi _ katam _ yugusigh ni _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ negh sta qaa llu _ aflenga kaqe a llu _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ Christ-am _ pi aqe llegh atun _ ugpeqagh nun _ ,
qayughllak _ nalighnequghiinkut _ ellnga n _ yugusigh an _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug m _ unite lleqe ak _ ata ni llu _ naa ni llu _ ilate na luni _ nuliigh minun _ . _ enkaam _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ ataasiighte lleqe uk _ . _ "
Taam _ akuzite m _ igaqegkagh m _ qayvighte a _ megnu nagh pigte lghii _ ipapilleq _ : _ Christ-allu _ ugpeqagh t llu _ ataasigh u ut _ .
iwernga _ taana _ elpesi nun llu _ ayuqe uq _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ ugi m _ piniqe pestaagh yaghqaqe a _ nuliigh ni _ ellmi neng _ katam _ piniqe lghii stun _ . _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ nulighh m _ sii vag ke yaghqagh ke a _ ugi ni _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ qaatke te lusi _ angayuqagh gpesinun _ Atanghem _ pi sqe sug llegh atun _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ elqughute nga uq _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ kiyaghnegh _ qelegh i kau uq _ , _ " _ Quulvaghluku _ ata n llu _ naa n llu _ . _ " _ taana _ qelegh sagh _ sivulii uq _ akequsagh leg _ .
whaten _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Kiyaghtaallghen _ itagnagh lleqe uq _ , _ taake luku llu _ kiyaghte lleqe uten _ nuna mi _ . _ "
angayuqagh ni _ , _ sakrite ste gpenaki _ taghnughhagh si _ . _ yeghlegi _ angli steki _ peghqigsagh luki llu _ apeghtughaghlukillu _ Atanghem _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghni _ , _ alinge lleg ligh lusi llu _ ungelegllelighlusillu _ qaatke teki _ piliitistesi _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ Ipapighqellusi _ qepghagh ta qite ki _ , _ katam _ Christ-a _ qepghagh te llegh gpesistun _ .
Piliitistesi _ qaatke teki _ qaywa _ esghapag nghite ghngaisi _ . _ qepghagh tek _ efqughhnaluki _ piliitistesi _ katam _ efqughtelleghpesistun _ atanegh _ . _ ilu gpesineng _ atuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ Christ-amun _ qepghaghtelaaqelghiistun _ .
enkaam _ qepghagh tek _ sagiqe lusi _ atanegh mun _ pi lghii stun _ , _ nakaan _ yug nun _ .
neqamike luku _ Atanghem _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ , _ pinitun _ pillghitnun _ . _ atanegh _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ qepghaghtelaaghnunllu _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilngughnunllu _ .
Piliitisteni _ , _ pinitun _ pi teki _ qepghaghtelaasi _ katam _ ungipaate lleg mtun _ ellngit _ pinitun _ pisqellusi _ . _ alingsequ gpenaki _ . _ neqamike luku _ elpek si llu _ qepghaghtelaasillu _ ataasigh meng _ atanegh lgu usi _ qilagmelngughmeng _ . _ ellnga n _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ taniillngunaki _ .
kinguligh _ apegh yaghqaqe a _ unanguuq _ , _ iknaqe lleg nge tek _ atanegh meng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllaganengllu _ .
aate kek _ iingunaagkenka _ akulghaaghek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe gkakek _ elpesi nun _ . _ taagken _ tengvimun _ nekevgha saghqagh ughte lleqe asi _ tughneghagh m _ puughte i llegh i _ .
neqamike luku _ , _ pilluwaangunghitaput _ yug t _ . _ itupill _ pilluwaangwaaput _ igleghte te i lghiit _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelget _ , _ igleghte te i lghiit _ nuna m _ mamleg aneng _ , _ seghlegh t llu _ tughneghagh t _ qilaganilnguut _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aate kek _ iingunaagkenka _ akulghaaghqek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe gkakek _ elpesi nun _ ! _ enkaam _ seghleliighem _ aghnegh ani _ pilluwaghyaqlegulleqasi _ anguyag m _ sughugallghi _ . _ taagken _ pilluwaneghmeng _ apeghiigh kufsi _ , _ elpek si _ paninang _ nekevgha u lleqe usi _ .
enkaam _ nekevgha manginagh tek _ . _ Ipapilleq _ tafsi uute ggu _ , _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ sakimag iitagh ite ggu _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nekeggmellegh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ kameg ii teki _ .
tamaakut _ saaghw itgun _ , _ atuqe teggu _ ugpeqe i llegh _ amiigigh aghtagh sigh u luku _ qaamsaghqaaluki _ kumangalghiit _ aaygu i _ tughneghagh- m _ .
aate ggu _ yuguligh llegh _ naasqughiitagh u luku _ , _ taghneghagh m llu _ savigpag a _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi tke a _ .
iiwleng _ yughaghte k _ taghneghagh m _ maghyaghqugh te llegh akun _ . _ atuqe luki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ yughagh llegh t _ , _ aapte niigh tek llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kelenga lusi _ , _ iilqayug gpenasi _ . _ iiwleng _ yughagh te kete luki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
whanga llu _ yughagh tke tengnga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ akuzitelitesqellunga _ . _ taagken _ tetug gpenanga _ apegh lleqe aqa _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ salin _ liigike ste llghite kanga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ akuzi ste u lunga _ ellmi nun _ . _ enkaam _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qiipraghusighlunga _ . _ yughaghte k _ ungipagh ke i na lunga _ tetug gpenanga _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ .
liisimake sug amsi _ natetulemnengllu _ sa aqe te mneng llu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kayagte ma aqa _ Tychicus _ elpesi nun _ . _ piniqekagh ut _ ugpeqaalgutfut _ , _ ataasiighmelnguuguqlu _ qepghaghtenga _ Atanghem _ . _ kaate kuni _ ungipaate lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ whanga mneng _ , _ kayeme lleqe aisi llu _ .
kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ atanegh meng llu _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ elpesi nun _ pi u uk _ nekeggmellegh llu _ , _ piniqe llegh llu _ ugpeqe i lleg leg _ .
nangllegtagh llegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ pi u uq _ piniqe i lghii ni _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ piniqe lleg ligh luku _ naange yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-mengllu _ Timothy-mengllu _ pi u ut _ , _ qepghaghtekiinkung _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ lata aqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ yughaghvig m _ igleghutistengitni _ , _ deacon-enillu _ Philippi-melngughni _ , _ ugpeqe i lghiit _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmellelguslisillu _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ elpesi neng _ sumeghtaghaatkennemsi _ .
Yughaatkennemsi _ quya pigte aqe unga _ ,
qayughllak _ neqamike aqa _ ungipagh ke i lgusigh qagh qagh zinga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ kayusigh qagh qagh zinga _ ugpeqe i yuggaagh llegh gpesineng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ whavemun _ kenlanga _ .
Liisimakngwaaghaqa _ kiyaghnegh _ piinligh ikagh _ pinigh lghii meng _ qepghaqagh meng _ ilu gpesini _ , _ ellnga n _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ Christ _ Jesus _ uteghnigh kan _ .
itagnagh pigte uq _ whanga mni _ sumeghtaghaatkennemsi _ tawaten _ qayughllak _ ilumnitaqusi _ . _ ungipagh ke i u lunga llu _ ipapighqingulungallu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ipa u ni luki _ , _ maaten llu _ anusimingllaghvig mete lunga _ , _ qamagte lusi _ allgeghtengngwaaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ whanga mnun _ maligte te lusi _ .
kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekaqe a _ esghagh yug pigte aqe amsi _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte lusi _ piniqe amsi _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ piniqe llegh atun _ elpek si _ .
yughagh te kaqe amsi _ piniqighllagesqellusi _ , _ liisimallengataghiisqellusi _ , _ liigikellengataghiisqellusillu _ .
tawaten _ lliigh kufsi _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ sa u a _ pinigh lleghpigagh _ nakmikumanginaghyagulleqaghsi _ . _ taagken _ Christ-a _ tagi nqigtekan _ pelungite lleqe usi llu _ anaggute llghite lleqe usi llu _ .
enkaam _ unguvallegh si _ imigh lleqe ut _ ipapestaaq _ pi niigh pigte lghii meng _ Jesus _ Christ-anginaghhaam _ piite stekagh aneng _ . _ taagken _ yug t _ quulvaghlleqaatlu _ , _ usuqe lleqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sug aqa _ anusimingllaghvig mete llegh ma _ ipapestaaq _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ nagate sta _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qamagte luteng _ umiileg m _ mangteghagh an _ kelengakistengita _ liite aat _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ qayughllak _ qepghaghtekegkanganga _ Christ-am _ .
anusimingllaghvig mete llegh ma _ allute luteng _ ugpeqagh lghute t _ ugpeqagh igh aghagh ste ai _ atanegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ wata _ tetug nanigh aghagh ut _ ungipagh ke nghmegteggu _ Christ-a _ .
ipa u uq _ ila i _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ qayughllak _ aqinake u kangatnga llu _ aaghtiiraagh u kangatnga llu _ . _ iwernga _ ila i _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ elqughute luteng _ .
ungipagh ke i u ut _ qayughllak _ piniqe kangatnga _ . _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi stekaqe aanga _ whavek _ nekevghatesqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ anguyag mnneng _ .
iwernga _ ila it _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ ellnginaayugtem _ , _ ipapighqegpenateng _ . _ sumegh meggni _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ seghleliighqataghaghnilunga _ pi atnga _ anusimingllaghvig mete ma lunga _ .
itagnagh uq _ , _ ungipagh ke i llegh at _ elqughute nga yagh ghngaan _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ alla neng _ apallugh lgu yagh ghngaan _ , _ ungipagh ke i llghite a _ quya ste aqe aanga _ , _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke i u ut _ Christ-ameng _ uglapiglleghiinun _ .
aa-a _ quya nga lleqe unga _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake aqa _ aane yaghqaa unga _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ yughagh tke llegh gpesigun _ , _ kayusillegh akun llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ taghneghagh an _ .
piyuke llegh ghllag ka llu _ , _ sighimake llegh ghllag ka llu _ esgha _ taana _ , _ kayngusaghagh te fqaama _ pi na lunga _ Christ-amun _ . _ itupill _ kiyaghte yug aqe unga _ ilutu lunga _ wataqaaghaq _ maaten _ anusimingllaghvig mete lleg mni _ . _ enkaam _ Christ-a _ quulvallengellequq _ unguva ghngaaghma _ , _ nalighmeng _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghma _ .
whanga mni _ unguvallegh _ Christ-anguuq _ , _ enkaam _ tuqu llegh _ allgeghutaghallghuuq _ .
iwernga _ unguva naqngu kuma _ qepghagh aghagh lleqe unga _ Christ-amun _ . _ Nalikek _ nakmike lleghqagh ka _ nalluke aqa _ , _ unguvallegh _ nalighmeng _ tuqu llegh _ .
kukriqe u unga _ naligkeneng _ nakmiigh lleghqagh mneng _ . _ aghulaqe yu pigte aqe yagh unga _ Christ-amennalunga _ , _ qayughllak _ pinigh aghagh yaghqaa uq _ taana _ .
iwernga _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ unguva u unga _ .
Ipapighqutkumaaqa _ taana _ , _ liisimake aqa _ wiin _ unguva naqngu unga _ . _ elpesinite naqngu unga _ kayusiite na lusi _ nagusqellusi _ , _ quyamallengesqellusi _ ugpegh llegh gpesigun _ .
elpesi nun _ pi kuma _ , _ usuqataghaghlleqaghsi _ Christ _ Jesus _ whanga _ apallugh ke lunga _ .
sa yagh ghngaatnga _ nagnegh te ki _ kiyaghtaallesi _ Christ-am _ apeghtugh llegh atun _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ . _ enkaam _ esghagh yaghtugh kumsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ aviite ghngaaghma _ nagaqugh kumsi _ , _ liigike lleqe aqa _ ataasigh stun _ pi llegh i _ . _ liigike lleqe aqa llu _ qerngagh gpesi _ nekevgha tete naqutke lleg si _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ anguyag gpesineng _ .
alike gpenaki _ angu yasi _ , _ quunpeng _ ilutu tete lusi _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesi _ ipapighqelleqaat _ ellngit _ kayaalqe i i naanghite ut _ . _ elpek si _ kayaalqe i uute lleqe usi _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ kayaalqe i i ste i lghii _ elpesi neng _ .
elpesi nun _ qepghaasaqlegughtestekaqaa _ Christ-a _ , _ ugpeqnginaghpenaan _ , _ ikfiqe lgusigh kesi llu _ .
Pilluwalgusightengnga _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ esghapag qagh qagh zinga _ piyaqli i lghiinga _ , _ nagaqugh kaqe asi llu _ piyaqli i llegh nka _ maaten _ . _ elpek si llu _ tamaakut _ ataasigh t _ piyaqleg iigh te kete naqngu asi _ .
Kiyaghtaalleghpesi _ Christ-akun _ iknaqughtisii _ ? _ piniqe llegh an _ ilutughte i sagh i _ ? _ quya aqe tsi _ ataasigh stun _ lliigh lghiisi _ ugpeqagh u lgutke te lghii ni _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ ? _ pinitun _ pi aqe stekagh i _ , _ nanglleg ke aqe stekagh i _ ila si _ ?
tawatete u kufsi _ , _ quya ma ste ghllag tengnga _ piniqe te llegh gpesigun _ , _ ataasigh stun _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ ataasigh stun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ .
Ellnginaayugneghugpenasi _ , _ aangaayugneghugpenasi _ . _ yeghlegi _ qusevgutullusi _ , _ ila gpesineng _ pinigh aghagh ni lusi _ sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ .
sumegh ke gpenaki _ piyukellghiinasi _ , _ yeghlegi _ piyuke lleg si _ pakig qagh luki _ kayusiite aqe luki _ ila si _ .
sumeghnegh si _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ sumeghnegh atun _ ayuqligh t _ .
Jesus _ kiyaghnegh tun _ ayuqe yagh ghngaaghmi _ sumeghtaghagh mangite uq _ kiyaghnegh _ inglu ke yaghqaa luku _ .
yeghlegi _ kiyaghnegh u lleg ni _ pakig luku _ , _ qepghaghtestun _ lliigh kau uq _ . _ yug stun _ lliigh kau uq _ , _ allgegh kau uq llu _ yug stun _ .
yugughte yami _ qusevegtekau uq _ enkaam _ qaatke te kau uq _ tuqu llegh mun _ , _ talwa _ tuqu kau uq _ qaquuragh kun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ Jesus _ aange lleghpigagh u luku _ , _ atigh kaqe a llu _ atanegh meng _ aangelleghpigaghmeng _ ateghyaggaghneng _ .
Enkaangam _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ qilagmelnguum _ , _ nunamelnguum _ , _ nuna m _ asinganilnguum _ quulvaghlleqaat _ Jesus _ qungughte uute llegh megteggun llu _ apegh llegh megteggun llu _ , _ " _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ Atanghuuq _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ quulvaghlleqaat _ kiyaghnegh _ a ta _ .
Enkaangam _ piniqekagh mni _ , _ elpesi nite lunga _ qaatke manginagh qagh qagh zinga _ , _ maaten _ aviillegh mni _ qaatke aghagh tengnga _ . _ Iighwightesqelluku _ yuguligh llegh i _ qepghagh manginagh tek _ alinge lleg ligh lusi llu _ ungelegte lleg ligh lusi llu _ ;
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh _ quunpeng _ qepghagh u uq _ elpesi ni _ atuqe yagute sqellug qu _ piyuke lleg ni _ , _ qaatkusagutesqellusillu _ piyuke llegh minun _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ pi aqe teggu _ akuzilgafqaafsi _ , _ nalighmeng _ aaghtiiraagh te fqaafsi _ .
enkaam _ avute ite lleqe usi llu _ pelungite lleqe usi llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ avaquti a _ avute ite yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghtengnguluteng _ akule itni _ puughtinghetlu _ seghleghqestetlu _ . _ kuukgute pestaagh yaghqaa usi _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ nuna mi _ ,
ungipagh ke i u lusi _ ellngit nun _ Christ-ameng _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug meng _ . _ enkaam _ tagi nqigtekan _ quyasleqaghpesinga _ elngaatall _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghtaalleghpesi _ kelgute yaghqaqe a _ qepghagh llegh ka _ temngingu nghite ngughk _ .
ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqe te stun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tuqute kangatnga _ whani _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ quya lleqe unga _ , _ qayughllak _ tuqu llegh ka _ aghqe te stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ tuune lghii _ elpek si _ aghqe te gpesinun _ iighwigh sigh u luni _ . _ Taam _ qamagte luta _ quya ste lleqe ainkut _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ elpek si llu _ quya yaghqaa usi _ , _ quyalgusighllagyaghqaqaghpesinga _ .
Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ , _ Timothy _ kayagte yaghtugh ngestagh aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ quya lleqe unga _ ungipange gkuma _ elpesi neng _ .
Timothy-nginaghhaam _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aisi _ sumeghtaghagh tke lleg mtun _ .
tamaakut _ ila i _ kiyang _ ellmeggneng _ katam _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe ut _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qepghaqagh a _ avelghagh luku _ .
iwernga _ Timothy _ liisimakngwaaghaghsi _ nateghtu langa _ . _ ighnegh stun _ kayuute yiite kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i u lunga _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ .
liigike ghesnagh kumkun _ aanesaghqagh u tke a _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ kayagte lleqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ .
neghyuke aqa _ atanegh _ whanga llu _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh unga _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aqa _ ugpeqaalgutfut _ epaphroditus _ elpesi nun _ uteghnigh ste na luku _ . _ kayute kaghqagh yug ma lunga _ tagi stekaqe kesi _ kayusiitesqellunga _ . _ qerngagh emtung _ qepghaqagh u ukung llu _ ungipagh ke i kau ukung llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ nekevgha te kaqe apung llu _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ kipullginaalghiineng _ .
aglagh ste naqe aqa _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ aghyuqe u uq _ . _ Pengʼgaqiisi _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh kaqe kesi _ qinuyug llegh aneng _ .
ipa u uq _ qinuyug ghllag kau uq _ repall _ tuqu vzigh kau uq _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kaqe a _ , _ whanga llu _ nanglleg yagute kaqe aanga _ . _ tuquma yagh kan _ wataqaaghaq _ qivghu lleg nge aghagh nayagh unga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ wataqaaghaq _ aglagh sug aqa _ elpesi nun _ . _ kaate kan _ esghagh kufsigu _ quya lleqe usi _ , _ enkaangam _ itagnaghi lleqe unga _ whanga llu _ .
epaphroditus _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghmi _ qepghaqagh u uq _ Christ-amun _ , _ aaqun _ tuqu vzigh kau uq _ . _ kayusiite kaqe aanga _ qayughllak _ elpek si _ kayusiitepagningitkaqaghpesinga _ , _ aviilnguusi _ . _ quyake sigh ke luku _ upugha tete nakesi _ qayughllak _ anglegutkaghsi _ atanegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ quulvaghluki _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ Epaphroditus-etun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ naange niite te kun _ ungipaasuwamsi _ , _ " _ quya ma aqe tek _ atanegh kun _ ! _ " _ qinuyagute igate unga _ ungipaanneqiggnemsi _ lata tgun _ igaqegkagh mneng _ sivugh nghaani _ , _ enkaam _ ila lleqe uq _ paqniite llegh gpesinun _ .
kelenga lusi _ seghletun _ pikayug neng _ , _ tamaakuneng _ qikmigh neng _ , _ yugu ut _ sagiqe te i lghiit _ kepfikesqelluki _ yugusigh t _ .
whangkuta u ukut _ ugpeqagh ni _ circumcise-epiiwaaqani _ qayughllak _ manigughaqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ , _ usuqaqaghputlu _ Christ _ Jesus _ . _ neghyu igate ukut llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ piliitesqelluta _ whangkuta _ katam _ salleg mteggun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi liite yaghqaqe yagh kagu _ ellnga n _ katam _ sallghakun _ , _ whanga _ pi yaghqaa yagh unga _ . _ yug t _ tawaten _ pi yaghqaa yagh kata _ whanga _ wataqaaghaq _ pi nayagh unga _ ukut _ apallugh ke luki _ :
Circumcise-ekaqaatnga _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ aghneq _ atugh yamkun _ kingu aneng _ allgellegh ma _ . _ Israel-eghmiineng _ pi u unga _ , _ ramke aneng _ Benjamin-em _ . _ Hebrew-piiguunga _ , _ angayuqagh gka llu _ Hebrew-nguuk _ . _ malighqutagh ke nga ghllag unga _ Jewish-et _ liilightuusagh itnun _ , _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pharisee- ngughte unga _ .
sagiqe pigte lunga _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe anka _ ugpeqagh t _ . _ Qaatkengngwaaqaqanka _ Jews-et _ liilightuusagh it _ repall _ anaggute llegh mun _ avutngitkaagunga _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ allgeghtekaqnikaqsaqenka _ ifla ma anka _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-a _ .
ipa _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ifla ma anka _ apallugh ke luku _ megnunaghtulnga _ liitngwaallemneng _ Christ _ Jesus _ , _ atanegh ka _ . _ ellnga _ apallugh ke luku _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ egte ma anka _ . _ esghagh anka _ mallagh stun _ ayuqe luki _ allgeghteqeghnaluku _ Christ-a _ ,
ilate u aghte unga llu _ ellnga nun _ . _ ugpeqe nanigh ma aqa _ whanga mneng _ pinigh naqe llegh _ qaatke te lleg mkun _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ yeghlegi _ liisimake aqa _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh ste aqe aanga _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kegka _ Christ-a _ . _ una _ pinigh llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ayuqe uq _ , _ yug t _ allgegh taqagh at _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ Christ-ameng _ .
piyuke llegh ghllag ke aqa _ , _ liite na luku _ Christ-a _ , _ nanghiigh na luku llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ unguvaghtellghan _ ; _ ilate na lunga llu _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ , _ ellnga tun llu _ lliigh yaghqaa lunga _ tuqu llegh ani _ .
tawaten _ pi kuma _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ sighimake aqa _ whanga llu _ unguvaghtesqellunga _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
whaten _ pi u nghite unga _ , _ " _ Christ-atun _ lliigh ma unga _ nalighmeng _ Christ-atun _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ quunpeng _ . _ " _ iwernga _ pinaqellghaqa _ qamagte luku _ atuqe u aqa _ Christ-am _ piyuke llegh atun _ lliigh na lunga _ atuqe na luku llu _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ whanga mnun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ sumeghtaghagh igate unga _ kayaalqelghagtuumaniluku _ . _ iwernga _ ataasigh _ pi aqe aqa _ , _ puygu luku _ sa u a _ tunutemnilnguq _ sivutmiighnaqutkaqunga _ kaate na luku _ sa u a _ sivu mnite ngughk _ .
enkaam _ taklaghruketun _ kilgaaqu u unga _ kayaalqe i i sigh ke na luku _ akileghtuusagh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqlugh tekagh anun _ pamavek _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh nghite kufsi _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigike ste naagh ai _ sumeghtaghagh lleg si _ anaggute nga lghiit _ .
una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ , _ nagnegh te lteki _ kiyaghtaalleput _ maligte luku _ ipapighqelleq _ liitekagh ut _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ uspute aqe lunga _ maligte ngnga _ . _ esghapag luki _ ila i llu _ kiyaghte lghiit _ whanga mtun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ uglagh ghngaan _ ungipaate aatagh kaqe amsi _ , _ maaten _ ungipaate naqlaatagh amsi _ qunituumagh ma _ . _ uglagh u pigte ut _ kiyaghte lghiit _ anguyag u luteng _ Christ-am _ tuqu llegh aneng _ qaquuragh kun _ .
suumqagh ke ait _ yugusigh meng _ piyuke llegh it _ kiyang _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ avelghagh luku _ . _ kayngu yug sighqagh ke yagh ke teng _ aangaayugusiqaqiit _ . _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aat _ nunamelngughhiinaq _ kiyaghtaalleghteng _ enkaam _ naafqe lleg nge yaghqaa ut _ hell- mi _ .
iwernga _ ugpeqagh ni _ whangkuta _ qilag mii u ukut _ . _ enkaam _ utaqangwaaghput _ yuguligh i sta _ , _ atanegh _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ , _ ukig yaghqagh _ whangkunnun _ qilag meng _ pamaken _ .
tagi kuni _ allangughte yaghqaqe ai _ kayaalnguut _ , _ tuqumun _ ayuqe lghiit _ yugusigh put _ . _ Unguvaghtekatun _ yugusigh mitun _ lli aghte yaghqaqe ai _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun _ . _ taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun _ igleghte te yaghqaaghte lleqe a _ sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ .
Enkaangam _ piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ esghagh yug pigte amsi _ , _ quya ma sigh ke amsi _ , _ akileghtuusagh ke amsi llu _ qepghagh lleg mnun _ . _ tawaten _ aghula i te kestagh tek _ atanegh kun _ .
Euodia _ , _ Syntyche _ , _ qevuute lunga _ qelegh naqe amtek _ , _ taaqe tek _ aghiva tete nghmeng _ . _ ataasigh stun _ lliigh tek _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke te utek _ atanegh kun _ .
Qepghalgutemni _ Syzygus _ , _ elpek llu _ kayuute yiite aghte kek _ aghnagh k _ taake uk _ taaqe sqellug kek _ aghiva tete nghmeng _ . _ Elkegkenka _ qevuute lutek _ qepghagh lgusigh kaqe ainkut _ Clement-lu _ ila i llu _ qepghalgutenka _ , _ qamagte luta _ ungipagh ke i u luta _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ yug lghute ghllag nun _ . _ Qepghalgutma _ qamagte luteng _ ategh it _ igaqe nga ut _ igagh akun _ unguvallegh m _ . _ Tawantut _ igagh ni _ ategh it _ qamagte luteng _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh ngekagh t _ .
iiwleng _ quya ma aqe tek _ atanegh kun _ . _ pi naqlaatagh amsi _ , _ quya ma aqe tek _ !
nuqete neghtu llegh i _ yug m _ qamagte luni _ liite ligu _ . _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ .
sumeghyali tke gpenaan _ sa u a _ alngunak _ . _ yeghlegi _ , _ sa meng _ aklu kufsi _ yughagh negh gpesini _ tungsigh aqe tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunesqellusi _ . _ iiwleng _ tungsigh aqe tek _ igamsiqa yug lleg ligh lusi _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilu si llu _ umyugagh si llu _ nekeggmetesnaaghii _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellegh a _ aange ghllag uq _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ liigikngwaaghnaanghitaa _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ naange niite ta akun _ lata ma _ ungipaasuwamsi _ sumeghtaghaatkumanginiisqelluki _ pinigh lghiit llu _ usuqe yaghqagh t llu _ whatelnguut _ : _ tamaakut _ ipa pig t _ , _ quulvaghyaghqat _ , _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ pelungilnguut _ , _ piniqe yaghqagh t _ , _ tamaakut llu _ pinitun _ akuzite kete yaghqagh t _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nagnegh te ggu _ liitekagh i _ whanga mneng _ apeghtugh i lleg mkun llu _ kiyaghtaallemkunllu _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ nekeggmellelitikayuk _ elpesinite lleqe uq _ .
elngaatall _ quya pigte unga _ atanegh kun _ qayughllak _ qavngarugllaggaaneng _ whaa _ allameng _ kayusiite laatagh kefsinga _ ! _ liisimake aqa _ kayusiite yukagh qagh zinga _ , _ iwernga _ pipagningite kau usi _ .
aklu u ni lunga _ pi u nghite unga _ qayughllak _ natete yagh ghngaaghma _ itagnagh aqe unga _ .
ilangani _ nuughngaghma _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ , _ ilangani _ siipte i i lunga _ kiyaghte aqe unga _ . _ itagnagh yagute ma unga _ nani _ alngunak _ satulemtun _ kiyaghte negh mni _ . _ itagnagh aqe unga _ kepsughngaghma _ kiyaghte negh mni _ , _ iyatagh ghngaaghma llu _ kiyaghte negh mni _ , _ talwa _ akluma ghngaaghma llu _ , _ aklu nghite ghngaaghma llu _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ pi yaghqaqe aqa _ Christ-akun _ iknaqughsaghtemkun _ .
paninang _ elpek si _ pinitungwaaq _ kayusigh u aatagh qagh zinga _ seghleliigh negh mni _ .
elpek si _ Philippi-yeghmiini _ , _ liisimakngwaaghaghsi _ aghulaqe aqngama _ Macedonia-meng _ , _ ungipagh ke i yuwhaagh aqngama _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ , _ ellnginaagusi _ ugpeqagh ni _ kayusigh ikagh t _ whanga meng _ . _ Ellnginaagusi _ ilate nga lghiit _ allgegh te lleg mnun llu _ iflii lleg mnun llu _ .
ataasigh ghhagh u gpenaan _ aklupignemni _ mani meng _ Thessalonica-mellunga _ , _ tuyughaqaghpesinga _ .
iwernga _ liigike sug amsi _ tunute yasi _ mani t _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u nghite ut _ whanga mni _ . _ Megnunalleghpigaqta _ esgha _ una _ : _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh _ allgeghsaghqagh i _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pinitun _ pilleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ .
whaa _ maaten _ naama unga _ , _ aa-a _ , _ talwa _ siipte i i lunga _ ayuqe unga _ . _ tuyuusagh si _ Epaphroditus-kun _ qamagte luteng _ kaate ma ut _ , _ enkaam _ whaa _ aklu igate unga _ . _ tunute yasi _ whanga mnun _ aghqe tkekagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mi _ efqughtinapiglleghhiit _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghnegh ma _ yataaghqe te naagh aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aklukegkaghpesineng _ aklungite llegh ghllag mikun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
kiyaghnegh mnnun _ , _ ata mun _ usuqe i lta _ , _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
ungipagh u aatagh nakesi _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqagh t _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutet _ whangamnilnguut _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ , _ kiyang _ taakut _ Caesar-em _ mangteghagh mii ita _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ taghneghagh gpesinite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ apostle-ngughtekaagunga _ Christ _ Jesus-mun _ . _ Timothy-mengllu _ pi u ut _ ugpeqaalgutemnneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ pi u ut _ Colossae-melngughnun _ , _ ataasiighmelnguut _ ugpeqaalgutet _ Christ-akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ nekeggmellelisillillu _ .
iiwleng _ iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ yughaatkennemsi _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ nagaquumaaghput _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ Christ _ Jesus-meng _ , _ piniqe i llegh i llu _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh pigu ut _ . _ nagaqugh yuwhaagh aqe yafsiki _ , _ liite kau usi _ sighima llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ . _ enkaam _ sighmalleghpesi _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ste aqe aisi llu _ piniqe i lleg lgu ste aqe aisi llu _ . _ qilag mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ kagpag ma a _ elpesi nun _ sa u a _ sighimakekagh i _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ quya ste i manginagh u ut _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ mingite u ut _ iingunaghhaanun _ nuna m _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ quyastillghistun _ elpesi nun _ nagaqugh yuwhaagh aqe yafsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ taagken _ kenlanga _ legh igh iitagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
Liitkaqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleghtallgha _ epaphras- meng _ , _ piniqekagh mnneng _ qepghalgutemnneng _ . _ ataasiighmete luni _ qepghagh u uq _ Christ-amun _ , _ qepghaqagh ke a _ whangkuta _ qepghaghyukaqsaqefut _ .
ellnga n _ ungipaate ma ainkut _ piniqe i llegh meng _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ elpesi nun _ .
aghnegh meng _ taagken _ nagaqugh te mnneng _ tamaakut _ , _ yughagh te kete nanigh igate amsi _ . _ tungsigh te u amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ qamagte luku _ ellnga n _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ yughagh te kaqe amsi llu _ peghqinghusqellusi _ , _ liigikesqellukillu _ sa u aat _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ apeghtugh tke ai _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe usi _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh atun _ , _ iiwleng _ atuqaqelleqaghsi _ sa u a _ efqugh nagh lghii _ ellnga ni _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh gpesini _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ pinigh lghii _ qepghaghlleqaghsi _ enkaam _ wata _ liilleqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yughagh te kaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iknaqughsiisqellusi _ ilu gpesigun _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghllagmikun _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ nuqenneghtughteghllagesqellusi _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
enkaam _ quya ma lleg ligh ghllag lusi _ iyamsiqayugvikelleqaghsi _ a ta _ . _ ellnga u lghii _ elpesi nun _ nengigh lgute ste ikagh _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ tuune lleqe ni luki _ yug ni _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nighug mi _ .
ellnga n _ yugulikaqiinkut _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng _ mamleg m _ enkaam _ tagite kaqe ainkut _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ pinigh kegka mi _ ighnegh mi _ .
ellnga n _ tukfigh kaqe ainkut _ , _ seghevute kaqe ai llu _ seghleghqe lleg put _ .
Christ-a _ tawatete u aghte uq _ aliite nghite ngugh tun _ kiyaghnegh tun _ . _ kiyaghte u uq _ sivungagh ni _ sa u a _ alngunak _ ulima llghite luku _ , _ enkaam _ qulighpigaaguq _ ulimaaghyaggaghneng _ .
ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ qilagmelnguutlu _ nunamelnguutlu _ . _ ulima kaqe ai _ esghaqagh yu put _ , _ esghagh igate ke put llu _ tamaakut llu _ umiileg t _ , _ atanghet _ , _ igleghutistet _ , _ pi lleghqagh leg t llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima kaqe ai _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ Christ-akun _ , _ Christ-amunllu _ .
Christ-a _ tawantekaaguq _ sivu itni _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakunllu _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ellnga n _ nekaghqaghlluwaaghitnitestaqii _ .
ellnga _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvigmelngughnun _ , _ ellnga n _ yugusigh ke ai _ . _ ellnga n _ yugusigh _ unguvangustengngwaa _ . _ ellnga u uq _ unguvagh yuwhaagh ke aq _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ enkaam _ qulighpigaaguq _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke a _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ ellmi _ katam _ kiyaghte na luni _ ighnegh mi _ ilu ani _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh mikun _ veghute stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ nuna mi llu _ qilag mi llu _ . _ enkaam _ aaw akun _ ighnegh mi _ tuqu aqngan _ qaquuragh mi _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ai _ ellmi nun _ .
ataasigh meng _ pellegh nga yagh usi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ anguyag ke yagh aisi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ , _ seghletun llu _ pi llegh gpesigun _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilaliighunneqigtestiisi _ ellmi nun _ ighnegh mi _ yugusigh an _ tuqu llegh akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tagite na lusi _ nayute te nga llegh minun _ agleghnagh lusi _ , _ pelungite lusi _ , _ avutngillusillu _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ nagnegh kufsi _ ugpeqe luki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ aygughikellngunaki _ . _ iqite gpenasi _ sighmalleghmeng _ allgeghtekaghpesineng _ nagaqugh aqe yafsiki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ taakut _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke u ut _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nuna m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ , _ whanga _ Paul _ , _ qepghaghtengulunga _ ellmi nun _ ungipaqesqelluki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
ikfiqe llegh ma _ yugusigh mkun _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ quya ste ghllag aanga _ . _ tawaten _ kayusigh i u unga _ apeghiigh na luki _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh i _ yugusigh minun _ . _ ellnga n _ yugusigh a _ ugpeqagh u ut _ yughaghvigmelnguut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaghtengllaqaqaanga _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ tagivagh kaqe a _ una _ qepghaqagh _ kayusiitesqellusi _ , _ elpesi nun _ liigikngwaaghesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte mangite a _ una _ ipapilleq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ qayvightengngwaa _ ellmi _ yug minun _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ nakmiigh lghii _ yug minun _ liisimake sqellug qu _ sa u a _ qayvighte llghite kete ni _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ nakmike kaqe a _ liisimake sqellug qu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ uum _ ipapillghem _ akule itni _ Gentile-et _ . _ Ipapilleq _ qayvightekagh a _ unanguuq _ : _ Christ-a _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ ilu gpesini _ . _ Christ-anguuq _ sa igh i ma ut _ kiyaghtesqelluta _ kiyaghnegh mi _ ellnga n _ nighughqellghani _ .
enkaam _ ungipaqngwaaghput _ Christ-a _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ qamagte luku _ peghqinellegh kun _ , _ kelenga sagh u aghaghkagh put llu _ apeghtugh aqe aput llu _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ukut _ tagite na luki _ ataasikaghtiita _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nayute te nga llegh anun _ angtaniitkaaluki _ Christ-akun _ .
taana _ pi na luku _ taakunginaghhaagneng _ ughleghiigh unga _ atuqe luku _ Christ-am _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ qepghagh lghii _ iknaqe pigte luni _ ilu mnni _ .
Ungipaataghllamsi _ taakunginaghhaagneng _ qepghagh te i lleg mneng _ elpesi nun _ , _ ugpeqagh nun llu _ Laodicea-melngughnun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh anun llu _ esghaate igate ngugh neng _ whanga mneng _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe unga _ ilu it _ ilutughllengesqelluki _ , _ ataasiightesqellukillu _ piniqe llegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ liigike u aghte lleqe aat _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte ma ite kanga _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ taana _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvightekagh a _ Christ-anguq _ .
qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ peghqinellegh i llu _ liigike i nga llegh i llu _ Christ-ametut _ . _ taake uk _ aklungi stun _ ayuqe uk _ iigh nga lghiik _ Christ-ami _ .
ungipaate amsi _ , _ kitumun _ alngunak _ puughte ste gpenasi _ temngineng _ apeghtughallghitneng _ , _ qaywa _ ipasugniteghngaata _ .
qaywa _ uyavansaghngaaghma _ elpesi neng _ , _ umyugagh mkun _ elpesinite aqe unga _ . _ quya unga _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte lghiisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh atun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ Christ-akun _ aghuliilnguq _ .
tugukligh llegh gpesistun _ Christ _ Jesus _ Atanghuluku _ , _ tawateghpigaq _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghte tek _ ellnga kun _ .
ellnga kun _ akugh lgute k _ asivagh nun _ samavek _ , _ ellnga kun _ nekefte ki _ kiyaghtaallesi _ enkaam _ iknaqughtek _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ apeghtugh llegh gpesistun _ . _ iyamsiqa yug manginagh tek _ .
kelenga lusi _ ! _ kitumun _ alngunak _ aghulaqe te ste gpenasi _ temngitwhatgun _ apeghtughallghitgun _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtughallghet _ yug t _ sumeghtaghagh llegh itneng _ pi u ut _ , _ tughneghagh neng llu _ pi u ut _ , _ igleghte te i lghiit _ whani _ nuna mi _ . _ Christ-ameng _ pi u nghite ut _ ,
qayughllak _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ kiyaghnegh _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ Christ-am _ yugusigh ani _ .
Christ-a _ naasqugh u te i u uq _ igleghutistenunllu _ pi lleghqagh leg nun llu _ . _ ilate ste lusi _ Christ-amun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune kaqe aisi _ unguvallegh pig meng _ .
ilate nga llegh gpesigun _ Christ-amun _ circumcise-ekaagusi _ . _ Circumcise-elleghsi _ yug t _ pi ste llghite aat _ , _ iwernga _ Christ-am _ pi stekaqe a _ . _ enkaam _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ piyuke llegh itneng _ .
Paaptaayaaqngafsi _ qungugh te kau usi _ Christ-akun _ . _ taagken _ makete kau usi _ unguvallegh mun _ Christ-akun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ makete kaqe a _ Christ-a _ tuqumeng _ .
tuqu kau usi _ qayughllak _ seghleghqe ste u yalghiisi _ , _ qayughllak llu _ circumcise-elghilnguusi _ yugusigh gpesigun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe aisi _ Christ-akun _ qayughllak _ seghevute kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ seghleghqe lleg put _ .
qaatke nghite aqe yamteki _ kiyaghnegh m _ Liilightuusi _ seghleghqe llegh t _ pi ke aput _ igaqe kau ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite kaqe ai _ igaqughkagh t _ seghleghqe lleg put _ tuqu qagh te luki _ Christ-am _ qaquuragh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ wayaghteqagh ke ai _ guututangit _ igleghte te i lghiit llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelgetlu _ tughneghagh t _ . _ tawaten _ tea- ma anun _ esghagh stekagh a _ kayaalqe i i lleg ni _ tamaakuneng _ tughneghagh neng _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ nanqigte ste gpenasi _ neghe llegh meng llu _ meghe llegh meng llu _ , _ neqenghaghqe llegh t _ aghnegh itneng _ , _ nutaghagh t _ tanqigh t _ aghnegh itneng _ , _ nalighmeng _ Sabbath-et _ aghnegh itneng _ .
taakut _ taghneghagh nge te lghii stun _ ayuqe ut _ taakunun _ pi yaghqagh nun _ aga _ sivumelngughnun _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ ipa pig t _ Christ-ametut _ .
ila i _ yug m _ qusevegngasugnighqesuneghtuut _ , _ manigugh aqe ait llu _ yaquleg t _ . _ iiwleng _ akuzite kaqe ait _ esghaghwaagh lleg teng _ esghaghkagh teng _ . _ ellngit nun _ ungipaate ste gpenasi _ anaggute nga ni lusi _ . _ ellngit _ esleqnga ut _ temngitwhameng _ qukaayuglleghmeng _ qayughllak _ sumeghnegh it _ yug m _ sumeghnegh ke ai _ .
ellngit _ ilate nanigh ut _ Christ-amun _ naasqugh u te i lghii meng _ yugusigh mun _ . _ igleghte te u a _ iingunagh an _ yugusigh _ , _ iknaqughsaghaqaallu _ neghqe aqe luku _ . _ Qerngaghmetestaqaa _ yugusigh _ atuqe ste luki _ naflugh i llu _ ivalu i llu _ . _ enkaam _ yugusigh _ nagu u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagu ste sqe sug llegh atun _ .
Christ-a _ tuqu aqngan _ tuqulgusiqallghuuqaqaghsi _ . _ enkaam _ iteme te kau usi _ tughneghagh neng _ igleghte te i lghii neng _ whani _ nuna mi _ . _ Sanganʼngam _ kiyaghte aqe tsi _ nuna mun _ pike pigte lghii stun _ ? _ sangan _ qaatke aqe steki _ liilightughallghit _ whatelnguut _ ,
" _ safleg gpenaan _ , _ naasiigh gpenaan _ , _ saafte gpenaan _ ? _ "
taakut _ liilightughallghet _ yug t _ neghe ke ii te neng llu _ meghe ke ii te neng llu _ ayuqe ut _ . _ enkaam _ neghekagh it llu _ meghekagh it llu _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ liilightughallghet _ taawanginaghhaq _ yug t _ liilightughalqiitlu _ apeghtuusagh ke ait llu _ .
tamaakut _ liilightughallghet _ apeghtugh ait _ yug t _ peghqinesighwaaghesqelluki _ . _ apeghtugh ait llu _ amyuutkesqelluki _ yugusigh at _ , _ atuqnaniisqelluki _ yugusigh ita _ pikyukellghit _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi llghite a _ aghula i aghte igate ait _ atuqe nanigh lleghqagh meng _ tamaakut _ seghleghqe llegh t _ . _ tamaakut _ liilightughallghet _ ipate yu gnite ut _ iwernga _ temngingu ut _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
Unguvaghtekaategpesineng _ maligte te lusi _ Christ-amun _ , _ piyuke aqe teki _ sa u aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ elpesi nun _ pikesqelluki _ qilagmelnguut _ . _ tawani _ Christ-a _ aqumga uq _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
suumqagh qite ki _ tamaakut _ qilagmelnguut _ , _ nakaan _ tamaakut _ nunamelnguut _ .
tawaten _ sumeghtaghagh aqe tek _ qayughllak _ tuqu kau usi _ . _ unguvallegh i _ iigh nga uq _ Christ-ami _ kiyaghnegh kun _ .
Christ-a _ unguvalqaghput _ . _ aliigh kan _ , _ elpek si llu _ aliilgusighlleqaghsi _ nighughqellghani _ .
taaqe teki _ atuqe nghmeng _ yugusigh gpesi _ seghlegh t _ piyuke llegh it _ , _ katam _ allani ii aagh _ , _ ukmangite nghite ngughk _ kiyaghtaalleq _ , _ atuqe yu llegh a _ seghlegh m _ , _ pakig ni uq llu _ . _ pakig ni uq _ maniguute lghii stun _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ ayuqe uq _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag a _ tagi u uq _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun _ ellnga nun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ tawaten _ kiyaghtengnguyaghtusi _ .
iwernga _ maaten _ atuqe nanigh teki _ qamagte luki _ ukut _ : _ sakraa _ , _ sakraa ghllag _ , _ ugumikeraaq _ , _ seghlequuq _ , _ seghlegh meng llu _ akuzi tke i llegh _ .
iqlengiqe te gpenasi _ qayughllak _ taaqumaaghsi _ kiyaghtaallelugsi _ , _ ayghigh te kaqsagh kesi llu _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghtaalleghraghaq _ atuqaaghsimaaghsi _ . _ Nutaghtengnguusi _ , _ Ulimaghistegpesistunllu _ lliigh u usi _ . _ tamaaken _ apalluquku _ liigikekestaghaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ kinaghpigaatanga _ .
Kiyaghtaalleghraghaghmi _ , _ allangughte te ite ut _ akule itni _ Gentile-etlu _ Jews-etlu _ , _ akule itni _ circumcise-ekatlu _ circumcise-ellghilnguutlu _ , _ akule itni _ barbarian-etlu _ , _ Scythian-etlu _ , _ akule itni llu _ qepghaghtelaaghetlu _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguutlu _ . _ iwernga _ Christ-a _ qulighpigaaguq _ , _ kiyaghtengnguuqlu _ tea- ma ghhagh mnni _ ugpeqagh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke aisi _ agleghnagh lghiit _ , _ piniqe pigte aisi llu _ . _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ . _ enkaam _ nangllegtagh lusi _ , _ nanglleg ke i lusi _ , _ qusevegte lusi _ , _ yakugh ke lusi _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi llu _ .
Sakritutegpenasi _ iwernga _ seghevutullusi _ . _ kinku t _ anagtegkangisi _ seghevute nakesi _ katam _ Atanghem _ seghevutellghistun _ elpek si _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ megnu nagh ut _ iwernga _ piniqe llegh _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ . _ piniqe te llegh m _ ataasiightengngwaaghiinkut _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ nalighnegh ke aisi _ Christ-am _ yugusigh an _ , _ enkaam _ nakmike kau usi _ kiyaghtesqellusi _ qerngagh gpesi _ nekeggmellegh kun _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ-am _ nekeggmellegh an _ igleghte te liki _ ilu si _ . _ iyamsiqa yug nga tek llu _ .
yeqay _ Christ-am _ apeghtuusagh i _ kemnagh luteng _ kiyaghte lit _ ilu gpesini _ . _ apeghtugh utu te aqe lusi _ , _ kelengasaaghututaqlusillu _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ peghqinellegh kun _ . _ ilagagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ iyamsiqa yug lleg ligh lusi _ ilu gpesigun _ , _ ilagagh tek _ psalms- neng _ , _ ilagaate neng _ , _ manigugh te mun llu _ ilagaate neng _ .
enkaam _ sa u a _ pikagh i _ , _ akuzite kun _ nalighmeng _ qepghagh llegh kun _ qamagte luku _ pi aqe teggu _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ . _ ellnga kun _ iyamsiqa yug vike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ a ta _ .
nuliigh ni _ , _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ Atanghem _ pisqesuwiisi _ .
ugi ni _ , _ piniqe luki _ nula isi _ , _ yakugh ke luki _ pi aqe teki _ .
taghnughhagh ni _ , _ qaute kete luki _ angayuqagh si _ sa llegh kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pillghem _ efqughtagh ke a _ atanegh _ .
ata ni _ , _ sakraa uute yaghagh gpenaki _ taghnughhagh si _ luuraq _ iilqennayukata _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghni _ , _ iiwleng _ qaute kete luki _ piliitistesi _ . _ iiwleng llu _ efqughhnaqluki _ esghapagughngaata _ nalighmeng _ esghapagunghiteghngaata _ . _ qepghagh te ki _ ipapighqellusi _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ quulvaangwaaghsi _ atanegh _ .
sa llegh gpesini _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ qepghagh aqe tek _ pinaqellghaghsi _ qamagte i i luku _ qepghagh te pigte lghii stun _ atanegh _ , _ nakaan _ yug nun _ .
neqamike luku _ Atanghuuq _ Christ-a _ qepghagh tekagh i _ . _ Allgeghlleqaghsi _ akileghtuusagh i _ ellnga neng _ . _ akileghtuusagh _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ yug minun _ .
iwernga _ kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi sta _ nallangigh yaghqaa uq _ seghletun _ pillghanun _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe a _ tamaghhagh an _ yuug _ tawateghlluwaaq _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghet _ piliitistengitni _ , _ pinitungwaaq llu _ atunengwaaqlu _ pi aqe teki _ qepghaghtelaasi _ , _ liisimake luku _ elpek si llu _ Piliitistelguusi _ qilag mi _ .
yughagh manginagh tek _ , _ iilqayug gpenasi llu _ yughagh aqe tek _ iyamsiqa yug vike magh an _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yughagh kufsi _ , _ yughaatkennakefsikutlu _ . _ yughaghte k _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qelpeghutesqelluta _ amig meng _ mingitesqelluki _ akuzi ta i _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighte mangite a _ ipapilleq _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaate aanga _ ungipagh ke sqellug qu _ taana _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ ipapilleq _ . _ ungipagh ke kaqe te mneng _ taana _ ipapilleq _ anusimingllagh aatnga _ .
enkaam _ yughagh tke tengnga _ una _ ungipagh _ ungipagh ke yaghqaa luku _ whateghlluwaaq _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ whanga mnun _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
Peghqinghwaaqitek _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngughnite negh gpesini _ . _ atuqe aqe teggu _ tamaghhagh an _ pi lleghqagh i _ ungipaate yaghqaa luki _ Christ-ameng _ .
aleghqugh nghpesiki _ iiwleng _ nangllegtagh lusi _ , _ akuzi aqe lusi _ itagnagh yugnagh lusi _ , _ nagate yugnagh lusi llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe tek _ liisimakesqellusi _ naten _ kiimsigh lleghqagh it _ aapqughaallghit _ .
Tychicus _ ugpeqagh u lgutke aqa _ , _ piniqe pigtekaqe a _ . _ qepghagh lgutke aqa _ , _ qepghagh te aqe a llu _ atanegh _ whanga mnun _ maligte te luni _ .
kayagte aqa _ elpesi nun _ , _ liisimake sqellug qu _ natetulvut _ enkaam _ kayemellengesqellusi _ . _ ungipaate naagh aisi _ whanga mneng _ .
kayagte aqa llu _ Onesimus _ elpesi nun _ . _ piniqe kau uq _ ataasiighmelnguq _ ugpeqaalgun _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi u uq _ . _ Tychicus-enkuk _ ungipaate lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ sa llegh neng _ maani _ .
Aristarchus-em _ anusimingllaghagh lgute ma _ , _ Mark-emllu _ ata lgu ta an _ Barnabas-em _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ ( _ ungipaate kaqe amsi _ lata tgun _ mark- meng _ , _ kaate ma kan _ elpesi nun _ upugha te sqellug qu _ . _ )
Jesus-emllu _ , _ alla _ ategh leg m _ Justus-meng _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ Taakunginaagut _ Jews-et _ ugpeqagh t _ , _ qepghagh lgusigh aqe aatnga _ ataneghpag u llegh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ilutu qu tke anka _ elngaatall _ .
epaphras _ , _ qepghaghtenga _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ , _ elpesi neng _ pi u uq _ , _ ellnga n llu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ . _ iiwleng _ taakunginaghhaagneng _ yughagh te kaqe aisi _ angtaniitesqellusi _ , _ liisimakngngwaaghesqelluku _ sa u a _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe sug llegh a _ elpesi nun _ , _ elpesi nun llu _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ piyuke llegh a _ pike sqellug qu _ .
ungipaate yug amsi _ epaphras _ qepghagh ghllag kau uq _ kayusiite na lusi _ , _ kayusiite na luki llu _ Laodicea-ghmiitlu _ Hierapolis-eghmiitllu _ .
Luke-emllu _ piniqe pigtekagh mta _ aghallegtagh m _ , _ Demas-emllu _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutnun _ Laodicea-melngughnun _ , _ nympha- mun llu _ , _ ugpeqaalgutnunllu _ qernughutkayugnun _ maniguute na luteng _ mangteghagh ani _ , _ ungipaate nakesi _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
atightugh nakesi _ ukut _ lata t _ ugpeqagh nun _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ yughaghvig ani _ Colossae-m _ . _ wataghllak llu _ atightugh nakesi _ ukut _ lata t _ Laodicea-ghmiit _ ugpeqagh itnun _ . _ atightugh nakesi llu _ lata t _ Laodicea-ghmiit _ ugpeqagh ita _ tuyugh yaghqagh it _ elpesi nun _ .
archippus _ ungipaataghnnakesi _ whaten _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ apeghiigh naken _ qepghaqagh _ Atanghem _ qelegh tke a _ elpenun _ . _ "
whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ una _ igaqe aqa _ . _ neqamike lunga _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ , _ qiipraghusighlunga _ ayuqe unga _ . _ qamagte lusi _ suumqagh ke amsi _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ nangllegtagh li _ elpesi nun _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ , _ silas- meng _ , _ Timothy-mengllu _ pi u ut _ , _ Thessalonica-ghmiit _ ugpeqagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ pi i _ Atanghemllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke i llegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ elpesi nite lik _ .
quunpeng _ iyamsiqayugvikaqaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinun _ , _ iiwleng llu _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ .
yughagh negh mta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata mnnun _ neqamikaqaghput _ qepghagh llegh i _ ugpegh llegh gpesigun _ , _ qepghagh llegh i _ piniqe llegh gpesigun _ . _ Iyamsiqayugvikaqaghputlu _ ugpegh llegh i _ nagneghuskesi _ iknaqe luku _ qayughllak _ sighima u lghiisi _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqekagh ani _ , _ liisimakagh ut _ nakmike kaqe aisi
qayughllak _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ tagite aqe yamsi _ , _ akuzite raaghinagh tgun _ pi mangite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqunllu _ , _ Agleghnalghiignekunllu _ Taghneghagnekun _ pi kau ukut _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqe asi _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ipa u ta i _ . _ liisimakagh i llu _ naten _ kiyaghtekaatfut _ elpesi nite luta _ , _ tawaten _ kayusiite na lusi _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ .
enkaam _ whangkutestun llu _ atanegh tun llu _ lliigh tek _ . _ qaywa _ ikfiqeghllagngaaghpesi _ , _ tugukligh asi _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ quya ma lleg ligh lusi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
enkaam _ usputagh ughte usi _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ ugpeqagh nun _ Macedonia-millu _ Achaia-millu _ .
Atanghem _ ungipagh a _ mingite u uq _ elpesi neng _ Macedonia-millu _ Achaia-millu _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh meng _ liite aat _ tea- ma ani _ . _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ pi nghite yagh ghngaamteggu _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ qayughllak _ siingenllu _ yug t _ nagaqugh ma ut _ .
tea- ma ani _ apegh aqe aat _ upugha te i llegh ghllag i _ whangkunneng _ elpesinite u luta _ . _ qiive ma ni lusi llu _ unguva lghii mun _ kiyaghnegh pig mun _ qepghagh te na luku _ , _ pegte luki _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ .
Utaqaaqaghsillunguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ Jesus _ , _ tagi yaghqagh _ qilag meng _ . _ ellnga u uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtekaa _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ yuguligh u iqe ainkut llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ kaate yaghqagh meng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ liisimakagh i _ elpesi nun _ pi llegh ut _ temngingunghitkaaguq _ .
iwernga _ sivugh nghaani _ elpesi nun _ pilleg mta _ , _ liisimakagh i _ philippi- mi _ ikfiqliightestekaqiinkutlu _ seghlequuqaqiinkutlu _ . _ tea- magh an llu ta _ qaywa _ uglagh lghii m _ yug m _ aghula i aghte naqutke ghngainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilutu stekaqe ainkut _ , _ enkaam _ ungipaate yaghtugh amsi _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ ipa u uq _ . _ iqlengiqe u nghite ukut _ elpesi nun _ , _ seghlegh meng _ piyuke ke ii te ukut _ elpesi nun _ , _ puughhe naqutke igate amsi _ .
yeghlegi _ , _ ungipagh kaqe aput _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ itagnaqluta _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ whangkunnun _ . _ akuzillegh mteggun _ efqughhnaqutkengngunghitaput _ yug t _ , _ iwernga _ efqughsukaghput _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ , _ nanqigte i nga lghii _ ilu mta _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng _ .
liisimakagh i _ usuquughsaghtuunghitamsi _ nalighmeng _ sakenge vike yaghtugh u nghite amsi _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ liisimake i stekagh ut _ .
Usuqesaayugtengngunghitukut _ yug neng _ , _ elpesi neng _ , _ nalighmeng _ kinku neng _ .
Apostle-ngutemnneng _ Christ-amun _ , _ tungsigh niigh vike yaghqaqe yagh amsi _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ iwernga _ elpesi nite luta _ yakumangighlliqe tke mangite amsi _ , _ yeghlegi _ mamaghti kayug stun _ naa stun _ aflengake i lghii stun _ taghnughhagh meggneng _ ayuqe kau ukut _ .
piniqe pigte amsi _ , _ enkaam _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ elpesi nun _ liisimake sug aput _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh i _ . _ pinigh lghii inagh t _ ungipagh t _ pi gpenaki _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ kayusigh yug lusi _ ayuqe amsi _ , _ qayughllak _ piniqsaliitkaqamsi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ neqamikaghsi _ naten _ angka an _ qepghagh llegh ut llu _ ughleghiigh llegh ut llu _ ! _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ qayughllak _ elpesi nun _ uqigtuqutnguyunghilnguukut _ ; _ elpesinite ma luta _ ungipagh ke i kau ukut _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
elpek si llu _ kiyaghnegh llu _ liisimakistekamsi _ . _ elpesi ni _ ugpeqagh ni _ kiyaghtekau ukut _ pelungite luta _ , _ ipapighqelluta _ , _ anaggutellngunaamta _ .
liisimakagh i _ katam _ ata m _ aflengake i llegh atun _ taghnughhagh mineng _ , _ whangkuta llu _ tamaghhagh gpesi _ tawaten _ katam _ aflengake kaqe amsi _ . _ kayeme kaqe amsi _ , _ ilutughsagh kaqe amsi _ , _ qelegh te aatagh qaghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ atuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghtaalleq _ efqugh nagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh mi _ . _ Tuqluungwiisi _ ilatesqellusi _ ellmi _ katam _ ataneghpag u llegh minun llu _ pinighnagh llegh ghllag minun llu _ .
Iyamsiqayugvikumanginaangwaaghputlu _ kiyaghnegh _ una _ apallugh ke luku _ : _ whangkunneng _ nagaqugh luku _ tuguklighaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipagh a _ . _ elpek si _ tuguklighaghsi _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ungipagh u luku _ , _ nakaan _ yug neng _ ungipagh u luku _ . _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaghpigaa _ qepghagh lghii _ elpesi ni _ ugpeqe i lghii ni _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ elpek si _ tawatete usi _ ugpeqistengistun _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ qerngughte te kayug t _ yughaghvig itni _ kiyaghnegh m _ Judea-mi _ . _ nunalgute gpesi _ ikfiqe stekaqe aisi _ katam _ Jews-et _ ikfiqestellghistun _ ugpeqagh t _ Judea-mi _ .
Jews-nguut _ tuqute ikagh t _ atanegh meng _ Jesus-meng _ , _ uuknaliqistenengllu _ , _ amyuqetagh tke kaqe ainkut llu _ . _ Efqughhneghitaat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kipullginaaghuutlu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun
aghula i aghte naqutke llegh megteggun _ ungipagh ke i llegh ut _ Gentile-enun _ yuguligh lleg nge na yu kata _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ ila manginagh ait _ seghleghqe lleg teng _ enkaam _ qenwat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ugumi yagute ghllag luki _ qantaghaqun _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ amyuqetaatkistemta _ aghulaqe ste aqe yamikut _ Thessalonica-meng _ , _ pellegh utu te ste aghte ainkut _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ sumeghmike aqe amsi _ . _ esghagh yug pigte aqe yagh amsi _ gginasaghqugh lusi
enkaam _ taku naqute kaqsagh amsi _ . _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ taku naqutke aatagh aqe yagh amsi _ iwernga _ tughneghagh m _ amig igh aghte aqe ainkut _ .
elpek si _ sighima llegh ke amsi _ , _ quya sigh ke amsi _ , _ qaghpa ke amsi llu _ . _ taana _ qaghpa _ whangkuta _ qukaayugusiqelleqaghput _ manu ani _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ tagi kan _ .
ipapestaaq _ elpek si _ qukaayug sigh ke amsi llu _ quya sigh ke amsi llu _ !
iwernga _ esghaatusigatutemnneng _ qavngaghhaaneng _ pellegh ngatu te llegh ut _ nuqetutepagningiitaghput _ . _ enkaam _ agghi te kau ukut _ whanga _ ellnginagh ma _ athens- mete na lunga _ ,
kayagtekaqaghpungllu _ Timothy _ elpesi nun _ . _ ugpeqagh u lgutekagh ung _ , _ qepgalgusighaqiinkung _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ungipagh ke i lgusigh aqe ainkung _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii neng _ . _ Kayagtekaqaghpung _ iknaqughsaghyaghtiisqelluki _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ , _ kayemesqellusillu _ ,
qayughllak _ iilqayug sug nghite kemsi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesineng _ seghleliigh lleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ . _ iwernga _ liisimakagh i _ ugpeqagh ni _ whangkuta _ seghleliigh yaghqaa ukut _ .
elpesi nite luta _ ungipaate u aqe aqe amsi _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge lleqe ni luta _ ; _ enkaam _ liisimakagh i _ taawa _ ipa _ ikfiqutkegkaqaghput _ amyuqetagh tke llegh _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghtugh yagute yama _ nuqete nghmeng _ , _ kayagtekaqe aqa _ Timothy _ elpesi nun _ liigike na luku _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ natete aqe ta a _ . _ pengke aqe amsi _ qayughllak _ tughneghagh m _ nanghiiqu ma na yu kangisi _ ugpeqinaniisqellusi _ , _ enkaam _ qepghagh llegh ut _ teme isug nighsi ma na yu kan _ .
iwernga _ Timothy-m _ uteghnigh luni _ ungipaate ainkung _ quyanagh lghii meng _ ungipagh meng _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesineng llu _ piniqe llegh gpesineng llu _ . _ ungipaate aqe ainkung llu _ iiwleng _ neqamike aqe ni lutung _ pinitun _ , _ esghagh yug aqe ni lutung llu _ katam _ whangkutung _ esghaghyullemtestegetun _ elpek si _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ seghleliigh ghllag ma luta _ , _ ikfiqe ghllag ma luta _ ilutughte ukut _ qayughllak _ nagnegh te u kesi _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ .
whaa _ aneghte aghagh ukut _ qayughllak _ aghuliilkaalghiisi _ atanegh kun _ .
enkaam _ iyamsiqayugvikngwaaghput _ kiyaghnegh _ elpesi neng _ . _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ quya ghllagu ukut _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mta _ .
Taakunginaghhaagneng _ yughaatkengngwaamsi _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ alla _ esghagh yaghqaa lusi _ , _ ila yaghqaa luki _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ aklukegkiit _ .
kiyaghnegh mta _ , _ ata m _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus-em _ qantaghaqun _ elpesi nun _ pi yaghqaaghte ste likut _ !
Atanghem _ , _ piniqsaliitutestaghaghlisi _ . _ piniqe llegh i llu _ tevugha ste ligu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ katam _ whangkuta _ piniqe lleg mtestun _ elpek si _ .
tawaten _ ayepsugighsagh lleqe ai _ ilu si _ avutngitesqellusillu _ pelungitesqellusillu _ sivungagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mta _ ata m _ , _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ tagi llegh ani _ . _ tawani _ kelqe lleqe ai _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ ellmi _ yug ni _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ alaghrang _ whaten _ pi naqe amsi _ , _ liitivikegkaqaghpekut _ naten _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ efqugh nagh lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ esgha _ tawaten _ kiyaghte lghiisi _ . _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ kayeme amsi _ wataqaaghaq _ tawaten _ pisqellusi _ .
liisima kasi _ sa u aat _ qelegh tke aput _ elpesi nun _ pisqelluki _ atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ .
whatete uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ elpesi nun _ : _ pelungite sug aisi _ seghleghqe ste sug nghite aisi _ atuqe te llegh kun _ .
liite sug aisi llu _ tamaghaghpesi _ nuqetutesqelluki _ yugusigh si _ pinigh llegh mun _ enkaam _ kiyaghte lleqe usi _ pelungite lusi _ , _ efqugh nagh lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ .
ilapga te gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ atuqe i yu llegh anun _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ pillghistun _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ sakusiiqe fqaan _ pi ligu _ ugpeqaalgutmi _ inglu a _ atuqe i llegh mun _ . _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh ghllag lleqe ai _ tawaten _ pikayug t _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ kelenga sagh u ghllag kaqe amsi _ tamaaken _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ainkut _ kiyaghtesqelluta _ pelungite luta _ , _ seghleghqellngunaamta _ .
Enkaangam _ kitum _ alngunak _ qaatke nghite kumiki _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ qaatke nghite kanga _ nakaan _ yuug _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ tuunistezi _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ lata nghite yagh ghngaaghmisi _ ayuqe aisi _ ungipaate na lusi _ piniqesqelluki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtugh kaqe aisi _ piniqutesqellusi _ .
ipa u uq _ piniqe asi _ qamagte luki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ Macedonia-mi _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ qelegh amsi _ piniqutaghiisqellusi _ .
Pinaqellghaghsi _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghte tek _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi _ , _ elpek si _ sa yaghqagh si _ pi aqe teki _ , _ avelghagh luki _ ila gpesi _ sa yaghqagh it _ . _ qepghagh tek _ allgegh te yaghqaa lusi _ aklukegkaghpesineng _ katam _ whangkuta _ qelegh lleg mtestun _ .
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ neghyuke naanghite asi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ aklukegkaghpesinun _ , _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t llu _ sii vag kete lleqe aisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ liisimake sug amsi _ ugpeqagh neng _ qavagh lghii neng _ qivghuke fqiita _ pisqelluki _ sighimallghilngughestun _ .
ugpeqagh ut _ Jesus _ tuqu luni _ unguvagh kau uq _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagi lleqe ai _ Jesus-kun _ tamaakut _ qavagh ke aat _ ugpeqe i luteng _ ellnga neng _ .
Ungipaatngwaaghamsi _ Atanghem _ apeghtugh tekagh aneng _ . _ atanegh _ tagi kan _ , _ whangkuta _ paninang _ unguva lghii ni _ ingyaghaghnaanghitaput _ tamaakut _ qavagh ke aat _ .
atanegh _ ellnga _ katam _ qilag meng _ ukig lleqe uq _ , _ yug t _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ iglagtuqagh _ qelegh llegh _ , _ me a _ archangel-em _ , _ qalghightaute anga llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tamaakut _ ugpeqe i luteng _ Christ-ameng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ unguvagh yuggaagh lleqe ut _ .
taagken _ whangkuta _ unguva lghii ni _ unegtekagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qerngughte te ste luta _ , _ ellngit nun _ , _ ghhatagh aghtagh te ste lleqe ainkut _ qilagwaaghnun _ payegh sqellug qu _ atanegh _ esla mi _ . _ enkaam _ atanegh mete lleqe ukut _ quunperugllag _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ilutughsagh sigh ke aqe teki _ taakut _ akuzite t _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ elpesi nun _ lata te kete niite ut _ qakun _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
qayughllak _ elpek si _ liisimakngwaaghaghsi _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ tagi yaghqaa uq _ waakenghillghaghte te luni _ tagi llegh atun _ teglegniightem _ unugmi _ .
yug t _ whaten _ pi ma luki _ , _ " _ nekeggmellegh lgu ukut llu _ paqniite ukut llu _ , _ " _ naafqe llegh m _ kaate qagh lleqe ai _ katam _ aghnagh m _ ighni yu llegh an _ aqnighqe llegh atun _ . _ yug t _ anag naanghite aat _ taana _ naafqe llegh _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ mamleg ghllag mete nghite usi _ enkaam _ aghnegh an _ aghnegh m _ waakenghillghaghte naanghite aisi _ tegleghniightetun _ .
qamagte lusi _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ nighug m _ , _ avaqutagh ke aisi llu _ aghnegh m _ . _ Unugem _ pike nghite ainkut _ nalighmeng _ mamleg ghllag m _ .
enkaam _ qavaa fqaamta _ pi lta _ ilangistun _ , _ itupill _ tegh u ma lta _ , _ liisima luta _ .
tamaakut _ qavagh lghiit _ qavagh aqe ut _ unugmi _ , _ tamaakut _ meghe lghiit _ suume aqe ut _ unugmi _ .
iwernga _ Atanghem _ pi ke ainkut _ enkaam _ liisima luta _ kiyaghte lta _ . _ Paqniighsaasilleghqamnnun _ sakimag mteggun _ aate lteggu _ sighima llegh _ yuguligh llegh mun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke nghite a _ ikfiqesqelluta _ sakraa llegh meng _ , _ iwernga _ yuguligh lleg nge sug ainkut _ atanegh mteggun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
Jesus-em _ tuquma tke kaqe ainkut _ ellminitesqelluta _ unguva yagh ghngaamta _ , _ tuqu kaayagh ghngaamta _ tagi kuni _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ kayemughtu te aqe tek llu _ kayute ke te aqe tek llu _ whaa _ maaten _ pi llegh gpesistun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ sii vag qite ki _ atanegh mun _ qepghagh lghiit _ akule gpesini _ . _ ellnga n _ nakmike kaqe ai _ igleghte te i ste u luki llu _ apeghtughiste u luki llu _ elpesi nun _ .
Siivakeghllagaqitekillu _ piniqe aqe teki llu _ apallugh ke luki _ qepghagh llegh it _ . _ Nekeggmetullusi _ pi tek _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ kelenga sagh ughte ki _ ighsanitagh lghiit _ , _ ilutughsagh teki _ aling tagh lghii t _ , _ kayusigh teki _ kayaalnguut _ , _ negkeghlluwaan _ pi aqe teki _ qamagte luki _ .
wataghllak _ akite yaqunaki _ seghletun _ pistesi _ iwernga _ pinitun _ pi aqe teki _ ila si _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ .
quya manginagh lusi _ ,
yughagh manginagh lusi _ ,
iyamsiqa yug lusi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ nekegneghmi _ . _ Taakunguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh i _ elpesi nun _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ pi liite ke ii te nun _ .
qaamte gpenakek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ ,
sasii nghite ni gpenaki _ uuknaliqe i llegh t _ .
iwernga _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ nanghiiqu aqe teggu _ enkaam _ tugukligh aqe luki _ sa u aat _ pinigh lghiit _ ,
iqite nga tek _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghlegh meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellelitistem _ iighwightengngwaaghlusi _ pelungighllisi _ . _ avute ite ste liki _ taghneghagh si _ , _ unguva sigh si _ , _ yugusigh si _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tagi kan _ .
Tagsiqlightegpesi _ pi lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmete uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ yughagh te kaqe luta _ .
quya kaqe teki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ naagh luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh akun _ .
qelegh amsi _ Atanghem _ pilleghqalitellghakun _ ukut _ lata t _ atightiisqelluki _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ ugpeqaalgutegpesinun _ .
piniqe llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ elpesi nite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ , _ silas- meng _ Timothy-mengllu _ pi u ut _ . _ ugpeqagh nun _ Thessalonica-melngughnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ pi itnun _ , _ Atanghemllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
nangllegtagh llegh llu _ nekeggmellegh llu _ elpesi nun _ pi u uk _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ata meng _ , _ atanegh meng llu _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ iiwleng _ iyamsiqa yagute yaghqaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ elqughute nga uq _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh ut _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqineghtughtaghalghiisillu _ , _ piniqutaghaghlusillu _ lliigh usi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qanatkaqamsi _ ila itnun _ ugpeqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yughaghvigitnilngughnun _ . _ Aapghaqaghput _ nuqetutineghtulleghsillu _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh i llu _ qaywa _ amyuutkellengeghngaaghpesi _ , _ ikfiqellengeghngaaghpesillu _ .
tamaakut _ ipapighqaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh a _ elqughutngagh lghii u uq _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh aisi _ itagnagh ni lusi _ kiyaghtesqellusi _ ataneghpag u llegh mini _ qayughllak _ ikfiqutkengngukesi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi yaghqaqe a _ sa u a _ elqughutngagh lghii _ : _ ikfiqesaghqagh ke ai _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe ste i lghiit _ elpesi neng _ .
enkaam _ elpek si _ ikfiqe lghii ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali ste naagh aisi _ ikfiqe llegh meng _ whangkuta llu _ maligte te luta _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ aliightekumiki _ atanegh _ Jesus _ , _ iknaqe ghllag lghiit llu _ yaquleg i _ . _ qilag meng _ ukig lleqe ut _ kenegh mete luteng _ kumaghugh nga lghii mi _ .
taagken _ Jesus-em _ aghyuugh lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ nalluke i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ qaatke te igate ngugh t llu _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh aneng _ Jesus-meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
aghyuugh naqngu ai llu _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ naafqe llegh meng _ , _ iqite ste naqngu ut llu _ atanegh meng _ , _ nighug aneng llu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghan _ .
tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ut _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ atanegh _ Jesus _ tagi kan _ . _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ ugpeqe ikagh t _ ellnga neng _ usuqe lleqe aat _ , _ saghiigha yagute lleqe aat llu _ . _ elpek si _ akulngitnillequsi _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kesi _ ungipagh _ apeghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ yughagh te kaqe amsi _ whaten _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh lisi _ kiyaghtengngunilusi _ ellmi _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh mitun _ . _ Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikunllu _ naamigte ligu _ qamagte luku _ piyuke llegh i _ pinigh llegh mun _ , _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesi _ .
enkaam _ ategh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ quulvallengellequq _ elpesigun _ , _ elpek si llu _ ellnga kun _ quulvallengellequsi _ nafughtagh llegh akun llu _ nangllegtagh llegh akun llu _ kiyaghnegh mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ ungipaate yug amsi _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ qerngughte te lleghqagh mnneng llu _ ellnga nun _ .
umyugagh si _ qapragaghtesunghitngwaaghaput _ nalighmeng _ kakave sug nghite aput _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ kaate ma ni luku _ . _ entaqun _ kitum _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe a _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ ungipagh kegka qaa _ , _ nalighmeng _ kitum _ lata tke ma ni luku _ whangkunnun _ pika qaa _ .
iwernga _ puughte ste gpenasi _ ! _ taana _ aghnegh a _ Atanghem _ kaate naanghite uq _ kenlanga _ yug t _ malighqutaqsugnanilghitnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i llegh anun _ , _ kaate llegh anun llu _ seghlegh pestaagh m _ yug m _ . _ ( _ ellnga _ naafqesaghqagh u uq _ hell- mi _ . _ )
Taam _ yug m _ kipullginaaghlleqii _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ nalighmeng _ manigugh yaghqagh t _ , _ tamaakuneng _ ellmi neng _ qulighpigaaghsaghqaaguq _ . _ Enkaangam _ itegh luni _ kiyaghnegh m _ Temple-nganun _ aqume luni _ kiyaghnegh u ni lleqe uq _ .
Neqamikenghistegguu _ salin _ elpesi nite lunga _ ungipaate kaqe kemsi _ tamaaken _ ?
liisimakagh i _ kitum _ maaten _ nuqnegh kaqe a _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ . _ wetku _ aghnegh ni _ kaate kan _ tagi lleqe uq _ .
aawallu _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ seghleghqe llegh m _ qepghagh u aghte ma uq _ nuna mi _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ kitum _ kimaawi sta qaa _ taana _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ kimaawi ste i ste nga _ tawaten _ pi lleqe uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite ste llegh anun _ .
taagken _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ aliightesllequq _ , _ iwernga _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ tagi kuni _ tuqu lleqe a _ aneghnegh aneng _ qanegh mi _ , _ naafqe lleqe a llu _ nighug ghllag akun _ tagi llegh mi _ .
Sivutghulluku _ Atanghem _ Jesus-em _ tagi lleghqagh a _ , _ seghlegh pestaagh _ yuug _ tagi lleqe uq _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelighluni _ tughneghagh- meng _ . _ taana _ yuug _ allaaghlluwhaghtisighwaaghllequq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ saghiigha nagh lghii neng _ .
atuqe lleqe ai llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ puughhe na luki _ tuqu yaghqagh t _ . _ tuqu yaghqaa ut _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe yu nghite kangat _ ipalleq _ yugulisighqaqsaqeseng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ puughneqguutesleqii _ ugpeqesqelluki _ sa u aat _ ipa u nghite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ ugpeqe i nghite ngugh t _ ipapilleghmeng _ nanqigte yaghqaa ut _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ qayughllak _ pinighyuugusiqegkangat _ seghlleghqelleq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ iiwleng _ iyamsiqa yagute yaghqaqe amsi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ elpek si _ piniqe ke ii te ni _ Atanghem _ . _ Iyamsiqayugvikaqaghputlu _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ yugulisqellusi _ ima _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh aneng _ nuna m _ . _ Yugulikaagusi _ pelungighsagh llegh akun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ , _ ugpeqe llegh gpesigun llu _ ipapilleq _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghtaalleghmun _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aisi _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ ungipagh kekagh megteggun _ ; _ tagi sqe aqe aisi _ pi liite sqellug qu _ nengighqagh i _ pinighnagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ .
enkaam _ ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ aghula i te kestagh tek _ , _ ugpeqe kestagh teggu _ ipapilleq _ apeghtugh tekagh ut _ elpesi nun _ ungipagh ke i lleg mteggun llu _ lata lleg mteggun llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ piniqistemta _ , _ nangllegtagh llegh mikun _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ ilutu llegh meng _ , _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ellnga n _ katam _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ ata mta _ , _ elkegkenka
ilutughsagh lisi llu _ , _ iknaqughsaghlisillu _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ pinigh lghii kun _ qepghagh llegh gpesigun llu _ akuzillegh gpesigun llu _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ taaqe niite te kun _ sa meng _ pi iigh aatagh qagh lamsi _ . _ yughagh tke tekut _ Atanghem _ ungipagh a _ mingite ragkiigh sqellug qu _ , _ yug nun llu _ quulviisqelluku _ , _ katam _ elpek si _ pi llegh gpesistun _ .
yughagh tke tekut llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ yugulisqelluta _ seghlegh neng _ yug neng _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu nghite uq _ .
iwernga _ atanegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ ; _ iknakqughsaghlleqiisillu _ paqniighsaghlleqiisillu _ tughneghagh meng _ .
Atanghem _ nalluneqniighumaa _ whangkunnun _ qaatke te u usi _ qelegh lleg mnnun _ , _ qaatkumanginaghlleqaghsillu _ .
Atanghem _ liigikeslisi _ wataqaaghaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh aneng _ , _ Christ-amllu _ nuqetutineghtullghaneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ ategh akun _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qelegh amsi _ iqitngasqellusi _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ ugpeqaalgutegpesineng _ ighsanitagh lghii neng llu _ malighqutagh ke igate ngugh neng llu _ apeghtugh tekagh mnneng _ elpesi nun _ .
elpek si _ katam _ liisimakagh i _ ayuqesighaghyaghqaqsaghaghpekut _ ; _ elpesi nite luta _ ighsanitagh iqe mangite ukut _ .
tugukligh igate aput _ neqe t _ kinku neng _ alngunak _ tukfillngunaki _ . _ iwernga _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ , _ ughleghiigh kau ukut _ uqigtuqutnguyunghitutemnneng _ naligh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ .
elpesi nun _ aapsaqleguyaghtukut _ kayusiitesqelluta _ , _ yeghlegi _ qepghaqagh u ukut _ aflengake na luta _ whangkunneng _ usputagh u na luta _ elpesi nun _ ayuqesighiisqelluta _ .
talwa _ elpesi nite luta _ whaten _ qelqe aqe kemsi _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ qepghagh yug nghite ngughk _ neghe ste gpenaan _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi kau ukut _ qayughllak _ nagaqugh aqe ukut _ ila si nguq _ ighsanitagh ut _ , _ qepghagh yug igate ut _ , _ yeghlegi _ yanutqu aqe ai nguq _ yug t _ .
ategh akun _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ qelegh aput llu _ kayeme aput llu _ tawatelnguut _ yug t _ ighsanitagh iqe fqiita _ allgheghutesqelluki _ kiyaghusighqiitneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemnni _ , _ qinuyagute gpenasi _ pinitun _ pi nghmeng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te yu nghite kan _ sa meng _ pilleg mnnun _ ukutgun _ lata mteggun _ , _ suumqennakesi _ kinku u ta i _ . _ enkaam _ iqite nga lghaasi _ ellnga neng _ kayngu yug sqellug qu _ anaggute llegh aneng _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghute gpenaan _ anguyag u luku _ , _ itupill _ kelenga sagh ughte ggu _ ugpeqagh u lgute kete luku _ .
Atanghem _ ellmi neng _ katam _ nekeggmellelitikayugem _ , _ nekeggmellelisilli _ iiwleng _ sa mi _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ atanegh _ tamaghhaaghpesinilli _ .
whanga _ , _ Paul _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ igaqe aqa _ piniqe i llegh ka _ elpesi nun _ . _ tawaten _ igagh aqe unga _ qamagte luki _ lata mkun _ elpesi nun _ liisimakesqelluki _ whanga mneng _ pi u ta i _ .
nangllegtagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ apostle-nganeng _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ Apostle-ngughtekaagunga _ qelegh llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighistemta _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-emllu _ sighimakekagh mta _ .
Timothy-mun _ ; _ ighnegh pig ke amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mtegnegun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-emllu _ atanegh mta _ quyasliten _ , _ nangllekliten _ , _ nekeggmellelguslitenllu _ .
aghulaqe naqe ma lunga _ Macedonia-mun _ ephesus- mete sqe kaqe amken _ . _ ila i _ yug t _ tamaanlenguut _ apeghtugh i u ut _ ipa u nghite ngugh meng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ . _ qelegh ki _ taaqesqelluki
sangillghaatkegpenakinguq _ akuzimghhutkelluki _ ungipaghaate ngllaghkagh t _ , _ sivunegh lghute ghllag t llu _ ategh it _ . _ tamaakut _ aaghtiiraagh sigh ghhagh inagh u ut _ , _ kayute u nghite ut _ qepghaqagh anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ ellnga n _ qepghaqagh a _ apeghiigh aqe uq _ ugpeqillghiinaghhaghqun _ .
Qeleluugutkaqa _ ugpeqagh t _ piniqutepiigesqelluki _ , _ umyugagh kegte luki _ , _ ipa pig meng _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu luki _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ pegtekaqe ait _ tamaakut _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh aqe ut _ temngimeng _ .
apeghtughiste u yug aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh anun _ . _ iwernga _ liigike igate ait _ akuzi tkekagh teng _ qaywa _ apeghtuusagh ke ghngaaghmegteki _ ipate yu gnite luki _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ pinigh ut _ elqughte luki _ atuqe lghii ni _ .
liisimake aput _ liilightuusagh t _ ulimaagh u nghite ut _ pinigh lghii nun _ yug nun _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ liilightuusagh neng _ naafqii kayug nun _ , _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun llu _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh yug igate ngugh nun _ , _ seghleghqestenunllu _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ waakigalngughnun _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ legasiighwagh tke i lghii nun llu _ agleghnagh lghii nun _ . _ ulimaagh u ut _ tuqute i kayug nun _ ata meggneng _ nalighmeng _ naa meggneng _ , _ yugtaghtenunllu _ .
ulimaagh u ut _ sex-kun _ seghleghqestenun _ , _ yug nun _ yug lgute meggneng _ atuqe i kayug nun _ , _ yug nun _ akike i kayug nun _ yug meng _ qepghaghtelaaghuluki _ , _ iqlengiqestenun _ , _ iqlengagh lghii nun _ liisimakistenun _ , _ kipullginaalghiinunllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh itnun _ ipapighqengngalghiinun _ .
taakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ pi niigh pigte lghii neng _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ pi u ut _ . _ apegh u aat _ usuqnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ whanga mnun _ aapghesqelluki _ .
iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ Christ _ Jesus _ atanegh ut _ , _ iknaqughsaqaqaanga _ qepghaqagh mnun _ . _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqa _ esghagh kaqe aanga _ ataasiighmete lunga _ nakmike lunga _ qepghaatesqelluni _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke kaqe aqa _ Christ-a _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ pi kaqe aqa _ . _ amyuqetagh te kaqe yamki _ maligsaaghtengi _ tawatete uq _ amyuqetaatkengnguftaqa _ ellnga _ . _ Tawalliima _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg ke kaqe kanganga _ qayughllak _ salin _ ugpeqe igate kegka _ Christ-a _ , _ liigike ma ite kegka _ sa aqe tke a _ .
iwernga _ atanegh mta _ nanglleg ke ghllag kaqe aanga _ ! _ Ugpeqillelitkaqaanga _ , _ piniqellelitkaqaangallu _ Christ _ Jesus-melngughmeng _ .
sa meng _ pi lleghqagh ka _ ipa u uq _ enkaam _ qamagte luni _ ugpeqe yaghqaa uq _ , _ " _ Christ _ Jesus _ tagi kau uq _ nuna mun _ yugulinaluki _ seghleghqestet _ . _ " _ whanga _ seghlelleghpigaagunga _ seghleghqesteneng _ .
naqamllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute kaqe aanga _ . _ enkaam _ usputagh u unga _ naten _ tagkaan _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ utaqa i lleghqagh aneng _ seghleghqesteneng _ ugpeqesqelluni _ . _ taana _ uspute aq _ tamaakunun _ ayuqe uq _ ugpeqe i yaghqagh nun _ ellnga neng _ unguvallengesqelluki _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
umiileg mun _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ , _ tuqupagningilngughmun _ , _ aliite nghite ngugh mun _ , _ ellnginaa _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ ; _ ellnga _ quulvallenglillu _ usuqe lleg nge li llu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ amen _ .
Timothy-mi _ ighnegh mni _ , _ qavngaq _ ila ita _ uuknaliqistet _ akuzi tke kaqe aaten _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ qelegh amken _ akuzi ta it _ guutute ke ki _ pilluwamun _ . _ tawaten _ pinitun _ pilluwaghllequten _ Christ-amun _ .
ugpeqe i kestagh a _ Christ-akun _ atuqe luku _ liisimake gkan _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ atuqe igate ait _ liisimakekagh teng _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ enkaam _ naafqe aqe ait _ ugpeqe i lleg teng _ katam _ angyaghpag igh te lghii stun _ .
Hymenaeus-enkuk _ Alexander-enkuk _ tamaakut _ akule itnite uk _ . _ tuune kaqe agka _ tughneghagh- mun _ liite sqellug kek _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke fqaan _ kiyaghnegh _ pi sqellug qu _ .
sivuke luku _ kayeme amken _ yughaatkesqelluki _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ , _ tungsiitesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aklukegkiitneng _ , _ iyamsiqa yagute naketen llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
yughagh tke ki _ umiileg t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ igleghte te i lghiit _ , _ kiyaghte yaghqaa luta _ nekeggmelluta _ maniguute ma luta _ , _ quulvaamalukullu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Tawatelnguq _ yughagh llegh _ pinigh uq _ , _ efqugh nagh uq _ kiyaghnegh mi _ Yugulighistemnni _ ,
qayughllak _ qamagte luku _ yuug _ yuguligh lleg nge sug aa _ , _ liite sug aa llu _ ipapilleq _ .
taawa _ ataasigh inagh u uq _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ataasigh inagh u uq llu _ ilaliigh te i sta _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ yug nun llu _ . _ Taananguuq _ yuug _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
ellmi neng _ tuune kau uq _ aghqe te u luni _ iteme te na luki _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ . _ Taananguuq _ pilleghqaghlluwaaq _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelgute i llegh a _ yuguligh lleg nge sug ni luki _ yug t _ qamagte luki _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i ste u lunga _ , _ apostle-ngulunga _ . _ kayagte aanga _ apeghtiisqelluki _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe i llegh meng llu _ ipapilleghmengllu _ . _ ipa _ ungipaate amken _ , _ iqlengiqe u nghite unga _ !
tea- ma ghhagh ani _ yughaghvig ni _ yugu i na ut _ yughigh sqe sug anka _ . _ Tamaakungulit _ kiyaghlleghhit _ qaatke te luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh anun _ . _ yughagh lit _ nengug te luki _ iigge teng _ sakraallngunatengllu _ aaghtiiraallngunatengllu _ .
piyuke anka llu _ aghnagh t _ pinighnagh llegh it _ kelgutesqelluki _ pinitun _ pilugug llegh itgun _ . _ aatkagh it _ malleg nga fqiita _ nalighmeng _ kayngu nagh yaghqaa fqiita _ . _ itupill _ pinighnagh lleg teng _ kelgute litki _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh megteggun _ , _ nakaan _ nuyaqegsaghwaalleghqun _ nalighmeng _ gold-mengllu _ pearl-mengllu _ ullngaqluteng _ nalighmeng _ akituqagh meng _ aatkagh meng _ aate luteng _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh _ elqughute nga uq _ aghnagh nun _ maniguute kayugu ni lghii nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
yug t _ apeghtugh i nghata _ yughaghvig ni _ aghnagh t _ nagate yaghqaa ut _ nepiighngaghmeng _ , _ malighqutagh ke luteng _ .
aghnagh t _ apeghtugh i ste sug igate anka _ nalighmeng _ igleghte te i ste u sug igate anka _ yug nun _ . _ nepiigh nga yaghqaa ut _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima yuggaagh kaqe a _ adam _ , _ taagken _ Eve _ .
Adam-ngunghituq _ puughte lleg ngekagh _ , _ iwernga _ aghnagh u uq _ puughte lleg ngekagh _ enkaam _ seghleghqestengughtekaaquq _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh t _ ighnegh iightugh kumeng _ taghnughhagh neng _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe ut _ nagnegh ma kumeng _ neghyuke luku _ Jesus _ , _ piniqe i manginagh kumeng _ ila meggneng _ , _ kiyaghte manginagh kumeng llu _ agleghnagh luku _ kiyaghtaalleghmeng _ qusevegte lleg ligh luteng _ .
