whaten _ pi llegh _ ipa u uq _ : _ kina _ alngunak _ igleghte te i ste u yu kuni _ ugpeqagh nun _ taana _ qepghaqagh _ piyukekagh a _ pi niigh pigte uq _ .
igleghte te i sta _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ , _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ , _ sumeghtaghaqegsaghqaaguq _ , _ yupiinghuyaghqaaguq _ , _ upughanghuyaghqaaguq _ , _ apeghtughiyaqleguuqlu _ .
suume ste u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ suugllug u yaghqaa nghite uq _ iwernga _ nanglleghtaghyaghqaaguq _ , _ qanegh nge naqe igate yaghqaa uq _ , _ mani yuneghtu yaghqaa nghite uq _ .
Igleghutistem _ igleghutngwaaghyaghqaqii _ mangteghagh mii ni _ , _ avaqutagh ni llu _ apeghtugh yaghqaqe ai _ veghusnaatefqaami _ qaatkesqelluni _ .
igleghte te i sta _ igleghte te i llgite kuni _ ellmi _ katam _ nengllugute mineng _ , _ natenʼngam _ aflengake lleqe aki _ ugpeqistengi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ?
igleghte te i sta _ ugpegh nghhagh u nghite yaghqaa uq _ , _ luuraq _ qukaayugtepagnayukan _ enkaam _ nanqigte lleg nge lleqe uq _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luni _ tughneghagh tun _ .
igleghte te i sta _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh nun _ akuzi tke sqellug qu _ itagnagh luku _ . _ enkaam _ seghlequughpagningilleqaat _ , _ tughneghagh m llu _ kayaalqepagningite lleqe a _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ Deacon-etlu _ pinigh luki _ akuzite kete yaghqaa ut _ , _ ipapighqengngayaghqaagut _ , _ wine- meng _ meghepag yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ pakignegh u yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ mani meng _ .
pegte yaghqaqe nghite ait _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvighqekagh i _ , _ umyugagh it llu _ seghleghyug i saghqagh u ut _ .
Igleghutistet _ nakmiigh vagilgameng _ deacon-kaghqameng _ qepghaqalilluki _ liigike nakangit _ pinigh ta i _ yug t _ . _ taagken _ deacon-ngughtesnakangit _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ aghnagh t llu _ pinigh luki _ akuzite kete yaghqaa ut _ , _ yiillgi yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ iwernga _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa ut _ , _ ataasiighmete yaghqaa ut llu _ sa kun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ .
Deacon-et _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa ut _ , _ igleghutngwaaghyaghqaqiit _ avaqutagh teng llu _ mangteghagh mii teng llu _ .
tamaakut _ deacon-et _ qepghaqegtat _ quulvallengyaghqaagut _ , _ nalluneqsuknaanghitaatlu _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
sunanguq _ qantaghaqun _ elpenun _ pi langa _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ elpenun _ lata tke anka _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
enkaam _ kimaawi ma kuma _ lata ma _ liisimake ste lleqe aaten _ naten _ ugpeqagh t _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ nengllugutanganilnguut _ . _ Ellnginguut _ ugpeqistengi _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ aghveghaqetagh u ut _ , _ tunemagh u ut llu _ ipapilleghmun _ .
Nalluneqnaghhangunaki _ ugpeqe aput _ apeghtuusagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ qayvightekagh i _ seghlegh ghllag u ut llu _ ipa pestaagh u ut llu _ : _ Christ-a _ allgegh kau uq _ yugusigh pigu luni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ liisimake ste ai _ tamaakut _ ellnga n _ pi ke ai _ elqughute nga ta i _ , _ yaquleg t llu _ esghagh kaqe aat _ . _ ungipagh ke kau uq _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ , _ ugpeqe kaqe aat _ nunatagh ghhagh ni _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ , _ taagken _ qilag mun _ mayuutkaguq _ .
agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ whateghlluwaaq _ pi uk _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ ila ita _ yug t _ pegte lleqe aat _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ Christ-akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke lleqe kangit _ iqlengagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ , _ apeghtuusagh it llu _ .
Tawatelnguut _ apeghtuusagh t _ iqlengagh lghii neng _ pi u ut _ . _ iqlengiqe lleg teng _ apegh aqe ait _ ipapigsugnighqelluki _ . _ nagate nanigh kaqe ait _ umyugagh teng _ liisimake i lghiit _ elqughutngagh llegh meng llu _ anaggute nga llegh meng llu _ .
Tawatelnguut _ yug t _ nengughte te snanigh i aqe ut _ , _ ila i llu _ neqe m _ neghe snanigh aqe ait _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe ai _ qamagte luki _ neqe t _ negh yaghqaa luki _ iyamsiqa yagute aqe luki _ . _ ugpeqagh t _ liisimake i lghiit _ ipapilleghmeng _ liisimake ait _ tamaakut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh i _ qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghii u ut _ . _ enkaam _ ighsake yaghqaa nghite ut _ tugukligh ma kumeng _ iyamsiqa yagute luki _ .
akuzi ta akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ yughakunllu _ aaftekau ut _ agleghnagh luki _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ liigikestengngwaaqufki _ ugpeqaalgutegpenun _ , _ pinigh lghii u lleqe uten _ qepghaghtenga _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh n _ iknaqughlleqaa _ liisima inagh kufki _ ipapillghet _ ugpeqagh t _ ugpeqe aqe kangit _ , _ pinigh lghiit llu _ apeghtuusagh t _ qaatkekagh ten _ .
nagate gpenaki _ sasii nghite ngugh t _ ungipaghaate t _ tengvimun _ ayuqe lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapillghanun _ . _ yeghlegi _ peghqigsagh tke gu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe lghii _ kiyaghtaalleq _ .
yugusigh m _ ulape llegh a _ pinigh uq _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ ayuqe lghii _ pinigh aghagh uq _ . _ kayusiite yaghqaqe ainkut _ whani _ unguvallegh mnni _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh ani llu _ unguvallegh m _ .
taana _ pi llegh _ ipa u uq _ , _ enkaam _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ ugpeqe yaghqaa uq _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ qepghagh ghllagu ukut llu _ sagiqliightengnguukutlu _ yug nun _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ipapilleq _ . _ tawaten _ pi ukut _ qayughllak _ neghyukagh ut _ unguva lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ Yugulighistengat _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakut _ ugpegh lghiit _ ellnga kun _ .
qelegh ki _ apeghtugh ki _ tamaaken _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ palaqe ste gpenaan _ anglinghhagh u ma llegh n _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqagh nun _ usputaawi _ akuzillegh gpegun _ , _ sa llegh gpegun _ , _ piniqe llegh gpegun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ , _ pelungite luten _ kiyaghte llegh gpegun _ .
kaate lleg mnun _ kenlanga _ , _ ugpeqagh t _ qerngughte te nghata _ atigh uute aqe ki _ akuzite neng _ igaqegkagh neng _ , _ ungipagh qite aqe ki _ , _ apeghtugh aqe ki _ .
atuqe aqe gu _ taghneghagnekun _ tunusagh _ ilu gpenite ngughk _ . _ taana _ tunusagh _ tuune kau uq _ elpenun _ uuknaliqe llegh kun _ Elder-et _ iigtighaqngaten _ .
pi naqe llegh n _ qamagte luku _ pi aqe ki _ qelegh tke anka _ . _ tawaten _ yug t _ liite lleqe aat _ pillguughlleghhiiten _ .
Piraamsingwaaghluten _ kiyaghtaalleghpenillu _ apeghtugh i llegh gpeni llu _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ elpeneng _ yugulillequten _ , _ tamaakut llu _ nagatesteten _ .
aghyuugh gpenaan _ siivanllegh _ yuug _ , _ iwernga _ kavyungunaan _ nallghusagh aqe gu _ ata ke lghii stun _ . _ uyuqligh t _ yug t _ anglegute ke lghii stun _ pi aqe ki _ .
siivanllegh t _ aghnagh t _ naa ke lghii stun _ pi aqe ki _ , _ enkaam _ uyuqligh t _ aghnagh t _ nayag stun _ pi aqe ki _ , _ qiliigh yuke fqiita _ .
kayusiite ki _ ugingighagh t _ aflengake i ste nga i tke aat _ .
iwernga _ ugi igh aq _ avaqutaghtu kuni _ nalighmeng _ eltughaghtu kuni _ , _ kelgute lit _ nengllugute meggnun _ kiyaghte yug ni luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe llegh atun _ . _ aflengake llegh megteggun _ angayuqagh teng _ aki naqe lleqe ait _ enkaam _ efqughlleqaat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugi igh aq _ ilakwaagh igh tke aq _ sighima u uq _ kiyaghnegh kun _ . _ enkaam _ unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yughagh manginagh u uq _ kayusiitesqelluni _ .
iwernga _ ugi igh aq _ teghigniqnginaqumi _ ellmi neng _ efqughhnaluni _ , _ unguva ghngaaghmi _ tuqukagh stun _ ayuqe yaghqaa uq _ .
qelegh ki _ ugpeqagh t _ tamaakut _ pisqelluki _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequunghillitki _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ aflengake nghite kumiki _ ilakwaagh ni _ , _ wata _ ellmi _ katam _ nengllugute ni _ , _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ pegtekaqe a _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ . _ enkaam _ seghleghataghaallequq _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh meng _ .
ugi igh aq _ 60 _ uksughtutkaligh ma kan _ , _ nengughtekau kan llu _ ataasigh meng _ , _ ategh a _ igaqe yagh ghngaaghmi _ ayuqe uq _ ugingighagh t _ ategh lghutagh itgun _ .
amalleqa _ tea- ma yan _ liisimake aat _ qepghagh llegtu langa _ , _ katam _ avaqutagh ni _ pinitun _ angli ste llegh atun _ , _ upugha neghtu langa _ , _ ugpeqaalgutmi _ itegagh it _ ughvugh aqe luki _ , _ kayusigh i aqe luni _ seghleliigh lghii neng _ , _ quunpeng llu _ pinitun _ pi aqe lghii _ .
iwernga _ nuteghagh t _ ugingighagh t _ ategh it _ igaqe gpenaki _ ategh lghutagh tgun _ . _ yugusigh ita _ piyuke llegh an _ sakniqesneghisteng _ ugiigh yug lleqe ut _ . _ tawaten _ pi ma kumeng _ naafqe lleqe aat _ akeqe i llegh eng _ Christ-amun _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ qayughllak _ naafqe kangat _ akeqe i llegh eng _ .
Taam _ saaghw akun _ ighsani te aghte aqe ai _ , _ itghagh u i te ughtaghkagh i _ , _ yiillgi te ughtaghkagh i _ , _ yanutqu neghtugh taqagh i _ , _ akuzite kaqe ait llu _ sa u aat _ akuzi tkesaghqagh ke nghite ke teng _ .
enkaam _ itagnagh aghagh nayagh ut _ nuteghagh t _ uginghighat _ ugiigh yagh kumeng _ , _ taghnughhagh nge luteng _ , _ aflengakesqellukillu _ nengllugutangit _ . _ tawaten _ pi kumeng _ anguyag _ seghlequughvigiitesleqaat _ whangkunneng _ .
aawallu _ ila i _ nuteghagh t _ ugingighagh t _ ugpeqagh u nanigh luteng _ maligte te ma ut _ tughneghagh- mun _ .
ugpeqe aq _ aghnagh _ ilakwaagh lgu kuni _ ugingighagh neng _ , _ ellnga n _ kayusiite yaghqaqe ai _ . _ enkaam _ ila ita _ ugpeqagh t _ kayusiite nghite yagh ghngaaghmegteki _ ayuqe ait _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqagh t _ kayusiite lleqe ait _ uginghighat _ aflengake i ste nga i tke aat _ .
Elder-et _ igleghte te i yuqagh t _ yugaghvigmi _ , _ taakunginaghhaagnengllu _ qepghagh lghiit _ apeghtugh i llegh kun _ , _ ungipagh ke i llegh kun llu _ , _ quulvaghaqiteki _ malghughqelluki _ akileghtuusagh it _ .
qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ Ox-a _ tutmagh lghii _ grain-meng _ malliigh na luki _ , _ negh sqellug qu _ grain-meng _ sugrugiitagh igh gpenaan _ . _ " _ amalleqa _ , _ " _ qepghagh a _ akileghtugh yaghqaa uq _ qepghagh llegh anun _ . _ "
nagate gpenaki _ kinku t _ alngunak _ avutke i lghiit _ Elder-meng _ anaggute ma ni luku _ , _ wetku qun _ avutke i lghii _ liisimakistelgukan _ maalghug gneng _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu neng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe manginagh kan _ , _ aghyuugh naken _ seghleghqennaniisqelluku _ ugpeqagh t _ manu itni _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvgu _ ila i _ tamaakut _ alinge lleqe ut _ .
tamaakut _ qelegh te anka _ elpenun _ qaatkesqelluki _ , _ pakiggutifqaavek _ nalighmeng _ taniilqe i fqaavek _ pisqelluten _ . _ tawaten _ qelegh amken _ esghaamanghitni _ kiyaghnegh nkut _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-enkut _ , _ nakmikegkagh t llu _ yaquleg t _ .
Iigtighaghtegpenaan _ kina _ igleghte te i stekaghqagh u luku _ yughaghvig mi _ . _ taayughqe gkuvek _ ilalkiinnayukavek _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ . _ kiyaghte kestagh a _ pelungite luten _ .
meghhagh inagh meng _ meghe gpenang _ , _ iwernga _ wine- ngiighhagh meng _ megh qaghaqe luten _ kayute ke lleqe an _ aqsaqugh gpenun _ , _ qinuyug aatagh llegh gpenun llu _ .
ila ita _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ aliitngwaaghaqut _ , _ talwa _ salin _ nanqigte llghite luteng _ . _ iwernga _ ila ita _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ aliighte yaghqaa ut _ kinguvaqwaaqun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh at _ aliitngwaaghaqut _ , _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ aliite nghite ngugh t _ iigh nga naanghite ut _ .
qamagte luteng _ qepghaghtelaaghet _ siivakeghllaglitki _ tamaakut _ piliitisteteng _ , _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke nghite likek _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apeghtugh i llegh ut llu _ .
Qepghaghtelaaghet _ piliitistengit _ ugpeqagh u lgute u kata _ sii vag kataghagh litki _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh u lgutke kangit _ . _ enkaam _ qepghaataghaghlitki _ qayughllak _ kayusigh u ngugh it _ ugpeqaalguteteng _ piniqekagh teng _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh ke ki llu _ ungipagh ke ki llu _ .
kina _ alngunak _ apeghtugh i kuni _ alla u luku _ tamaakuneng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ , _ itagnaqenghitii _ apeghtuusagh pig i _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga n _ apeghtuusagh an _ ungipaate ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ kiyaghte lleghqagh meng _ .
kina _ alngunak _ alla tun _ apeghtugh i lghii _ aangaayugneghllaguuq _ , _ liigike igate uq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ aaghtiiraagh yuneghtu uq llu _ qani iqe yuneghtu uq llu _ akuzite neng _ . _ tawaten _ pillghem _ allgegh taqagh i _ : _ aqina llegh _ , _ aghiva te llegh _ , _ seghlequughutelleq _ , _ ugpeqe te nanigh llegh _ .
Tawatelnguut _ quunpeng _ aaghtiiraagh te ta iqe ut _ . _ umyugagh it _ sumeghneghlluugtaqut _ enkaam _ liisimake nanigh aqe aat _ ipapilleq _ . _ sumegh meggni _ qepghagh u uute kumegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ aklungi igh i lleqe ni luteng _ pi aqe ut _ .
iwernga _ allgegh te ghllag lleqe ukut _ kiyaghtekumta _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh atun _ itagnaqluku _ pitutalvut _ .
allgegh aqngamta _ nuna mun _ kelqe te ite ukut _ , _ tuqu kumta llu _ kelqe te lgu naanghite ukut _ .
enkaam _ itagnagh lleqe ukut _ neqe lgu kumta _ , _ aatkagh lgu kumta _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ aklungi igh i yu lghiit _ nanghiiqu lleg nge aqe ut _ . _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llghite a _ tugwaaqii _ enkaam _ temngitwhaghllagughtaqut _ . _ taagken _ piyuke llghite a _ sayug aqe ai _ naafqe llegh mun _ .
mani meng _ piniqe i llegh _ akuqagh a _ qamagte luni _ seghlegh m _ . _ ila ita _ yug t _ pegte aqe aat _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ qayughllak _ manitughqagh u ghllag yug lghiit _ . _ enkaam _ ellmeggneng _ qivghughllagughtaqut _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke aaten _ , _ enkaam _ iqite nga luten _ tamaakuneng _ . _ sagiqe te ki _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ kiyaghten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe llegh atun _ , _ ugpeqe i lleg ligh luten _ , _ piniqe i lleg ligh luten _ , _ nuqete neghtu luten _ , _ nangllegtagh luten _ .
Pilluwaatigu _ ugpeqe i llegh _ qayughllak _ tawaten _ pilluwalleq _ pinigh lghii u uq _ . _ tugu gu llu _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagsigh kaqe aaten _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ taana _ unguvallegh _ apegh aqe yavgu _ ugpeqe i llegh n _ ugpeqagh lghute nun _ .
qelegh naqe amken _ nagate ma nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ unguvallelitikam _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ unguva lghii nun _ , _ nagate ma nghaani llu _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ , _ kiimsighilaataqughikam _ Pontius _ pilate- mun _ .
qelegh amken _ piraamsi luten _ qaatkesqelluki _ qamagte luki _ qelgutkanka _ elpenun _ . _ nagnegh te ki _ kenlanga _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ uteghninqiglleghanun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ kitum _ alngunak _ anagguniluten _ pi naanghite aaten _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pilleghqaghlluwaaghmini _ tagi ste lleqe a _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ . _ usuqnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ellnginaaguq _ igleghte te i ste ghllag _ , _ ellnga u uq _ umiileg at _ umiileg t _ , _ Atanghat _ atanghet _ .
ellngagh inagh u uq _ tuqu igate ngughk _ . _ Kiyaghtengnguuq _ nighugrakegllagmi _ repall _ kitum _ alngunak _ tughaaghpagningitaa _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ esghagh igate a _ , _ talwa _ esghagh naanghite a _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piklikek _ quulvalleqlu _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu _ quunperugllag _ . _ amen _ .
qukaayug snanigh ki _ tamaakut _ aklungilnguut _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ talwa _ sighima snanigh ki _ aklungi itgun _ nalluneqnalghiitgun _ . _ iwernga _ sighima sqe ki _ kiyaghnegh kun _ . _ ellnga n _ ighlegute gpenaamta _ tuune aqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pinighyuugusighqameng _ .
Aklungilnguut _ pinitun _ pi sqe ki _ , _ aklungite sqe ki _ pinitun _ qepghagh llegh kun _ , _ ighlellngunaki _ tuune i yu kestagh luki _ ila itnun _ yug nun _ .
tawaten _ pi kumeng _ kagpag lleqe aat _ aklungi _ ellmeggnun _ . _ taana _ aklungi _ ayugilnguuguq _ tunemagh _ aag nakaghqagh itnite ngughk _ . _ enkaam _ unguvallegh nge lleqe ut _ unguvallegh pig meng _ .
Timothy _ , _ kelengake luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ neghyuke tke ai _ elpenun _ . _ iqite nga luten _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ temngitwhaneng _ akuzite itneng llu _ , _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh itneng llu _ . _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ sumegh meggni _ liisimallepiilguniiqut _ , _ iwernga _ ipa u nghite uq _ .
ila ita _ pegte ma ut _ ugpeqe i llegh eng _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe kangat _ ipa u nghite ngughk _ liisima llegh _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyaslisi _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ apostle-nganeng _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh akun _ . _ kayagtekaqe aanga _ apegh sqellug qu _ akequsagh kekagh _ unguvallegh _ Christ _ Jesus-melnguq _ .
Timothy-mun _ piniqe pigtekagh mnun _ ighnegh mnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-emllu _ atanegh mta _ quyasliten _ , _ nangllekliten _ , _ nekeggmellelguslitenllu _ .
unugtugh magh an _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ yughagh lleg mkun _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ elpeneng _ . _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ seghleghyullngunanga _ , _ katam _ sivunegh mtun _ .
esghagh yug pigte aqe amken _ allameng _ , _ qayughllak _ neqamike aqa _ pellegh utu te aqngamtung _ qiya kau lghiiten _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllag lleqe unga _ qerngughunneqigtekumtung _ .
neqamike aqa _ ugpeqillepiigen _ . _ Taananguuq _ ataasigh _ ugpeqe i llegh _ nengyugh gpek _ Lois-em _ , _ naa gpek llu _ Eunice-em _ atuqe ka ak _ . _ Liisimakngwaaghaqa _ elpek llu _ atuqe u an _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh ka ughte yug amken _ , _ atuqe manginagh ghhu _ tunute yan _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ tuune kaqe a _ iigtighaqngamken _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghalitellghitiinkut _ alingyug na lghii meng _ . _ itupill _ taghneghagh gkenka _ imigh kaqe ainkut _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmeng _ , _ piniqe llegh meng _ , _ nuqete llegh meng llu _ .
kayngu ke gpenaan _ ungipagh ke gu _ atanegh ut _ , _ talwa _ kayngu yagute gpenanga _ anusimingllaghagh u unga _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ itupill _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ikfiqe lgusigh nga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ yugulikaqiinkutlu _ nakmike kaqe ainkut llu _ pelungitesqelluta _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ apallugh ke luki _ ellmi _ katam _ uspeqe lleg ni llu _ piniqe i lleg ni llu _ , _ nakaan _ qepghagh llegh ut _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ piniqe kaqe ainkut _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ sivutghulluku _ piinligh lleghqagh an _ nuna m _ .
iwernga _ whaa _ piniqe lleg ni _ liite sta _ whangkunnun _ tagi llegh akun _ Yugulighistemta _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ . _ Christ-am _ naafqe kaqe a _ tuqu llegh _ , _ taagken _ pinigh lghii tgun _ ungipagh tgun _ liite ste ainkut _ tuqu igate ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ .
pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aanga _ ungipagh ke i ste u lunga _ , _ apostle-ngulunga _ , _ apeghtughiste u lunga llu _ .
taakut _ apallugh ke luki _ ikfiqe u unga _ . _ iwernga _ kayngu yug nghite unga _ qayughllak _ liisimake aqa _ kina u ta a _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ . _ Liisimakngwaaghaqa _ ellnga n _ kelengaksaqlegwaa _ sa u a _ neghyuke tke aqa _ ellnga nun _ kenlanga _ kinguligh mun _ aghnegh mun _ .
maligte ki _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ nagaqughkagh ten _ whanga mneng _ . _ usputagh u ut _ atughqagh ke aten _ . _ apeghtuusagh ke ki _ ugpeqe i llegh kun llu _ piniqe llegh kun llu _ allgeghtekaqaten _ Christ _ Jesus-meng _ .
kelengake gu _ ipapilleq _ neghyuke tke aq _ elpenun _ . _ kelengake gu _ kayute kellug kek _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ .
liisima kan _ qamagte vzigh luteng _ ugpeqagh t _ Asia-melnguut _ kayusigh yug nanigh ma aatnga _ , _ talwa _ Phygelus-enkuk _ Hermogenes-enkuk _ .
Yughaatkengngwaanka _ atanegh mun _ nangllegyagutesqelluki _ Onesiphorus-em _ nengllugutangi _ , _ qayughllak _ uglagh ghngaan _ ilutughsagh aqe aanga _ . _ kayngu yagute mangite a llu _ anusimingllaghagh u ma llegh ka _ .
kaate aqngami _ Rome-emun _ ivanʼghiighutkaqaanga _ kenlanga _ naalke llegh minun _ .
atanegh mun _ yughagh te kaqe aqa _ Onesiphorus _ nanglleg yagute sqellug qu _ tawani _ aghneghmi _ ! _ liisima kan _ kayute ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ ephesus- mi _ .
Enkaangam _ elpek _ ighnegh mni _ , _ iknaqe i _ atuqe llegh gpegun _ piniqe llegh a _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ .
elpek llu _ tawantutkatlu _ nagate kaqe asi _ apeghtuusagh nka _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtuusagh nka _ neghyuke te ki _ ataasiighmelngughnun _ . _ taagken _ ellngit a _ apeghtuusaqlegulleqiit _ ila meggnun _ .
ikfiqe lgusigh kut _ pinigh lghii tun _ pilluwaghtengatun _ Christ _ Jesus-em _ .
Pilluwaghtem _ ilate nga lghii m _ pilluwaghtenun _ efqughsugaqaa _ umiileg ni _ , _ enkaam _ akumghhuusigatuq _ pilluwaghtengunghilnguut _ kiyaghtaallghitnun _ .
kayaalqeiiraagh a _ kilgaaqumun _ malighqutagh ke nghite kuni _ liilightuusagh meggnun _ , _ allgegh te naanghite uq _ qaghpa aneng _ kayaalqiistem _ .
ughleghiigh ghllagkagh _ piitesighagh a _ nengigh yuwhaagh yaghqaa uq _ unatagh kata _ .
sumeghtu aghagh tke ki _ sa meng _ pillghenka _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ liigi ksagute ste lleqe aaten _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ .
neqamike luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ kingunegh ke a _ David-em _ . _ Tamaakunguut _ ungipagh kaqe kenka _ apenemki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ .
ikfiqe u unga _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ke gkenka _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ talwa _ qiipraghusighlunga _ ayuqe unga _ liilightuusagh meng _ naafqii stetu te _ . _ iwernga _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ qiipraghute ite ut _ .
enkaam _ ikfiqe sigh ke yug luku _ ayuqe aqa _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yugulillengesqelluki _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ . _ yuguligh llegh megteggun _ nighughqellengellequt _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ .
maakut _ pillghet _ ipa u ut _ : _ tuqu lgusigh ma kumteggu _ , _ kiyaghtelgusighlleqaghput _ .
iilqayug nghite kumta _ , _ igleghutilgusighlleqaghput _ . _ nallu negh ke gkumteggu _ , _ ellnga n llu _ nallu negh ke lleqe ainkut _ .
ataasiighmete nghite kumta _ , _ ellnga _ ataasiighmete aqe uq _ qayughllak _ taaqe naanghite uq _ ataasiighmete nghmeng _ .
kitumun _ alngunak _ puygu ste gpenaki _ tamaakut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagate ma nghaani _ , _ kelengasaaghqi _ qani qutu tke fqiita _ akuzite t _ pisqelluki _ . _ qani qu te llegh at _ kayute u naanghite uq _ , _ naafqengnginaghlleqaat _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ nagate lghiit _ .
Taakunginaghhaagneng _ qepghagh a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ itagnaqesqelluten _ . _ Qepghaghtengu _ kayngu ke i igate ngughk _ qepghaqagh mineng _ . _ elqughaghte luku llu _ apeghtuusagh ke gu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ungipaghpigaa _ .
iqite nga luten _ temngitwhaneng _ , _ sa meng _ pi sigh u nghite ngugh neng _ aleghquute llegh neng _ . _ Tawatelnguut _ aleghquute llegh t _ uyavagh u aatagh aghte lleqe ait _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
Tawatelnguut _ temngitwhat _ apeghtuusagh t _ aqnighnegh stun _ ayuqe ut _ mingite kayug t _ maame yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ . _ Hymenaeus-enkuk _ Philetus-enkuk _ apeghtugh i llegh ik _ tawatelnguugut _ .
pegtekaqe aik _ apeghtuusagh pig t _ qayughllak _ pi aqe uk _ siingenllu _ tuqukagh t _ unguvaghtesimaniluki _ . _ enkaam _ ila itnun _ ugpeqe nanigh stekaqe ak _ ipapilleq _ .
iwernga _ ayugilnguq _ tunemagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekagh a _ qapragtepagningituq _ . _ taaggun _ tunemagh kun _ igaqe nga ut _ akuzite t _ : _ " _ Atanghem _ liisimake ai _ ellmi _ pi ni _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ tuqlugh i lghii _ ategh aneng _ Ataneghem _ , _ seghletun _ pi nghmeng _ taaqe li _ . _ "
mangteghagh ghllag mi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ salghutaghtu uq _ : _ ila i _ ulimaagh u ut _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ qiku meng llu _ . _ ila i _ salghutagh t _ megnu nagh lghii nun _ atugh u ut _ , _ ila i _ sa mun _ alngungak _ .
kina _ alngunak _ ellmi neng _ katam _ pelungighsagh kuni _ seghlegh meng _ , _ salghutaghtu te _ atughqagh ughte lleqe uq _ megnu nagh lghii mun _ . _ aaftekau aghte lleqe uq _ atugh u luni _ mangteghagh m _ yug anun _ . _ taagken _ atughqagh ughte lleqe uq _ alngunak _ pinigh lghii mun _ qepghaqagh mun _ .
iqite nga luten _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ anglinghhagh t _ atuqe yug aqe ka itneng _ . _ quunpeng _ atuqe aqe gu _ elqughutngagh llegh _ . _ ataasiighmete luten _ , _ piniqe i nga luten _ , _ nekeggmellutenllu _ . _ tamaakut _ atuqe ki _ , _ maligte te luten _ tuqlugh i lghii nun _ atanegh mun _ qamaken _ pelungilngughmeng _ ilu meggneng _ .
iqite nga luten _ temngitwhaneng _ aleghquute llegh itneng _ yug t _ akuzi tke i lghii neng _ liigike ma ite ke meggneng _ . _ liisima katen _ aaghtiiraagh te ste i kayugu ut _ .
Atanghem _ qepghaghtenga _ aaghtiiraaghtengunghituq _ . _ itupill _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa uq _ tea- ma anun _ . _ pinigh lghii u yaghqaa uq _ apeghtugh i sta _ . _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ .
Atanghem _ qepghaghtenga _ kavyugite yaghqaa uq _ apeghtugh i kuni _ kipullginaalghiinun _ . _ walluumllu _ kiyaghnegh m _ avuteghqe ste aqe liki _ ugpeqe sqellug qu _ ipapilleq _ .
enkaam _ liite yaaghagh yagh kumeng _ anag nayagh aat _ tughneghagh m _ negagh aa _ . _ tughneghagh m _ naapte ma nghminiki _ aaghqutagh ke aqe ai _ .
liisimake sug amken _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ seghleliigh ghllagu yaghqaa uq _ .
yug t _ ellmeggneng _ piniqe lleqe ut _ , _ mani yuneghtu lleqe ut _ , _ yamrratu lleqe ut _ , _ aangaayugte lleqe ut llu _ . _ Seghlequughlleqiit _ ila teng _ , _ qaute kete naanghite ait _ angayuqagh teng _ , _ iyamsiqa yug naanghite ut _ , _ waaknanigh lleqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
piniqe i naanghite ut _ , _ seghevute i naanghite ut _ , _ iqlengiqe tke i lleqe ut _ , _ suugllug u lleqe ut _ , _ amyuqetagh iqe lleqe ut _ , _ ugumi ke lleqe aat llu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pinigh lghii _ .
uvegh ghpagte te lleqe ait _ ila teng _ , _ nangyagh u i aghte te lleqe ut _ , _ qukaayugteghllagllequt _ , _ teghigniqe llegh _ piniqe aghagh lleqe aat _ pakiggulluku _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
qaye megteggun _ ugpeqagh u yug lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghtaallghita _ apegh lleqe aat _ avangitulngi _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghaneng _ . _ iqite nga luten _ tawatelngughneng _ yug neng _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ ne nun _ itegh aatagh lleqe ut _ aaghqute aqe pigesnagh na luki _ nallekaghnilnguut _ aghnagh t _ . _ tamaakut _ aghnagh t _ seghleghqe llghite a _ uqigtu qusigh ghllag lleqe ai _ , _ seghlegh m llu _ piyuke lleg lghute ita _ aaghqute aqe lleqe ai _ .
tamaakut _ aghnagh t _ nagate lleqe ut _ apeghtugh i llegh anun _ kitum _ alngunak _ , _ taawanginaq _ liite naanghite aat _ ipapilleq _ .
tamaakut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ ellngit nun _ kipullginaaghlleqaat _ ipapilleq _ , _ katam _ Jannes-enkuk _ Jambres-enkuk _ kipullginaallghegketun _ moses _ . _ Umyugaghlluugllequt _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh at llu _ ipa u nghite lleqe uq _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ pillghat _ mulu naanghite uq _ . _ temngitwha llegh at _ aliite lleqe uq _ tea- ma anun _ , _ katam _ Jannes-enkuk _ Jambres-enkuk _ temngitwha llegh ak _ aliite nga llegh atun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ liisimakngwaaghaten _ apeghtugh i llegh nka _ , _ kiyaghtaalqa _ , _ apallugh a llu _ kiyaghte llegh ma _ . _ liisima kan llu _ ugpeqe i llegh ka _ , _ iilqayug nghite llegh ka _ , _ piniqe i llegh ka _ , _ aghuliilkaamalqa _ .
liisima kan _ amyuqetagh tkesigh llegh ka _ , _ ikfiqe llegh ka llu _ . _ liisima kan _ tawaten _ pi kaqe aatnga _ Antioch-mi _ , _ Iconium-emi _ , _ Lystra-millu _ . _ uglagh ghngaan _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge kau unga _ , _ tawalliima _ Atanghem _ yugulikaqaanga _ tea- ma ghhagh itneng _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ amyuqetagh tke lleg nge lleqe uq _ kiyaghte yu lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
seghlegh t _ yug t _ , _ puughtistetlu _ , _ seghlegh ughteaghaghte lleqe ut _ . _ puughte qugh lleqe ut _ , _ ellngit llu _ puughte lleg nge lleqe ut _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ atuqe manginagh ki _ apeghtuusagh t _ liitekagh ten _ , _ ugpeqepiikaghten _ . _ liisima katen _ ipa u ta i _ , _ qayughllak _ liisima katen _ kinku u ta i _ apeghtughiste kekagh ten _ .
ima _ taghnughhagh u te gpeneng _ liisimake kaqe aten _ agleghnagh lghiit _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ . _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apeghtughyaqlegwaaten _ yuguligh lleghqagh meng _ ugpeqe i llegh gpegun _ Christ _ Jesus-kun _ .
qamagte luteng _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aneghziig llegh ke ai _ . _ enkaam _ apeghtugh i sighqagh u ut _ , _ aghyuugh sagh ighqagh u ut _ , _ nallghusagh sighqagh u ut _ anaggute llegh mun _ , _ apeghtugh i sighqagh u ut llu _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh mun _ .
enkaam _ atuqe luki _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaghtenga _ peghqigsaghwaaghngallequq _ , _ yataaghqengngallequqlu _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mun _ .
Christ _ Jesus _ tagi kuni _ igleghte te i na luni _ ataneghpag u llegh mini _ , _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ unguva lghiit llu _ tuqukagh t llu _ . _ enkaam _ nagasimanghegkeni _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ Christ _ Jesus-enkuk _ , _ qelegh amken
ungipagh ke ki _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ . _ sagiqe luten _ ungipagh ke ki _ yug nun _ nagasugughngaata _ nalighmeng _ nagasugunghiteghngaata _ . _ Nekeggmelluten _ apeghtugh i llegh gpegun _ ugpegh ste naqe ki _ , _ ineghte ki _ anaggute llegh itneng _ , _ kayeme ki llu _ .
pi lleghqagh _ tagi u uq _ yug t _ nagate yug nanigh lleqe ut _ ipa pig nun _ apeghtuusagh nun _ . _ ivagh i lleqe ut _ piyukekagh meggneng _ apeghtughiste lghute neng _ nagate pigesnagh na luki _ nagaqugh yukekagh ghhagh inagh teng _ .
nagate yug nanigh lleqe ut _ ipapilleghmun _ , _ nagate yug yagute lleqe ut _ temnginun _ ungipaghagh nun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ iiwleng _ nekeggmelluten _ , _ nagnegh te gu _ sa u a _ pi yaghqagh n _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghpek _ , _ ungipagh ke i kestagh a _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ . _ elpek _ qepghaghtekegkangaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apeghiigh ghhu _ qamagte luku _ qepghaqagh _ elpenun _ pi sqekagh a _ .
whanga _ aghqe te kete yaghqaaghte ma unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ tuqu lleghqagh ka _ kaate yaghtugh ma uq _ .
Pilluwaamaaqa _ pinigh lghii _ pilluwalleq _ , _ apeghiigh aqa _ kilgaaqu llegh ka _ , _ ataasiighmete manginagh kau unga _ atanegh mun _ .
enkaam _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ utaqa i te u a _ whanga mnun _ qaghpa a _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ . _ Atanghem _ elqughte luku _ nanqigtistem _ akileghtugh lleqe aanga _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ . _ whanga inagh u gpenanga _ iwernga _ akileghtugh lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ qelanegh lghiit _ tagi lleghqagh aneng _ .
Pinaqellghaagken _ qamagte lukek _ tagi ragkiigh i _ whanga mnun _ .
Demas-em _ piniqsaliisimaa _ nuna m _ kiyaghtaallgha _ enkaam _ unite ma unga _ , _ aghulaqe ma uq _ Thessalonica-mun _ . _ Crescens _ Galatia-simaaq _ enkaam _ titus _ Dalmatia-mun _ pi ma uq _ .
Luke-nginaghhaq _ whanga mnite uq _ . _ mark _ aqfa luku _ kelqennaken _ qayughllak _ kayute ke pigte aqa _ qepghagh lleg mni _ .
Tychicus _ ephesus- mun _ kayagte ma aqa _ .
Troas-mellunga _ unite kaqe agka _ qaasligh gka _ Carpus-enkuni _ . _ tagi naqe gkuvek _ tagite aghte nakegken _ . _ tagite aghte naketen llu _ iimgat _ igagh nka _ , _ kiyang _ taakut _ amiiragh meng _ ulimaagh t _ .
Alexander-em _ siilu meng _ sangllaghtem _ elngaatall _ seghletun _ pi kaqe aanga _ . _ Atanghem _ aghyuugh naagh aa _ tawaten _ pillghaneng _ .
elpek llu _ kelengake luku _ tawaten _ pinagh yu kangaten _ qayughllak _ ungipagh ut _ ugumi ke pigte a _ .
Nanqigtistemun _ aglagh te yuwhaagh aqe yatnga _ kitum _ alngunak _ mesighagh te yaghtugh llghite aanga _ , _ yeghlegi _ uniqaghaatkaqaatnga _ . _ yughagh te kaqe anka _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aki naqe fqiita _ pisqelluki _ tawaten _ pillghitneng _ .
iwernga _ atanegh _ whangamnitkaaguq _ . _ iknaqe sigh ke aqe aanga llu _ ungipaqesqelluki _ iingunagh ita _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ qamagte luki _ Gentile-et _ nagaqiisqelluki _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugulikaqaanga _ tuqute lleghqagh meng _ .
Atanghem _ yuguliyaghqaqaanga _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghlegh m _ sughugallghaneng _ , _ enkaam _ paqna nagh ngunaan _ aglagh u lleqe aanga _ qilagmelngughmun _ ataneghpag u llegh minun _ . _ ellnga nun _ usuqe i llegh _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
ungipaate aghte naketen _ Priscilla-nkuk _ Aquila-nkuk _ , _ Onesiphorus-enkutlu _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ suumqagh ke anka nguq _ .
erastus _ unegtekau uq _ Corinth-mi _ ; _ qinuyug ta aneng _ trophimus _ unite kaqe aqa _ miletus- mi _ .
uksugh vagilgan _ tagi naqe ghllag i _ . _ Eubulus-enkut _ , _ Pudens-enkut _ , _ Linus-enkut _ , _ Claudia-nkut _ , _ ila ita llu _ ugpeqaalgutet _ ungipaate sqe aisi _ suumqagh ke aisi nguq _ .
atanegh _ taghneghagh gpenite li _ , _ quyaslisillu _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ qepghaghtenganeng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ apostle-nganengllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ kayagtekau unga _ kayusiitesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh i _ yug t _ ugpelleghtughtaghiisqelluki _ , _ liite sqellug qu llu _ ipapilleq _ . _ Taam _ ipapillghem _ kayusigh lleqe ai _ yug t _ kiyaghte lleghqagh it _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ .
taagken _ ataasigh meng _ ipapilleghmeng _ sighima lleg lgu ukut _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ . _ Iqlengiqigatngwaaghem _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke kaqe a _ taana _ unguvallegh _ ima _ ayumirugllaggaaneng _ .
enkaam _ pilleghqaghlluwaaghmini _ kiyaghnegh m _ liite stekaqe a _ taana _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ ungipagh mikun _ . _ whanga mnun _ neghyuke te kaqe a _ ungipagh ni _ enkaam _ ungipagh kaqe aqa _ qelegh te llegh atun _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighistemta _ .
ukut _ lata t _ titus- mun _ pi u ut _ , _ ighnegh pig ke amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mtegnegun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ , _ Christ _ Jesus-emllu _ Yugulighistemta _ quyaslitenllu _ nekeggmellelguslitenllu _ .
unite kaqe amken _ Crete-mi _ , _ apeghiigh sqellug qu _ qepghaqagh ut _ apeghiigh llghite ngughk _ . _ nakmiigh ta ii sqe sug amken _ Elder-kaghqameng _ yughaghvig nun _ tea- ma ghhagh itni _ town-et _ . _ neqamike luki _ qelegh tke anka _ :
elder-kaghqagh _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ ; _ ataasigh meng _ nuliigh lgu yaghqaa uq _ , _ avaquti a llu _ ugpeqagh u yaghqaa ut _ ; _ nelliqe negh u yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ qaatke te igate yaghqaa nghite ut llu _ .
igleghte te i ste u te mineng _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaqagh anun _ , _ Elder-a _ avute ite yaghqaa uq _ . _ Yukeghqenghuyaghqaanghituq _ , _ nalighmeng _ kaate qaghtagh ma u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ suume ste u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ suugllug u yaghqaa nghite uq _ , _ nalighmeng _ pakignegh u yaghqaa nghite uq _ aklungi igh i na luni _ .
itupill _ upughanghuyaghqaaguq _ , _ piniqe i stekaghqagh ke a _ pinigh llegh m _ . _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa uq _ , _ elqughute nga yaghqaa uq _ , _ taghneghagh gmikun _ pelungite yaghqaa uq _ , _ nuqetutiyaghqaaguq _ alngunak _ seghlegh meng _ .
ellnga _ ataasigh mete yaghqaa uq _ ipa pig nun _ apeghtuusagh nun _ apeghtughallengelleghmitun _ . _ atuqe luki _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ kayeme lleqe ai _ yug t _ , _ liigike ste lleqe ai llu _ apeghtughistesighwaaghet _ anaggute nga ni luki _ .
uglagh u pigte ut _ qaatke te yug igate ngugh t _ , _ temngi _ akuzi lghiit _ puughte i lghiit _ ila meggneng _ , _ kiyang _ tamaakunguut _ apeghtugh i lghiit _ Gentile-et _ ugpeqe ait _ circumcise-eyaghqaaniluki _ .
taaqe ste ki _ tawaten _ apeghtugh i llegh itneng _ . _ Temngimeng _ apeghtugh i llegh megteggun _ alngunaseghaghqagh ke ait _ iingunagh ita _ nengllugute t _ . _ apeghtugh i aqe ut _ apeghtugh te yaghqaqe nghite ke meggneng _ ; _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ aklungi igh i pigesnagh na luteng _ .
ataasigh m _ Crete-eghmiim _ uuknaliqistem _ pi kaqe ai _ , _ " _ Crete-eghmiit _ quunpeng _ iqlengagh ut _ , _ ugighsagh lghii stun _ teghig ke sagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii u ut llu _ neghe ghllaget _ . _ "
tawaten _ pillgha _ ipa u uq _ . _ taana _ apallugh ke luku _ qevuute luki _ aghyuugh ki _ Crete-eghmiit _ ugpeqe ait _ ugpeqesqelluki _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
ungipaate ki _ nagate nanigh litki nguq _ Jews-et _ temngi _ ungipaghagh ta it _ . _ qaute kete nanigh litki nguq _ yug t _ qelegh sagh ngllaghkagh it _ . _ Taakunguut _ ighsake ikagh t _ ipa pig neng _ apeghtuusagh neng _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ pelungite uq _ tamaakunun _ pelungilngughnun _ . _ iwernga _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ pelungite nghite uq _ tamaakunun _ pelungite nghite ngugh nun _ . _ Kiyaghtengnguut _ seghleghqe llegh mi _ , _ ugpeqe igate aat llu _ Christ-a _ . _ umyugagh it llu _ sumeghnegh it llu _ nukeggnaghtekau ut _ , _ enkaam _ liigike yaghqaa nanigh ma ut _ pinigh llegh llu _ seghlelleqlu _ .
liisimake na iqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ iwernga _ kiyaghtaallghita _ ipapighqaqaat _ nalluke ta a _ : _ ugumi ke ni pigte ut _ , _ qaatke te igate ut _ , _ sasii nghite ut llu _ sa u a _ alngunak _ pinitun _ pi naanghite aat _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ apeghtuusagh ke ki _ ugpeqagh nun _ ipa pig t _ apeghtuusagh t _ .
apeghtugh ki _ nuyekligh at _ yug t _ nuqenneghtusqelluki _ , _ siivaknalghiinguluki _ , _ sumeghtaghayusqelluki _ , _ ayepsugitesqelluki _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ , _ piniqe i llegh kun _ , _ nuqete neghtu llegh kun _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ apeghtugh ki _ nuyekligh at _ aghnagh t _ kiyaghtesqelluki _ tuunʼngaluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ seghletun _ akuzite kete yaghqaqe nghite ait _ ila teng _ , _ nalighmeng _ meghe ghllag fqiita _ wine- meng _ . _ apeghtugh i yaghqaa ut _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghqagh meng _ ,
enkaam _ peghqigh lleqe ait _ uyuqligh t _ aghnagh t _ piniqesqelluki _ ugi it llu _ avaquti ut llu _ .
Sumeghtaghaqegsaghqaagut _ , _ pelungite yaghqaa ut _ kiyaghtaalleghmeggni _ , _ qepghaqegsaghqaagut _ ne meggni _ , _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa ut _ , _ qaatke te yaghqaa ut _ ugi meggnun _ . _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequughnaanghitii _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh i _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ qelegh ki _ nukalpigagh t _ nuqenneghtusqelluki _ .
elpek _ sa llegh gpegun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ , _ usputaawi _ ellngit nun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh gpegun _ . _ apeghtugh i aqe i _ ipapighqelluten _ , _ piraamsi luten _ .
wataghllak _ apeghtuusagh ke gkan _ elqughute nga li _ enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequunghillinkut _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ kipullginaaghtet _ seghletun _ akuzite kete naanghite ainkut _ , _ kipullginaallghitallu _ kayngu yug ste lleqe ai _ .
apeghtugh ki _ qepghaghtelaaghet _ qaatkesqelluki _ piliitestengit _ , _ efqughtengngwaaghesqellukillu _ . _ Veghusnaghyaghqaqenghitiit _ ,
nalighmeng _ tegleg vike yaghqaqe nghite ait _ . _ yeghlegi _ quunpeng _ pinitun _ , _ ataasiighmete luteng _ pi yaghqaqe ait _ . _ enkaam _ sa llegh megteggun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ piyuke na ngllagh lleqe ait _ apeghtuusagh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighistemta _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte yaghqaa ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekaqe a _ piniqe lleg ni _ yuguligh lleg nge sqellug qu _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ .
Taam _ piniqe llegh m _ apeghtugh ainkut _ pegte sqellug qu _ kiyaghtaalleq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ , _ ighsakesqelluki _ nuna m _ yug an _ piyuke llegh i _ seghleghqengngalghiit _ . _ apeghtugh ainkut llu _ nuqenneghtusqelluta _ , _ elqughute nga luta _ , _ kiyaghtesqelluta _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte lta _ utaqa i ma luta _ quyanagh lghii meng _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ Sighimalqaghput _ nighughqengngalghii _ aliigh lleghqagh a _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ kiyaghnegh ghllag mta _ Yugulighistemta _ .
ellmi neng _ tuune kau uq _ yugulinaluta _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ pelungighsagh yug kanginkut _ ellmi nun _ yugu luta _ , _ sagiqe luta _ aneghneghqisqelluta _ yug nun _ .
apeghtuusagh ke ki _ tamaakut _ ugpeqagh nun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh i _ atuqe luki _ kayeme ki _ , _ aghula i aghte ki llu _ seghletun _ pi u kata _ . _ yeqay _ kitumun _ alngunak _ ukavagh ste gpenang _ .
negh ka ughte ki _ ugpeqagh t _ malighqutaqesqelluki _ kavemem _ igleghutistengitnun _ , _ umiilwaaghnunllu _ . _ qaatke te nga yaghqaa ut _ , _ apeghiigh nga yaghqaa ut _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh nun _ .
ungipaate ki _ kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ akuzi tke fqaan _ , _ aaghtiiraagh fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ itupill _ nekeggmetulluki _ , _ qusevegngatulluki _ pisqelluki _ tea- ma anun _ .
whangkuta llu _ sivugh nghaani _ nallu yagh ukut _ , _ qaatke te igate yagh ukut _ , _ puughtengngayaghtukutlu _ . _ yugusigh mta _ piyuke llegh a _ ayghigh te luku _ , _ itagnaghqusiqluku _ ayuqsaghaghput _ . _ unguvallegh put _ kiyaghusiqsaghaput _ seghlegh pestaagh mun _ , _ aqina llegh mun llu _ . _ yug t _ ugumi ke yagh ainkut _ , _ ugumi ke te yagh ukut llu _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ Yugulighistemta _ liisimake stekaqe ainkut _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng _ , _ piniqe llegh mineng llu _ .
Yugulikaqiinkut _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh lleg ni _ , _ nakaan _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mteggun _ . _ Agleghnalghiignekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ ughvugh kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ , _ nutaghagh meng llu _ unguvallelitkaqiinkut _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ kuuve kaqe ak _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kemnagh pigte lukek _ whangkunnun _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ , _ Yugulighistemteggun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ piniqe llegh mikun _ nallghusagh na luta _ elqughutngagh llegh minun _ . _ enkaam _ sighima lleg lgu ukut _ whangkuta _ pi liite na luku _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ .
tamaakut _ pillghet _ ipa u ut _ . _ tamaakut _ apeghtuusagh t _ elpenun _ sagiqe te sqe sug anka _ yug nun _ qaatkesqelluki _ . _ taagken _ ugpegh lleg leg t _ kiyaghnegh kun _ aneghneghqagh igh pestaagh lleqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh t _ pinigh lghii u ut llu _ kayute u ut llu _ tea- ma anun _ .
iwernga _ elpek _ iqite nga luten _ tamaakuneng _ temngi _ qani qu te lghii neng _ , _ aaghtiiraagh te lghii neng _ sivugh nghmeng _ ategh itneng _ , _ liilightuusagh neng llu _ . _ tamaa na _ sasii nghite uq _ , _ kayute u naanghite uq _ kitumun _ alngunak _ .
kina _ alngunak _ aafqugh te ste i lghii _ kelengasaaghnaken _ ataasigh meng _ nalighmeng _ alghigh luku _ . _ nagate nghite kan _ pegge naken _ .
liisima kan _ tawatelnguum _ yug m _ ighsake kaqe a _ ipapilleq _ , _ seghleghqe ste u uq llu _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga n _ katam _ seghleghqe llegh an _ nanqigte yaghqaaghte ste lleqe a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ .
aglagh stekumkun _ Artemas _ nalighmeng _ Tychicus _ elpenun _ , _ Nicopolis-ennaqeghllaggaaten _ , _ qayughllak _ uksughte yug aqe unga _ tamaani _ .
kayusigh naqe ghllag nakegken _ lawyer- a _ Zenas _ , _ Apollos-lu _ iglegha lleghqagh gkenun _ . _ wataghllak _ yataaghqe te nakegken _ kelqesaghqagh meng _ sa meng _ aklukegkagkeneng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemta _ peghqigsagh te kete litgu _ aneghnegh ghqu te kaghqagh _ enkaam _ kayusighyaqlegughhnakangit _ aklukegkapilget _ . _ temngi _ kiyaghtaafqaameng _ pi lit _ .
qamagte luteng _ whangamnilnguut _ piniqe aisi nguq _ . _ piniqe llegh ut _ apegh qagh naken _ ugpeqaalgutemnnun _ piniqistemnnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ quyaslisi _ qamagte lusi _ .
ukut _ lata t _ Paul-meng _ pi u ut _ , _ anusimingllagh aq _ Christ _ Jesus _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ ugpeqaalgutemnnengllu _ Timothy-meng _ . _ piniqekagh mtegnun _ qepghalgutemtegnun _ Philemon-mun _ ,
ugpeqagh nun llu _ qerngughte te kayug nun _ mangteghagh gpeni _ , _ Apphia-munllu _ nayag mnnun _ Christ-akun _ , _ Archippus-munllu _ pilluwalgutemtegnun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ , _ atanegh mta llu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ nanglleg ke lisi llu _ , _ nekeggmellelguslisillu _ .
Philemon-mi _ , _ quunpeng _ iyamsiqa yug vike aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh ka _ yughaatkennemken _ ,
qayughllak _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ piniqe llegh n _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh n llu _ atanegh kun _ Jesus-kun _ .
yughagh te kaqe amken _ ungipaatesqelluki _ ila ten _ ugpeqe i lleg mnneng _ Christ-akun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ liigike aghagh lleqe aten _ qamagte luki _ quya ste llegh t _ allgeghtekaput _ Christ-akun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ piniqe i llegh gpek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug anun _ quya ste ghllag aanga llu _ kayeme aanga llu _ ! _ piniqe llegh gpek _ quya ste ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ .
tetug naanghite unga _ qelegh na luten _ Christ-akun _ atuqe sqellug qu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ pi naanghite unga _ .
piniqe te llegh ung _ apallugh ke luku _ aapte vike amken _ atuqe sqellug qu _ elqughutngagh lghii _ . _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ nanevgagh u unga _ , _ anusimingllaghagh u unga llu _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
whanga u uq _ aapute i lghii _ ighnegh mnun _ , _ Onesimus-mun _ . _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ ata liite kaqe aanga _ Christ-akun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ sasii nghite yagh uq _ elpenun _ , _ iwernga _ whaa _ kayute ughte pigte ma uq _ whangkutegnun _ .
Onesimus _ elpenun _ aglagh ste naqe aqa _ , _ leganqun _ ilu ka _ maligte te naqe uq _ ellnga kun _ .
Whangamnitesuguyaghaqa _ kayusiitesqellunga _ anusimingllaghvig mi _ , _ katam _ elpek _ kayusiite na yaqevnga _ maansaquvek _ . _ liisima kegken qun _ anusimingllaghagh u lghiinga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ apallugh ke luki _ .
iwernga _ whangamnitesnaanghitaqa _ wetku qun _ sivuke luten _ aapte aghte luten _ . _ itagnagh qu ma kuvgu _ whangamnitesqelluku _ taawa _ elpek _ piyuke llegh ke lleqe an _ , _ qayughllak _ qelegh u nghite amken _ tawaten _ pisqelluten _ .
entaqun _ Onesimus _ iqite aghtekau uq _ elpenisaghqaaluni _ quunperugllag _ .
ellnga _ paninang _ qepghaghtelaaghuuq _ . _ iwernga _ qepghaghtelaaghumalleghmineng _ anglu iigh aghagh ma uq _ qayughllak _ piniqe kau aghte ma uq _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ . _ piniqe pigte aqa _ , _ iwernga _ elpek _ piniqe aghagh lleqe an _ qepghaghtelaaghuluku _ , _ ugpeqagh u lgute u luku llu _ atanegh kun _ .
Enkaangam _ tugukligh ma kuvnga _ qepghagh lgute u lunga _ , _ tugukligh naken _ Onesimus _ whanga u ste luku _ .
sa meng _ seghletun _ pi ma kangaten _ nalighmeng _ asengemakangaten _ , _ asengenga _ whanga _ llivike lleqe aqa _ .
whaa _ , _ whanga _ katam _ iigge mneng _ igagh unga _ whaten _ : _ whanga _ , _ Paul _ , _ llivike lleqe amken _ . _ iwernga _ puygu gpenaan _ unguvallegh n _ asengeluku _ ayuqe an _ whanga mnun _ .
aa-a _ , _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ aapte vike amken _ atanegh kun _ tugukligh sqellug qu _ Onesimus _ . _ tawaten _ pi kuvek _ quyasleqaghpenga _ Christ-akun _ !
lata amken _ liisimakngwaaghluku _ qaatkesaghqagh ke an _ qelegh tke aqa _ elpenun _ , _ repall _ qaayghute luku _ pi lleqe uten _ .
atwhay _ , _ nekaghqagh ngllagh te aghte nakevnga _ qayughllak _ sighima u unga _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiimsigh lleqe ai _ yughagh lleg si _ , _ enkaam _ elpesi nun _ pi lleqe unga _ .
Epaphras-emnguq _ piniqe aisi _ ; _ anusimingllaghagh lgu tke aqa _ apallugh ke luku _ Christ _ Jesus _ .
Qepghalgutmallu _ Mark-enkut _ , _ Aristarchus-enkut _ , _ Demas-enkut _ , _ Luke-enkut _ ellngit a llu nguq _ piniqe aisi _ .
piniqe llegh a _ Atanghem _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ uglagh luku llu _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u luku llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aleghqugh kaqe ai _ sivunegh put _ uuknaliqistetgun _ .
iwernga _ up-uni _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ aleghqugh kaqe ainkut _ ighnegh mikun _ . _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh _ nuna ngllagh kau uq _ , _ nakmike kaqe a llu _ pi liite sqellug qu _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ .
ighnegh m _ kuukgute aqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqellgha _ , _ Kiyaghneghtungwaaqlu _ ayuqe uq _ . _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ nagneghastengngwii _ tawatete luki _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh tgun _ akuzite mikun _ . _ ighnegh m _ tuune kaqe a _ ellmi _ katam _ unguvallegh ni _ ukmangigh na luta _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ . _ apeghiigh yamigu _ tawaten _ pilleg ni _ , _ qilag mi _ aqume kau uq _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghpigaam _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ qule ii aghtekaqe a _ ighnegh _ yaquleg neng _ , _ atelitkaqaallu _ ingyagh te nga lghii meng _ ategh itneng _ .
tawaten _ pika qaa _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi mangite ai _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg t _ whaten _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ ; _ aghneghmi _ Ataliitaghpenga _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ pi mangite ai _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg t _ whaten _ , _ " _ ata ke lleqe aanga _ enkaam _ ellnga _ ighnegh ke lleqe aqa _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ kayagte yaghqaaghte yamigu _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh ni _ nuna mun _ , _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ yeqay _ qamagte luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ita _ manigugh litgu _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ yaquleg neng _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ni _ anuqe stun _ lliigh stekaqe ai _ . _ Qepghaghtengi _ kumaghugh lghii stun _ kenghestun _ lliigh stekaqe ai _ . _ "
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh _ ighnegh mineng _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ kaay _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aqumutagh gken _ kenle ite yaghqaa uk _ quunperugllag _ ! _ igleghte te lleqe an _ ataneghpag u llegh n _ elqughutngagh lleg ligh luku _ .
pinigh kan _ elqughutngagh llegh _ , _ ugumi ke an _ anaggute nga llegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh gpek _ nakmike ma uten llu _ quulvaamaatenllu _ pakiggulluku _ ila gpeneng _ . _ Enkaangam _ quya ste i ghllag uq _ anoint-eluten _ mesiigh meng _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ elpek _ , _ atanegh _ , _ piinligh yuggaagh mi _ nuna ngllagh kau uten _ , _ iigge gpeneng llu _ qilaga ngllagh kau uten _ .
qamagte luteng _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ , _ iwernga _ elpek _ kiyaghte yaghqaa uten _ . _ aghyugh yaghqaa ut _ aatkagh stun _ .
Imegteghlleqaten _ qaasligetun _ , _ simigh lleqe aten llu _ aatkagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ elpek _ quunpeng _ almesiqe lleqe aaten _ , _ aghyugh yaghqaa nghite uten llu _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ pimangitngwaaghii _ naligh ghhagh inagh it _ yaquleg ni _ whaten _ : _ " _ aqume i _ whagun _ aghenqignegh mkun _ , _ kenlanga _ anguyag ten _ tunemagh liite ste lleg mnun _ itegagh gpek _ asi anun _ . _ "
Sangaawanʼngam _ yaquleg t _ ? _ qamagte luteng _ taghneghagh u ut _ qepghagh te i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ kayagte aqe ai llu _ kayusiitesqelluki _ tamaakut _ yuguligh lleg nge yaghqagh t _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ sumeghtaghaatkengngwaaghelteki _ ipapillghet _ nagaqughkagh put _ luuraq _ waaknaniqestaghnayukamteki _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ apeghtuusagh i _ ipa u ut _ ; _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ yaquleg tgun _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ qaatke te nghite ngughk _ apeghtuusagh nun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ aghyuugh lleghqaghtutala atun _ .
enkaam _ ighsake ma kumteggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuguligh i llegh ghllag a _ anagpagningitaghput _ aghyuugh i lleghqagh a _ . _ Atanghem _ apegh yuggaagh kaqe a _ taana _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ taagken _ tamaakut _ nagaqugh tke aat _ ellnga neng _ , _ ipapighqaat _ whangkunnun _ .
kiyaghnegh m llu _ ipapighqegkaqaa _ whangkunnun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ atuqe llegh mikun _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ allaaghlluwhaghtillghet _ , _ uyegte llegh mikun llu _ tunusagh i _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike llghite ai _ yaquleg t _ igleghutisqelluki _ sivumelngughmun _ nuna kaghqagh mun _ . _ ( _ Taananguuq _ nuna _ akuzitkegkefut _ . _ )
nalighnegh itni _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ sangaawa _ yuug _ umyugagh mig kaqe ken _ , _ nalighmeng _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ aflengake gkan _ ?
ulima aqe an _ ukavaqaanlluku _ yaquleg neng _ , _ qaghpa ligh qagh kan _ nighughqelleghmengllu _ quulvalleghmengllu _ ,
igleghte te i ste ngllagh qagh kan llu _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ " _ tawani llu _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe a _ yuug _ " _ igleghte te i ste u luku _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ . _ " _ taana _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ sa u a _ qamagte luni _ ilate nga uq _ igleghte te i llegh anun _ . _ naqamllu _ salin _ esghiigataghput _ yuug _ igleghte te i lghii _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
iwernga _ esghaghaghput _ Jesus _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ natengiighhaq _ ukavagh stekaqsagh aa _ yaquleg neng _ . _ maaten _ esghaghaghput _ qaghpa lug ni _ nighughqelleghmengllu _ quulvalleghmengllu _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe luni _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ Jesus _ tuqu kau uq _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
kiyaghnegh u uq _ ulimaghikaq _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ ellmi nun _ , _ nagneghastengngwiillu _ tawatete luki _ . _ itagnagh pigtekau uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighsaghwaaqaqaa _ Jesus _ ikfiqe llegh kun _ piinlightenguluku _ yuguligh llegh itnun _ . _ enkaam _ Jesus-em _ tagite yaghqaaghtekaqe ai _ yug lghute t _ nighughqelleghmun _ .
Jesus-em _ pelungighsagh kaqe ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ . _ enkaam _ ellnga llu _ tamaakut llu _ pelungighsaghkagh i _ , _ qamagte luteng _ ata ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus-em _ kayngu ke igate ai _ atigh yaghqaa luki _ anglegute u luki _ .
Jesus-em _ pika qaa _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ " _ apegh lleqe aqa _ ategh n _ anglegute mnun _ ; _ usuqe lleqe amken _ qerngughte te gkata _ . _ "
whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ neghyuke lleqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ " _ pi kau uq llu _ , _ " _ whaante unga _ , _ taghnughhagh t llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ tagivaghkagh i _ whanga mnun _ . _ "
taakut _ taghnughhagh t _ yugu ut _ kemekrag leg t llu _ aaw lgu ut llu _ , _ enkaam _ Jesus _ ellngistun _ lliigh kau uq _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuqu na luni _ naafqennaluku _ tughneghagh _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelek _ tuqumun _ .
enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ iteme te kaqe ai _ tamaakut _ qepghaghtelaaghestun _ ayuqe lghiit _ unguvallegh teng _ qamagte luki _ qayughllak _ alike u kangat _ tuqu llegh _ .
Whateghllugaaghuuq _ yaquleg u nghite ut _ Jesus-em _ kayusigh iqe ai _ , _ iwernga _ Abraham-em _ kingunghi _ kayusigh aqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus _ lliightestengngwaaghyaghqaqaa _ whangkutestun _ . _ tawaten _ qepghaasaqlegwaa _ kiyaghnegh _ High _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ , _ nangllegtagh luni llu _ ataasiighmete luni llu _ . _ enkaam _ tuuniyaqlegughtekaaguq _ aghqe te meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ seghevutesqelluki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ .
Jesus _ ikfiqe kau te mineng llu _ nanghiiqu lleg nge kau te mineng llu _ , _ kayusighyaqlegwii _ tamaakut _ nanghiiqu lleg nge lghiit _ .
Enkaangam _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aaftekaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ tuqlugh kaqe aisi llu _ ellminitesqellusi _ qilag mi _ . _ sumeghmike luku _ Jesus _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayagtekagh a _ Apostle-ngulukullu _ High _ Priest-ngulukullu _ aapghaqegkefut _ ugpeqe ni luku _ .
Jesus _ ataasigh mete kau uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nakmikisteminun _ , _ katam _ moses _ ataasigh metekagh _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qepghagh te aqe yamigu _ kiyaghnegh _ mangteghagh ani _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ mangteghagh _ kitumeng _ ulimaghistelgulghii _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus-kun _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ ulima aqe a _ . _ yug t _ usuqe aghagh yaghqaqe aat _ Jesus _ pakiggulluku _ Moses-meng _ , _ qayughllak _ yug t _ usuqe lleqe aat _ mangteghagh ngllagh a _ pakiggulluku _ mangteghagh meng _ .
moses _ ataasiighmete kau uq _ qepghagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ani _ , _ ungipaate kaqe ai llu _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh _ sa meng _ apegh yaghqagh lgu ni luku _ taaganiqaaghaq _ .
iwernga _ Christ-a _ ighnegh u luni _ ataasiighmete kau uq _ igleghte te i sta _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh ani _ . _ whangkuta _ mangteghagh ke ainkut _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ ilutu manginagh kumta _ , _ ipapighqutkumanginaqumteggullu _ sighimakekagh ut _ .
Enkaangam _ katam _ tawaten _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ ,
pineghlliqe gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ tamaani _ aghnegh ni _ kilgaa nite luteng _ qaatke sug mangite aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ nanghiighsaghagh kaqe aat llu _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ tamaani _ 40 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ sivunegh gpesi _ esghagh kaqe ghngaaghmegteki _ apeghiighkagh nka _ , _ paninang _ nanghiighsaghagh kaqe aatnga _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tamaakut _ yug t _ sakrite stekaqe aatnga _ . _ enkaam _ pi kau unga _ , _ ' _ iiwleng _ ataasiighmete igate ut _ whanga mnun _ , _ liigike igate ut llu _ natete luku _ kiyaghte sqe sug lleg mneng _ .
sakrite u lunga _ akeqe i kau unga _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ ' _ whaten _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ Iteghnaanghitngwaaghaat _ meghnaali vigkagh _ yataaghqe kaqe a _ ellngit nun _ . _ ' _ "
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ kelenga lusi _ , _ seghlegh meng _ sumeghtaghagh llegh neng llu _ ugpegh nghite llegh neng llu _ , _ iqitute ste gpenasi _ unguva lghii meng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
iwernga _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kayeme te aqe tek _ pi lleghqagh lgu ma luku _ atigh llegh ke lghii meng _ " _ aghneghmi _ . _ " _ tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ taawa _ seghleghqe llegh m _ puughte lusi _ pineghllug ngllagh lleqe aisi _ .
iwernga _ ataasiighmelkumta _ unguvallegh mta _ kenle anun _ , _ neghyuke luku _ kiyaghnegh _ ugpegh yuwhaagh lleg mtestun _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ pi lgutke lleqe ainkut _ ellmi _ pi mineng _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ , _ pineghllug u gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ "
kinkungaawa t _ nagaqugh tke aat _ kiyaghnegh m _ me aneng _ naqam _ qaatke te gpenateng _ ? _ Tamaakunguut _ yug t _ Moses-em _ maghyaghqugh qu ai _ Egypt-meng _ .
40 _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kinku t _ kiyaghnegh _ sakrite ste atgu _ ? _ Tamaakunguut _ seghleghqelluteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ kilgaa ni _ .
kinku nun _ kiyaghnegh _ akeqe i kau a _ iteghnaanghitngwaaghniluki _ meghnaali vigkagh mun _ yataaghqekagh minun _ ? _ akeqe kaqe ai _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
taawa _ liigikagh ut _ iteghpagningite kau ut _ tawavek _ meghnaali vig mun _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe nghite kangat _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ yug nun _ aghula i tuq _ iitghesqelluki _ meghnaali vig minun _ . _ iwernga _ alinge lta _ luuraq _ naligh i _ nuughhute na yu kan _ itegh gpenani _ meghnaali vig anun _ .
pinigh lghii _ ungipagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig aneng _ ayuqe lghii _ nagaqugh qaghkagh ut _ katam _ tamaakustun _ yug stun _ Moses-em _ maghyaghquqiistun _ Egypt-meng _ . _ iwernga _ pinigh lghii m _ ungipagh m _ kayusiite llghite ai _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe mangite aat _ nagaqughkagh eng _ .
whangkuta _ ugpegh lghii ni _ itegh lleqe ukut _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi tke kaqe ai _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ whaten _ , _ " _ sakrite u lunga _ akeqe i kau unga _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ whaten _ pi unga _ , _ ' _ itegh naanghite u aghte ut _ meghnaali vigkagh mnun _ . _ ' _ " _ tawaten _ akuzi kau uq _ qepghaqagh ni _ apeghiigh kaqe ghngaaghmiki _ ima _ nuna ngllagh llegh mineng _ .
naa n tuq _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe luni _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta a _ aghnegh m _ whaten _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ meghnaali kau uq _ tamaaghhaaneng _ qepghaqagh mineng _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ani _ aghnegh m _ . _ "
akuzite ni llu _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ itegh naanghite u aghte ut _ meghnaali vigkagh mnun _ . _ "
paninang _ ila i _ yug t _ itegh lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh te yuwhaagh ke aat _ pinigh lghii meng _ ungipagh meng _ , _ itegh llghite ut _ meghnaali vig mun _ qayughllak _ qaatke te llghite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegtekaqe a _ ila a _ aghneq _ , _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ " _ aghneghmi _ . _ " _ Kingurugllaganeng _ Moses-em _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ taana _ aghneq _ David-kun _ . _ uteghte pagte anka _ David-em _ igaqegkagh i _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ whani _ nagaqugh kufsigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ , _ pineghlliqe gpenasi _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ "
Joshua-m _ maghyaghqugh llghite ai _ yug t _ tawavek _ meghnaali vig mun _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ qayughllak _ taam _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kegka qaa _ ila a _ aghnegh a _ meghnaali llegh m _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ taawa _ Sabbath-a _ aghula i tuq _ , _ meghnaali vig _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itnun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ itegh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ , _ meghnaali lleqe uq _ qepghaqagh mineng _ katam _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali llegh atun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ itegh naqe ghllag lta _ kiyaghnegh m _ meghnaali vig anun _ . _ qaatke nghite fqaan _ pi lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ sivunegh mta _ pillghistun _ .
akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguva ut _ qepghagh u ut _ . _ ipeg aghagh ut _ alngunak _ inglugtun _ ipegsaghkagh neng _ savigpag neng _ . _ kaapute kayugu ut _ qamaverugllak _ unguva sigh m llu _ taghneghagh m llu _ kaat ute nga llegh gkenun _ , _ naflugh t llu _ pategh t llu _ kaat ute nga llegh itnun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ nanqigte i kayugu ut _ yug m _ sumeghtaghagh llegh aneng llu _ sa naqe llegh aneng llu _ .
sa u a _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh a _ iigh nga nghite uq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ aliite ut _ , _ whateghlluwaaghuutlu _ iye gkeni _ . _ ellnga nun _ qayvighqesaghqagh ke aput _ salleg put _ qamagte luki _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ High _ Priest-elegllaguukut _ qilag mun _ mat- yuqagh meng _ . _ Jesus-nguuq _ , _ ighnegh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ enkaam _ ugpeqe i llegh mete kestagh lta _ apeghkagh mnni _ yug nun _ .
High _ Priest-emta _ liigike u aqe aqe ai _ kayaaghlliqe sigh put _ , _ qayughllak _ nuna mete luni _ nanghiiqu lleg nge kau uq _ whangkutestungwaaq _ . _ naqamllu _ seghleghqe mangite uq _ .
enkaam _ tetullngunaamta _ aglagh lta _ umiileg u sigh gnun _ aqumutagh gkenun _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ allgeghuseghqaaluta _ nangllegtagh llegh anun _ . _ tawani _ nanglleg ke lleqe ainkut _ , _ kayusigh lleqe ainkut llu _ aklu ke igh lleg mnni _ .
tamaghhagh an _ high _ priest- a _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ yug lgu ta aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aglagh aqe uq _ yug t _ apallugh ke luki _ tuunaluki _ tunusagh it _ aghqerragh u aghte te na luki llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ .
High _ priest- a _ kayaaghlliqe kayugu te mineng _ nangllegtagh yaghqaa uq _ tamaakunun _ nalluke lghii nun llu _ ugpeqe i nanigh lghii nun llu _ ipapilleghmun _ .
qayughllak _ kayaaghlliqe kayugu te mineng _ , _ high _ priest- a _ aghqerraaghyaghqaaguq _ ellmi _ katam _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ seghleghqe llegh itnun llu _ yug t _ .
kina _ alngunak _ nakmike igate uq _ ellmi neng _ high _ priest-ngughhnaluni _ quulvaghyaghqaaluni _ . _ iwernga _ yuug _ high _ priest- ngughte aqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikenghatni _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ nakmike llegh atun _ aaron _ .
tawaten llu _ Christ-a _ quulvallghituq _ ellmi neng _ nakmike luni _ high _ priest- ngughte llegh mun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ . _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ ighnegh ke amken _ ; _ aghneghmi _ whani _ Ataliitaghpenga _ . _ "
nalighnegh itni _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh m _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ priest- nge te lleqe uten _ quunperugllag _ , _ Melchizedek-em _ priest-ngullghatun _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq _ yuguliyaghqaaluku _ Jesus _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ Jesus _ nuna mete u luni _ , _ iglagtu luni _ qunituumagh mi _ yughagh kau lghii llu _ tungsigh kau lghii llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ yugulisqelluni _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nagate kaqe ai _ yughagh llegh i _ , _ qayughllak _ qusevegte luni _ qaatkekagh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ .
qaywa _ Jesus _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ke ghngaatni _ , _ paninang _ liite kau uq _ qaatke te ma llegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh mikun _ .
apeghiigh yagu _ qamagte luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi sqe llegh a _ , _ Jesus-ngughtuq _ kenle ite ngugh meng _ yuguligh lleg nge ste i yaghqagh _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ qaatke te lghii nun _ ellmi nun _ .
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ high _ priest-nguluku _ , _ Melchizedek-em _ high _ priest-ngullghatun _ .
apegh yaghqagh ghllag u ukut _ tamaakuneng _ . _ iwernga _ apeghtugh neghllug pigte usi _ tamaakuneng _ qayughllak _ liigikaghaghsigalnguusi _ .
neghigh pigte lusi _ ugpeqagh u lghiisi _ enkaam _ apeghtugh i yaghqaaghtekau usi _ ila gpesinun _ . _ yeghlegi _ paninang _ aklu aqe usi _ kitumun _ apeghtunqigtesqellusi _ ugpegh nghhagh t _ liite yuwhaagh yaghqagh itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ katam _ taghnughhaghhaghestun _ mamaghtugh yug aqe usi _ , _ neqe pig yug gpenasi _ .
kina _ alngunak _ mamaghtuqagh yu k _ paninang _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u uq _ . _ salin _ nalluke a _ elqughutngagh llegh llu _ anaggute nga llegh llu _ .
iwernga _ neqe pig _ angtaniitkanun _ pi u uq _ . _ peghqigsagh kau ut _ liigike yaghqaa lukek _ pinigh lghii nkuk _ , _ seghlegh nkuk _ .
enkaam _ liite lteki _ apeghtuusagh t _ angtaniitkanun _ ugpeqagh nun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ liite u aqe aqe asi _ apeghtugh te yuwhaagh ke aat _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghiit _ enkaangam _ liinneqigsaghqaqenghitasi _ . _ Liitngwaaghumaasi _ atuqe yaghqaa fqiita _ pi na luki _ tamaakut _ tuqumun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ Liinneqigsaghqaqenghitaghsillu _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ ayuqe lghii _ kiyaghnegh kun _ ,
paaptaaye llegh neng _ , _ iigtilleghneng _ , _ unguvaghtilleghneng _ tuqukagh neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh aneng _ yug neng _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luki _ kenle u na an _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi stegkanginkut _ , _ apeghtugh lleqe amsi _ angtaniitesqellusi _ ugpeqagh t _ .
tamaa _ ila aneng _ yug lgu uq _ allgegh te kaayagh lghii neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighug aneng _ , _ naasiigh kaqe aat llu _ qilag m _ tunusagh a _ . _ allgegh te kau ut llu _ agleghnagh lghii gneng _ taghneghagh gneng _ . _ nanghiigh kaqe ait _ pinightu langi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ nanghiigh kaqe aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ nuna kaghqagh mete ngughk _ . _ taagken _ ugpeqe nanigh kumegteggu _ Christ-a _ , _ avuteghqe nqigtepagningite te lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaquuragh nqigtegkangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh a _ , _ kayngusaakegkangatlu _ yugtuqagh mi _ .
nuna _ megh aqe uq _ eslallugughnneghani _ , _ piite ta iqe uq llu _ nunivagseghagh meng _ atughqagh meng _ tamaakunun _ peksighqikanun _ nuna meng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinighqe sta qaa _ nuna _ .
iwernga _ nuna _ piite ste i ma kuni _ sikughllug neng llu _ weeds-nengllu _ sea-te u nghite uq _ . _ yakugh nagh anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghu ni lleghqagh aneng _ , _ enkaam _ paneghte yaghqaa uq _ .
piniqekagh mnni _ , _ qaywa _ elpesi nun _ lata tke ghngaamteki _ tamaakut _ , _ sumeghtaghagh tke igate amsi _ tawatete lusi _ . _ liisimakagh ut _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ yuguligh llegh gpesigun _ .
kiyaghnegh _ elqughute nga an _ nanqigte i aqe uq _ , _ enkaam _ puygu naanghite a _ qepghagh llegh i llu _ , _ piniqe i llegh i llu _ ellmi nun _ kayusiite llegh gpesigun _ yug i _ . _ neqamike lleqe a llu _ paninang _ kayusiite u kesi _ .
nagnegh sug amsi _ sagiqe lusi _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale atun _ . _ enkaam _ allgeghtepestaaghlleqaghsi _ sighimakekagh i _ .
ighsanitagh lghii ughte sug nghite amsi _ . _ yeghlegi _ tamaakustun _ ayuqe ste sug amsi _ ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ , _ nuqetutilleghmegteggunllu _ allgegh te yaghqagh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh aneng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe aqe yamigu _ abraham _ , _ akeqe kaqe a _ pi yaghqagh pestaagh u ni luku _ . _ ava ite u ta aneng _ aange aghagh lghii meng _ ellmi neng _ , _ atuqe luku _ ellmi _ katam _ ategh ni _ akeqe i kau uq _ .
abraham _ pika qaa _ , _ " _ quya ste pestaagh luten _ , _ uglagh u pigte luku _ kingunelilleqamken _ . _ "
abraham _ qelanegh gpenani _ utaqa i kau uq _ , _ enkaam _ allgeghtekaqaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ .
kitum _ neklegsugh nghminigu _ aaghtiiraagh te llegh _ , _ akeqe i aqe uq _ sa meng _ pilleg ni _ ipa u ni luku _ atuqe luku _ kitum _ ategh a _ ellmi neng _ aange aghagh lghii m _ .
allgegh te yaghqagh t _ akequsagh mineng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ liigikestesugwii _ allaangughsaghqaqenghitngwaaghniluki _ agghi lleg ni _ . _ enkaam _ akeqe i kau uq _ atuqe luku _ ategh ni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ kayeme ainkut _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ iqlengiqe igate uq _ akeqe i nghmini _ , _ iqlengiqe naanghite uq llu _ akeqe i kuni _ atuqe luku _ ategh ni _ ipapighqennaluku _ pi yaghqaqe te ni _ . _ taake uk _ allangughte qaghte naanghite uk _ . _ whangkuta _ anagniighkagh ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ paqniite na luta _ , _ kayeme lleg nge ghllag ukut _ sighimake na luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh a _ .
taana _ sighima llegh _ uyghiite u uq _ unguva sigh mnnun _ , _ paqna nagh igh te ste ainkut llu _ ayepsugite ste ainkut llu _ . _ taana _ sighima llegh _ itegh uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ safkaaghute m _ awatanganilngughmun _ .
tawavek _ Jesus _ itegh kau uq _ sivu mnni _ whangkuta _ apallugh ke luta _ . _ High _ priest- ngughte kau uq _ quunperugllagmun _ , _ Melchizedek-em _ priest- nge ma llegh atun _ .
taana _ melchizedek _ umiileg kesagh aa _ Salem-em _ , _ priest-ekaallu _ Qulighpigaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ abraham _ uteghnigh ma luku _ pilluwameng _ kayaalqughluki _ umiileg t _ , _ Melchizedek-em _ nallagh luku _ quya stekaqe a _ .
taagken _ Abraham-em _ tuunekagh a _ qulaghqellghaneng _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ tugukagh mineng _ pilluwami _ . _ Melchizedek-em _ ategh a _ maalghug gneng _ sa meng _ pi sigh lgu uq _ , _ sivuligh _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ umiileg a _ elqughutngagh llegh m _ . _ " _ umiileg ke kau ta aneng _ Salem-em _ , _ ategh an _ aag llegh a _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ " _ umiileg a _ nekeggmellegh m _ . _ "
igagh ite uq _ igaqe vikekagh meng _ Melchizedek-em _ ata aneng llu _ naa aneng llu _ nalighmeng _ sivunghaneng _ , _ talwa _ allgellegh aneng llu _ tuqu llegh aneng llu _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighneghagh tun _ aghula i tuq _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ quunperugllag _ .
taawa _ liigikagh i _ Melchizedek-em _ aange ma llegh ghllag a _ . _ talwa _ sivuneqsuwhaamta _ Abraham-em _ tuunekagh a _ melchizedek _ qulaghqellghaneng _ tugulaghkagh mineng _ pilluwami _ .
Priest-et _ kingunegh ke ai _ Levi-em _ . _ liilightuusagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelqe aqe ai _ priest-et _ qerngughtisqelluki _ yug lgu ta itneng _ qulaghqelleghmeng _ allgeghtekiitneng _ . _ Priest-et _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ priest-etlu _ yug t llu _ Abraham-em _ kingunegh ke ghngaisteng _ .
melchizedek _ kingunegh ke nghite a _ Levi-em _ , _ iwernga _ tugukligh kaqe a _ qulaghqelleq _ Abraham-em _ tuune yagu _ . _ quya stekaqe a llu _ abraham _ , _ allgegh te kau lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ .
Nalluneqniituq _ taana _ quya ste i lghii _ aange aghagh uq _ taagken _ quya stekagh meng _ .
Priest-et _ yugu ut _ tuqu kayug t _ naqamllu _ allgegh te kau ut _ qulaghqelleghmeng _ . _ Melchizedek-llu _ allgegh te kau uq _ qulaghqelleghmeng _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghtengnguuq _ , _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ apellghistun _ .
levi _ allgegh te kau uq _ yug neng _ qulaghqelleghmeng _ . _ pi na yalghiikut _ talwa _ ellnga llu _ llivike i kau uq _ qulaghqelleghmeng _ Melchizedek-mun _ Abraham-kun _ .
qaywa _ levi _ allgegh llghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ sivunegh mi _ Abraham-em _ yugusigh u ni te kau uq _ Melchizedek-em _ nallagh aqe yagu _ abraham _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ priest-et _ kingunegh kesaghqagh ke ai _ Levi-em _ . _ ellngit a _ liilightuusagh t _ apeghtugh te kaqe ait _ yug nun _ , _ iwernga _ qepghaqagh at _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nuughhute kau uq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yug t _ aklu kau ut _ priest- meng _ Melchizedek-etun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ , _ Aaron-etun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ .
Levite _ priest-et _ simigh nghmegteki _ alla neng _ priest-eneng _ , _ taawa _ liilightuusagh t llu _ allangughte yaghqaa ut _ .
Priest-et _ quunpeng _ Levi-em _ ramke aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ iwernga _ atanegh ut _ ramke aneng _ pi u nghite uq _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ atanegh mta _ ramke aneng _ pi _ qepghagh igate u aghte uq _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ aghqefig gni _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ liisimake aat _ atanegh ut _ allgegh kau uq _ ramke anun _ Judah-m _ . _ Moses-em _ pi mangite ai _ kingunghi _ Judah-m _ priest-nguyaghqaaniluki _ .
enkaam _ tamaakut _ liigike aghagh aput _ whateglluwaaq _ qayughllak _ ila a _ priest-em _ Melchizedek-etun _ ayuqe lghii _ tagi ma uq _ .
liilightuusagh t _ qelegh te kaqe aat _ priest- a _ kingunegh kesaghqagh ke ni luku _ levi- mun _ . _ atanegh ut _ priest- ngughte kau nghite uq _ liilightuusagh t _ pi sqe llegh itgun _ , _ iwernga _ priest- ngughte kau uq _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngugh qun _ unguvallegh mikun _ kenletghuusaghqaanghilngughqun _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau lghiit _ , _ " _ priest- nge te te n _ quunperugllag _ , _ Melchizedek-em _ priest-ngullghatun _ . _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ simigh kaqe a _ liilightuusagh _ priest-eneng _ ayuqe lghii _ qayughllak _ kayaalnguqlu _ atugh u nghite ngughk llu _ .
liilightuusagh t _ kina _ alngunak _ pistesimangitaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ma ainkut _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ sighima llegh meng _ . _ taaggun _ sighima llegh kun _ aglagh yaghqaaghte ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Taam _ sighima llegh m _ saaghw akun _ kiyaghnegh _ allangughte naagh nghite ngugh meng _ akeqe i ma uq _ .
iwernga _ tawatelngughmeng _ akeqe i llghite uq _ Levi-em _ kingunghi _ priest- ngughte aqngata _ . _ Jesus-nginaghmun _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ atanegh _ akeqe i ma uq _ , _ allangughte naanghite ak llu _ umyugagh gni _ ; _ ' _ elpek _ priest- nge te te n _ quunperugllag _ . _ ' _ "
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus-nguuq _ ipapighqelleq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ni _ pi pestaagh lleqe a _ . _ taana _ akequsagh _ pinigh aghagh uq _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ Moses-kun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ priest-etuyaghtuq _ . _ tuqu nghata _ ila ita _ priest-et _ nagnegh te aqe aat _ qepghaqagh at _ .
iwernga _ Jesus _ priest-nguuq _ quunperugllag _ qayughllak _ unguva lleqe uq _ quunpeng _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus-em _ iiwleng _ yuguliyaqlegwii _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aglagh lghiit _ ellmi kun _ , _ qayughllak _ quunpeng _ unguva u uq _ manigugh utu tete na luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Jesus _ High _ Priest-nguuq _ tuune i kayug _ sa meng _ aklukegkamnneng _ . _ agleghnagh uq _ , _ avute ite uq _ , _ pelungite uq _ , _ aaftengngaaq _ seghleghqesteneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ quulvaqaqaa _ qulighpigaghmun _ qilag mun _ .
Jesus _ ilangistun _ high _ priest-estun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ high _ priest- a _ aghqerraaghyaghqaaguq _ , _ sivuke luni _ ellmi _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ taagken _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ . _ Jesus _ tuune aqngami _ ellmi neng _ katam _ , _ aghqe tke kau uq _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ yug t _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ .
liilightuusagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ yug t _ nakmiigh yaghqaa ni luki _ high _ priest-ekaghqameng _ seghleghqe kayugu ghngaan _ alngunak _ yug stun _ . _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ apegh llegh an _ liilightuusagh t _ Moses-mun _ , _ tagtalmi _ taakwani _ allangughte yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ akeqe i kau uq _ . _ taaggun _ akeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ighnegh ni _ High _ priest- ngughte stekaqe a _ , _ afkuyagh ngunaan _ , _ quunperugllag _ .
apeghkagh ut _ elpesi nun _ , _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ : _ tawatelngughmeng _ high _ priest-elguukut _ aqumga lghii _ aghenqignegh ani _ saaghw akun _ Aghtughyaghqaanghitelleghpigaam _ qilag mi _ .
qepghagh te i u uq _ high _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ sanctuary-mi _ . _ taana _ tabernacle-epiguuq _ Atanghem _ nekeftekaqe a _ , _ yug m _ nekeftekaqe nghite a _ .
tamaghhagh mi _ high _ priest- a _ nakmike kau uq _ tuune i sqellug qu _ tunusagh neng _ , _ teghig ke sagh neng llu _ aghqerraaghesqelluku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ enkaam _ High _ priest-evutlu _ sa meng _ tuune yaghqagh lgu yaghqaa uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Jesus _ nuna mete yagh kuni _ priest-ngunayanghituq _ , _ qayughllak _ priest-elguuq _ nuna mi _ tuune i kayug neng _ tunusagh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ liilightuusagh t _ pisqellghistun _ .
Priest-et _ qepghaqagh u ut _ sanctuary-mi _ , _ qilagmelngughtun _ ayuqesugnilngughmi _ . _ salin _ Moses-em _ tabernacle-a _ nekefte llghite luku _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ apaqu te kaqe a _ , _ " _ wataghllak _ sa u a _ qamagte luku _ ulima naken _ tawatengwaaq _ uspeqe lleg mtun _ kelgutekagh mtun _ elpenun _ naayghagh mi _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ Jesus _ qepghaqalitkaqaa _ priest-nguluku _ . _ qepghaqagh a _ megnu nagh aghagh uq _ Levite-et _ priest-et _ qepghagh llegh itneng _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pinigh aghagh lghii u uq _ akequsagh lug meng _ qayughllak _ taaggun _ Jesus-em _ ilaliigh te stekaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh llu _ yug t llu _ . _ pinigh aghagh uq _ qayughllak _ tunemagh ite nga uq _ akequsagh tgun _ pinigh aghagh lghii tgun _ .
sivuligh _ akequsagh _ afkuyagh ite yagh kan _ , _ taawa _ tuungligh ite nayagh uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ afkuyagh lgu ni kaqe ai _ yug ni _ whaten _ pi aqngami _ , _ " _ aghnegh t _ kaate lleqe ut _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ , _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pi lleqe aqa _ Israel-eghmiinunllu _ Judah-ghmiinunllu _ .
akeqe te yagh ragh aqa _ tawatete naanghite uq _ akequsagh kekagh mtun _ sivunghitnun _ tasluqluki _ aghulaqe te aqe yamki _ Egypt-meng _ . _ qaatke te mangite ut _ akequsagh ma _ pi sqe llegh atun _ . _ enkaam _ avelghaqiinagh kaqe anka _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ .
aghnegh t _ taakut _ kingu itneng _ una _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ pi lleqe aqa _ Israel-eghmiinun _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ : _ liilightuusagh nka _ umyugagh itnun _ kanagh lleqe anka _ , _ igaqe lleqe anka llu _ qamagun _ ilu itgun _ . _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ , _ ellngit _ yug ke lleqe anka _ .
naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ apeghtugh yaghqaqe nghite a _ nunalgute ni _ , _ nalighmeng _ nengllugute ni _ liite sqellug qu _ atanegh _ , _ qayughllak _ qamagte luteng _ liisimake lleqe aatnga _ , _ ukalighpigaghhaghneng _ pingwaagh ghllag nun _ .
seghevute lleqe anka _ anaggute llegh it _ , _ allameng llu _ neqamike naanghite anka _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite kaqe yamigu _ akeqe te yagh ragh aq _ , _ sivuligh _ akequsagh _ atugh u nanigh stekaqe a _ . _ enkaam _ sa u a _ alngunak _ atugh u nanigh luni _ aghyugh luni _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute lleqe uq _ .
akequsagh ke yuwhaagh mini _ kiyaghnegh m _ igaqe kaqe ai _ qelegh sagh t _ naten _ maniguute lleghqagh meng _ ellmi nun _ , _ naten llu _ nekefte lleghqagh a _ sanctuary _ nuna mi _ .
taana _ sanctuary _ yug t _ ulimakagh at _ tiinta u uq _ maalghug gneng _ ne leg _ . _ sivuligh m _ ne m _ ategh ke a _ agleghnagh lghii _ na _ . _ ilu nga ni te ut _ kenelghutag lghutagh k _ , _ tipele k _ neqekrangllagh leg k _ tuunekagh meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
awalighnegh ani _ tuungligh ghhagh n _ safkaaghute m _ ila a _ ne m _ atigh llegh ke lghii _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh _ na _ .
ilu ani _ taawa _ gold-ek _ aghqefig k _ paneghreghaasik _ incense-mun _ . _ taawa llu _ salngag k _ qaspeghagh iqe ak _ gold-meng _ , _ ategh kek _ ark- ek _ , _ neqangugh sighqagh k _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh anun _ . _ Ark-em _ imaqe ai _ gold-ek _ aqimleghutagh k _ manna- meng _ imaleg k _ , _ Aaron-em _ ayaviigh a _ piitqughvikekagh _ , _ maalghug llu _ lliivneqegtagh k _ uyghag k _ igaqugh vike nga lghiik _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh aneng _ .
qule ani _ ark-em _ taawa _ gold-ek _ cherubim-ek _ , _ yaqghwik _ taghneghagh nge te lghiik _ mercy _ seat-kun _ . _ iwernga _ uumi _ pi llegh mi _ akuzi tkepagningite aput _ tamaakut _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ tiinta nite ngughk _ apeghiigh luku _ , _ taagken _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ priest-et _ itegh aqe ut _ sivuligh mun _ ne mun _ qepghagh na luteng _ .
iwernga _ high _ priest-nginaghhaq _ itegh yaghqaa uq _ tuungligh ghhagh anun _ ne anun _ tiinta m _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe uq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ayumiqullegh mi _ . _ itegh nghmini _ tawavek _ ne mun _ iiwleng _ kelqesaghqagh u uq _ aaw aneng _ aghqe tkekagh m _ teghig ke sagh m _ . _ tuune i aqe uq _ aaw meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ellmi _ seghleghqe llegh minun _ , _ yug t llu _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ . _ taana _ aawk _ seghleghqe llegh itnun _ pi u uq _ nalluke luteng _ pi ke ii te nun _ .
Tamaakutgun _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ liigike ste ainkut _ iteghvig _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ salin _ qelpeghte igate ngughk _ tabernacle-a _ atuqe u luku _ .
