taakut _ usputagh u ut _ maatemun _ . _ liigike ste ainkut _ tunusagh t llu _ aghqe tkekagh t llu _ teghig ke sagh t _ nallghusaghpagningite aat _ maniguutistem _ sumeghnegh a _ .
tamaakut _ tunusagh t llu _ aghqe te t llu _ atuqe kau ut _ qaatkesaghqagh u luki _ qelegh sagh t _ negh ke neng llu _ , _ meghyaghqagh neng llu _ , _ pelungighsagh lleghqagh neng llu _ yugusigh itneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ tamaakut _ qelegh sagh t _ yugusigh ghhagh inagh mun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ qaatkesaghqagh u ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe te yagh ragh aa _ atugh ughte llegh anun _ .
Christ-a _ tagi aqngami _ High _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ , _ tagite kaqe ai _ qamagte luki _ pinigh lghiit _ quya ste i llegh t _ whaa _ maaten _ whaanlenguut _ . _ itegh kaqe a _ tabernacle-a _ qilag mete ngughk _ , _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii llu _ pinigh aghagh lghii llu _ nunamelngughmeng _ tabernacle-meng _ . _ qilag mete ngughk _ tabernacle-a _ yug t _ ulima aqe nghite aat _ enkaam _ nuna m _ pike nghite a _ .
taagken _ Christ-a _ itegh kau uq _ ataasigh meng _ quunperugllag _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ iteme te na luta _ kenle u na an _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuune llegh mikun _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw ni _ , _ atugh gpenaki _ aaw it _ goat-etlu _ , _ kaawaghaatlu _ .
legh iightugh sagh t _ qelqe aqe ait _ priest-enun _ sivillagtiisqelluki _ yug t _ aaw itneng _ goat-et _ , _ bull-et _ , _ panellegh aneng llu _ kaawaghaam _ . _ tawaten _ pi aqe ut _ pelungighsagh na luki _ yug t _ yugusigh at _ tuguklighyugnaghtesqelluki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
tamaakut _ pelungighiyaqlegukata _ yug t _ yugusigh itneng _ , _ taawa _ Christ-am _ aaw an _ wata _ pi lleqe ai _ . _ pelungigh lleqe ai _ umyugagh si _ sea-te u nghite ngugh neng _ ugpeqe i llegh neng _ elpesi nun _ qepghagh te sqellug qu _ unguva lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Kenlengilnguugnekun _ Taghneghagnekun _ , _ Christ-a _ seghleghqe llghite ngughk _ , _ tuune kau uq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghqe te u luni _ .
enkaam _ Christ-am _ tagite kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe te yagh ragh aa _ yug nun _ tuqlughkagh anun _ . _ Christ-a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ ellngit nun _ allgeghtesqelluku _ kenle ite ngughk _ pagite aq _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ ellngit nun _ . _ allgegh lleqe ait _ pagitagh t _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ tuquma tke kaqe kangi _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ kiyaghtekagh t _ akequsagh ke yuwhaagh mi _ , _ iteme ma ut _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ .
igagh kun _ yug m _ igaqugh lleqe ai _ saghya ni _ kitumun _ pagite yaghqaa ni luki _ tuqu kuni _ . _ pagite i yaghqagh m _ allgeghhnaanghitii _ pagite yaghqagh ni _ wetku _ kitum _ ipapighqegkagu _ yuug _ tuquma ta a _ .
Taam _ yug m _ igaqugh qu ai _ pitngunaanghitut _ salin _ kiyaghtengnguluku _ . _ igaqugh qu ai _ pitngughllequt _ kingu aneng _ tuqu kan _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ talwa _ akequsagh ke yuwhaagh _ pitngumangituq _ aawngunani _ .
Moses-em _ apegh kaqe ai _ yug nun _ qamagte luki _ qelegh sagh t _ Liightuusanilnguut _ . _ taagken _ kaawaghaatlu _ , _ goat-etlu _ aaw itneng _ tugu tete luni _ megh meng _ akumekagh a _ . _ tugu tete luni _ kavilngugh meng _ wool-meng _ , _ avayagh aneng llu _ hyssop-em _ neptekagh i _ aaw mun _ . _ taagken _ sivillagte aqe ai _ igagh t _ liilightuusagh lghutagh t _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ .
pi ke ai _ , _ " _ Unanguuq _ aawk _ apeghiigh i lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh aneng _ qelghuskanga _ elpesi nun _ qaatke sqellug qu _ . _ "
Tawatengngwaaq _ Moses-em _ sivillagte aqe aqe ai _ aaw meng _ tabernacle-a _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ saghya t _ atuqekagh t _ maniguute llegh mun _ .
ipapestaaq _ liilightuusagh t _ pillghitni _ , _ qamagtevzigluni _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ pelungigh kau uq _ aaw kun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute naanghite ai _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ wetku qun _ aawk _ maaqe gkan _ .
nuna mete ngughk _ tabernacle-a _ , _ ilunganilnguutlu _ saghya t _ qilagmelngughestun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ tamaakut _ nunamelnguut _ saghya t _ pelungigh yaghqaa ut _ aaw itgun _ teghig ke sagh t _ . _ iwernga _ qilagmelnguut _ saghya pig t _ pelungigh yaghqaa ut _ aghqe te tgun _ pinigh aghagh lghiit _ nuna mi _ aghqe tkekagh neng _ .
Christ-a _ itegh mangite uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ yug t _ ulimaagh itnun _ . _ taana _ ipa pig tun _ qilagmelngughtun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ yeghlegi _ qilag mun _ itegh kau uq _ enkaam _ maaten _ kiyaghnegh mete uq _ High _ priest- ngugh lug ni _ whangkunnun _ .
Christ-a _ nuna m _ high _ priest- ngatu te _ ayuqe nghite uq _ . _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ayumiqunghani _ high _ priest- a _ itegh aqe uq _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ ne mun _ kelqelluni _ aaw meng _ ellmi _ pike nghite ke mineng _ . _ iwernga _ Christ-a _ aghqe tke mangite uq _ ellmi neng _ uteghpagtiinaq _ ,
qayughllak _ ikfiqe nayagh uq _ uglagh inagh luku _ ima _ ulima llegh aneng _ nuna m _ . _ iwernga _ up-uni _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ tagi kau uq _ ataasigh meng _ quunperugllag _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe llegh t _ aghqe tke llegh mikun _ ellmi neng _ .
Tamaghaghhmi _ tuqu yaghqaa lghii _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ , _ enkaam _ taam _ kingu aneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte lleqe ai _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ Christ-a _ aghqe tke kau uq _ ellmi neng _ iqite na luki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ yug lghute t _ . _ iwernga _ alla _ tagi kuni _ , _ aghqe tkesaghtugh u nghite uq _ ellmi neng _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ yeghlegi _ yuguliyaghtughlleqii _ qelanqe i lghiit _ ellmi neng _ .
liilightuusagh t _ taghneghagh nge te lghii stun _ ayuqe ut _ pinigh lghii nun _ kaate yaghqagh nun _ , _ iwernga _ liilightuusagh t _ taakughpigaanghitut _ . _ liilightuusagh t _ qelellghistun _ Jews-et _ aghqerraaghumanginaghaqut _ ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ aghqerragh u llegh t _ ukmangighwaaghpagningitiit _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ manigugh yaghtugh nghmegteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ .
yug t _ maniguutestengi _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangipiigumakumeng _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ , _ seghleghni nanigh nayagh ut _ . _ enkaam _ aghqe tke i nanigh nayagh ut _ .
iwernga _ ayumigh ite anga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tamaakut _ aghqerragh u llegh t _ neqangugh ste aqe ait _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ ,
qayughllak _ aawite a _ bull-etlu _ goat-etlu _ seghleghqe llegh ighpagningite ait _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ Christ-a _ tagi aqngami _ nuna mun _ pika qaa _ kiyaghnegh _ : _ " _ Aghquteyugumangitutenllu _ tunusagh yug mangite uten llu _ , _ iwernga _ yataaghqe kaqe an _ yugusigh _ whanga mnun _ .
efqugh ke mangite aten _ teghig ke sagh t _ iingunagh ita _ paneghtekagh t _ aghqefig gni _ nalighmeng _ aghqe te t _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
taagken _ whanga _ pi aqa _ , _ ' _ ii-i _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ tagi unga _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi na lunga _ , _ katam _ tawaten _ igaqugh kaqe kangatnga _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ . _ ' _ "
Christ-a _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ Aghquteyugumangitutenllu _ tunusagh yug mangite uten llu _ . _ Aghquteyugumangituten _ teghig ke sagh neng _ iingunagh meng _ paneghtekagh neng _ aghqefig gni _ nalighmeng _ aghqe te neng _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ tamaakut _ efqughsimangitaaten _ . _ " _ Christ-a _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ liilightuusagh t _ qelghutkaqeghngaatki _ tamaakut _ aghqe te t _ pisqelluki _ .
taagken _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ ii-i _ , _ tagi unga _ piyuke llegh gpetun _ pi na lunga _ . _ " _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ qamagte luki _ iqite qugh luki _ aghqe te lug t _ nengigh tgun _ nekegtekaqe a _ Christ-a _ aghqe te u luku _ .
Jesus _ Christ-am _ qaatkesaqminigu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ pelungigh kaqe ainkut _ seghleghqe lleg mnneng _ tuune llegh mikun _ yugusigh ni _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ quunperugllag _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ priest-et _ nekevghagh meng _ qepghaqagh teng _ pi aqe ait _ . _ Uteghpagtiinaq _ tuune i aqe ut _ tawatelkullghiineng _ aghqe te neng _ . _ Tawalliima _ tamaakut _ aghqe te t _ seghleghqellghighiyaghqaghhaanghitut _ .
iwernga _ Christ-am _ tuune kaqe a _ ataasigh _ aghqe te _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ quunperugllagmun _ . _ taagken _ aqumekagh _ aghenqignegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
tawani _ Christ-a _ utaqa i aqe uq _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nekegte lleghqagh anun _ anguyag i _ itegagh an _ asi anun _ .
taaggun _ ataasigh kun _ aghqe tke llegh kun _ , _ Christ-am _ quunperugllag _ naamigte stekaqe ai _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ seghleghqe llegh meggneng _ .
agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ ungipaate ainkut _ tamaakuneng _ . _ sivuke luni _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ ,
" _ Unanguuq _ akequsagh ka _ yug mnun _ , _ kingu itneng _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ , _ pi uq _ atanegh _ , _ liilightuusagh nka _ kanagh lleqe anka _ ilu itnun _ , _ igaqe lleqe anka llu _ umyuwiitgun _ . _ "
taagken _ pi uq _ , _ " _ allameng llu _ neqamike naanghite anka _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ seghletun llu _ pillghit _ . _ "
enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute kaki _ seghleghqe llegh it _ , _ aghqe te t _ atuqe yaghqaa nanigh lleqe ut _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ alingillngunaamta _ itegh lleghqagh nge ukut _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ aaw akun _ Jesus-em _ .
qelpegh te ma ainkut llu _ tumeghraghaghmeng _ unguvallegh mun _ safkaaghute kun _ ; _ taana _ safkaaghute _ yugusigh ke a _ .
Priest-elegllaaguukutlu _ igleghte te i lghii _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh aneng _ .
tamaakut _ apallugh ke luki _ tughaaghelteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ ipapighqelluta _ , _ neghyukngwaaghluku _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleghqagh nge ukut _ qayughllak _ umyugaghllug put _ sivillagtaqaagut _ Christ-am _ aaw aneng _ ukmangiightesqelluki _ , _ yugusigh put llu _ ughvughqe kau ut _ pelungilngughqun _ megh kun _ .
yeqay _ ataasiighmete luta _ sighima llegh mete kestagh lta _ whangkunnun _ piknikamnnun _ , _ qayughllak _ ugpeqagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ ataasiighmete uq _ enkaam _ pi yaghqaqe ai _ akequsagh ni _ .
yeqay _ sumeghtaghagh lta _ naten _ qiilngumighte te yaghqaa luta _ piniqe yaghqaa luki _ ila t _ , _ pinitun llu _ pi yaghqaa luta _ .
yeqay _ taaqe fqaamta _ qerngughte te nghmeng _ pi lta _ manigugh na luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ila ita _ piiqellghistun _ . _ yeghlegi _ qerngughte te manginagh lta _ kayemughtu tete na luta _ . _ wata _ kayeme te manginagh lta _ qayughllak _ Atanghem _ aghnegh a _ tughaalghii _ .
seghleghqe sug aatagh kumta _ kingu aneng _ liite luku _ ipapilleq _ , _ taawa _ aghqe te kaghqagh ite uq _ iqite sighqagh meng _ tamaavek _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ .
tamaakut _ tawaten _ pi lghiit _ alingruughmeng _ utaqa i lleqe ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh aneng _ . _ atuqe lleqe ak _ uguqnagh ghllagek _ kenghek _ naafqennaluki _ tamaakut _ kipullginaalghiit _ ellmi neng _ .
maalghug _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ liisimakistet _ apegh katgu _ yuug _ qaatke te mangite ni luku _ Moses-em _ liilightuusagh anun _ , _ nanqigtistem _ nanglleg ke gpenaan _ tuqute ste lleqe a _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu _ naten mi _ angkaslugan _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe agu _ yuug _ tutmaasghaqiiqelghii _ ighneghagh neng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ pi aqe lghii _ sea-te u nghite ni luku _ aawk _ apeghiigh tke aq _ akequsaghraghaghmeng _ ( _ qaywa _ kiyaghnegh m _ ukmangiisigh ke kaqe ghngaagu _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ ) _ , _ seghlequughiiqelghiillu _ nangllegtagh lghii gnun _ Tagneghagnun _ .
liisimakagh ut _ kiyaghnegh _ ; _ ellnga u lghii _ whaten _ pi ke aq _ , _ " _ whanga u uq _ aghyuugh i yaghqagh _ , _ akite yaghqaqe anka _ seghletun _ pillghit _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ ellmi _ yug ni _ . _ "
tatame aatagh na pigte uq _ kina _ alngunak _ iigganisaghqaq _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i llegh m _ aghnegh ani _ !
neqamike kesi _ tamaakut _ aghnegh t _ sivugh nghaani _ liite yuwhaagh aqe yafsigu _ ipapilleq _ Christ-ameng _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ aghula i te kau usi _ ataasiighmete lusi _ qaywa _ ikfiqeghllaghngaaghpesi _ .
ilangakun _ yugtuqagh mi _ yug t _ seghletun _ akuzite kaqe aisi llu _ amyuqetagh te kaqe aisi llu _ . _ ilangani _ nekevgha lgusigh aqe asi _ tamaakut _ amyuqetagh tkesigh lghiit _ .
nanglleg ke aqe asi _ anusimingllaghvigmelnguut _ . _ talwa _ quya nga aqe usi _ yug t _ tugulagh nghatki _ saghya si _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ paninang _ sa lgu usi _ pinigh aghagh lghii meng _ quunpekaghqameng _ .
Enkaangam _ iilqayug gpenasi _ qayughllak _ ilutu manginagh kufsi _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ akileghtuusagh ghllag meng _ .
Aklukngwaaghsi _ nuqete neghtu llegh _ atuqe yaghqaa luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ . _ taagken _ allgegh lleqe asi _ akequsagh kekagh i _ .
katam _ igaqe nga lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ qantaghaqun _ taana _ tagi yaghqagh _ kaate lleqe uq _ ; _ kimaawi naanghite uq _ .
elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug nka _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ . _ iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ pegtekunigu _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ , _ unguva sigh gma _ efqugh ke naanghite aqa _ . _ "
iwernga _ whangkuta _ pegte ikagh stun _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ ayuqe nghite ukut _ , _ naafqe lleg nge yaghqagh stun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu ukut _ enkaam _ unguva sigh put _ yugulikaagukut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh m _ liisimakestengngwaaghiinkut _ allgeghsaghqagh ke ni luku _ sighmakegkaghput _ , _ ipapighqusiguq _ esghagh yaghqaqe nghite ke mnnun _ .
ugpeqe i llegh megteggun _ ayumigh m _ yug i _ itagnaqellengegkaagut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ liigikegkaqaghput _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulima aqe a _ nuna _ akuzite mikun _ . _ tamaakut _ aligh ite ngugh t _ ulimaagh u ut _ esghagh yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ abel _ tuune i kau uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tugukligh yugnagh aghagh lghii meng _ aghqe te meng _ Cain-em _ aghqe tkekagh aneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ abel _ elqughutngagh lghii u ni luku _ yuug _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ apallugh ke luku _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapighqegkaqaa _ abel _ elqughute nga ni luku _ tugukligh llegh mikun _ tunusagh i _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh mikun _ abel _ paninang _ akuzi u uq _ , _ tuqu kaayagh ghngaaghmi _ .
Upeqilleghqun _ enoch _ mayugh te stekau uq _ qilag mun _ enkaam _ nanghiigh llghite a _ tuqu llegh _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ naalke llghite a _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugu kaqe kanga _ . _ mayugh llghite luni _ qilag mun _ , _ igaqe nga kau uq _ Enoch-em _ efqughtekaqaa _ kiyaghnegh _ .
Ugpeqillngunani _ kitum _ alngunak _ efqughtepagningitaa _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ tagi yu kuni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ugpeqe pestaagh yaghqaqe a _ kiyaghnegh lgu ni luku _ , _ akileghtugh yaghqaqe ai llu _ ivaghipiilghiit _ ellmi neng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Noah-m _ nagate kaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ kelenga sagh ughte tke ai _ tamaakut _ salin _ pi igate luki _ . _ enkaam _ qaatkellug qu _ kiyaghnegh _ angyaghpag ngllagh kau uq _ nengllugute ni _ yugulinaluki _ uleve llegh meng _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ Noah-m _ nuna m _ yug i _ nanqigte stekaqe ai _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuughesqelluki _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ apallugh ke luku _ Noah-m _ allgeghtekaqaa _ elqughutngagh llegh _ kiyaghnegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Abraham-em _ qaatke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqlugh aqe yatni _ aghulaqe sqellug qu _ ila anun _ nuna m _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh ke a _ taana _ nuna _ ellnga nun _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ . _ enkaam _ unite kaqe a _ ellmi _ nuna ni _ nalluke luku _ navek _ pi naqe te ni _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ kiyaghtekau uq _ nunatagh u luni _ nuna mi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh ani _ . _ tiintanite kau uq _ katam _ Isaac-enkuk _ Jacob-enkuk _ pillghegketun _ . _ Elkegkenkallu _ allgeghtekaqaak _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ taana _ nuna _ .
abraham _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ qayughllak _ utaqa i u lghii _ kiyaghte na luni _ ne ghllag mi _ tunemaghtuqagh mi _ . _ kiyaghnegh u uq _ uspeqe i ste nga llu _ ulimaghistengallu _ ne ghllag m _ .
abraham _ nanevgaghllaghngaaghmi _ , _ sarah- llu _ quminge yaghqaa nghite ghngaaghmi _ , _ paninang _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ sarah _ quminge kau uq _ , _ qayughllak _ neghyuke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pi lleqe ni luku _ akequsagh kekagh ni _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ abraham _ tuqu yaghtugh ngestagh kau ghngaaghmi _ , _ paninang _ kinguneghtughqagh u ghllag kau uq _ . _ ellngit a _ uglaghtalngit _ ighaleqetaagh stun _ qilagamelngughestun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ kestekaanghilngughestunllu _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ esnagh m _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ yug t _ paninang _ kiyaghtekau ut _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ tuqu llegh meggnun _ kenlanga _ . _ tuqu laghate te kau lghiit _ allgeghtegpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ ellmeggnun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ esghagh kaqe ait _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh i _ uyavanlluki _ sivu meggnite luki _ quyake kaqe ait llu _ . _ Enkaangam _ ungipaate kaqe ait _ yug t _ nunatagh u ni luteng _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ nuna mun _ pike nghite ni luteng _ .
tamaakut _ tawaten _ akuzi lghiit _ , _ whateghlluwaaq _ apegh u aat _ nuna kaghqagh yug ni luteng _ ellmeggnun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ .
sumegh ke kaqsagh kumegteggu _ taana _ nuna _ unitekagh eng _ , _ uteghte lleghqagh lgu nayagh ut _ .
yeghlegi _ piyuke aghagh kaqe aat _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ nuna _ , _ qilaghmelnguq _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh _ kayngu yug igate uq _ kiyaghnegh ke ni nghatni _ . _ talwa _ yataaghqe te kaqe ai _ ne ghllag meng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ akeqe kaqe kanga _ abraham _ , _ " _ Isaac-ekun _ kingunegh ghllag u lleqe uten _ . _ " _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Abraham-em _ neghyuke kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ nanghiiqu aqe yatni _ . _ enkaam _ aghqe te kete yaghqaaghtekagh a _ kezemagh ghhagh _ ighnegh ni _ , _ isaac _ .
Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ unguvaghtiyaqleguniluku _ tuqukagh neng _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuqute snanigh aqe yagu _ isaac _ , _ Abraham-em _ veghtekallghuuqaqaa _ isaac _ tuqu llegh meng _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Isaac-em _ quya stekaqe ak _ Jacob-enkuk _ Esau-nkuk _ , _ tungsigh te kaqe ak _ kiyaghnegh mun _ quya ste sqellug kek _ aag naqe kaghqagh ik _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Jacob-em _ , _ tuqu naqngu luni _ quya stekaqe ak _ allakaqaghtaagkenka _ ighnegh kek _ Joseph-em _ . _ taagken _ qungughte luni _ ayaviigh mikun _ manigugh kaqe a _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Joseph-em _ , _ kenletghuunnaqellghani _ unguvallegh mi _ , _ akuzite kegka qaa _ aghulaqe lleghqagh at _ Israel-eghmiit _ Egypt-meng _ . _ apeghtugh te kaqe ai llu _ neghqwaagh ni _ naten _ sa lleghqagh i _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Moses-em _ angayuqagh gkenka _ iighaghtugh kaqe ak _ pi nga yu t _ tanqigh t _ allgellegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ esghagh ka ak _ yuukegtepiglleghii _ , _ alinge ma ite ngugh k llu _ qaatke te nghite yaghqaa lutek _ umiileg m _ qelegh te llegh anun _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ moses _ , _ yugughte yami _ ighsa kau uq _ ighnegh ke ste nghmeng _ Pharaoh-m _ panig anun _ .
yeghlegi _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ikfiqe lgusigh na luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ avelghagluku _ efqugh yug na llegh a _ seghleghqe llegh m _ mulu yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
itupill _ sumeghtaghagh tke kaqe a _ ikfiqe lleghqagh ni _ Christ-amun _ itagnagh aghagh ni luku _ aklungilghutanganeng _ Egypt-em _ . _ Sumeghtaghaatkengngwii _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh t _ aga _ sivumelnguut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Moses-em _ unite kaqe a _ Egypt _ alingellngunani _ umiileg m _ sakraa llegh aneng _ . _ iilqayug mangite uq _ qayughllak _ esghagh lghii stun _ pi kaqe kanga _ aliite nghite ngughk _ kiyaghnegh _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Moses-em _ qelqe aqe ai _ yug t _ Passover-esqelluki _ , _ qelegh te kaqe a llu _ aaw _ sivillagtaatesqelluku _ amig tgun _ . _ enkaam _ yaquleg an _ tuqu llegh m _ tuqute llghite ai _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh it _ Israel-eghmiit _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Israel-eghmiit _ aghviqagh ke aat _ Red _ Sea _ nikimqun _ qute stun _ . _ iwernga _ Egypt-eghmiit _ , _ aghvighnaqutkengnguluteng _ pekagh qu te kau ut _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Israel-eghmiit _ maaghraghvinleg ni _ aghnegh ni _ uzivgagh kaqe aat _ Jericho-m _ mingllu ta a _ . _ taagken _ mingllu te a _ ulleghaatkaaguq _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ Rahab-em _ , _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ upugha te kaqe ak _ Israel-eghmiit _ riirngi steke t _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llghite uq _ maligte te luni _ qaatke te igate ngugh nun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
wataqaaghaq _ ungipamsugullamsii _ yug neng _ ugpeqe ikagh neng _ kiyaghnegh meng _ ? _ taake ghllag yaghqaa ut _ akuzite kete yaghqaa luki _ Gideon-enkut _ , _ Barak-enkut _ , _ Samson-enkut _ , _ Jephthah-nkut _ , _ David-enkut _ , _ Samuel-enkut _ , _ uuknaliqistetlu _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ ila i _ yug t _ whaten _ pi kau ut _ : _ kayaalqe kaqe ait _ ataneghpag u llegh t _ , _ elqughute nga luteng _ igleghte te i kau ut _ . _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh i _ tugu kaqe ait _ . _ ila ita _ lion-et _ qaanghit _ meqete ste aqe ait _ .
kumaghugh ghllaget _ kenghet _ qaamte aqe ait _ , _ anag aqe luki llu _ tuqute i stekaghqagh teng _ savigpag kun _ . _ kayaate aqe ut _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i llghite a _ iknaqe ughtaghkagh it _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ pilluwaghtengit _ iknaqughteghllagaqut _ enkaam _ kayaalqe aqe ait _ ila ita _ nuna t _ pilluwaghtengit _ .
ugpeqe i llegh kun _ aghnagh t _ tuqumasliiteng _ veghte aqe ait _ tuqu llegh meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghhneghaki _ . _ ila i _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe ste ghllag aqe ait _ pegte sqellug qu _ ugpeqe i llegh at _ . _ iwernga _ tuqu na luteng _ pi aqe ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ unguvaghtesqelluteng _ pinighataghalghimun _ unguvallegh mun _ .
ila i _ legasiighwagh te kaqe luki _ , _ ila i _ kagsagmig aqe luki _ , _ ila i _ qiipraghusighluki _ anusimingllagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ milughpagaatameng _ tuqute aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ yugusigh at _ pilagtugh luki _ malghughqe aqe ait _ , _ ila i _ tuqute aqe ait _ savigpag kun _ . _ ila i _ temgi _ tamaani _ igleghte aqe ut _ aate luteng _ penniigh m llu _ goat-emllu _ amigh aneng _ . _ ila i _ akluma pigte lghiit _ , _ yug t _ amyuqetagh tkekagh it _ , _ seghletun llu _ kiyaghute ke ait _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ pinighpagunghite ut _ kiyaghte lgusigh yaghqaa luki _ tamaakut _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ ! _ ila i _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ temngi _ tamaani _ iglegha kau lghiit _ paaghqagh igh llegh ani _ , _ naayghagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte aqe luteng _ qaye ni _ , _ laawaagh ni llu _ .
qamagte luki _ tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ itagnaqegkaqii _ ugpeqe i llegh it _ apallugh ke luki _ ! _ naqamllu _ allgeghsimangitaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqekagh a _ whangkunnun _ pinigh aghagh lghii u uq _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ whatete uq _ : _ akequsagh ni _ pi naanghite ai _ ellngit nun _ whangkungunaki _ . _ qerngagh emta _ qamagte luta _ iighwigh lleqe ainkut _ .
qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liigike ste ainkut _ ugpeqe i llegh meggneng _ naten _ kiyaghte llegh megteggun _ . _ maaten _ uvitangigh luta _ esghapag aqe ainkut _ . _ enkaam _ kilgaaqustestun _ iqite lteki _ qamagte luki _ uqigkutagh t _ , _ seghleghqe llegh t llu _ iglagute lghiit _ whangkunnun _ . _ sagiqe luta ngam _ kilgaaqu lta _ sivumnnilngughmun _ ,
esghagh ma ke luku _ Jesus _ , _ piinligh i ste nga llu _ apeghiigh i ste nga llu _ ugpeqe i lleg mta _ . _ kayngu nagh uq _ tuqu lleghqagh _ qaquuragh kun _ , _ iwernga _ Jesus-em _ pi tke mangite a _ kayngusaghagh te llegh _ . _ yeghlegi _ nakmiigh kau uq _ ikfiqe na luni _ qaquuragh kun _ apallugh ke luku _ quya llegh _ allgeghsaghqagh ni _ . _ enkaam _ maaten _ aqumga uq _ aghenqignegh ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ggu qun _ Jesus _ . _ iilqayug mangite uq _ qaywa _ seghleghqestet _ ugumikeraaghllaghngaatni _ . _ tawaten _ elpek si llu _ ilutu llghite te naanghite usi llu _ iilqayug naanghite usi llu _ .
seghleghqe nghite naqutke llegh gpesi _ salin _ yug nun _ tuqute sigate aisi _ .
puygu stekagh i _ ilutughsagh sigh t _ akuzite t _ ungipaate i lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ighnegh ke ni lusi _ ? _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ ighnegh mni _ , _ avelghaqiinagh gpenaan _ Atanghem _ nallghusagh nghaten _ , _ iilqayug gpenang llu _ aghyuugh nghaten _ .
qayughllak _ qamagte luki _ piniqekagh ni _ Atanghem _ apeghtugh aqe ai _ qaatkesqelluni _ , _ aghyuugh aqe ai llu _ tuguklighkagh ni _ avaqutagh u luki _ . _ "
tugukligh aqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ke lghii stun _ pi aqe aisi _ . _ qamagte luki _ avaqutagh teng _ ata ita _ aghyuugh aqe ait _ nallghughqennaluki _ .
qamagte luteng _ avaqutagh t _ aghyuugh lleg nge aqe ut _ . _ aghyuugh lleg nge nghite kuvek _ taawa _ ata ite ngugh u uten _ enkaam _ avaqutagh pig ke nghite aaten _ .
Taam _ saaghw akun _ , _ ata mta _ nunamelnguut _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ apeghtugh na luta _ qaatkesqelluteng _ , _ iwernga _ paninang _ quulvaghaqaput _ . _ enkaam _ ata ut _ qilag mete ngughk _ qaatkataghaghyaghqaqaghput _ unguva na luta _ .
ata mta _ nunamelnguut _ aghyuugh aqe inkut _ natengiighhaq _ , _ sumegh meggni _ elqughte luku _ aghyuugh i u ni luteng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aqe ainkut _ pinighqe lleghqagh mnnun _ pelungiightesqelluta _ ellmi tun _ .
quya niite uq _ aghyuugh lleg nge negh mta _ qayughllak _ aqnighte aqe kanginkut _ . _ iwernga _ tagtalmi _ , _ liitfiknemteggu _ , _ nekeggmellegh nge aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghte yagute aqe ukut _ elqughute luta _ .
keveg teki _ iigge si _ qughagh nga lghiit _ , _ taagken _ iknaqughsaghteki _ kayaalnguut _ segesqugh si _ !
taklaghte ki _ tume i _ tutmagh llegh gpek _ , _ taagken _ kayaalnguq _ ighu n _ aane qagh naanghite uq _ naflugh mineng _ , _ iwernga _ naallghute lleqe uq _ .
kiyaghte naqe tek _ nekeggmetullusi _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ yug nun _ , _ kiyaghte naqe tek llu _ seghleghqellngunasi _ . _ kinku t _ alngunak _ pelungite nghite ngugh t _ esghagh naanghite aat _ atanegh _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ luuraq _ allgeghhneghisaaghaat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ . _ nagu tete yaqunaan llu _ sungagh nite ngughk _ akugh _ seghleliighqagh ii luni _ naafqii yaghqagh _ yug lghute meng _ .
esghagh ma ke te lusi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ seghleghqesagh u aghte ut _ sex-kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ kinku t _ alngunak _ quulvaghinghisaaghtut _ kiyaghnegh meng _ Esau-tun _ . _ akike kaqe kanga _ pagitaghqagh ni _ ataasigh ghhagh mun _ neghyaghqagh mun _ .
liisimakagh i _ taam _ kingu aneng _ , _ allgeghsugaqngamigu _ a ta mi _ quya ste llegh a _ , _ ata an _ ighsake kaqe a _ . _ Esau-m _ allangughtepagningite kaqe a _ apeghiighkagh ni _ , _ qaywa _ qunituumagh mi _ tungsigh ghngaaghmigu _ a ta mi _ quya ste i llegh a _ .
sivunegh gpesistun _ ayuqe nghite usi _ Mount _ Sinai-mun _ pikagh stun _ . _ esghagh yaghqagh at _ , _ saafte yaghqagh at llu _ . _ tawani _ mamleg ghllagukagh _ , _ naafte ghllagukagh _ , _ naayghagh llu _ kumaghugh ghllagu lghii _ .
nagaqugh qu aat _ qalghightu an _ qalghighlleghhii _ , _ nagaqugh qu aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ me a _ . _ iwernga _ nepiigh qigh sqekagh at _ ,
qayughllak _ tugukligh yug nghite kangat _ qelegh i llegh a _ whatelnguq _ , _ " _ taana _ naayghagh _ , _ yug m _ nalighmeng _ teghig ke sagh m _ saaftekunigu _ , _ tuqute yaghqagh pestaagh u uq _ milughpagaatameng _ . _ "
Moses-em _ esgha qaa _ kakavaatagh na pigte lghii _ repall _ whaten _ pi kau lghii _ , _ " _ Ellngaatall _ ungelegte unga _ alingruughem _ . _ "
iwernga _ katam _ elpek si _ tagi kau usi _ Mt _ . _ Zion-mun _ , _ qilag m _ Jerusalem-nganun _ , _ ne ghllag anun _ unguva lghii m _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kestekau nghite ngugh nun _ yaquleg nun _ qerngughte tekagh nun _ quya lleg ligh ghllag luteng _ .
tagi kau usi _ qerngughte te llegh itnun _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ ugpeqagh t _ ighnegh ke yuwhaagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ qilag mi _ ategh it _ igaqe nga ut _ igagh tgun _ . _ tagi kau usi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nanqigtistengitnun _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ yug t _ , _ taghneghagh itnun llu _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ yug t _ iighwigh stekagh nun _ .
tagi kau usi _ Jesus-mun _ , _ ellnga kun _ kiyaghnegh _ akequsaghraghagh ngllagh kau uq _ . _ tagi kau usi llu _ sivillagtaatkamun _ aaw anun _ Jesus-em _ . _ pinigh aghagh uq _ Abel-em _ aaw aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghevute ai _ seghleghqe llegh t _ Jesus-em _ aaw akun _ .
enkaam _ kelenga tek _ , _ nagate yu nghite gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh _ akuzi lghii _ . _ sivunegh mta _ nagasunghitkaqaat _ kelengasaaghillgha _ nuna mi _ whani _ , _ enkaam _ anag mangite aat _ aghyuugh i llegh a _ . _ whangkuta _ aghyuugh aghagh lleqe ainkut _ nagate yu nghite kumteggu _ kelenga sagh u llegh a _ qilag meng _ .
kiyaghnegh _ akuzi aqngami _ Mount _ Sinai-meng _ , _ me an _ ufsugute ka qaa _ nuna _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ akeqe i ma uq _ whaten _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ufsugunneqiglleqaqa _ nuna _ , _ iwernga _ qilag llu _ ufsug u lleqe aqa _ . _ "
tawaten _ akuzillegh an _ , _ " _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ ufsugunneqiglleqaqa _ nuna _ , _ " _ liigikestengngwaaghiinkut _ whaten _ , _ sa u aat _ qamagte luki _ ulimaagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ ufsug te yaghqagh t _ . _ Tamaakunginaghhaat _ ufsugutepagningilnguut _ tamaanllequt _ quunperugllag _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ iyamsiqa yug vike lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ qayughllak _ tuune kanginkut _ ataneghpag u llegh meng _ ufsug te yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ . _ Enkaangam _ manigugh lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ efqugh nagh leg kekagh atun _ alinge lleg ligh luta llu _ quulvaghillelighlutallu _ ,
qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh ut _ naafqii lghii u uq _ kenegh _ .
piniqe kestagh teki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ .
upugha manginagh tek _ aqiiyag nun _ qayughllak _ ila ita _ upugha te aqe ait _ nalluke luki _ yaquleg u ta i _ .
neqamike luki _ anusimingllaghvigmelnguut _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ anusimingllaghvigmetellghistun _ . _ neqamike luki _ ikfiqe nga lghiit _ , _ nikimqun _ elpek si llu _ ikfiqe lghii stun _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ sii vag qite ggu _ nengughte te llegh _ enkaam _ ugi t llu _ nulighh t llu _ ataasiighmetullit _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe ai _ gelgaghniigh lghiit _ , _ tamaakut llu _ ila aneng _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ pakignegh u gpenasi _ mani mun _ , _ itagnagh aqe tek llu _ seat- ta leg gpesistun _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ Uninnaanghitngwaaghamsi _ ; _ peggnaanghitngwaaghamsi _ . _ "
enkaam _ tetullngunaamta _ whaten _ pi lta _ , _ " _ atanegh _ kayute ke aqa _ ! _ alinge naanghite unga _ yug t _ sa lleghqagh itneng _ . _ "
neqamike luki _ igleghutistesi _ ungipagh ke ikagh t _ elpesi nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ neqamike luki _ naten _ kiyaghtekau ta i _ enkaam _ ugpegh lleg lgu naqe tek _ ellngistun _ .
Jesus _ Christ-a _ almesiqe aqe a _ ighivgaq _ , _ aghneghmi _ , _ quunperugllag llu _ .
iqitute ste gpenasi _ ipapilleghmeng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh nun llu _ allakaayagh gnun llu _ apeghtuusagh nun _ . _ nangllegtagh llegh akun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ayepsugighsagh teki _ ilu si _ , _ nakaan _ qaute kete luki _ liilightuusagh t _ negh ke neng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ taakut _ neqe t _ liilightuusagh it _ qaatke gkufsiki _ ayepsugighsagh naanghite ait _ ilu si _ .
Priest-et _ qepghagh lghiit _ tabernacle-mi _ ineghtekau ut _ neghe lleghqagh itneng _ aghqe tkekagh meng _ aghqefig mteggun _ .
High _ Priest-em _ tagite aqe ai _ aaw it _ teghig ke sagh t _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh mete te _ aghqe te kete na luki _ seghleghqe llegh nun _ . _ iwernga _ kemegkwaagh it _ teghig ke sagh t _ ne ghllag meng _ iqitute luki _ paneghte aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus-llu _ iqitute kau uq _ ne ghllag meng _ . _ tawani _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ pelungighsagh na luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh itneng _ ellmi _ katam _ aaw mineng _ .
Enkaangam _ ne ghllag meng _ whangkuta llu _ aglagh lta _ Jesus-mun _ , _ seghletun _ akuzitkesqelluta _ katam _ ellnga _ seghletun _ akuzitkellghistun _ .
nuna mi _ whani _ quunpekaghqameng _ ne ghllag ite ukut _ , _ iwernga _ utaqangwaaghput _ negh ghllag _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
Jesus-kun _ iiwleng _ aghqe tke i lta _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ aghqe te put _ usuqe i llegh ke aput _ apenemteggu _ Jesus _ Atanghuniluku _ .
puygu gpenaan _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ , _ tuune te aqe tek llu _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ aghqe te u ut _ efqugh nagh lghiit _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
qaatke teki _ igleghutistesi _ atuqe luki _ qelegh sagh it _ . _ kelengake i u ut _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ liisimake luku _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nanqigsaghqaatseng _ . _ quya nghite ste gpenaki _ igleghutistesi _ , _ itupill _ qaatke llegh gpesigun _ qepghaqagh teng _ pi lleqe ait _ quyake sigh ke luki _ . _ qaatke nghite kufsiki _ kayusiitepagningite aisi _ .
yughagh tke tekut _ . _ liisimake ukut _ umyugagh mta _ anaggute llghite na ainkut _ , _ qayughllak _ iiwleng _ piyukelqaghput _ elqughutngagh lghii _ pi yaghqaa luku _ .
Taakunginaghhaagneng _ kayagte amsi _ yughaatkesqellunga _ qantaghaqun _ elpesi nun _ uteghnigh na lunga _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nekeggmellelitistem _ atanegh ut _ Jesus _ unguvagh stekaqe a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ enkaam _ aaw mikun _ Penniighniighteghllagughtekaaguq _ penniigh nun _ . _ aaw an _ atugh u yaghqaaghte stekaqe a _ kiyaghnegh m _ quunpekaghqaq _ akequsagh a _ .
yughagh unga _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tuunesqellusi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pinigh lghii meng _ elpesi nun _ piyuke llegh a _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ Jesus _ Christ-akunllu _ ilu gpesinun _ kiyaghnegh m _ pi ligu _ efqugh nagh lghii _ ellmi nun _ . _ Christ _ usuqe lleg nge li _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ nagate u aqe aghte ki _ lata nka _ qayughllak _ kayeme yug aqe amsi _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ takestaaghhaa luku _ lata amsi _ .
liisimake sug amsi _ ugpeqaalgutemnneng _ , _ Timothy-meng _ , _ aanesimaaq _ anusimingllaghvig meng _ . _ Kaatelghaghtughyaqan _ qerngagh emtung _ esghagh yaghtugh lleqe amsi _ .
quyake aghte nakesi _ qamagte luki _ igleghutistesi _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutetlu _ italy- meng _ pi t _ quyake aghte na ke ii sigh nge uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piniqe i nga lghii _ kayusillegh a _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ ! _ amen _ .
ukut _ lata t _ James-meng _ pi u ut _ qepghaghtenganeng _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ Atanghemllu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ lata aqe unga _ Jews-et _ ugpeqagh itnun _ mingite nga lghii nun _ tea- ma ani _ . _ quyake amsi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ quya aqe tek _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliigh negh gpesini _ ,
qayughllak _ liisima kasi _ seghleliigh llegh gpesi _ nanghiiqungwaat _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ nuqete neghtughsagh na lusi _ .
taagken _ nuqete neghtu llegh i _ nagnegh nga steggu _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ angtaniillequsi _ , _ iighwigh lleqe usi _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenasi _ .
naligh i _ peghqinellegh nge yu kuni _ tungsigh li _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ighlegite ghllag uq _ , _ quyake sigh ke i nagh luku _ tuunegkayuwaa _ qamagte luku _ yuug _ aapte lghii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune lleqe aisi _ tungsigh kufsi _ .
enkaam _ aapte tek _ ugpeqe i lleg ligh luku _ malghuklillngunaan _ . _ malghukli nga lghii _ imaghllug stun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ anuqe m _ tenge qagh te aqe kanga _ .
malghukli nga lghii _ ataasiighte igate uq _ sa llegh mikun _ tamaghhagh an _ . _ Tawatelnguq _ yuug _ talwa _ sumeghtaghagh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa meng _ alngunak _ allgegh u lleqe ni luni _ atanegh meng _ .
yeqay _ akluma lghii _ ugpeqaalgun _ quya li _ quulvaghtestengngalleghmineng _ .
yeqay _ aklungilnguq _ ugpeqaalgun _ quya li _ qusevegtestengngalleghmineng _ , _ qayughllak _ aviighute yaghqaa uq _ piitesighaghestun _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghmini _ maatneghqwaaghllagaqelghii _ , _ piitesighagh at _ paligh ste luki _ . _ taagken _ piitesighagh at _ ifkagh qu uute aqe ut _ , _ pinigh niigh te aqe ai _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ aklungilnguq _ yuug _ sa kestagh ghngaaghmi _ aviighute lleqe uq _ .
quyanaghhalek _ yug m _ nanghiiqu lleg ni _ nuqetutkayugi _ . _ suflughtekumiki _ allgeghsaghqagh ke a _ akileghtuusagh ni _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ akequsagh kekagh a _ tuune lleqe ni luku _ piniqisteminun _ .
kina _ alngunak _ nanghiiqu lleg nge gkuni _ whaten _ pi te qugh a mi _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ seghleghqe ste naqutke aanga _ . _ " _ kiyaghnegh _ nanghiiqu lleg nge yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite uq _ seghlegh meng _ ; _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghqe ste naqute kete yaghqaqe nghite a _ .
iwernga _ yuug _ piyuke lleg lug an _ nanghiiqu lleg nge sta qaa _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ . _ sivuke luku _ piyuke lleg lug an _ sayug aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ , _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh m _ naapte aqe a _ .
piyuke lleg lug m _ allgegh ste aqe a _ seghleghqe llegh _ . _ taagken _ seghleghqe llegh _ angli nghmini _ tuqu llegh ughte aqe uq _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ puughtesigh gpenasi _ .
qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit llu _ , _ sallghwaaghhiilnguutlu _ tunusagh t _ qilag meng _ pi u ut _ . _ tamaakut _ ata meng _ pi u ut _ ulimaghistenganeng _ qamagte luni _ nighug m _ ; _ allangughte igate uq llu _ , _ mamleg ste i igate uq llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ piyuke llegh ke a _ , _ tuunaluta _ nutaghagh meng _ unguvallegh meng _ ungipagh akun _ ipapighqellghem _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ , _ whangkuta _ megnunalleghpigaasqelluta _ ulimaaghyaggaghmineng _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ neqamike luku _ una _ : _ tamaghhagh mi _ nagate yu kestagh luni _ pi yaghqaa uq _ , _ akuziighaghtafqaamillu _ sakraagaghaghtafqaamillu _ ,
qayughllak _ sakraam _ kayusiite igate aisi _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghmun _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyukekagh anun _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pegte ggu _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqe aqe kesi _ . _ Qusevegngaghpesi _ tugukligh teki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ , _ piite tesiigh aqe ai _ ilu gpesigun _ , _ qayughllak _ yuguliyaghqaqiisi _ unguva sigh gpesineng _ .
nagate ghesnagh gpenaki _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta i _ itupill _ atuqe teki _ . _ puughte aqe usi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ nagate ghesnagh nghpesiki _ atuqe gpenaki _ .
yuug _ nagate ghesnagh kuni _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ atuqe gpenaki _ , _ taghneghaghqugh lghii stun _ ayuqe uq
tunute kuni _ tawaninginaq _ puygu lleqe a _ natetuleni _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ liilightuusagh i _ iteme te ta iqe ut _ yug neng _ . _ yug m _ liinnaquma inagh kumiki _ taakut _ liilightuusagh t _ , _ puygu gpenaki _ atuqe gkumiki _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya saghqagh ke a _ sallghakun _ tamaghhagh an _ .
yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh yu k _ ugpeqagh ghllag u ni luni _ , _ naqam _ akuzitkesaghqaqenghilkemmineng _ akuzi kayug _ temngi _ puughtengnguuq _ ellmi neng _ katam _ . _ ugpegh llegh a _ sea-te u nghite uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ata mta _ pillghani _ yuug _ ugpellepiilgukumi _ , _ kayusigh yaghqaqe ai _ yaywaali t llu _ ugingighagh t llu _ seghleliigh nghata _ , _ nuqete yaghqaa uq llu _ seghlegh aneng _ nuna m _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ ugpeqe i u te gpesineng _ atanegh mnneng _ Jesus _ Christ-ameng _ , _ Atanghaneng _ nighughqellghem _ sumeghtaghagh tke gpenaki _ ila i _ yug m _ megnu nagh aghagh ni luki _ ila meggneng _ .
maalghug _ yug k _ itegh yagh kayek _ qerngughte te vig gpesinun _ , _ aag llegh a _ aarragh luni _ , _ gold-meng _ alangqughiitagh ightugh luni _ , _ aag llegh a _ aatkagh lug kaghte luni _ ,
taana _ aarragh nga lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ whagun _ aqume i _ pinigh llegh akun _ aqumutagh m _ , _ " _ naqam _ akluma lghii _ yuug _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ tawani _ nekevgha _ , _ " _ nalighmeng _ , _ " _ aqume i _ itegagh ma _ saaghw akun _ , _ "
tawaten _ pi kufsi _ pakiggulleqasi _ ila i _ yug t _ enkaam _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ sumeghtaghagh llegh gpesigun _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ nagate aghte tek qun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ aklumaalghiit _ nuna mi _ whani _ ugpeqilleghtusqelluki _ . _ nakmike kaqe ai _ tuguklightenguluki _ ataneghpag u llegh mineng _ , _ akequsagh kekagh mineng _ yug minun _ , _ piniqe i nga lghii nun _ ellmi neng _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ aklumaalghiit _ yug t _ ukaligh u ste aqe asi _ . _ liisima kasi _ aklungilnguut _ piyaqleg iighqagh ke aisi _ , _ aglagh te aqe lusi _ nanqigtivig mun _ .
Ellnginguut _ seghletun _ akuzi tke i lghiit _ quulvaghngalghiimeng _ ategh aneng _ Jesus-em _ , _ ategh _ tuunekagh _ elpesi nun _ qayughllak _ ellnga n _ pike kangisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ ataneghpag u llegh an _ Liilightusaa _ unaagh nge uq _ : _ " _ piniqe luku _ yug lgute n _ piniqe llegh gpetun _ elpeneng _ katam _ . _ " _ Qaatqegkufsigu _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ , _ taawa _ pinitun _ pi usi _ .
iwernga _ pakigguskufsiki _ ila i _ yug t _ seghleghqe lleqe usi _ , _ qaatkennaanghitaghsillu _ taana _ liilightuusagh _ .
kitum _ qaatkesagh ghngaaghmiki _ qamagte luki _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ , _ ataasigh _ qaatke nghite kunigu _ , _ qamagte luki _ qaatkengngunghitii _ .
kiyaghnegh _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ gelgaghniigh gpenang _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi kau uq _ , _ " _ yugtagh gpenang _ . _ " _ gelgaghniigh nghite yagh ghngaaghpek _ yugtagh kuvek _ taawa _ qaatkengngunghitaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ liilightuusagh i _ .
akuzillegh gpesigun _ , _ sa llegh gpesigun _ piraamsi lusi _ qayughllak _ elpesi u usi _ nanqigte yaghqagh t _ megnu nagh lleghpigagh qun _ liilightuusagh kun _ . _ Taam _ liilightuusagh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ atuqe sqellug qu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ elpesi nun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekunisi _ nanglleg yagute naanghite aisi _ , _ nanglleg yagute nghite kufsiki _ yug lgute si _ . _ iwernga _ nanglleg ke gkufsiki _ yug lgute si _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanglleg yagute lleqe aisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ kina _ whaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ " _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu unga _ , _ " _ iwernga _ taam _ ugpeqe i llegh an _ yugulinaanghitaa _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun _ . _ sasii lleqe a ngam _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ aneghneghqillngunani _ ?
sa nayagh tsi _ ugpeqaalgutsi _ aatkagh isag yagh kan llu _ , _ neqangisag yagh kan llu _ ?
tuune gpenaan _ aklukegkaaneng _ temngi _ whaten _ pi kufsigu _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ quya ste naagh aaten _ ; _ sunanguq _ neghyaghqagh nge i llu _ aate kangi llu _ maqagh lghii meng _ , _ " _ sasiilleqanʼngam _ akuzite si _ aneghneghqillngunateng _ ?
ugpeqe i llegh llu _ tawatete uq _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh kun _ atuqe nghite kuni _ sasii nghite uq _ .
kina _ pi lleqe uq _ , _ " _ elpek _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu uten _ , _ whanga _ aneghneghqellelguunga _ . _ " _ keleg u vike nga _ ugpeqe i llegh gpeneng _ aneghneghqagh igh llghite ngugh meng _ , _ keleg u vike lleqe amken _ ugpeqe i lleg mneng _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg mkun _ .
ugpegh kan _ ataasigh ghhagh u ta a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ taana _ pinigh uq _ ! _ tughneghagh t llu _ ugpeqe aqe aat _ taana _ enkaangam _ alingruugh aqe ut _ , _ ungelegte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte yaghqaqe kangi _ .
uyuq _ nalluuqaq _ yuug _ , _ paninang _ liigikigasiguu _ ugpeqe i llegh _ aneghneghqillngunani _ sasii nghite u langa _ ?
sangan _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh qagh kagu _ sivunegh ut _ abraham _ seghleghqumangilngughestun _ ? _ tugukligh kaqe a _ abraham _ qayughllak _ ugpeqe i lleg ni _ atuqe kaqe a _ aneghneghqelleghmikun _ aghqe te kaqe yamigu _ ighnegh ni _ isaac _ aghqefigegnekun _ .
Liigiksiguu _ ? _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh llu _ qerngagh egmek _ qepghagh kayugu uk _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe i llegh a _ iighwightekaqaa _ aneghneghqelleghqun _ .
enkaam _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ whaten _ pillghit _ Abraham-emeng _ apeghiigh kau ut _ , _ " _ Abraham-em _ ugpeqe kaqe kanga _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ abraham _ seghleghqumangilngughestun _ . _ " _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ abraham _ ilakumtaagh ke ni luku _ pika qaa _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh aqe a _ yuug _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh akun llu _ ugpeqe i llegh akun llu _ ; _ tugukligh igate a _ ugpeqe i lleg raaghinagh akun _ .
Rahab-llu _ usputagh u uq _ . _ akike i kayugu yagh lghii _ yugusigh mineng _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ tugukligh kaqe kanga _ seghleghqumangilngughestun _ apallugh ke luku _ kayusigh i llegh a _ . _ Joshua-m _ kayagtekaqe kek _ maalghug _ yug k _ aksaqe luku _ nuna at _ yuvghiigh sqellug qu _ . _ yug t _ ivagh yatkek _ , _ Rahab-em _ alla kun _ tume kun _ anag stekakek _ .
Enkaangam _ yugusigh _ taghneghagh ngunani _ tuqu nga uq _ , _ ugpeqe i llegh llu _ aneghneghqillngunani _ tuqu nga uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ allute lusi _ apeghtughiste ughte fqaafsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimakagh i _ whangkuta _ apeghtughiste ni _ nanqigtengngwaaghataghaghyaghqaagukut _ .
qamagte luta _ anaggute aghagh neghtu ghllag ukut _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ yuug _ akuzillegh mikun _ anaggute igate ngughk _ elqughutngagh pestaagh u uq _ . _ yug m _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ talwa _ yugusigh ni llu _ agghi te kete luku _ ayuqe yaghqaqe a _ .
savikenghaagh ghhagh t _ sa ni te mun _ ayuqe luki _ kuuni t _ qaanghitnun _ kanaghte aqe aput _ qaatkesqelluta _ enkaam _ whangkuta _ igleghte te aqe aput _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kaghte ki qun llu _ angyaghpag ghllag t _ ; _ aquutasquvegaghhaam _ qiifte aqe ai _ angyaleg m _ piyuke llegh anun _ talwa _ anuqateghllagyaghngaan _ .
ulu llu _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ iwernga _ aangaayugneghllaguuq _ . _ Kenghhaam _ uqfig lghute ghllag t _ kumaghsaghqagh ke ai _ !
ulu llu _ kenghestun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ esleqnga uq _ seghleghqe llegh meng _ enkaam _ seghleghqe ma llegh a _ mingite kayugu uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ enkaam _ naafqii kayugu uq _ kiyaghtaallemnneng _ qayughllak _ hell-em _ kenghan _ kumagh a qaa _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ nemeghyagh t _ , _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh i _ qimugtekayugu ut _ , _ aaqun _ yug m _ qimugtaghkagh i
iwernga _ kitum _ alngunak _ qimugte naanghite a _ ulu _ . _ nekleg igate ngugh u uq _ , _ seghleghu uq _ , _ esleqnga uq _ tuqunagh lghii meng _ poison-meng _ .
ulu _ usuqusiqaqaghput _ atanegh mnnun _ ata mun _ . _ naqam _ seghlegh meng _ neghyugtaghagh usigh qaghkagh ut _ yug lgute mnnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ulimaagh itnun _ ellmite yu gnite luki _ .
usuqe i llegh llu _ , _ seghlegh meng llu _ neghyugtaghagh llegh _ aane kayugu uk _ ataasigh meng _ qanegh meng _ . _ Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ tawatete yaghqaa nghite yagh uq _ .
pinigh lghii llu _ seghlegh llu _ megh _ maaqegkayuwaak _ ataasigh meng _ sengngugh meng _ ?
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ figs-em _ uqfig a _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ olives-meng _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ grapes-em _ vine- nga _ piite ste i naanghite uq _ figs- meng _ . _ talwa _ meghtaghvig _ taghyughnilngughmeng _ meqe lghii _ pinigh lghii meng _ megh ite uq _ .
kina _ akule gpesinite a _ peghqinegh lghii _ , _ liigike i ma lghii llu _ ? _ tawatete lleg ni _ kelgute ligu _ pinitun _ kiyaghtaalleghmikun _ , _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh mikun llu _ qusevegngaghmi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ aqina nga kufsi llu _ , _ ellngiinaayugneghukufsillu _ iqlengiqe tke gpenaan _ ipapighqelleq _ , _ qaghya llegh gpesigun _ liisima ni lusi _ .
Tawatelnguq _ peghqinellegh _ qilagtagh u nghite uq _ , _ nuna meng _ pi u uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkeneng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ tughneghagh meng _ pi u uq _ .
nani _ alngunak _ aqina lleg lgu nghaani llu _ , _ ellnginaayugllelgunghanillu _ taawa _ kipullginaallelwaaquq _ , _ sa u aat llu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ seghlegh t _ tawantaqut _ .
iwernga _ peghqinellegh _ qilagte aq _ kiyang _ pelungite uq _ . _ Amalleqaa _ nekeggmetuq _ , _ kavyugite uq _ , _ malighqutagh ke i nga uq _ , _ nangllegtagh uq _ , _ pi nigh staghhiinaghtu te _ pikayug u uq _ , _ tanem ii llghite uq _ , _ yupiinghuuq _ .
nekeggmellegh _ piitute stun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ tamaakut _ nekeggmellegh mun _ qepghagh kayug t _ piitesighagh aqe ait _ , _ enkaam _ saghna aqe ut _ elte qugh nga lghii meng llu _ pinigh lghii meng llu _ kiyaghtaalleghmeggni _ .
Saam _ aaghtiiraagh te ste aqe isi llu _ , _ pillugute ste aqe aisi llu _ ? _ apate lugh qaghkagh i _ , _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh gpesi _ pilluwaghaqii _ pinigh lghiit _ piyuke lleg si _ .
qiliigh aqe usi _ avangite negh gpesini _ enkaam _ yugtagh yaghqaghte aqe usi _ allgeghhnaluki _ qiliigh ke gkasi _ . _ qiliigh ghllag aqe usi _ taawanginaq _ allgeghtepagningitaqasi _ enkaam _ aaghtiiraagh te aqe usi _ , _ pilluwutaqusi _ . _ allgegh te igate usi _ kiyaghnegh _ aapsigatutegpesineng _ .
talwa _ aapte ghngaaghpesigu _ kiyaghnegh _ allgeghsigatasi _ qayughllak _ seghlegh mun _ atughqagh u luki _ aapte aqe lghiisi _ . _ piyukekagh i _ elpek si _ katam _ piyukekagh ghhagh inagh gpesinun _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ .
ukughsi _ ataasiighneghilngughni _ ! _ Liisimakenghistegguu _ piniqe gkufsigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ , _ ugumikaghsi _ kiyaghnegh _ ? _ kitum _ alngunak _ piniqe gkunigu _ nuna m _ seghlegh a _ anguyag u uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sumeghtaghagh gpenasi _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ temngingu ni luku _ whaten _ pillghat _ , _ taghneghagh k _ kiyaghte lghiik _ ilu mnni _ aqina naqe neghtu uk _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusiite aghagh aqe ainkut _ nuqetutesqelluki _ piyuke lleg lug put _ . _ iwernga _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusigh aqe ai _ qusevegngalghiit _ puuru _ kipullegmun _ pi aqe ai _ qukaayugneghet _ . _ "
tuune lusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ , _ anagniigh lleqe uq _ elpesi neng _ .
qantaghalli i aghagh tek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ qantaghalli i aghagh lleqe uq _ elpesi nun _ . _ Seghleghqesteni _ , _ uughtugh tek _ ! _ elpek si _ ataasiighte llghite ngugh ni _ , _ ukmangigh teki _ ilu si _ qaamkut _ .
quya nghite tek _ , _ asemeghqe tek _ , _ qiya tek _ ! _ nenglaghqagh iqe lleg si _ qiya llegh ughte ki _ , _ quya lleg si _ quya nghite ngugh ughte steki _ .
qusevegte tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ quulvaghlleqiisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ seghlequughutegpenasi _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ seghlequuqumigu _ ugpeqaalguteni _ , _ seghlequughlleqii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekunigu llu _ ugpeqaalguteni _ nanqigtengngwii _ liilightuusagh t _ . _ nanqigtekufki _ liilightuusagh t _ qaatkengngunghitaten _ . _ yeghlegi _ liilightuusagh t _ nanqigte i stekau te n _ .
kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ liilightuusagh ngllagh a _ , _ nanqigte i sigh u luki _ atuqe aqe ai _ , _ enkaam _ sanganʼngam _ nanqigsigu _ yug lgute n _ ? _ kiyaghnegh ghhagh inagh u uq _ yuguligh i yaghqagh _ , _ naafqe i yaghqagh _ .
ila si _ whaten _ pi aqe ut _ , _ " _ aghneghmi _ nalighmeng _ unaami _ tawavek _ nuna mun _ aghulaqe lleqe unga _ . _ Tamaanllequnga _ ataasigh _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ mani ngllagh lleqe unga _ . _ "
iwernga _ nallukagh i _ unaami _ sa lleghqagh i _ ! _ talwa _ nallukagh i _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale kaghqagh a _ . _ unguvallegh i _ tan- squghhagh u uq _ , _ agepsughruggaghestun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute kayug _ .
itupill _ whaten _ pi aqe tek _ , _ " _ Atanghem _ piyuke llegh ke gkagu _ unguva kestagh lleqe ukut _ enkaam _ apeghiigh te aqe lleqe ukut _ sa meng _ alngunak _ . _ "
tawaten _ pi nghite kufsi _ aangaayugte lleqe usi llu _ qanangullequsillu _ . _ tamaakut _ aangaayugte llegh t _ seghleghu ut _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ liisimake ghngaaghmigu _ pinitun _ pi llegh _ atuqe nghite kunigu _ , _ seghleghqengnguuq _ .
nagate tek _ aklungilngughni _ ! _ qiya kestagh tek _ , _ iilqe kestagh tek _ qayughllak _ seghleliigh naqngu usi _ .
aklungi si _ aghu ma ut _ , _ aate kasi _ moth-em _ negh ma ai _ .
Gold-esillu _ silver-esillu _ anaghtaa ma ut _ . _ anaghtaa llghite a _ ipapighqennaqngwaa _ ellnginaayugneghulleghsillu _ , _ pakignegh u llegh i llu _ nanqigte lleg nge gkufsi _ . _ taagken _ anaghtaa llegh m _ yugusigh si _ naafqe lleqe ai _ katam _ kenghestun _ . _ qaywa _ kinguligh nun _ aghnegh nun _ lliighngaaghpesi _ , _ qerngughte i manginagh u usi _ wata _ aklungi igh i na lusi _ .
talwa _ akileghtugh llghite asi _ qepghaghtesi _ unatagh ke aat _ piitesigh u aghagh vig gpesini _ . _ nagate ki _ akuzilgallghit _ . _ Atanghem _ aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagem _ nagaqugh ma ai _ akilghuu llegh it _ .
Kiyaghtaalleghpesini _ whani _ nuna mi _ , _ aklungitu te gpesineng _ sa u a _ alngunak _ piyukekagh i _ allgegh taqagh i _ efqughhnalusi _ elpesi neng _ katam _ . _ tawaten _ pi llegh gpesigun _ penniigh stun _ ayuqe usi _ . _ penniigh t _ qugilisighat _ nalluke aat _ qantaghaqun _ tuqute lleghqagh eng _ . _ Nallukestegguu _ qantaghaqun _ Atanghem _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ ?
elpesi u ut _ nanqigte i ste ikagh t llu _ tuqute i ste ikagh t llu _ anaggute ma ite ngugh neng _ yug neng _ , _ ellngit a _ ayag qligh u mangite aisi _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ qelanegh gpenasi _ kenlanga _ Atanghem _ tagi nqigte lleghqagh anun _ . _ piitesigh u aghagh a _ usputagh qite ggu _ . _ nuna mi _ piitesigh u aghagh luni _ qelanegh yukagh gpenani _ utaqa i aqe uq _ uksaagh m llu _ upenghaamllu _ eslalluwaneng _ nagu ste i kayug meng _ piite yaghqagh neng _ .
elpek si llu _ qelanegh neghllug te k _ neghyu manginagh lusi _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ tagi yaghtugh uq _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ seghlequughpenaki _ ila si _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ nanqiggneghillisi _ . _ ellnga u uq _ nanqigte i sta _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh lghii _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ neqamike luki _ uuknaliqistet _ akuzikagh t _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ . _ usputagh qite ki _ qelanegh gpenateng _ nuqete neghtu luteng _ ikfiqe llegh mi _ pikagh t _ .
quya nga na iqe aput _ uuknaliqistet _ qayughllak _ ikfiqe u ghngaaghmeng _ paninang _ neghyuke manginagh kaqe aat _ atanegh _ . _ nagaqugh qaghkagh i _ Job-em _ nuqete neghtu llegh a _ , _ quya ste llegh a llu _ atanegh meng _ ikfiqe llegh a _ alpag yan _ . _ enkaam _ Job-kun _ Atanghem _ liite ste aisi _ nafughtagh llegh mineng llu _ nangllegtagh llegh mineng llu _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ apegh naqe kegka _ una _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ . _ akeqe i negh gpesini _ , _ akeqe i gpenasi _ qilag kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nuna kun _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ alngunak _ . _ pi yaghqaa kufsi _ legan _ aangʼghhaasi _ , _ pi yaghqaa nghite kufsi _ legan _ nakaaghhaasi _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe aqe teki _ akequsagh si _ , _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ Atanghem _ nanqigte naanghite aisi _ aghyuugh yaghqaa lusi _ .
kina _ akule gpesini _ ikfiqe u a _ ? _ yughagh li _ . _ kina _ quya nga a _ ? _ ilagagh li _ usuqe i llegh meng _ .
kina _ qinuyuwaa _ ? _ tuqlugh liki _ Elder-et _ enkaam _ yughagh te kete litgu _ mesiighqellug qu _ ategh akun _ Atanghem _ .
yughagh llegh m _ ugpeqe i llegh kun _ naallghute yaghqaqe a _ qinuyug lghii _ yuug _ . _ enkaam _ Atanghem _ yugunqwuughtesneqiglleqaa _ , _ seghleghqe llegh i llu _ seghevute lleqe ai _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ apegh aqe luki _ seghleghqe lleg si _ ila gpesinun _ , _ yughaatkututaqlusi _ naallghutellengesqellusi _ . _ elqughutngagh lghii m _ yug m _ yughagh llegh i _ iknaqe ghllag ut _ , _ allgegh te kayugu ut _ .
elijah _ yugu uq _ whangkutestun _ ayuqelgii _ . _ Taakunginaghhaagneng _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte fqaan _ pi sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte ma ite ngughk _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ alla _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh _ ilate luku _ .
taagken _ alla _ yughaghkagh _ eslallugughte sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ eslallugughte yalghiimi _ nuna _ piite ste ikagh _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemni _ , _ una _ kinguligh u uq _ apegh yug kegka _ elpesi nun _ . _ naligh i _ ugpeqe i nanigh kan _ apeghtuusagh pig neng _ , _ kitum _ kayusigh ligu _ ugpeqe i nqigte llegh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kunigu _ yugulisleqaak _ seghleghqestem _ unguva te zikek _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ seghuvulleqii _ taam _ seghleghqestem _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag i _ .
ukut _ lata t _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ apostle-nganeng _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmikegkagh itnun _ yug nun _ aghulaqe uute stekagh t _ Pontus-mun _ , _ Galatia-mun _ , _ Cappadocia-mun _ , _ Asia-mun _ , _ Bithynia-munllu _ .
neghigh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ ata m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ ellmi nun _ yugu lusi _ , _ agleghnagh lghii m llu _ taghneghagh m _ pelungighsagh kaqe aisi _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uk _ qaatkutesqellusi _ Jesus _ Christ-amun _ , _ ukmangiightesqellusillu _ aaw akun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ kayusillegh a llu _ nekeggmellegh a llu _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi nun _ .
usuqe lteggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ ata a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ ! _ apallugh ke luku _ nangllegtagh llegh ghllag ni _ allgegh nqigte ste ainkut _ unguvaghtelleghmikun _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ . _ Taam _ sighima lleg nge ste ghllag ainkut _ nalluneqniilngughmeng _ .
enkaam _ utaqa u aput _ pi liite yaghqagh put _ quya ste llegh ghllag t _ kiyaghnegh m _ aflengake kangi _ yug minun _ . _ aflengake u ai _ qilag mi _ elpesi nun _ enkaam _ aghu naanghite ut _ , _ naave naanghite ut _ , _ gheve naanghite ut llu _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun _ paqniighsaghlleqiisi _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ . _ enkaam _ kenletghuutelleghmi _ aliigh lleqe a _ yuguligh llegh _ yataghqegkaq _ elpesi nun _ .
Taam _ quya ma ste aisi _ , _ qaywa _ maaten _ natengiighhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ seghleliighyaghngaaghpesi _ .
tamaakut _ seghlegh ligh u aaghet _ nanghiiqu sigh u ut _ ipapighqennalusi _ ugpeqillepiilgutsi _ . _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ megnu nagh aghagh lghii nguq _ gold-nneng _ . _ Gold-et _ nanghiiqu nghmegteki _ kenegh kun _ naafqe kayugu ut _ . _ paninang _ kenghet _ atuqe aqe ait _ pelungigh na luki _ . _ Tawateghpigaq _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ nanghiiqu yaghqaa uq _ . _ aghula i uute kan _ pelungite luni _ , _ allgeghlleqaghsi _ usuqe llegh _ , _ nighughqelleq _ , _ quulvalleq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ aliightekagu _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ .
esghagh igate ghngaaghpesigu _ pinighkagh i _ , _ esghagh nghite ghngaaghpesigu _ maaten _ ugpeqagh i _ . _ enkaam _ quya ghllagu usi _ repall _ aapghwaaghpagningitaghsi _ angtalanga _ quya llegh gpesi _ ,
qayughllak _ allgeghtengngukesi _ yuguligh llegh a _ unguva sigh gpesi _ . _ Taananguuq _ apallugh a _ ugpeqe i lghiisi _ Christ-akun _ .
neghigh luku _ uuknaliqistet _ liigikngwaaghnaqegkaqaat _ taana _ yuguligh llegh _ . _ uuknaliqe tke kaqe aat _ tunusagh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ elpesi nun _ .
taghneghagh kek _ Christ-am _ uuknaliqistet _ ilungitnitkaaguk _ . _ ungipaate kestagh kaqe ai _ ikfiqe lleghqagh aneng _ Christ-am _ , _ quulvallengelleghqaghllaganengllu _ ikfiqe llegh an _ kingu aneng _ . _ enkaam _ uuknaliqistet _ liigike naqutke kaqe aat _ kina u yaghqaa ta a _ Christ-a _ , _ qakun llu _ tamaakut _ pi yaghqaa ta i _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ uuknaliqistet _ liigike stekaqe ai _ uuknaliqe tkekagh it _ ellngit nun _ pi u nghite ni luki _ , _ iwernga _ elpesi nun _ pi u ni luki _ . _ agleghnagh lghiik _ taghneghagh k _ kayagtekau uk _ qilag meng _ . _ ellnga n _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghakun _ ungipagh ke i lghiit _ pinigh lghii neng _ ungipagh neng _ ungipaate kaqe aisi _ tamaaken _ . _ talwa _ yaquleg t _ liigike yu pigtekaqe ait _ tamaakut _ .
Enkaangam _ umyugagh si _ apeghiighsaghwaaghluki _ ayuqe teki _ sa lleghqagh mun _ . _ umyugagh si _ whateghlluwaaghuluki _ , _ sighimake u aghte ggu llu _ tunusagh _ yuguligh lleg nge llegh _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune yaghqagh a _ Jesus _ Christ-a _ tagi kan _ .
qaatke te lusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh ke aisi _ . _ enkaam _ atuqe gpenaki _ seghlegh t _ piyuke lleg si _ atuqe u yagh kesi _ . _ tawatete yagh usi _ nalluke te gpesineng _ naten _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte sqe sug llegh an _ ayuqe ta a _ .
kiyaghnegh _ nakmikestezi _ , _ pelungitu ta aneng _ elpek si llu _ pelungi tek _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ pelungi tek _ qayughllak _ whanga _ pelungite unga _ . _ "
yughagh negh gpesini _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ata ke niighkagh i _ . _ nanqigte aqe a _ atunengwaaq _ yuug _ tamaghhagh an _ salleghtulngatun _ . _ enkaam _ tallugh ke teggu _ nunatagh ma lusi _ nuna mi _ whani _ .
liisimakagh i _ sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghtekau usi _ sasii gpenasi _ katam _ sivunegh gpesistun _ . _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ iteme te kaqe aisi _ taagken _ sasii nghite ngugh meng _ kiyaghtaalleghmeng _ . _ tukfigh llghite aisi _ silver- meng _ nalighmeng _ gold-meng _ naave kayug meng _ ,
iwernga _ tukfigh kaqe aisi _ megnu nagh pigte lghii meng _ aaw aneng _ Christ-am _ . _ ellnga _ penniighaghaghtun _ ayuqe uq _ sallwhaaghhiilnguq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ Christ-a _ talwa _ sivungagh ni _ nuna _ ulima llghite luku _ . _ maaten _ kinguligh ni _ aghnegh ni _ aliightekaqe a _ elpek si _ apallugh ke lusi _ .
Christ-akun _ ugpeqagh i _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ ellnga n _ unguvaghtekaqaa _ Christ-a _ tuqu llegh meng _ , _ quulvaghllakaqaallu _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ ugpeqe i llegh i _ , _ sighima llegh i _ kiyaghnegh mun _ ayuqe uq _ .
qaatke te llegh kun _ ipapighqelleghmun _ pelungightekaqasi _ unguva sigh si _ , _ enkaam _ piniqepiigasi _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ . _ piniqe te kestagh tek _ ilu gpesineng _ qamaken _ .
allgegh nqigtekau usi _ . _ unguvalleghraghagh i _ tuqu kayug meng _ pi u nghite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu igate ngugh meng _ pi u uq _ . _ allgegh nqigtekau usi _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta itgun _ , _ unguva lghiit _ , _ kenle ite ngugh t _ .
akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ igaqe nga uq _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ yug t _ vegaagh stun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ pinighnagh llegh i llu _ piitesighaghestun _ ayuqe ut _ . _ vegaagh t _ paligh aqe ut _ , _ piitesighagh at llu _ ifkagh aqe ut _ ,
iwernga _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ quunpekaghqaagut _ . _ " _ Taakusta _ akuzite t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kangit _ elpesi nun _ .
enkaam _ taaqe teggu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ seghlegh _ atuqekagh i _ . _ iqlengiqe nanigh tek _ , _ piniiyuggnanightek _ , _ aqina nanigh tek _ , _ seghlequughunnanighteklu _ .
allgegh nghhagh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug aqe ut _ . _ ellngistun _ quunpeng _ mamagh yug tek _ pelungilngughmeng _ taghneghagh m _ mamagh aneng _ . _ Angtaniitesleqaa _ yuguligh llegh i _ ,
qayughllak _ naasiighaghsi _ Atanghem _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
tagi tek _ atanegh mun _ , _ ellnga _ unguva lghii u uq _ uyghag _ . _ yug t _ ighsakekagh at _ sasiinghilngughestun _ , _ iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe a _ megnu nagh luku _ .
elpek si llu _ unguva lghii stun _ uyghag stun _ ayuqe usi _ , _ enkaam _ agleghnagh lghii m _ taghneghagh m _ nekefte sigh ke lisi _ kiyaghnegh m _ mangteghagh anun _ . _ Qepghaalleqaghsi _ aaftekau lusi _ priest-et _ tuune i lghiit _ aghqe te meng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ ellnga n _ tugukligh lleqe ai _ aghqe te t _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ .
igaqe kau lghii _ akuzite ni _ igaqegkagh ni _ whaten _ , _ " _ Zion-mi _ nekegte aqe aqa _ megnu nagh lghii _ uyghag _ ; _ kangighagh m _ uyghag ke a _ nakmikegkagh ka _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ ugpeqe i lghii _ ellnga neng _ kayngumiqe naanghite uq _ . _ "
taana _ uyghag _ megnu nagh pigte uq _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqe i lghii nun _ . _ iwernga _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh nun _ whatelnguuguq _ , _ " _ taana _ uyghag _ mangteghangllaghtet _ ighsakekagh at _ , _ kangighagh m _ uyghakaaghsimakanga _ . _ "
amalleqa _ , _ " _ Taam _ uyghag m _ yug t _ naagte ste aqe ai _ , _ iqu ste aqe ai llu _ . _ " _ naagte aqe ut _ qayughllak _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta anun _ . _ tawaten _ kiyaghnegh m _ uspeqe kaqe ai _ .
iwernga _ elpek si _ yug ni _ nakmike kau usi _ , _ umiileg m _ priest-ekiisi _ , _ aaftekau usi _ yug ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellnga n _ katam _ yug ke aisi _ . _ nakmike kau usi _ aapghesqelluki _ allaaghlluwhaat _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh i _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ tagsigh ikagh _ elpesi neng _ mamleg ghllag meng _ ellmi _ katam _ allaaghlluwhaghmun _ nighug minun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ke nghite yagh aisi _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ yug liite ma aisi _ . _ sivugh nghaani _ nalluksaghaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ allgeghsimaaghsi _ nangllegtagh llegh a _ .
ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ nunatagh u usi llu _ allaneghtagh u usi llu _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ enkaam _ kayeme amsi _ ilapga te gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ qayughllak _ yugusigh m _ piyuke llegh an _ pilluwaangwaa _ unguva sigh i _ .
pinitun _ kiyaghte tek _ akule itni _ ugpeqagh u nghite ngugh t _ , _ luuraq _ ellngit a _ seghletun _ pi ste u ni na yu kangisi _ . _ esghagh kumegteki _ aneghneghqagh igh lleg si _ usuqe lleqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ aghnegh ani _ Christ-am _ tagi llegh an _ .
atanegh _ apallugh ke luku _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ kiyaghte tek _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ kavemem _ igleghutistengitnun _ . _ qaatke te lusi _ umiileg mun _ ; _ ellnga u uq _ angegh lleghpigagh _ igleghte te i sta _ .
qaute kete luki llu _ igleghutistet _ ; _ umiileg m _ aghyuughiyaqlegughtestaqii _ seghletun _ pistenun _ , _ usuqiyaqleghughtestekaqiillu _ pinitun _ pistenun _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh ke a _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesigun _ nepiightesqelluki _ nalluuqat _ temngitwhameng _ akuzite lghiit _ .
kiyaghte tek _ iteme nga lghii stun _ iwernga _ iteme nga llegh i _ atuqe fqaan _ seghlegh mun _ . _ kiyaghte tek _ qepghaghtelaaghulusi _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Quulvaghluku _ tea- ma ghhagh a _ yuug _ , _ piniqe luki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ , _ alike luku _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ quulvaghlukullu _ umiileg _ .
elpek si _ qepghaghtelaaghni _ qaatke utek _ piliitestegpesinun _ siivakellelighlusi _ . _ qaatke gpenaki _ nangllegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ umyugaqegtagh ghhagh inagh t llu _ , _ iwernga _ qaatke aqe teki llu _ amyuqetagh lghiit _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke aqe aisi _ sumeghmike nghpesigu _ ellnga _ ikfiqe u lusi _ sa meng _ sapiglleghhiistun _ .
iwernga _ suflughsi ma kufsiki _ qevutqullesi _ , _ seghletun _ pilleg si _ apallugh ke luki _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ usuqe naanghite aisi _ . _ Naqamenraq _ suflughsi ma kufsigu _ ikfiqe llegh _ pinitun _ pi llegh gpesinun _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ efqugh ke lleqe aisi _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ suflughtesqelluki _ ikfiqe llegh t _ qayughllak _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe tke kaqe aisi _ . _ ikfiqe llegh a _ usputagh u uq _ elpesi nun _ maligte sqellug qu _ .
ellnga _ seghleghqe igate uq _ , _ iqlengiqe igate uq _ .
Seghlequullengaqngami _ akite mangite ai _ . _ ikfiqe aqngami _ akeqsagte mangite ai _ . _ itupill _ neghyuke te kau uq _ ellmi neng _ nanqigte i kayug mun _ elqughaghte luku _ .
Christ-am _ ellmi neng _ katam _ aglagh te kaqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg put _ yugusigh mig ke luki _ qaquuragh mun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau uq _ tuqungasqelluta _ seghleghqe llegh mun _ unguvasqelluta _ elqughutngagh llegh mun _ . _ kiitigh qu llegh akun _ naallghute kau usi _ .
penniigh stun _ aghulaqe aatagh lghii stun _ ayuqe yagh usi _ . _ iwernga _ maaten _ uteghnigh ma usi _ Penniighniightemun _ Kelengakistenganun _ unguva sigh gpesi _ .
elpek si _ ugiighkagh ni _ , _ kiyaghte tek _ qaatke te lusi _ ugi gpesinun _ . _ ila i _ nuliigh leg t _ ugpeqe i igate ngugh u ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ iwernga _ tawaten _ kiyaghte llegh gpesigun _ ugpeqagh ughte na yu kata _ sa meng _ pi nghite ghngaaghpesiki _ ,
qayughllak _ esghapag kangat _ pelungi tun _ kiyaghtaalleghsi _ , _ alike i llegh i llu _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
nuyagh kegte yagh llegh m _ , _ ullngaqellghem _ gold-meng _ , _ aarragh llegh m _ pinighnaghsigh igate ai _ ilu si _ .
itupill _ pinighnagh tek _ ilu gpesigun _ qusevegllelighlusi _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh lusi llu _ . _ Tawatelnguq _ pinighnagh llegh _ quunpekaghqaaguq _ , _ megnu nagh ghllag uq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
sivugh nghaani _ agani _ , _ aghnagh t _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ pinighnaghsagh kayugu ut _ ilu megteggun _ , _ qusevegllelighluteng _ , _ nekeggmellegh ligh luteng llu _ . _ neghyuke kaqe aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ qaatke kaqe ait llu _ ugi teng _ .
sarah _ tawatete kau uq _ ! _ qaatke kaqe a _ abraham _ , _ atanqennikaqaallu _ . _ enkaam _ elpek si _ panike aisi _ pinitun _ pi ma kufsi _ , _ alinge igate kufsi llu _ sa meng _ alngunak _ .
elpek si llu _ nulighhtuqagh ni _ kiyaghute ki _ nula isi _ liigike luki _ nateghtu langi _ qayughllak _ kayaate aghagh ut _ elpesi neng _ . _ Quulvaghluki _ nula isi _ qayughllak _ atunem _ allgeghsaghqaqaghsi _ kiyaghnegh m _ tunusagh a _ kenle ite ngughk _ unguvallegh _ . _ tawaten _ pi kufsi _ saam _ alngunak _ pillgilliqe naanghite ai _ yughagh lleg si _ .
Taaqnighnaqanka _ sa meng _ pillghenka _ whaten _ : _ qamagte lusi _ ataasigh stun _ sumeghnegh lgute k _ , _ aqniqe te utek _ , _ piniqe utek _ anglegute ke te lghii stun _ , _ nanglleg ke te utek _ , _ qusevegte te utek _ .
yug t _ seghletun _ pi kangisi _ akite gpenaki _ seghletun _ , _ nalighmeng _ seghlequuqangisi _ akite gpenaki _ seghlequughmeng _ . _ itupill _ akite ki _ quya ste llegh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ tawaten _ pisqellusi _ elpesi nun _ allgeghtesqelluku _ quya ste i lleg ni _ .
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pillghistun _ , _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ quya nga lghii meng _ unguvallegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ quya ma lghii neng llu _ aghnegh lgu yu kuni _ , _ seghletun _ akuzi nghmeng _ taaqe li _ , _ iqlengiqe nanigh li llu _ .
seghletun _ pi nanigh luni _ , _ pinitun _ pi li _ . _ Nekeggmennaqlunillu _ kiyaghte li _ ,
qayughllak _ Atanghem _ esghapag u ai _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ , _ nagate aqe ai llu _ yughagh llegh it _ . _ iwernga _ Atanghem _ tengvimun _ ayuqe ai _ seghletun _ pi lghiit _ . _ "
kitum ngam _ aqnigh lleqe isi _ sagiqe u kufsi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ ?
iwernga _ ikfiqeghngaaghpesi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ quya ste lleg nge lleqe usi _ . _ alike gpenaki _ yug t _ , _ talwa _ sumeghyali gpenasi _ .
iwernga _ ilu gpesigun _ manigugh aqe teggu _ Christ-a _ Atanghuluku _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ aaptegkangisi _ sighima llegh meng _ ilugpesinilngughmeng _ quunpeng _ liigike natu te _ kiimsighyaqleggiinaawaqiteki _ .
iwernga _ kiimsigh aqe teki _ qusevegllelighlusi _ , _ sii vag ke igh lleg ligh lusi _ . _ seghleghqe nghite kufsi _ umyugagh si _ seghleghni naanghite ut _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ seghlequuqangisi _ pinitun _ kiyaghte llegh gpesineng _ Christ-akun _ , _ kayngu yug lleqe ut _ tawaten _ akuzillegh meggneng _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyukelqengngukagu _ ikfiqesqellusi _ pinitun _ pi llegh mun _ , _ taana _ itagnagh aghagh uq _ ikfiqe lleghqagh gpesineng _ seghletun _ pi llegh mun _ .
Christ-a _ tuqu kau uq _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ apallugh ke luki _ yug t _ seghleghqe llegh it _ . _ seghleghqe mangite uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuquma tke kaqe ai _ seghleghqestet _ tagite na luki _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ yugusigh a _ tuqute kau uq _ iwernga _ taghneghagh kek _ unguvaghtekaaguk _ .
enkaam _ taghneghagh u luni _ ungipagh yaghtugh kau uq _ taghneghagh nun _ anusimingllaghvigmelngughnun _ .
Taakunguut _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh mun _ neghigh luku _ noah _ kiyaghtengnguluku _ . _ noah _ ark-engllaaluku _ kiyaghnegh _ qelanegh gpenani _ utaqa i kau uq _ qaatke te ma ite ngugh nun _ avuteghqesqelluki _ . _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu llgagh inagh t _ yug t _ itegh luteng _ ark- mun _ yugulikaagut _ megh kun _ .
Taananguuq _ megh _ uspute aq _ paaptaaye llegh mun _ yuguligh i lghii _ elpesi neng _ maaten _ unguvaghtellghakun _ Jesus _ Christ _ . _ paaptaaye llegh _ iqangigh sigh u nghite uq _ yugusigh mun _ . _ itupill _ paaptaaye llegh kun _ akeqe i ukut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ umyugagh mnneng _ seghleghni ite ngugh meng _ .
Jesus _ Christ-a _ qilag mun _ mayugh luni _ aghenqignegh anite uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte te u ai _ qamagte luki _ yaquleg t _ , _ qilag m _ igleghutistengi _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghetlu _ .
ikfiqe kau ta aneng _ Christ-a _ yugusigh mikun _ elpek si llu _ yataaghqe tek _ ikfiqe yaghqaa lusi _ Christ-atun _ , _ qayughllak _ kina _ alngunak _ yugusigh mikun _ ikfiqe lghii _ seghleghqe sug nanigh ma uq _ .
enkaam _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ unguvallegh gpesi _ tagtale atun _ malighqutagh ke gpenasi _ yugusigh gpesi _ piyuke llegh anun _ , _ iwernga _ atuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ .
sivugh nghaani _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lqinagh usi _ qaatkusigalngughestun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ whaten _ pi kau usi _ : _ seghleghnagh pigte luku _ atuqe te kayugu yagh usi _ , _ qiliigh ke te aqe lusi _ , _ suume uute aqe lusi _ , _ qerngughutullusi _ uglagh pestaagh t _ seghlegh t _ atuqe aqe luki _ , _ neqenghaghqete lusi _ , _ meghe uute ghllag lusi _ enkaam _ alngunaseghaghllagughtaqusi _ , _ manigugh kaqe asi llu _ iinghutekagh t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t _ .
kiyaghte nanigh lghiisi _ ugpeqaanghilngughestun _ , _ liigike igate aat _ sangan _ ilate nanigh u tsi _ seghletun _ kiyaghtaalleghmeggnun _ , _ enkaam _ seghlequughaqiisi _ .
iwernga _ salleg teng _ ellmeggneng _ katam _ apegh yaghqaqe ait _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ nanqigtiyaqleggiinaghmun _ unguva lghii neng llu _ tuqukagh neng llu _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ talwa _ tuqukagh nun _ . _ tamaakut _ nanqigtekau ut _ unguva u luteng _ nuna mi _ whani _ . _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ ungipagh ke kau ut _ ellngit nun _ , _ enkaam _ taghneghagh it _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte lleqe ut _ katam _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghte llegh atun _ .
sa u a _ qamagte luni _ kenletghuusaghtughtuq _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ whateghlluwaaghuluki _ umyugagh si _ , _ nuqete neghtu lusi _ yughagh yaghqaa lusi _ yughagh lleghqagh gpesistun _ .
megnu nagh lleghpigagh u uq _ una _ : _ piniqutepiiglusi _ qayughllak _ piniqe llegh m _ seghevute ste aqe ai _ seghleghqe lleg lghute ghllag t _ .
Upughanghulusi _ qikeghte qugh fqaafsi _ .
tamaghhagh gpesi _ allgegh te kau usi _ tunusagh neng _ atughqagh meng _ ila gpesinun _ . _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ tunusagh t _ kiyaghnegh meng _ pi si _ atuqe aqe teki _ pinitun _ .
tunusagh leg t _ akuzimun _ akuzi lit _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzi ta aneng _ . _ tunusagh leg t _ qepghhaatimun _ qepghhaatilit _ iknaqe lleg ligh luteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuunekagh aneng _ . _ enkaam _ sa llegh gpesigun _ tea- ma ghhagh akun _ kiyaghnegh _ usuqe lleg nge lleqe uq _ Jesus _ Christ-akun _ . _ ellnga n _ pikagh ak _ nighughqelleqlu _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ amen _ .
piniqekagh mni _ ilakumtaagh mni _ , _ quupkagh gpenasi _ seghleliigh ghrukutaagh ghllaget _ kaate kangisi _ nanghiighsaghagh na lusi _ . _ nanghiighsaghagh lleg si _ allakaayagunghitut _ .
itupill _ quya tek _ ilate lghiisi _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ quyangaghllagesqellusi _ nighughqellgha _ aliightekan _ .
Seghlequuqangisi _ apallugh ke luku _ maligte yaaghte u ma llegh i _ Christ-amun _ , _ quya ste lleg lgu usi _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh kek _ nighughqengngalghiik _ kiyaghtengnguuk _ elpesi ni _ .
ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ , _ ikfiqe gpenasi _ yugte aghte u lusi _ , _ tegleg nigh ughte u lusi _ , _ seghletun _ pi ste u lusi _ , _ nalighmeng _ yanutqu ste u lusi _ .
Naqamenraq _ ikfiqe yaghqaa kufsi _ Christian-ngutegpesineng _ , _ kayngu yug gpenasi _ iwernga _ usuqe nakesi _ kiyaghnegh _ atigh kangisi _ Christ-am _ ategh aneng _ .
nanqigte i lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ sivuke luni _ piinligh lleqe uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ nengllugutangakun _ . _ piinligh naqngu kan _ whangkutgun _ , _ salleqanʼngam _ qaatke te igate ngugh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ pinigh lghii nun _ ungipagh anun _ ?
akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pillghistun _ , _ " _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ pegnem _ yugulikaakuyeng _ , _ avelghasingwaalghiit _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ seghleghqestetlu _ natenʼngam _ yuguligh lleg nge lleqe aat _ ? _ "
Enkaangam _ tamaakut _ ikfiqe lghiit _ apallugh ke luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ , _ elqughute luteng _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ neghyuke te lleqe ait llu _ unguva sigh teng _ ataasiighmelngughmun _ Ulimaghistemun _ .
sa meng _ piighhe yug anka _ Elder-et _ yughaghvigpesinilnguut _ . _ whanga llu _ Elder-nguunga _ , _ esghapag kaqe kegka llu _ Christ-am _ ikfiqe llegh a _ , _ ilate yaghqaa unga llu _ Christ-am _ aange llegh ghllag anun _ kiyaghnegh m _ aliightekagu _ .
enkaam _ qelegh yug amsi _ Elder-eni _ whaten _ : _ pennagh igh nigh ughte u tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ penniigh itnun _ ; _ neghyuke te kaqe ai _ elpesi nun _ aflengakesqelluki _ . _ aflengake teki _ qayughllak _ aflengake yu kesi _ , _ nakaan _ qayughllak _ pi yaghqaa te gpesineng _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawaten _ pi sqe sug aisi _ . _ aflengake teki _ nakaan _ akileghtuusagh nge pigesnagh na lusi _ , _ iwernga _ qayughllak _ kayusigh yug u kesi _ .
agghi te kaqe gpenaki _ aflengake gkasi _ , _ iwernga _ maligsugnaghqitek _ ellngit nun _ .
enkaam _ Igleghutistengat _ Penniighniightet _ tagi kan _ allgegh u lleqe usi _ pinighnagh pigte lghii meng _ qaghpa meng _ qelmegh i uute yaghqaa nghite ngugh meng _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ elpek si _ uyuqligh ni _ malighqutagh ke lusi _ siivanllegh nun _ . _ qamagte lusi _ qusevgutullusi _ qayughllak _ akuzite t _ igaqegkagh t _ pi kau ut _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ kipullegmun _ ayuqe ai _ qukaayugneghet _ , _ iwernga _ kayusigh aqe ai _ qusevegngalghiit _ . _ "
Enkaangam _ elpesi neng _ katam _ qusevegngatek _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghtughyaghqaanghiteghllagmun _ . _ taagken _ quulvaghlleqiisi _ nakmikegkagh mini _ aghneghmi _ .
qamagte luki _ sumeghyali tke gkasi _ pegte ki _ ellnga nun _ , _ qayughllak _ aflengake u aisi _ .
liisima lusi _ , _ kelenga lusi _ . _ anguyag i _ tughneghagh _ iglegha u uq _ ugini lghii tun _ lion-etun _ , _ ivagh i aqe uq _ kina _ naafqennaluku _ .
ayag qlighte ggu _ tughneghagh _ ayepsugilngughqun _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesigun _ , _ liisimake luki _ ugpeqaalgutesi _ nunataghhaanilnguut _ tawaten _ ellngit llu _ ikfiqe u ut _ .
iwernga _ natengiighhaq _ ikfiqe llegh gpesi _ kingu aneng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqingaghllagem _ tea- ma anun _ , _ ellnga n _ katam _ nallghusagh u lleqe aisi _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ . _ ugpeqe i lleg si _ iknaqughsaghlleqii _ , _ ayepsugighsagh lleqe ai _ , _ aghuliilkaaghtesleqii _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe aisi _ Christ-akun _ ilatesqellusi _ kenle ite ngugh mun _ aange llegh ghllag minun _ .
qamagte luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleq _ ellnga n _ pi ke aa _ quunperugllag _ ! _ amen _ .
silas _ ataasiighmelnguuguq _ ugpeqagh u lgute a _ ; _ igagh te aqe aanga _ takestaaghhagh tgun _ lata mkun _ elpesi nun _ . _ lata nka _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqellepiiganeng _ ayuqe ut _ . _ ungipaate amsi llu _ kayeme amsi llu _ kiyaghtekestiisqellusi _ piniqe llegh ani _ .
Ugpeqaalgutesi _ Babylon-melnguut _ , _ elpesi stun _ kiyaghnegh m _ nakmike kaqe ai _ . _ ellngit a llu _ , _ eight- nghma llu _ Mark-em _ piniqe aisi nguq _ .
quyake te aqe tek _ naagh llegh kun _ Christ-am _ piniqe llegh akun _ . _ nekeggmellegh _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ Christ-am _ pi liite ke ii te ni _ .
ukut _ lata t _ simon _ peter- meng _ pi u ut _ . _ Qepghaghtekaangallu _ , _ apostle-kaangallu _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ . _ lata aqe amsi _ qamagte lusi _ allgegh tekagh ni _ ugpeqe i llegh meng _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ . _ Allgeghtekaqaghput _ ugpeqe i llegh ut _ elqughutngagh llegh akun _ Jesus _ Christ-am _ , _ Kiyaghneqegkefutlu _ Yugulighistekegkefutlu _ .
piniqe llegh nkuk _ nekeggmellegh nkuk _ wata _ nula lik _ elpesi ni _ liisimake llegh gpesigun _ kiyaghnegh llu _ Jesus-lu _ atanegh ut _ .
Jesus _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuq _ kiyaghnegh meng _ . _ taaggun _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ sa meng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aklukegkamnneng _ kiyaghtesqelluta _ kiyaghnegh yug neghtu luta _ . _ tamaakut _ allgeghtekaqaput _ qayughllak _ liisimakegkefut _ Jesus _ . _ tuqlugh ainkut _ ilatesqelluta _ quulvalleghminunllu _ pinigh llegh minun llu _ .
Aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmikun _ , _ Jesus-em _ tuune kaqe ainkut _ akequsagh mineng _ megnu nagh pigte lghii neng llu _ pi vag na pigte lghii neng llu _ . _ tamaagun _ akequsagh tgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ ilate ste lleqe aisi _ nangaghnegh minun _ . _ taagken _ anagyaqlegughlleqasi _ seghlegh m _ piyuke llegh i _ nunamelnguut _ naafqiiyaqleget _ elpesi neng _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangaghnelitkaqutanganeng _ elpek si _ , _ taakunginaghhaagneng _ pinaqellghaghsi _ qamagte luku _ ilate ki _ ukut _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ : _ ugpeqe i llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ pinigh llegh _ , _ pinigh llegh gpesinun _ ilate ggu _ liisima llegh _ ,
