kiimsigh aqa _ , _ " _ yugu ni uq _ , _ elpek _ liisima katen _ . _ " _ Elder-em _ pi unga _ , _ " _ Taakunguut _ suflughte tke aat _ seghleliighrukutaaghllagmeng _ . _ Penniighaghaam _ aaw akun _ aghvig luki _ qiipaghagh teng _ , _ qategh stekaqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivu gkeni _ kiyaghnegh m _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkeni _ . _ manigugh aqe aat _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ temple- nga ni _ . _ aqumga lghii m _ umiileg u sigh gni _ aqumutagh gni _ azigutigh lleqe ai _ nayute te nga llegh mineng _ .
iyatagh iqe nanigh lleqe ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ meqsug yug nanigh lleqe ut _ . _ Siqinghem _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uguqnagh ghllag lghii m _ ugute naanghite ai _ .
pennagh ii aghagh aq _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ saaghw anite ngughk _ pennagh igh nigh ughtekete lleqe aat _ . _ maghyaghqugh lleqe ai _ sengngugh lghii nun _ megh nun _ unguvallelitikayugnun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ quni ightugh lleqe ai _ . _ "
Penniighaghaam _ qelpeghte aqe yamigu _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta a _ seal-ellghem _ , _ qilag mi _ qallegnanighwaaghutut _ entaqun _ aflu m _ aveg llegh atun _ tagkaan _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ taakut _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ nekevgha lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh kun _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ qalghightaute ngugh u te ut _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ , _ tugumiigh leg _ gold-meng _ sagnegh meng _ , _ tagi luni _ nekeve uq _ aghqefig gni _ . _ tuunekagh at _ incense-elghutmeng _ ilatesqelluki _ qamagte luki _ yughagh u i te nun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug an _ . _ yaquleg m _ lli a _ gold-egnun _ aghqefig gnun _ sivunganilnguuk _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ .
Incense-em _ agepsugh a _ mayugh uq _ maligte te luni _ yughagh llegh itgun _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ . _ mayugh ut _ kiyaghnegh mun _ sagnegh meng _ yaquleg m _ tugumiigh aneng _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ , _ tugu luku _ sagnegh _ , _ imigh aa _ kenghaneng _ aghqefig m _ . _ sagnegh m _ imigh a _ miluute ai _ nuna mun _ . _ enkaam _ kallugughte ghllag uq _ , _ kavlegtagh ghllag uq _ , _ nighwaaghpagtaghllagtuq _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ qalghightate te leg t _ yataaghqe ut _ qalghightinaluteng _ .
sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ kaftekrag nkuk _ , _ kenghenkuk _ akume lutek _ aaw meng _ nuna mun _ miluute agket _ . _ enkaam _ pingayughqellgha _ nuna m _ panegh uq _ , _ pingayughqellghitlu _ uqfig t _ panegh ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ sungaghyug lghiit _ vegaagh t _ panegh ut _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ sa u a _ naayghagh ghllagte yu gnite ngughk _ kumaghugngalghii _ , _ miluute aat _ kellii nun _ . _ enkaam _ pingayughqellgha _ kellii m _ aawgughtuq _ .
Pingayughqellghit _ kelliinilnguut _ unguva lghiit _ tuqu ut _ , _ pingayughqellghitlu _ angyaghpag t _ naafqengngwaaghii _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ , _ kumaghugh nga lghii _ torch-etun _ , _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh uq _ pingayughqellghitgun _ kiiw t llu _ sengngugh lghiit llu _ megh t _ .
ategh a _ ighaleqetaagh m _ " _ sungagh ni _ " _ . _ Pingayughqellgha _ megh m _ sungaghnightekaq _ enkaam _ yug lghute ghllag t _ megh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ qayughllak _ megh _ sungaghnightekaalghii _ .
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ taagken _ saam _ tenpe ai _ siqinegh _ , _ tanqigh _ , _ ighaleqataaghetlu _ , _ enkaam _ pingayughqellghi _ mamlegte ai _ . _ Pingayughqellgha _ aghnegh m _ mamleg a _ , _ pingayughqellghallu _ unugem _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ nagaqugh aqa llu _ qawaagpag _ tengaa lghii _ quulvani _ , _ iglagtu luni _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaaghunaqnguuq _ ! _ kinguligh t _ pi nga yu t _ yaquleg t _ qalghighhnaqegkumegteki _ qalghightate te teng _ , _ taagken _ elngaatall _ seghlegh pestaagh u naqngu uq _ yug nun _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ tamaani _ pi llegh ni _ ! _ "
taagken _ tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ esghagh aqa _ ighaleqetaagh _ ifkaghkagh _ qilaga meng _ nuna mun _ , _ key-litkaaftuqlu _ qelpeghte sqellug qu _ asilighneghilnguq _ laag u aq _ .
ighaleqetaagh m _ qelpegh a _ asilighneghilnguq _ laag u aq _ . _ Tesamaken _ agepsugh _ aane uq _ katam _ agepsugh atun _ egllu ghllag m _ repall _ siqinegh llu _ qilag a llu _ mamleg a _ agepsugh m _ .
taagken _ agepsugh meng _ aanleghaate ut _ locust-elghutet _ , _ nuna mun llu _ ukig uute ut _ . _ Kaapigaqleghutekat _ yug neng _ , _ katam _ scorpion-et _ kaapiiqellghistun _ .
ungipaate kau lghiit _ locust-et _ naafqe fqiita _ vegaagh t _ pisqelluki _ nalighmeng _ sungaghyug t _ nunivagseghagh t _ nalighmeng _ alngunak _ uqfig t _ . _ aqnighte sqekagh i llu _ tamaakunginaat _ yug t _ kiyaghnegh m _ nalluniigh llghite kangi _ qagugh itgun _ .
Locust-enun _ tuqu qugh ste na nigh ke ai _ tamaakut _ yug t _ , _ taawanginaq _ ikfiqesteghllagestesqegkii _ tallimanun _ tanqigh nun _ . _ Scorpion-et _ kaapellghistun _ yug t _ ikfiqe ghllagkagh t _ .
Taakuni _ tallimat ni _ tanqigh ni _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuquyug pigte lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqupagningite lleqe ut _ . _ yug t _ tuqu naqe ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu naanghite ut _ .
Locust-et _ esghaqagh u luteng _ kuuni stun _ ayuqe ut _ pilluwamun _ yataaghqekagh t _ . _ Naasqwitniteftut _ llangaqa _ gold-et _ qaghpa t _ , _ gginagh it llu _ yug t _ gginiistun _ ayuqe luteng _ .
nuyagh it _ aghnagh t _ nuyiistun _ ayuqe luteng _ , _ ggute it llu _ lion-et _ gguutngistun _ ayuqe luteng _ .
yugusigh megteggun _ qaltelguftut _ esghaqagh u luteng _ savikenghaagh t _ sakimag iitagh t _ . _ Yaqwghitallu _ sulugtagh llegh it _ llangaqa _ chariot-et _ kuunituqagh t _ sukera lghiit _ pilluwamun _ .
papeg lgu ut _ scorpion-estun _ kaape i kayug meng _ . _ enkaam _ tallimanun _ tanqigh nun _ yug t _ ikfiqe ste ghllag ait _ papeg meggneng _ kapugh luki _ .
umiileg lgu ut _ igleghte te i lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ yaquleg u uq _ esghagh ma ke i ste nga _ asilighneghilnguum _ laawaagh m _ . _ Hebrew-stun _ ategh a _ Abaddon _ , _ Greek-estun _ Apollyon _ , _ ( _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ " _ naafqii sta _ " _ ) _ .
sivuligh _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag _ alpag uq _ , _ taam _ kingu aneng _ paninang _ maalghug _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag k _ pi yaghqaa uk _ .
taagken _ aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ gold-egneng _ aghqefig gneng _ estamaneng _ sighunegh leg gneng _ tekerqamegnekun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivunganilnguuk _ .
Taam _ me m _ aleghqugh aa _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ yaquleg t _ qalghightate te leg _ . _ pi ke aa _ , _ " _ iteme te ki _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ asighqengngalghiit _ kiigwllagegni _ Euphrates-egni _ ! _ "
enkaam _ estamat _ yaquleg t _ iteme tke ai _ . _ yataaghqe kau ut _ tea- mete te _ aflu mun _ , _ aghnegh mun _ , _ tanqigh mun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mun llu _ tuquqiisqelluki _ pingayughqellghi _ yug t _ .
ungipaate aanga _ uglaghtala itneng _ kuuni tgun _ igleghte lghiit _ pilluwaghtet _ , _ 200 _ million-nguftut _ .
esghaghwaagh lleg mkun _ esghagh anka _ kuuni t _ , _ igleghutistengitlu _ . _ sakimag iitagh it _ kenghestun _ kavite ut _ , _ sapphire-estun _ sungaghyukegte ut _ , _ sulphur-estun _ , _ yellow-nguftut _ . _ kuuni t _ naasqwit _ lion-et _ naasqwistun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ qaanghitneng _ aane ut _ kenegh _ , _ agepsugh _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
Taakutgun _ pi nga yu tgun _ naafqii llegh ghllag tgun _ tuqu qugh ait _ pingayughqellghi _ yug t _ . _ kuuni t _ qaanghitneng _ aanleghaate ut _ kenegh _ , _ agepesuq _ , _ sulphur- a _ .
kuuni t _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelguut _ qaanghitnillu _ papeg itni llu _ . _ papeg it _ nemeghyagh stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ naasqugh leg t _ kiitigh qu sagh it _ yug nun _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ yug t _ tuqute llghite kangit _ tamaakut _ naafqii llegh ghllag t _ , _ avuteghqe ma ite ngugh t _ pegte yug ma ite kangit _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh teng _ . _ manigugh nanigh mangite ait _ tughneghagh t _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh t llu _ ulimaagh t _ gold-meng _ , _ silver- meng _ , _ siilu meng _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng llu _ . _ tamaakut _ esghaate yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nagaqugh te yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ , _ nalighmeng _ piyug yaghqaa nghite ngugh t _ .
talwa _ avuteghqe tke ma ite kangit _ yugtagh lleg teng _ , _ alignaghtaagh lleg teng _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te llegh eng _ , _ nalighmeng _ tegleg niigh lleg teng _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ aghtugh igate ghllag _ yaquleg _ uki lghii _ qilag meng _ . _ pilugug nga uq _ qilagwaaghmeng _ , _ naasqwan _ qula ani _ aglu k _ , _ gginagh a _ siqinegh tun _ kuukgute luni _ , _ ighu kek llu _ kumaghugh lghii stun _ pillar-estun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
tugumiiqe ai _ iimgat _ igagh ghhaat _ qelpalnguut _ . _ aghenqignegh t _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ kellii m _ megh an _ qaye akun _ , _ saghumignegh t llu _ itegagh ni _ tuute ste ai _ qute kun _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ akilghuu uq _ lion-em _ uwighhniillghatun _ . _ akilghuu ghllag yan _ maaraghvinlegyaget _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh ut _ .
maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ tengngaagtagh yata _ igaqe naqe yagh anka _ sa meng _ pillghit _ . _ iwernga _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aksaqe ki _ maaghraghvinlegyage t _ kallug t _ sa meng _ pillghit _ , _ igaqe gpenaki _ ! _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ qilag mun _ nengug te ai _ aghenqignegh t _ iigge ni _ ,
akeqe i uq _ kiyaghnegh m _ ategh akun _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ellnga u lghii _ ulimaghikaq _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sa meng llu _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ taakunilngughneng _ . _ yaquleg _ pi uq _ , _ " _ pi lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ .
iwernga _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghighhnaqegkumigu _ qalghightate te ni _ , _ taawa _ kiyaghnegh m _ apeghiigh lleqe a _ uspeqe i lleg ni _ qayvighte ma ite kete ni _ sivugh nghaani _ . _ uspeqe i llegh a _ ataasigh u uq _ aapte qugh a _ qepghaghteminun _ uuknaliqistenun _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqughkagh ma _ me m _ qilag meng _ aleghqugh laatagh aanga _ , _ " _ aglagh luten _ tugu ki _ qelpalnguut _ iimgat _ igagh t _ iigganilnguut _ yaquleg m _ nekevgha lghii m _ kellii kun llu _ qute kun llu _ . _ "
yaquleg mun _ aglagh lunga _ tungsigh anka _ imeg nga lghiit _ igagh ghhaat _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tugu luki _ neghe ki _ ; _ aqsaqugh gpeni _ qugaagte lleqe ut _ iwernga _ qanegh gpeni _ muugate lleqe ut _ honey-stun _ . _ "
yaquleg m _ iiggagh neng _ tugu luki _ iimgat _ igagh ghhaat _ negh anka _ , _ imani _ qanegh mni _ muugate ut _ honey-stun _ . _ iwernga _ tuufte yaqenka _ aqsaqugh ka _ quwaagtaa _ .
taagken _ pi atnga _ , _ " _ allameng _ uuknaliqe tke pestaagh yaghqaqe aten _ yug lghute t _ , _ nunatagh lghute t _ , _ alaaghhiinaat _ ulu lghute t _ , _ umiileg lghute t llu _ . _ "
taagken _ kitum _ ayaviigh lightu aanga _ usputagh sigh ke sqellug qu _ . _ enkaam _ kayagte aanga _ , _ " _ usputagh yaghtugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ , _ aghqefig k llu _ , _ keste naketen llu _ yug t _ maniguute lghiit _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ usputagh gpenaan _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nge an _ court-nga _ eslatagh anite ngughk _ , _ qayughllak _ tuune kau uq _ Gentile-enun _ . _ Tutmaasghaqnaqngwaat _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ forty _ two-ghyagni _ tanqigh ni _ .
ungipaghteke _ pilugug nga lghiik _ sackcloth-meng _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillelelleqagka _ uuknaliqe sqellug kek _ 1,260 _ aghnegh nun _ . _ "
maalghug _ ungipagh tek _ maalghug u uk _ olive-em _ uqfig k _ , _ maalghug u uk llu _ kenegh lghutagh m _ tunemagh kek _ nekevgha lghiik _ sivungagh ni _ Atanghan _ nuna m _ .
enkaam _ kitum _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ , _ qaanghegkeneng _ kenghem _ aane luni _ tuqu qugh lleqe aik _ anguyag ik _ . _ kitum llu _ alngunak _ aqnighte naqutke gkumikek _ taawa _ tuqute yaghqaaghte lleqe uq _ .
Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuk _ qilag a _ eslallugughnaniisqelluku _ uuknaliqellghegkegni _ . _ Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuk _ megh t _ aawughtesqelluki _ . _ Aghtughyaghqaanghillelguuklu _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ikfiqe na lghii neng _ seghleliighllagneng _ , _ awen _ tawaten _ pi aqe lleqe uk _ piyukelleghmegetun _ .
apeghiigh kayek _ ungipagh nghmeng _ , _ asilighneghilngughmeng _ laawaagh meng _ aane lleqe uq _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ Pilluwaghlleqaak _ enkaam _ kayaalqe gkumikek _ tuqu lleqe ak _ .
kemegkwaagh ik _ tamaanllequk _ tume ani _ ne ghllag m _ , _ Atanghita _ qaquuragh vig ani _ . _ taana _ negh ghllag _ ategh ke uq _ Sodom-emengllu _ Egypt-mengllu _ qayughllak _ yug i _ Sodom-eghmiistunllu _ Eygpt-eghmiistunllu _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
yug t _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ , _ ramke neng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ ulu neng _ , _ nunatagh neng llu _ tagi lleqe ut _ esghagh na lukek _ kemegkwaagh ik _ . _ tawaten _ pi lleqe ut _ pi nga yu nun _ aghnegh nun _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ , _ kitum u te llu _ alngunak _ qungugh snanigh lleqe agket _ .
taake uk _ uuknaliqe istek _ ikfiqe ste i ghllag kau lghiik _ nuna m _ yug itnun _ . _ enkaam _ yug t _ quya ghllag lleqe ut _ , _ tunqugh u lleqe ut llu _ tunute yameng _ ila meggnun _ , _ apallugh ke luku _ tuqu llegh gkenun _ .
iwernga _ kingu itneng _ pi nga yu t _ aghnegh t _ aveg lleg ligh luku _ kiyaghnegh m _ aneghnegh ni _ itegh stekagh a _ uuknaliqistegnun _ . _ enkaam _ nekeve yayek _ , _ qamagte luteng _ tamaakut _ esghagh lukek _ alingruugh te ghllag ke aat _ .
taagken _ uuknaliqe istek _ nagaqughaak _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ mayugh tek _ whavek _ ! _ " _ anguyag ik _ esghapag ma luki _ mayugh uk _ qilag mun _ qilawaagh kun _ .
tawani _ pi llegh mi _ qevuute pigte luni _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ ; _ qulaghqellgha _ ne ghllag m _ naave uq _ . _ enkaam _ seven _ thousand _ yuug _ tuqu qugh aa _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag an _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ yaywaasekagh t _ kakavaatagh te ghllag luteng _ usuquughtaat _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ alpag uq _ , _ iwernga _ esghaghte ggu _ pi nga yu a _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag m _ seghleliigh llegh m _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ qalghightate te ni _ qalghigh a _ . _ iglagtu pigte luteng _ me t _ qilag mi _ pi ut _ , _ " _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ nuna m _ ataneghpagulqaaghtaak _ atanegh mta llu _ Christ-anganllu _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ igleghte te i lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luku _ siivanllegh t _ aqumga lghiit _ umiileg u sigh tgun _ aqumutagh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sivungagh ni _ , _ gginagh teng _ sekete luki _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ .
pi ke aat _ : _ " _ iyamsiqa yug vike amken _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ maaten _ , _ iiwleng llu _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ tugu magh an _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite llegh ghllag n _ enkaam _ piinligh uten _ igleghutimun _ .
nuna m _ yug i _ sakrite ghllag ut _ , _ iwernga _ maaten _ sakraa lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ . _ tuqukagh t _ nanqigte yaghqaaghte ut _ . _ akileghtugh yaghqaaghte aten _ qepghaghteten _ uuknaliqistet _ , _ agleghnagh lghiit _ yug ten _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ sii vag ke igh lghiit _ elpeneng _ , _ ukavanlenguutlu _ apeghseghugh t llu _ . _ tuqu qu lleghqagh n _ kaa tuq _ tamaakunun _ tuqu quqagh neng _ yug neng _ nuna mi _ . _ "
taagken _ kiyaghnegh m _ temple- nga _ qilag mete ngughk _ qelpate uq _ . _ tawani _ temple- nga ni _ esghagh agka _ ark- ek _ kiyaghnegh m _ Covenant-elghutakek _ . _ taagken _ nighwaagpagtagh uk _ , _ eftughtagh uk _ , _ tengngaagtagh uk llu _ kallug k _ ; _ nuna _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ , _ kaftekrag ughte ghllag aa llu _ !
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ : _ aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ siqi nghmeng _ , _ itegagh i _ tanqigh kun _ nekegte luteng _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lug ni _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ighaleqetaagh neng _ .
qumig lgu uq _ , _ ighniyugem _ aqnighqellug qu _ lliigh aa _ , _ aane aqe llegh an _ taghnughhagh m _ aragh qugh a _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ sa u a _ ila a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ aliigh uq _ liigike sighqagh ut _ apeghiigh naqe lghii mun _ : _ taawa _ kavite ngughk _ dragon-eghllak _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ , _ qula _ sighunegh leg _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ naasqwi _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ .
papeg mineng _ saqipeg te ai _ nuna mun _ pingayughqellghi _ qilaga m _ ighaleqetaagh i _ . _ taagken _ dragon-a _ nekevekagh _ manu akun _ aghnagh m _ negh na luku _ taghnughhagh a _ ighni i ghesnagh kagu _ .
aghnagh _ ighnegh nge uq _ , _ igleghte te yaghqagh i _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nuna m _ yug i _ iron-meng _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ iwernga _ aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh a _ akuqagh luku _ aglagh te aat _ kiyaghnegh mun _ , _ umiileg u sigh gkenun llu _ aqumutagh gnun _ .
aghnagh _ qimag uq _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ kiyaghnegh m _ yataaghqe te kaqe kanga _ nekaghqagh meng _ , _ aflengake yaghqaqe kangat _ 1,260 _ aghnegh t _ .
taagken _ qilag mi _ pillugute ut _ . _ Michael-enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ pilluwaghaat _ dragon-a _ . _ Dragon-enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ pilluwaghiit _ Michael-enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ ,
iwernga _ Michael-enkut _ kayaalqe aat _ dragon-a _ . _ enkaam _ dragon-enkut _ yaquleg ke te lghiit _ qilag mete yaghqaa nanigh ut _ .
qilag meng _ miluute aat _ dragon-eghllak _ . _ ( _ neghightagh lug _ nemeghyagh _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ nalighmeng _ tughneghagh _ , _ puughqughtenga _ nuna m _ yug an _ . _ ) _ miluute aat _ nuna mun _ yaqulegtuumagh an _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu luni _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ whaa _ kaate ma ut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yuguligh i llegh a _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ , _ ataneghpag u llegh a llu _ , _ Christ-anganllu _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ . _ salin _ tughneghagh _ miluute llghite luku _ qilag meng _ , _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ anaggute nga na iqe ai _ ugpeqaalguteput _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Ugpeqaalgutemta _ kayaalqe ma ut _ aaw akun _ Penniighaghaam _ , _ ungipagh ke llegh megteggun llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ ipapighqellgha _ . _ talwa _ tuqu yagh ghngaaghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ Christ-a _ apallugh ke luku _ .
enkaam _ qamagte lusi _ kiyaghte lghii ni _ qilag mi _ , _ quya te ghllag tek _ ! _ iwernga _ seghleghwaaghunaqnguusi _ nunamelngughnillu _ kelliinilngughnillu _ ! _ tughneghagh m _ ukig vike ma aisi _ , _ sakrite ghllagu uq _ qayughllak _ liisimake a _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghtugh uq _ . _ "
Dragon-em _ liigike yamigu _ nuna mun _ miluute lleg ni _ , _ malighqagh aa _ aghnagh _ ighnegh ngekagh _ .
iwernga _ aghnagh _ tuunekagh at _ qawaagpag ghrugllag m _ yaqugh gkeneng _ tengaa sqellug qu _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tamaani _ paqniite lleqe uq _ nemegh yameng _ , _ aflengake lleqe aat llu _ pi nga yu t _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ aghvinleg _ tanqigh t _ ilate luki _ .
taagken _ nemeghyagh m _ ughyugh te a _ megh _ kiiw stun _ ayuqe lghii _ aghnagh _ maaqute sqellug qu _ .
iwernga _ nuna m _ kayusiite a _ aghnagh _ . _ nuna m _ agitaghte te luku _ tuufte a _ megh ghllag _ dragon-em _ ughyugh tke a _ .
taagken _ dragon-em _ ugumi yagute ghllag luku _ aghnagh _ , _ enkaam _ pilluwaghyaghtughii _ qamagte luki _ ila i _ kingunghi _ . _ Tamaakunguut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh itnun _ , _ ataasiighmelnguutlu _ ipalleghmun _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ Jesus-em _ .
taagken _ dragon-a _ nekeve uq _ kellii m _ esnagh akun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ teghikusalluuk _ aane lghii _ kellii meng _ . _ qula u ut _ sighunghi _ , _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh leg _ . _ qamagte luteng _ sighunghi _ qaghpa lgutu te ut _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ naasqugh t _ igaqugh vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ seghlequulghiimeng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
taana _ teghikusalluuk _ leopard-esugnituq _ , _ itegagh i _ kaynge m _ itegagh atun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ qaangha _ lion-em _ qaanghatun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ Dragon-em _ tuune a _ teghikusalluuk _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghmineng _ , _ umiileg u sigh gmineng _ aqumutagh gneng _ , _ igleghte te i yaghqaaghte sta llu _ ategh ni _ atuqe luku _ .
ataasigh _ naasqwa _ teghikusalluugem _ tuqute sug ni tke aq _ kiitigh luni _ , _ iwernga _ taana _ kii yagh llegh a _ maame kau uq _ . _ Iingunaghhaghmeng _ nuna m _ yug ita _ saghiigha yagute luku _ maligte aat _ teghikusalluuk _ .
qamagte luteng _ yug t _ manigugh aat _ dragon-a _ qayughllak _ teghikusalluugmun _ tuune kanga _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleni _ . _ manigugh aat llu _ teghikusalluuk _ , _ pi ut _ , _ " _ kina ngam _ teghikusalluugtun _ ayuqe a _ ? _ kitum ngam _ pilluwaghlleqagu _ ? _ "
taagken _ teghikusalluuk _ akuzi yaghqaaghte uq _ . _ aangaayugte ghllag uq _ , _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te llu _ akuzi tke a _ kiyaghnegh _ . _ Aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luni _ 42-nun _ tanqigh nun _ .
piinligh aa _ seghlegh pestaaghtu te _ akuzi tke i lleg ni _ kiyaghnegh meng _ , _ ategh aneng _ , _ kiyaghfig aneng _ , _ tamaakunengllu _ kiyaghte lghii neng _ qilag mi _ .
Aghtughyaghqaanghillelitaa _ pilluwiisqelluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ kayaalqesqellukillu _ . _ igleghte te yaghqaaghte ste ai _ qamagte luki _ ramke t _ , _ yug t _ , _ ulu t _ , _ nunataanilnguutlu _ yug t _ .
qamagte luni _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii m _ manigugh lleqe aat _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ iwernga _ tamaakut _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ manigugh naanghite aat _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ igaqe kaqe ai _ ategh it _ nuna ngllagh llghite luni _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ pi ke ai _ Penniighaghaam _ , _ yug t _ tuqu tke ai ta _ .
" _ nagate tek _ , _ sigute lgu kufsi _ :
kina _ alngunak _ tugu yaghqaa kuni _ , _ tugu lleqe aat _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ tuqute yaghqaa kuni _ savigpag kun _ , _ tuqu lleqe aat _ savigpag kun _ . _ taake uk _ whaten _ pi sigh u uk _ : _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu yaghqaa ut llu _ ugpeqe i lleg lgu yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ teghikusalluuk _ nuna meng _ aane lghii _ . _ maalghug gneng _ sighunegh lgu uq _ penniighaghaam _ sighunghatun _ , _ akuzi uq llu _ dragon-etun _ .
sivuligh _ teghikusalluuk _ tawanlluku _ tunglighhaan _ teghikusalluugem _ atuqe a _ qamagte luku _ aghtughyaghqaanghillgha _ . _ taaggun _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleghqun _ maniguute ste ai _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ sivuligh mun _ teghikusalluugmun _ . _ ( _ kii yagh llegh an _ tuqute sug ni tke a _ , _ iwernga _ kii yagh llegh a _ maamekagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ teghikusalluuk _ allaaghlluwhaghtighllagaataghtuq _ , _ talwa _ qilag meng _ nuna mun _ kenegh _ ukig ste a _ yug t _ esghaamanghitni _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a _ teghikusalluuk _ aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq _ allaaghlluwaghtiyaghqaaluni _ tawantellghani _ sivuligh m _ teghikusalluugem _ . _ tamaagun _ allaaghlluwhaghtilleghteggun _ puughte ai _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ kiyaghte lghiit _ nuna mi _ . _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ nangaghnenglliisqelluki _ quulviisqelluku _ sivuligh _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ ( _ taana _ tuqute kaayagh lghii _ savigpag kun _ iwernga _ unguvaqagh _ . _ )
tuungligh ghhagh a _ teghikusalluuk _ aghtughyaghqaanghillenguq _ aneghnegh nge ste i yaghqaa luni _ unguvallegh meng _ nangaghnegh anun _ teghikusalluugem _ . _ enkaam _ nangaghnegh _ akuziyaqlegughtuq _ . _ taagken _ nangaghnegh m _ qelegh ai _ yug t _ tuquqiisqelluki _ tamaakut _ maniguute yu nghite ngugh t _ ellmi nun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ teghikusalluugem _ nalluniigh ta ii sqe ai _ number-meng _ qamagte luki _ yug t _ aghenqignegh itgun _ iiggitgun _ nalighmeng _ qagugh itgun _ . _ tawaten _ qelegh ai _ aangwaaghughngaata _ , _ ukavansaghngaata _ , _ aklungiteghngaata _ , _ aklumaghngaata _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghunghiteghngaata _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghughngaata _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tukfigh i yaghqaa nghite uq _ nalighmeng _ akike i yaghqaa nghite uq _ wetku qun _ nalluniigh lleg lgu kuni _ . _ taana _ nalluniigh lleg ke te aq _ teghikusalluugem _ ategh ke a _ nalighmeng _ ategh an _ number-kaa _ .
peghqinellegh leg m _ liigike naagh aa _ una _ . _ sumeghtaghagh llegh mikun _ liigike lleqe a _ sa meng _ pi sagh ite anga _ teghikusalluugem _ number-nga _ . _ taana _ number-a _ yug mun _ ategh u uq _ , _ 666-nguuq _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ nekevgha lghii _ naayghagh mi _ Zion-mi _ . _ ellngan ite u te ut _ 144,000 _ yug t _ , _ qagugh megteggun _ igaqe vikekagh t _ ategh aneng _ , _ ata an llu _ ategh aneng _ .
nagaqugh aqa llu _ me _ qilag meng _ . _ nagate kau luni _ llangaqa _ qalla atun _ meghllag t _ , _ tengngaag atun llu _ kallug m _ . _ nagate kaqe a _ me _ llangaqa _ harp-estet _ ayngananga te lghii stun _ harp-etgun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
144,000 _ yug t _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh m _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ , _ elder-etlu _ . _ taakut _ yug t _ ilagagh aqe ut _ ilagaateghraghaghmeng _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ taana _ ilagaate _ liite yaghqaqe nghite kanga _ iwerngaqun _ 144,000 _ yug t _ . _ Ellnginguut _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugulikii _ qungangitneng _ nuna m _ yug aneng _ .
taakut _ yug t _ nukeggnaghqe ma ite ngugh u ut _ aghnagh meng _ atuqe i llegh kun _ . _ maligte aqe aat _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ navek _ alngunak _ pi nghaani _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ yugulikaqii _ akule itneng _ nuna m _ yug an _ , _ tunusagh ke yuwhaagh u ut _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ Penniighaghaghmunllu _ .
iqlengiqe igate u aghte ut _ . _ apallugh ite ut _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ tengaa lghii _ quulvaghpani _ . _ apegh ai _ kenle ite ngugh t _ pinigh lghiit _ ungipagh t _ nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghii nun _ , _ tea- ma ghhagh itnun _ nunataanilngughnun _ yug nun _ , _ ramke nun _ , _ ulu nun _ , _ yug nun llu _ .
iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ alike teggu _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ usuqe teggu _ aange llegh ghllag a _ ! _ yug neng _ nanqigte i lleghqagh a _ kaawtu uq _ . _ manigugh teggu _ ulimaghikaq _ qilaga meng _ , _ nuna meng _ , _ kellii neng _ , _ sengngugh lghii neng llu _ megh neng _ ! _ "
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ maligte a _ sivuligh _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ Babylon-eghllak _ naavuma uq _ ! _ Babylon-em _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ sex-meng _ wine-etun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ wine- mineng _ megheg squgh igh a _ qamagte luki _ nuna m _ yug i _ , _ enkaam _ ellngit a llu _ seghletun _ sex _ atuqe yagute aat _ . _ enkaam _ tawaten _ pi llegh megteggun _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aghyuugh ste lleqe ut _ . _ "
pi nga yu ak _ yaquleg m _ maligte te uq _ sivuligh gnun _ . _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kitum _ alngunak _ manigugh kunigu _ teghikusalluuk _ , _ nangaghnegh a llu _ , _ allgeghsimakumigullu _ nalluniigh llegh _ qagugh mikun _ nalighmeng _ iigge mikun
megh yaghqaqe a _ wine- nga _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh an _ . _ taana _ wine- a _ me ligh ma ite ngughk _ kuuvekagh _ qayuusigh mun _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ke a _ ! _ kina _ alngunak _ manigugh tke aq _ taakugnun _ ikfiqe ghllag yaghqaa uq _ kenegh mi llu _ , _ sulphur- mi llu _ , _ sivu itni _ agleghnagh lghiit llu _ yaquleg t _ , _ Penniighaghaamllu _ .
Kenghem _ ikfiqe ste ghllag lleqe ai _ , _ agepsugh a _ mayugh lleqe uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ . _ ikfiqe nanigh naanghite ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtu magh an _ , _ maniguute kau te meggneng _ teghikusalluugmun _ , _ nangaghnegh anun _ , _ nalluniigh kau te meggneng llu _ ategh aneng _ . _ "
tamaakut _ qamagte luteng _ whaten _ pi sigh u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ nuqete neghtu pestaagh yaghqaa ut _ . _ Tamaakunguut _ qaatke te nga lghiit _ kiyaghnegh m _ qelegh sagh anun _ , _ ataasiighmete luteng llu _ Jesus-mun _ .
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ qilag meng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ igaqe gu _ una _ : _ whaken _ kenle ke luku _ quya saghqagh u ut _ tuqu yaghqagh t _ qepghagh te ma luku _ atanegh _ ! _ " _ taghneghagh k _ pi uk _ , _ " _ quyanagh pestaagh ut _ ! _ meghnaali lleqe ut _ ughleghiigh llegh meggneng _ , _ yug t _ neqamike lleqe ait _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh it _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ qilag u aq _ , _ qilawaghqun _ aqumga uq _ llangaqa _ ighnegh a _ yug m _ . _ naasqugh mikun _ gold-meng _ qaghpa lgu uq _ , _ tugumiiqe a llu _ ipeg lghii _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ aqumga lghii _ qilagwaaghmi _ , _ " _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig n _ atuqe luku _ unatagh a _ , _ qayughllak _ unatagh lleghqagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuna m _ piite stekagh a _ unataghyaghqaaghtengnguuq _ ! _ "
enkaam _ qilawaagh mi _ aqumga lghii m _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ unatagh sigh ke a _ nuna mun _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ temple- meng _ qilag mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ ipeg lghii meng _ pakregmelngughmeng _ savig lgu uq _ .
taagken _ ila a _ yaquleg _ aane uq _ aghqefig gneng _ aflengake i ste nga _ kenghan _ aghqefig m _ . _ akilghuu ghllag aa _ yaquleg _ ipeg lghii meng _ pakregmelngughmeng _ savileg _ , _ " _ savig gpeneng _ kepugh ki _ grapes-et _ nuna m _ vine-nganeng _ , _ qayughllak _ grapes-et _ qigumaat _ ! _ "
enkaam _ yagulgem _ pakreg mete ngughk _ savig ni _ saqipeg te a _ nuna mun _ , _ kepugh ai _ grapes-et _ nuna m _ vine-nganeng _ . _ taagken _ miluqutagh ke ai _ grapes-em _ qageghqugh sigh ghllag anun _ . _ Taananguuq _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakrite vig ghllag a _ .
grapes- mun _ qageghqugh sigh k _ eslataanilnguuk _ ne ghllag m _ . _ Grapes-et _ qageghqugh yalghiimeng _ aawk _ maaqe uq _ qageghqugh sigh neng _ 180 _ miles _ tagtale kellug qu _ , _ 5 _ feet _ uusqaghtu lleg kellug qu _ .
taagken _ qilaga mi _ aliigh uq _ sa u a _ saghiigha nagh pigte lghii _ liisimake sighqagh ut _ pi yaghqagh mun _ . _ taawa _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ tagite i lghiit _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ taakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ taaqe niite tke ai _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kellaag igh te yu gnite ngughk _ meghraag kegte aq _ siqinwaaghestun _ , _ akume nga lghii _ kenegh meng _ . _ esghagh anka llu _ kayaalqe i ikagh t _ teghikusalluugmeng _ , _ nangaghnegh aneng _ , _ ategh an llu _ number-nganeng _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ saaghwaghni _ kellii m _ , _ harp-elightuulluteng _ kiyaghnegh m _ tuune ke ii te neng _ ellngit nun _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ ilagagh ta aneng _ Moses-em _ , _ ( _ kiyaghnegh m _ qepghaghtenga _ ) _ , _ ilagagh ta aneng llu _ Penniighaghaam _ : _ " _ kaay _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ghllag _ , _ qepghagh llegh ten _ seghlegh ghllag u ut _ , _ allaaghlluwhaghllaguut _ ! _ kaay _ , _ umiileg at _ nuna m _ yug ita _ , _ elpek _ sa llegh ten _ elqughute nga ut llu _ ipa u ut llu _ !
atanegh _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ yug t _ alike lleqe aaten _ , _ quulvaghlleqaatlu _ ategh n _ ! _ Ellnginaaguten _ agleghnagh lghii _ ! _ Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ nunatagh t _ manigugh yaghtugh lleqe aaten _ , _ qayughllak _ liisimake kangat _ nanqigte i llegh ten _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ ! _ "
Taam _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ qilag mi _ qelpeghtegkangat _ temple- a _ . _ ( _ agleghnagh lleghpigagh u uq _ na _ , _ ellnga n _ yug ita _ liisimake sigh ke aat _ kiyaghnegh _ tawanniluku _ . _ )
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ aanleghaate ut _ temple- meng _ kelqelluteng _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ . _ tamaghhagh meng _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ nighugh lghii meng _ , _ sakimag megteggun _ gold-meng _ tafsi luteng _ .
taagken _ ataasigh m _ unguva lghii m _ estamaneng _ taakuneng _ , _ gold-meng _ sagneliqughii _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ . _ taakut _ sagnegh t _ imigh nga ut _ sakraalleghllaaganeng _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ kiyaghte lghii _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
Temple-em _ ilu a _ agepsughqaagaa _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqellghanengllu _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghillghanengllu _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ itegh naanghite uq _ temple- mun _ kenlanga _ maaghraghvinleg _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ kenletghuutellghitnun _ , _ tagi tke ait _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ .
taagken _ temple- meng _ nagaqugh aqa _ iglagtu lghii _ me _ , _ ungipaate kangi _ maaghraghvinleg _ yaquleg t _ , _ " _ kuuve yaghtugh teki _ nuna mun _ maaghraghvinleg _ sagnegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ sakraa llegh ghllag i _ ! _ "
enkaam _ sivuligh m _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve yaghtugh aa _ nuna mun _ . _ taagken _ seghlegh pestaagh ghllag t _ aqnighnagh pigte lghiit _ pupig t _ piitquutut _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh nun _ teghikusalluugmeng _ . _ Tamaakunguut _ manigugh tke aat _ nangaghnegh anun _ .
tuungligh ghhagh n _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kellii nun _ . _ taagken _ kellaag igh a _ aaw atun _ tuqukagh m _ yug m _ lliigh luni _ , _ enkaam _ qamagte luteng _ unguva lghiit _ kellii ni _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
pingayut ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kiigwnunllu _ , _ sengngugh nun llu _ megh nun _ enkaam _ aaw ughte uute ut _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ igleghte te i lghii _ megh neng _ yaquleg _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ kaay _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ elpenguuq _ maaten _ kiyaghte lghii _ , _ elpenguuq _ quunpeng _ kiyaghte lghii _ ! _ nanqigte i llegh ten llu _ aghyuugh i llegh ten llu _ elqughute nga ut _ .
yug t _ tuqu qugh kaqe ait _ yug ten _ , _ uuknaliqistetenllu _ , _ enkaam _ meghyaghqalitaten _ aaw meng _ . _ tawaten _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luteng _ ellmeggneng _ allgeghtekaqaat _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ aghqefig gneng _ me _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ aa-a _ atanegh _ , _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ ! _ ipa u ut llu _ elqughute nga ut llu _ nanqigte i lleghqagh ten _ ! _ "
estamat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ saghneni _ kuuve a _ siqinegh kun _ enkaam _ kiyaghnegh m _ siqinghem _ kenghanun _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ .
Siqinghem _ uguqnagh ghllag an _ panegh ste ai _ yug t _ . _ enkaam _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ ategh a _ kiyaghnegh m _ , _ igleghte te i ste u ta aneng _ tamaavek _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag nun _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ , _ usuqe nghite aat llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ aange llegh ghllag a _ .
tallimat ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ teghikusalluugem _ umu i lgute ziin _ aqumutagh gkenkun _ , _ enkaam _ ataneghpag u llegh a _ mamleghqwaagaa _ . _ yug t _ ikfiqem _ ulu teng _ amqeghqugh ait _ .
sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh a _ qilag m _ apallugh ke luku _ aqnighqe llegh meggneng llu _ pupigtaa llegh meggneng llu _ . _ avuteghqe nghite ut llu _ seghletun _ pi llegh meggneng _ .
aghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ kiiwllagegnun _ Euphrates-egnun _ . _ kiiw k _ pategh uk _ yataaghqe te na luki _ tume kaghqagh meng _ umiileg t _ tagi lghiit _ asivaghmeng _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ pi nga yu t _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ frog-esugnilnguut _ . _ aane ut _ qaanghitneng _ dragon-em _ , _ teghikusalluugem _ , _ uuknaliqistesighwaaghemllu _ .
taakut _ tughneghagh t _ allaaghlluwhaghtikayuguftut _ . _ aghulaqe ut _ umiileg itnun _ nunatagh ghhagh n _ tamaghhagh an _ qerngughte na luki _ pilluwamun _ aghnegh ghllag ani _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atanegh _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate aghte tek _ ! _ tagi u unga _ tegleg nigh ughtetu te _ ! _ quyanagh uq _ teghhumalghii _ , _ aatkagh ni _ piiftengngwaaghluki _ ayuqe kangi _ . _ enkaam _ igleghte naanghite uq _ amsikagh mi _ , _ kayngusaghagh te naanghite uq llu _ tesqagani _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ ! _ "
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ qerngughte ait _ umiileg t _ Armageddon-mun _ . _ tawaten _ Hebrew-ghmiistun _ atigh llegh a _ ayuqe uq _ .
taagken _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta ita _ yaquleg m _ sagnegh ni _ kuuve a _ esla kun _ . _ temple- mi _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ iglagtu pigte luni _ me _ pi uq _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ "
taawa _ nighwaagpagtagh uq _ , _ tengngaagtagh uq _ , _ ka lli tuq _ , _ nuna llu _ ufsug te ghllag uq _ . _ taana _ nuna m _ ufsug te llegh ghllag a _ seghlelleghpigaaguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ yungllaghyuggallghaneng _ .
negh ghllag _ pellegh uq _ pingayughqelluni _ . _ nuna t llu _ ne ghllag it _ qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ naave uute ut _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ Babylon-eghllagem _ seghleghqe llegh i _ . _ enkaam _ megh sta _ wine- a _ qayuusigh mete ngughk _ sakrite llegh ghllag mineng _ imaqe lghii _ .
qamagte luteng _ qiighqagh t _ aviighute uute ut _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ naayghagh t _ kaave uute ut _ .
kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ 100 _ uqigtutka vzigh lghiit _ qilaga meng _ ifkagh qu uute ut _ yug nun _ . _ enkaam _ tamaakut _ yug t _ sa ngugh ughte ghllag aat _ kiyaghnegh _ apallugh ke luki _ kaftekrag ghrugllag t _ . _ taana _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag _ seghlegh pigu lghii _ .
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ , _ taakuneng _ ataasigh m _ taku lunga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ aghyuugh lleghqagh aneng _ apeghseghuum _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ , _ aqumga lghii _ meghllag tgun _ .
nuna m _ umiileg i _ seghleghqe aqe ut _ atuqe aqe luku _ aghnagh _ . _ seghlegh t _ atuqe i ste i llegh i _ wine-etun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ enkaam _ nuna m _ yug i _ suume aqe ut _ megh nghmegteggu _ wine- nga _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ Taghneghagnekun _ aglagh te aanga _ kilgaa nun _ . _ tawani _ esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ aqumga lghii _ kavirrakegtagh kun _ teghikusalluugkun _ . _ Teghikusalluuk _ igaqugh vike nga uq _ uzimun _ sa ngugh ughte sigh neng _ ategh neng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ . _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh lgu uq _ , _ qule u ut llu _ sighunghi _ .
aghnagh _ pilugug nga uq _ esneyaagh meng llu _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ enkaam _ ullngaqluni _ gold-meng _ , _ akitughllagmeng _ uyghag meng _ , _ pearl-mengllu _ . _ tugumiiqe a _ gold-a _ qayuusigh _ esleqnga lghii _ seghleghnalghiineng _ kiyaghtaalleghneng _ , _ nukeggnagh lghii neng llu _ sex-kun _ seghleghqe llegh aneng _ .
qawaag ni _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ qayvighte ma ite ngughk _ whaten _ pi sigh _ , _ apeghseghugh _ Babylon _ , _ naa ke aat _ yugusigh meggneng _ akike i kayug t _ aghnagh t _ , _ seghleghnallghanengllu _ nuna m _ .
esghagh aqa _ aghnagh _ suume lghii _ aaw itneng _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ , _ aaw itneng llu _ tuqu quqagh t _ qayughllak _ ataasiighmelnguut _ Jesus-mun _ . _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh _ saghiigha yug ghllag unga _ .
iwernga _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ sangavek _ saghiigha yug ziin _ ? _ ungipaate naqe amken _ qayvighte ma ite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi sigh u te kek _ aghnaa nkuk _ , _ teghikusalluugenkuk _ . _ taana _ teghikusalluuk _ igleghte te i lghii _ aghnagh meng _ , _ naasqugh lgu uq _ maaghraghvinleg _ , _ sighunegh lgu uq llu _ qula _ .
Teghikusalluuk _ esghagh kan _ unguva yagh lghii u uq _ , _ iwernga _ tuqu kau uq _ . _ mayugh lleqe uq _ Saamnangilngughmeng _ Laagwaaghmeng _ naafqe lleg nge na luni _ . _ yug lgu uq _ nuna mi _ ategh it _ igaqe llghite ngugh t _ igagh itgun _ unguvallegh m _ nuna _ piinligh llghite luku _ . _ tamaakut _ yug t _ esghagh kumegteggu _ teghikusalluuk _ saghiigha yug lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ unguva yagh lghii _ , _ tuqukagh _ iwernga _ tagi yaghqagh _ .
" _ sumeghtaghagh yuqagh m _ liigike lleqe a _ una _ : _ maaghraghvinleg _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut _ qemi t _ aghnagh m _ aqumga vig i _ .
taakut _ naasqugh t _ maaghraghvinleg u ut llu _ umiileg t _ . _ tallimat _ tuqu kau ut _ , _ ataasigh _ igleghte te i u uq _ , _ enkaam _ ataasigh _ salin _ tagi igate uq _ . _ tagi kuni _ igleghte te i yaghqaa uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
Teghikusalluuk _ unguva yagh lghii _ iwernga _ tuqukagh _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite u uq _ umiileg _ . _ taana _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu liite a _ umiileg _ ila ke aat _ sivuligh t _ maaghraghvinleg _ umiileg t _ , _ naafqe lleg nge yaghtugh u uq _ .
" _ esghaghkagh ten _ qula _ sighunghet _ , _ qula u ut _ umiileg t _ salin _ igleghte te i igate ut _ . _ iwernga _ aghtughyaghqaanghillengellequt _ igleghte te i yaghqaa luteng _ ataasigh _ aflu _ maligte te luteng _ teghikusalluugmun _ .
taakut _ ataasigh _ umyugagh ke luku _ tuune lleqe ait _ teghikusalluugmun _ aghtughyaghqaanghilletengllu _ pi lleghqagh teng llu _ .
enkaam _ pilluwaghlleqaat _ pennagh ii aghagh aq _ . _ iwernga _ Penniighaghaam _ kayaalqe lleqe ai _ qayughllak _ atanegh ke kangat _ atanghet _ , _ umiileg ke kangat llu _ umiileg t _ . _ Penniighaghaghmelnguut _ tuqlugh kau ut _ , _ nakmike kau ut _ , _ ataasiighmelnguugutlu _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ esghagh aten _ megh t _ aghnagh m _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug m _ aqumga vig i _ . _ taakut _ megh t _ yug lghute ghllag u ut _ nunatagh ghhagh aneng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ pi u ut _ , _ ulu ke lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
esghaghkagh gpek _ qula _ sighunghet _ , _ teghikusalluugemllu _ , _ ugumiite lleqe aat _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ . _ Saqraggiighulluku _ , _ amsiqaghqelluku _ , _ kemeg a _ negh luku _ , _ taagken _ siipnegh a _ kumagh lleqe aat _ .
taakut _ qula _ sighunghet _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ ellngit nun _ atuqe stekaqe a _ piyuke lleg ni _ . _ angeghqe ma te kau ut llu _ tuunaluki _ ataneghpag u lleg teng _ teghikusalluugmun _ . _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ kenlanga _ kiyaghnegh m _ piyuke llegh a _ apeghiigh llegh anun _ .
taana _ aghnagh _ esghagh kan _ negh ghllagu uq _ igleghte te i lghii _ umiileg itneng _ nuna t _ . _ "
Taam _ kingu aneng _ esghagh aqa _ ila a _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ . _ Aghtughyaghqaanghillelegllaguftuq _ , _ nighughqelleghmineng _ iingunaghhaan _ nuna _ nighugte a _ .
akilghuu ghllag uq _ , _ " _ naavuma uq _ ! _ naavuma uq _ Babylon-eghllak _ ! _ nekagh ughte ma ut _ tughneghagh t _ , _ nukeggnagh lghiit _ tughneghagh t _ , _ ukmangite nghite ngugh t _ kusge nagh lghiit _ qawaag t _ .
Babylon-em _ seghletun _ atuqe i llegh a _ sex-meng _ wine-etun _ ayuqe uq _ , _ nunataghhan _ tamaghhagh an _ meghe a _ . _ nuna m _ umiileg ita _ atuqe aqe aat _ , _ nuna m llu _ akilpegaghtengita _ aklungi igh i sigh ke u aat _ nuqete saghqagh u nghite ngugh qun _ sex-kun _ atuqe i yu llegh akun _ . _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh aqa _ ila a _ me _ qilag meng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ yug mni _ , _ aanleghaate tek _ Babylon-meng _ ! _ ilate gpenasi _ seghleghqe llegh anun _ aghyuullengnayukafsi _ ellnga nun _ maligte te lusi _ .
seghleghqe llegh i _ may- ughte ghllag nga ut _ uusqaghtutkaghmeng _ qilag tun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqamike ai _ seghleghqe llegh i _ .
seghletun _ pi teggu _ Babylon _ katam _ ellnga n _ seghletun _ pillghatun _ . _ malghughqellug qu _ seghletun _ pillgha _ pi teggu _ . _ qayuusigh akun _ kuuve teggu _ wine- a _ iknaqetulnga _ malghughqengngaan _ ellnga n _ atuqe aqe ka aneng _ .
ellmi neng _ usuqe ghllag aqe uq _ , _ aklungi ghllag ni llu _ atuqe aqe a _ sa mun _ alngunak _ piyukekagh minun _ . _ enkaam _ ikfiqe ste ghllag teggu llu _ qivghu ste ghllag teggu llu _ atunekiite ste luku _ qaghya llegh ghllag anun _ . _ ellmi neng _ pi aqe uq _ , _ ' _ queen- ngugh u nga _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh mkun _ . _ ugingighagh u nghite unga _ enkaam _ qivghu naanghite u aghte unga _ ! _ '
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aghnegh ghhagh inagh mi _ kaate lleqe a _ tuqu llegh m _ , _ qivghu llegh m _ , _ negh ke igh sag ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ kenghem _ panegh lleqe a _ qayughllak _ aghyuugh i ste nga _ , _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aghtugh yaghqaa nghite ghllag uq _ . _ "
nuna m _ umiileg i _ ila tke aat _ atuqe i llegh anun llu _ qiliigh yug llegh anun llu _ , _ esghagh kumegteggu _ agepsugh a _ panellegh an _ qiya kete lleqe aat _ , _ iglagtu pigte luteng llu _ qiya ke ghllagte lleqe aat _ .
Uyavanlluteng _ nekeve lleqe ut _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ellmeng llu _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ ! _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ elpek _ aange ghllag _ aghtugh igate ngughk _ negh ghllag _ , _ Babylon _ ! _ aghyuugh lleg nge uten _ ataasigh ghhagh mi _ aflu mi _ ! _ "
nuna m _ akilpegaghtengita _ qiyaaghwagh tke aat _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ kitum _ alngunak _ tukfigh nanigh kangit _ saghya it _ .
Babylon-mi _ akilpegaghtet _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ gold-et _ , _ silver-et _ , _ akitu ghllaget _ uyghag t _ , _ pearl-etlu _ ; _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ qiipaghaghqagh t _ ulimaagh t _ linen- meng _ , _ silk- meng _ , _ qiipaghaghqagh t llu _ iqeghte aqe lghiit _ esneg yagh u aaghet _ , _ kavirrakegtagh t llu _ . _ aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ unaghsigh t _ , _ ulimaagh t _ naangqugh neng _ , _ akitughllagneng _ unaghsigh neng _ , _ siilu neng _ , _ savikenghaagneng _ , _ marble-enengllu _ .
aki kaqsagh kangit llu _ cinnamon-et _ , _ spice-et _ , _ incense-et _ , _ myrrh-et _ , _ frankincense-et _ ; _ wine-et _ , _ olive-em _ mesiigh i _ ; _ avlawa t _ , _ wheat-et _ ; _ cattle-et _ , _ penniigh t _ , _ kuuni t _ , _ wagon-et _ ; _ talwa _ yug t _ aki kaqsagh kangit _ qepghaghtelaaghuluki _ .
Akilpegaghtet _ Babylon _ pi lleqe aat _ , _ " _ qamagte luteng _ pinigh lghiit _ allgeghsukeghllakaghten _ aviighute ut _ . _ qamagte luteng llu _ aklungi ghllag ten _ qelmegh ghllaget _ aviighute ut _ , _ allameng llu _ allgeghsaghqagh u nanigh aten _ ! _ "
Akilpegaghtet _ aklungi igh ikagh t _ akike i luteng _ Babylon-mun _ , _ nekevgha lleqe ut _ uyavanlluteng _ qayughllak _ alinge lghiit _ ilate na yukagh meng _ ikfiqe llegh anun _ . _ qiya lleqe ut _ qivghu ghllag magh meng _ ,
whaten llu _ pi lleqe ut _ , _ " _ ' _ Seghleghwaaghuuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaaghuuq _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aate kayugu yagh uq _ linen- meng _ , _ esneyaagh meng _ , _ kavirrakegtagh meng llu _ , _ ullngaqegkayuguyaghtuqlu _ gold-meng _ , _ akitughllagmeng _ uyghag meng _ , _ pearl-mengllu _ !
ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ " _ qamagte luteng _ angyaleg t _ , _ yug it _ , _ passenger-ngit _ , _ akilpegaghtetlu _ iglegha kayug t _ angyaghpag tgun _ allgegh te na luteng _ kiyaghusighqameggneng _ , _ angyaghpag it _ aghula i iqe aat _ uyavanlluteng _ Babylon-meng _ kumagh aqngan _ .
esghagh luku _ agepsugh a _ kumagh llegh an _ , _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ alla _ ne ghllag ite uq _ whatelngughmeng _ ! _ '
naasqugh teng _ pagula lightugh ait _ qiya te kete luku _ , _ qivghu te kete luku _ akilghuu ut _ , _ ' _ Seghleghwaaghuuq _ ! _ Seghleghwaaghuuq _ negh ghllag _ ! _ aklungi ghllag aneng _ qamagte luteng _ angyaghpag leg t _ aklungi igh i kayugu yagh ut _ ! _ iwernga _ ataasigh mi _ aflu mi _ aklungi ghllag iitagh a _ ! _ ' _ "
taagken _ qilag meng _ kina _ pi uq _ , _ " _ kaay _ qilagmelngughni _ , _ quyake teggu _ qayughllak _ kiyaghnegh m _ naafqe a _ Babylon _ ! _ quya tek _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug itni _ , _ apostle-eni _ , _ uuknaliqistenillu _ ! _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh aa _ qayughllak _ seghletun _ pi kaqe kangisi _ ! _ "
taagken _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ keveg aa _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ , _ grain-mun _ kagimte i sigh stun _ ayuqe lghii _ . _ miluute a _ kellimun _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ " _ Tawateghpigaq _ negh ghllag _ Babylon _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ miluute ghllag lleqe a _ asitmun _ enkaam _ allameng llu _ esghagh naanghite aat _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ nagaqugh naanghite ai _ harp-esteten _ , _ pillgughikat _ aynganangasteten _ , _ flute-esteten _ , _ qalghightaghtetenllu _ ! _ qamagte luteng _ pillgughikat _ qepghaghteten _ aviighute yaghqaa ut _ , _ grain-meng _ kagimtesteten _ alla llu _ nagaqugh naanghite ait _ !
kenegh lghutagh m _ nighug a _ kuukgunnaanighnaquq _ elpek ni _ . _ me ik _ nulightugh naqe lghii m llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii m llu _ nagaqugh nanigh naqe uk _ elpek ni _ . _ Akilpegaghteten _ aghtiigatngwaaghyaghtut _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ alignaghtaagh llegh gpegun _ puu ghqu qagh katen _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nuna m _ yug i _ !
Babylon-mi _ taawa _ aaw it _ uuknaliqistet _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug i _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ tuqu tke aat _ nuna mi _ . _ "
kingu aneng _ iknaqe ghllag lghii m _ yaquleg m _ akuzillegh an _ , _ qilag mi _ nagaqugh anka _ yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu lghiit _ , _ " _ Hallelujah _ ! _ yuguligh llegh _ , _ quulvalleq _ , _ aghtughyaghqaanghilleqlu _ kiyaghnegh mta _ pi ke ai _ !
ellnga n _ nanqigte i llegh i _ ipa u ut _ , _ elqughute nga ut _ ! _ ellnga n _ aghyuugh kaqe a _ apeghseghugh _ aghnagh _ yugusigh mineng _ akike i kayug _ qayughllak _ nuna m _ yug i _ seghletun _ pi stegkangi _ sex-kun _ atuqe ste aqe luni _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ akite kaqe a _ qayughllak _ qepghaghtengi _ tuqu qugh stegkangi _ . _ "
yug lghute ghllag t _ akilghuu laatagh ut _ , _ " _ Hallelujah _ ! _ ne ghllag m _ kumagh lghii m _ agepsugh a _ mayugh u uq _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ ! _ "
taagken _ yuginagh _ estamat _ siipnegh ke luki _ elder-et _ , _ estamat llu _ unguva lghiit _ niinghute uute luteng _ manigugh aat _ kiyaghnegh _ , _ aqumga lghii _ umiileg u sigh gmikun _ . _ pi ke aat _ , _ " _ amen _ ! _ Hallelujah _ ! _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh ghllag gneng _ me _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ " _ usuqe teggu _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ qamagte lusi _ qepghaghtengani _ alike i lghii ni _ ellnga neng _ , _ ukavanlengughnillu _ aangwaagh ni llu _ ! _ "
taagken _ nagaqugh anka _ llangaqa _ me it _ yug lghute ghllag t _ . _ nagate kau luteng _ suksugistun _ tevlughte ghllag lghiit _ megh t _ , _ kallug m llu _ tengngaagtagh llegh atun _ ayuqe luteng _ . _ akilghuu ut _ , _ " _ Hallelujah _ ! _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh ut _ , _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ igleghte te i uq _ !
quya te lta _ , _ elngaatall _ quya ghllag lta llu _ usuqe lteggu llu _ ! _ Penniighaghaam _ nengughte lleghqagh a _ kaa tuq _ , _ nuliighqagh a llu _ yataaghqe ma uq _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ aasi ightugh ma a _ ugiigh naqe lghii _ pinighrakegtameng _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ . _ " _ ( _ " _ linen- a _ " _ whaten _ pi sigh u uq _ , _ elqughutngagh lghiit _ aneghneghqagh igh llegh t _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ pi aqe kangit _ . _ )
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ una _ igaqe gu _ : _ Penniighaghaam _ nengughte llegh an _ neqenghaghqe llegh anun _ negh yaghtigh sqekagh t _ quya stekau ut _ . _ " _ whaten llu _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ ipa u ut _ akuzi ta i _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh akun _ manigugh na luku _ , _ iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ qepghagh te aqe aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ elpetun _ , _ ugpeqaalgutegpetunllu _ . _ Ellnginguut _ ataasiighmelnguut _ ipalleghmun _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh kekagh anun _ . _ Ipalleq _ Jesus-em _ apeghtuusagh kekagh a _ taananguuq _ ipalleq _ kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenka _ uuknaliqistenun _ ungipagh ke stekagh a _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ qilag _ qelpegh lghii _ , _ taawa _ qategh lghii _ kuug ni _ ! _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ ategh a _ " _ Ataasiighmelnguq _ , _ ipapik _ " _ . _ elqughute nga ut _ nanqigte i llegh i _ , _ pilluwaqangillu _ anguyag ni _ .
iye kek _ kumaghugh llegh atun _ kenghem _ ayuqe lutek _ , _ naasqugh mikun _ qaghpa lghute lgu uq _ . _ ategh a _ ellnga kun _ igaqe nga uq _ kitum _ alngunak _ nalluke kanga _ iwerngaqun _ ellnginagh an _ .
atkuyaagh k _ atugh kek _ neptekau uk _ aaw kun _ . _ ategh ke a _ , _ " _ kiyaghnegh m _ akuzite anga _ " _ .
qilag meng _ pilluwaghtengita _ maligsaagh aat _ uugte luteng _ qatelghii tgun _ kuuni tgun _ , _ atkuyaaghluteng _ iqa ite ngugh meng _ qatelghii meng _ linen- meng _ .
Qaanghaneng _ aane uq _ ipeg lghii _ savigpag _ , _ taaggun _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nakumiit _ kayaalqughlleqii _ . _ igleghte te lleqe ai _ iron-meng _ anagutagh ligh luni _ . _ taagken _ tutmagh lleqe ai _ anguyag ni _ katam _ yug t _ tutmaghaqellghistun _ grapes-et _ qageghquusignilnguut _ . _ taana _ tutmagh llegh _ sakraa llegh ghllag ke a _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh m _ .
atkuyaagh akun llu _ qugtuqagh akun llu _ igaqe nga uq _ ategh _ whaten _ ; _ umiileg a _ umiileg t _ , _ Atangha _ atanghet _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ nekevgha lghii _ siqinegh kun _ . _ qamagte luki _ qawaag lghute t _ quulvani _ tengaa lghiit _ iglagtu pigte luni _ pi a _ , _ " _ tagi laghate te lusi _ qerngughte te k _ kiyaghnegh m _ neqenghaghqe llegh ghllag anun _ !
tagi tek _ , _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ umiileg t _ , _ pilluwaghtet _ umiileg it _ , _ pilluwaghtetlu _ . _ negh yaghtugh teki _ kemegkwaagh it _ kuuni t _ , _ kuuni kun _ igleghtestet _ , _ qamagte luki llu _ yug t _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghet _ , _ qepghaghtelaaghunghilnguut _ , _ ukavanlenguut _ , _ aw nge aaghet llu _ . _ "
taagken _ esghagh anka _ teghikusalluuklu _ , _ nuna m llu _ umiileg i _ , _ pilluwaghtekullghiit _ qerngughte te ut _ pilluwaghnaluku _ igleghte lghii _ kuuni kun _ , _ pilluwaghtengillu _ .
Tugwaagket _ teghikusalluugenkuk _ , _ uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk _ allaaghlluwaghtiighaataqaq _ tawanlluku _ teghikusalluuk _ . _ ( _ Allaaghlluwaghtiiqelleghmikun _ puu ghqu qu ai _ nalluniigh lleg ngekagh t _ teghikusalluugmeng _ , _ manigugh qu aat llu _ nangaghnegh a _ . _ ) _ Teghikusalluugenkuk _ , _ uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk _ unguvaagkenka _ miluute ak _ naayvagh m _ kenghanun _ kumaghugh lghii mun _ sulphur- meng _ .
Pilluwaghtengik _ kuuni kun _ igleghte lghii m _ tuqu qugh ai _ savigpag kun _ qanegh mineng _ aanekagh kun _ . _ taagken _ qamagte luteng _ qawaag t _ negh ait _ kemegkwaagh it _ kepsugh qiinagh llegh meggnun _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ yaquleg _ qilag meng _ uki lghii _ tugumiiqe luni _ key-nganeng _ Saamnangilnguum _ laawaagh m _ , _ qiipraghute ghllag neng llu _ .
kayaalqellug qu _ dragon-a _ tuwaa _ . _ ( _ Dragon-a _ taananguuq _ ayumightagh _ nemeghyagh _ , _ ategh a _ tughneghagh _ , _ tughneghagh _ . _ ) _ taagken _ yaquleg m _ asighte qugh a _ qiipraghute neng _ thousand _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
miluute luku _ laawaagh mun _ , _ taagken _ amig meng _ umeg te luku _ maghqatutkaa _ seal-eluku _ . _ enkaam _ Dragon-em _ puughte yaghqaa nanigh ai _ yug t _ kenlanga _ thousand _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ alpag kata _ iteme te aghte lleqe aat _ .
taagken _ esghagh anka _ umiileg u sigh t _ aqumutagh t _ , _ aqumga lghiit llu _ taakutgun _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte i yaghqaaghte stekagh i _ yug neng _ . _ Eshaghankallu _ unguva sagh it _ tamaakut _ naasqwightuqiit _ apallugh ke luku _ Jesus _ . _ ungipagh ke kaqe kangat _ ipalleq _ Jesus-em _ qayvighqekagh a _ , _ akuzi ta i llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ . _ taakut _ maniguute mangite ut _ teghikusalluugmun _ , _ nalighmeng _ nangaghnegh anun _ . _ talwa _ qagugh megteggun _ , _ nalighmeng _ iigge megteggun _ allgeghtellghitaat _ nalluniilkutagh a _ teghikusalluugem _ . _ unguvagh uute luteng _ igleghte te i lgusigh aat _ Christ-a _ thousand _ ayumiqullegh nun _ .
taana _ sivulii uq _ unguvagh qugh llegh _ . _ ( _ ila i _ tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ unguvagh uute naanghite ut _ kenlanga _ thousand _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag llegh itnun _ . _ )
tamaakut _ kiyaghnegh m _ unguvaghtekii _ unguvagh uute yuwhaagh llegh mi _ quya stekau ut llu _ agleghnagh ut llu _ . _ tuqu naanghite ut _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ iwernga _ priest-ngunaqnguut _ kiyaghnegh mun llu _ Christ-amunllu _ . _ igleghte te i lgusigh lleqe aat llu _ Christ-a _ thousand _ ayumiqullegh ni _ .
Thousand _ ayumiqullegh t _ alpag kata _ , _ tughneghagh _ anusimingllaghvig aneng _ iteme te yaghqaa uq _ .
enkaam _ aane luni _ puughte qugh lleqe ai _ nunatagh t _ mingite nga lghiit _ nunatagh ghhagh ani _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ . _ tamaakut _ nunatagh t _ ategh ke ait _ Gog-enkuk _ Magog-enkuk _ . _ yug ik _ uglagh ghllag ut _ qenaavzeghagh atun _ esne m _ . _ taagken _ tughneghagh m _ qerngughte lleqe ai _ pilluwamun _ .
tughneghagh m _ pilluwaghtengi _ iqelmun _ mingite luteng _ igleghte lleqe ut _ nuna kun _ . _ kaate luteng _ kangllu lleqe agket _ nunaagh llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ yug ita _ nayugh at _ , _ negh ghllag llu _ kiyaghnegh m _ piniqekagh a _ . _ taagken _ qilag meng _ kiyaghnegh m _ kenegh _ ukig ste luku _ paneghtekagh i _ pilluwaghtet _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh _ puughte ikagh _ nunatagh neng _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ yaquleg ita _ miluute lleqe aat _ naayvagh mun _ kumaghugh lghii _ sulphur- meng _ . _ tawavek _ miluute kaqe kegket _ teghikusalluugenkuk _ , _ uuknaliqistesighwaaghenkuk _ . _ tawani _ ikfiqe ghllag lleqe ut _ aghneghtuumaan _ unugtugh magh an _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ esghagh aqa _ kiyaghnegh _ aqumga lghii _ qatelghiignekun _ umiilgusignekun _ aqumutaghllagegnekun _ . _ nuna llu _ qilag a llu _ qimaaguutuk _ kiyaghnegh m _ tawantellghaneng _ , _ alla llu _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenatek _ .
esghagh anka llu _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ , _ ukaliiwaqlutengllu _ aangwaagh u aqe luteng llu _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ nekevgha te u ut _ sivungagh ni _ umiileg u sigh m _ aqumutagh ghllag m _ . _ taagken _ igagh t _ qelpeghte ait _ , _ igagh i _ unguvallegh m _ , _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ ategh itneng _ tamaakut _ unguva yaghqagh t _ quunperugllag _ . _ ila i llu _ igagh lghute t _ qelpeghte ait _ igaqugh vikekagh t _ tuqukagh t _ kiyaghtaallghitneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ . _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ atuqe luki _ igaqughkagh t _ igagh tgun _ .
taagken _ kellii m _ tuquma ste lugh u i ni _ pegte ai _ . _ tuqu llegh m llu _ Hades-emllu _ tuquma ste lugh u i tek _ pegte aik _ . _ Qamagtengngwaaghluki _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigte ai _ kiyaghtaallghistun _ .
taagken _ tuqu llegh llu _ Hades-lu _ miluute agket _ naayvagh m _ kenghanun _ . _ naayvagh m _ kengha _ tuungligh ke a _ tuqu llegh m _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ategh a _ igaqe ma ite kan _ igagh ani _ unguvallegh m _ , _ milugh tke aat _ naayvagh m _ kenghanun _ .
taagken _ esghagh agka _ qilag ragh aq llu _ nunaghraghaqlu _ . _ qilag ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ nuna ke yuwhaagh ii te ma uq _ , _ kellii igh te kau uq llu _ .
esghagh aqa llu _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ , _ Jerusalem-eghraghaq _ , _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ qilagmelngughmeng _ . _ negh ghllag _ yataaghqelluni _ ugiigh naqe lghii m _ ullngaqellghatun _ ugi minun _ .
nagaqugh aqa _ me _ iglagtu pigte lghii _ umiileg u sigh gneng _ aqumutagh gneng _ pi lghii _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ kiyaghfig a _ yug nite uq _ ! _ kiyaghfig ke lleqe ai _ enkaam _ ellngit _ yug ke lleqe ai _ . _ kiyaghnegh _ ellnga _ katam _ ellngitnite lleqe uq _ enkaam _ ellnga _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aat _ .
quni igh lleqe ai _ qamagte luki _ . _ tuqu u i lleqe a _ , _ qivghu u i lleqe a _ , _ qiya nga i lleqe a _ , _ talwa _ aqnighqengngiilleqaa _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ atuqe yagh kangit _ atuqe nanigh lleqe ait _ . _ "
taagken _ umiileg u sigh gnite ngughk _ aqumutagh gni _ pi uq _ , _ " _ esghaqagh ki qun _ , _ ulima aqe anka _ sa u aat _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ nutaghagh u luki _ ! _ " _ whaten llu _ pi uq _ , _ " _ igaqe ki _ tamaakut _ apeghkagh nka _ elpenun _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ akuzite t _ ipa u ut _ , _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut llu _ . _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ apeghiigh uq _ ! _ whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ Omega-nguunga _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ , _ aki u na an _ meghsi lleqe aqa _ sengngugh lghii meng _ unguvallegh nge ste i kayug meng _ megh meng _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ kayaalqe i i lghii m _ allgegh lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ whanga mneng _ . _ kiyaghnegh ke lleqe aatnga _ enkaam _ ellngit _ avaqutagh ke lleqe anka _ .
iwernga _ tamaakut _ quyughtagh lghiit _ , _ ugpeqe i llghite ngugh t _ , _ seghlelleghpigaghneng _ seghleghqe lghiit _ , _ yugtaghtet _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe te lghiit _ , _ alignagh lghiit _ , _ maniguute kayug t _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ , _ qamagte luteng llu _ iqlengagh lghiit _ , _ nekaghqagh at _ naayvagh u uq _ kumaghugh lghii _ kenegh meng llu _ sulphur- meng llu _ . _ Taananguuq _ tuungligh a _ tuqu llegh m _ . _ "
taagken _ yaquleg t _ maaghraghvinleg neng _ sagnegh leg t _ esleqnga lghii neng _ kinguligh neng _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag neng _ , _ ataasigh m _ taakuneng _ taku anga _ . _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ , _ keleg u vike naqe amken _ ugiigh naqe lghii meng _ , _ nuliighqagh a _ Penniighaghaam _ . _ "
kiyaghnegh m _ taghneghagh gkenkun _ yaquleg m _ tugu lunga _ aglagh te aanga _ uusqagh lleghpigagh anun _ naayghagh m _ . _ tawani _ kelgute a _ Jerusalem _ , _ agleghnagh lghii _ negh ghllag _ uki lghii _ kiyaghnegh meng _ qilagmelngughmeng _ .
Kuukgutngaghmi _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighughqellghaneng _ . _ negh ghllag _ kuukgute uq _ akitu ghllag lghii tun _ uyghag tun _ , _ jasper-etun _ , _ meghraakegtutkaghmi _ crystal-etun _ .
uusqagh ghllag meng _ mingllute leg _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amigllalgaataq _ . _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ yaquleg t _ amig ghllagnite ut _ . _ Ataasikaghtaghmeng _ amig ghllag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ ramke aneng _ Israel-em _ .
mingllu ta a _ ne ghllag m _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag leg _ , _ pi nga yu t _ asivagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ aywaa ni _ , _ pi nga yu t _ ikevagh mi _ , _ pi nga yu t _ pakfalla mi _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta a _ tunemagh igh kau uq _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ uyghag neng _ . _ Ataasikaghtaghmeng _ uyghag t _ igaqe vike nga ut _ ategh meng _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ apostle-nganeng _ Penniighaghaam _ .
yaquleg _ aleghqughteka _ gold-meng _ usputagh lgu uq _ usputagh na luku _ negh ghllag _ , _ amig ghllag i llu _ mingllu ta a llu _ .
negh ghllag _ ulluviighrakegteftuq _ tagtalnga _ , _ pateghtulngatun _ ayuqe uq _ . _ yaquleg m _ negh ghllag _ usputaghyaqminigu _ : _ 1,500 _ miles _ tagtale ke a _ , _ pateghtu lleg ke a _ , _ uusqaghtu lleg ke a llu _ .
mingllu ta a llu _ usputaghyaqminigu _ , _ 216 _ feet-nguftuq _ uusqaghtulnga _ . _ yaquleg m _ usputagh llegh atun _ ayuqe uq _ yug m _ usputagh llegh a _ .
mingllu ta a _ ulimaagh u uq _ jasper-meng _ . _ negh ghllag _ ulimaagh u uq _ gold-eperegwaaghmeng _ . _ Gold-a _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ siqinwhaaghtun _ .
ne ghllag m _ mingllu ta an _ tunemagh i _ pinigh naagh qusigh luteng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh neng _ akitughllagneng _ uyghag neng _ . _ sivuligh _ jasper-nguftuq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ sapphire-nguftuq _ , _ pingayut ii ta at _ agate-nguftuq _ , _ estamat ii ta at _ emerald-nguftuq _ ,
tallimat ii ta at _ onyx-nguftuq _ , _ aghvinleg ii ta at _ carnelian-nguftuq _ , _ maaghraghvinleg ii ta at _ chrysolite-nguftuq _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu ligh ta at _ beryl-nguftuq _ , _ estamaneng _ inglu ligh ta at _ topaz-nguftuq _ , _ qule ughte ta at _ chrysoprase-nguftuq _ , _ qula _ ataasigh _ siipnegh ii ta at _ jacinth-enguftuq _ , _ qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ii ta at _ amethyst-nguftuq _ .
qula _ maalghug _ siipnegh ke luku _ amig ghllag t _ pearl-nguftut _ , _ tamaghhagh meng _ amig ghllag t _ ataasigh meng _ pearl-meng _ ulimaagh u ut _ . _ ne ghllag m _ tume i _ gold-eperegwaaghuftut _ ; _ gold-a _ meghraakegtepiglleghii _ siqinghwaagh tun _ .
ne ghllag mi _ esghaate nghite unga _ temple- meng _ , _ qayughllak _ temple- nga _ Atanghuuq _ kiyaghnegh _ aghtugh yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngughk _ , _ Penniighaghaaguqlu _ .
negh ghllag _ siqineghsughniituq _ , _ nalighmeng _ tanqigh ighsugh niite uq _ nighugkagh meng _ , _ qayughllak _ nighughqellgha _ kiyaghnegh m _ nighug ke kanga _ , _ pennagh ii aghagh aq llu _ kenegh lghutagh ke kanga _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluteng _ nuna m _ yug i _ kiyaghte lleqe ut _ nighug akun _ kuukgute nga lghii kun _ . _ nuna m llu _ umiileg ita _ aklungi teng _ tagite uute ait _ ne ghllag mun _ .
ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag i _ umeg naanghite ut _ aghnegh m _ naange nghaani _ qayughllak _ unug naagh nghite ngughk _ tamaani _ .
nuna m _ yug ita _ ne ghllag mun _ tagite uute lleqe ait _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ aklungi teng _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa nghite uq _ sa u a _ seghlegh _ , _ talwa _ kina _ alngunak _ seghleghnagh tun _ pi sta _ , _ nalighmeng _ iqlengiqe sta _ . _ iwernga _ ne ghllag mun _ itegh yaghqaa ut _ tamaakunginaghhaat _ ategh it _ igaqe nga lghiit _ igagh akun _ unguvallegh m _ . _ taakut _ igagh t _ Penniighaghaam _ pi ke ai _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ keleg u vike aanga _ kiiw gneng _ maaqe lghiik _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ Penniighaghaamllu _ umiileg u sigh gkenka _ aqumutagh gkeneng _ . _ Unguvallelitikayugmeng _ me leg k _ , _ meghraakegtutkalghiik _ crystal-etun _ .
maaqe nga lghiik _ qukaa kun _ tumangan _ ne ghllag m _ . _ kiiw k _ inglugtun _ uqfigtuqagh k _ unguvallelitikayugneng _ . _ tamaghhagh mi _ uqfig _ piite ste i kayugu uq _ fruit-neng _ tanqigh inagh kun _ , _ ayumiqullegh mi _ , _ ququngagh it llu _ naallghute sigh u ut _ nunatagh anun _ .
sa u a _ alngunak _ kiyaghnegh m _ nanqigtekagh a _ aghyuugh yaghqaa luku _ , _ ne ghllag mete naanghite uq _ . _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ Penniighaghhaankuk _ umiileg u sigh k _ aqumutagh gket _ ne ghllag mete yaghqaa uk _ , _ kiyaghnegh m llu _ qepghaghtengita _ manigugh lleqe aat _ .
gginagh a _ esghagh lleqe aat _ , _ ategh a llu _ qagugh itgun _ igaqe nga lleqe uq _ .
tamaani _ unug nanigh lleqe a _ , _ kenelghutaghsughniighulleqii _ , _ nalighmeng _ siqineghsughniighulleqii _ , _ qayughllak _ atanegh _ kiyaghnegh _ nighug ke lleqe aat _ . _ igleghte te i lleqe ut llu _ umiileg u luteng _ quunperugllag _ kenle u na an _ .
taagken _ yaquleg m _ pi unga _ , _ " _ ukut _ akuzite t _ ugpeqe yaghqaa ut _ , _ ipa u ut llu _ . _ Atanghem _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ igleghte te i lghii m _ taghneghagh itneng _ uuknaliqistemi _ , _ kayagtekaqe a _ yaquleg ni _ kelguvikesqelluki _ qepghaghteni _ sa u aat _ pi yaghtugh ngestagh ni luki _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ quya stekau ut _ qaatke te lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqe nga lghii nun _ ukutgun _ igagh tgun _ . _ "
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ nagate kaqe anka llu _ esghagh kaqe anka llu _ tamaakut _ . _ nagaqugh aqe yamki llu _ esghagh aqe yamki llu _ tamaakut _ , _ niinghute unga _ yaquleg m _ itegagh ani _ manigugh na luku _ , _ keleg u vike i steke _ tamaaken _ .
iwernga _ pi unga _ , _ " _ tawaten _ pi gpenang _ ! _ whanga llu _ qepghaghtenguunga _ elpetun _ , _ ugpeqaalgutegpetunllu _ uuknaliqistestun _ , _ qaatke te lghii stun llu _ akuzi ta itnun _ ukut _ igagh t _ . _ manigugh ghhu _ kiyaghnegh _ ! _ "
pi unga llu _ , _ " _ aksaqe gpenaki _ uuknaliqe llegh t _ ukut _ igagh t _ apeghkagh it _ , _ qayughllak _ tamaakut _ pi lleghqagh it _ kaate yaghtugh ma ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ seghletun _ pi lghii _ nagnegh li _ seghletun _ , _ enkaam _ kina _ alngunak _ nukeggnagh meng _ sumegh ke lghii _ nagnegh li _ nukeggnagh meng _ suumqelluni _ . _ kina _ alngunak _ elqughutngagh lghii _ nagnegh li _ elqughute nga luni _ , _ kina llu _ alngunak _ pelungilnguq _ nagnegh li _ pelungite luni _ . _ "
Jesus _ pi uq _ , _ " _ nagate tek _ ! _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ akileghtugh te yaghqagh nka _ kelqe lleqe anka _ nallangightugh na luki _ yug t _ kiyaghtaallghistun _ .
whanga _ alpha- ngugh u nga _ Omega-nguunga _ , _ whanga _ sivulii unga _ kinguligh u unga _ , _ whanga _ piinlegh u unga _ kenle u unga llu _ . _ "
quya stekau ut _ tamaakut _ atkuyaag teng _ aghvig ke ait _ iqangite te ste luki _ . _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ negh yaghqaaghtekau ut _ piite stekagh aneng _ unguvallelitikayugem _ uqfig m _ . _ itegh yaghqaaghtekau ut llu _ ne ghllag m _ amig ghllag itgun _ .
iwernga _ ne ghllag m _ eslataanilnguut _ qikmigh u ut _ , _ alignalghii u ut _ , _ nengughte gpenateng _ atuqe i ste u ut _ , _ yugte aghte u ut _ , _ kiyaghnegh ngllaghkagh nun _ maniguute ste u ut _ , _ iqlengiqe yuneghtu ut _ , _ iqlengiqe manginagh aqe ut llu _ .
" _ whanga _ , _ Jesus _ , _ kayagtekaqe aqa _ yaquleg ka _ elpesi nun _ ugpeqagh nun _ yughaghvignilngughnun _ . _ apegh lleqe ak _ ukuk _ elpesi nun _ , _ ' _ whanga _ David-em _ kingunegh ke aanga _ , _ whanga _ nighugrakegtaagunga _ unaangum _ ighaleqetaagh a _ . _ ' _ "
taghneghagh k llu _ ugiigh naqe lghii llu _ pi uk _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ tamaghhagh mi llu _ nagate lghii _ pi li _ , _ " _ tea- ai _ ! _ " _ kina _ alngunak _ meqsug lghii _ tagi li _ ; _ tugukligh ligu _ aki ite ngughk _ megh _ unguvallelitikayuk _ .
whanga _ , _ John _ , _ kelengasaaghyuganka _ nagate lghiit _ uuknaliqe llegh nun _ igaqegkagh tgun _ ukutgun _ igagh tgun _ . _ kitum _ alngunak _ ilaraagh kaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ aghyuugh lleqe a _ . _ ellnga nun _ ila lleqe ai _ tamaakut _ seghleliigh llegh ghllag t _ igaqe nga lghiit _ ukutgun _ igagh tgun _ .
kitum _ alngunak _ ikuvike gkaki _ uuknaliqe tkekagh t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ , _ kiyaghnegh m _ iqite lleqe ai _ nengighqe ai _ piite stekagh t _ uqfigagh neng _ unguvallelitikayugem _ . _ kiyaghte snaanghite a llu _ agleghnagh lghii mi _ ne ghllag mi _ . _ taake uk _ apegh nga uk _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
Jesus-nguuq _ apegh i lghii _ tamaaken _ qamagte luteng _ ipa u ni luki _ . _ pi uq llu _ , _ " _ ipapestaaq _ tagi yaghtugh unga _ ! _ " _ amen _ . _ tea- ai _ , _ atanegh _ Jesus _ !
nangllegtagh llegh a _ atanegh mta _ Jesus-em _ tea- ma ghhagh gpesinite li _ . _ amen _ .
sangami _ qiighqagh _ sivuqagh meng _ atigh kau a
sivuqagh m _ ungipagh aa
nuna _ ulima nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ , _ ulimaghista _ meghnalikaq _ , _ ulimaagh ni _ yuvghiigh qagh a _ .
Taakum _ tunganga _ esghaghyaqminigu _ meraghinaaftuq _ .
enkaam _ taakum _ kellii n _ megh anun _ kagukagh _ .
megh m _ saamken _ teghhaneng _ nuna meng _ tugu tete luni _ sivuqagh a _ .
taana _ sivuqagh ni _ nuna _ llikagh a _ megh m _ qaye akun _ , _ qiighqagh ughtekagh _ .
tagtalmi _ qiighqagh _ nevugh ngekagh _ .
piite vikekagh a _ veg m _ , _ piitesighaam _ , _ nunivagseghaam _ , _ ququngaam _ .
afsengagh t _ , _ sikig t _ , _ kaviigh t _ uugtekagh t _ qiighqagh mun _ .
aghvegh t _ , _ ayvegh t _ , _ neghsagh t _ , _ ulghaagh t _ , _ nanugh t llu _ tagikagh t _ qiighqagh m _ megh an _ tunganganun _ .
ila a _ uugte yagutekagh _ , _ ila yan _ nayugh ksagutekagh at _ .
ila a _ teghig ke sagh _ uksugh mi _ sikugnekun _ kaate kayug _ .
upenghagh mi _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qagugh ak _ katelghaate yagutekagh _ , _ ighni laghate yagutekagh _ .
ila it _ uksughte aqe lghiit _ .
Kiyaghtaallghem _ tagtale ani _ yugwem _ naalkekagh a _ qiighqagh _ .
nelikagh at _ kiyaghfig kekagh at _ .
qiighqagh _ esghaqaaluni _ llangaqa _ qetekagh _ inglupigaghmeng _ iigge meng _ , _ enkaam _ ategh ke a _ sivuqagh _ , _ Ulimaghistem _ sivuqagh a _ .
Allaaghlluwhaq _ ayungkaghagh
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ nenglu mete ngughk _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ellnginaghhaalghii _ , _ iwernga _ aghnaghaghpaggaaghtekaq _ , _ anglu ighpagkagh ghhagh _ .
kaame llgagh u aqe lghii _ , _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh meng _ , _ ayumigh m _ kaamenganeng _ ayngusikagh meng _ .
emta _ tawaten _ aane aqngami _ taakwegkutgun _ qilaga t _ tulimagh ita _ kenle itgun _ ayungkaghagh ghhagh ni _ lli ma kanga _ .
lli luku _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ pamavek _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ tesqakmani _ anʼgiqriqluni _ , _ iiyagh m _ sani ngiighhagh ani _ .
tawaten _ nekevgha ghngaaghmi _ , _ anʼgighngaaghmi _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te uq _ me meng _ .
tawaten _ nagate ghngaaghmi _ sa u a _ qama _ allgegh lghii _ me _ :
“ _ Sak-maa-nii-nguuq _ sakma _ ,
Sak-maa-nii-nguuq _ sakma _ ,
unaagh _ ii-maa _ neghiistet
Aghulaquu-si-maat _ !
Iitghelten _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ ”
tawani _ nagate aghte luni _ aga _ aqfaasnaq _ ukig yalghiimi _ , _ ukig yalghiimi _ aga _ itegh uq _ , _ itegh uq _ .
iitghute kete luku _ esghaqu aghte yalghiimi _ megh gnun _ tawavek _ .
megh ma lghii _ taagken _ .
megh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ tamaani _ yuvghiigh luni _ esghapag luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ legan _ mayugh aqe lghii _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ .
pi laataghtugh ngugh _ qama _ :
“ _ Sak-maa-nii-nguuq _ sakma _ ,
Sak-maa-nii-nguuq _ sakma _ ,
unaagh _ ii-maa _ neghiistet
Aghulaquu-si-maat _ !
Iitghelten _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ ”
legan _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aga _ aqfaasnaq _ itegh qaghte aqe lghii _ .
nenglu mun _ qamavek _ maaten _ pi llegh mineng _ elngaatall _ ivagh i uq _ .
taawa _ meghe nghite aghte igate ngughk _ , _ megh aqe lghii _ aghnagh aq _ .
tamaa na _ yuvghiigh aa _ , _ uumtagh m _ saamna _ asi a _ , _ tamaa na _ sa u a _ alngunak _ wata _ .
aane laatagh uq _ .
legan _ aane luni _ mayugh luni _ , _ mayugh luni _ qakmavek _ iiyagh m _ saaghw anun _ kaate luni _ nekeve uq _ , _ qama nguq _ pi laatagh uq _ tawatengwaaq _ legan _ :
“ _ Sak-maa-nii-nguuq _ sakma _ ,
Sak-maa-nii-nguuq _ sakma _ ,
unaagh _ ii-maa _ neghiistet
Aghulaquu-si-maat _ !
Iitghelten _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ ”
legan _ aqfaasnaq _ esghaate naqe pigte luni _ maatenllaam _ aga _ elngaatall _ aqfaasnaq _ itegh qagh uq _ .
maaten _ tawani _ pingayut ii te kun _ meqsug nghite uq _ , _ megh k _ legan _ esghagh lukek _ avelghaghaak _ .
tamaani _ esghaqu luni _ , _ esghaqu luni _ , _ esghaghte yu gnite a _ iye gmi _ aag llegh gkeneng _ inga _ .
kii _ , _ ayungkaghagh a nguq _ whaa _ uqlughte aqe uq _ !
tawavek _ esghapag luku _ , _ esghapag luku _ , _ tekegh mineng _ imeg aa _ , _ imeg aa _ tespikapighqaaghluku _ sakeqe a _ .
sakeqe luku _ taana _ sakeqe llegh a _ negh luku _ aane uq _ .
aane luni _ mayugh luni _ qaye anun _ tamaakagh _ .
elngaatall _ tamaa a _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmi _ pi laatagh uq _ maateghniineng _ alla pigu luni _ , _ llangaqa _ qengaghllug pigu luni _ :
“ _ Sak-paa-tii-kuuq _ sakpa _ ,
Sak-paa-tii-kuuq _ sakpa _ ,
up-tu aq _ ii-paa _ teghiis-tek
Aghulaquu-si-paat _ !
Iitgheltet _ peqsaghtaa _ . _ ”
aga nguq _ alla _ itegh qaghte te kete luku _ , _ nutem _ tutemqaghqagh meng _ pi luni _ test- pig ke na _ qamagte luku _ elngaatall _ iike a _ , _ liite kanga _ taanangutanga _ akuzi i aghagh u aatagh lghii _ .
qamagte luku _ tugwaa _ .
negh luku _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mayugh luni _ tespamavek _ tawaten _ tamaa te kete luku _ nagate yagh uq _ .
naagu _ alla _ pi nghite uq _ , _ avangite te uq _ .
tawaten _ aneghte lghii nguq _ taananguftuq _ ayungkaghagh a _ aghnaghagh m _ .
taawa _ alla llu _ pi nghite uq _ .
tefaay _ ! _ Aliinghakuun _ , _ amsanagh u keuute te _ !
ayungkaghagh ngllagh aqe ut _ upenghagh mi _ salin _ nuna _ anigu lgu luku _ .
meghutlugkwaagh ghhagh t _ nanigh m _ ellngaate aneng _ imigh luki _ laag utu aqe ait _ nuna kun _ anigu m _ tungangakun _ .
Taam _ meghutlugwem _ piiznga llegh an _ paye i _ uzimun _ qiigh luki _ kumagh taqagh it _ .
qiigh qiinagh aqe luki _ kumangastaaqiit _ kenlanga _ ellngaate t _ ilu llegh itnun _ , _ maatnegh m _ kumaghneghaki _ .
Enraghngam _ pateg llegh itnun _ kumangasluki _ taagken _ anigu mun _ kuuve aqe ait _ nenglisqelluki _ .
taakut _ anigumelnguut _ ayungkaghagh u ut _ .
amaa nkuk _ Meteghllugwenkuk _ Ilughaghnighullghiik
Apasengaam _ ungipagh aa
amenam _ .
meteghllug ghllag nguq _ taana _ estaaghagh ma lghii _ .
naayghagh meng _ iggagmete lleghpigagh aneng _ anigu leg ani _ , _ suqlunqagh gneng _ asitum _ estaaghagh yalghiimi _ meteghllug ghllag _ .
Legannguq _ pi aqe uq _ estu laatagh nghmini _ :
“ _ Aya-ya-luuk _ ,
Aya-ya-luuk _ !
Ku-uu-iiya _ ,
Ku-uu-iiya _ !
tenge qaghte aqe lunga _ , _ Qghuugh _ ! _ ”
tenge qaghte luni _ , _ aga nguq _ qaghleg aqe luni _ .
tawaten _ aneghte ma luku _ amaa ghllag m _ taku ma kanga _ .
“ _ uuk _ , _ ilughagh ghhagh ka _ naqamalla _ nunaki aqa _ !
ilughagh ghhagh ka _ naqamalla _ nunaki aqa _ ! _ ”
“ _ ilu uq _ ! _ ”
“ _ Aay _ ! _ ”
“ _ estu aghte langa _ whanga llu _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ . _ ”
“ _ estu naanghite uten _ , _ megh mun _ nagnegh naagh uten _ ! _ ”
“ _ Estugwenkami _ taakut _ , _ legan _ pakineg lleqe unga _ , _ nuqnegh lleqe unga _ . _ ”
“ _ estu naanghite uten _ , _ megh mun _ nagnegh naagh uten _ ! _ ”
Legannguq _ ellnga _ aga _ estu nghmini _ meteghllug _ :
“ _ Aya-ya-luuk _ ,
Aya-ya-luuk _ !
Ku-uu-iiya _ ,
Ku-uu-iiya _ !
tenge qaghte aqe lunga _ , _ Qghuugh _ ! _ ”
tenge qaghte aqe luni _ .
aga _ qaghleg aghte aqe lghii nguq _ megh mun _ kaate naqe nghmini _ .
“ _ uuk _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ whanga llu _ estu aghte langa _ ! _ ”
“ _ estu naanghite uten _ , _ megh mun _ nagnegh lleqe uten _ ! _ ”
“ _ Estugwenkami _ taakut _ , _ legan _ pakineg lleqe unga _ megh mun
kaate yaghtugh kuma _ aghuliigh lleqe unga _ . _ ”
“ _ eng _ , _ estu _ , _ sayug naanghite amken _ megh mun _ aatqaghtekuvek _ !
sayug naanghite amken _ . _ ”
amagh u ghllag _ aga _ estu naqe uq _ .
Yataaghqelluni _ estu yalghiimi _ anigu kun _ suqlunghegnekun _ taakwagun _ megh mun _ agigngalghiignekun _ .
leganqun _ sukaghi yuwhaagh kau te ni _ , _ aanqute i uq _ amagh u ghllag _ ,
“ _ Alii-luuy-ngen _ , _ aliiluyngen
Elaayngen _ !
Sinang-awen _ , _ kemgite uq _ , _ ku-uuy _ !
U-uuy _ ! _ ”
pakineg yagh uq _ , _ megh mun _ nagnegh ghllag uq _ ima _ !
kaleve qaghte luni _ , _ talugh qaghte luni _ , _ nuughqaghte luni _ , _ “ _ Quq _ ! _ ilu uq _ , _ sa yukagh nga _ ! _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ sayug naanghite amken _ , _ maaten qun _ ighleke yaqemken _ !
Elpeneng _ uugten _ estug lgu uten _ , _ ” _ Meteghllugwem _ pi a _ .
“ _ amen ta _ seghleghu naqe unga _ , _ iighhwnnaqaanga _ sayug qaghte nga _ ! _ ”
“ _ uugten _ elpeneng _ , _ maatenta _ ighleke yagh amken _ . _ ”
“ _ uuk _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ nayag ka _ tugu nayagh an _ estamaneng _ atngaghute leg _ . _ ”
“ _ huk _ , _ uvegte luku _ maaten _ apegh gpenaan _ , _ kenu i aatagh ma ste ghllag uq _ ! _ ”
taku luku _ meteghllug ghllag m _ sayugwaa _ .
sivughtugh aa _ yaqugh mineng _ , _ nayag aneng _ nulightugh pigesnagh na luni _ estamaneng _ atngaghute leg meng _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tamaani _ ighwaaghtuute luten _ , _ pangalwaagh i _ , _ supelghaghsi a _ . _ ”
pangalwaagh uq _ .
pangalwaagh luni _ , _ pangalwaagh luni _ , _ ufsughqutaqluni _ , _ mingwaagtuute luni _ anigu kun _ pangalwaagh luni _ , _ piniighte ngnga mi _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ ilu uq _ . _ ”
“ _ Aay _ ! _ ”
“ _ waamte amken _ , _ nayag ite unga _ avangite unga _ ! _ ”
“ _ uuk _ , _ iqlengagh lghiiten qun _ .
nutem qun _ iqlengagh qrug lghiiten _ ! _ nagun _ , _ naliignekun _ suqlunghegnekun _ aag naqe ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ ukagun _ , _ ayguqliignekun _ siqinqegtagnekun _ aag naqe unga _ .
Elpegmi _ nagun _ aag naqe ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ samavek _ uughqa nun _ whanga _ esnagh mun _ mat- llaag ghhagh anun _ teve naqe unga _ . _ ”
aghulaqe uute uk _ .
taana _ aygugh mun _ pangaleg uq _ .
taana _ meteghllug ghllag _ amenam _ eslumun _ .
“ _ Quq _ ! _ Quq _ ! _ Quq _ ! _ ”
taagavek _ meteghllug _ naayghagh m _ talugh nga llegh akun _ qiive uq _ , _ aygugh mun _ , _ aygugh mun _ , _ aygugh mun _ amaa m _ tume kaghqagh gkenun _ .
tume kaghqagh nun _ lliigh yami _ ifkamalghii _ tungtu u luni _ tuqu nghhaghllug ghllag _ .
amaa m _ taam _ mallu ke ma kanga _ tungtu ghllag _ iiwen _ esne mun llu _ teve aqe uq _ .
tungtu ghllag nguq _ legan _ tuqaaghesnaq _ !
“ _ uuk _ , _ iyatagh ma lunga _ seghleghhalek _ , _ seghleghhalek _ nanglleg ke te yagh ghllag _ una _ . _ ”
kaate luku _ , _ nullu kek _ taake uk _ sivuke lukek _ nguugraghaak _ , _ neghe ak _ , _ tunughllaguftughnguq _ ! _ iwerngaqun _ aqsa ni _ esleqaghaghsaqminigu _ kepsugh uq _ .
“ _ unaami _ alla _ teghtugh kuma _ neghe lleqe lghiinga _ . _ ”
Saaghhwaakun _ taaggun _ ingaghte uq _ .
amagh u ghllag _ qavagh naqe uq _ .
iiwen _ qavagh naqe aqe uq _ , _ aqsanganenguq _ qama _ , _ “ _ Quq _ , _ quq _ , _ quq _ , _ quq _ ! _ ”
“ _ uuk _ , _ ilughagh ghhagh ka _ naanlluni _ qalghigh qagh laatagh a _ .
aawallu _ ilughagh ma _ aki aghte laatagh aanga _ ! _ ”
“ _ ilu uq _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ ukut _ saksiki _ ? _ ”
“ _ uuk _ , _ arekulngamnguq _ taawa _ qilu nka _ . _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ qilug qagh katki _ maakut _ tagsighaghllugkwaagh t _ ! _ ”
iike ma kangi _ .
iike luki _ paame na nga kete te _ miluute ma kangi _ .
“ _ Quq _ , _ quq _ , _ quq _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ ukut _ saksiki _ ? _ ”
“ _ Arekulngam _ tengugwenka _ , _ entaqun _ aaw ngllagh sigh nka _ ! _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ tengug qagh katki _ maakut _ neve ut _ temngi _ ! _ ”
iike luki _ miluute ai _ .
“ _ ilu uq _ , _ ukuk _ saksikek _ ? _ Quq _ ! _ Quq _ ! _ Quq _ ! _ ”
