“ _ Arekulngam _ tequgh ngllagh sigh gka _ , _ iiskag gka _ ! _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ iiskag ke aqe atki _ maakut _ uyghag t _ temngi _ ! _ ”
iike lukek _ egllaataghaak _ .
“ _ Quq _ ! _ Quq _ ! _ Quq _ ! _ ukut _ saksiki _ ? _ ”
“ _ Arekulngam _ kemagnagh nka _ .
kemagnagh nka _ , _ pugnaaqute nka _ ! _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ sangan mi _ maaten _ pugnaaqutkennanighsiki _ kaleve aqngavek _ ! _ ”
iike luki _ miluute ai _ !
“ _ Quq _ , _ quq _ , _ quq _ , _ una _ saksigu _ ? _ ”
“ _ uuk _ , _ arekulngam _ aqsaqugh ka _ ! _ taana _ imigh negh mkun _ , _ teghhumaaqelghiinga _ ! _ ”
“ _ temngi _ ! _ temngi _ una _ kalngagalleghqwaaq _ sa u a _ aqsaqugh ke zigu _ ! _ ”
iike luku _ miluute a _ .
“ _ Quq _ , _ quq _ , _ quq _ , _ ilu uq _ , _ una _ saksigu _ ? _ ”
“ _ uuk _ , _ arekulngam _ taawa _ unguva sigh ka _ ighsaqugh ka _ , _ teghhumasiqa _ ! _ ”
“ _ ighsaqugh ligh ma aqe tsi _ temngi _ uyghag ghllag meng _ , _ suflughragmeng _ ! _ ”
iike luku _ miluusaqminigu _ tuqute a _ !
tulimagh ii kete te _ taaggun _ puvughqu yalghiimi _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ melqumsuwhiighusimakanga _ .
kii _ , _ ghhuu naqe uq _ , _ tungtulugwem _ manu anun _ itegh uq _ .
tawani _ sukate pigte luni _ melqunge uq _ .
ima _ naallghute aghte uq _ melqunge aghte uq _ .
taana _ amagh u ghllag _ neqekagh a _ , _ neqekagh a _ , _ neqekagh a _ qamagte a _ , _ alla _ tungtu _ taana _ naangtengngwaaghluku _ !
tefaay _ !
Kiiluum _ akmag a
Kesliim _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ ategh a _ Kiiluuq _ .
elngaatall _ agghiyugneghllak _ , _ aaghhe neghllug ghllag _ .
angayuqagh ni _ , _ anglegute ni llu _ pinightesigalkangi _ , _ naqam _ panignagh ghllag _ .
tawaten _ ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ Kiiluuq _ aaghhneghlliqe ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ samavek _ elqwaagh yagh na luni _ .
qenwat _ naa an _ maligte ma kanga _ .
kii _ , _ qagi ghllag u uq _ .
Kiiluuq _ elqwaagh niigh gpenani _ qagi t _ nengulgha llegh itni _ naghaagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qagi t _ kasug ma kangat _ , _ ghhuughaghte ma kanga _ , _ naange a _ nallutghaaghlluku _ .
iitek _ naa an _ akuqagh naqe ma yagh kanga _ siingenllu _ aga _ kaleve uq _ .
Kiiluuq _ liite yalghiimi _ saam _ mangteghagh ghllag m _ ilu nga ni te uq _ .
tamaa nguq _ pegnem _ piyug te aqe ut _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ taku luku _ nekeve sqe ma kanga _ .
tuune ma kanga _ kalngagagh _ uqig ghllag _ , _ akmagtesimakanga _ .
meghnugh luteng _ aghuliighnaqenghata _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kagsagmig aqe kangi _ .
Kiiluuq _ meghnugh uq _ , _ qiya luni _ lliigh uq _ .
qiya magh mi _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ sangan lli _ agghiyugniqe ma zinga _ , _ aaghhneghlliqe ma zinga _ !
nutaan tuq _ pinitun _ kiyaghte lghiinga _ ! _ ”
pi neghllug meng _ taghnughhagh meng _ taana _ mangteghagh _ imaqe uq _ .
Kiiluum _ akmag a _ agghiyugniqe llegh aneng _ , _ aaghhneghlliqe llegh aneng _ imaqe uq _ .
meghnugh luteng _ aghuliighnaqenghata _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kagsagmig aqe kangi _ .
Kiiluuq _ meghnum _ qiya magh mi _ pi laatagh uq _ ,
“ _ sangan lli _ agghiyugniqe ma zinga _ , _ aaghhneghlliqe ma zinga _ !
nutaan tuq _ pinitun _ kiyaghte lghiinga _ ! _ ”
Legannguq _ nepiigh uq _ ne minun _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ima _ Kiiluuq _ piniighqwaamakanga _ .
agghiyugniqe nanigh ma lghii _ .
pinitun _ lliigh uq _ .
tefaay _ !
akluma lleghpigagh _ quyanagh lleghpigagh _ kuusme
ayuqligh m _ ungipagh ke llegh a
kuusme m _ Pinighyuugtestellgha
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ neqamike aqe aqa _ kuusmeyaghtu nghaani _ esla _ quunpeng _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aliineghllug ghllag u aqe lghii _ naqam _ aqlaghakegllak _ enkaam _ qakma _ kinku t _ naghughte negh meggni _ piyug llegh it _ aghqiiwtu te _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ unangupiglluku _ aag negh mta _ qalghighqiteghllaget _ tevragh naqe lghiit _ napi naqe lghiit _ qimugsigh meng _ .
Amsanaam _ angtale aneng _ qilug llegh it _ , _ talwa _ ugwatangaghmiit _ qikmigh at _ , _ alirugwakegllaget _ .
piyug meng llu _ piyaanneqegsaataqut _ qaanngwaateng _ qamugh ke luki _ .
nalluniite aqe uq _ sivuqagh _ kuusmete yug nightu aqe a _ , _ kinku t _ esghanemteki _ quya ma ghllag t _ , _ yataaghqe te ghllag t _ .
tamaani _ naagu _ kinku t _ suume qaghte gpenaki _ aqimle meng _ meghe uute lleghqagh it _ , _ aqnighte lleghqagh it _ .
Qelanqennemteggu _ ataata mta _ tagi lleghqagh a
ataata ut _ qelanqe sag utagh uqagh ut _ pugughilegh meng _ tagi lleghqagh a _ qayughllak _ kuusme _ sivutghulluku _ qimugsigh ghhagh meng _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
ataata ma _ qamite kek _ teghiglugwem _ inglu aneng _ usi ii ghllag lutek _ tamaaken _ uksaagh mi _ agaghtekagh meng _ kinghaagaghluteng _ kumlate luteng _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
awen _ apegh aqe kangat _ apa ka _ , _ ataata ma _ awtu anga _ , _ neqe ngllaghtu ni luku _ enkaam _ nagnegh te a _ ataatamaallu _ .
ataata ka _ nutaaghameng _ kineghkagh meng _ iqallug meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ qamiye gni _ usilukeklu _ taawa _ ayuqe ak _ .
uksugh ghllag mi _ ilangakun _ neqangisag aqe uq llu _ .
amenqun _ laluramke t _ kuusme mi _ table-eni _ neqenghaghqe te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ whangkuta llu _ legan _ whaa _ tawaaten _ negh u lleqe ukut _ iwerngaqun _ qayutighluta _ nuna mi _ .
llaaghanwha _ neqe lgu aqe ukut _ ingavelqiinaqlu _ .
kiyang _ ataata ka _ kaate aqe uq _ pugughilegh meng _ siqinegh _ tevigh kestagh nghaani _ .
aanqaghte aatagh qu kut _ quya pigte luta _ .
nekefqaghte luteng _ qikmigh t _ uveghtaqiinkut _ ellngit llu _ esghagh nghmegtekut _ quya aqe ut _ .
ila i _ unglegh aqe ut _ entaqun _ meghnum _ qayughllak _ taake lghii _ tume _ pugughilegh meng _ .
qikmigh a _ makughqugh aqe aput _ , _ petugteghumiita _ , _ neghqe aqe luki _ .
ila i _ naatghigh qugh te luteng _ qikmigh an _ kameg i _ ayuqe ut _ .
talwa _ qikmigh a _ kameg meng _ praasentaaqanka _ .
mamleg a qaa _ , _ qama _ gas _ lamp-pem _ qergese kun _ nighug kek _ nighug u te aqe uk _ salin _ sivuqagh _ kenghilluku _ .
iwernga _ generator-esqughhaak _ atugh aqe agput _ wetku _ uqug lgu negh mta _ .
ataata mta _ kameg i _ , _ allighte i _ , _ piginghi _ , _ atkugwi _ , _ temkagh i _ agaghte qugh aqe aput _ .
akmagtagh an llu _ imigh a _ nusugraghteghaqaput _ .
Suflugwii _ qesighte neghsigh luki _ sangighqugh luki _ , _ mesiighqe aqe anka _ .
Kaviighsiighumaqelghiillu _ .
unaami _ ughug nghata _ afta aqe aput _ , _ niightugh aqe aput _ , _ kinegh nghata _ pinighsagh aqe aput _ avlaawakun _ .
awen _ itegh qagh qu aqe ut _ ataata ma _ teghiglugtagh aneng _ aapsat _ .
tunqugh aqe ukut _ elngaatall _ .
ellngit a llu _ liisimake kangat _ kinegh vyiighkagh meng _ kumlatekagh meng _ teghiglug meng _ tagite aqe lghii _ .
ilangqughqu llegh ut
enankin _ aange lghii kun _ ataata mta _ qamiye akun _ naayvagh meng _ ikellegh itneng _ taghnughhagh ni _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ .
Boiler-et _ , _ qalta t _ , _ salngagkwaagh t _ imightugh aqe aput _ .
naayvagh mun _ sukera aqe ukut _ atghii negh mta _ , _ nenglagh magh emta _ , _ ilaagaamaamta _ , _ uteghmun _ weni _ qule mun _ siinge lqiinagh aqe ukut _ angegh lleg kellug kek _ qamiye gput _ .
kaate negh mta _ miigh aqe ukut _ ilangqugh meng _ .
tamaani _ qeleghtengnguunaamta _ qepghagh aqe ukut _ .
aqlaghate ngugh mi _ mangteghagh mi _ kiyaghte llegh ut
mangteghagh ut _ mekesqughhaayaghtuq _ entaqun _ 10 _ feet _ by _ 12 _ feet-ngnguuq _ .
quunpeng _ supug ghllag _ ulima llegh a _ seghlegh _ , _ qayughllak _ ata mta _ naken _ saghnaaghaneng _ ulima uq _ .
Unugmi _ qaamngaamta _ qavagh aqe lghiikut _ .
aghneghmi _ kerosene _ heater-meng _ itagsi pigte luta _ atuqe aqe ukut _ .
sakighte uute luta _ nuna mi _ qavagh aqe ukut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ , _ sakighte uute negh mta _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ room-engiighhaq _ esleqaqaghput _ .
Army-t _ qavaghvig ita _ mattress-nganeng _ egte llegh neng _ saghnaaghmeng _ alliighighaqukut _ .
Yo-yo-ngllanemta _ aangqagh ngllagh u negh mta _ aki kaghqagh meng _ tamaatum _ mattress-em _ imaa neng _ kevigh aqe aput _ enkaam _ allighagh mta _ nalighnegh i _ imighutaaqut _ .
iwernga _ aatkagh meng _ imigh u llegh i _ tamaakut _ kanaghfikughaqaput _ .
repall _ qivghuke kaqe anka _ amigh meng _ allighagh igh te lghiikut _ , _ itupill _ maqagh aqe yagh lghiit _ .
uglaghi yalghiikut _ alngunak _ sa meng llu _ ulig meng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ alla ii aghagh kau qu kut _ .
kiyang _ atkug mnneng _ iimwaaghluki _ akite kaqe ukut _ puvite i _ qamanlluki _ ightughqennayukaata _ .
kuusmeyaghtugh kanga _ sighima kestagh aqe ukut _ yughaghvig m _ mission _ box-ngan _ maqagh lghii meng _ ulig meng _ .
itegagh lghute put _ naa mta _ itegagh anun _ qerngughte te aqe aput _ qayughllak _ itegagh i _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
Unanguluku _ teghtugh kete te negh mta _ naasqugh put _ nuugtesnemteki _ aneghnegh nge luta _ , _ qaamngaamta _ qavagh aqe lghiikut _ .
naave ut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh nghmini _ kenegh lghutagh k _ kumaghhneghminikek _ puqlaghtaqiinkut _ .
mat- ke qu tete negh mta _ qaprag te negh mta _ wata _ sukate luni _ puqlaghtaqiinkut _ .
Yugmekaghtat _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe ta i
ata mta _ naken _ imani _ lipeghsagh ma aki _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ .
Ketfaghyaqminiki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ .
wallu _ nutaan _ repall _ tamaaken _ pikengyalghiikut _ nutemkaghtameng _ whangkunni _ quyanagh ghllag t _ .
taawa _ qugwintapayugwek _ snowman-allu _ , _ sa n ta _ Claus-allu _ , _ candle-ek _ .
Kumaghsugllagngaamteki _ itake aput _ alla _ ayumiqun _ ketfagh yaghqaa luki _ nalighmeng _ quunpeng _ aflengakuraaqsaghqaaluki _ .
uqfig squghhagh ut
awatkaghtagh _ qemtamesalghii _ uqfig _ naken _ ata mta _ saghnaagha _ , _ National _ Guard-et _ tagi tke aat _ , _ ateghsaqminigu _ pine _ needle-ngi _ ifkagh te uute ma lghiit _ .
naken _ , _ wallu _ igaghvig meng _ naligkenka _ angayuqagh mta _ sungaghyug kegtagh meng _ crepe _ paper- meng _ pikengluteng _ tamaakut _ avayagh i _ iimgutfiikughyaqmegtegnegu _ legan _ whangkunni _ uqfiglluwhaq _ .
kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe sagh i _ tawaavek _ uqfig mun _ llilaghtughaaput _ .
leganqun _ whanga mni _ laluramke t _ mangteghiitnilnguut _ , _ catalog-eni _ esghagh aqe ke put _ tawaatelnguq _ kuusme m _ uqfig ut _ .
Allaaghlluwhaat _ kenghet _ uqfig kun _ iimgutkayugwet _ kumagh u negh meggni _ qallaqugh aqe ut _ , _ ornament-et _ , _ whangkuta llu _ igaghvig mi _ ulima aput _ uqfig kun
agaghte uute ghllag luki _ , _ uqfig squghhagh _ esghaqaaluni _ ughleghiighteghllagluni _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanglleg nagh igh te a _ uqfiillegaaghhaq _ .
Enkaangam _ ceiling-efut _ aghqesqughhaq _ qughaseketiigh ghllag luni _ iyaghvig mi _ ulimaagh mnneng _ , _ alla _ tamaa na _ aatkagh lghute _ agaghnga lghii _ .
iwernga _ naliighhiinaghput _ qikeghqungigalnguq _ amig igh te ghllag ghngaita _ .
kuusme m _ Cards-ngi
yughaghvig ut _ naken _ akmaken _ awtuqagh meng _ cards-engaqelghii _ ayumigh ke te nghaani _ ategh it _ negig luteng _ iikekagh t _ .
nagaqugh aqe ukut _ pika _ tugulagh te ni luki _ .
Yimiyumteggun _ taglagh aghte aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ uglaghllagwaaqelghii _ tugulagh te yagh uq _ .
Akulangitgun _ iwernga _ tugutagh ke ukut _ .
quyake pigte luki _ atghagh te luki _ yuvghiigh aqe aput _ , _ ila i _ mingle kun _ neve ste qugh aqe aput _ ,
ila i _ praasentasimun _ ateligh sigh ke aqe aput _ , _ iyagh ngllagh aqe ukut llu _ ila i _ aflenga kaqe aput _ .
piniqumtaagh nka _ tamaakunguut _ akmani _ nani _ skate-tiingelghiit _ naayvaghaghni _ .
aghni ut _ akughtuqagh meng _ qaasligh igh luteng _ .
qaasligh at _ nasaperaaghitlu _ sa meng _ melqugh meng _ esnelaaghusighluteng _ .
Iiggaghluteng _ muff-emeng _ .
anglikagh t _ taslugh kete te luteng _ skate-telghiit _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ qiighnite aghagh magh meng _ .
mangteghagh at _ qama _ puqlate sug nigh ghllag t _ nighug ghllag t _ .
Whanikunghaani _ entaqun _ skate-tetaqut _ qayughllak _ ighaleqetaagh lgu aqe ut _ .
tamaakut _ skate-tiingellghiit _ quyamsugnighllaget _ .
pinighnagh ghllag k _ qergese gput
qergese gput _ estaamaneng _ qergese ke lghiik _ qaspiqunneghilnguut _ enkaam _ uksugh mi _ kanegh meng _ umeg igh qite ghllag aqe uk _ .
Kaanghi _ iwernga _ pinighnagh ghllag t _ .
Umyugwamkun _ elngaatall _ navek _ tamaatum _ uqfig m _ akulangani _ piyaa aatagh aqe unga _ .
tamaa _ legan llu _ teghig ke saghsugnite ngugh t _ , _ yugsugnite ngugh t _ aliite aqe ut _ kanegh mi _ .
Sigiiqellghem _ esneghrugwi _ kumlate igate ngugh t _ kiig u ste aqe anka _ .
kumlu mnneng _ ighneghwaagh mnneng _ aneghnegh mnneng llu _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ qagaavek _ esghapag na luta _ .
ilangakun _ qafsinʼgulluku _ ughugsigh te aqe ukut _ qayughllak _ umu ghllaget _ .
naqamllu _ esghaatepag igate ngugh u kut _ alungutellegh _ qakma _ .
repall _ whanga mni _ qergese k _ taake uk _ esghagh uqagh u lutek _ kuusmete yug nighllug tek _ ayuqe uk _ .
qantaghtugh i _ Praasentasimeng
ata ut _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ piraamsi negh ghllag _ .
talwa _ qantaghtu llegh i _ ayugwinnaqepiglluki _ ila i _ tapghaghpawaaghmeng _ .
ila i _ sa u aat _ atugh qagh ghhaat _ naghaghutet _ aatkagh t _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luteng _ qantagh aqe ai _ .
taakut _ qantagh llegh i llu _ leganqun _ praasentaasiwaqut _ .
neqamike aqa llu _ tamaani _ quunpeng _ ilughagh niigh te neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ .
ata ma _ ilughagh ni _ praasentaa _ qiipaghagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ iiggagh t _ , _ laluramke t _ iigge ait _ .
inglu inagh a _ mekestaaghhagh kun _ pinighnaghsaag pigte luku _ qantagh luku _ , _ inglu a _ aangeghllag kun _ sa kun _ pikraghniite luku _ qantagh luku _ .
naa mta _ ungipaghagh te aqe ainkut _ ingaghte uute negh mta _ qavaragkiighesqelluta _ qantaghtugh na luteng _ .
qenwat _ naave ut _ tulughagh aqe uq _ whangkuta _ Kuusmenaqem _ tengghuniqem _ praasentasighqiitneng _ legreyugwem _ qavagh lghaghtugh gpenaamta _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh t _ Praasentasit
whanga mni _ tegh igh na ghllag _ nengyugh ut _ iimgutangllaannemteggu _ .
elngaatall _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ulimaaqaghput _ .
Qiipaghameng _ , _ uygiinaghmeng _ , _ melqighaghmeng _ kakipiggaghmeng _ ulimalaghteghaqaput _ .
ila i _ qafsina neng _ esteg lgu aqe luteng _ , _ zipper-elwaaqluteng _ , _ nagtuqagh lgu aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ tuugtekayugwet _ .
Ilaakwaaput _ ayapghaatagh meng _ , _ kameg meng _ , _ allighte meng _ uliimaamnneng _ praasentalaghaaqaput _ .
ila i llu _ legan _ qiipapiggaghmeng _ whangkunneng _ ulima tete luki _ kaki iqe aput _ .
Ivaghileghtaagaqukut _ anglegute ke te lghii ni _ qantagh yaghqagh meng _ kinku nun _ .
sa tke igate ke put _ seghleqesisigalkeput _ atuqe aat _ sa u aat _ praasentasiqneghmeng _ liisimake luku _ tawaateteghngiita _ quyake lleqe kangit _ .
anglegute ke te lghii ni _ tamaanlengughmeng _ esghaqu sigh ghllag mnneng _ praasentataqukut _ whangkunneng _ .
Naatngwaaghlutallu _ qantaghkagh meng _ uyghagsugnite ngugh meng _ candy-meng _ sa n ta _ Claus-em _ iiyagh mteggun _ kanaghte vike ma kanginkut _ .
taana _ qaamggunginaq _ aygughikaaqa _ .
yughaghvig mi llu _ igaghvig mi llu _ prasentaasit _ tunqugh aqe ait _ program-eneghmeng _ taaqenghaata _ .
aange lghiit _ qiipaghagh t _ nasagh i llu _ aligh a llu _ qepe luki _ praasentaasiput _ aglagh te aqe ait _ .
ata mta _ quunpeng _ sa u aat _ igaqugh aqe kangi _ , _ talwa _ praasentasiput _ naken _ pi u ta i _ igaqugh aqe ai _ akite yaghqagh t _ .
Qelaaneghnaghllak _ , _ iwernga _ turn-kaghtaamta _ iyaqughaaqii _ .
Red _ Cross-em _ Salngaawrii
iyaghvig mi _ tunqugh aqe ainkut _ Red _ Cross-et _ tunusagh itneng _ .
Salngaawaasqughhaat _ naqam _ imagh ghllag t _ .
imigh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u aqe ut _ , _ igaasigh t _ , _ ruler-et _ , _ igaasigh mun _ ipegsagh sigh t _ , _ handkerchief-et _ , _ igaghyaghqagh ngestagh t _ , _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ iye it _ uumkayugwet
neveghlleghhiini _ , _ color-et _ , _ taqughutagh t _ , _ mesunat _ , _ jacks-etlu _ , _ compass-esqughhaaklu _ taawa _ .
ata mnun _ tuune agka _ aqupileghsaghaatkegkek _ ulimaagh minun _ atuqe na lukek _ , _ usputaasiqumaagkenka _ iyaqraasiqumaagkenka _ .
mekelghiigh nun _ aghnaghagh nun llu _ Red _ Cross-et _ qantaghtuqagh u ut _ tamaakut _ .
Mission-em _ salngag i
Enkaangam _ yughaghvig meng _ seal- nga u uute aqe uq _ qamagte luni _ sivuqagh m _ family- nga _ .
mangteghagh m _ imigh a _ qamagte luteng _ aatkagh nge te aqe ut _ , _ sakenge uute aqe ut _ .
aatkagh it _ , _ jeans-engit _ nutaghaghllugwaaqut _ .
ila it _ suit-em _ qaasligh a _ aangeghngaata _ aataqaaput _ .
ulig t llu _ quyanagh ghllag t _ quilt-et _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
aklungi igh i ste aqe ainkut _ yughaghvimtaallu _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh sighqagh t
naa mta _ atkuyaangllaghteghaqiinkut _ qiipaghagh meng _ nalighmeng _ igaghrakegtellghan _ avlaawaatam _ qantagh aneng _ .
pinigh ghllagu aqe ut _ atkuyaag put _ .
enkaam _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ ggaatmengllu _ qulliiraaghmengllu _ .
naave ut _ angatughqe i aqe uk _ ilangakun _ unug llegh ke sigh _ kakisigh aqe uq _ aatkaghraaghiisqelluta _ .
alla _ naa mta _ nuyagh lghute put _ qipellegaghteghaqii _ qupughhughkagh meng _ qiipaghagh meng llu _ coffee _ can-em _ qelpeghte llegh an _ savikenghaagh i _ igaghqwaagh meng
qantagh luki _ .
igamsiqa yug llegh ka
sa u a _ Kuusmeyaq _ , _ praasentaasiq _ , _ laalighqwaagh te _ apeghiigh nghaani _ kuusme m _ pinigh na aqe te ni _ taawa _ kagpagtughaqaghput _ .
kuusmeyaghkagh _ ataata ut llu _ pugughilegh mun _ aglanqigtutuq _ .
taawa _ mangteghagh squghhagh ut _ nunaatughqwaagaa _ iwernga _ elngaatall _ pinighyug te ukut _ quya te ukut _ .
uteghmun _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ Kuusmelleghput _ nengllugute ke te lghii ni _ qerngaaghhaamta _ , _ akluma ghngaamta _ , _ kayute ke teqaghte luta _ .
akluma lleg mnnun _ iilqe ste gpenaamta _ angayuqagh mta _ apeghtugh ma aqe ainkut _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ pivake luki _ aflengakngwaaghluki _ .
kina _ alngunak _ kayusiite luku _ .
Taananguuq _ Kuusmelleghput _ neqamike aqa _ pinigh ghllag _ .
pupig allugh _ mekelghiigh _ nulightugh lghii
ungipaghagh ta a _ Tuliim
eltughagh ghhagh a _ taana _ pupig ghllag _ quunpeng _ kumeg aqe lghii _ , _ “ _ g-g-g _ , _ g-g-g _ . _ ”
Taagkennguq _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ keveg aqe ma kanga _ aghnangllaatesqelluni _ .
nenglutuqagh _ .
pi ma kanga _ eltughagh n _ , _ “ _ aghnangllagh yagh uute nga _ . _ ”
Iquklighpigaghnun _ aghnangllagh yagh ma lghii _ nengyugh a _ .
taagken _ kaate ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Qamaay _ !
eltughagh ghhagh ma nguq _ panig n _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu nakanga _ . _ ”
“ _ Nakaannguq _ .
Sakesqelluninguq _ pi a _ .
aagra ligh u aghte ngugh lug ni _ ?
aante i ste u luni _ ? _ ” _ akite ma kangat _ .
taagken _ sivugte ma lghii _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ eltughagh ni _ , _ “ _ Sakesqellutennguq _ pi ziin _ ?
aagra ligh u aghte u luten _ ?
aante i ste u luten _ ? _ ”
eltughagh ghhagh n _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ila itnun llu _ piigh ten _ aatak _ . _ ”
ila itnun llu _ taglagh laatagh ma lghii _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
taagken _ sivuligh t _ saaqwligh ghhagh itnun _ .
kaate luni _ qineghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
pi laatagh ma kangi _ , _ “ _ eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ , _ panig gpek nguq _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ ”
pi laatagh ma kangat _ , _ “ _ Sakesqelluni _ pi a _ ? _ ”
Tawatengwaaghwaaq _ sivuligh ghhagh m _ akuzillegh atun _ akite laatagh aat _ .
taagken _ sivugte laatagh uq _ .
atghagh laatagh uq _ .
kaate yan _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ ? _ ”
nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ imatuq _ aghni lleqe aten _ .
qenwat _ anaguleghtesleqaghpenga _ . _ ”
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ , _ “ _ whanga llu _ anaguleghlleqamken _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ qamagte ma kanga _ nenglu _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh t _ nenglu t _ taku ma kangi _ .
Legannguq _ qineghte uq _ , _ yug nguq _ esghagh u aghagh a _ .
Yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ seal- gnun _ pi ziin _ ? _ ”
nulighh a _ nuughqaghte ma lghii _ .
nuughqaghte luni _ pi ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ , _ “ _ neqe leg nun _ pi ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nakaan _ , _ neqe leg nun _ pi nghite unga _ .
eltughagh ghhagh ma _ keveg aqe aanga _ .
Panigennguq _ pinigh llegh a _ tugu ligu _ . _ ”
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tugu naqe a _ .
atghagh lleqe uq _ , _ maligte lleqe aaten _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ ugwiineghmeng _ ighsa luni _ .
naa an _ angegh te yu nghite kanga _ tawavek _ yaywaali mun _ , _ qayughllak _ pupig ghllag u lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ .
taagken _ itegh luni _ aghnagh aq _ aagra nun _ ayapegh ma yagh lghii _ .
vuvegh k _ aghipa ghllag u uk _ .
kangighagh ghhagh kun _ peghleghte ma lghii _ , _ ighu gni _ qantagh lukek _ atkug mineng _ .
qiya ma lghii _ , _ ugwikaghqani _ nagasaqminigu _ , _ kumeg yalghiimi _ , _ “ _ g-g-g _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ , _ eltughagh ghhagh ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ ghhute gnun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
kelig ma kanga _ pupig a _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ piniighqwaamakanga _ .
esghaqaaluni _ nukalpigagh _ , _ pinighhalek _ !
taagken _ nenglu mi _ nategh a _ tanughqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nenglu ni _ tukegh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nanigh t _ kumagh qugh ma kangi _ .
nenglu _ nighuwhalek _ .
nunivag m _ tungangani _ nenglu mi _ miinglutanga _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ , _ awergha _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ atg- ke uk _ , _ ilepghaaq _ , _ qallevag _ , _ kapesegaq _ , _ agaghte uute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ aywaa n _ tunganga _ , _ megh m _ tungangan _ miinglutanga _ qelpeghte ma kanga _ .
tanemlleqa _ aklungi _ nusug ragh ma kanga _ .
eltughagh ni _ taagken _ pilugug ma kanga _ ukileghyag meng _ .
quyngigh liigh ghllag ma lghii _ .
sagnegh ghllag t _ malghugnegh t _ pugnegh meng _ imigh ma kangi _ .
alegh kek _ mekestaaghhagh k _ qaye gkenkun _ tawaqapig t _ lli ma kangi _ .
aghnagh aq _ teghsagh ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ , _ “ _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ , _ angayuqagh ten _ neqe meng _ taglaate ki _ . _ ”
taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ ugwikaghqaminun _ , _ esghaghyaqminigu _ nukalpigagh _ pinighhalek _ !
aghnagh aq _ nenglagh kau ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Tehem _ , _ tehem _ . _ ”
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sukate luten _ aqume i _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ aqume luni _ aatkagh ni _ mataghte qugh ma kangi _ .
alla neng _ aatkagh neng _ tuune ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh m _ .
qalleg vag ma lghii _ naayghagh _ ughug kestagh lghii stun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ , _ ukileghyag m _ angtalanganeng _ .
taagken _ kapesegaamalghii _ qaye akun _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghiik _ ugwikullghiik _ .
Sagneghpaget _ tugu luki _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
kaate lutek _ mangteghagh mun _ , _ aghnagh aq _ tuqlugh i ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Qamaay _ ! _ kenegh meng _ nuug te ngnga _ . _ ”
aghnaghagh t _ anighqute _ kumaghllug qu _ nuug te ma kangat _ .
Esghaghyaqmegtekek _ ne k _ pinighhalek _ ! _ qimag ma lghiit _ .
itegh qaghtagh te ma lghiit _ , _ kenegh eng _ unite luku _ .
ungipaate ma kegket _ angayuqagteng _ , _ “ _ ne k _ sama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ ! _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ pi laatagh ai _ , _ “ _ sukate lusi _ , _ kenegh meng _ tuune tengnga _ . _ ”
kenegh meng _ aatghute ma lghiit _ .
itegh ma lghiik _ ugwikullghiik _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh m _ saki ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nunalgute ten _ kelgugh ki _ .
Tagilaghallinnguq _ . _ ”
tagi laghate ma lghiit _ .
Iteghaasata _ ungipamsug te ma kangi _ pupig mineng _ qalmamineng _ .
taagken _ sagneghpagem _ angenegh kek _ tawavek _ ellngit nun _ neghesimakek _ .
taagken _ qiliigh nagh meng _ tawaqapig meng _ qaneghmiquumakangi _ .
taake uk _ ila kek _ sagnegh m _ saki minun _ tuune ma kek _ .
taagken _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
aghnaghagh t _ maligte ma kegket _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnaghagh t _ ayapegh lghiit _ amiwaagh kun _ repa ma aqe kangi _ , _ qayughllak _ angayuqagh ita _ ighleke kaqe kangit _ .
taawa _ nulightugh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
tefaay _ !
Iistumiim _ tugukagh i _ afsengagh m _ negh kangi _ qamagte luki _ , _ siipte te aghte gpenaan _ uksuqun _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
seghleghyugkagh _ elngaatall _ .
iwernga _ nanevgagh _ afsengagh _ pi ke aq _ , _ “ _ itagnagh uq _ ellnga llu _ kitum _ panike a _ . _ ”
tawaten _ pi llegh mikun _ segheve tke a _ , _ neqamike yaghqaaghtekagh a _ allameng _ afsengagh t _ neqe meng _ naange te fqiita _ pi yaghqaaghtekagh _ .
Ugwingan _ piniqsaliitaghaqaa _ qayughllak _ ila ni _ sumegh ke sag u te kangi _ , _ nangllegtaghtekanga _ .
Iistumii _ megnu nagh lghii meng _ liite lghii
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ taakunnguq _ aghnaghagh t _ tallimat _ .
aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ , _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ taagaveqaaghaq _ kaate luteng _ iigge llegh ghllag _ kaate ma kangat _ aange pigte lghii _ .
ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ kanagh ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ qelpeghsaqminigu _ peknegh meng _ imigh ghllag luni _ .
tagsigh ai _ ila ni _ , _ “ _ tagi tek _ , _ whaa _ naalkute unga _ . _ ”
taakut _ aghnaghagh t _ tagi ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ Iistumii _ , _ ila a _ ketngigtu ma ai _ , _ ataasigh _ Qugtuqaghtuurughmii _ , _ enkaam _ Aghveghtughmii _ , _ tallimaat _ Ullungagtuuru _ .
taagken _ elngaatall _ nengighqe ait _ aghnaghagh t _ taakut _ kenigh megteggun _ tawanlluki _ , _ siqlugwaq _ avangiitngwaaghluku _ .
tawaten _ peghu vyiigh luku _ unite ma kangat _ .
elngaatall _ quya pigte luteng _ aglagh ut _ aghnaghagh t _ .
aglagh luteng _ ne meggnun _ , _ ugwinga _ Iistumiim _ naken _ pi a _ , _ entaqun _ ama _ peknegh yaghkagh _ .
itegh luni nguq _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ elngaatall _ sumeghtaghagh ghllag _ .
Ugwingan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ iyatagh unga _ , _ siqlugwaghqu _ . _ ”
taawa _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
“ _ enta _ sukate luten _ iyatagh unga _ siqlugwaghqu _ , _ ” _ pi laatagh aa _ ugwingan _ .
alingughyug te inagh mineng _ aane luni _ siqlugwani _ legan _ esghapagtu qiinagh luku _ unite ma kanga _ .
unite luku _ , _ ugwini _ pi ma kanga _ :
“ _ Aay _ , _ uqesqaghhaghma _ sa ite u unga _ !
Iistumiinkut _ , _ ketngigtu ma ainkut _ ,
Aghveghtughmiinkut _ , _ Ullungagtuurunkut _ ,
qugtuqagh mii nkut _ naangsimiit _ ! _ ”
legan _ ugwingan _ tawavek _ , _ qezigh ni _ amqeghte aghte luku _ , _ siingyaqminigu _ legan _ aga _ nevaghmi _ ullegh uq _ , _ qeteghaghtuq _ .
imani nguq _ pi a _ qiya magh mi _ :
“ _ Maketengngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ !
Maketengngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ ! _ ”
Taawanlengughnguq _ ugwatangani _ nanevgagh ghllag _ , _ afsengagh _ .
Taam _ pi ma kanga _ :
“ _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ ,
Qughrughaam _ avaqutagh a _ ,
Kuyapegrugaaghem _ eltugh aa _ ! _ ”
makete ma kanga _ .
tawaten _ esghapaghngaaghmigu _ legan _ siinge laatagh aa _ !
legan _ qiyaaqe lghii _ aghnagh _ :
“ _ Maketengngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ !
Maketengngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ , _ ngaay _ ! _ ”
Taagum _ pi laatagh aa _ :
“ _ makete gu _ , _ makete gu _ !
Qughrughaam _ avaqutagh a _ ,
Kuyapegrugaaghem _ eltugh aa _ ! _ ”
makete ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ aqumesimakanga _ .
taawa _ pinigh kau aghte a _ , _ aghyuugh kanga _ taam _ nanevgagh m _ .
taawa _ pinitun _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
tefaay _ , _ aliinghakun _ , _ amsanagh akun _ !
aa _ ggute ke a _ !
iyaa-kagh m _ ungipagh aa
qaa ii te aq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ gguusiqe ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ , _ Willu _ , _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ggute ka _ aqnigh ghllagu uq _ . _ ”
Willum _ ugwini _ seat- a _ itegh yan _ pi a _ , _ “ _ qaa ii te aq _ gguusiqe ghllagu uq _ . _ ”
“ _ tea- ai _ , _ Ggutlumun _ esghaghtesaghtugh ltegnegu _ , _ ” _ sa ta m _ qaa ii te aq _ pi ma kanga _ .
aagra neng _ nategh mun _ ategh lutek _ sa ta m _ atkug ni _ aate a _ .
Yugwet _ atkug teng _ nategh kun _ agaghtekayugu kangit _ .
qamaken _ suugwerngeneng _ Qiitaam _ naange a _ nuug luni _ Qiitaam _ nasaperagh a _ tuune a _ .
Qiitaam _ nasaperagh ni _ aate luku _ , _ ata ke te lghiik _ aglagh uk _ Ggutlunkunun _ .
guygu u uq _ Ggutlunkut _ mangteghagh at _ .
kaate yaghtugh yalghiimek _ tepe a _ neqnigh ghllag _ naagh aa _ Qiitaam _ , _ oven-kun _ neqekrangllaghpag ni _ .
Qiitaankut _ ellngit _ egllu ite ngugh t _ .
nanigh meng _ gaaghusigh ke lghiit _ .
Oven-kun _ gaaqagh m _ tepe anga _ nalluniitngwaalghii _ naaghyaqminigu _ neqnigh ghllag _ .
Eslakliq _ amigh k _ qelpate uq _ .
Qiitaankuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ saayguraagh mun _ itegh yalghiimek _ nategh meggneng _ alla u uq _ imani _ , _ suugwerngengiteftuq _ .
ilukligh _ amigh k _ qelpeghsaqmegteggu _ aagra stun _ ayuqe nghite uq _ .
nengigh ita _ qaamnangat _ igaghtestun _ , _ yughaghte stun _ ayuqe uq _ .
taawa _ egllu k _ oven-elgek _ , _ maalghug _ qayungllaasigh k _ qaye ani _ .
egllu m _ qula ani _ llivelghagh mi _ taawa _ coffee-ngllaasiqlu _ qayugh ligh sigh llu _ .
llivelghagh lgu uq _ mingle mi _ inglugtun _ .
Table-ek _ qergese m _ manu ani _ .
kangighagh mi _ taawa _ sa u ak _ llivelghagh k _ , _ qaye gkeni _ ukitu tete lutek _ angighhe te leg k _ aghmigusigh k _ .
Ggutlum _ upugha te ai _ .
“ _ uteghvagh lusi _ .
aqume i _ taaggun _ , _ ” _ keniimaagkenka _ aqumutagh k _ .
sa ta m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ gguusiqe lghii _ taana _ esghaqigh sqellug qu _ tagi aqe ukung _ . _ ”
“ _ aa-a _ , _ taaggun _ aqume i _ , _ ” _ aghmigusigh leg m _ llivelghagh m _ saaghw akun _ aqume sqe a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ Ggutlum _ .
“ _ whaa _ legan _ esghagh naqe aqa _ .
qayugh a _ utaqa i te kete luku _ , _ ” _ Ggutlum _ pi a
seat- a _ .
aghnagh m _ seat- a _ qayugh ste a _ , _ neqekrangllagh meng _ tuune a llu _ .
Ggutlum _ taku luku _ qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ “ _ agitaghten _ . _ ”
qaa ii te aq _ agitaghte yan _ Ggutlum _ yuvghiigh ai _ ggutangi _ .
“ _ Natungwaa _ aqnigh lghii _ , _ ” _ aapte a _ .
qaa ii ta m _ kelgute a _ .
“ _ kii _ , _ suflu u ma lghii _ , _ pinighsagh naqe aqa _ , _ ” _ Ggutlum _ pi a _ .
“ _ Siimiiyaq _ !
kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ , _ ” _ Ggutlum _ tuqlugh aa _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ qemtagh meng _ ukig uq _ .
“ _ taana _ kayute ke aqa _ , _ ” _ Ggutlum _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ .
Ggutlum _ gguutniighusini _ piite te kete luki _ , _ Siimiiyaq _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Tazingkuk _ igarutaagh k _ tagite kek _ . _ ”
Igarutaaghsugningiighhiilnguuk _ tagite ak _ .
itegagh mineng _ Siimiiyaam _ sa u ak _ tukeghraghaak _ .
Ggutlum _ tugumiigh aneng _ Qiitaam _ nagate a _ , _ “ _ tzzzz _ , _ tzzzz _ , _ tzzzz _ ” _ .
Ggutlum _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ “ _ iflasagh luku _ whaken _ kaape sigh meng _ , _ igarutaagh luku _ ilaagh naqe aqa _ .
piniighte lleqe a _ aqnigh nanigh lleqe uq _ .
Siimiiyaam _ kayusigh naqe aanga _ . _ ”
“ _ agitaghten _ , _ ” _ Ggutlum _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ .
agitaghte uq _ qaa ii te aq _ .
pi laatagh aa _ Ggutlum _ , _ “ _ Qaanghen _ kagpestaagh pigu uq _ agitaghte ghllag i _ . _ ”
qaa ii te aq _ quneghqumaghmi _ agitaghte ghllag yan _ ifla uute yagh aa _ .
Maateqwaqun _ nagate a _ temngi _ , _ “ _ tzzzz _ ” _ aqnighte nghite te a _ .
Ggutlum _ , _ Qiitaam _ ggutanga _ qepghagh luku _ taaqe yamigu _ pi a _ , _ “ _ taawa _ taaqe amken _ alla _ aqnigh naanghite uq _ . _ ”
taaqe yan _ qaa ii te aq _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ neqekrangllagh ta ii sqesugh ghngaamken _ qaanghen _ umughqwaangalghii _ .
ang _ , _ aglagh kuvek _ qaanghen _ piniightekan _ negh naketen _ . _ ”
paper _ sack-a _ tuune a _ , _ imani _ tepe kegte uq _ .
Qiitaankuk _ sa ta nkuk _ aane aqngamek _ sa ta m _ igamsiqa yug vike ai _ Ggutlunkut _ .
Qiitaam _ aglagh te kete luku _ naagh aqe a nguq _ tugumiigh ni _ , _ oven-kun _ gaaqagh t _ neqekrangllagh t _ .
kaspig m _ paqnamiqe llegh a
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ tengutkaleg nkuk _ ungipagh aat
kaspig _ itegh yaghagh ma lghii _ , _ qayugh ghllag nge uq _ anuqe ghllag _ aqlagha ghllag _ , _ uksugh u lghii _ .
wata _ anuqligh kanga _ umegnegh ughte magh mi _ teghigniighuskanga _ esla mi _ naghaaq _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ pinighyuugtuq _ nighugh lghii llu _ puqlalnguq _ nenge aat _ .
suupe liighpag ni _ naagh ma kanga _ .
naange a _ quyngigh meng _ suupe liigh aqe uq _ neqekrangllagh magh mi _ suupeliightugh sighqagh meng _ .
“ _ kameg gken _ ufsug yaghtugh kek _ !
itegh kuvek _ agaghte nakegken _ , _ ” _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ .
kaspig _ ategh luni _ saayguraagh mun _ ufsug luni _ , _ itegh luni _ kameg gni _ agaghte ma kek _ .
taagken _ taku ma kek _ anengagh ni llu _ nayagganillu _ .
anengagh a _ atightugh aqe uq _ igagh neng _ library-meng _ navghaghkagh mineng _ .
Nayaaggaa _ negikragh aqe uq _ taghnughhaghwaghmeng _ magazine-melngughmeng _ .
apa _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ table-legni _ .
kaspig m _ taku luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Apaay _ ungipaghagh te nakefkut _ ! _ ”
taghnughhagh t _ nagasugwaqegkangat _ apa eng _ ungipaghagh nghaani _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi _ taghnughhagh u luni _ naghaagh llegh meggneng _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kangi llu _ ayvegh niigh llegh meggneng _ , _ nanugh niigh llegh mineng _ .
piniqe lleghpigagh ke aqe kangit _ ungipagh ai _ mayeraaghpag t llu _ teghig ke sagh t llu _ akuzikayugwet _ .
“ _ ungipaghagh u lleqe amsi _ ighivgaqun _ mayeraaghpag meng _ unʼganlengughmeng _ kellii ni _ , _ ” _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .
kaspig _ suupe liigh uute kete luku _ sumeghtaghamalghii _ qelanghumaghmi _ apa ita _ ungipaghagh u lleghqagh aneng _ , _ sa naqe lleqe a tuq _ mayeraaghpag _ !
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ egllu m _ saaghw ani _ aqume te ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ apa eng _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ungipagh aa _ . _ ”
legan _ iiwen _ sumeghtaghaatkengnginaghngaaghmigu _ apa mi _ ungipaghagh qugh a _ , _ iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ .
apa at _ piinligh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ apegh vagilgamkun _ kellii n _ mayeraaghpag a _ apegh naqe aqa _ naayvagh m _ yug nge sta _ .
ilangani _ nalluniite aqe uq _ qayughllak _ megh _ qapragtaqegkanga _ .
uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ siku yuwhaagh nghaani _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ siku igate ngughk _ .
ila a _ naten _ siku llghite kayug _ .
tamaakut _ siku llghite ngugh t _ ategh i _ negagh yu llegh ke aat _ .
Yusengetaghhaam _ megh _ qapragtaqegkanga _ kumlate snanigh aqe kanga _ qayughllak _ naayvagh _ iingunagh mi _ siku nghaani _ naayvagh m _ ilu a _ mamleghqwaagaqegkanga _ qule mun _ esghapag nanigh aqe lghii _ .
enkaam _ aghtugh yagute llegh minun _ kenlanga _ negayulqalgusnaqaqegkanga _ . _ ”
“ _ Apaay _ , _ sa aqa ngam _ negagh yu llegh ke i aghte te nghaani _ ? _ ”
kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
“ _ Yusengetaghhaq _ qefliqe ghllag aqe lghii _ enkaam _ kumlate snanigh i aqe lghii _ siku _ umughtesnanighaqegkanga _ megh _ qapragtaqluku _ .
utaqa i aqe lghii _ kanagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ kanagh kata _ ila ke na luki _ siku m _ asi ani _ mamleg ghllag mi _ . _ ”
“ _ Saaqanngam _ kanaghkagh t _ ? _ ” _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nalluke aput _ , _ enkaam _ pinigh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ kinku t _ kanagh kata _ . _ ”
“ _ Natenngam _ pi lleqe sta _ , _ sa yaghqaa sta _ , _ apaay _ ? _ ”
“ _ sa lleghqagh meng _ liisimake luni _ pinigh uq _ .
kayute meng _ aqfate qaghte yaghqagh t _ .
ila ita _ sayug naqe yaghqagh at _ taana _ kanaghkagh _ .
Kelengangwaaghluni _ esnevapagllafqaami _ kanagh na yu ka mi _ ellnga llu _ . _ ”
“ _ Samengam _ sayug sigh ke lleqe sta _ , _ ” _ kaspig m _ aapte a _ .
“ _ ivagh i luni _ sa meng _ , _ uunghameng _ , _ taake lghii meng _ unaghsigh meng _ , _ talwa _ jacket-tet _ aligh a _ qillghuquulluki _ , _ sa u aat _ tafsi t _ , _ sayug sighqagh u luki _ tawavek _ kanaghkagh mun _ .
aqlagha mi _ nusugwaghhnaqsaghqaalghiit _ kanaghkagh t _ .
Isekinami _ yugwet _ mulupag igate ngugh t _ . _ ”
“ _ kelenga ghllag lleqe unga _ negayulqameng _ .
wiin _ yusengetaamesunghitunga _ mamleg ghllag mi _ .
Kelliinngam _ mayeraaghpag a _ apegh ghhu _ , _ ” _ kaspig m _ pi a _ .
“ _ aa _ , _ ” _ apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taana _ mayeraaghpag _ kellii nite ngughk _ wata _ seghleghataghaaguq _ , _ yakughnaghataghtuq _ .
umiileg ke a _ kellii n _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ , _ siku yan _ , _ iiwem _ , _ tungyuum _ , _ maaqellegh m _ .
ilangani _ wata _ ugumi yagute ghllag aqe ai _ yugwet _ wataqaaghaq _ naayvagh m _ yungestagh aneng _ talwa _ . _ ”
“ _ sa aqa ngam _ ? _ ” _ kaspig m _ aapte ma kanga _ .
“ _ puughte aqe ai _ yugwet _ , _ ” _ apa an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ puughte i sighqaghtu ghllag uq _ . _ ”
“ _ sangaawa t _ puughte i sagh i _ ? _ ” _ kaspig m _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ anglegute ni _ nagate ma luki _ iye it _ nangllagraketun _ .
“ _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ sigugnegh _ .
alqime i an _ tamaa na _ puughte i sagh igh kaqe a _ .
qaye mineng _ esghaqaaluni _ anigu _ nallunagh lghii _ piiznga ta a _ megh mun _ , _ tuute lghii ni _ ifkagh te na lghii _ .
kayute meng _ aqfaate uute ghngaaghmeng _ kaate ste gpenaki _ aga _ ughhe yaghqagh _ ifkagh tke aq _ . _ ”
“ _ esnaghni ii te qugh a mi _ pinigh uq _ , _ ” _ kaspig _ pi ma lghii _ .
“ _ taawa _ ipa _ pi uten _ , _ ” _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ .
“ _ Taanangiinaanghituq _ puughte i sagh i _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ megh _ iiggwtesneghminigu _ esne _ uusqaghqwaagaqaa _ .
qiighnite luni _ aatqaghte lghii ni _ uugte naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ esneveqestiightesnanighaqiit _ .
wata _ taghnughhagh t _ esnagh niigh snanigh aqe ait _ . _ ”
“ _ Apaay _ , _ ungipagh aten _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
kelenga lleqe ukut _ mayeraaghpag meng llu _ yusengetaamengllu _ , _ ” _ kaspig _ pi ma lghii _ . _ ”
“ _ Ingaghsaghtughtegngam _ ! _ ” _ apa ita _ pi ma kangi _ eltughagh ni _ .
“ _ unaami _ igaghyagh yaghqaa usi _ . _ ”
“ _ Goodnight _ apa _ , _ ” _ kaspig m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sunanguq _ qavangugh ke nghite langi _ mayeraaghpag t _ . _ ”
taagken _ ingaghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
Meghnum _ sukate luni _ qavamalghii _ talwa _ unug llegh ke sigh _ qavangugh qagh gpenani _ .
unaami _ ellmaaraghqwaamakanga _ , _ siqi neghllug ughte ma kanga _ .
qayug nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kaspig _ aane luni _ ilakumtaagh ke te lghiik _ igaghvig mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aleghqugh tke magh an _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe gkan _ sa lleghqagh ek _ .
kaspig _ nagallaaghpenani _ unaaghsi ma lghii _ .
Siqinghem _ repall _ anigu _ nighwaagpagtaghqelluku _ qakma _ .
nighwaagpagtagh llegh t _ esghagh nghminiki _ llangaqa nguq _ pi aqe aat _ , _ “ _ tea- ai _ aane i _ , _ naghaagh yagh a _ . _ ”
kaspig m _ kellaag k _ esghagh nghminikek _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kek _ sa yamek _ nalleq _ sukangiite ghllag akek _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ imani _ .
qenwat llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ riisaaghnaqnimakangi _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ amig mun _ piyug ragkiighute ma lghiit _ .
aane luteng _ naligh ita _ kaspig m _ ilakumtaagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ esnagh mun _ pi lta _ , _ siku _ igleghte lghii _ esghapag yaghtugh lteggu _ . _ ”
kaspig llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k llu _ maalghug _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
agigte yalghiimeng _ talwa _ kellaag igh a _ pinighnagh pigte uq _ .
sikuqwaagh ghhagh t _ aghuliighwaaghluteng _ llangaqa _ suupeliigh mi _ saltine _ cracker-et _ puglegha lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ataasigh m _ pi ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ “ _ kaangqwagh lta _ yeqay _ , _ siku t _ aghula i te u aghte ut _ ! _ ”
kaspig m _ aag llegh gni _ aatqaghtagh te yayek _ siku mun _ , _ sumeghtaghagh gpenani _ ellnga llu _ qetgegh ma lghii _ .
kaangqwagh te ma lghiit _ , _ teghigniqe te ma lghiit _ .
Awavanlleghpigaannaqusimalghiit _ .
kaangqwagh te ghngaaghmeng _ naligh t _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ ughhe aqe ai _ .
aragh ma kangi _ ila ni _ , _ “ _ Haak _ , _ uughhiinkuut _ ! _ ”
qamagte luteng _ kelute mun _ qiive luteng _ aragh u aghagh taute ma lghiit _ , _ “ _ Uughhiinkuu-ut _ ! _ Uughhiinkuut _ ! _ ”
qaasqagh mi _ yugwem _ angyagh meng _ qepghagh lghii m _ nagaqumakangi _ .
kayute meng _ piighaghte luni _ , _ dory-meng _ atghagh te luteng _ aqfa ma kangit _ ivenrumeng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ awavagh te ghllag ma kangi _ , _ llangaqa _ esghaqagh u luteng _ qawaaggaat _ sikuqaagh mi _ .
mulu gpenateng _ kaate luki _ tugu ma kangit _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ ellmeggneng _ esghaqagh qu te magh meng _ , _ naligh ghhagh inagh t _ iqenge aghte gpenateng _ , _ aghsughwaaluteng _ .
llangaqa nguq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh ni _ kelute mun _ muluugh ghllag lghiit _ .
llangaqa llu _ nunmaasquvegaghhaq _ igleghte lghiit _ .
kaspig _ tuufsagh nge ghllag ma lghii _ apa ni llu _ mayeraaghpag a llu _ kellii n _ sumeghtaghaatkesaqminikek _ .
qute mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .
Yugwet _ qaake ma kangit _ qute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ uugte ghngaaghmeng _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ mayugh ma lghiit _ qaasqagh mun _ igaghvig mun _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
kaspig m _ alegh kek _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghiik _ , _ “ _ sa meng tuq _ apeghtughiste mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ?
sa meng tuq _ igaghyagh lgute mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ?
sa meng tuq _ angayuqagh mta _ pi naqe inkut _ ? _ ”
kaspig m _ taananginaghhaq _ sumegh kekagh a _ , _ “ _ apa ma _ sa meng tuq _ pinagh kanga _ ? _ ”
qaasqagh m _ qaye anun _ qaygeghte yalghiimi _ pika _ esghagh aa _ yuug _ , _ apa ni _ .
Sikiggaam _ Puughneqguutkanga _ meteghllug ghrug
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ taana nguq _ sikiggaq _ meteghllugwem _ neghe vzigh qagh a _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ , _ meteghllug _ tengaa ma lghii _ pagani _ asitmun _ ivagh i magh mi _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
Sikigennguq _ ellnga ni _ elngaatall _ negh yugnagh lghiit _ .
esghaate yami _ yagtaghagh ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sikig _ riigte mineng _ aane luni _ navek _ pangaleg lghii _ .
Nalughqaghsimalghii _ riigte an _ manu akun _ .
Sikiggaq _ tagi luni _ itegh yug ghllag ghngaaghmi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ qayughllak _ meteghllug _ tawanlenguq _ .
taagken _ Sikiggaam _ itegh na luni _ puughte yuguma kanga _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Meteghlluuy _ , _ aghula aqe ziin _ ? _ ”
Sikiggaam _ aawallu _ meteghllug _ puughte aghte ma kanga _ .
“ _ aa-a _ , _ aghula pestaagh kayugu unga _ , _ ” _ quyaaghaghteghrugumaghmi _ meteghllug _ angegh aghte ma lghii _ , _ “ _ aghula nayagh unga _ legan _ whaa _ . _ ”
“ _ aa _ naqam _ ! _ ” _ Sikiggaam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ atugh utagh ghllag ken _ .
aghula _ . _ ”
taagken _ atugh te ma kanga _ iigge mineng _ saguyagh ke luni _ :
“ _ Qung _ qughlung _ qughlung _ , _ qung _ qughlung _ !
Qung _ qughlung _ qughlung _ , _ qung _ qughlung _ !
Qung _ qughlung _ quneghtepallaghqaaghluten _ ,
qung _ qughlung _ !
Qung _ qughlung _ avleghtepallaghqaaghluten _ ,
qung _ qughlung _ ! _ ”
meteghllug ghrug nguq _ aghula ma lghii _ yaagpagte aghte aqe luni _ sighla ma lghii _ atugh te yatni _ .
Sikiggaam _ atuute mi _ quneghqennallgha _ kaate yagu _ , _ meteghllug _ quunghaghsimalghii _ .
Quneghqelluni _ elngaatall _ aghula ma lghii _ .
Sikiggaghnguq _ atugh ghllag _ , _ whatennguq _ pi magh mi _ lliigh uq _ , _ “ _ itegagh n _ inglu a _ quulvani _ , _ qughlung _ . _ ”
Legannguq _ Meteghllugwem _ itegagh ni _ quulvaghaghteghruneghminigu _ paagguqaghaq _ .
Sikiggaq _ sukanghhaghmitun _ itegh qaghte ma lghii _ taam _ aghula lghii m _ Meteghllugwem _ ighu gkenka _ akule gkenkun _ .
Meteghllugwem _ akuqagh yagh aa _ yaghlegi _ papeg igh inagh a _ akuqamakanga _ , _ sakeqe ma kanga _ .
iwernga _ Sikiggaq _ itegh qagh uq _ sakeqe llegh meng _ papeg ligh luni _ .
meteghllug _ unite qaghte ma kanga _ papeg m _ sakeqe llegh aneng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aglagh te ma kanga _ .
riigte mi _ ilu ani _ ngillegrugsimaghmi _ iilqumalghi _ papeg igh te ni luni _ .
qiive magh mi _ ataasigh _ avaqutagh ani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Natungam _ sikiggaq _ papeg ita _ ?
aatak _ veghte naqe yaghtuqagh ghhu _ paapgaqa _ meteghllug meng _ .
qikmigh m nguq _ iye aneng _ naveghlleqaqa _ . _ ”
Meteghllugwem _ ne anun _ sikigaghaq _ aglagh luni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ naa ma _ papeg ni _ veghute sqellug qu _ aapte sqe aaten _ .
Naveghlleqaanguq _ qikmigh m _ iye aneng _ . _ ”
Meteghllugwem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tuuneqaghte naanghite aqa _ papeg a _ .
saama llu _ qikmigh m _ iye aneng _ pitu unga _ . _ ”
aglagh ma lghii _ sikigaghaq _ naa ni _ ungipagh saghtu ma kanga _ Meteghllugwem _ kiimsitanganeng _ .
“ _ kii _ , _ natungam _ sikig _ papeg ita _ , _ ” _ ngillegte pigte luni _ sikigaghaam _ naange a _ pilataamalghii _ .
“ _ enta _ aatak _ ungipanneqigsaghtughhu _ neghsagh m _ iiynganenguq _ naveghlleqaqa _ papeg ka _ . _ ”
Sikigaghaq _ aglagh nqigte ma lghii _ Meteghllugwem _ ne anun _ .
taawanginaq _ waakepanghillataghtuq _ naavghute yaghqagh aneng _ Sikiggaam _ .
“ _ yaghlegillu _ whaa _ iyetu unga _ , _ ” _ Meteghllugwem _ pi ma kanga _ sikigaghaq _ .
Sikigaghaq _ aglagh nqigte luni _ naa ni _ ungipasimakanga _ Meteghllugwem _ kiimsigh llegh aneng _ .
Sikigaghaam _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ ungipasaghtughhu _ whaa nguq _ naveghlleqaqa _ maatenllaam _ neqnighrakegtameng _ .
ungipaate naken _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ tuune lleqe aqa _ . _ ”
Sikiggaam _ avaqutagh ghhagh a _ aglagh laatagh ma lghii _ meteghllug mun _ ungipaate na luku _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ naveghhnaaghniluku _ paapgaq _ .
Meteghllukrugwem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Naveghhnaanghitaa _ papeg ni _ naghuyagh m _ iye aneng _ , _ yeqaytuq _ aa _ , _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ .
itupill _ tamanameng _ naveghtesnaayaghaqa _ ! _ ”
aglagh luni _ sikigaghaam _ naa ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ wetku _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ naveghlleqniluku _ papeg a _ .
naa ngiighhagh a _ iilqamiqngwaaghluni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ kaay _ seghleghhalek _ , _ nakenngam _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ pikengnaqsinga _ ! _ ”
Sumeghyalightuq _ wata _ sumeghtaghaatkengngiinaq _ .
“ _ Emaay _ , _ ” _ sikigaghaam _ naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangan mi _ ivagh i nanigh stuung _ me ke ta ghhagh meng _ uyghag meng _ yugwem _ iye atun _ ayuqesugnilngughmeng _ , _ tawaten wha _ puughhnayanghisteggu _ meteghllug _ ! _ ”
Sikiggaam _ avaqutagh ghhagh ni _ tuune ma kanga _ qaliqenghaagh ghhagh meng _ aqeftaghaagh meng _ , _ pi ma kanga llu _ saghna yigh sqellug qu _ iyesugnitaaghmeng _ uyghag meng _ .
uteghnigh yan _ aqeftaghaghhani _ esleqe luku _ uyghag meng _ , _ naa an _ keveg aqlaatagh ma kanga _ meteghllug mun _ .
“ _ meteghllug _ , _ meteghllug _ , _ ang _ taawa _ piyukekagh gpeneng _ yugwem _ iye aneng _ tagite amken _ ! _ ” _ kaate qaghte te kete luku _ sikigaghaam _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ .
Efqughqwaamakanga _ elngaatall _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug nguq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Kgwugg _ , _ tea- ma ken ta _ esgha _ neghyugwaqelghiinga _ ! _ ”
Akuqwaamaan _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh _ sikigaghaghmun _ tuune ma kanga _ naa an _ papeg a _ .
aga _ sikigaghaq _ ne minun _ sukatngwaaghluni _ aglagh aghte ma lghii _ .
naa ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Emaay _ , _ taawa _ papeg n _ ! _ ”
naange a _ quyaapiglluni _ papeg ni _ aatqaghte ma kanga _ aga _ paperegte i inagh magh mi _ .
inga _ ne mini _ Meteghllugrugwem _ qelpeghte luku _ qaliqenghaagh _ aqeftaghaghhaq _ nusug ma kanga _ ataasigh _ uyghag _ iyete yu gnite ngughk _ .
taagken _ iigge mini _ ullghitaperegwaaghtesimakanga _ .
Neqnighyugwem _ angtale aneng _ qaangha _ meghaaghtu qu ma lghii _ .
aga _ qaneghmig aghte a nguq _ , _ imani nguq _ aqnighnagh ghhalek _ , _ kangruguteghllagumalghii _ C-R-U-U-U-N-C-H _ !
ayungkaghagh
tamekestagh t _ yaagigh igate ngugh t _ , _ ughhe igate ngugh t _ ellngaate meng _ , _ mesiigh meng _ ulimaagh t _ :
“ _ aghnagh aq _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ ayungkaghagh _ taana _ siipnegh _ tuune gu _ aghnaghaghhagh mun _ . _ ”
qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun
aagra m _ ilu yan _ paagna i _ , _ qulighnegh i _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ iiggagh ten _ qilaga t _ tulimagh itgun _ teghlegtekaqe anka _ . _ ”
aneghte lghii nguq _ ( _ aneghte lghii _ )
maaten _ pi llegh mitun _ alla _ pi iigh aatagh lghii _ :
Sikiggaq _ neghe lleg mta _ neqekrag m _ kagimleghwaagh aneng _ negh luni _ riigte minun _ aglagh luni _ itegh luni _ aag nghmini _ tagi aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte lghii nguq _ esghapag aat _ .
uumtagh m _ ( _ uumtagh _ )
nenglu m _ ilu yan _ nunamelnguut _ , _ sa meng _ alngunak _ kanaghfikegkayugwet _ :
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pirughtani _ qawaag m _ qateg i _ tukrug aat _ uumtagh m _ asi anun _ kanaghte ma kangi _ .
tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ ( _ tutmaghwaaq _ )
uksaagh mi _ nuna _ kumlaregagh nghaani _ ne meng _ uyavagh ni _ afsengagh m _ siqlugwaaneng _ ivagh i lghiit _ nuna _ tutmagh aqe luku _ .
Siqlugwat _ akuuragh nghmegteki _ ketngig it _ nalighmeng _ putukghwit _ kanagh aqe ut _ :
aghnaghagh t _ ata eng _ tangigh sqellug qu _ pekneghtigh sqellug qu _ tutmaghwaagh yagh ma lghiit _ .
kenigh megteggun _ ( _ kenigh t _ )
Atkugwem _ , _ qaligh m _ , _ qiipaghagh m _ asilighneghi _ nuqutuqagh t _ ggaatmeggneng _ qantagh ke lghii ni _ :
yuug _ esnagh mun _ agigte yalghiimi _ iqallugwaq _ tepe qaghtagh ma kanga _ .
Yugwem _ ila i llu _ esnevagh luteng _ kenigh megteggun _ saghna te ma lghiit _ qantaghqagh ite ngugh t _ .
tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ ( _ tutmaghwaaq _ )
tutmaghwaagh ghngaaghmi _ sa lghii _ , _ nalighmeng _ tutmaghwaagh te kete luku _ sa lghii _ :
aghnagh aq _ tutmaghwaagh negh ke te ziin _ aghula ma lghii _ .
ila it _ asa- ni luku _ , _ apagh aatagh ni luku _ taku ma kangat _ .
peknegh meng _ ( _ peknegh _ )
Piitesighaam _ piiknangi _ cotton-nesugnilnguum _ akugh i _ :
aghnagh aq _ peknegh meng _ naalkute nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ saqlagte luni _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ufsug yagh a _ ( _ ufsuk _ )
sa u aat _ aatkagh t _ , _ ulig t _ anigu i _ , _ pagula i _ , _ ifkaghte na luki _ kaagtulghiini _ unaghsiighwaghmeng _ , _ alngunak _ sa meng _ anagutaghqaghyugnameng _ :
“ _ kameg gken _ anigu ghllag u uk _ ufsug yagh a _ qakmavek _ , _ ” _ naa an _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
nighwaagpagtaghqelluku _ ( _ nighwaagpagtaq _ )
Saam _ akisqaghneghan _ nighug u uute aatagh ste llegh i _ :
aw ligh neghllug mi _ meghutlug lghute _ egte llegh ni _ siqinghem _ akisqaghneghan _ nighwaagpagtaghqelluku _ esghaghaghput _ .
siqlugwaq
neqelghutagh _ nuna kun _ laag te luni _ , _ laag llegh _ mingllu luni _ qaye a _ aghvegh m _ aglaaneng _ takaghqughvike luni _ nevugh meng _ saapekagh _ umu luku _ iwerngaqun _ paye a _ .
isekinagh lghiit _ enkaam _ neqe mun _ aghu nigh ite ngugh t _ :
Siqlugwaq _ ukmangigh aqe luku _ imighaqaghput _ enkaam _ imagh kegte aqe uq _ .
qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ ( _ qaghlu _ )
Tapghaghneng _ pateghtuqagh t _ aqnigh nigh ite ngugh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ teghiglugwem _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimakagh t _ qamugh sigh u luki _ qikmigh nun _ :
yuug _ nutaghagh meng _ qaghlu ngllagh aqe uq _ qikmigh minun _ .
iingunagh mi _ ( _ iingunagh an _ )
Qamagtengngwaaghluni _ , _ sa u aat _ ikuvike llghite ngugh t _ :
nengiighhagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh _ iingunagh an _ qaake naqe kangat _ esghapag yaghtugh ma kangat _ .
siku yan _ ( _ siku _ )
siku _ taana _ , _ natum _ saam _ siku a _ :
naayvagh m _ siku yan _ iqeghte a _ sungaghyug a _ ughug kestagh yalghiimi _ .
iiwem _ ( _ iikw _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne meng _ awavagh ghllag negh meggni _ llangaqa _ naange ghllag luteng _ :
Iiwem _ qalmesagh _ awavanlenguq _ aliigh uute ghllag ma uq _ .
tungyuum _ ( _ tungyugh _ )
kellii n _ , _ naayvagh t _ megh it _ esne mun _ taglagh ghllag negh meggni _ , _ uleve ghllag negh meggni _ :
angyagh _ esnevanlenguq _ tungyuum _ kaate ma a _ .
maaqellegh m _ ( _ maaqem _ )
kellii n _ megh an _ maaqellegh an _ saste llegh a _ nalighmeng _ maaqellegh m _ ayuqetulnga _ :
maaqellegh m _ aghvightagh u aatagh llegh an _ siku _ nekegnegha _ allangughte aqe a _ .
alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ ( _ alqime i an _ )
uksugh mi _ naayghagh t _ , _ uusneghwaagh t _ , _ sigugnegh t _ , _ qagurugwit _ paagken _ anuqanneghmini _ , _ umegnegh _ suupe m _ anigu _ neve aqe uq _ awatmun _ piiztaquq _ qagughrug neng _ .
qaye mineng _ nallunagh lghii _ tuute lghii ni _ ayeme luni _ ifkagh u qagh yu k _ .
naayghagh ni _ alqime i an _ uglaghi nghmini _ uqigtughte nghmini _ ellmi neng _ ifkagh qagh yu k _ , _ lengke kayug _ : _ paagken _ anuqe _ mulu nghmini _ sigugnegh _ alqimagh u isigh ste ghllag aqe a _ .
nunaki aqe uq _ ( _ nuna ke i _ )
teghigniqe a _ , _ pinighyuugta _ :
yuug _ ellnginaghhaghmi _ aliineghlluglagmi _ kiiw m _ esne ani _ kumaqiluni _ , _ negh aqe luni _ , _ nulugh magh mi _ aghnelqusiq _ nunaki aqe uq _ .
uvegte luku
Tawaninginaq _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ tukughagh ni _ aqnighte luki _ mulu magh an _ naa an _ clinic-mun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
Health _ aide-tem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uvegte luku _ tagite qaghte naqe gpenaan _ . _ ”
atngaghute leg _ ( _ atngaghute t _ )
aghnagh t _ neghigh luku _ taatgitnilnguut _ terellegh t _ :
aghnalqwaagh _ atngaghute leg _ , _ taqugh kek _ igaghtuqagh k _ esghaqaaluni _ aghnalqwaaghsugningitngwaaghtuq _ .
ighwaaghtuute te n _ ( _ ighwaaghtuute a _ )
teghig ke sagh t _ anigu mun _ , _ nuna mun _ ingaghte aqe luteng _ neveghtaqluteng _ mingughhu te lghiit _ :
Yugwem _ qikmigh ni _ megh meng _ uugte yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tamaani _ ighwaaghtuute te n _ . _ ”
qikmigh _ ighwaaghtuute luni _ nekeve luni _ efsug te yalghiimi _ yuug _ isiqaghte ma kanga _ .
waamte amken _ ( _ waamte a _ )
puughte i _ .
Amyughwaaghluki _ , _ ipa u nghite ngugh meng _ sa meng _ pi lghii ni _ :
aghnaghagh m _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag _ inga _ . _ ”
qiya yan _ pi a _ , _ “ _ waamte amken _ , _ nanugh u nghite uq _ . _ ”
agghiyugneghllak _ ( _ agghiyugneq _ )
Piyukellghiinaghmitun _ pi naqe ghllag _ , _ sagiqe ghllag _ :
mekelghiigh _ uksugh mi _ maqaghqe gpenani _ napi naqe ghllag _ angayuqagh mi _ maqaghqe sqe ghngaatni _ .
ata an _ aghyughumakanga _ , _ “ _ elpek _ agghiyugneghllak _ !
esla _ nallu kan _ qakun _ allangughte lleghqagh a _ . _ ”
kasug ma kanga _ ( _ kasuk _ )
qagi m _ sa kun _ alngunak _ tekite yuwhaagh llegh a _ isiqghuute ghllag qagh yu k _ :
mekelghiigh m _ elqwaagh t _ sigugnegh m _ asinganilnguut _ aqfaagh aghte yagh luki _ kasug ma kanga _ .
suflu u ma lghii _ ( _ suflugh _ )
ggute m _ aghu llegh a _ :
ggute nka _ gguutniightem _ yuvghiigh luki _ , _ ataasigh _ suflu u ma lghii _ .
aghqiiwtu te _ ( _ aghqiiw _ )
uksugh mi _ sapeghhnaghqwaanghani _ anigu kun _ piyug lghii ni _ piyug llegh t _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiw i _ nagate aqe ke put _ :
qakma _ manughagh mteggun _ naghughte lghiit _ nallu nigh ite ngugh t _ aghqiiwtu te _ piyug llegh it _ .
piyaanneqegsaataqelghiit _ ( _ pi yu a _ ) _ Yugwet _ uksugh mi _ piyug meng
siku gnun _ ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ unangniigh na luteng
megh meng _ ivagh i yagh te aqe lghiit _ : _ siku k _ kaasuwhaanghegkeni _ yugwet
piyaanneqegsaataqelghiit _ .
ataata ut _ ( _ atugh a ta _ )
ata m _ anglegutanga _ yuug _ :
ataata ut _ quunpeng _ napi ghllag _ enkaam _ unange aqe lghii _ .
ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ ( _ ilangqughqu _ )
ilangqugh meng _ aqfate lghiit _ meghqagh meng _ :
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ quunpeng _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangit _ enkaam _ ilangqughqu aqe ukut _ esla _ naafte ghngaan _ meghagh ite igate ngugh u kut _ .
boiler-et _ ( _ boiler _ )
melghutagh t _ entaqun _ 10 _ gallon-et _ umeg leg t _ , _ tugutagh leg t _ takemriig u aaghet _ :
Boiler-et _ kagimlegh meng _ ilangqugh meng _ imigh aqe aput _ .
ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ ( _ ilughaghte ni uq _ )
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ amyughwaaghullghiit _ , _ sugwaagusigalnguut _ :
ilughagh ke te lghiit _ ilughwaghniighute neghtu ghllag yagh lghiit _ maaten _ pi pagnanigh ut _ .
qaasligh at _ ( _ qaasligh t _ )
umuqagh t _ akughtuqagh t _ qaasligh u luteng _ ggateg ke te _ atughqagh t _ :
ukut _ qaasligh at _ mat- qaghte yug nigh ghllag u ut _ .
kaki sigh ghllag _ ( _ kaki _ )
kaki sigh kun _ kaki ghllag _ :
aghnagh m _ ugwini _ , _ avaqutagh ni _ , _ anʼgaghani _ aatkagh ngllagh aqe kangi _ qiipaghagh meng _ kakisignekun _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ kaki sigh ghllag _ .
yupig m _ Sanqutanganun _ apeghtuusagh kekagh nun _ liite aghagh sighqagh t
iyaa-kagh m _ apeghtu sagh i
sa ngllagh yaghqagh t _ : _ Tugweq _ nalighmeng _ uunghagh
atughqagh t _ : _ atugh llghite ngughk _ igaasigh _ nalighmeng _ unaghsiighwagh _ igagh _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ x _ 2 _ inches _ kuynge mun _ ukmangiisigh _ nalighmeng _ paper _ clip-meng _ .
naten _ tugweq _ ulima yaghqau a _ :
imeg te luku _ maalghugwegneng _ igagh _ amestaaghhaq _ igaasigh m _ iqugwakun _ eraser-em _ tungangakun _ .
igagh _ neve ste luku _ igaasigh kun _ scotch _ tape- meng _ ilefkaghaghhnayukan _ .
kepe nakesi _ igagh _ imeg tke aq _ saqugmun _ nuvukrugwa _ ipeg sqellug qu _ .
wayagh _ kepe luku _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inches _ tagkaan _ .
agughte luku _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ inch-nguluku _ uzive qaghtagh na yu kan _ igaasigh mun _ nekegtekuni _ .
agughtekagh _ wayagh _ neve ste nakesi _ scotch _ tape- meng _ igaasigh mun _ igiilghakun _ iqugwakun _ 1 _ inch _ piiznga an _ .
agughte nakesi _ wayagh _ piiznga lghii _ nekreg u luku _ .
igaghqwaagh leg _ tuugghuuq _ , _ nekreg aa _ alngunak _ sa mun _ atugh u uq _ .
akuzillegh t _ sa llegh mun _ uspute nga lghiit
1 _ . _ tunag m _ qukaa ni _ .
efqughute nga lghiit _ , _ qaatke te ma lghiit _ , _ qepghaghtuqagh t _ , _ qepghagh tke ai ta _ , _ ilakwaagh ita _ piniqe pigtegkangit _ .
“ _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ qaatke te nga te mineng _ tunag m _ qukaa nite uq _ ” _ angyaleg an _ pi ma kangi _ yugwet _ .
2 _ . _ Kaagkasaghta _ .
Efqughaghta _ elngaatall _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa ni _ kaapelqagh meng _ awaligh ma kanga _ .
apa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tamaaken _ negh yuguma lunga _ kaagkasaghtaghpenga _ ! _ ”
3 _ . _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
puughte i lleg _ , _ peghqinegh _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ puughte luku _ dollar-nga _ sa meng _ naveghsimakanga _ .
naa ita _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ “ _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ taam _ puughte laatagh ma uten _ .
4 _ . _ meteghllug ghllag _ .
puughhe negh kegte aq _ , _ nalluqagh _ .
naa an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ elpek _ legan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ tuune laatagh magh an _ dollar-en _ ” _ .
5 _ . _ iye k _ miluqutagh ka _ .
alngunak _ esghaqwaaghaghtalghiini _ iye t _ qapragsimiita _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ aangqagh ghhagh ni _ naalkenneghmeng _ aghtugh luku _ naa ni _ aapte yagh aa _ kayusitesqelluni _ ivagh kanga _ yaghlegi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ amen _ iye gken _ miluqutagh ke kek _ , _ naalke lleqe an _ . _ ”
quyngigh k _ maalghug _ sumeghneghtuqagh k
Qaygeghhaam _ ungipagh aa
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ ighnegh leg _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ , _ panig leg llu _ .
taana _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ quunpeng _ quyngigh mi _ nayugh i aqe lghii _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ esnaghtagh t _ tannge t _ naghughte te kete luku _ taana _ quyngigh igh ghllag _ mekelghiightuumagh an _ tugu ma kangat _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tawani _ uksaagh u uq _ .
qenwat _ uksugh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ mekelghiigh _ ratamyaag luni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
naqam _ neghe ste aqe kangat _ , _ taawanginaq _ ilu ani _ qavagh igate ngughk _ !
maaten _ ilangani _ , _ esla mi _ qavagh naqe yan _ quyngigh k _ maalghug _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
ila a _ gginagh a _ aveg luni _ tagnegh lghii _ inglu a _ qategh lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ yugusigh a _ ukileghyag _ .
taake uk _ apa an _ qamughtekeftaak _ .
taake uk _ ingaghte aqe lghiik _ akeleghraagh ke luku _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ghhuute igate kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ kiyaghtaalleghmi _ mengteghagh mii i _ ivagh i aqe ut _ .
aghnagh aq _ nayag a _ ivagh i ma lghii _ , _ naayghagh m _ amatanganun _ pi yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ tume ghllag t _ .
ataasigh meng _ unug yagu _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte yata _ aag llegh an _ quyngigh m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taakuniskuvek _ wata _ ikfiqe lleqe uten _ .
whaa _ maalghug gneng _ meghnalikuyeng _ kaate lleqe ut _ ne meggnun _ !
unaami _ aane gkuvek _ ingavek _ uyavaghpanun _ tume nun _ aglagh ghhaaten _ .
kaate kuvek _ ukavek _ ayuqe luten _ nekevgha lghaaten _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
negh te ma lghiit _ .
taaqe yata _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ , _ kaa sa mi _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ tume nun _ uyavaghpanun _ .
kaate luni _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
inga _ qaghluughi na luteng _ tagsigh ma yagh kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ .
Avelghaqinaamakangi _ legan _ ellngit nun _ ayuqe luni _ nekevgha ma lghii _ .
ila ita _ pi ma kangat _ , _ “ _ sa u luku _ tuqu li _ qaywaam _ ! _ ”
taagken _ tuqutagh igh na luteng _ malighqugh ma lghiit _ .
sivuke luni _ quyngigh _ uzive ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ taake uk _ quyngigh k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ qavagh lgute kek _ uzive ma lghiik _ maligte te lutek _ .
pangaleg ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ .
mulu luni _ tazingavek _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh magh mi _ aag llegh a _ quyngigh a _ guughte ma lghii _ .
quyngigh m _ kaate yatni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ uughqaghte ma lghii _ sivutmute _ ayuqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pangaleg te ma kangat _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ malighqagh i ma yagh lghii _ .
uyavagh te luki _ quyngigh m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Umegneghsighhu _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ umegneghsighyaqenni _ .
umegnegh ughte ma kanga _ qanigtuumagh mi _ , _ anuqetu magh mi _ .
naqam _ kingu at _ umegnegh _ sivungagh t _ aliinegh _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ tuqu laghate ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ legan _ igatagh negh gpeni _ tuqute luki _ negh luten _ pegte luki _ igleghte aqe i _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ igatagh nghmini _ tuqute luki _ neqagh luni _ pegte luki _ tamavek _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ima _ uksaagh _ tannge t _ metngegh tke aat _ , _ igleghtengngiinaamaluku _ qenwat _ upenghagh u ma lghii _ .
ighni laghate te ma lghii _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ “ _ legan _ ighninghhagh t _ unite aqe ki _ , _ malighqagh te aqe naagh ut _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ unite aqe kangi _ .
mulu luteng _ ataasigh meng _ qavagh luteng _ kaate aqe lghiit _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ quyngigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ una _ saam _ naayghagh ke agu _ ? _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ naayghagh _ esghapag yagh kete ni _ naayghagh eng _ asi mikun _ uusneghwaagh leg _ .
uusneghwaagh m _ awatanganilnguut _ mengteghagh i _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ esgha _ taana _ naayghagh _ whangkuta _ naayghagh ut _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwenllu _ qemi meng _ teve naqe aqe uq _ , _ yugwem _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ghhukaghagh _ kuuve yaghtugh ghhu _ up- ghhagh ghllag nge a _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ ghhukaghagh _ tugu luku _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
kuuve luku _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kek _ maalghug _ quyngigh k _ teve lghiik _ uusneghwaagh meng _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma kangi _ qenwat _ ata an _ qama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nalleghiite ziin _ , _ nikimqun _ sa meng _ esghapag inagh uten _ ! _ ”
itegh luni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aane lutek _ esghaghyaqegteng _ quyngigh eng _ , _ qenwat _ uglaghi ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
Yugwa _ talugh nga lghii _ .
wetku _ mulu luni _ yugwa _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
esghagh yamegteggu _ quyake luku _ qiyakluku _ .
yuug _ qavaghtuqagh
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ ne mi _ tea- ma ni _ esne meng _ unegken _ kellii neng _ neqenge kayug ni _ uksugh yuwhaagh mi _ siku k _ mallegyuwhaanghegkeni _ .
Yugwet _ , _ nukalpigagh t _ ategh utu aqe lghiit _ , _ ayveghaataqelghit _ puglegh akun _ .
unange aqe lghiit _ maklagte aqe lghiit _ anglu akun _ .
tamaa _ yuwhaq _ ellnga llu _ piyaa aqe lghii _ unug ghllagu luku _ nighugte ste gpenaan _ .
sikuvag nun _ kaate nghmini _ vuuslegh t _ qungangitgun _ laag te luni _ uqiite luni _ aghnelqusiq _ qavagh aqe lghii _ ivagh i niigh gpenani _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ aghnegh m _ qukagh a llu _ naghughte luni _ , _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .
taglagh aqe lghii _ maligte te luni _ .
Yugwet _ ungipamsug te nghata _ , _ taana _ yuug _ pimaqelghii _ , _ “ _ ii _ , _ elngaatall-aa _ , _ esghataghtegpenanga _ naalkute aghte gpenanga _ , _ akuuraate aghte gpenanga _ anglu meng _ puglegh meng _ uteghnigh laatagh unga _ . _ ”
ataasigh meng _ yugwet _ naligh ita _ esghamakangat _ naten _ sa aqe ta a _ .
Esghapagyaqmegteggu _ , _ iiskughsaqmegteggu _ vuuslegh t _ , _ sikuvag t _ qungangitnun _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma aqe lghii _ .
Nuliighhanun _ apegh ma kangat _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ yuug _ yataaghqellaatamalghii _ .
Unugwaghllagyan _ , _ nuliighhan _ kingu aneng _ tuumte ma kanga _ .
maligte ma kanga _ uyaavanlluni _ esghaghnayukangatni _ liigiknayukangatni _ .
llaaghanam _ sikuvag nun _ takukumtaaghminun _ kaate luni _ aghuliigh llegh ani _ tuvagh m _ , _ naagu _ talugh uq _ qungangitnun _ tamaavek _ .
tawani _ esghapag llegh ke i i na ma kanga _ .
tazingavek _ takukestamakanga _ iigkaghameng _ .
elngaatall _ igkamsug luku _ pi yalghiimi _ taawa _ sanqutangi _ , _ uyiigh i _ , _ uunghagh i _ saaghw ani _ naqam _ .
qavagh ani _ uyiigh a _ tugu luku _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ ne mun _ kaate luni _ ugwimi _ uyiigh a _ iigh luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghan _ whanikumaan _ taglagh luni _ yuug _ ungipagh yalghiimi _ , _ “ _ ii _ , _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ angtughte yagh aqa _ sa u a _ maklag _ , _ ima _ sa aqe kete te uq _ .
saavgumiigh i uute unga _ .
taawa _ sanqutaaghhaanka _ ima _ aghulaqe te ai _ . _ ”
taawa _ nuliighhan _ angegh luku _ sa meng _ pi nghite a _ .
Ighivgaghmi _ taakwani _ nulqaaviightuq _ yuug _ .
nuliigh ni _ keveg aqe a _ , _ ” _ ingavek _ kugweghpenun _ keveg aqe laken _ .
Uyiighaghhaghmeggnenguq _ aqupilqennaqlitnga _ sanqutaaghiitngwaaghumanga _ . _ ”
angegh luni _ nulighh a _ aane luni _ tazingavek _ kugweghminun _ pi ma lghii _ .
uteghnigh luni _ uyiigh _ iighkagh ni _ tugu luku _ itghute luku _ tuune ma kanga _ .
Yugwem _ tugu luku _ yuvghiigh aa _ , _ liigike a _ ellmi _ uyigh ani _ .
sa meng _ pi nghite uq _ .
unaami _ unugwaghllaglaataghtuq _ .
maaten _ tawavek _ iighagh vig minun _ pi gpenani _ , _ anglu meng _ ivagh i uq _ .
anglu _ kaate luku _ , _ maklag m _ anglu a _ , _ esghapag aa _ .
llaaghanwha _ uka _ mayugh uq _ maklag _ .
iwerngaqun _ sugupag kek _ nuug yayek _ tawavek _ naghullegyaqminigu _ legan _ unake a _ .
kii _ , _ imani _ iknaqe uq _ elngaatall _ .
aga _ pi akun _ taaggun _ nengte uq _ iwernga _ kiksag aa _ uyiigh m _ kangigh a _ .
tawaten _ maklag stun _ uyatu tekagh mi _ sama _ nengte uq _ .
maklagte lghii _ , _ anglu a _ nuqutughte a _ tawaten _ qaake yaghqaaghte luku _ .
naghigh yan _ sayugwaa _ , _ sayugwaa _ .
Sayugwaa _ , _ sayugwaa _ iiwenllu _ whaa _ aliigh naqe aqe uq _ , _ samaken _ nuughqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ , _ yugwem _ neghqughrugwa _ .
neghqughrug _ uughqaghte luni _ yuug _ taana _ qevutqughtaamakanga _ gginagh a _ esneguughlluku _ puufqellug qu _ .
Neghqughrugwem _ nuqnegh luku _ uyiigh a _ pi kaqe kanga _ , _ aga _ itegh uq _ veghute uq _ anglu mun _ .
yuug _ nekeve luni _ uyigh ani _ , _ sanqute ni _ imeg luki _ taglagh uq _ .
esghagh luku _ nulighh an _ aapte a _ , _ “ _ kii _ sa ghllag ziin _ , _ sangavek _ gginagh igh te ghllag ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ elngaatall _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ . _ ”
yugwem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ angtaagh ii yagh aqa _ , _ sa u a _ taaga _ , _ repall _ nengtem _ angtale aneng _ nuqnegh naqe m _ anglu m _ esne akun _ gginagh ka _ kaagutaatam _ gginiighutngwaaghaanga _ . _ ”
taawa _ angegh aqe kanga _ , _ sa meng _ pi igate kanga _ .
qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ atugh luki _ gginagh ni _ pi niigh ghraagte yan _ , _ yataghqelluni _ aghulaqe laatagh uq _ , _ piyaa laatagh uq _ .
unange uute aqe lghiit _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ pi yu aat _ .
taawa _ qavagh nghite uq _ ivaghilataghtuq _ anglu meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ anglu meng _ naalkute luni _ taawa _ uqlighllataghtuq _ .
uka _ mayugh laatagh uq _ , _ nuug laatagh aa _ sugupag m _ .
iwerngaqun _ tawaten _ alla _ naghulleg aa _ , _ nengte uq _ aga _ .
tawaten _ pilate- aghte uq _ , _ imani _ iknaqe uq _ .
Ilumsuwhangunani _ , _ legan _ whaa _ neghqughrug _ sama _ qevutqughnaqlataghaa _ .
iwernga _ yuwhaam _ nuqnegh aa _ .
taawa _ naghigh yan _ uka _ sayug laatagh aa _ , _ amu a _ , _ amu a _ .
Nuugtesaqminigu _ maklag ghllag _ .
legan _ panaghaghmineng _ tuqute a _ angtaagh ghllag _ .
qaake luku _ ellnginaghhaghmi _ maklag ghllag _ angtaagh ghllag _ repall _ nalluke a _ sa u ta a _ .
Unangigallghem _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ una _ teghiglugwem _ avaaqutaghllakenghitaagu _ , _ ” _ nallum _ angtale an _ .
taawa _ makliluni _ , _ qamiigh luni _ taglagh uq _ .
Elngatall _ quyake aat _ upugha te aat _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ taawa _ qavagh yaghtugh nanigh uq _ , _ unange yagute uq _ tamaakustun _ maligte te luni _ .
yugu lghii _ ellnga llu _ , _ pikengyaghqayalghii _ qavagh igate yagh kuni _ .
tefaay _ ! _ tagtale ke a _ taawa _ .
Qayaghtughhaqlu _ maalghug _ aghnagh k llu
Elqiilaam _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ , _ aghnagh k nguq _ taake uk _ maalghug _ uusnegh m _ qaye ani _ unatagh ma lukek _ uugken _ uka _ sa u a _ qayaghtughhaq _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
nallangigh lukek _ tespikavek _ pi ma kek _ , _ “ _ kinku k _ paagkuuk _ , _ aghnagh k _ paagkuuk _ . _ ”
avelghaqiinagh ma kangat _ .
maamtawha nguq _ , _ “ _ kinku k _ paagkuuk _ , _ aghnagh k _ paagkuuk _ ? _ ”
aag llegh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Angalqatanyaangankuk _ , _ Unayaangankuk _ . _ ”
“ _ tagi tek _ qaake naqe amtek _ , _ aglagh te naqe amtek _ ne gpetegnun _ . _ ”
aavgugh vig tgun _ taakwagun _ ukig ma lghiik _ .
aag llegh a _ ugwavek _ itegh ma lghii _ qayagh an _ , _ aag llegh an _ kingu anun _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ .
nalleghaghhalek _ qelanghumalghiik _ elngaatall _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ .
qenwat _ sivuyag mete ngughk _ ugwa _ ghhuuteghllagyaqminigu _ .
“ _ Aa-ve-ve-ve-ve-ve-yaa-aa _ !
salin _ kaate yug niite aqe sta _ ? _ ”
Yuwhaam _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Uu-ku-ku-ku-kuuk _ , _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ tazina _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ ”
taawa _ igleghte ut _ .
nasiqe luku _ ivgagh yaghqagh _ kingu anite ngughk _ enraq _ , _ “ _ Aa-ve-ve-ve-ve-ve-yaa-aa _ !
salin _ kaate yug niite aqe sta _ ? _ ”
“ _ Uu-ku-ku-ku-kuuk _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ tazina _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ ”
Qenwannguq _ aghnagh k _ ghhuu yaghtugh ngestagh uk _ .
aanqute i ma lghii _ sivuyag mete ngughk _ ugwa _ ,
“ _ Pina-aagh- _ ngaagh-maa-ngaa _ ,
Piyuugh-aa-ngaa-aagh-maa-ngaa _ ,
Yaa-a-yaa-a-yaa-ngaa _ ,
Naagunguuq _ paam-na-ngaa _ , _ Quygguu
Piyuugh-ii-yaghii-yaa-ya-yii-yaa-ya-yii-yaa _ ,
Mengaa-ghuu-nguuq-angay _ . _ ”
“ _ Uu-ku-ku-ku-kuuk _ tekeghagh ghhagh _ tazina _ ivgagh kumteggu _ kaate lleqe ukut _ . _ ”
kingu anite ngughk _ maateqwaaqun _ aanqute ma lghii _ ,
“ _ Pina-aagh-ngaagh-maa-ngaa _ ,
Piyuugh-aa-ngaa-aagh-maa-ngaa _ ,
Yaa-a-yaa-a-yaa-ngaa _ ,
Naagunguuq _ paam-na-ngaa _ , _ Quygguu
Piyuugh-ii-yaghii-yaa-ya-yii-yaa-ya-yii-yaa _ ,
Mengaa-ghuu-nguuq-angay _ . _ ”
nepiightugh ngugh _ legan _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek _ uugna _ ugwatanganilnguq _ qayagh ani _ sivuyag anite ngughk _ aga _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ tanpeghhakun _ ukite qaghte te luni _ , _ aghqullug _ .
maateqwaaqun _ kingu aneng _ .
taawa _ aghqullug u lutek _ , _ iwerngaqun _ qula igh luku _ mighyaghyaqmegnegu _ , _ mighyaghyaqmegnegu _ , _ mighyaghyaqmegnegu _ , _ iwerngaqunnguq _ yuwhaq _ kaleftagh at _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ tagitug mi _ Iflangwaaghakaq
Algalik
iimnanguq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ iimna _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ iwernga _ apa leg _ nengyugh leg _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuna lgu ta ita _ aghnaghagh t _ keleg ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aghulaghqugh naqe ni luteng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapute ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh minun _ .
angegh ma kanga _ ellnga llu _ maligte te sqellug qu _ aghulaghqunun _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ .
unatagh ma luki _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ piitekagh meng _ tagitug ughte te ghllag ma kangi _ .
tagitug ughte ghllag yagu _ aghnaghagh t _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
Atghamun _ aghnaghaghhagh _ piyaqeseng _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghagh t _ alinge luteng _ angayuqagh meggneng _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuqlughaghaataghyaqeseng _ akite nghite ai _ .
ima _ aviite uq _ .
aghtugh luku _ tuqlughagh aatagh nghmeng _ miiwen _ sivu meggni _ atghagh ma na yu kan _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa i _ aapsaqmegteki _ kaate ma ta a _ , _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila ni _ aviilngaghyamiki _ qiyaaghwagh magh mi _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ .
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavaa ma luku _ taghsaghram _ taghtugh a _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ aghnagh ngugh _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghulaghqugh yagh luta _ tagitug ughte yagu _ ila nka _ iflii ma anka _ .
entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ .
ifla u iqe lunga _ ila nka _ aghtugh luki _ ivagh nghmeng _ whani _ qavaa ma lghiinga _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ nenge lunga _ qetngigh uq _ , _ ugwatanga _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqetu uq _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ neghesimakanga _ mangtag meng _ quyngigh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ “ _ wiin _ whani _ kiyaghten _ !
unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ , _ whani _ utaqa aqe nga _ .
igatagh aqe gkuvek _ neghyukekagh gpeneng _ negh aqe i _ utaqa gpenanga _ . _ ”
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ aghnagh _ aane aqe lghii _ .
Aghnelqusiq _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yaghtugh magh an _ tagi nghmini _ itghute aqe lghii _ tungtu meng _ ilangani _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ apa an _ nuna lgu ta ita _ ivagh yagh luku _ aghtugh yamegteggu _ aviite yan _ qenwat _ wesqaawi te ma kangat _ .
tagtalmi _ kiyaghtaallghem _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ apa gpenun _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ aglagh langa _ .
Naantat _ apa nka _ nalluke kenka _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whaa _ qavagh yaghtugh unga _ .
qavagh kuma _ angatumeng _ taghtugh naanghite unga _ .
qemall _ aghyuqe lleqe uten _ , _ pellagh yug lleqe uten _ .
apa gpek _ saama _ suumqenneghmeng _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
repall _ iye it _ iqaghtagh igh ma ut _ .
Ighivganghagu _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavagh naqe aqe uk _ . _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wetku qun _ elpek _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ ” _ aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
“ _ whaa _ apeghtugh naqe amken _ .
vuvalla mi _ egmightaatagh u uute kumeng _ kayaalqennaayukangaten _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ alignaghtaagh ma lghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ liite i ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ A-a _ liite unga _ ! _ ”
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ legan _ atghagh luten _ vuvallakufsi _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ . _ ”
taagken _ aane yalghiimek _ nutaan _ uksaagh aqe a _ .
atghagh ma lghiik _ , _ atghagh ma lukek _ unug ma kanga _ .
kaate yaghtugh yamek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uteghte naqe unga _ whanga _ .
ellnginagh gpek _ kaate lghaaten _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uteghmun _ qiive yagh kete ni _ , _ kaynge _ aga _ maaten _ tumangitgun _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ kaate luni _ amig m _ reghillegh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ apa kek _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavaa te aqe uk _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ tenglugtugh magh an _ amigh k _ qamayaaghmigyaqenni _ taghtughsimakek _ .
qama _ pi ma lghiik _ , _ “ _ kay _ , _ llangaqa _ eltughagh ghhagh mta _ me a _ ! _ ”
“ _ aaqun _ whanga u unga _ tagi unga _ !
enmis _ sukate lusi _ qelpegh te ngnga _ ! _ ”
“ _ kaay _ eltughagh ghhagh ut _ tagi uq _ ! _ ”
qelpegh te ma kangat _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ qavaghlaaghigallghem _ iqaghtagh igh luteng _ .
eltughagh ghhagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ aapqughaaghyaghaat _ apa gkenka llu _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ aghulaghqulgutangita _ naken _ pi ta a _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ aksaqngwaaghumalghii _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa a _ vuvallamalghii _ .
sughu ke aq _ tagi laghate te luni _ negh te nghmeng _ taaqe yami _ ungipaghagh te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ alla _ neghe uute luteng _ enraq _ egmightaatagh u te ma lghiit _ , _ alignaghtaagh te ma lghiit _ .
ila ita _ sungagh t _ kagimlluki _ saguyagh megteggun _ qaake luki _ saguyagh teng _ kallaganeghmegteki _ sungagh t _ iighwigh aqe ut _ .
enraq _ ila ita _ tugu ta i _ ayvegh m _ mengqugh tun _ ullegh qaghtagh aqe kangit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga llu tuq _ egmightu aatagh lghiinga _ ! _ ”
nutem nguq _ apa a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ , _ sa naqe aqa _ ? _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Ellngallutughnguq _ egmightu aatagh lghii _ . _ ”
“ _ legan mi _ sa aqa _ , _ ” _ pi ma lghii _ apa a _ .
nutem nguq _ ila i _ sughukagh m _ aghnalqwaagh t _ pi ma lghiit _ , _ “ _ yakugh ke luten _ !
Aghnaghaqruwhaq _ agghiyugnepiwaa _ !
kimaawi ste i naqe uq _ ila itneng _ alignaghtaagh naqe lghii neng _ . _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh _ ketfagh luni _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uka nguq _ suksug ghllag _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ pi aqe ut _ amig kun _ ugwa _ qagi t _ kasug ma lghiit _ ilu te mun _ nategh mun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ saguyagh gni _ kallagaghyaqenni _ qagi t _ iigwyalghiimeng _ , _ kii _ nategh mi _ tepe aq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ iigusimakanga _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nekeve luni _ sagnegh gneng _ tugu tete luni _ tamaaken _ tepagh meng _ imigh lukek _ sagnegh gni _ sughu ke aq _ tunqugh ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ tunqugh nghmeng _ enraq _ siklagh meng _ tungsigh ma lghii _ .
tuune yatni _ ugwatanganun _ aglagh luni _ mingle _ siklagh yagh kete ni _ kii _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tangegh iqe aq _ peksigaghte ma kanga _ .
itagnatun _ sagnegh k _ tugu lukek _ imigh aqe lukek _ tamaaken _ tangighkagh meng _ .
sughu ke aq _ uyegte ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ mumegh _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mingle _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ meghraag kegte pigte lghii _ maaqe ma lghii _ mingle aneng _ .
meghute meng _ tugu tete luni _ meghsilaamakanga _ tamaghhagh an _ sughu ke aq _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ugpeqsaliitaat _ .
Vuvallaneghmeggni _ aqfa aqe kangat _ nuna lgu ta ita _ .
qamagte uq _ .
qilughwaagh neng _ wayagh te lghiik
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
ungipagh aq _ , _ anipaghllag _ nalug ma kestagh ma luku _ qilughwaagh ghllag ni _ naken _ meteghllug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ Meteghllugwem _ aapte ma kanga _ ,
“ _ Anipaay _ , _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ?
awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ , _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ . _ ”
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ whanga _ ne ke anka _ .
iqlengiqe uten _ ne ke nghite aten _ .
whanga _ ne ke anka _ , _ awite te n _ iqite te n _ taagken _ . _ ”
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ Meteghllugwem _ ,
“ _ entami _ tuqlugh qagh ki _ qilughwaagh t _ taakut _ , _ angegh kangaten _ taawa _ ne ke lleqe aaten _ . _ ”
anipa _ qalghigh yagh uq _ , _ naagu _ sa meng _ pi aghte nghite ut _ .
Meteghllugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ whanga qun _ nagate aghte nga _ tuqlugh qagh langi _ . _ ”
qalghigh yalghiimi _ meteghllug qrug _ ,
“ _ Qghwaaghwq _ , _ qghwaaghwq _ , _ qghwaaghwq _ ! _ ”
ii _ , _ akiingqwaghte aghagh u i _ .
“ _ qayugham _ angegh kangatnga _ esghaghhu _ , _ awite te n _ ne ke nghite aten _ . _ ”
anipa _ tenge ghrug ma lghii _ ima _ .
Uqitaqestaghngaan _ aga _ tenge ste luku _ , _ meteghllug qrug _ nalug ma lghii _ taaggun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ metngegh tke aq _ Aghsigallghaanun
ayumigh m _ ungipagh aa _ ungazigh meng
yuug _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh lgu ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ .
