ataasigh _ panig a _ , _ ataasigh _ ighnegh a _ , _ tamaghhagh egmek _ mekestaagh staghhiinagh k _ .
yuug _ taana _ unange yu pigte lghii _ , _ unange aqe lghii _ neghsagh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ .
nulighh an _ neghsagh t _ unangkagh i _ afta aqe kangi _ mengteghagh mini _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ neqekumaaqelghiit _ .
ilangani _ naghaagh ma lukek _ taghnughhagh k _ mengteghagh m _ uughqa ni _ esghagh ma kangat _ angyagh _ igleghte lghii _ megh mi _ ataasigh meng _ yug ke lghii _ .
legreliqe tke ma kangat _ taghnughhagh k _ kina u ta a _ tagi lghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nuyekligh u ma lghii _ uyughagh mineng _ , _ tamaaken _ naa minun _ apegh ma kanga _ sivuke luku _ ,
“ _ Upagughnaqaghput _ angyagh _ uukna _ nallukekagh ut _ . _ ”
angegh ma kangi _ naa ita _ .
aqfaasnaq _ taghnughhagh k _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ kaate ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ taawanginaq _ uugte gpenani _ qute mun _ .
nayag an _ uyughagh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ talligh akun _ .
Yugwem _ aghnagh aq _ aapte ma kanga _ angyagh meng _ ,
“ _ uyughagh n _ tagivagh nayagh nghite zigu _ tugumiiqe sqellug qu _ ? _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ entaqun _ qiya lleqe uq _ . _ ”
Yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ qiya kan _ tuune lleqe aqa _ .
aghnaghagh m _ tuune a _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ iiggagh nun _ yugwem _ .
Yugwem _ qaake luku _ angyagh minun _ taghnughhagh _ kete ma lghii _ kilgaa nun _ megh mun _ .
igleghte ma lghiit _ siqinghem _ tevigh vig anun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ naa minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
ungipaate ma kanga _ sa mun _ yug mun _ tugu ma ni luku _ uyughagh ghhagh ni _ .
naange aat _ qiya ma lghii _ ighnegh minun _ saama _ alinge ma lghii _ ugwimineng _ .
tagi ma lghii _ ugwinga _ mughu ta neng _ tusigate luni _ , _ uglagh u pigte luku _ unange ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
itegh luni _ aapte ma kangi _ ,
“ _ naagu _ ighnegh ka _ ? _ ”
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ ,
“ _ Yugwem _ tagikagh m _ angyagh kun _ tugu ma a _ ighnegh ut _ , _ enkaam _ aghulaqe te ma a _ .
alangghu nagh ghhalek _ whangkuta _ !
ellnga n _ aghulaqe te ma a _ whangkuta _ ighnegh ut _ aghsigallghan _ tunganganun _ . _ ”
Yugwem _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nallunagh llegh anun _ esnagh m _ .
mamleg pigte ma lghii _ .
Yugwem _ unite ma kanga _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ava u na an _ neqe u na an _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ alngunagan _ igleghte ma lghii _ mamleg mi _ .
qula ani _ qalghigh magh meng _ tengaa ma lghiit _ turiig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ qalghigh llegh itneng _ nagaqugh te luni _ alingyug ma lghii _ ellnginaghhaghmi _ mamleg mi _ .
negh ka nge i te ma lghii _ igatagh luni _ aligh ni _ nguug ragh luku _ lliigh ma kanga _ .
meghnugh ghllag yami _ asivaqun _ qavaa ma lghii _ temngi _ tamaani _ .
taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ma luku _ tafsi a _ ileme ma lghii _ .
tafsi a _ qughagh ghllag ma lghii _ qinuyugte ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nalluke ma kanga _ naten _ naallghute lleghqagh a _ enkaam _ esghagh ma lghii _ sivutmute _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ sivu mini _ mekelengestaghhaq _ nighuwhaq _ akamkegtalghii _ ighaleqetaaghte yug nitagh lghii _ .
enkaam _ aglagh ma lghii _ tazingavek _ nighuwhaghmun _ .
igleghte yalghiimi _ wata _ sivutmute _ nighuugsimanginaamakanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ esghagh ma kanga _ turiiggaq _ .
Turiiggaam _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
“ _ tugu gu _ whanga _ amiiragh ka _ . _ ”
enkaam _ turiig m _ qesug ma kanga _ yaqugh mineng _ taake lghii _ silug _ .
tuune ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ pi magh an _ ,
“ _ qavagh naqe negh gpeni _ , _ qavagh aqe i _ qagi t _ kelu kaghagh itni _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh aqe gkuvek _ esghagh aqe gkufki _ naayghagh t _ aglagh aqe i _ tazingavek _ .
Qaygeqlitkuvek _ naayghagh neng _ esghagh lleqe aten _ asi itni _ mengteghagh t _ .
ukig ggaaten _ enkaam _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luki _ aghuliigh ghhaaten _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ igleghte ma lghii _ tugumiiqe luku _ turiig m _ silugwa _ .
aghneq _ qamagte yan _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ qagi t _ turiig m _ pillghatun _ .
unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ igleghte laatagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ esghagh ma kangi _ naayghagh t _ .
taku ma kangi _ kaate luki _ maye ii ma lghii _ qule mun _ .
qaygeghte luni _ llaaghanam _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh lghute _ naayghagh m _ awatangani _ .
ukig ma lghii _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luni _ mengteghagh nun _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag ma lghii _ .
turiig m _ iknaqughi te ma kanga _ .
ne mi _ tawani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pinitun _ neghesimakangat _ .
ne m _ yugwi _ qerngughte ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nanghiigh na luku _ .
aglagh ma lghiit _ pennagh nun _ .
asi akun _ pennagh m _ llilaghtugh ma kangat _ uglagh pigte lghii _ savig _ .
pi ma kangat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nalugutesqelluki _ awatghute luki _ savig t _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sivulii luni _ nalugute ma lghii _ qamagte luki _ savig t _ qayetghute ma kangi _ .
ila i llu _ nalugute ma lghiit _ , _ savig tgun _ tuute ma lghiit _ , _ uglagh llegh a _ tuquma lghii _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ mengteghagh mun _ .
taagken _ ungipaate ma kangi _ mengteghagh mii it _ , _ ila i _ yugwita _ qetgeghaghluteng _ savig kun _ tuquma ni luki _ .
upugh ma lghiit _ iknaqe lghii meng _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
kayagte ma kangat _ aghulaqe sqellug qu _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ nayyghamun _ esghagh ma kanga _ ne ni _ .
uteghnigh ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ iknaqughi ghllag luni _ .
aqupilqe i llegh m _ Akileghtusaa
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni _ imani _ , _ yuwhaghnguq _ taana _ unangupiglluku _ esnighqwataamalghii _ .
sigugnegh igh ghllag luni _ uusqagh pigte luku _ esnagh _ ayuqe uq _ .
tawaten _ yuug _ igleghte ma luku _ nakennguq _ qikmigh ghhagh _ mulaagh qu aqe uq _ .
mulu luni _ qalghilqwaaghaghaqelghii _ llangaqa _ aqnighqwaaluni _ .
taawa _ tawatestaghhinaq _ naqam _ yuwhaam _ naantulnga _ esghagh gpenaan _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ qenwat _ esghagh aa _ sigugnegh m _ esne akun _ pakineg kau te lghii _ .
sivuligh t _ itegagh ghhagh u i ni _ aliigh qagh lghiit _ nuqnegh naqe mikun _ taaggun _ ima _ aga _ este aghagh uq _ .
sama _ tekite luni _ qalghigh ghllag uq _ .
sama _ mulaqumaluku _ tawavek _ pakineg qagh vig anun _ upleg luku _ up-tu aqe a _ .
Yataaghqengngwaaghluni _ whaa _ nalugute ghesnagh te _ akuqagh ma kanga _ , _ qaake a _ .
qikmigh ghhagh _ qaake yatni _ quyam _ ighwaaghtuute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yugwem _ ighu kek _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ paagh ma kek _ inglugtun _ .
paagh lukek _ taagken _ aga _ sivungagh ni _ pangaleg uq _ .
maligte nghite yatni _ uteghte luni _ paagh laatagh aa _ , _ naqam _ aga _ pangaleg aqe luni _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ qikmigh ghhagh _ aneghte uq _ .
qenwat _ elpeg yug luni _ yuwhaam _ malighqagh aa _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ unite luku _ ayuqe kanga _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ uteghte vike luku _ paagh aqe luku _ pangaleg aqe lghii _ .
qenwat _ yuwhaq _ sukaaghtaa _ .
aawallu _ maateqwaaqun _ yuwhaam _ unite yagute a _ qikmigh ghhagh _ .
qikmigh ghhagh m _ kaate luku _ quyaalaataghtuq _ ighwaaghtuute laatagh uq _ .
taawa _ yuwhaq _ sukaghi ma lghii _ maateghhaq _ qikmigh ghhagh m _ akileghtumakanga _ sukaghimeng _ .
tefaay _ aliinghakun _ !
kevgaaslug _ neghnavregagh
Viri _ V _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ataasigh _ yuug _ ellnginaqeltaghhaq _ .
nuna mi _ tungangani _ ava ite ngughk _ nuna lgu ta ite ngughk _ .
unangniigh llegh ke kanga _ taawanginaq _ sikiggiinaghmeng _ .
talwa llu _ sikig meng _ neqekelghii _ .
naqam _ quunpeng _ piyaanaghaaqelghii _ .
gaagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ negh luni _ , _ taaqe nghmini _ ingliigh luni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
unaami _ piyaa aqe lghii _ .
unange luni _ uteghnigh nghmini _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig t _ afta aqe luki _ .
aymaake i _ gaagh aqe kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ kinegh ngllagh aqe kangi _ ingleghqagh u luki _ naliini _ tanpeghqagh u luki _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ sivuke luni _ esnighqwagh na luni _ .
taagken _ aane luni _ esnagh m _ tunganganun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ igleghte ma luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ unguva lghii _ tepe nghhagh _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ .
taana _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ tugu luku _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
taglagh luni _ kangighagh ani _ mengteghagh m _ petugtu aq _ amigh _ up- yu aatagh a _ kepe luku _ ukigsimakanga _ .
ukigllug qu _ itemsimakanga _ .
Itemlluku _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva an _ qepute ma kanga _ .
qepute luku _ almesigh itun _ petug ma kanga _ kangighagh kun _ .
piyaa vig mi _ unange laatagh ma lghii _ sikig meng _ .
sikigtagh ni _ akmag iigh luku _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ unakegkagh ni _ sikig _ lli ma kanga _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ .
lli luku _ akite kun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ neghnavregagh _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ enta _ sa aqe ziin _ , _ pistemni _ unangkagh ka _ afta gu _ ! _ ”
unangkagh a _ sikig _ umyugwamineng _ qayuutagh mun _ uugte luni _ ellmi neng _ amiiragh igh ma lghii _ .
amiiragh ii nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi neng _ llaag t _ uglafqe te ma lghiit _ , _ ighneghagh igh ma lghii llu _ .
Uglafquneghmeng _ taaqe yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
“ _ sa aqe ziin _ pistemni _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ ”
Yugwem _ esghapagyaqminigu _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ ugkellikagh i _ qulmesiite mun _ kanaghte uute ma lghiit _ ellmeggneng _ .
egllu m _ qula akun _ qulmesiite _ ellmi neng _ agaghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ ,
“ _ sa aqe ziin _ pistemni _ ingliigh te nga _ !
ingaghte naqe unga _ ! _ ”
yuug _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ , _ mulu gpenani _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ungavig _ ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yami _ piyaa laatagh ma lghii _ .
Iiwennguq _ qemi meng _ teve aqe uq _ meteghllug _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ uuk _ aqelqagh _ !
natmun _ igleghte aqe ziin _ ? _ ”
Meteghllugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ temngi _ maani _ igleghte aqe unga _ . _ ”
Yugwem _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ ,
“ _ uuk _ weni _ whanga _ aqelqagh ke laken _ , _ atghagh ltung _ , _ negh yaghtugh ltung _ ! _ ”
taagken _ yugwem _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ mengteghagh minun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itegh lutek _ yugwem _ upugha te ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ meteghllug _ .
meteghllug _ utaqa i ma lghii _ aqume luni _ sikig m _ amiiragh akun _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ sa aqe ziin _ pistemni _ , _ aqelqagh _ gaagh te gu _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ sikig m _ negh kangi _ ellmeggneng _ ketfagh luteng _ ugkelli aqe lghiit _ .
ugkelli luteng _ ellmeggneng _ qulmesiite mun _ itegh luteng _ agaghte ma lghiit _ egllu m _ qula akun _ .
meteghllug _ aqume luni _ qiivaqu aqe lghii _ uzimun _ .
mengteghagh m _ ilu ani _ aghtugh aqe lghii _ esghanneghmeng _ .
kitum _ yuug _ apeghiighsagh te aqe agu _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ ungavig mun _ .
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ , _ negh lutek _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
Yugwem _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ whanga _ piyaa naqe unga _ , _ elpek _ navek _ pi naqe ziin _ ? _ ”
Meteghllugwem _ akite ma kanga _ ,
“ _ whanga _ aki yan _ tunganganun _ ivagh i aqe unga _ ne meng _ . _ ”
taagken _ pellegh utu te ma lghiik _ .
yuug _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ aki yan _ tunganganun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ pengughqagh meng _ talughte luni _ , _ yuug _ iigh te luku _ esghapag ma kanga _ , _ talughte neghsigh ma kanga _ .
talughte yan _ qemi meng _ meteghllug _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ yugwem _ mengteghagh anun _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh luni _ aqume ma lghii _ .
yug tun _ ellnga llu _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ enta _ pistemni _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ ”
neghnavregagh m _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ iwernga _ wata qun _ .
qenwat _ aghtugh luni _ meteghllug _ qefliqe ma lghii _ .
uzimun _ mengteghagh _ ivagh i vike ma kanga _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ esghagh kanga _ kangighagh mi _ petug luni _ amigh _ iimwaqaq _ .
Meteghllugwem _ ketfagh luku _ itemsimakanga _ .
Saagsaqminigu _ esghagh ma kanga _ neghnavregagh ghhagh _ unguva lghii _ .
meteghllug _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
“ _ Unangwaaqsengalghii _ yugwem _ kayute anga _ . _ ”
Meteghllugwem _ neghnavregagh _ qesugragh luku _ amigh mun _ imeg te ma kanga _ .
ne akun _ petug luku _ aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
yuug _ unange luni _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ unangkagh ni _ egllu m _ saaghw akun _ lli luku _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ sa aqe ziin _ pistemni _ , _ gaagh te nga _ ! _ ”
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
alla _ pi laatagh aa _ .
aghtugh ma kanga _ .
mataawi tete yamigu _ amigh _ ketfagh luku _ saagsaqminigu _ imeg tekagh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ qesugragh luni _ .
taagken _ almesigh liite laatagh ma kanga _ kiyaghnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ apeghiighsagh luni _ lliigh laatagh ma lghii _ .
Aliinghakun _ amsanagh akun _ .
tefaay _ !
Tungyuuk _ , _ Iiwek _ , _ maaqellegh k _ sivuqagh mi
Akulkim _ apegh llegh a
maaqnegh ughte nghaani _ tungyughaqaa _ .
quunpeng _ tanqigh _ naqenqaghqe nghaani _ tungyupagllagaqaa _ .
tawani llu _ maaqellegh k _ iknaqe pigte aqe uk _ .
Asivaghataghaam _ nalighmeng _ quungvaam _ tungyupagtestaqaa _ .
kiyang _ six _ hours-mi _ maaqellegh k _ aghvightagh ke ak _ .
Ikevreghaaghhneghani _ iiw aqe a _ .
tepe aghte nagh uq _ esnighqwagh lghii ni _ iiwmun _ ayuqe luku _ .
tepe aq _ iighhwtaqaa _ tungyunghani _ .
Iiwmi _ iqanengenaaghte nagh a qaa _ qalmesaghtu llegh ani _ esne mi _ .
kayute nagh aqe uq _ iqanengenaagh meng _ nayigh itni _ taanʼgani _ qalmesagh ni _ .
aywaayage m _ iiwpag ste aqe a _ .
Iipaghllanghani _ ellmaaralqinaanaqaquq _ .
Sulpik
Tuug _ ’ _ ghim _ apegh llegh a
Mekelghiighhaghnguq _ taana _ Sulpik _ , _ aange ghllag nghite ngughk _ , _ qugwintarkaggaq _ , _ anglinasuwhaq _ elngaatall _ .
Iggaarkitaaghaqelghii _ ilangani _ piyug nghmini _ .
elngaatall _ iye kek _ nangllagrakguutaqelghiik _ ilangani _ .
nasaperaghpag qaghte luni _ ayuqe lghii _ army _ cap-meng _ .
atugh kek _ jacket-eghllagek _ , _ nagtuqaghpalgek _ , _ aligh kek _ taake lghiik _ ellnga ni _ .
atuqe aqe lghii llu _ qulligllagegneng _ segesqugh kek _ ilaagh ghllagkagh gneng _ , _ kameraagh ghllag gneng llu _ singigh a _ singigh gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ legra aqe lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ sa meng _ esghaghkagh mineng _ .
Amyughwaatuqaq _ amyughwaaghusiqaqegkanga _ uglagh lghii _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh ni _ ilakumtaagh minun _ .
quunpeng _ teghigniqe u lghii _ nenglagh aqe lghii _ .
nenglagh kaqe kangi _ sa u aat _ alngunak _ sumeghtaghagh tkekagh ni _ .
sumegh ke igate kanga _ talwa _ esla m _ allangughhrakegtulnga _ ne meng _ uyavagh nun _ piyutagh u nghmini _ .
Amyughwaaghngaaghmi _ pinitun _ pingwaagh ke lghii _ .
ilakumtaagh an _ piyuke aqe kangat _ ila u luku _ qayughllak _ umyugwaqegtaq _ .
sa lleghqagh meng _ suumqaallataneghmini _ nulqaviighsimaaqelghii _ , _ aghuliilkiqnanimaaqelghii _ .
kiyang _ nenglaghnagh luku _ sa u a _ esghamaaqegkanga _ .
enkaam _ quunpeng _ sa meng _ ila minun _ nenglaghtilleghqameng _ umyugwamikun _ sumeghtaghagh ma aqe lghii _ .
kaagkagh _ qelluugta _ .
kaagkagh t _ qelluugtaataneghmeggni _ qesugyugwem _ .
“ _ atugh lghiit _ qesug nagh pigte ut _ aghula te ghllag t _ repall _ kaagkagh ka _ qelluugtaa _ .
qenwat _ aghula unga _ , _ ” _ aghnaghagh m _ ilakumtaagh ni _ ungipaate ma kangi _ .
SANGULLUUK _ qemi mi
Sivuqaghhmiitlu _ , _ sivungagh mii t llu _ apeghtughiste ita _ ulimaagh at
Sulpik _ taana _ qemi mun _ mayugh kusiigh ghngaaghmi _ sa meng _ allakaayagh gmeng _ esghaate igate ngughk _ .
alla _ maaten _ mayugh luni _ , _ agigte luni _ , _ yugsughayalghiimi _ sa u a _ allake ma kanga _ esghagh igate kete ni _ tespamanlluku _ , _ elngaatall _ iye kek _ nangllagrakguusimalghiik _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sa u a _ taana _ esghagh luku _ elngaatall _ egtugte pagte ma lghii _ .
Tawatennguq _ egtugte pagte te kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ ,
“ _ Ka-a-ay _ ! _ ”
Esghaghyaqminigunguq _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ angqaperug kegte aq _ , _ uka llu nguq _ taku kestagh aqe a _ .
“ _ kaay _ , _ sa naqe zinga ngam _ ? _ ” _ pi ma lghii _ Sulpik _ .
Esghanqegsitkesaqminigunguq _ iye ghllag kek _ , _ ggute ghrugllag i llu _ .
Agitaghqeghllagluni _ ellngaghllugwinaanun _ ayuqe uq _ .
nanugh m _ melqwatun _ melqugh leg ghllag _ , _ ayvegh m _ tugu ta atun _ tulughyag ghllag kek _ , _ iye ghrugllag kek _ legan _ kilgaa ni _ miluqutagh ke kek _ .
Nunmaasqughhaq _ uka _ taku kestagh aa _ .
alingruugh ghllag luni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qimag na luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ enraq _ pi yalghiimi _ alingruupagllagem _ ighu kek _ kayaali ste qugh u aghagh ma lghiik _ .
iitek nguq _ talligh gni _ aghulasimaagkenka _ pi yagh uq _ ,
“ _ Huy _ ! _ Huy _ ! _ ”
alike aghte nghite a nguq _ .
taagken _ slingshot-egni _ suumqagh u te ma kek _ .
nusug lukek _ uyghag ligh lukek _ qiinghute luku _ guute naqe yagh aa _ , _ guutepagningite uq _ , _ talligh kek _ ungelegteghllagem _ .
Enraghnguq _ sling-engan _ rubber-kek _ aghyum _ kepe kaqe ma lghiik _ .
“ _ A-ay _ ! _ ” _ , _ pi uq _ Sulpik _ .
Tawateteghngaagkenka _ inglu inagh u ghngaan _ qiinghute luku _ guusagh aa _ , _ manu ngiighhagh akun _ uyghag a _ tekite uq _ .
sumeghtaghagh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ .
“ _ sa meng _ milugh qaghte lakun _ ! _ ”
tamaavek _ esghaquaghaghte yalghiimi _ uyghag nguq _ whaa _ saaghw ani _ , _ akuqagh aa _ tawavek _ milugh na luku _ .
uqliite luku _ , _ nekefqaghte magh mi _ miluute kete luku _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Aa-aa _ ! _ ”
aragh te lghiit _ nagasaqminiki _ llangaqa nguq _ igaghvig mi _ ilakumtaagh i _ ,
“ _ Aqnighnnaqaghpekuut _ alla _ milughpenaamtaa _ ! _ ”
pi yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ taakut _ pi nga yu t _ igaghyagh lgute i _ amiiragh ghllag m _ asi aneng _ aga _ qimagugh te ma lghiit _ .
Sulpigem _ malighqagh luki _ kaate yamiki _ qeleqetaaghtagh ma kangi _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ alinge ma lghiit _ qayughllak _ iknaqe lghii _ ellngit neng _ , _ wata _ suwaguluni _ .
Akequughtaat _ seal- i qugh naqe ni luku _ , _ savig teng _ , _ uunghagh teng _ , _ qamiye teng _ tuune aqe ni luki _ sa u a _ ipa _ akequsagh keqaghte litgu _ .
wetku _ akequughtengngwaaghyatni _ qeleqetaneghmeng _ taaqe ai _ .
taagken _ aglamalghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ akequsagh teng _ tagite uute ma kangit _ Sulpigmun _ .
aane te kete luku _ Sulpigenkuneng _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ allameng llu _ amyughwaaghnaanghitaghput _ .
qakimallu _ suflugwalwaaqli _ ! _ ”
iye _ inglupigagh
angyagh na mi _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ egtug nagh mi _ ugmestaaghhaluku _ qavagh lghii ni _ .
Yugwet _ pi aqe ut _ ,
“ _ Teng _ ’ _ ghunaaguq _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ unugmi _ qavagh naqe ut _ . _ ”
SULPIGEM _ pilaataqu llegh a
Wamiyaam _ apegh llegh a
“ _ Sulpiik _ !
Sul-PIIK _ ! _ ”
Sulpigem _ naa an _ tuqlumakanga _ ,
“ _ Sulpik _ , _ tagi aghten _ , _ tagi ragkiigh qagh a _ ! _ ”
Sulpignguq _ igleghte te kete luku _ Honda-megteggun _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ whaa _ aghyuugh naqe aatnga _ . _ ”
legan _ naa an _ ineghqughwaaghwaaghaa _ honda-k _ metngeghutefqaayek _ pi sqellug kek _ .
ineghtekau ghngaaghmi _ nuqenneghmenguq _ aghtugh uq _ , _ metngegh yug ghllag _ , _ esnighqwagh yug ghllag _ qenwat _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
naqamllu _ esnighqwagh llegh a nguq _ una _ aghyuullngunani _ aghqe aghtekagh _ .
esnighqwagh vigkagh minun _ kaate luni _ , _ qagughrug kun _ Honda-gni _ aghula i aghte lukek _ , _ ategh luni _ piyug meng _ esnagh mun _ atghaamalghi _ .
taakwani nguq _ tepagh meng _ saghna yalghiimi _ .
qagi igh ghllag nguq _ , _ saveg ii aghte luni _ megh _ un _ ’ _ ga _ , _ imani nguq _ qagitu uq _ .
Sulpik _ saghna pigte ghngaaghmi _ sivugte yalghiimi _ neghsagh _ qagi m _ ayeme te aqe a _ , _ repall _ nangllagpagtuq _ .
quya pigte luni _ nalla anun _ aglagh aghte luni _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh luku _ kelevagh ma kanga _ .
iiwenllu _ kelevaghqaghaqaa _ nengulgha llegh neng _ sivugte yalghiimi _ ila a _ neghsagh m _ kana _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
legan _ taana _ peghhe qagh luku _ ila a llu _ teskana _ takuaghaghte luku _ nengulgha sag u _ akuqagh aa _ .
imange i nguq _ aangwaagh uq _ .
Pegnekaniq _ sayugwaa _ .
alla _ qingsig qagh yalghiimi _ qagi nun _ , _ paninang _ pi nga yu a _ ayeme te laatagh aa _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ ,
“ _ wiin _ allameng _ qingsig naqe nghite unga _ ! _ ”
elngaatall _ quya uq _ .
“ _ taawa _ aghyuugh naqe nghite aatnga _ honda-k _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ ”
salin _ kayaalnguq _ enraq _ nuna _ kumlaluni _ qiighnagh ghllag _ enkaam _ qamullginnaq _ .
qiighnite nghmini _ nuna mun _ gginagh a _ mateg qaghte vzigh aqe lghii _ .
iwernga _ nenglengeltaghaqelghii _ quyam _ neghsagh meng _ .
taagken _ pegnem _ ataasigh _ kaat ute qaghte luku _ Honda-mi _ uvite anun _ ila i llu _ aqfa i _ .
elngaatall _ piyaqli aqe aq _ qayughllak _ mekestaaghhaa lghii _ .
Qiighnitaghamikun _ taaggun _ qamagte qaghte luki _ pegnem _ kaat ute te luki _ Honda-gminun _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
Sumeghtaghamalghii _ ,
“ _ seghleghhalek _ natenngam _ qakughnaqsingi _ , _ aglagh te naqe zingi _ . _ ”
aghliigh yug yagh luni _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ ,
“ _ iitek llu _ uteghpagtagh lleqe unga _ , _ ataasigh t _ katulluki _ ila i _ aqfa aqe luki _ pi lleqe anka _ . _ ”
meghnaali yami _ ataasigh _ qaake naqutke ma kanga _ Honda-minun _ .
tugu luku _ kevegsigh u aghagh a _ ima _ peghhe qaghaqe a _ qayughllak _ uqigtu ghllag _ .
ila i llu _ nanghiqwaghsimayaqangi _ mataawi te ma kangi _ .
Sulpik _ yugsughayalghiimi _ , _ hiik _ , _ maalghug _ esnighqwak _ esnevagh aqe uk _ .
ukapighqaagh yayek _ tagsigh ma kek _ .
arekull _ nulighh ghqu te uk _ elkek llu _ esnighqwak _ .
uka _ tagi qrugtugh ngugh _ yuwhaq _ .
Yuwhaam _ kaate luku _ upugh ma lghii _ ,
“ _ kii _ , _ unangsamaten _ ! _ ”
Sulpik _ quya pigte lghii _ , _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ Tepughii _ taaggun _ elngaatall _ uygute luteng _ ! _ tea- te te _ ’ _ gavek _ esghagh negh mni _ akuraghaqanka _ ayeme te lghiit _ , _ kelevagh aqe anka _ legan _ . _ ”
taagken _ yugwem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ una _ amsakenghat _ qaake naqe aqa _ Honda-gpenun _ qayughllak _ honda-gken _ me ke ta ghhagh k _ . _ ”
iwernga nguq _ tunutegkenkun _ qaake luku _ asighte te vyigh aa _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ yugwem _ ,
“ _ maalghug _ taake uk _ qaake lleqe agka _ honda-gka _ aange uk _ , _ saama _ iknaqe uk _ . _ ”
Yugwem _ quyakullu _ aga _ igleghqaatnginamaghmeng _ .
angayuqagh an _ Sulpigem _ peng _ ’ _ gun- ii te aat _ aviitngwaalghii _ Sulpik _ .
liigike kangat _ metngeqagh u lghii _ Honda-gnekun _ .
Sulpigem _ naa an _ ugwini _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ naagu _ Sulpik _ , _ navek _ pi a _ , _ pengenghisiguu _ ?
ivagh yaghtugh naqe gu _ ! _ ”
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ navek _ mekelghiiqruwhaq _ aghulaqe laatagh a _ !
whaa _ legan _ aghyuughmigtaanaqngwaaqa _ ! _ ”
ata a _ yataaghqelluni _ ila gkenkun _ Honda-m _ aghulaqe uq _ .
iiwenllu _ igleghte lqinagh aqe uq _ uka _ key- nghhagh at _ , _ mamlegte yaghtugh lghii _ .
Honda-ngighhaat _ taakwavek _ tume tgun _ sanivaqun _ igleghat _ , _ taakwavek _ qiive yalghiimi _ liisuqe a nguq _ Sulpik _ uka _ Honda-ngiighhaagnekun _ tagi lghii _ .
taagavek _ qiive qaghte luni _ amigimakangi _ .
Tughwaaghyaqminiki _ piyaqminiki _ , _ kii _ , _ neghsagh meng _ usi lug teng _ .
kaate luki _ aghuliigh uute ma lghiit _ .
Sulpigem _ ata a _ puyguughnguq _ ima _ aghyuughmignaqnguyaqanga _ Sulpik _ .
Sulpigem _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ata ni _ ,
“ _ qivghu pigte unga _ elngaatall _ metngegh lghiinga llu _ Honda-klu _ metngeghute kegka _ . _ ”
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ aa-a _ , _ wiin _ aglagh kumta _ aleghqugh lleqe amken _ . _ ”
wetku _ kaate luteng _ ne mun _ Sulpigem _ nengllugutangi _ pi yalghiimeng _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pi nga yu t _ neghsagh t _ Sulpigem _ mallu ke ai _ .
qamagte luteng _ quya te ut _ elngaatall _ .
pi nga yu a _ taana _ neghsagh m _ usiitilghimun _ tuune ma kangat _ , _ kayusigh i lghii _ qayughllak _ .
naange a _ elngaatall _ afta ma lghii _ .
afta nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ uyegte ma lghii _ awalightu ma lghii _ uviqlimeggnun _ , _ quyaghllagem _ angtalanganeng _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ , _ Sulpigem _ naange a _ neghsagh liigh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute neghsigh te kete luki _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aleghqugh ma kangat _ Sulpik _ qaatke te nghite llegh aneng _ , _ metngegh llegh aneng _ , _ Honda-gneng _ metngeghute i llegh aneng _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ Sulpik _ !
qakimallu _ uqiigh te aqe i _ , _ naavutaqliten _ , _ nalighmeng _ sa kun _ tenpe te aqe i _ .
iwernga _ aneghneghte uten _ mallu nge ughtagh u lghiiten _ . _ ”
alaghrang _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ aghulaqe naqe negh gpeni _ navek _ aaputngwaaqaghluten _ pi aqe i _ !
ungipaate aqe luta _ , _ enkaangam _ pengeg fqaamta _ pi aqe lta _ !
aapute aghte manginagh lukek _ honda-k _ atugh aqe i akek _ . _ ”
taawa _ Sulpik _ liite uq _ aapute yagute naqe uq _ .
akeqe ma kangi _ angayuqagh ni _ ,
“ _ quunpeng _ neqamike aqe lleqe aqa _ napiyugllaghngaaghma _ sivuke lunga _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ .
whaken _ kenlanga _ elpetegnun _ aapute aqe lleqe unga _ . _ ”
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ elngaatall _ aviite yaghqagh ghllag _ taawa _ allgeghsimaan _ .
taana llu _ ilate luku _ atuqe gkuvgu _ qaatke te ma llegh _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ , _ quya te aqe lleqe ukut _ . _ ”
siingvallagha
Qugwayunghitem _ , _ efqughyunghitem _ me t _ aanesqaghtameng _ akuzi lghii ni _ .
mekelghiigh _ naa mi _ meghtiisqesatni _ naa ni _ pi a _ ,
“ _ aa-a _ , _ pi lleqe unga _ ! _ ”
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ siingvallagha igate ut _ , _ me n _ ayghigh lleqe uq _ . _ ”
naayghagh _ taku ste na nigh ke aq
Qirgengaawetem _ apegh llegh a
Sulpigem _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kaay _ , _ megh iitagh ke ukut _ ! _ ”
“ _ meghtagh lleqe unga _ ! _ ” _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ Sulpigem _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ taayughqe ma lghii _ meghtagh na luni _ .
aate ma kangi _ uqig allugh ghhagh k _ kameraaghpaggaagnillu _ jacket-teghpaggaagnillu _ .
tespamavek _ kiiw gnun _ piyug meng _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
aghneghmi _ tawani _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh ghllag _ .
elngaatall _ nguuyngaghaat _ qinuyugte ma kangat _ Sulpik _ .
malghugnegh neng _ qalta ligh luni _ kiiw gnun _ tespamavek _ meghtagh ma lghii _ atuqrughwaaghumaghmi _ ,
“ _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa- a _ , _ ayaangaa _ . _ ”
“ _ Kaa-aa _ ! _ ”
Aqnighqwaamalghii _ elngaatall _ .
arekull _ vegtaagh m _ kaape ma kanga _ aghenqignegh akun _ ullungag akun _ .
qiya vzigh ma lghii _ aqnighqwaam _ angtale aneng _ .
Iiggelluwhaghmineng _ qugwinpayuwhaghneng _ eflughwaghaghsimakanga _ kaape lleg ni _ .
kiiw gnun _ kaate luni _ qalta ni _ imigh ma kangi _ .
Atghamun _ qalghigh te lghiit _ piyaqminiki _ leghllegh t _ aga _ tespamavek _ kiiw m _ tunganganun _ pi aqe ut _ .
tumangani _ qalta ghhagh ni _ lli luki _ meghnaalimalghi _ .
nekevgha te kete luku _ tawani _ esghapag ma kanga _ naayghagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ apegh qumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh mini _ .
awen _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe kanga _ ungipaghagh mi _ taana _ nateghtu langa _ naayghagh _ sangami llu _ taku snanigh kau ta a _ .
taagken _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiimi _ mangteghagh mun _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ penggaaqeftuq _ uteghpaarkitaagh magh mi _ esghagh naqe magh an _ uka _ qemigh a mi _ .
“ _ kaay _ , _ Sulpik _ elngaatall _ pengegsigh uten _ ! _ ” _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
Sulpigem _ iqenge te yagh aa _ nengyugh ni _ , _ pegnem _ inglupigagh meng _ iqenge te a _ qayughllak _ ullungag a _ puuve ghllag nga lghii _ .
“ _ ukavek _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ gginagh n _ !
kii _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ ?
sullevneghhaleg _ una _ !
kitum _ pi uten _ ? _ ” _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ .
Sulpigem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
“ _ nakaa _ , _ vegtaagh m _ taglagh ma lunga _ kaape kaqe aanga _ pamavek _ meghtagh ma lunga _ ! _ ”
piniqe pigtekanga _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ tawanighlluwhiinaq _ ukmangigh aghte ma kanga _ ullungag a _ .
Ighivgaghyan _ , _ negh te nghmeng _ apeghiigh yameng _ , _ Sulpigem _ taku yuguma kangi _ ilakumtaagh ghhagh ni _ kiiw gnun _ pikagh t _ .
taagken _ piyaataaghluni _ kiiw gnun _ sa u a _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
nagasugni yalghiimi _ llangaqa _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ , _ nalighmeng _ kaynge _ , _ nanugh _ .
nagaqugh ma kangi _ akuzite lghiit _ kiigwem _ esne gkeni _ .
piyaqminiki _ aragh kaqe te lghiit _ arekull _ ilakumtaagh i _ naghaagh te aqe ut _ .
“ _ Sulpik _ , _ sukate luten _ tea- ai _ ! _ ” _ aragh ma lghii _ ataasigh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ,
“ _ kayusiite aghte kut _ iqallug _ una _ tugunaqutkaqaghput _ . _ ”
Sulpik _ sukate naqe pigte luni _ piyullunaaghumalghii _ enraq _ ighu k _ takestaaghhagh m _ suka ighlliqe ma lghii _ .
“ _ Sulpik _ aghuliigh i _ nagnegh aghte lleqe uten _ esnevaghpag kuvek _ ! _ ” _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
siingenllu _ Sulpik _ uka _ ullghitaperewaaghaqeftuq _ aragh magh mi _ .
aga _ isiqghuute ghllag uq _ ! _ naate naagh a nguq _ iqallug _ tugu naqekagh at _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ takwaghaghlluku _ Sulpik _ kayusiite luku _ nekevesimakangat _ .
qute mun _ taslugh luku _ uyghag m _ saaghw akun _ aqumesimakangat _ .
kameraagh kek _ anighaaghte lutek _ uqigtughqwaamalghiik _ megh m _ imighyaqminikek _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ iqallug _ kameraagh an _ ilu ani _ .
taagken _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ Sulpigem _ iqallug _ tugumiiqe luku _ .
Sulpik _ uniqaghaasimakangat _ qayughllak _ aghiraam _ sukangiite ghllag lghii _ .
nagate laatagh ma kanga _ taana _ qawaagte yu gni _ qalghigh lghii _ llangaqa _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ .
Upum _ angtale aneng _ elngaatall _ iqallug _ qete ghllag ma kanga _ .
Sulpik _ ne mun _ kaate yalghiimi _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pengeg aqlaatagh uq _ .
“ _ kaay _ , _ sa laatagh ziin _ sangavek _ aghitqe ghllag ziin _ !
Pugwimaghyaghsiin _ ? _ ”
Iqlighmi _ Sulpigem _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
“ _ Estughaghllunga _ kiiw gnun _ aghitqe unga _ ! _ ”
“ _ kii _ , _ Sulpik _ uyuq _ qakunngam _ liite naqe ziin _ ! _ ” _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ aghyuniighumakanga _ .
Unugmi _ tawani _ amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ , _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ .
tanqigh _ elngaatall _ nighugtu te _ tespikegken _ naayghagh meng _ aliigh kestagh aqe uq _ .
Sulpik _ aane yuguma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mangteghagh m _ qaye anun _ mayugh luni _ amaanguyugsimalghii _ .
“ _ Aaa-ruuu _ ! _ ” _ mulaagh ma lghii _ .
“ _ paamyuq _ unugwaa _ itegh i ngam _ , _ ” _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ amig meng _ eslate mun _ qineghte luni _ tuqlugh aa _ .
Sulpik _ qetgegh yalghiimi _ qakma _ miiguute ghllag uq _ manughagh kun _ .
Sulpik _ itegh yalghiimi _ aagra ita _ ilu a _ nighug ghllag _ qayughllak _ nanigh at _ qetngigh lghiit _ .
Allighighwaaghluku _ nuna kun _ yataaghqutngwaaghluku _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ayuqe a _ .
“ _ Apaay _ , _ alla _ ungipaghagh te aghte nga _ ! _ ”
Sulpigem _ aapte a _ nengyugh ni _ .
“ _ aa-a _ , _ ” _ nengyugh an _ angegh ma kanga _ ,
“ _ emta _ nagate lghaaten _ naghaagh gpenang _ aghuliighwaaghluten _ ! _ ”
Sulpigem _ piniqumtaagh a _ ungipaghagh an _ atugh laatagh aa _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ , _ tanqigh m _ yugwi _ .
Sulpik _ nagate u ghngaaghmi _ aghsaan _ aapqughwaaghllak _ .
qenwat _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ ungipaghaate mete nghite ngugh meng _ ,
“ _ sangami _ allaaghlluwhaawa _ naayghagh _ piikna _ ? _ ”
nengyugh an _ kiimsimakanga _ ,
“ _ kitum _ alngunak _ taku igate a _ test- pig ke na _ naayghagh _ ! _ ”
“ _ sangan _ ? _ ” _ iqlimyugwaaghumaghmi _ Sulpigem _ aapte a _ .
“ _ qayughllak _ whangkuta _ tespikavek _ pi igate ngugh u kut _ ! _ ”
nengyugh ghhagh n _ qenwat _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ Nataataghtiinga _ ineghtengngwaaghaqamken _ tespagavek _ pi gpenang _ ! _ ”
ineghte ghngaatni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ umyugwaghhaagkeneng _ avaagh igate ngughk _ aligate llegh a _ naayghagh mun _ .
legan _ iiwen _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ pengeg aqe kanga _ .
repall _ penggem _ iiskughte aqe kanga _ Sulpik _ navek _ aghulaqe na yu kan _ nallu nghmini _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ Sulpik _ nulqaaviighsimalghii _ navek _ pi na luni _ .
iiwen _ taanangwaaqelghii _ naayghagh _ umyugwaanilnguq _ .
naqamllu _ esghagh nghminigu _ almesiqe aqe kanga _ , _ alla u nghite ngughk _ ila itneng _ naayghagh neng _ .
“ _ Aap _ , _ apaay _ ! _ ”
Sulpigem _ nengyugh ni _ tuqlumakanga _ iighaghtugh magh mi _ mangteghagh m _ tunuqagh anun _ .
nengyugh an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ,
“ _ ay _ , _ sa meng _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ ”
Sulpigem _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ naayghagh _ taku kaqsagh aqa _ apaay _ , _ naqamllu _ sa nghite unga _ ! _ ”
“ _ sangama _ qaatke nghite zinga _ ! _ ” _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ aghyughumakanga _ .
Sulpigem _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ,
“ _ puughte amken _ ! _ ”
“ _ ii-i _ , _ ” _ kenimiita _ Sulpik _ piighaghte ma kanga _ nengyugh an _ ,
“ _ paagkut qun _ esghaqagh ki _ kaangugh lghute t _ . _ ”
Sulpik _ pi ma lghii _ ,
“ _ Apaay _ , _ naayghagh m _ qula akun _ aag ut _ , _ naqamllu _ sa nghite te ai _ . _ ”
“ _ sa u luku _ emta _ ! _ ” _ pi ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ .
uksaagh nghaani _ vegaagh llu _ , _ nunivagseghagh llu _ paligh kestagh nghaani _ ne mi _ tawani _ quuggutaqelghiit _ .
Sulpigenkutlu _ angaghqugh aqe lghiit _ esnagh meng _ quugkagh meng _ uksulqusigh _ atughqagh meng _ .
“ _ kaay _ , _ naagu _ qalqalima ut _ ? _ ” _ nengyugh an _ aapte ma kanga _ Sulpik _ .
“ _ kii _ , _ puygu ma aqa _ quugte vig mni _ , _ ” _ Sulpigem _ ungipaate a _ .
“ _ aa _ , _ aqfa aghte gu _ qugwaghsiighnalunga _ pi aqe unga _ kumagh u qu te kaghqagh meng _ , _ ” _ nengyugh an _ kayagte a _ .
Sulpigem _ esnagh mun _ quugte vig minun _ tesamavek _ qalqalima _ aqfa ma kanga _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ taakwani _ tumangani _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ .
nagasugni yalghiimi _ naayghagh meng _ sa u a _ nagaqumakanga _ .
llangaqa nguq _ ellnga _ tuqlugh kanga _ .
nagasugni kestagh ghngaaghmi _ neqagh te ma kanga _ qalqalima _ aqfaakenni _ .
naalkellug qu _ wata _ quugte luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
Qaamggunginaq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ elngaatall _ nulqaaviightem _ pilataamakanga _ , _ navek _ piyaataaghyugllagem _ .
kaateqaghte luni _ aapte ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ ,
“ _ pagavek _ pi aghte langa _ , _ uqfigagh yagh qagh langa _ ? _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ kelengangwaaghluten _ .
sa u a _ allake gkuvgu _ tespagani _ uteghte lghaaten _ , _ ” _ nengyugh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
unaami ani _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ allake ma kanga _ Sulpik _ .
Pinqusighmineng _ Sulpik _ aghuliigh lleg ke iqe nghite uq _ .
repall _ nengyugh an _ aksaqe luku _ iiskughte ma kanga _ kelengake ma kanga _ qayughllak _ Sulpik _ naayghagh mun _ ayuqngwaalghii _ .
llaaghanam _ Sulpik _ aga _ tespagavek _ pi aqe uq _ .
nengyugh an _ esghapag ma kanga _ uteghmun _ qiive ghesnagh aqe luni _ naayghaghllugwinaghmun _ taglagh lghii _ .
Sulpik _ iiwenllu _ naayghagh m _ nategh anun _ kaate aqe uq _ naken _ sa u a _ nagate laatagh aa _ .
naayghagh _ qule mun _ yuvghiighwaaghyaqminigu _ paga _ kiigh ani _ qughsatku ghllag _ ellngaghlluwinaanun _ ayuqe luni _ .
qughsatku ghllag _ nekefqaghte luni _ qalghiilluugllagumaghmi _ esla _ pategpaghqwaa _ .
Sulpik _ aliingem _ repall _ iflaaghwagh ma lghii _ sa ma lghii _ aviite qaghte aghte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ liite qaghte luni _ qimag naqe ma lghii _ .
kayalaawi ghngaaghmi _ ungelegte ghngaaghmi _ sukaangiighhaagni _ qamagte lukek _ aqfaate ma lghii _ .
elngaatall _ aqfaate ma lghii _ uteghmun _ qiive yukagh gpenani _ .
pi yalghiimi llu _ whaa _ mangteghagh meggnun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ amig meng _ eslate mun _ esghapagaaqeftuq _ .
taawa _ liite a _ sangami _ naayghagh _ taku snanigh kau ta a _ .
liite a llu _ sangan _ nengyugh ni _ qaatkesaghqagh ke te ni _ .
aqsa m _ imigh a
anglegute ke te ii na lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh k _ nayag eng _ pingayuqluku _ angyagh meng _ nunaagh meggnun _ pi ma lghiit _ .
apa ita _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ taaga _ aqsa m _ imigh a _ kete ut _ . _ ”
kilgaa n _ qikmighagh a
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
Sulpigem _ qikmigh ni _ Siilpak _ mangteghagh meggnun _ living-room-memun _ itghute luku _ , _ neghsagh m _ qugweziineng _ iqlugte yaghqagh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
Aqumutaghllagegnekun _ neveghlluni _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ sa lleghqagh meng _ , _ navek _ piyaa aatagh u lleghqagh meng _ .
“ _ Sulpik _ !
una _ qikmigh _ sa aqlaatagh a _ whani _ ?
legan _ tanughqe i u aghte unga _ !
aane ste gu _ ! _ ” _ naa an _ agniqe te ma kanga _ .
Upughqwaamakanga _ Sulpik _ sumeghtagh aqe ste aq _ .
aqume qaghte te kete luku _ naa ni _ piighaghte ma kanga _ ,
“ _ aa-a _ aane ste naqe aqa _ ! _ ”
Sulpigem _ kameraghegni _ , _ Shoe _ Pac-kek _ aate ma kek _ .
talwa _ allake te uk _ , _ inglu a _ aghnagh m _ pike a _ , _ inglu a _ yugwem _ .
naqam _ qamagte lutek _ size _ 6-ek _ .
iwerngaqun _ inglu a _ aange lghii _ .
Jacket-tek _ atuqumtaghegni _ piniqumtaghegni _ aate ma kek _ .
taake uk _ army-t _ field _ jacket-tegket _ angegh lleg ke ghngaaghmikek _ atuqe aqe kek _ legan _ aligh kek _ ulpegte aghte lukek _ .
nasaperagh llu _ eslaghllag ke aq _ Cat-meng _ igagh leg _ contractor-reneng _ pi ni _ aatquumakangi _ .
Kitchen-kun _ aane aqe uq _ .
qikmigh an _ maligte a _ .
Kitchen-mi _ neqekrangllagh meng _ peanut _ butter-meng _ sandwich-engllaghluni _ aqume luni _ negh uq _ .
Siilpak _ living _ room-emun _ uteghte uq _ .
Sulpigem _ ata an _ , _ Ggiiluum _ , _ kuynge a _ end _ table-legneng _ ashtray- mete ngughk _ ateghte luku _ iqlugte a _ .
iqlugte ma luku _ Ggiilu _ itegh uq _ .
“ _ Sulpik _ !
qikmigh _ una _ sa aqa _ whani _ ?
aane ste gu _ ! _ ”
Ggiiluum _ aghyuugh aa _ , _ “ _ alla _ qikmigh nge naanghite u aghte uten _ .
qikmigh n _ kelengake igate an _ . _ ”
Sulpik _ neghekestaq _ upughqaam _ repall _ neqe ni _ nuna mun _ ifkagh aa _ .
“ _ aa-a _ ! _ ” _ Sulpigem _ angegh aghte a _ ata ni _ .
Sulpik _ aane yalghiimi _ imani _ aliinghuuq _ .
qikmigh ni _ petugwaghlluku _ piyaataaghumalghii _ naayghagh mun _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ a ta mi _ kuynge a _ Siilpagem _ iqlugtekagh a _ sumeghtaghagh tke ma kanga _ .
“ _ naten _ kuynge u teqaghte lakun _ , _ ” _ pi ma lghii _ Sulpik _ .
Ellnginaghhaaghngaaghminguq _ akuzi aqe lghii _ .
naayghagh m _ nategh akun _ , _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ tume tgun _ Sulpik _ igleghte aqe lghii _ .
uteghmun _ naayvagh m llu _ kellii n llu _ akulangakun _ tume ngllaghkagh tgun _ tagi aqe lghii _ ne mun _ .
qayughllak nguq _ nalugvingllat _ truck-ngit _ taakwagun _ igleghte aqe lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ driver-et _ uugte ste aqe kangat _ .
enkaam _ uteghmun _ truck-ekun _ igleghte nghmini _ teghigniqe aqe lghii _ .
Sulpik _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ naayghagh mi _ , _ uyghagagh neng _ paga _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ qalghigh lghii _ .
pika _ uyghagagh ni _ esghagh aa _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ esghavyu kegte aq _ sugrug kek _ tagnegh lghiik _ .
imani _ pinigh uq _ .
tespikavek _ taku ma kanga _ .
qikmighagh ghhagh m _ esghagh luku _ qimag uq _ yaagtuqagh nun _ uyghagagh nun _ .
ima nguq _ suflu mun _ itegh qagh uq _ .
Sulpik _ uyghagagh nun _ kaate luni _ qikmighagh ghhagh m _ iteghvig a _ suflugh _ ilu te mun _ qineghte a _ .
qama _ esghagh aa _ .
tugu na luku _ suflu mun _ itegh vike naqe yagh aa _ enraq _ kangsugh uq _ .
kilgaa n _ qikmighagh ke a _ nuyaagh ghllag _ , _ entaqun _ naa igh tke aq _ .
“ _ whangate uq _ pi kegka _ , _ ” _ Sulpik _ pi ma lghii _ .
uteghte yu ghngaaghmi _ ilakumtaagh ni _ ungipaate na luki _ qikmighagh ghhagh meng _ enraq _ uteghmun _ piyug ghllag yaghqagh _ .
ika _ naayvagh m _ kenle ani _ tume ngllaghkagh ni _ truck-ek _ esghaghaak _ .
tazikavek _ aglagh ragkiigh uq _ .
llaaghanwha _ tume ngllaghkagh anun _ kaa tuq _ truck-ek _ igleghte ste gpenakek _ .
naghughte lukek _ piyug uq _ .
natengiighhaq _ naghughte aqe ak llu _ uka _ igleghte uk _ truck-kek _ .
kaate luku _ driver-em _ , _ Jack _ Thumbo-m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Hi _ Sull _ , _ where _ you _ going _ ? _ ”
Sulpigem _ akite a _ , _ “ _ Hi _ Jack _ , _ i _ ’ _ m _ goin _ ’ _ home _ . _ ”
“ _ Hop _ on _ , _ i _ ’ _ m _ going _ to _ lunch _ , _ ” _ Jack-em _ pi a _ .
uugte luni _ Sulpik _ igleghte te kete luku _ Jack _ ungipaate a _ qikmighagh ghhagh meng _ .
pi ghngaaghmi _ suumqagh u te a _ a ta mi _ kuynge a _ Siilpagem _ iqlugtekagh a _ .
taana llu _ apegh aa _ quni i _ maaqe magh meng _ .
“ _ i _ ’ _ ll _ tell _ you _ wheat _ , _ Sull _ , _ ” _ Jack-em _ pi a _ tuye akun _ patagagh magh an _ , _ “ _ It _ ’ _ s _ my _ turn _ to _ sweep _ our _ quarters _ tonight _ .
If _ it _ ’ _ s _ okay _ with _ your _ parents _ , _ would _ you _ like _ to _ help _ me _ ?
That _ way _ i _ can _ pay _ you _ and _ buy _ a _ pipe _ for _ your _ dad _ . _ ”
“ _ aa-a _ ! _ ”
Iqlighmi _ Sulpik _ qiive qaghte ma lghii _ .
kaate lutek _ ne mun _ Sulpik _ aglagh uq _ ellmegnun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ angayuqagh kek _ living _ room-emi _ mail-meng _ yuvghiigh aqe uk _ .
Sulpigem _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ esghaghkagh ni _ apegh aa _ .
“ _ whangate uq _ pi kegka _ , _ ” _ kavyungunani _ pi ma lghii _ ata ni _ qingsig magh an _ .
Ggiiluum _ sa meng _ pi gpenani _ yaghlegi _ kuynge ni _ Siilpagem _ iqlugtekagh a _ kelgute a _ .
Sulpigem _ piighaghte a _ ata ni _ Jack _ thumbo _ kayusiitesqelluni _ whanikun _ alleg naqe lghii _ aapute sqe ma ni luni _ , _ akileghtugh lleqe ni luni _ .
angayuqagh gkenka _ itagnagh qu ma kangat _ .
“ _ iiggagh nge naqe lghaaten _ , _ ” _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ Sulpik _ , _ “ _ iigge an _ inglupigagh _ mingllite aqa _ , _ inglu a _ qayngun _ ifla magh an _ ? _ ”
Estugwaq _ umeg ste gpenaan _ Mr. _ Thumbo-nkuk _ Sulpigenkuk _ alleg nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ kuynge nge yaghtu ma lghiik _ .
two _ dollars _ twenty-four _ cents _ siipte yan _ Sulpigmun _ tuune ma kanga _ .
kuynge _ Sulpigmun _ tuune ma kanga _ ata anun _ aglagh te sqellug qu _ .
Sulpigem _ igamsiqa yug vike luku _ Mr. _ thumbo _ , _ aqfaasnaq _ aglagh ma lghii _ ellmeggnun _ .
itegh luni _ kuynge _ ata minun _ tuune ma kanga _ , _ money _ siipnegh _ naa minun _ .
“ _ seghleghhalek _ sangan _ kuynge nge laatagh ziin _ , _ una _ kii _ ! _ ” _ Ggiiluum _ Sulpik _ qete magh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ legan _ qikmigh n _ kelengake sqellug qu _ pi iqagh ut _ . _ ”
Sulpigem _ naange a _ qamagunginaq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ awiim _ puygu naqe kanga _ una _ money _ , _ iiggagh nge te lleqe aqa _ . _ ”
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ Sulpigem _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ naayghagh mun _ taku aqe kanga _ , _ neqe meng _ taglaate aqe kanga _ .
qenwat _ tagtalmi _ nuyaaghite te a _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ , _ eflughwaaghyagutaa _ , _ tugu yagute a _ Sulpigem _ .
Atghasugllagngaaghmigu _ enraq _ ata an _ alla _ qikmigh nge naanghite ni kaqe kanga _ .
Sulpigem _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ Rocky-meng _ atigh ma kanga _ qayughllak _ uyghagagh nite ngughk _ .
quunpeng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ naten _ atghagh te lleghqagh meng _ ne mun _ .
ataasigh mi _ aghneghmi _ tengegkayugwet _ kaate luteng _ , _ Sulpigem _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ State-tem _ governor-nga _ nengllugutetuumagh mi _ kanniluku _ .
Campaign-naaqeftuq _ alla _ nakmikesqelluni _ .
Sulpigem _ nalugvig mun _ esghagh yaghtugh aghte ma kangi _ .
taawa _ ne k _ ighnegh llgagh u uk _ aghvinleg _ ayumiqulleghtutka lghii meng _ .
aamta _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ seghleghllug u uq _ .
saghya meggneng _ utaqa i te kete luku _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ angayuqagh gni _ pi ma kek _ , _ “ _ Wow _ !
Look _ at _ the _ pretty _ mountain _ !
It _ looks _ so _ close _ and _ low _ . _ ”
Governor-em _ pi ma kanga _ ighnegh ghhagh ni _ , _ “ _ After _ i _ meet _ with _ the _ people _ , _ we _ ’ _ ll _ find _ a _ guide _ to _ take _ us _ up _ there _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aapute yagh uq _ , _ “ _ may _ i _ go _ up _ there _ now _ ? _ ”
“ _ We _ just _ got _ here _ son _ .
You _ don _ ’ _ t _ know _ wheat _ ’ _ s _ up _ there _ .
You _ will _ not _ go _ ! _ ” _ naa an _ pi ma kanga _ .
Whanikumaan _ Sulpik _ nagaqugh ma lghii _ Governor-em _ ighnegh ghhagh a _ aviite ni luku _ , _ ivaghaqaannguq _ .
Sulpik _ aanqaghte yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ aga _ Governor-enkut _ , _ nulighh a llu _ , _ police-allu _ naayghagh mun _ taglagh aqe ut _ .
malighqagh ma kangi _ .
Kaasaqminiki _ Governor-em _ nulighh a _ qiya vleghagh aqe uq _ .
Sulpigem _ nanglleg yagute ghllag magh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Don _ ’ _ t _ worry _ , _ they _ ’ _ ll _ find _ your _ son _ .
i _ ’ _ ll _ help _ look _ for _ him _ too _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ Sulpik _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ You _ are _ very _ thoughtful _ .
Thank _ you _ . _ ”
uyghagagh t _ nalla itnun _ lliigh luteng _ , _ Sulpigem _ iiwenllu _ ungipaate na luki _ qikmighagh ghhagh meng _ pi aqe ai _ , _ pika _ uyghag meng _ agigte uq _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ sa meng _ eggmiigh luni _ .
“ _ Thatʼs _ my _ puppy _ !
He _ is _ an _ oprhaned _ wild-dog _ puppy _ .
He _ has _ something _ in _ his _ mouth _ .
i _ ’ _ ll _ go _ see _ , _ ” _ Sulpigem _ tespikavek _ kenimaan _ ila ni _ piighaghte ma kangi _ .
aga _ Sulpik _ igleghte yan _ Governor-em _ nulighh an _ esghaghwaaghyaqminigu _ aatkallgha _ imani nguq _ ellnga ni _ nanglleg nagh uq _ .
aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Poor _ thing _ , _ i _ wonder _ if _ he _ has _ any _ other _ clothes _ . _ ”
Police-em _ pi ma kanga _ nenglagh magh mi _ , _ “ _ Oh _ , _ that _ ’ _ s _ just _ his _ nature _ .
When _ he _ ’ _ s _ not _ in _ school _ he _ always _ dress _ like _ that _ .
His _ parents _ are _ well-to-do _ . _ ”
Sulpigem _ kaate luku _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ eggmiigh a _ piyaqminigu _ nasaperagh u uq _ .
nasaperagh _ tugu luku _ yuvghiigh aa _ .
aga _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ quulmum _ pangaleg uq _ .
Sulpigem _ malighqagh aa _ nasaperagh _ tugumiiqe luku _ .
qikmighagh ghhagh _ uyghagagh neng _ alpag luni _ quulvaghqaaghluni _ uyghag ghrugllag mun _ kaate luni _ qilug uq _ .
Sulpigem _ kaate luku _ uyghag ghrug ghllag _ ivgaghyaqminigu _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ whaa _ ayaqighte luni _ qavagh aqe uq _ .
Sulpik _ uteghmun _ aqfaate luni _ tesamkut _ aragh ai _ , _ “ _ Hey _ , _ hey _ !
i _ found _ your _ son _ ! _ ”
Governor-enkuk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ , _ police-sallu _ mayugh ragkiigh ma lghiit _ .
mayugh ma luki _ Sulpigem _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taku nqigte luku _ taghtughsimakanga _ .
Pekamaghmi _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Everybodyʼs _ looking _ for _ you _ .
Your _ mom _ and _ dad _ are _ comin _ ’ _ . _ ”
kaate luteng _ naa an _ ighnegh ghhagh ni _ qete qagh a _ .
Governor-em _ ighnegh ni _ naalke kangat _ quyake ma n _ pengegsigh lghii llu _ aghyuniighumaan _ , _ “ _ We _ looked _ all _ over _ for _ you _ !
We _ were _ worried _ sick _ !
wheat _ in _ the _ world _ are _ you _ doing _ up _ here _ ? _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sanghitalghiistun _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ ata ni _ , _ “ _ i _ came _ up _ here _ to _ see _ the _ pretty _ mountain _ .
i _ was _ going _ home _ .
i _ seat _ here _ to _ rest _ but _ i _ fell _ asleep _ .
i _ ’ _ m _ sorry _ . _ ”
atghagh luteng _ Governor-ra _ akuzi naqe ni luni _ yughaghvig mi _ kelgughtesimakanga _ ne m _ yugwa _ .
Sulpigem _ angayuqagh kek _ ungipaate sqe ma kegket _ wataghllak _ elkek llu _ nagate yigh sqellug kek _ Sulpik _ kelqellug qu _ .
yughaghvig mun _ yugwet _ iteghaasata _ , _ Governor-em _ igamsiqa yug vike ma kangi _ ivagh i llegh itneng _ ighnegh ghhagh mineng _ .
taagken _ Sulpigenkut _ angayuqagh ke te lghiit _ tuqlugh ma kangi _ atghiisqelluki _ .
atghagh yata _ Governor-ra _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ My _ wife _ and _ i _ would _ like _ to _ commend _ Mr. _ and _ Mrs. _ Ggiilu _ for _ raising _ a _ very _ intelligent _ young _ son _ and _ for _ his _ smart _ mountain _ puppy _ .
For _ now _ we _ would _ like _ to _ present _ this _ as _ a _ token _ of _ our _ appreciation _ to _ this _ young _ mate _ .
It _ is _ something _ to _ buy _ a _ good _ collar _ for _ his _ mountain _ puppy _ . _ ”
Iteghaatkaq _ nekeve uute luni _ iigge teng _ qasaghqugh te ma kangit _ .
aqume uute yata _ , _ Ggiiluum _ Governor-ra _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ When _ we _ leave _ from _ here _ our _ son _ will _ have _ the _ puppy _ you _ are _ talking _ about _ .
i _ ’ _ m _ sure _ he _ will _ take _ good _ care _ of _ it _ .
We _ didn _ ’ _ t _ know _ he _ head _ tamed _ it _ . _ ”
Sulpik _ quyam _ repall _ iye kek _ me u ma lghiik _ .
Akuzimleghamalghii _ , _ “ _ aane gkuma _ whaa _ Rocky _ aqfa naqe aqa _ .
ategh a _ simigh lleqe aqa _ governor _ Rocky-meng _ . _ ”
qallate luku
Tawaninginaq _ , _ mulu gpenani _ sa yaghqagh t _ piighaghte lghii ni _ .
mekelghiigh _ neghsagh meng _ afta lghii _ kilighpag ma lghii _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qallate luku _ aghaligh vig mun _ kelgute yaghtugh ghhu _ maame neghlliqe lleqe uq _ , _ aange pigte uq _ . _ ”
igaghvigraaghagh
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
usi ii sta _ angyaghpag _ kaate ma lghii _ .
qaa ii te aq _ esnagh mun _ pi na luni _ naa ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ naagu _ Maarpa _ ?
angyaghpag t _ esghaghyaghtughyugwanka _ . _ ”
Qiitaam _ anengagh ni _ Maarpa _ maligsaagh aqe kanga _ navek _ pi nghaani _ .
“ _ Maarpa _ qepghagh aqe uq _ esnagh mi _ .
Igaghvigraaghaghqaghnguq _ kaat ute a _ usiistem _ , _ ” _ naa an _ ungipaate a _ .
apa an _ qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ “ _ whangkutung _ pi ltung _ . _ ”
Qiitaankuk _ apa ke te lghiik _ qaasqagh meng _ agigte yalghiimek _ unaghsigh _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ qakumakangat _ .
alla _ salngag _ uglagh ghllag _ aange aqe luteng _ mekestaaghhagh u aqe luteng _ tamaa _ .
sa u ak _ iglegha aqe uk _ leveklug ghllag k _ qamiye vyiigh gneng _ qamugh ke lutek _ .
aghuliigh yayek _ qepghagh te lghiit _ saghya meng _ usi ghllag u ma kegket _ qamiye k _ .
aga _ taam _ leveklugtughllagem _ aghtugh gpenakek _ qamughagh ak _ taglaate ak _ .
“ _ maakut _ aghtugh yiite ut _ , _ ” _ naligh ita _ siivanllegh _ pi uq _ .
Qitaankuk _ apa ke te lghiik _ taglagh lutek _ ne mun _ Qiitaam _ naa ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ esghaghkagh mineng _ .
naa an _ pi a _ qaa ii te aq _ , _ “ _ uksaaqun _ elpek llu _ igaghyagh lleqe uten _ . _ ”
“ _ igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ ? _ ” _ Qiitaam _ aapte a _ naa ni _ .
naa an _ pi a _ , _ “ _ taaqe ma katgu _ . _ ”
vegaagh _ sungaghyuwiilluni _ , _ unug rakegte tete te magh mi _ lliigh magh an _ qaa ii te aq _ an _ ’ _ gun- igh luni _ itegh yan _ naa an _ pi a _ , _ “ _ ingaghte yaghagh lleqe uten _ ighivgaqun _ .
unaami _ igaghyagh lleqe uten _ . _ ”
Ighivgaghmi _ tawaani _ qaa ii te aq _ ingaghte luni _ qavagh nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ unaami _ igaghyagh lleghqagh ni _ sumeghtaghagh te kete nghmeng _ .
iwernga _ qavagh qaghte ma lghii _ .
unaami _ naa an _ qaa ii te aq _ pilugugwaa _ nutaghagh perewaagh meng _ .
Qulliraangllamakanga _ blue _ denim-memeng _ .
kuusme mi _ Mission-nekegkak _ shirt- tek _ Qiitaam _ esghaghaak _ naa an _ aflengake ma kek _ igaghyagh sigh u lukek _ .
kameg k llu _ nutaghagh u uk _ blue _ denim-mek _ flannel- meng _ ilupeghagh leg k _ iwernga _ nateghqagh pig meng _ nateghqagh leg k _ .
aate ai _ Mackinaw-gnillu _ nasaperagh ni llu _ qateghrakegtagh _ sailor _ cap-a _ angyaghpag neng _ ata an _ tukfigh aa _ .
naa an _ aglagh ta k _ igaghvig mun _ Qiitaankuk _ saaqwligh ghhagh meng llu _ ighnegh ghhagh t _ Pantu _ .
Qiitaankut _ itegh yalghiimeng _ uglagh u pigte uq _ igaghyagh _ .
mekestaaghhagh t _ naa ita _ nalighmeng _ nengyugh ita _ maligte aqe luki _ .
Pantunkuk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ ataasigh _ qiyaamalghiik _ apeghtughiste meng _ alinge lutek _ .
apeghtughiste m _ aghnagh m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aag llegh a _ wiin _ aglagh te sqe a _ salin _ mekestaaghhaa ni luku _ .
qaa ii te aq _ table-legnun _ apeghtughiste m _ aglagh te a _ .
sa meng _ apeghtugh i sta _ akuzi uq _ laluramke stun _ Qiitaankut _ liigike nghite aat _ .
aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh mineng _ tagite i lghii m _ Qiitaankut _ mumiggutii _ , _ “ _ elpek si _ tawanlengughni _ table-legni _ , _ Table _ One-nguusinguq _ . _ ”
Estamaguftut _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ tawani _ table-legni _ .
apeghtugh i sta _ laluramke _ akuzi laatagh uq _ .
aghnagh m _ taam _ tagite i lghii m _ mumegh igh qugh te laatagh aa _ igaghyagh nun _ , _ “ _ North _ star _ usi ii sta _ tagi aqe uq _ .
aghnequn _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkufsi _ igagh naanghite usi nguq _ . _ ”
taagken _ apeghtughiste m _ apeghtugh ai _ Qiitaankut _ whaten _ pisqelluki _ , _ “ _ North _ star _ is _ coming _ . _ ”
Qiitaam _ liite naqe ghllag aa _ aglaqugh mi _ apegh na luku _ angayuqagh minun _ .
qamagunginaq _ peghqigsagh uq _ , _ “ _ Nors _ star _ is _ coming _ ... _ Nors _ star _ is _ coming _ ... _ ”
aanleghaate luteng _ tamaakut _ igaghyaquusit _ igaghyagh nghhagh t _ Qiitaankut _ pi aqe ait _ , _ “ _ Little _ Yellow _ Beginner _ ! _ ” _ Reading _ Book-ni _ liite tke aat _ “ _ Little _ Yellow _ Chicken _ ” _ enkaam _ igaghyagh nghhagh t _ mekestaaghhagh t _ Little _ Yellow _ Beginners-nguniiqegkangit _ .
qaa ii te aq _ aglagh yami _ ellmeggnun _ iitghute kete luku _ aragh uq _ , _ “ _ Nors _ star _ is _ coming _ ! _ ”
ata an _ usuqe a _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ aawallu _ liite aghte ma uten _ igaghyagh luten _ . _ ”
uksaagh aqe a llu _ Qiitaam _ ata a _ itegh luni _ ungipaate a _ nuliigh ni _ igaghvigraaghagh _ taaqe ni luku _ , _ yuvghiigh yagh te aqe ni luku _ .
qaa ii te aq _ pi a _ , _ “ _ whangkutung _ igaghvigraaghagh _ yuvghiigh yagh ltegnegu _ . _ ”
igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ itegh yayek _ Qiitaankuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ aghnaghagh m _ ungipaate ak _ ellnga n _ igleghte te naqe ni lukek _ .
amigh k _ qelpalnguq _ itegh yuwhaagh aat _ .
taana _ room-meghrugllak _ llivelghagh ghllag u uq _ , _ sayugwaatat _ savikenghaagh t _ tamaa _ .
yuug _ laluramke _ inga _ radio-m _ manu ani _ aqume luni _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi uk _ Qiitaankuk _ , _ “ _ taana _ office-nguuq _ . _ ”
yuug _ laluramke _ nekeve luni _ sa meng _ aleghqughwaa _ Qiitaam _ ata a _ .
qaa ii te aq _ ata an _ ungipaate a _ , _ “ _ neghesti m _ kingu aneng _ igaghyagh t _ nuugllequnnguq _ whavek _ igaghvigraghagh mete te _ . _ ”
Office-mi _ ila a _ taawa _ amigh k _ ila anun _ room-memun _ .
taamavek _ ivgagh yalghiimeng _ taawa _ table-leghrugllagek _ uzimun _ pumsugtu uk _ .
pilagtuusigh _ , _ walamnaag _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ taawa _ rack-mmi _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ taana _ ulimavig u uq _ . _ ”
taagken _ room-memeng _ aane luteng _ office-kun _ aane ut _ .
enraq _ ila a _ room-mem _ iteghyaqmegteggu _ egllu lgu uq _ .
mingle mi _ taawa _ sa u aat _ aghvigisighsugnite ngugh t _ .
mingle meng _ taawa _ sa u aat _ qelmeqegtat _ nekegnga lghiit _ .
ataasigh m _ aghnaghagh m _ qiipsaqminigu _ megh _ maaqe uq _ .
aag llegh a _ qiipsaqminigu _ uguqnagh lghii _ megh _ maaqe uq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ igleghte te i ta igh a ta _ ungipaate ai _ , _ “ _ una _ aghvig i vig u uq _ gaagh vig u uq _ . _ ”
Qiitaankuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ amigh k _ uglagh ghllag _ itegh ghhaat _ .
ughvughqefig t _ , _ aghaligh vig _ , _ classroom-met _ , _ anagh vig t _ yuvghiighteghiit _ .
mangteghagh _ aangem _ , _ amigh k _ uglagh m _ repall _ iflangwaaghanaghlluni _ .
Qiitaankuk _ egllu meng _ puqlaaqutmeng _ esghaate nghite uk _ .
mingle mi _ tamaa _ sa u aat _ savikenghaagh t _ aghnaghagh m _ puqlaaqutnguunii _ .
Qiitaankuk _ ata ke te lghiik _ saafsaqmegteki _ maatnegh ghllagu ut _ .
aghnaghagh m _ igleghte te i ta ita _ alla _ samavek _ ukig te ak _ .
mayughaatagh neng _ nateqlite luteng _ amig mun _ itegh yalghiimeng _ sa ngugh ghllag k _ taawa _ .
aghnaghagh m _ puqlaqu te u na aik _ megh mun _ uguqnaghsigh sagh inagh ik _ .
taagken _ mayughaatagh tgun _ mayugh luteng _ amig kun _ aw llaag ke te _ aane ut _ maaten _ itegh vike nghite ke megteggun _ .
qaa ii te aq _ aglagh uq _ sumeghtaghagh tke magh an _ megh _ mingle meng _ maaqe kayug _ .
qelanqe ma kanga _ igaghvigraaghagh mete te _ igaghyagh lleghqagh ni _ .

niigh uute aqe ut
kiighte i te aqe ut _ amiiqagh meng _ .
nefku _ ategh qugh aqe aat _ ila a _ kagpag aqe aat
uksuqun _ neghyaghqagh t _ .
nunivag _ , _ ququngagh
angukagh _ , _ alqegkagh _ , _ piitquutaquq _ .
saghna aqe ait _ kaamwaagh t llu _ ,
kagpag yaghqagh t _ uksugh mi _ neghyaghqagh t _ .
nunaagh mun _ aghulaqe uute aqe uq
Iqalliniighmun _ , _ manigniighanun _ .
nguuyngaaghagh m _ leveklugraghtaqaa _ , _ qawaag m
qalghikrigtaqaa _ .
aghnegh t _ takelli aqe ai _ aghte llegh inagh kun _ .
vegaagh m _ sungaghyug a qaa _ nuna
ii- tesiigh aq _ iqeghte aq _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tamana
anuqataghagh _ maatneghtu te
tepe a _ neqnigh lghii _ suupe aqe a _ .
uksaagh
nunivagseghagh _ paligh uq _ .
qanivleghaghtagh te aq _ ,
esla _ nengleg ketu te _ ,
naayvagh t _ sikugh u aghagh luteng _ .
kenite aat _ naayvagh mi
amigh te yaghqagh t _ angyagh nun _ .
tevragh t _ nengki ni _ uqlighhutet _ ,
nuugte yug nigh ghllag mi _ .
Tutmaaghwaaghyaghnaghtaa _ .
tangegh iqe aat _ , _ tepagh t
saghna yaghqagh t _ , _ kagpag yaghqagh t
Kumlavagilgan _ .
pennagh neng _ , _ nayyghaneng _ qawaagaghaq
qetgegh uute aqe uq _ kellii nun _ .
amsanagh a qaa _ aghneq _ qafsina
Qawaagaghaq _ ellmi neng _ negh naqe llegh a
pilleghqalitaqaa _ .
kavilngugh k _ qiipaghagh k
Qirgengaawem _ apegh llegh a
kiig m _ whanikukestaani _ amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ aqlaghaghraagtekestaq _ .
qagugh ak _ qalghisimaghmi _ naghughte qugh a tuq _ negh niigh vig meggnun _ aglaghtu te aqe ut _ .
siqinegh _ asivagh kestaamaan _ ilakumtaagh ke te lghii ni _ teghignalkumtamnneng _ naghaagh te ukut _ iighaate ukut _ sungaghyug kegtagh mi _ vegaaghtuqagh mi _ .
esla mi _ neqelghutagh m _ saaghw ani _ naa ka _ qasiqagh meng _ gaagh aqe uq _ esghapag magh emta _ .
tamaani _ aghnagh t _ qiipaghagh igh te aqe lghiit _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ qipaghaghqameng _ .
ila i _ avlaawaatameng _ saghna luteng _ naama yaghqaaghte nghata _ qiipaghagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ estugwaghmeng _ tukfighagh meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ iqeghte aqe lghii meng _ qiipaghagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
naa ka _ pingayugnegh neng _ qiipaghaalek _ .
ataasigh k _ qepghagh te zikek _ gaghusikek _ .
ila kek _ temngi _ an _ ’ _ gun- igh qragh te zikek _ .
pingayugnegh kek _ wetku _ sa mi _ July-mi _ , _ kuusme mi _ , _ Sunday-yamun _ aate aqe kek _ .
taake uk _ qiipaghagh k _ gaaghusigh kek _ puygu naagh nghite kegka _ .
kavilngugh k _ piitesiighameng _ igagh leg k _ qatelghii meng _ , _ sungaghyug kegtagh meng _ , _ sungaghyaag meng _ .
llangaqa _ ighivganghhastun _ neqamikngwaaghagka _ taake uk _ atugh u kek _ quni ii nga i sigh ke gkakek _ whanga mun _ .
Taam _ qiipaghagh m _ aligh a _ neghuvalnguq _ qigughrug nite ngughk _ allangughte te ukagh _ kiyaghtaallemni _ .
tawani _ kiig mi _ kitum _ milugh aanga _ naasqugh mkun _ .
Qiiyaaghwaghtunga _ elngaatall _ .
gaagh vig mineng _ naa ma _ tuqlugh aanga _ , _ “ _ tea- ai _ ! _ tea- ai _ whavek _ .
unite ki _ taakut _ qinunaghqe lghiit _ . _ ”
naa ma _ apeghtughanga _ , _ “ _ taghnughhagh t _ qinunaghqe nghata _ avelghaqiinagh aqe ki _ , _ unite aqe ki _ . _ ”
taagken _ quni igh aanga _ aligh aneng _ taam _ neghuvalnguum _ , _ ilutu na lghii m _ kavilngugh m _ qiipaghagh m _ .
kina _ alngunak _ efqugh kekagh lgu aqe lghii _ enkaam _ kiyaghtaallghit _ maliggnaqegkayugwit _ .
whanga _ efqugh ke kaqe a _ piniqe pigtekaqe a _ naa ke aqa _ Sivuglleghii _ .
ungazigh meng _ tagikaguq _ Chukotka-meng _ esnenganilngughmeng _ ungazigh meng _ .
maaten _ ungazigh m _ yugwa _ nuughqagh u te kau lghii _ tasigh mun _ .
naa ka _ elngatall _ kaki yuqagh _ .
uglagh u pigte luku _ muutagh nge aqe lghii _ kameg meng _ , _ atkug meng _ ila aneng llu _ aate te kaghqagh m _ .
kitumtu te _ alngunak _ sa u a _ pi naqe kayugu kanga _ , _ ilangani _ apeghtughiste u magh mi _ , _ ilangani _ aghallegtagh nge magh mi _ .
nenge a _ quunpeng _ mingllegneqegtaq _ .
temngi _ kiyaghtaaghigalnguq _ piniqe i nga lghii _ aghnagh _ .
maaten _ paninang _ whateghlluwaaq _ neqagh te aqe agka _ kavilngugh k _ qiipaghagh k _ .
Taam _ aligh an _ apeghtugh qagh kanga _ nuqete neghtu llegh meng _ , _ liigike i ma llegh meng _ , _ neghingteqngalleghmeng _ , _ naa m llu _ piniqe llegh aneng _ .
sivuqagh m _ naayghagh a
Yimiggaam _ apegh llegh a
pinighnagh ghllagtu te _ tawanlenguq _ ,
ukileghyagte luni _ anigu meng _ .
uusqagh llegh ani _ pightughrug
Tengtaataghaqaa _ qule mun _ asitmun _ .
upenghagh m _ ughug a qaa
Kaangha _ gginagh aneng
pinighnagh llegh kesagh kanga _ uksaagh m _ ,
tuqlugh llegh an _ uksuum _ tagi yan _ .
kiik _ tagi uq _ nuverragh magh mi _ uksugh _ aghulaqe ma luku _ .
Pinighrakegtaq _ , _ neghuvalnguq
sungaghyaag _ ulig te uq
tepe kegte pigte luni _ .
teghig ke sagh t _ , _ maligte te luteng _ yug nun
mingug iqe ut _ gginagh ani _ , _ naalkennaluku
neqe _ tuunngalghii _ tawani
Uvitangani _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh t _ .
uksaagh m _ tagite aqe a _ iqeghtagh kegte aq _ ulitellgha
Unangum _ seghhesleghakun _ .
allanqik _ alla _ uksugh _ sekete laatagh uq
ulig na luku _ qategtu te _ anigu meng _ .
nunaagh mnni _ teghigniqe llegh ut
ukaagh
iglegha llgu uq _ aghneghmi _ nunaagh mnnun _ nasqagh mun _ itghagh naqe lghiikut _ .
amsanaghllug ghllag u uq _ qilagigh luni _ naqam _ iglegha nagh uq _ .
maaten _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ nasqaghte aqe ghngaamta _ , _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ kiig ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ itghagh aqe yalghiikut _ .
angyat mnnun _ uugte naqe te inagh _ , _ “ _ tvvvv _ ” _ leveklugwan _ ivenruute m _ , _ megh m _ kasughqu llegh an _ kaate ragkiigh yug ste aqe kanginkut _ nasqagh mun _ .
ataasigh meng _ kaate naqe te inagh _ teskiwavek _ aag kaqe te lghii gni _ , _ Aqetlu _ , _ aqfaasnaq _ esnagh meng _ uusnegh u aq _ mayughaghpung _ .
naangngwaaghagh ta lgu lghii _ qelanghaqelghiikung _ kaate lleghqagh mnneng _ nunaagh mnnun _ .
“ _ Aqet _ , _ ii-i _ !
naangngwaaghaate m _ utaqa aqe ainkung _ ! _ ”
pekagh magh ma _ pi aqa _ .
Aqet _ naangwaaghatagnun _ aqume qaghte te kete luku _ kayagte aanga _ , _ “ _ aaga ste nga _ . _ ” _ aaga ste aqa _ qevute lugh u i aghagh te kestaamaan _ aaga llegh igh inagh u kete te _ .
qevuute luni _ aaga yalghiimi _ taqughte ghllag kek _ qaghlegaghtaaghaak _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ napaqagh kek _ aghvegh m _ agluqsaqek _ , _ tapghagh kek _ aqumutagh igh lutek _ unaghsigh meng _ .
ilangani _ aaga ghllag negh mta _ napaqagh kek _ qaprag aqe lghiik _ aaga llegh inagh mteggun _ .
naangngwaaghagh vig m _ asi i _ iime luteng _ itegagh mnneng _ pakig qaqu nghmeng _ aaga naqe m _ .
Taananginaanghituq _ piiqegkefut _ nasqaghte lleg mnneng _ kenlanga _ piwallemnnun _ sivuqagh mun _ igaghyagh na luta _ .
ila a _ teghignalkumtaaghput _ pugwimanemta _ naayvaghpag mi _ nasqagh meng _ qantaghanlenguq _ .
liite naqe aqe lghiikut _ pugwimameng _ aghqestaallegh ani _ esne ani _ .
ivegh aqe lghiikut _ kenlanga _ megh _ tamlu mnnun _ kaate llegh anun _ .
megh m _ asi ani _ nuna _ piyugkagh ut _ maatnegh aqe lghii _ qetustaaghhagh u magh mi _ itegagh mnni _ .
ila a _ teghigniqe sigh ut _ iigge mnneng _ ila put _ isiqaghtanemteki _ kenlanga _ ghhuu te m _ ungelegte luta _ lliigh lleg mnnun _ .
taagken _ itegagh raaghinagh m ta _ vegaaghtuqagh kun _ piyug aqe lghiikut _ .
ataasigh meng _ Aqet _ qetgegh uq _ aragh magh mi _ , _ “ _ kaa _ ! _ ”
tuute qaghte yalghiimi _ sikughllug kun _ .
taagken _ sengelqameng _ uteghpaarkitaagh uq _ allaghlluwhaghmeng _ nutaghagh meng _ tukalegalghiistun _ .
“ _ kelenga luten _ , _ ” _ aragh aanga _ , _ “ _ ila i _ tamaakut _ vegaagh m _ ipeg pigte ut _ .
aqnighnagh pigte ut _ tuute qaghtekufki _ . _ ” _ iwernga _ ilangani _ mangteghagh mun _ iitqaghsugwaqelghiikut _ aqfaate aqe lghiikut _ vegaagh m _ qaye akun _ leganqun _ sikig stun _ kaviigh meng _ qimag lghii stun _ .
aliineghllug mi _ piyutagh u aghagh qu kut _ esnagh mi _ ivagh i aqe ukut _ tepekagh meng _ aqimle lghutagh meng _ , _ negaghpag m _ pugnatnganeng _ .
mulu gpenaamta _ uglaghi ghllag aqe ut _ saghnaput _ enkaam _ estugwaghiiraaghutaqukut _ mangteghagh mta _ tunuqagh ani _ .
Ugharrameng _ pie-yesqungllaaghaqukut _ akume luku _ qenaavzeghaghmeng _ , _ uyghag meng _ , _ ququngaghmeng _ .
aki kaghqagh lug ke i _ estugwamnni _ lli aqe aput _ .
ata mta _ ilaakwaagha _ nengllugute ke te lghiit _ tamaanlenguut _ uviqligh ke ke put _ .
mangteghagh at _ nutaaghaq _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ tunemagh a _ nuna mun _ tuute nga lghii _ .
ellngit a _ mangteghagh at _ nuna meng _ tuute nga nghite ngughk _ unaghsighpagmeng _ nengkilaghluni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ataasigh meng _ nelliqruugem _ kaate ainkung _ .
Aqetlu _ aaghhwmeng _ itegh lutung _ mangteghagh m _ asi anun _ naalkute ukung _ laagwaaghllagmeng _ tesamani _ .
Uqfilqaaghmeng _ takaghqughvike luku _ saapaghpung _ vegaagh meng _ ququngaghmeng _ .
Saapsaqefung _ nallunagh ghhalek _ nuna mun _ ilatngwaaghluni _ .
taagken _ esghaghaghpung _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ naghughlleghhi _ , _ tuqlughaghpung _ , _ “ _ tea- ai _ naghaagh lgusigh yaghtugh kung _ .
whani _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aaghhe uq _ sa kun _ waakaghte gpenani _ kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh mnnun _ .
“ _ Thunk _ ! _ ”
Kalefkagtuq _ laagwaaghmun _ .
Nenglapagllagem _ repall _ aqsa ligh negh ka _ aqnighnaghqwagaa _ .
kanagh yagh ngllaghkagh ut _ pi niigh pigte yan _ nanghiiqwaaqaghput _ taghnughhagh itnun _ igleghat _ .
Whanikumi _ siqinegh _ tevigh ste gpenaan _ , _ Aqetlu _ aqfaate aqe ukung _ asitmun _ uusneghwaagh mi _ esnagh mun _ .
Sukeraghllagem _ iqu aqe lghiikung _ ullghitagh magh emtung _ asitmun _ nenglagh te magh emtung _ .
wetku _ iqunghan _ ingyaghaghte aqe kegka _ nategh anun _ iqu nghite negh mni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ meghnag liigh qu kung _ esghapag magh an _ siqinegh _ tevigh lghii _ .
elngaatall _ allaaghlluwhaghyugnaghtuq _ esghapag kau luni _ .
qilag a _ kumgayaaghte luni _ iqeghta meng _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ .
Qilaawaaghet _ llangaqa _ silugwet _ angighhekagh t _ kumgayaagh m _ iqeghtagh atun _ .
ataasigh meng _ emta _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ taglagh lutung _ mangteghagh mnnun _ ingaghte qughtu kut _ .
Aqetem _ sigutqugh aanga _ , _ “ _ whaa tuq _ maanlleghhiikut _ quunperugllag _ . _ ”
sivuqagh m _ uyghag i
Yimiggaam _ apegh llegh a
kestekau nghite ngughk _ uyghag _ tutmagh kaqe a
tea- ma anun _ igleghte te ikagh t _ .
iimken _ ima
sivunegh mta _ tutmagh kaqe aat _ una _ nuna _ .
uyghag t _ maakut _ ulimghusiikat _ .
liite tke ait _ apeghtu sagh neng
uuvganeng _ atugh u lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ ighsa luni
qaatke te nghmeng _ naa minun
taagken _ unakegkagh a _ ila ni _ .
nengleg ketu te _ seghheslengluteng _ unugmi _ ,
ukmangightu te _ maqaaghte luteng _ aghte llegh mi _ .
maakut _ uyghag t _ naghaagh vig ukagh t
naa m _ taghnughhagh ghhagh ni
esnagh mun _ naghaagh yagh te aqe kanga
Amsaanaghllugllagmi _ .
kestekau nghite ngugh t _ uyghag t _ ukut
Tawatelnguut _ ayumigh ke ta a _ tamaghhagh an
Tutmaasghaqegkat _ yugwet _ maaqute lghii stun
Quunpeghllak _ aghuliillngunaan _ .
alpa m _ manig i
Awitaam _ apegh llegh a
whangkuta _ maaten _ ataasigh inagh u gpenaan _ upenghagh mi _ pennaghtekayugutemmneng _ liisimake ke put _ alpa m _ manig i _ , _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ , _ ila i _ mekestaaghhaagwaqluteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
enkaamllu _ alpa t _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ ighni aqe lghiit _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ .
ayumigh _ laluramke t _ kaate llghite luki _ sivunegh put _ upenghanghani _ angyaghtu nghmeng _ taaqe negh meggni _ pennagh nun _ kiigsaghtuqayugwet _ .
enkaam _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ manigniiqayugwet _ .
tawatete kayugu te meggneng _ liite tke ait _ alpa m _ manig i _ naten _ sa kayugu ta i _ .
whaten _ enkaam _ ungipamsug kaqe ait _ , _ ighniyugwaaghlutenguq _ tugu luki _ manig it _ uteghaghtiluteng _ sivuligh meng _ mani gmeggneng _ mekestaaghhaagwaqut _ manig it _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ pingayut igh nghmegteki _ nalighmeng _ estamat igh nghmegteki _ uteghaghtilleteng _ , _ maniginnguq _ inglugtun _ nuvugyugtaqut _ .
tallimat igh nghmegteki nguq _ uteghaghtilleteng _ qenwat _ manig it _ inglugtun _ nuvugyukguughtaqut _ .
ipa _ tawatete yaghqaa ut _ , _ qayughllak _ mangtaagh ngllagh igate ngugh t _ alpa t _ temngi _ legan _ uyghag m _ qaye akun _ ighnikayugwet _ .
enkaam _ inglu inagh anun _ nuvugyugtengngakumeng _ , _ ifkaghyugnamelnguut _ ifkaghaatam _ avaquti naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
naqamalla _ inglugtun _ nuvugyukguughtekumeng _ uzive llegh i _ nengigh inagh meggnite luteng _ lliigh yaghqagh t _ .
taawa _ avaquti yaghqagh t _ .
Tugweq _ / _ uunghagh
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
atughqagh t
atugh llghite ngugh meng _ igaasigh meng
1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ X _ 2 _ inches _ angka lghii meng _ igagh meng
kuynge m _ ukmangisiineng _ nalighmeng
me ke ta ghhagh meng _ paper _ clip-meng
ulima llegh a
1 _ . _ igaasigh m _ eraser- nge an _ tungangakun _ imeg te ggu _ igagh _ malghugegneng _ .
neve steggu _ igagh _ scotch _ tape- meng _ .
nuqnegh lleqe a _ igagh _ igaasigh m llu _ saag na yu kan llu _ .
kepe nakesi _ igagh _ uneghwaagmun _ .
2 _ . _ kuynge m _ ukmaangiisii _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inches-nghuluku _ kepe luku _ .
inglu a _ aghughhnakesi _ one _ quarter _ inhc-nguluku _ .
Agughneghem _ uziveaghaghte aghte snaanghite a _ igasimun _ nekegtekan _ .
nekegte nakesi _ wayagh _ igaasigh m _ iqugwan _ inglu akun _ scotch _ tape- meng _ 1 _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ inch _ piiznga an _ .
agughte nakesi _ wayagh _ piiznga lghii _ nekreg u luku _ .
taawa _ uunghagh _ taaqe uq _ .
nekreg a _ alngunak _ sa mun _ atuguq _ .
Iguqwa _ igagh leg _ uneghwaagmun _ kepekagh meng _ tuugghuuq _ .
mughute kayug _ tamaghhagh mi _ tugweghmeng _ kelqe aqe uq _ mughute negh meggni _ .
savikenghaagh leg _ nuvugyukegtameng _ ( _ igagh _ uneghwaagmun _ kepekagh _ ) _ siku mun _ umutalesuusiguq _ .
siku _ ugmestaaghhagh u kan _ nalighmeng _ qetustaaghhagh u kan _ tugweq _ sufluqaghte te yaghqagh _ siku mun _ .
mughu ta m _ liisimake yaghqagh a _ kanagh nagh ta a _ .
angyagh mi _ kangqwaaghtuqagh mi _ tuumkaghqamelngughmeng _ siku mun _ ayaghqusiqegkayugwet _ .
inglu a _ nekreg leg _ atuqe llegh a _ uglagh lghii _ .
unangkagh t _ siku m _ esne anun _ kaate nghata _ nekreg luki _ qaake aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh meng _ , _ maklagment _ pilag lghii ni _ unguutimun _ atuqayugwet _ .
tuugtagh mun _ siqlugwameng _ nusugusiqegkayugwet _ .
“ _ nekreg luku _ nekreg t _ ngevyegneng _ iknaqe nagh ut _ . _ ”
“ _ Tuugghen _ atugh ghhu _ .
ketngig gpeneng _ pinigh uq _ . _ ”
leghllegh
leghllegh t _ upenghagh mi _ kaawtu ta itneng _ iingtagh lug ke i llu _ unake naqe kayugu ut _ .
leghllegh t _ qawaagyag neng _ negh yugnagh lghiit _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ .
qikmigh m _ Ilakumtaalleghpigaa
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
Ayumirugllak _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ qikmigh _ uqfigtuqagh mi _ ellnginaghhaghmi _ .
qikmigh _ amaa mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Amaay _ , _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ ”
“ _ A-aa _ , _ sa aqe stuung _ legan _ , _ ” _ akite ma kanga _ amaa m _ .
qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
tagtalmi _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te luni _ qilug ma kanga _ .
“ _ ii-i _ qilug gpenang _ , _ ” _ ineghte ma kanga _ amaa m _ , _ “ _ kaynge _ tagi lleqe uq _ , _ neghe lleqe ainkung _ . _ ”
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Kayngawha _ whangkutegneng _ iknaqe nghite a _ sangan qun _ amaa m _ alike agu _ . _ ”
taagken _ qikmigh m _ ivagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ kaynge _ .
naalkellug qu _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ ”
“ _ A-aa _ , _ ” _ angegh uq _ kaynge _ .
llaaghanam _ qerngagh egmek _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ aghnegh m _ qikmigh _ qilug laatagh ma lghii _ .
kaynge m _ aghyuniighaa _ , _ “ _ saa _ una _ , _ qilug gpenang _ ! _ Yugwem _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
qemall _ tagi luni _ pitegqaghlleqiinkung _ ! _ ”
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ awilleqa _ yuug _ iknaqe lleghpigagh u lghii _ .
sangan qun _ uum _ alike laatagh agu _ . _ ”
ivagh yaghtugh luku _ naalke ma kanga _ yuug _ .
taana llu _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ qerngagh emtung _ kiyaghte ltung _ ? _ ”
Yugwem _ angegh aa _ .
kiyaghte lqinagh lutek _ , _ ataasigh mi _ unugmi _ qikmigh _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te laatagh luni _ qilug ma lghii _ .
Yugwem _ kayeme a _ , _ “ _ taku gu _ , _ taku gu _ !
tugu gu _ , _ tugu gu _ ! _ ”
qikmigh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ yuug _ ipa _ alinge igate uq _ . _ ”
qikmigh _ taawa _ alligte ma lghii _ yug mi _ .
tefaay _ !
alpa
alpa t _ megh m _ qawaag ke ai _ .
qawaag m _ ila atun _ uqeghhmun _ aghulaqe igate ut _ uksugh mi _ .
uksugh mi _ megh ughte negh an _ angyaghnaghhneghani _ esghagh aqe ait _ .
upenghagh mi _ esne mun _ taglagh yagute aqe ut _ .
alpa _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ pennagh ni _ megh mi _ nalug ma uute aqe uq _ .
paninang _ uglagh ghllag _ tengaa te aqe uq _ .
alpa t _ pennagh ni _ ighni aqe ut _ .
manig i _ kiyang _ ataasiwaqut _ , _ ila i _ maalghugwaaqut _ .
manig i _ tugu lghii ni _ alla _ ighni aqe ait _ , _ uteghaghtiiniiqiit _ .
pennagh ni _ piyaqnagh u i llegh ani _ yugwet _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ mayugh luteng _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ tugulagh te aqe ut _ .
Palasqughhaq _ tugwaaqaat _ .
uglagh ghllag _ piyaqnagh llegh anite ngughk _ tugu igate uq _ .
alpa m _ negh kangi _ negh aqe aput _ , _ nutaghagh at _ inikagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
tukrugtekagh t _ gaagh luki _ nalighmeng _ ilangani _ tawatete luki _ neghaaqut _ .
amighqwaagh i _ atkug kaqe ait _ .
yuginagh _ qula _ siipnegh ke luku _ alpa m _ amighqwaagh a nguq _ naama aqe uq _ atkug u luni _ .
tunusagh t _ kumag nun
Tagikaam _ ungipagh aa
iimnanguq _ .
kiyaghte ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh _ , _ umiileg at _ paallghu nkut _ , _ qetgeghyaankut _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ melnguunkut _ .
umiileg _ taana _ qamarilakayuk _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ nunalgute ni _ taakut _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Qamarilanaqunga _ , _ qerngughte te k _ ! _ kina _ kayaalqe i i lghii _ sanqutelilleqaqa _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ paallghu nkut _ , _ qetgeghyaankut _ , _ apayepayiigh nkut _ , _ melnguunkut _ qerngughte te ma lghiit _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ qamarila m _ ayaaviigha _ qiighw nge ta leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ , _ saaghw akun _ lli ma kangi _ sanqute t _ .
taagken _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ qetgeghyaankuk _ paallghu nkuk _ pi ma kek _ , _ “ _ elpek tek _ nuna _ uzive tegnegu _ . _ ”
Enkaangam _ melnguunkuk _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ kayagte ma kek _ , _ “ _ elpek tek _ naayghagh _ uzive tegnegu _ , _ taagken _ uteghnigh ghhaasi _ whavek _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ qetgeghyaankuk _ paallghu nkuk _ sivuke lutek _ igleghte ma lghiik _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ iigh ma lghiik _ .
iigh lutek _ pinitun _ meghnaalingwaaghumalghiik _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ mangteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
kaate yamek _ nguuyngaaghagh _ pi ma kangat _ , _ “ _ tagi ukung _ nuna _ uzive luku _ ! _ ”
apayepayiigh ghhagh nkuk _ melnguunkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ pengughqagh ghllag _ .
qesiqun _ uzivekagh at _ pengughqagh u nghite uq _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ .
apayepayiigh _ uteghnigh ma lghii _ nguuyngaaghagh mun _ .
melngugh _ nunmaawhtapagem _ kinguligh u luni _ kaate ma lghii _ .
katelghaate yata _ nguuyngaaghagh m _ sanqute meng _ tunqugh ma kangi _ .
paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ atkugwaneng _ qatelghii meng _ .
Aasaqminigu _ taagken _ kenlanga _ paallghu t _ qateghsimakangi _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ apayepayiigh t _ negaghpag niigh yagute ma lghiit _ sugukelengiigh meng _ nguuyngaaghagh meng _ .
qetgeghyagh _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh mineng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qetgeghyagh t _ qetgeneghtughsimakangi _ sukaaghsimaghmeng _ .
melngugh _ tuune mangite ma kanga _ qayughllak _ nunmaawhtaqaq _ .
quunpeng _ sumeghtaghaghllagughsimalghii _ .
enkaam nguq _ melnguut _ igleghte yagute ma lghiit _ naasqugh teng _ qughaghlluki _ .
qamagte uq _ .
Pagrugwaq
Pagrugwaat _ tamaakut _ pinighrakegtat _ qawaag t _ sivuqagh mi _ .
uksaagh mi _ aghulaqegkayugwet _ .
Ighnikayugwet _ pennagh ni _ qilughaaghni _ alngunal _ naayghagh ni _ .
sa mun _ atuqe igate ngugh t _ amighqaaghi _ negh igate ngugh t _ negh kangi _ .
iwernga _ neghyaghqagh t _ negh ke igh sag mi _ .
ata m _ liilightugh llegh a _ ipa u uq
Tagikaam _ ungipagh aa
kiyaghte ma lghii _ ungazighmii _ aghnagh _ ugwilek _ maalghug gneng _ ighnegh leg k _ .
tagtalmi _ ugwingighaamalghii _ .
sighineg mii m _ yugwem _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ ugwingiillghii _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
taana _ yuug _ aklungilnguq _ .
tagtalmi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ enkaam _ sighineg mun _ aglagh te ma kangi _ .
taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ atakaghqagh ita _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ “ _ qagavek _ alngunak _ ilate qaghtagh gpenatek _ , _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ amyuutke lleqe i istek _ . _ ”
Puughsimaqegkek _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ ulape sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ ulape aqe lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ uksuum _ unanguluku _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
uteghnigh lutek _ nagnegh ma lghiik _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ awalighpigaaghllutek _ nefkagh aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh lutek _ taglagh aqe lghiik _ .
tamaa na _ taglagh uute lghii _ naghughte qugh luku _ kaate aqe lghiik _ ne mun _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ uksulqusigh _ .
ataasigh meng _ unaangu luku _ tungtuqu yagh laatagh ma lghiik _ .
tungtute lutek _ atghagh ma lghiik _ aghneghtu ghllag luku _ .
tungtu kekagh tek _ kaat ute te luki _ nagnegh laatagh ma lghiik _ yuug _ tamaa na _ maligte luku _ esavghagh ma lghiik _ .
ata ita _ awalighpigaaghtesnanighaqsaqek _ .
tawani _ aghtugh ma lghiik _ ayveghagh nghmeng _ .
tamaakut _ ila i _ ayveghagh te luteng _ taglagh uute ma lghiit _ elkek _ ayveghagh naqe ma lukek _ .
qenwat _ whanikumakanga _ .
ayveghagh qaghte lutek _ iiwenllu _ yataaghqe aqe ak _ uyughagh a _ kelute mun _ qiive yalghiimi _ esghaate ma lghii _ puyughpag meng _ .
anengagh ni _ aragh u aghagh a _ , _ “ _ Iii _ , _ iike te ainkung _ ! _ ”
anengagh an _ ayvegh _ pegte luku _ kelute mun _ kilgaaqu ma lghiik _ .
esne anun _ siku m _ kaate yalghiimek _ nutem _ ameltughqwaaluni _ .
naqam _ iiwleng _ tea- te te _ ’ _ gavek _ siku _ saagrukegtaq _ .
tamaa na _ saagrukegtaq _ siku _ anuqe mi _ legan _ megh m _ teve yaghqagh a _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ .
uyavagh ghllag lutek _ kaate ma ka ak _ iighwilngugh ghllag _ .
sikuvag nun _ mayugh lutek _ tespamani _ qaye itni _ laag te lutek _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ “ _ weni _ tuqusigh naqngu nghite kumtung _ sa naqe i _ ! _ ”
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ nuyekligh _ tunag mineng _ saguyagh igh luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uyughagh n _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ uyavaghpaneng _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ ”
uyughagh n _ nagaquteghngaaghmi _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ waniwanllu _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite unga _ . _ ”
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ meteghllug _ qalghigh laatagh ma lghii _ uyavaghpaneng _ , _ iwernga _ maateghniineng _ qantaghanlluni _ .
uyughagh ni _ aapte laatagh ma kanga _ .
maaten _ uyughagh a _ nagaqunnimalghii _ .
nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ nuyekliimllu _ alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ alla _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ qantaghanlliighaghluni _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nagaqugh nghite aqa _ ! _ ”
iwernga _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qakma _ uqeghhmi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Quqquqquqquqquq _ . _ ”
anengagh an _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ awii _ .
whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ ”
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ ”
akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ pi aqe uq _ whanga inagh ma _ taglaate na lunga _ . _ ”
qakma _ qalghigh laatagh uq _ meteghllug _ , _ “ _ Quqquqquqquqquq _ ! _ ”
anengagh an _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Aaa _ , _ nanghiiqu naqe i _ ! _ ”
uyughagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ meteghllug _ ? _ ”
anengagh an _ akite a _ , _ “ _ whaten _ pi aqe uq _ , _ “ _ ‘ _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ maalghug u lutek _ .
taawanginaq _ uka _ tume mi _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uusqagh lghii _ ’ _ . _ ”
