anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ qemqagh u aghagh a _ aanalutek _ .
aane lutek _ uyughagh ni _ neveghtesqumakanga _ .
Neveghsan _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ kenigh mineng _ saape ma kanga _ .
taagken _ meteghllugwem _ ghhatagh te ma kek _ igleghte ma lghiit _ quulvaqun _ .
igleghte luteng _ , _ igleghte luteng _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ meghnaali ma lghiit _ .
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ neveghtesqellaataamakanga _ .
Neveghsan _ aqume luku _ gginagh a _ saape luku _ kenigh mineng _ ghhatagh laatagh ma lghiit _ .
mulu luteng _ naluglaatamalghiit _ .
pi yalghiimeng _ meteghllugwem _ meghnalivigkun _ naayghagh mi _ alungutellegh leg mi _ uyghag kun _ nalugute ma kangi _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ taawanginaq _ naayghagh _ mayughvig ite uq _ .
anengagh an _ ila a _ tughneghagh- ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ .
amiklug _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
anengagh an _ aleghqugh ma kanga _ amiklug _ , _ “ _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ ”
uyughagh n _ aapte a _ anengagh ni _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ ”
anengagh an _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ “ _ pi aqe aanga _ whanga inagh ma _ may- te na lunga _ . _ ”
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wetku qun _ whanga _ sivuke lunga _ mayugh te linga _ , _ taagken _ elpek _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ amiklugwem _ sivuke luku _ uyughagh a _ may- te ma kanga _ .
taagken _ uteghte vike ma kanga _ anengagh a _ .
qaygeghte lutek _ ne mun _ aglagh ma lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ ne mii it _ ilagaanneqegsaataqelghiit _ .
qagugh m _ nunalgute m _ alignalghii ngiighhagh a _ ilagaqayuwhaa _ ilagagh te aqe lghii _ .
ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ un _ ’ _ ga _ tuquma ni lukek _ nagaqumaniluteng _ .
ata at _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ llangaqa _ whaa _ siku m _ ilu anite lunga _ ilagagh unga _ , _ iqlengiqe unga _ weni _ ! _ ”
alla _ ilagagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghma _ meteghllugwem _ pi unga _ ghhatagh te na lunga _ .
aygugh mun _ aghulaqe ukung _ .
igleghte lutung _ aghuliigh lutung _ siku kun _ meghnaali ukung _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe laatagh ukung _ .
aghuliigh ukung _ ingani _ meteghllugwem _ meghnaali vig ani _ .
weni _ iqlengiqe unga _ . _ ”
kaate lutek _ mekelghiigh k _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte lutek _ nagate ma lghiik _ .
qama _ ata ak _ ilagagh aqe uq _ .
ilagagh ghngaaghmi _ nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ taagken _ meghnaali lunga _ amiklugwem _ mayugh te aanga _ .
qaygeghte yamtung _ tagi unga _ .
kaate yama _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh unga _ . _ ”
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ .
nukalpigagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ enta _ qakmavek _ iiyagh mun _ agigte yaghtuqagh tek _ . _ ”
nukalpigagh t _ aane yalghiimeng _ paaghqite uq _ .
qayughllak _ mayugh naqe yata _ awatmun _ mekelghiigh k _ ullghitagh ma lghiik _ .
itegh luteng _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .
mekelghiigh k _ nenglu m _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghiik _ .
ata ak _ ellmi neng _ aane luni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
itegh sqe ma kek _ .
quyake ma kegket _ .
ata ita _ pi ma kek _ , _ “ _ sa lutek _ uugte lugh stek _ ? _ ”
“ _ taanegken _ ima _ takaghpagllelgaataaftuq _ .
Yulleghpagkun _ qutenge ukung _ . _ ”
ata gkenka _ pi ma kek _ , _ “ _ llaaghinaan _ takaghpagllelgaataamaaq _ ! _ ”
uyuqligh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ llaaghinaan _ elpek _ iye llgagh u uten _ ! _ ”
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ awavagh ghllag nanigh ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh k _ .
qamagte uq _ , _ tefaay _ !
tekeyiighagh
apegh aqe ait _ sivuqagh mi _ tekeyiighagh at _ upenghagh mi _ kingulighpigagh lug teng _ kaate luteng _ sivulighpigaluteng _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ aghulaqe aqe lghiit _ .
tekeyiighagh at _ ighnikayugwet _ qenaghmillu _ qenaavzeghagh mi llu _ imqaghlleghani _ .
Qawaaggaat _ tea- ma kut _ tenge qaghte luteng _ mangtaghmeggneng _ ukig aghtagh vike aqe kangit _ yugwet _ naghughte lghiit _ , _ mangtaghmeggnun _ pinagh yu kata _ .
ilutuqagh _ Afsengaaghaghhaq
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
ilangani _ , _ aane ma lghii _ unaangu luku _ afsengaaghaghhaq _ .
Aghnelqusiq _ aviite luni _ uteghnigh uq _ ighivgaamaan _ .
nengyugh ni _ ungipamsug te a _ afsengaaghaghhaam _ , _ “ _ whanga _ iknaqe llegh u unga _ , _ pinighqallghuftunga _ , _ nangyiite llegh u unga _ nunivag mi _ . _ ”
“ _ naten _ liigike ziin _ ? _ ” _ nengyugh an _ aapte a _ .
eltughagh n _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ “ _ aane lunga _ riigte meng _ igleghte yalghiinga _ kaate unga _ megh mun _ .
yakugh yug gpenanga _ pugwimameng _ aghvigh unga _ inglu anun _ . _ ”
“ _ liisimake aqa _ taana _ megh _ pugwimegkan _ , _ ” _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ “ _ quyngigh m _ tuumke a _ .
qantaghaqun _ naghughte ma uq _ quyngigh _ , _ tumangi _ me u ma ut _ . _ ”
nengyugh ni _ pi laatagh aa _ afsengaaghaghhaam _ , _ “ _ nagaten _ .
esghagh aqa _ naayghagh _ enmis _ naghughte aqa _ . _ ”
“ _ liisimake aqa _ , _ ” _ pi a _ nengyugh an _ , _ “ _ taana _ temke u uq _ naayghagh u ni ken _ . _ ”
Afsengaaghaghhaq _ wata _ ungipagh uq _ , _ “ _ pi yalghiinga _ pillugute aqe uk _ kaynge k _ , _ tagnegh lghii llu _ qategh lghii llu _ .
alinge gpenanga _ peglleghqute agka _ . _ ”
nengyugh an _ pi a _ eltughagh ni _ , _ “ _ kaynge u ni kegken _ taake uk _ nguuyngaaghaankunguuk _ yaqellengetaankuk _ . _ ”
Nallghughqaataghyatni _ qiya uq _ afsengaaghaghhaq _ .
nengyugh an _ nenglaqluku _ pi a _ , _ “ _ iwernga _ elpek _ alinge ma ite ngugh u te n _ , _ ipapik _ iknaqe uten _ , _ pinighqe aghte uten _ . _ ”
taawa _ itagnaghi uq _ afsengaaghaghhaq _ .
tefaay _ !
sangameng _ quyngigh t _ Aghulisigatat
quutmii t _ ungipagh aat
ilangani _ , _ quyngigh m _ nallagh ma kanga _ afsengagh _ .
afsengagh _ peghqinghumalghii _ .
afsengagh m _ aapte a _ , _ “ _ quyngigh _ , _ navek _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ ”
quyngigh m _ akite a _ , _ “ _ vegaagh meng _ megh meng _ ivagh i qu nga _ . _ ”
afsengagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ wiin _ iighaate aghte ltung _ . _ ”
“ _ A-aa _ , _ ” _ angegh aa _ quyngigh m _ .
“ _ quneghte naqe unga _ sivuke luten _ elpek _ iigh i _ ivagh lleqe amken _ , _ ” _ afsengagh m _ kayagte a _ .
quyngigh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaaghtuqagh mun _ .
taawanginaq _ sighunegh kek _ aliite uk _ .
afsengagh m _ maatghaq _ naalke a _ quyngigh _ qayughllak _ sighunegh kek _ esghagh kek _ .
quyngigh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Haa _ , _ elpegngam _ iigh i _ ivagh naqe amken _ . _ ”
quyngigh _ quneghte yan _ afsengagh _ iigh yaghtugh uq _ vegaagh mun _ .
quyngigh m _ ivagh aa _ , _ ivagh aa _ afsengagh _ .
Whavemun _ kenlanga _ naalke igate a _ .
Egllungllaq _ naghaaghute meng
iyaa- ka
atughqagh t
igagh meng _ meghutlug meng _ ( _ Oats-m _ , _ meghaatagh ngllagh yaghqagh m _ qantagh aneng _ )
Plastic-meng _ umeg meng
pumsukegtagh te meng _ , _ savig meng _ mekestaaghaghmeng
kuynge m _ ukmangiisigh aneng _ , _ waya meng _ trash _ bag-em _ qeputagh aneng
Construction _ paper- meng _ suflu kaghqagh meng _ , _ umeg mun _ tugutaghqagh meng
ulima llegh a
1 _ . _ kelgute llegh tun _ , _ kepe i uute kek _ qantaghqwaagh k _ naten _ three _ nalighmeng _ four _ inches-ngulukek _ uusqaghtulkek _ .
taagken _ qiigh vigkagh _ negig te yaghqagh _ .
negig llegh a _ egllu kaghqagh m _ angtalkek _ nasiqute lukek _ .
plastic _ umeg _ qaye gkenkun _ nekegte yaghqagh _ .
2 _ . _ qiigh vig _ umeg ngllagh yaghqagh _ egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh gkeneng _ .
Uumwaaghngasqellukek _ umegkagh _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ aange luku _ qiigvigkameng _ uzimun _ iike yaghqagh _ .
kelgute llegh tun _ reghighsaghqagh _ umeg m _ asilighnegha _ triangle-nguluku _ me lug kegte sqellug kek _ egllu k _ .
Tape-pesaghqaq _ tugumavigkagh _ umeg mun _ .
egllu kaghqagh m _ kepellegh k _ asiliqutagh u lukek _ ulima yaghqagh k _ .
egllu ngllagh lghii m _ piyuke llegh mitun _ uusqaghtutkaagkenka _ kepe lukek _ .
3 _ . _ kepe yaghqagh k _ maalghug _ uniistaaghhagh k _ waya k _ nalighmeng _ kuynge m _ ukmangiisigh aneng _ 2 _ inches-ngulukek _ .
igaghqwaagh meng _ qantagh leg t _ wayaaghhaat _ trash _ bag-mmun _ qeputagh t _ pinigh ut _ .
peghte lukek _ waya k _ qukagh gkenkun _ Tape-esaghqak _ umeg mun _ kepellegh m _ tunge kek _ .
1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ piizngaagkenka _ peghngallghem _ tunganga _ umeg meng _ .
agughte yaghqagh k _ piiznga lghiik _ agaghte yaghqaa lukek _ egllu m _ esne gkenkun _ qiigh vig m _ nalla akun _ .
4 _ . _ Taam _ qantaghqwaagh m _ uumgagh kun _ angqaperug kegte luku _ teregh yaghqagh _ 1 _ inch-nguluku _ diameter _ esne aneng _ tungangakun _ 1 _ / _ 2 _ inch _ awavantutkaan _ .
taana _ angqaperug kegtagh ngllaghkagh _ pilag yaghqagh _ qukaa kun _ .
taagken _ aveg llegh k _ taake uk _ qukagh gkenkun _ pilaagaataghyaghqak _ .
angqaperug kegte aq _ estamaghqesaghqaq _ .
Estamaghqellghet _ alla _ qukaa ii kete te _ aveg yaghqagh t _ .
taagken _ enraq _ qule mun _ agughte qugh yaghqagh t _ .
suflug mun _ aatesvigkaagut.Egllum _ qaye akun _ umeg te yaghqagh _ .
5 _ . _ imeg yaghqagh _ angqaperug kegte luku _ construction _ apper _ suflug m _ ukimallegh an _ eslegtalngatun _ .
Scotch _ tape- meng _ neve ste luku _ saagaghte na yu kan _ suflu ligh vig mun _ iqug a _ kanaghte yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ suflulighvigmelnguut _ qule mun _ agughte qughkagh t _ qaye itgun _ suflug t _ aate stekayugu yagh ut _ .
igaghqwaagh u lghiit _ ukut _ uniistaaghhagh u ut _ suflu k _ nuqnegh naanghite aat _ .
Sulpik _ naapte lghii _ kaviigh meng
Tuug _ ’ _ ghim _ apegh llegh a
Sulpik _ quunpeng _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ unkuseniighmeng _ kaviighniighmeng _ uksugh mi _ .
uspeqe aqe lghii _ neqesghagh ightugh na luni _ temngi _ tamaagun _ nunivag kun _ uyavanteghllagpenaan _ ne meng _ .
piyug meng _ kaate yugnagh luki _ siifqaghnaluni _ .
Sulpigem _ kaviigh meng _ naapteaghaghte lleghqagh ni _ sighimake gpenaan _ siifqaqaalghii _ .
unaami inagh _ esghagh yaghtugh na luki _ unkuse ni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
ata an _ repall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ legan _ siifte uten _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe yu ikagh i _ ? _ ”
Sulpigem _ ata ni _ qingsig qagh luku _ yukemsugsimaghmi _ aghulaqe uq _ .
kaate yaghtugh yamigu _ unkuseniigh vig ni _ egtugruugtuq _ .
sivuligh t _ unkuse ni _ qantaghanlliighaghyamiki _ wata _ egtugnegh a _ sukaaghtaa _ .
Kaasaqminiki _ avangite ut _ .
“ _ temngi _ egtugte ma unga _ avangirrugneng _ ! _ ”
Sulpik _ uniigh miqe pigte luni _ pi ma lghii _ .
“ _ maaten _ unkusema _ tuungligh ghhagh itnun _ kaate yaghtugh kuma _ emta _ egtugruuggnaanghitunga _ , _ ” _ Sulpik _ ellmi neng _ akuzite ma lghii _ .
kaate yaghtugh yami _ ima _ nuqetmikun _ taaggun _ egtugte laatagh uq _ .
elngaatall _ quupkagh ma lghii _ unkuse ni _ esghaghyaqminiki _ kaviighhaghnguq _ taawa _ naapte ma lghii _ .
iye kek _ angqaperug kegte tete te uk _ , _ ungelegte magh mi _ esghagh luku _ naaptani _ .
“ _ Natenngam _ tuqute naqe zikun _ kaviigh ii qu na _ , _ ” _ Sulpik _ pi uq _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ atuute yagh kumkun _ , _ ilagaate yagh kumkun _ aghula magh ma _ aghuliigh nayagh uq _ amqeghte naqe nayagh nghite te aanga _ . _ ”
taagken _ atugh uq _ aghula magh mi _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ aghuliigh luni _ esghapag aa _ .
maateqwaaqun _ elngaatall _ angalkellaataghtuq _ , _ iike te naqlaatagh uq _ .
Sulpik _ enraghngam _ aragh magh mi _ talligh gni _ aghulasimaagkenka _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
paninang _ kaviigh _ aghuliigh nghite uq _ angalke uq _ elngaatall _ .
ima _ unaangu luku _ esghagh yaghtugh kaqe kangi _ unkuse ni _ .
Aghnelqusiq _ tuqute naqe m _ tagtale ani _ kaviigh _ , _ elpek nge yalghiimi _ mamlegte yaghtugh aqe a _ .
iighwziig magh mi _ , _ quneghte magh mi _ , _ qesigh kau magh mi _ taakunginaghhaagneng _ niinghute vikekagh a _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
qenwat llu _ tuquteqaghtekagh a _ .
esghagh yaghtugh nghite ai _ ila i _ unkuse mi _ qayughllak _ mamlegtekanga _ .
Sulpik _ kaate yan _ kaviigh ligh luni _ ne mun _ angayuqagh gkenka _ aghyugh aat _ muluugh ghllag lghii _ peng _ ’ _ ginniluku _ .
sangan _ muluugh ta a _ ungipaghsugh aat _ .
Sulpigem _ ungipaate ai _ piyaqli i llegh mineng _ tuqute i naqe m _ kaviigh meng _ .
ata an _ aapte a _ , _ “ _ naten mi _ tuqute zigu _ ? _ ”
Sulpigem _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ “ _ ilagagh unga _ , _ aragh unga _ , _ talligh gka _ nengug te lukek _ aghulate agka _ , _ tukagh unga _ aghuliigh sqellug qu _ ngiigte na luku _ . _ ”
ata an _ apeghtugh aa _ kaviigh meng _ tuqute i llegh meng _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ unaghsiighwagh ghhagh _ qaanghanun _ kanaghte luku _ amqeghtekagu _ up- lleghte luku _ tuute naken _ ighsaqghwan _ nalla akun _ .
aga _ sukate pigte luni _ tuqu lleqe uq _ . _ ”
tawani _ uksugh mi _ Sulpik _ liite uq _ kaviigh niigh llegh meng _ tuqute i llegh meng _ .
elngaatall _ naapte aghtagh qu uq _ .
Sulpik _ Iilqayugwigalnguq
Anagutaam _ apegh llegh a
Qalugyaam _ ighnegh ghhagh ni _ , _ Sulpik _ , _ ungipamsug te aqe kanga _ ullghitag igh te luku _ qimugsigh meng _ igleghusiqaqsaghniluteng _ .
apegh aqe kanga llu _ ghhavegh _ , _ pingayuwhaghneng _ qikmigh ke luni _ tevragh kayugu yagh ni luku _ .
Qalugyaankut _ qikmigh leg t _ ataasigh meng _ , _ qamisluulget _ , _ ullghitag leg t _ .
Sulpik _ qimugsigh naqe ma lghii _ toboggan-nek _ qamite kete lukek _ .
qikmigh eng _ pot _ , _ uyate te igh luku _ qiipraghuteneng _ snap-petii _ toboggan-mun _ .
igleghte na luni _ aqume qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ yeghlegi _ qikmigh m _ uughqaghte aqe kanga _ .
qenwat llu _ qikmigh _ kilgaanlenguq _ Pot-tem _ esghagh luku _ malighqagh ma kanga _ ugwavek _ aatnegh mun _ .
Sulpik _ taklagh an _ toboggan-kun _ qamumakanga _ .
aantagh ni _ pot _ aghuliigh luni _ aantagh niigh uq _ .
Sulpigem _ qamughtaaghnaqutkaa _ igleghte na luni _ , _ aghtugh aa _ .
Sulpigem _ neghnagh igh lleg lghutagh _ plastic _ bag-a _ naalkellug qu _ Pot-mun _ naagh ste luku _ maghyaghqugh aa _ ne meggnun _ .
kaat ute qaghte yamigu _ petugwaa _ .
itegh naqe yami _ kameraagh ghllag gni _ itegmighqutngwaaghaak _ .
saayguraagh mun _ itegh luni _ amig m _ saaghw akun _ nekeve ste lukek _ qamavek _ ilu te mun _ itegh uq _ .
paaghqite ut _ .
Sulpigem _ suflugwaghhani _ agaghte vig aneng _ ateghte luku _ suflugwam _ mesiigh aneng _ , _ sangighqugh sigh meng _ , _ ighllughwaatmeng _ ketfagh te uq _ .
sivuke luku _ suflugwaq _ sangigte luku _ taagken _ ighlluughwaghaa _ .
ighlluughaate ni _ mingllite naqe luku _ mesiilghutagh ghhagh k _ aagute lukek _ kuuve ma kek _ .
mesiilghutagh ghhagh k _ makete qaghte naqe lukek _ enraghngam _ suflugwani _ ullegh aghte ma kanga _ .
mesiigh _ kuuvekagh _ nepsag luku _ paper _ cup-ngiighhaghmun _ sivugh luku _ enkaam _ agha lghutagh ghhagh gnun _ mesiilghutagh gnun _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
Suflugwani _ mesiighqe ghngaaghmigu _ esghagh ma kanga _ sivuqligh _ nakeghsagh ta a _ naate naagh a _ ayemkagh ma lghii _ ullegh aghte aqngami _ .
nakeghsaate a _ pin-netngaftuq _ .
suumqagh u te a _ jacket-mi _ esteg ani _ three _ penny-ngiighhaq _ tuquuqagh _ naalkutaagh ni _ .
taagken _ tuquuqagh meng _ aanesimakanga _ pin- nga _ .
alquutagh _ table-legneng _ tugu luku _ puu a _ uspusaqminigu _ nakeghsaatetu te _ umutatkaftuq _ .
Ulimghusilghutak _ ketfamakek _ .
Pumsugwegnekun _ alquutagh _ amqeghte ste luku _ puu aneng _ hacksaw-meng _ kepe te ma lghii _ .
ayemekagh _ nakeghsaate _ uspute aqe luku _ nakeghsaate ngllagh u aghagh a _ suflugwani _ .
alquutagh _ kepekagh ni _ walamnaag meng _ neghuvaghsagh luku _ sayugwaatagnun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
Iiiwenllu _ ulimghusit _ kanaghqutagh ke ai _ angayuqagh kek _ iteghaatuk _ .
naa an _ kuuve llegh _ mesiigh _ esghagh luku _ ukmangigh ste a _ Sulpigmun _ pi magh an _ , _ “ _ sangan qun _ kelenga luten _ pi igate ziin _ ! _ ”
ingaghte uute luteng _ Sulpik _ qavagh nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ .
quunpeng _ Qalugyaam _ ungipamsugwi _ qimugsigh naqe lleg ni llu _ sumeghtaghagh tke ai _ .
allamenguq _ alquutagh ghhagh m _ puung _ kepekagh ni _ nakeghsaate u luku _ naten _ apegh lleghqagh a _ nulqaaviighutkaa _ .
Sulpik _ liite yaaghagh uq _ sa u aat _ sumegh mini _ piyaqnagh u i tesugnite ngugh t _ eltughyalget _ katam _ qimugsigh naqe aqe nga a mi _ .
Sulpigem _ pinighsagh kaqe ghngaaghmigu _ nakeghsaate _ , _ aligh u u ma lghii _ qayughllak _ naa an _ kepe negh ke uq _ alquutagh _ naalke gkunigu _ aghyuugh yaghqaqe kanga _ .
Umyugwagni _ ataasiighte ak _ unaami _ aghtekan _ naa ni _ ungipannaluku _ .
aga _ qavagh inagh magh mi _ .
SULPIK _ nulugh yagh lghii
tengutkaleg m _ apegh llegh a
aghvaghllug ghllag _ siqi neghllug ghllag _ .
Sulpik _ manughagh meggni _ pilagtugh vig gni _ aqume luni _ savighhwaaghaqaanguq _ unaghsigh ghhagh _ .
Neghsangllaghnaqutkaqughnguq _ a ta mi _ naangqugh meng _ neghsagh ngllagh llegh atun _ .
savighhe llegh a _ ifkagh aqe lghii _ qenwat _ kamelluuwhaghqeklu _ savighhe llegh ghllag ughte uk _ .
“ _ Aliinesaggaq _ nulugh yagh yagh kuma _ , _ ” _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ nulugh yagh kuma _ iqallugte nayagh nghite zinga _ . _ ”
semqatwhali gni _ imeg lukek _ esteg mig lukek _ a ta mi _ nuluusigh a _ ivagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
“ _ Samengam _ iqsag ke naqe zinga _ , _ ” _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ saghya lghutagh mi _ naalkute nayagh nghite zinga _ . _ ”
ivagh i yalghiimi _ iqsag _ naalke ma kanga _ .
nekegte ma kanga _ nuluusigh kun _ .
“ _ una _ iqsag _ aghsaan _ aange pigte a _ , _ ” _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ iwerngaqun _ sa meng _ alla _ pi langa _ , _ entaqun _ iqallug ni _ iwernga _ takumsunaghte uq _ . _ ”
esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ , _ iggaarqitaagh magh mi _ ighu ngiighhagh kek _ takestaaghhagh k _ , _ eslegmaruggaak _ .
nuluusigh _ uyamig a _ piiste ghllag luni _ iqsag a _ piyug llegh akun _ aghulate magh mi _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ miluute ma kanga _ iqsag ni _ .
megh _ qateghllug ghllag _ iqsag a _ awavagh qagh a qun _ tekite ma lghii _ .
aqume luni _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
qagi vzeghagh ghhagh t _ ayeme aatagh llghite a _ , _ siqinghemllu _ maatnegh an _ qavaghni sta _ .
“ _ qavangsi yagh kuma _ , _ ” _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Iqallugwetluwha _ qavaa te aqe nghite aat _ . _ ”
qavagh luni _ qavangugh ma lghii _ aangelleghpigaghmeng _ iqallug meng _ esghaghaqegkemmineng _ .
elngaatall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ .
Qakemkuni _ , _ iqallugnaaqungiighhaam _ uzivgagh aqe a _ iqsag a _ .
iqallug ghnaggagh m _ kaate yaghtugh aa _ iqsag ghrugllag a _ , _ papasqitagh llegh an _ megh _ imaghllugte a _ repall _ .
taagken _ nalugute vike ma kanga _ iqsag a _ .
Sulpik _ upum _ taghtugh aghte ma lghii _ .
elpek nge yalghiimi _ nekevgha uq _ , _ saam _ sayugwaghsimakanga _ nekefqaghte ste luku _ .
“ _ Uwhiiy _ ! _ ” _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ itagnagh nayagh uq _ iqallugte yagh kuma _ , _ saamna _ entaqun _ qavangugh ke kaqe a _ iqallugpagllaguuq _ .
Sayugwaataatkallghuughumalghiik _ .
Sayuvleghaqaghneghminigu _ , _ iqallugwem _ sayugwaghteghllagaqegkanga _ .
qenwat _ qagi vzeghagh ghhagh nun _ kaate yaghtugh uq _ .
“ _ ugumi _ ... _ ” _ akuzimleghagh uq _ , _ “ _ Iqallugwem _ yeghlegi _ whanga _ entaqun _ negh naqe aanga _ . _ ”
iiwenllu _ megh mun _ kaate naqe aqe uq _ , _ esghagh ma kanga _ ilakumtaagh ni _ , _ alleg te aq _ , _ ukig aqe uq _ esnagh mun _ Honda-gmikun _ .
“ _ alleg te aagh _ !
sukate pestaagh luten _ tea- ai _ !
kayusiite nga _ ! _ ” _ aragh ma kanga _ .
Aallgutaam _ esghaghyaqminigu _ Sulpik _ sayugsigh u lghii _ , _ tazingavek _ sukera vike ma kanga _ .
“ _ sukate luten _ ! _ ”
Sulpigem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ petug ggu _ una _ ullghitagh gpegun _ . _ ”
Iknaqngiighhatek _ qamagte luki _ sayugsiighumakangat _ , _ petug qaghte ma kangat _ ullghitag nun _ .
ughhe qaghtagh te lutek _ igleghtesimakegket _ ullghitagh k _ .
mayugh te kete luku _ esnagh m _ uusneghwaagh anun _ uteghmun _ esghagh ma kangat _ gginagh a _ megh mi _ kayullunaaghllagem _ .
“ _ iqallug u nghite uq _ ! _ ”
Aallgutaam _ pi ma kanga _ Sulpik _ , _ “ _ sangaawa tuq _ ? _ ”
Sayugyaqmegnegu _ , _ ggute leg ghllag u uq _ .
iye ghllag kek _ neghsagh m _ iye atun _ angka lghiik _ elkegkenun _ ayuqe lutek _ .
Salluugwem _ qaanghani _ , _ ggutangi _ tawaten _ pilagtuusighpagem _ ggutangatun _ ayuqe ut _ .
“ _ entaqun _ taglaate fqaan _ pi yagh kumtegnegu _ . _ ”
Aallgutaam _ pi ma kanga _ Sulpik _ , _ “ _ neqniite sug ni te pigte uq _ . _ ”
Sulpigem _ taawa _ kayutagh mi _ neqnigh a _ sumegh ke nghite kanga _ .
taku yu nghite u aqe a _ .
aleghquute ma lukek _ , _ salluugwem _ aglu gni _ taghpaghteghllaglukek _ umeg aghte ma kek _ .
Uskughwat _ sakeqe ma lghiit _ .
upugh luni _ Aallgutaam _ igleghaghteslukek _ ullghitagh k _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ qeteghaghtevziimalghiik _ .
naagh llegh u aghte pagte yamek _ uteghmun _ esghaghyaqmegnegu _ , _ salluuk _ aga _ naghullgute aqe uq _ angtughhaastun _ niinghute lghii stun _ .
megh kun _ tekite yalghiimi _ siqfallag u uute ghllag ma lghii _ .
“ _ seghleghhalek _ ! _ ”
alleg te aq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ima _ anagiighpung _ . _ ”
“ _ nakaa _ , _ ” _ Sulpigem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whangkutung _ anag ainkung _ ! _ ”
mekiitlegte ghllag ma yagh lghii _ !
Suflugwamun _ Qantangllaqlu _ Akmagtangllaq
iyaa- ka
atughqagh t
igagh meng
Tapghaghpawaaghmeng
tape- meng
Suflugwamun _ qantagh ngllagh llegh
liighqe te aagh _ nekegte luku _ igagh kun _ teregh nakesi _ uzimun _ .
negikragh luku _ terellegh kun _ qukaa kun _ peghhe nakesi _ liighqe te aagh _ terellegh ngeltagh tgun _ .
tasig ligh vigkagh t _ uki qugh luki _ tape-pennakesi _ qaye a _ qantagh m llu _ uumgagh nun llu _ qillghutfigkaa _ .
umeg a _ tapghaghpawaalighnakesi _ .
Akmagtangllaq
liighqe te aagh _ nekegte luku _ igagh kun _ , _ teregh nakesi _ uzimun _ .
negikragh luku _ terellegh kun _ peghhe nakesi _ liighqe te aagh _ terellegeltatgun _ .
negikragh tekek _ maalghug _ 1 _ / _ 4 _ ” _ by _ 1 _ ” _ igaameng _ tasig ligh vigkagh k _ .
Tapghaghpawaaghmeng _ kepe te lghaaten _ tasigkagh meng llu _ umeg mun llu _ qillghutusighqameng _ .
Tape-pennakesi _ pi sqe llegh atun _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag
Mekengam _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni _ imanagh i _ , _ mayeraaghpag ghllag nguq _ taana _ aange pigte lghii _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ mangteghagh leg ghllag _ nenglu leg ghllag _ .
Tallimagyaget _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ inghu yagh ma lghiit _ .
inghu ma luki _ mayeraaghpag ghllag m _ taku ma kangi _ .
qimag te ma yagh lghiit _ malighqagh luki _ kaate luki _ ratamiiragh gminun _ kanaghqusimakangi _ .
paye kek _ tapghaghmeng _ qilleghte lukek _ uyamig lukek _ aga _ navek _ aghulaqe uq _ .
kii _ , _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ alingruugh te ma lghiit _ .
ataasigh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ navek _ pi naqe inkut _ ? _ ”
Piillghaghqun _ ataasigh _ qineghte yalghiimi _ unaghsigh _ napaqagh ghllag _ inga _ taku aqe a _ .
uya mini _ kaat ute te luku _ ateghte luku _ taana _ napaqagh ghllag _ aleghquma kanga _ , _ “ _ Unnaaqekangaa _ , _ unnaaqekangaa _ uunnaaqepilugwatgi _ ! _ ”
napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ma lghii _ qukagh mikun _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ taaggun _ ratamiiragh gni _ napaqagh m _ iqugwakun _ asighte te ma kek _ ayugwilluku _ .
apeghiigh luni _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ Unnaaqekangaa _ , _ unnaaqekangaa _ uunnaaqepilugwatgi _ ! _ ”
kii _ , _ taklaaghaghsalghiimi _ napaqagh ghllag _ pikaarugllaak _ quulvaghpani _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag _ aglagh luni _ ne minun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
kii _ , _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ alingruugh te ghllag t _ qaprag qagh gpenateng _ ifkagh na yukagh meng _ .
qiya aghte te ngeltagh te ghllag t _ qiya mreghagh te ghllag t _ .
elngaatall _ tawaani _ qenwannguq _ iye it _ puuve uute ghllag ut _ qiyaaghwaghllagem _ aliingem _ ifkagh na yukagh meng _ .
Tawaaten _ qiyaamaluki _ ukimallghaghqun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ ataasigh _ sama nguq _ afsengagh ghhagh _ asi itni _ naghughte naqe aqe uq _ .
taagavek _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ afsengagh ghhagh _ aagyuuq _ llaaghan _ yuwhaayengalghiiten _ ileme teqaghti kut _ . _ ”
afsengagh ghhagh m _ qule mun _ esghamakanga _ , _ “ _ Ilemuteqaghhnaanghitamsii _ aamta _ whaa _ neghniimsugumaluta _ milughpagaataghaqaghpesikut _ tuqutagh qagh zikut _ ! _ ”
aga _ naghughte uq _ .
kingu aneng _ legan _ qiya aghte te tete laatagh ut _ .
tawaten _ pi ma luki _ kaviigh ghhagh _ enraq _ uka _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte naqe yan _ ataasigh m _ pilaatamakanga _ , _ “ _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aagyuuq _ llaaghan _ yuwhaayengalghiiten _ ileme teqaghti kut _ . _ ”
uka _ tagi i ma lghii _ .
legan _ quya uute ma lghiit _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh t _ ukiggnaqegkangi _ .
“ _ naten qun _ ilemullamsi _ pikarugllak _ ? _ ”
kaviigh m _ qule mun _ aapte ma kanga _ .
“ _ mayeraaghpag _ whaten _ pi kau uq _ legan _ , _ ‘ _ Unnaaqekangaa _ , _ unnaaqekangaa _ uunnaaqepilugwatgi _ ! _ ” _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ kiimsigh ma kanga _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ aatakqun _ napaqagh _ aleghqughyaqminigu _ , _ “ _ Unnaaqekangaa _ , _ unnaaqekangaa _ uunnaaqepilugwatgi _ ! _ ”
sunami _ napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ghllag naagh a _ .
pakreg aghte yan _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ taana _ tapghagh a _ iqlugsaqminigu _ , _ iqlugsaqminigu _ qenwat _ ilemtaa _ .
Ilemsagu _ aanleghaate ma lghiit _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh ghhagh t _ estamat _ .
ataasigh _ aghnaghaghhagh _ teghtughhneghmeng _ mataawi te aat _ qiyam _ qavanghumillaghqelluku _ sama _ tegh ghhagh ani _ ratamiiragh m _ .
“ _ aa _ , _ tawanlli _ qavagh li _ ! _ ” _ ataasigh m _ qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ ila ni _ .
aghnaghaghhagh t _ taakut _ uninnaqngaamegteggu _ inghukaghhaateng _ katag luki _ ratamiiragh gnun _ vegaagh ghllag meng _ imigh lukek _ tawanniluteng _ pisqelluteng _ qilleghte ma kegket _ .
petug lukek _ napaqagh kun _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ aatak _ aragh ut _ , _ “ _ Unnaaqekangaa _ , _ unnaaqekangaa _ uunnaaqepilugwitgi _ ! _ ”
napaqagh ghllag _ taklaaghaghteghllagyalghiimi _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pika _ ellnginaghhaghmi _ qavagh _ .
qimagugh te luteng _ uyavaghpanun _ elngaatall _ iiskughte ma kangat _ mayeraaghpag _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe ma kangi _ ulaagh ghllag ni _ tugumiiqe luku _ , _ “ _ naa ke i _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ esghagh yaghtugh naqe anka _ . _ ”
mayeraaghpag m _ taku luki _ kaate luki _ napaqagh ghllag _ aleghqugh laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ Unnaaqekangaa _ , _ unnaaqekangaa _ uunnaaqepilugwitgi _ ! _ ”
napaqagh ghllag _ pakreg aghte ghllag yan _ ulaagh mineng _ pilagaghsaqminikek _ ratamiiragh k _ vegaagh _ pagunghagh _ ifkagh qu uute ma lghii _ .
aviite yata _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ qefliqe luni _ wata _ pilagaghtaghyaqminikek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ iqelqwa _ kepe qaghte ma kanga _ .
“ _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ , _ key- ke a _ !
Kumakightekaghnaghaghpenga _ , _ kumakightekaghnaghaghpenga _ .
enta _ kumakigh naqe amken _ , _ ” _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ qiya magh mi _ pi ma kanga _ .
“ _ huk _ aa-a _ , _ ” _ mayeraaghpag _ kaagkasaghsaggaghneng _ .
ingaghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ kumakigh aa _ .
afsengagh _ , _ nguuyngaaghagh _ , _ melngu _ , _ kingu k _ , _ sa u a _ kumag ke a _ .
Legannguq _ tuqute aqe ai _ .
mayeraaghpag ghllag _ qavagh uq _ nunakim _ .
qavagh yan _ iye kek _ paarghuliighaak _ inglugtun _ .
taagken _ mayeraaghpag _ qavagh luni _ , _ qavagh luni _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi magh an _ teghtughsimakanga _ , _ “ _ uyuq _ pikavek _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ ”
mayeraaghpag _ esghagh naqe yalghiimi _ aghtugh uq _ .
“ _ Sangaamek _ iye gka _ sa uk _ . _ ”
“ _ saa _ , _ qavagh gpeni wha _ nevuute ma nghite ak _ , _ ” _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ taslugh naqe amken _ pikavek _ meqsaghtugh a _ . _ ”
amenam _ taslumakanga _ maye raagh ghllag _ .
kaat ute te luku _ kiiw gnun _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uuhuk _ megh i _ , _ megh i _ ! _ ”
mayeraaghpag _ megh yalghiimi _ , _ megh yalghiimi _ , _ megh yalghiimi _ kiiw k _ qamagaghllukek _ .
kii _ , _ nekeve naqe yalghiimi _ aqsa ghllag a _ meghllag meng _ imigh luni _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ pikavek _ yeqay _ usneghwaaghmun _ aghula yagh a _ atugh u lleqe amken _ taslugh naqe amken _ . _ ”
iye kek nguq _ natengiighhaq _ qelperegaaqestaghaqeftuk _ .
Taslumakanga _ tespikavek _ .
kaat ute te luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Uhuk _ , _ aghula _ ! _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh m _ atughtu a _ elngaatall _ .
qetgegh kau magh mi _ yaagpagte yagh uq _ aqsa a _ qupaghteghllagtuq _ .
piyaqminigu _ tuqungwaaghluni _ maye raagh ghllag _ .
aqsa aneng _ aanleghaate uq _ qayugh te aq _ , _ sagnegh _ , _ savig _ , _ ulaagh _ , _ sa u a _ .
ila i _ aghnaghagh ngeltagh at _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ kayagte ma kangi _ ellngit llu _ tugulaatesqelluki _ .
quya uute magh meng _ atghaghtu te ma lghiit _ .
tefaay _ !
yaywaali _ nulightugh lghii _ nanugh meng
Apangaluum _ apegh llegh a
kiyang _ uglagh u pestaagh lghii m _ tazingkerugllak _ imagh a _ nanugh t _ yugu yagh na iqe kangit _ .
taana _ nagate kaqe a _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ , _ nanugh t _ yugte yug nightu ta i _ yugwestun _ nangaghnegh i _ ayuqe ta i _ .
elngaatall _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ , _ pinigh lghii _ sa kun _ allaaghhinaghqun _ .
ilughagh ghhagh a _ yaywalingiighhaq _ yugughtekestaq _ ellnga nite ngughk _ ne ite ngughk _ qayughllak _ .
aflengake u kanga _ ilughwaghhani _ pinitungwaaq _ iwerngaqun _ amyughwaaghem _ saaghw akun _ aghsaaghmikaatkaqegkanga _ .
enkaam _ uksaagh mi _ siku k _ taginghegkeni _ yataaghqe te ghllag aqe lghii _ yuug _ unangniighusighqagh meggneng _ .
uunghagh _ , _ uyiigh _ apeghiighsagh aqe kangat _ qayughllak _ siku k _ kaate kayek _ piyaa uute yaghqau aqe lghiit _ .
mekelghiigh _ sumeghtaghaqayuuglleghhii _ yugughte lghii _ .
ellngagh a llu _ uunghagh ghhagh meng _ ulimasigh u ma lghii _ .
luuraq _ maligte te luni _ nengigh yaghqaaghte na luni _ kayute ughte na luni _ tawavek _ nengllugute minun _ .
leganqun _ yugwem _ ilughagh ni _ esghagh aa _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ qinuyug a _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ ilughagh ka _ uunghagh ngllagh aqe uq _ sa u a ngam _ aqsaqugh u naqe a _ , _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe ukut _ whaa _ . _ ”
elngaatall _ taanastaghhiinaq _ qaanghan _ ima qaa _ .
qenwat _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kitumun _ uunghiitanglliisqellunga _ pi zinga _ , _ naangilngugh nge a _ nulighh ite ngugh nge a _ nayag ite ngugh nge a _ wetku qun _ nuliigh gpek _ uunghiitagh ngllagh nakanganga _ . _ ”
kii _ , _ yuug _ wata _ saghiighqe uq _ , _ qinuyug a _ ilughwani _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
qenwat _ whanikuyan _ meghnugh luni _ mekelghiigh _ kagtaghte ma lghii _ aane ma lghii _ .
tespikani nguq _ kelutagh nge i te ni _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ ellnginaghhaat _ .
tespikegkut _ uqiigh ghhagh itnun _ uqitaghyaghtumalghii _ .
iiwen _ whaa _ kaate aqe uq _ up- qite vigkagh minun _ qilughwaagh ghllag t _ mengqughte te ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ .
Esghaghaghsaqminiki _ amigh k _ qelpegh aqe uq _ aghnagh _ whaa _ qineghte uq _ , _ elngaatall _ ineqsunagh ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangavek _ nangllegnaghqesin _ sa qu ziin _ aqlagha ghllag mi _ ne mete kestagh ghngaaghpek _ ? _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ , _ “ _ elngaatall _ ilughagh ma _ qinuyugte aanga _ uunghiitaghtugh na luni _ .
wasiwa _ kitum _ uunghiitagh ngllagh lleqe aanga _ . _ ”
“ _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ utaqa i yagh a _ uunghiitagh ngllagh naqe amken _ , _ ” _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ ne u uq _ .
taawa nguq _ kelutangani _ nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ esghagh aa _ .
elngaatall _ aghnagh m _ pugnegh iigh te a _ sa meng _ akughtu te a _ .
Akutunneqegsaghluku _ apeghiighyaqminiki _ sagnegh ghllag k llu _ sagnesquvegaghhaaklu _ iigge m _ imagh ghhagh kek _ imightugh ma kangi _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ atghagh a _ .
Qinuyugllataqangaten _ nungyaghagh gneng _ qiigh negh ke i i nagh luten _ aragh ghhaaten _ whaten _ ‘ _ Uunghiitamaang _ , _ uunghitameng _ . _ ’
tuune lleqe amken _ .
taake uk _ angenegh ghllag kek _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ lli nakegken _ , _ tea- ma anun _ negh sqellug kek _ .
taake uk _ sagnesquvegaghhaak _ ilughagh gpenun _ tuunakegken _ .
whaten _ pi naken _ , _ ‘ _ ang _ , _ taawa _ uunghitaghtaa _ elngaatall _ . _ ’
taaqe gkatki _ enkaangam _ aane te naketen _ tugu naagh anka _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
legan _ itegh uq _ ilughagh n _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ uunghitaghtughnaqukutlu _ entaqun _ keleg yaghtu ma a _ uunghitangllaghtekaghqani _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ kitumun _ uunghiitanglliisqellunga _ pi zinga _ , _ ava ite ngugh nge a _ sa ite ngugh nge a _ ? _ ”
Yugwem _ tawanlenguut _ pi a _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ maakughsi _ neghlaaghpenaasi _ kepsugh yaghagh lleqe usi _ uunghagh ite aq _ seghlegh ghllag u naqe uq _ ighivgaghmi _ whani _ . _ ”
qinuyugte lqinagh yatni _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh ni _ tawavek _ pi a _ , _ “ _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ sullevneghhaleg _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh _ taawavek _ piigwaghluni _ nuug ke i nagh luni _ nungyaghagh gneng _ aragh uq _ , _ “ _ Uunghiitamaang _ , _ uunghiitagh meng _ . _ ”
whaa _ iiwen _ aghnagh _ .
sagnegh t _ tuune ai _ .
mekelghiigh m _ itghute ai _ .
kii _ , _ sagnegh ghnaggagh k _ nategh m _ qukagh kun _ lli uk _ .
“ _ esnevagh lusi _ taake uk _ neghe tekek _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ tamaakut _ kayagte ai _ .
taake uk _ sagnesquvegaghhaak _ mekelghiigh m _ ilughagh minun _ aglagh te ak _ , _ “ _ ang _ , _ ukuk _ elpek _ neghe kek _ .
elngaatall _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ sa aqe ziin _ . _ ”
ilughagh n _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ ugumi ke pigte ma zinga _ mekelengestayuwhaak _ ukuk _ kepe yutekaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh k _ tagivagh agken _ . _ ”
“ _ legan _ qalleg gpenang _ negh i _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ .
esnevagh uute luni _ neghunneqegsaatut _ .
taana _ ilughagh a _ sagnesquvegaghhaagneng _ tugu tete luni _ negh lukek _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe lukek _ .
amawha _ tugu tete luni _ negh luni _ esghagh nghminikek _ almesiqe aqe kek _ .
Mataawitngwaaghaak _ naangteqaghhneghmeng _ .
iwerngaqun _ kepsugh ghllag ghngaaghmi _ neghyaghaak _ .
aghtugh yamikek _ , _ “ _ Ii-hi-hi-hi-hii _ , _ kepsugh unga _ .
taawa _ uunghiitaghtughqaghpenga _ , _ iluuy _ . _ ”
“ _ uunghiitaghtugh naqe aqe luten _ sa aqe ziin _ uunghagh ite aghte a _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ aghsaghte ma kanga _ .
“ _ yeghlegi llu _ weni _ kepe yu ma unga _ , _ ” _ Yugwem _ sagnegh squghhagh k _ tuunumaagkenka _ pi a _ .
mekelghiigh m _ tugu lukek _ qamagte luku _ imagh a _ kanagh a _ qanegh minun _ .
aane te luki _ sagnegh t _ itegh uq _ .
iiwen _ ingaghte aqe uq _ mekelghiigh _ ilughagh n _ taku a _ .
kii _ , _ enraq _ qinuyug a _ qemqaghwaaghaa _ asute na lutek _ .
“ _ liisimake kevnga _ nulighh ite ngugh u nga _ , _ naten _ pi na luten _ pi ziin _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ .
“ _ kitum i _ uunghiitagh ngllagh aten _ ?
nulighh ite yagh kuvek _ avangite nayagh uten _ .
whaa _ nuliigh lgu uten _ esghaghhu _ , _ ” _ ilughagh n _ pi a _ .
Qavaghtesneghitngwaaghaa _ mekelghiigh _ ilughwaan _ .
qenwat _ qavagh ste naqe nghite te yatni _ aane luni _ tespikavek _ taglagh laatagh uq _ mekelghiigh _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh aghte te laatagh aa _ .
“ _ sa laatagh aten _ ? _ ” _ aghnagh m _ aapte a _ .
“ _ elngaatall _ qinuyugte aanga _ qavagh ste nghite aanga _ ilughagh ma _ asunaluni _ , _ asute na lutung _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ ungipaate a _ .
“ _ legan _ atghagh luten _ whavek _ kayagte gu _ tagligh sqe gu _ , _ ” _ aghnagh m _ kayagte a _ .
mekelghiigh _ atghagh uq _ .
itegh yan _ ilughwaan _ pi laatagh aa _ .
“ _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ kii _ sullevneghhaleg _ .
enta _ pikavek _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh a _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ tagligh sqe a _ .
“ _ ii _ , _ nutem qun _ peqliqutaaqaghpenga _ pi leg ghllag u ghngaaghpek _ , _ ” _ yugwem _ pi a _ .
pilugug ragkiigh luni _ aga _ taglinaamaghmi _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ qilughwaagh t _ qelpegh te a _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ aghnagh _ pi nigh _ kaki iqe uq _ taawa _ .
Yugwem _ ingaghhunnaqutkesaqminigu _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ piiqsaghanguq _ , _ “ _ Qinuyugtaghpenga _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ , _ ingaghte luten _ qavagh a _ .
Ingaghfiknaanghitngwaaghamken _ . _ ”
ii _ , _ yugwem _ qinuyug a _ .
pi laatagh aa _ aghnagh m _ , _ “ _ Qinuyugtaghpenga _ ingaghte vike naanghite amken _ naqamallameng _ ugwingighhaqa _ kaana _ nuliighpenisaqan _ ingaghte vike nayagh amken _ .
maaten _ kana _ aavngaaq _ ne mini tuq _ , _ iqite nga uq _ . _ ”
“ _ temngi _ pi uten _ aleghqugh ghllag luku _ nulighqa _ taglagh unga _ .
qavigh sqellug kek _ pi kaqe aqa _ , _ ” _ yugwem _ pi a _ .
“ _ tagi aghten qun _ kelguvikaghllaken _ , _ ” _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ .
nanilghagh gni _ makregsaqminigu _ reghigh uq _ kanavek _ nenglu mun _ .
Esghaghyaqminiki _ kana _ ugwatangani _ ilughwaghhani _ atkuwhaghmineng _ ulig luni _ enmis _ qavagh aqe uq _ .
nuliigh ni llu _ esghagh aa _ ellnginaaftuq _ .
“ _ enta _ sa u lukek _ pi zikek _ allakagh mete uk _ test-kagh nkuk _ .
whangkutung _ allakagh mete ukung _ .
ingaghte ltung _ , _ ” _ yugwem _ sagiqe te a _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh _ talligh akun _ tangyegh akun _ tugu luku _ sayugsiighluku _ lliigh aa _ yugwem _ .
“ _ kii _ , _ yuug _ una _ qinu na pigte ma a _ , _ ” _ aghnagh _ pi uq _ .
nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ aghnagh m _ aate luku _ yuug _ ugwiighhaa _ , _ tuqute a _ .
taagken _ yugusigh a _ mingllite luku _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ tawantuq _ .
taagken _ unaami _ qenwat _ nighugte a _ .
ilughagh ni _ itegh yaghqagh _ mekelghiigh m _ qelanqe a _ .
mulu inagh yan _ qenwat _ aane luni _ qilughwaagh nun _ taglagh uq _ .
legan _ kaa tuq _ whaa _ amig m _ qelpegh te a _ .
“ _ naagu _ ilughagh ghrug ka _ pengeg luku _ qenwat _ esghagh yaghtugh aqe aqa _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ aghnagh _ aapte a _ .
“ _ esgha _ taana ta _ ilughagh n _ , _ ” _ aghnagh m _ keleg u vike a _ , _ “ _ ilughagh ke ken _ legan _ qivghuke yu kuvgu _ qivghuke yaghqaqe ken _ .
qinuyugte yanga _ taawa _ qinukuumaaqa _ .
whanga _ yugu nghite unga _ esgha _ taana _ amiiragh ka _ .
aygugh lleqe unga _ ne mnun _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh kayek _ , _ maani _ kiikaatkagunga _ .
saama _ nanglleg ke luten llu _ aghuliigh vike amken _ whani _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ maligte naqe amken _ kitum qun _ aflengake linga _ .
taawa _ qinuyugte aqe naagh aatnga _ maa nte kuma _ .
elngaatall _ nangllekistekamken _ elpek _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ maligte naqngu kuvnga _ sa meng _ sanqutaaghhaghmeng _ guunniighukaghaghmeng _ avelghagh gpenang _ kelqe lghaaten _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ atghagh luni _ yataaghqe uq _ .
amennguq _ mekelghiigh _ ughluvegh llgagh u uq _ .
ughluvegh ni _ , _ saningughtagh ni _ tugu luki _ taglagh uq _ .
Taam _ aghnagh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ aghiqngwaaghaa _ qayughllak _ atuqe naqe kanga _ .
aghnagh m _ aasaqminigu _ amiiragh _ leganqun _ nanugh ghllag u uq _ .
taawa _ unugmi _ aane lutek _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe uk _ .
esnevagh yamek _ mekelghiigh _ nanugh m _ sigute gmi _ akule gkenkun _ aqume ste luku _ pugwimutaa _ .
Pugwimutaaqegkanga _ , _ pugwimutaaqegkanga _ siku mun _ kaate negh megteni _ uugte lutek _ piyug meng _ lliigh aqe lghiik _ .
igatagh negh megteni _ nanugh ghllag _ unange ni nghmini _ neghsagh meng _ unakengaqelghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ mekelghiigh _ neghe ste luku _ aminaqekagh i _ ellnga n _ qamagte luki _ negh aqe kangi _ .
Tawaaten _ kiyaghtekagh k _ .
tagtalmi _ sikugnitkullaaghllaglutek _ qaallgute a _ nanugh m _ , _ “ _ amenam _ taawa _ meghnugh unga _ .
Meghnutamken _ , _ tuqlugh i naqe unga _ kugwemneng _ paayghesqellutung _ .
imani _ aliigh kata _ kuug _ ’ _ ghenka _ tallugh yug yaqunang _ kakave yaqunang _ .
payegh naketen _ gginagh it _ qukasalegluki _ esghamakluki _ sa naanghite aaten _ tawaaten _ pi kuvek _ . _ ”
nanugh m _ taawa _ vuuslegh t _ uqiigh at _ anigu a _ iigge a _ .
Sugrugwegni _ kanaghte lukek _ tawaavek _ kii _ ugwinighllagaataghluni _ sivugte luni _ igleghte uk _ .
Tazinganiqaaghaq _ tawaatengwaaq _ alla _ pi laatagh uq _ .
pingayut ii ta ani _ tawaaten _ pillghem _ kii _ sivungagh t _ aga _ pengetaagte ghllag aa _ qaprag te ghllag _ aliighte yu gnite uq _ .
“ _ taakwa _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ , _ kugweghma _ taakwa _ payegh ainkung _ .
aatak _ pi sqe lleg mtun _ pi naqe lghaaten _ , _ ” _ nanugh m _ pi a _ .
tughwaagh yalghiimi _ kii _ , _ nanulghuteghllaak _ pangaleg te aqe uq _ .
legan _ mekelghiigh _ taagken _ nanugh m _ saaghw aneng _ aqfaasnaq _ pi sqe llegh atun _ paayghi a _ sumeghtaghamaghmi _ , _ “ _ siingenllu _ tuqu kau lghiinga _ neghigh pigte luku _ . _ ”
kii _ , _ kaat ute te luteng _ mekelghiigh _ quyaksaqmegteggu _ nanugh t _ nagun _ ipa _ sugrug mig aqe aghte litgu _ alunge aghte aqe luku _ .
nayag eng llu _ taana _ kaate luku _ quyaakaat _ .
mekelghiigh _ elngaatall _ nanugh m _ qaye inagh akun _ aygugh uq _ .
ne meggnun _ kaat ute aat _ .
nanugh lghute ghllag nguq _ tamaa _ .
ataasigh igh ngugh _ taawa _ aange pigte uq _ .
itghute aat _ ne meggnun _ mekelghiigh _ .
atkug teng _ mataghqughyaqmegteki _ yugughte uute ut _ .
uglaghyagagh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
Ugwatanganiteftughnguq _ taawani _ nanevgagh ghllag _ sa na nigh ke aq _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ mekelghiigh _ , _ “ _ Ugwikaghqalgunga _ qaga _ .
nagaqugh unga _ ugwikaghqamanguq _ aqelqaghniigh naqe aaten _ , _ tuqute naqe aaten _ nuliighqagh ni _ wayagh naqe ni luku _ .
whaa _ unaminginaq _ legan _ keleg naqe aaten _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ , _ “ _ qayughllak qun _ pi langa _ .
elpek _ nangllekestengiighhaqa _ maligtekaqe kemken _ tuquma te kete na luten _ .
legan _ yugusigh ka _ pegte luku _ ayuqe aqa _ . _ ”
unaami _ qakma _ mayugh ai _ iiyagh itnun _ .
Kelgiyaghtum _ pi a _ , _ “ _ naagu _ mekelghiigh _ tesqamna _ aqelqagh i _ nuliighqiighnaqegkaannguq _ keleg yaghtigh sqe a _ aglagh li nguq _ aaghqutaate naqe a _ .
“ _ aa-a _ , _ aglagh naqe unga nguq _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh aa _ .
mekelghiigh _ pilugug uq _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ ugwategnilnguum _ qaallgute a _ , _ “ _ kameg gka _ ukuk _ aate kek _ qiighnagh ite ngugh k _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ esghaghyaqminikek _ ii _ , _ nanugh m _ ighu ghllag i _ itegaghtu magh meng _ .
“ _ Naka _ whatete ghngaaghma _ pi naqe unga _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ pi magh an _ aane uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ maliglleghaataat _ aghnagh m _ kugwelghutangan _ .
ii _ , _ yug ghllag u uq _ qerngughtaaghvik _ kangllu te ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh ghnaggagh _ tallu i kek _ naflugh mun _ kenle ke lukek _ melqiite ghllag ke ak _ .
Qughsatkughnaaggaaftuq _ uteghpaarkitaghaqeftuq _ .
Elqunevragllagek _ taawa _ saaghw ani _ .
mekelghiigh _ ellnga _ legan _ whateghllugwaaghulghii _ qughsatku ghllag _ kaate yaghtugh luku _ aghuliigh uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ qughsatku ghllag m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ tamaa ke raaghinagh _ nuliighqagh ka _ wayagh ste nghmeng _ pi lunga _ tagsiqligh amken _ .
taawa _ nanghiqaghluki _ wiin _ aghnaa igh naqe ait _ .
enankin _ nanghiigh te aghte lutung _ entaqun _ itagnagh yaghqaa lghiikung _ .
kayaalqe gkuvnga _ taawa _ aghnaa igh lleqe kevnga _ .
aamtaam _ whanga _ kayaalqe gkumken _ paninang _ whanga _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ . _ ”
qughsatku m _ mekelghiigh _ pi a _ , _ “ _ kelenga te i unga _ aangqagh ghhagh mneng _ whaken _ milugh naqe amken _ . _ ”
taagavek _ aglagh qagh luni _ miluyagaghpaghqu yalghiimi _ uka _ aqfayngwaaghyalghiimi _ .
kaate lukek _ elqunevraag k _ talligh mineng _ pategyaqminikek _ uka _ leveklugtu te _ mekelghiigh mun _ tagi stek _ .
“ _ naten qun _ pi langa _ siingenllu _ kayaalqesaghqagh ke kanganga _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ .
Taakwantaaghaghlukek _ paasqamaagkenka _ itegagh mineng _ akiqaghyaqminikek _ elqunevraag k _ pelimnneqegsaghlukek _ kagimtengngwaaghlukek _ .
legan _ kagimleghwaagh ghhagh u lutek _ ifkagh uk _ .
kii _ , _ aga nguq _ iisqamsuwhangunani _ aglagh uq _ ne minun _ mangteghagh minun _ qughsatku ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ kayaalqenniluku _ qughsatku ghllag _ mekelghiigh mun _ elngaatall _ esghapagyaq _ aragh te ghllag uq _ .
aghnagh m _ kugwelghutangi _ ne meggnun _ aglagh ut _ mekelghiigh llu _ taana _ .
itegh yata _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ taawum _ aapte ai _ , _ “ _ Qayughwam _ nateghtu ta k _ ? _ ”
“ _ aangqagh igh ma a _ mekelghiigh m _ umiileg ut _ tazinga _ .
angegh kakek _ kagimte ma uk _ , _ ” _ naligh ita _ kiimsigh aat _ .
“ _ taawa _ yuwhaat _ tea- ma kut _ maalghuwhaghneng _ ighu llgagh at _ , _ inglu u nghite ut _ . _ ”
taakwna nguq _ legan _ me ke a _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ , _ “ _ inglu u nghite ut _ ! _ ”
unaami _ qakma _ keleg laatagh aat _ mekelghiigh _ , _ “ _ Yuwhaghnguq _ esqamna _ aqelqagh ghhagh i _ aglagh li _ aghniighnaqegkaannguq _ este aghagh te naqe a _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ “ _ ahaa _ , _ aglagh naqe unga _ .
natete naqlaatagh a _ este aghagh vig _ . _ ”
nanevgagh m _ ungipaate a _ , _ “ _ este aghagh te naqe aaten _ megh mun _ ayuqe lghii mi _ pennagh mi _ .
Tesaama _ megh m _ teghhanitut _ pi nga yu t _ uyghaaget _ .
ataasigh _ teghiglugwestun _ angka uq _ , _ ila a _ qetgaghwaaghtestun _ , _ enkaam _ pi nga yu aat _ angtaagh ghllag stun _ .
Tazingum _ umiileg m _ taana _ qukaqligh _ megh meng _ aliigh ste aghte aqe a _ palaghhaghmeng _ ayagaghte nghminigu _ tegh ghhagh aneng _ samaken _ . _ ”
nanevgagh _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ nukalpigagh u lunga _ whanga inagh ma _ qukaqligh _ taana _ weni _ ghhataghteghpagaqaqa _ megheng _ .
aatak _ naten _ pi naqe lghaaten _ .
ayapghaatagh gka _ ukuk _ aate kek _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ pi uq _ , _ “ _ yeghlegi llu _ tawaateteghngaaghma _ alla _ pi naqe unga _ . _ ”
taawa _ aglagh laatagh uq _ .
pennagh m _ qagughrugwani _ uteghpaarkitaghaqeftuq _ qughsatku ghnaggagh _ .
Tawaatengwaaq _ pi laatagh aa _ qughsatku m _ , _ “ _ kayaalqe gkuvnga _ aghnaa igh lleqe kevnga _ , _ aamtaam _ whanga _ kayaalqe gkumken _ panineng _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ .
esghapag nga _ tawaten _ pisqelluten _ maghyaghqunnaqamken _ . _ ”
qughsatku _ pennagh neng _ aga _ estu uq _ megh mun _ .
legan _ aga _ naagu _ talugh qagh uq _ .
esghapag te ghllag m _ esghagh aat _ qetgaghtestun _ uyghag _ angka lghii _ aw ligh qagh pigesnagh luni _ aga _ kaleve uq _ .
taawa _ nuug luni _ uugg tuq _ .
“ _ Haa _ , _ elpegngam _ , _ ” _ kayagte a _ mekelghiigh _ .
“ _ giniwan _ whanga _ pi naagh nghite ngugh nge a _ tawaten _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ akite a _ .
iwerngaqun _ asighte luni _ qepe qaghtugh luni _ estu uq _ .
aghveqe te m _ angtale aneng _ samavek _ teghhanun _ kaate qaghte yalghiimi _ taawa _ uyghag t _ pi nga yu t _ .
taana _ maaten _ aligh kaghtekagh a _ qughsatku m _ kefkaghyaqminigu _ imani _ uqegh ngestagh ghhagh u uq _ .
taana _ angenegh ghllag at _ angtaagh ghllag stun _ angka lghii _ aatakqun _ ayagaghsaqminigu _ qule mun _ megh meng _ ghhataghteghllagaa _ .
aghnagh m _ kuug _ ’ _ ghwita _ ukig aghte vike luku _ mayuutnginamaan _ mekelghiigh _ .
taawa _ iisqagh ngunani _ aglaaghaqelghii _ kayaalqe nghatni _ qughsatku _ .
taawa _ ighivgaghyagu _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ qaallgute a _ mekelghiigh _ , _ “ _ unaami _ pi qaghte naqe aaten _ entaqun _ . _ ”
“ _ qayughllak qun _ pi langa _ neghigh pigte luku _ tuqu kau lghiinga _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh _ akuzi laatagh uq _ .
unaami _ qavagh luteng _ aghte yagu _ keleg laatagh aat _ mekelghiigh _ .
“ _ tesqama _ aghnaa igh naqekagh an _ ingum _ aqfa sqe a _ aglagh li nguq _ wawernga tete naqe a nguq _ .
“ _ ahaa _ , _ aglagh naqe unga _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh m _ kiimsigh ai _ .
“ _ taawa _ pi qaghte naqe aaten _ , _ ” _ nanevgagh m _ pi a _ .
“ _ sullevneghhaleg _ atkug ka _ una _ aate naqe i agu _ enta _ qiighnagh lghii _ . _ ”
“ _ yeghlegite lugh u _ , _ itagnagh unga _ tawatete ghngaaghma _ , _ ” _ mekelghiigh _ pi laatagh uq _ .
Ughluvghhani _ yataaghqellug qu _ kelqellug qu _ aglagh uq _ .
kii _ , _ pinqusigh mineng _ pagsinga _ uglagh uq _ imani _ .
taawa _ elngaatall _ nanugh _ uteghpaarkitaghaqeftuq _ saagrukegllagmi _ sangighhiilngughmi _ .
kii _ , _ inglugtun _ yugllaguftuuq _ pagsinga te ghllag _ .
taawa _ kaate luni _ ughluvegh ni _ taana _ yataaghqe a _ mekelghiigh m _ .
“ _ Kingulighpigaguq _ una _ pilqa _ .
kayaalqe qaghtekumken _ taawa _ nuliighqagh ke kegka _ whanga _ , _ nulighqelleqegkegka _ .
Kayaalqellaataquvnga _ sa lunga qun _ pi langa _ , _ ” _ qughsatku m _ pi a _ .
Tawaaten _ pi luku _ mekelghiigh _ ii _ , _ tazingapighqaqaghluni _ qughsatku ghllag _ ugwiinighllagluni _ , _ ugwiinighllagaataqaghluni _ sughugyaqminigu _ uka _ elngaatall _ .
legan _ ulmighte te luku _ utaqalgigh u aghagh a _ mekelghiigh m _ .
liisimake u aqe anga _ angvangha _ reghilnguq _ .
iwerngaqun _ kaate yaghtugh ngestagh luni _ qughsatku _ agitaghte magh mi _ ighighnnaqngan _ angvanghakun _ pitegte a _ .
leganqun _ aaygu a _ aga _ itegh qagh uq _ .
nagnegh yalghiimi _ aga _ sivutmute _ ullghitagh uq _ .
Tuqungwaaghluni _ aghuliigh uq _ .
taawa _ tuqute a _ .
kii _ , _ pinqusighmeggneng _ pagsinga lghiit _ elngaatall _ aragh aat _ .
mekelghiigh nkut _ aghnagh m llu _ kuug _ ’ _ ghi _ aglagh yata _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ aapte ai _ , _ “ _ Qayughwam _ aa _ nateghtu ta k _ ? _ ”
“ _ tuqute ma a _ , _ mekelghiigh m _ tuqute ma a _ .
umiileg igh te ma ukut _ , _ ” _ ungipaate aat _ .
nanevgagh _ akuzi uq _ , _ “ _ Hiik _ , _ taawaa _ maalghuwhaghneng _ ighu llgagh at _ yuwhaat _ inglu u nghite ut _ .
tugumiigh ghhagh it _ guututangit _ suvinaghtu ut _ aqnighnagh ut _ .
sa mig ke nghmegtekut _ ilangani _ malighqugh nghmegtekut _ iye put _ tagitug ughte ste ghllag aqe luki _ aaw meng _ qesitestaqluta _ tawaaten _ aneghtekau unga _ whanga _ anglinghhagh u lunga _ . _ ”
Anagikusighllaguftughnguq _ arekull _ .
ii _ , _ pilugugtugh uq _ nanevgagh _ .
aane luni _ nenglu m _ qaye anun _ mayugh luni _ aragh qu uq _ , _ “ _ nunalgute mni _ maani _ nagate te ngnga _ , _ nagate te ngnga _ .
umiileg igh te ma uute yu ai _ amyuqetaatkestezi _ kagpag ma a _ aqelqagh m _ .
pinighi yu lghii _ pinighi lghaaq _ , _ aklungi igh i yu lghii _ aklungi igh i lghaaq _ .
Sallgughiyulghii _ legan _ iteme uq _ taawa _ .
avangite te usi _ , _ amigighwaaghtengiitusi _ . _ ”
Tawaaten _ akuzi luni _ itegh uq _ .
mekelghiigh _ nangllekistemineng _ nulightugh uq _ .
tagtalmi _ ighnegh nge ma lghiik _ .
naqam _ enraq _ veghute naqutke ghllag aat _ mekelghiigh _ ne anun _ nulighh a llu _ ighneghhallu _ maligte te lukek _ .
enkaam _ qani ma kangit _ sakighagh ita _ aglagh te ma kangit _ .
nanugh t _ yugu luki _ mekelghiigh m _ kiyaghilgutkegkaqegkangi _ .
tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ yugwestun _ ayuqe nigh ke kangit _ .
tefaay _ !
yupig m _ homonym-ngi
uzive a
1 _ . _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ kuyapegagh m _ akeleghraaghanilnguut _ apegh lghii ni _ tea- mete te _ kuyapegagh mun _ uzive aqe ni luku _ .
“ _ Taam _ kuyapegagh m _ uzive a _ aange pigte uq _ . _ ”
2 _ . _ sa u aat _ saam _ uzivenghaki _ .
Yugwem _ manteghani _ uzive a _ .
yupig m _ homonym-ngi
qukagh a
1 _ . _ Yugwem _ qukagh a _ , _ “ _ Yugwem _ qukagh a _ amestaapiguuq _ . _ ”
2 _ . _ Saam _ alngunak _ qukagh a _ .
“ _ tapghagh _ peghte luku _ qukagh a _ nalluniigh naken _ . _ ”
yupig m _ homonym-ngi
qikmighwaagh a
1 _ . _ ayvegh m _ , _ maklag m _ , _ neghsagh m _ neghqwaagh i _ sipsamelnguutlu _ , _ ggayegmelnguutlu _ .
“ _ neghsagh m _ qikmighwaagh a _ whanga _ pi lleqe aqa _ naghaaghute u luku _ , _ ” _ pi a _ naa ni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ .
2 _ . _ naghaaghute t _ ulimaagh t _ qikmigh t _ .
“ _ eight- nghma _ qikmighwaagh a _ naasqwighaghsimaaq _ . _ ”
yupig m _ homonym-ngi
iye a
1 _ . _ Yugwem _ teghig ke sagh m _ , _ saama _ alnunak _ iye leg m _ inlupigaq _ esghaate yu ai _ .
“ _ Uum _ qikmigh m _ iye a _ saa _ ? _ ”
2 _ . _ Iyegaatem _ iye a _ inlupigaq _ .
“ _ Iyegaatma _ iye a _ avituq _ . _ ”
3 _ . _ sikugh m _ ukimalgha _ .
“ _ Uum _ sikugh m _ iye a _ kagpestaagh pigu uq _ . _ ”
sivuqagh m _ ungipagh ai
quutmii t _ ungipagh ait
Sulpik
ungipaghagh t
imlaa ngiighhagh t
Imlaangiighhaas _ tamaakut _ .
Aftanaqmteki _ maana _ tamlu ngiighhagh itgun _ seglluki _ tekegh mnneng _ nayug luki _ .
maana _ ... _ amiiraaghhii _ ghhataghlluki _ .
taagken _ ghhuugh aqe aput _ .
Ghhuunemteki _ legan _ amiiragh i _ ghhatagh aqe ut _ yugusigh meggneng _ .
itegagh ghhagh aneng _ iiggagh ghhagh aneng _ ghhuughwaaghluki _ .
taakut _ ukimallegh i _ qilleghte luki _ naasqwakun _ sevlughakun _ .
Qillaghlluki _ lli aqe aput _ nategh mun _ .
legan _ melqwi _ kiinghaqut _ ggatamaghmeng _ amiiras _ taakut _ yugusigh meggneng _ .
ghhatagh nghata _ qafsina neng _ qavagh qugh luki _ ghhatagh nghata _ itghuiluki _ afta aqe aput _ .
afta luki _ sevlughhwaaneng _ uugken _ qapiqeltaghluki _ naasqwi _ .
uulte magh ita _ .
ighneghwaagh ghhagh i _ estughitneng _ qepughluki _ iigge i llu _ itegagh i llu _ .
Uusluki _ sa ta i _ qaaske aqe luki _ kevigh aqe ait _ .
kevigh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ nategh mun _ ateghte luki _ kinengllaghaqht _ kenlanga _ kinegh llegh itnun _ .
ugtinghagh
Ugtinghas _ tamaakut _ .
alngunak _ ugtinghagh u iqe aput _ amiiragh t _ meqekagh t _ nalighmeng llu _ uygaagh t _ kiighutesnemteki _ melqwi _ meqesigh luki _ tawaten _ ghefsighluki _ ghefsighluki _ ghevenghata _ agaghte luki _ aqlaghsigh luki _ .
aqlagh nghata _ kaki aqe aput _ .
Amiiraghhaas _ tamaakut _ kaki aqe aput _ .
kaki luki _ enkaangam _ ugtinghet _ tamaakut _ uqfiillegam _ qaye i _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe atki _ .
Savighhwaaghluki _ savighhwaaghluki _ whangkuta _ sakmani _ .
Tepenghata _ uqfiillegat _ saghna luki _ .
Qaayghulegenghata _ savighlluki _ savighhenaamaluki _ legan _ unlleghumaghmeng _ kavighte aqe ut _ .
qaayghu meng llu _ saghna luta _ qaayghus _ tamaakut _ savighhwaaghluki _ ugtinghitkaaqaput _ sa kun _ sagnegh u aagh qun _ kavighute t _ tamaakut _ ughtinghitet _ .
sagnegh u aagh qun _ kanaghte luki _ maatnegh lghii mun _ megh mun _ kuuvenemteki _ aga _ kavighqwaaghaqut _ .
Puufsighluki _ tawani _ puuve nghata _ kavighqwaa nghata _ .
meghtuumagh ita _ legan _ tawavek _ amiiragh mun _ kakikagh mnnun _ kuuve aqe aput _ .
kuuve luki _ tawaten _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ .
Itghuugunneghsighaqaputi _ .
ketfagh luki _ tawaten _ iigge mnneng _ elngaata _ mingug te aqe aput _ amiiras _ taakut _ mingug aqe aput _ .
mumigte aqe luki _ minguglluki _ minguglluki _ imeg luki _ lli aqe luki _ itghuugutesqelluki _ .
qafsina t _ qavagh qugh aqe aput _ qafsina neng _ qavagh qugh luki _ tawaten _ esghagh aqe luki _ kavighte ma nghata _ .
kavighte ma nghata _ ugtinghitet _ taakut _ nusug ragh luki _ .
siighnagh m _ kepellghaanun _ kanaghte luki _ .
alla _ atughqagh u uute luki _ saghna aqe aput _ egte igate aput _ .
Enkaangam _ taakut _ ugtinghagh t _ kelaggnemteki _ kehigi _ saafte luki _ .
maana _ aqlagh nghata _ aqlagh ghraag nghata _ mesiigh ghhagh meng _ sa ta i _ aga _ aghighhaqapus _ tamaakut _ ugtinghagh t _ .
gheve naanghite ut _ mesiigh m _ gheve snaanghite ai _ itghuugute neghsigh luki _ pellumghaghaqaput _ ne ngestagh ke aput _ taawa _ ugtinghagh u iqe ukut _ atughqaghqagh ke aput _ .
sukilpagh
Sukilpaghhaas _ tamaakut _ , _ pennagh ani _ , _ anaavag luki _ kii ite u aqe ut _ .
enkaam _ ... _ anaavag luki _ atkugkagh meng _ naate nghmegteki _ atkugkaaghhneghmegteld _ afta aqe ait _ nayug luki _ segge gpenaki _ talligh ghhagh itgun _ nayug luki _ yugusigh ita _ .
Naasqwi _ kepe luki _ nusug luki _ talligh ghhagh itgun _ uusluki _ naate nghmegteki _ atkugkagh u luki _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
qayughllak _ ila i _ qugintagh ghllaget _ .
keligagh luki _ qugaag ii na ai _ tamaakut _ taaqe nghmegteki _ .
neghigh luku _ , _ neghigh luku _ qavngarugllak _ ghhute t _ kiyang _ taghnughhagh nun _ ughhustaqiit _ .
Enkaangam _ tamaakut _ sukilpagh ghhagh t _ kanaghte uute luki _ aghvig aqe ait _ .
kenlanga _ mesiighneghitngwaanghata _ .
maaten _ legan _ meghtu kau lghiikut _ megh kun _ sategtaqnayagaput _ .
Soap-elighluki _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ ukmangighwaaneghmegteki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ sategte nghmeng _ nuvugh luki _ sukilpagh ghhagh m _ amiiragh ghhagh i _ tamaakut _ amighqwaagh igh a _ .
Nuvmghluki _ agaghte aqe ait _ uksugh mi _ aqlagha mi _ elngaatall _ sa ta ngiighhagh i _ .
aghsugh aqe ut _ .
Kiinghaqut _ .
itghute nghmegteki _ tukruugfagilata _ uluwaaghaqiit _ .
Uluwaaghluki _ tawaten _ atkugkagh t _ naate nghmegteki _ seggughaqiit _ .
qafsineg u aqe aat _ imani _ atkug t _ sukilpat _ nalluke anka _ .
Enkaangam _ kaki aqe ait _ .
qaye aneng _ entaqun _ .
maana _ qaye aneng _ melqwaneng _ kaki luki _ .
kaki luki _ naate nghmegteki _ atkug t _ tamaakut _ taaqe nghmegteki _ qikmigh raagh ghhagh meng _ nagnaaqusighluki _ aligh an _ paye i _ puvisaagh igh aqe ait llu _ qikmigh raagh meng _ taghneqegtaa _ maqagh ghllag t _ uqemelengestaaghhaat _ .
ighneghllug
Ighneghlluges _ tamaakut _ ayvegh m _ ighneghllug i _ maklag m _ ighneghllug i _ maklaguugut _ ategh i _ .
ii- u na ghllag i ta _ qilu i _ natangi _ iwerngaqun _ avelghagh luki _ qilu i _ entaqun _ .
saghna aqe ait _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ meqete luki _ taanʼgani _ tawaten _ piighhe aqe ait _ .
pi aghte luki _ taglaate nghatki _ ughugsigh luki _ itghuiluki _ sagnegh kun _ .
ughvugh aqe ait _ qaanmangi _ megh kun _ .
megh meng _ kuuve luki _ imigh luki _ ughvugh aqe ait _ .
Ughvughwaaghluki _ qayugh te a qun _ saaglluki _ ayvegh m _ ighneghllug i _ tamaakut _ .
qaye i _ kdigaghaqiit _ ughvig kun _ .
keligagh luki _ qamagte nghmegteki _ , _ uusluki _ qaye i _ tamaakut _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ keligagh nghmeng _ uusluki _ ilepenghaagh i _ .
Enkaangam _ , _ maana _ uulte naqe nghmegteki _ uyghaggaghmeng _ kanaghte vike luki _ narangunaan _ legan _ uulte aqe ait _ .
Uusluki _ uulte nghmegteki _ enraghngam _ ilepenghaagh i _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
keligagh luki _ tawaten _ taaqe nghmegteki _ sagnegh ghllag kun _ sa kun _ ughvugh aqe ait _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ megh i _ simigh aatagh nghmegteki _ anigu meng _ anigu t _ gheve nagh pigte na iqe ait _ .
anigu meng _ kanaghte vike luki _ ghevngwaanghata _ sivugh qaghaqe luki _ sa aqe luki _ .
Ghevngwaaghwaanghata _ ghhuugh luki _ uksugh mi _ aghsughhnaqneghmegteki _ ini aqe ait _ .
aamtaam _ aghsughhnaqenghinneghmegteki _ kiig mi _ ini aqe ait _ .
ghhuugh luki _ ghhuugh luki _ tawaten _ qamagte luki _ nayemte aqe ait _ .
Nayemlluki _ tawaten _ agaghte aqe ait _ .
agaghte luki _ kiinghwaanghata _ itghuiluki _ seggughluki _ imeg magh ita _ imeg luki _ imeg luki _ taawa _ qamagte aqe ait _ taaqe aqe ait _ .
Aghsughtas _ tamaakut _ uksugh mi _ .
maklagu t _ tamaakut _ keligagh igate ait _ qaye i _ iiggemeggneng _ kumlu meggneng _ qaye i _ ikugh aqe ait _ .
sa u luki _ atighaqsaghet _ estugte aqe ait _ .
estugte luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ elngaatall _ .
maana _ uusiuki _ ilepenghaagh t _ keligagh aqe ait _ .
uksugh mi _ tawaten _ aghsughhneghmegteki _ kanaghlluget _ ategh i _ aghsughtagh u ut _ .
tamaakut _ ighncghllupiget _ igfineghlluget _ aghsughtellghelnguut _ qaligh kaqe ait _ .
Aghsughtas _ tamaakut _ ighneghllug t _ aghsughtekat _ .
aghsughtagh u aqe ut _ ategh i _ kaki nghmegteki _ .
siighnagh
siighnagh t _ tamaakut _ enkaangam _ ayvegh m _ siighni a _ angtughpag m _ aghnasaleg m _ siighni a _ .
amalleqa _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ saghna aqe kangit _ siighni a _ .
kelengake pigte luki _ pilagnayukamegteki _ imanagh lgu nghata _ taglagh nghmegteki _ imani _ nusugiuki _ sagneghpagkun _ niive luki _ .
amalleqa _ ughvughwaaghluki _ ughvugh luki _ maanaaqiit _ .
qaye i _ sivuke luki _ qapigh aqe ait _ savig meng _ .
piig yaqunaki _ pikegken _ iglagaaneng _ kanavek _ qapighhaqiit _ kelengake pigte luki _ .
qapigh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ uusluki _ amalleqa _ keligagh aqe ait _ qaamnangi _ .
keligagh luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ sagneghpagkun _ tamaagun _ kanaghte luki _ ughvughwaaghaqiit _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ megh i _ simigh aqe luki _ , _ tawaten _ upenghagh mi _ siighni a _ nekegte yagh te aqe ut _ .
anigu meng _ me ligh aqe luki _ .
anigu t _ gheve nagh pigte na iqe ait _ .
tawaten _ amalleqa _ ila i _ aqeftaghaghqaaluki _ pi nghmegteki _ aghsughtagh ke ait _ .
elngaatall _ siighnas _ tamaakut _ kagpag sigh ghllag u ut _ atugh kaqsagh ait _ .
neqe mun _ , _ aqeftaghaghamun _ unatapsugmun _ saguyagh m _ sii anun _ siighnagh t _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
akitu pigte ut _ maani _ elngaatall _ .
Aghnasallghiinaam _ angtughpag m _ siighni a _ saghna aqe ait _ .
amalleqa _ ghevngwaanghata _ ghevngwaanghata _ ghhuugh luki _ .
ghhuu ghllag luki _ elngaatall _ ila i _ aange pigte aqe ut _ .
ghhuugh luki _ inillghaatagh ke te _ agaghte uute aqe ait _ pakregnegh akun _ .
kuug igh neghtu uute aqe ut _ kiinghaqiis _ tawaten _ .
kiig mi _ sivungagh mi
kiig nghagu _ , _ sivuke luteng _ kiiw t _ pinagh uute aqe ut _ .
nani _ tanqigh mi _ entaqun _ may- mi _ , _ nalighmeng _ June-mi _ taakwani _ .
anigu _ ughug nghaani _ , _ piite te siigh at _ nunivagseghagh t _ piitquutaqut _ .
Enkaangam _ qawaag t _ ighni laghate te aqe ut _ .
manig yagh te aqe ut _ tawani _ tanqigh ani _ June-nem _ , _ alpa m _ manig aneng _ .
Enkaangam _ nunivagseghagh t _ piitquunneghani _ , _ aghulaghqugh te aqe ut _ aghnagh t _ , _ nunivag yagh te aqe ut _ .
akmagutagh ghhagh teng _ imightuutaqht _ .
Ququngaghmeng _ saghna aqe ut _ , _ angukagh meng llu _ .
neghigh luku _ taagani _ , _ kiyang _ neghsapig meng _ nayug aqe ut _ nunivaataghqameng _ .
nayug luki _ kinegh nghata _ aghi ste luki _ uspeqe aqe ait _ yataaghqe aqe ait _ .
Enkaangam _ awataghpag t _ kinegh nghata _ taakut _ yataaghqelluki _ .
sivuke luki _ itegagh i _ imigh aqe ait _ ququngaghmeng _ .
taagken _ ququngaghmeng _ imigh luki _ , _ navek _ qalqasigh an _ asi anun _ .
tawaten _ melqwi _ qamaninganilluki _ nunivag meng _ kevigh aqe ait _ , _ kenlanga _ iiggaghhillu _ taakut _ imigh luki _ ququngaghmeng _ .
nunivag meng _ imigh luki _ ilangakun _ nunivagtu negh meggni _ , _ iwerngaqun _ pikavek _ , _ esleqe aqe ait _ .
nunivag t _ nuughnaqenghata _ ququngaghmeng _ imigh aqe ait _ .
qilleghte luki _ teptaaqeluki _ ( _ teptaaqe aqe ait _ ) _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ , _ saayguraagh m _ qaye anun _ qaake aqe ait _ , _ nalighmeng _ siqluwam _ qaye anun _ .
uksaagh mi _ taakwani _ nalighmeng _ uksugh mi _ taakwani _ mumigte ghesnagh aqe luki _ uksutestaqiit _ .
Enkaangam _ ila a _ saghna aqe lghiit _ .
siklagh niigh aqe ut _ aghnagh t _ tangighkagh meng _ , _ qullikagh meng _ , _ akughagh meng _ , _ uqfigagh meng _ , _ saqlag meng _ , _ saghna aqe ut _ .
siighnagh m _ kepellegh anun _ kanaghte luki _ navek _ aqlaghalighanun _ mingllite aqe ait _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwani _ tangigh ste aqe luki _ , _ unangenghata _ nutaghagh kun _ , _ kemekrag kun _ uqugh ke te _ .
Enkaangam _ yuges _ tamaakut _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ , _ quugkagh meng _ quugsaghtugh aqe luteng _ , _ siimghu meng _ qupugh aqe luteng _ quug meng _ , _ tagite uute aqe ait _ mangteghagh meggnun _ .
uksugh mi _ quugkagh u luki _ nalighmeng _ mayughti aqe ut _ unaghsigh meng _ .
uksugh mun _ quugkagh meng _ .
amalleqa _ , _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ pinighsagh aqe ait _ mangteghagh teng _ mat- qaghte yagh aqe ait _ .
sa u a _ neqesghaghqagh _ , _ neqesghagh ightugh aqe luteng _ .
sa aqe luteng _ yataaghqe aqe ut _ uksugh mun _ .
qawaagniigh aqe ut _ ngelqaaghaghmeng _ , _ leghllegh meng _ .
Leghlleghes _ tamaakut _ ghhiitagh luki _ agaghte aqe ait _ ulpegte luki _ .
Ngelqaaghaat _ tamaakut _ ilangakun _ ghhiitagh luki _ akmagutagh gnun _ kanaghte uute aqe ait _ , _ uksugh mun _ neqekaghqagh t _ ( _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ ) _ .
Enkaangam _ nani _ taakwani _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ igaghyagh uute aqe ut _ taghnughhagh put _ .
igagh te aqe ut _ uksulqusigh _ holiday-neghagu _ taaqe luteng _ holiday-luteng _ alla _ piinligh luteng _ igagh te aqe ut _ uksulqusigh _ , _ kenlanga _ upenghagh mun _ .
upenghagh mi _ taaqe uute yaghagh aqe ut _ qayughllak _ samavek _ pugughilegh mun _ angyagh yagh uute aqe ut _ .
aghvegh niigh yagh te aqe ut _ .
pilaataqu negh meggni _ maalghug _ , _ pi nga yu t _ , _ estamat _ , _ unake aqe ait _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluni _ allute luni _ yuug _ , _ mekelghiigh _ , _ teve uute aqe uq _ .
pilag yagh te aqe uq _ .
pilag aqe ait _ aghvegh ghllag t _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ nengighqe aqe luki _ .
inpite qugh aqe luteng _ .
Enkaangam _ aghveghni ii aagh _ taaqenghani _ enrak _ angyaghte qu uute aqe ut
upenghagh mi _ ayvegh meng _ , _ maklag meng _ , _ teghiglug meng _ , _ neghsagh meng _ neqekaghqagh meng _ .
Siqluwalwaaqsaghtut _ .
Siqluwalwaaqsaghtukut _ , _ maaten _ siqluwapagiisimaaq _ .
qantaghtugh luki _ , _ pinitun _ kagpag luki _ , _ nutaghagh u luki _ , _ kumlasighvig meggnun _ kanaghte uute aqe ait _ .
Enkaangam _ neqe _ legan _ aklukaghte gpenaan _ .
unange ni uq _ itaghnanghani _ , _ pinigh nghaani _ , _ unangsaghwaallghat _ neqemeng _ legan _ kagpag ghllag aqe ut _ .
Siqluwalguluta _ neqe _ manguna _ tamaa na _ tuugte qugh luku _ .
Siqluwat _ ukmangighwaaghluki _ , _ kanaghte uute aqe yagh ait _ .
neqekaghqagh u luki llu _ .
qikmigh mun llu _ neghqutkagh u luki _ .
amalleqa _ maana _ ... _ amiqenghata _ aghnasinghaghmeng _ amigh kau iqe ut _ .
ayvegh t _ aghnasaleg t _ amiiqagh u iqe ait _ .
amu iqe i luki _ , _ uqiigh luki _ , _ upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ amighkagh lug kun _ angyagh m _ amighkagh lug akun _ qantagh luki _ meqesigh aqe ait _ .
Meqenghata _ esneli luki _ aghnagh t _ kiigtagh ke ait _ .
Taaqenghatki _ niightugh aqe ait _ yug t _ kinegh llegh itnun _ kenlanga _ .
kinegh nghata _ maana _ , _ imeg luki _ , _ navek _ lli aqe ait _ , _ maanasqelluki _ atughqagh ke kangit _ .
ilangakun _ entaqun _ ayumiqullegh _ wiin _ amigh te gpenaki _ kiyaghute aqe ait _ .
Enkaangam _ amiiqas _ tamaakut _ enrak _ tanpegh at _ megh mun _ ateghte luki _ aghisigh aqe ait _ kellii mi _ .
aghisigh luki _ aghi nghata _ aghnagh t _ piighhe aqe ut _ ivalu meng _ , _ aghveqinghaghmeng _ .
pi aghte luteng _ tawaten _ asisighqameng _ sivuyag anun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ , _ kingu anun _ pi kaghqagh meng _ .
pi aghte luteng _ naate nghmegteki _ qiipagh t _ tamaakut _ aghisigh luki _ sa meng _ uqigtuqagh meng _ uyghaghmeng _ nalighmeng _ sa meng _ iqugikun _ kanagun _ uyghigh luki _ agaghte luki _ pikavek _ sa kun _ pikagun _ agaghte luki _ nengesigh aqe ait _ .
Nengenghata _ taawa _ amu iqe i naqe negh meggni _ atugh aqe ait _ .
aghnagh t _ qafsinʼguluteng _ , _ kaki aqe ait _ angyagh t _ .
maana _ .... _ asiigh ke ut llu _ uugnangillu _ kingu i llu _ kakilaghaqiit _ .
nalluke anka _ naten _ pilag llegh i _ .
tawaten _ iwernga _ amu iqe ait _ .
taaqe nghmegteki _ kuvighluki _ piineqe aqe ait _ , _ taawa _ lli aqe ait _ .
apeghiigh nghmegteki _ , _ atughqagh u luki _ angyas _ tamaakut _ angyapig t _ upenghagh mun _ .
kiig mi _ maaken _ savikenghaagh meng _ angyagh ke luteng _ upenghagh mi _ angyaghtugh aqe ut _ .
kiig mi llu _ navek _ pinegh meggni _ angyaqaqiis _ tamaakut _ .
kiig mi _ enraq _ amalleqa _ nunaagh meggnun _ pi laghate aqe ut _ .
unangniigh na luteng _ , _ iqallug niigh na luteng _ , _ iigge na luteng _ , _ aki ughtekanga _ maaten _ tugutlug llu _ , _ artifact-llu _ specimen-a _ .
naalkuteqaghte negh meggni _ elngaatall _ akivagsitkaqiit _ tukfightughtet _ aglagh nghata _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ sa mun _ akituqagh mun _ .
ullghitagh mun _ sa mun _ allgegh sigh ke aqe ait _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyang _ uksaaqestagh nghaani _ iigge aqe ut _ elngaatall _ .
qawaagniigh magh meng _ .
uksaagh mi _ mughute magh meng _ .
uqlighsagh magh meng _ , _ unange negh meggni _ amiiragh it _ saghna luki _ aki ngllagh aqe ait _ .
Neqangis _ tamaakut _ ilangakun _ neqetu negh meggni _ agaghte luki _ aqlaghsigh aqe ait _ .
nutaghagh yug negh meggni _ nutaghagh u luki _ gaagh aqe ait _ .
taana _ elngaatall _ megnu nagh pigte yagh uq _ .
awaligh uute aqe luteng _ ava ite ngugh nun _ ne nun _ .
awalightugh aqe luki _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ neqe _ quunpeng _ ila meggnun _ tuune luku _ ayuqaqsaghaghput _ yupiggaghni _ whangkuta _ .
laluramke t _ pillghitni _ share-eluku _ yug lgute mnun _ ava ite ngugh nun _ .
neqe pig
afta luki _ neghsagh t _ unangenghata _ , _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ ... _ ugkelli luki _ , _ megh t _ taghyugh ligh luki _ , _ ilangakun _ aghipsaate luki _ , _ ilangakun _ kiteghqelluki _ depends _ on _ naten _ piyuke llegh stun _ .
enkaam _ ayvegh t llu _ tawaten _ pi aqe aput _ , _ maana _ nutaghagh u luki _ maana _ ugkelli luki _ manguna t _ , _ kemekrag ligh luki _ .
qilu i _ ughvugh luki _ uusluki _ , _ ilangakun _ ighsaqugh t llu _ gaagh aqe aput _ .
aghipsaate luki _ piyunemteki _ kiteghqellukillu _ .
uuk _ , _ maana _ ilangakun _ neghsagh t _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ aqlagh nghata _ ama _ gaagh aqe aput _ , _ neghsatiu _ tamaakut _ .
inglu t _ legan _ agaghte aqe ke put _ aqliisqelluki _ .
aa-a _ , _ taawa _ .
neqekrangllagh
sivuke luku _ mash _ bowl-kun _ , _ qayuusigh _ maatneghraag _ kuuve luku _ , _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ sakarameng _ , _ angurghaallukek _ sakara _ .
kuuve nakegken _ maalghug _ package-k _ yeast-ak _ tawavek _ maatneghraag mun _ megh mun _ .
qallaqugh neghsigh ma luku _ , _ palaqaniiluku _ qayuusigh meng _ sakara _ sagnegh mun _ tawavek _ kuuve luku _ .
para meng _ tawaten _ pi nga yu t _ pengughughlluki _ alquutaghpaget _ tawavek _ ilate naken _ sakaramun _ .
enkaam _ maalghug _ alquutagh ngestagh k _ taghyugh meng _ .
maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ uguqnaghllagmeng _ megh meng _ kuuve nakegken _ tawavek _ para mun _ , _ parankugnun _ sakarankugnun _ kenlanga _ para _ ughug llegh anun _ .
ughug kan _ enkaangam _ angurghaalluku _ , _ ilate naken _ maalghug _ qayuusigh k _ mamagh meng _ , _ fresh _ milk- meng _ nalighmeng _ dry _ milk _ mamagh ngllagh qagh luku _ .
taake uk llu _ maalghug _ manig k _ , _ ilate lukek _ tawavek _ angurghaallukek _ , _ yeast-allu _ ilate luku _ .
enkaam _ elngaatall _ nunmaawhaq _ avlawa ligh luku _ eggbeater-elgukuvek _ nalighmeng _ electric _ beater-elgukuvek _ .
Nunmaawhaq _ avlawa ligh magh an _ angurghaannaken _ , _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
aghtugh yagute kan _ electric _ beater-meng _ , _ iigge gpeneng _ taana _ akuute naken _ .
avlawa _ ilate naken _ tawavek _ akuutagh mun _ kenlanga _ igughte llegh anun _ .
igughtekan _ tawani _ sagnegh mi _ mesiigh ligh luku _ taana _ akuute an _ ghhuughsigh naken _ saape luku _ sangighqugh sigh meng _ vegllumeng _ kenlanga _ ghhuu llegh anun _ .
ghhuugh kan _ enkaangam _ gaagh naken _ mesiigh kun _ .
tawaten _ mesiighquute tke aat _ neqekrangllagh t _ kenlanga _ qamagte llegh gpeneng _ taana _ akuute aq _ .
mangteghapig
neghigh luku _ mangteghapiggaaluta _ mangteghapig put _ efluugalget _ nategh leg t _ angyagh m _ amu iqe yagh ka aneng _ ategh i _ vuvegh t _ .
Enkaangam _ mingle t llu _ quyngigh m _ amiiragh i _ , _ sangwat _ allighaghqagh t _ , _ aagra t _ .
iwhani _ taakut llu _ , _ maana _ , _ sangaawatii _ , _ puygaanka _ ima _ ( _ suugernge t _ ) _ .
tawaten _ engkaangam _ , _ nanigh lightugh luteng _ nanigh m _ puyuqerugaqegkangi _ puyuqe aqe kangi _ entaqun _ .
maana _ aagra ten _ tamaakut _ tanughqe aqe kangit _ .
Tanughqelluki _ maanaaqluki _ sa meng _ iwhani aqe luki _ ( _ sategte luki _ sallegte aqe kangit _ ) _ .
Engkaangam _ aqlaghaghraagmi _ qateghraketun _ kinegh na iqe kangit _ supelgaghluteng _ vuvegh teng _ tamaakut _ .
ama _ tanughqengngwaaghaqegkangit _ .
neghigh luku _ ila it _ nekegte ghllag na iqe kangit _ legan _ whangkutestun _ maaten _ nekegsaghwaaghaqelghiit _ .
temkagh ak
sivuke luki _ nazighagh at _ temkag ngllagh aqe aput _ .
maana _ qafsina t _ pi nga yu t _ estamat _ angtale akun _ amiiragh m _ .
Enkaangam _ sivuke luki _ aftanemteki _ aghvig aqe aput _ amiiragh t _ elngaatall _ ukmangighsaghwaaghluki _ , _ mesiighiitngwaaghluki _ .
maana _ kiig mi _ aane ste luki _ , _ sa kun _ tefte luki _ nalighmeng _ clothesline-kun _ , _ melqwi _ kinegh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ niightughaqhiki _ .
uksugh mi _ anigu kun _ tuute aqe aput _ .
tuute luki _ ufsug luki _ niightugh aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ enkaangam _ ( _ niighigh luki _ esne igh luki _ pellug aqe aput _ ) _ pellug luki _ , _ pellughiki _ , _ pi nga yu t _ , _ estamat _ nalighmeng _ pellughiki _ aghvig luki _ aane ste luki _ .
maana _ upenghagh mi _ qafsina neng _ qavagh ste luki _ itghute luki _ aqlagh ma nghata _ ulug aqe aput _ .
kinegh nghata _ nenge qagh luki _ pellug meng _ taawa _ liighqelluki _ temkagh u luki _ kaki aqe aput _ .
amiiragh t _ , _ maalghut _ ighu ke luki _ ataasigh _ naalkakluku _ .
Enkaangam _ maaten _ zipper-elighluki _ ughfigi _ paagkut _ ( _ paagna i _ ) _ qiipaghaghhaglimeng _ iwhani luki _ kakivike luki _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe ait _ ( _ nungighsighaqaput _ ) _ .
kaankut llu _ tukughagh i _ enkaangam _ nungighsigliluki _ maana _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ ulima aqe aput _ temkagh at _ .
Ilepghaaghet
Qulliget _ maakut _ ilepghaaghet _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ ulima aqe ke put _ .
amigh t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ entaqun _ sa u luki _ atigh aqe atki _ , _ yearling-et _ .
tamaaken _ ilepghaangllaghaqut _ .
maana _ aghu iqe luki _ sa ta i _ aghiqngwaaghluki _ .
imeg luki _ lli luki _ yukutaghraaggneghata _ petlugaqiit _ .
pellug luki _ pellug luki _ yukutaqluki _ imeg luki _ lli luki _ , _ itghuugute nghata _ ketfagh luki _ ulug aqe ait _ elngaatall _ ulug luki _ esne i _ maana _ tukegh aqe ait _ , _ nengte aqe ait _ , _ unite te lugh u i aghagh aqe ut _ tukegh nghmegteki _ .
tawaten _ lli luki _ ketfagh aqe luki _ ulug aqe luki _ kenlanga _ unite te lugh u i aghagh llegh itnun _ .
unite te lugh u i aghagh nghata _ taawa _ kavighvaagmeng _ kavighte aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tea- ma uten _ kaviigh igh yagh te lghiikut _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ qaye akun _ mesiigh ghhagh meng _ mesiighqelluki _ ( _ angighhe aqe ait _ ) _ .
Maananayukata _ kavighyaag i _ gheve na yu kata _ ( _ ifkagh na yu kata _ ) _ .
tawaten _ ulug aqe luki _ taaqe nghmegteki _ lliighqagh ke ait _ ilepghaaghet _ .
Lliighqellghiit _ nallukekanighanka _ .
iwernga _ tawaten _ entaqun _ tuungghughlluteng _ ayuqe ut _ temkaastun _ .
tawaten _ tukughagh i llu _ kaankut _ , _ qukagh i llu _ esnelaagusighluki _ qiipaghaghhaghmeag _ nungighsighaqiit _ .
Ilepghaaghes _ tamaakut _ temkaam _ ilu akun _ melqwi _ qamanlluki _ kemegmigllug ke i _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
kameg
amalleqa _ tamaakut _ neghsagh t _ amiiragh t _ , _ kamegmim _ atuqnaqnemteki _ , _ neghsapig t _ unʼgavek _ mughuniighmun _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
qazigyagh t _ quyillegtagh u aqe ut _ .
ategh it _ quiyillegtat _ .
qazigyagh meng _ ulima aqe aput
Enkaangam _ , _ neghsapig t llu _ qazigyagh t llu _ .
Enkaangam _ amalleqa _ neghsapig t _ tamaakut _ amiiragh t _ qigugh luki _ , _ melqighat _ atigh kau luteng _ .
Melqighas _ tamaakut _ amalleqa _ mughunniigh mun _ atugh aqe ut _ kameg t _ .
Sangaawatii _ ategh it _ , _ akughvigawaaqut _ .
kelulighagh ke aput _ maalghug gneng _ megh mun _ itegh yaghqaa fqiita _ ( _ taape yaghqaa fqiita _ ) _ .
Enkaangam _ melqighas _ tamaakut _ ama _ iwhani u aqe ut _ ipigkingwaagh u aqe ut _ .
ipigkingwaagh mun _ kaamwaagh ke ut _ ipigkingwaagh at _ takestaaghhagh t _ tukughagh mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ ipigkingwaagh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
Enkaangam _ kaamges _ tamaakut _ uygaagh meng _ uygu aqe aput _ .
paagna i _ kaleftaghluki _ nungightelighluteng _ ( _ nungightelighluki _ ) _ .
Enkaangam _ singig ligh aqe aput _ ama _ uygaagh meng _ singigh ghqusigh luki _ .
Quyillegtas _ tamaakut _ singigh ghqusigh aqe aput _ ugtinghaghmeng _ .
nalighmeng _ melqighaghmeng _ .
ilangakun _ melqighaas _ tamaakut _ ( _ ilu i _ ) _ qaamnangi _ eslalighneqluki _ .
Enkaangam _ , _ melqighaas _ tamaakut _ akughvigagh ngllagh aqe aput _ .
upenghagh mi _ anyaghtumi _ atuqe aqe ait _ kaamges _ tamaakut _ .
tawaten _ legan _ uygiinghagh meng _ uygu luki _ nungighsighluki _ maalghug gneng _ kelulighagh ke aput _ .
maana _ megh mun _ itegh yaghqaa fqiita _ ( _ taape yaghqaa fqiita _ ) _ .
Enkaangam _ ipigkingwaaghes _ tamaakut _ ama _ melqighaawaqut _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kaame kaqe kangit _ .
maana _ ipigkestaghhaaluki _ ipigkingwaagh t _ ategh it _ .
uygiinghagh meng _ uygu luki _ , _ singigh luki _ , _ uygiinghagh meng llu _ .
maklag m _ amiiragh aneng _ natigh aqe aput _ egte luki _ .
Enkaangam _ ila i _ kameg m _ ratamyaag t _ .
ategh it _ ratamyaag u aqe ut _ .
kiig mi _ kameraagh ighllug qu _ atuqe aqe kangit _ .
taape neghllug t _ piyug mi _ megh mi _ .
aghinagh mi _ atugh aqe kangit _ .
iwhani _ kameg t _ atugh t _ mughunniigh mun _ angyaghtugh sigh mun _ atugh t _ .
melqugh igh aat _ kameg ngllaghkagh t _ melqighaas _ tamaakut _ qigugh luki _ akughvigagh ke aqe kangit _ .
Akughvigas _ tamaakut _ taaqe nghatki _ atugh nghmeng _ uusluki _ sa ta igh aghte llegh igh a _ qigugh llegh an _ ilaagh luki _ .
kelu ligh luki _ maalghug gneng _ mesiighqelluki _ taape neghllugte yagh luki _ natigh aqe ait _ tamaaken _ melqiighaghmeng _ singighte luki _ .
enkaam _ kiig mi _ atuqe aqe ait _ piyug mun _ .
quyngighniigh negh meggni _ atuqe aqe ait _ ivagh i yagh te negh meggni _ .
uksaagh mi _ esnighqwataanneghmeggni _ sa mun _ legan _ atuqe aqe ait _ enkaangam _ .
sanaghte a
kamegkagh t _ amiiragh t _ .
quyillegtaghqagh t _ kamegkagh t _ .

kinegh nghata _ sa ta i _ aghu iqe luki _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ yuqutaghtesqelluki _ .

nazighagh at _ sanaghhnemteki _ pellug luki _ aghvig luki _ esla kun _ agaghte uute luki _ .

neghsapig t _ .
pellug luki _ sa ta i _ pellug luki _ taaqnemteki _ tanughqelluki _ .
melqugh igh ai _ ama _ sa ta i _ imeg luki _ lli aqe aput _ yuqutaghtesqelluki _ .
