uygaagh
Enkaangam _ uygaaghqas _ tamaakut _ .
neghsagh t _ nayug luki _ afta aqe aput _ .
nayug luki _ , _ amiiiii _ yugusigh aneng _ iiknemteki _ uusluki _ uqiigh aqe aput _ .
uqiigh luki _ taagken _ itegagh i _ iixi _ tawanlluki _ sagnegh mun _ kanaghte aqe aput _ .
Taaqnemteki _ uqiigh nghmeng _ uqugh aneng _ saape aqe aput _ taakut _ uygaaghqagh t _ nayugkagh put _ .
Enkaangam _ navek _ lli aqe aput _ maatnegh ghraag llegh mun _ meqesigh aqe aput _ .
meqesigh luki _ meqenghata _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ kelenga kaqe aput _ .
Meqenghata _ meqete luki _ sivugh sigh ngllagh aqe ukut _ unaghsigh meng _ .
Maalghut _ unaghsigh t _ sivugh sigh ke aqe aput _ .
maalghug u luta _ aghnagh ni _ sivugh aqe aput _ mesughllug i _ .
mesughllug i _ sivughwaaghluki _ taagken _ ughvugh luki _ .
ughvugh luki _ taagken _ soap-elighluki _ mehghluki _ lli iqe aput _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ tawaten _ kenlangangwaallghit _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ qiipe aqe luki _ qipugh luki _ qipugh luki _ megh i _ simigh aqe luki _ .
ilangakun _ anigu meng _ taakut _ kevigh aqe aput _ ghhute t _ .
Enkaangam _ ... _ ughug negh meggni _ ughsighaqut _ tamaakut _ uygaagh at _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ tawaten _ sivugh aqe luki _ qipugh aqe luki _ kenlanga _ ghevngwaanghata _ suugh te nanigh nghata _ megh i _ .
taagken _ suugh te nanigh nghata _ suggellghelguut _ tamaakut _ uygaagh at _ kaki aqe aput _ .
itegagh i _ sivuke luki _ ghefeighnaqnemteki _ kepugh aqe aput _ iigge i llu _ .
enkaam _ ghefsineghmeng _ taaqnemteki _ itegagh i _ taakut _ kakilaghaqaput _ .
iigge an llu _ , _ aa _ , _ itegagh an llu _ ukimallghelgellghiit _ .
Kakilaghluki _ uyaqugh t llu _ pikegkut _ naasqwi _ kepellegh m _ kakilaghaqaput _ .
Kakilaghluki _ qaamkungitneng _ qaamkunganeng _ uygaaghqagh m _ taam _ .
Kakilaghluki _ ukimallghelgimayukata _ yuvghiighwaaghluki _ .
kaki sigh m _ qiipanghutaghhaaneng _ ghuuqusighluki _ ghuughaqaput _ .
kenlanga _ tamaakut _ awataghpag t _ uygaagh t _ .
Ghhuughwaaghluki _ aane te luki _ kumlasighaqaput _ .
kumlate te nghata _ uugnangi _ uyaqughhi _ ukut _ kelaghlluki _ kaki llegh it _ unaghsigh kun _ sa kun _ qengagh m _ unaghsigh akun _ nuuve te luki _ .
tuquuqagh te aqe aput _ nalighmeng _ asighte luki _ .
uksugh mi _ anuqam _ suupe aqe ai _ tawantaqut _ aqlagha mi _ uksugh mi _ .
tanqigh _ sa u a _ atughaqaghput _ .
taagken _ suupngwaanghata _ saye akun _ asitmun _ pilag luki _ talliighiitgun _ tapghagh mun _ nuuve luki _ .
ilangakun _ inillghaatagh ke te _ inglugtun _ qilleghte uute aqe ait _ .
tawani _ kiinghwaaghtestaqaput _ .
suupe u aghte ste aqe aput _ .
seggekagh t _ uygaagh t _ amiiragh t _ seggekagh t _ uvghiinemteki _ ghefsighluki _ tawaten _ .
Ghevngwaanghata _ amiiragh m _ niightuute ka qun _ niightugh luki _ aywaa n _ tungangakun _ tungatgun _ lli aqe aput _ nalighmeng _ mangteghagh m _ sani akun _ .
sivuqagh m _ UNGIIPAA
Akulkim _ apegh llegh a
Akuwaaq _ qaye ii lleghte aqngamta _ , _ taamum _ ila yan _ ategh i _ liite aput _ .
kinku u ta i _ taamani _ kiyaghtekagh t _ ayumigh _ liite aput _ .
ukut _ igagh t _ pillghitni _ , _ ayumirugllaak _ sa u a _ 11,000 _ ayumiqullegh _ , _ uukna _ alaska _ salin _ ugpeqe llegh meggni _ qute u luku _ pamavek _ .
sivuligh t _ kiyaghtekagh t _ , _ ukani _ alaska- mi _ , _ kiyaghtekau lghiit _ esne mi llu _ , _ qungevagh ni llu _ pagani _ .
iqallug meng _ , _ teghig ke te yameng _ neqekluteng _ .
Scientist-tet _ ugpeqe llegh itni _ Onion _ Portage-enʼnguq _ 10,500 _ uksughtu tke aagh _ .
ayumightagh ghllag u uq _ .
whani _ igagh ni _ whaa _ ila i llu _ ategh i _ :
Tangle _ Lake _ , _ Healy _ Lake _ , _ taana llu _ kukuleg _ , _ maanlenguq _ qiighqagh mi _ , _ taawanginaq _ kiwanlenguq _ sivungagh mi _ .
taana ta _ Geist-am _ , _ archeologist-em _ , _ University-nganun _ Alaska-m _ , _ iigfikegkaa _ mangteghagh ngllagh luteng _ aange lghii meng _ .
qepghaqagh u uq _ tawani _ uglagh lghii _ ayumiqullegh _ .
Iiglluteng _ liigikekagh at _ yug t _ kiyaghtekau ni luki _ 10,000 _ ayumiqullegh _ .
Entagun _ 100 _ years-ngughtuq _ paaghqagh ite u te mineng _ .
ipa u uq _ whanga mni llu _ .
Taam _ kukuleg m _ angtalnga _ apegh ma kangat _ ; _ 800 _ feet _ tagtalnga _ , _ 140 _ feet _ iqetulnga _ .
tawaten _ angka ni luku _ apeghkagh at _ .
asivagh nun _ samavek _ laag ke aat _ esghagh na luku _ naten _ aghyuqaghtulnga _ .
Nalkusaaqat _ elngaatall _ tawani _ .
Maatemeng _ kenlanga _ tazimavek _ , _ 200 _ ayumiqullegh _ .
ila i _ naalkutaagh it _ liigike nayagh anka _ nateghtu langi _ , _ naken _ tagi kau ta i _ .
mayughwaagh mi _ qafsinʼguut _ nenglullug t _ maa _ .
ataasigh _ naayghagh m _ iinwaagh anite uq _ .
liigike lleg mni _ sivulighte aq _ na _ neli yuwhaagh ke aq _ , _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ , _ ategh ke ait _ iinwaagh mii t _ .
ayumightagh ghllag t _ , _ aghyugh qagh lleghpigagh at _ naalkutaaghenʼnguq _ maani _ uugte vig meggneng _ pi u ut _ .
Naatghanilnguut _ taakut _ naayghagh m _ mayughwaagh mii u ut _ , _ maalghug gneng _ qaspiqullghiineng _ neli llegh it _ ataasigh t _ pungughmii t _ iglegha lgutke ait _ .
Taam _ asi ani _ naalke lleqe asi _ sanquutaaghit _ ayumightagh t _ agavek _ “ _ Old _ Bering _ Sea-ghmiinun _ . _ ”
ayveghyage mii t _ taakut _ ama _ ne t _ , _ aygugh ghhagh itni _ mayughwaagh mii t _ .
ayuqligh m _ ila yan _ salin _ atigh aqe ainkut _ ayveghyage mii neng _ .
Siqluwaghyagmiit _ taakut _ naayvagh m _ aygugh ghhagh anite ut _ , _ taakwavek _ kete mun _ .
sume mni _ taakut _ Siqluwaghyagmiit _ entaqun _ 200-300 _ years-ngut _ .
iwernga _ taakwani _ naalkutaagh t _ pungughmii stun _ ayuqekanightut _ .
ila i _ naalkutaagh m _ aghyugh ghllag aqe luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
unegkut _ ne mta _ akinganilnguut _ nenglullug t _ entaqun _ 150 _ years-nguut _ , _ wallu _ ingavaqaantat _ .
wata _ unʼganlenguut _ , _ maaten _ qagi m _ naafqekagh i _ , _ 1900-em _ natangani _ ne u yagh lghiit _ : _ Anangtinkut _ , _ Taangyatentkut _ , _ kinku t llu _ .
taawa _ liigikeghraagaghput _ nani _ kiyaghtekau ta i _ yug t _ , _ qavngaghtagh u ta i llu _ .
tawani _ Old _ Bering _ Sea _ Two-mi _ allangughte ut _ igaqragh llegh it _ .
whanga mni _ qamagte luteng _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
ila i _ igaqragh llegh it _ qaayvantaqluteng _ qukagh itni _ .
punguug _ taake uk _ malghughqellutek _ ayuqe uk _ :
sivuligh k llu _ , _ punguug _ , _ kinguligh k llu _ punguug _ .
Punguum _ culture-nga _ mingite te luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
sivuqagh mi _ maani _ ulu ii ma uq _ naalke aqe aat _ pungughmii stun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
ketngipalag ni _ naalkute kau unga _ uugte vig stun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ .
taagani _ nuugtekagh t _ uugte vig neng _ taakwavek _ Dr. _ Bandim _ iiggekagh anun _ , _ taagken _ nuugtekagh t _ tekeghagh anun _ .
sivu ligh aat _ taakut _ Ketngipalam _ pengwaakraganilnguut _ .
naalkutaagh put _ tawani _ uugte vig stun _ aghyugh qaghtutka ut _ .
sivuligh m llu _ Punguum _ pi atun _ ayuqe lghii meng _ pi lgu uq _ tazikna _ .
ila i _ piniipigtaaqut _ .
naalkutaagh mteggun _ ilggnemta _ liigike aqe aput _ naken _ culturemeng _ pi u ta i _ ulima llegh itgun _ .
uugte vig _ taana _ sivulightalleghpiigaaguq _ maani _ . _ naalkutaagh mnni _ terellegh it _ maalghut _ saaqwligh igh qutagh lghiit _ . _ terellegh t llu _ qamavneghtuqat _ .
uugte vig _ taana _ 2000 _ years-neng _ ingavantuq _ .
uugte vig mii t _ uliimaaghita _ terellegh it _ samavneghtuqat _ , _ awalighnegh i _ terellegh t _ qaayvanlenguut _ , _ angqaperugtagh llgagh u aqe luteng _ .
tuungligh kek _ uugte vig k _ taake uk _ Old _ Bering _ Sea _ One-nguuk _ .
paninang _ uksughtutka lghiik _ tawaten _ 2000 _ years _ .
Old _ Bering _ Sea-m _ igaqragh llegh an _ terellegh i _ samavneghtuqat _ agughte magh meng _ .
taamani _ ulimayiitkanit _ , _ iwernga _ pinigh lghiit _ igaqragh llegh i _ .
whaa _ maaten _ tukfightughtet _ tukfiighinaaquteghliaquut _ taghnughhaghwaagh meng _ , _ naasqughwaaghmeng _ , _ ila aneng llu _ pinigh lghii meng _ sa meng _ allaaghlluwhaghmeng _ .
tamaakut _ taghnughhaghwaagh t _ uugte vig nun _ kaate luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
kiyang _ tawatekaniq _ ullimallghi _ ayuqe te ut _ .
ila i _ taghnughhaghwaagh m _ ullmallghi _ Egypt-eghmiit _ ulmaaghistun _ ayuqe ut _ .
Naasqughwaaghem _ enkaam _ ila i _ Indian-eghmiistun _ ayuqe ut _ , _ igaqragh llegh it llu _ tawatengwaaq _ ayuqe aqe ut _ .
SIVUGAM _ KIYAGHTAALLGHA _ ayumigh
Uvim _ ungipagh a
elngaatall _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ liite llegh ma _ kenle aneng _ taagken _ mangteghapiperegwaaq _ .
nenglu m _ ulima llegh anun _ nuugh uute kau unga _ .
nalluke anka _ enkaam _ .
iwernga _ iigna llu _ Qaygeghtaankut _ mangteghagh ita _ ukakaghaanilnguq _ waamte uute te m _ allgegh vike a _ .
sallghite kanigh luku _ natanga _ , _ katumllu _ neqelghutaluggamta _ nalla ani _ , _ kaay _ , _ naavngwaallghilnguut _ , _ qakemnallu _ peghukagh _ naavngwaallghiteftuq _ .
taakut _ esghaghu _ .
mangteghapig ghllag u uq _ , _ ila i _ sama _ megh mun _ lliigh uute ut _ esghagh llegh nka _ , _ kiyang _ maalghug _ .
Taangyatenkutlu _ , _ Anangtinkutlu _ teskananlenguut _ .
Anangtighllak _ , _ paa- a _ angli stekagh a _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ kanansaghpetukut _ angyilghagh mnni _ .
enkaam _ ugwakaghamnni _ Temkeruunkut _ .
ingate kaghagh itni _ Qanenguunkut _ , _ qeghagh lug t _ tazingkut _ kete kaghagh itni _ Nemaayaankut _ , _ unʼgantusaghtut _ .
qaasqagh _ unʼgarugllak _ .
uughqaghtagh ughte aqe ghngaaghmi _ pi igate ngugh t _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ , _ tesamantengnginaghaqut _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ allangughtemllu _ aaskellikaalghii _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ akilighneghani _ Taangyatenkut _ sama _ samavek _ lliigh ma ut _ .
kelu kaghagh itni _ Anangtinkut _ .
enkaam _ kelu kaghagh itni _ Aymergenkut _ .
enkaam _ taakwani _ tazikaniqaaghaq _ Eghqaaghaankut _ , _ maaten _ ikegkut _ Iirgunkut _ angyaghwaagh lghutagh ita _ kete kaghagh itni _ .
Ukakaghiitni _ enkaam _ Siivaghhaankut _ , _ Maasqem _ ata a _ .
enkaam _ taagegkut _ qiwaaghmii lghute u ut _ .
nalugvig m _ amenqun _ uyghagagh u ta t _ taagegkut _ .
ilagagh te ma nkut _ , _ Uqengeliighaankut _ , _ Nguungayankut _ esghaghteghanka _ .
mangteghapig it _ taagantusaghpetut _ , _ llangaqa _ maaken _ aafte aghagh luteng _ taagavek _ .
enkaam _ taakwna _ entaqun _ uzive te yu ainkut _ esghagh lleg mni _ uga _ mangteghagh it _ aghula i te ut _ , _ nayaas _ taana _ .
kelu kaghagh at _ up- ke na nga _ paqeqraggiisaghtuq _ , _ mangteghaqraggiisaghtuq _ , _ nunatu ghllag yagh uq _ .
kiyang _ ukantusalghiit _ , _ iwerngaqun _ taawaniqaaghaq _ Saavlankutlu _ , _ aghillug nkut llu _ , _ taawani _ maaten _ ayapghute m _ nayugh ani _ .
taakwani _ saaqwligh igh qutagh luteng _ taanʼgani _ imutem _ qaye ani _ iwhani _ , _ Minaankut _ .
tazingani _ Asunaghaankut _ , _ Piinteghllankut _ , _ Uwetelenkut _ , _ Quwaarinkut _ , _ Kinguwaaghhaankut _ , _ Qenaaghaankut _ .
Uwaliit _ uwani _ maaten _ angyilghagh vig it _ taawani _ .
tawatete yagh lghii _ taakwna _ nunaghllag _ .
iwerngaqun _ taawani _ Atayaghhaam _ guygu an _ nalighnegh ani _ Kuulunkut _ tawantut _ ellnginaghhaghmeng _ .
ketfaghkagh ani _ tamaani _ mangteghagh t _ tamaa _ esghaghteghanka _ .
taagani _ aghneghte neghtugh kanga _ , _ Ayuwighsaatenkunillu _ , _ Neghyugenkunillu _ .
Taakwantusaghtut _ ketfaghkagh ani _ .
Kiyaghneghuneghtuqakut _ taagani _ .
Mangteghapiperegwaaq _ .
ayumigh m qun _ tanpigh kayug i _ , _ tamaa na _ .
aange lghii m _ whangkuta qun _ aange ghllag lghii _ mangteghagh ut _ .
Tallimawaaqut _ tanpeghhet _ .
saye t _ uugkut _ amenqun _ qiipaghagh ghllag u aqe lghiit _ .
Aghvilqelluki _ saye t _ taawegkut _ .
tawatete aqe ut _ .
Tallimaneng _ whangkuta qun _ tanpegh ke aqe ut _ .
Tagsighaperuwaaghmeng _ niightugh lghii stun _ tawaten _ putu t _ ataasigh t _ aflu ke aqe luki _ niightughteghaqegkangit _ .
kisaate i _ sa i _ uyghag meng _ uqigkusighluki _ , _ qayughllak _ upenghanghani _ kuug igh negh mun _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ masaaghi nghaani _ tuquuqagh tke aq _ tamaa na _ niightugh vig a _ makregaghte aghte aqe uq _ .
kii _ , _ kuug igh negh mun _ sayug i _ entaqun _ iknaqe pigte ut _ .
tamaakut _ malighqutagh ma t _ uyghu iqe aat _ itagnagh ma aqe lghiit _ uyghag t _ atugh it _ .
nenglullug u yagh lghii _ iigna _ naghaagh vig ghllag _ , _ ulapnaariqfigllak _ uyghagtuqagh _ tazigna _ qellinegh _ .
qerngughte vig u yagh lghii _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ qelli ghllag luni _ naghaagh vig m _ ulapnaariqfiga _ nukalpigagh m _ .
whangkuta qun _ malikruutaghtaqunga _ mekestaanghitgun _ tamaakutgun _ pi aghte aqe ukut _ .
esgha _ tamaakut _ uyghag t _ aange pigte aqe ut _ , _ neghqute m nguq _ tagite kaqe aqe ai _ .
entaqun _ iknaqe pigte uq _ .
kuule t _ estamat _ esgha _ maakut _ aangepaaghrulleghpigii _ akmag kayugu ai _ , _ entaqun _ hundred _ pounds-nguut _ .
amavek _ ivgagh naqe nghmini _ mangteghasqwaaghqagh ni _ sivugnagh mete te _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ akmakayugwaa _ .
kii _ , _ iknaqe pigte uq _ taawa _ .
Inganlluki _ esghaqagh ma aqa _ naten _ imani _ tullumeg t _ eslegkakaat _ .
aywaa neng _ anuqlinʼghani _ amiiragh t _ iqugikun _ petug luki _ , _ sa aqe aki _ ulug aqe aki llu _ .
kii _ , _ aghneghhutkaqii _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
qayughllak _ uvinegtu pigte uq _ .
inglu anun _ aghvightagh ke luki _ aghneghtengngwaaghaquq _ .
simigh aqe ai _ amiiragh ni _ , _ qevuute luni _ pinigh ghllag _ ulima yu ghllag _ .
taakut _ tawatete yaghpete ut _ .

tawaten _ ukavek _ nuugtekau ukut _ qagingughteghlluni _ qaasqagh mun _ taakwavek _ aghsaan _ pi ste ghllag gpenaan _ salin _ .
taakwavek _ nuugh qugh te kau ukut _ .
tagi ukut _ taakwavek _ kelevagh uute kau ukut _ tamaani _ tawatetusaghpetukut _ .
elngaatall _ amalka _ piniqe te ghllag luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ , _ upughatu tete luni _ kiyaghnegh at _ .
nagaqugh lleg mni _ salleg mni _ , _ nelliqruugunnemtallu _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ aghyuughesqelluta _ , _ ata mta llu _ taagegkughhmiinun _ .
yimi ke gpenaamta _ qelegh te aqe kanginkut _ aghyuughesqelluta _ .
ukut _ kiyang _ a ngam ta _ , _ Neghyugenkuk _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkuk _ , _ naa mta _ kugegh kek _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
taakwani _ allangughte kestagh magh mi _ angli llegh a _ mangteghagh a _ uglaaghikestaamaghmi _ .
taakwna _ imiite ghllag _ mangteghagh qaqu _ allgeregaamaghmi _ .
una llu _ pinigh yagh lghii _ iigna _ igaghvig _ una _ ukaligh _ naafqe llegh m _ kenle a _ taana _ , _ pinigh ghllag yagh lghii _ .
kii _ tawani _ aqfaqugh te ghllag aqe yagh lghiit _ .
ilulighnegh itgun _ whangkuta _ mekestaaghhagh ni _ .
Exercise-esti _ every _ day-kaniq _ .
Neghyaghtuneng _ igaghyagh neng _ aag negh mta _ puqleghaaggneghani _ uksugh mi _ , _ whaa _ aqfaqut _ .
legan _ aag negh mta _ ilate aqe lghiikut _ .
ilangakun _ puqleghaaggneghani _ , _ tapghaghqunnaqunʼnguq _ .
taakwagun _ Uuyneq _ kenle ke ma aqe kangat _ .
sukalqagh msiigh _ tamaa na _ .
whangkuta _ ukavaneng _ ukegken _ .
taakwani _ saagguteghllagaqut _ .
qamaggute aqe uq _ , _ mekelghiigh iighpag ni _ whangkuta llu _ .
kaate negh meggni _ tughumghanneqegsaataqut _ .
aamta _ sariigh te lghiit _ , _ qemqagh uute lghiit _ tamaakut _ aqlagha _ yakugh ke igate aat _ .
Ighennaqun _ esghaghtu pigte aqa _ .
sa meng _ sateregaatkat _ taananguuq _ qemqagh uq _ , _ esghaate na luteng _ .
naligh _ menutu kan _ aliksaliisaghqaa _ taam _ .
qaatke sag liite yaghqagh a _ .
tawatete uq _ .
sa meng _ naqam _ seghleliighmeng _ avangite uq _ .
ghhuute igate ai _ , _ tughumgha te aqe ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ ineghte aqe ait _ .
kumlaaghqe lleqe aisi _ tawatenʼngam _ pi tek _ .
aamta _ aranʼghata _ sate luteng _ taawa _ aghulaqe uute aqe ut _ , _ kilgaaqu te sqe aqe kangit _ seghleliigh te laatagh naqe ni luki _ , _ sa naqlaatagh ni luki _ .
legan _ qelellghistun _ , _ qaatkumtaaghllagit _ , _ whangkuta llu _ repall _ .
alingnaghte luteng _ repall _ nagate lleg mnni _ angeneghte aput _ tamaakut _ .
ii-ii _ esghagh lleqe aaten _ pi lleqe aaten _ , _ esgha _ esghapag lghii _ tazigna _ .
tawatete yaghpete ut _ , _ llangaqa _ sa meng _ itagnagh nghite ngugh meng _ kelengaruugh luteng _ .
qamugh te nghata _ tawaten _ kiigwken _ , _ alngunak _ legan _ aghulaqe aqe lghii ni _ .
kina _ qamugh te na luku _ .
amalka _ qetgegh aatagh te kanigh luni _ ayuqe te yaghpete uq _ .
kina _ alngunak _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .
nani _ ugani _ piyaqli i lghiit llu _ legan _ ayuqe yaghpete ait _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
tawaten _ sa lghiit _ pillugute lghiit _ , _ nanʼghiighutestaqiit _ .
taana _ inglu a _ iknaqenghani _ , _ aa-a _ taaqnakenʼngam _ tawaten _ pi nghmeng _ .
“ _ Taaqnakenʼngam _ qule ii uq _ elpeneng _ , _ sa meng _ alla _ pi gpenaan _ . _ ”
taawa _ ava iitagh ke ai _ .
piniqe llegh meng _ tuune aqe ait _ amalka _ .
siivanllegh t _ igleghte te i u ut _ tamaani _ .
taghtugh negh mta _ legan _ ilangakun _ taawa _ aghulaqe aqe ukut _ first _ bell-lenatangani _ .
Tespikegkusta _ high _ school-em _ uwalighneghani _ uyghagagh ghhagh t _ .
tawani _ utaqa i te aqe ukut _ kaate negh mta _ .
nula ghllag negh mta _ tawani _ nukalpigagh ni _ taawa _ ivgaghyaghameng _ guututaqut _ teskigwken _ .
tawaten _ unaangu luku _ esla _ seghleghu nghaani _ , _ tawani nguq _ uyghagte te naqe ut _ .
uyghag meng _ ategh leg t _ .
Tughumghanneqegsaataqut _ taakuni _ kinku ni _ mangteghagh ni _ , _ aagra itni _ .
uyghag u te meng _ ategh leg t _ .
anigu _ umughhneghani _ naghaagh vig _ ulima aqe aat _ .
itegagh m _ naamanʼghatun _ nuqutupag fqaan _ .
qellughqagh vig k _ tazingkuk _ qellughqagh vig ghllag u yagh uk _ , _ igaghvig m _ saaghw ani _ napaqagh k _ .
sa u a _ legan _ agleghnagh lghii _ sa u a _ uksugh mi _ tamaani _ pi igate kangat _ .
sa u aat _ sariigh t _ , _ naghaallqusiighem _ sariigh i _ agleghnagh ut _ , _ nanevgagh t _ pi snanigh llegh it _ .
naqamalla _ kiinʼghanillu _ , _ upenʼghanʼghani _ taawa _ sa u a _ reghigh aqe uq _ , _ amalka _ sariigh _ .
Kiinʼghagu _ tawaten _ test- pig ke na _ maaten _ piwhaninkut _ , _ Mangtaqulinkut _ mangteghagh vike yagh kangat _ , _ ila ngllagh vig ghllag _ .
pika _ ayaviileg t _ atghanʼghata _ keleg qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ .
Tiigunnaqunʼnguq _ .
ayaviileg t _ kelegtet _ amalka _ yugpag t _ .
tiig te naqe ut _ !
elngaatall _ kemeg migkagh inagh meng _ sa meng _ aate luteng _ .
Uglaaghighllaneghmeggni _ , _ nanevgagh t _ qelegh nghmegteki _ .
angyilghagh neng _ , _ ivgaghyuqameng _ , _ uuvganeng _ tespiikegken _ qelghaaqegkangit _ .
ii _ , _ whangkuta _ taakwagun _ paayghi vig u ut _ ukegkut _ .
liilightugh aqe kangit _ “ _ nuqeghsigh gpenaki _ , _ naayghagh m _ mingleghrugwaakun _ qamagte lusi _ aag aqe tek _ . _ ”
ila i _ qayughllak _ ketfaghpaqun _ qiive aqe ut _ .
pi ste na nigh ke ait _ kaate nghata _ aghyuughmigaqiit _ .
taawa _ tugutagh ke ut _ .
tanemlleqa _ tughumghanneqegsaataqut _ .
tamaani _ mekelghiigh ni _ , _ mekelghiighpagughsimaamta _ pi aqe lghiikut _ .
iknaqe lleg leg t _ .
uuvganeng _ taana _ iknaqughi kestaghkagh _ , _ Sunaaghruk _ taana _ .
iknaqe lleghpigagh u yagh lghii _ Amagu _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ pamaken _ .
anglegute ke te lghiik _ yukeghqenghek _ , _ sa meng _ quuftinaqluni _ whaken _ village- meng _ ayuqe lghii _ .
qule ii naqe k _ anengagh ke te lghiik _ , _ may- u kau uq _ anengagh a _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ , _ ii-i _ Sunaaghrugem _ kaate a _ , _ kaate luku _ , _ ii-i _ sa nanigh uq _ saste nanigh aa _ .
qalepangi ghllag kek _ sa kek _ , _ kepsighaak _ .
taawa _ kaate a _ kitugh aa _ sa nanighqe a _ .
llangaqa _ natanga _ iimna _ aghsaan _ lliighqagh a _ sa mi _ village- mi _ whani _ yukeghqennaqellgha _ .
taawa _ kitugh aa _ .
taawa _ maalghu _ , _ pi nga yu _ aghni te kaghte aqe aat _ , _ mulu negh meggni _ pi nga yu neng _ .
Excercise-meng _ , _ kilgaaqumeng _ .
Taananguuq _ kilgaaqu _ , _ tughumgha _ .
ilangakun _ tawani _ maaten _ Kuulunkut _ angyilghagh itni _ .
aastu ghllag yagh lghii _ , _ kilgaaqu te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ kiyang _ whanikumi _ .
qellinegh ghllag mi llu _ tawani _ .
naghaagh vig ghllag u yagh uq _ taana _ .
uyghag _ taana _ kii _ , _ ila ita _ aya kataghaghkagh at _ .
ila i _ pi kegte pigte aqe ut _ , _ tughumgha igate ngugh t _ sa igate ngugh t _ , _ pi kegte pigte aqe ut _ esghapag kau luteng _ .
Ighivgasiighhneghata _ tawaten _ sigute gemni _ imani _ itegh nghata _ .
whangkuta qun _ anengaagput _ taake uk _ , _ kiyang _ entaqun _ qaagna llu _ tawatete aqe lghii _ .
“ _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ Ulapsaneng _ pi ziin _ ? _ Ighivgasighllalghiiten _ .
Ulapsaneng _ kaate ziin _ , _ sa ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnagh t _ ighivgasisnanighwaaqayuwiit _ , _ pi igate u aghte ut _ aghneq _ naten _ lliigh nghaani _ .
awatiiteg neng _ akequsagh leg t _ .
aane ste gpenaki _ aatkagh igh luki _ sakagh t _ ighivgaghmi _ pikagh t _ sakagh t _ .
enkaam _ aghnaghaghhagh t _ sa u aat _ kelenga luteng _ .
iwerngaqun _ ugwiiqas _ tamaakut _ itupill _ taawa _ itagnagh ut _ .
enkaam _ sa meng _ peggmeng _ avangite kanigh yagh uq _ .
unaami _ entaqun _ pi nga yu _ , _ estama _ aflu _ aghhmun _ tuungsagte nghaani _ elngaatall _ aanleghaate aqe lghiit _ .
nukalpigagh _ sa aqe lghii _ iimna _ yuvghiigh aqe kangat _ sa aqe kangat _ .
qetgegh aatagh te luni _ ayuqe yaghpete uq _ .
whanga llu _ sa lghii nun _ piyaqli lghii nun _ pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .
Taananguuq _ emta _ aghyuugh ta lgu uq _ pi nghite llegh _ piyaqli i lghii nun _ .
taawa _ aghyuugh llegh ke a _ kilgaaqu _ .
Taananguuq _ aghyuuleq _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ , _ whanga llu _ ilate aghtekau unga _ .
tenge vig mteggun _ aga _ ii-i _ qayughllak _ alinge ste luta _ qelegh luta _ .
Yugughtekas _ tamaakunʼngam _ wata _ .
ila i _ ii-ii _ pinqegsaggaghneng _ ayuqe ut _ esghapag lleg mni _ whanga _ .
qaatke te ma ghllag t _ esghapag lleg mni _ .
ulape luteng _ iknaqughi aqe ut _ .
unaghsigh meng _ sa meng _ aa _ , _ navek _ naayghagh leg mun _ mayugh luteng _ ukig aqe luteng _ , _ tawaten _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ meghnugh pagllag gpenateng _ taaqe kayug t _ .
taqayuqe na yukagh meng _ taqayuqe gkumeng _ iknaqughimun _ pi lleghqagh igh te yaghqagh t _ , _ taaqe lleqe ut _ , _ avangite te lleqe ut _ .
Ighennaq _ esgha _ tawaten _ pi ke aq _ .
Taqayuqem _ avangite tke aq _ .
Akulghaaghtesluku _ kilgaaqu ste aqe kangat _ .
Tamaanaghlagem _ taqayuqe stekagh _ .
kaate nghaani _ tanpeghhek _ tespikagun _ qellinegh kun _ angayuqagh ita _ nakutlu _ angag ita _ aagkut _ kii-ii _ , _ neqenghaghqe te aqe ut _ .
whangkuta _ neghe lleghqagh ite ngugh ni _ , _ nanevgagh i i na ut _ neqnighqutagh ke ut _ neqenghaghqe te ghllag aqe aat _ Ighennaq _ taana _ kiyang _ isghallemni _ .
Akulghaaghllagluni _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
Ukum _ pi i _ qateghrakegtagh t _ , _ tagnegh lghii _ , _ qateghrakegtagh _ .
entaqun _ maavek _ segesqugh mun _ akughtu tke aat _ .
llangaqa _ umupag nghite ngugh t _ sa u aat _ maklag t _ teghiglug t _ .
tuye inagh t _ ukut _ naflugh leg t _ , _ pamavek _ qakeghllug ke i _ pie- aghagh te aqe aat _ . _ tawatete ut _ , _ pinighnaghsalget _ natangi _ sa lget _ igaqragh leg t _ .
Kaanangi _ makreggneghmegteki _ qughagh aqe ut _ .
qalepgute magh ita _ kilgaaqu te kete naqe nghmegteki _ pi aqe ait _ .
qalepgute magh meng _ entaqun _ suka mun _ pi sigh t _ .
taakut _ esghagh kaqe anka _ .
ayuqe yaghpete ut _ taawa _ .
Kii-ii _ , _ llangaqa _ sa meng _ itagnagh nghite ngugh mun _ pi lleghqagh meng _ nanevgagh t _ iiskughtiiregat _ .
Tespikantaqelghiitlu _ siqlugagh ghllag mi _ , _ nani llu _ qerngagh meng _ .
taana _ aghyuutagh lleghpigagh u uq _ ifkaghte te _ , _ tamlu nkut _ ata at _ .
me a _ qaayvanlenguq _ , _ iknaqe u aq _ .
nuughtugh kanigh anka _ , _ iitek _ tughumgha kayugu luki _ .
iknaqe pigte uq _ ifkaghte te _ taana _ .
Yaavgaghsiinkut _ , _ egmigh u aghte te nkut _ iknaqngwaaghuyaghpetut _ ivenrugh ta nge i tete luku _ tamaani _ .
angu ghllag kaqe a _ , _ atuqeghlakaqaa _ , _ ayghigh te luku _ whanga qun _ meghnugh igate unga _ , _ ayghigh te luku _ .
Aygughnamelluki _ sa u aat _ teghig ke sagh t _ pinemteki _ , _ ifkaghaghluki _ yaavuqugh aghte aqe ukut _ .
taawa _ elngaatall _ unaagh ghhagh aneng _ amsanagh u nghaani _ taawa _ yaavuqumeng _ .
Kayunglluta _ , _ kayunglluta _ , _ neghaali aqe luta _ .
taagken _ kiyang _ qaatke sigh kekagh _ pi aqe kangat _ taglagh uute te mun _ whanikumun _ taakwnnangani _ aghvenge llegh m _ kingu ani llu _ taakwani _ kalleghtangyaghatesqaqegkanginkut _ .
Angwaaghataquut _ .
ila i _ , _ kii _ sukate pigte aqe ut _ .
tawani _ Ifkaghutenkutgun _ pi unga _ , _ nukalpigaghwaaghuluku _ salin _ ifkaghte te _ .
tuqutagh yagh lghii tgun _ ayvigtegh mii nun _ amavek _ angyaghwaagh kun _ .
Sipelankutlu _ taakut _ tuqutagh yagh naqe t _ .
taawa _ qemqaghtugh ai _ ifkaghte te m _ , _ ighneghqagh ke a _ Sipela _ taana _ .
pisagh lghiikut _ , _ ii-ii _ , _ aga _ nusug kestagh ainkut _ taakut _ ighneghqagh an _ taam _ .
tallimat ke aghtagh te _ yukutukut _ .
enraq _ esgha _ taam _ sasigh a _ seghlegh ghllag t _ , _ Eghqaaghaam _ .
maalghug gneng _ nanghiigh aqe aqa _ .
aga _ uyavagh ste gpenaki _ angwaaghute _ tugu luku _ maalghug gneng _ pi luki _ , _ inglu anun _ aghvigh luni _ , _ maalghug gneng _ pi luki _ , _ qaake a _ .
Aay _ , _ amu yagh ke put _ .
nanevgagh m _ aagusaqminikut _ yaavuquute put _ taakwanlengughni _ yaavuquute itnun _ pillgilliqasimaghmeng _ .
elngaatall _ pi nge i kete te _ taaggun _ .
ii _ , _ esgha _ seghleghllug u ma lghii _ yuug _ taana _ .
aagken llu _ ivenruute _ allgegh kestaamaan _ , _ Uzivusiinkutgun _ angwaaghtugh lunga _ , _ ivenrugh magh emta _ , _ telaananga magh emta _ , _ aga _ sivu mnni _ , _ aga _ amu aqe aput _ , _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh aput _ , _ aga _ iivagh yalghiimeng _ .
Iirgum _ neqagh m _ tawaten _ apegh llegh ke a _ .
angwaaghute ni nguq _ pi mafte a _ tawaten _ .
ima _ aga _ , _ kii _ ayuqe uq _ esgha _ .
sasigh leg t _ pi lget _ sa lget _ ayumigh m _ sa i _ .
ila i _ pi tke pigte ait _ nagate lleg mni _ , _ sa meng _ piyaqnamengllu _ uuggusiqaqluki _ , _ sa meng _ qute mi _ tamaani _ tawatetusaghpetut _ .
AQELLQAGHNIIQ
Apangaluum _ apegh llegh a
neghigh luku _ sa u aat _ yug t _ naken _ kaate nghata _ maakumiu u nghite ngugh t _ aqelqagh t _ .
sivuqagh m _ igleghneghani _ tamaakut _ aqelqagh t _ kaate nghata _ nanghiigh yaghqau aqe lghiit _ , _ iknaqetulngi _ , _ sukatulngi _ .
kiyang _ ungazigh meng _ pamaken _ pangeghte aat _ pi nghata _ , _ taakunguut _ aqelqaghniigh yug aqe kangit _ , _ tea- ma anun _ pagsinga na lghiit _ .
tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pinaghvig mi _ nalighmeng _ tuungligh ghhagh ani _ angutughvig mi _ pangegh t _ kaate nghata _ pamaken _ angyagh t _ , _ ilangakun _ family-tuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ akilpegagh na luteng llu _ , _ pirughte na luteng _ pangeghte aqe lghiit _ .
iwernga _ taananguuq _ aange lghii _ aqelqaghniigh llegh _ , _ talwa _ ilangakun _ aqelqagh t _ neghe ste gpenaki _ piinligh qagh yu k _ .
tawaten _ piinligh qagh yu k _ , _ yuug _ mat- ke ma ai _ ayaviightuumagh mi _ qellinegh mun _ esnevagh aqe uq _ .
tawaten _ yug meng _ esghhaanneghmeggni _ liigike aqe aat _ sa naqute anga _ .
aqfaqugh vig mi _ uzivgagh aqe uq _ , _ nulangllameng _ ategh leg _ .
kina _ alngunak _ yuug _ ateghaate aqe uq _ aqfaquq _ piinligh nghaani _ .
nukalpigagh _ iingunagh mi _ avelghagh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ tawavek _ .
siivanllegh t _ iiskughte i aqe ut _ kina _ avelghagh na yu kan _ .
kina _ nukalpigagh _ avelghagh kuni _ repall _ kayngu nagh lgigh a _ .
tawani _ aqfaqugh te lghiit _ nula ghllag negh meggni _ sukaaghsimaghmeng _ lliigh aqe ut _ .
paghyugh lghii _ tunuvagh magh mi _ , _ qenwat _ qafsinʼggaaghtaqut _ .
paghyugh uute luni _ tunuvagh uute nghaani _ taana _ paghyugh neghllug _ kayaalqe i i aqe uq _ .
sivuqagh _ qamagte luni _ pagsinga aqe uq _ tawani _ , _ qellinegh mun _ tagilaghaateghlagaquq _ aqelqaghniighmun _ esghapag yagh te aqe uq _ ingluksuugullghiimeng _ .
aqelqagh t _ aqelqaghniigh aqe ait _ , _ naligh t _ pinigh ta i _ .
Aqfaqum _ kingu aneng _ yuug _ atkugwighluni _ atghagh aqe uq _ qukaa nun _ aqfaqugh vig m _ .
peghleghte luni _ utaqa i aqe uq _ teskanani _ .
taana _ tughumghameng _ ategh leg _ .
ungazighmii t llu _ maakumiu t llu _ ateghteiiraagh te aqe ut _ , _ iqunneghisteng _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ .
qenwat _ iknaqe llegh t _ siipte aqe ut _ taawa _ taana _ kina _ ategh ta igh te nghmini _ kayaalqe i i aqe uq _ .
neqamike lleg mni _ maakumiinʼnguq _ kayaalqe sigate ut _ .
aqfa qu mi _ tamaakut _ sukaaghikat _ , _ paghyugh neghllug t _ kayaalqe i i kayug t _ .
ama _ tughumgha te mi _ , _ iknaqe lghiit _ , _ tughumgha lleg t _ yugiqengegkayuget _ .
Taam _ aqelqaghniighem _ kingu ngiighhagh aneng _ teghig nagh llegh _ piinligh qagh yu k _ kalleghta _ , _ a tuq llu _ .
sa u a _ puygaaghlluku _ tamaghhagh mi _ teghigniqe te aqe uq _ tawani _ .
sivuqagh m _ KIYAGHTAALLGHA _ 1930-NI
Akulkim _ apegh llegh a
tamaani _ usiisteghllagem _ kiig nghaani _ saghya _ kaatutkayuwa _ .
ataasigh ghhagh meng _ kaate kayug _ , _ enkaam _ ayumiqullegh mun _ saghya _ naama ste naqe aqe kangat _ .
Natu _ esnagh _ qagi ite nghaani _ taakwani _ usingigh aqe luni _ .
paamggun _ nalle kun _ , _ saamggun _ uughqa kun _ , _ ilangakun _ , _ kiyang _ uksaagh mi _ , _ amagun _ Tevleghagnekun _ , _ ilangakun _ Uuyneghqunllu _ usingigh qagh yu k _ uukna _ qagitu nghaani _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ saghya _ angyaghpag meng _ angaghqugh aqe lghii _ .
estamagnegh t _ drum-et _ usi ke kayug i _ enkaam _ tapghagh meng _ qaamqaghte luki _ yug t _ uglagh te luki _ sayug aqe luki _ , _ enkaam _ qute meng _ up- llghite aghtagh luki _ tunuvagh aqe luki _ .
elngaatall _ tamaghaghmi _ sivuqagh m _ yug a _ , _ aghnagh a _ qepghagh te kayug _ tawani _ .
taghnughhagh ke te luni _ talwa _ akmaghqutkayuk _ .
saghya _ kiyang _ akmag luku _ ne mun _ atghagh te kayug _ , _ ila i _ qimugsigh meng _ .
Drum-a _ tamaa na _ up- llghite aghtagh luku _ atghagh te aqe aat _ kenlanga _ naangellegh anun _ .
Tractor-ngilluku _ tawaten _ ayuqe kau uq _ kenlanga _ taake uk _ Kleet-Trac-meng _ ategh leg k _ tractor-ek _ , _ D-2-uustun _ ayuqe lghiik _ kaate llegh gkenun _ .
maligte te lutek _ BIA-em _ igaghvigkagh anun _ kaate uk _ , _ igaghvig _ ulima naqe aqngan _ .
enkaam _ pillugagh u luku _ World _ War _ ii- mi _ taakut _ Siighmiit _ ( _ CAA _ housing _ ) _ nekeftekau ut _ .
tamaani _ uglagh lghii _ mat- ke ma ai _ qepghagh te kau uq _ akileghtusaqluku _ seventy _ cents _ an _ hour _ .
tamaani _ nalug vike yuwhaagh _ ulima kaqe aat _ suna meng _ tangeghtuqagh meng _ angaghqugh te aqe luku _ taakwegken _ nenglullug neng _ wheel _ barrow-kun _ .
Taakwantuq _ akilighneghitni _ Qaygeghtaankut _ taagavek _ aki mun _ .
iwernga _ taam _ sivungagh ni _ qafsinagnegh _ tengegkayug _ kaate kau uq _ maavek _ salin _ nalugvig ighllug qu _ , _ mekestaaghhagh t _ tengegkayug t _ .
Otto _ William _ Geist-tenkut _ ila i llu _ archeologist-et _ tagite ait _ sivuligh t _ tengegkayug t _ .
taana _ tengegkayug ke yug u aq _ qesug nagh lleghpigagh u kau uq _ tamaani _ .

sivungagh ni _ taam _ tengegkayug ighllug qu _ mail-a _ , _ sa u a _ lipeghsagh aq _ akmavek _ wetku _ ayumiqun _ angyaghpinneghani _ kaate kayugu yagh lghii _ .
taagken _ tengegkayug igh sagte te luni _ kiyang _ uksugh mi _ naayvagh _ ayuginʼghani _ kaate aghtekayug t _ .

maaten _ whaa _ nalugvig mteggun _ nalug yagute ut _ .
kiig mi _ megh kun _ nalug kayug t _ , _ army-t _ pi it _ , _ naayvagh kun _ nalug aatagh kau ut _ .
pillug a mi _ tamaani _ maakumiu t llu _ alaska _ Territorial _ Guard-ngughquuteghllakaagut _ .

enkaam _ , _ Kanuggaq _ taana _ first _ sergeant-kelluku _ .

taagken _ , _ taam _ kingu aneng _ , _ July _ , _ l949-mi _ , _ alaska _ army _ National _ Guard-et _ piinligh ut _ .

aga _ mangteghagh t _ nekefte qugh na aqe magh ita _ pi kaqe ait _ .

Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
mangteghasqwaagh t _ sivuke naqe anka _ kiig mi _ atugh t _ . _ Uglaghtalestun _ angka i ta _ ulima aqe lghiit _ .
ungavig u ut _ amigh t _ ighivganghani _ nekegte luki _ qavaa te kayug ni _ , _ nanigh ligh luki _ .
ila i _ mangteghasqwaaghaqut _ inglu ke te luki _ tent-astun _ ayuqe luki _ , _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ kiig mi _ nayugh put _ .
aghte nghaani _ ungaviges _ taakut _ , _ taghnughhagh t llu _ taghtugh qu uute nghata _ , _ iike luki _ uteghmun _ petug aqe ut _ .
taawa _ enkaam _ tawaten _ kiigtagh ke ut _ .
Gaami _ tawani _ gaagh aqe luteng _ , _ qula i _ reghilnguut _ .
azigutagh igh aqe luki _ amig m _ tunganganeng _ taagken _ enkaam _ agepsugh t _ quleghlluginaghmun _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
Amsaanaanʼghani _ seghleghwaaghuut _ taawa _ .
puyugh _ aane gpenani _ mingite ghllag nghmini _ repall _ aneghsiilliqnaghlluni _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ aane qaghtagh aqe ukut _ .
mekestaaghhaa luta _ ighivgaghmillu _ nulugh yagh te t _ taglanʼghata _ kayu liigh ragkiigh negh meggni _ kii _ puyughllug ghllag u aqe uq _ .
iwernga _ kiyaghfig t _ kiilqusigh _ .
enkaam _ enraghngam _ mangteghagh t _ aange lghiit _ qeghagh luki _ uksuum _ mangteghagh i _ qeghagh luki _ .
aagra m _ saghya a _ kiyang _ sa u a _ aate tke aq _ , _ uksuum _ aatkagh a _ qeghaate luku _ .
ighulugh i _ asi akun _ takagh qugh luki _ sivuklluki _ , _ enkaam _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh luki _ taakut _ kiilqusigh _ .
enkaam _ September-ngughhneghani _ piinligh aqe ut _ mangteghaghpagmun _ .
Mangteghaghpages _ tamaakut _ angqaperukaniigut _ , _ sivutmute _ taake luteng _ .
aghveghaqetagh u ut _ qukaa n _ pi i _ .
taakut _ ateghte luki _ sivuke luki _ qeghagh t _ unaami _ atughqagh t _ .
Ighulus _ taakut _ angaghqugh luki _ enraq _ mangteghillegh mun _ tawavek _ saghya a _ taana _ qeghagh t _ .
alla neng _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh luki _ .
enkaam _ ighulugh t _ mangteghagh m _ mingle akun _ ayaqighte qugh luku _ .
unaami _ unaangu pigte luku _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ naafqellukillu _ .
taakut _ aghveghaqetagh t _ sivuke luteng _ napaghte aqe ut _ , _ siivantaqut _ qukaanite nghite ut _ .
enkaam _ laagulluuteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
peghu luki _ petugteghluki _ estamaneng _ .
ighulugh t _ nefteghqughnaqenghata _ yug t _ mayugh aqe ut _ .
Tapghaghmeng _ piiznga a ta _ qaquuragh meng _ , _ sivutmute _ qaquuragh i _ ayuqe ut _ .
aghveghaqetagh t _ taakut _ piisteghpagluteng _ one-foot-neng _ taaklluteng _ .
enkaam _ tapghaghmeng _ iqug i _ taakut _ kingu aneng llu _ pi meng _ , _ sivulighte nghmeng llu _ .
tapghagh a _ taaggun _ aghveghaqetagh m _ singig akun _ negavluku _ .
sivulighte negh i _ takite aghagh aqe ut _ .
enkaam _ yug t _ tawavek _ mayugh aqe ut _ tullumeg t _ unaghsigh t _ nekegte luki _ .
taake ghllag lghiit _ tunuqagh m _ pi i _ .
ighulugh t _ sa u ut _ thirty _ feet- ngugh t _ ila i _ one _ by _ four-et _ .
enkaam _ nemegh te magh ita _ tugu aqe luki _ .
siingutagh igh luki _ nuuve te nghata _ pi aqe ait _ .
ayvegh m _ tulimagh i _ unaghsigh kun _ nuuve te luki _ taakut _ ighulugh t _ uniistaaghaalghiit _ .
pikavek _ singikrag mun _ nuuve te luki _ taaggun _ unaghsigh kun _ inglu a llu _ tawaten _ iggwani _ unaghsigh _ sa u a _ tuquuqaghpak _ quwaataqluku _ ingleghtagh kun _ , _ nemegh te vigkagh t _ iqug i _ ighulugh m _ ranmemelnguut _ nemghutagh ke luki _ taagken _ tawaten _ nefteghqughaqaat _ ighulugh _ nemghutagh ke luku _ sani anun _ tawavek _ .
Sivulighneghes _ taakut _ tullumeg u ut _ atigh llegh i _ .
eslege lghiit _ , _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ teggmag lghiit _ tespikavek _ qule mun _ pilagh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ ighulugh a _ qamagte luki _ nefteghquneghmegteggu _ guulgute u ut _ atigh llegh i _ maalghuneng _ napaqagh leg t _ .
tuquuqagh meng _ lliigh kau lghiit _ , _ aguqaagmelluki _ tunuqagh m _ pi i _ sivuklluki _ nekegte aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ esghapag aqe ai _ , _ qule mun _ ayagsineghqesiighluki _ sakniqe te luki _ , _ nuna i _ tuute yameng _ ategh ke ut _ .
tuute vigkagh t _ apumeg iitagh t _ nuna mun _ unaghsigh t _ .
enkaam _ iqug i _ taakut _ ayagute u ut _ atigh llegh i _ guulgute m _ napaqagh i _ .
enkaam _ sakniqe te luki _ nekegte luki _ tawaten _ sani an _ pi i _ tawaten _ ama _ guulgute t _ taakut _ ayagute i _ ama _ tuusagh igh luki _ , _ enkaam _ esghapag lghii m _ yug m _ tawaten _ atunem _ ghhuughneghtutalangi _ , _ inglugtun _ nefteghqughtestaqluki _ esghapag luki _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ guulgute t _ ighulugh tgun _ asighte te luki _ , _ allameng _ ameltutaghaghaqelghiit _ , _ iqug i _ taakut _ sayugteghaataqiit _ avleghnayukata _ ighulugh t _ .
enkaam _ teggmaaghqwaaghllagaqii _ ighulugh t _ uniilengestaghhaayalghiit _ .
enkaam _ mayugh aqe luteng _ .
Tanpeghhet _ , _ tafutagh u ut _ ila i _ , _ ranme m _ tungangani _ tanpegh t _ quupekagh t _ sivuke luki _ nekeghqughluki _ taakus _ tunuqagh m _ tanpeghhi _ ighulugh tgun _ tamaagun _ qulighnegh i _ qeluughteghutaqiit _ . _ taakut _ enkaam _ sani an _ pi i _ asiliit _ pi nghata _ . _ yanga u ut _ reghillegh i _ .
taakut _ alla neng _ tanpegh meng _ ilaagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ uglagh u pigte luku _ .
Quliit _ tanpegh t _ nefteghqunghata _ mekelghiigh u luta _ tagsighagh mun _ nuvughtengunemta _ putu nge i kete te _ teghigniqe aqe ukut _ mayughamun _ nuvugh yug te aqe lghiikut _ .
Tanpeghha _ qamagte luku _ tawaten _ saye i _ entaqun _ one-third-evzii _ mangteghagh m _ uteghmun _ .
angyaghpag m _ telananganganeng _ umughpaarugllagmeng _ atastameng _ tanpigh aqe ait _ .
llaaghanwha _ tanpeghsughnapangunaan _ lli aqe aat _ tawaten _ .
tagsigh aq _ uglagh u pigte luku _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
tagsighagh t _ tamaakut _ tapghagh at _ amenqun _ tanpegh mun _ atuqe aqe lghiit _ .
ayvegh m _ , _ qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllagh llegh m _ taaqe negh a _ keleve aqe luki _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh m _ ikellegh aneng _ uziftagh ke luki _ qelutagh u luku _ tagsighagh u luku _ .
qasiqagh t llu _ ilangakun _ tawaten _ .
alngunak _ eslegkakiita _ keleve aqe ut _ tagsighas _ tamaakut _ .
qasiqagh m _ uyiigh ngllaghkagh m _ taaqe negh i _ taakut _ .
unkuvag t _ pi nghmegteki _ taawa _ taaqe negh i _ .
sa u a _ ikellghaq _ uzifqughaqaat _ talwa _ amiiqagh m _ liighqe llegh i _ , _ tekerqagh i _ uzifqughaqiit _ qelutagh u luki _ .
uglagh u pigte lghii _ tagsigh aq _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
Yukutaghsighluku _ mangteghaghpag lghii ni _ .
enkaam _ nutaghaperuwaaghmeng _ kinegh nghhagh meng _ tunuqagh i _ akilighneghem _ tungangi _ , _ ilangakun _ whangkuta qun _ aywan _ tungangi _ awatkaghtagh t _ ataasigh t _ , _ ilangakun _ malghugnegh t _ ilate aqe ut _ , _ palaghhaanʼghata _ amiiqagh igh llegh t _ .
Taaqsuggwaaghmun _ mangteghaghpages _ tamaakut _ , _ akuzi lghii ni _ qayiigrughlluteng _ ayuqe ut _ , _ akuzillegh it _ taaqsuggwaalghiini _ .
tallimat _ tanpeghhet _ mangteghaghpagmun _ , _ esgha _ taakusta _ tawaten _ tunuqagh m _ taakut _ sanim- a _ malghugnegh t _ qule ii iqe te luteng _ , _ enkaam _ tallimagnegh t _ .
tawaten _ nekeghqughluku _ taaqenghata _ , _ ingliigh magh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ qeghaate kayug _ .
nefkuuragh t _ pi nigh ghllag t _ . _ enkaam _ mangteghas _ taaqenghataa _ miigtemmeng _ ategh leg t _ .
kenegh meng _ kumaghlluteng _ tamaaken _ qasiqagh meng _ , _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh aqe luteng _ .
kayute t _ ila i _ ighleke aqe kangit _ neghesqelluki _ .
Kaagtuumaghmeng _ maklinʼghaghmeng _ nefkuuragh meng _ .
paaw i _ maligte luki _ nefku kayugu lghiit _ .
paaw i _ qupughragh negh meggni _ , _ uyghag kun _ , _ qalqalima meng _ , _ sa meng _ kaagtughaqegkangit _ .
kavighrug ketu te _ qupughragh llegh i _ paaw m _ .
Neqniipigtuut _ tepe kegte pigte lghiit _ .
qayughllak _ sivuligh _ unakegkagh _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ nefku igate ngughk _ wiin _ , _ kepellegh ni _ sa ni _ qayugh utaghpag ni _ kiyaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ mesiighutngwaaghaqelghiit _ . _ Tepesuungnaqekestat _ nefku aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ qamavek _ iiwleng _ kiinghwaaqayuget _ mesiighutngwaaneghmeggni _ .
enkaam _ tepe kegte pigte ut _ .
taawa _ mangtag leg t _ mangtag meng llu _ miigtemmeng _ ategh leg _ .
neqnigh ghllagu ut _ nefkuuras _ tamaakut _ sivu ligh aat _ .
aamtaam _ nefkunaghsiman _ unakegkagh t _ kaatutaghesnaq _ nefku lghii ni _ , _ maaten _ elpek si _ nefku llegh gpesistun _ taawa _ alla u aqe ut _ .
mesugh i _ ellngagh lugh u aghte ste gpenaki _ qaye i _ kiinʼghaghhneghmeggni _ ellngagh nanigh aqe lghiit _ enkaam _ qaamnangi _ aghipate aqe luteng _ , _ alla u ut _ enkaam _ .
mesiigh tke aat _ neqnightus _ taawa _ .
neqe m llu _ kagpag llegh a
Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
taaqe negh mta _ sa mun _ unangniighmun _ lliigh aqe ut _ .
naten _ nefkuuragh t _ qeghaate aqe aat _ ?
Sivuklluki _ nefkuuragh t _ taakut _ .
Ighuulut _ nekeghquqayugulghiit _ qeghagh tgun _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ qaayngikun _ ighulugh m _ nefkuuragh _ , _ qasugh u iqe aq llu _ sa aghte qugh luki _ tanpeghhaghaaliqaghluki _ tanpegh meng _ .
uksugh mun llu _ pinʼghata _ tanpegh meng _ saape aqe luki _ pikayug u ut _ .
Upenʼghaam _ pillghi _ ukut _ aagra m _ saghyaanganeng _ tanpeghhaghaalighluki _ aatkagh meng _ pikayug t _ qaayngikun _ enkaam _ tanpegh meng _ qantagh aqe kangit _ .
uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ ama _ tawaten _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ uksughtekayug t _ .
eghqwaagh te yaghqagh t llu _ tawaten _ .
uqiigh luki _ nefku aqe lghiit _ .
uqiightugh luki _ enkaangam _ kinegh rakegtagh t _ .
tamaa na _ sa u a _ ila a _ tuliimaq _ kiilqusigh _ negh magh an _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Mangteghasqwaalghiini _ kinellghistun _ sivuligh t _ nefku t _ kiig negh ke aat _ qeghaate kayugu ut _ , _ sivuuliit _ kinegh nghhagh t _ .
alla u yagh lghii _ , _ nefku kayug t _ wetku _ kiiw t _ pinanʼghata _ .
nefku yaghagh ngugh _ tagitugtu uq _ .
ila a _ uksugh mun _ pi kaghqagh _ qeghaate aqe aat _ .
Eghqwaaghusaghqas _ tamaakut _ ama _ upenʼghaghhaaneng _ saghna kayug t _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh kayug t _ .
enkaam _ payangite nghaani _ quyngigh m _ kevigh a _ atghagh te nghatki _ angyaleg m _ kagpaagaqegkangi _ .
taana _ kiig mi _ uukagh _ pi nghaani _ nefku kayug _ , _ nunivag _ saghna aqe kangat _ tuqusigh aqe luki _ .
awen _ ungipagh kaqe anka _ laluramke nun _ nunivag t _ tuqusigh aqe ni luki _ akmaagutakun _ .
tuqu negh meggni _ mesugh i _ qugaaghqwaakayuguniluki _ , _ ila i _ katam _ juice-estun _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ maaten _ kinguligh nun _ orange _ juice-nguniluki _ liite lghii nun _ juice-meng _ ayuqe na iqe anka _ .
enkaam _ tamaa na _ uksaagh mun _ lliinʼghani _ October-mun _ nunivag meng llu _ kevigh te luku _ awataghpag mun _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani _ tamaa na _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh _ uukagh _ asighte aqe luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukaghtagh teng _ asighte luki _ tagite aqe kangit _ qeghaghnaqenghata _ .
eghqwaagh te kaghqagh t _ uksuqun _ ellngit a llu _ atuqe yaghqaa luki _ itake aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ qafsina _ asighnegh _ , _ qula neng _ uglaaghaqluku _ asighte aqe luku _ sangwa _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng _ pikayug t _ .
aamta _ whangkuta _ uukagh _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ pugneghqagh _ , _ nunivag t _ taakut _ qaaynganitaqut _ qeghagh nun _ qaake luteng _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ enkaam _ asightengngwaaghaqiit _ .
uukagh t _ kinegh nghhagh t _ , _ iggwani _ pi niigh pigte ut _ Septemperem _ uukaghti a _ .
kinegh ghllag ste gpenaki _ qeghaate aqe lghiit _ eghqwaagh te kaghqagh u luki _ .
aamta _ sivuligh t _ August-em _ pi i _ masleg kanigh aqe ut _ .
uuk _ , _ ila a _ uukagh _ July-mi _ piyaghqaanʼghani _ kingugtagh u ghllag qagh yu k _ .
ukut _ enkamm _ ggata i _ neqangiitngwaaghumaaqegkangi _ kingug m _ .
september _ taana _ kingugnapagilnguq _ enkaam _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aatkagh m _ kaki llegh a _ , _ atuqe llegh a _ neghigh luku
Wayengim _ apegh llegh a
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ liite unga _ kaki meng _ .
Iqragmetaghngaata _ kaki naqutke kau unga _ , _ nalikek _ eight _ , _ nine-years-ngulunga _ .
kelug nka _ natete yagh luteng _ nanghiiqwaaghaatam _ qenwat _ tawaten _ liite unga _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ maana _ maaten _ atugh ut _ ukavansaghtuq _ .
iitek _ allgegh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ taawanginaq _ ukavanteftuq _ .
palaghhagh u yagh uq _ aate tke aq _ , _ iitegngam _ kameraagh _ aklunagh luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
kameg ngllagh aqe kangit _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh meng _ melqugh ligh luku _ yug t _ ipigtu luku _ , _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ kaame kegka _ yug t _ .
Uygiinʼghaghmeng _ kayanqusiqat _ , _ aarraghwaaghusiigut _ .
whanga _ tawaten _ liite lleg mni _ .
ataasigh t _ amiiragh t _ kameg mun _ naama kayug t _ , _ neghsagh t _ aangkegtat _ neghsapig t _ .
qazigyagh t _ aangeghllanʼghilnguut _ amsakelghii t _ .
neghsapig t _ sufllughraggneghlluget _ .
Unʼgavek _ unʼgapisiiluki _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ , _ neghsapig t _ unʼgapisiiluki _ piniqe aqe ait _ .
Ayumiqunʼghani _ sufllughraggneghlluget _ qazigyagh neng _ .
qazigyagh t _ ayumiqunaqutnginaq _ taapngigsimaaqegkangi _ .
kukupag t _ unglleneghtungitneng _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
aghi negh meggni _ unglleg neghtuqagh t _ .
amiiragh t _ kinenʼghata _ , _ pellug luki _ iqangigh aqe ait _ sa ta i _ mesiighneghighaqiit _ melqwillu _ .
whaten _ uksugh mi _ pikagh t _ melqwi _ taane luki _ mesiigh i _ taane vyiigh aqe ait _ .
aane te luki _ anigu kun _ tuutqughluki _ enkaam _ ilu akun _ niightugh aqe ait _ .
talwa _ liighqimun _ pattern- nge isagh ut _ .
Atuluggaghteggun _ atuqe yagh ka itgun _ nasiqute luki _ aange aghagh luki _ pi aqe ait _ .
aghvegh m _ ivalu i _ qiipagh ke aqe ait _ asi an _ tungangi _ tukughagh i _ .
emta _ angtughaat _ ivalu kegtekayugu ut _ .
iitek _ ila i llu _ amsakaghtagh t _ aghvepigetllu _ ivalu kegte ut _ .
enkaam _ pinemteki _ iike luki _ qupughragh luki _ , _ qupughhugh luki _ , _ kinegh ngllagh luki _ kinenʼghata _ qiipi aqe aput _ .
tallu luki _ pi aqe aput _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ amestaaghhaat _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ , _ qule mun _ kaleftagh u sigh t _ , _ uygiinghagh t _ qule i _ kameg m _ .
kaleftagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
Kaleftaghluki _ kaki aqe ait _ .
Yaagkestaaghaat _ kaki llegh t _ .
quyngigh m _ ivalu i _ amestaaghhaaluki _ qiipi luki _ tespagavek _ atuqe aqe ut _ .
aghvegh m _ pi i _ qayughllak _ ila i _ , _ iitek _ ila i _ taaqe kayug t _ amestaaghhaaluki _ .
qiipi lghii ni _ whaten _ tapghaghpawaaghem _ qiipelghatun _ qiipe magh ita _ eslegtalkaghqiistun _ tallu luki _ , _ uygaagh ke luki _ uugnangikun _ , _ nuuve neghqagh i _ taakut _ amelliighaghaqluki _ taagavek _ .
tagneghsagh naqe lghii ni _ tagneghli meng _ sa meng _ tagneghsaregaghaqiit _ , _ kaleftagh mun _ whaten _ atuqe naqe lghii ni _ , _ uygu sigh u luki _ pi lghii ni _ .
kenuleg t _ siku ut _ kameg mun _ kaki sigh t _ , _ maaten _ three-sided-kaqegkangit _ kenuleg t _ tamaakut _ ipeg lghiit _ sangyiilnguut _ .
tespagavek _ kameg m _ uygu anun _ kenug ite ngugh t _ angqaperug kegtagh t _ kaki sigh u ut _ .
atungag meng _ aange lghii meng _ , _ amsakaghtagh meng _ iwhanimeng _ nateghqagh ke kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
whanga _ liite lleg mni _ unʼgavek _ kameg t _ qasiqagh meng _ nateghqagh igh kayugu ait _ kiyang _ .
aghisigh luki _ yataaghqe aqe ait _ aghi nghata _ egte luki _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ amiiragh _ yukutate luni _ kaki nqegte uq _ .
elngaatall _ taaqe lghii ni _ kinengllaghwaaghaqiit _ .
Nazighaam _ amiiragh i _ temkagh ke kayugu ait _ , _ uksugh mi _ atugh u ut _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ .
sivuligh ghhagh mta _ aagkut _ kiig mi _ ellnginaaluki _ uuslluki _ sa ta i _ qaasligh u luki _ atuqe kayugu yaghpete ait _ .
maaten _ whanga _ liite lleg mni _ uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ atuqe yagute ma kangit _ .
amigh meng _ qamagun _ ilepghaaghmeng _ ilupeghagh igh luki _ .
Temkaas _ taakut _ qaye akun _ amiiragh t _ melqwi _ qaasligh ke luki _ uksugh mi _ maqagh ghllag t _ .
Taakunguut _ qaamkut _ ilukligh t _ ategh i _ ilepghaaghet _ .
taakut _ qaasligh at _ temkagh at _ , _ nungightelget _ paagna i _ qukagh i llu _ , _ tukughagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luteng _ temkagh at llu _ ilepghaaghetlu _ .
kameg m _ ilu akun _ allighte t _ amiiragh t _ .
ila i _ pi lget _ qallukagh meng _ allighte ke aqe ut _ .
amigh meng _ ama _ qalleg vag kaqe ut _ , _ nuqutuqagh t _ yugusigh a _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ naranʼghilluteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
amalleqa _ tawaten _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ amigh meng _ iluklighte luki _ ila i _ uksugh mi _ milqwi _ qamanlluki _ .
qaasligh at _ taakut _ milqwi _ qaye anite luki _ .
uksugh mi _ whaten _ aghnagh m _ amalleqa _ atugh it _ qaspiqulluki _ .
ighu i _ segesqugh mun _ kenle kut _ .
maqaghqe ghllag luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ qiipaghagh _ kayaalnguq _ tamaani _ iwernga _ ama _ ila i _ nuugh nga lghii ni _ inglupigagh ghhagh u kayugu ut _ , _ saatghwaaghhaaluki _ sa ta i _ qaasligh ke luki _ qallevag t _ , _ alla _ qaye akun _ atkug luteng _ .
amigh ghqu aq _ kiyang _ atkug kaqsagh kangat _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ alpa _ , _ metghagh _ , _ kangʼghwaagmengllu _ atkug kayugu yaghpete ut _ .
weni _ whanga llu _ liite lleg mni _ sa u a _ kayaali kestagh ta a _ .
ila a _ atuqe pagnanigh magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
yug t _ ngelqaghmeng _ , _ alpa meng _ kiyang _ atkug kaqe ut _ .
saye i _ atkug ngllagh aqe ait _ atuqe aqe ait _ atkungllamun _ .
Paamnangillu _ atuqe kayugu ut _ naate lghii ni _ , _ naamalighlleghhiini _ .
amalleqa _ amiiragh i _ aghvig luki _ yataaghqe llegh i _ pi aqe ait _ keligaghwaaghluki _ .
taaqe neghllug pigu ut _ sukilpagh t _ wata _ mekestaaghhagh t _ .
naate neghllug pigu ut _ , _ pegte aqe luki qun _ enraq _ kaki aqe lghiit _ .
Ighivgaghmillu _ whaten _ kiyang _ pikayug u ut _ .
aghneghmi _ whaten _ sa meng _ neqenge naqe meng _ qepghamsuregaghtuqaq _ , _ qepghaqagh _ uglaapigtengnguyaghtuq _ aghnagh ni _ mangteghapig mete luni _ , _ kiyang _ ighivgaghmi _ aghuliigh qagh negh meggni _ kaki llegh kesagh kangat _ .
ne m _ qepghaqagh a _ .
sapeghhnagh mi _ whaten _ kanegh ghllag kayugu ut _ aagra m _ qaye i _ , _ nategh mi _ .
qama _ qayughllak _ puqla ghllag u aqe lghii _ , _ iiyagh _ eslegtanqelluku _ agepsughtaaqayuget _ egllu stun _ , _ enkaam _ kanegh ghllag qagh yu k _ .
naqamllu _ tawanlliqiigalkangit _ . _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ alleg luki _ egte aqe luki _ .
nanigh t _ taakut _ ama _ uqughqagh aneng _ yataaghqe llegh i _ , _ uqugh isag lleghqagh i _ uqigh aqe luki _ .
nutaghagh inagh meng _ whaten _ pinegh meggni _ , _ iitegngam _ aqlagha mi _ whaten _ mesiigh i _ nuugh aatagh naqe ghllag t _ tangtaqeregameng _ lliigh lghii ni _ .
kapeghte luteng _ kumlate luteng _ whaten _ tamaakut _ ughugtemmeng _ ayuqe lghiit _ sukate nagh ut _ .
aqlagha igh te mi _ tangtaqeregiluteng _ lliigh aqe ut _ enkaam _ sukangiite aqe ai _ mesiigh ngllagh llegh i _ .
uglagh _ mesiigh _ atuqe aqe aat _ nanigh mun _ , _ ila ita _ maalghug u aqe lghiit _ pagum _ inglegh m _ nanigh a _ .
inga _ alla _ maalghug _ inglu ani _ enkaam _ estamat _ nanigh t _ atuqe kayugu ait _ .
tamaakut _ neghsagh m _ uqigh a _ awatkaghtagh meng _ akume vleghagh luteng _ pinigh aqe ut _ .
aamta _ ellnginaaluteng _ kumaghugh naqe ghllag aqe ut _ .
Aksigungwaaghluteng _ kumaghugh igate ut _ .
taawanginaq _ yakumangilngugh ni _ pama yug ma t _ .
neghsagh meng llu _ atkug ngllagh kayugu te u lghii ni _ .
Paqniilnguut _ qevuute luteng _ yukutanami _ .
kiyang _ taakunguut _ qawaag m _ amiiri _ kiyang _ atugh t _ .
qikmigh meng _ puvite ke ut _ , _ puvisaagh igh kayugu ut _ .
ataasigh t _ agaten _ amaa llgagh at _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ pamakaghtagh t _ .
weni _ maaten _ quynginge magh an _ liite kau unga _ .
quyngigh u uute luku _ salin _ taaganingani _ tespamaken _ amigh llu _ pi ma aqe yagh kangat _ .
Upenʼghami _ amiiragh t _ milqwighluki _ kaame kaqe ait _ .
aghinaghte nghaani _ melqwilngughmeng _ kaame kaqe ut _ .
uksugh mi _ aamta _ melqughtugh ma lghii meng _ kaame ke kayugu ut _ .
quyillegtagh u ut _ uksugh mi _ aatkagh it _ .
uliigh t _ tamaakut _ mughu te mun _ atugh u ut _ .
Unʼgapisim _ kameg m _ ategh ke ai _ , _ uliigh _ .
quyillegtagh t _ maani _ qute mi _ naveg _ ama _ pi mun _ atugh t _ .
Akughvigaas _ tamaakut _ aghinaghneghani _ angyagh mun _ ivghaagh sigh t _ upenʼghami _ taape neghllug t _ .
taawanginaq _ tawaten _ taapngiggneghata _ tukruuggneghata _ aghvig luki _ mesiigh meng _ sa ta i _ angighhe aqe ait _ qaamnangi _ .
mulu negh meggni _ mesiighneghiitaqut _ .
enkaam _ taape neghllug ghraagte aqe ai _ .
aghyugh negh meggni _ taapngigtekayugii _ .
amiiragh _ aklu niite luku _ simigh qiinagh aqe luku _ taapngigtekaq _ pikayug u aat _ .
kiig mi _ enraq _ temkag lug t _ aghvig luki _ , _ sa ta i _ kavighte luki _ pi aqe ait _ kameg ngllagh aqe ait _ .
aamqute u ut _ nateghqagh m llu _ amiiragh m llu _ akulanganilnguut _ enkaam _ ukatanganilnguut _ qiipagh m _ itegh qagh i uute ai _ elngaatall _ sagniite u ut _ , _ sagniite ke ai _ .
Tapghaghpawaaghmengqun _ atugh lghii ni _ , _ kelug mun _ itegh qagh i aatagh u ut _ seve uute na yu kata _ sa na yu kata _ .
test-pag kut _ quulnganilnguut _ uygu u ut _ .
Unʼgantut _ uum _ iteg ngestagh m _ taakwnanganilnguut _ mughnegh t _ , _ nateghqagh m _ tungangani _ .
paagna an _ pi i _ nungighte u ut _ , _ singigh a _ , _ putulghi i _ , _ nungightengi _ .
uygu yan _ kaki llegh i _ neftegte llegh i _ kaleftagh u uute luki _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ .
test-pag kut _ nungighte yan _ iggwhaningi _ nungighte yiite te t _ .
qallukagh at _ kameg t _ estullug meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ quyngigh m _ ighu i _ ategh i _ qallukagh at _ estullunglaqayuugit _ .
ipigtu luki _ piyug lghii ni _ ipigkestaaghhagh u luku _ ilaaghtugh aqe luki _ aange lghiit _ ayuqe ait _ .
ipigkingwaagh t _ ipigkestaaghhagh at _ kameg t _ , _ enkaam _ ipigtuqagh t _ pagavesengwaagh t _ .
neghigh luku _ UNANGNIILEQ _ maani _ sivuqagh mi
Akulkim _ apegh llegh a
whaten _ uksaagh mi _ kumlaluni _ anigunʼghagu _ , _ elngaatall _ yuug _ yataaghqe te ghllag kayugu uq _ , _ siku k _ kaate ste gpenakek _ .
tapghagh _ , _ uunʼghaq _ , _ qaanʼngwaaq _ , _ sa u a _ atughqagh _ unangniighmun _ apeghiigh naqe aqe kangat _ .
uyiigh _ , _ tuugkagh _ , _ ayveghniighmun _ atughqagh _ tugaaghesnangllaghteghaqegkangat _ .
sa u a _ qamiyallu _ tamaa na _ , _ qaghlu kaghqagh _ qikmigh mun _ ulima luku _ , _ pi lleghqagh _ kaate ste gpenaan _ pi aqe kangat _ .
taagken _ uksunʼghan _ , _ uksugh na iqe aat _ siku k _ kaanneghegkeni _ maavek _ .
tawani _ yuug _ tengghuniqe te aqe uq _ piyaamun _ uksugh yuggaagh nghaani _ qayughllak _ teghig ke sagh m _ unake naqe llegh a _ piyaqnagh iitagh ke lghii _ siku gni _ unʼgani _ .
unaangu luku _ aghte ste gpenaan _ sivuke pigte luku _ eslaqagh ke lghiit _ aane luteng _ , _ saamna llu _ esne _ qagi a _ agigsaghtuughaqegkangat _ navek _ wiin _ pi vagilgameng _ .
Pininʼghani _ mughu te mun _ , _ yataaghqelluteng _ aga _ aghulaqe uute aqe lghiit _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ .
kiyang _ paamggun _ kiwavek _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh nun _ esghaate naqe magh meng _ teghigmeng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
ilangakun _ taakwaningiighaq _ ayveghagh te aqe lghiit _ tegh ik _ qantaghate nghaani _ .
Uyiighis _ taakut _ elngaatall _ kelengake sqe lleg leg t _ iglakaasiqnayukatki _ ayvegh niigh kumeng _ .
Ayvelgunʼghani _ tawaten _ sanqute teng _ quunpeng _ yataang _ pi aqe lghiit _ pi llgu na llegh ani _ siku m _ .
liilightuusagh _ taana _ , _ uyiigh teng _ quunpeng _ uughqa n _ tunganganilluki _ iiwleng _ pi sqe lleg leg t _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh _ nanʼghiiqaalghiit _ , _ yug t _ ayvegh mun _ nusug na iqe ait _ uyiigh kun _ iglag ke aqe aat _ .
enkaam _ tamaaken _ apaalluqluku _ uyiigh t _ anuqe m _ tungangaku _ pi snanigh lleg leg t _ , _ tengtekuyeng _ iglakaasiiyaghqat _ .
taana qun _ kiiw u aq _ sivungagh mi _ ayvegh m _ nusug qu a _ tawaten _ uyiigh an _ iglakaghluku _ tazimantekagh _ .
unangniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ liilightuusagh ghllag u uq _ qayughllak _ awen _ peleghqe tke kayug _ .
ila a _ whaa _ puygukefut _ .
Tamaatum _ liilightuusagh a _ , _ esla m _ , _ siku m _ , _ megh m _ , _ maaqellegh m _ saamlu _ ila yan _ natetulnganeng _ liite luteng _ wetku _ ellmegneng _ mughute yaaghtekayug t _ nukalpigagh t _ . _ wiin _ sivuke luteng _ pi ke sigh nun _ maligsaagh te luteng _ unangniighmun _ piinligh kayug t _ liite kayug t _ tawaten _ nanʼghiighluku _ mughute ni uq _ .
kina _ taanʼgani _ ayveghagh nghmini _ tawani _ ila ni _ pi yaagh lgute ni _ apagh aatagh aqe ai _ uusqagh llegh anun _ siku m _ mayuqaghlini _ .
enkaam _ uvilighneghmelnguut _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ esghaate negh migte ni _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ nengigh yagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
Kaatquunnneghata _ uglagh te luki _ ayvegh teng _ qaake luki _ , _ qamagte luni _ yuug _ nengigh uute aqe uq _ .
aga _ asighte i luteng _ qaanʼngwaateng _ kelute mun _ taglagh naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ kingu ligh qutagh luteng _ igleghte te aqe ut _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ .
uka _ qamugh te lghiit _ ne meng _ esghagh nghmegteki _ , _ nanevgagh u aqe ut _ qeleghraghtet _ , _ siivanllegh t _ kayagte aqe ait _ mekelghiigh t _ paayghisqelluki _ , _ igaghyagh t llu _ tamaakut _ pi ste aqe kangit _ igaghyagh u ghngaita _ .
kinku t _ tuungqagh teng _ qamuutagh ke ait _ , _ kinku t llu _ alngunak _ .
tawani _ neqe _ piyuwhaanʼghani _ , _ tamaghhagh mi _ quya kayugu uq _ , _ qayughllak _ sivuqagh _ iingunagh mi _ nutaghagh meng _ neqe meng _ naasiigh yaghqaa lghii _ .
tawatete uq _ tamaani _ ataasigh stun _ yug a _ ayuqe te yagh uq _ .
ilangani _ tamaakut _ pi yu aat _ yug t _ , _ tevragh t _ , _ up- qlighte te aqe lghiit _ meghhagh ni _ nalighmeng _ iighwilngugh m _ kangite gkeni _ .
neghsagh llu _ tamaani _ aklunagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
aga _ iighwilngugh t _ quupaghnaqutnginaq _ nuug inagh magh meng _ kiyang _ pi aqe yagh lghiit _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ tawaten _ .
tagtalmi _ ikevagh ughte luni _ megh ughte nghagu _ amalleqa _ angyagh meng _ pinegh meggni _ ayvegh _ , _ maklag _ , _ neghsagh _ unake aqe kangat _ .
taawanginaq _ uksugh mi _ sallegyugumaghtaqegkanga _ . _ siku k llu _ pininʼghegkegni _ kiyang _ aghneghtu mi _ esavghagh te aqe lghiit _ unʼgavek _ ama _ neqete luteng llu _ taglagh aqe luteng _ .
neqete naqe a _ taana _ iiwleng _ ayuqe lghii _ , _ tawaten _ pillghughtaghhneghani _ .
neqangisag lleghqagh _ pakiggutaqegkangat _ saama llu _ aghneghtughneghani _ tegh ik llu _ awavagh qagh yu k _ .
tawani llu _ esla _ pinighaghluku _ pi naqe kayug t _ .
tawani llu _ uksugh yuggaagh mi _ qawaagni ii aagh _ pikayug _ .
aygughara meng _ unaangu luku _ aghtaghaqestanʼghani _ kangʼghwaak _ , _ alpa meng _ , _ metghaghmeng _ ilangakun _ akume luni _ aygugh ghllag qagh yu k _ , _ enkaam _ aygughara meng _ ategh leg _ .
Ighivgaghmi _ enraq _ eslugh ghllag qagh yu k _ uqumigtengnguuq _ ategh a _ .
aywaa neng _ anuqe _ ugavaneng _ ayuqenʼghani _ qawaagniigh llgu nagh aqe uq _ .
naten _ ilangakun _ siku k llu _ kaasaghanʼghegkegni _ nani _ tamaani _ kaneghyengesi mi _ , _ qighunegh _ pi ghllag qagh yu k _ .
qighunegh meng _ ategh leg _ tamaa na _ alpaaghaayalghii _ tenge igate ngughk _ qugilipagllagem _ , _ enkaam _ ilangani _ uksugh llegh m _ sighlatkeghllakayuwaat _ siku mete luku _ , _ meghagh ite u tke aq _ , _ kiyang _ amani llu _ , _ qawani llu _ .
emta _ iinʼghusalek _ , _ uglagh negh mii ni nguq _ nenge a _ ughumakayuguniluku _ pi aqe aat _ enkaam _ kelenga sagh u uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
enkaam _ uksugh _ navek _ taakwavek _ Lluughvigmun _ llinʼghani _ angyaleg _ tamaghaghmi _ aghvegh mun _ sanqute t _ yataaghqe te aqe kangit _ .
angyaghwaagh u yagh lghiit _ aghvegh niigh sagh it _ tamaani _ . _ Gaarinʼghi _ ghhuugh m llu _ simigh aqe luki _ naavuma na yu kata _ , _ tamaakut llu _ aghqelengestagh i _ .
keniliigh te magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ pillghughtefagilgagu _ kete ghesnagh yaghqaa luteng _ .
quunpeng _ taakut _ kenilegh t _ kelengake luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ anigunʼghaki _ pekete aqe luki _ , _ amalleqa _ vuumanʼghakillu _ reghightaqluki _ iiwleng _ .
aamta _ tuvalgunʼghani _ tawaten _ ataasigh inagh t _ kenilegh t _ segge aqe ait _ , _ qayughlak _ ilangakun _ tuvagh _ aastu aqe lghii _ .
Aaskestaaghhaanʼghani _ kiyang _ malghugnegh t _ pi aqe ait _ , _ uwatangaghmiitlu _ , _ akingaghmiitlu _ .
taawa _ aghveghni ii aagh _ piinligh aqe uq _ aghvegh llu _ igleghte magh mi _ pi aqe lghii _ .
saama llu _ meghughhneghtughtaqegkanga _ . _ esla _ unaami _ pinighsugninnaqenʼghani _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ iye _ inglupigagh _ atugh naqe ni luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ ilangakun _ atghaghtegh te aqe lghiit _ iglag ke luku _ tengʼghuniqem _ aqfaalighaataasimaghmeng _ taayugniighem _ .
taakut _ kiyang _ Awergenkut _ sivulii yuneghtuqagh t _ .
elngaatall _ aga _ kete uute negh meggni _ napaghhwaaghtaqegkanga _ telaananga m _ .
pilaataqu negh meggni _ aga _ aghvenge i nagh magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ ilangani _ , _ ama _ tawaten _ ila a _ ayumiqullegh m _ avangite aqe luni _ ayuqe lghii _ angyaghnaghpag i te m llu _ pi ste aqe kanga _ .
kinku t _ taakut _ aghvenge negh meggni _ aga _ napaatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ liisimake luki _ ivenrugh u uute qaghtagh te aqe lghiit _ napaatagh meng _ esghaate negh meggni _ .
Paagkenlu _ ne meng _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ liisima kaqe kangit _ ilangakun _ , _ enkaam _ ne mi llu _ qesugniqe te aqe lghiit _ aghvenguughumaghmeng _ .
tuqute luki _ aghvegh teng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ enraq _ kelute mun _ kaalgugh naqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyagh _ qamagte luni _ kaalguutagh ke lghii _ uyguuquteghllagluni _ uka _ aliinegh meggni _ .
kaalgughkagh teng _ kaat ute te nghmegteki _ ategh leg t _ teghlug te meng _ , _ teghlug te na iqe kangit _ .
unuk _ pi tke igate aat _ aga _ pilag naqe magh meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ aqsaqughiitigh qagh luteng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ mangtag _ nengigh te igate yaghpete aat _ , _ enkaam _ angyagh _ iingunagh mi _ aghvegh mi _ tawani _ pi naqute kayug _ .
tamaakut _ angyagh m _ yug i _ kayungqanʼghet _ suyvaghte aqe lghiit _ , _ iwernga _ tea- ma a _ pikayug _ , _ naasiigh qagh yu k _ .
suqi a _ , _ llaag i _ , _ sa i llu _ taam _ aghvelghem _ agghi te aqe ai _ , _ inpite qugh magh mi _ pikayug llu _ navek _ alngunak _ .
taagken _ kiig m _ aghnagh a _ piite nghaani _ , _ aghvegh iitagh ke kanga _ .
tawani _ enraq _ ayveghniighmun _ neqniighmun _ legh iigh aqe lghiit _ .
tawani llu _ tanqigh mi _ teghigem _ avaqutaghagh a _ allgekqayuk _ , _ qasiqagh leg _ , _ teghiglug leg _ unakughaqegkangat _ .
neqe _ uglagh luku _ pinagh kaqe kangat _ tegh ik _ aligh u aatagh luku _ , _ esla _ pininʼghani _ qavalqugpenateng _ angyaghtugh aqe lghiit _ .
kagpag naqe magh an _ neqe _ pi aqe kangat _ .
tamaani llu _ qikmigh _ atugh ghllagu yagh lghii _ enkaam _ ila a _ kiyang _ neghqutkagh u luku _ saghna ghllag aqe aat _ .
tuugte magh an _ manguna _ , _ kemeg qragh k _ tamaa na _ nefku magh an _ , _ neqangisag lleghqagh _ pakiggutkaqegkangat _ liisimake luku _ .
tawani _ pinaghvig mi llu _ ayughaayag _ qawani _ pi aqe aat _ nani _ taakwani _ tapghugh m _ ketanga ni llu _ .
siku pagite te aqe kanga _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ iwernga _ qavregh meng llu _ ayveghagh te kayug t _ unʼgani _ .
qavregh _ taana _ aghnasaleg _ amsakaghtagh meng _ akume luni _ qasiqagh leg t _ akuuragh qaghaqe ait _ .
aga _ awavagh magh mi _ taana _ qavregh _ pikayug _ .
Qemiighunneghaniinguq _ pigtekayuguftaat _ .
sikungigh te a _ maligte luku _ tegh ik llu _ maligte te kayug _ .
tawani llu _ pinaghvig mi _ kiyang _ matum _ qiighqagh m _ qawaag a _ kaat quute te kayug _ .
alpa eng _ unake aqe aat _ qawaagniigh luku _ .
unaangu pigte luku _ ugani _ singikrag mi _ sukilpaqulghii _ pi aqe kangat _ , _ ighinʼghanillu _ whanikumi _ .
amiiragh a _ tamaatum _ qawaag m _ atkugkagh u luku _ pegtiirakigalkangat _ , _ alpa _ , _ ngelqagh _ , _ sukilpagh _ , _ ila i llu _ .
kiwani _ naayghagh mi _ uzive yaaghte nghaani _ tawani _ annavagluku _ pikayug _ .
uugtekayug _ ighivgaghmillu _ , _ unaangu luku llu _ .
ategh kek _ ighivgaayaankunguut _ , _ unaayaankuk _ .
naputuqagh _ naayghagh _ teskiwna _ anag vag vig meng _ , _ ategh i _ napu t _ .
aywaa neng llu _ ikevaghmengllu _ napu leg _ , _ emta _ pinigh llegh i _ sivulii yug te kaqe ait _ anuqe _ pininʼghanillu _ .
tamaa na _ anag vag ni uq _ teghig nagh pigte uq _ liite lghii ni _ anavagmeng _ .
enkaam _ anavagyaq _ uglagh u pigte aqe uq _ .
Uglaaghinʼghani _ qagugh ak _ kiyang _ nukalpigagh _ tamaavek _ tengʼghuniqutaqelghii _ .
uglagh luku _ qagugh ak _ unake nghmegteggu _ kagpag kayug at _ kiyang _ ighaluqi luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
Ighaluqameng _ ategh ke ut _ tamaakut _ mesiigh kun _ kanaghtekagh t _ .
tawaten _ ila a _ neqe m _ kagpalgha _ ayuqe lghii _ tamaani _ neghigh luku _ .
nani _ tamaani _ elte nagh vig mi _ qagugh ak _ ighninʼghani _ agavek _ pennagh nun _ angyagh meng _ manig yagh te kayug _ megh _ pininʼghani _ , _ alpa m _ manig anun _ , _ amalleqa _ agavek _ nunivag mun _ kiyang _ piyug meng _ pi aqe ut _ metghaam _ saam _ manig anun _ ila i _ .
sukilpagh m llu _ manig anun _ kigwavek _ naayghagh mun llu _ manig yagh aqe lghiit _ ama _ .
tamaani _ salin _ qawaagniighusigh _ allgeghlaallghilluku _ neghigh luku _ tea- ma kut _ atugh aqe kangit _ negaghagh t _ , _ suqagh meng _ ulimaagh t _ metghagh mete te _ atugh t _ .
tamaakut _ sukilpagh mun _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ qitavestaagh t _ , _ naghuyagh mun _ enkaam _ atugh t _ maklegsagh meng _ ategh leg t _ , _ enkaam _ ngelqagh mete te _ atugh t _ ategh ke ai _ ayengqeghragh t _ .
ama _ tamaakut _ kuuvragh meng _ ategh leg t _ ulima llegh i _ negaghpag stun _ ayuqekanit _ teghiglug mun _ naapte luki _ pi sigh t _ .
enkaam _ llangaqa _ unange ni uq _ teghigmun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe aqe lghii _ kiig mi _ iwernga _ ila i _ nunaagh meggnun _ aglagh uute aqe lghiit _ kiyang _ unatagh anun llu _ .
nunivag anun _ , _ uqfigagh anun _ sa mun llu _ unatagh m _ ila anun _ .
sa u a _ atughqagh _ sa mun _ unaghsigh _ angwaaghute kaghqagh _ , _ yaavuquute kaghqagh _ , _ ivagh aqe kangat _ sa mun llu _ ila anun _ atughqagh _ .
quugkagh meng llu _ quug meng _ qerngughte i aqe luteng _ mayughtagh ke luki _ qerngagh ita _ .
kiig mi _ nunaaghmelnguut _ yug t _ kiyang _ unange na i aaghet _ neghsagh meng _ , _ qawaag meng llu _ .
sa mun _ tamaavek _ pivikegllaghakun _ nunaanglaghaqelghiit _ kiyang _ .
samavek llu _ uughqa nun _ iqalliyaghaqelghiit _ .
kiilqusigh _ iqallug eng _ naapte aqe kangat _ tesamani _ naayvaghllag mi _ .
Wekullu _ kumlayaghtunʼghani _ uteghnigh uute aqe lghiit _ .
teskiwavek _ kangii nun _ angyagh meng _ itghagh luteng _ teskiwhken _ saghya eng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ teve te qugh luki _ qaqlungighig nun _ teve aqe lghiit _ naayvaghllag mun _ .
Ukumllu _ uughqa n _ meghe a _ pininʼghani _ taakwagun _ angyagh meng _ pikayug u ut _ qagi ite nghaani _ .
pugughileghmii t llu _ taakut _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ kiig ta a _ kiyang _ tamaghaan _ teskiwavek _ pikayug t _ iqallugagh nun _ weku _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ngelqagh u aghagh niigh nghmeng _ .
iqalliniighvig _ ategh leg _ , _ egkugh a _ tespagna _ , _ tapghaaghagh llu _ , _ aghvigh tek llu _ qupnegh niigh vig t _ , _ taanegna _ ketlighneq _ iqallupig niigh vig _ .
enkaam _ tespamna _ nuna meng _ ategh leg _ kiigwtaghniighvik _ .
ukani _ tamaa na _ iqallug _ pi igate yaghpete aat _ tamaani _ , _ wetku _ qantaghaqun _ pi yagute kau ut _ liite luku _ .
yeqay _ uukagh eng _ sighla tke ghllag kayugu aat _ nulugh luku _ kiipaghqenʼghani _ .
tamaa na llu _ kayu _ kiwani _ naayghagh m _ sivungagh ni _ pikayug at _ .
tawani _ uksaaghyaghtunʼghani _ amalleqa _ yuug _ qimugsigh qagh yu k _ yataaghqe te kayug _ , _ qamiye meng _ , _ qaghlu meng _ qimugsigh sighqagh meng _ sa meng llu _ ila aneng _ unangniighmun _ atughqagh meng _ .
tamaani _ neghigh luku _ qamiye _ paaragh ite usagh lghii _ , _ taatghusigh ite usagh lghii _ .
qamiye mun _ taatghusigh at _ atugh it _ unaghsigh t _ tamaani _ ingleghagh t _ akule itgun _ asitmun _ kenʼgutkayuget _ , _ ategh ke ai _ yagaarinat _ .
talwa _ uyghiite ite ngugh t _ tamaani _ .
aghuliigh negh meggni _ taakut _ kagsagute teng _ qikmigh meng _ sivungagh kun _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
kagsagute t _ tamaakut _ qikmigh mun _ aghyuugh sigh u ut _ .
Pineghlliqenʼghata _ kagsagmig aqe ait _ enkaam _ qikmigh m _ aliksaliitaqiit _ .
tawatete yagh lghii _ tamaani _ igleghneq _ .
NATENG _ angyapig m _ ulu ii ma llegh i
Akulkim _ apegh llegh a
ayumigh _ ulimghusiq _ pinigh lghii _ maaten _ atugh ut _ aviite yagh lghii _ .
sa u a _ tamaaghhaan _ maani _ allgeghtekaq _ atuqe kaqe kangat _ sa ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ unangniighusigh _ tamaghhagh an _ ulimaperugwaaghluku _ pi aqe kangat _ tamaani _ .
angyaghtugh sigh t _ angyagh t _ tamaani _ atugh it _ ategh ke lghiit _ angyapig meng _ .
Tagtalngi _ kiyang _ yuginagh _ itegagh _ siipngagh lghiit _ .
Iqetulngi _ kiyang _ yaagnegh stun _ iqetutka aqe ut _ .
mayughneghqagh _ , _ neghqwaaghtaghqagh _ esne mi _ ivagh luku _ pi aqe kangat _ angyat ngllagh naqe negh meggni _ .
tuquuqagh igh te luku _ nemegh perewaagh _ nemegh yaghqagh _ pi aqe kangat _ suqaghmem _ kelevekagh meng _ nemegh kete luteng _ .
enkaam _ saamnangillu _ angyagh m _ taklaghmete luki _ ulima aqe yagh kangit _ ayumigh _ .
Ingusighluki _ tawaten _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ yuug _ aqume uute yaghqaa luku _ alla _ angyaleg _ angyalligh kun _ .
tamaakut _ aghnasaleg t _ uvineg kegtagh t _ amiiqagh u iqe ait _ amighqagh u luki _ angyagh mun _ .
sivuke luki _ kiighte luki _ niightugh kayug t _ meqenʼghata _ .
amigh i naqe negh meggni _ sivuke luki _ kenite aqe ait _ aghingwaaghesqelluki _ .
Maalghu _ , _ pi nga yu _ tanpegh _ naama kayug _ angyagh mun _ amu i luni _ kiyang _ .
uyguragh anun _ qiipagh t _ kaki sigh t _ ategh ke ai _ tea-si sigh t _ ivalu meng _ ulimaagh it _ pi aghte luteng _ .
angyagh mun _ amu i luki _ aghnasaleg t _ liisima kangit _ mulu neghtuqagh t _ ugi neng _ , _ saama _ uvineg kegte yu i magh meng _ .
ugi t _ tamaakunʼnguq _ ataasighaghmeng _ ayumiqukayuguftut _ , _ imange yuguma magh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
angyagh m _ amu i _ tamaani _ talwa _ piineqiigasaqangit _ .
enkaam _ pi nga yu _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ amu i nguq _ simigh yaghqaaghtekayugu ut _ .
saamkut _ kuyaagit _ aghu kayug t _ , _ saama llu _ ukiyugumaghtekayuget _ .
angyagh negh meggni _ igleghte te yu ait _ .
Angwaaghmeng _ , _ yaavuqumeng _ , _ telaananga meng llu _ .
siighnagh t _ kaki te uute luki _ telaananga ngllagh ma aqe kangit _ tamaani _ ayumigh _ .
sanqute t _ AYVEGHNIIGHMUN
Qavalghaam _ apegh llegh a
sanqute t _ tamaakut _ unangniighusigh u ut _ teghigmun _ unʼgani _ kellii ni _ .
Taakunguut _ awataghpag t _ , _ tapghagh at _ , _ uunʼghat _ , _ tuugkagh at _ .
qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh i _ “ _ sanqute t _ ” _ .
angyagh mi _ atugh t _ allakanigh u ut _ siku gni _ atugh neng _ .
Uunʼghat _ unaghsigh u ut _ aghvinleg _ itegagh _ tagtatkelghiit _ angqaperugtekagh t _ iigge meng _ tugu yaghqaa luki _ .
iqug ani _ tugegh meng _ ategh leg t _ naangqugh t _ nuvugyugtekat _ uugnangi _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh tke aat _ .
taakut _ tuugʼghet _ siku m _ umutalnganun _ esghaate yu i ut _ .
Unʼgani _ siku gni _ atupiguus _ tamaakut _ .
enkaam _ uunʼgham _ inglu an _ iqug ani _ , _ ategh i _ iquuyat _ , _ tuugkagh ligh vig t _ .
ama _ tugute t _ peqigte luteng _ nemegh ke aat _ suqagh meng _ kelevngwaaqameng _ .
Iquuyam _ uugnangi _ kepe negh kegtagh t _ qukagh i _ igarutaagh lleg leg t _ giimagh mun _ nekegte vig t _ .
taakut _ giimagh t _ kilgaanlenguut _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ nuuve luteng _ qukagh megteggun _ ayuqe ut _ .
tapghi a _ uunʼghakun _ nemegh tke aat _ naten _ entaqun _ three _ inches _ tagkalghiit _ , _ iqug i _ nuvugyuglluteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
inglu i _ iquuyakun _ aate stekayug t _ , _ inglu i _ tuugkagh kun _ aate stekayug t _ .
Aatesleghiini _ giimagh m _ tapghi a _ nengqengngwaaghaqut _ .
wetku _ naghullgute lghii ni _ ilefkaghaghtekayuget _ .
taakut _ giimagh m _ tapghi a _ ategh lgu ut _ aaghsi meng _ .
enkaam _ taam _ aaghsi m _ uunʼghamun _ nemegh llegh m _ siipnegh i _ taakeghpaggaat _ ama _ atugh u ut _ , _ ategh ke ai _ qalu ukut _ .
taakut _ tuugkagh m _ nuvug i _ savigtagh leg t _ , _ inglu i _ igarutaagh ke aat _ giimagh m _ inglu an _ nuvug a _ itegh yaghqaa luku _ tawavek _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ tuugkaam _ kiwakaghaanilnguq _ tapghagh _ taana _ tuugkaam _ up- yu aatagh a _ , _ ukimallegh akun _ nuuve tke aq _ ategh a _ tukaghsiigh u uq _ .
Enʼngatall _ taana _ tukaghsiigh mun _ uyiigh _ qillghunnaqegkuni _ , _ qapruute u uq _ ategh a _ .
tapghagh m _ uygu te llegh atun _ ayuqe ut _ taawanginaq _ maalghuneng _ nuuve te luteng _ .
tukaghsiigh m _ amalleqa _ uygu te llegh i _ taakut _ estu tete lugh qugh luteng _ kipullegmun _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
sanqute t _ ulima kumeng _ tuugkagh _ aate ste luku _ nenglluku _ uteghmun _ aaghsi kun _ nuuve te luku _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ qaluuku meng _ uyiigh _ awatghute luku _ aaghsi kun _ taana _ nuuve te luku _ ataasigh meng _ nusugteqagh igh luku _ qillghusaghqaq _ .
aga _ ayvegh _ naghulleg kuni _ uunʼghaq _ aga _ mayugh yaghqagh _ uyiigh mete ghngaaghmi _ puglegh yaghqagh _ naranʼghilnguq _ nuqutuqagh _ .
taawa _ taakunguut _ ayvegh niigh sigh t _ sanqute t _ .
taakut _ giimagh t _ naflluugut _ , _ ayvegh mun _ itegh qaghtekuni _ tuugkagh _ , _ una _ uunʼghaq _ ullegh kuni _ aga _ iteme yaghqagh _ .
Enkaamam _ qaaghi _ , _ taakut _ nuvukrugmelnguut _ qilleghnegh ghhagh t _ estullugnegh u ut _ ategh i _ .
taaggun _ iqukrugikun _ ukite luki _ nuuve te luki _ nenglluki _ , _ eggmagh luki _ , _ taakut _ iqukrug i _ qilleghtepigmeng _ qilleghte yaghqagh t _ .
estullugnegh u ut _ ategh i _ .
kiiwhkut _ kangii ut _ , _ kangightemmeng _ ategh ke ut _ .
enkaam _ taagken _ , _ tuugkagh m _ kiwakaghaanilnguq _ tapghagh _ taana _ tuugkagh m _ up- yu aatagh a _ , _ tuugkagh at qun _ ukimallegh leg t _ , _ taaggun _ tapghagh ghhagh t _ nuuve te luki _ , _ tukaghsiigh u ut _ ategh i _ .
sanqute i _ AGHVEGHNIIGHEM
Qavalghaam _ apegh llegh a
tamaakut _ whaa _ aghveghqutagh ke aqe kangit _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ , _ aghveghqutaanʼghisaghtut _ .
ighlleghute u na iqe ait _ , _ ighlleghute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
elngaatall _ aghveghqutanʼnguq _ esghha _ taakut _ uyghag t _ , _ ighlleghute m _ savigtigh a _ .
tuugkagh at qun _ giimagh lgu lghiit _ whaa _ kinguliighaam _ tuugkagh i _ savikenʼghaaghmeng _ .
ighlleghute u ut _ tuugkagh ghllag t _ taakut _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ uyghag t _ ugmestaaghhagh t _ aghveghqutagh u ut _ .
ukimallegh llgagh u aqe ut _ ila i _ .
Sivuyagtem _ quunpeng _ na sa mi _ nungighte nga kete te _ petug luki _ , _ unʼgaani _ .
Nelegtengngwaaghpenaki _ whavek _ ighlleghute mun _ , _ sigiqnayukamiki _ kelenga ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
wetku _ whaa _ aghvegh meng _ pi naqe negh meggni _ nelegte luki _ pikayug u ait _ .
enkaam _ taakwegkut _ ighlleghute m _ kiwakaghaanilnguut _ amalka _ giimagh ghllag u ut _ , _ kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
Angtughpinʼghaghllaget _ nuvug yugsaghkagh t _ whavek _ ighlleghute m _ tunutanganun _ .
Kuuket _ amalka _ tungu i _ .
amenqun _ saveg t _ maakut _ tungig leg t _ .
tamaa na u ut _ .
kuukegh u na iqe ait _ .
elngaatall _ uniilliighaghte yu aqe aat _ tukaghtes _ taakut _ .
Peghngaghmeng _ nuuve te luteng _ taaggun _ , _ peghngaghllagmeng _ tuteg te luteng _ kakitu tke aat _ saviigagh t _ maklag t _ tapghaghrakaaqegkangit _ maaten _ .
kingwaagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ tukaghtenguftunʼnguq _ tawaten _ tuteg tke aat _ uniilliighaghte yaghkagh t _ awataghpag mun _ taaleg mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ kukegmun _ tawavek _ aate ste luku _ , _ taaggun _ putu luteng _ keniqaate lgu na iqe ai _ , _ amalka _ tekeghmigute stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Uunʼghaam _ ila i _ tekeghmigute lgu ut _ .
elngaatall _ uglagh te luki _ nenglluki _ tawavek _ keniqaate mun _ aate sqe aghte aqe ait _ , _ uglagh te luki _ nenglluki _ .
elngaatall _ quunpeng _ taakut _ taawa _ tawantaqut _ upenʼghalqusiq _ .
ayag mun _ tawavek _ kumlu mun _ nemegh tekagh mun _ aate ste nghmegteki _ uglagh te luki _ , _ taawa _ quunpeng _ nelgaqut _ peskugsigatut _ , _ quunpeng _ tawantaqut _ .
quunpeng _ kete negh meggni _ , _ saavgumiighwaaghluteng _ amalka _ , _ taawa _ taakut _ quunpeng _ aatezngalghiit _ ayag mun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
taake uk _ elngaatall _ tukagh tek _ kangigh leg t _ , _ taaleg mun _ tukagh tek _ ilate te lutek _ amenqun _ awatiitegnekun _ ilate luteng _ qillghutkayuget _ .
Awatitnguut _ .
Taam _ kingu u i aghagh a _ tapghagh _ taana _ , _ taana _ tapghaghrag _ , _ tapghaghrag meng _ ategh leg _ , _ unkuuvak _ .
miglegrungigh u yagh ghngaaghmi _ qukiinaani _ .
miglegrungigh at _ elngaatall _ ayvegh _ aghnaaghanʼghhaaghlluk _ , _ taghnughhangenʼghhaghlluk _ miglegrungigh _ .
tamaa na u yagh ghngaan _ qukiinaani _ tapghaghrangllaaghaqut _ keleve luki _ two _ and _ a _ half _ inches _ eslegkakiita _ .
tapghaghrag meng _ elngaatall _ aatqus _ tamaakut _ unkuvag t _ , _ miglegrungigh at _ .
taaggun _ ineqerewaagh m _ kenle akun _ umu llegh akun _ uziftagh ke ait _ .
elngaatall _ taakut _ kiwaakaghii _ tapghagh at _ , _ pi nga yug u lghiit _ ayumigh m _ awataghpag i _ .
kingwaagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ elngaatall _ maklag t _ , _ saviigagh u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ meqesigh kaayagh ghngaaghmeng _ .
kingwaagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ , _ kingwaagh u ut _ .
unkuvag t _ enʼngaatall _ tapghaghrag u ut _ ategh i _ .
taakut _ awataghpaaget _ .
Sivuqlighpiigaq _ aange lghii _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ amsakelghii _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ qazigyaghaayaghngaghmi _ qukiinaani _ , _ kingwaagh _ .
taaleg _ , _ Akuula _ , _ kingwaagh _ .
taaleg u ut _ sivuqlighpiigaat _ taakut _ .
Uughqwaaget _ , _ aghsaan _ aangepagllanʼghilnguut _ .
tegag staghhiinagh t _ awataghpi aqe ait _ kiyang _ .
iitek _ aghnagh t llu _ awataghpi aqe ait _ amle i _ taakut _ qaghrilghaghluki _ .
qaghrilghagh at _ ilaagh sigh t _ unaghsigh t _ iimlluteng _ esneghrug i _ .
enkaam _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ kaki luki _ esneghrug i _ uzimun _ tawavek _ amalka _ ilaagh mun _ kumyugte aqe ait _ esneghrug i _ qamagun _ qulighneghikun _ .
elngaatall _ nemghaqiis _ taakungi _ iime negh kun _ taaggun _ .
qaghrilghagh m _ esneghrug a _ uzimun _ iimnga lghii _ .
asighte aqe ait _ taaggun _ nenglluki _ .
Qaghrilghaagus _ taakut _ .
enkaam _ qepe luki _ inglugtun _ putukghi _ itegagh an _ qevuute luki _ nenglluki _ tawaten _ .
amenqun _ naflugh ghhagh a _ putukghan _ .
Kiwakaghaakun _ qepute aqe ait _ putukghi _ inglugtun _ enkaam _ uulte negh meggni qun _ sa squghhagh u aqe lghiit _ .
Eltuqsamaghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ .
taakut _ ama _ sanqute meng _ ategh ke ut _ .
ayumigh m _ eghqwaagh llegh a llu _ , _ eghqwaagh sagh a llu
Apangaluum _ apegh llegh a
kitum _ igleghte te lleqe agu _ ayumigh m _ yupig ita _ eghqwaagh llegh a _ ?
maalghug u uk _ , _ nalighmeng _ pi nga yu t _ allake te lghiit _ sivunegh leg t _ maani _ sivuqagh mi _ ramke t _ .
ataasigh t _ taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ .
ila i _ sivunʼghita _ ategh i _ aymaramket _ .
paamken _ ungazigh meng _ pi ut _ , _ qerngaghllagmeng _ nenglu t _ qerngaghmelnguut _ iimken _ sivunegh meggneng _ ima _ ataasigh mi _ ne mi _ .
sanighmelngughmii t _ ategh it _ .
nenglu it _ tawaaten _ sani qligh ke te ghllag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ nekegneghi _ .
taakut _ ategh it _ , _ ramke t _ ilakwaagh ke te lghiit _ paamken _ tagikagh t _ , _ maani _ kingunʼghit _ whaa _ kiyaghte ut _ , _ talwa _ angyaleg itnun _ atigh te luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
ila i _ taakut _ ramke t _ ategh i _ nangupagaghmii t _ .
nenglullug it _ ama _ qaye ii llegh ni _ ayumightagh t _ qerngaghmelnguut _ nenglu t _ .
ayumigh _ tamaakut _ yug t _ liisimake kangat _ naten _ eghqwaagh llegh llu _ , _ sa meng llu _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh meng _ , _ qerngughte i llegh m llu _ igleghnegha _ .
ataasigh meng _ ayuumiqulleghni _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ naate yagh aq _ kaate nghaani _ .
laluramke t _ “ _ moon _ worship _ ” _ -nguniiqegkangat _ , _ teme igh u u uq _ .
whaten _ Aymaaramket _ pikayug u ut _ eghqwaagh naqe negh meggni _ : _ usaa _ taana _ upenʼghaa _ tamaghhagh an _ pangeghtekau yu k _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh leg nun _ , _ quyngigh m _ tunugh anun llu _ qilu anun llu _ .
tamaakut _ qerngughte luki _ kagpaagaqluki _ kiig negh ke aat _ .
amalleqa _ nunivag meng _ awataghpag kun _ kagpag i kayugu ut _ .
uteghnigh nghmini _ tespamken _ uukagh meng _ nefku kayug _ eghqwaaghmun _ atughqagh meng _ .
salngag t llu _ tawaqa t _ , _ nalighmeng _ tawaqapig meng _ pamaken _ atghagh te kayug _ .
aghvenge ma negh meggni _ , _ ataasigh t _ awataghpag t _ mangtag meng _ imigh luki _ siqlugagh mun _ kanagtaqluki _ .
tamaa na _ neqe _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ kagpag kayugu aat _ kenle aanga _ tawaavek _ aghnegh anun _ eghqwaagh vigkagh mun _ , _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ kergamqun _ nutaghagh _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
Taam _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ Piifqemmeng _ ategh leg _ .
tawani _ taana _ angyaleg _ eghqwaaghmun _ igleghte te i ste u aqe uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ angyaleg m _ sa meng _ akuute yaghqagh meng _ akuute qugh aqe uq _ .
ayvegh m _ uqugh an _ mesiigh i _ akuute sagh igh kaqe ai _ nuniivagmun _ , _ tunu meng _ ila luki _ .
