qamagte lutek _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aatkagh meng _ , _ eghqwaaghem _ aate te kaghqagh aneng _ aate yaghqagh k _ .
wetku _ tawaninginaq _ aate yaghqagh t _ .
Tamaakunʼnguq _ ateghagh m _ aate kaqe ai _ .
ateghagh naqe negh meggni _ aate kayug it _ .
aghneq _ ataasigh _ yataaghqe te kaqe aat _ , _ neqe _ sa u a _ apeghiighteghraaneghmegteggu _ .
unaghsigh kun _ sagnegh kun _ neqe _ qamagte luku _ qantaghteghluku _ nategh m _ qukaa kun _ qerngagh ita _ lli luki _ , _ tanpegh meng _ saape luki _ qavaghtaghkagh it _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ taam _ angyaleg m _ qafsina t _ ilagaate t _ atugh aqe ai _ tamaavenginaq _ pi sigh t _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ tamaakut _ .
nangllegsiisigh t _ .
taagken _ unaangu pigte luku _ aghtaaghaqestaq _ maligte luku _ angyagh m _ yug an _ nenglluuguteteng _ ila ke luki _ atghagh uute aqe ut _ tamaaken _ sagnegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh uute luteng _ , _ kanavek _ angyilghagh nun _ .
taagken _ angyagh _ angyilghagh neng _ ateghte luku _ , _ taakut llu _ neqe t _ qaake luki _ angyagh mun _ , _ kanaavek _ keniileghnun _ angyagh _ atghagh te aqe aat _ .
Tawaani _ kenilegh ni _ aghuliigh luteng _ utaqa i aqe ut _ siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ .
whaa _ siqinegh _ piitekestanʼghani _ naayghagh m _ qaye aneng _ , _ angyaleg m _ tamaa na _ sagnegh _ llilaghtugh ste aqe a _ anigu m _ qaye akun _ , _ taagken _ tamaaken _ sagnegh m _ imaa neng _ tugu tete lugh aqe luni _ eghqwaagh aqe uq _ .
eghqwaagh negh meggni _ tugu tete lugh luteng _ taanʼgavek _ megh mun _ milugh utu te kete luku _ sa meng _ akuzimleghagh magh meng _ maniiguutusimeng _ , _ igamsiqa yug magh meng _ agum _ ayumiqullegh m _ tunugh u sagh aneng _ pi aqe ut _ .
tawaten _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ angyaleg _ , _ tawaqa t llu _ iingunagh ita _ megh mun _ miluute luki _ piiqegkaangi _ taakut _ yug t _ neghesqelluuki _ .
tawani _ keniileghni _ neghe uute ghllag kayugu ut _ .
kina _ alngunak _ tagi lghii _ elngaatall _ negh sqe aqe aat _ .
taana _ llangaqa _ eghte qugh u aagh _ nangllegsiisigh u uq _ ama _ igamsiqaayuguusiiguq _ .
tanqigh mun _ maniiguutusiinʼghituq _ , _ taawanginaq _ taana _ tanqigh m _ piite yuwhaagh llegh a _ iiskughte aqe aat _ tawanighlluugwaaq _ ayuumiqulleghmi _ pi na luteng _ .
nangllegsiisigh _ uumun _ upenʼghaam _ neqnigh u llegh a _ pilaataqu sqellug qu _ .
taakut _ pugughileghmii t _ ramke it _ eghqwaagh kayugu ut _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ Lluughvigmi _ , _ amalleqa _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ piinʼghaaluku _ .
tawaten _ ama _ neqe _ iingkerugllak _ neghyugnaq _ qerngughte luku _ pikayug t _ .
taawanginaq _ taakunʼnguq _ pugughileghmii t _ , _ ilakwaagh ke te ii na lghiit _ eghte qugh u aagh mi _ negh te kayugu ut _ .
alla t _ pi igate ut _ .
taakut _ ila i _ ramke t _ , _ nangupagaghmii t _ , _ eghqwaaqayuuguftut _ tawani _ teghiglugsigh mi _ tawaten _ tanqigh _ piite nghaani _ .
alngunak _ kina _ negh yaghtuqagh yu k _ tawani _ eghqwaanʼghata _ .
tamaa na _ angyaleg _ eghqwaagh qagh yu k _ qamaggluni _ ateghagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luni _ pikayug _ .
temngi _ alla _ aate igate te ait _ , _ iwerngaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ wetku _ aate kayug it _ .
EGHQWAALLQEM _ yataaghqe llegh
Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
ila a _ nefkuuragh meng _ eghqwaagh u sqe kayug _ .
April-erugllagmun _ ilangakun _ kaate stekayugu ait _ .
Lluughvigmi _ eghqwaagh kayug t _ .
whangkuta _ nazighaghsigh mi _ , _ ilangani _ February-mun _ kaatngwaaghumaan _ , _ ilangani _ January-m _ naange nghaani _ .
amenqun _ kalanta ni _ tanqigh t _ new _ moon-et _ alngunak _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
tanqigh pig kun _ ayuqe lghiit _ whangkuta _ .
piite ghesnagh nghata _ , _ sivulii lghii ni _ eghqwaagh yaghagh aqe lghii ni _ .
ataasigh u yagh na iqe aat _ angyagh _ tazimani _ , _ enkaam _ aafte lghiit _ tawaten _ legan _ ataasigh _ uspeqe llegh _ .
taana _ Quwaaren _ allakanigh _ .
saki mini _ key- aghtekau uq _ , _ enkaam _ saki mitun _ pillgha _ ayuqe uq _ .
Atayaghaankut _ , _ Pusaankut _ ata at _ .
whangkuta _ Angqatenganwatenkut _ taakut _ sivuliiwaqut _ qayughllak _ igwhani _ entaqun _ Pelaasingumayaghtuq _ ataasigh u luteng _ angyagh t _ .
taagken _ uglaaghiyameng _ entaqun _ tegh leg nge a _ lli aqe aq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ Quwaarinllu _ aaftekagh _ .
enkaam _ eghqwaagh llegh it _ tawaten _ , _ whangkuta _ pi yagute yamta _ maaten _ Angqatenganwan _ taana _ sivuliiwaqelghii _ .
whangkuta _ , _ Pusaankut _ , _ Uwetelen _ , _ kingulighha _ angyaleg _ , _ qilleghte uute te _ taana _ angyalgughtengngan _ eghqwaagh kayugu ste luku _ .
Pusaam _ kinguligh u ste luku _ pika qaa _ .
ataasigh t _ negh kestagh u kut _ eghqwaagh sagh ke aqe ut _ .
aghvenge lghii ni _ mangtag meng _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ tamaa na _ ategh qugh luku _ eghqwaagh te yaghqagh _ aghneghmi _ , _ Piifqemmeng _ ategh leg _ .
aavgugh qagh yu k _ mangtag meng _ mangtag lgu negh mta _ avegtugh magh an _ , _ uukagh _ aavgugh luku _ , _ pellug magh emta _ nunivag meng _ .
uqughqagh meng llu _ ayveghagh lghii ni _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ .
kapeghte i luteng _ uqingllagh magh meng _ .
tawaqa _ aavgugh magh an _ .
uukagh _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh stun _ , _ pugnegh iigh magh meng _ .
pugnegh t _ mekestaaghhagh u aqe ut _ .
paamken _ atghagh tke aat _ mekestaaghhaa lghiit _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ kagpag luki _ , _ unaami _ nighugte nghaani _ angyagh t _ ateghte luki _ , _ awataghpag t _ , _ tapghaghrages _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ .
sagnegh t _ neqe t _ aqfaaqeggkeput _ tawaten _ angyagh naqe lghii stun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh te luki _ .
siqinegh _ piite neghsigh aqe aat _ eghqwaagh gpenateng _ wiin _ .
igaghyagh kayugu luta _ utaqa i te kete luku _ kayaggneghinkut _ qaprag aqe lghiikut _ , _ mayughaate aqe lghiikut _ vuuslegh nun _ .
siqinegh _ piite kestagh nghaani _ , _ esnevagh u qugh luki _ megh m _ esne anun _ , _ eghqwaagh luten _ , _ eghqwaagh luteng _ , _ taaqe negh meggni _ , _ pelluumeghtat _ , _ pugnegh t _ aavgughwaaghluki _ .
mangtag _ avegtugh aq _ sagneghnite aqe lghii _ .
tunuvagh te luki _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ esnagh a mi _ .
taawa _ kiyang _ alngunag _ naken _ negh yagh qagh yu k _ .
yuggagh t _ agigte lghiit llu _ , _ nagun _ , _ apagh aatagh luki _ neghesqelluki _ .
taawa _ mangtag lgu lghii ni _ , _ kiyang _ mangtag meng _ negh aqe ut _ .
Neqniighqwaaghllakayuget _ whangkunni _ aghyugh negh meggni _ .
Awataghpagmelnguut _ neqnightus _ taawa _ .
enkaam _ taaqe negh mta _ taglagh luteng _ , _ angyagh t llu _ qaake luki _ apeghiigh luki _ .
tamaa na _ awite qugh luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uukagh t _ ilate katen _ legan _ tugulagh aqe kangit _ .
Aavgughteghluku _ tea- magh an _ uukagh _ , _ nunivag llu _ , _ aavgugh magh an _ mangtag _ .
awalightugh aqe lghiit _ , _ mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ awalightugh aqe kangat _ .
enkaam _ imiisalik _ , _ sa meng _ amiiragh _ , _ sa u a _ alnguunak _ ulimasigh _ .
whangkuta _ pinegh meggni _ walamnaag _ sa u a _ igarutaagh _ .
aghnagh t _ ighneghllug _ , _ sa u a _ amiiragh _ .
Imiisaperuwaalek _ .
taawa _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ eghqwaaghem _ negh kanga _ tamaa na _ neghyuukayuga _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ whangkuta _ qamagte luten _ ila put _ kayusigh aqe luki _ ayuqe lghii ni _ eghqwaaghnaqenghata _ .
kayu siightu tete luta _ qerngughte te aqe luta _ ayuqe lghii ni _ .
aamta _ ila i _ neghyiigalnguus _ talwa _ , _ negh ka ite ngugh t _ nunivaggaghmeng _ legan _ eghqwaagh tke kayug t _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ pugughileghmii neng _ ategh leg t _ ukuta _ qasiqagh meng _ pikayug u ma ut llu _ , _ nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ , _ ila i _ ququngagh raaghinagh ghhagh meng _ .
Lluughvirugllagmi _ wetku _ ila i _ eghqwaagh te kayug t _ Uwaliit _ , _ Pugughileghmiistaakut _ , _ akule ke inkut _ , _ Suluugenkut _ , _ Temkeruunkut _ taakut llu _ ifkaghte te u uq _ liite yama _ angyaleg _ , _ tamlu m _ ata a _ .
Lluughvigmi _ ama _ eghqwaagh kayugu ut _ .
entaqun _ ququngaghmengllu _ , _ tunguuya meng llu _ kineghkagh meng _ eghqwaagh tke ut _ .
ivaghullug _ ILAGAAT
Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
Ighivganʼghani _ , _ eghqwaaghem _ elagaatangi _ taakut _ atugh aqe ait _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ angyaleg t _ taakut _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ .
Elngataall _ , _ repall _ tusaqnapangunatengllu _ .
Nangllegsim _ angtalanganeng _ , _ wata _ eghqwaagh llegh mi _ tawani _ nanglleg naghsagh pigte luteng _ ilagagh negh meggni _ iglag teng _ qughaghteghllaglukii _ pi aqe kangit _ .
Nangllegsim _ angtalanganeng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Uuknaa-aa-aanguu-uuq _ .
Saamnaa-aa-aanguu-uuq _ ,
Taglalghii-ii-ii _ saa-aamnaa _ .
ketangaa- u an _ aghveghaa- a _ saa-aamnaa-aa
Aghvelegglaguu-uu-lii _ .
Ellngalluu-uu-uu _ .
Qagimaa _ iluganii-ii-ii _ .
Uknaa-aa-aanguu-uuq _ .
Saamnaa-aa-aanguuq _ ,
Ketangaa-aa-aan _ ayveghaa- a _ saa-aamna _ .
Aghvelegllaaguluu-uu-lii
Elngaa-aa-aalluu-uungu-uuq
Qagimaa _ iluganii-ii-ii _ .
Uuknaa-aa-aanguu-uuq _ .
Saamnaa-aa-aanguu-uuq
Taglalghii-ii-ii _ saa-aamnaa _ .
ketangaa- u an _ maklaqaa-aa-aanguuq _ .
Ellngalluu-uu-uu _ .
Aghvelagllaguulii-ii-iingii _ .
Qagimaa _ iluganii-ii-ii-ngiy _ .
AGHVEGHNIIGHEM _ PILLGHI
Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
taawa _ enkaamngam _ angyaghnagh llegh mun _ tawavek _ .
aghvenge negh meggni _ avii kayug t _ , _ “ _ Wu-hu-hu-huumeng _ ! _ ” _ ayuqe ut _ aviis _ tamaakut _ .
aquutagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te luki _ , _ angyapig m _ aquutagh i _ .
Kelgutnguftunʼnguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ nusunʼghata _ aga _ aghveqe luki _ .
enkaam _ tuqute nghata _ wiin _ angyagh _ awillaghate te luni _ .
uzive luki _ kaspugte lghii ni _ avii kayug t _ wu-hu-hu-huumeng _ ayuqe ut _ .
enkaam _ taaqenghata _ tagi laghate te luni _ qepghagh aqe ait _ .
ila i _ kaalgughnaqenghata _ kaalguutaghqaameng _ , _ ikute magh meng _ mangtag meng _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
awataghpag ightugh luku _ sivulighneghikunllu _ , _ kingu nge i kete te llu _ .
enkaam _ ghhatagh luteng llu _ igleghte negh meggni _ aga _ angyagh m _ yug a _ qamagte luni _ avii kayug _ wu-hu-hu-huumeng _ .
qukaghite lghii ni llu _ , _ whaa _ tamlag yaghtugh lghii ni llu _ avii aqe lghiit _ .
taawa _ qepghagh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ kaat ute te nghata _ taakut _ angyaleg t _ mangtag meng _ pi luteng _ awataghpag t _ imigh aqe kangit _ .
suqi a _ taakut _ inglu i _ sivuligh t _ iike yuggaagh t _ aghvenge lghii m _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
veghagh i llu _ taakut _ qamagte luki _ pikayug u ai _ .
inglu i _ suqagh n _ taakut _ angyagh mun _ allghuulegnun _ , _ pingayuulegnun _ , _ taakwavek _ inpiquusghaqaqiit _ .
siipnegh _ tamaa na _ suqagh _ siivanllegh nun _ inpiquusghaqaqaat _ aghnagh nun llu _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ , _ angyaleg t _ elqiigh luteng _ ayuqe aqe lghiit _ .
angyaleg t _ kaate lghii ni _ apeghiigh lghii ni _ qepghagh llegh i _ aghvegh m _ , _ angyaleg m _ aa _ elqiigh uute luta _ sivuyagtetlu _ angyaleg t llu _ .
aquutagh t _ , _ qalugyagh t _ sivuyagtem _ tugu luki _ mangtaggaghmeng _ ikute luteng _ enkaam _ taglagh aqe ut _ .
Aquutastaakut _ mangteghagh m _ sivugh u nga kete te _ qavighnga i ta _ napaghte aqe ait _ .
Qalugyas _ taakut _ amig m _ aywaa kun _ asighte te aqe ait _ napagh ita _ .
enkaam _ nunivag t _ egsug i _ taakut _ ikute luteng _ peghu aqe lghiit _ , _ aghvengmun _ pi kaghqagh t _ , _ enkaam _ tugu luki _ , _ itghute luki _ , _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uglaghtalngatuq _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ , _ qilleghtengnguus _ taakut _ , _ taqughtekete te _ , _ qiiyngu t _ amenqun _ quyngigh m _ manu i _ melqughtuqagh t _ .
taagken _ ikute te luteng _ naten _ angka i ta _ petug kayugu ait _ .
aavgugh aqe ait _ angyagh m _ yug an _ uglaghtala atun _ , _ aghtequgh ligh luki _ , _ enkaam _ qaltaaghwagh ghhagh u ut _ .
qaltaaghwagh ghhagh t _ , _ unaghsigh t _ sa u aat _ , _ ila i _ suqaawut _ , _ tawavek _ kanaghte uute luki _ , _ megh meng _ ila aghte luki _ , _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ tugumiiqe luki _ atghagh aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ aquutagh t _ alla _ ila i _ , _ angyilghanilnguut _ , _ taakut _ kelqelluki _ , _ uugte luteng _ , _ sivuyagtetlu _ , _ angyaleg t llu _ .
taakut _ aquutagh t _ angyaleg m _ atuqe luki _ , _ taakut _ angyaleg m _ nulighh i _ angyagh m _ sivuyag an _ kelu kaghagh ani _ , _ malleghqengngwaaghaqiit _ angyas _ tawaten _ .
angyagh t _ wiin _ iggagte aatagh aqe ait _ tawaten _ tallimaneng _ iggagte aatagh luki _ aviinʼghata _ .
aquutagh teng _ qule mun _ nengug te nghatki _ , _ enkaam _ nulugh igh i te a _ taam _ qaltaaghwagh t _ qule mun _ nengug te aqe ait _ .
avii nghmeng _ taaqenghaata _ , _ enraq _ aghvighlluki _ iggagaataghluteng _ .
tawaten _ ama _ inglu anun _ nengug te luki _ aviinʼghata _ , _ ama _ inglu aneng _ aghvighlluki _ ama _ qaltaaghwagh teng _ nengug te aqe ait _ qule mun _ .
Aviit _ Wu-hu-hu-huunguut _ arat _ aviimeng _ ategh leg t _ .
tawaten _ aviillegh _ Wu-hu-hu-hu-hu-huu _ pi aqe ut _ .
taagken _ taaqenʼghata _ taakut _ aghvegh m _ teghrughwaaghi _ sivuyag kun _ neftegtekayugu ut _ .
iike luki _ naten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ , _ mangtagtuumagh ita _ kiwavek _ naterugllak _ tagkiita _ mangtag i _ .
Neftegtaqus _ tawaten _ .
taakut _ teghrughaagh t _ taagken _ qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qaghte aghte aqe ait _ sivuke luki _ .
teghrughaagh t _ veghagh m _ iqug ke ai _ , _ iime qaghte luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Viistun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Teghrughaaghus _ taakut _ .
qaltaaghwagh m _ megh aneng _ kuuve qagh qaghaqe ait _ sivuke luki _ enkaam _ taakut _ tuune aqe ait _ .
Sivuyagtet _ sivuke luteng _ nunivag meng _ , _ mangtaggaghmeng _ pi luten _ , _ megh qagh luteng _ , _ kinguligh ghhagh nun _ , _ iwerngaqun _ angyaleg mun _ .
enkaam _ taaqenʼghata _ , _ puuskaate t _ aghnagh m _ ighu ita _ akulangiikun _ aghvequte aqe ait _ .
tawaten _ whanga llu _ pi kanga _ estamaneng _ .
pi iigh aatagh kau unga _ .
puygu laatagh ma aqa _ whangkuta _ sivuke luku _ pilleghpus _ taana _ .
Aghnas _ tagi laghate te aqe lghiit _ ilagagh yagh ut _ .
ivi t _ , _ iviighunʼghilnguut _ .
ivi u ut _ aghnagh t _ aqume uute luteng _ .
aqumutagh igh luki _ aquutagh m _ taam _ kelu kaghagh akun _ .
Taam _ angyaleg m _ nulighh an _ atghagh naqe lghii ni _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute i tete luki _ unite aqe ai _ enkaam _ taakut _ kingu itneng _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
nunanigh pigtu ut _ ilagaate t _ iglakgalek _ .
nalluke anka _ ilagaate t _ , _ liite mangite anka _ ivis _ tamaakut _ .
Iggwaninginaat _ ivaaghulluuget _ .
enkaam _ apeghiigh luteng _ tawaten _ taglanʼghata _ , _ angyagh t _ usingigh luki _ sayug luki _ kelevagh luki _ .
tamaa na _ angaghqugh luku _ qamestagh _ , _ suqagh n _ inglu i _ manughagh mun _ .
ivi igh ghllag kayugu luki _ .
Nunanipigtus _ tamaakut _ ivi t _ .
Enkaangam _ angaghqugh te lghii _ yuug _ esghapag lghii ni _ nunmaaggaq _ , _ ila i _ qamugh meng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Nunmaaggaq _ mangteghagh meggnun _ aglagh kestagh aqe ut _ ilagagh lghii neng _ nagate magh meng _ .
iglakegte pigte lghiit llu _ , _ aghnaghpaget _ tamaakut _ ima _ mekelghiighhaatemmneng _ .
taana _ Quwaaren _ aghvenge kayug _ kiyang _ upenʼghaatanga _ .
nagate kanga _ tamaaken _ .
Quwaaren _ Pusaankut _ ata at _ .
ataata ke luku _ whanga _ ayuqe aqa _ .
aghvenge neghtuqagh _ uponʼghaatanga _ kiyang _ .
enkaam _ nagate lghiinga _ , _ esghapag kanga _ tamaaken _ ima _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u te mneng _ , _ whangkunneng _ piyaaghllemnnun _ tawaten _ .
Aghnaghpaget _ iglag kegtagh ghhalek _ .
enkaam _ taaqe aqe ut _ angaghqugh nghmeng _ , _ apeghiigh nghata _ enkaam _ taagken _ enraq _ angyaleg m _ tugukagh mineng _ suqagh meng _ , _ kiyang _ aghnagh t _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ inpite qugh aqe ait _ suqagh meng _ .
enkaam _ inpite qugh nghmeng _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ , _ enraghngam _ angyagh m _ yug i _ nengigh te ste aqe ait _ .
tamaa na _ qamestagh _ , _ aghvegh m _ llaag i _ , _ talligh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ veghagh m _ nuvukrug i _ , _ qengagh i _ , _ iye i _ , _ iye i _ ukut _ iyighpigaat _ iike luki _ , _ qaltaaghwagnun _ kanaghte luki _ petug kayugu ut _ .
taakut _ qamestagh t _ , _ taakut llu _ llaag t _ uyvasaghqenneghmeng _ apeghiigh aqe kangit _ .
nekegte luki _ tawaten _ taakut _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ taaqenʼghata _ qamestagh i _ taakut _ siqlugagh mun _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ , _ kanaghqughaaqut _ siglugaghmiigaqut _ .
enkaam _ teghrughwaaghes _ taakut _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ petuwaqiit _ .
Awataghpages _ taakut _ mangteghagh m _ sivulighte negh akun _ pingayuwaaqelghiit _ , _ petug aqe ait _ .
elqiigh t llu _ mat- aghte luki _ taakut _ apeghiigh aqe lghiit _ , _ aghinʼghwaaghnun _ nefteghquqayuk _ .
kelqe te aaghet _ quunpeng _ aghinʼghwaaghnun _ elqiigh t _ .
atungag t _ ukagun _ nasquughutet _ amyutlegell _ yukutate aqe lghiit _ .
kinegh negh meggni _ ukum _ pi i _ teregh u aghte te neghtu pigte ut _ , _ tukruugtaqegkangi _ .
enkaam _ ighivganʼghani _ eghqwaaghem _ ilagagh ta i _ taakut _ ivaghullug t _ atugh aqe ait _ .
ilagagh aqe ut _ angyaleg t _ taakut _ .
ivaghullug meng _ ategh leg t _ .
qafsina t _ liite kaqe anka _ ilagaate t _ .
elngaatall _ repall _ tusaqnapangunatengllu _ nanglleggsim _ angtalanganeng _ .
wata _ eghqwaagh llegh mi _ tawani _ nanglleg naghsagh pigte luteng _ ilagagh negh meggni _ iglag teng _ qughaghteghllagluki _ pi aqe kangit _ .
Nanglleggsim _ angtalanganeng _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
eghte qugh u aagh _ taana _ tanqigh mun _ pingunʼghilnguq _ kiyaghnegh mun _ .
Kagpagaalghii _ sivuke luku _ tuune kayugu lghii _ .
aghvegh mun _ tawavek _ nanglleggsiisiq _ .
qerngughte i sigh _ taana _ , _ kiyang _ aghvegh _ taana _ angegh llegh u lghii _ unake naqe yaghqagh _ .
taakut _ amalka _ kiyaghnegh mun _ aflenga kaqe kangit _ tunusagh u luki _ tukfigh sigh u luki _ .
tawaten _ uspeqe llegh i _ nakaan _ tanqigh mun _ .
apeghtughiste m _ tanqigh mun _ pillghuniluki _ pi aqe kangi _ .
moon _ worship-meng _ ata iqe ai _ apeghtughiste mta _ whangkuta _ .
tanqigh mun _ pingunʼghilnguut _ , _ yupig ni _ kiyaghnegh mun _ tunusagh t _ .
Tazimakerugllak _ liisimake kangat _ kiyaghnegh _ taana _ .
ima _ sivuliighaghneng _ yuksuggaaghneng _ liisimake kangat _ repall _ atigh igate aat _ ellqughlluku _ ategh aneng _ , _ aangesqem _ aangtalanganeng _ .
Atiipallaaghyaghqaanguq _ aange uq _ , _ tallughnaghpetughnguq _ .
enkaam _ apa meng _ atigh luku _ ayuqe aat _ , _ aangesqem _ angtaalanganeng _ .
aghvegh m llu _ uyvasaghqe llegh a
Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
taakut _ llaag t _ eghqwaagh naqe lghii ni _ keneligh luteng _ .
uksugh mi _ uqfigagh m _ tangigh llegh m _ qaamnangi _ amestaaghhaat _ , _ saghna aqe lghiit _ .
enkaam _ petugtaaghaqegkangit _ aagra ni _ quunpeng _ kinegh ghngaita _ .
paneghte aqe kangit _ kenegh kun _ .
Kumaghhneghmeggni _ taakut _ uqfigagh m _ ggiillegh i _ paneghqughaaqiit _ uglaghi naqe pigte luki _ .
Enkaangam _ tawaten _ taakut _ apeghiigh nghmegteki _ taakut _ tawaten _ pi nghmeng _ , _ pi nga yu t _ unuget _ qavagh t _ pikayug t _ .
aamta _ qepghagh u ngugh lug ni _ qavanʼghani _ aghte negh ni _ , _ maalghuneng _ ighivgaghni _ tawaten _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
taakut _ ilagaate t _ atugh aatagh aqe ait _ enkaam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ aghlleghem _ taakut _ teghrughaagh t _ petug nga lghiit _ qeteghte aqe ut _ .
tawaten _ keneligh luki _ eghqwaagh luteng _ ama _ iike luki _ , _ itegsinʼghuut _ mangtagti a _ taakwegkut _ .
natengiighhaq _ eslegkakaan _ entaqun _ naten _ iqetutka aqe ut _ one _ foot-na-half-neng _ , _ five _ inches _ eslegkakiita _ .
Teghrughaaghes _ taakut _ mangtag i _ uteghmun _ iike luki _ , _ taakut _ kenghet _ kumaghlluki _ eghqwaagh aqlaatagh kangit _ tamaaken _ ggiillegh meng _ panegh qugh magh meng _ .
enkaam _ awataghpaagetlu _ ikugh aqe ut _ , _ aquutagh t llu _ taakut _ iike magh ita _ .
qalugyagh t llu _ nefteghqe aqe aat _ , _ taawa _ taaqe nghmegteki _ apeghiigh aqe aat _ taaqe aqe ut _ amalka _ aghvegh m _ qepghagh llegh a _ .
enkaam _ iye i _ taakut _ qageghte luki _ sa kun _ qalusiqagh kun _ sa kun _ sagnegh u aagh qun llu _ megh i _ taakut _ ila ke luki _ iye an _ megh i _ .
tamaa na _ ggiillegh m _ panellegh a _ akuute aqe aat _ mesiigh meng _ ila aghte luki _ uglaaghinaluki _ akuute aqe ait _ .
enkaam _ akuute nghmeng _ taaqe nghmegteki _ angyagh m _ sivuyag i _ aghenqignegh i _ aghvegh ghhagh t _ , _ minguughhutaqiit _ puyugh meng _ taagken _ .
Tagneqegtepigtuut _ uqfiigam _ ggiillegh an _ panellegh i _ .
aghvegh t _ ulima aqe ait _ aghenqignegh m _ tungangakun _ , _ saghumignegh an _ tungangakun _ veghagh ghhagh inagh t _ pi aqe ait _ asitmun _ teregh luki llu _ inglugtun _ .
enkaam _ aquutas _ taakut _ amalka _ piineqe aqe ait _ aligh a _ taakut _ quulqam _ tungaangakun _ taaggun _ asitmun _ ighighte luteng _ ayuqe ut _ slant-eluteng _ .
qulighnegh i llu _ taakut _ mingughhaqiit _ .
enkaam _ tagneqegte pigte aqe ut _ , _ kinegh ngllagh aqe ait _ .
taawa _ aghvegh m _ taana _ uyvasaghqe llegh a _ apeghiigh aqe uq _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
alla _ angyagh yaghqaaghte aqe ut _ .
Angyaghtughluuteng _ ayveghni ii aagh _ pi luku _ .
ila i llu _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ ama _ tawaten _ uyvasaghqe kayug t _ ellmeng _ pi llegh megestun _ uyvasaghqe kayug t _ .
tawaten _ ama _ veghagh i _ siqlugagh mig kayug it _ .
enkaam _ sa mun _ angyaghtumun _ lliighaqus _ taawa _ .
qamestagh m _ aavgugh llegh i _ uyvasaghqe llegh i llu
Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
enkaam _ angyagh uute luteng _ tawaten _ , _ angyaghnaq _ kayaali nghaani _ enkaam _ taakut _ qamestagh i _ aqfa luki _ angaghqugh luki _ unaangu pigte luku _ siqinegh _ quulvaghqaaqestanghani _ pegget _ sa u aat _ kayute kellug ke i _ angaghqumun _ .
enkaam _ ighleke aqe kangit _ , _ whangkuta qun _ kayute teng _ .
taakut _ ama _ tawaten _ uyvasaghqelget _ .
eghqwaagh qagh luteng _ ama _ tawaten _ , _ taawa _ apeghiinʼghata _ eghqwaagh nghmeng _ elngaatall _ piliighunneqeggsaatkayuk _ qamestagh m _ mangtag aneng _ .
aavgugh luki _ naten _ umu tate ke ii te a _ qamestagh m _ amestaallghi _ , _ mangteghagh nun _ awaligh uute kaqe ait _ .
wetku _ tawani _ nengighqe aqe ait _ .
mangteghagh _ qamagte luku _ .
enkaam _ tawaten _ ama _ imiisagh leg _ sa meng _ piyukekagh meggneng _ .
Enkaangam _ aghnaghaghhagh t llu _ awalightumun _ , _ awalightughyuneghtughqaagaqii _ .
imiisagh u ut _ akileghtuusagh t _ amalka _ .
aghnagh u aghagh aat _ sa meng _ neqe meng _ neghyugnameng _ pi aqe luki _ , _ enkaam _ ayghigh luteng llu _ awaalightughnaqaqelghiit _ .
taawa _ taaqenʼghaata _ teghruughaaghes _ taakut _ petug aqe lghiit _ aagra m _ qula akun _ .
AGHQESAGHTUM _ pi a
Pelaasim _ apegh llegh a
enkaam _ angyaghnaq _ kayaalinʼghani _ , _ enraq _ aghqesaghtumun _ pikayug ni _ .
ila ke te lghii _ , _ kelgute te luta _ siivanllegh t _ , _ taakut _ aghvengekagh ni _ teghrughaagh t _ .
aghnagh t _ kelgugh luki _ qerngughuluteng _ taglagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
qasiqagh m _ itegagh a _ , _ mangtag _ , _ aghnas _ tamaakut _ , _ mangtag _ agaghte i i ragh u aagh _ .
ila i _ nefkuuragh meng llu _ , _ tawaqa _ , _ quyngigh m llu _ tulimagh aneng _ pi ma aqe aat _ pamaaken _ atghagh tekagh meng _ .
Qisgengankut _ , _ Anaghasuugenkut _ , _ Wiyallu _ taana _ pikayug _ iknaqe llegh a _ umiileg _ .
enkaam _ kumaghlluteng _ ungagagh meng _ qiigh aqe luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ , _ “ _ Aasivaasaamna _ taa _ , _ ” _ sivunʼghet _ tuqlugh aqe luki _ tagilaghaatesqelluki _ kenʼghem _ asi anun _ neghe ste naqe ni luki _ eghqwaagh aqe kangit _ .
taagken _ apeghiinʼghata _ neghe uute ghllag aqe ukut _ .
teghrughaagh t _ nengighqe aqe luki _ neghe uute aqe ut _ .
elngaatall _ neqe m _ neqnigh lleghpigagh i _ teghruughaaghes _ taakut _ piinlegh i _ kinʼghaganeghmeggni _ , _ kii _ mesiigh _ uqlughte nanigh negh meggni _ , _ gevyaglluteng _ tesqamani _ saanighruugtekestaghluuteng _ aa _ urang _ neqnigh ut _ neqe t _ .
elngaatall _ neghe uute ghllag kayug ni _ .
taaqe negh mta _ kenegh mun _ alleg luta _ veg meng _ sa meng _ .
Atghamun _ kilgaaqu te aqe ukut _ mekelghiigh ni _ .
enkaam _ qamagte luni _ tawaten _ angyaleg a _ , _ angyagh meng _ taaqe llegh at _ puvaallaluku _ , _ taakwaningani _ aghqesaghtugh aqe luteng _ .
allakagh meng _ pi vig leg t _ alngunak _ kinku t _ .
kiyang _ yug a _ aghqesaghtughvilik _ naantaqluteng _ .
ila i _ angyagh meng _ pi aqe luteng _ .
kiyang _ qamagte luni _ .
enkaam _ amalka _ ayumiqullegh _ kaspugte aqe uq _ .
enkaam _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kaqe aqa _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ sangiighhagh a _ , _ puvallaraallghaa _ , _ aghqesaghtumsuk _ apeghiigh aqe kangat _ June-em _ kiyang _ naange nghaani _ taakwani _ .
enkaam _ July _ taana _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ , _ sa mun _ nunivagseghagh mete te _ saghna vig _ , _ new _ year-ngusqelluku _ . _ alla _ nutaghagh _ amalka _ ayumiquleq _ igleghte te aqe kangat _ .
taawa _ sa u a _ nulughyaq _ , _ anavagyaq _ atuqe magh an _ .
aghnagh t _ aghulaghqugh te aqe lghiit _ iwerngaqun _ kiilqusigh _ aliinʼghunʼghaani _ .
aghhunneghagu _ avelghagh gpenateng _ navek _ pi aqe luteng _ .
Nulughyaq _ , _ kayu _ pinʼghani _ , _ nefkaaqluku _ , _ mesiigh kun _ ateghte aqe luku _ .
uukagh _ tawaten _ ama _ mesiigh mun _ ateghte aqe luku _ ila a _ .
aghula i te gpenani _ yug a _ legh iitu te mneng _ esghapag lleg mni _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ pi ma inagh _ , _ ila a _ tamaa na _ sangllaq _ navek _ pi igate ngughk _ .
sa meng _ angyagh meng _ ulima _ .
ila a _ mallu nge aqe luni _ , _ uugtengaqluni _ , _ aghveghmenglu _ mallu nge aqe luteng _ .
alngunak _ ayvegh meng _ mallungenʼghata _ pi laghate aqe luni _ .
kelgugh aqe kangit _ aqfatesqelluki _ aghvegh meng _ mallungenʼghata _ , _ aghvesiigh meng _ , _ qungvuughaghmeng _ wataghllak _ avelghagh igate ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ pilag nghmegteki _ , _ ila ke te lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ pilag aqe lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ ne iitagh ke luki _ .
taakwavek _ qenwat qun _ esgha _ aghvepig llu _ qenwat qun _ ne iitagh ke luku _ lliigh lghii _ maatemun _ ukavek _ wha _ tawaten _ .
sivuligh
sivungagh m _ Kiyaghtaallgha _ neghigh luku
mat- yu ke aq _ sivungagh mii
Kingikaam _ apegh llegh a

Sipelankut _ maavek _ lliigh magh ita _ tagi ukut _ wetku _ .
anengagh ka _ Galaagerngen _ aghnaa igh te yan _ kayagte aanga _ qepghagh te yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .
amen- a _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t llu _ , _ Sipelankutlu _ qerngughte te kau ut _ taam _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ maavek _ sivungagh mun _ .
quyngigh m _ qapraghqaqegkangi _ .
taagken _ enkaangam _ tagi ukut llu _ aghnaa igh te yan _ Galaagerngen _ .
kayusigh yaghtigh sqe a _ ataqagh m _ .
Enkaangam _ qenwat _ ellngit llu _ tagi ut _ .
tazigna ta _ mangteghagh at _ .
sivuke luta _ kanansalghiikut _ , _ aaygu m _ maaten _ nayugh kekagh ani _ .
Enkaangam _ , _ elngaatall _ kagpellghaghteghllagluta _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ .
ingaghte uute negh mta _ sakighte luta _ , _ qavaghvig ite ngughk _ tamaani _ .
igaghvig _ sakmavek _ pi u yaghpete aat _ , _ Pinaayam _ itghagh te ma kanga _ , _ taghnughhagh a _ matum _ pillgite na yu kan _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
Piwhaninkut _ Mr. _ Farlis-enkut _ , _ Sipelankut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ Pangawyinkut _ ayvigtegh mi _ taamani _ quyngigh _ sighuneghtupaalugllak _ tugu naqutke kangat _ .
Agʼghilghiit _ nagate vyiigh anka _ , _ ne m _ kelutangani _ taamani _ ayvigtegh mi _ .
Tamaakeyaggaq _ quyngigh neng _ sighunghi _ aange lghiik _ .
enkaam _ sivuke luku _ ungazighmii m _ neli kaqsagh kanga _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ , _ Mayukaam _ .
enkaam _ amani _ sivukekagh _ Quvegsileghmi _ nenglu ngiighhagh m _ aag llegh a _ makete luku _ .
alghigh ta ani _ nunalgusiqaghaghput _ .
whangkuta _ log _ house-meng _ mangteghagh luta _ .
almesiqe a _ nutem _ tawaten _ mesag ghllag _ .
Tutemqiiraaghhaghmeng _ tuumkelluta _ .
kelulighnegh itgun _ uwalighneghitgun _ mangteghagh ukut _ Mayukaankut _ , _ maagun _ sivungagh kun _ .
Taanʼganteftuq _ .
elngaatall _ nategh ke te luni _ floor-engllaamalghii _ piwhanimeng _ , _ salngagkwaagh m _ , _ inglitraaghmeng _ , _ taqughkwaagh aneng _ .
elngaatall _ taake uk _ neghe llegh nkuk _ , _ Siivaghhaankuk _ taghnughhagh ke lukek _ .
enkaam _ nulighqelluku _ Taliqnaq _ , _ taana llu _ saki ni _ entaqun _ Waayi _ .
Enkaangam _ tawani _ itghagh yuwhaagh aqngamta _ , _ Iirgum _ itghagh sigh nkut _ maavek _ .
amavek _ maaken _ Mayukaankut _ taakut _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ itghagh kau lghiit _ .
maghagh mete te _ itghaghwaaqaghtukut _ ayvigtegh meng _ amaken _ tawani _ kiig ani _ .
Enkaangam _ taamani _ Galaagerngenkuk _ Mayukaankuk _ uyghiite ngllagh uk _ .
angyi aghte tke aat
malghukuraagh _ tesqawani _ unguvigagh m _ tapghagh ani _ , _ nalluke aqa _ sa ke aq _ aquutagh ii aghagh luni _ wallu _ tepe kau a _ .
yug i _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ tume liqe luteng _ , _ naalkekagh it _ qenwat _ , _ maalghug _ .
samagun _ naayghagh t _ uughqitgun _ ivagh luki _ qimugsigh meng _ .
Enkaangam _ kitum _ taam _ amaghaghsini _ nangllaghqe ghllag yan _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ , _ naayghagh t _ uughqitni _ samani _ .
up- lleghte luku _ , _ talwa _ akuzi nanigh luni _ , _ up- lleghsi ma kanga _ iwhanim _ Aymergem _ .
piiwagh te u yagh kangi _ ivaghit _ kinku t _ taam _ malghukuraagh m _ yug i _ .
esghaqagh kau ma aqa _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ .
unguvigagh m _ entaqun _ tapghagh ani _ tesqawani _ .
napaqagh ghllag a llu _ , _ taana llu _ yugusigh a _ .
kingu a llu _ taawa _ aminghagh vyiigh llgagh u uq _ natengiighhaq _ .
uugte aq
Taakunguukut _ tawani _ , _ Kemugyillu _ , _ veghtekagh llu _ , _ Ataqa _ wallu _ Singaaweteghllaklu _ iwhani llu _ Kaneghteghyaqlu _ , _ uugta nge ukut _ tesqawani _ ayvegh meng _ .
tuqute luku _ kagimtegkangat _ , _ elngaatall _ taana _ Singaaweteghllak _ natanganeng _ tuufqaghtagh lghii _ .
ii _ aghnalqwaagh _ qemall _ , _ tukaate ma a _ neghekagh an _ entaqun _ , _ mighyam _ kaate kaqe a _ elngaatall _ , _ tesqawani _ taaqe luni _ tuufqaghtagh nghmeng _ .
Mayukaankuk _ Amawunkuk _ nayag ak _ .
tamaani _ aghnaaghtekau uq _ .
iknaqe qrug raaghinagh _ elngaatall _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
Mayukaam _ angyi lghii
Teskananteftut _ Mayukaam _ angyi lghii _ , _ tekeghagh an _ ukum _ tungangiighhaani _ .
anguksag kaqsagh aput _ amaken _ tapghapagagh meng _ maavek _ lliigh yama _ , _ teskanani _ tukughagh i _ kenle nge i kete te _ samagun _ kepugh llegh it _ .
whaten _ ayuqe yaghpete ut _ , _ enkaam _ iighsuute meng _ qughagh qugh vike luteng _ .
arekull _ Mayukaam _ tamaani _ tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
Family-nginaghhaawaqelghiit _ maani _ taakut _ Mayukaankut _ .
inglu a _ qaake luku _ angyaghwaagh m _ enkaam _ ayagsigh luku _ , _ inglu a _ enraq _ iighsugh luku _ qaake aqe a _ .
tawaten _ angyilghagh ma aqe kanga _ .
mat- yu ke aq _ sivuke pigte luni _ maavek _ lliigh kau uq _ .
enkaam _ tuqu yan _ , _ Sipelankut _ kiiw gneng _ samaken _ quyngigh eng _ nula ghllag yan _ malghughqellug qu _ , _ ila a _ ayvigtegh mi _ , _ ila a _ maani _ , _ tawaten _ pi kau ut _ .
angyaghpag ghllag _ Ruby
Enkaangam _ una _ Ruby _ angyaghpag ghllag _ pi nga yug qu ragh u aagh _ , _ esghagh ma aqa _ taana _ , _ Steamer-nguyaghpetuq _ .
tawani _ esghagh aqe yamkun _ kingu mikun _ whaten _ malghukuraaghhaghestun _ elqaghtaghhaghmeng _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
Ruby _ maagun _ uyghigh uq _ , _ igaghvig _ tagite a _ , _ igagh vike yuwhaagh _ .
Pinaayam _ itghagh tke a _ tawani _ .
tawaten _ pi luku _ umiileg llu _ tesakmumllu _ apeghtughiste a _ kina u yagh uq _ .
Dupertuis-nguyaghtaa _ wallu _ puygaaqa _ tesakmum _ apeghtughiste a _ .
ipa _ apeghtugh i sta _ , _ igaghyagh vike yuwhaagh ka _ whanga _ Campbell-nguyaghtuq _ .
elngaatall _ taana _ apeghtugh i sta _ qepghaqagh ghllag pestaagh u yagh uq _ .
Los _ angeles- meng _ tagi kau uq _ , _ California-meng _ .
sa n _ Francisco-m _ uughqa ghhagh anite ngughk _ taana _ Los _ angeles _ .
Tawalliima _ naten _ angka aqa _ akileghtuusagh a _ aghvig nghaani _ .
wetku _ upenghagh ghhagh inagh mi _ mail-lelitkayuk _ .
Cutter-etgun _ wetku _ mailengegkayuk _ taana _ yuug _ .
Enkaangam _ elngaatall _ kuusme mi llu _ , _ New _ Year-millu _ igagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ kiiw gnun _ aglagh luni _ , _ kiiw gneng _ tesamaken _ pugughilegh mun _ .
pugughilegh meng _ wetku _ tagi aqe luni _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ kuusmeyagh aqe lghiik _ kiiw gnun _ tesamavek _ quyngighqwaagh nun _ .
petgegh nghhagh
quyngighqwaagh t _ liisimakekagh nka _ piwhaninkunguut _ , _ Sipelankut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ taana _ iiwenllu _ liite aqe unga _ tuqu uq _ .
imagh yagh ghllag luku _ natangakun _ , _ wallu _ ighu an _ kenle akun _ .
taaghta mun _ pasiskangat _ iodine-meng _ aghaligh naqe luku _ tuqute ni luku _ .
ata an _ Imegyuutem _ wallu _ pasike kanga _ .
elngaatall _ Pinaayam _ iknaqughi ni yagh aa _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ samani _ tapghagh mun _ taagavek _ quugsaghtugh negh meggni _ , _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ kakegllugiitagh mineng _ uygaaghte luku _ , _ whaten _ navek _ tamaavek _ qenaagh mun _ mughaaya _ kanagagh gminun _ , _ ingavek _ qamughteminun _ uyamig aghte luku _ aqfalaameng _ aglagh te kaqe a _ .
quyngigh m _ ataasigh m _ katamngwaagh _ usi a _ , _ taana _ angyaghpag m _ palutagh ghllag a _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe a _ .
Enkaangam _ taana _ petgegh nghhagh _ tuqu yan _ , _ uyughagh anun _ tagi ste aat _ quyngigh a _ Unmeggaghmun _ .
enkaam _ quyngighqwaagh uq _ taana _ Unmeggaq _ .
taakut _ amalka _ piinligh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
entaqun _ uygureghaneng _ maaken _ laaligh neng _ ungipamsug meng _ nagaqugh aqe aqa _ governmentemnguq _ maana _ quyngigh liqe aqe kanga _ igataghllagmeng _ kenle ke luku _ .
Paneghaatkaalghii _ nalluke kegka _ whanga _ , _ sivuqagh _ tesakemna _ .
enkaam _ pugughilegh mun _ neqe meng _ aqfate aqe luteng _ .
kiyalighagh t _ maakut _ , _ kukuleg t _ yug lgutusagh lghiit _ , _ pugughilegh t _ tamaakut _ .
ungipamsug ke luki _ liite aqe anka _ .
alaka ghhagh
Enkaangam _ teskiwhkuk _ Nunaagak _ , _ kukuleg mii u uq _ entaqun _ , _ alaka ghhagh u uq _ .
uyiigh meng _ ameltulkek _ usputagh qagh lukek _ , _ qute mun _ taglaate luku _ taana _ uyiigh _ .
aag vig kaghte luni nguq _ nalugute nghmini _ aghvigh qaghte aqe yagh lghii _ .
ighleke aqe kangat _ qetgegh luni _ tangeghtunghaaskuni _ uteghmun _ megh mun _ ifkagh na yu kan _ uyghag ghllag u lghii _ .
Taamaa _ Elqilegmii _ uyamigaatakek _ maalghug _ uyghag ghllag k _ takeriikanik _ .
aag llegh a _ naten _ whaten _ entaqun _ ten _ feet-emyaak _ , _ yaagnevziq _ iqetulnga _ .
Uyamigaataqniiqagket _ , _ taake uk _ , _ alaka ghhagh mun _ tawavek _ .
tapghapagagh mi
taagken _ Iirgum _ itghagh te luta _ amavek _ tapghapagagh mun _ , _ azigutagh leg ghllag u yagh uq _ unegken llu _ paagken llu _ , _ whaten _ unaghsigh meng _ azigutagh leg ghllag t _ teskanansaghtut _ esnagh ghhagh m _ tunutangani _ .
sa qaghte laatagh sta _ uqughte ta ghhagh ngunaamta _ itghagh ma lghiikut _ .
nefkuuragh put _ elngaatall _ sika ke lghii stun _ aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ .
esghaghhu _ Wangqetelem _ tazingken _ quyngigh _ qineghpeghwaagh yagh luku _ esghagh ma kanginkut _ .
esghagh luta _ legan _ tespikegken _ , _ ukalighmeng _ naayghagh meng _ , _ samavek _ mangteghagh mii meggnun _ pi gpenani _ tespikegken _ egmigh vike ma kanginkut _ .
taagken _ ungipaate luku _ , _ neqe ghllag u na ait _ ama _ elqiileg mi _ taamani _ .
Enkaangam _ natangani _ taam _ whanga _ maligte luku _ taama _ pi ukung _ akmag yagh unga _ neqe meng _ .
unaami _ Wiighallu _ tagi ukung _ esne perewaagh kun _ akmag aatagh lutung _ quyngigh meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ sa meng _ .
taamani _ Waaghnaam _ pennagh ghhagh ita _ qaye itni _ sikiggaq _ aga _ sivu ngiighhagh mtegni _ , _ suna _ pamum _ kayagte te agu _ malighqigh sqellug qu _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ pi yagh aqa _ , _ akmagaatalegllagulghiinga _ .
taagken _ kaate lutung _ tamaani _ esgha _ kiyaghtaalleq _ pi niigh pigte yagh lghii _ .
taana _ Pangawyi _ amalka _ tuvghagh ke luku _ , _ ataasiighte pagtekaayagh lghiit _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ Veghtekaankut _ .
Pangawyi _ tuvghagh ke luku _ .
pedersen
pedersen _ una _ kaate nghaani _ ilangakun _ sakmavek _ piiwagh aqe lghiit _ , _ naaptaghteng _ akike yaghtugh aqe kangat _ kaviigh _ .
Enkaangam _ itghagh yamta _ taamavek _ tawaten _ aglagh yamta _ taawa _ pedersen _ itghagh kayugu yagh lghii _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ taamaken _ upag aqe lghiikut _ maavek _ .
ilangakun _ ellnga n _ Pedersen-em _ taam _ uunʼggun _ itghagh vike aqe kanginkut _ .
umiileg _ taana _ pilleg qrug raaghinagh _ .
aga _ siku m _ tugu luku _ naagu _ maaqute aqe a _ .
entaqun _ alpag te nghatni _ piwhaniluni _ whaa _ aliighwaaqestaghaqelghii _ sakmaken _ .
pedersen _ taana _ angyaghugh magh mi _ , _ akilpegagh magh mi _ ayuqe uq _ .
aghvepig mun _ angyaghughtu yaghpete uq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ sivuqagh mete luta _ salin _ .
naghughte aqe uq _ , _ uksaaghenkugni _ , _ upenghaankugni _ .
Nome-etelleq
entaqun _ Nome-a _ nelimun _ saghiighqesuwhaaghaqngan _ liite kau lghiinga _ .
esghaghhu qun _ maaten _ whaa _ angyaghpangestiighuskanga _ .
Nome-elluteng _ piiwagh negh meggni _ , _ esnagh aneng _ sa meng _ saghnamsugumaaqelghiit _ , _ egtekagh itneng _ laluramke t _ .
piyag qu te _ ( _ Bear _ ) _ Nome-etaqut _ .
Cheechako _ Company-lluteng _ tawaten _ akilpegagh luteng _ .
tawaten _ Nome-esaghqaaneghmeggni _ aki kaghqagh meng _ yataaghqe aqe lghiit _ uksugh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ .
naten _ pi aqe aat _ , _ taana _ Ataayaghhaq _ entaqun _ kaangqugh ke luku _ .
esghaghhu qun _ suqagh meng _ akike luteng _ Nome-eqaataqelghiit _ .
Taakwaningani _ umyugagh meggneng _ lliigh ut _ .
Cheechako _ allgeghllug qu _ sivuqagh m _ tesakmum _ .
sa yukagh yu k _ , _ whaten _ sanighte luku _ sayug aqe kangat _ iighsuutegnekun _ , _ piyugtestemmeng _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ tespamani _ ungazigh mi _ malghukuraagh _ , _ Saaplanguftuq _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ avate mi _ tawani _ Hazel _ , _ ama _ malghukuraagh _ , _ angerkavavleghaaguq _ natengiighhaq _ Unazighmiit _ anyaghpagitneng _ .
tukfigh iqe ait _ Nome-memeng _ .
maaten _ paga _ Nome-a _ angyaghpag ngestagh meng _ avaqraggiighute ma uq _ .
wetku _ entaqun _ nakmiigh aqe yagh kata _ tamaaken _ lipeghsagh luteng _ akmavek _ pi aqe nayagh lghiit _ .
tawaten _ nula kau uq _ sivu nge aq _ .
sivuke pigte luku _ Mayukaam _ ungazighmii m _ , _ atghagh luni _ Sivuqametkullaaluni _ , _ Sivuqaghhmiingughtekaq _ .
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ Amagunkuk _ , _ nayag ke luku _ Singaaweteghllak _ taakut _ .
taana _ Amagu _ taawa _ iknaqe qrug pigte yaghtu uq _ .
iwernga _ Sunaaghrugem _ entaqun _ kitugh yagh aa _ , _ pi nanigh magh an _ .
Paangʼghet
elngaatall _ upenghagh u uute nghaani _ payangite nghaani _ naavghutkayugyugaghtuuq _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tespamaken llu _ pangeghte luteng _ , _ maligte luki _ maakumiu t _ , _ sakmani _ .
ukavek _ lliigh yug niite ghllag luta _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ .
tespamavek _ nangenqagh naqe yagh luta _ , _ amsanaghllug _ elngaatall _ .
amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ teghigagh ighlliqe luta _ evlug ghllag t _ kaate luki _ .
entaqun _ Bering _ Strait-mi _ kaate kaqe ke put _ amsanaghllug mi _ imani _ evlug ghrugllag t _ .
taagken _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ iwhaninkut _ Alankut _ nallagh aput _ qavregh meng _ malighqugh luteng _ .
tawaten _ malighqugh llegh ke ut _ , _ kitum _ alngunak _ ayvasaa stekagh a _ naghulleg nghmegteggu nguq _ ellngit a _ pikayug u aat _ .
Piya _ ( _ Bear _ ) _ tespamavek _ engine-ekegsaghyaghtuqayuguyaghtuq _ , _ navek _ nalluke aqa _ .
Piya _ una _ Coast _ Guard _ Cutter _ aqimle ightugh a _ .
apeghtughiste m _ tawavek _ apegh luki _ Piyankunun _ .
sa n _ Francisco-telleq
Thetis-nguyaghtuq _ aag llegh a _ .
taameng _ pi yameng _ qemightaaghyaghtuq _ palaghhaghmeng _ .
Enkaangam _ Veghtekaankut _ taam _ iwhaninkut _ angu sagh u te nkut _ , _ Inuunkut _ aghvigh te kaqsagh ai _ taaggun _ Thetis-em _ .
Iwhaninkunguyaghpetunʼnguq _ ipa _ aghvigh yaghqagh t _ , _ igaghyagh kayug t _ ukut _ , _ Iirgunkut _ entaqun _ kinku t _ Sunaaghrugenkut _ , _ kina u uq _ pi nga yu aat _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyaghte luni _ Veghtekaam _ kanavek _ sa n _ Francisco-meng _ bridge-eliimanikangat _ , _ tamaani nguq _ avangite yagh uq _ taakmanlluki _ ellngit _ .
Enkaangam _ eltughagh minun _ kelgute aqe kangi _ igaqegkagh nite luku _ esghagh nghminigu _ taana _ bridge-eghllak _ .
whaken _ sa n _ Francisco-meng _ navek _ , _ Golden _ gate- mun _ entaqun _ .
tawavek _ kenle ke luku _ bridge-eliimaniiqaat _ .
Ferry _ boat-kunʼnguq _ aghvigh qragh u llegh a _ ellngit _ taakmanlluteng _ .
Enkaangam _ uteghnigh ut _ angyaghutgun _ malghukuraagh kun _ , _ kina u yagh uq _ taana _ malghukuraagh _ , _ uksughte luteng _ wetku _ taakut _ .
Inuughnguq _ taana _ igaqayuugtevyiiqaalghii _ , _ umiileg anun _ lata ste luku _ aghveghniighyat _ .
aygugh uute naqe yata _ tawavek _ tagi luteng _ legan _ pi naqe ni ma kangi _ .
ivagh i ma _ aghnagh _ iknaqe lghii
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ iknaqe lghii _ , _ yuguma neghtuqagh _ repall _ World _ War _ Two-mi _ tamaani _ unguva yagh lghii _ .
Aghnalqwaaghllagluni _ , _ nekeve nanigh luni _ , _ pakregngaghhaghmi _ talwa _ lli aqe aq _ .
wetku _ taam _ pillugam _ kingu aneng _ tuqukagh _ .
ivagh i ma u uq _ ategh a _ , _ Agaankuk _ , _ Karginkuk _ nayag ak _ .
sivuke luku _ Ayngera _ ugi ke yagh kanga _ , _ Paallengetaq _ panike luku _ .
taake uk _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ qamagte lutek _ enkaam _ qalu m llu nguq _ tugu kaqsagh kanga _ .
ama _ taana llu _ tuqukagh _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ Tutmatelgem _ tugukagh a _ .
taake uk _ ne k _ aghyupaarighllaglutek _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ , _ wetku _ World _ War _ Two-m _ kingu aneng _ .
flu- lutek _ qerngagh egmek _ , _ kingulighaqutaghlutek _ , _ ikfiqepag gpenatek _ , _ qinuyug te kete luku _ tuqu laghate tke ak _ .
iknaqe pigte ma lghii _ aghnagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
ayumigh _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ ayvii llegh it _ alla t _ maaten _ pilleg mnneng _ .
ayvegh meng _ nasqunghi _ uyavlutuumaghllagita _ uteghvagh qu te _ iike aqe kangit _ neqetuumagh ita _ .
Taamnguq _ ivagh i ma m _ angtughpag m _ nasqunghii _ tugutagh nge i kete te _ tugu luki _ saaygu m _ qaye anun _ miluute ma aqe kangi _ .
sivu liigh aput
Mekeneghsim _ apegh llegh a
Taaganii _ qiighqagh _ maana _ yugtu pigte ma yagh lghii _ .
qafsina _ villages- nge ma yagh lghii _ , _ sivuqagh _ , _ sa igh kuvek _ , _ kiyalighagh _ , _ kukuleg _ , _ qangeghsagh _ - _ kiwatangaghmii t _ , _ tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ Aqaam _ .
a qaa _ iwhanit _ aghnagh ke ghrug aat _ , _ pagaliit _ .
pagaliit _ Tuusaankuk _ Akumutaankuk _ panig ak _ .
Tupaanga _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ enkaam _ ellnga _ Iqmaluwa _ , _ Paazak _ uyuqlighpigaaniiqaa _ .
kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ repall _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ .
angayuqagh gkenka nguq _ tesakmaken _ kukuleg _ yug lgu luku _ kukuleg u te kaqe aat _ ellnga _ .
Leganʼnguq _ kukuleg mun _ tagyuqa ut _ , _ taakwavek _ ketliqagh t _ sani itneng _ uwalighneghakun _ igleghte aat _ .
kii _ , _ nenglu m _ qaye a _ paga _ ketanqwaaghaqrigtaa _ yuug _ naavghute uq _ .
angyaghyage neng _ sivuqagh meng _ aragh ut _ .
taamagun _ tamliiviggaawaqelghiikun _ , _ taaggunʼnguq _ tamlag ut _ .
taana nguq _ tamlu ii vig u na iqe aat _ angyat igh vig u magh mi _ , _ kangegh igh lughkagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
yugtu pigte yaghpete uq _ .
elngaatall nguq _ angyagh eng _ saafte nghite aat _ tenpe te aqngan _ .
yug m nguq _ qaghlegtekaqii _ taagken _ .
tawaten _ ungipamsug kaqe ai _ .
yug lgu luku nguq _ liisimake a _ .
Tawatenʼnguq _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ pi aqe kangat _ .
Tawatenʼnguq _ aghnaghagh penaagh u luteng _ ellngit _ , _ entaqun _ kellmigsigalluteng _ salin _ , _ iwernga _ ungipagh ngugh _ nagaqugh aqe uq _ whaten _ kiipaghqemmi _ uksaagh m _ tungangani _ , _ Kiyalighaghmiinʼnguq _ tesqaga _ aqiiyag ut _ .
ii _ , _ legretaqelghiinʼnguq _ aghnaghagh llegagh t _ ellngit _ .
kiyalighagh mii t _ pi nghmegteki _ , _ tesqagumnguq _ yug i _ angvigagh pigte ut _ .
pi nghmegteki _ metghaghmeng _ atkug te luteng _ , _ aate kau uute luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ ilangakunʼnguq _ , _ Kiwatangaghmiinʼnguq _ tesqaga _ aqiiyag t _ .
pi nghmegteki _ , _ naghuyamenguq _ atkug ghpagte te luteng _ .
esgha _ Tuliinkut _ nalighnegh it _ maaten _ entaqun _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
qangeghsagh mii t _ , _ taakusta _ kiwatangaghmii t _ elngaatall _ saki nka _ ukut _ whanga _ , _ Meghyuunkut _ .
kiwatangaghmii u na iqe ait _ , _ pungughmii t _ kiwatangaghmii t _ .
Unmeggaankuk _ , _ Meghyuunkuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
Pinaayam _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe a _ petgegh nghhagh _ taakuni _ , _ aw lug ke i _ uyuqlighpigaaniiqsaghaat _ .
mekelghiigh u luteng _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aagna _ , _ apangiighhagh ut llu _ aamta _ entaqun _ seghleghllug u ma yagh uq _ .
Upenghaam _ whaten _ unugani _ qawaagniighnaghsimaan _ , _ anengagh mi _ Nguungayankuk _ Alangankuk _ qawaagniighusigh at _ metngeghute laatagh ma kanga _ .
qawaagyagh yagh luteng _ , _ Eghqaaghaam _ guute qaghte vike ma kanga _ taana _ aw lug ke i _ , _ sivuqagh mi _ .
Aqaam _ sivuqagh mete luni _ ungipagh a _ , _ aghnaghagh u luni _ .
taawa _ sivuqagh llu _ , _ sa igh kuvek llu _ nagate llegh mini _ uglagh na iqe yagh aa _ .
Upenghaamnguq _ esla ani _ tawaten _ amsanaghtu pigte yagh na iqe a _ taaganingani _ elngaatall _ .
ataasigh ghhaghte negh nge uq _ aghnegh t _ qafsina t _ naqam _ enraghnguq _ naafte nghmini _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ taakunginaghhaagneng _ umeg a qaa _ .
naqam _ aliigh nghmini _ taagaverugllak _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ taagani _ sivunegh mnni _ maalghuwaaqsaghtunʼnguq _ mangteghagh t _ kiyaghute yu ait _ .
uksaagh mi _ mangteghaghpagtuutaqunʼnguq _ kumlanaqellghem _ sivu ngiighhagh ani _ .
upenghagh mi _ angyaghnaq _ taaqe ghesnagh nghaani _ , _ mangteghasqwaaghmunʼnguq _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ .
taakut _ mangteghaghpatenguq _ naafqe aqe ait _ .
Naafqelluki _ kagpag aqe ait _ .
kiig mun _ , _ summer _ house-mun _ nuugte aqe lghiit _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ .
Mangteghasqwaaghenʼnguq _ tamaakut _ mekestaaghhaa ut _ mangteghaghpagneng _ .
Bedroom-mengi _ qaamkut _ ungaviguunʼnguq _ atigh llegh i _ .
Enkangam _ sivungagh ni _ taawani _ kitchen-et _ amalka _ , _ gaat _ .
qula i _ reghilnguut _ , _ gaagh vig t _ .
mangteghasqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ tawatete na iqe ait _ .
Tawatenʼnguq _ sivuqagh _ mangteghasqwaagh mun _ aanleghaate yuwhaagh luni _ , _ sivuqagh _ gaagh u uute nghmini _ , _ qaqsungigh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ , _ esne m _ tungangakunʼnguq _ naghughte negh meggni _ nutem _ alpag negh meggni _ saye it _ puyuqemlegaghwaaghluteng _ .
Tawatengwaaghnguq _ siquveg mi _ tesamani _ ayuqe na iqe ait _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ nengyughma _ ungipamsug kaqe a _ .
Enkaangam _ entaqun _ saam _ aqnighnegh m _ qiighqagh m _ yug a _ village-emta _ maatum _ yug a _ strike-emaa _ ayumiqullegh mi _ wallu _ ataasigh mi _ yugu i ma a _ .
sivuqagh ghhagh inagh _ survive-emalghiinguq _ .
tamaa na _ village-em _ ila a _ tuqu laghate tke aq _ tawani _ , _ paaghqite tke aq _ .
tawaten _ apegh kaqe a _ .
Iitegngoq _ sivuqagh llu _ yug igh ghllag kaqsagh aa _ , _ iwernga _ esgha _ siipnegh u ma lghii _ .
kukuleg _ entaqun _ esgha _ tamaatum _ , _ Iegan _ nenglu m _ ilu ani _ tesqamani _ aghuliigh uute tke aq _ .
qantaghaqun _ entaqun _ esgha _ kukuleg _ paaghqite tke aq _ .
nanigh u llegh a _ pugughilegh m
pugughilegh _ , _ repallnguq _ pennagh t _ taagegkut _ tuumlighllagluki _ ayuqe yaghpete ai _ .
neli yagh ghngaaghmegteggu _ nanugh m _ nenglu it _ kanagh aqe luki _ .
nellug yug negh meggni _ unite aqe luki _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ pugughilegh _ taaganingani _ .
yuug nguq _ tespamaken _ avate meng _ atg- ghhagh ke aq _ , _ Qaaqa _ .
sivuke luni nguq _ tapghugh kun _ neli kau uq _ .
tapghugh _ uksugh mi _ neqe niigh vig a _ awavaqaanlenguq _ .
pugughilegh mun _ teve ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ nanugh _ ivagh i tke a _ naten _ efleghhtelleghqameng _ .
tawaten _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh an _ nanghiiqu ma kanga _ , _ kumaghtaqluku _ , _ sa u a _ kumaghtaqluku _ , _ nanugh _ tamaa na _ efleghte naqe nghmeng _ , _ iqite ste naqe nghmeng _ .
taawa nguq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ , _ nanugh m _ naanghagh aneng _ ayaawagh ke luni _ kenghek _ kumaghsimakek _ .
taawa nguq _ nanugh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ taawagun _ singigpag qu te _ ategh kau uq _ .
Leganʼnguq _ aneghnegh an _ agepsughte luku _ .
taawa nguq _ yuggagh m _ taam _ pugughilegh _ nanigh igh te stekaqe a _ .
nanugh m nguq _ ne ke yaghpete a _ taaganingani _ .
tawaten _ apegh aqe aat _ .
Sivunghenka _ kingikagh at
taana ta _ esghaghhu _ whanga _ ategh ka _ me ke negh i _ .
Fifth _ generation-nguniiqaanga _ nanevgaghtagh ghhagh ma _ whanga _ tespikegken _ ategh meng _ .
Mekeneghsinguughnguq _ liisimake llegh a _ .
Mekeneghsim _ ighnegh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ .
awte lugh u i ngam _ ighnegh kek _ Alangankuk _ Nguungayankuk _ .
Enaangena _ nayag ke luku _ , _ Maasqem _ naange a _ .
Enkaangam _ Galaagerngenkuk _ , _ Kingikaankuk _ Maasqen _ ilughagh ke ak _ .
Enkaangam _ taana _ awte lugh u i nga _ unʼgani _ peleghqe kau na iqe aat _ uksugh yuwhaagh mi _ tanemlleqa _ qighuneghyage mi _ qimugsigh mi _ entaqun _ pi ke aq _ .
qikmigh ita _ qighunegh mun _ teghiigh tke a _ .
liilightuusagh u laatagh uq _ qighunegh _ uglagh ghllag _ qerngughneghllak _ kaate qaghte luku nguq _ , _ pula snanigh aqe aat _ .
kanagh naghtugh ngugh _ , _ kiingighte te ghllag luni nguq _ uglagh te mineng _ ayuqe uq _ .
liilightuusagh _ .
tamaavek _ qikmigh ita _ kaate qaghte te luku _ kanaghkagh _ .
entaqun _ qikmigh a llu _ atunem _ pi naqute yalghiimeng _ qikmigh ita _ mughugtekagh at _ wallu _ tawani _ aliite yagh luni _ .
taagani _ nani _ eskimo _ custom _ ellmi neng _ kenle ngllagh llegh _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ .
tawatete luni _ taanʼganinguq _ peleghqekagh _ kiyang _ taglaate igate aat _ imaken _ ima _ .
taake uk _ ighnegh gkenka _ tuguyugllaghngaaghmegtegnegu _ qayughllak _ pi lik _ liilightuusagh u lghii _ , _ mamlegte naqe magh mi _ .
iwerngaqun _ kuguutitkeghngaaghmegtegnegu _ unitekagh ak _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawatesaghtunʼnguq _ taanʼgani _ yug t _ peleghqe kau nghata _ aghnaghaghhagh u luki nguq _ atiiqe aqe yagh ait _ .
Enkaangam _ Nguungayam _ nuyeklighpigagh u na iqe aat _ aghnaghaghhagh u luku _ atiiqekagh a _ awte lugh u i nga _ taana _ .
tanemlleqa _ awte lugh u i nga _ Imingatem _ ilughagh aneng _ Aghnaghlluggaam _ kuugʼghaneng _ Estugruugmeng _ ugwiighumalghii _ .
Enkaangam _ paniggaghqek _ taake uk _ Avruwaankuk _ , _ Kukiiyangankuk _ .
whangkuta _ ilughwaagput _ .
Enkaangam _ tanemlleqa _ Estugruuk _ tuqu yan _ taake uk _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ aflengake i ste nga i uute yayek _ , _ entaqun _ qantaghanlleghpigaghmun _ Imingatmun _ aflengake sqellug kek _ qallegsaghagh te yagh lukek _ , _ Imingateqrugem _ entaqun _ apetuyuugte te ma uk _ .
Enkaangam _ apangiighhagh mta _ qullug ightuqagh ke gkek _ qayughllak _ taam _ panig mi _ paniggaghqek _ eltughagh ghhagh gni _ taawa _ tugukligh kaqe kek _ .
anglikagh k _ whangkunni _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ taake uk _ ugwiightuutelleghmegnun _ kenlanga _ .
Kalaawyinkugneng _ Kemugyinkugneng _ ugwiightuutkaaguk _ .
Enkaangam _ taana _ Estugruuk _ tuqu yan _ paninang _ Awalqameng _ ugwiighumalghii _ awte lugh u i nga _ , _ enkaam _ Qavalghaankuk _ , _ Aquutunkuk _ mekelghiigh perewaagh ghhagh k _ taaggun _ allgeghsimakek _ .
taagken _ entaqun _ elngaatall _ qerngaqaniigmek _ aviighute uute ma uk _ ugwikullghiik _ .
tanemlleqa _ Qavalghaghllak _ taana _ esgha _ ilughagh ka _ taagken _ apallugh ke luku _ .
tawatete uq _ whanga _ liigikellqa _ .
aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh at _ sivungagh mii t
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
pugughilegh mi _ aghvegh niigh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ ungipagh ke naqe aqa _ .
aghvegh niigh llegh _ piinligh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ , _ tesamani _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ angayuqagh igh te magh mi _ kaviigh niigh qagh yu k _ elngaatall _ ellnginaghhaghmi _ .
taawanginaq _ angayuqagh igh te luni _ ellnginaghhaaghtekaalghii _ , _ iitek _ anengagh ghhagh a _ , _ taawanginaq _ qinuyuwaaghaqelghii _ .
ungipagh kaqe kangi _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ , _ upenghaamllu _ ilangani _ tuvaghllagluni _ tawaten _ , _ aghvegh t _ tuvagh m _ saaghw ani _ kaaghtaaghaqelghiit _ esghapag aqe kangi _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ sumeghtaghagh lunga _ elngaatall _ estuwaaghsimaghmallu _ , _ estuwaghmun _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ .
puuskaate meng _ lipeghsagh yug unga _ , _ maalghug _ pi agka _ .
elngaatall _ sa u luki _ lipeghsagh ni luki _ atugh u naanghite ni luki _ pi kangit _ .
taana _ Pitiim _ ungipamsug llegh a _ sanighte te luku _ nanghiiqu na lunga _ , _ ungipaate gpenaki _ pi luki _ .
taagken _ allgegh te yama _ estugagh meng _ qakiqniqe unga _ tesamavek _ 1972mi _ .
angyagh ut _ tevutaghpung _ , _ Pagayaghmiillu _ maalghuggaamtung _ .
sivuligh t _ ne t _ tesamani _ .
Kaatutaghput _ pegnem _ , _ iwernga _ Pitiim _ kayusiite ainkung _ .
taawa _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ piinligh yuwhaagh kaqe a _ aghvegh niigh llegh _ .
sumeghtaghagh lunga _ kingumun _ ukavek _ atugh u yaghqaa uute yu gnite yan _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ atugh ughte uq _ .
aghvegh niigh vig ite yagh luteng _ sivungagh mii t _ , _ maaten _ kinguliighagh mnnun _ nutaan _ aghvegh niigh vigkagh _ allgegh uq _ .
iwerngaqun _ laluramke t _ sakwaaqe i naqe ghllag t _ , _ neqe mnnun _ aghveghniighmun _ tamaavek _ .
tamaani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ allgeghtekaqaqa _ taana _ .
tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ ivenrumeng _ nanghiiqu yagh luta _ maallgute nghmeng _ aghtugh ukut _ .
iitek _ Ivelghani _ taakwani _ , _ Ivelghaaftut _ taakwegkut _ , _ maaten _ Ivelghat _ liite ke put _ , _ aghvenge nayagh ukut _ ingutugh ghhagh meng _ .
aghveqe yagh kunigu _ taape nayagh kanga _ entaqun _ .
ghhuugh _ entaqun _ guute nayagh lghii _ savegpagkun _ tamaagun _ .
taana _ ivenrumeng _ kaatevzighaghput _ , _ aaqun _ kaasimaaghput _ iitek _ .
tawani _ ayumiqullegh mi _ aga _ aghvenge i nagh magh emta _ pikani _ , _ aghvenge i nagh magh emta _ elngaatall _ .
sivuke luta _ awatiigh qagh luta _ siku akun _ , _ qungughvig t _ ketangitni _ .
Aghviteghllak _ elngaatall _ , _ awatiigh ukut _ , _ telanangangllaghluta _ .
Enkaangam _ savegpalegnun _ pi luta _ , _ savegpangluta _ alla neng _ awataghpag meng llu _ pi luta _ taawa _ aghvenge ukut _ .
Ayumiqungani _ taawa _ aghvenge aatagh kau ut _ .
entaqun _ maaghraghvinleg _ .
Maaghraghvilqelluku _ qawiighnegh _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ elngaatall _ aghveghni ii aagh _ akuzisaghanguq _ qafsinʼggaawaqluni _ lliigh uq _ .
tawaten _ aghveghniighem _ tagtale ke a _ taawa _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a
quyngighqwaagh llegh
piinlillegh a _ quyngigh m
Uvim _ apegh llegh a
Dr. _ Jackson _ yusqughhagh u uq _ piinlighiyuwhaaghtevut _ ugpeghmeng _ , _ maaken llu _ quyngigh meng _ .
esgha _ tawatete luta _ enraq _ itghagh aqe lghiikut _ tapghugh mun _ kiig mi _ .
me t _ kaate ut _ , _ piiwagh lta nguq _ .
nanevgaghtagh ut _ sulug _ piiwigh sqe aat _ quyngigh meng _ sa meng _ , _ taawa _ government-mun _ itegh uq _ amalka _ whaten _ qepghagh lghii stun _ .
taawa _ tuwaat _ aawallu _ quynginge yaghqaaghte ut _ .
quyngigh _ aangʼghaa _ , _ uglagh m _ ighsake yagh kanga _ tagite llegh a _ .
qule ke aghtagh te _ usikaataghaghput _ amavek _ , _ Kepkaghyalqagnekun _ taaggun _ .
Asighqelluki _ tawaten _ , _ qule ke aghtagh te _ .
entaqun _ yuginagh _ tallimat _ siipnegh ke luku _ .
saghligagh _ uglagh negh kellug qu _ .
taawa _ Iiyiitaankut _ , _ Aghtuqaayagenkut _ , _ kinkughyaget _ taawa _ , _ elngaatall _ ayaviigh iigh luteng _ pilaanqelluteng _ .
kevegtugh luki _ qaake luki _ lli luki _ asighqe sagh i _ ilemtaqiit _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh ughte nghata _ nekefqaghte luteng _ ketarwaaqsaqangit _ , _ leganqun _ lli luki _ quyngigh m _ aga _ alpag aqe ait _ .
maalghug gneng _ usi ii kut _ , _ pi nga yu a _ taana _ tallimaggaaluki _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ taamavek _ maaken _ .
taamavek _ aglaghyunʼghituq _ Piya _ ( _ Bear _ ) _ angyaghpag _ .
taagken _ laag vlaagh ghhaat _ ( _ Laplanders _ ) _ neqe at _ aglaataghput _ .
taakut _ Tzaarankunguut _ entaqun _ aghnagh m _ ategh a _ , _ weni _ kellmighqepag llghite unga _ .
avaqutagh kek _ weni _ angli tete lutek _ ayuqe uk _ , _ maalghug u uk _ mekelghiigh k _ .
pinigh t _ ne t _ taakut _ , _ laag vlaagh ghhaat _ , _ quyngigh meng _ pi ut _ .

nayghapag kun _ taaggun _ kiwalighneghan _ kenle akun _ tiinta lug teng _ , _ ne ngllagh naqe kangit _ entaqun _ .
Pamansalghii _ esghagh kesi _ entaqun _ , _ aqfayegaagnite yagh lghii _ .

tawatete ut _ .
entaqun _ nuugte aqe luteng _ , _ nuugte aqe luteng _ , _ amenqun _ kangii kun llu _ ataasigh _ ulima kangat _ .
kangigh kun _ pamagun llu _ saviggaq _ ulima kaqe aat _ , _ quyngigh _ maligsaaghem _ angtalanganeng _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
quyngighqwaagh llegh ka
Tuliim _ apegh llegh a
liite yuwhaagh llegh ka
sivuke luku _ ighni llegh ka _ apegh naqe aqa _ .
sivuqagh mi _ allgegh kau unga _ .
taakut _ apaghpigaqa _ una _ nalluke aqa _ , _ tegh leg nge a _ , _ Saavlankuk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
Saavla _ anguksag kaqe aqa _ , _ Pelaasinkut _ ata at _ .
anguksag ghllag kaqe aqa _ .
aghillug nkut _ , _ Quwaarenkut _ , _ Minaankut _ , _ taakut _ siivanllegh t _ sulug nkut _ , _ ifkaghte te nkut _ anguksag ghllagkagh nka _ .
enmis _ qelegh i luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ esghapag luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ nukalpigagh nun _ , _ qayughllak _ whaten _ anguyag leg stun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
inglu qligh mnneng _ pamaken _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ payangite kayug _ .
Aqelqaghniighmeng _ atigh luki _ , _ aqelqaghniigh kayugu kangit _ .
tamaakut _ aqfate te mun _ ayuqesugnilnguut _ taawa _ elngaatall _ aqfate te meng _ pi ste aqe ait _ .
Aamtaa _ tughumgha te ste luki _ whaten _ iknaqngwaaghmun _ ayuqesugnilnguut _ taawa _ iknaqmeng _ enraq _ pi ste naqutke aqe ait _ .
qayughllak _ pangeghtekan _ anguyag lgu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ .
tawatete ut _ payangite nghaani _ , _ taakut _ awatangani _ tughumgha te kayug t _ , _ taawa _ tugutu te aqe ut _ tughumgha te kayugu ut _ , _ nakaan _ anguyag ke te luteng _ taawanginaq _ aqelqaghni ii aagh _ .
anguyag ke te nghite ut _ piniqe te luteng _ elngaatall _ , _ naavghutulluteng _ ayuqe ut _ tespamaken _ ungazigh meng _ , _ nuughnaqaniq _ entaqun _ tanpegh _ .
entaqun _ aghnasaleg pagite ma aqe uq _ tespamna _ natete aqa _ .
amu i qaghte na qaqu ut _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ atungagh k _ .
Naveghtaqiit _ taaqe u aqe aat _ atkuwet _ , _ ilepghaaghet _ , _ sanaghtengngwaaqat _ amigh t _ .
quyillegte neghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ allgegh te aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ aki kaqe kangit _ tapghagh at _ quyilleg nun _ tespagavek _ , _ enkaam _ tukfigh aqe kangit _ , _ naveghtaqegkangit _ entaqun _ amigh meng _ .
tawatete ut _ .
Taawaa _ sivuqagh mi _ allgegh kau unga _ 1903mi _ .
taawanginaq _ maalghug u uk _ taawa _ birth _ date-egka _ .
sivuqagh mi _ Maasqem _ , _ government-em _ file- nga ni _ piyaqmininga _ six-nguftuq _ ighni llegh ka _ , _ August _ 6 _ .
Enkaangam _ church-em _ file- nga ni _ August _ 12-nguftuq _ .
Malghughqelluni _ sangami _ ayuqe ma a _ .
Six-kun _ kiyang _ pi aqe unga _ imigh i negh mni _ .
Teacher-elguftuq _ tea- aghte a _ , _ teacher-kesuwhaaqaghput _ liisimake kaqe a _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ taake uk _ , _ apeghtughiste k _ Campbell-enkuk _ .
nutaan _ aanqaghte aqe aat _ kete mun _ taawa _ , _ boys _ room-emeng _ ategh leg _ .
taana _ igaghviliitkaqaghput _ mekestaaghhagh ni _ aanqaghnegh _ taana _ .
esgha _ tawatete uq _ tazinganirugpak _ allgegh lunga _ esgha _ whaa _ maaten _ whaten _ yugtu tekagh ligh unga _ .
Quyngighqwaaleq _ - _ neli yuwhaagh llegh
1914-mi _ quyngighqwaagh unga _ .
1914-mi _ mangteghiigh yuwhaagh llegh itni _ legan _ kiig ani _ .
whanga _ uksugh ani _ itghagh unga _ .
Quyngilegtimeng _ aqfa atnga _ quyngighqwaaghesqellunga _ .
Anaghayaaghmun _ apprentice-ngulunga _ .
Anaghayaam _ aqfa unga _ apprentice-ngulunga _ .
Apprentice-ngughtunga _ taawa _ .
tea- ngatu _ Unmeggaam _ tugu kaqe a _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ apeghtughiste m _ nanglleg yagute lunga _ mekelghiighhaaghngaaghmaa _ apprenticengughtestekaqegkanganga _ Anaghayaaghmun _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ maavek _ lliigh lghiik _ .
1914-nguftuq _ taawa _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
Inuum _ log _ house _ taana _ Sipelankuk _ , _ log _ house-nguftuq _ 1914-mi _ ulimaagh u uq _ neli yuwhaagh llegh _ .
estamagnegh ghhagh u ut _ .
Sipela _ , _ Nunguk _ , _ Anaghayaaq _ , _ Unmeggaq _ , _ taakunguftut _ .
pi nga yu neng _ inglu lgu yagh lghiit _ quyngighqwaagh t _ .
aveg luteng _ pi kau ut _ .
Enkaangam _ ayvigtegh mi _ Pinaaya _ , _ Pangawyi _ , _ meteghllug _ , _ Raaquq _ , _ taakut _ ayvigtegh mete ut _ .
entaqun _ agʼghilluteng _ tawaten _ pelleghtekat _ .
taawa _ esgha _ 1914-mi _ quyngighqwaagh kanga _ .
Anaghayaaghmi _ enkaangam _ four _ years-nguftuq _ apprentice-ngullghem _ kiyaghtaallgha _ .
estamat _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh luki _ kayagtekayugu ait _ ellngit neng _ lliighesqelluki _ .
tamaani _ qamagtengngwaaghwaaghluni _ quyngigh leg m _ nalluniigh kayug a _ .
quyngigh _ nalluniightugh luni _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
upenghagh mi _ whaten _ tegleg yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ut _ enraq _ avaquti ut _ .
whangkuta _ nalluniigh lleg mtestun _ nalluniigh kumteki _ , _ whaa _ pi kumteki _ , _ kii _ taam _ yug m _ quyngigh a _ naqam _ nughagh a _ una _ saam _ yug m _ nalluniigh luku _ .
tegleg yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ naa ita _ liisimake kangit _ .
naten _ uglaghqakaan _ quyngigh _ , _ nughagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ , _ kiiw ni _ whaten _ aghvighhnaqnemteggu _ , _ nughagh ngeltagh lghute _ elngaatall _ qerngughquteghllagaqelghii _ , _ naa ite a _ ivagh magh ita _ , _ naalke aqe ait _ legan _ aga _ , _ aghulaqe te magh ita _ .
tawatete ut _ , _ tugulagh kayugu ait _ .
nallavragh yaghqaqe nghite ait _ tawatengwaaq _ iqeghte aq _ ayuqe yagh ghngaan _ .
quyngigh m _ nalluniightu llegh a
Enkaangam _ Anaghayaam _ nalluniigh llegh a _ viistaghiinaaftuq _ .
takestaaghhaa lutek _ sigute kek _ qamagte lutek _ .
whanga _ enkaangam _ aghenqignegh a _ awalighnegh a _ iike yalghiimi _ L _ .
taakwna _ kepe negh kegte uq _ inglu a _ .
ataasigh mi _ ayumiqullegh mi _ nalluniigh llegh _ tamaa na _ aghvinleg u uq _ .
ataasigh mi _ ayumiqullegh mi _ quyngigh meng _ nalluniigh i llegh a _ .
Apprentice-ngughtem _ nalluniigh llegh a _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
Enkaangam _ sivuligh mi _ aghvinleg _ .
estamat _ saghligagh t _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
Enkaangam _ aag llegh ani _ ayumiqullegh m _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ , _ maalghug _ yug k _ .
nalluniigh kayug t _ .
Enkaangam _ pi nga yagh u ni _ qula _ .
aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yugte aqe luki _ , _ tawaten _ nalluniightugh aqe luki _ .
Enkaangam _ estamaani _ tawani _ , _ qula _ allameng _ , _ tawatengwaaq _ uglaghqakaan _ , _ aghvinleg _ saghligagh _ estamat _ yug t _ .
taawa _ upenghanghani _ , _ kiig nghaani _ kayagte aqe ait _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe ait _ , _ taawanginaq _ tiinta meng _ , _ egllu meng _ , _ avlawa _ sa u a _ , _ kagimkagh _ tunqugh aqe aat _ , _ sa meng _ pi yaghqaa gpenaki _ .
gaaghusigh _ qamagte luku _ tunqugh kayugu aat _ .
tawaten _ ayuqe uq _ .
katam _ tawaten _ ayumigh _ panig teng _ tugumiightu nghmegteki _ , _ saki itnun _ aglagh ste naqe nghmegteki _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ tawatengwaaq _ tugumiightuqallghuughaqiit _ apprentice-eteng _ .
ellngit neng _ kiyaghte yaghqaaghte ste aqe kangit _ .
tawatete uq _ .
tugumiightu lghii stun _ katam _ .
tugumiigh iigh uq _ tamaa na _ , _ panig teng _ saki itnun _ aglagh sug kayugu ait _ mulupagnaqenghata _ .
nengaa teng _ taakut _ tugumiightugh luki _ aglagh stekayug it _ .
tawatete laatagh ut _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ pi aqe unga _ , _ apprentice-et _ tawaten _ esleqenghatki _ tugumiightugh luki _ aglaghtesleghiistun _ .
aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh yagu _ Sipelam _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Anaghayaaq _ , _ qakun _ tulugh u i _ kayagte naqe zigu _ nalleghaghhalek _ aghvinleg _ ayumiqullegh _ pi naqe a _ ! _ ” _ upenghagh ke te _ pi naqe a _ .
Upenghanghani _ ivgagh mi _ taawani _ , _ pedersen _ kaate nghaani _ , _ taawani _ ighni ste i kayugu lghiikut _ .
akilpegagh niigh luta _ apeghiigh yamta _ , _ tent- a _ , _ qawaagniighusigh _ , _ suflugagh _ , _ egllu _ , _ avlaawa _ , _ ii- u na qaghtagh te _ tukfightugh aa _ sa meng _ nuugh yaghqaa gpenanga _ , _ taawa _ umyugagh mneng _ lliigh ste aanga _ .
Enkaangam _ angayuqagh nka _ legan _ tent-amnun _ tagi ta nka _ , _ Unmeggaankunitaqsalghiit _ .
Ataasimetaqsalghiit _ , _ upenghagh mi _ taawavek _ ivgagh mun _ ighni ste i yagh te aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ corral-mun _ kanaghtekayugu lghii _ tamaani _ .
enkaam _ quyngigh _ keste nghmegteggu _ , _ quyngightutala _ liisima kaqe kangat _ , _ yug m _ taam _ quyngigh an _ uglaghtatalanga _ teregh te kayugu lghii _ .
tawaten _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kiyaghtaallemni _ 400-ngughtekaq _ quyngigh ka _ siipngaaghluni _ .
legan _ naa itnite luki _ nughagh at _ , _ ighninghhagh u luki _ nalluniigh aqe aput _ .
naa ita _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ , _ repall _ unite igate ait _ tawanlluki _ , _ manu itnite luki _ inag itnite luki _ nalluniightugh aqe aput _ , _ ighninghhagh ghhagh u luki _ .
aamta _ ila ita _ angayuqagh ita _ unite qaghte luki _ esghapag aqe ait _ , _ apeghiinemteki _ wetku _ taku aqe ait _ .
ila i _ tamaakut _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ sughugaghaqut _ enkaangam _ ila mnnun _ naghpigh ste luki _ nuqnegh ste luki _ nalluniigh luki _ wetku _ , _ qayughllak _ avaqutagh yug neghtuqagh t _ sughugaghaqut _ , _ avaqutagh teng _ tugu snanigh aqe ait _ .
Sughugaghnaqenghata _ naghpigh luki _ nuqnegh aqe ait _ .
four _ years-mi _ quyngigh ka _ 400-ngughtuq _ , _ saghligagh nge yuqagh nge a _ qayughllak _ .
upenghagh mi _ ighnistinun _ pinegh mni _ kiyang _ saghligagh meng _ ighni aqe lghiit _ .
entaqun _ saghligagh nge yuqagh t _ nula rakegte na pigte ut _ .
esghaghhu qun _ tawaten _ tuyugh i i aghagh ta mi _ quyngigh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu lghiit _ uksaagh nghaani _ .
seven _ hundred _ dollars-meng _ quynightuqat _ tamaakut _ money-nguutaqelghiit _ December-mi _ .
Enkaangam _ taakwavek _ ukavagh magh mi _ quyngightutalestun _ tawaten _ money-nguutaqut _ .
quyngightuqagh t _ tamaakut _ $ _ 700.00-ngughsimaaqelghii _ .
esgha _ tawatete laatagh ma lghii _ .
Money-nguutkayuguyaghtut _ , _ igug ighkagh meng _ tuyugh i kayugu yagh lghiit _ akmavek _ Boxer-kun _ , _ unaghsigh u luku _ Boxer _ , _ unaghsigh ghhagh u luku _ , _ Whitlem _ umiileg kesagh kanga _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh ghllag kau lghii _ kayusigh i kau lghii _ .
pedersen _ taawa _ kayusigh i kau uq _ estuwiilluku _ , _ akilpegagh niigh qagh yu k _ .
wetku _ apeghiigh nghata _ , _ pedersen _ , _ akilpegagh niigh nghmeng _ taaqe negh mta _ , _ July-enaqenghani _ Julymi _ wetku _ tagi laghate te aqe ukut _ , _ tagi aqe ukut _ maavek _ sivungagh mun _ .
kiyang _ quyngimetutemneng _ nalluke kegka _ sa u a _ ila a _ , _ ne mun _ tagilqungigalnguunga _ kiyang _ quyngimetkayugulghiinga _ qayughllak _ .
taakut _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ quyngigh igh kut _ kelengake u kangat _ .
wetku _ ighni ste i _ taaqenghani _ , _ ne mun _ tagi luta _ unaami _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh ke luteng _ , _ quyngigh _ aqfa aqe luku _ tagite aqe luku _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
unaami _ tuungligh ghhagh t _ pi aqe luteng _ .
Enkaangam _ taakut _ unaami _ , _ taakut _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ maalghug u luteng _ aghulaqe aqe ut _ .
Nayughnanighaqegkefut _ temngi _ aqfa aqe luku _ piiqegkefut _ .
neli llegh _ igaghvig ligh llegh
Enkaangam _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igaghvig ligh naqe yan _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taamkut _ tagi laghate te ut _ .
Meeting-eyaghtut _ .
qerngughte te ut _ meeting- aat _ .
igaghvig _ whaa _ qaake naqe kangat _ , _ nagun _ nekegte lleghqagh meng _ agʼghitkaat _ .
Enkaangam _ meeting-eluteng _ tawaten _ , _ ayvigtegh _ taamnaa _ nuna kegte yagh ghngaan _ , _ uksugh mi _ sa nigh ite u ta aneng _ , _ umegneghpaalluutanganeng _ , _ savig ite u ta aneng _ avelghagh aat _ anuqetuqagh _ .
ayvigtegh _ sa nigh ite ngughk _ piyaa nigh ite ngughk _ .
naqam _ quutfaghmeng _ quunpeng _ umegnegh ughte aqe kanga _ .
ivgagh _ taawna _ nuna kegte aq _ pi yu ghngaaghmegteggu _ atg- ghhaghte neghtuqagh _ .
mangteghagh t _ suupe te inaghte na yu kata _ qenaagh u ta aneng _ .
qayughllak _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ , _ kii _ tiintaviget _ suupute ghllag ma aqe kangi _ qenaagh u lghii _ .
maana _ mesagtu ghngaan _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ nakmike aat _ ukagungiighhaq _ reghightekayugutanganeng _ neqniighvikegtutanganeng _ .
aghuliigh aat _ maana _ sivu nge aq _ nunallug mete ghngaan _ maagun _ pi naqe aat _ .
aywaa meng _ anuqlighpag igate ngughk _ maana _ ikevagh ghhagh inagh meng _ anuqligh qagh yu k _ .
taawa _ ayvigtegh mii t _ itagnagh ut _ , _ tagite ait _ mangteghagh teng _ naafqelluki _ tagi laghate te ut _ maavek _ .
tagi ut _ taghnughhagh teng _ igaghyiisqelluki _ , _ qerngughunneqigtut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ enkaam _ .
taawanginaq _ nani _ tanqigh mi _ puygu ma aqa _ igaghvig _ qaaksugwhaallgha _ , _ naqamalla _ kitum _ entaqun _ .
igagh ngllagh llegh mete ngughk _ .
Government-em _ igagh u ni te u lghiit _ , _ imatuq _ avangite aat _ .
igagh a _ pi yuwhaagh aqngami _ entaqun _ Thompsonnguuq _ entaqun _ .
Dupertuis-nguyaghtuq _ ulimaghista _ igaghvig meng _ .
sivuqagh mi _ apeghtughiste u yagh lghii _ .
igaghvig _ ulima naqe aqngan _ , _ taam _ ulima yaghtugh aa _ .
igaghvig _ ulima ut _ , _ sivungagh m _ igaghvig a _ .
Teskanagun _ nutem _ pi ut _ , _ whagun _ igaghvig ghllag u yagh lghii kun _ whaa _ maaten _ .
Tawansalghiiqun _ igaghviggaq _ sa u a _ mekestaaghhagh _ .
kenlanga _ Troutman-enkut _ maavek _ apeghtugh i llegh itnun _ atuqekagh at _ taana _ .
Enkaangam _ Mr. _ William-enkut _ lliigh magh ita _ igagh vike yuwhaagh m _ kingu ligh aa _ kumagh kau uq _ .
Tazingagun _ nekegtegkangat _ , _ maaten _ uum _ nekagh ughtekanga _ , _ taaggun _ nekegtekagh at _ .
kumagh kau lghii _ , _ kii _ taawa _ qamagtengngwaaqaqaa _ .
Drum-a _ tamaa na _ iqe iqe ughtagh ukagh at _ sukate luku _ , _ iqite kaqe kangat _ guute na yu kan _ .
iwerngaqun _ tank-angi _ taakut _ qafsinagnegh u lghiit _ qerngagh meng _ , _ wallu _ aghvinlegneghuyaghta _ .
taakut _ aghula i te ut _ .
Guuqaqat _ , _ qimagugh tke aat _ ukavek _ .
Mr. _ William _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ tesqamanlenguukak _ Walter-em _ aane te kaqe ak _ .
naten _ floor-em _ asi a _ reghiteftuq _ .
Aaghhwmeng _ itegh vikekagh i _ .
agepsugh ghllagu lghii _ , _ esghagh vig ite ngughk _ aaghhwmeng _ ivagh lukek _ qikmigh llu _ , _ Mr. _ William-llu _ aane tke ak _ .
walter _ liisima laatagh ma a _ , _ saamna _ floor-em _ asi a _ agepsugh ghllagu ghngaaghmi _ , _ naten _ uusqaghtu tekagh mi _ saamnanga _ avangite ma a _ , _ reghisimaa _ , _ esghagh a _ aane te kaqe kangi _ .
naten _ ayuqe nayagh lghii _ , _ agepsugh m _ naafqe kanigh luku _ William _ talwa _ .
qaamte i na luni _ tesqamantekaayalghii _ , _ qikmigh ghllag a llu _ tawantekaq _ .
unaghsigh llu _ , _ igaghyagh llegh ka llu
Elngataall _ tawatete uq _ quug ghllag u yaghtu uq _ Sagunghangestaankuk _ , _ Sagunghaankuk _ taake uk _ , _ enkaam _ aklunagh isag lghii _ quugkagh meng _ .
mangteghiightuqagh u lghiit _ legan _ tamaaken _ unaghsigh meng _ qupughhugh luteng _ .
taakut _ Sipelankut _ log _ house-nguluku _ ulima kaqe aat _ .
llaaghinaan _ esgha _ nalluniigh aa ta qaa _ Inuum _ 1914-mi _ nekeftekau lghii _ .
Taawaa _ sivuqagh mi _ whaten _ liigikngwaaghpenanga _ itghagh kau lghiinga _ maavek _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ 12 _ yearsngngulunga _ .
igaghyagh unga _ tesakmani _ iitek _ .
Second _ grade-ngulunga _ taaqe unga _ , _ igaghyaghpag gpenanga _ .
maani _ itupill _ young _ me n _ class-etgun _ igaghyagh aatagh unga _ .
Young _ me n _ class-et _ igaghyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ ighivgaghmi _ .
igagh te kayugu yagh ut _ yug t _ ighivgaghmi _ .
igaghyagh kayugu yalghiikut _ tamaani _ yug tgun _ , _ ima _ taaqe aat _ sangan _ , _ piyug nanigh aat _ .
Quyngighniighem _ piyaqli i llegh a
quyngigh igh ni uq _ elngaatall _ ikfiqe na pigte uq _ .
talwa _ ighni ste i mi _ mangteghagh isag lghiikut _ .
esla mi _ legan _ uyghag t _ may- ughte luki _ , _ azigutagh ghhagh mi _ taawa _ .
talwa _ sa ngunaamta _ , _ sleeping _ bag-ngunaamta _ , _ ulig ngunaamta _ legan _ tawaten _ ingaghte aqe lghiikut _ .
tawatete yaghpete uq _ .
Iwerngaa _ aatkagh put _ maqagh lghiit _ .
qamagun _ nughagh at _ maakut _ ighninghhagh t _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t _ , _ angli ma ite ngugh t _ qamagun _ ilukligh u luki _ , _ enkaangam _ qaye akun _ tuqutagh nge ste aq _ maana _ aate te kaghqagh _ nughagh _ .
aate te kaghqagh ughtekagh _ .
tamaa na _ melqwi _ qaute kete luki _ atkug kaqe aput _ .
Ilepghaaghluta _ temkaghluta _ .
amigh meng _ alla ighsigh luta _ , _ kameg luta _ , _ amigh meng _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ .
Taananginaaguq _ umegnegh ughte nghaani _ seghlegh pigu uq _ .
azigutagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ .
iwernga _ tagtalmi _ sunglug ta ghhagh neng _ , _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ sa u aat _ azigutagh liite aput _ .
mangteghagh ke yaag te aput _ .
legan _ unaghsigh meng _ tawaten _ ulima luki _ , _ canvas-meng _ qantagh luki _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ azigutagh t _ piniraaghinagh t _ .
Anuqlighnaqenghani _ petugteghaqluki _ up- lleghte na yu kaki _ .
alaghrang _ egllu ngllagh ut _ , _ ulluvikagh t _ five _ gallon-et _ , _ tamaa na inagh u yagh lghii _ ulluvikagh _ five _ gallon-a _ .
tamaaken _ egllu ngllagh yagute ut _ , _ suflu ngllagh luteng _ kagpelengestayuggaghmeng _ .
suflugkagh t _ sa u aat _ , _ egllu kaghqagh meng _ pedersen _ tagite kayugu lghii _ saag nga lghii meng _ , _ galvanize-et _ sa u aat _ egllu kaghqagh ghllag t _ entaqun _ whaten _ plywood-estun _ angka lghiit _ .
kepugh luki _ ulima kayug it _ .
whangkuta _ enkaam _ suflu ngllagh negh mta _ , _ meghutlug t _ legan _ uygu uute qugh te luki _ suflu ke aqe ke put _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ .
ivgagh m _ qaye ani _ ighni ta iqe lghiikut _ , _ pugughillghagh mete te _ ukig yagute ukut _ , _ pugughillghagh qun _ sunglug ta ghhagh t _ ulima luki _ , _ egllu ligh luta _ , _ quugtu pigte lghii _ legan _ , _ qavangsiyuwaalghii _ , _ qavangsi yagh aqe lghii _ .
quyngigh ut _ ukig te luku _ pugughillghagh mete te _ aga _ mayugh aqe lghii _ .
mayugh nghaani _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ , _ maligte yaaghaghkagh ut _ iwerngaqun _ unglegh qaqu luni _ lliighnaqenghani _ , _ umulghaghaqaghput _ , _ ukig taqagh ut _ tawavek _ nayugh mnnun _ .
pilaataqu lghii ni _ four _ hours _ unglegh ma te kaqe aat _ .
taawanginaq _ emta _ ila ita _ nayugh i lghiit _ kipullegte vig _ tughaanghani _ neghe snanigh aqe kangat _ ungllegtu aatagh aqe kangat _ takelengestayuggaaluki _ , _ unglegh ma llegh _ lliigh ma aqe kangat _ , _ one _ hour _ , _ two _ hours _ .
ungllegtagh ta m _ whaa _ kipullegte i lleghqagh _ kaannaqenghani _ , _ ighleg yagute ma aqe kangat _ liigilliigh luki _ .
kiyang _ quyngigh mete kanga _ whanga _ .
utaqa i aqe lunga _ taakut _ aleghqagh nka _ tagi nghata _ .
esghaghhu qun _ Genugenkut _ , _ Maligutkaankut _ , _ ayugighsagh te nkut _ quyngighqwaagh aatagh kaayagh ut _ .
taawa _ mulu nghite ut _ .
sivugh qaghte negh meggni _ taawa _ itghagh igate ut _ .
entaqun _ iilqayug aqe ut _ nanghiigh nghmegteggu _ ikfiqe na a _ .
neghe gpenaamta _ , _ qavagh gpenaamta _ igleghte negh mta _ taananguuq _ ikfiqe na llegh _ .
Enkaangam _ ivagh i yami _ tawani _ ilangakun _ unaamun _ kenlanga _ kaate gpenaamta _ ivgagh mete luta _ pi aqe kanginkut _ .
nanghiigh aatagh kangat _ , _ enkaangam _ ima _ piiwagh aqe ut _ quyngighqwaaghwaaghluteng _ .
iilqayug neghllug te mneng _ whanga _ .
Meghnughnanighwaaghlunga _ , _ tenmaawingwaaghlunga _ .
Angtanghhamtestun _ igleghte aqe lghiikut _ , _ enkaam _ meghnughnanighwaaghluta _ .
enmis _ uteghmun _ aqfaaghtu te aqe luku _ quyngigh ut _ lliighaghput _ tughwaagh negh mta _ , _ ivagh i yagh negh mta _ .
One _ week _ aghulaqutkaqegkefut _ quyngigh mun _ pinegh mta _ , _ tuqutagh ii lleghqagh _ pinaqenghani _ .
Amansaghtuq _ corral-a _ , _ tuqutagh igh yuwhaagh llegh ut _ qitneg mi _ .
qitneg mete yagh lghii _ corral-a _ , _ taananginaayalghii _ .
Enkaangam _ corral-engllaghtut _ ivgagh kun _ .
taawa _ taawavek _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh igh yagh yagute ut _ .
Taamaverugllak _ pikayug u yagh ut _ qitneg mun _ sivuqagh meng _ tuqutagh yagh te aqe yagh ut _ .
Herd-em _ tukfigh kayugu yagh aa _ , _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ teghiglaaq _ , _ qaghlu kau luku _ .
quyngilegti llegh
quunpeng _ quyngilegtimeng _ ayuqe yalghiikut _ , _ qimugsigh gpenaamta _ .
Peghqightiluta _ pi aqe lghiikut _ , _ repall qun _ ataasigh meng _ , _ estamaneng _ inglu lgu luta _ pugughilegh meng _ coal-emeng _ piiwagh te i kau ukut _ , _ quyngilegtiperewaaghmeng _ igaghvig mun _ , _ sivuqagh m _ apeghtughiste anun _ .
sivuqagh _ entaqun _ usingigh vig ite yan _ , _ natete yan _ pugughilegh kun _ coal-a _ qaake ma kangat _ .
Government-em _ coalenga _ igaghvig m _ .
Quyngilegtimeng _ coal-emeng _ piiwagh te i yaghtugh ukut _ sivuqagh mun _ estamaneng _ inglulegyag u luta _ .
Maalghut _ usi ke aatagh aput _ ataasigh kun _ quyngigh kun _ , _ 150 _ pound-et _ coal-et _ ataasigh t _ .
whangkuta _ quyngigh put _ utuqanghulghiit _ , _ tenmaawikagh t _ qamugh mun _ , _ qamugh qu sigh ghllag t _ .
ukut _ ayvigtegh mii t _ ellngit a _ nuteghagh t _ quyngigh teng _ atugh naqe luki _ , _ naavyigh yuguma lghiit _ qamugh u aatagh igate ngugh t _ , _ tenmaawi kau nghite ngugh t _ .
up- si llu ta _ tesamavek _ tevmun _ pangalegti tete yalghiimeng _ legan _ unite ainkut _ aga _ , _ ayvigtegh mii t _ taakut _ quyngigh at _ nuteghagh u lghiit _ , _ whangkuta _ utuqanghulghiit _ .
pugughilegh meng _ up- si llu ta _ aygugh uute yalghiikut _ , _ nuug ukut _ whangkuta _ enraq _ usite yalghiikut _ .
tevelqug ni _ utaqa i ukut _ , _ pugughilegh meng _ saaggutukut _ .
Wangqetelen _ aviite uq _ .
Galaagerngem _ pi inkut _ , _ “ _ Wangqetelen _ entaqun _ uka _ . _ ” _ Taslughameng _ uka _ allgegh lghii _ .
Maasqen _ pi aqe a _ , _ “ _ Maasqen _ , _ sa meng _ piyugte gpenaan _ pi naken _ , _ entaqun _ uka _ qefliqngwaalghii _ . _ ”
aa _ , _ whangkuta _ sivungagh mii ni _ , _ salin _ tagi llghite luki _ ayvigtegh mii t _ , _ tamlu _ , _ whanga _ , _ Maasqen _ , _ Meghyuq _ .
Enkaangam _ ayvigtegh meng _ taamaken _ , _ Wangqetelen _ , _ Galaagerngen _ , _ Aluwa _ , _ Nungunaq _ , _ Qenluk _ , _ Akiya _ , _ aghvinlegyage t _ .
whangkuta _ estamaguukut _ , _ qule u ukut _ qerngagh emta _ .
Wangqetelem _ quyngigh a _ paghyum _ qamuyiilnguq _ , _ unite naqe ak _ usi gni _ , _ aag llegh a _ waran _ qaake sqe aat _ .
taana _ enraq _ ighsa kau te aqe aat _ qaake naqe nghite aat _ .
pi atnga _ , _ “ _ elpek _ nanghiiqu yagh kuvgu _ , _ usi ke yagh kuvgu _ . _ ” _ sivuughagh kestagh ghngaamkun _ quyngigh ka _ naavyigh na yu kan _ pi nga yiite aqa _ .
“ _ masingka _ legan _ itagnagh lghii _ ! _ ”
Maghyaghqughtekluku _ Wangqetelen _ igleghte ukut _ sukatutala atun _ .
quyngigh a _ ungleghaatatughqwaaga _ meghnum _ .
qamiye put _ , _ qamiye pigu ut _ iqetu ghllag luku _ two _ feetngwaaqut _ iqetaaghalluki _ qamiye ngllaghkagh t _ .
qayughllak _ kilgaa ni _ petug vike magh ita _ pi aqe ke put _ , _ legan _ aaghwte te luki _ unite aqe ke put _ quyngigh put _ .
ne mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikut _ aaghhwlluki _ .
suqaghnegh i _ savikenghaagh u ut _ .
Enkaangam _ pi yalghiikut _ masingka _ pingayugughngaata _ sivuqagh mun _ kaat ute anka _ .
kii _ qamugh neghtu pigte ut _ , _ kiilqusigh _ atuqe aqe kangit _ qayughllak _ .
kiig u yagh ghngaan _ unaghsigh mun _ qamughtugh u sigh ke aqe kangit _ .
Enkaangam _ qamugh mun _ iknaqe ut _ naavyighyaghqaanghisimaghmeng _ ayuqe ut _ .
Chief _ Herder-meng _ tugutellegh _ , _ nakmiigh llegh
taagken _ chief _ herder-meng _ tugu tete naqe ut _ , _ chief _ herder-kaghqameng _ .
sivuligh _ Sipelanguuq _ chief _ herder-a _ , _ enkaangam _ Pangawyingughlluni _ , _ Pangawyingughsimaan _ nutaghagh meng _ chief _ herder-kaghqameng _ tugu tete naqe ut _ .
quyngigh _ corral-mun _ kanaghte luku _ , _ key-tagh ut _ , _ pi nga yug u luta _ , _ Pangawyi _ , _ ggayegllug _ , _ whanga _ .
Nalimtaa _ tungqwaaghaghhnaqagu _ , _ tungqwaaghaghtelleghqaa _ esghagh naqe aat _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ayumiqukat _ , _ yearling-et _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ uksughtekagh t _ , _ old _ dog _ , _ old _ dog-meng _ atigh yaghqagh t _ , _ tawaten _ .
atightugh aatagh yagh ke put _ whangkuta _ quyngigh m _ ayumiqututalangi _ .
keste i luta _ apeghiigh luta _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ “ _ kii _ ! _ whanga _ elqughaghte ma kegka _ quyngigh _ kiyang _ ayumiqututalnga _ ! _ ”
amenam _ ungazighmii stun _ , _ paamkustun _ , _ quyillgistun _ , _ quyngimetutemneng _ liigilliigh kaqe kegka _ quyngigh m _ uksughtutala a _ , _ nayugh ke m _ angtale aneng _ .
