tawatete kangat _ pamani _ , _ quyilleg t _ liisimakngwaaghluki _ uksughtutaala _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh i _ , _ kiyaghtaallghi _ liitngwaaghluki _ ayuqe kangit _ .
Tawatengwaaghwaaq _ ayuqe yaghpete uq _ .
aawallu _ quynimun _ chief _ herder-ngulunga _ tuwaatnga _ .
quyngigh _ tungqwaaghaghtekegka _ .
tawani _ chief _ herder-ngulqinaghtunga _ , _ mayor-ngumaghma _ , _ estuwaghmun _ director-ngumaghma _ .
Estuwam _ saghya a _ whangkuta _ agʼghitkegkayuguyaqefut _ , _ Anica-m _ tugu mangite luku _ .
akitutala _ qerngagh emta _ ulimalaghluku _ , _ sivuqagh mii t llu _ qerngughte te luta _ ulima luku _ pikayuguyaqefut _ .
sivuqagh mi _ Kuzaata _ mayor-kesaqangat _ .
enkaam _ qerngagh emtung _ Kuzaatallu _ qepghaqagh u lghiikung _ kiyang _ estuwaghmun _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ kayanqute _ maana _ ukighqughaqegkefut _ , _ aki ite ngugh mun _ sa mun _ neqe mun _ ukigtelleghput _ pikayugukefut _ , _ enkaam _ estuwaghput _ iflii igate ngughk _ .
aki pagite yagh ghngaaghmi _ ghhuugh _ tamaa na _ , _ tamaavek _ aglaghhnemteggu _ ifla igate ngughk _ .
maana _ ila a _ neqe m _ akimsuggiite u lghii _ , _ enkaam _ tamaavek _ nengighqennemteggu _ aki ite ngugh mun _ , _ akitughtevleghaghyaghngaaghmi _ kayanqute _ tamaa na _ atugh ut _ ivagh i niigh sigh _ piyaqli na yu kata _ .
tawatete kayugu yagh lghii _ .
maaten _ Anica-mun _ lliigh luni _ tawaten _ lli aqe aq _ .
tawatete yagh ukut _ , _ elngaatall _ tawatengwaaghwaaq _ qepghalqesaghaghput _ sivuqagh mii t llu _ whangkuta llu _ .
Meeting-ekayuguyalghiikut _ kiyang _ council-ni _ , _ sivuqagh m _ council-ngi _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ qerngughte te luta _ aghvighaatameng _ tawaten _ meeting-ekayugni _ .
ilangani _ maavek _ tagi luteng _ , _ kiyang _ whangkuta _ tesakmavek _ , _ Mr. _ Daugherty _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ meeting-eyaqayuguyaghtukut _ .
Mr. _ Daugherty _ seghleghllug u yagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tamaani _ .
qayughllak _ whaten _ Daugherty-m _ quunpeng _ tesakmavek _ July-eyaamaamta _ pi stekayugu yagh kanginkut _ .
qerngughte te luta _ July-aaqelghiikut _ , _ tawatete yalghiikut _ .
maaten _ pamaken _ inglu aneng _ pi nanigh yalghiimeng _ , _ aqelqaghniigh sigh ughtekanga _ aangqagh igh aq _ .
Chief _ Herder-em _ qepghaqagh a
Chief _ herder-em _ qepghaqagh a _ tamaa na _ elngaatall _ quyngigh _ , _ quyngighqwaaghtet _ hour-ngit _ , _ igaghtelighluta _ .
Forty-five _ cents-an-hour-nguftuq _ tamaani _ qepghagh llegh _ .
aghsaghmete yaghtu uq _ forty-five-cents-an-hour _ , _ iwernga _ tawaten _ angka yagh uq _ .
enraq llu _ money-pigmeng _ akileghtugh gpenaamta _ , _ quyngigh meng _ pikayug u kanginkut _ .
iwerngaqun _ herder-ngughsimaamta _ money-ngiighhaghmeng _ ila luta _ lliigh ainkut _ .
Tawatengwaaghwaaq _ pi nga yu neng _ inglu lgu luta _ quyngighqwaagh kau lghiikut _ .
Chief _ herder-et _ tamaakut _ quyngigh mun _ kayagtimun _ , _ taakut _ quyngighqwaagh yaghqagh t _ qepghagh kayugu ait _ , _ quunpeng _ quyngigh _ tawaten _ lliigh nghaani _ tawavek _ tuqute i lleghqagh _ lliigh nghaani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ , _ yataaghqestekestaaghaqegkangit _ .
Chief _ herder-em _ qelegh llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ quyngigh ghqu yaghqagh t _ taakut _ ulima kayugu ai _ quunpeng _ .
tuqute i aagh mi _ , _ tawaten _ uglaghqakalghii _ sivuqagh meng _ atungagh k _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ money-meng _ ila i _ , _ quynginge na ta it _ .
saama _ qepghagh negh meggni _ llaaghanwha _ hour-ngit _ taakut _ quyngigh mun _ legan _ qiifte aqe kangit _ .
aki msuggagh ngunaan _ urang _ , _ qamagtengngwaaghwaaghluku _ qepghagh lghii _ , _ enkaangam _ quynginge uute kayugu yagh lghii _ , _ tuqu ta u uute aqe lghii _ .
saama _ ila ita _ pirughte i te aqe kangit _ .
whangkuta _ katam _ quyngigh leg ni _ , _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute ste aqe ainkut _ piyuke lleg mtestun _ inwa _ tukfigh luku _ .
Enkaangam _ whangkuta _ tunqughaqegkefut _ aki u na an _ tanemlleqa _ quyngigh yaghkagh nun _ tamaavek _ .
whanga qun _ kayusiite i naqe nghmeng _ katam _ whanga _ tukfigh aqe luki _ aki it _ pilagh kanga _ , _ herd-em _ palaghaghtekayugukangi _ .
whanga _ upuupeng _ pinitun _ tukfigh aqe kenka _ , _ qayughllak _ negh yugnagh pigte lghii _ quyngigh _ , _ maaten _ paninang _ tawatelnguq _ .
urang _ nulasagh kumegteggu _ whangkutestun _ ayuqe yagh kumeng _ , _ whaa _ quyngigh m _ yug ita _ kelengake yagh kumegteggu _ ighni ta iqe luteng _ , _ tuqute llegh _ kayaate nayagh lghii _ .
kaviigh m _ , _ meteghllug m _ , _ tuqute kayugu kanga _ nughagh _ , _ kelengake nghite ngugh ni _ .
meteghllug qrug t _ tamaakut _ teghhikun _ nughagh ghhagh t _ qellu it _ nusukataamaaqegkangit _ .
kaviigh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ uwighhughluki _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
tamaaken _ enkaangam _ apallugh ke luku _ , _ Sipelam _ chief _ herder-nguluni _ tuqutagh ii negh mta _ , _ nayugh i negh mta _ , _ kaviigh niigh ste aqe kanginkut _ tuqu qite te neng _ .
taakut _ amiiragh i _ Pedersen-mun _ tuune luki _ money-ngi _ taakut _ nayugh ikagh ni _ , _ kaviigh t _ tuqu tke aput _ Pedersenmun _ tuune luki _ , _ akike luki _ , _ money-ngi _ taakut _ whangkuta _ nayugh ikagh ni _ nengigh te sta qaa _ .
money-ngi _ ne iitagh ke aput _ nayugh ikagh ni _ .
Llaaghanwhaa _ nughaam _ tuqu llegh a _ kayaalnguq _ , _ wetku _ umegneghughneghani _ upenghagh mi _ esla _ naafte nghminigu _ ghhuu ste qugh aqe lghii _ , _ gghuugaqelghiit _ nughwaghhaat _ ilangani _ .
aamta _ ilangani _ aghsaan _ tuqu llegh a _ ayuqe aqe uq _ .
taawa _ esla _ naafte luni _ aliigh yuwhaagh llegh ani _ pinegh mta _ , _ kii _ , _ tuqwaaghtaqumaaqelghii _ .
Enkaangam _ iflangigalkefut _ , _ nughagh ghhagh t llu _ tamaakut _ ighninghhagh ghhagh t _ akike kayugu kangi _ chief _ herder-em _ .
tamaakut _ tuqukagh t _ nayugh ikagh ni _ tawani _ legan _ akingite ut _ , _ avangite ut _ pilagh aqe ke put _ saghna aqe ke put _ , _ aviite yaghqaa yagh lghiit _ qayughllak _ .
Taanangulghii _ uksumii _ , _ uksaagh mi _ whaten _ kumlaluni _ aniguvzeghagh yagh luni _ , _ eslallugughte luni _ puqlaghqwaaluni _ aqlaghate ghpagte nghmini _ saamnanga _ legan _ siku nghminigu _ negh vig iitagh ke lghii _ .
qayugtugh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ estuwiinneghmeggni _ tuqu kayugu ut _ , _ estug teng _ naangtaqegkangit _ .
Enkaangam _ kiyang _ naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte naqe neghtuqagh t _ , _ naayghagh t _ ava ite ngugh t _ itagnagh lghiit _ , _ enraq _ ungagagh pagite te kayugu lghiit _ .
ungagagh _ tamaa na _ uksugh mi _ neqekegkanga _ quyngigh m _ .
ungagagh _ enraq _ tamaa na _ liisaqefut _ , _ laavlaaghmii t _ liite stekagh at _ ungagagh m _ piite llegh a _ .
Tallimanʼnguq _ ayumiqullegh t _ , _ quyngigh m _ neghenghite nghminigu _ , _ nagu kayugu uq _ .
ungagagh t _ tamaakut _ talligh ma _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ wetku _ negh yaghqaaghte ma aqe lghiit _ .
piite luteng _ sukangite pigte ma lghiit _ .
upenghagh mi _ itagnagh lghii _ alngunak _ piinghagh _ maana _ quyngigh m _ neghe kayugu kanga _ .
laavlaaghmii t _ tagiuwhaaqaaftut _ quyngigh _ maligte luku _ .
pinagh u yankut _ , _ Sipelankut _ , _ Qalunkungulghiit _ sivuligh t _ , _ quyngigh _ qaake yuwhaagh aqngan _ qula _ .
Aghtuqaayagenkut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ , _ Petgenghhaankut _ kinku t _ sivuke luteng _ .
Enkaangam _ ayumiqungani _ alla _ qaake tke aat _ quyngigh meng _ .
Enkaangam _ taakut _ taaqe ut _ , _ Sipelankungughtut _ taakut _ , _ elngaatall _ quunpeng _ Sipela _ , _ Pinaaya _ , _ petgegh nghhagh _ ( _ paninang _ kiyaghte yagh lghii _ ) _ .
petgegh nghhagh _ entaqun _ umiileg kesagh kangat _ tamaani _ , _ Meghyuunkut _ anengagh at _ .
laag vlaagh t _ taakut _ entaqun _ maalghug u ma yagh uk _ , _ wallu _ qafsinʼguyaghtat _ .
apeghtugh i yuwhaagh ke aat _ .
quyngigh m _ yukumtaaghi _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ .
Qamiynginʼnguq _ qayagh u ut _ , _ uuggun _ qamuutagh leg t _ , _ uvegh igate laatagh ut _ .
qaya stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ qamiyngit _ .
amenam _ entaqun _ nuyaaghite te ghllag nghata _ atugh aqe kangit _ .
aamta _ nuyaagh luteng _ naafqesaghqagh ke ait _ , _ qapragtu ghllag ut _ .
quyngigh mun _ apeghtugh i llegh
apeghtugh naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ , _ naten _ uyatutkaaghluki _ , _ sa u a _ five-to-six _ feet _ uyatu tke ai ta _ petug aqe aput _ .
taakut _ enlegkutagh t _ qamughaghtagh yaghqaa luki _ , _ qamugh ghllag yaghqaa gpenaki _ , _ aaw ghhaghtagh meng _ pi yaghqaa luki _ , _ aqnighte na yu kata _ , _ ii- sqeaghaghte na yu kata _ .
quunpeng _ nalughqutaghllagaqu _ tuguyuwhaanemteki _ .
qaprag ghllag aqe ut _ , _ sighunghit _ kepugh luki _ holda-lighluki _ petug aqe ke put _ .
unaami _ wetku _ pinemteki _ aghuliigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
unaami ani _ enraq _ qaghlu aqe aput _ .
qaghlu it _ piyuwhaanemteki _ , _ enraq _ tanemlleqa _ qaghlu yuwhaagh negh meggni _ efleghyugem _ iwernga _ mulu pagigate ut _ .
liisagh ke put _ tuguyuwhaanemteki _ tawaten _ apeghtughnaqnemteki _ qaghlu magh ita _ lliigh aput _ .
Qaghluughumiita _ , _ qaghlu it _ petugteghwaaghluki _ tawavek _ , _ saagtengit _ qughwaghnayukata _ .
Saagtengit _ naten _ tagkaaqut _ , _ teghiglug t _ tagtalkelluki _ .
tapghagh ghhagh meng _ uygaagh ke aput _ .
teghiglug t _ peghte luki _ whaten _ iqetu tke ai ta _ sa u a _ three _ inches _ , _ peghte luki _ tawaten _ saagtekaqaput _ .
qaghlu t _ pi niigh pigte ut _ tamaakut _ teghiglug t _ , _ amiiragh i _ , _ melqwi _ qaye anite luki _ .
unange i _ melqiite aqe lghiit _ , _ uuknangi _ agtugham _ qaghlukusiighteghllagem _ .
Peghqigsanemki _ , _ whanga qun _ kiyang _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghtaghkagh nka _ , _ apeghtughnaqnemki _ .
amenam _ pi nqegtagh t _ wallu _ akuuragh aqe zingi _ .
emta _ ila ita _ ilullug t _ , _ sughugaghllaaget _ quunpeng _ .
anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ uka _ legan _ sughug i kayugu ut _ , _ enkaam _ qamiye teng _ napaghaghtaqegkangit _ uka _ tagi nghata _ .
uyiigh t _ tagtalkelluki _ tawaten _ saagtekaqaput _ .
enkaam _ qamiye put _ uka _ tagi nghata _ sani igh te nghata _ uughqaghte aqe luta _ .
taawa _ ukanlluki _ quunpeng _ sayughqaaghkagh put _ qiifte naqutke aqe aput _ , _ qiive yagute aqe ut _ ukavek _ aghenqignegh mun _ .
Qiifnaqnemteki _ angyalligh qugh magh ita _ qamiye put _ taakwavek _ , _ elngaatall _ taawa _ qiive aqe lghiit _ .
Pangalgughaqut _ , _ pangalgughaqut _ , _ pangalgughnaninghataa _ amu kestagh aqe aput _ .
whaa _ qiivaatatughlluteng _ lliigh nghata _ , _ aghula i aghte aqe luki _ .
qenwat _ tenmaawisnemteki _ taawa _ uyatutalangistun _ lliigh aqe aput _ .
Saagtengan _ tagtalngi _ , _ tenpe yaghqaa gpenaki _ sa u a _ six-feet _ entaqun _ five-feet _ tawaten _ uyatu tekagh ligh aqe aput _ .
aghuliigh aghtekata _ , _ tenpe gkumteki _ , _ ighu i _ ayemnnaaqeput _ .
kiyang _ pi nga yu _ whanga _ qavaghte luki _ peghqightu aatagh kaqe anka _ , _ pi nga yu _ qavagh _ .
tawatete kau ut _ pi nga yu neng _ qavaghte luki _ peghqigh aqe ut _ peghqigsaghkagh nka _ .
akuuragh aatagh kaqe anka _ ilullug ite ngugh t llu _ .
Inglusighaqaput _ tenmaawi nghata _ , _ enkaam _ maghyaghqughtengughtaqut _ .
tamaakut _ aamta _ follow-meng _ ata iqe aput _ , _ taakwegkestaghhiinaq _ , _ elngaatall _ follow-t _ tamaakut _ usi iigh aqe aput _ .
ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ , _ quyngilegti sighqagh u nghite ut _ ellnginagh meng _ .
uziveketaagh ghllagu aqe ut _ igleghte gpenateng _ naqam _ petug luteng _ taslughanqegtut _ , _ follow-meng _ atigh luki _ ayuqe aput _ .
Enkaangam _ qamiye mteggun _ petug luki _ usi lug ke i _ whaa _ igleghte te kaqe aput _ , _ whaa _ usi igh ghllag luteng _ , _ naqamllu _ itagnagh aqe lghiit _ .
tawaten _ igleghusiqnemteki _ , _ followmeng _ atunem ta _ yugu yagh nga a ta _ , _ aqume luteng _ maligte te aqe lghiit _ , _ taawanginaq _ ellnginagh meng _ igleghte yaghqaa nghite ut _ pegngaghmeng _ , _ uziveketaagh yaghqagh t _ igleghte gpenateng _ .
sangameng _ tawatete aqe aat _ inglusi i ma ite ngugh t _ .
enkaam _ inglutelget _ pinigh ut _ quunpeng _ .
emta _ tawatete laatagh ut _ qikmigh stun _ , _ sukallelwaaqluteng _ .
sukate ngugh t _ sukaghllag u ut _ .
whaten _ igleghte te negh mta _ , _ pangalegti tete naqe negh mta _ aga _ sukate ngugh meng _ quyngigh lgu negh mta _ aga _ unite qaghte aqe aput _ ila put _ .
Aqfayngwaakegtat _ tamaakuut _ , _ aqfayngwaag negh meggni _ whaa _ pangalget _ ila i _ .
pangalegti naqe te inagh _ aga _ , _ ilangani _ pangalegti te kayugu lghiikut _ qayughllak _ .
uyaute iqe aq _ taana _ kiyang _ tuqu qugh kau uq _ ii- sqeaghaghte ste aqe luki _ .
naten _ pi aqe aki _ apeghtugh i nghmini _ .
entaqun _ nuqnegh qagh nghminiki _ aghvequte ste aqe kangi _ .
ii- sqeaghaghte negh meggni _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ .
naasqugh t _ ukut _ iisqagh teng _ aqnighte nghmegteki _ , _ sivugte yaghqaa nanigh aqe ut _ , _ enkaangam _ tuqute aqe aput _ .
emta _ tawaten _ ayuqe laatagh ut _ , _ ila ita _ apeghtugh qu ait _ ilullug ghllag t _ sughugaghyuneghtuqat _ .
whanga _ amenam _ apeghtuqagh nka _ ilulliqepag gpenateng _ , _ llangaqa _ pinqegteghraastaghhiinaat _ .
emta _ pi aqlaatagh ait _ tamaakut _ ilullug t _ , _ umyugagh it _ natete ma aqe lghiit _ , _ suugllug kanigh ma aqe lghiit _ .
Tawatetaqllaataghpetut _ .
manigugh luteng _ quyngigh t _ atughqagh u ut _ , _ sasnaqefqaameng _ .
Sughugaghyuneghtuqas _ taawa _ anusigaa aqe ut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ mekelghiigh t _ qamiye meggneng _ aafte igate ut _ .
Sughugllanghisteng _ legan _ qamiye teng _ napaghaghtaqiit _ , _ qayugmignaqneghtuqat _ qayughllak _ .
kii _ , _ taawa _ nula kaayagh uq _ , _ 10,000-ngukaaguq _ kingulighpigagh _ corral-ekaq _ .
Nalikek _ ifkagh llegh nkuk _ , _ Nuuqitaankut _ chief _ herder-ngulukek _ .
nula pagllag kau uq _ .
Enkaangam _ tawani _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ , _ upenghaghyag u _ pi yalghiikut _ , _ kii _ uughqa ni _ samani _ naayghagh ghhagh t _ uvitangitni _ .
yaywaalingiighhagh u na iqe kangat _ saamna _ iwhanim _ aygugh ghhagh anite ngughk _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ ayvigtegh m _ kelutanganilnguut _ .
Nayghannaq _ , _ suvinagh ghraag ggaat _ , _ naayghagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
Uvitangani _ tawani _ kii _ , _ ungleghumaghllaak _ , _ tuqukagh lghute ghllag _ .
legan _ unglegh ma negh ke te ziin _ tawaten _ paneghaatkaq _ .
Enkaangam _ qiighqagh _ maana _ tawaten _ uglaghqakalghiimun _ quyngigh mun _ atughqagh u nghite uq _ , _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ .
Uksuum _ negh kanga _ piyaqnagh pigte lghii _ .
Qaltemeng _ , _ aqsaqugh mig itgun _ pi yagh ke put _ , _ uyghag m _ qaltenganeng _ , _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ amenam _ .
uyghag m _ qaltenganeng _ aqsaqughhmikelghiit _ , _ seghleghu lghiit _ neqe u nghite ngugh t _ .
quyngigh m _ atuqe llegh a
Imegyuutem _ apegh llegh a
quyngigh t _ qamagte luteng _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
sugupag i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ , _ sigutangi _ , _ sighunghan _ melqwi _ , _ itegagh i _ ayakagh aqe luki _ neghughaqiit _ .
Aqsaqghwi _ piwhaniyukaghpenaki _ ukifkagh yukagh gpenaki _ .
taakut _ qaaynganilnguut _ aqsaqugh m _ taakut _ tunu t _ pugughyi u ut _ .
Iikngwaaghluki _ aqsaqugh t _ , _ wetku _ iike luki _ tesqamkut _ imigh a _ ilakelliluki _ , _ aqsaqugh mete luki _ tawani _ quwiisighluteng _ neghe kayugu ut _ .
aqsaqugh m _ natangani _ alamke t _ , _ ughvughwaaghluki _ neghe kayug t _ , _ vegllugte yug nigh t _ tamaakut _ , _ aqsaqugh t llu _ ughvughwaaghluki _ neghe kayug t _ .
kevighqagh i _ taakut _ naanlenguut _ , _ ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ imigh luki _ kevingllaqayuwiit _ .
ilu yan _ tunugh aneng _ uulte magh ita _ imigh kayug t _ .
qellu i _ tamaakut _ ama _ uulte magh ita _ , _ tunughtuqagh t _ .
whangkuta _ negh igate aput _ iiskag i llu _ , _ tengug i llu _ .
ila ita _ negh aqe ait _ .
Qilegyighllagi _ taakut _ , _ qilu i _ uzimun _ pikayug t _ , _ ikughwaaghluki _ qanlagighwaaghluki _ tunu ghllag t _ angqaperugtu te _ tawaten _ .
amalleqa _ qamagte luku _ yugusigh anite ngughk _ taana _ neghe kayugu uq _ .
amu i _ uksaagh nghagu _ melqughtughneghata _ allighaghqagh ughte aqe ut _ .
upenghagh mi _ melqughlluugteghllagaqii _ makugte negh meggni _ .
amiiragh i _ ugmelengestaghhaat _ melqeghqelengestaaghhaat _ asiighqagh u luki _ saghna kaqe kangit _ .
taakwani _ nani _ July-mi _ aate te kaghqagh ughte aqe uq _ .
katamngwaagh _ melqughtu langi _ lliigh aqe ut _ pi nigh ghllag t _ aange lghii u yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ legan _ melqeghqelliighaghaqegkangi _ .
ighni ste i _ april- mi _ piinligh aqe ut _ kiyang _ , _ yug inagh meng _ .
kipullegte i stekete te luteng _ one _ week-ekaghtaan _ .
ivgagh mete luta _ nutaan _ maana _ quyngigh _ atghagh luni _ ellmi neng _ tamaani _ ighnegh iightugh aqe uq _ uvite kaghagh mnni llu _ .
taklaghte luta _ esghapag aqe aput _ tawaten _ esghapagkagh mtestun _ legan _ , _ nughagh at _ kinegh naqe te inagh _ aga _ igleghte aqe ut _ .
umegnegh u luku _ tiinta lug teng _ nayugh i aqe ut _ .
tiinta lug teng _ ighni ste i mi _ tawaten _ .
uglagh ghllag yagh lghii _ quyngigh _ .
pi nga yu a
sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh i
iike ta t
Mekeneghsim _ apegh llegh a
esgha _ taakut _ iike ta t _ tesakmaken _ .
Qunaghhaq _ mekelghiigh pigu luku _ iikutaamakat _ .
qafsineg ii ta ani _ qavagh m _ unugmi _ tawani _ , _ ii _ , _ ayngelite ghllag mun _ kaat ute ma kagh nge i _ , _ eflugh te luki _ elngaatall _ maaqe ghllag _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangit _ ( _ entaqun _ liisimake kanga _ ) _ .
“ _ seghleghhalek _ navek _ lliigh te aqe inkut _ , _ Nunaagagnun _ akliitaqenghitinkuut _ .
sangami _ ayngelite ghllag _ uukna _ allgegh a _ . _ ” _ Nunaagak _ neghighhaaneng _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ .
“ _ Nunaagagnekun _ whaa _ entaqun _ eflugh te ainkut _ . _ ”

tawaten _ agʼghinguulluteng _ ataasiighte luteng _ ( _ uusqagh pigte lghii _ amenqun _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ ) _ .
ayngelite ghllag k _ .
eflugh te nga llegh ghllag mun _ amu isigh negh meggni _ aanʼngallghwaaqelghiik _ .
ayngelite u na iqe ait _ , _ tuvagh m _ whaten _ maaqellegh m _ eflugh te ghllag m _ taklaghrukgighllagluteng _ naqam _ vuuslegh i _ uusqagh ghllag t _ .
Nunaagagni _ taakwani _ vuuslegh ghllag u aqe lghii _ .
entami qun _ ataasiighte pagte luteng _ ataasigh _ ayag ma kangat _ .
uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ sa ngugh ghllag k _ test- pig ka _ mamlegute uk _ . _ ”
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ entaqun _ taawa _ Nunaagak _ ! _ Neghighhaaneng _ nangllegtagh na iqe agket _ . _ ”
tawaten _ uyiighagh teng _ , _ entaqun _ esgha _ uyiighagh leg perewaagh t _ , _ uyiighagh ni _ saagllug qu _ tawaten _ uyiighagh kun _ taaggun _ mayugh uute ut _ .
Kingulighpigaghnguq _ iiwen _ nuyilegh u te kestagh aqe a _ sayug aghte aat _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ mughaayaghllaak _ , _ qivallug ghllag _ , _ mughaayaghllak _ .
naqam _ test- pig ka _ enlega _ aligh ite ngughk _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ taawa _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ uugte ukut _ . _ ” _ Nunaagak _ neghighhaaneng _ nanglegtaghniiqagket _ .
“ _ aghuliigh llegh anun _ kaate ukut _ .
whaken _ igleghte naanghite ukut _ , _ tazingavek _ aglagh luta _ Nunaagagnun _ qavangsi naqe ukut _ elngaatall _ egtug yug gpenaamta _ . _ ” _ ( _ aatkagh kegte pigte lghiit _ entaqun _ neghigh luku _ . _ )
“ _ unaami _ wetku _ aghtekan _ mingle anun _ taglagh lleqe ukut _ . _ ”
taawa _ aghte neghsigh ma kangat _ .
llaaghanam _ aghsaqminigu _ , _ Nunaagak _ .
taawa _ mingle anun _ pagavek _ , _ qivallugllaak _ , _ tuumllugllak _ , _ elngaatall _ igleghtekagh t _ .
aghneq _ naten _ lliigh magh an _ entaqun _ tapghagh ghhagh kun _ taakwagun _ qutenge ma lghiit _ .
siivanllegh ita _ apaate ma kangit _ ukatmun _ .
kukuleg mun _ uwavek _ kaate naqe sqe ai _ .
Iiwenʼnguq _ mamleg a qaa _ kukuleg mun _ kaat quute ut _ , _ kukuleg nguq _ paaghqiinneghhaqaniimalghii _ tamaani _ .
nenge lunga _ kiyaghute lghii _ salin _ .
siivanllegh ita _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ elngaatall _ teghhumasaqumeng _ naghughesnaghtesnayanghitiisi _ , _ maani _ qavagh naqe ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ nenglu itnun _ itegh gpenasi _ . _ ”

tamaani _ ighulugh meng _ ivagh i luteng _ mangteghasqwaagh ngllagh ut _ .
legan _ nanevgagh m _ apeghtugh ai _ , _ “ _ kinku nun _ taakunun _ navghaghyaghaqlusii _ legan _ unguva pigte lghii stun _ pi tek _ .
kinku t _ navghagh vike aqe luki _ sa meng _ tanpegh meng _ ighulugh meng _ tamaaken _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ legan _ tawaten _ navghagh aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ azigutagh _ taaqe luku _ qavagh ut _ .
naagu nguq _ saqraggaq _ llaaghanwha _ , _ wetku nguq _ unaami _ aghtaghagh naqe llegh mi _ , _ qaga nguq _ aghqiiw _ , _ qiillaghqu _ .
nanevgagh m _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ upugha te aisi _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ navghaghhasi _ tamaakut _ yug itnun _ veghute qugh nakesi _ .
maaken _ igleghte lleqe ukut _ . _ ”
apeghiigh luteng _ igleghnaqngameng _ whaten _ tuumllugllagmi _ imani _ , _ whaten _ uygu uute qugh te luteng _ igleghte ma ite ngugh t _ .
Sakighmenguq _ kangighagh anun _ pikavek _ taglagh kau ut _ .
Entaqunʼnguq _ alingyuwaaghutngukaalghiit _ qamagte luteng _ .
tawaten _ taagken _ taglagh kau ut _ sakighmeng _ , _ pikavek _ kangighagh anun _ kukuleg m _ .
kangighagh u negh nge uq _ wetku _ ukavek _ igiigh yameng _ naallghute ut _ .
Qunaghhaq _ una _ atallug nkut _ ata at _ , _ Qerngughtekaam _ ugwiksaqanga _ , _ atallug nkuk _ , _ Waallankut _ ata ak _ , _ Qunaghhaq _ taana _ .
Enkaangamnguq _ nangyaghtaghqwaaghllakaq _ , _ anusimightem _ mekelghiigh pigu luni _ , _ iikutaamakaq _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe aat _ .
ila i _ iike ta t
taakut _ ila i _ ungipamsug m _ nunanigh ut _ , _ puygu kanigh luki _ iwernga _ ungipamsug ke naqe anka _ .
uksaagh ghhagh u negh nge uq _ iike tke aat _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh yayek _ .
Napazigenkut _ , _ Mesuurunkut _ , _ Qetiinankut _ , _ kinku t _ , _ iike tke aat _ .
uksughtekagh t _ iitek _ Bering _ Sea-mi _ esgha _ .
uksughte ma lghiit _ navek _ taakwavek _ .
Tawatenniiqsaghiinʼnguq _ taakwagungiighhaghnguq _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ kiyang _ uteghnigh igate ut _ .
sivuqagh mi _ iike te neghtuqagh t _ .
naqamalla nguq _ awavagh qu te _ ivgagh te nghminiki _ entaqun _ maaqnegh m nguq _ aygugh mun _ ukavek _ ivgagh te aqe kangi _ .
aamta _ taakwagungiighhaghnguq _ pi nghminiki _ entaqun _ ikevreghaam _ aghvigh te meng _ pi aqe kangi _ .
Tawatetkanʼnguq _ uksughtekagh t _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ maaqnegh m _ sukate pigte luki _ aygugh te aqe yagh kangi _ .
naayghagh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ aliigh aqe yagh lghii _ , _ ima nguq _ aygugh u aghte nghaani _ iivagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ aghneghtuumaan _ qiighqagh _ maana _ ila kepagningite te aat _ .
Ayvikaatnginaghhaghnguq _ taana _ talughte neghlliqe yagh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ tagtalmi _ aviighute uq _ temngi _ meraaghinagh ghllag mun _ lliigh ut _ .
Sikuvagllagenʼnguq _ nekagh ughte ait _ , _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nalighnegh i _ ne ngllagh luki _ .
ellmaaragte nghaani nguq _ tuvagh u te aqe kangi _ .
Mughutaqelghiinʼnguq _ tamaani _ .
Piyuwhaaghhiinaghmunʼnguq _ taana _ sakniqe tkesagh aat _ megh _ , _ megh ite ngugh t _ .
ayveghagh luteng _ wallu _ maklagte luteng _ , _ qilu aneng _ entaqun _ ighneghllug ngllagh luteng _ , _ aatkagh meng _ kiigh akun _ whaten _ qenleghwaaghluteng _ pi ma lghiit _ .
anigu meng _ , _ peghqinegh pigu ma ut _ esgha _ taagnaput _ , _ esghaghhu _ anigu meng _ imigh luki _ yugusigh megteggun _ mengllagh yagute ut _ .
yugusigh m _ maatnegh an _ ughugtaqegkangi _ .
taawa _ megh _ akluknanighaat _ .
taana nguq _ estamaat _ mulu gpenani _ aviighute uq _ .
aghipa m _ saam _ entaqun _ enraq llu _ kanagh luni _ , _ asi gni _ uniigh yayek _ iilqayug luni _ tuqute ma lghii _ .
taakut _ pi nga yu t _ uksughtekagh t _ tawani _ .
Mesuurunkut _ , _ Napazinkut _ , _ Qetiinankut _ .
qete i i na qrug ngugh _ taana _ atugh kayugu ma a _ .
taana _ Napazinaq _ alignagh lghii _ , _ ilagagh qagh yu k _ .
Tughneghaanʼnguq _ megh m _ uusqagh llegh anun _ pi igate ma lghiit _ , _ megh mi _ kiyaghsigate ma lghiit _ .
Tughneghiighutngwaaqaagut _ meghllag mun _ lliigh yameng _ .
Alalakanginaghhiinaaghtekaagunʼnguq _ .
Alalakanguftughnguq _ tughneghagh i _ mesungesag t _ .
Taakunginaghaaghsimalghiit _ megh m _ pi i _ .
Tawatenʼnguq _ esla _ naafte luni _ milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ ellmeggneng _ ilutughsagh te aqe luteng _ iknaqsuugte te aqe luteng _ kiyaghtekagh t _ .
milegtaagh te naqe negh meggni _ taana _ pingayughtek _ pi aqe ka ak _ , _ “ _ qete i i na _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ , _ seghletun _ kiyaghte naqlaatagh ukut _ , _ averngu lta _ . _ ” _ atugh ghpagte ste aqe ka ak _ pingayughtek _ taana _ .
ii _ , _ nemetalghiistun _ llaaghanwha _ qesugniqe aqe lghiit _ avara te magh meng _ ellmeggneng _ .
llaaghanwha _ milegtaagh lleghqagh eng _ overcome-aaqegkangat _ .
taaqe negh meggni _ taana _ pi nga yu aat _ enraq _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
taawa nguq _ mesungesag inagh ghhagh t _ taakut _ tughneghagh i _ tagi aqe lghiit _ .
aamta _ ila a _ tughneghaan _ ivegh igate ma ut _ entaqun _ , _ aviighute uute tke aat _ .
uksugh ghllag _ avii tke aat _ , _ uksaagh ghhagh aneng _ ima _ , _ siku k _ malleg qagh inagh llegh gkeneng _ .
entaqun _ may- mi _ ima _ wetku _ nani _ Kamsaatkam _ nalighnegh akun _ qutengekagh t _ .
tawaten _ apegh ait _ .
Akluknanighaanʼnguq _ megh _ .
anigullugte luni _ lliigh yalghiimi _ taakut _ nayigh ita _ akeleghraagh a _ meghaagh nge luni _ , _ tamaaken _ meqekagh t _ .
esghaghhu qun _ repall _ ughug yan _ , _ taakut _ nayugh teng _ uyiighaghmeggneng _ asighte ma kangit _ entaqun _ uglafnayukaki _ .
Tuvaghnaniqangi _ taakunginaghhaaghtut _ , _ aqlagha igh u uute kanga _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ qute _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
qute mun _ paga _ tughaaghtut _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaaghmeng _ kii _ , _ tekeghagh ghllag _ ika _ .
tawavek _ tekeghagh ghllag mun _ itghute kanigh ai _ ukum _ tungangakun _ .
tekeghagh ghllag _ taana _ tughwaaghyaqmegteggu _ kii _ , _ sugenregh igh ghllag luni _ .
Haak _ ! _ seghleghhalek _ tawavek _ kaatute kumegteki _ whaa _ seghleghu naqe ut _ .
iitek _ whaten _ aklu i te kanigh luteng _ , _ qute m _ ketfaggaakun _ taakwavek _ aanuughutkaniqangi _ .
taana _ pingayughtek _ pi laatagh ma ka ak _ , _ alignagh lleghtagh tek _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ ingavek _ atneghagh anun _ lliigh kumta _ sugenregh mun _ , _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ unite lleqe ainkut _ .
alignagh na iqe luten _ naten _ pi naqe i _ . _ ”
amsanaghllugllak _ .
tawaten _ ilagagh luni _ Alalakani _ taakut _ aleghqugh qu ai _ naten _ kayute ngllaghkagh _ .
qateghllug ghllag mi nguq _ imani _ sikuvag ghllag t _ kelute mun _ qukfighute naagh aat _ elngaatall _ , _ tawavek _ kangighagh anun _ .
qute meng _ awavaqaanlluteng _ teghhakun _ tuute tke aat _ , _ aghqe itagh i tke aat _ , _ nalugutekagh neng _ awavaqaanlluteng _ .
iwernga _ ifqallaghngaaghmeng _ uuglleghaatkat _ .
tanemlleqa _ iiwenʼnguq _ ghhataghtekestaghaqii _ qute mun _ taakwavek _ uugtekagh t _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ tapghaghllaak _ sa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ , _ enkaam _ naantuleyeng _ nalluke kangat _ .
Tawatenʼnguq _ tungtu tgun _ ( _ big _ dipper _ ) _ aygugh ut _ .
aghte nghaani _ siqinghem _ tunganganun _ igleghte aqe luteng _ .
Tapghaghllaguftughnguq _ aygugh mun _ esne _ tawaten _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ tumesugningiighhaq _ avangite uq _ .
temngi qun _ aatakqun _ igleghte ut _ .
qafsina _ qavagh _ atugh magh an _ , _ wallu nguq _ tanqigh _ .
Hiik _ , _ iimqaghtalleghsugningiighhaat _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ esghagh ait _ .
tume u lleghqagh i _ nalluneqnaghluteng _ temngi _ iime qaghte luteng _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ iime qagh ta vleghagh _ tamaa na _ nula kestagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ seghleghhalek _ negh ke igh te naqe ut _ qute mun _ lliigh yalghiimeng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ nalluniigh te ut _ tumete yug ni u luteng _ .
tawaten _ igleghte llegh mi _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ kii _ , _ peghwaagh ghllag t _ kaasaqmegteki _ iqalluwaghllak _ peghwaagh ghllag _ .
negh ut _ elngaatall _ .
negh luteng _ , _ angyagh u aatagh luteng _ taawa _ igleghte ut _ .
aygugh lqinagh luteng _ peghwaagh t _ kaate nghmegteki _ taawa _ iqaluwaawaqelghiit _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmeng _ tekeghagh _ qemighyuk _ inga _ aliigh aat _ , _ iiwen _ qemighyugmeng _ taagken _ mayugh aqe ut _ , _ amaken _ yug m llu _ atunem _ .
atunem _ aliigh te ut _ .
kii _ , _ piyaqmegteggu _ yuug _ tusaqepagningite aat _ , _ ulu _ alla _ .
seghleghhalek _ tusaqunneghitem _ enraq _ seghleghu naqe ut _ , _ liigikunneghitem _ .
qete i i na _ taana _ , _ esgha _ sa u a _ kiyaghtaalleghllagem _ apeghiighwaaghluku _ ayuqe nghminigu _ , _ mekelghiigh u luni _ nukalpigagh pigu luni _ kidnap-ekaamalghii _ .
tespamna _ quteghllag _ neghighhaaneng _ yuwa _ amyuqetagh na iqe aat _ .
Kidnap-eghikayuguniiqaat _ qiighqagh m _ matum _ anglinghhagh aneng _ , _ aghnaghagh aneng _ , _ nukalpigagh aneng _ metngeghute i kayug _ .
taana _ qete i i na _ metngeghute kau ma yagh lghii _ .
tawaten _ enraq llu _ esgha _ tuune aqe luki _ , _ tuune aqe luki _ tawaten _ pi ma aqe ait _ .
Asaaggaankut _ maakut _ ungipaqagegkangit _ tawaten _ pi kau ni luki _ .
taana _ Qetiinaqruk _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghii _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike kau ma yagh lghii _ .
quyilleg ni _ qepghagh luni _ , _ qepghagh luni _ aghyuqe yami _ metngeqagh qrug u uq _ .
uteghnigh kau ma lghii _ naqam _ .
nukalpigagh k _ maalghug u lutek _ yug m _ qepghaghtekegkakek _ quyilleg m _ .
Qitefkayuugteqrugumaa _ esghaghhu _ .
seghleghhalek _ aag llegh gkenka _ pilaataghaak _ , _ “ _ seghleghu naqe ukut _ , _ yug lgute mun _ kaatngwaaghluta _ tusaqunneghitem _ seghletun _ pi naqe ukut _ , _ aatak _ qiteve te naqe gu _ ! _ ”
Qetiinaqrugem _ qitevusaqminigu _ , _ ii _ iingken _ akisaqminigu _ nutem _ nagatellghistun _ tawatengwaaq _ akuzillegh a _ ayuqe luni _ .
ii _ , _ napaghpagtagh te lutek _ aga _ payegh te uk _ .
ii _ , _ kaat ute te lutek _ qetleghutugnguq _ , _ elngaatall _ .
piyaqminigu _ taana _ qepghalgutni _ neghigh luku _ mekelghiigh _ whaa _ nallagh utu te aqe uk _ .
tawaten _ aleghquute lutek _ pi ma kangi _ , _ ama _ negh ghllag _ taamanniluku _ , _ “ _ keleg qaghte te yaghtugh naqe amsi _ .
Taamum _ ne m _ upugha te i llegh a _ tawatete uq _ , _ yug m _ kaate lghii m _ uum _ pana teng _ uutqighlluki _ elpesi nun _ nengug te aatagh lleqe ait _ .
tugu manginagh nakesi _ , _ tugu manginagh nakesi _ .
tuqute naanghite aisi _ , _ upugha te i llegh it _ tawatete ut _ . _ ”
taawa _ aga _ aglagh uq _ llaaghanwha _ .
Maateqwaaqunʼnguq _ llaaghanam _ kii _ , _ yuug _ inwa nguq _ palaghhagh _ kaat quute uq _ .
llaaghanam nguq _ kaate lghii m _ uum _ pana teng _ uutqighlluki _ , _ taawa _ tugu ma inagh ke ait _ .
taake uk _ Napazugenkuk _ Mesuurunkuk _ ne m _ tamaatum _ umiileg an _ aqelqagh ke ma kek _ .
taana _ Qetiinaqruk _ taam _ aqelqagh ke ma kanga _ qepghagh lgutkekagh an _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ , _ Qetiinankuk _ taana llu _ .
Paninanguq _ ne m _ tamaatum _ ulu a _ alla u uq _ .
taawa _ taake uk _ ulu ke lukek _ kiyaghte ut _ .
Taam _ Napazugem _ , _ nuyekligh ke ma atgu _ ungipaate sqe ma kanga _ Qetiinamun _ , _ “ _ Ikiifsinʼnguq _ ne mnni _ samani _ sivuqagh ghhagh mi _ tawaten _ uniiliqeghllagluta _ qutengeqaghte negh mta _ taghyugh igh aqe yagh ukut _ !
a tuq _ sa u a _ pinighyuuk _ atuqaqsaghaghput _ . _ ”
ii _ , _ umiileg m _ piyaqminiki _ , _ umiileg an _ nuna m _ taam _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ legan _ pi aqe llegh gpesistun _ pi tek _ . _ ” _ taawa _ taana _ Qetiinaqruk _ atughteklaataamakangat _ .
elngaatall nguq _ qesugniqe stekaqe a _ negh ghllag _ taana _ ellnginaghaghmi _ .
taana _ entaqun _ Napazinaq _ ilagagh luni _ , _ qaywalleqa nguq _ tughneghaghtu pigte ma a _ qute mun _ uugte yalghiimi _ .
Taakunʼnguq _ Alalakangi _ aghsaghpaagtekaagut _ .
ghhute itgun _ , _ melghutagh itgun _ puugpaghqum _ yuug _ qimaaglluku _ .
tawatete kau ut _ .
maalghug gneng _ tawani _ ayumiqullegh k _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
ataasigh inagh u yaghqaa yagh lghii nguq _ naligh t _ , _ wallu _ qete i i na _ nelliqe luni _ sa luni _ taagken _ anaggute luni _ taake ughtagh aqe aat _ .
iike te llegh meggneng _ estamat ii te kun _ wetku _ , _ estamaani _ ayumiqullegh m _ ungazigh mun _ kaateqaghsi ma lghiit _ .
Estamaaninguq _ ayumiqullegh m _ wetku _ sivuqagh mun _ uteghnigh kau ut _ taakut _ .
taawa _ igleghte mafte ut _ .
tawaten _ ungipagh kaqe ait _ .
taawa _ kenlepghillaataghtuq _ .
aghnaghagh u lleg mneng _ neqamike llegh ka
Nuughnaam _ apegh llegh a
Sivukeghpigaghlunga _ liisagh lghiinga _ Anasugenkut _ pamani _ guygu ita _ kelu kaghagh itni _ mangteghapig mi _ , _ tawani _ liite unga _ .
Enkaangam _ entaqun _ nuug ukut _ tespagavek _ , _ sa meng _ nuuggutfut _ apallugh a _ nalluke aqa _ .
nekeve te _ , _ whanga _ , _ aqume igate ngughk _ , _ Miklaghhaq _ .
enkaam _ Paazagem _ anglegutangi _ taakut _ Iqmaluwa _ , _ Tupaanga _ , _ a qaa _ , _ Ageza _ .
whanga _ ategh ka _ Agezanguniiqaat _ , _ uyuqlighpigaq _ .
Iqmaluwam _ taam _ Mikaghaq _ nulugh igh qugh a _ .
taana _ Aghnaghaghpak _ ugwingiisan _ , _ entaqun _ qilleghte uute te m _ ata an _ nulighqesaqanga _ Kinguwaaghhaam _ .
Peleghqesata _ enkaam _ tugu te ste qugh luki _ tawavek _ lli aqe aq _ .
taakut _ ama _ atalgute ke te lghiit _ Angqatenganwatenkut _ , _ Qaalunkut _ .
taakut _ Pelaasinkutlu _ , _ Uwetelenkut _ ila ke te ut _ .
ila ke te luta _ whangkuta _ ayuqe ukut _ .
taakut _ qayuutagh m _ ila ke ai _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ Pelaasi _ apakagh ut _ imani _ ategh a _ .
enkaam _ nevngam _ entaqun _ atiiqe te aqe luteng _ .
saama _ entaqun _ ilaliigh te aqe lghiit _ tawaten _ neghe lgutke te luteng _ lliigh negh meggni _ .
tawaten qun _ liite lleg mni _ nagate aqe anka _ .
naange aat _ taana _ Atekanguuq _ , _ Tangatunkut _ taakut _ entaqun _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ Uwetelenkut _ .
Uwetelem _ nulighh a _ Wamiiyaq _ .
taana _ Wiya _ , _ aymaramket _ aghnaa t _ .
Enkaangam _ taana _ ugwighpigani _ tuqu yan _ taagken _ Iyengqighmeng _ ugwiiqaq _ .
Enkaangam _ taakut _ Paangankuk _ uziva nkuk _ , _ aghnagh t qun _ ataasigh t _ anglegute ke te pestaagh t _ , _ tume _ ataasigh _ , _ aanvig _ ataasigh _ , _ allameng _ atakaqsaghngaaghngaata _ .
Paangʼghet
whangkuta qun _ pamanlliimta _ , _ asag ghllag mta _ taam _ , _ Naghuqanguftuq _ taana _ pamanlliimta _ kingunghat _ , _ elngaatall _ sungagh meng _ atghagh te aqe kanginkut _ tangyeghute meng _ , _ qupag meng _ .
elngaatall nguq _ tamaa na _ pi tke pigte aat _ megnu nagh lghii _ .
entaqun _ sivunegh put _ tespamken _ pi u ut _ .
esgha qun llu _ ukut _ Walangankut _ , _ ila put _ whangkuta _ .
nallukngwaagh yalghiikut _ whangkuta _ , _ ellnga n _ Uuketam _ ungipamsug te kaqe ainkut _ .
liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ quunpeng _ pangeghte a _ .
tagitug mi _ qevuute luteng _ tawaten _ amsanaghllug ghllag mi _ suqsugh t _ uka _ aliigh aqe lghiit _ .
sakmani _ naghaaneghtuqakut _ aatnegh mi _ .
taagken _ emta _ tawaten _ tagitugllug _ , _ Iqmaluwankuk _ , _ Ayakinkuk _ , _ aatnegh kun _ iggasighte lutek _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ , _ naghaagh te aqe lghiikut _ aatnegh m _ asi ani _ taakwani _ .
sangamta _ tawaten _ pi llegh ut _ nalluke kegka _ .
qaasqagh mi _ ama _ pinegh mta _ aghillug m _ esghapag aqe kanginkut _ .
uuk _ mate- yaag yu ngiighhagh _ ama _ taana _ quunpeng _ qaasqamenneghtuqaq _ .
Liitngwaaghluta _ pi yalghiikut _ esghapaluugusiq _ taghnughhagh nun _ , _ nanugh t _ naken _ ikegken llu _ , _ kiiwhken llu _ pi yaghqagh t _ .
tawaten _ emta _ upenghagh mi _ kii _ uka _ suqsughaliighllak _ , _ nutem _ pi inkut _ , _ “ _ tagi laghate te k _ . _ ” _ Tawatelnguut _ araqruwaqelghiit _ kaate yaghtugh negh meggni _ .
“ _ aa _ , _ milughmigtekuut _ , _ taghneghiightekuut _ . _ ” _ Piqruwaqelghiit _ ungazighmii t _ .
upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ kaate kayugu ut _ akilpegagh niigh ghllaget _ .
entaqun _ aghsaan _ ayuqe yagh lghii _ tespamani _ aklungi igh lleghtu ghngaaghmeng _ .
ila i qun _ wenigh a _ saaputagh ite aqe ut _ talwa _ qalleg vag qiinagh luteng _ , _ aghnagh m _ ila i _ qalipaaggaghmeng _ .
yug t _ tamaakut _ saatghwaagh qiinagh luteng _ akilpegagh na i aaghet _ .
qevuute luteng _ aki kegte ghllaget _ .
qallukagh at _ sanaghtengngwaaqat _ kavightengngwaaghluteng _ .
sungagh _ , _ ugtinghagh _ , _ qikmiiraagh _ kavightengngwaaqaq _ , _ sa u a _ legan _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ aki kaghqagh _ .
qayugh leg nun _ , _ sa meng _ maaken _ estuwaam _ pi anun _ aki it _ .
qiipaghagh put _ maakut _ whatelnguut _ ugpeqagh meng _ atigh luki _ aghnagh ita _ .
ugpeqagh ghhagh leg nun llu _ aki it _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ liisagh lghiinga _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ akequsagh leg ni _ taghnughhagh ni _ , _ puughte aqe kanginkut _ entaqun _ .
nalleqligh ke na iqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ taagani _ ila teng _ .
Sivuliighamta _ ila ke te lghiit _ nalleqligh u lghiit _ ellngit ni _ .
nalleqligh mta nguq _ piiqegkanginkunʼnguq _ tamaakut _ , _ “ _ taghnughhagh si _ kelengaklukii _ kalngagmig lleqe aput _ . _ ” _ puughte luta _ entaqun _ .
kalngagmig na yu kanginkut _ whangkuta _ iteghaataqelghiikut _ .
urang _ aki kegte pigte ut _ .
liite lleg mni _ taake uk _ Uughqaghtaankuk _ kinku k _ aklungite na iqe agket _ tespamani _ .
uughqaghte a qun _ taana _ kaate nghmini _ nulighh a _ qiipaghagh ghllag _ quunpeng _ .
enraq _ entaqun _ tawaten qun _ ila i _ nakminʼghhiinaqayuget _ .
iwernga _ sivuqagh meng _ sa u a _ allgegh qugh luku _ taglagh aqe lghiit _ tespamavek _ .
taake uk llu _ Qaallnaankuk _ pamapi kayugu yagh uk _ Aghyagaankuk _ , _ arekull _ tespamanteftut _ taakut _ Amagunkut _ .
Qaallnaq _ Amagum _ nulugh igh qugh a _ , _ Aghyagaq _ panike a _ .
Enkaangam _ Pinaayam _ whaten _ apeghsugnitekagh i _ , _ Amagu _ taana _ ellnga n _ atghagh stekaqe a _ amyuqnaqngagu _ taana _ nayag ni _ .
Yukeghqengngakaniq _ taana _ Amagu _ entaqun _ .
aqelqaghni ii aagh _ , _ upugha te i llegh
aqelqaghniigh ta leg _ tamaani _ .
liisagh lghiikut _ qellinegh _ esgha _ teskana _ igaghvig ghllag m _ natum _ neliite tke a _ .
uyghag ghrugllag t _ taawa _ angqaperug kegtagh leg t _ pi nga yu t _ , _ mekestaaghhagh _ ataasigh _ , _ amalleqa _ taana _ aqelqaghniigh sagh it _ .
aqfaqugh vig leg ghllag u yaghpete uq _ taawa _ .
taana _ Qellinghuftuq _ ategh a _ , _ qerngughvik _ .
aqfaqugh te ghllag t _ .
iwernga _ whanga _ iitek _ liite aqa _ , _ esghapag kaqe anka _ legan _ ategh aqe luteng _ aga _ .
pekagh lghii _ entaqun _ una _ aqume magh mi _ , _ ila a _ ategh aqe luni _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ pekagh igate ngugh t _ yugiqengniiqiit _ naqam _ .
enkaam _ taanʼgani _ Qellinghem _ qukaa ni _ tughumgha te ghllag aqe ut _ .
esghapag na pigte uq _ , _ iinghusaleg _ emta _ .
esghapag lqinagh naqe negh mta _ tunuvagh uute sqe aqe kanginkut _ .
“ _ naghaagh kestagh tek _ ulape naanghite usi _ aghnaghagh ni _ . _ ” _ naqam _ mekelghiigh t _ esghapag aqe ut _ .
ima wha _ wiin _ esghapagyughngaamta _ tunuvagh aqe ukut _ , _ iwernga _ esghapag aqe ukut _ .
liisagh lghiinga qun _ whanga _ , _ yug t _ taakut _ kinku t _ entaqun _ aagken _ naken _ kilgaaqu aqe aat _ samawun _ naayghagh m _ mingle akun _ kaspugte luku _ .
entaqun _ tawatete aqe yagh ut _ .
aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ kalleghteghllaneghmeggni _ pingayughqelluteng _ .
aki yan _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ uwatangan _ qaasqagh ani _ , _ ne m _ tunutangani _ .
seghlegh ghllag u ut _ elngaatall _ .
whaa _ entaqun _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ tawaten _ , _ enraq _ atugh aqe lghiit _ teskanani _ sulug nkut ni _ .
amenqun _ taakut _ atughte ghllagu na iqe yagh kangit _ .
iitek _ angukagh put _ .
Miklaghhaam _ , _ sulug nkut _ nayag at _ tugukagh a _ , _ naa mta _ ata an _ , _ ategh a _ iknaqe negh _ .
kii _ , _ enraghngam _ whangkuta _ asag mta _ taam _ Singlengam _ , _ ighlekumtaaghllaginkut _ atugh nun _ kanavek _ panrengi naqe negh mta _ .
ellnga _ qayughllak _ legrengigatuq _ .
naqam _ taana _ panig a _ pugughileghmii u lghii _ , _ asag ke te lghiik _ atghagh aqe lghiik _ Anasugenkuk _ .
kana _ elngaatall _ qelpeghqenniiqegkangat _ saye at _ una _ qelpeghqellukunguq _ .
iglag it qun _ whaantalghiistun _ ayuqe ut _ .
atugh ghllag t _ tawaten _ .
sa sqe qaghte aqe linkut _ ipa _ meghtigh sqe ainkut _ , _ kayusiite sqe uq _ , _ taghnughhiqe te sqe uq _ , _ legre na yukagh mta _ .
naqam _ tazingkut _ yug ngertagh ghhagh t _ panig it _ atghagh uute kayug t _ .
pi aqe kanginkut _ whangkuta _ Singlengam _ , _ “ _ pagaliit _ atigh igate ut _ , _ aghula igate ut _ . _ ” _ whangkuta _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh nghata _ tawaten _ atugh ghllag nghmeng _ , _ tumighqaate naqe negh meggni _ , _ taglagh uute naqe negh meggni _ , _ tumighqaate naqe na iqe ut _ .
Puygiimaghmeng _ ila i _ waame te aqe lghiit _ , _ entaqun _ amsanagh ghhagh u luku _ taglagh uute na luteng _ .
sumeghtaghagh te kete negh mkun _ maaten _ esgha _ , _ neve ste uute ghllag luta _ entaqun _ imaken _ ima _ ayuqe lghiikut _ whaa _ .
taagken _ enraq _ tumighqaate nghata _ pellagh nagh ni _ ama _ .
tawaten _ kingu itneng _ atugh ghllag qagh yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ esla llu _ naafte nghaani _ .
Teskananillu _ tawaten _ aneghte aghte aqe ut _ ilangani _ .
Uzivleghulluteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ tughumgha te aqe luteng _ , _ temngi _ aqelqagh ite ghngaaghmeng _ .
awiim _ ulape sigh ke kangit _ .
taana llu _ sivuqagh _ kaspugaghtaqluku _ kilgaaqumeng _ .
nalluke aqa _ whanga _ apegh luku _ pi aqe aat _ .
whanga _ apegh yug igate aqa _ sa na yu kangatnga _ .
apa ut llu _ taana _ kilgaaqukayuggaaniiqsaghaat _ .
taana _ angag ke na iqe lghii _ naten _ nalluke aqa _ , _ awiim _ neve sqe te te m _ pilqegkanga _ .
angag ke na iqe lghii _ Sunaaghruk _ taana _ ama _ .
iknaqe llegh ke aqe kanga _ sivuqagh m _ , _ iknaqe uq _ .
mekelghiigh t _ enkaam _ entaqun _ amalka qun _ , _ amenqun _ whaa _ laluramke t _ esgha _ qimugte naqe aqe kangit _ .
Teacher-keftaat _ amalka _ .
Kilgaaqumun _ , _ teskanani _ aqfaqumun _ .
Iknaqelqaaniiqaat _ .
tamaakut _ Yaghaankut _ kilgaaqu ste u na iqe yagh ait _ , _ aantagh mii m llu _ ata a _ Qaalu _ .
qepe qaghtugh usigh luteng _ kilgaaqu kayug t _ tamaakut _ .
qepe qagh uute kek _ taake uk _ aqume igate ngugh mete uk _ Qaalum _ .
qiinghigh mangite agka _ sa u te kek _ .
salem- perewaagh _ entaqun _ tamaghhagh mi _ sa llegh _ .
nanughaghtagh leg t _ tamaakut _ iknaqughi ghllagkagh t _ .
nanughaghtagh luteng _ aatkagh it _ tunugh ke isigh luteng _ qulligit _ , _ temkagh it _ , _ iknaqe lghiit _ , _ sukate ngugh t _ .
Iirgughllaklu _ una _ tunuqite lgu luku _ angukagh ka _ whanga _ .
temngi _ yuug _ kiyaghtaaghyaghqaanghisaghpetuq _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ nukalpigagh _ yugughtekagh _ , _ nukalpigagh _ maana _ anglinghhagh _ .
whaa _ whangkutestun _ entaqun _ yugtu tekagh liqe aq _ sa meng _ ikfiqliighlleghhii _ aga _ kayusigh magh an _ ayuqe yaghpete aat _ .
tawatete yaghpete ut _ kayusigh i ghllagu yaghpete ut _ .
kinku t _ ukut _ keveg iitagh u lghiit _ aga _ meghtagh uute ait _ .
whangkuta qun _ Qipengam _ quunpeng _ meghtagh uute aqe ainkut _ .
aga _ kinku t _ esghagh aqe ait _ , _ “ _ Uu-huuk _ , _ qetgegh teki _ piyaqleg iigh uq _ . _ ” _ aga _ qetgegh luki _ wayagh luki _ tugu aqe luki _ .
esghapag inagh yaghqaa nghite yaghpete ut _ .
taawa _ upleg luki _ tugumiigh it _ tugu aqe luki _ .
uksugh mi _ whaten _ umegnegh mi _ kinku t _ alngunak _ nengaangiteghngaata _ anigu m _ pi nghaki _ peketutaqluki _ .
nengaa ita _ qepghaatkayugwiit _ .
maaten _ allangughtem _ talwa _ kayusigh i na niite ut _ .
aghnagh ghhaat _ , _ aghnagh lqinagh u aghtekagh ghhagh t _ aantit _ aga _ legan _ aghnaghagh nun _ qetgeghtugh luki _ aante i te ste aqe luki _ .
Kayusighiperewaaghllaguyaghtut _ .
siivanllegh t _ tamaakut _ whangkunneng _ yugpallaghte ghllagkagh t _ siivanlleghunikayuwiit _ .
Apeghtughamsuk _ entaqun _ sa llegh meng _ .
aghnagh t _ tamaakut _ ama _ whangkunnun _ aghnagh nun _ ama _ apeghtughamsuget _ .
Ellngitnengluqun _ liite luta _ whaa _ whangkuta _ legan _ igleghtani _ .
qaatke te ma ghllagu yagh lghiit _ talwa _ entaqun _ .
entaqun _ ukavagh magh mi _ aamta _ lliigh kau uq _ .
ila a _ aamta _ tamaa na _ neghighhaaneng _ seghleluukayuk _ ama _ entaqun _ natelnguq _ .
puvalla
taakwani _ whangkunni _ puvalla meng _ esghaate mangite unga _ angli u lunga _ .
avangite ukut _ sa ite ukut _ .
taawanginaq _ apa ghllag ut _ taana _ aghillug _ uksaagh te nghatni _ , _ isi _ keviiwaqelghii _ quyngigh m _ kevigh kaqe kanga _ isigima _ .
Liitngwaaghlunga _ pi yalghiinga _ aghveghwaagh ke uq _ aghvegh ngllaghkagh ghhagh _ .
sa u a _ wallu _ melqugh igh aq _ enraq _ liigike llghite aqa _ .
inglukutagh ke lghiikung _ whangkutung _ .
Uughqaghmiinkuk _ aqume igate ngugh nkuk _ , _ nekeve te nkuk _ , _ Tuusaankuk _ , _ Agigsugenkuk _ Qagaqunkuk _ , _ inglukutagh ke luta _ , _ whangkutung _ aghillug llu _ .
inglu ke neghtu aanga _ whanga _ .
Peggnemteki _ aga _ legan _ , _ akuqagh aqe ke put _ kaate nghata _ .
emta _ natete yaghqagh nun _ , _ ellnga qun _ taana _ whangkuta _ apa ut _ , _ whaa _ ayumiquluku _ , _ sa kan _ uksaagh kan _ ifla lleqe uq _ , _ taana _ legan _ igleghte aq _ , _ qukaghite nghmini _ sallipgaghtaqluni _ .
alingnagh igh ke ghrug ke aq _ nutem _ .
awiim _ ellngit a _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ .
sa meng _ puvalla raagh meng _ esghhaasimangitunga _ whanga _ , _ tamaani _ liite aqngama _ whangkunni _ .
aghqesaghtughtu ukut _ yeqay _ , _ Ataayaghhaq _ aghqesaghtughtu uq _ , _ taakwavek _ maaten _ housing-eliitkaghpesinun _ .
Taanʼgantuq _ naayvagh m _ esne ani _ wallu _ taakut _ anagh nge ainkut llu _ Kegyuuqenkutlu _ , _ naa n tuq _ taakwani _ akeleghraagh itni _ aghqesaghtugh vig _ .
talwa _ naaghte yameng _ kumaghtisiqigalnguq _ yuug _ .
saghna sqe aqe kanginkut _ taglagh negh mta _ , _ mangtaggaat _ upenghagh _ ima _ entaqun _ agaghtekagh t _ taakut _ kelqelluki _ .
“ _ Awalmiggaghmeng _ saghna aqe tek _ , _ ” _ pi aqe ainkut _ .
Awalmiggaghmeng _ saghna aqe lghiikut _ .
taakwani _ sa u aat _ masugkwaagh ghhagh t _ .
kaate negh mta _ esteg mineng _ nusug luku _ uyghaggaq _ qateghrakegtagh _ , _ aghnegh ghllag _ una _ awalmig _ peqagh ghhagh t _ lli luki _ awalmiggaat _ taakut _ .
qelanegh na ghllag _ kumaghtinaqa _ .
taawa _ aanghughlluteng _ taakut _ kumagh nghata _ supughragh nghminiki _ , _ qenwat _ kumagh aqe ut _ .
Enraghngam _ yuggagh m _ , _ whanga inagh u laatagh lghiinga _ sa kayug _ uguminaghnaghqegkayuk _ ilangani _ .
aygughiketagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ taagani _ .
aghyuugh aqe kanganga _ sa meng _ qalleg aghtagh fqaama _ nagatngwaaghesqellunga _ .
unegkut _ unguva lghiit _ eghqwaagh nghminiki _ Pelaasinkut _ kinku t llu _ .
naqamllu _ sa u aat _ aviite aqe ut _ kenghegnun _ tawavek _ .
pi aqe kegka _ , _ “ _ Pelaasi _ kana _ kiyaghtaaqestaghngaaghmi _ qaanghakun _ . _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ pi naqlaatagh uq _ una _ aghnaghaghruupak _ ! _ ” _ Ataayaghhaq _ pi uq _ .
naqam _ kelgugh aqe kanginkut _ .
taghnughhagh perewaagh ni _ kelgugh luta _ aghqesagh uute aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ taakut _ aghqesaghtugh vig lgu ukut _ , _ naa n tuq _ ama _ taakwani _ tapeghagh m _ natangani _ .
teghigniqe te aqe ukut _ .
Aghvengenghata _ Salqumsilleq
whaa _ upenghanghani _ tawaten _ unʼga _ aghvenge ni nghatki _ , _ naghaagh te ghngaamta _ elngaatall _ taglagh uute luta _ , _ uka _ kaalgunghaata _ piyutqerragkiighaqukut _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t llu _ , _ aghnaghagh t llu _ .
whangkuta _ aghnaghagh ni _ ughvughqe te luta _ taaqe luta _ taqughtengngwaaghluta _ , _ samaken _ nanigh m _ asi aneng _ aallnegh meng _ qilag aput _ pi luki _ atghagh uute aqe ukut _ .
sangamta _ nalluke aqa _ nangaghnegh m _ almesiqe laatagh kanga _ .
taawa _ mangtagtu uute aqe ukut _ tesamani _ .
Pilaget _ atalughagh meng _ miluvikaqegkanginkut _ .
angyaleg t _ tamaakut _ esghapag na lleghpigagh at _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ angyilghagh ni _ .
kaankut _ ugwimeng _ aquutagh _ pi te lghii ii nigh itgun _ qaltaaghwraggaat _ , _ aghulakallghuuneghmeggni _ esghapag na pigte ut _ .
nulighh it _ pika _ kenilegh m _ nalighnegh ani _ , _ angyaleg t _ kana _ angyagh mi _ , _ aghvenge lghiit _ taakut _ .
iwerngaqun _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ , _ qaltaaghwraggaghmeng _ nulighh it _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
Katum _ ugwimeng _ sa te lghii ii nagh u kete te _ qalta teng _ aghulate aqe luki _ .
tawatete laatagh lghiit _ entaqun _ .
taakut _ ivightengit _ manughagh kun _ aqume uute luteng _ .
uka _ llaag t _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ , _ taakut _ aghvegh leg t _ atigh aqe luki _ apallugh ke aqe luki _ ilagagh aqe lghiit _ .
ilagaate it _ nalluke anka _ liite mangite anka _ , _ naqam _ whanga llu _ aqume aqe lghiinga _ .
Ivighuteghllagaqut _ aghnagh perewaagh t _ , _ aghni ut llu _ entaqun _ naken _ ugwiiqat _ tagi luteng _ aghvenge lghii nun _ ugwiteng _ sa teng _ aghvengenghata _ .
taakut _ aymaramket pig t _ , _ aymaramket pigu na iqe anka _ yug squgh u ta ghhagh t _ taakut _ .
Wiyaghllawaaqelghii _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh t _ panig it llu _ , _ whangkuta llu _ ila ke luta _ , _ iglakegte ghllag _ aghnagh _ ivi igh nghmini _ .
Maligtevyiiqaghaqaghput _ iitek _ , _ tawaten _ angyaleg t _ atigh aqe luki _ .
Ivighteleperewaalget _ entaqun _ aghvenge negh meggni _ .
iwerngaqun _ naangellegh itnun _ llaag t _ angaghqugh llegh it _ .
esgha _ siqlugagh lgu yaghpete ukut _ Apetekinkut _ kelu kaghagh itni _ llaag lghutagh lgu aq _ .
llaag lghutagh _ entaqun _ ilukligh u uq _ , _ ataasigh _ amig ke luku _ .
Taakwantut _ whangkuta _ siqlugagh put _ , _ taana _ ama _ neqelghutagh u na iqe a _ Angqatenganwatem _ .
ellngit a nguq _ siqluwaqaghaat _ taana _ .
nuyekligh teng _ entaqun _ naasqugh ke luki _ legan _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
maaten _ qavngaq _ pi yaqegka _ Kingungham _ kelgusaqminigu _ , _ enmiss _ iiggellug igh ghllag luni _ , _ siqlugagh ut _ taana _ ughyugh ghllag luni _ .
esgha _ kelutangitnilnguut _ siqlugagh t _ taakwegkut _ , _ taakunguut _ siqlugagh put _ taakwantut _ .
Kagpamsugllaget _ , _ nani _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
paninang qun _ salin _ maana _ , _ ugwiighumaghma _ tuyugh qaghaqe ainkut _ ukut _ nayugh mta _ Raaquunkut _ .
uziva nkut _ salin _ entaqun _ angyeghetagh _ sa u a _ atuqe u luku _ .
mangtag _ , _ qasugh iqe aq _ sa u a _ tuyugh aqe aat _ .
angyeghetagh t _ tamaakut _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ neqe t _ angyagh mun _ kelqe te aaghet _ , _ ategh i _ angyeghetagh t _ .
taakut _ alla _ akmagtagh ghhagh t _ aghinghwaagh u na iqe ait _ .
sanqute t _ , _ aghvegh mun _ pi sigh t _ , _ aghinghwaagh lghutagh t _ .
aghvenge naqe llegh _ piraamsi tete luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ .
eghqwaagh uute aqe luteng _ tanqigh mi _ nani _ .
angyagh mun _ pi sigh _ enkaam _ entaqun _ yataaghqennaqneghmeggni _ eghqwaagh uute aqe lghiit _ .
Kaavam _ angli naqe llegh a
Kaavam _ apegh llegh a
siknegh
siknegh mi _ tesamani _ qafsina neng _ akuuragh aqe aqa _ qazigyagh _ , _ whaten _ iiwleng _ pi gpenaan _ , _ ayumiqullegh t _ ataasigh t _ .
Uwalighneghmeng _ taawegken _ esneghag ni _ .
nalluqagh nge a _ , _ angyengestagh lgu lghiinga _ .
ilu te mun _ maaqek _ uughqaghtagh t _ allgeqestat _ .
negig llegh k _ whaangiighhaaghllutek _ kenle kek _ , _ uksaapagmi _ whaten _ , _ ilu te mun _ tungyuuk _ maaqe ghllagek _ .
unake luki _ upag aghte luki _ tugu naqe i nagh ma luki _ , _ taakwavek _ malleg aghte nghminiki _ teghluwaghtaqluki _ .
tawatete naagh zinga _ .
naqam _ unange ghllag _ , _ qayughllak _ uygu te ghllag _ .
Uunʼggun _ aag lghii _ sa u luku _ .
Tawatenginaanaqngama _ , _ angalqatagh nka _ ilemlluki _ kete qaghte lunga _ , _ kaate luki _ tawavengiighhaq _ angallqatameng _ , _ nekreg ite ngugh nge a _ , _ angalqatagh aghte aqe anka _ .
legan _ taakwavek _ , _ enraq _ yakughnaqaniq _ , _ kagsaataqegkanganga _ laagh anun _ .
Whaangiighhaq _ negig llegh m _ kenle kek _ .
aghvinleg _ tugu qaghte aqa _ .
ila a _ aga _ teghluwaghtaqanga _ , _ whanikwaaqaa _ iiwen _ , _ siqinegh _ tevigh yagh uq _ .
Guutngwaaqaagunga _ iwerngaqun _ whanikwaa _ .
unaami _ uughqaghte aat _ kaate ghllag ma lghiit _ .
teskiwani _ Umeyaalagni _ , _ qenu _ anuqe ngunani _ puglegh meng _ pi lghii _ amsanagh _ .
sa u a _ kagpesqwaagh _ , _ nallukeghllaghngaamki _ suflugagh m _ qepghagh llegh i _ , _ piyuke lleg mtun _ lli aghte naqe aqa _ .
kingu a _ walamnaag aghagh aqa _ nakeghsagh ta a _ .
pinigh yagh lghii _ apeghiighkagh _ .
naakghite te ste ghllag aqa _ , _ ukatghutaghllak _ .
teskiwavek _ ( _ nutaan _ unange ghraag vyiigh yagute aqe unga _ ) _ kaate yalghiinga _ taawa _ , _ aghneghupaagumaan _ , _ uksaagh mi _ , _ nuug aqe uq _ kiiwhken _ elngaatall _ .
Whaangiighhaaghhneghata _ guunnemki _ , _ ukatghute ghllag luki _ .
ii _ guusagh lghiinga _ .
unange gpenanga _ seghleghhalek _ ghhuugh ghhagh nka _ sikna yagute anka _ .
nuug ghllag _ unite luku _ quug meng _ qerngughte i yalghiinga _ , _ ghhuugh meng _ siknayagutem _ .
teghiglug t _ esgha _ repall _ qungeghrug i _ aliigh aqe ut _ qenughhaghagh vleghagh mi _ mallegkagh m _ angtalanganeng _ .
iwerngaqun _ , _ aglagh negh mni _ legan _ guute aqe unga _ .
“ _ sangami _ tawatete a _ . _ ”
awavagh qagh a qun _ nuug lghii _ piisutaghaghluku _ guusagh kegka _ leganqun _ .
tugu naagh nghite kegka _ amsanaghqwaakanga _ .
entaqun _ kiiwna a _ walamnaapagem _ ukatghutatughqwaasteghllakaqa _ .
taawa _ mataawi kau unga _ .
sivu nge aq
maana llu _ sivu nge aq _ nuugtu yagh lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ tuvagh _ reghighhneghmini _ nuug leg pigu uq _ , _ unange na pigte yagh uq _ , _ maaten _ avangite te a _ .
aghsaan _ nuug pagite te a _ .
tawaten _ malleg lutek _ me ngunani _ kiyaghte uq _ .
Raaquq _ taana _ esavghaghtu raaghinagh _ .
Kelengakaqegkefut _ .
Tuumllugllak _ , _ angyagh llegh ke sigh ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ inwa _ walguyaaggaghmun _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ iknaqelgaqat _ .
aa _ , _ maghyaghqugh aqe kanginkut _ walguyaagluni _ .
“ _ puughte i lghiit _ tamaakut _ angwaaghute meng _ anagu aqe luki _ ! _ ” _ amenam _ legan _ anagu aqe ke put _ .
esnevagh aqe ukut _ legan _ nuug aqe ut _ .
kayagte aqe kanginkut _ amsakellegh inagh aneng _ , _ nuugtu nghaani _ .
qafsina _ unake luku _ , _ tamaani _ igleqaqwaaqelghii _ , _ llaaghanwha _ ilangakun _ maklagte aqe lghii _ qavaghsigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ legan _ taakwegkut _ segge llegh ghllag t _ uteghmun _ itagnagh aqe ut _ .
Angyallqusighllak _ , _ qikmigh a llu _ iknaqe lghiit _ .
nuugtu pigte yagh uq _ .
sangami _ maaten _ nuug pagite te agu _ .
leveklug ghllag m _ saam _ teghha _ sakuslugtughqwaam _ saam _ .
maana _ sivu nge aq _ nateghtu langa _ nallukngwaagh kegka _ .
siknegh mete aqe lghiinga _ quunpeng _ unangseghwaaghmun _ lliigh ghngaan _ .
uksugh ghhagh inagh mi _ .
uksaagh m _ unangseghwaagha _ nallukngwaagh aqa _ .
qineghpeghwaagh aqe lghiinga _ liigilliigh yama _ .
naten _ lliigh nghaani _ , _ uksaaghpag kestagh nghaani _ , _ ayvegh _ ukavek _ esghaqaqutughhneghatgu _ .
kaana _ ayveghagh igate uq _ kiwalighneqaniq _ .
negh niigh vig ghllag _ , _ quunpeng _ ayvegh leg _ , _ qantaaghantuq _ kana _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ esghaallaaghnanightunga _ .
qantaghante uq _ , _ aghula i aatagh u ghllag _ .
Esghaallaaghnanightunga _ .
nalluke kegka _ nateghtu langa _ , _ maansimangitunga _ , _ siknegh mete kanga _ .
pugughilegh meng _ kenqigllaaghpenanga _ tesamani _ tagi unga _ maavek _ .
taawa _ tagi ukut _ pugughilegh meng _ .
Sivulighpigaalutung _ , _ ( _ Anaghayaankut _ quyngighqwaagh t _ maanlenguut _ ) _ , _ Waallallu _ tagite ainkung _ Imingatem _ .
Waalla _ taana _ kiyalighagh mii u yagh lghii _ .
taakwagun _ , _ qamiye t _ malghugnegh t _ , _ Waalla _ qamugh ke luku _ .
qikmigh ghhagh t _ pinighwaaghet _ , _ naten _ kenqigllaaghpenanga _ , _ entaqun _ qavagh aqe lunga _ .
naten _ tawaten _ , _ wallu _ kangigh mii nun _ kaate sta _ .
Anaghayaaq _ quyngilegti _ .
taawa _ quyngigh a _ qateghrakegtagh ghllag _ .
sa u ak _ qamiyelluugpagek _ , _ natete ak _ , _ aghqestaagh pigu uk _ .
Iwhanitwha _ qamisli llegh ke nghite atkek _ Lapland-eghmiit _ .
aa _ , _ unuwaa _ mamleg a _ .
ii _ naayghagh ghrug ghllag _ whaa _ qigug mi _ angqaperukegllak _ .
whaa _ tagtalmi _ liisimakngwaaghpetaqa _ .
uugna qun _ Naayghaghpawuniiqegkangat _ .
taana _ , _ tawani _ ima _ esghagh llegh ka _ .
unug llegh ke sigh _ tagi ukut _ , _ naten _ uyatu tke a _ , _ kenqigllaallghitaqa _ .
naa kek _ taake uk _ qimugsigh k _ aviite uk _ .
Mengyaakenghitagput _ .
kaate luni _ legan _ quyngigh ni _ pegte a _ .
taawa _ alla _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh lgu uq _ .
Whaangiighhaq _ petug luni _ , _ mangteghagh m _ ingate kaghagh ani _ , _ ukum _ qemi m _ ukakaghaani _ .
taawa _ sivungagh mun _ lliigh uq _ .
Imegyuutemllu _ angayuqagh i _ , _ Sipelankut _ , _ Nungugenkut _ , _ whangkuta _ , _ estamagnegh u uq _ mangteghagh _ .
Mangteghapiggaat _ , _ whangkuta llu _ , _ Imegyuutemllu _ angayuqagh i _ , _ Nungugenkutlu _ tanpegh ghhagh t _ .
taakut _ Sipelankut _ entaqun _ log _ house-nguniiqegkangit _ .
qaamkut _ mingle i _ unaghsigh t _ , _ sivuqagh m _ mangteghagh atun _ .
iwernga _ maanangilnguut _ , _ unaghsigh t qun _ nuug uute ghllag luteng _ , _ whaten _ roof-emsiilget _ .
tanpegh meng _ roof-elighluteng _ .
Tuumllugllaak _ aghpumla ghllag _ .
maaten qun _ tuumlluggnaniqanga _ , _ aghpumla nga i uute kanga _ .
entaqun _ anuqetughtekanga _ .
tamaani qun _ aghpumla u lghii _ quunpeghllak _ .
anigu _ temngi _ tekite ghllag _ , _ mangteghagh t _ nuvukruggii _ , _ anigu ghllag _ .
umegnegh ughte nghminigu _ taagken _ , _ ii _ entaqun _ qaamte aqe a _ , _ tamaa na _ tengteghllaneghminigu _ .
Aay _ , _ ayveghagh lghiit llu _ whaangiighhaawaqut _ .
unaagh nge i nagh u kete te _ naken _ qamugh t _ whaa _ .
neghsaghtu magh mi wha _ ayuqe yagh nghite a _ , _ esghaghhu qun _ kanani _ tekeghagh ani _ kana _ eftughuute aqe ut _ awen _ .
Kellmigtellghilnguunga _ nalluke kenka _ , _ entaqun _ luugh gni _ .
tawaten _ kumlaaghqelluni _ , _ Inuunkuk _ kinku k _ , _ Nunguwaallu _ , _ Uvingwaallu _ , _ quyngigh meng _ taslughwaghlutek _ kiiwhken _ tagi aqe uk _ qamiyngik _ usi lug teng _ .
Kaatusaqmegneki _ , _ neghsagh t _ igughqwaakat _ paseghagh ghllag t _ .
entaqun _ ighivgaq _ unange luteng _ , _ naten _ aqfaqugh ma ait _ , _ qazigyaghpaghqut _ naken _ pi atgu _ .
quyngigh t _ taslughameng _ tagi aqe ut _ Uvingwaallu _ , _ Nunguwaallu _ , _ Inuughuuq _ iitek _ aag llegh a _ .
Qazigyapagllagsugnitutlu _ aange pigte ut _ , _ enraq _ sikughnagllagluteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
kukuleg
kukuleg _ teskiwna _ maaken _ esghaqaaluni _ , _ legan _ napaqagh m _ uliwaaghluni _ ayuqe uq _ .
qeghagh ghllag _ , _ sa u ut _ .
qeghaghtu pigte uq _ ulleghaatellghilluni _ .
angyagh meng _ teskiwavek _ , _ mangteghagh ngllagh naqe t _ , _ mangteghagh vyiigh ghhagh _ sa u a _ .
taakwegken _ esne meng _ unaghsigh meng _ angyagh kun _ usi ii kut _ , _ usi iigh ukut _ .
maligsaagh yug neghtugh kanga _ palaghmete ghngaaghma _ .
Yaavuqughtekluki _ Imingatenkut _ , _ entaqun _ Meghyuunkut _ , _ Waaghyinkut _ , _ kinku t _ Petgenghhaankut _ .
Esneghruwhaakun _ angyapig kun _ yaavuqumeng _ .
teskiwani _ kukuleg m _ kangighagh ani _ , _ whaa _ maaten _ liigike yaqegka _ , _ kangighagh akun _ tamlag qagh luteng _ sa ut _ piyutagh u aghte te ut _ , _ uqligh aat _ wallu _ .
tamaa _ nenglullug t _ natangi _ ifkagh aqe luteng _ naqam _ neftegngaaqluteng _ .
me nge ghllag luteng _ qaamnangi _ .
yug m _ naasqugh lghutagh nge i _ tamaa _ .
ii _ tanpeghhaghaaq _ sa u a _ tamaa _ .
angyagh t _ tamaa _ ulpig aghte aghte aqe luteng _ , _ ayemqugh aqe luteng _ .
amig lgu aqe luteng _ , _ sa ngllaghkagh ghllag pestaagh _ , _ pelungigh ghllag _ , _ saagrukegllak _ .
maaten _ kiwa _ qete llegh ughte ma uq _ .
Seghleghwaaghuuq _ .
tawani _ entaqun _ yugu i te ghllag mi _ , _ sa ma uq _ , _ tuqu laghate te ma uq _ .
sa n qun _ tamaa _ nenglu ni _ .
Yuvghiighwaaghyaqumta _ entaqun _ sakuslugllak _ sama _ .
enraq llu _ tamaani _ llangaqa _ unayaghaqiigatesugnitut _ .
Taawaa _ unaghsigh meng _ usi iigh luteng _ , _ kepe te aqe luteng _ .
Taakwnanga _ puygaaqegkegka _ nateghtu langa _ , _ naqam _ natanga _ neqamike aqe anka _ .
uughqa ni _ samani
tagtale mii _ ii _ naten _ imani _ ayumiqullegh _ atuqe luku _ maani _ , _ llangaqa _ mulupag gpenani _ , _ aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
Taakunii _ , _ angayuqagh gka _ taake uk _ , _ apagkaa _ , _ liite lghiinga _ angayuqagh ke lukek _ taake uk _ .
aglagh ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
tamaani _ kiig ainkut _ , _ upenghaghagh a _ , _ salin _ kenqigllaallghilnguunga _ .
tagtale mii _ kiig aqe a llu _ , _ Anaghayaankut _ suna _ taakut _ , _ angyapig kun _ .
Anaghayaankut _ , _ Imingatenkut _ , _ kinangaawa _ Waaghyingwaallu _ esteg ragh u a llu _ , _ taana llu _ naa ghllag ka _ , _ kaate ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
Tamaantekullaalutaang _ kete ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ qikmigh t _ quutqughutii _ kangii nun _ kiwavek _ .
taakut _ Pugughileghmelnguut _ Agaankutlu _ , _ Anawutaankutlu _ malghugnegh t _ .
tawaten _ teve luta _ entaqun _ .
maaten _ liisagh lghiinga _ , _ tapghaaghagh qun _ , _ iiwen _ siqinegh _ tevighyaghtuughaquq _ tamlag ukut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ kangii neng _ taagken _ uteghte uq _ .
qikmigh t _ itghagh u uute kangi _ .
Tamaantekullaalutaa _ , _ iqallug ut _ awen _ unakaghput _ .
kii _ awen _ siknegh _ nagaqutughtaqaa _ .
siknegh _ quunpeng _ qaanghitnun _ lliigh uq _ .
arekull _ siknegh mun _ aglagh u aqe ukut _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ qenwat llu _ igleghte ukut _ .
tawaten _ tekeghalghunqun _ taakwna _ , _ naagu _ siknegh _ .
ii _ atiqusatughllaataghaat _ .
Sungaghyuggalek _ kanagh a _ pengugulluni _ , _ siknegh u naqe lleqe uq _ .
Taawaa _ ketmiighte vigkagh ut _ , _ Esneghaghpaaguftuk _ ategh kek _ .
qateghllug tek _ inga _ .
esneghagh m _ keluteghlluwaaghani _ tapghagh mi _ taakwani _ , _ kelute mii ii aghte lutek _ Esneghaghpaaguftuk _ .
naayvagh mun _ whavek _ kanaken _ esneghag neng _ esneghagh k _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ nuug t wha _ tamaa _ esghaqagh aqe aput _ , _ naayvagh mi _ .
Tazingkuk _ kaate yaghtugh yaqegput _ uugte ghllag lutek _ qategh ghraagte lutek _ , _ neghsapigpaghqughllak _ .
temngi _ qenaagh kun _ uugte luteng _ naayvagh m _ esne akun _ , _ kii _ .
guute nghite ait _ avelghagh ait _ .
kii _ ii _ , _ taakwagun _ aningugh luta _ , _ allakagh mi _ siknegh _ naayvagh lgu lghii _ .
atghagh ukut _ , _ ii _ aghqe i aghaghtu uq _ imani _ .
nuug _ tamaa na _ , _ qawaagllaak _ , _ samseghhaghaaghmeng _ .
arekull _ aglekesegagh u aqe ut _ .
Samseghhaghaqngwaaghaqanka _ .
kii _ , _ teskanavek _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiikut _ , _ qagi t _ unʼga _ , _ esneghagh k _ reghighqellutek _ , _ ayeme aqe ut _ kana _ .
qawaag ghllag u uq _ , _ neghsagh ghllag _ .
ii _ legan _ suqsugh ghhalek _ neghsagh t _ qimag aqe ut _ naken _ .
unange naqe mun _ waakenghitut _ kaate naqe i nagh ut _ .
enraq llu _ nakevleghaghmeng _ anuqe _ ayuqe uq _ .

tamlag luta _ nenglullug lghute ghllag t _ kii _ taakwaa _ .
sungaghyug te aqe lghiit _ esghaghkagh nka _ , _ kaa _ siqluwalghunqun _ taakwna _ kelute mnni _ .
taagken _ tent- ta lug teng _ , _ uqlighsagh naqe ut _ ingavek _ .
angyapig llu _ esnevagh te naqe aat _ .
Ineghqughwaghwaaghlunga _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh ma _ , _ legan _ aga _ uyavaghqagh ughte ut _ , _ kingu itneng _ , _ ighsakinghegkeni _ yaag aghte aqe lunga _ .
ii _ naqam _ riistuniqe magh ma _ aghyuugh na yu kangatnga _ .
Qikmighaghestun _ entaqun _ maligsaagh naqe lghii stun _ .
guute lutek _ , _ upaghqaghtaqlutek _ Tutmatelgenkuk _ , _ Anaghayaankuk _ .
tagsigh aagnenga llu _ esghagh lunga _ .
taawa _ nuug aqe uq _ , _ ilu te mun _ maaqeghllaaguftuk _ .
legan _ guute lutek _ unake luki _ upaghqaghtaqluki _ .
iwerngaqun _ whanikwaa _ tagi ukut _ .
taane a _ nenglu vyiigh _ sa u a _ , _ Sipelam _ entaqun _ nekeftekaqe laatagh aa _ .
pinighsagh luku _ tawannaqnguftukut _ arekull _ .
taana _ nayughkagh ut _ .
nevugh ligh aat _ qaye a _ , _ nevugh lgu uq _ nutem _ .
egllu llgagh u uq llu _ taawa _ naagu _ suflug meng _ ivaghnaghhaq _ .
tamaa _ copper-et _ , _ legan _ taakwavek _ suqlughte luki _ , _ waya meng _ sa meng _ , _ wayaghtu uq llu _ copper-meng _ tamaa _ .
suflug t _ taaqe ait _ .
arekull _ Balena-m _ nalighnegh aneng _ makreghqullghuftut _ .
angyaghpag m _ taam _ aghqe itagh i tekagh m _ .
taawa _ tesamani _ tepe luni _ angyaghpagllug m _ ingluvingha _ .
taawa _ quug u luni _ qalqalimaqu lleghtu uq _ .
quug ke luku _ taana _ .
tamaa _ telaananga m _ sa i _ , _ napaghyagh i _ sanighyaghwaaghi _ .
ikiqun _ quyngighqwaagh t _ angaghqugh kaqe ait _ .
siipnegh it _ kepugh ait _ taakut _ .
taake pigte aqe ut _ pengiiwaqutlu _ entaqun _ quug ke aqe aput _ , _ llaag i _ savikenghaagh ghllag meng _ siteghte aqe luteng _ .
siknegh mun _ lliigh sigh ut _ taana _ , _ natungaawa _ ayumiqullegh _ .
agaten _ paninang _ aviite qaghte aqe lunga _ , _ puygaaqlunga _ naten _ .
kaviigh iigh na i ughtagh u ukut _ , _ enraq llu _ tamaani _ kaviq _ , _ kaviighniighem _ tanqigh a _ qelpegh llegh a _ ava ite ngughk _ , _ taaqe llegh a _ kenle ngllagh llghite ngughk _ .
alngunak _ entaqun _ legan _ siifqaq _ aniguvzeghanghani _ .
tekeghagh aneng _ akmaghqukaqaa _ kaviigh _ Tutmatelgem _ .
Qafsinʼgughhneghminigu _ kaviigh nge lleg ni _ , _ kaviigh niigh yug nanigh aqe uq _ kenle lgu uq _ , _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
uglagh ghllag luku _ kaviigh ii igate uq _ .
entaqun _ kaviivluugsaqlegestun _ taaqe aqe uq _ .
taagken _ kenle ke luku _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh _ ayumiqullegh _ avelghagh gpenaamta _ aglaperewaaghllak _ .
tawani _ nani _ August-mi _ , _ ilangakun _ July _ naange ghesnagh nghaani _ , _ wallu _ July-mi _ paninang _ July-nguluku _ aglagh aqe lghiikut _ .
uksaagh kanigh u luku _ aqfa aqe ainkut _ Anaghayaam _ qimugsigh meng _ .
tefte i aghagh qu kut _ ayvigtegh kun _ taakwagun _ .
legan _ ayumiinneghinkut _ teve aqe ukut _ .
tagtale mii _ , _ wetku _ quyngigh _ apeghiigh nghaani _ aglagh yagute ukut _ .
Corral-munqun _ kanaghte aqe kangat _ .
Corral-miqun _ tuqutagh igh yagute lghiit _ , _ ila i llu _ qitneg mi _ .
Taam _ wetku _ kingu aneng _ aglagh aqe ukut _ .
siingenllu _ ivenruute _ allgegh lghii _ .
ii _ , _ ii _ , _ qimugsigh meng _ angaghqugh aqe ukut _ tevnga ni _ .
qenwat _ qikmigh ghhagh put _ nengenghighwaaghaqut _ .
iitek _ taawani _ kangii ni _ muluugh aqe ukut _ .
Teveqaghhnemtaa _ taawa _ qimugsigh llegh ut _ kayaali qaghte aqe uq _ .
sivuligh mi _ tamaani _ pi yaaghte yuwhaagh lleg mnni _ ukamameng _ , _ ukamaperuwaaq _ qikmigh tgun _ .
ukamagh aatagh unga _ whanga llu _ qikmigh tgun _ .
tenmaawi lunga _ , _ meghnugh pagnanigh lunga _ .
iitek _ qikmigh ghhagh t _ , _ angyagh ghhaat _ repall _ qukfighute ste aqe ait _ .
Ivenrustun _ tawaten _ teghugh ii aghte i negh meggni _ , _ repall _ angyagh ghhaat _ iptagtaghaghluteng _ .
enraq llu _ angyengestagh meng _ quunpeng _ qamughagh lgu aqe lghiit _ .
sivuke luta _ Tapghaaghastaghhinaghqun _ .
elngaatall _ iqallugte aqe ukut _ , _ qupnegh meng _ kiyang _ .
tagtale mii _ ii _ pugughileghmii t _ katelghaate aqe ut _ iqallugyat _ .
Agaankutlu _ , _ Anagutaankutlu _ , _ kiwaliqutaghluteng _ .
Aghvightegnekun _ taaggun _ Agaankut _ .
Anagutaghhaanut _ taakut _ , _ Aghtuqaayagenkutlu _ kisii mi _ .
nasiqe aghte aqe ut _ aga _ piiwagh uute aqe ut _ tamaantelqinaghluteng _ .
Temkeruullu _ taana _ , _ tefte i uute qugh ghllag _ .
quunpeng _ tefte i uute qugh ghllaget _ Temkeruunkut _ .
ilangakun _ sivu ngiighhagh mnni _ , _ kingu mnneng _ ilangakun _ .
tamaagun llu _ whaa _ ilangakun _ tamlag aqe ut _ .
qagugh mun _ quunpeng _ mayugh aqe ut _ .
quyngighqwaagh t _ salin _ ikayughtelguluteng _ sa u na iqe ka itneng _ Lapland-eghmiineng _ neli kaqe aat _ ukagun _ kiwalighneghakun _ .
qagugh _ taana _ kingurugllamnneng _ mangteghagh liqe aqe aat _ .
qafsinagnegh t _ mangteghagh t _ tawansaghtut _ .
Sipelankut _ , _ pinagh u yankut _ , _ Unmeggaankut _ , _ Pangawyinkutlu _ .
taane a _ government-mun _ pikniiqaat _ entaqun _ apeghtughiste ita _ nayugh at _ .
angumake nghite anka _ nalluke anka _ .
sakmavek _ piiwagh magh ita _ Walangankut _ , _ mulu magh ita _ .
tawani _ piiwagh llegh gpesi _ kenle ani _ guygu t _ allgegh qugh ait _ .
kiig aa _ legan _ qakughiit _ .
sangaawa _ 1925-1926-mi _ .
taakwani _ nani _ 1924-1925-mi _ .
ila ita wha _ qaga _ neqamike nghite atki _ .
ataasigh kun _ taanegkut _ ketligh at _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ mangteghagh _ qaake aat _ .
Taam _ telanangameng _ ayuqe lghii m _ , _ Holmes-nguniiqegkangita _ .
aleghquusigh t _ allgegh nghhagh t _ , _ maakut qun _ kenʼgaghtat _ .
Tamaawun _ lipeghsaghat _ .
sa u a _ teacher-ngiighhaq _ amsakaghtagh ghhagh _ , _ entaqun _ seghleghlluggagh ughtekagh _ kenʼgaghtakun _ .
Scupholm-nguftuq _ taawa _ aleghquusigh kun _ sukaghllag u uq _ .
taana _ telaananga _ upenghayaghapiguluku _ holmes _ , _ Buckland-nguniiqegkangat _ umiileg a _ , _ ighnegh a _ John _ .
telaananga meng _ , _ akilpegagh magh mi _ .
kaviigh meng _ tukfightugh magh mi _ , _ sa meng _ tugute meng _ .
kaviigh niigh llegh
naligh ni _ taakwani _ ayumiqullegh ni _ kaviigh _ akitu pigte uq _ .
akitu lleghpigagh at _ saam _ $ _ 60-mun _ kaate qaghte luteng _ .
qenghaghtu t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ $ _ 100 _ siipngaan _ wallu _ $ _ 75 _ .
tamaani _ unangsagh yagute magh ma _ , _ kaviigh iigh nigh ughte ngughsi magh ma _ akitughqaagaa _ .
kii _ kaviigh t _ pi naqe yuwhaagh lghii ni _ unake neghllug u laatagh ma ut _ .
iitek _ kaviighniighpaghqwaaqsalghiinga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ , _ nagun _ aag aqe aat _ .
tagtalmi _ liite te m llu _ saam _ piitkegsimllu _ .
tawaten _ kaviigh niigh aatagh llegh mi _ , _ ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ kaviigh pagite luni _ , _ ilangakun _ kaviighyag ghllag aqe luni _ .
maaten _ katam _ iigsagh aatagh llegh stun _ , _ kaviigh niigh te ghllag _ , _ ii _ kaviigh niigh te aqe uq _ .
kaviigh nge naqe te perewaagh ghllag _ , _ katam _ maaten _ tugutlugte naqe ghllag lleg mtestun _ .
amenam _ maligte te nagh kaqsagh lghiinga _ kaviighniighmun _ , _ taawa _ uqengeghmetaqelghiinga _ .
aghulaqe uute aqe uq _ elngaatall _ , _ kiipaghqenghani _ , _ kaviighniighyaanneqegsaataquq _ .
uuvganeng _ yataaghqesagh te aqe uq _ .
aghneghtu nghaani _ uteghnigh uute aqe luni _ .
Kinguvaqun _ iwerngaqun _ , _ tanqigh a _ unkuseniighem _ umeg llegh anun _ kenlanga _ , _ ikugh lleg mnnun _ kenlanga _ .
Takestaapiggaayaghtuq _ .
November-meng _ legan _ February _ naangellegh anun _ .
sangan _ tawaten _ siifqallghem _ agʼghillgilliiqellgha _ takestaaghhagh _ maaten _ qemall _ seghlegh ghllag u uq _ .
november _ first- meng _ april- mun _ taakwavek _ .
unkuseniigh na niite lghii llu _ .
nanugh
uuvganeng _ entaqun _ nanughtu uq _ .
Tumemeng _ quunpeng _ , _ aywaa yagh nghaani _ tawaten _ tume liqe ghllag aqe ut _ .
maaten _ snow _ machine-engyalghiimeng _ sukate luku _ nanugh _ qerngughtegkangat _ .
uuvganeng _ nanughtu uq _ , _ nanugh m _ tume liqe aqe ut _ , _ nanughagh aqe ut _ awen _ .
nanughagh aatagh unga _ .
ataasigh meng _ tesamani _ , _ naqam _ tume liqe ghllag _ , _ aviite u aghte ut _ .
Tuumlluku _ qituk _ aange pigte uq _ , _ tuumlluku _ qimugsigh meng _ tumeyag ghllag _ nanugh ghllag _ entaqun _ .
esghaate igate unga _ .
qituk _ maani _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ esghaate unga _ .
naqam _ tume t _ tamaa _ esghaate gpenanga _ .
Tuumtivaghqughllaak _ .
aywaa nun _ teve yaghtugh negh mni _ uteghte aqe lunga _ .
aga _ aywaa n _ esne a _ aliinegh mkun _ uteghte aqe unga _ tesamavek _ .
tawaten _ alla _ esgha _ tuumlluku _ taana _ , _ qanlengunisimaa _ .
anuqe m _ , _ nuugtem _ , _ qiive ma lghii _ .
nanugh meng _ esghaate igate ngugh u nga _ , _ aay _ amsakaghtagh _ .
tuqute yaqegka _ nanugh ghrukutaaghllag _ , _ uqig ghllag _ pegnem _ neveghtekaqaqa _ .
wiin _ neveghneghlliqluku _ , _ llaaghinaan _ saagrukegtuq _ .
tume _ awen _ esghagh kaqsagh aqa _ , _ temanganeng _ esghaate gpenanga _ .
qituk _ maaken _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ esghaateqaghte lunga _ maani _ enraq _ yug lgu uq _ .
amu a ngam nguq _ pike a _ .
esghaateqaghtekaayagh unga _ enraq _ yug lgu uq _ .
taana _ ama _ esghagh luku _ , _ ama _ qituk _ qineghpeghwaaghute kun _ , _ siknegh mi _ .
Qaayaam _ aga _ taku aqe a _ .
nutem llu _ tughwaagh ma kanga _ .
Snow _ machine-em _ nanugh _ aghtuqnanightestaa _ .
paninang _ esghaate na qaghte aqe unga _ , _ aviite u aghte ut _ .
naqam _ satun _ aay _ whateghlluwaaq _ .
taakut _ esghagh aataghkagh nka _ , _ megh mete ngughk llu _ unʼgani _ , _ paaggun llu _ esghagh kaqe a _ .
Whateghlluwaaq _ legan _ gginagh ke te luki _ nallunaghhiitut _ .
aag llegh a _ liigikngwaaghluku _ , _ aag llegh a _ liigiklaaghpenaan _ ukawungiighhaq _ maaqute ste kestagh lghii _ .
salngagkwaagh u ni lukek _ yeghlegi _ , _ aange pigte uq _ neghniimsugllak _ entaqun _ maaqute kanga _ iighwilngwaaghhaghmi _ kezemtagh ghllag _ taana _ .
naqam _ naate tke a _ elpegyuk _ .
ungipaate aqa _ , _ “ _ Salngawhkaaghllagek _ taaga _ maaqute aqe ak _ . _ ”
“ _ ii _ nanugh u nghite a _ ? _ ”
Qineghneqigsaqegka _ aviite uq _ .
pugughilegh mi _ ungipaate anka _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ sa u a _ nanuuwallu _ , _ uugte u a llu _ analghwaaghhaghni _ . _ ”
Yugniilqwaam _ ellmi nun llu _ esghagh ma na ai _ .
Egtugyugem _ pi luta _ esghaghnaqsaqefut _ aviite uq _ , _ avangite uq _ .
waaknanigh ukut _ , _ tagi ukut _ .
legan _ igleqaghtukut _ , _ Aghnangiighaam _ uugte ma lghii _ kiiwhun _ kingu mnneng _ , _ uyavagh ste gpenaamta _ .
“ _ yugkagh megteggun qun _ pi na iqe kangit _ . _ ”
Vupiget _ neqnigh u llegh at
ggayegllug m _ apegh llegh a
neqnigh u llegh _ kenle ite yagh uq _ avangite yagh uq _ .
iwerngaqun _ unake yu llegh megestun _ uglaghqakaan _ unake kayugu yagh aat _ .
tawaten _ uglaghqakaan _ unake lleghqagh meng _ kenle ite yagh uq _ .
upenghagh mi _ tawaten _ angyaghtu negh meggni _ naamakaghte na iqe lghiit _ , _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ ayveghagh negh meggni _ naamakaghtemmeng _ atigh llegh ke uq _ .
ayveghagh llegh m _ uglaghtala a _ eight _ , _ naamakaghtengnguftuq _ atigh llegh a _ .
yupig ii negh ghllag u aqe yagh lghiit _ .
ila i _ aamta _ whaten _ yug pagite aqe luteng _ ayuqe yagh lghiit _ .
enkaam _ natetkanighmi _ angyagh igate aqe luteng _ , _ yupagilnguut _ .
tamaakut _ yupiinghet _ alngunak _ angyagh llegh megestun _ angyagh kayugu yagh ut _ .
Twelve-nguyaghpetut _ angyagh m _ uglaghtala a _ neghigh luku _ .
Saavlankutgun _ angyagh yuwhaagh unga _ .
taagken _ Angqatenganwatkun _ angyagh na lunga _ piyagh _ lunga _ , _ kayute u naanghite ni lunga _ ighsake aanga _ .
elngaatall _ suwaghqwaalunga _ nutem _ angli kuma _ ellngitgun _ angyagh yaghqaa gpenanga _ .
angli magh ma _ tawaten _ yungllagh yagh aanga _ , _ taana _ puygu nghite kegka _ ighsake llegh ka _ .
Kayutngunaanghilqa _ , _ piyug nghite unga _ .
Uwaliit _ , _ Saavlankut _ , _ aghillug nkut _ , _ Quwaarenkut _ , _ Nemaayaankut _ , _ Temkeruunkut _ , _ ifkaghte te nkut _ , _ Eghqaaghaankut _ , _ Ungalaankut _ , _ sulug nkut _ , _ Nguungayankut _ , _ akule ke inkut _ , _ angyagh kayugu yaghpete ut _ angyaghwaagh kun _ lliigh magh meng _ .
taakut _ kiyang _ Quwaarenkut _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ aghvenge kayugu ut _ .
aghvenge ste u ut _ taakut _ , _ aghvengyuqagh t _ .
Pusaa _ sivuyagtekluku _ Quwaaren _ ata ke kanga _ .
Pusaankut _ , _ Ataayaghhaankut _ , _ Aghnilunkut _ , _ kunukagh nkut _ , _ Tatuwinkut _ , _ taakunguftut _ avaquti a _ Quwaarim _ .
elngaatall _ aghtiilnguut _ yuggagh t _ quunpeng _ .
angyaghwaagh kun _ lliigh magh meng _ , _ amsanaghllug mi _ whaten _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ , _ quunpeng _ sivulii manginagh aqe lghiit _ yaavuqumeng _ .
entaqun _ yaavuqumeng _ neghaalipag igate ngugh t _ .
angyagh at llu _ enraq _ sukate magh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ entaqun _ .
Pakregrakegtaghhaq _ angyagh ghhaat _ angyaghwaagh _ .
sivuke luku _ nanevgaghtagh ka _ piyaa nghaani _ maligte aqe kegka _ .
taagken _ maavek _ lliigh magh emta _ aviighute magh an _ umyugagh mneng _ lliigh unga _ .
kiyang _ umyugagh mneng _ piyaa aqe lunga _ lliigh unga _ , _ aviighute magh an _ nanevgaghtagh ghhagh ka _ taana _ .
ayveghte ni uq _ suflugagh neng _ whanga mni _ talwa _ teghig nagh uq _ .
Tengʼghunaghtuq _ ayvegh meng _ naghulleg negh _ , _ sugupag igh negh _ .
suflugagh meng _ talwa _ teghig nagh uq _ .
yakugh nagh ite uq _ , _ uyiighagh t _ kangigh a _ taakut _ sa kun _ vuuslegh kun _ ayugilngughqun _ agaghte luki _ , _ qaamqaghte te luki _ .
Sugupiluki _ pi aqe ke put _ whaten _ puglegh anite luki _ pi aqe ke put _ .
atghagh naqe negh meggni _ uygute luteng _ aneghte yagh qu aqe lghiit _ sugupag teng _ qerngughte yuggaagh qagh nghaki _ tawaten _ wetku _ sugupag ii iqe kenka _ .
aamtaam _ asitnginaaqanimeng _ pi lghii ni _ neghqugh na lghii _ .
Uunghatlu _ , _ naghulleg qagh inagh luku _ pegte lghii ni _ uunghagh igh te na lghii _ .
tuugkagh mete luki _ tawani _ atghagh te kayug i _ .
naghulleg luki _ tawaten _ naqamalla _ , _ qesug lghii ni _ , _ pi igate kangi _ nengtelghiini _ .
uyiigh t _ nengte lghii ni _ uunghakun _ petug llegh i _ .
naghigh aghte aqe lghiit _ , _ iike aqe lghiit _ .
Nengtaghluteng _ tawaten _ nasiqute luki _ sulleve te luki _ , _ siingenllu _ taku laghate te aqe kangit _ ayveghagh lghiit _ tawaten _ , _ sayug luki _ taawa _ tuqute aqe kangit _ .
nalluniite aqe ut _ anglu megteggun _ aneghte negh meggni _ agepsugh u aghte tete te kayugu ut _ .
Allaaghiinaagut _ puglegh m _ nuqutulngi _ .
aamta _ naafleghmelluki _ uka _ samaken _ mayugh nghata _ , _ esnevaghwaaghluta _ tawavek _ laag ghhagh anun _ naafleghmi _ tawani _ .
uka _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ whaten _ qungughqelluteng _ .
whaa _ aanaqenghata _ kepelleghteggun _ taaggun _ naghulleg lghii ni _ , _ taawa _ unake na lghii _ .
Qagaqum _ pangeghte llegh kek
Qagaqum _ apegh llegh a

sivuqagh meng _ tesakmaken _ mekelghiigh u lunga _ pangeghnaqunga _ tawani _ tanqigh mi _ pinaghvig m _ qukaghneghani _ taakwani _ .
tespamavek _ ungazigh igh unga _ sivuqagh meng _ .
“ _ enkaam _ , _ inaanmellengi _ ungazigh _ ! _ Teghraastu _ ! _ ” _ enkaam _ ighivgaghmi _ upenghaam _ aghnegh ani _ ighivgaamaan _ taglagh ukut _ nani _ taakwani _ siqinegh _ tevigh magh an _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ igleghte ukut _ malghugnegh u luta _ , _ Ataayaghhaankutlu _ qilleghte uute te nkut llu _ .
whanga _ qilleghte uute te nkut ni _ .
qavaghni nghite unga _ qesugniqem _ ungazigh _ esghagh naqe kegka _ .
tawaten _ iiwen _ mangteghagh t _ sivuqagh m _ mangteghagh i _ talughsaghtugh aqe aput _ , _ qayug ngllagh ukut _ .
qayugh te ma luta _ Uuyghaam _ pi inkut _ , _ “ _ aghviqagh mun _ kaate ukut _ . _ ” _ qateghllug ghllag _ , _ aghviqagh u naqe lleqe uq _ , _ esneghag tun _ tawaten _ papapaaghlutek _ iqetu lutek _ .
alpag lukek _ taawa _ taglagh ukut _ .
Uuyghaq _ nekeve luni _ aruugh aqe lghii _ ingute kun _ nekeve luni _ .
qayugh te nghmeng _ taaqe luta _ pi inkut _ , _ “ _ uaf- ke aq _ aliigh uq _ . _ ” _ pi yalghiikut _ qemigh _ sa u a _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ .
qute m _ maaqe niite kek _ alpag lukek _ arughsit _ aliigh aput _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ , _ taglagh ukut _ .
siqinegh _ piite kestagh uq _ , _ whaa _ tamlag yaghtugh ukut _ .
angyagh ghllagu uq _ aatnegh at _ .
Tamlaghqutaqeftuq _ angyaghugh tke aq _ .
elngaatall _ neqe siigh u te ma lghii _ , _ ayveghagh te ma lghii _ .
whaa _ kaate naqe ukut _ , _ kii _ yuug _ esnevagh uute yalghiimi _ , _ gginagh _ alla inagh _ esghaghaghput _ .
ivenruute k _ aghula i aghte lukek _ nusug agput _ .
angyagh _ kelevaghpani _ nutem _ , _ ateghviga ii te ainkut _ upugham _ saam _ alngunak _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kanglluute kete luta _ .
Taam _ angyagh m _ imagh a _ .
Qaaqanguftuq _ taglaate ainkut _ ellmeggnun _ .
imani _ mangteghaghtu uq _ , _ yugtu uq _ peggullghi _ tamaa na _ .
qesugniqe ghllag _ , _ ketanqwaaghaallghi _ Sivuqaghhmiit _ kaate lghiit _ .
taagken _ manughagh mun _ kaa llu ta _ angyagh m _ imigh u ni _ tawani _ pi inkut _ , _ “ _ tawani _ utaqa itek _ nengighqe lleqe amsi _ ilakwaagh mnun _ . _ ”
“ _ paye a _ kenegh meng _ aane uten _ . _ ” _ qamaken _ anighqute _ tugumiiqe luku _ tuune a _ qaaqagh mun _ .
qaaqagh m _ tawaten _ milugh lghii stun _ pi aqe luta _ alleg luta _ , _ “ _ Haa _ , _ taawa _ . _ ” _ ilakwaagh i _ uvite mi _ utaqa it _ .
tea- ngatu llu _ whangkutung _ yug ghllag m _ saam _ aglagh te ainkung _ , _ maligtaghpung _ .
kaa llu ta _ itegh ukut _ .
yug ghllag m _ taam _ nughagh ak _ maalghug _ allighaghqagh k _ kiig negh ke ak _ ilu te mun _ miluqutagh ke ak _ .
atkug igh lutung _ itegh unga _ .
aghnagh m _ saam _ itegagh nka _ kelig ai _ .
taawa _ itegh lunga _ amsikaghte naqe yagh unga _ , _ aghnagh m _ amsikaghaghtaak _ kameg gka _ , _ iikaghagh ak _ tawavek _ kayagte aanga _ allighagh mun _ .
nutaan _ allighagh kun _ iggasighte lunga _ negh naqe unga _ qayuutagh m _ esne ngiighhagh akun _ .
tea- ngatu _ qiive aghte yaqegka _ elngallu _ iggasighte ma lghii _ .
taakut _ tukugh pung _ aqumgagh meng _ .
taawa _ neghe uute ukut _ .
ikuyeg ka _ meghnugh uq _ aqumyugllagughtunga _ .
qenwat _ ayapegh lunga _ negh unga _ .
