Taaqlutaa _ qayugh te ukut _ .
taawa _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ may- nga u naqe lleqe uq _ .
Taamqun _ aleghqugh aqe aanga _ .
aane ukung _ .
aane luteng _ igleghusaqmininga _ tesqagani _ , _ naa ke i _ ila nka _ esghagh nanigh anka _ .
puughhe na yu kanganga _ uteghnigh yug unga _ .
aglagh ukung _ .
Taakunguftut _ Qerngughtekaankunguftut _ taam _ ata a _ may- ngam _ .
taagken _ aghnegh upag magh an _ qavaghni yama _ qavagh unga _ .
Whanikumaan _ taghtughtu inkut _ atugh naqe ni luki _ .
taagken _ atugh lghii nun _ aglagh ukut _ , _ navek _ pi langa _ maligte te unga _ atugh lghii nun _ .
mangteghagh ghrug ghllag _ , _ paagna a _ niighigh luku _ , _ yuug _ qineghte uute luni _ elngaatall _ asitmun _ .
whanga llu _ mayeqellegaghlunga _ qineghte unga _ .
taagken _ qineghte yalghiinga _ yug ghllag u uq _ nategh _ elngaatall _ , _ aqumgaviggaq _ taananginaq _ aghulaviggaqlu _ reghiteftuq _ .
yug ghllag u uq _ amig mun _ iiwleng _ .
legan _ ategh aqe ut _ alla t _ , _ ila i _ ategh vzigh luteng _ alla t _ mellu tete nghata _ ila i _ ategh aqe ut _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luteng _ neghe uute ut _ siivanllegh t _ , _ whangkuta _ neghenghite ukut _ tamaani _ temngi _ iglegha ukut _ , _ esghagh yukekagh ut _ esghaghaghput _ .
Yugllaguftuuq _ ungazigh _ , _ mangteghagh ghllag _ .
teghigniqe ukut _ kalleghtaqlutaa _ , _ naghaagh lqusiigh aqe luta _ .
mulu ukut _ tespamani _ anguugh ainkut _ nakemeng _ anuqllighluni _ .
iwernga _ aghyuqe vig ite ngughk _ , _ tengʼghunaq _ elngaatall _ .
taawa _ pegge nanigh lunga _ , _ maligte te lunga _ tukugh mnun _ qavagh yagute unga _ .
tukugh nka _ taakut _ pi niigh pigte ut _ .
quyilleg t _ kaate ut
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luta _ quyillgaagh ghhagh _ kaa tuq _ , _ taakunituq _ , _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
akuzi igate ngughk _ whangkutestun _ naqam _ mumegh igh qugh te aqe kangat _ .
ungipamsug nghaani _ taam _ tukugh mta _ mumigte te aqe ainkut _ .
tea- magh an tuq _ ellnga llu _ , _ liite ghraag unga _ akuzillegh aneng _ nagatem _ .
ila i _ neqamike anka _ paninang _ , _ ila i _ puygaanka _ quyillgaagh t _ akuzillegh it _ .
taana _ atuute llgagh u uq _ , _ atugh yaghtugh uq _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ nani _ .
nagaqugh unga _ , _ aghulaqe naqe negh meggni nguq _ quyillgaagh t _ mangteghagh nun _ qikmightuumagh meng _ takuughagh aqe ut _ .
tungsigh niigh llegh it _ tawatete na ait _ .
tukugh ma _ waakenghisatgu _ , _ aghulaqe naqe yayek _ nengiighhagh k _ taake uk _ , _ qaghluughisaghtugh agka _ .
qiteve aqe lghii _ , _ tusaqe igate kegka _ .
taakut _ qaghlu t _ akuqagh luki _ , _ kenigh nghaki _ taakut _ qaghlu yaghqagh t _ taku luki _ qaghlu aqe anka _ .
taana _ naqam _ enraq _ melqupag _ sa u a _ qaghlu sqe a _ , _ kenigh aa _ , _ tawaten _ pi unga _ , _ “ _ Kuluften _ . _ ” _ taawa _ Kuluftenet _ entaqun _ melqupag u ut _ ellngit ni _ .
taawa _ apeghiigh luni _ itghagh u i nghite uq _ .
nuna an _ Nekegnegha
taawa _ sivuqagh tun _ ayuqe uq _ naayvagh _ .
sivuqagh _ esghagh aqe kesi a _ , _ tawatete u aghte uq _ ungazigh m _ nekegnegha _ sivuqagh tun _ .
naayvagh kun _ taakwagun _ aghulaqe uq _ .
tawaten _ sivuqagh tun _ tapghagh lgu uq _ .
naayghagh i _ pagarugllak _ .
sivuqagh meng _ aliite aqe lghiit _ mamleg siigh t _ naayghagh t _ akivantut _ .
tungeqligh a _ taana _ ungazigh m _ uughqa nun _ tume u uq _ , _ ategh a _ ukigyaghagh u uq _ .
Igaghviganʼnguq _ tawansaghtuq _ ukigyaghagh mi _ .
nuugte ma kangat _ kinguvaqun _ pi yalghiikut _ mangteghagh m _ qunganganun _ .
taagken _ pi laatagh ainkut _ aygugh meng _ , _ aanyaghagh u uq _ pamarugllaak _ , _ ungazigh meng _ taagken _ sungaghyaagte lutek _ ayuqe uk _ naayghagh k _ .
maaken _ naayghagh neng _ paagken _ esghagh lghii ni _ naayghagh t _ aghqelengestaghaat _ , _ tawatete ut _ aghqestaaghhagh u ut _ aygugh mun _ .
taana _ ungazigh m _ aygugh ghhagh ani _ qiighqagh ghllag _ iwhani u uq _ nunangighagh u uq _ .
Alpaghllaguftughnguuq _ nuna igh aq _ , _ ne m _ qula akun _ alpa _ igleghte ghllag _ , _ qawaagniigh igate ngugh t _ , _ alpa meng _ negh igate ngugh t _ .
metghagh ghhagh inagh meng _ qawaagniigh llegh ke ut _ .
taakut _ tukugh nka _ angyengestagh squllgagh u ut _ taawa _ petug luni _ nategh kun _ .
qawaagniighusigh ghhagh it llu _ takestaaghhaa ut _ kepe luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
upugha negh ghllag u ut _ ungazighmii t _ tamaani _ pilleg mni _ sivuligh mi _ .
Taananguuq _ sivuligh _ whaa _ pangeghte yuwhaagh llegh ka _ salin _ laluramke nge i tete luku _ .
uglagh u pigte uq _ ungazigh _ , _ entaqun _ matumllu _ sivuqagh m llu _ qerngughte te yagh ghngaaghmi _ paninang _ uglagh uq _ .
Upughaneghllaak _ , _ aag negh mta _ taakut _ pi inkut _ , _ “ _ qayugh yagh a _ . _ ” _ ighsa negh mta _ pi aqe ainkut _ , _ “ _ Peluusangiighhaaghngaan _ . _ ” _ taawa _ aane yug nanigh ukut _ upughaghllagem _ , _ kepe yu m _ .
manguna _ whangkutestun _ negh kangat _ quyngigh _ .
quyngigh t _ awatkaghtagh t _ aqii nghhagh t _ , _ awatangani _ aqii luteng _ tagi tke ait _ .
Tukruuglluteng _ neqnit _ elngaatall _ awatkaghtagh t _ .
aqii ma aqe lghiit _ upenghayaghaaluku _ taagavek _ aki anun _ angyagh kun _ .
naken _ tasigh meng _ , _ avate meng _ yug nge aqe luteng _ taagavek _ angu aghtekaghqagh meng _ .
aate yameng _ , _ aki anun _ taagavek _ naantat _ imani _ quyilleg t _ akivansimaat _ .
quyngighqwaagh t _ Kiyaghtaallghat
Quunpenguq _ quyngigh eng _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ uksulqusigh igh ghllag _ .
uksugh mi _ tunuvagh aqe luteng _ pagavek _ mugu aqe luteng _ , _ quyngigh eng _ negh manginigh sqellug qu _ pinigh lghii meng _ .
atigh llegh i _ tawatete ut _ nuugte naqe negh meggni _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
enkaam _ qamiyeghnaaqungit _ tamaakut _ tanʼnguurngenguftut _ .
iwerngaqun _ usi igh ghllag luki _ mugu ma aqe lghiit _ .
nunivag m _ qukaa nun _ pamavek _ uksugh mi _ umegnepagillghanun _ entaqun _ negh vig kegtagh mun _ quyngigh eng _ aghulaqe te aqe luku _ , _ tunuvaghllaglutaang _ ungazigh meng _ .
paamna _ ungazigh _ aange pigte lghii _ nuna _ .
tespagani _ uksughte luteng _ upenghaqestanghani _ esne mun _ aligate ma aqe lghiit _ kiiw t _ pinagh lleghqagh i _ sivutghulluki _ .
quyngigh meng _ qikmigh ke luteng _ .
taawa _ mugu nqigte ma aqe lghiit _ esne anun _ upenghaqestanghani _ .
taawa _ tamaaken _ neqenge ma aqe lghiit _ tukfigh i luteng _ , _ tuugte aq _ , _ manguna _ .
manguna t _ tuugtagh u lghiit _ whangkunni _ , _ akike luki _ tanpegh _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ tapghaghpak _ .
quyilleg nun _ akike ma aqe kangat _ quynginge natke ma aqe kangat _ .
quyilleg t _ tamaakut _ tukfighagh eng _ tapghagh _ quyngigh meggnun _ saagtekumaan _ .
sanqute ke aqe kangat _ , _ nateghqagh _ kameg meggnun _ .
ungazighmii t _ Kiyaghtaallghat
esghagh yagh kufsiki _ ungazighmii t _ aatkagh it _ nuqutupaaghrugllaaguut _ , _ nasagh ite ngugh t _ nasaperagh meng _ nasagh ke lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ atkugwit _ ukut _ collar-ngi _ maaten _ , _ qikmiiraagh t _ entaqun _ iingunagh ita _ collar-kaqiit _ .
uksugh mi _ taakwavek _ qule mun _ iwhani luki _ nasaperagh meggneng _ taagken _ sigutngiitagh leg meng _ qepe nghmegteki _ legan _ puvite leg t _ , _ lliigh aqe ut _ naagu _ supuggaq _ .
kameg it _ nuqutupaaghruget _ , _ ila i _ esghaghkagh nka _ qallukaghmeng _ temkag lgu aqe ut _ , _ pinigh t _ maqagh t _ atugh it _ .
sa u aat _ maqagh u na iqe ait _ aatkagh t _ ama _ , _ wallu _ atkug ghllag t _ tamaakut _ .
liite qugh yagh unga _ , _ ungazighmii t _ akuzillegh it _ whangkunneng _ ila i _ sanivaqaantaqut _ , _ nagneghaghqunguut _ .
avate meng _ kenle ke luni _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ ila a _ tawaten _ qiteve ma _ .
qiteve a _ nagate aqe a _ tespamani _ , _ aleghquute aqe ut _ katam _ whangkuta _ whaten _ aleghquute negh mta _ .
ungazigh _ taana _ ikevaghllug mun _ ukavek _ tekeghagh igh luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ sivuqagh tun _ tawaten _ taakwagun _ .
Aghqestaayuwhaaguq _ , _ tawaten _ atigh llegh a _ sivuqagh m _ atillqumsillghatun _ ayuqe uq _ .
aatnegh leg _ , _ uughqa _ , _ imun _ , _ siqluwaghyaaget _ , _ tawaten _ sivuqagh m _ atightullegh atun _ .
taawanginaq _ naayghagh ite uq _ ungazigh _ tuungvani _ , _ ukigyaghagh ghhagh inagh _ kiwarugllak _ talwa _ entaqun _ kukuleg meng _ uyatu uq _ naayghagh m _ kenle a _ uughqa neng _ ukigyaghagh u ni kangat _ .
tamaani _ esghagh lleg mni _ qimugsigh u uq _ .
ugriilegh mun _ qimugsigh meng _ akilpegagh yagh te aqe ut _ , _ estuwalguftuq _ Ugriillghiinaq _ taana _ , _ ungazigh _ estuwiisaghpetuq _ tamaani _ .
sivuligh mi _ pangeghte aqngama _ .
elngaatall _ iqa _ piniqe aat _ seghleqe igate aat _ tamaani _ .
pelungighsagh yug pagigate yaghpete ut _ tamaani _ .
tawani _ esghapag aqe yamki _ angyagh t _ tamlaghqullghiit _ neqe meggneng _ angaghqugh yalghiimeng _ angyagh meng _ whaken _ , _ yug it _ mat-aghaghte luteng _ kemeg raaghinagh ughte luteng _ temkagh ke i i nagh luteng _ .
manguna t _ ugkellikagh t _ putu itgun _ tugu luki _ ggaatmeggnun _ miluute luki _ taagken _ ketarwataqiit _ angyagh meng _ qute mun _ .
tawaten _ angaghqugh aqe ut _ .
apeghiigh luteng _ tamaakut _ kanuugteghllakat _ esnagh mi _ tawani _ aniguvzeghagh ghhagh kun _ qikmigh stun _ tawaten _ ighwaaghtuute aqe ut _ aqsageteng _ aaw igh aqe ait _ ila meggnun _ sangighqugh ste aqe ait _ .
taakwagun _ maaqe aqe ut _ pamyughagh itgun _ ilepghaaghitnun _ qamavek _ .
Taananguuq _ ungazighte llegh ka _ sivuligh _ .
teghigniqe kau unga _ nuna _ alla _ esghagh kegka _ .
elngaatall _ America-m _ tawaqa a _ piyuke aat _ , _ kuynge a _ .
ellngit a _ tawaqa it _ alqegkagh stun _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ tawaqapig it _ .
Malghughqelluteng _ ayuqe ut _ .
pinigh llegh i llu _ , _ sungaghyug kegtagh u ut _ kayaate llegh i _ .
iknaqe llegh i _ tamaakut _ kiiwhtagh stun _ tawaten _ iqeghtagh atun _ ayuqe ut _ seqemengeltaghaghluteng _ llangaqa _ isaah- iqe aghtagh lghii stun _ .
pinigh llegh i _ tawaqa m _ .
melugyaghqagh it _ tamaakut _ qellistekagh ghhagh u ut _ .
maaten _ entaqun _ Days-O-Work-estun _ angka ut _ melugyaghqagh it _ .
kagime yug ma t _ elngaatall _ .
kuynge ngiighhagh it _ unaghsigh ghhagh t _ ulimaagh ghhagh t _ .
tamaani _ pingwaagh ghhagh inagh t _ aklungi igh llegh i _ Ivaqaankut _ tamaakut _ America-m _ angyaghpag aneng _ tukfigh i kayug t _ , _ suqagh meng _ , _ tugute meng _ kaate nghata _ tespamavek _ .
Taakuni _ Ivaqaankuni _ rice-a _ , _ pagunghangeltagh _ , _ neqekrag pig _ neghe stekaqe aat _ .
maaten _ kinguligh mi _ aklungighisqwaaghaamalghiit _ taakut _ Ivaqaankut _ .
ighnegh i _ qafsinʼguut _ .
tamaani _ sivuligh mi _ esghagh aqe yamki _ taana _ ighnegh a _ angyaleg ughtekagh _ .
kinguligh mi _ angyaleg ughtekagh _ esghagh lleg mni _ .
nukalpigaghlluggagh u uq _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ whangkutestun _ aqfaqugh te a _ , _ aqelqaghniigh aat _ tamaani _ .
Taananguftuq _ atughyuneghtupigtuut _ ungazighmii t _ .
aghnegh m _ ilangani _ atugh aqe ut _ , _ sa u a _ naghaagh llegh ke sigh _ aviite kau uq _ , _ taananguuq _ upugha te i sagh it _ atuunkuk _ igatagh gpenaamta _ kiyaghtesqelluta _ .
tawatete uq _ ungazigh _ esghagh lleg mni _ .
Pangeghlleghma _ aag llegh a
sivuligh _ puygu kanigh aqa _ ungazighte llegh ma _ ila a _ .
Ataayaghhaam _ taam _ elngaatall _ ungazigh _ taku llegh a _ liisimake a _ sivuqagh meng _ whaken _ .
tawaten _ akikanighmun _ taglagh uute ukut _ naayghagh t _ taakut _ sivuqagh meng _ aligh ite ngugh t _ qukagh itgun _ tawaten _ .
maaqellegh m _ ungazigh _ elngaatall _ elqughaghtaqeftaghput _ .
sa u uq _ four _ hours-kaghtaghput _ .
ivenruute t _ kayaalnguut _ angyaghwaagh kun _ tawani _ sivuligh mi _ .
kinguligh mi _ sukate kau ukut _ .
Three _ hours _ siipngaqaghtekaqaghput _ .
wallu _ enmis _ nuughsimasteggu _ three _ hours _ .
sivuqagh meng _ qantaghaghhantuq _ ungazigh _ imaghlluwilngughmi _ .
Tawaani _ pi kau lghiikut _ pinaghvig mi _ .
siku _ aghviqagh mun _ lliigh magh an _ .
Tespamum _ qute m _ tunganganun _ lliigh magh an _ .
Taananguuq _ ungazigh mun _ sivuligh _ pilqa _ .
kinguligh ghhagh a llu _ upuupeng _ atugh naqe aqa _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawaten _ upenghagh u magh an _ tesakmani _ angyagh yaghtugh aqe lghiinga _ sivuqagh meng _ .
Pangeghnaqlaataghtukut _ .
taakut _ tengtekat _ taglaate naqe aput _ .
taakut _ qiwaaghmii t _ taagegkut _ ellngit a _ pi ita _ nekreg te nkut _ taglaate kaqe ait _ .
taakut _ ungazighmii t _ Ataayaghhaam _ ilakwaagh ke ai _ pamanlliiqeftii _ taglaate naqe aput _ .
taawa _ taglagh laatagh ukut _ tawani _ pinaghvig m _ natangani _ upenghayaghaaluku _ tespamavek _ pi ukut _ angyaghwaagh kun _ pi laatagh ukut _ .
taawa _ Piluwuklu _ tawantuq _ , _ taawa _ taglagh ukut _ , _ taglagh ukut _ , _ tawaten _ .
naate yagh aq _ ungazigh mun _ , _ Ataayaghhaam _ liite u aqe anga _ maghyaghqughwaqegkanginkut _ .
taawanginaq _ taglamun _ maalghug gneng _ qayunglaghaqukut _ .
pi inkut _ Uuyghaam _ , _ “ _ kuynge si _ , _ tawaqa si _ iighteghnakesi _ . _ ” _ Iighteghiit _ , _ katamqun _ atughqagh ghhagh inagh teng _ sanqutkelluki _ esteg mig luki _ .
ungazighmii t _ tungsigh ghllaget _ America-m _ tawaqa aneng _ , _ melugyaghqagh aneng _ , _ kuynge aneng _ .
tawani _ angyaghugh te llghite ut _ kaate yaghtugh yalghiikut _ esnevagh ghllag laatagh ainkut _ .
kii _ mangteghagh it _ uusqagh i ma lghiit _ qavngaq _ pi yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ , _ pangeghte yuwhaagh lleg mneng _ .
whaa _ angyagh _ malleg uq _ , _ atkug yu aghte te luteng _ lliigh uute ma lghiit _ , _ angyagh _ sayuwaat _ .
Sivuqaghhmiit _ angyaghwaagh teng _ safkaagh kayugu kangit _ .
safkaagh naqe yagh ait _ , _ ruuseghmii k _ maalghug _ whaa _ sufluwalighlutek _ esnevagh aghte uk _ .
kalngagagh _ tamaghhagh an _ yuvghiighyaqmegnegu _ nusug ragh aqe luku _ .
angyagh m _ ilu a _ , _ yuvghiigh aat _ ruuseghmii k _ maalghug _ .
seghleghhalek _ , _ sa naqe lleqe inkut _ sumeghtaghagh unga _ .
taawa _ atghagh naqe nghite ukut _ sivuqagh mun _ .
taawa _ naqam _ iqlighmete u aghte uk _ , _ iigge put _ aghulate aatagh aik _ angyagh m _ imigh u ni _ .
taawa _ taglagh ukut _ .
taana _ taawa _ tukuqaqeghkegka _ , _ taana _ may- nga _ .
maaten _ tawani _ ungazigh mi _ sivuligh mi _ igaghte u nghite yaghpete uq _ .
maaten _ igaghte ngughsi ma lghii _ .
apeghtughiste ughte ma lghii _ igaghvig mi _ .
igaghvig at _ ne m _ qukaa nun _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
Katutun _ entaqun _ high _ school-etun _ angka uq _ aange pigte uq _ .
ruuseghmii t llu _ tawanteftut _ .
ruuseghmii ghllag ughte ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ elngaatall _ sufluwalgek _ , _ anagutagh leg k _ igleghte ghllagek _ quunpeng _ , _ every _ day _ igleghte ghllagek _ .
entaqun _ police-nguut _ maaten _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luta _ igaghvig mun _ atghii sqe ainkut _ .
atghagh uute ukut _ .
arekull _ neghe ste naqe ainkut _ , _ igamsiqa yug luteng _ yug t _ ungazighmii t _ taakut _ angyagh t _ taglaate llegh itneng _ , _ taagken _ .
taagken _ taake uk _ police-ek _ maalghug _ igleghte aqe lghiik _ .
ungipaate ainkut _ ungazighmii t _ .
whaten _ pi manginigh sqellug kek _ quunpeng _ .
Thrastuwi _ uyavaqaansaghngaagkenka _ .
Yugenʼnguq _ ataasigh t _ liigike gkumegteki _ taakustaghhiinaat _ yug t _ nallaqagh teng _ tuqute yaghqaqe ait _ tallimat ii ta ani _ thrastuwiinghilnguut _ .
taawa _ whangkutung _ tiiwri llu _ uyavaqaansaghngaata _ thrastuwiighaghtaqegkepung _ unguva na lutung _ igleghteghlagulghiikung _ .
taagken _ pi unga _ , _ tiiwri llu _ qiighhuskanginkung _ agha niigh yagh na lutung _ hospital-mun _ .
Hospital-elguftuq _ , _ atghagh ukung _ .
tenglugtugh lutung _ whaa _ taam _ iye ite ngugh u uq _ ayvegh ghhagh _ .
iye k _ pamavek _ esghagh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
pi inkung _ , _ “ _ sivuqagh mii u stek _ ? _ ” _ Aangʼghaghpung _ .
pi laatagh ainkung _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi stek _ ? _ ” _ Qiighmun _ agha niigh yagh u ukung _ .
“ _ aa _ , _ itegh tek _ . _ ”
akuzipig kayugu uq _ .
“ _ utaqa itek _ tawani _ Sapasly _ aqfa naqe aqa _ . _ ” _ naagu _ Sapasly _ mulu uq _ .
ivgagh luni _ pi inkung _ , _ “ _ Tagillequghnguq _ . _ ” _ muluugh uq _ tawani _ .
pi aqe ainkung _ , _ “ _ Sapasly _ nalleghiite a _ . _ ”
Hiik _ , _ ivgagh qagh uq _ tea- aghte a _ taana _ .
imani _ iqlighmete uq _ .
aapte ainkung _ .
entaqun _ taam _ ayvegh ghhagh m _ pi a _ agha niigh yagh u ni lutung _ qiighw mun _ .
taawa _ tunqugh ainkung _ aqimleghuutaghhaghqun _ imiite lutung _ .
igamsiqa yug vike luku _ aane ukung _ .
amigh k _ umegnaqngwaaghluku _ alla _ igamsiqayugviklaataghaghpung _ , _ alla _ tagi sqe ainkung _ .
Aangʼghaghpung _ .
imani _ agha it _ iknaqe ut _ .
taawa _ atuqe apung _ .
Movie-it _ igaghvig mi
taagken _ igaghvig mun _ aglagh lutung _ movie-naqniit _ .
“ _ Kinu _ , _ kinunaqunʼnguq _ . _ ” _ Sivuqaghhmiinginaanʼnguq _ kinunnaqiit _ .
sivuke luta _ neghe ste laatagh ainkut _ .
taawa _ coffee-ngit _ whaten _ coffee-mtestun _ ayuqe lghiit _ , _ taawanginaq _ grind-emangilnguut _ .
Grind-eluki _ qayugh liite ait _ .
kagimkagh it _ iguqragllaguut _ kaagtughluki _ , _ kagimlluki _ akume kaqe ait _ .
tawaten _ whangkutestun _ neqekrag it _ , _ taawanginaq _ yeast-amnneng _ whangkuta _ ghhuughneghtaaghatut _ .
ategh ai _ eghllipa _ .
tamaakut _ para ligh luteng _ neqnighllawaaghuut _ .
ayghigh te yagh ke put _ , _ para kun _ jam-eighluki _ neghe uute ukut _ , _ qayugh te ukut _ .
ruuseghmii neng _ tukfigh aqe ait _ .
Utataawetem _ tawani _ ungipamsug te ainkut _ movie-m _ sivungagh ni _ .
nani _ ugriilegh mi _ igaghyagh luteng _ , _ igagh te luteng _ aanleghaate luteng _ , _ kiiw u uk nguq _ , _ aga _ mangteghagh t _ inglunganilnguut _ nayigh at _ .
ruuseghmii t _ taawkegkut _ apeghtughiste t _ inglu ani _ .
aghvigh uute ma lghiit _ piyug meng _ .
Iiwenʼnguq _ kiiw gnun _ qukaghite naqe aqe ut _ , _ uka nguq _ qikmigh igh ghllag _ .
piyaqmegteggu _ aange ghllag _ uwighsaghsugnighllak _ .
uteghmun _ igaghvig mun _ , _ qiighnite aqe luteng _ sikwaaghaghmi _ tamaani _ , _ ila teng _ ngiigte aqe luki _ alingruugh te m _ qimagugh te ma lghiit _ , _ aaghwaaghaqluteng _ .
uugte qaghte luteng _ apeghtughiste mun _ tawavek _ , _ apeghtughiste mun _ itegh luteng _ tenglugtugh luku _ pi ma kangat _ kayusiisqelluteng _ .
pi ma kangat _ , _ “ _ qikmigh igh ghllag _ inga _ uwighsaghsugnighllawaaghuuq _ . _ ”
ruuseghmii m _ taam _ qineghte luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ qikmigh u nghite uq _ kuuni u uq _ ugighhe yiite uq _ . _ ”
Elngaatallnguq _ nenglaqsaqminiki _ , _ nenglaatunʼnguq _ .
Nutaanʼnguq _ ellngit _ esghaate lghiit _ , _ ellngit _ ungazighmii t _ tamaaken _ kuuni meng _ .
taagken _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ .
Anʼgiisimaluki _ igaghvig m _ manughagh ani _ , _ melugutaqunʼnguq _ maghhuurka meng _ , _ melug te ma luki nguq _ , _ uglaghtunʼnguq _ aqume uute luteng _ ila i _ .
Qikmighaghhaghnguq _ melqupagraag ghhagh _ tagi uq _ naken _ tamaaken _ .
ila ni _ pi ma kangi _ Utataawetem _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ una _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ ellnga llu _ melug yug uq _ . _ ” _ taagken _ kuynge ni _ melug luku _ agepsughtaaghqeghllagluku _ , _ tugu luku _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ , _ qengagh kek _ mellu lukek _ qaangha _ , _ qaanghakun _ suupe ma kanga _ qengagh kek _ mellu lukek _ nuqnegh luku _ .
Leganʼnguq _ pegte a _ qengagh gmikun _ agepsughtaaghumaghmi _ melug lghii stun _ .
qikmighagh ghhagh _ tamaani _ igleghqurghalghii _ , _ qenwanʼnguq _ ullegh aghte uq _ .
nenglagh qu ma kangat _ tuqwaalghi _ qikmighagh ghhagh _ taana _ .
taawa nguq _ nekeve luni _ aga _ navek _ aghulaqe uq _ , _ piniighte luni _ .
Taam _ ungipamsug qu a _ Utataawetem _ .
Taananginaghhaaghsimalghii _ Utataawen _ maaten _ ungazighte lleg mni _ kinguligh mi _ .
tawani _ siivanllegh _ tamaa na _ entaqun _ tuqu laghate te ma ni luku _ .
amen _ qellinegh lgu uq _ , _ elngaatall _ siivanllegh _ tamaa na _ aarragh te ste luku _ .
tanqigh t _ naangenghata _ siivanllegh ghhagh inagh t _ meghsi aqe ait _ kelengake luki _ tawaten _ guard-tetuftut _ .
ungazigh _ suulya ghllag ughte ma lghii _ tamaani _ kelenganaghqwaamakanga _ .
taagken _ movie-lluta _ , _ nagnegh uq _ may- nga _ apeghtuqagh ni _ esghapagesqelluki _ .
taana _ Qaghluuyam _ ighnegh ke a _ maghyaghqughtekluku _ elngaatall _ qiifqaghtamsuwaaghusalghiimeng _ iigge teng _ pateg te aghte aqe luki _ .
Juice-mengwha _ tagite ainkut _ tamaaken _ ruuseghmii m _ aghnagh m _ saam _ , _ meghaatagh meng _ .
upugha ghllaget _ upugha ma ghllag t _ , _ ruuseghmii t _ apeghtughiste t _ .
iyatagh ste gpenaamta _ igagh te nghmeng _ taaqenghani _ .

June-mi _ paninang _ tawani _ igagh te aqe ut _ .
tuqlughaasigh _ kavite ngughk _ sayuwaqaat _ , _ lengaaghuute aqe a _ .
igaghyagh _ uglaapigteftuuq _ .
igaghvig at _ aange ghllag uq _ .
Qafsinʼguniikaat _ sixteen-nguniiqaat _ apeghtughiste at _ .
Kiyaghtaallghem _ Allangughnegha
Lighthouse-elguftut _ .
Lighthouse-a _ aliite aqe lghii _ sivuqagh meng llu _ entaqun _ .
maaken llu _ akisqaghte te aqe uq _ , _ uusqagh pigte uq _ .
qateghrakegtagh meng _ piineqe luni _ pikanteftuq _ uziveketaaghet _ .
Estamagyaguftut _ akisqaghte ta i _ .
yupig meng _ kelengakistelguftut _ family-t _ .
atghagh yaghqaa nghite ngugh u kut _ taanʼgavek _ Sivuqaghhmiini _ .
Taakunguftut _ angyaghtengit _ eight-nguftut _ ungazigh m _ taakustaghhiinaat _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ angyagh ut _ pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg _ angyagh _ .
Hour-a _ kaate negh ghhagh ni _ taam _ umiileg m _ kingu m _ , _ Mayor-ngan _ , _ umiileg an _ ungazigh m _ qelegh aqe ai _ hour-a _ kaate ni luku _ angyaghuutesqelluki _ .
taawa _ anuqataghagh u ghngaan _ angyaghugh te aqe ut _ .
esla _ seghleghu aqe lghii _ uteghnigh aqe ut _ sa ngunateng _ .
Ivaqaankunun _ tawavek _ , _ iglinegha _ estuwaaghsimalghii _ .
aklungi igh llegh ke a _ ungazigh m _ .
aklungi igh lleg liite ma kangi _ taakut _ Ivaqaam _ avaquti a _ .
kete te yu ke aq _ taana _ estuwaaftuq _ , _ taana _ naligh _ ighnegh a _ angu u uq _ ama _ saste u uq _ .
taana _ Pikesaq _ angyaleg _ kayaalqe i i ma lghii _ upenghagh mi _ ataasigh mi _ one _ thousand _ dollars _ ( _ one _ thousand _ ruble _ ) _ .
angyaghniigh llegh m _ teghig ke sagh _ unakelgha _ 80 _ maklagte yaghqaa yaghpete ut _ , _ 100 _ ayvegh _ , _ 60 _ neghsagh _ .
Taakunginaat _ Pikesaankut _ tungqaghaghte ma kangat _ unangniigh llegh _ .
taawa _ one _ thousand _ ruble-meng _ money-meng _ win-emakangat _ .
manughagh at _ qepghaghteghllaguftut _ .
angtughpag ghllag t _ iingunagh ita _ amiiqilaghluki _ uqiigh ma aqe kangit _ .
taghyugh ligh luki _ entaqun _ angyaghpag tgun _ taakmavek _ aghvigh te ma aqe ait _ .
ungazigh _ tawani _ kinguligh mi _ mangunatugh niigh te ma lghii _ .
Eslequunkugneng _ , _ kemekragenkugneng _ .
tukfigh luku _ lliigh ma kangat _ neqseng _ , _ ellmeng _ siqluwaqsaghngaaghmegteggu _ .
taawa _ igaghvig m _ kelutangani _ apegh kausigh naagh qu ghllagek _ .
aghnagh t _ siqluwameggnun _ siqluwaghquluteng _ , _ sagnegh teng _ imigh luki _ tawavek _ apegh kau sigh gnun _ aglagh luteng _ , _ apegh qagh luki _ taglaate luki _ neqe teng _ , _ estuwamun _ llivike yaghtugh aqe ait _ neqe t _ taakut _ taglaatekagh teng _ .
Estuwaanun _ pi unga _ , _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ estuwaghpigaa _ .
taagken _ tukfigh i luteng _ ware _ house-enganun _ aqfate aqe ut _ , _ ware _ house-enga _ esghagh yaghtigh sqe aat _ , _ ware _ house-eghnaaqughllaak _ inglu a _ saghya ghllag u uq _ , _ inglu a _ taagna _ nanaagh _ , _ amu a _ , _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ megh llegh ke uq _ , _ agaghte uute luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
kaviipig _ , _ silver _ fox _ , _ sangusiq _ amiiragh _ , _ beaver-a _ amiiragh _ , _ neghsagh m _ amiira _ taagantuteftuq _ aki at _ akikekagh at _ .
taawa _ neqekranglaghvilguftut _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawani _ neqekrangllagh vig itnun _ gaagh vig u uq _ .
Aantunguftuq _ yupig _ , _ akuzi kayug _ whangkutestun _ , _ half _ breed-a _ ruuseghmiig igh a _ , _ upugha negh ghllag _ ama _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaaghhan _ neqekrangllagh ghllagu uq _ , _ estuwaghmeggnun _ , _ eghllipameng _ tamaaken _ .
aghneghmi _ Ivaqaankut _ taakut _ , _ Ivaqaam _ panig a _ neqekrangllaghte u uq _ aghneghmi _ .
Unugmi _ taana _ Aantu _ , _ Aantunguftuq _ yuggagh _ half _ breed _ Ruuseghmi _ whangkutestun _ akuzi kayug _ .
uugte neghtu yaghpete uq _ mekelghiigh u luni _ America-m _ angyaghpag akun _ akmavek _ Seattle-mun _ .
taana llu _ Piigla _ ungipamsug uq _ sivuligh mi _ tawani _ pangeghte lleg mni _ .
Seattle-mi _ uksughtekau uq _ ategh a _ Piiglanguftuq _ , _ nenglataalghii _ yuggagh _ .
ategh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ .
taakut _ tukuqekagh nka _ , _ may- ngam _ ata ke a _ sivuligh mi _ pista u yagh uq _ , _ kinguligh mi _ ruuseghmii t _ pillghat _ , _ pista u nanigh ma lghii _ .
ruuseghmii ni _ qilghaghnaaftuq _ , _ kaynguunaaftuq _ pi sta _ ategh u luni _ , _ ategh a _ simigh ma kangat _ Qerngughtekaghmeng _ .
qerngughtekau aghte ma lghii _ .
kiiste i vig _ Tukalegaghvigmi
Dance-evilguftuq _ , _ dance-evigitnun _ pi yalghiinga _ kiiste i vig _ tesqamanllaataghpetuq _ .
nukalpigagh _ taana _ 20 _ years _ igaghyagh luni _ uteghnigh aqe uq _ Leningrad-meng _ .
elngaatall _ apeghtugh i aqe uq _ guitar-emeng _ , _ violin-emeng _ , _ nengtaatagh meng _ .
elngaatall _ aghnagh aqe te luni _ seghleghllug u ut _ , _ guitaremaghmeng _ , _ violin-emaghmeng _ , _ accordian-emaghmeng _ .
kiiste i vig _ taana _ taku kestagh aa _ mekelghiigh m _ qamaten _ .
Dance-esqelluku _ ellnga llu _ , _ ataasigh t _ aatqaghte aqe lghiit _ .
sivungigh luku _ ketngig ni _ itegagh ni _ keveg luki _ ketngiggiinaagni _ tuute lukek _ papereghtitaa _ .
kiiste i vig _ nekefqaghte uq _ .
kiiste i vig _ tusiigaghllagulghii _ nekefqaghte magh mi _ aga _ nalug qagh te luni _ aragh kau magh mi _ aga _ ellngistun _ iigge ni _ qukagh mikun _ whaten _ inglugtun _ piwhaniiqluki _ leganqun _ napaqagh _ taana _ uziveaghaghte aqe luku _ sighla ghllag _ .
elngaatall _ aragh aat _ , _ aatqaghte vike aqe aat _ legan _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ mekelghiigh t _ kipullginaalluku _ , _ araghqagh ii aagh _ kiiste i vig _ .
Araghqinaqsami _ , _ sa u a _ ungazighmii _ mekelghiigh _ taku kestagh aa _ , _ tawaten _ dance-emaghmi _ iigge ni _ qukagh mikun _ inglugtun _ nekegte luki _ , _ taawa _ legan _ ellngistun _ ruuseghmii stun _ ketngig ni _ napaghte luku _ aga _ itegagh mineng _ aga _ papasqitagh vike a _ , _ aga _ nekefqaghte sta _ .
nalug kau te aghte magh mi _ elngaatall _ sighla te ut _ .
naange niite anga _ Pangeghlleghma
taagken _ navek _ pi laatagh ukut _ .
tawaten _ iiwen _ dance-evigmeng _ taglagh aqe ukut _ angyaghyag ni luteng _ , _ pi yalghiikut _ uughqa neng _ angyaghyag aqe ut _ .
upugha te ait _ , _ tawaten _ maakumiu stun _ upleg te ghllag aqe kangit _ quya ke m _ elngaatall _ .
qiteve ma u ut _ , _ akuzipig meng _ aghsaan _ ayuqe ut _ , _ iitek _ akuzi msiigh aqe ut _ .
Taakunguftut _ tengtekat _ qiwaa neng _ .
avate meng _ pi u ut _ , _ qiwaaghmii t _ taakut _ esghaghkagh nka _ sivuqagh mi _ tengtekat _ .
taana _ Ngepenkawaawetnguftuq _ ataasigh _ liigike aqa _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ akuzi msiigh qagh yu k _ , _ Gutgugyi _ .
Gutgugyinkuk _ , _ Gulgugyinkuk _ taake uk _ anglegute ke te lghiik _ .
Piluwugem _ liisimakngwaaghii _ taakut _ Gulgugyinkut _ , _ Gutgugyinkut _ , _ piinliite nkut _ , _ whanga llu _ esghagh kaqe anka _ taakut _ tengtekat _ .
taana _ akuzipigpag igate ngughk _ Ngepenkawaawen _ , _ kiyang _ qiteve ghllagu ut _ .
nagate lghii ni _ qitevet _ tamaakut _ liite nagh ut _ , _ liigike nagh aqe ut _ .
Taam _ tukugh ma _ may- ngam _ apeghtugh aqe kanganga _ .
ruuseghmii stun llu _ qitevmengllu _ .
Aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ ighivgaghmi _ ungipamsug te aqe aanga _ .
taakut _ Ataayaghhaam _ pillgilliqe tke vzigh ai _ suqagh t _ ugriilegh mun _ akikesaghtugh stekagh i _ , _ mayor-ngakun _ , _ umiileg akun _ ungazigh m _ .
tugu vzigh aat _ Ataayaghhaq _ , _ iwernga _ peglleghqute ma kangat _ .
atghagh naqe ghngaamta _ piniighte ghngaan _ wiin _ nuqnegh ainkut _ .
Ataayaghhaq _ apeghiigh na luku _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ igagh _ , _ tespamum _ ungazigh m _ igagh a _ , _ quyngigh m _ amu i _ atghagh te yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sa u a llu _ tamaa na _ ila a _ .
atghagh naqe yamta _ , _ sivuke luku _ taana _ wiin _ , _ atg- ghhagh _ pi vagilgan _ , _ taana _ ugriilegh mun _ kingu u uq _ mayor-nga _ ungazigh m _ Ataayaghhaam _ suqameng _ akilpegagh yaghkagh _ veghute ait _ suqi a _ pi naqe nghite ait _ .
taagken _ atghagh ukut _ .
ESTAMAA
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i
Singaaweteghllagem _ Ungipamsuwa
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
neghigh luku _ aghnagh ghllag _ taana _ Singaaweteghllaguftuq _ ategh a _ , _ Pilugugenkuniteftuq _ sivungagh mi _ .
taakut _ pilugug m _ avaquti a _ aflengake ghllagu ai _ .
quunpeng _ anʼgighaqelghiit _ .
esnagh mun _ tawaten _ alla _ pi yalghiikut _ kana _ tekeghagh ani _ anʼgighaqeftut _ .
tagsigh luta _ aglagh uute yamta _ ungipamsug te ainkut _ .
qenaagh kun _ aqume uute luta _ whangkuta _ nagasaqefut _ nunanigh ghllag _ .
pi yalghiimi _ , _ ellnginʼnguq _ sivuke luteng _ sivungagh mi _ kiyaghte yuwhaagh kau ut _ salin _ taakwna _ paaghqite luku _ .
Neghsaghllaguyaghpetughnguq _ qazigyagh meng _ neli yuwhaagh aqngameng _ .
Repallnguq _ afta vig ngllagh luteng _ pi kau ut _ quug meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ .
qayughllak nguq _ unaghsigh ghllag u yaghpete uq _ tamaa na _ .
ellnga nge uq _ taana _ quunpeng _ piyuggaghmeng _ sivugh qaghte aqe lghii _ , _ akmag aatagh luni _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
taakwna nguq _ maaten _ nalugvig ughtekagh _ naayvagh ghrugllag u yagh uq _ kiiw m _ esne aneng _ kenle ke luni _ .
piyug nghmini nguq _ kiiw m _ esne akun _ tagi aqe lghii _ .
tekeghagh a nguq _ taana _ pengugrakegsaghtuq _ mingle a llu _ iggagrukegsaghpetuq _ .
Iiwhlakayuguyaghtughnguq _ kanaverugllak _ repall _ talughte luni _ .
iinghusaleg u uq _ wataghllak _ iiwhlanghani _ taanʼgavek _ ategh yaqunaki _ pi sqe lleg leg _ , _ uleve qaghtekayugu ni luku _ sukate pigte luni _ .
Ayumighnguq _ taghnughhagh lghute _ tuqu laghate te kau uq _ iiwhlagmi _ uleve qaghte te luki _ .
ilangani _ tawaten _ ellngit _ neqangisag ma lghiit _ , _ iyataghnagh iqe ma lghiit _ .
talwa nguq _ tawani _ tepagh isag ghllag _ , _ elqwaagh isag ghllag _ .
elngaatall nguq _ quunpeng _ esnighqwagh aqe lghii _ taana _ Singaaweteghllak _ .
sa meng _ naalkute na luni _ elqwaagh ghhagh meng _ .
atgenra _ ava isag ghllag _ .
alla _ unaangu pigte luku _ esnighqwagh luni _ pi yalghiimi nguq _ tekeghagh a _ , _ teskana nguq _ , _ iiwhlagluni _ unʼgaverugllak _ ayuqe uq _ .
Unʼgallunguq _ elqwaaghtu uq _ qiliigh nagh _ , _ enraq _ iinghusaleg u lghii _ .
saama llu _ enraq _ ellnginaghhaalghii _ taanʼgavek _ atg- ghhaghte yu ghngaaghmi _ .
aqume luni _ taanʼgavek _ ayuqe luni _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ aqumtaaghngaaghmi _ paaghqilngughmi _ , _ pama _ kelutanganeng _ kafsagtagh ma lghii _ .
Qiivyaqminigu _ taawa _ temngi _ nuna meng _ amigh k _ qelpaghmi _ , _ ava isag lghii _ .
Aghnasqughhwaghnguq _ aane aqe uq _ qalipaakaghlluni _ , _ nuna meng _ ghhataghngaghmi _ .
naten _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh nghminikek nguq _ ellnga nge uq _ legan _ nunakiighwaghaqelghii _ , _ sa aqe lghii _ kayaali inagh aqe lghii _ .
elngaatall _ qevuute luni _ ellpeknganaqaqelghii _ sanayukangatni _ .
naqam nguq _ , _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtaghnaninghegkeni _ ava iitagh ke luni _ .
Leganʼnguq _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ kafsagtagh aqe ak _ ellnga _ uniigh naqe aqe lghii _ , _ qevuute pigte luni _ iwernga _ esteqe aqe lghii _ , _ teghhumanaqaqelghii _ wata _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kii _ aghnagh ghllag mi _ whani _ , _ aghtugh amken _ seghlegh ghllag u uten _ elngaatall _ iknaqe uten _ .
whanga _ aane vike amken _ kayusigh nagh u luten _ neqangisag lghiisi _ .
enta _ tawani _ utaqiigi _ unʼgavek _ saghna yagh te naqe amken _ . _ ”
naagu nguq _ legan _ aga _ atghagh uq _ taanʼgavek _ talugh qaghte luni _ qalmesagh t _ awata itnun _ .
naqamllu _ mulupag gpenani _ uka nguq _ aliigh uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi nguq _ kenigh ghhagh ni _ imigh ghllag luku _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ kenigh ghhagh n _ . _ ” _ key- nghmini _ aghnasqughhwaam _ kenigh anun _ katag ma kangi _ .
Esghaghyaqminiki _ , _ elqwaagh _ , _ tepe aq _ , _ uupa _ allaaghiinaq _ .
llaaghanwha nguq _ neghekagh t _ .
siingenllu nguq _ pillghughulluki _ neqengekagh t _ .
tawaten _ ungipamsug ma luku _ tagitug ghrug mi _ aglu k _ allgegh uk _ .
pi inkut _ whaa _ , _ “ _ esghapag tekek _ aglu k _ ayemnnaqagka _ . _ ”

ayvegh m _ aglu kek _ tamaaken _ tugu lukek _ napaghte ak _ .
taagken _ tazingapighqaaghluni _ uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ aglu k _ milughyaqminikek _ unake lukek _ aglu k _ ayemkaghagh ak _ .
aga llu _ aglu k _ akuuraate lutek _ aglu m _ qukagh kek _ gheve uk _ .
suna _ aragh qrug a _ , _ “ _ Aagluk _ ayemtagkaa _ . _ ”

Ayumighnguq _ ellngit _ tawaten _ naghaaqayudet _ .
akuuraate lutek nguq _ aglu k _ gheve aqe lghiik _ llaaghan _ .
Taananguuq _ taawa _ Singaaweteghllagem _ ungipamsug a _ .
talwa _ salin _ quyngighqwaagh t _ neli llghite luki _ .
ellngit a nguq _ sivu nge aq _ neli yuwhaagh kaqe aat _ .
Kuugʼghegkenka _ Mayukaankuk _ , _ Amagunkuk _ , _ Piinteghlam _ ighnegh kek _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ Gugiingem _ kasivag te llegh a _ nanugh meng
puughhute m _ apegh llegh a
ungipamsug _ ayumigh _ yuggagh _ pugughileghmii _ Gugiingen _ , _ nanevgagh ghhagh ughte magh mi _ .
sukate yagh lghii _ , _ iknaqe yagh lghii _ nukalpigagh u luni _ .
nanevgagh luni _ sa nanigh magh mi _ , _ temngi _ esnagh mun _ ukig qagh luni _ siku gnun _ kanavengiighhaq _ pi yagh luni _ analghu ghllag t _ awata itni _ nanugh ghllag nkuk _ kasivag tke ak _ .
Nanuunʼnguq _ tamaakut _ kasivag lghii ni _ sughug i kayugu ut _ qimag igate ngugh t _ .
legan _ sughukagh a _ uka _ .
aatak _ mayugh aghtekagh _ analghu nun _ .
sa ite ngughk _ sanqute ite ngughk _ iwerngaqun _ saviggani _ tafsimig ke luku _ .
qaygeghte qaghte luni _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ , _ uka _ legan _ nagnegh aqe uq _ nanugh ghllag _ .
aatakqun _ temngi _ saviggani _ amaaghaghte luku _ qule mun _ nengug te luku _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ , _ whaken _ pi lleqe amken _ ! _ ”
kii _ , _ nanugh ghllag nguq _ tukegh aghte ghllag luni _ leganʼnguq _ aga _ siigte ghllag magh mi _ kete mun _ pakegte ma lghii _ .
pelleghmun _ anagniigh utu te ma lghiik _ .
ellnga _ qule mun _ pamavek _ key- llegh kaghte i yaghtugh aghtekagh _ .
pugughilegh _ uusqagh lghii _ pamanlenguq _ nenge aat _ .
iwernga nguq _ nani _ kananingiighhaq _ tuqu tke aat _ malighqagh luku _ .
qilag m _ taghnughhagh a
Mekeneghsim _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ pagaliit _ aghnaqe kangat _ , _ pagaliit _ entaqun _ ungipaghagh itneng _ , _ angayuqagh mineng _ ungipagh aq _ entaqun _ liite qugh kaqe kangi _ .
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ nenge uq _ tamaa na _ tanemleqa _ umiileg leg _ .
umiileg a _ nuna m _ tamaatum _ tallimaneng _ panig leg _ .
Uksaaghunneghistenguq _ aghnaghagh t _ pagunghagh eng _ pi aqe kangat _ .
elngaatall _ inghuyiqutaqelghiit _ .
Tawatenʼnguq _ inghuyaneng _ kaate nghata _ naa ita _ pikegken _ aakagh itneng _ inghu sightu ait _ nivughteghaqegkangi _ .
alla _ tawaten _ ayumiqullegh _ pi luni _ , _ pagunghagh _ saghna yaghqaaghte luni _ inghu yagh llegh mi _ tawaten _ inghu ghngaaghmeng _ uyuqlighpigaam _ nanigh ke aagh _ anglegute mineng _ sanivaghqaaghluni _ taghnughhagh _ nagaqughwaa _ qiya lghii _ .
ighninghhagh _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ elngaatall _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqe luku _ qiya llegh akun _ taakwavek _ pi luni _ kaasaqminigu _ taghnughhagh _ ighninghhagh _ mekelghiighaaftughnguq _ .
elngaatall _ aneghrengitkemmeng _ tugu luku _ niivusghaminun _ kanagh a _ .
Kuugʼghilnguut _ whaa _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ seghleghhalek _ angayuqagh gkenka _ quyake naqe ak _ kuugʼghilnguut _ .
taagken _ uteghnigh uute luteng _ tawaten _ emta _ naa ita _ almesigh ghhagh mitun _ aakagh itneng _ whaken _ inghukegkiit _ nivugh kangi _ .
Uyuqlighpigaam _ inghu sightu a _ katagyaqminigu _ kii _ , _ aga _ sa u a _ ifkagh uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ taghnughhagh _ enraq llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u uq _ .
ii _ , _ quyake naqe na iqe a _ aghnaghagh m _ piyaqminigu _ , _ tengvimun _ , _ kipullegmun _ , _ naa an _ piyaqminigu _ .
“ _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ seghleghhalek _ waran _ ata n _ , _ ugwika _ nuna m _ matum _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kagu _ .
Sakusiiqnaqlluumaftan _ elngaatall _ .
yug ngunang _ aqsanguma ziin _ qavngaq _ . _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ ungipaate ghngaatni _ aygughike a _ , _ yug ngunani _ aqsa nge sta _ legan _ .
Ugwini _ nani _ qaga _ yug ni _ qerngughtaaghullghiit _ .
itegh yan _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ yug mi _ whani _ , _ panig gpek _ kayngusaghaatesnaqlughaaten _ sakusiiqnaqlughwaaten _ .
waran _ nuna m _ qagugh m _ umiileg ke nghite yagh kangaten _ . _ ”

“ _ saa _ , _ sangama _ ? _ ”
“ _ esghaqagh ghhu qun _ taana _ taghnughhagh _ . _ ”

yuug _ sumeghtaghagh qagh luni _ , _ “ _ naken _ pi a _ ? _ ”
“ _ entaqun _ esgha _ yug ngunani _ aqsanguma uq _ . _ ”
yuug _ iisqiighute luni _ panig ni _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Whaannaanghituten _ , _ aane ste naqe amken _ , _ qagavek _ lliigh naqe uten _ .
nunalgute mnun _ qagavek _ talwa _ kinku nun _ itegh snaanghite amken _ , _ liilightugh te naqe amken _ , _ tesqagavek _ temngi _ lliigh naqe uten _ . _ ” _ taawa _ aanesimakanga _ .
nunalgute m _ nanglleg yagute ghngaaghmigu _ qayughllak _ pi ligu _ umiileg m _ iinghute kanga _ .
taawa _ tesqagavek _ lliigh uq _ .
uksaaqestagh ma kanga _ , _ kumlaluni _ aqlaghaghte a _ , _ kumlate a _ .
Ighivgaghmi _ tawaten _ tanqighllugllaak _ , _ taghnughhagh a nguq _ qiya ghllag _ .
sa meng _ tesqagani _ azigutagh ngllagh vyiigh luni _ kiyaghte aagh _ .
wata _ aqlaghaghtekanga _ kumlakanga _ .
Tawatenʼnguq _ uteghpaarkitaagh te aqe a _ .
qenwat _ mengilegyagute luku _ pi aqe a _ , _ “ _ taghnughhagh mi _ whani _ nanglleg ke gpenanga _ qiyaaqe ai _ , _ piyaqnagh te _ whanga _ lli aghte lunga _ . _ ”
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ hiik _ , _ tanqigh _ mamlegpag u uute uq _ .
tawaten _ uteghpaarkitaagh ghngaaghmi _ me m _ tunutanganeng _ , _ “ _ kii _ aghnaghagh mi _ whanii _ , _ nafughnaghquten _ ellngaatall _ , _ aqfa aqe amken _ .
wasaq _ whanga _ angayuqagh gken _ nanglegyagullukek _ , _ nanglleg ke lukek _ ava ite ngugh k _ ighnegh ite ngugh k _ , _ elpegun _ tuune kaqsagh agka _ ighneghqagh meng _ .
tea- ai _ maligte nga _ aqfa aqe amken _ . _ ”

piyaqminigu _ yuug _ , _ qateghrakegtepiglleghiimeng _ , _ qateghrakegtagh meng _ aatkagh leg _ .
Qimugsiiftughnguq _ , _ qikmigh a _ qateghrakegteperuwaaghet _ qamagte luteng _ .
“ _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ taghnughhite gnun _ tawavek _ . _ ”
mayugh te a nguq _ , _ mayugh te a _ . _ ( _ uyatu pigte ma a _ pamavek _ qilag mun _ . _ )
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ aghnagh aq _ meqsug uq _ .
salug naqe uq _ meqsugem _ ikfiqe sta _ .
yug m _ akuzite aqe yagh kanga _ , _ “ _ seghleghhalek _ kaate yaghtugh ukung _ , _ kaate kuvek _ meghe lleqe uten _ . _ ” _ seghleghhalek _ sakniqe uq _ salug naqe uq _ .
qenwat _ yug m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ aa-a _ , _ tawani _ utaqa i ai _ meghqe te qagh naqe amken _ .
Wataghllagngaam _ puughtesaqunang _ .
taawa _ puughtesimakuvek _ qayughllak qun _ elpek _ pilqegken _ taawa _ ifla lleqe uten _ . _ ” _ naagu _ aghulaqe uq _ .
legan _ aghulaqe luni _ mulughpagluni _ me m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ ukavek _ qiive aghten _ , _ esghaqagh nga qun _ .
aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ . _ ” _ ii _ , _ iike na ghhalek _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ quwayuwigataghhaghmeng _ elngaatall _ .
Waranʼngam _ taawa _ qiive aghte ait _ . _ ”
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ nuqete yagh luni _ qiive uq _ .
piyaqminigu _ kaay _ , _ tagneqgalek _ qallevag kek _ ngevreghagte lutek _ .
“ _ aatkagh pung _ naavghute ltegneki _ , _ ukut _ aatkagh nka _ esghaqagh ki qun _ pi nigh ghllag t _ elngaatall _ . _ ”

“ _ yaghlegillu _ ineghtengngwaaqaqsaghaanga _ wataghllak _ kitumun _ puughnayukanganga _ . _ ”

“ _ elngaatall _ puughte aaten _ taagum _ yug m _ .
pi naanghite uten _ , _ naten _ pi naanghite uten _ . _ ” _ qinu na ghhalek _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ aaghte ste laatagh uq _ .
legan _ qallevag gni _ mat- aghte lukek _ ellnga n _ qallevag kek _ taake uk _ aate ak _ , _ melngu u luni _ qamiye m _ ingleghagh an _ akulangakun _ ifkagh uq _ .
taawa _ aghnagh _ taana _ ellnga _ , _ aatkagh i _ aate luki _ taghnughhite gnun _ itegh uq _ .
Mulughpagllagluni _ pama _ yuug _ uteghnigh uq _ .
aapte a _ , _ “ _ naagu _ qaame na a _ , _ saluwaaghtuten _ ? _ ”

“ _ yaghlegillu _ utaqa i aqe unga _ ! _ ” _ aghnagh m _ puughte a _ .
aghnagh aq _ sa luni _ pi li _ sama _ melngu ughte luni _ , _ akuzi na luni _ pi yagh uq _ , _ temngi _ legan _ aneghte ghllag uq _ .
naagu _ aga _ unite luku _ igleghte uq _ .
yug m _ liigike a _ , _ liigike ghngaaghmiki _ igleghte uq _ .
taawa _ space-mi _ entaqun _ nani _ tespagani _ kiyaghte uq _ taana _ melngu ughte luni _ .
tawaten _ tagtalmi _ tungtunʼnguq _ uka _ tagi aqe ut _ qerngaghneghet _ .
amig igh te naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ , _ aklu i uute naqutke aqe yaghtugh ngugh _ ima nguq _ aga _ alpag aqe ut _ kaate ste gpenateng _ , _ suka ite ngughk _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tawaten _ alla _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ ukanterugpagllagluki _ ima _ sivu kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te naqutke uq _ .
sivuligh t _ qenwat _ aga _ , _ qenwat _ naghughte ut _ .
( _ taana _ pegte aghte luku _ tespamavek _ lliigh naqe unga _ . _ )
taghnughhagh _ qiyaghllaak _ , _ yug m _ liigike ghngaaghmigu _ .
navek _ pi luni _ kaate nghmini _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ “ _ sa aqe ziin mi _ naqam _ aviillegh mni _ ? _ ”
“ _ Sasqellunga _ pi aqe zinga _ kaki aqe lghiinga _ , _ wangi aqe lghiinga _ , _ tekegh ngllagh aqe lghiinga _ . _ ” _ taawa _ yug m _ nepiigh te aqe kanga _ .
( _ taagken _ taawa _ tawavek _ uteghte unga _ ) _ .
aghnagh aq _ taana _ tungtu t _ uka _ tagi yata _ , _ sivutghulluki _ elngaatall _ tume kaghqagh itnun _ amig igh te ragkiigh uq _ .
kii _ , _ sivuligh t _ aga _ naghughte uute ut _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh m _ nalighnegh akun _ agtugh qagh aa _ legan _ , _ qallevag kek _ quupaghsaqminikek _ , _ aghnagh _ qallevag mineng _ aane yalghiimi _ , _ aghnagh _ legan _ matagh mi _ tawaten _ .
taawa _ tawaten _ kiyaghte uq _ .
tagtalmi _ yug m _ aatkagh meng _ kelqe te luku _ ivagh yaghtugh aa _ .
taawa _ naalke ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kii _ aghnagh mi _ whanii _ taamengwha _ tawaten _ kiyaghtaaghaquten _ , _ pineghllug pigu ma ziin _ elngaatall _ .
naagu _ liilightughwaaghyaqemken _ wataghllak _ puughte ste gpenang _ pisqelluten _ . _ ”
“ _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ taglaate naqe amken _ .
kaate kuma _ tespamavek _ tuungliiyugsaqunang _ wataghllak _ pi lghaaten _ . _ ”
mayugh te luku _ kaat ute a _ , _ legan _ itegh uq _ kii _ , _ taghnughaan _ quyake magh an _ taku luku _ qetlleghaataghaa _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ kiyaghte luteng _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ taana _ aghnagh _ .
Puughtisteni _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ , _ qavagh ngllagh aa _ .
qavagh ste a _ kenghek _ kumaghllug kek _ .
qavagh ngllagh luku _ tagtalmi _ takuyangllagh aqe luku _ , _ aghnagh _ teghtugh nanigh uq _ qavagh uq _ .
taana _ puughte i ste nga _ aghnagh _ .
taagken _ qavagh yan _ , _ keveg luku _ kenghegnun _ tazingavek _ aglagh te kestagh aa _ .
Kenghegnun _ miluute a _ , _ yug m _ taam _ mayugh te ikagh m _ .
taagken _ aga _ aviilghwastun _ ukikagh _ kenghegnekun _ taaggun _ .
taana ta _ ungipagh aq _ tawatelnguq _ , _ kiyaghnegh nkuk _ Satan-enkuk _ .
taake uk _ esgha _ ungipaghaate k _ .
kiyaghnegh ghllag m _ ighnegh ni _ nuna mun _ whavek _ tuune kaqsagh kanga _ .
nuna m _ yug an _ tugukligh ma ite kanga _ .
Tawatelnguq _ kiyaghnegh m _ satan _ taana _ asitmun _ egtekaqe kanga _ .
ungipaghagh mta _ title- nga ta _ taana _ .
paninang _ akeqe luku _ kenegh mun _ anusimingllagh yaghqaqe kanga _ .
taana ta _ ungipaghagh an _ yug lgute mnun _ ungipaghaatkesuwaqegkegka _ .
Naghuyangughtekaq
Mekeneghsim _ apegh llegh a
taane a _ tanemlleqa _ Imingatem _ ungipamsug kaqe kanga _ .
( _ aagna _ paniggaqa _ whanga _ Naghuya _ . _ pugughilegh llu _ naghuyagh lgu lghii _ . _ )
naghuyagh m _ taam _ atiiqeluugutanga _ , _ Naawyanguyaghtughnguq _ yug m _ ategh a _ taana _ .
iike te luteng _ entaqun _ pugughileghmii t _ ighnegh ke te lghiit _ .
taawa _ naghuyagh m _ taam _ , _ kiyaghtaalleghllagem _ entaqun _ kayusillegh _ tuunyaqminigu _ .
entaqun _ naghuyagh mun _ tawaten _ naghuyagh t _ kayute kellug ke i _ qutenge stekagh i _ .
taawanginaq _ liilightughwaaghluki _ pi kaqsagh kangi _ , _ wataghllak _ kelute mun _ qamagte luki _ ingaghte uute luki _ qavaatesqelluki _ kayagtekaqsagh kangi _ .
taana _ ataasigh _ entaqun _ nukalpigagh _ sa u a _ entaqun _ aygugh itagh ma uq _ , _ pineghllug ma uq _ tawaten _ ungipamsug ughte yaghqaa luni _ .
unaami _ aghte yagh kanga _ taakut _ kelute mun _ ingaghte uute nga lghiit _ , _ qute mete luteng _ elpeg kekagh t _ .
taana _ aviite uq _ .
taawa nguq _ Naghuyangughsimalghii _ .
nani _ pennagh ni _ naanlluku _ apegh aqe yagh aa _ Imingatem _ ukunun _ legan _ Aglughaankunun _ aghqesaghtugh vig at _ .
taana _ Naghuya _ ellnga n _ talwa _ esghagh kaqe na iqe a _ Imingatem _ , _ yugu yagh lghii _ taana _ Naghuya _ .
taawa nguq _ melqughlluugteghllagluni _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
qalghigh llegh a _ iglaglluugte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ esghagh nanigh aat _ entaqunʼnguq _ aviighute ma uq _ .
taana ta nguq _ esgha _ sivunghat _ taakut _ Agaankut _ .
ungipagh aq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga
qagugh mii m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ taana _ .
aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ qerngughte i uq _ elngaatall _ .
kii _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu yameng _ alingigatutanganeng _ atigh ma ut _ entaqun _ .
ima _ tazimkerugllaak _ ungipagh aq _ taana _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
Upenghanghaninguq _ pungughmii t _ sikungigh te nghaani _ taakwnaa _ , _ enlegmete te _ pagavek _ aghviqagh igh aqe lghiit _ .
upenghagh ii yaghtugh aqe ut _ mainland-mun _ tespagavek _ .
upenghagh ii aqe ut _ tespagani _ ne eng _ punguug _ unite lukek _ .
Alingtiitunganginaghhaq _ tamaantaqelghii _ ne mi _ tamaani _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qayngun _ whaa _ sa u a _ qinuyuwaaghllak _ pi lleqe uq _ tughneghagh igh naqe yagh kumkek _ punguug _ , _ entaqun _ . _ ”
esgha _ ayumirugllagughngaaghmi _ nenglullug lgu ma uq _ alla _ , _ sivu liigh ait _ aagkurugllaget _ entaqun _ .
alingtagh u itu ngam _ taam _ sivuliighani _ naafqennaqii _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh igh naqe ma kek _ punguug _ .
kelgugh ma lghii _ , _ kelgugh ma kanga _ Punguum _ yug a _ neghyu i sqellug qu _ ellmeggnun _ .
nenglullug nun _ kaate luni _ nenglullug t _ qineghte luki _ ategh it _ tuqlughragh luki _ nagasiisqelluki _ Puvallanaqniluni _ .
Taakunun _ aglagh luni _ taakwna _ atigh luku _ puvallanaqniluni _ nagasiisqelluki _ .
elngaatall _ neqenge naqe lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ kenʼghhwak _ kumaghllug kek _ , _ sasiqumtaagh at _ ayumigh _ kenʼghhwighluteng _ neqe _ kenʼghhwam _ uvitanganun _ llilaghtu ghllag aqe luku _ .
Wuututkaghqani _ tiguynge _ sa u a _ , _ tiguynge t _ tamaakut _ aksigutagh u aqe ut _ , _ ayumigh m _ tiguynge i _ .
anighqute ni _ , _ tamaakut _ tiguynge t llu _ iigh luki _ navek _ tugwaaghesnaghyaghqaaluki _ .
kelgugh qu a _ elngaatall _ punguug _ .
Iii _ , _ whanikukestaq _ maligte luku _ tughneghaluwhaqaa _ qerngughte yalghiimi _ elngaatall _ .
ila i nguq _ mingle meng _ tamaaken _ itegh aqe lghiit _ , _ ila i _ qule aneng _ paagken _ ukig aqe lghiit _ .
ila i _ mingle meng _ naken _ taagken _ , _ ila i _ samaken _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte a _ .
“ _ taawa _ apeghiigh unga _ . _ ” _ iwerngaqun _ tughneghaluwhaq _ neqe mun _ whavek _ sekete uute lghii _ .
taakut _ wuututkaghqani _ anighqute t _ tugu luki _ aliigh aghte te kete luki _ qete te a _ tuqu qu ghllag aa _ .
ila a nguq _ alignapiglleghii _ aga _ nuna m _ asi anun _ itegh aqe uq _ , _ pagavek _ qilaga nun _ , _ mingle mun _ .
ila a nguq _ aamta _ natelnguut _ , _ temngi _ tenputaghaaqelghiinʼnguq _ tamaani _ tughneghaan- ghngaaghmeng _ elngaatall _ , _ taawa _ alingruughem _ angtalanganeng _ .
tawaten _ kelengaruugh uq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
qavagh nanigh uq _ sa uq _ kelenga uq _ , _ akinayukangatni _ .
elngaatall _ qavagh m _ sakniqesatnii _ ( _ ii _ , _ aghnegh m _ ilangani _ qalmesagh ghllag _ iineghminii _ qute mun _ lliigh qagh yu k _ ) _ qalmesagh ghllag mun _ teskanavek _ atghagh luni _ qavangsi ma lghii _ , _ iye gni _ suqwaghhaghmeng _ ayagsightugh lukek _ inglugtun _ , _ esghapag pigte lghii stun _ legan _ qavagh _ .
Iyeg _ naqam _ taghpaghrakegllagek _ , _ taawa _ qavagh uq _ .
ii _ , _ mengeghagllagem _ teghtugh a _ elngaatall _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ paga nguq _ esnagh mi _ tughneghagh _ qerngughte ghllag luni _ .
guutute kaghagh ni _ taakut _ kelqelluki _ tawani _ .
Kayagtaghwaaghutaqeftaat _ tughneghaan- lgute meggnun _ tamaavek _ .
“ _ Imantaghaay _ aa _ uygu te gu _ , _ uygu te gu _ . _ ” _ uygute na luku nguq _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
“ _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ , _ aa _ Kanantaghaam _ pi naagh aa _ . _ ” _ Kananlenguum _ tughneghagh m nguq _ mingle anun _ kayagte te a _ .
“ _ nakaan _ , _ nakaan _ aa _ Pikantaghaam _ pi naagh aa _ . _ ” _ Pikum _ quulvanlenguum _ tughneghaan _ .
Kanantaghaghmun _ pi sqe aqe luku _ elngaatall _ , _ kayagtaghwaaghutaqeftaat _ .
ii _ , _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ aa _ taawa llu _ whanga _ .
makete qaghte te kete luku _ guute laatagh ma kangi _ .
aniighwte aghte qugh a _ elngaatall _ tuqu qu ghllag luku _ .
taawa nguq _ tughneghagh igh te a _ .
naten _ kiik _ lliigh nghaani _ atghagh uute kayug t _ enleg meng _ tespagken _ .
atghagh uute luteng _ elngaatall _ uksaaqestagh aa _ punguug ni _ tawani _ .
aqlaghaghte nghaani qun _ mangteghagh t _ sa aqe lghiit _ miigtagh aqe lghiit _ wetngaaqwaaqelghiit _ aqlagha mi _ .
Takevuq _ igleghte ma lghii _ , _ alingtagh u itu ngam _ kelengake ma kanga _ , _ saavgumiighwaaghluni _ ii _ , _ uyiigh _ , _ kangigh a _ iiyagh kun _ kanaghte luku _ , _ taagken _ nuqneghteghyaghqaa _ .
wetku _ kaate kan _ naghulleg yaghqagh a _ .
mangteghagh nun _ kaanneghminii _ qagugh mig te ghllag aqe luni _ siklaate luni _ .
qama _ akite aqe kangat _ tenglugtugh aqe kangat _ , _ kii _ iqlinqegsaghmi _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ siklaate luni _ .
iinghute ma ka nge a _ ellmeggnun _ kaate kan _ akite fqaan _ tenglugtugh fqaan _ pisqelluki _ .
taawa _ ellngit nun _ pi luni _ , _ akite nghite nghatni nguq _ , _ kii _ ii _ , _ qenʼngulliqeghllagluni _ payugte kestagh aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ siklaate ghllag aqe lghii _ , _ qagugh mig te aqe lghii _ mangteghagh kun _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ taakwavek _ , _ siklaate luni _ akite nghite yatni _ , _ ii _ qenʼngulliqeghllagluni _ sivugte kestagh yan _ naghulleg aa _ .
ii _ ii _ , _ nengsalghiimi _ elngaatall _ Takevuq _ anagniigh yalghiimi _ .
uyiigh _ qamaken _ nuqnegh kanga _ elngaatall _ .
nenglu _ pikegken _ segge ma kanga _ segge ma kanga _ , _ naange naqe yan _ uyiigh m _ kangigh a _ kaate yan _ peghhe qagh ma kanga _ .
Saapgutaa _ , _ Takevuq _ sa u a _ taana _ .
uksaagh mi _ taakwani _ uksugh luni _ , _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ piyaataaghluni _ navek _ taanʼgavek _ , _ mangteghagh _ suna _ taana _ .
megh mete ma uq _ entaqun _ .
taawa nguq _ nanevgagh ghllag _ quulqite gni _ aqume luni _ ii _ .
tamaa _ yugtuqagh _ aghnaghtu uq _ .
upugha te aat _ elngaatall _ .
gaagh te naqe aat _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ aa _ sivuglluningughaa _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh ka _ aa _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ gaaghutegguu _ .
gaagh te ggu _ neghestegguu _ tuugkagh rraag meng _ , _ giimagh rraag meng _ , _ iquuyarragmeng _ . _ ” _ ahaa _ , _ gaagh te sqe ma kanga _ .
atightugh luki _ imanagh t _ sa u aat _ giimagh rraag t _ , _ iquuyarraaget _ , _ tuugkagh rraag t _ , _ tapghaaghagh at _ .
gaagh te aat _ elngaatall _ .
ugute luteng _ negh ma lghiit _ .
neqnigh ghhalek _ imanagh _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ neghe a _ .
iwerngaqun _ kepsughaghiighluni _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ nanevgagh ghllag m _ taamnguq _ qiive luni _ qaallgute a _ , _ “ _ alingtagh u itu ngam _ aa _ sanqutaani _ ellmi neng _ negh ai _ . _ ”
legan _ tawaten _ pi uq _ , _ ii _ angvanghakun _ ugmestaallghakun _ tuugkagh _ , _ giimagh _ , _ iquuyaq _ legan _ piisqaghte a tuq _ , _ tapghaaghagh _ tamaa na _ uya iigh aq _ .
Sanqutaaninguq _ negh mafte ai _ .
taawa _ tuquma lghii _ aling tagh u i i i i itu nga _ .
tefaay _ !
yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ ungipagh aq
siftugh te m _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imanagh i _ taana nguq _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
elngaatall _ neqengyupaarugllak _ urang _ .
Quunpenguq _ naken _ piyaaneng _ , _ angyagh neng _ kaate nghmini _ neghsaghsighaghllagluni _ kaate aqe lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ elngaatall _ nulighh an _ nefku ghllag aqe kangi _ ila i _ negh kangi _ .
amiiragh i _ nayug luki _ , _ nayug luki _ negh kangi _ kanaghte uute aqe luki _ .
tagtalmi _ taagken _ yuug _ neqete nanigh yalghiimi _ , _ neqe meng _ kaat ute na nigh yagh lghii mi _ , _ ima _ neqe ngllagh ghllag qagh a _ taana _ nefku ghllag _ avangite te a _ negh ke igh te uk _ , _ yuug _ neqenge yu igh te yalghiimi _ .

neqenge nanigh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ “ _ Upuupeng _ nunivagseghagh ghhagh meng _ pi yagh kuma _ entaqun _ negh nayagh ukung _ ighivgaqun _ . _ ”
pennagh nun _ nunivag yagh yalghiimi _ , _ tawaten _ saghna ma luku _ , _ ugwinganguq _ uka _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ qaya ghhagh a _ taglagh yalghiimi _ .
kii _ sama nguq _ usingigh yalghiimi _ neqe ghllag _ ugwingan _ qaake ma kanga _ .
Nakenʼnguq _ pennagh m _ saye aneng _ taakwegken _ aghnagh _ aane luni _ kayusiite luku _ ima nguq _ aga _ iteghaatuk _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ , _ uyghag m _ asi anun _ , _ amig anun _ tawavek _ iteghaallutek _ aga nguq _ umeg te uk _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ “ _ Ugwika _ taameng _ neqengyiighullii _ , _ aghnagh meng _ naalkute ma lghii _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ whaa _ . _ ” _ aglagh ma lghii _ nunivagte gpenani _ .
kaate yan _ ugwini _ pemakanga _ , _ “ _ sangavek _ neqenge yu igh te ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ esgha _ sangama _ neqengyiighuskanganga _ . _ ”
taagken _ aghnagh _ quunpeng _ aghhutanga _ tamaghhagh an _ pennagh m _ saye anun _ pi ghllag ughte uq _ .
Ugwini _ aghulaqenghani _ ellnga llu _ aghulaqaqlluni _ .
allamenguq _ pi yalghiimi _ ataasigh meng _ aghneghmi _ , _ aghnagh ngugh _ taawa _ pennagh m _ saye ani _ aqumga aqe uq _ , _ iwhani _ pellugtugh aqe uq _ elngaatall _ aliineghllug ghllag mi _ .
taku ma kanga _ aghnagh m _ taam _ .
“ _ sangavek _ agavek _ ne mun _ aglagh igate ziin _ , _ ellnginaghhaghpek _ pellagh yug igate ziin _ ? _ ”

“ _ nakaa _ , _ ne ke aqa _ una _ neghightagh u unga _ una _ ne ke aqa _ whanga _ . _ ”
“ _ kumakigh te aghte ltung _ ? _ ”
aa _ , _ aa _ ighsakestamikunʼnguq _ angegh uq _ .
taawa nguq _ gaagh aqe uq _ neghsagh meng _ esla kun _ elngaatall _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ elpek _ sivuke luten _ kumakigh laken _ . _ ” _ aqume luni _ taagken _ ingaghte ste luku _ kumakigh aa _ .
qavagh ngllagh aa _ elngaatall _ kumakigh aa _ , _ ima nguq _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh yan _ aghsug kestagh luku _ nuna kun _ lli kestagh luku _ ugke a _ taana _ qallaqugh ghllag _ tugu luku _ sigutanga kun _ aghnagh m _ kuuve ma kanga _ legan _ tuqute luku _ .
Iilqwa _ qaamna _ , _ sigute kek _ panegh yalghiimek _ tuquma lghii _ .
tuqu yalghiimi nguq _ taakwavek _ iqraghqelluni _ llangaqa nguq _ ighyaghqesagh lghii mi _ iqlighmi _ .
aqume ste luku _ , _ aqume vyiigh ste luku _ , _ pelluk u a _ tawavek _ , _ iigge nge ai _ piifte luki _ , _ aqumgagh an _ tawaten _ unite ma kanga _ .
Unillukuu _ pennagh m _ qaye ani _ taklaghte luni _ kelengake ma kanga _ qaya ghhagh _ taglagh yaghqagh _ , _ ugwini _ .
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ taglagh yalghiimi _ usi ii ghllag luni _ , _ kaleve qaghte ghllag luni _ .
taagken _ kaate yan _ esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh siigh ni _ taana _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ sa ni _ , _ elngaatall _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ ” _ tuqu kau lghii _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
“ _ egmiinaq _ sukate luten _ aghnaqelqusigpenang _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ ”

“ _ naqam _ iqlighpek _ tespikani _ esghapag nga _ .
egmiinaq _ tea- ai _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ neqe ghllag u unga _ kayusiite yaghtugh nga _ . _ ” _ avelghaqiinagh aa _ .
“ _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ naqam _ iqlighpek _ esghapag nga _ . _ ” _ qenwat _ sakrite uq _ .
uughqaghte luni _ sayugaghsaqminigu _ imani nguq _ uniistaaghhagh u uq _ .
Piyaqminigunguq _ tuquuluni _ , _ aneghneghsughyaqminigu _ .
ii _ akuqagh luku nguq _ elngaatall _ yuug _ qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi _ inag mig ke luku _ nuliigh siigh ni _ , _ aghnaghagh ni _ taana _ .
qiyaaghwagh yalghiimi nguq _ , _ qiyaaghwagh ma luku _ aghnagh m _ nuliigh pig an _ tespamum _ pennagh m _ qaaynganilnguum _ unite ma kanga _ .
nalleghaghhalek nguq _ naagu _ yuug _ .
kii _ kaate yalghiimi nguq _ up- ke aa _ qayugh a _ kaleve qaghte luni _ .
kaate luni nguq _ , _ “ _ kii _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete uten _ ? _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ nutaan _ repall _ neqete unga _ . _ ” _ Esghalqugpenaanʼnguq _ iye gni _ iigh manginagh lukek _ , _ gginagh ni _ iigh manginagh luku _ .
kayusigh qu luku _ , _ taglaate qugh lgusigh luku _ iteghaallutek _ aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kii _ sa yamek _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ . _ ”
“ _ esghaghhu _ nutaan _ neqenge yalghiinga _ , _ piyaqleg iigh yalghiinga _ entaqun _ iye gka _ puuve uk _ . _ ”
gaagh ragkiigh lutek _ negh te kete luku _ .
“ _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ ” _ taawa _ naghughte nghminigu _ , _ “ _ sa yamek llu _ iye gken _ puuve ghllag ak _ ? _ ”
qenwat _ yug m _ taam _ ugwingan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Uumlleqa _ pi ma kanga _ ! _ ” _ taawa _ iye k _ puuve ghllag ni lukek _ qinunaghqutkesaqminigu _ .
“ _ Uumlleqa _ pi ma kanga _ ” _ , _ tawatenʼnguq _ pi tkellug qu _ uulegh u ma lghii _ tawaten _ pi magh mi _ .
Uumlleqa _ pi ma kanga _ .
taawa _ ungipaghaate m _ kenle ke a _ .
tefaay _ aliinghakuun _ !
sivuligh
pugughilegh
pugughilegh
Kaavam _ apegh llegh a
pugughileghmii u llegh ut
Quyngightuumaghmenguq _ anguyag nge luteng _ anag ma lghiit _ qavagh nanigh naqe yameng _ aate yameng _ .
tawatete ut _ naqamalla _ whaa _ aapghwaaghaqa _ nagate lleg mtun _ .
sangan _ uglaghyagaghllagennguq _ Walangam _ aapghwaaghyaqminigu _ tazingani _ aa sa mi _ .
nenglu _ ataasigh _ nenglu ghrug ghllag _ , _ yugunqegte pigte ma aqe aat llu _ .
angayuqagh gket _ tawani _ nengluksaqemeggni _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg nguq _ Walangam _ apegh llegh ani _ , _ aanleghaate luni _ angyaghugh te aqe uq _ , _ angyagh _ , _ tesqamaken _ .
“ _ tawaten _ sikig stun _ entaqun _ , _ ” _ whanga _ sumeghtaghagh lleg mni _ .
taagavek _ nenglu ngllagh luteng _ , _ taakwavek _ taana _ ataasigh _ angayuqagteng _ tuumkellug qu _ .
Aghveghtaqegkangannguq _ elngaatall _ .
Yugwilngasiyugwem _ ungipaghqangllaghyugwem _ kaatepigneghinkutqun _ esghaghhu _ .
aghvenge luteng _ , _ yugtu pigte lghii _ entaqun _ maaghaghte aqe kangit _ aghvenge ghngaaghmeng _ .
nuugh aqe lghiit _ .
Yugilngasiyugwem _ kaasimakangl _ .
Aghvelqaaghaghllaga _ tungyugh u uute yagu _ mat- llegte luku _ , _ qaye igh luku _ , _ putuugh luku _ iighsugh ma kangat _ mangtag a _ aliighqelluku _ .
Ghhataghsimakangat _ pakag aat _ amalka _ .
nengqe ghllag luteng _ ukut _ tapghaghrag t _ iighsuute t _ .
amenqun _ uughqa _ esgha _ nangaghte aqe kanga _ uksaagh mi _ .
katelghaate ghllag yan _ , _ sanqutaateng _ peghu luki _ taagagun _ .
ii _ , _ qelegh kangit _ legan _ tesamavek _ .
kergamqun _ samavek _ kagpestaallghanun _ lliigh yuwhaagh kau ta i _ taakwegkut _ kepe ma kangit _ .
ngiigte ghllag luku _ ila a _ kete mun _ ateghuglluku _ .
waame lghii _ una _ legan _ sanqutaatenguq _ tugulagh luki _ tuququghtaagiit _ qamagte luki _ .
ungipagh ngllagh naqe m _ piyaqminiki _ .
taagken _ taana _ taananginaq _ tume _ .
taku vigkagh a _ aasa mun _ uksugh mi _ taananginaghhaq _ .
naken _ sani gneng _ taku vig ite ngughk _ .
awiim _ neqe igh negh ke uq _ sa u a _ , _ sengngugh qagh yu k _ .
nagaqugh luteng _ entaqun _ aki naqe naqe lghiit _ .
megh meng _ taana _ kuvugh ghllag ma kangat _ tume _ taana _ .
Sikwaaghaaghtesteghllagumakangat _ , _ iwerngaqun _ samavek _ nategh anun _ .
taakwna _ , _ sani kek _ iighagh vigkagh meng _ unʼgavek _ nategh anun _ .
Iwemgaqun _ teskanani _ nateqlisaghami _ uglagh luni _ guutute kaghqaghtuumagh mi _ , _ legannguq _ sughugwi _ kaate nghmini _ taakwani _ estu laghate te aqe lghii _ .
estu ma luku _ tuqu qu ghllag luku _ nateqlitekagh _ teskanani _ pi aqe luku _ .
sughug ghllag _ qamagte ma kangat _ .
aki naqe m _ qavagh nanigh ma lghiit _ quunpeng _ kelenga ghllaget _ .
esla kegte na iqe yagh kangat _ .
quyngigh eng _ umulghaamakangat _ siku gnun _ .
Tesamagunnguq _ , _ aasagh mii lgu uq _ tesamna _ natungwaa _ pugughilegh m _ ugwalighnegha _ .
aasagh mii lgu uq _ .
taaggun _ uugte ma lghiit _ quyngightugh ma ghllag meng _ .
quyngigh at _ tuqu ghllag ma lghii _ , _ entaqunnguq _ taakwani _ qavaghtagh llegh mi _ taghyughtupagllagem _ .
“ _ kii _ , _ uuggutkataamaat _ . _ ”

tuqu qugh ma kangat _ naangtevzighluku _ .
tazimaken _ ima _ quyngingyaqlegestun _ .
tawaten _ entaqun _ gheve luteng _ , _ segheve luteng _ .
nalighnegh i _ enraghngamnguq _ , _ qafsinagnegh _ angyagh _ tawaten _ naayghagh nun _ pugughilegh _ ketghuteqaghlluku _ .
ila it _ taakut _ veghute ma lghiit _ .
“ _ entaqun _ Walangat _ maaten _ .
whangkuta _ unegte ukut _ .
tawatete uq _ ungipagh a _ avatmii u lleg mta _ .
Agarugllaak _ .
pugughileghmii t
Saamaa _ nagaqugh qaghaqe ukut _ qavngarugllak _ ategh _ Aghnangiighaq _ , _ Nuniivaaghmi _ .
whangkuta _ ateghkagh ut _ Aghnangiighaq _ .
Gugwiingemnguq _ nayag ke yaghpete a _ .
entaqun _ ipa u uq _ .
Gugwiingen _ avatmii _ apa ka _ , _ apa ma _ ata a _ .
Anangwaanaaguq _ apaghpigaqa _ sivulighpigaq _ .
alla _ sivuligh leg _ .
Taakuneng _ allgegh kau unga _ Anangwaanaankuneng _ , _ Gugwiingenkuneng _ , _ Napaqaghhaankuneng _ , _ Yugniilqwaankuneng _ .
esghagh nghiteqaghte aqa _ nuughtugh qaghte aqa _ Gugwiingen _ .
allgegh magh ma _ tuqukagh _ , _ wallu _ allgegh ste gpenanga _ .
nulighh a _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ Waalla _ .
nanevgagh magh mi _ entaqun _ tugukagh a _ .
Nuliighpigaa _ Pangangangufluq _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ apaghpigaqaqa _ Yugniilqwaam _ ata a _ uum _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ , _ Iteghyaghaam _ kuuggha _ .
Waalla _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ , _ ukut _ Imegyuutenkut _ pi ke aat _ .
kiyalighagh mii u ut _ taakut _ ukut _ Aywaaghmiit _ nani _ qangeghsagh mii t _ .
Malghughqelluteng _ entaqun _ nunaghqaat _ qangeghsagh _ .
Unmeggaankut _ , _ Sumuusinkut _ , _ alaka ghhagh nkut _ kiyalighagh m _ yug ke ai _ .
maalghug _ alaka ghhagh k _ sivuligh llu _ kinguligh llu _ pi nigh staghhiinagh k _ qamagte lutek _ .
Waalla _ kiyalighagh mii u uq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
tagi ukung _ enmis _ whangkutung _ .
tesamani _ pugughilegh mi _ kiyaghlleghii _ .
tespikavek _ qemi mun _ kelutemmnilngughmun _ mayugh lutung _ , _ segesqugh gmikun _ ayapegh luni _ aliineghllug _ kiwatmun _ nekegte luni _ aghuliigh aqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ qama _ kiyalighagh mun _ umyugwak _ kaatngwaaghlutek _ .
akuzillegh it _ tawaten _ ayuqe ut _ iitek _ whangkutestun _ anagte yaghqaa gpenateng _ tusaqe neghllugte yaghqaa gpenateng _ .
ungipamsug ke llegh a _ taana _ ellnga _ kiyalighagh mi _ , _ panignaghllug u yagh lghii nguq _ ellnga llu _ .
repall _ ne u yagh lghii _ Waalla _ taagani _ avaqutaghllug u lghii _ avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ .
ukegken _ enraq _ yug nge kau na yu kan _ pi aqe aat _ nallu negh ke te ziin _ , _ kiyalighagh _ .
alaska- meng _ , _ mainland-meng _ .
Qantaghanlleghaneng _ taakwegken _ .
tawaten _ malghuklitkemmeng _ , _ nallunqemmeng _ anglisaghtegma _ taakut _ , _ aamta _ kenqigtengngwaaghpenatek _ temngi _ yug nge kau na yu kan _ tazimaken _ pi aqe aat _ .
Agaankut _ nagaqugh aqe anka _ saghumig nkuk nguq _ Naaghuluunkuk _ avaqutagh ke ait _ walluumllu _ naa gket _ maalghug _ .
ivagh i ma nkut _ , _ tan- qagh u yankut _ , _ Agaankut _ , _ Karginkut _ .
Agaam _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ nengyugh ka _ .
Iteghyaghaam _ aag na nga _ avatmii u uq _ .
naqamllu _ atghagh kau nghite ngugh ni _ tazinganirugllak _ aagnaput _ aneghtekagh t _ tawaten _ .
Tawatelgutkutngwaaghniiqiit _ akuzillegh it _ .
enkaam _ Agaam _ avaqutagh ke ai _ Kavnaghuunkut _ , _ Aglughaankut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ Qaygeghtaankut _ , _ Ukumankut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ Maghqaneq _ .
allameng _ nuyekligh lgu ut _ nalug iqe yagh aat _ .
nagate lleg mni _ peleghqe tke ai _ Kargim _ , _ Saghumigenkunguuk _ Singigpaayankuk _ .
taagani _ qungughvig ni _ peleghqe ma na iqe ait _ .
Agaam _ aag llegh a _ avaqutagh a _ Kargim _ ellnga n _ ila a _ .
Kargi _ , _ Agaq _ , _ tan- qagh u nga _ , _ ivagh i ma _ taakut _ liisimake anka _ .
taana _ Tutmatelek _ Aqulagenkuk _ Qaaqwaankuk _ avaqutagh ke ak _ .
qaaqu aq _ aghnagh u uq _ esghagh ghllag kaqe aqa _ taam _ maaten _ Gugwiingem _ ata lgu ta an _ nayag a _ .
Tutmatelgem _ nulighqesuwhaagha _ Pinirkaguftuq _ .
taagken _ nengyugh ghhagh ka _ puughhute _ .
ivagh i ma _ kingulighpigagh _ .
avaquti a _ Anaghayaankut _ , _ aki vig nkut _ , _ nategh mii nkut _ .
Yugniilqwaaq _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighneghqagh ke a _ sa a _ qangigagh a _ , _ ilughagh n _ avaqutagh ke a _ .
Tutmatelgem _ nayag a _ Tenmiiwen _ , _ taananginaq _ liisimake aqa _ .
Taakwnaa _ atalgute ni _ aviighute uute kau na iqe a _ uglagh ghllag na iqe yagh ai _ .
Unguqti _ ilughwaa _ , _ Qaayaam _ avaqutagh a _ , _ Qaaqwaankut _ kuugghat _ .
Qaayaq _ tesamkumiinguuq _ ilate nga uq _ whangkunnun _ .
Nalighneqaghput _ whangkuta _ pikagh ut _ Qaaqwaam _ kugegh ke a _ alla neng _ ata leg _ .
Gugwiingem _ itegh yagh aq _ panig a _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ .
anglegutetu yagh lghii _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
anagutagh ghhagh _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh ma _ ataata ke a _ puughhute m _ .
Anagutaam _ ata a _ melqughtu u na iqe aat _ .
aaga _ Anagutaam _ nulighh a _ .
avaqutagh lgu yagh lghii _ tagneghli meng _ , _ peleghqe tke aat _ puughhute m _ kuugghan _ .
atghagh u nga _ Agaankut _ panike aat _ allughqagh m _ tawaaten _ anagutagh mete te _ lli aqe aq _ .
tan- qagh u nga _ Agaam _ nayag ke a _ .
Gginaqutkanik _ esghaqagh u lutek _ .
Aamtayaq _ aghyugh kau uq _ naagu _ tamaani _ sa kaghqagh ghhagh _ .
Kargim _ avaquti a _ ayuqligh nkuk _ Singigpaayankuk _ .
Yugwaaghhaq _ puughhute m _ ata a _ , _ nulighh a _ Naangiighaq _ .
avaqutagh ke ai _ Yugwaaghhaam _ , _ pekete te aq _ , _ agigte te _ , _ puughhute _ , _ Nalugwi _ .
Yugniilqwaaq _ ellnginaqeltaghhaq _ ata ka _ .
naqam _ ilughwalghutangi _ taakut _ , _ Qaygeghtaankut _ .
Anaghayaaq _ taana _ anglegutkaghqagh a _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ , _ Ikanuq _ , _ Nalugwi _ .
napaqagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh ke a _ Yugniilqwaaq _ .
Qaanaankut _ tesamantuq _ ama _ ramke t _ allakagh meng _ .
tanem _ avaqutagh a _ taananginaghhaghsugnilluku _ nagate te qugh aqe aqa _ elqwaagh ghqu _ , _ Taqaangankuk _ .
pugughileghmii t _ naqamllu _ whaten _ whangkutestun _ pugughileghmii stun _ qerngagh meng _ atigh llegh at _ ayuqe nghite ngughk _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ naqam _ .
alla t _ nunatagh t _ kinku t _ ungipagh ke igate ait _ .
iitek nguq _ nunatagh meng _ nula u yagh uq _ taku aqe luku _ whaten _ negh naqe m _ saam _ amenqun _ ivagh i ghllagu yagh lghiit _ , _ neqe _ taana _ .
nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ whaken _ qiighqagh m _ yugwan _ lliigh vike aqe luku _ nula u yaghtugh ngugh _ .
atigh llegh i _ pugughileghmii u nghite ngugh t _ , _ naqamllu _ liigike llghite anka _ nakumiingwaaqluteng _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ taananguuq _ nagate lleg mni _ Nungugwenkugneng _ Anaghayaankugneng _ .
negh naqe m _ aneghneghte naqe m _ siivanllegh i nguq _ piiwagh mafte ut _ kiyang _ tawaten _ kevgaghqalighluteng _ .
legan _ nenglu meng _ taagken _ whangkunneng _ qemgaghmeteghllallemmneng _ aane luteng _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwaghkagh t _ , _ qavngaq _ imani _ .
ataasigh u yagh ukut _ , _ ataasigh mi _ nenglu mi _ , _ pelleghqagh ke te llegh u uq _ .
qafsina t _ entaqun _ kiyalighagh mun _ .
enkaam _ taakut _ ata ii qugh stegkangi _ Anaghayaam _ tanem _ taagken _ nenglu meng _ aanekagh t _ ighsake te te nkut _ , _ silas-tu te te nkuk _ Kiyalighamelnguuk _ .
kiyalighagh mun _ lli aqe aat _ .
pugughileghmii lghute _ tesakmani _ nula ghllag lghii _ .
taagken _ nenglu meng _ ataasigh meng _ aane luteng _ piiwaghkagh t _ .
maani llu _ sivungagh mi _ nula aqe uq _ .
tawaten _ nagate vyiigh llegh ke aqa _ taagken _ anglisaghtegemneng _ .
Nagasugwigasalghiingallu _ qemall _ maaten _ avuteghqe ghllag _ .
neqamike yaghqagh t _ liigi _ neqamikesqelluki _ ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ .
Waakigalngughni _ .
taana _ ayumightagh ghllag _ qaaqu aq _ ungiipamsugtaaghllak _ waakigalkefut _ .
Imingatem _ sa kagu _ ?
sakegh nghite a _ Imingan _ sakenghitaghput _ iike nagh te mineng _ nulighhtuqagh _ .
aghnagh nge naqe m _ akequsagh ke luku nguq _ yugusigh ni _ , _ iingkerugllak _ ellngit ni _ tawani _ nengaawagh u lghii _ .
Tutmatelgem _ nangllegtapaayugutmineng _ tugukligh laatagh qagh a _ .
alla ghllag _ quutmii neng _ ungazigh meng _ allgeghkagh _ , _ allgellegh a _ entaqun _ ayuqe lghii _ .
taakut _ Aalaankut _ , _ Anangwaanaankut _ Aazugwenkunnguq _ anglegute ke te ut _ , _ apa nka _ .
anglegute ke te lghiit _ , _ taana _ Aalaaq _ nuyeklighpiigaq _ Anangwaanaq _ , _ Aazuk _ uyuqligh _ , _ lluu yu k _ maaten _ sakemna _ .
avaqutagh lgutu te lghiit _ .
taake uk _ melngu nkuk nguq _ Tapghalugwenkuk _ Aalaam _ avaqutagh ke ak _ .
taana _ Aazuk _ uyuqligh _ panig inagh meng _ , _ Qaaqwaankuk _ , _ Panikutaankuk _ .
temngi _ neqamike vyiigh llegh nka _ puygutagh unga _ apegh anka _ .
nepiigh igate yagh uk _ angli saghteke _ aagnammneng _ ungipagh meng _ .
repall _ maaten _ avuteghqe aqe unga _ .
elngaatall nguq _ aghviteghllak _ utaqiigaqnaaghtannguq _ ingutugh meng _ .
ingutugh meng _ kiyang _ .
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ itagnaghi nghata _ aghvesagmenguq _ kayagte aqe ait _ .
nemeghqagh u luki _ suqi a _ .
tagtale mii _ aangepaaghrugmeng _ qaanngwaaghqameng _ sa yaghqagh meng _ pakegte aqe luki qun _ amen _ sa ngllagh yaghqagh meng _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ nagaqughsugnite aqa _ whaa _ nagate llegh ka _ sa u a _ yuug _ Qaaqamenguq _ ategh leg _ .
nakaan _ una _ Qaaqa _ ungazigh mete ngughk _ kina _ taanangunghilnguq _ .
ategh qu te _ allakusnaq _ uglagh lghii _ .
repall _ nagaqugh aqe lghiinga _ Kiyalighaqlunguq _ Yaavgaghsilguyaghtuqlu _ , _ ategh ite ngugh lgu yagh uq _ .
Sakunneghilnguut _ ategh i _ akuuraate nga lghiit _ .
Qaaqa _ Pugughilenglaqaq
taana _ sa u a _ Qaaqa _ pugughilegh ngllagh qagh ngugh _ .
sivuke luni nguq _ Tupnaghqun _ nekegtekau yaghpete uq _ .
Tawatennguq _ ulapnaariqluni _ tawatesugwni _ nagate aqa _ pugughilegh _ nallagh ma kanga _ neqetu ghllag _ , _ nanugh ghllag _ enraq _ .
entaqun _ upenghagh mi wha _ nallagh ma nghite agu _ , _ aghvegh ghllag nguq _ kellii ni _ tamaa na _ qavregh ghllag _ .
taawa _ entaqun _ takukagh a _ alingyugwigatutmineng _ nanugh meng _ .
Legannguq _ nanugh _ tawaten _ .
entaqun _ yungyuwhaaq _ nutaan _ nalluke kangat _ .
nanugh m _ ne ke luku _ .
ii _ , _ nenglu ngllagh llegh ke te luku _ legannguq _ nenglu i _ ifkaghte aqe ai _ nanugh m _ .
Tawatennguq _ qule iqe te lukek _ asivanlluku _ asiliq _ taana _ tawatennguq _ nayugh keqaghte ak _ .
Taagkennguq _ efleghhnaqutkesaqminigu _ .
aghtugh aa _ pi neghllug _ .
tawaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ kenleksaggaghneng _ uqugh a nguq _ ayaawagh ke luku _ kenghegnun _ .
ii-ii _ , _ taamagunnguq _ Iqalugwilagnekun _ ukig uute ghllag uq _ .
Naliignekun _ imani _ ketliignekun _ kaate lghii _ una _ .
tawaten _ nula ghllag uq _ taakwani _ .
tagtale mii _ ategh ghllag uq _ .
Tawatennguq _ keteghllugwinaghmun _ .
Tawatennguq _ nekegte luni _ nuvugyuglluni _ .
legan _ kaate lghii _ iighwilngughllagestunnguq _ qategtu te _ .
esla kegte yagh na iqe kangat qun _ ayumigh _ .
unaami _ teghtugh yalghiimi _ qupegh ghllag _ iighwilngugh ghllag stun _ .
qafsiniite kun _ qavagh m _ aga _ asivagh inagh uq _ .
qupegh _ talugh qagh uq _ .
tawaten _ nagaqugh aqa _ .
taawa _ nanigh igh te a _ paninang _ nanughtuqagh _ .
ungipagh kaqe kanga _ Tutmatelgem _ taam _ anglisaghtema _ napiighlleghhiinnguq _ waame aqe ut _ nanumun _ sanitmiighte aghte lghiit _ tagtalmi _ .
tamaa na ngugh _ tume ghllag _ nanugh m _ tuumlilleghllakaa _ amenqun _ iqetu pigte lghiit _ .
nanugh m _ tuumlilaghllagluku _ ila i _ ikfiqnat _ kiigh ani _ .
nenglu _ qafsinʼguyaghta _ uglaghraag _ qaya _ paamna _ nenglu ligh vig ite ngughk _ tangeghtu ghllag _ .
ketwhelqun _ , _ uygu na ni _ kana _ allameng _ taana _ Kangkiilghem _ asi ani qun _ , _ taghnughhagh ghhagh it _ estu igate ut _ .
Mangteghasqwaaghviguyaghtughnguq _ qaye a _ paamna _ upenghagh mi _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ .
atigh llegh i _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ taakwavek _ mayugh uute aqe ut _ , _ kiigtagh ke ut _ taakwani _ .
pennagh ni nguq _ taagani _ pennanitkullaaluteng _ qagugh ak _ piyuke llegh eng _ entaqun _ ngelqagh u aghagh u aghte llegh mun _ kenlanga _ .
itghagh aqe ut _ tagi luteng _ iqallugwanun _ .
enkaam _ nalluniilkutaqaqaghput _ ngelqaaghaq _ tengenghani _ , _ iqallug _ sama _ tea- ma anun _ lliigh aqe uq _ ugwavaghaquq _ ukavek _ aghvighteg nun _ navek _ kaate ghllag aqe uq _ .
Sughugwet
Taaganirugllaganii _ talwa _ Qaaqwaam _ entaqun _ sivungagh ni _ sughu k _ allgeghkagh _ .
tespamaken _ aywaa neng _ igleghtaneng _ nakaan _ uughqa neng _ .
taakwegken _ uqevaneng _ aate yameng _ pi llghite ut _ ukegken _ aywaa neng _ pikagh t _ .
taakwegkut qun _ yugwit _ tuqu qugh kau ni kangit _ kiyalighagh mii t _ .
entaqun _ tamaaken _ apallugh ke luku _ aki naqe m _ .
Uughqannguq _ uukna _ yugwa _ pi llghite uq _ uukna _ , _ Avatestaakwegkut _ , _ tea-si inkut _ .
aygugh a _ uukna _ anguyiqe kau uq _ ungazigh meng _ kenle ke luni _ .
qiighqagh _ entaqun _ unaymighwaaqaqsaqangat _ .
pillugute lghii stun _ maaten _ katam _ entaqun _ .
Nanirugllak _ aganirugllak _ entaqun _ .
sa igh kuvek
taana _ sa igh kuvek _ ungipaghagh u luku _ repall _ nagaqugh aqa _ elngaatall nguq _ yugllaak _ .
naken llu _ nagaqugh qagh nghite ngugh u kut _ whaa _ maaten _ taakusta _ siquveg mii u yagh lghiit _ .
yugtu lleghpigagh u na iqe aat _ .
Tawatennguq _ esgha qun _ napaqagh an _ iqetu langa _ entaqun _ ipaanguuq _ agarugllak _ este na ghllag _ taana _ iqetutale kellug qu _ napaqagh u yagh ut _ agavek _ .
Tawatennguq _ tallimaghqelluni _ ayuqe yagh uq _ .
Unʼgarugllaak _ ketligh at _ ila it _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m nguq _ sugwagluni _ ayvegh aneng _ neqete nghmeng _ aghtugh luni _ taglagh luni _ ne nun _ kaate nghmini _ meghsi ngllagh luni _ legannguq _ tuuneghatni _ tunutmun _ kuuve aqe ai _ .
negh ghllag _ qamagte luku _ taana _ unʼgavek _ .
nuliigh ni _ kaate luku _ meghsi ngllagh vike a _ , _ agniqe te a _ itegh luni _ pi sqellug qu _ , _ ungipaghagh u uq _ .
tuune a _ qinuyagute luku _ .
Tunutmun _ kuuve a _ .
ii-i _ , _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghivaleghtaagaa _ allghiinegh iqe qrug ni luku _ .
aga _ itegh uq _ enraq llu _ .
Taakwanteqruwhaamaa _ enraq llu _ kelulighpigaghni _ .
ii _ , _ legannguq _ itegh uq _ , _ qagingughte ghllag aa _ .
nuliigh ni nguq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ .
ellnga neng _ kayagte a _ ellnga neng _ pi sqellug qu _ .
sagiqe te yatni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnalqwaagh _ kii _ , _ qagighrukuutaaghllaget _ .
taawa nguq _ tungeqligh t _ taana _ kasugwaqeftaa _ ayemqe aqe a _ .
maaten _ siquveg m nguq _ tesamum _ liisimakekagh mta _ tuungligh a _ .
taanegna nguq _ nutemlu _ qamagte ma kanga _ ketligh _ .
Tidal _ wave-esteghllagumakanga _ .
negh ghllag _ taanegna _ estamat _ iqetughllagaatat _ iighwte ai _ .
tawaten _ nagate aqa _ yugwiitellghan _ kenle a _ .
naqamllu _ naa ke i _ kingunghit _ siquveg mii t _ nagaqiigalkeput _ .
entaqun _ qamaghqwaamii _ .
mayeraaghpag _ Anaqsi
siknegh mi _ ama _ angvigapigniiqaa _ yuug _ .
yug ghrugllag u na iqe aat _ , _ taawaa _ kelgute yagh aat _ napaqagh squghhagh _ .
Whagunnguq _ kaapute luni _ ayuqe uq _ ( _ tuye akun _ ) _ whagun llu _ ighu m _ kenle akun _ .
nengug luku nguq _ esgha _ naama kusiigh aqlaatagh ma atgu _ .
Unguqtinguq _ angvigagh ghllag uq _ , _ Anaghayaam _ apegh aqe a _ .
nuqsaleg aqe a nguq _ taana _ napaqagh a _ nengug luku _ .
Qemighllugwem _ tagtaalanga _ .
qazigyaghagh ghhagh m nguq _ iqelqwakun _ pakineg luku _ tuquma lghii _ .
ivghaagh lghii _ amsikaghlluni _ entaqun _ qazigyaghagh meng _ , _ teghig ke sagh ke te _ nuyaaghite yagh lghii _ .
naghulleg aqe luki _ , _ pakinʼgumakanga _ nagun _ iqelqwakun _ itegagh akun _ , _ taawa _ taana _ tuqusiigh iqe a _ , _ pakineg llegh a _ qazigyaghagh m _ .
ategh a _ Anaqsi _ , _ siknegh mii _ .
Atkuyaghhaam _ .
esgha qun _ tuqu naqe negh mta _ aghtugh igate ngugh u kut _ .
yug lgu luku _ enmis _ angu kaqe aat _ siknegh _ ukegkut _ kinguligh t _ .
Yulguftughnguq _ tamaa na ai _ yugwiitelleghllagem _ entaqun _ natangani _ yug lgu yagh uq _ enmis _ ingutughhaghmenguq _ paaghqite te yan _ yug pagite te yan _ aghvenge aghte aqe ut _ tagtalmi _ , _ siknegh mi _ .
amenqun _ ama _ neghqwaaghtuqagh _ .
allakagh mi _ ne u uq _ siknegh _ .
siquveg meng _ allakagh mete uq _ .
yug lgu luku _ entaqun _ Qaaqwaankut _ liite tke aat _ , _ liisimakekagh at _ .
negaghpag ngllagh llegh
Qiipamenguq _ ivalu meng _ negaghpag ke aqe ut _ taagani _ .
elngaatall _ uksulqusigh igh ngugh _ qiipe aqe kangat _ .
Ameriigaghallghi _ tamaakut _ qupneghqutaghqagh t _ , _ eslege llegh i _ kiiwhtaghqutaghqagh t _ , _ iqate lughqutaghqagh t _ , _ negaghpagkagh t _ .
Tawatennguq _ puusngughraggaat _ imigh aqe ait _ whaa _ qafsina m _ yaagneghqagh m _ negaghpag m _ , _ nalluniightugh luteng _ emta _ taaggun _ .
qafsina _ imightugh luku _ .
whaten qun _ kaki naqe negh meggni qun _ qiipi aqe lghiit _ , _ tawaten _ .
Qinungitut _ .
entaqun _ itagnaghi nghata _ , _ aghi ste luki nguq _ enraghngam _ paaggun _ nengqelluki _ .
Iglagtengngwaaghaqaannguq _ , _ nenglute aq _ .
taawa _ kiyaghte aqe ut _ .
Peqlighsighat _ .
tagtale mii _ aghisighlukii _ tawaten _ nekegte aqe luki _ .
entaqun _ piyuke lleg teng _ kaate nghata _ enraghngam _ qilag aqe luki _ negaghpag ngllagh aqe luki _ .
suqagh meng _ pugughyaagh ke na iqe ait _ yeqay _ .
kangghwaag niigh sigh t _ negaghpag t _ .
angli naqe llegh ka _ pugughilegh mi
Aghnaghaghniim _ apegh llegh a
akuzi naqe lghii _ aghnaghaghni ii unga _ ungipamsug naqe lghiinga _ pugughilegh mi _ angli lleg mneng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ allgegh ma lghii _ 1928-mi _ .
angayuqagh kek _ Aglughaankuk _ nategh mii nkuk _ .
Aglughaq _ taana _ Agaankuk _ Iteghyaghaankuk _ ighneghagh k _ , _ nuyeklighpigaam _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ nategh mii m _ angayuqagh kek _ Tutmatelgenkuk _ Pinirkagenkuk _ .
taawa _ allgegh yalghiinga _ nalluke aqa _ talwa _ aakagh ka _ ugwiighumalghii _ sivungagh mii neng _ qiwaaghmii neng _ .
aakagh gka _ maalghug _ .
Kuugghegka _ maalghug _ nuyekligh ak _ whanga mneng _ .
nuyeklighpigagh _ aakagh ka _ Naangiighaq _ , _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ Kargi _ .
naghuyagh nkuk _ , _ Tapghalugwenkuk _ yugte aqe lukek _ .
whanga _ Aghnaghaghniq _ , _ uyughagh gka _ maalghug _ taake uk _ Naaghuluunkuk _ Pitiinkuk _ .
iitek _ angu aqa _ apa ka _ taana _ Agaq _ .
Whatengwaaq _ liigikngwaaghpenaan _ .
iitek _ naghaagh te negh mta _ naghaghutkaghqameng _ sa meng _ tagite aqe kanginkut _ , _ akmaliighaghmeng _ , _ qateghyiighagh meng _ sa meng _ naghaaghute kaghqagh meng _ .
Whatengwaaq _ liigike gpenaan _ , _ Agaaftuq _ taawa _ siivanllegh ut _ .
taake uk _ asag gka _ Agaam _ panig kek _ Atghaangankuk _ Ukumankuk _ .
Qaygeghtaankuk _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ ighnegh kek _ , _ Aglughaq _ nuyeklighpigaam _ tuungligh ghhagh a _ .
kinku u ta i _ taagegkut _ nalluke anka _ .
taana _ asag ka _ atghagh u nga _ ugwilguftuq _ taawa _ Aghtuqaayagmeng _ .
enmis _ mangteghiluteng _ maalghugyaagegneng _ .
aag llegh a _ mangteghapig _ tanpegh meng _ amu iqe lghii _ , _ aag llegh a _ guygu _ .
kiig nghaani _ nuugte aqe luteng _ .
taawa _ mangteghapig ghllag llu _ whanga qun _ angu aqa _ tawani _ nayuqegkayugwat _ .
Kiigunneghisteng _ legan _ tanpeghha _ iike luku _ qaame na nga _ ukmangighwaaghluku _ kiigtagh ke ut _ guygu mi _ .
iwernga _ paninang _ ayagyu t llu _ atuqe u luki _ paninang _ taawa _ esghagh anka _ nanigh t _ .
angli naqe llegh ka _ elngaatall _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ , _ qawavek llu _ iqalliniighyaanun _ pi aqe luta _ , _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ aate te kaghqagh _ .
qawaag m _ amiiragh a _ apeghiigh nghmegteggu _ qawavek _ enraq _ iqallugwanun _ pikayug u ut _ .
iqallug igh ghllag luteng _ tesqawani _ elngaatall _ .
