alla _ pamavek _ nuna mun _ enraq _ kiiwhtagh anun _ enraq _ pi aqe lghiit _ .
qanii luteng qun _ kangii nun _ alla _ uteghte pagte luteng _ wetku _ tawaten _ uteghnigh naqe aqe ukut _ pugughilegh mun _ .
liite lleg mni _ elngaatall _ neqetu pigte uq _ .
Upenghaanneghisteng _ kiyang _ llangaqa _ nazighaankuk _ teghiglugwenkut _ .
teghiglug _ kuuvragh luku _ , _ tasigu luku _ enkaam _ pi aqe kangat _ .
Suflugwaq _ llangaqa _ atuqepag igate kangat _ .
kuuvragh _ neghusigh ke pigte aat _ elngaatall _ teghiglug meng _ .
whanga _ qepghagh yagute magh ma _ kiyang _ nayugwaqegkeput _ tapghaghqagh t _ , _ uyiighqagh t _ , _ angalqataasighqagh t _ .
taakut _ Ngusighmiit _ tagi negh meggni _ tan- qagh u nga llu _ kiyaghte luku _ taawa _ esghagh aqa _ amalleqa _ key- nqigte gpenaan _ .
Agaam _ nayag ke a _ .
Elqwaaghqunkut _ taakut _ kaate aqe ut _ uksugh mi llu _ qimugsigh meng _ , _ kiig mi llu _ angyagh meng _ .
tamaa na _ amiiragh _ nazighagh _ aate te kaghqagh u luku _ , _ teme kaghqagh _ inglukagh ghqu tete luku _ kinku nun _ tuune aqe kangi _ .
taana llu _ tengghu nagh pigte aqe lghii _ angyaghpag _ ategh a _ Trader _ kaate nghaani _ .
amiiragh _ , _ tapghagh _ , _ sa u a llu _ ivory _ , _ aate tke aq llu _ , _ kameg llu _ .
Trade-aaqegkangat _ uksugh mun _ naamakaghqagh _ sa u a _ qayuq _ kagimkagh _ .
Toast _ bread-eghllaguftuqun _ tamaani _ liite lleg mni _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ atalgute nka _ Qaygeghtaam _ avaquti a llu _ , _ Wesqegetenkut _ , _ ayuqligh nkut _ , _ Takeqsiigenkut _ .
napaqagh ghhagh _ taana _ nulightugh luni _ Kukiyangameng _ .
ayapghute nkut _ , _ Anagutaankut _ , _ Agaankut _ , _ asag u ma ainkut _ avaquti a _ .
Taam _ enraq _ kingu aneng _ igaghyagh mun _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ piiwagh qaghaqe luta _ .
whangkuta llu qun _ angyaghnaghhneghani _ aghveghniighmun _ piiwagh qaghaqe ukut _ one _ month-ngiighhaq _ .
enkaam _ tawani _ piiwaqallemmni _ taanangiighhaq _ igaghyaatkaqaghput _ , _ whanga llu _ Naaghuluqlu _ .
Taam _ tagtale ngiighhagh a _ one _ month _ igaghyaatkaqaghput _ .
whanga _ igaghyagh yuwhaagh llegh ka _ sivungagh mun _ .
sivu nge aghte ukut _ nani _ , _ qafsina _ years-ngughteghllagumaghma _ .
nategh mii m _ kuuggha _ teskiwanlenguq _ , _ angag ka _ Anaghayaaq _ .
enkaam _ amalleqa _ qawavek _ tevnegh meggni _ , _ tesqawani _ qemgughutaqukut _ .
apangiighhagh ka _ taana _ naa ma _ ata a _ Tutmatelek _ , _ Uma _ .
tea- ma ghhagh gkenka _ naqamalla _ ategh gni _ atuqe kek _ .
sivuligh _ nuliighpigaa _ Pinirkaguftuq _ naa ma _ qantaghhagh a _ .
enkaam _ allameng _ aviighute yan _ nulightugh luni _ puughhute meng _ nalluke aqa _ .
wetku _ ivagh i ma meng _ nulightugh magh an _ taana _ liisimake aqa _ .
taana llu _ allughqagh at _ siftugh te _ .
Esnighqwaqlu _ kiyang _ tesqawani _ qemgughutaqelghiini _ taghnughhagh u luta _ salin _ mekestaaghhaatu tete luta _ .
tesqawavek _ pite kayugu ut _ , _ taakut llu _ Nungugwenkut _ , _ Apetekinkutlu _ esghaqagh aqe anka _ , _ Walangankutlu _ taakut _ .
siknegh mun _ pi yamta _ tamaakut _ esghaghteghanka _ .
Naqamenraq _ nengyugh ka _ taana _ itegh yagh aq _ liisimakngwaaghaqa _ .
kiyang _ Iteghyaghaghmeng _ liite aqa _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ kagpareghalleq _ .
kagpag llegh a _ neqe m _ liite aqa _ Iteghyaghaghmeng _ akuute llegh i _ sa u aat _ liite qugh anka _ .
qaywa _ whateghllugwaaq _ apeghtugh aqe yanga _ tawani _ liite gpenaki _ , _ kinguvaqun _ liigikngwaaghanka _ .
piinlillegh aneng _ iwernga _ apeghtugh llegh an _ liite luki _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate aat _ .
talwa _ ngelqaam _ qilu ngiighhagh i _ sipeghqughwaaghluki _ agaghte aqe luki _ .
Metghaam _ , _ ngelqaam _ itegagh a _ nuvughteghluku _ kinegh ngllagh aqe luku _ .
angiite tke aq _ entaqun _ igataghnagh iqe llegh mun _ .
agnepa llu _ entaqun _ sa u a _ yaayasi tke igate kangat _ .
atugh yaghqagh perewaagh _ sangiighhagh _ qamagtengngwaaghluni _ .
nunivagseghagh ghhagh mun _ talwa _ tamaavek _ kagpareghallghit _ ellnga neng _ liiqughteghanka _ .
nunivag _ , _ ququngagh _ sa u a _ tamaa na _ akugh anun _ kenlanga _ .
akugh _ uglagh u pigte uq _ taawa _ neghe kayug ut _ elngaatall _ .
alqegkagh t llu _ , _ pughpuuqetlu _ qallate luki _ kagpag kayugu ait _ , _ qallatngwaaghluki _ uksugh mi _ neqekaghqagh u luki _ .
ila i llu _ akugh ghhagh m _ tamaakut _ suqlag t _ , _ suqlamengestagh t _ akughllug ke i _ ama _ pikayugwit _ neqnigh ghllaget _ , _ peknegh t _ .
sa u a _ tamaa na _ neghyaghqagh _ elngaatall _ liilightugh te aqe kangat _ .
ata ma _ Aglughaam _ pi aqe kanganga _ , _ “ _ sa u a _ esghaghkagh i _ ayvegh m _ aqsaqghwanilnguq _ neghyaghqagh perewaagh u uq _ tepagh u luku _ esghagh kufsigu _ . _ ”
enkaam _ amalleqa _ tamaa na _ inghu yaghqaghte a _ aqavzig _ , _ pagunghagh _ , _ kaavlag _ .
Taakunguftut _ inghu luteng _ enraq _ pikayugwet _ .
elngaatall _ aqavzig ghllag u uq _ , _ pagunghagh ghllag u uq _ .
nunivag _ taana _ kiyang _ Singigpameng _ aagken _ pennagh neng _ atate zikun _ tagiteghllakayugwat _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh ghllag luki _ .
laluramke t llu _ esghagh qaghte yug ni tke anka _ laalighte aat _ nalighmeng _ taakut llu _ kiyaghtekau aat _ tesamani _ .
nurse- a llu _ gallegher- meng _ ategh ke lghii _ kaate aghte uq _ .
asag ka _ taana _ up-uma _ emta _ qinuyug ghllagu laatagh uq _ tamaani _ .
liite lleg mni llu _ tawani _ legan _ Bible-eneng _ atightugh kayug ni _ , _ ilagagh kayug ni _ , _ yughagh te kayug ni _ .
Sunday-nkuk _ Wednesday-nkuk _ legan _ taake uk llu _ aflengake lukek _ ayuqe agput _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ atalgute nka _ qemqaghwaaghaqegkenka _ tagisqelluki _ ellngit llu _ ilagagh aqe luta _ qerngagh emta _ yughagh aqe luta _ .
Bible-eghllagetqun _ taawa _ igaqegkaghtuqagh t _ yuvghiigh na ghllaget _ whangkunnl _ tawanteftut _ , _ naken _ imani _ pi kaqe atki _ umu ghllaget _ .
umuqagh meng _ qaspeghagh ke lghiit _ .
mekestaaghhaa lunga _ whanga _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghii _ uksugh mi _ elngaatall _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ qaygeghte aq _ nalighmeng _ Aglughaq _ kaate nghmini _ usi igh ghllag luni _ mission _ box-nguniiqegkangit _ Red _ Cross-enengllu _ .
Whangkunni _ taghnughhagh ni _ elngaatall _ qiliigh nagh lleghpigagh u aqe lghiit _ , _ tengghu nagh lleghpigagh at _ , _ quyanagh lleghpigagh at _ .
qaywa _ paper _ sack-et _ talwa _ esleqellngunateng _ imaleg u yagh ghngaita _ nuts- meng _ , _ candy-meng _ , _ pop _ corn-meng _ whangkunni _ elngaatall _ quyanagh ghllag t _ .
uksugh mi _ enkaam _ sa yaghqagh ite aqe lghii ni _ , _ entaqun _ sa meng _ iwhanilleghqammneng _ quunpeng _ naghaagh ste aqe kanginkut llu _ sa meng _ .
kiyang _ llangaqa _ exercise-estaqegkanginkut _ ilu anite ghngaamta _ , _ uultaatameng _ sa meng _ peghlaaghwagh meng _ , _ estughpagtameng _ .
tawaten _ ilu ani _ qawawaanghinnemta _ mekestaaghhagh meng _ uyghagagh u te aqe lghiikut llu _ .
whanga _ angli lleg mni _ igaghyaghqagh llu _ aklunagh pigte aqe lghii _ .
Magazine-em _ igiitallghaakun _ terugwiteghllagaqelghiikut _ .
taana _ enkaam _ quunpeng _ whanga _ favorite-kelluku _ qimugsigh _ usi leg ghllag _ mission _ box-meng _ sakmaken _ sivuqagh meng _ tagi lghii _ terugwiyukelleghpigaqegkegka _ .
tawani qun _ sivulighpigaghmi _ igaghyagh lleg mni _ sivungagh mun _ artist-nguniiqaatnga _ qayughllak _ entaqun _ uuvganeng _ terugwighllagem _ .
sa u aat _ legan _ terugwinemki _ elqughaghte aqe luki _ .
kiig mi _ amalleqa _ neqamike aqa _ teghigniqe llegh ka _ .
iighaate aqe lghiikut _ , _ veg a llu _ riigllugwallu _ taake ghllaget _ tamaavek _ iighaate aqe lghiikut _ .
sa meng llu _ ategh i _ esgha _ puygu kenka _ , _ naghpigh aqe luki _ aglu t _ ila mta _ inglu ke te luta _ ataasigh _ qamughtekluku _ aglu gneng _ naghpigh naqute aqe ke put _ .
qenwat _ naghpigh lleg t _ uglaghi ghllag aqe lghiit _ naghpigh iqe ait _ neghqwaagh t _ tamaakut _ qamugh it _ .
qetgagh te aqe luta llu _ , _ sa u aat _ tamaakut _ naghaagh lleg put _ teghig nagh tun _ avighaate aqe ut _ .
Atuqesugwaqanka _ whanga _ maaten _ eltughagh mnun _ .
tamaakut llu _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ ivaghiniightet _ , _ quyngighqwaagh t _ .
quyngigh ghllag u yagh u uq _ liite lleg mni _ tamaani _ , _ uglagh pestaagh ghllag _ enraq _ kaynge m llu _ entaqun _ malighqagh nghminiki _ pangaleg u ghllag aqe lghii _ quyngigh _ saamllu _ vegtaagh m _ pangalgughqeghllagaqegkanga _ .
aagken _ imagh a _ Pengutneng _ aliigh luni _ pamagun _ Kangighaagnekun _ kiwavek _ aga _ teve ghllag aqe lghii _ .
allameng _ sivuqagh meng _ uteghnigh yalghiikut _ uvite mi _ nughagh ghhagh t _ legan _ tuquma aqe lghiit _ .
tamaani _ entaqun _ nula ghllag llegh ani _ quyngigh m _ .
ata ma _ Aglughaam _ ungipamsug ke nghminiki _ qawani _ quyngigh igh na i aaghet _ Pangawyinkut _ kinku t _ kiyalighagh mi _ nani _ tesqawani _ .
Quynginnguq _ legan _ qaghlu luki _ qamisluugllaget _ uqfilqaaghmeng _ tesqawanlengughmeng _ avayagh aneng _ kepugh ghllag luteng _ usi igh nghmegteki _ quyngigh t _ qamughtekluki _ qikmigh stun _ .
taawa _ ellnga llu _ igagh lgu uq _ buck _ deer-meng _ quyngigh lgu kau ni yagh uq _ ellmi llu _ .
enraq _ taam _ kingu aneng _ aviite luta _ salin _ pennaghqute te luni _ sa u a _ maana _ care-enanighluku _ .
tamaani _ enkaam _ mekestaaghhaa lunga _ quyngighyat _ kaate aqe lghiit _ iwhaninkut _ Raaquunkut _ , _ kinkungwaaqat _ ila i _ uglagh _ katelghaate aqe lghii _ .
kiig mi _ enkaam _ anglu ighpag magh ma _ piyug meng llu _ Uyatiqaankut _ maakut _ kaate aqe ut _ quyngigh meng _ ivaghiyat _ .
enkaam _ entaqun _ Aghtuqaayagenkut _ , _ Qaygeghtaankut _ igaghyiisqelluki _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh teng _ sivulighpigaagut _ sivuqagh mun _ nuughqwaatkat _ liisimake lleg mni _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ siingenllu _ up-uma _ kiiste i vig meng _ ugwiightuq _ .
enkaam _ kayute igh te naqe ni luni llu _ Aglughaq _ pi aqe lghii _ , _ sivuqagh mun _ ellnga llu _ piigwaghtukut _ iwemga _ taam _ kingu aneng _ , _ Aglughaq _ aviighute magh an llu _ paninang _ Pitiim _ nayugh ke yagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
nulightugh luni _ pi te i uq _ kaviigh niigh uq _ tesamani _ elngaatall _ .
pi ta igh u uq _ whanga _ ugwiighumaghma _ kingu mneng _ taagken _ pi te i uq _ kingulighpigagh u uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lli aqe aq _ .
tawani llu _ pi te i uq _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ taakunguut _ Nungugwenkut _ , _ qagugh mii _ kelgute luni _ mangteghagh ghhagh a _ atugh naqe ni luku _ aghveghniighmun _ .
Aghveghllagwaaqelghii _ taakwnangiighhaq _ qantagh aq _ taawa _ taagken _ piinligh kau uq _ maaten _ neli kangat _ itagnatun _ aghveghniighmun _ .
ipa _ whangkuta _ kingulighpigagh u ukut _ .
taana _ apa ka _ Agaq _ kiyaghte luki _ iitek _ entaqun _ siivanlleghpigaqaat _ tesamani _ .
iitek _ Tutmatelgenkutlu _ kaate aghte aqe ut _ .
kiyang _ qawani _ iqalliniighvig mi _ qerngughte te aqe lghiikut _ taakut llu _ Elqwaaghqunkut _ qantaghantengnguut _ kaate neghtuqagh t _ tesamavek _ .
kiyang _ kiiggun _ tevnga kun _ Apetekinkutlu _ taakut _ waamte uute te nkut _ tevegkayugwet _ .
enkaam _ tamaani _ wetku _ esghagh aqe kegka _ uglagh lghii _ yuug _ .
pugughilegh
Ukumam _ apegh llegh a
iighwite luta _ Kargi _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ entaqun _ talwa _ taghnughhagh pagite ukut _ Agaankuni _ .
piqalag _ taake uk _ nunaagh gket _ , _ ne gket _ mangteghagh leg k _ .
ighulugh leg k _ ika _ akmagutagh leg k _ .
iwernga _ mayugh aatagh lleg mni _ imani _ nuna ughtekagh _ .
Ingantaqelghiinnguq _ pennaghte negh meggni _ , _ sivuke luteng _ kuyag nge ma gni _ .
kuyag nge ma gni _ tawani _ kiyaghte luteng _ atghagh aqe lghiit _ agavek _ piqalag nun _ .
taakwagun _ sugugte luteng _ , _ yugwita _ angaghqugh aqe kangit _ .
aghni ut _ pamagun _ mayughtuutaqelghiinnguq _ .
Iteghyaghaankut _ , _ Walkutankut _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ Walkutam _ kayaalqekataghaqegkanga _ itegh yagh aq _ .
tawaten _ emta _ quutquutaqegkanginguq _ qikmigh t _ , _ Aglughaam _ .
amenqun _ Piqalam _ paagna a _ uusqagh ghllag _ tespagani _ .
Tawatennguq _ iiwenllu nguq _ ivgagh naqe aqe ut _ uugte na luteng _ Iteghyaghaankut _ araghtunnguq _ , _ “ _ Aglughaq _ ullegh uq _ , _ pennaghqute te uq _ ! _ ” _ test- pig ke na _ anigu leg _ .
legan _ taagken _ sa u luki _ usi teng _ qetgegh te aat _ .
ellnga n llu nguq _ iitek _ esghagh aa _ uka _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ naa ke i _ .
Palaghhaghmenguq _ aliigh qaghaqe uq _ .
esghaghhu nguq _ Kargi _ ataata a _ , _ Agaam _ anengagh a _ , _ sa mi nguq _ sugugte lit _ aga _ nalug tke aq _ .
aga _ taakwagun _ whaa _ siingenllu _ itegh qaghte lghii _ anigu mun _ tespikavek _ .
Iwerngaqunnguq _ sa luku _ pi litgu _ .
aliigh te nghminigu nguq _ pika _ yuguyuglluni _ .
qughagh nghaani nguq _ ima _ talughte te aqe a _ .
ullegh na nigh an _ tawaten _ ukig te ma kangat _ .
aaw yagh ghllag _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ uuknaghllaga _ kiiluugteghllakaq _ .
navek _ pi kau aat _ tawavek llu _ uugta t _ alaghrang _ piqalag nun _ .
taawa _ taana _ pennaghqute te llegh an _ angegh llegh ke a _ .
qikmigh a _ talwa _ avii tke aat _ naa ke i _ .
taana _ yugusigh ghhagh a _ tugu qaghtekagh at _ .
alignagh yagute aqe kanga _ ilagagh igate ngughk _ naqam _ sa igate ngughk _ , _ Kargi _ , _ anengagh ni _ Agaam _ .
Esghhaghunguq _ yugupagningilnguq _ unguva stekagh a _ Aglughaq _ qangigagh ni _ .
kinku u lghii ni _ tuqu yaghqagh _ .
Naasqwa _ kagimekagh _ .
taakwani _ kingu ani _ whangkuta _ , _ Naangiighaqlu _ allgegh magh an _ , _ ifkagh nqigte laataghkagh _ .
ifkagh gpenani _ kaave i ke ghllag ke aq _ .
talligh kek _ sa ghllag ke ak _ .
Napaqaghhaankunguut _ , _ Aglughaankut _ , _ whangkuta _ Milghulagni _ Naangiighaq _ , _ nategh mii _ , _ whanga _ .
utaqa i ni _ pennaghtagh neng _ .
Ngelqaaghaghyat _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ Aglughaankut _ , _ Qaygeghtaankut _ .
kingu itneng _ whangkuta _ , _ Naangiighaqlu _ amsakelghii _ tamaani _ , _ angtaalgutkutevzigni _ .
neqe meng _ gaagh luta _ , _ apeghiigh luni _ nategh mii _ utaqa i ukut _ manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
nutem _ paga _ , _ aliigh yalghiimeng _ aga _ qagughrug mi _ tan-kaghyage m _ qula ani _ , _ imani llu _ sukaghllag t _ .
mate- te ghhagh inagh _ aga _ aliighagh ut _ whaa _ ukig ut _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ imani _ seghleghu ut _ .
iwerngaqun _ gginagh ghhagh _ una _ sallghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ manughagh mun _ tafsi igh yalghiimi _ aawyaghpaghqu _ ifkagh qu uute uq _ .
ilapga qu te aqe uq _ , _ naasqugh ghllag a _ .
aaw ightugh luku _ , _ qantaghqagh leg nun _ aqfaqugh naqe uk _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ , _ Qaygeghtaankuk _ .
manughagh mi _ qakmani _ .
whangkuta _ sa aqe ukut _ ilu ani _ .
Qiinghaghsalghiimi _ imani _ sungghanagh uq _ “ _ aglagh uute naqe ukut _ ! _ ” _ ima _ aga _ sivugwaghtuq _ .
pi naqe i nagh ma luta _ aga llu _ Akulpeghamun _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
Malighqaqefut _ Naangiighaq _ , _ whanga _ , _ nategh mii _ .
ima _ aga _ nuughtughaqertaghput _ .
enankin _ nategh mii m _ aga _ katqaghtaa _ , _ ugwini _ Aglughaq _ , _ arekull _ sa ghllag _ nalpagh ghllag _ kenlanga ii te ghllag _ .
Nuqneghteghaataqanga _ kaateqaghtagh ung _ .
Naangiighaqlu _ aghnaghaghhaluku _ .
Nuqneqluku _ kenigh akun _ tukegh lleghtagh ghllag ni _ , _ legan _ ava igh lleg ke ainkut _ .
pugughilegh mun _ amavek _ aglagh te ainkut _ .
Tumangillghanun _ atghagh te luta _ tume nun _ pi aqe luta _ .
ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe luta _ , _ uyghagkagh ightu aghagh a sa _ .
amalka _ qikmigh kun _ tugu laghate luta _ .
aawallu _ Silqinangagnun _ kaate aghte ukut _ .
iiwenllu _ samaken _ ukig te luta _ mayugh aqe ukut _ tume nun _ agavek _ ika _ nategh mii _ araghaatagh ghllag _ wasi _ nagaqugh lleqe aat _ , _ ingarugpak _ , _ paghyugh lghiikut _ whangkuta _ .
enankin _ kaatqaghsaqmininkut _ yuwhaak _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkuk _ .
aga _ ima _ , _ whangkuta _ peghte uute luta _ .
amalka _ qikmigh _ nengyagha _ , _ igleghte naqe a _ , _ Aglughaq _ .
sa mi _ kaate lta _ whangkuta _ , _ neghigh pigte luku _ kaat ute ma kagh nge aat _ .
taawa _ ingaghmete uq _ , _ ingaghte ma kangat _ nekgumalghii _ Aghtuqaayagem _ inag mig ke a _ .
aqfaqugh ma kanga _ Iteghyaghaam _ Aghtuqaayak _ .
tamaa na _ qanegh mineng _ aaw a _ paamsugteghaqeftaa _ talligh m _ uum _ kiitigh llegh a _ , _ atkugwa _ piig aqe luni _ .
nuqete naagh nghite ngugh t _ qaligh ghhaat _ qiipaghagh t _ , _ atkugwet _ amighqwaagh t _ .
Naasqwa _ qukfighte aqe luku _ , _ agavesaasluku _ aqume ste luku _ legan _ qanegh mineng _ nusug luki _ uyghag t _ lli aqe ai _ , _ kii _ uyghag ghllag u uq _ amighregagh m _ kiigh a _ .
whaa nguq _ naasqugh _ una _ ukifkagh kaayagh kuni _ unguva nagh u yagh nghite uq _ .
qanegh mineng _ ulu mineng _ , _ nusugwaqii _ uyghag t _ ila i _ aange aqe luteng _ .
Iwemgaqun _ eflughwaaghaqluki _ uyghagighteghwaaghaa _ .
Nekegraamsiighluni _ taagken _ igleghte yaaghte yalghiimi _ piniighte yalghiimi _ ellnginaghhaayaghqaagpenani _ , _ quunpeng _ alelighyuneghtughqwaaluni _ .
sa uq _ kakavleghwaaghaqluni _ , _ alingruugh ghllag aqe luni _ , _ nekgaqluni _ .
taawa _ ugpegh llegh gni _ aghula igh te lukek _ .
Whangkunginaamta _ alignalghii mun _ pi naqe ghllag _ .
qenwat qun _ Aawyaankuk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ tagi tke agput _ , _ aqfa kek _ kitum _ , _ atghak _ maavek _ .
naqamllu _ sa nghite ak _ , _ temngi _ sa naanghite ni luku _ naten _ yuwhaam _ .
Nuliiqruwhaa _ taana _ leganqun _ tengghu nagh _ aghnagh ghhagh _ .
nalla ghhagh _ pi uq _ , _ “ _ ukughsi _ , _ elpesi ni llu _ quyangapigsinga _ ? _ ” _ agnepa _ tawatete igate yagh unga _ tugunghiinemki _ iilqe ghllag aqe unga _ sa yaghqagh nun _ . _ ” _ legan _ aghnagh ghhagh _ qalepangi ghllag _ ilagavaghqughllak _ .
Nutern _ pi inkut _ , _ “ _ tuqu naanghite uq _ alingutke gpenaan _ .
Umyugwagka _ qama _ pi niigh pigte uk _ . _ ”
taagken _ yugwem _ kelqutaaqsaqmininga _ Aglughaam _ , _ navek _ pi nghmini _ .
piniighte a _ mulunghituq _ , _ maavek llu _ tagi aqe luni _ .
taawa _ tagtale ke a _ .
angli naqngu lunga
Wesqegetem _ apegh llegh a
kiig mi _ tesamani _ kiyaghte llegh ut _ .
kii _ , _ ne mete igate ukut _ .
pennagh ni _ kiyaghte luta _ aga _ nasiqe negh meggni _ qawavek _ naayvagh mun _ .
Milghulagnillu _ , _ kuyag nge ma gni _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ .
alpa _ sa u a _ ngelqaaghaq _ pi iqagh ut _ kiilqusigh _ .
iqallug _ iwerngaqun _ nasiqute luku _ , _ tagi aghte luta _ esnagh mi _ tentaluta _ kiyaghte aghte luta _ apeghiineghmeggteggu _ kagpagteghluta _ itghagh aqe luta _ aghvighteg nun _ .
Fourteen _ years-ngughsimaghma _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
aglagh aqe luta _ , _ piiwagh qagh luta _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aglagh qaghaqe luta _ tagi aqe luta _ .
tagi luta _ qenwat _ lliipiigtukut _ ayuqligh _ igaghyagh lghii _ qayughllak _ tuungligh ka _ .
Piigwapiigtukut _ fourteen _ years-ngughsimaghma _ .
sivuqaghte negh mta _ Iirgunkunitaqukut _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ uum _ aasa m _ angayuqagh itni _ Aghnaghlluwhaankut _ .
angyaghpag t _ pugughilegh mete luta _ kaate aqe lghiit _ Trader _ , _ angyaleg at _ kina _ Mr. _ Ranka _ , _ ila nga nigh kun _ Castell _ .
Castell-kun _ atasimeng _ sivuqagh meng _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh ukut _ .
Iirgunkutgun _ piiwagh luta _ aglagh te ainkut _ taaggun _ .
Taakunginaagut _ angyaghpag t _ .
igaghyagh llghite unga _ .
sivuqagh mi _ one-year _ igaghyagh qagh lunga _ taaqe kau unga _ .
naghaaghute lgu ukut _ sa meng _ ulimaagh meng _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ naghaghutengllaqat _ , _ qamiye u aq _ , _ angyaghwaagh _ , _ sa u a _ .
uqfigagh t qun _ amen _ tangigh llegh ghqu aaghet _ pickup _ sticks-kelluki _ tamaaken _ naghaagh te kaqsagh ukut _ , _ iighhagh u te meng _ , _ qawawaagh meng _ .
Meteghllugwaaghet _ sa u aat _ unaghsiiwaqlluteng _ .
mangteghagh t _ Aghtuqaayagenkut _ , _ Aglughaq _ , _ whangkuta _ .
guygu mun _ whangkuta _ lliigh ukut _ liitngwaaghumaghma _ neqamike aqa _ .
entaqun _ taakut _ qemtagh ghllag mi _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke te lghiit _ tawani _ whangkuta _ guygu mun _ lliigh ukut _ .
angyat nge llegh _ nalluke aqa _ , _ liisagh lghiinga _ taawa _ angyaghwaagh lgu ukut _ .
entaqun _ Pedersen-meng _ pikniiqaat _ .
nekreg te nkut llu _ tesamantaghtaqluteng _ entaqun _ anglegute mini _ tawani _ Aghtuqaayagmi _ esghagh aatagh aqe anka _ kaate aghte nghata _ ilangani _ .
Ungipamsugwet _ tamaakut _ ila i _ enraq _ alingyugwem _ , _ kiyang _ ighivgaghmi _ ungipamsug te lghii neng _ .
Ipangughtesugnighqwaanghata _ alingyagunnemki _ ila i _ , _ naa ke i _ qavaghnaqragkiighem _ .
qevuute lunga _ qemall _ ilangani _ qivghukaqlluki _ .
sangan lli _ nagatngwaaghnanighsinga _ .
puygu ma anka _ ungipamsugwet _ sa u aat _ nagate ghllag luki _ .
qemall _ whaa _ neqangugh lleqe anka _ .
amalka _ esgha _ legan _ liite lleg mni _ exercise-esteghllagumaaqinkut _ estughte pagte aq _ sa u a _ , _ qetgaq _ exercise-esimaaqegkanginkut _ esgha _ naghaagh ste nghmegtekut _ , _ pinighyuugtestaqiinkut _ .
aanqaghte luta _ alla _ mangteghagh t _ uzifqaghte luki _ wiin _ neghe ste gpenaamta _ .
Ighsaaningitesqelluta _ entaqun _ pinighyuugtesqelluta _ malighqutagh ke u yalghiikut _ legan _ .
kii _ , _ naghaaghute _ allaaghiinaq _ sa u a _ naghaalqusiighutkaqsaqefut _ .
pugughilegh m _ Paneghaatellgha
Ukumam _ apegh llegh a
Anagutaam _ taana _ ungipamsug ke kanga _ paneghaateghllak _ .
talwa _ ellnga _ nukalpigagh u luku _ , _ ungipamsug ke yaghqagh a nguq _ talwa _ urang _ seghleghu uq _ .
Qamagtengngwaaghluni _ pugughilegh _ yugwiqaa _ , _ igatam _ saam _ qinuyugwem _ .
mesiighllug kun _ anigu t _ nepte luki _ negh aqe luki _ .
nanigh m _ peqagh i _ , _ uqullugwi _ , _ ellngagh ta i _ qaamkut _ negh aqe luki _ .
avaqutagh teng _ paneghte yu i ma kangit _ .
taagavek _ aane te luki _ kiiw m _ inglu anun _ lli aqe luki _ , _ kayaalim _ ukavek _ lliigh ut _ .
taagani _ kayaali llegh mi _ , _ legan _ amig meng _ aane ste luki _ ifkaghte aqe kangit _ , _ manughagh mun _ tawavek _ .
qenwat _ aane te nanigh ma kangit _ .
taana ta _ Pitiim _ iiggekagh a _ asimmnilnguq _ saamna _ yug meng _ imaqe ghllag uq _ .
Aghuliightuuteghlagluteng _ .
katamqun _ anagte u ma lghiit _ Iteghyaghaankut _ , _ Agaankut _ , _ Anagutaankut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ uyughaqutalghiit _ .
pamavek nguq _ mayugh aqe lghiit _ taslugh kete te luteng _ .
sa meng _ neqe meng _ ivaghimsugyaghaqelghiit _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ Iteghyaghaankut _ .
tamaani nguq _ tuqu quqagh _ , _ llivegh _ .
Kangkiilghem _ peghyalqaani _ taakwani _ .
entaqun _ igleghtaayaghluteng _ panegh pigesnaghkagh t _ , _ negh ke igh llegh m _ .
Siqlugwam _ , _ iigge llegh i _ afsengagh m _ sa i _ neghughaqluki _ , _ mesiighllug vyiigh ghhagh i _ neghughaqluki _ .
megh kun _ pugughilegh _ neqe igh ghllag kaqe na iqe kanga _ Anagutaam _ .
Legannguq _ tuugtagh t _ aane te luki _ kaate nghata _ maaken _ , _ aavguneghmeggteki _ qukikun _ aafkagh inagh aqe luki _ .
Aqimlennguq _ tuugtagh m _ aveg llegh m _ katamngwaagh _ .
Paneghaatellghani _ tamaani _ .
neqetu yagh lghii _ pugughilegh _ .
sivuqagh _ igataghnagh _ .
iwernga _ megh kun _ pugughilegh m _ negh ka aneng _ anagkagh t _ entaqun _ .
Tesamantekaayalghiikut _ siipnegh ghhagh ni _ angayuqagh gka llu _ , _ anglegukaghaankallu _ , _ taawaraaghinaq _ nanevgaghtagh ut llu _ .
tazikani _ Anagutaankut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ Aghtuqaayagenkut _ .
taawa _ pugughilegh m _ yug ke aa _ .
Tutmatelgenkut _ neghigh pigte luteng _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ talwa _ itghaghkagh t _ sivungagh mun _ .
Anaghayaam _ itghagh tke ai _ .
Qaaqwaankut _ , _ Tutmatelgenkut _ , _ puughhute nkut _ .
taakut _ itghagh tke ai _ aki vig nkut _ , _ tagnegh linkut _ panig ni _ ila i _ .
Qawagem _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ atkug ngllaghkagh t
nanevgaghtagh mta _ ungipagh iqe te igate kanginkut _ .
Kukulegmiinnguq _ pugughilegh mun _ piyug uute ghllag negh meggni _ upenghagh mi _ .
sagnegh _ pakegtekagh _ , _ akmag ke luku _ qayugh te aq _ .
sukilpagh mun _ , _ qawaag m _ amighqwaagh anun _ .
kiyang _ aate kau yaghpete ut _ ngelqaankut _ , _ sukilpagh nkut _ , _ alpa nkut _ , _ naghuyagh nkut _ , _ qaqsungiinkut _ .
esghaghteqagh nka _ angayuqagh ma _ naa ma _ ulima aqe kangi _ .
qaqsungigh at _ atkug u luteng _ entaqun _ alpa stun _ 35-nguut _ .
naghuyagh t _ , _ ngelqagh stun _ 25-nguut _ .
sukilpagh t _ 85-nguluteng _ atkugwet _ .
akmaliighagh ghhagh t _ tamaakut _ 100 _ atkug u luteng _ naamakayugwet _ .
amighqwaagh t _ esghapag lleg mni _ sivuke luki _ ghhute kun _ ghhute ngllaghkagh kun _ tequgh kun _ , _ naagu _ soap-engiighhaq _ aghvig nghminiki _ naa ma _ , _ talwa _ whanga _ , _ qateghrakgalek _ taaqnemteki _ .
Ininaqnemteki _ , _ tequgh ghhagh t _ tequghpaagtekaghhaat _ mesiigh meng _ kuuve luki _ qateghqwaasluki _ .
angighhwaagh luki _ amighqwaagh t _ .
itghuugute neghsigh luki _ , _ ini luki _ .
Nengtaghhnemteki _ , _ aayqateghraketun _ .
whanga _ qantaghaqun _ taaqe kanga _ tamaaken _ amighqwaagh meng _ qepghagh nghmeng _ .
ighleg yagute yatnga _ taaqe unga _ .
aki ngllagh ghllagu yalghiinga _ amighqwaagh meng _ tamaaken _ , _ ngelqaankugneng _ , _ alpankugneng _ , _ sukilpaankuneng _ .
Qugwinii _ sivuke luki _ keligagh aqe ke put _ .
Gevestengngwaaghluki _ ngelqagh at _ , _ naghuyagh t _ .
qateg i _ ukut _ atugh aqe ut _ qamagte luteng _ .
qateg i _ allakagh meng _ atugh u ut _ , _ salleg i _ allakagh meng _ .
pinighhalek _ atkugwet _ maqagh ghhalek _ .
ghhuu yaghqagh ghhagh u nghite ngugh t _ .
aghsughtagh ghhagh meng _ kiigh mig luki _ , _ ngelqagh at _ qaasligh ke luki _ .
quyngigh meng _ amigh meng _ ilepghaghluteng _ .
kavighyaag meng _ kavighte luki _ amigh t _ taakut _ , _ ilepghaaghet _ kavirrakgalek _ pinighhalek _ .
Temkaghluki _ aatkayugwet _ .
Iteghyaghaam _ ungipamsug te nghminikut _ sangita _ paamkughhmiingita _ nalighnegh ita _ upenghagh u uute nghatni nguq _ nughaghmeng _ , _ neqe meng _ , _ amigh meng _ atghagh te ghllag aqe kanga _ , _ tagite aqe kangat _ .
sa eng _ nayag eng _ taana _ Panganga _ tagite aqe kangat _ , _ Pangangaawen _ upenghagh u ta a _ tamaghhagh an _ , _ amigh _ , _ neqe _ , _ quyngigh _ , _ tawaqapig _ .
talwa _ esghaghkagh nka _ tawaqapig i _ .
sungaghyug kegtagh ghllag t _ ququngagh ghllag t _ iknaqe ghllaget _ tawaqa t _ .
ila i _ sungaghyaag u aqe luteng _ .
taana qun _ naa ma _ imeg te a _ , _ maana _ nazighagh _ qukaa kun _ kepe luku _ tamaaken _ imaleg _ .
iknaqe ghllag _ , _ tawaqa isag negh meggni _ ikute aqe luteng _ taagken _ amiiragh meng _ taapekagh meng _ .
maaten _ esghapag lleg mni _ tawaqa llu _ allangughte uq _ .
melugyaghqagh _ allangughte uq _ .
pugughileghmii t
pugughilegh mi _ Ukumam _ angayuqagh kek _ Agaankuk _ Iteghyaghaankuk _ .
avaquti a _ anglegute nka _ uglagh u pigte lghiit _ .
qule u yaghpete ukut _ pi nga yu t _ siipnegh ke luki _ , _ kinkughyawaat _ .
liisimakekagh ghhagh nka _ atghagh u yankut _ , _ Aglughaankut _ , _ Qaygeghtaankut _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ , _ Kavnaghuunkut _ .
Liisimakuqenka _ taakut _ .
Agaam _ taam _ nayag i _ ivagh i ma nkut _ , _ tan- qagh u yankut _ , _ Wesqegetenkut _ , _ saghumig m _ avaquti a _ .
Naaghuluq _ ama _ sa ke aa _ .
Kargi _ taana _ anengagh a _ , _ megh mi _ tuqukagh _ , _ ighnegh ghhagh a llu _ Agaamllu _ ighnegh a _ .
negaghaghni ii aagh mi _ uksugh mi _ Singigpami _ taawani _ .
quunpeng _ negaghagh niigh ghllaget _ taakut _ metghaghmeng _ .
kangghwaag _ unakughaqegkangat _ .
emta _ tawaten _ negaghagh yagh luteng _ aviite ut _ tazimante ut _ .
unaami _ ivaghyaghtughyaqmegteki _ , _ taawa nguq _ qawaagtagh teng _ allakagh ita _ , _ avaqutagh mi _ qawaagtagh ghhagh i _ allakagh ita _ negaghagh ghhagh i _ ellnga n _ .
uugte ma lghii nguq _ kanaken _ aghipatuumagh mi _ .
tawani _ yataaghqelluki _ taakut _ aga nguq _ taaggun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ tazimante ut _ .
taakut _ Tutmatelgenkut _ tesamantekat _ esghaghkagh nka _ aki vig nkuk _ Anaghayaankuk _ avaqutagh kek _ Tutmatelgem _ , _ nulighh a _ Pinirkak _ .
Iteghyaghaam _ kuuggha _ taana _ Tutmatelek _ .
itegh yagh aq _ naa ka _ , _ quutmii t _ panig at _ .
taana _ Iteghyaghaam _ ata a _ Gugwiingen _ .
Nuliighpigani _ tuqu yan _ ungazigh mun _ nulightugh yaghtugh luni _ , _ Gugwiingen _ .
atghagh yalghiimi nguq _ Panganganguftuq _ nulighh a _ .
enkaam _ Iteghyaghaankuk _ , _ Napaqaghhankuk _ avaqutagh kek _ .
tuqu yan _ , _ kukuleg mun _ qawavek _ nulightugh yaghtugh ma lghii _ .
tagi yalghiimi _ nuliigh ligh luni _ Waallameng _ .
talwa _ whanga _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ , _ aghnagh ghllag _ kukuleg mii _ .
taana llu _ Gugwiingen _ esghaqagh vyiigh kaqe aqa _ .
taana _ Waalla _ iwerngaqun _ pekam _ tuqu tke a _ .
taana _ Gugwiingen _ ugwinga _ sa meng _ qugwelngimeng _ negh neghllug te luni _ tuqukagh _ .
umeg ke i
Ayumirugllak _ , _ neghigh luku _ tesamani _ umeg ke i _ aghnagh _ tuquma lghii _ .
taglaate luku _ kiiw m _ taagavek _ inglu anun _ ika _ aliite uq _ .
Tallimaneng _ qavagh yan _ ugwingan _ esghagh yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
taakwegken _ nenglu neng _ agigsaqminigu _ ika nguq _ aqume luni _ .
taku luku _ aaggun _ uyavagh qu te _ alingyug ke m _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ alinge yu ke gpenanga _ tea- ai _ taku nga _ , _ tea- ai _ aqfa nga _ . _ ”
aglagh luni _ yuug _ , _ siqinghem _ aghnagh _ qateghrakgitaghta _ tagneghkwaagh lug ni _ siqinegh ghllag ke aq _ , _ ugu te ghllag ke aq _ .
tagite a _ atghagh te a _ , _ ighsa uq _ ne mun _ itegh nghmeng _ .
Tesqagagun _ uvite megteggun _ tanpeghhek _ ayagsigh lukek _ ne ke ak _ .
Tawanlluku _ , _ sa yaghqagh t _ negh kangit _ ighsa kaqe luki _ .
pi niigh luni _ ungipamsug kekagh a _ kingu liigh aq _ allangughte lleqe ni luku _ .
lengaaghsi magh mi _ , _ qelmeghte magh mi _ , _ qilag kun _ igleghte yaaghte yaghqagh _ .
Legannguq _ esnagh mun _ unʼgavek _ ugkelli yaghtugh aqe lleqe ut _ kinguliighagh put _ whangkuta _ .
taawa _ elqughte a _ .
ipapik _ tuqu nqigte ma lghii _ mulu luni _ qafsina _ ayumiqullegh _ atugh luku _ .
ataata ngiighhagh ma _ Anagutaam _ esghagh kaqe na iqe kanga _ umeg ke i _ taana _ .
Taakunginaaftukut _ whanga _ liisagh lghiinga _ katam _ family- ngiighhagh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ , _ Aglughaankut _ .
lwerngaqun _ tazikegkut _ Anagutaankut _ , _ Aghtuqaayagenkut _ , _ atghagh u yankut _ .
Aghtuqaayak _ Sivuqaghhmii _ .
igagh a _ taana _ Taasna _ .
esla m _ seghlegh m _ tesamagun _ qaakekagh at _ .
talwa _ uksugh _ qukaghte ste gpenaan _ tagikagh _ .
laluramke meng _ esghaate igate ngugh ni _ pugughilegh mi _ .
angyagh t _ ayvegh m _ kangllukagh i
taakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ aviitete te luta _ , _ Aglughaghhiinaankuk _ Atghaangankuk _ avaqutagh ke u lukek _ .
agigte te nkut _ taakut _ angyagh t _ Gugwiingenkut _ angyaghut _ .
nani _ taanʼgani _ nalle inagh mi _ ayvegh m _ kanglu ghllag aatagh luki _ taakut _ Gugwiingenkut _ anag ma lghiit _ .
Taakunnguq _ sama _ qagegh ta ghllag t _ .
Qaagghiisan _ taku luki _ piyaqmegteki _ megh _ yug ghllag _ , _ taakut _ agigte te nkut _ panig i _ , _ nulighh a _ , _ avaquti a _ .
ategh ka llu _ tawannii _ .
Kanuuglluninguq _ iimna _ megh _ .
angyagh t _ aaghwngaghmi _ naafqelluni _ .
Taananginaghhaghnguq _ ategh ka _ pukanegh llgagh u yagh lghii _ suflitaghmi _ .
Taam _ apangiighhagh mta _ ighsake ma kanga _ qaake lleghqagh a _ .
legan _ unite luki _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
Kingungitnenguq _ taakwani _ kiig mi _ qikmigh at _ naave ut _ mulaagh te aatagh ghllaget _ .
Kangkiileghmi _ ingansalghiit _ Peghyalqam _ ukakaghaani _ mangteghagh at _ .
qikmigh ke te luki _ tuqu qugh ma ait _ , _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ panegh qugh ma kangit _ .
nanugh m _ Taghnughhiiqengellgha
nenglu it _ tamaakut _ ayumightagh ghllag t _ .
aviite luki _ talwa _ Iteghyaghaankut _ tugutu te mangite luki _ .
entaqun _ ayumigh _ yugtu pigte yagh lghii nguq _ matumeng _ talwa _ .
nenglu i _ estamat _ yugtu ghllaget _ .
aatghute ghllag negh meggni nguq _ taghnughhaperugwaaq _ unite luku _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag negh meggni _ .
tesamani _ esnagh mi _ naghaagh te ghllag aqe lghiit _ , _ taghnughhagh it _ .
alla _ tawaten _ naghaaghuteghllaglutenguq _ amaken _ Uygunaneng _ nanugh ghllag m _ ivgagh ma aki _ qughsatku m _ .
qughsatku m _ uugte vike ma kangi _ .
nanugh ghllag m _ tuqu qugh ma a _ taghnughhagh _ tamaa na _ .
Atasighhiinaq _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ anagkagh _ .
tuqu quqagh ni _ tamaa na _ neghuumaa _ ila i _ siipte aqe luki _ , _ naa squghhagh inagh i _ negh aqe luki _ , _ nakaghiinii _ negh aqe luki _ .
Tamlaghqusalghiimeng _ taghnughhagh ghllag _ , _ kanug ghllag _ kaana _ esnagh m _ kenle ani _ .
Taghnughiighwaaghluni _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ legan _ .
taamna _ taghnughhagh igh vig _ , _ naghaagh vig it _ akullghute aat _ aki itnite ngughk _ .
taghnughhagh _ naghaagh yagh te ghllag aqe lghii _ taamavek _ .
esghaghhu _ taakut _ kaave ghllag ma ut _ qula at _ .
sama _ taghnughhagh a _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ peghu ghllag qagh a _ naghaagh vig at _ .
neqamike llegh ka _ pugughilegh mete luta
ayapghute m _ apegh llegh a
whanga _ ayapghute u unga _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh m _ panig a _ , _ Kukiyangam _ panig a _ .
Ngusiigni _ allgegh kau unga _ Octoher _ 29,1927 _ .
ayumiqullegh _ ataasigh _ Ngusiignillunga _ pugughilegh mun _ aglagh kanga _ .
napaqagh ghhagh meng _ Kukiyanga _ ugwiighumalghii _ .
tesamani _ liite unga _ .
Kemugyinguyaghpetuq _ Kukiyangam _ ugwiksuwhaagha _ .
sivugh qaghte luni _ sivuqagh meng _ maaken _ aglagh yagh luni _ iflangwaaghaluni _ tuqu kau uq _ , _ ghhuu kau uq _ .
qikmigh ghhagh inagh ghhagh a _ meghyaghqughtenga _ Elqwaaghqum _ apegh kaqe a _ kaate tke aq _ .
napaqagh ghhagh mi _ tawani _ liite unga _ .
liisagh lghiinga _ Qaygeghtaankutlu _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut llu _ qerngaghmetuteftukut _ .
taakut _ Aglughaankut _ allakagh mete ut _ .
Agaq _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
itegh yagh aq _ nayugh ke ghllag kaqe aqa _ .
Agaq _ aghuliigh yaghtugh magh an _ taghtugh kau unga _ .
taawa _ ingaghte luni _ qinuyug u uq _ , _ ighu a _ uki nga lghii _ sa u aat qun _ maame igate ngugh t _ , _ agha lgu aqe yagh kata _ tamaani _ entaqun _ pinigh aqe nayagh lghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ manu ani _ tawani _ qavagh aqe lunga _ ellnga ni _ .
Alia _ tawaten _ qavagh laatagh lunga _ taghtugh yalghiinga _ nuugte ma kangatnga _ .
pi yalghiinga _ tuquma lghii _ .
Agaq _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ ata ke aat _ , _ nulighh a _ itegh yagh aq _ .
liite lleg mni _ ne t _ malghugnegh t _ iwerngaqun _ atghagh u yankut _ taakut _ pingayuqluki _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghtekayug ni _ uksughte aqe luta _ kiigtagh ke luta _ ayumiqullegh t _ atugh aqe luki _ .
sivuqagh m _ natetulnga _ whanga qun _ nalluke yagh aqa _ .
whanga qun _ 17 _ years-ngughsimaghma _ maavek _ lliigh kau unga _ .
Satughqwaakanginkut _ qinuyutughhnaqaataghllaget _ enkaam _ maavek _ sivuqagh mun _ tawaten _ agha leg nun _ tagi i aghagh u aatagh lghiit _ kayaali naqe ghllag ughte lghiit _ .
sa meng _ agha ite ngugh u lghiit _ tesamani _ , _ maakenginaghhaq _ aghangegkayugwet _ .
maapi i aghagh u aatagh llegh ut _ liisimake aqa _ .
maapi luta _ aglagh aqe luta _ pi iigh aataghkagh ni _ .
Kuzaatam _ aqfa aqe kanginkut _ angyaghtumun _ , _ yugwisagllaguluni _ .
enkaam _ maaken _ neqe ngllagh luteng _ aglagh te aqe luta _ .
maani _ mangteghagh ite yagh ukut _ .
tazikna _ kitum _ Ivigugwem _ piksaghaa _ .
taakut _ liisimake anka _ Maayaankut _ whatengwaaq _ , _ alike magh ita _ esghagh kaqe anka _ .
upenghagh mi _ neqe niigh aqe ut _ esavghagh luteng _ , _ ataasigh ghhagh neng _ ayveghagh qaghaqe ut _ maklagte aghte aqe ut _ tawaten _ yupagilnguut _ , _ qerngughte luteng _ , _ angyagh _ ataasigh _ .
June-ngughhneghani _ elngaatall _ tawani _ unakughaqut _ inwa _ ghhuugh ghhagh mun _ .
kuuvragh kun _ negaghpag kun _ maagun _ oaten _ iistutkalghiikun _ .
tapghagh at _ , _ qasiqagh m _ amenqun _ tamaaken _ keleve te luteng _ inwa _ ghhuughsughnaghhaq _ .
ghhuugh teng _ itakumtaaghllagit _ .
Whatengwaaq _ anʼgilqugpenaamta _ nanugh meng _ kelengaruugh ni _ , _ qayughllak _ nanughtuqagh _ .
Aqiyagaqiinkut _ , _ estugwaamllu _ negh ka aneng _ aglagh te aghte aqe ainkut _ .
maaken llu _ quyngigh lgu luku _ piyug meng _ kaate aqe ut _ sivungagh meng llu _ maaken llu _ .
kaynge lgu luku _ , _ kaynge _ ama _ taana _ mekestaaghhaa luta _ esghagh kaqe a _ .
angli ghllag magh an _ ighleg yagute aqe kanginkut _ , _ legan _ iiwen _ iiskughte aqe kanginkut _ navek _ aghulaqe lleghqagh ut _ .
qayughllak _ neqe mnneng _ tegleg u ghllag _ , _ qikmigh put _ tuqute aqe luki _ .
Brown-nguuq _ color-nga _ tagneqegneghituq _ .
Taananginaaguq _ nagate kaqe a _ kaynge _ ataasigh ghhagh _ , _ ava ite ngugh u yagh lghii _ kayngengitnuyalghii _ .
Aglughaankut _ taakut _ napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ kingulighpigagh ughtekagh t _ .
taawa _ aglagh yug nanigh uq _ sivuqagh mun _ lliigh u aghte uq _ iilqayug kanigh lghii _ yugwiitem _ .
nenglutuqagh _ , _ iigge snanigh aqe kanginkut _ neghsagh meng _ nuyaaghqagh ii na yukagh mta _ amenqun _ tepe a _ sa u a _ aliigh na yu kan _ ighlekeluugutangat _ .
wetku _ qagi inagh ghhagh m _ aliighte nghagu _ naalkute aghte aqe ukut _ tugutluwhaghmeng _ , _ tuugkagh ghhagh meng _ .
tawatete ut _ iwerngaqun _ nengyugh mta _ ungipamsugwa _ Iteghyaghaam _ taana _ mangteghagh squghhagh _ , _ kuugghan _ uuknaliqe aqngami _ nekeftekaqe a _ church-enguluku _ .
tagtalmi _ sa u aat _ angyaghpag t _ kaate luteng _ teacher-kaghqaq _ tesamagunnguq _ qaake ma kangat _ .
tesamani _ enkaam _ igaghyagh vleghagh kau ma lghiit _ esgha _ .
napaqagh ghhagh nkut _ Aglughaankut _ taakut _ nekreg te nkut _ tesamavek _ pi luteng _ nagnegh luteng _ , _ Waalankut _ , _ ayuqe inkut _ tesamani _ igaghyagh te ma lghiit _ , _ Uniightaqaankut _ .
taana llu _ liisimake kegka _ Geist-ta _ .
taawa _ dynamite-teghllaget _ , _ entaqun _ mining- u aqe ut _ .
tesamani _ uksugh ghqu ghllag ut _ , _ uksughte aatagh ut _ .
taana _ mangteghagh ghhagh _ guygu ngiighhagh _ qaake llegh a _ liisimake aqa _ .
Nanek-ekun _ angyaghpag squghhagh kun _ angaghqugh kaqe aat _ .
kaviigh meng _ , _ ulimaagh meng _ qerngughte te luteng _ Qaygeghtaankut _ kakikagh meng llu _ ila luki _ tukfigh iqe aat _ .
tesamna _ maaten _ una _ aghqelli ma ut _ , _ uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ .
anuqe m _ tagtalmi _ tuquuqagh i _ entaqun _ anate te m _ naranghigh luni _ aghqelli kaqe aat _ .
uusqagh ghllag yagh uq _ , _ anuqekegteghllagtuq _ tesamna _ .
anuqligh nghmini _ mangteghagh t _ qapragtaqegkangi _ , _ uusqagh te mineng _ .
taana _ mangteghapig _ , _ napaqagh ghhagh llu _ quugwet _ quupe aqe luki _ pinighsagh qaghkagh ut _ , _ ulimakaqaghput _ whangkuta _ .
nenglu u yagh uq _ sivuke luni _ .
nenglu mi _ tawani _ liite kau unga _ , _ nenglu m _ ilu ani _ .
enkaam _ unaghsigh meng _ pi iigh aatagh yan _ angaghqugh aqe luki _ , _ quupe aqe luki _ ulimalaghteqaghput _ .
tanpegh meng _ piiknalighluku _ .
Agaankut _ nenglu meng _ tawavek _ nuugtekagh t _ enkaam _ tawanlluni _ tuqu kau uq _ .
nulighh a _ taana _ aqsallugwem _ iwerngaqun _ taawa _ unamtaqepigesnaqaqaa _ .
ayaa yaghtugh ngestagh aqe uq llu _ , _ whaten _ taghnughhaghestun _ lliigh kestagh aqe uq llu _ esghaghhu qun _ naghaalgutkennaqaqegkefut _ .
nengyugh ghhagh inagh mta _ ungipamsug te aghte vyiigh qaghaqe ainkut _ .
Agaam _ ata i _ taakut _ kinkungwaat _ uvegh luteng _ tuqukagh t _ lvelghani _ taakwani _ , _ qungughvig ni _ entaqun _ kangsumqaghte luteng _ tuqukagh t _ .
qerngagh emta _ Aghnaghaghniqlu _ , _ ayuqligh llu _ anglikakut _ room-a _ entaqun _ mangteghagh _ una _ kagpelliighaghluku _ aafqengertaatukut _ .
Nulaghilghiiniqun _ kagpelliighaghaqegkangi _ mangteghagh t _ family-tughlleghhiini _ .
tagtalmi _ nani _ tamaani _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ anguughem _ neqangisag luta _ lliigh ukut _ .
qayugh m _ awarkingiighhii _ uqug ligh aqe luki _ neqekagh ke ke put _ .
Tanpeghhet _ puufluki _ tapghaghqagh t _ gaagh luki _ .
Siqlugwam _ puyaneqruwhaa _ kelig aqe luku _ , _ tawaten _ neqekegkaghput _ .
Ellmaaraglleq _ maligte luku _ aliillegh _ maligte luku _ sakma _ January-mi _ tawani _ Nayegreghaq _ aghvenge aqe uq _ mangtag ghllag t _ kaat ute i aat _ Elqwaaghqunkut _ , _ Kuzaatankut _ .
taawa _ neqete ukut _ .
naten _ sangamta _ negh ke igh te qaghte ghllagkagh ni _ sangamta _ , _ esla m _ seghlegh m _ entaqun _ .
Teghiglugwem _ inglu i _ , _ uksaagh mi _ unakughllagluku _ tanpegh nun _ kanaghte uute aqe luku _ kayu _ , _ iqallug _ , _ qagugh ak _ kagpagteghaqegkangat _ uksugh mi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ .
nalighnegh ghhagh a _ eghqalikaghtegpenaan _ .
qawaag m _ itegagh i _ nuvugh aqe luki _ agaghte uute aqe luki _ uksugh mi _ puufluki _ , _ aghi ste luki _ , _ gaagh luki _ negh aqe ke put _ .
kiyang _ nulugh yagh qaghaqe ukut _ tagtalmi _ , _ iqsapagilngughni _ tamaani _ .
nulugh yagh llegh _ tamaghhagh an _ suflugwaliqaamanginaq _ , _ nanugh meng _ kelengaruughem _ .
Neghevleghaqestani _ tawaten _ .
riigh nge ka inagh _ angyaghpag _ , _ atasighhiinaghmeng _ pedersen _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
kingulighpigagh u ni luku _ pugughilegh mun _ usingigh iqe aq _ .
Taaqniitnguftughnguq _ iglegha llegh a _ .
Taam _ kingu aneng _ riigh nge gkankut _ , _ Nanek-enkut _ kaate aqe ut _ tesamavek _ sivulii luteng _ pugughilegh kun _ tekite aqe ut _ .
taagken _ kinguvaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ , _ sivungagh mun _ pi aqe ut _ .
akilpegagh aqe ut _ kagimkagh _ , _ iiqmig _ , _ tawaqa _ entaqun _ avelghagh igate kangat _ , _ sikeriigh t _ .
avlawa qun _ iitek _ piiqegkefut _ qayuq _ .
qayugh t _ tamaakut _ Iiisalghiinga _ qamagun _ foil-elget _ qaye i _ vegaagh t _ Japanese-emeng _ ategh leg t _ , _ tumapagilnguut _ neqnigh ghllaget _ .
Foil-engi _ tamaakut _ Aghnaghaghniqlu _ elngaatall _ teghigniqe tke aqlaatagh ke put _ aksaqe luku _ tegleg luki _ gguternteggun _ mategtaqluki _ .
iqenge negh mta _ qelmeghuutesqelluki _ iingqagh put _ .
Whatengwaaq _ enraq _ pi gpenaamta _ , _ nagate snanigh aqe kanginkut llu _ ungipamsug te nghata _ .
Qepghamsugllagni _ quunpeng _ aghula i te gpenaamta _ .
nunivag niigh aqe luta _ , _ maani _ aviilnguut _ piitesighagh at _ saghna aqe luki _ , _ legan _ esghaqagh u luteng _ mirugwanat _ .
Unataankut _ , _ mellu inkut _ saghnalaghaqaput _ uksugh mi _ pi kaghqagh u luki _ .
iitegngam _ aqavzig _ elngaatall _ saghnaaqaghput _ .
tuungligh ghhagh a
sivunegh mta _ nangaghnegh i
kukuleg mii t
Penapagem _ apegh llegh a
tawaten _ nagate lleg mtun _ Ugwetelemeng _ apangiighhammneng _ apegh naqe aqa _ .
ungipamsug te aqe kanginkut _ , _ kukuleg mii t _ pelungighllagennguq _ elngaatall _ iqangite naqe negh ghllag t _ , _ aatkaqegllaget _ , _ igaqragh ghllag _ sa at _ tamaghhagh mi _ ayuqe lghii _ .
entaqun _ ataasiighneghunaqeghllaget _ ipapighqengnganaqeghllaget _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
Saghllakannguq _ tagtalmi _ .
elngaatall _ amyuqetaghsighwaaghllagem _ kaate tke ai _ , _ entaqun _ nanghiiqu llegh m _ saam _ kaate te ghllag ke ai _ maatenguyaqan _ sumeghtaghagh llegh _ .
tawaten _ ukut _ kiyaghte aaghet _ uum _ nuna m _ pi yan _ puughte ghllag kaqe kangi _ sivuke luki _ .
Legannguq _ piyaa luteng _ unʼgani _ ayvegh t _ unguva i ta _ manguna itneng _ ikute luteng _ , _ legan _ amyuqetagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
pi aqe lghii _ whaten _ Ugwetelen _ , _ “ _ imatuq llu _ talwa _ ayvegh ghhagh inagh t _ pi kaqe atki _ , _ awiim nguq _ teghig ke sagh _ qamagluku _ seghletun _ tawaten _ amyuutke kaqe kangat _ . _ ”
tuqute gpenaki _ ikute aqe luteng _ legan _ .
entaqun _ tawaten _ teghig nagh nge tke ai _ elngaatall _ .
legan _ tawaten _ unguvalngughmeng _ whaa _ ikute aqe luteng _ gaagh yaghqagh meng _ , _ neghyaghqagh meng _ .
tagtalmi _ yuug _ ataasigh _ sa ghllag ke aq _ elngaatall _ .
entaqun _ kevgaakaalghii _ yuug _ taana _ .
Saam _ kaate kaqe kanga _ , _ nunalgute ni _ elngaatall _ aatkanglaatesqegkii _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ , _ pelungighsagh te naqe ni luteng _ pi kaqe kangi _ .
aghnagh _ kaki tke aq _ elngaatall _ .
aarragh tke aq _ igaqragh ghllag meng _ tawaten _ pinighrakegtepiglluku _ ulima tete luteng _ .
entaqun _ apeghiighyaqmegteggu _ tamaa na _ qelegh te llegh a _ , _ entaqun _ tamaananginaq _ pi gpenaan _ mangteghagh ke te luki _ sagnellghaqulluki _ ukmangigh stekagh i _ yugwem _ taam _ .
Yugwem _ taam _ pillghatun _ legan _ pikagh t _ maligtekagh at _ , _ alignagh ite ngughk _ yuug _ taana _ entaqun _ .
laluramke nun _ ungipamsug ke nghminigu _ prophecy-kaaniiqegkangat _ yuug _ taana _ .
tawaten _ apeghiigh uute yan _ , _ enraq llu _ tawani _ ighivgaghmi _ pi lleghqagh itni _ amsanaghllug ughtekagh _ , _ anuqeqraggangunani _ , _ qagiqraggangunani _ legan _ megh _ unegna _ taghneghaghqugh te stun _ qateghllugwem _ angtalanganeng _ lli aqe aq _ .
esnagh mun _ atghagh uute ste ghllag luku _ yuug _ elngaatall _ kumaghtighllagluteng _ bon _ fire-eghllakat _ entaqun _ .
Kumaghtighllagluteng _ quug _ qerngughte luku _ aarragh te luteng _ tawaten _ entaqun _ neqe meng _ kelqelluteng _ .
Yugwem _ whalen _ pi ke ai _ , _ “ _ temngi _ tawaten _ aneghte nghite u amsi _ , _ nuna _ uukna _ tagi lghii _ qateghrakegtagh _ iqa ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ tuusaghqaqenghilkefut _ nukegnaghluta _ . _ ”
taana _ apeghiigh te sqellug qu _ pelungighsagh te sqellug qu _ .
esgha _ legan _ Bible-et _ pillghistun _ pikagh t _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ megh kun _ uunʼggun _ , _ mumigte aqe luteng _ yuvghiighkagh t _ .
elngaatall _ pelungighsaghkagh t _ entaqun _ seghletun _ pi llegh eng _ taana _ qivghukekagh at _ sa ke aat _ apeghraghkagh at _ .
seghleghqe llegh eng _ , _ seghleghyukelleghteng _ aag negh squgh ke aat _ elngaatall _ .
taghneghaghqughkagh t _ taanʼgavek _ nuna mun _ .
pi aqe kangi _ Ugwetelem _ , _ “ _ Entaqunnguq _ seghevute uute tke aat _ . _ ”
piniqe llegh _ ighivgaghmi _ tawani _ naalkekagh at _ .
Iwerngaqunnguq _ tawaten _ taakwna _ nuna _ yugwem _ taam _ atigh aqe kanga _ taakwna _ nuna _ tagi lghii _ qateghrakegllak _ ava ite ngughk _ tagneqragh ite ngughk _ iqa ite ngughk _ .
taana _ pelungighsagh te sqekagh a _ , _ ukmangigh sqekagh i _ nunalgute ni _ tamaakut _ .
entaqun _ apeghiigh luteng _ esgha _ taam _ kingu aneng _ mulu gpenateng _ , _ qavameggnenguq _ tuqu laghate kau ut _ .
Aqnighpenatenguq _ qavaghpagutkaaniiqegkanginnguq _ .
nenglu m _ legan _ imigh a _ qavagh negh ke te ziin _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ .
ungipamsug _ taana _ elngaatall _ allaaghlluwhaghyagutaqegkegka _ compare-raaqegkegka _ , _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ whaten _ igamsiqa yagute aqe kegka _ .
repall _ pi aqe kenka _ minister-et _ , _ “ _ Taakwaningani _ whaa _ kenletghuuskan _ nuna _ , _ entaqun _ ila i _ legan _ esghagh yaghqagh put _ yuguligh llegh nun _ iteghkagh t _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ nangllegtagh a _ esghagh kaqe kegka _ elngaatall _ , _ yupig t _ tawatengwaaghwaaq _ laluramke stun _ ugpeqe luku _ ayuqe kangat _ honor-eghllagluku _ ( _ in _ their _ own _ way _ ) _ ellmeng _ katam _ pi llegh megestun _ .
Understand-telleghmegestun _ ayuqe kangat _ . _ ”
anglinghhagh u lunga
Amigiqaam _ apegh llegh a
elngaatall _ whanga _ qaatke ghllag luki _ angayuqagh nka _ ata nka _ taakut _ angli kau lghiinga _ .
neqe _ sa u a _ angaghqugh ghllag nghatgu _ qepghigh sqe aqe kangatnga _ qinutagh ghllag naagh ni lunga _ .
enkaam _ kayusiite aqe kenka _ neqe meng _ qepghagh nghata _ .
Pisqeghllagatnga _ sasqeghllagatnga _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe lghiinga _ ilangakun _ kalleghsaghnalungallu _ sa lunga llu _ qinuyug lunga _ .
panignagh u na iqe lunga _ nukeggnaghqe ste ghllag aqe aatnga _ .
Ugwiighyamallu _ tagi negh mni _ agligh sqe aqe kangatnga _ .
agligh sqe nghatnga _ Apaatankunun _ atghagh aqe lghiinga _ .
amalleqa _ piqrugwaqegkanganga _ , _ panike na iqe kanganga _ apagh ta m _ .
“ _ Singlengam _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ . _ ”
Singlenga _ taana _ whangkuta _ agani _ pikumakangat _ .
“ _ Singlengam _ qelanqe lleqe aaten _ aglagh a _ . _ ”
aglagh aqe lghiinga _ qiya vleghagh magh ma _ sumeghtaghagh magh ma _ , _ panike na iqe lunga _ ighsayagute ghllag atnga _ .
lghsayagunnilunga _ .
test-kagh nkuk _ enraq _ atalgute gka _ ugumikeraagh naqe ghllag k _ , _ Akuliqaankuk _ , _ Aghnaamkaminkuk _ .
apagh ta m _ panig i _ , _ taana llu _ Teparghuq _ .
Teparghuq _ taana _ entaqun _ taghnughhagh ghhagh u luku _ Ayakinkunun _ angag itnun _ tuune kaqe aat _ .
Egmighaghllak _ .
aag lleg nge a nguq _ naa ke a _ .
apagh ta m nguq _ nulighqeftaa _ aag lleg nge a _ .
ayag ke inkut _ nayag ke aat _ .
Taagegken _ tagi laghate kau ut _ .
whanga llu _ atalgute gka _ taake uk _ .
ugumi ke ghllag yagh kanginkut _ Teparghuum _ .
urang _ ugumi ke yagh ainkut _ , _ maaten _ qemall _ .
pi aqe kenka _ panig nka _ , _ maalliqun _ piniqsaliighllagaanga _ qavngaq _ ugumi ke ghllag lunga _ .
alingyug ketagh ghllag _ , _ paninang _ maaten _ alingyug ketagh ghllag _ .
Alingyugwigalnguunga _ , _ unugtaqelghiingallu _ ellnginaghhaghma _ .
navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe aat _ .
itegh nghata _ pi aqe kenka _ , _ “ _ navek _ aghulaqe uute aqe tsi _ ? _ ”
pangeghte aat
ungipamsug ghllag t _ elngaatall _ .
payangite ghllag qagh yu k llu _ angukagh ut _ .
elngaatall _ legan _ tamlaghqulluteng _ whaa _ qayungllaq _ , _ aqelqagh put _ taakut _ qayug ngllagh te ma luki _ qenaaghpallaqu _ , _ qiinqanemni _ kana _ qaasqagh mi _ uzivleghet _ .
aqfaqugh te t _ aqelqaghni ii aaghet _ .
legan _ qayugh qiinagh luteng _ neghe gpenateng _ .
elngaatall _ tawaten _ aqfaqugh te luteng _ uzimun _ ataasighhaaghte aqe luteng _ , _ entaqun _ aneghte negh meggni _ aatqaghte vike aqe luki _ .
apeghiigh negh meggni _ enraq _ mataghqe te luteng _ tughumghanneqegsaataqut _ .
enraq _ talwa _ esghapag snanigh aqe kangit _ .
Aghnaamkamillu _ amigh k _ umeg sighwaagh luku _ reghilqughlluku _ esghapag aqe lghiikung _ .
sangamta _ esghapag snanigh aqe inkut _ .
sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ liisagh lghiikut _ agleghnagh staghhiinagh _ .
iwerngaqun _ taaqe luteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ neghulghutaqut _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ nunatughqwaasugnitaqiinkut _ .
luteng _ apeghiigh negh meggni _ taglagh uute negh meggni _ elngaatall _ neghulghutaqut _ .
enkaam _ tumighqaate nghata _ llangaqa llu _ nunatughqwaasugnitaqiinkut _ .
Kelqughluteng _ kalngag meng _ ila i _ uyamig luteng _ .
amigh m _ liiqnegh a _ legan _ tan-ekastun _ tawaten _ .
ugtinghagh it _ pi nigh ghllag t _ legan _ whaten _ .
qallukagh _ sanaghqughwaaghluni _ .
ayallaghwaagh llu _ , _ angyaghwaagh llu _ allgegh naqe ghllag at _ elngaatall _ , _ iiwen _ kaki sigh m _ siku i _ .
Sikuunnguq _ ataasigh t _ allgeghteqaghneghmegteki _ , _ kaki yaghtugh negh meggni _ tamaanalegnun _ kelqelluki _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ siku ut _ .
Sikughhnaqeghllaget _ maaken _ kaki sigh m _ sikugh aneng _ .
Qavngaghtarugllaget _ sikugh nka _ Pedersen-meng _ ima _ tukfighagh t _ , _ pinigh t _ taake ghllag nghite ngugh t _ , _ taakeghpaget _ katamngwaagh t _ kenug kegte nghite ngugh t _ pinigh t _ .
whaa _ panig ma _ naangsaghtughii _ .
aflenga kaqe anka _ neghightagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh nka _ ima _ aghnaghagh u lunga _ allgeghtekanka _ .
Kelguqunemki _ kinku nun _ nalleghayagutaqegkangit _ .
talwa _ Geist-am _ aqeftaghaagh i _ sungaghtuqagh t _ .
pi lgu unga llu _ tamaaken _ sakma _ .
taakut _ enkaam _ panig nka _ tawatekaniigut _ whanga mtun _ pivagru negh ghllag _ aag qagh ghhaat _ .
aamtaam _ eltughagh nka _ pillgite u aghte ut _ .
whanga mtun llu _ taawa _ pisqelluki _ aghyuugh aqe kenka _ , _ maligte naagh nghite kangatnga _ .
kii _ , _ akuzi aqe unga _ ilangakun _ apeghtugh na luki _ ungipamsugunnemki _ angli naqe lleg mneng _ .
ineghneghlliqe gpenanga _ whanga _ angli kanga _ sa mun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ .
Pelaasi _ entaqun _ taana _ pilleg pigte yagh uq _ elngaatall _ ungipamsug nghmini _ .
taameng _ igaghyaqayugwetlu _ liisagh lghiikut _ yugwet _ seven-eklaagmi _ unugmi _ igaghyagh te aqe lghiit _ .
High _ school-em _ igagh i _ qamagtekaqe kangi _ talwa _ .
enkaamllu _ puygiingigalqwaaghllaguyaghtuq _ .
lgaghyaatkayuguyaghtut _ unugmi _ .
apeghtughiste ke yuwhaagh t
taana _ igaghvig _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ tamaavek _ nanevgagh nun _ .
Saavlankunun _ , _ Pusaankunun _ , _ kinku nun llu _ ulima aqe na iqe kangat _ .
Kayusiitkaqniiqegkangqat _ tea- aghte a _ .
aglu m _ inglu igh llegh aneng _ repa ke luteng _ .
Tangeghtughllagtunnguq _ elngaatall _ aglu t _ tamaakut _ , _ ayvegh m _ aglu igh a _ .
tamaaken _ repa ke luteng _ ulima kaqe na iqe aat _ .
kayusigh kaqe na iqe aat _ .
iwernga _ liisagh lghiikut _ pinigh ghllag _ igaghvig ghllag _ .
whaten _ igagh yami _ ikiqun _ uglagh ghllag _ whangkuta _ teacher-kegkaqenghilkefut _ .
nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiit _ .
maaten llu _ teacher-eghllagughlleghhii _ .
Nickerson-enkut _ maani _ teacher-ngughllakaagut _ .
minister- nge magh mi _ , _ teacher-ngumaghmi _ ayuqe lghii _ .
Thompson-nenkut _ ama _ teacher-ngughllakaagut _ tawaten _ nulighhqaghtu an _ .
iwernga _ sa u a _ ayuqligh _ ama _ teacher-kegkaqaghput _ ukavanlengughni _ .
Aghnaartuq _ ayuqligh _ .
Pillwaaghataghat _ taana _ Nickerson-ngunikangat _ teacher-kertaat _ .
whangkuta _ taana _ ayuqligh _ teacher-kegkaqaghput _ .
negh yagh uute kayug ni _ whangkunnun _ .
negh yaghtugh luta _ one-eklaagyaghtunghani _ tagi aqe luta _ .
talwa _ mangteghagh pagite yagh lghii _ .
Taanʼgani _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ .
enkaam _ uvite _ pinigh ghllag _ .
aante aput llu _ samaveghllugwinaq _ , _ mallagh ite ngugh t llu _ .
sa kun _ avlawate ta kun _ , _ paper _ sack-kekun _ qantagh luki _ anuqligh nghaani _ aantagh nun _ aante i negh mta _ tengtestaqegkeput _ , _ tengtaqegkangi _ .
entaqun _ sa pagite luta _ mallagh ite ngugh u kut _ talwa _ .
akilpegaghkagh t
Nuughtekanighmeng _ anglikagh ni _ whangkuta _ .
Taanangurtuq _ kiyang _ tukfigh yug qumtaagh at _ tawaqa nkut _ , _ iiqmig nkut _ , _ qayuunkut _ , _ avlawa nkut _ .
Taakungurtut _ kiyang _ tukfigh yuke llegh it _ .
avlawa _ kiyang _ , _ avlawa t llu _ tamaakut _ neqekrangllaghpag gpenaki _ , _ kiyang _ avlawa liigh aqe kangit _ .
enkaam _ mulu ghllag aqe ut _ , _ neqekrangllagh qaghaqe luteng _ .
nutaghagh llu _ taawa _ nanigh m _ neqekrangllagh a _ neqekrangllagh meng _ negh yugnagh ghllag _ .
sa kun _ qayulghutagbhaghqun _ Java _ Tea-nguniiqegkangitgun _ ukite luki _ neqekrangllagh aqe lghiinga _ .
Kangghugrakguughlluteng _ ila i _ oaten _ mesiigh m _ taapekanighluki _ neqnigh ghllaget _ whangkunni _ .
neqe ut
ii _ , _ neghsagh _ kaat ute ghllag nghmegteggu _ .
Aymaakelaghtughaqegkefung _ Napaaqlu _ .
tazingavek _ saagbhwammnun _ siqlugwamun _ kanaghte aqe luki _ .
kaate negh megteni _ qamugbllaglutek _ .
qaye akun _ aligh mta _ qalqalima meng _ aveg aqe luki _ .
Siqlugwiigbaqelghiikung _ qalqalima meng _ kemekrag meng _ .
Sagneghwaagbllaget _ imigh luki _ kapeghte i lutung _ iqugwakun _ kapeghtekagh pung _ lli luki _ .
neghe uute negh mta _ taaggun _ kapeghtekagh kun _ iwhani _ neqnigh ghhalek _ , _ ilangakun _ tengug meng _ .
qalqalima kun _ elngaatall _ unaghsigh kun _ siftaghlluki _ siqlugwiiqakun _ taaggun _ .
legan _ pellumeghtagh put _ pightugh vleghagh ghhagh t _ .
qazigyagh m llu _ , _ ayvegh m llu _ uqigh a _ lard-estun _ ayuqe ut _ .
whaten _ ayapegh aatagh luta _ akuunnemteki _ neve sqe aghtagh luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ .
Piraamsitngwaaghluki _ akuute aqe ke put _ , _ neghyaghqagh stun _ tawaten _ angka i ta _ aavgugh aqe luki _ .
mesiightu luki _ pi sqe aqe kangit _ qavagh ghqu negh meggni nguq _ mesiigh i uute kayugu ut _ .
maaten _ tawaten _ pi aghte aqe yagh anka _ eltughagh nka _ ukut _ avaqutagh nka _ , _ seghleqe aqe ait _ .
Akuutangwaaghllagluta _ uksulqusigh _ .
akuute luki _ kumlasighaqluki _ .
Iqallugwaqlu _ pi ghllag nghatgu _ Napaaq _ tengertagh igh yu neghtu ghllag _ .
tengertagh t _ tenge kayugu na iqe kangit _ , _ taawanginaq _ aygughike aqe kenka _ .
Akuunnemteki _ uglagh ghllag t _ .
sagnegh u aaghet _ takeriig t _ tamaagun _ tengertagh meng _ akuute ghllag lunga _ ateghte luku _ , _ neghe uute naqe yamta _ neqagh luku _ entaqun _ , _ “ _ kaay _ , _ akuute aq _ aqfa aghte naqe aqa _ . _ ”
Itghusaqminigu _ legan _ tekerqagh u ni te uq _ kanegh _ .
tenge ma na ait _ naqam _ .
tengertagh meng _ ategh ke lghiit _ .
nalighmeng _ mesiigh i _ , _ nalighmeng _ sallghi _ anagte lghii ni _ tawatete ut _ .
ila i _ ghhuughpagtagh pigesnagh luteng _ pi ma aqe lghiit _ .
Neghqwaaghighwaaghluki _ iqallugwat _ tamaakut _ , _ qayevregaghhii _ tamaakut _ ikugh luki _ , _ qete luki _ , _ mesiigh meng _ akuute luki _ qayagh itneng _ kuuvikevleghaghluki _ kumlasighaqegkeput _ .
tengertagh u ut _ ategh i _ .
aygughike ma aqe yaqenka _ , _ taana _ esghagh luku _ wetku _ ugpeqe yagute anka _ .
mangteghapig t llu _ , _ mangteghasqwaagh t llu
taagken _ mangteghagh put _ upenghagh mi _ , _ amaa iqe aq _ , _ tapghaghqagh _ apeghiinemteggu _ naafqe aqe ke put _ mangteghagh t _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mun _ lliigh aqe luta _ uqugh meng _ itagsi naqe nghmeng _ .
mangteghapig m _ tanpeghhi _ ikugh luki _ aagra i llu _ naafqelluki _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qukaa kun _ taaggun _ , _ maqaghqute t llu _ , _ veg t llu _ maqagh te t _ llilaghtugh luki _ tanpegh meng _ asiliqutagh igh luki _ iwhani _ , _ kagpag aqe kangit _ tanpeghhmun _ llilaghtugh luki _ sa meng _ tapghalaagmeng _ nemegh luki _ .
kiigtagh ke lghiit _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ .
mangteghasqwaagh mi _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikut _ ayagyu ligh luki _ .
aghte nghaani _ taakut _ ayagyu put _ makreglluki _ petug luki _ paaggun _ .
aghneghte aqe lghiikut _ suksugtagh kun _ qayug ngllagh aqe luta _ .
gaagh ngllagh luteng llu _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ eslallug mi _ .
aliinegh mi _ aamta _ qagani _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
aanqaghte pagte te luki _ mangteghasqwaagh mi _ gaagh ngllagh aqe ut _ .
Gaanguftut _ anuqe mi _ , _ eslallug mi _ taaggun _ gaagh aqe lghiit _ .
uqugh _ piyaqnagh kanigh yagh lghii _ liisagh lghiinga _ qayughllak _ .
Upenghaam _ whalen _ uqiightu llegh a _ uqug ngllagh llegh a _ egsigalkefut _ , _ kagpaperewaaq _ akmagutagh kun _ .
wetku _ uksaagh mi _ naayvagh _ esneli nghaani _ , _ kumlaaghtaquluni _ lliigh nghaani _ mangteghagh uute aqe ut _ .
taakut _ paaggun _ iwhani sigh u ut _ , _ mangteghagh m _ qamagun _ ilu akun _ tanpeghtagh igh luteng _ .
tanpigh luta _ taakut _ aagra t _ nekegte aqe ke put _ .
amu i ut _ aagra t _ , _ amigh t _ maakut _ allighaghqagh ughtekagh t _ .
amenqun _ allighaghqagh u na iqe ke put _ melqughtuqagh t _ , _ tamaakut _ kaki luki _ , _ unaghsigh meng _ naten _ eslegkakalghiimeng _ .
vuvegh m _ , _ vuvighnaqnemteki _ .
una _ iiggereghwaagh vig _ iigge igate luni _ veg ghllag u yagh uq _ .
taagken _ veg meng _ saghna ghllag aqe luta _ .
samagun _ tanpeghhaghaaghet _ ilaagh uute luki _ ikellegh ghqu aaghet _ tunemagh ke luki _ amalka _ .
enkaam _ veg meng _ pi luki _ vuvegh igh aqe ke put _ tanpegh meng _ .
ukite aqe luki _ , _ napaghyeghaaniiqiit _ uum _ amigh m _ amalka _ ayagsigh ta i _ .
tawaten _ ameltu aqe luki _ napaghte qugh vike aqe ait _ .
test-pag kut _ kelu t _ eslege lghii meng _ ingavek _ iiwleng _ qukaa ii kete te _ llivike luki _ .
test-pag kut _ ama _ tawaten _ eslegkakalghiimeng _ ceiling-ngengi _ amalka _ aagra m _ .
sa ni te mun _ llilaghtugh vike luki _ ulig aqe ke put _ .
tawaten _ uusqaghtutka i ta _ unaghsigh t _ , _ kevigh luki _ veg meng _ .
Uuyneghmun _ enraq _ , _ natanga _ taake ghllag lghii _ veg a _ , _ whateghllak _ legan _ .
elngaatall _ akmag aatagh aqe lghiit _ , _ amenqun _ uqengelengestaaghhaat _ .
tespamavek _ tawavek _ amenqun _ iiggereghwaagh vig u yagh lghii mun _ veg meng _ saghna yagh negh mta _ qiipaghagh t _ imigh aqe ke put _ aligh a _ qilleghte aqe luki _ .
Uqengesquyuwhaat _ kenegte ghllag aqe luki _ , _ keviite kaghqagh meng _ .
taakwegkut _ uzimun _ aagra t _ kevigh luki _ asi i _ kenegte ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ atkuvlegaq _ sa u a _ qagugh ak _ atg- ke uk _ taaqegkagh _ atkuvlegaq _ , _ amigh _ .
amigh m _ qaye akun _ qakmagun _ eslatagh akun _ maqaasghagh igh uute kaqe kangit _ .
puqla ghllag t _ .
tespamna llu _ tawaten _ tanpigh luku _ veg meng _ uligaqegkefut _ .
enkaam _ supug ite ngugh t _ .
taawanginaq _ puqlaghhneghani _ tanpegh pigu luku _ qepghagh na ghllag _ .
legan _ qakemna _ naghigh aqe uq _ tanpegh pigu luta _ , _ kanegh _ ifkagh qu ghllag aqe uq _ .
taakut _ veg t _ ifkaghte luki _ , _ apeghiigh nghaani _ ifkagh qu nghmeng _ , _ kameraagh i llu ta _ kameg put _ repall _ aghi aqe kangi _ .
whaten _ anigu i _ ifkaghte luki _ miluute aqe luki _ .
Anigungighwaaghluki _ mayugh luta _ saul- ghqu nqigte aqe luku _ veg a _ .
taakut _ anigu t _ aane ste qugh aqe ke put _ ghhute tgun _ inglugtaaghutaqluki _ .
Napaam _ emta _ kalngagagh t _ imigh luki _ uqigtu ghllaget _ qamunemtegneki _ egtivimmnun _ ugwavek _ .
anigu u lghiit _ kaanghet _ egte aqe aput _ .
taawa _ mate- yagh i yaaghte nghaani _ taakwna _ uqegh _ ifkagh aqe lghii _ .
sa meng _ sapuughaghtaghyaghtughaqegkefung _ .
Kiyaghtaalqa _ , _ iglegha llegh ka llu
Maasqem _ apegh llegh a
allgellegh ke a _ Fehruary _ 12 _ , _ 1898 _ .
taana _ hirth _ day-keftaqa _ liisagh lghiinga _ .
angayuqagh nka _ nalluke anka _ , _ anglegute nka _ .
kergam _ taghnughhagh u lunga _ ifla laghate ma lghiit _ .
enkaam _ Waayinguftuq _ aflengake i steke _ , _ Siivaghhaam _ nayag a _ .
taagken _ enkaam _ taaghta nkut _ tagi luteng _ 1900-mi _ allughqi ma kangatnga _ taaghta nkut _ .
entaqun _ esghaqagh u lunga _ seghleghu yalghiinga _ , _ esghaghhu qun _ allughqi kangatnga _ .
enkaam _ taaghta mi _ tawani _ , _ ( _ E. _ O. _ Camphell _ ) _ , _ qafsina _ years _ kiyaghte unga _ .
entaqun _ mekelghiighpagughsama _ , _ angyagh yaghqaaghte yama _ Sulugwenkutgun _ angyii sqe aanga _ .
enkaam _ Sulugwem _ itagnaqsanga _ taaggun _ angyagh unga _ taaghta m _ pillghatun _ .
unaangu luku _ angyaghnagh nghaani _ Amamengam _ keleg yaghtugh aqe aanga _ .
teghtugh negh mni _ whaa _ angyaataghqe aat _ aqeftaghaagh kun _ kevigh te uute luteng _ kelqesaghqagh t _ .
enkaam _ atghagh lunga _ , _ kete luta _ taanʼgani _ taakut _ angyagh m _ yugwita _ taakut _ taaghta m _ angyaatagh igh uute yu ai _ kiyang _ negh aqe kangit _ .
whanga _ eghqwaagh sagh itneng _ qasiqagh meng _ neghe kayug _ .
tamaani _ laluramke m _ negh kanga _ piyaqnagh lghii _ , _ taaghta mi _ yeghrat _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ tagtalmi _ , _ nengigh aqe lunga _ nefku yagute uq _ maklag meng _ , _ ayvegh meng _ .
Qeghasta _ test-ankut _ Mekengankut _ ketangitni _ taaghta m _ qeghigh a _ .
elngaatall _ yuug _ piniipigtuuq _ tea- aghte a _ taana _ .
tagtalmi _ ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ , _ amaa iqe i ste aatnga _ Sulugwenkut _ .
taawa _ taglaate luku _ , _ kitumun _ uqiigh ste luku _ taaghta m _ , _ akmagutagh gnun _ kanaghte luku _ akmavek _ tuyugh aa _ .
arekull _ qawaagniighusingesqellunga _ pi ma kanganga _ ulimasightuumagh an _ .
enkaam _ ayumiquyan _ kaate yalghiimi _ 16 _ qawaagniighusigh _ , _ kanuyaaghrug _ qafsina _ igagh ghqu aq _ , _ ulimasigh leg _ .
igaghqwaagh u yagh lghiit _ ulimakayugwet _ qawaagniighusigh m _ pi i _ , _ ghhuugh t _ .
llaaghanwha _ atuqe aqa _ taana _ elngaatall _ .
allameng _ upenghaghyag u _ angyagh laatagh unga _ .
Amamenganguuq _ taana _ keleg i steke _ .
elngaatall _ angyagh u uute i te aqe kangatnga _ , _ unʼgani _ neghesqellunga _ entaqun _ .
iwernga _ negh igate kenka _ , _ angyagh t _ yugwita _ taakut _ negh aqe ait _ .
whanga _ angyeghetagh itneng _ eghqwaagh te yameng _ neqnighqagh ke unga _ elngaatall _ qasugh iqe aq _ , _ sa u a _ , _ pugnegh _ .
allameng _ amaa iqe i laatagh unga _ tawani _ , _ amaa iqe i ste laatagh aatnga _ .
enkaam _ taglaate luku _ kitumun _ uqiigh ste laatagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
pangeghte yuwhaagh llegh ka
enkaam _ tagtalmi _ tawaten _ pangeghte naqe ut _ , _ Sulugwenkut _ .
whanga llu _ taaghta m _ pangeghte sqe aanga _ .
taana _ amaa iqe aq _ akike yaghtigh sqe a _ llaaghanwha _ .
Uvinkunguut _ , _ Amamengankut _ , _ whanga _ amalka _ anglinghhagh pestaagh t _ yugwi _ Sulugwem _ .
ellnginagh emta _ naten _ pangeghte ukut _ , _ pangegh t _ maligte luki _ .
pamaken _ pangegh t _ maligte luki _ .
kii _ , _ elngaatall _ anguugh kaqe ainkut _ .
atghagh aqe yagh luta _ qukaghite negh mta _ uughqaghtagh ghllag t _ kaannemteki _ uteghte aqe luta _ .

qanigughte aqe luni _ .

maalghug gneng _ amig nge ma ni unga _ .

ayumiqullegh m _ ilangani _ Ungalaq _ aghvenge ma lghii _ kiipaghqemmi _ June-mi _ .
elngaatall _ suqagh a _ pi luku _ Ataayaghhaankut _ , _ Aghtuqaayagenkut _ , _ Ungalaankut _ 1911-mi _ Nume-etkat _ .

uyghigh luta _ tawani _ , _ uka _ angyagh t _ malghugnegh t _ , _ pingayugnegh t _ uka _ .

Kemugyi _ taana _ qiteve llgu ma uq _ llaaghinaan _ .
qiteve te luki _ pi yalghiimeng _ , _ uksulqusigh _ elngaatall _ igataghnagh iqe aqe ut _ , _ neqangisagllaak _ elngaatall _ .
enkaam _ Kemugyi _ ungipaate a _ , _ “ _ taawna _ nengighqe gu _ yug nun _ tawavek _ . _ ”
“ _ amaa iqe aq _ , _ uqugh _ , _ neqe _ tamaa na _ nengighqengngwaaghhu _ yug nun _ ataasikaghtanun _ elngaatall _ . _ ”
whanga _ pi unga _ , _ “ _ Neqekraatat _ malghugnegh t _ taglaate ki _ , _ tespagavek _ uyegte yaghtugh ki _ . _ ”
Neqekraatii _ aange ghllag ut _ , _ entaqun _ qafsina _ pound-eghllaguut _ .
malghugnegh t _ taglaate anka _ .
Pingayugulata _ taglagh ukut _ , _ angyalligh a _ , _ yugwa _ , _ whanga _ .
neqekrag t _ malghugnegh t _ ila ke luki _ .
kaate yalghiikut _ tamlag yalghiikut _ , _ enraq _ mayii lgu uq _ .
pugughilegh tun _ whaten _ taawanginaq _ aghqestaaghhagh _ .
uyamig luki _ taakut _ mayugh te ait _ , _ malghugnegh t _ .
qaygeghte yalghiikut _ , _ mangteghagh t _ tawanteftut _ , _ entaqun _ qule u a llu _ palaghhagh u a llu _ enkaam _ 200 _ feet _ ila i _ taawa _ , _ alla _ tazingani _ ila i _ , _ mangteghapig t _ .
liigike yaqenka _ , _ ramkekaghtaghmeng _ , _ allakagh meng _ mangteghagh uute luteng _ ayuqe ut _ .

qelpeghte lukek _ tawani _ , _ paga _ paa- aqe ut _ .
