inga _ qelpeghte yakek _ apaqu aqe aqa _ neqekrag meng _ tugu tete lunga _ tawaten _ qete nghma _ angtalangatun _ .
taagken _ whaa _ taaqe naqe uq _ yataaghqenneghmeng _ .
tespagavek _ akilghuu unga _ , _ “ _ Qurghuu _ , _ qurghuu _ qiyatgii _ , _ qiyatgii _ , _ aqelpa _ qiyatgii _ . _ ”
sukate luki _ tagi sqe anka _ .
ii _ , _ qule mun _ esghapag aanga _ .
qiteve te yagh aanga _ tusaqe nghite aqa _ .
entaqun _ whaten _ pi uq _ , _ “ _ una _ qiteve kayugu ma lghii _ esgha _ . _ ”
“ _ avangite na iqe uq _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ uka _ atghagh uute uq _ , _ line _ up-elluteng _ .
Line _ up-estaput _ kaa sa ta _ .
uyegte apung _ tawaten _ elngaatall _ .
qiteve magh mi _ taana _ elngaatall _ entaqun _ ila i _ uteghte pagte aqe lghiit _ nalluke kenka _ .
aghnagh _ , _ taghnughhagh _ , _ mekelghiighpak _ .
Yugwet _ aviite ut _ , _ upag uute lghiit _ entaqun _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ uyegte ma lutung _ naange uk _ qenwat _ ataasigh k _ .
ila kek _ taake uk _ apaqu agka _ .
iiwen _ qelpeghlluke _ , _ k _ ila kete lugh u iqe agput _ , _ ilk _ , _ up- ke aa _ akulangitni _ akuzipig ghllag _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ aghnagh _ .
arekull _ tulugh u uq _ , _ avatmii t _ panike aat _ tamaaken _ ugwiiqaq _ , _ Tuluq _ .
taana _ uglagh luku _ whanga _ akuzipig _ pi aqa _ elngaatall _ .
Kli _ , _ quya kau uq _ elngaatall _ .
taagken _ kelengake agka _ neqekraatak _ taake uk _ .
avegte yayek _ pi aqa _ , _ “ _ Tepay-a _ . _ ”
taaqe sqe aqa _ .
llaaghanwha _ taaqe uq _ .
apaqu aqa _ qamitwhayaghtughnalunga _ ellngit nun _ .
ii _ , _ qiteve magh mi _ elngaatall _ uyamig aghte ak _ , _ taake uk _ aveg llegh k _ siipnegh k _ neqekrag k _ .
negh yaghtugh llegh ka
awaligh mete ut _ ingani _ , _ malghugnegh t _ whaa _ ukanteftut _ .
kii _ , _ mangteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ qiteve te ai _ elngaatall _ qiteve te ai _ , _ neqekrag meng _ quya te magh meng _ elngaatall _ .
entaqun _ whaten _ pi aqe ai _ , _ “ _ taana _ yuug _ yiillgi yaqunaan _ , _ tusaqe kayugu uq _ whaa _ . _ ”
nuliigh ni _ ungipaate a _ qayungllaatesqellunga _ .
kumaghkagh it _ tawani _ llungani _ .
ii _ , _ qiteve magh meng _ elngaatall _ .
qiteve te aqe yagh aatnga _ , _ ava ite ngugh u nga _ .
liitekagh ghhagh nka _ qafsinkuuragh ghhaat _ .
taagken _ qayugh te aq _ ketfaghyaqmegteggu _ , _ kemeg qragh k _ naten _ angka uq _ qateghrakegtagh _ .
aag llegh a _ taana _ liigike aqa _ maklag m _ kuyag ke a _ .
aghnagh _ avegtughlunl _ , _ avegtugh luni _ miluute ai _ .
Tagnellghiinaaneng _ negh naagh zinga _ whanga _ qategh llegh i _ avelghagh luki _ .
sa u na yu kan _ , _ nanugh u na yu kan _ , _ quyngigh u yagh nghite a _ sa u yagh a _ .
taagken _ maklag t _ naange yata _ , _ pi aqa _ , _ “ _ Tepay-a _ , _ maligsit _ . _ ”
Vegllugwet _ tungsigh anka _ , _ taaqe ni unga _ .
Tepay-a _ taaqe u uq _ , _ maligsit _ vegllug u ut _ .
ii _ , _ qiteve laatagh ut _ elngaatall _ .
entaqun _ avaqutagh teng _ sa meng _ seghlegh meng _ pi snanigh aqe aatnga _ , _ tusaqe naagh ni lunga _ .
taagken _ qayugh te naqe ukut _ .
qayugh te ma luta _ ii _ , _ qakma _ nutem _ me mikun _ Tuluq _ .
whanga mnun _ pi u uq _ .
ii _ , _ itegh luni _ tawani _ elngaatall _ , _ ellnga llu _ qayugh uq _ .
Yiillgiyaqminiki _ elngaatall _ tusaqnaanghitunnguq _ .
uksulqusigh igh ngugh _ taakut _ neqe leg t _ .
Ighlegtupigtunnguq _ elngaatall _ iwernga _ , _ tawansimaaqelghii _ elngaatall _ aghnellqusiq _ .
Entaqunnguq _ igataghaqsengaghtut _ , _ neqaaghhaghmeng _ tuunlunghatni _ taawa _ aane ma aqe lghii _ .
kingu itneng _ entaqun _ neghe uute aqe lghiit _ .
pi aqa _ tagtalmi _ , _ “ _ igataghnagh iqe vig ite usi _ , _ sighineg mii t _ ama _ aghvenge ghllag ma ut _ aange pigte uq _ elngaatall _ . _ ”
“ _ enmis _ suqagh a _ tukfigh ma a _ Pedersen-em _ . _ ”
ii _ , _ aghnagh _ ullegh aghte uq _ elngaatall _ .
li _ , _ tamaani _ elngaatall _ uvagha uq _ quyam _ angtale aneng _ amaken _ aghvegh meng _ .
whaa nguq _ ellnga llu _ pirughte yaghtugh pestaagh naqe uq _ awataghpag meng _ kelqelluni _ .
uqugh aneng _ sa aneng _ keveg iqe i na luni _ .
ii _ , _ taakut _ nangqalugpagtaalluteng _ sa ut _ esghapag aat _ elngaatall _ .
apeghiigh yami _ quya nghmeng _ ungipaate ai _ , _ qiteve te ai _ .
kii _ , _ nekeve qaghtagh te kau ut _ elngaatall _ , _ mengwaagte ma a _ elngaatall _ .
taawa _ pirughte yagh uute naqe aqe ut _ ellngit llu _ .
angyaghpag kun _ aag yaghqagh t _ taawanginaq _ .
atghagh te aatnga qun _ Tuluqlu _ taana _ uugte luni _ .
taakut llu _ angyagh t _ entaqun _ ungipaate ait _ taglagh luteng _ .
whangkuta _ aghulaqe ukut _ taakwagun _ esnigh ukut _ uteghmun _ nunaagh kun _ pi aqe luteng _ .
ungazigh _ kaate laaghigate aat _ angyaghpag kun _ pi yaaghte te mneng _ .
teglenga pigte na iqe aat _ elngaatall _ .
enkaam _ sa u a _ tuguyugnaq _ kagpagteghaqaghput _ kaate yaghtugh negh mta _ .
mangteghagh m _ nalla akun _ pi gpenaamta _ sani akun _ pi aqe luta _ .
Sanivanteghngaaghmeng _ , _ piyug meng _ angyagh meng _ upag uute aqe lghiit _ .
liigi _ taawa _ tawatete uq _ ungazigh _ taana _ .
aywaa ni _ akilpegagh llegh ut
enkaam _ alla _ ayumiqullegh mi _ maavek _ tuumke aqe kanganga _ Pedersen-em _ .
Nume-ekun _ qaake kayugu yalghiikut _ .
Ighennaqlu _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ whanga _ , _ Kemugyi _ , _ Inuuq _ , _ taaggun _ uugtekayugu ukut _ uuvganeng _ .
enkaam _ tagtalmi _ Kemugyinkuk _ , _ Inuunkuk _ aviighute uk _ .
uugte nanigh ut _ .
whanga _ , _ Ighennaq _ , _ imagh mii _ , _ Meghyuq _ , _ taakungughtukut _ uugtekayug ni _ .
aghvegh niigh gpenaamta _ akilpegameng _ .
Akilpegameng _ lliigh ukut _ kaviigh _ , _ amiiragh _ , _ ulima uq _ , _ alngunak _ sa u a _ aki at _ .
tan- lgu a _ qawaag m _ melangaagh a _ .
aki ite ngugh t _ entaqun _ nanglleg ke aqe kangi _ .
mani k _ , _ alpa m _ manig a _ .
alpa m _ manig anun _ whanga _ pinigh llegh anun _ test-esiigunga _ , _ kalevekagh ghhagh inagh t _ tukfiqayugwet _ .
puglegha lghiit _ yug nge kau lghiit _ .
taakut _ yug ngekagh t _ veghute aqe aput _ .
iwernga _ tukfigh aqe kangi _ elngaatall _ .
nuna _ qamagte luku _ esne a _ taakwna _ akilpegagh vike luku _ paamna _ , _ inglu anun _ enraq _ aghvig negh mta _ sivuqagh mun _ maavek _ , _ Canada-muu _ esne kun _ .
uukna _ kaviigh ghllag u uq _ Canada _ .
uukna _ akeleghraagh a _ Nunglegraq _ , _ sighineg _ , _ alia _ qukaa ni _ imtug _ .
imtug meng _ taagken _ ava n _ .
avate meng _ taagken _ qigugh a _ , _ taana lli _ sangaawa _ qiwaa m _ kangighagh a _ puygaaqa _ .
taagken _ agavek _ ungazigh mun _ .
ungazigh meng _ taagegken _ nanevgagh ke i yankut _ nuna at _ ama _ puygaaqa _ .
Taagegken _ nallukekanighaqa _ ategh a _ kenlanga _ Nevuqamun _ .
nevugh ke aq _ taana _ ama _ naayghagh mete uq _ .
uulegh _ ama _ uaten _ ama _ uyatu tke aagh _ whavek llu _ entaqun _ nasqagh tun _ , _ naayghagh meng _ teve a _ .
uulegh mi _ tawani _ estugwaanun _ taglagh lutung _ Pedersen-llu _ .
kaviightu uq _ agaghte uute luni _ taawa _ .
arekull _ uulegh m _ estugwaqeftaa _ , _ ruuseghmiig igh a _ .
kaviigh _ avugh aa _ elngaatall _ tawani _ .
whanga _ kanaghte magh an _ aqeftaghaagh ghllag tgun _ .
tawaten _ pi ghngaaghmi _ , _ tuqlugh aanga _ , _ “ _ una qun _ esghaqagh ghhu _ . _ ” _ pi yaqegka _ kaviigh u uq _ whanga mni qun _ iitek _ .
pi yalghiinga _ rahhit _ skin- nge ma lghii _ .
papeg liqe aq _ , _ taameng _ melqwa _ takestaaghhaa li _ , _ naqam _ qateghrakegtepiglleghhii _ .
ruuseghmii mun _ tawavek _ kelgute a _ .
qivghu uq _ tukfigh llegh mineng _ tawavek _ .
uulegh mii t _ puughtengngwaaghumakangat _ .
iwernga _ tukfigh aa _ tawatete ghngaan _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh luta _ inglu anun _ ukavek _ aghvigh ukut _ .
sivuqagh meng _ maaken _ piinligh luku _ , _ Sivuqaghhmiit _ kaviighagh t _ tukfigh luku _ , _ kangigh mii t _ kaviighagh t _ , _ pugughileghmii t _ kaviighagh t _ , _ tapghapagagh mii t _ kaviighagh t _ , _ tukfigh luku _ taagken _ aygugh aqe lghiikut _ .
ingaligh t _ taakut _ ulimaaperegwaaghllaguut _ .
ighlleghaasigh _ sa u a _ alngunak _ , _ tugute _ ulima uq _ .
uuvganeng _ ulima kayug ghllag u ut
taakut _ , _ ingaligh mii t _ .
elngaatall _ tukfightugh aqe kanga _ , _ ighlleghaatfaghqu _ sa u a _ teghig ke sagh _ .
qafsinkaghte aqe aki _ imani _ .
taawa _ sighla luteng _ taglagh aqe lghiit _ .
Estugwalguuq _ tawani _ pedersen _ , _ Small _ Diumede-mi _ ingaligh ni _ .
kina u yagh uq _ ategh a _ liisimake yagh aqa _ .
ingaligh ni _ atugh llegh
tawaten _ angyagh meng _ atghagh luteng _ , _ taglagh naqe yameng _ ii-ii _ , _ angyagh m _ yugwa _ qalghillaghquuq _ , _ angwaagh te kete luku _ .
Qalghillaghquuq _ elngaatall _ atugh naqe na ait _ .
Qalghiillaghqum _ ungipaate aqe ainkut _ atugh naqe ni luki _ .
aga _ taglagh ut _ .
kingu aneng _ Pedersen-mun _ pi lunga _ , _ “ _ pagaveg- a _ atugh lghii nun _ nagate yagh yagh ka ite zinga _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ lghennaqlu _ , _ whanga llu _ ? _ ”
Pedersen-em _ pi unga _ , _ “ _ Umiilgataghaq _ esgha _ tesqakemna _ liigike ste gu _ .
angegh amken _ liigike ste naken _ taana _ umiilgataghaq _ taglagh u tsi _ liisimake sqellug qu _ . _ ”
aane lunga _ ungipaate luku _ umiilgataaghaq _ taana _ , _ “ _ umiileg m nguq _ angegh ma kanganga _ legan _ esgha _ teskiwna _ dory _ , _ taaggun _ taglagh tek _ . _ ”
taglagh ukut _ taaggun _ ighennaqlu _ , _ imagh mii llu _ , _ whanga llu _ .
Keluteghllugwinaghqun _ tamlag ukut _ uyghagapagillghakun _ .
Ighennaam _ legan _ kayusiite gpenaamta _ , _ aga _ Ighennaq _ .
Tuqlughaghyaghaghpung _ imagh mii llu _ .
kelevagh te luku _ angyagh _ taana _ , _ aglagh ukung _ .
kii _ , _ atugh yug pigte ma lghii _ elngaatall _ .
kaate yalghiikut _ nutaan _ pi kestagh aqe ut _ .
ii _ , _ upugha te ainkut _ elngaatall _ .
ii _ , _ atughtu ut _ .
aghula ut _ elngaatall _ .
apeghiigh luteng _ kayagte ainkut _ aghulasqelluta _ aghula kayugu lghiinga qun _ whanga _ aga _ ategh unga _ .
nuna ni _ ighsa snanigh aqe kanginkut _ siivanllegh t _ sa meng _ .
ii _ , _ tawaten _ kallagpak _ pi yan _ uzive kestagh yalghiinga _ iwerngaqun _ aghnagh _ nekeve uute luni _ yaaqghiitutaqeftuq _ .
whanga mnun _ kayusiite i _ .
Atasiq _ apeghiigh luku _ , _ imagh mii _ enraq _ .
tanemlleqa _ tawaten _ elngaatall _ .
aghnagh m _ aghulasaqminiguu _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh yan _ , _ Ighennaq _ alaghrang _ aghula igate uq _ kayagtaghwaaghyaghaghput _ pipagningite u aghte uq _ .
taagken _ atghagh luta _ inglu anun _ pi ukut _ enraq _ , _ ukavek _ Nome-emun _ .
Nome-emun _ kaa llu ta _ tawavek _ , _ malghugnegh t _ Scow-et _ akmaken _ steam-akun _ tagite ma aqe kangit _ saghya anun _ ilakaghqagh t _ .
entaqun _ maaken _ angyaghpag a _ ulevaghaghngaaqelghii _ akilpegameng _ .
tamaani _ 1928-ngwaallu _ , _ 1929-ngwaallu _ .
teller- mi _ aghqella llegh ut
enkaam _ taagken _ aygugh aqe luta _ tukfigh i aqe luta _ .
teller- mi _ tawani _ iqallug _ aghqella taqagh ut _ .
Pedersen-nguuq _ tanemlleqa _ teller- mete ngughk _ .
inglu anite ngughk _ mission-net _ tungangitnilnguq _ .
aghqella te aqe ainkut _ .
aghqella _ whalen _ uzive te luku _ whanga _ ateghqughtengwaaqunga _ .
Iingʼggurugllak _ tamlag te luku _ , _ tazingken _ sayunemteggu _ , _ nutem _ uka _ kavighte te ghllag luni _ taglagh aqe uq _ .
ila a _ tepe ste luku _ , _ iingunagh an _ tepe sigate aat _ .
uglagh _ tepe luni _ tawani _ tepe ste luni _ .
aw llaag ghhagh inagh ghllag u uq _ .
nuna nge aik _ , _ iqallug _ , _ kayu _ , _ puvangitaghagh _ , _ neghnavregagh _ , _ sighunpayaag _ .
pekete ta meng qun _ imigh aqe aput _ kalngagagh t _ , _ kanani _ avugh yaghqaa luki _ .
taana _ kingummneng _ uaten _ pi aqe atgu _ .
megh mun wha _ pekete aqe nghite atgu _ .
Sikulinghwaalleghput
taagken _ iqallug meng _ pi luta _ tespagavek _ enraq _ .
siku _ pi magh mi _ elngaatall _ siku _ .
siku anun _ kaate aqe ukut _ ayguvani _ taakwani _ sikughllawaaghuuq _ .
siku niigh lleg pigu uq llu _ enraq _ pedersen _ taana _ .
gaarinegh pig meng _ dynamite-tekluta _ .
elngaatall _ ughugwighpenaamta _ dynamite-testeni _ siku mun _ ateghaate luta _ .
ii-ii _ , _ guuqaghaqaghput _ megh kun _ ukimallegh kun _ ighllute aqe luki _ .
amenqun _ nakreg leg ghllag u aqe lghiit _ angyaghpag t _ taakeghllagmeng _ .
Yumralighluki _ tawaten _ asighte te luki _ kumaghlluki _ , _ ighllute luki _ qimagugh te aqe luta _ .
kii _ , _ 50 _ pound-em _ guute llegh i _ , _ siku t _ aange lghiit _ pagaaaa _ !
Seghleghllawaaghuut _ .
enkaam _ tume ngllagh luku _ , _ aghula i te aqe lghiikut _ tawani _ .
angyaghpag _ uka _ tagi luni _ , _ tagi luni _ , _ saaghw mteggun _ taaggun _ aag luni _ aghuliigh igate ngughk _ .
pi ke sigh t _ legan _ nagun _ tapghagh kun _ akuqaghtugh luta _ uugte aqe ukut _ .
Ingaverugllak _ alla _ ategh yaghqagh ni _ qayughllak _ .
nukalpigagh ni _ elngaatall _ tengghu nagh _ elngaatall _ .
Ughumaaghmeng _ naange luta _ .
tawaten _ siku mi _ igleghtekayugu uq _ .
enkaam _ sallghite yagh kuni _ maaten _ , _ ice _ breaker-mi _ umiileg _ pi niigh pigte nagh u yagh uq _ .
aygugh llegh ut
Ayguvanun _ lliigh luta _ , _ taakwna _ estugwaghtuuq _ , _ ama _ taakwani _ angyaghwaagh kun _ malghugneghteggun _ .
angyaghpag ut _ kanagh a _ awavani _ .
saghya a _ taglaaqughaqegkefut _ estugwam _ .
neghe llegh llu _ naghughte aqe lghii _ , _ salngag _ taglaate qugh luku _ elngaatall _ .
esghaghhu _ Nurth _ Star-eksuwhaaghuluku _ Sivuqaghhmiit _ enlegaqegkangat _ salngag _ qelpegh qugh ma ni luku _ , _ maani _ usingigh negh meggni _ .
tespagani _ tawatete uq _ .
igatagh negh mta _ legan _ sa u aat _ salngag t _ qelpeghte luki _ negh aqe ukut _ .
angyaghpag _ qayughllak _ kanagh a _ , _ negh vig llu _ naghughte aqe kanga _ .
esghagh a _ Nurth _ Star-eksuwhaaq _ tawatete ma lghii _ aghqestaagh ghllag mi _ usingigh nghmini _ .
taagken _ iiwen _ Puint _ hupe- mun _ kaate negh mta _ , _ yug meng _ tugulagh te aqe uq _ .
aghvinleg _ tugwaaqaa _ , _ kenlemmnii _ kayute u luku _ .
Aghisinankut _ tamaakut _ Stanley-nkuk _ .
stanley _ taana _ qavngaq _ maaken _ Anchurage-etaqngamta _ tengegkayug kun _ esghaqagh kaqe a _ .
Point _ Hope-eghmii _ Barrow-mun _ lli aqe aq _ .
kii _ , _ upugha te kaqe aanga _ elngaatall _ .
Aghisina _ enraq _ taana _ tuquyugllaaguftuq _ .
taagken _ tawavek _ kaa llu ta _ yug meng _ tugulagh te luni _ , _ mangtag _ tukfightugh luku _ awataghpag mete ngughk _ .
Fifty _ keveg iqe aq _ tukfigh aqe kanga _ mangtag _ , _ tekeghagh mi _ tawani _ .
Kenlemmni _ aki u luku _ .
Ugwavek _ sivuyag m _ qaye anun _ llilaghteghaqegkangit _ .
Siqinghaqegkangi _ taawani _ .
ataasigh _ ellngatughqwaagaa _ awataghpag _ .
Pedersen-em _ pi unga _ , _ “ _ taana _ imagh mii llu _ awataghpag _ akmagutagh mun _ kuuve luku _ neqeknakesi _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ ukite luku _ akmagutagh gnun _ kuuve luku _ aay _ , _ kavighrukwhalek _ uqugh a _ elngaatall _ .
arekull _ tekeghagh mii t _ kevigh sagh it _ , _ mangtag _ , _ uqugh _ tawaten _ uglaghqakalghii _ kevigh te ma aqe kangat _ .
mangtag llu _ , _ uqugh llu _ .
llaaghanwha _ neqekagh ut _ elngaatall _ , _ neqnigh ghhalek _ .
saallghaghte te llegh ut
tawaten _ allameng _ angyaghpag t _ kaate laatagh aput _ Arctic-nguftuq _ .
pedersen _ lishuurne- mun _ lliigh magh an _ .
taana _ arctic _ Leavitt-em _ pi a _ .
ilu akun _ siku m _ iglegha te aqe ukut _ , _ unʼga _ siku ghllag _ .
ii _ , _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ghngaamta _ quutfaghmeng _ saallghaghte a _ .
tepe naqe ainkut _ seghleghhalek _ .
ii _ , _ kete mun _ elngaatall _ angwaaghasalghiikut _ taakut _ Arctic-et _ enankin _ aange lghiit _ , _ aga _ Iegan _ igleghte ut _ .
whangkuta _ sangyite aqe luta _ qenwat _ tumangitgun _ aatqaghte luta _ tumangitgun _ taakwagun _ .
awavagh ghllag luta _ llangaqa _ tepnaanghilleghmun _ lliigh luta _ .
Arctic-et _ taakut _ aghuliigh ut _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ sa ni te mun _ pegnem _ apumgute luta _ aghula igh ukut _ .
tagtalmi _ tawaten _ ellmaaragte yagu _ kelute mun _ taglaghtuunneqiglluta _ esne akun _ taakwagun _ .
Barruw-mun _ kaa llu ta _ arctic _ tawantuq _ .
whangkuta _ naghughte ukut _ .
taana _ arctic _ usingigh yaghqaa lghii _ , _ tawavek _ Charles _ Brower-mun _ .
Charles _ Bruwer _ estugwaqaat _ Leavitt-enkut _ .
taagken _ naghughte ukut _ whangkuta _ elngaatall _ , _ Point _ Lay _ , _ naghughqughaghput _ amavek _ Demarcation _ Point _ kaate luku _ naghughtaghput _ .
Barrow _ ivgagh lghii ni _ kenlengwaaghanun _ asivagh mete te _ qiive kayugu ukut _ .
asivagh mete ut _ Canada-nkut _ .
aghqe itagh i te llegh
asivagh mete te _ qiive luta _ taakwani _ sa uq _ tagitug ghraag ughtagh a _ .
imukun _ naasi qu gpenateng _ , _ whanga qun _ naasiigh qu ste nghite aanga _ .
ii _ , _ aghqitaghagh ightu kut _ igleghte kestagh ghngaamta _ .
iitek _ uutqiigh aghtagh yagh uq _ .
sa u a _ qemighyuk _ elqughaghsimakefut _ , _ sani kek _ naqam _ uusqagh lghiik _ .
iitek _ allaaghhiinaghaqsaghtuuq _ , _ aghtugh uq _ .
qavaa yagh lghiit _ teghtugh qugh luki _ .
angyaghwaagh _ evlug ngllagh magh mi _ angyaghpag m _ uvitangani _ , _ angwaagh magh emta _ , _ uteghmun _ pi magh mi _ .
angyaghpag _ talwa _ aghulate igate uq _ .
nanugh u uq _ taana _ aghqe itagh i sigh ut _ .
tawaten _ unugwaa _ ghhatagh nghite ukut _ .
yuug _ ataasigh _ pegge stekagh at _ .
aghnagh _ taana _ nuliigh ni _ lengaaghte aghtekagh a _ engine-egnun _ qamavek _ .
umeg igh lleg _ taana _ ellmi neng _ angyallighte aqe uq _ .
unaami _ unaangu pigte luku _ teghtugh luta _ teghtugh qugh luta _ uyghiite k _ maalghug _ angyaghwaagh k _ tuteg te lukek _ uyghiite t _ unaghsigh meng _ sanighyigh luki _ uyate te igh luki _ atghagh te aqe aput _ taanʼgavek _ , _ uyghiite t _ uqig ghllag u lghiit _ , _ angyaghpag m _ uyghigh ta i _ .
iwerngaqun _ awavanun _ atghagh te luki _ qalqalima meng _ , _ uyghiite t _ aga _ kaleve aqe ut _ .
enkaam _ angyaghpag meng _ taagken _ angwaagh magh emta _ uteghmun _ , _ taakut _ tangki mii ii te a _ iighsuute t _ uyghiite _ , _ ghhatagh naqe m _ angtale aneng _ , _ angyaghwaagh _ qagi ngllagh magh mi _ .
taawa _ unugwaqegkanga _ sa gpenani _ .
Hiik _ , _ tagtalmi _ uyghiite k _ samaken _ nusug negh megteni _ iwerngaqun _ ughwarrameng _ akleg i _ taakut _ imigh ghllag ma aqe lghiit _ .
tangki t _ iknaqe te meggneng _ sayugwaqegkangit _ .
taagken _ ila a _ tagtalmi _ kii _ uyghiite _ sakeqe te uq _ , _ qivghuke a _ elngaatall _ .
ataasighhaaghte uq _ uyghiite _ .
Coal-a _ ateghqughaghput _ elngaatall _ megh mun _ .
qafsina _ ton _ megh mun _ egtaghput _ .
legan _ megh mun _ sanivanun _ kalertaqaput _ .
Diesel _ tamaa na _ tavaghte aqe luku _ ellnga n _ uqughqagh a _ .
Drum-a _ qafsinegyag _ ateghqughaghput _ .
angyaghpag m _ saghya a _ inglu anun _ angaghqugh magh an _ , _ qaame na nga _ angyaghpag _ iggagesqelluku _ .
pingayut ii ta ani _ tawani _ pi yalghiikut _ aywaa meng _ anuqligh ma kanga _ .
pika _ qute _ pi ka ngiighhagh _ .
ii _ , _ waame niigh uq _ elngaatall _ tawani _ uyghiite k _ taake uk _ naghqellinghitngwaaghtuk _ elngaatall _ .
uutqiigh magh mi _ , _ ellnga n _ angyaghpag _ cumpass-ekun _ nalluniigh magh an _ .
aaghhaghte na ai _ tagtalmi _ .
whangkuta _ qamani _ saghya _ inglu anun _ ughumaaghte luta _ elngaatall _ inglu anun _ saghya _ aghvighquqefut _ .

mesiigh ghhagh inagh _ tamaa na _ tavaghte luku _ .
ii- k _ , _ iiwen _ aghnegh m _ qute kaghagh ke a _ , _ hiik _ aaghhaghte na ai _ angyaghpag _ .
Evlugwem _ piyaqminigu _ sama _ .
Hiik _ , _ ghhatagh ukut _ qenwat _ .
taawa _ uutqiigh ukut _ uyghiite kun _ taaggun _ , _ engine-emaamta _ , _ drum-elghuteghllak _ taana _ .
uyghiite mun _ kaa llu ta _ tawavek _ qiive luta _ sayug luku _ , _ taanʼgavek _ elngaatall _ angwaagh uq _ , _ tawaten _ iggagngaghllagemta _ elngaatall _ .
iwerngaqun _ taanʼgavaak _ siku mun _ kaa llu ta _ , _ siku kun _ petug luta _ nallghusagh ukut _ .
saghya _ inglu anun _ nekeghquumaan _ almesigh itun _ , _ drum-a _ tamaa na _ qakuumaan _ .

taagken _ Herschel _ Island-muu _ .

tungtutuqagh _ .
qiighqagh mun _ tungtu yagh aqe lghiit _ , _ ii _ , _ enleganun _ .

malghukuraagh _ sloop-a _ .

Pedersen-mun _ tuune ait _ .

atigh llegh ka _ Private _ Mate-nguuq _ .

pi mkun _ taglagh ukut _ .

uugg tuq _ .
petug yaghtugh aqa _ angyaghpag _ qute kun _ .

umiileg m _ pi unga _ , _ “ _ Mast _ head-mun _ mayugh a _ . _ ”

uksuqun _ qakun _ ungazigh mun _ aglagh u lleqe aaten _ .

amenqun _ meghqatngalghii _ .

pi unga _ , _ “ _ Teddy _ kayusiite yaghtugh ghhu _ . _ ”
Siqlugwalguuq _ kingu a _ sanqutaaperewaaghmeng _ imaqe lghii _ .
ghhuugh _ , _ gaarinegh _ , _ pellugpak _ , _ bomb _ gun- a _ , _ push _ gun- a _ sa u a _ guunniighusigh perewaagh _ teskiwantekayuguuq _ umiileg m _ ne ani _ , _ sama _ siqlugwami _ .

itegh yalghiinga _ Teddy _ tesqamanteftuq _ .

kaviigh _ tamaani _ sixty _ dollars-nguyaghtuq _ .

Yughaq
Yughaq _ taana _ .
Nagannemki _ taawa _ , _ ” _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ ” _ nagate aqe kegka _ legan _ pi nghatgu _ .
Yughaghyaqmininga _ , _ talwa _ saafte gpenanga _ , _ iigge ni _ qule mun _ nengug te ai _ , _ nengug te luki _ whaa _ qilag m _ pamaken _ qulighhaan _ qulighhaaneng _ qilag m _ pi nga yu an _ qafsig ke llegagh te _ amiiragh aneng _ ayapghaatiisqelluni _ pi uq _ .
qaamna _ sa u a _ aqnighqagh ii lghii _ pinighsagh na luku _ .
tungsigh llegh a _ esgha _ taana _ interest-tetkeghllakaqa _ Bible-emi _ Heavens _ of _ Heaven-qun _ atightu kangat _ .
sumeghtaghagh tke ghllag aqe kegka _ .
taagken _ tungsigh luni _ wetku _ tawani _ taawa _ elngaatall _ eflughwaaghumaghma _ .
ayapegh aatagh luni _ qaamna _ aqnighnegh _ pinighsagh naqe a _ , _ maangnnaqaa _ .
Maangnnaqniiqiit _ entaqun _ soothenaqneghmeng _ .
Maangta _ taana _ understand-teyaqegka _ sooth-nguftuq _ .
entaqun _ ukut _ yughagh qite te a _ nagate nghmegteki _ ukut _ ipapighqeghllanghata _ , _ neghyu ghllag negh meggni _ piniighte aqe ai _ .
taawa _ yughagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ whaa _ piniighte na ai _ ayapghaatagh gneng _ igamsiqa yug uq _ , _ qilag m _ pamum _ pingayaannguq _ qafsig aneng _ ayapegh aatagh luni _ pi lghii _ .
tefaay _ , _ naangtaqiit _ qesigh aqe ainkut _ taawa _ .
qesigh luta _ taaqe aqe ut _ .
Every _ prayer _ , _ beginning-enga _ , _ ” _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ ” _ , _ naangnegh a _ ” _ tefaay _ ” _ .
amen- nga _ entaqun _ taana _ tefaayngwaaqelghii _ .
aag yu i aagh _ taana _ taawa _ maaten _ whaa _ kinku nun _ nuyeklighnun _ aapte aghte aqe yagh aqa _ .
nallu kaqe aat _ .
akuzitekagh ut _ , _ part _ of _ our _ prayer _ , _ beginning _ of _ prayer _ .
entaqun _ whangkutestun _ sa meng _ pillghuuq _ wallu _ .
Yughaq _ qamagte luni _ tawatete uq _ taawa _ .
ateghte i
kina lli _ ama _ angyat teng _ aga _ angyagh lghiit _ ateghte i lghii _ nagate laatagh aqa _ ?
tawaten _ sivuke laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ aag yu i aagh _ tanem _ ” _ , _ angyat ghhagh ni _ aagkut _ taghneghagh ngunaki _ ava u na ki _ meghraag pigte luki _ kete sqe ai _ .
sa mun _ teghig ke sagh mun _ esghagh yaghqaa gpenaki _ taghneghagh nge te yaghqaa gpenaki _ aga _ , _ unʼgani _ ivagh i naigh sqe ai _ .
Naangsaqminiki _ yughani _ , _ qesigh uq _ sivuke luni _ angyaleg ita _ sigutanga n _ tunute nga kete te _ qesigh uq _ .
alla _ pi laatagh uq _ .
sivuyagte yan _ sigute gkenka _ tunutangakun _ qesigh laatagh aa _ .
esgha _ aleghquqayugwit _ .
Teghigsit
Teghigsit _ tamaakut _ negh ke igh sag ghllag mi _ elngaatall _ pikayugwet _ .
Teghigsilget _ ungipaghagh neng _ entaqun _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
teghigsigh negh meggni _ entaqun _ seal- i qugh kayugu laatagh ut _ , _ alignalghii u ut _ .
sivunegh lgu lghiit _ ayvegh ughtekagh meng _ .
ayvegh nge yu ghllag t _ sivuqagh m _ ayvegh nge yu lleghtagh igh i _ sivunghannguq _ ayvegh ughtekau lghii _ .
Ayveghteggun _ ayumigh ite nghaani _ tagi aqe luni _ , _ tagi aqe luni _ .
melqunge luni _ qenwat _ tazimantekagh _ .
ima _ kaate laatagh nghmini nguq _ qalghiighaqelghii _ ayvegh lghute m _ qalghigh te lghii m _ qunganganilluni _ kingunegh minun _ .
ategh teng _ atightugh aqe kangi _ .
ipa u ut _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ ayumigh _ ungipamsugwet _ .
laluramke nun _ Wiyam _ tamaa na _ compare-ennemkun _ , _ elqughaghte te luni _ ayuqe uq _ , _ palaghhaghmeng _ allangughte vleghaghkagh _ .
ayumigh m _ Kiyaghtaalgha
Article _ laws-et _ taakut _ kiyaghtaallghit _ ayumigh m _ Old _ Testamentet _ pi it _ yupig m _ legan _ kiyaghtaallghatun _ ayuqe ut _ .
sangiighhagh _ qamagte luni _ itake ghllag luni _ ayuqe uq _ .
Enkaangam _ yupig ni _ whangkuta _ igleghneghput _ tawatete yaghpete uq _ legan _ ukmangite ghllag _ .
ungipamsug te negh mta _ maaten _ nani _ ungipamsug te negh mta _ .
talwa _ esghapag snanigh ghllag luta _ ayuqe kanginkut qun _ .
esghagh yugnagh ghllaget _ .
Avegtughhaghmun _ neghe uute naqe mi _ whaten _ aqelqagh leg ni _ , _ liilightuusagh leg _ , _ avegtugh lleghqagh meng _ , _ sa u a _ tamaghhagh mi _ .
kenletu lleghpigagh u ukut _ entaqun _ whangkuta _ liilightuusaqemrugwaaq _ sa u a _ uglagh u pigte lghii _ .
sa ite ngughk _ enkaam _ ayumigh _ .
neqe m _ ila a _ neghe snanigh luku _ ayuqe kanga _ ila a _ sa u a _ anglinghhagh nun _ tamaavek _ , _ ila a _ aqsaleg nun _ aghnagh nun _ .
liisimake luki _ entaqun _ sa lget _ tamaakut _ yupig t _ peghqinegh pigu lghiit _ .
talwa _ piitesighagh m _ ila a _ alngunak _ whaten _ negh yaghqaa nghite ngughk _ .
agleghnagh ni luki _ pi aqe kangit _ , _ agleghnagh u nghite uq _ entaqun _ atigh llegh a _ taana _ .
puvalla t
puvalla t _ tamaakut _ entaqun _ yugwem _ kitum _ sa u a _ esghagh luku _ puvalla ughtekayugu uq _ taawa _ puvalla liite kayugu uq _ , _ entaqun _ gift-tengaqelghiit _ yugwet _ taakut _ sa meng _ nani _ .
Puvallaneghmeggni _ tawaten _ , _ elngaatall _ party-lghiistun _ katam _ ayuqe ut _ , _ amalka _ core-elget _ iwernga _ akugh leg t _ .
sa u a _ tawaten _ aanghutelleghteng _ liisimake kangat _ .
Pinigh _ atugh aqe aat _ puvallaneghmeggni _ .
neqenghaghqe ghllag kayugu ut _ .
uzive na iqe kangit llu _ tapghagh at _ whaten _ aghveghaqetagh kun _ petug luki _ .
aghnagh t _ tugu luki _ yugwet _ paamken _ inglu aneng _ tunutngitnilluteng _ .
Dance-estun _ legan _ tawaten _ uzivngwaaghuteghllakayugwennguq _ nenglaghqiquteghllakayugwet _ .
seghlegh _ sa u a nguq _ puygaaqegkangat _ puvalla mi _ tawaten _ qerngughte te luteng _ .
Allaaghiinaagughnguq _ puvalla _ tamaa na _ , _ kitum _ yugwem _ pi a _ alla u aqe luni _ pattern- nga _ .
Saayat
ila ita _ saayaaniiqegkangit _ puvalla it _ .
Saayat _ tamaakut _ taxidermistestun _ ulimaaghistun _ ayuqe ut _ .
naqam nguq _ kana _ sagnegh t _ , _ qayuutagh ghhagh t _ neqe meng _ imigh luki _ qukaa ni _ tawani _ kenghhwagh m _ saaghw ani _ lli luteng _ .
kiiwhken _ kiwa _ , _ nallu kaqe kangit _ maakut _ ila ita _ anglinghhagh t _ , _ yugwet _ aqume luteng _ piighhagh meng _ entaqun _ amel leg ngestagh ghhagh meng _ ivalu meng _ paaggun _ pizitetgun _ pi luki _ .
qawaag m nguq _ amighqwaagh i _ , _ sa u aat _ entaqun _ alngunak _ qawaag t _ , _ iwhani _ esghaghkagh teng _ taakut _ qawaag t _ akuqagh kayugu kangit _ .
Amighqwaaghennguq _ afta nghmegteki _ seglluki _ kevigh luki _ .
kinegh nghata _ kevigh luki _ unguva lghii stun _ legan _ whaten _ ulima luki _ .
nagun _ paamggun _ kaki te aqe ait _ qiipagh t _ .
pika nguq _ qawaag t _ nalug luteng _ iteghaanneghmeggni _ esghagh aqe ait _ .
esghapag ghngaaghmegteki nguq _ qawaag t _ , _ yaqugh teng _ whaten _ saaglluki _ , _ neqe mun _ kanavek _ pi luteng _ , _ puvuglutenguq _ , _ aga _ quulvaghaghtaqut _ .
Teskigum _ esghapagsagh ke nghmini _ elngaatall _ , _ esgha _ party-estun _ ayuqe lghiit _ puvallallghit _ .
Puvallannguq _ tamaakut _ seghlegh ite ut _ quyanaghllaaguut _ , _ quyaqayuguteghllakayuguut _ .
eghte qugh u aagh
eghte qugh u aaghet _ maakut _ angyagh m _ piinligh lleghqagh ani _ elngaatali _ nangllegsiisigh t _ , _ tungsigh ragh sigh t _ elngaatall _ taakut _ .
Year _ round _ entaqun _ neqe _ sa u a _ unakegkagh eng _ , _ part- sa _ taana _ saveekayugwat _ .
angyagh _ piinligh yaghtugh nghaani _ ategh qugh luku _ , _ tunugh _ tamaa na _ pugnegh iigh luku _ , _ kaape llegh ke i luteng _ nunivag meng _ , _ sa u a _ akuute aq llu _ pi luku _ .
aghveghaqetagh m _ uvitangakun _ nekeghqughluki _ tawaten _ , _ alqimagh yukagh gpenaki _ , _ saafte yukagh gpenaki _ naten _ itake ghllag luki _ .
angyaleg m _ nuliigh ghhagh inagh n _ qepghaqayugwi _ akuute yaghqagh t _ tamaakut _ .
tanpegh meng _ ulig luki _ qavaghtekayugu ut _ .
Unugwem _ qukanghani _ angyaleg nkuk _ , _ sivuyagtenkuk _ nulighh a llu _ taana _ ivaghullugwaqut _ ilagagh aqe ut _ .
taaqe negh megteni _ sivuyagtekete te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuune i yaghtugh aqe uk _ .
taawa _ eghqwaagh aqe ut _ , _ eghwaaghluteng _ qayuutasquvegaghhaat _ sa u aat _ , _ sagnegh nge ste aq _ uglagh u pigte uq _ .
eghqwaagh yaghtugh negh meggni _ tuune i yaghtugh naqe na iqe ut _ .
Yearly _ catch-eyeng _ taana _ angyaghnaq _ pinaqenghani _ tungsighwaaneghmeggni _ entaqun _ taana _ tuunegkayugwaat _ .
Iqugwa _ amalka _ veghute lghii stun _ amalka _ pikayugwaat _ .
elngaatall _ tawani _ tungsiqayugwet _ .
taawa _ uligiuki _ unaami _ aghte nghaani qun _ samavek _ esnagh mun _ enraq _ angyat teng _ kete luki _ eghqwaagh aqe lghiit _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ eghqwaagh tkekagh teng _ taglagh negh meggni _ , _ taawa _ qaagken _ neghyaghtum _ negh aqe kangi _ .
taawa _ qagavek _ enraq _ taana _ mingilatkayugwat _ angefqaghhaan _ tawaten _ qamagte luku _ taagken _ ikute te luki _ awalightughtaakayugwiit _ Tesqagegkut _ enraq _ temngi _ tugu gpenaki _ awalinghisteng _ sangiighhagh meng _ imiite aqe luki _ .
amalka _ naveghtevleghaghaqluki _ .
kingulighpigagh _ qepghagh llegh _ nagate kaqe kegka _ whangkunni _ eghqwaagh aqngameng _ .
tawani _ unugmi _ ivaghulluneghmeng _ Ugwetelen _ taaqe luni _ aane luni _ tuune i yaghtugh luni _ itegh luni _ , _ taawa nguq _ pugnegh at llu _ , _ kaapelqagh at llu _ tugu vike ma kangat _ Pingayuggaagunnguq _ tuguvikneghmeggteki _ .
Eskimo-t _ ugpeqe ghllag luki _ ayuqe kangit _ , _ tughneghaannguq _ pingayuwhaghneng _ ighneghwaagh ke ut _ .
taawa nguq _ iqugwaneng _ tugu te ma lghii _ tawaten _ tugu te aatagh ma lghii _ .
kii _ alinge yalghiimek _ , _ Wamiiyaq _ alingruugh yalghiimi _ .
Tuqiinaqnginanghatanguq _ negh ka itneng _ tesamanlluki _ tawaten _ tuguvikegkayugwii _ tughneghagh m _ , _ taghneghagh m _ saam _ .
alingruugh ghllagkagh _ , _ ellnga _ tuqu kau uq _ .
entaqun _ alingeghllagem _ tuqute kaqe a _ .
alinge igate yagh kumeng _ entaqun _ passaaqnayalghiit _ .
ugpegh ke ghllag m _ , _ respect-eghllagem _ taawa _ ipa _ aatestekayugwaa _ .
taana _ esgha _ puygu nghite kegka _ whaa _ .
pi nga yu neng _ tughneghagh t _ ighneghwaagh ke na iqe kangit _ .
uyvasaghqe a
uyvasaghqe a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh u uq _ .
taana _ amenqun _ tapeeni _ qikmigh meng _ pi lghiit _ uyvasaghqengnguuq _ tamaa na _ , _ tawaten _ aneghlleq _ qamagte luni _ ategh a _ alngunak _ .
amalka _ alignalghii m llu _ kina _ kayagte yagh kunigu _ qinuyug ta ii lghiit _ , _ tusigagh luni _ sangameng _ tawaten _ aneghtutseng _ alignalghii kun _ liigike naqe luku _ , _ alignalghii m _ kayagte yagh kumiki _ apeghtugh yagh kumiki _ tawaten _ pisqelluki _ uyvasaghqennayalghiit _ .
taana _ qikmigh _ tape- mi _ Uuyghaankut _ iwhaningat _ .
qikmigh t _ tamaakut _ ngiigaqiit _ qinuyugllagnun _ tamaakunun _ ngiigte ste luki _ tuqute aqe ait _ .
naavghusagh ke aqe ait _ .
qikmigh u naanghite ut _ , _ sangughlluwhaghteng _ pivake ghllagkagh eng _ taakut _ qinuyugwet _ naalghutesqeqaghlluki _ ngiigluki _ egte aqe ait _ .
Suflugwaq _ sa u a _ .
uyvasaghqe a _ tamaa na _ alla u uq _ .
uglagh uq _ ategh _ .
qani
tamaakut _ ama _ suicide-ekat _ qani na iqe kangit _ .
Suicide _ taana _ qani u uq _ , _ yugtagh u nghite ngughk _ yugte aq _ allakagh mete uq _ .
Tamaakunnguq _ qanig ke aat _ seghlelleghpigaqii _ yugwem _ elngaatall _ , _ umyugwiitelleghpigaannguq _ qani kayugu ut _ .
qinuyug negh meggni _ , _ kiyanguq _ yuug _ pinigh lghii _ qanig perewaagh _ ellmeggneng _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
Naqamenraq _ liisimakistelighluteng _ tawaten _ entaqun _ nanevgaghtagh meggnun _ , _ nuyekligh igh ta meggnun _ akuzingwaaghluteng _ , _ explain-nengwaaghluteng _ , _ naallghute yaghqaa nghite lleg teng _ liigike negh meggni _ .
taawa _ amenqun _ ne m _ tunutangani _ uyghag ghllag _ irregular _ side-tawansalghii _ .
neghqute mun _ uyghag ke na iqe kangat _ .
neghqute m nguq _ naken _ tagi tke a _ entaqun _ ulape u luni _ tawaten _ qani vig u luku _ .
Piyugmenguq _ taglagh aqe ut _ qani naqe lghiit _ tamaakut _ yugwennguq _ kiyang _ pinighikagh t _ iilqayug yuguma ghllag ut _ .
pi aqe kangi _ Ugwetelem _ , _ “ _ Tamaakunnguq _ pinighi pigesnagh luteng _ qateghyiighagh m _ umyugwaaneng _ umyugwalget _ ellmeggneng _ tuqute aqe ut _ naallghute lleghqagh eng _ iilqayuke nghmegteggu _ . _ ”
taawa nguq _ taglagh luteng _ uyghag nguq _ taana _ akite kete luku _ , _ ila i nguq _ legan _ guute negh meggni _ , _ esghaghhu nguq _ uyghag _ taana _ iilqugh vleghagh ghllag u yagh uq _ .
ila i nguq _ legan _ kenuqagh aqe ut _ ellmeggneng _ tuqute aqe ut _ .
entaqun _ esghapagtelighluteng _ maligte luteng _ .
entaqun llu nguq _ ila i _ pi aqe kangi _ , _ naallghusaghqaghlluwhaat _ .
naqam nguq _ ila i _ tamaakut _ pinighi kau nghite ngugh t _ umyugwaghtuqat _ neghqwaagh it _ uki iqe luteng _ kemgim _ angtalanganeng _ , _ naave luteng _ .
piniighte aqe ai nguq _ naallghute aqe ut _ igleghte yagute aqe ut _ .
Meregtemeng _ tume t _ sivuqagh mun
tapi i sag m _ apegh llegh a
Neghqunnguq _ taana _ akmaneghpallugh _ , _ aglagh naqe negh meggni _ mangteghasqwaagh t _ sa u ut _ entaqun _ naten _ angka qaghte lit _ , _ tanpeghhek _ tawaten _ .
esgha _ mangteghasqwaagh _ iingunagh an _ akmag ma kanga _ maaken _ taamavek _ aglagh negh meggni _ sivugnagh mete te _ .
ayag ke itagh te t _ sa it _ , _ naten _ angka an _ sakusimaat _ imani _ .
esghaghhu _ atiiqe te yagh ghngaaghmeng _ , _ aghsaan _ tawaten _ .
Enkaangam _ ayuqligh _ sangan _ ilughagh ke steggu _ whangkuta _ sa meng _ apallugh ke luku _ .
nanevgaghtagh ma _ taam _ angayuqagh ma _ sa ke aat _ entaqun _ .
tanemwha qun _ Yaaghu _ Ugwaliitlu _ pike kangat _ , _ taamengwha _ apallugh ke luku _ pi ma nghite a _ .
esghaghhu _ maaken _ amavek _ akmag kayugu ma lghiit
Meregtemeng _ piinlillegh a
entaqun _ tazingani _ aamnanguyaghtuq _ neghpigagh a _ meregta _ .
tegh vleghagh m _ qula ani _ tazinga _ nenglu t _ ayumightaneghqesiighet _ esghagh aqe kenka _ tamaa _ naghughte aqe kenka _ .
aghvegh m _ elqunevragi _ , _ angtughhaam _ elqunevrakumaaqegkangi _ esghaghhu _ .
tawaten _ uyghag stun _ qaltetutkalighluteng _ lli aqe aat _ , _ ayumightaneghqesiighem _ entaqun _ angtale aneng _ .
kinkungaawa t _ imani _ .
esgha _ yulgem _ kenle aneng _ ukavek _ tagi ste naqe kegka _ .
taawa _ tazingavek _ piiwagh luteng _ enraq _ qaye igh llegh nun _ .
qaye igh llegh t _ ama _ nenglullug llgagh u aqe ut _ tamaa _ nenglurraaggaghmeng _ .
naqam _ taamna _ meregta _ neghllaak _ elngaatall _ uglagh pestaagh meng _ .
uglagh lghii _ nenge a _ elngaatall _ yugwa _ .
mengyagh llegh
esghaghhu _ repall _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii _ .
navek _ ugwavek _ qerngughte vig ghllag mun _ , _ nenglughnagllak _ sa u a _ qerngughte vig _ .
ayuqligh t _ qarginguninayaqangat _ taawavek _ uksaagh mi _ puvalla yagh uute kayugu ma lghiit _ .
elngaatall _ puvallanghani _ yaywaali leg _ tamaa _ elngaatall _ ellnginaghhaghmeng _ kezemaghhagh meng _ .
Nayughistekluku _ , _ kelengastekluku _ , _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ taana _ .
ne ghllag m _ taghnughhagh lghute ni _ , _ taana _ aflengakistekluku _ , _ tawavek _ tagi qu ghllag luki _ .
elngaatall _ taawavek _ piiwagh uute ghllag luteng _ taana _ nayughistekluku _ .
legan _ tanqighllug ghllag _ aliigh neghllug ghllag _ .
Siiqaataghtekayugwi _ qayughllak llu _ sa nghata _ tawaten _ .
puvalla _ kitum _ pi a _ taana _ efqughhneghminigu _ , _ atugh laataqu nghminigu _ , _ kaa _ , _ leganqun _ .
elngaatall _ sa u a _ pi naqlaatagh yalghiimi _ , _ taghnughhagh t _ teghhwaaghigh tke aat _ .
taakut _ elngaatall _ taghnughhagh lghute ghllag _ teghhwaaghigh te ut _ paye u naqe yalghiimi _ entaqun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ yuqeghraghtaghtuq _ sa uq _ elngaatall _ , _ egtug yug uq _ , _ ugmelli iqe uq _ sa uq _ .
qenwat llu _ alla _ yuqeghte yalghiimi _ , _ kii _ , _ kavighhalaak _ kenegh ghllag _ uka _ unegken _ .
entaqun _ paye aneng _ kanakena _ mengyagh t _ esgha _ tawatete ma lghiit _ .
“ _ seghleghhalek _ qenwat llu _ mengyaghnaqiinkutaa _ , _ heng _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ ”
esghagh yaghtugh nghminigu _ uka _ taglaq _ aliighinaq _ naken _ teskanaken _ paye aneng _ .
“ _ Seghleghhalekaa _ qenwat llu _ mengyagh naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ pineghlliqe tek _ , _ aragh teki _ ”
alla _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ legan _ kenegh ghllag _ .
tughneghagh t _ kenegh meng _ atkug na iqe kangit _ tughneghagh _ aamtayaghhaq _ aw llaag ghhagh inaghtu te _ igleghnegha _ ayuqe lghii _ .
kii _ , _ alla _ pi yalghiimi _ kana _ malleg ma lghii _ .
“ _ Seghleghhalekaa _ , _ taawa _ pi naqe aisi _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ ”
pi yalghiimi _ , _ ii- k _ sa u a _ aane uq _ tesqamaken _ uka _ mayugh uq _ .
elngaatall _ itegh qagh qiinagh luni _ , _ amenqun _ aglughat _ esghagh ke put _ nenglullug _ iikna _ ulima aqe yamegteggu _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ tamaavek _ uughqaghte luni _ elngaatall _ tawanii _ , _ “ _ heng _ , _ elngaatall _ aragh tek _ ! _ ”
kii _ , _ pi yalghiimi _ qakma _ saaygu tgun _ elpeg kesagh ke yagh lghii mi _ , _ elpeksaqmegteggu _ , _ kii _ nenglu _ , _ nuna _ iggagte uq _ teskanavek _ , _ sunglug uq _ amig mun _ .
kii _ , _ supughraghyaqminigu _ , _ sa yalghiimi _ aneghziig yalghiimi _ teskanavekaa _ iggagllagumaghmi _ .
elngaatall _ pi megteggun _ taaggun _ , _ tatame aatagh te ut _ , _ kakave niigh te ut _ , _ sa luteng _ pi lit _ leganqun _ estu laghate te ut _ tesqamavek _ naa ke i _ .
Taghnughhaqsa _ palaghhagh u a _ , _ qamakaghii _ .
Seghleghalek _ mekelghiigh _ alinge uq _ .
amen- a _ imgaghalghiini _ sa lghii ni _ tughneghagh t _ pinegh meggni _ entaqun _ kenghiqengegkayugulghiit _ .
aga _ kenegh _ mayugh uq _ , _ aga _ qenwat _ qaame aqe luni _ , _ tawaten _ aneghte luni _ .
nasiqute luku _ ukig luni _ agigte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ aga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ maalliqun _ whanga _ piiqaghhnaaghyukaghpenga _ . _ ”
ii _ , _ aghuliigh qaghte luni _ uutqaghtuq _ .
tespikavek _ ne minun _ maaten _ mayugh aghte uq _ .
elngaatall _ aneghpaghquyalghiimi _ allanqiggaghmeng _ itegh luni _ , _ ii _ peskugwaghtevzighaqluni _ , _ ifkagh vzigh aqe luni _ palaghhaghmeng _ sa kun _ eltugh luni _ .
Hiik _ , _ naghigh luni _ aga _ igleghte uq _ .
legan _ allanqiggaghmeng _ taawa _ pi aqe kanga _ .
sa uq _ , _ nagnegh uq _ uteghnigh nghite uq _ .
atghagh uq _ aqeftapag m _ taanʼgavek _ paye anun _ .
tawatete aqe ainkut llu _ , _ naniqengyat _ sa u aat llu _ pikayug u ut _ , _ naken _ megh meng _ , _ qute meng _ .
Kenengyaqayugwet _ sakayugwet _ , _ enkaam _ megh _ kenegh meng _ itake pigte luku _ ayuqe yagh kangat _ , _ nunaagh ni _ whaten _ .
tagi laghate te ghllag luteng _ taghnughhagh teng _ piyaqmegteki _ , _ naate naagh aat _ , _ taakut _ angayuqagh it _ puvalla yaghkagh t _ .
Elngaatallaa _ aghyuughmigaat _ sa ut _ , _ pegnem _ akuzi ste luku _ .
qenwat _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Elngaatallaa _ elpek si llu _ aragh tek _ , _ pineghlliqe tek _ .
tawaten _ pi aqe naagh usi _ ineghhnemsi _ , _ elpek qun _ naa gpek _ , _ ata gpek _ mengyaghlleqiinkuti _ ! _ ”
Yulqusighllaget _ anglikagh t _ angtaniitkat _ , _ sa u a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ tawaten _ ineghneghlliqe ut _ neghyuke luku _ uteghte na luki _ taghnughhagh teng _ , _ pi u lghiit _ .
wetku _ tawatenginaq _ pi yaghqaa na yu kata _ .
qineghte yaghtugh yalghiimi _ ii- u ke _ .
“ _ heng _ , _ wata _ araghtegaa _ , _ qenwat llu _ taakwa _ pi qaghte naqe aisi _ , _ legan _ tawaten _ pi llegh mitun _ pi qaghnaqe aisi _ . _ ”
elngaatall _ , _ Meregtemiinguut _ tazimanirugllak _ Meregtem _ yugwa _ .
entaqun _ nenglullug ughtekagh m _ Dr. _ Bundi-nkut _ iigge aqe luki _ lli aqe ait _ .
Amum _ yugwi _ .
Yuksuwhaaghita _ qukagh a _ waran _ entaqun _ .
elngaatall _ kinku k _ taake uk _ maalghug _ taaggun _ amig m _ qula akun _ guutute ligh lutek _ utaqa uk _ , _ sa meng _ imani _ guutute ke ak _ .
Tawateghpigaq _ maaten _ pi llegh tun _ , _ aneghziig aatagh nghmini _ legan _ teskanagun _ .
iiwenllu _ estu laghate te naqe luni _ lliigh aqe uq _ , _ ii _ , _ uuhuukaaqaghluki _ sa ma kangat _ , _ guute ma kangat _ .
pakreg ghpagte ghllag ma lghii _ .
aanziigh ghllag yalghiimi _ sa yalghiimi _ , _ mighyagh ghllag yalghiimi _ taghnughhagh m _ akileghteghllagluku _ , _ qiya te ghllag t _ .
esgha _ sallghite ma lghii _ taghnughhagh _ , _ sa u a _ hour-mi _ sa mi _ tughneghagh m _ aqsa ani _ .
maatnegh a _ temperaturenga _ kayaate ma uq _ .
kii _ , _ elngaatall _ uteghtestekataghllakiit _ taawa _ .
Ugwatmun _ piinlillegh
taakwavek _ tagi ut _ , _ tagi ut _ ii _ , _ kingunghit _ maaten _ esgha _ entaqun _ Ungalaankut _ , _ nekreg te nkut _ , _ Waamseghaatenkut _ , _ yuungaaghagh nkut _ , _ kinku t _ taakut _ Meregtem _ yugwi _ Mangenankut _ .
enraq llu qun _ esghaghhu _ maavek _ lliigh yagh luteng _ entaqun _ maantekestaghngaaghmeng _ taamagun _ nenglu ngllagh ma lghiit _ Meregtekun _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ Mangenankut _ ulimaagh at _ Meregtemiingulghiit _ qayughllak _ .
taamaken _ legan _ aglagh luteng _ sakmavek _ sivuqagh mun _ siqlugwaghqumaaqelghii _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
legan _ sagnegh k _ uyamig ke lukek _ whavek _ ne mun _ tagi pigte lghii stun _ taaga _ aglagh aqe lghii _ siqlugwaghqu _ amavek _ Meregtemun _ .
taakwa _ aghvigh qaghte vig t _ esghaghhu _ Mangenankut _ tumangit _ .
aghsughalegh m _ kiwatangani _ taawa _ qenngumsag _ sa u a _ nangupagagh meng _ ategh ke uq _ .
Enkaangam _ yugwi _ kinku t _ taakut _ nangupagaghmii u na iqe kangit _ esghaghhu _ taawavek _ piiwagh kestagh u u ma lghiit _ , _ tagikestaq _ entaqun _ sivuqagh mun _ whaa _ .
Nulam _ mingite kestagh yalghiimi _ Meregtem _ yugwa _ .
taawa _ taakwagun _ tume tgun _ piiwagh lghii ni _ Sanivleghet _ .
Sanivleghni _ taakwavek _ .
aghsughalegh _ taana _ kitugh lghii ni _ taakwegkut _ tume t _ taakwa _ .
esghaghhu _ ne kun _ tuumliluteng _ ayuqe ma aqe lghiit _ taakwa _ nenglu t _ , _ nenglu ngiighhagh t _ ingangiighhaq _ uyghag t _ tamaakut _ mingle itni _ qulighnegh itni _ .
Nenglulluwhaat _ kaate aqe anka _ maalghugwaaqluteng _ .
Tazinganiqaaghaq _ kitum i _ tawani _ ila i _ taawa _ .
sigasit ni _ tawani _ taawa _ ila i _ .
Sanivleghet _ legan _ tume ghllag leg t _ , _ ayumigh m _ Meregtem _ yugwita _ tumangit _ qelli ghllag luteng _ ugwavek _ .
uyghagagh ni _ tamaani _ uyghag _ nekeghqughaqluni _ tuumlingwaaghluni _ .
taawavek _ esnevagh negh mni _ whanga _ esghagh llegh ka _ apegh aqa _ , _ qayughllak _ yugtu yagh ni luki _ ugpeqe aqe kegka _ .
taawavek _ pi yalghiinga _ , _ teskigwken _ , _ taakwa _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ , _ nenglagh u aghagh ta t _ ayvigtegh mun _ tawavek _ .
ayvigtegh mi _ taawa _ elngaatall _ nenglu t _ sa u aat _ .
nenglutu uq _ ayvigtegh llu _ taana _ .
tespikani _ quulvani _ , _ sanivleghni _ taakwani _ , _ tazingani _ inglu anun _ aghvigh aghte lghii ni _ paninang _ nenglu t _ taawa _ .
Ngiigtekaankut
ayag ke inkut _ tawani _ , _ Ayakim _ ungipamsugwani _ , _ sika ghhagh m _ ungipagh ani _ , _ aghqesaghtughtuqagh t _ , _ satuqagh t _ eghqwaaghtuqagh t _ entaqun _ .
Ngiigtekaankut _ tawanniiqiit _ .
ngiigtekagh meng _ ategh ke ut _ nenglu ghllag t _ , _ elngaatall _ negh ghllag _ entaqun _ uglaghyagagh ghllag t _ .
Qilughaaghet _ legan _ siklaate ghllag luteng _ ngiigte ma kangit _ yugtuumagh an _ .
Enkaangam _ ategh ke lghiit _ ngiigtekagh meng _ .
Ngiigtekaankut _ atigh neghllugte igate kangit _ taakut _ ellngit _ Ugwaliit _ .
Meregtem _ nalighnegh ke na luki _ entaqun _ Iirgum _ esgha _ Qavalghaam _ eltuughaa _ ataasigh _ taana _ ngiigtekagh _ .
uyuqligh _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ taana _ .
Awalqam _ panig a _ ngiigtekagh _ .
esgha _ tawaten _ pi kau ma lghiit
taagken _ aghvigh luta _ sanivleghet _ kukragnaghqwaagii _ , _ entaqun _ qaye akun _ aag ma aqe ut _ , _ lliigh ma aqe ut _ .
taawa _ iwernga _ ivgagh lghii ni _ sani vleghagh ite te luni _ .
taawa _ nenglulluwhaq _ tawani _ Ayakinkuni _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ .
nenglu _ aange llegh ke sigh u uq _ .
elngaatall _ taakut _ amaken _ Meregtemeng _ qaygeghte luteng _ amalka _ tume t _ qaye itgun _ .
taagken _ tanemwhaqa _ tesamavek llu _ ukig vig lgu uq _ , _ sivugnagh mi _ tawani _ .
entaqun _ nalighnegh meggnun _ sa meggnun _ ukig qagh kayugu ut _ taana _ nenglullug _ elngaatall _ , _ Qenaaghaankut _ kinku t _ nenglu mun _ tawavek _ pikayug u ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ enraq _ Sivugnaghmeng _ taakwa _ tume t _ ugwavek _ Akulkegnekun _ qaygeghtekayugwet _ tuumliluteng _ taam _ nenglullugwem _ yugwita _ tuumlillghi _ .
Nekeghqughwaaghluteng _ elngaatall _ ukavek _ akulkeg nun _ qavimun _ ukig luteng _ .
Taam _ nenglullugwem _ yugwan _ tuumlillghi _ .
taakwavek _ Ayakinkunun _ , _ Neghqutenkunun _ , _ Qenaaghaankunun _ kaate luteng _ ayuqe lghiit
mayughwaagh mii t
entaqun _ esgha _ 1600-mi _ nani _ neli kau ma lghii _ maani _ .
tagi yalghiimeng _ esgha _ mayugh aagh mi _ tespikani _ .
uukna qun _ mangteghagh t _ aagkut _ manu at _ housing-et _ , _ esnagh u yagh lghii _ entaqun _ .
tapeghagh meng _ ategh ke lghii _ esgha _ .
mayugh aagh qun _ esgha _ taamaken _ tea- ait _ neli ma lghiit _ .
sa lghii meng llu _ esgha _ Ayveghyagteggun _ neli luteng _ ayuqe lghiit _ taamaken _ tagikestam _ angtalanganeng _ .
sivuqagh _ yug nge kestagh yalghiimi _ .
entaqun _ kana _ qiighqagh mi _ sa mi _ tawani _ neghqute nkut _ .
taghnughhagh mun _ atigh i llegh _ sivuqagh mi
iyaa-kagh nkuk _ , _ Kepelgunkuk _ apegh llegh at
kitum _ atigh aqe aki _ taghnughhagh t
taghnughhagh teng _ atigh naqe nghmegteki _ sivuke luki _ ateghqagh meng _ siivanllegh teng _ aapte luki _ , _ ateghqagh meng _ tuunekagh aneng _ atigh aqe ut _ .
nalighmeng _ kitumeng _ taagken _ atigh naqe ni luki _ siivanllegh teng _ ungipaate aqe ait _ , _ nalluke sigate ait _ .
ila ita _ ategh it _ ataasiiwaqut _ , _ ila i _ naqam _ maalghugwaaqluteng _ , _ pingayugwaaqluteng _ .
naten _ ila i _ wata _ uglagh aqe luteng _ .
laluramke stun _ whaten _ ayuqe nghite ngugh u ut _ first _ name _ , _ last _ name- ke te nghite ngugh u ut _ , _ John _ Paul _ Henry _ Jones-etun _ tawaten _ .
ategh t _ uglagh ghngaita _ kiyang _ ataasigh t _ ategh t _ atuqe aqe ait _ .
katam _ Kaavam _ pillghatun _ igangllaqammni _ kitum _ taam _ ategh an _ legan _ nalikek _ atughqagh _ .
ila ita _ ramke m _ taghnughhagh teng _ aane ste gpenaki _ ateghqagh meng _ yataaghqutkayugwiit _ .
sivunegh neng
Taagegken _ ima _ ellmeng _ sivugh nghmeng _ ategh it _ atiitkayugwiit _ kingumun _ ukavek _ aviigh tke aat _ .
enkaam _ puygu igate kangit _ sivunegh teng _ kinku u ta i _ .
taagani _ sivuqagh m _ akuzillegh a _ igaqe nga nghite yagh ghngaan _ .
wiin _ kiyaghte luki _ , _ unguva luki _ atiiqe igate kangit _ , _ entaqun _ taagegken _ ima _ qelegh sagh _ .
iwernga _ esgha _ aghnaghagh m _ ighnegh ni _ qantaghaqun _ atigh ma yagh agu _ a ta mi _ ategh aneng _ salin _ kiyaghte luku _ , _ ata an _ efqugh ke ma nge i tke a _ , _ piyuke ma nge i tke a _ .
naten _ ategh t _ aglagh aqe aat _ ramke m _ ila anun
kiyang _ yugwem _ , _ ata m _ tunganganeng _ taghnughhagh t _ allgegh nghata _ atigh kayugu kangit _ .
iwernga _ nuliigh teng _ ellngit a _ pi itneng _ atiiqistekayugwit _ , _ akileghtugh kayugu kangit _ .
tawaten _ esgha _ ategh t _ ramke m _ ila aneng _ tagikayugwet _ , _ aglaqayugwet _ .
aghnagh m _ ategh _ igleghutkayugwa _ .
Ugwiighluni _ tuqu yagh kan _ , _ ugwingan _ pi ita _ atiiqe yaghqagh a _ .
nalighmeng _ aghnagh m _ ellnga n _ ramke an _ atiiqe yaghqagh a _ .
ila i _ ategh m _ tawatengwaaq _ akuuragh utu tete luteng _ ayuqe aqe ut _ kinku t _ ramke itni _ nalighmeng _ nani _ nuna mi _ .
ategh t _ whani _ igaqe llegh mi _ atuqekagh t _ temngingu ut _ .
ategh u kata _ akuuram _ pi ste lleqe ai _ .
nuna meng _ , _ nunaagh mun _ atightullegh
kiyang _ ramke m _ ila yan _ taghnughhagh teng _ atightugh aqe ait _ pennagh m _ , _ nuna m _ , _ saam _ tekeghagh m _ ategh aneng _ .
katam _ “ _ qule iqe aq _ ” _ taana _ nunaleg m _ legan _ atigh te nayagh kanga _ .
nalighmeng _ taghnughhagh t _ tawani _ allgeghvig itneng _ atigh nayagh kangat _ nalighmeng _ aviighute vig aneng _ nuna meng _ .
taagken _ nalighmeng _ llivegh vig aneng _ , _ qungughvig aneng _ .
ategh t _ teghig ke sagh t _ , _ qawaag t _ , _ piitesighagh at
aw llaag ghhagh inagh _ ategh _ nagaqughaqegkefut _ , _ qawaag m _ ategh a _ , _ teghig ke sagh m _ ategh a _ saamllu _ piitesighagh m _ , _ ategh leg _ tamaaken llu _ uglagh uq _ .
akuzillegh meng _ atigh llegh
kiyaghte luteng _ sa meng _ pituqagh t _ .
yuug _ taana _ sa meng _ pitu kan _ , _ taana _ akuzillegh a _ taghnughhaghmunnguq _ atigh te yagh ghngaaghmi _ .
amalka _ yuug _ , _ Mukaq _ , _ kiyaghte luni _ pituqagh _ , _ “ _ Kguugg _ ! _ ”
Atiiqsaqmegteggu _ , _ taghnughhagh _ “ _ Kguuggmeng _ ” _ ( _ “ _ Kguugg _ ” _ ) _ ata iigh aat _ .
sa mun _ elqughaghte tekagh mun _ atigh llegh
aghnagh _ aqsaleg _ sa llegh mun _ elqughute kan _ legan _ taana _ atigh te ma ut _ , _ nalighmeng _ qavangugh llegh _ , _ esghaghwaagh llegh _ .
amalka _ yugwem _ unaghsigh m _ qaayghu a _ makregsaqminigu _ , _ qaayghu m _ asinganiteftuq _ yungllaghkagh ghhagh _ .
enkaam _ taana _ atigh te ma kanga _ “ _ Makregtekaq _ ” _ .
allangughte na luteng _ atiiqe i llegh
taagani _ agha _ , _ aghaligh vig _ aviite luku _ , _ taghnughhagh nge nghmeng _ aghtugh lghiit _ , _ natete nghata llu _ qinuyugtu nghata _ , _ qiyatu nghata _ , _ alla _ atigh nqigte aqe kangit _ ategh lgu ghngaita _ alla neng _ .
amalka _ taana _ , _ tuumte i _ , _ alla _ atigh ma kangat _ qiyatu ta aneng _ , _ seghlegh meng _ .
megh mi _ aviigh tke aat
kiyang _ ayumigh ghhagh aneng _ megh mi _ yugwet _ peleghqekagh t _ atiiqe aqe ait _ aghnagh ghhagh u luki _ .
ategh t _ tan- kestagh u aghte yaghkagh t llu _ alla tun llu _ ata iqe aat
kiyang _ ategh t _ yeghrat _ taake ghllag lghiit _ takelli luki _ ateliitkayugwiit _ .
amalka _ Makimingaawen _ , _ taake yagute luku _ makigh meng _ tuqlughagh ta m _ qenwat _ ateligh te a _ taana _ ategh _ , _ mat- ke i _ .
taghnughhagh t llu _ salin _ akuzi yaaghte gpenateng _ atigh llegh it _ ila ita _ ramke m _ nagneghtaqegkangit _ tawaten _ .
katam _ Saapugha _ ategh _ .
taghnughhagh m _ atigh llegh a _ “ _ Puugwa _ , _ ” _ ateligh tke a _ .
naqamllu _ ayghigh te aqe kangit _ .
pi nga yu a
ayumigh m _ ungipaghagh ta i
Ayngaghlingaawetenkuk _ , _ Qilakaghiilaankuk
puughhute m _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ taake uk nguq _ aghnaghaghhagh k _ ilughaqutalghiik _ .
Kugwelestaghhiinaak _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh at _ .
ategh ik _ Ayngaghlingaawetenkuk _ , _ Qilakaghiilaankuk _ .
Ayngaghlingaawen _ taana _ natetalghii _ , _ nallagh u lghii _ , _ ighsanitaghalghi _ .
ilughagh ghhagh a _ Qilakaghiilaq _ nekeggmetalghii _ , _ aatkagh kegte aq _ , _ pinitun _ kiyaghte aagh _ kaki ghllag _ quunpeng _ .
taana _ Ayngaghlingaawen _ itghiighnaqeghllak _ , _ anʼgighnaqeghllak _ sa gpenani _ .
alla _ tawaten _ kaki ma luku _ Qilakaghiilaq _ , _ kuuggʼghaa _ ughluvghwaangllaamalghii _ .
iiwen _ taaqe yaghtugh luku _ ughsaghtuutkelluku _ qineghte yaghtugh ma lghii _ , _ taana _ ughluvghwaaghhani _ napaghluku _ mingle kun _ .
aga _ aane magh an _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ naten _ tekegh ni _ petgeghllaataquluku _ , _ ten- ke i vike luku _ ughluvghwaagha _ ayemkagh ma kanga _ .
alingruugh ma lghii _ , _ itegh kuni _ aghyuughnayukangatni _ , _ ughneg mi _ asi anun _ iigh ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ kuuggʼghaan _ ivagh ma kanga _ ughluvegh ni _ , _ “ _ naagu _ ughluvegh u aqa _ whaansalghii _ navek _ pi zigu _ ? _ ”
amenam _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ ivagh sighwaagh aa _ elnganllu _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te luku _ ivagh aa _ elngaatall _ .
qenwat _ ughneggaa _ ikighaghluku _ piyaqminigu _ whaa _ ayemngwaaghluni _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ nutaan _ qefliqe uq _ elngaatall _ pi igate yagh lghii _ .
Nayaggani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangan _ aksaqe zigu _ ayemlluku _ ? _ ”
taagken _ ayeme llegh aneng _ yaakestaaghhagh an _ anag ma yagh kanga _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ uniigh miqe luni _ qiyaaghwagh ma lghii _ .
nutaan _ kuuggʼghaan _ tawaten _ pi kanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ kagpag luni _ nengagh ma lghii _ aane luni _ navek _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ igleghte ghngaaghmi _ , _ iiwen _ aghtaghagh aqe a _ inga _ sa u aat _ iime negh m _ ilu ani _ esghagh ai _ .
kaate luki _ piyaqminiki _ iimqaghneghem _ ilu ani _ kamulugwalghun _ ukaagh igh ke ghllag ke aat _ .
aqume luni _ aqeftaghaagh ghhagh ni _ nusug luku _ amsighquughteghumakangi _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ .
taaqe luki _ negh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ saaghw itni _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ mevluugtet _ nagate ai _ , _ piiqunnguq _ whaa _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhaqsa _ una _ nanglegtapigta _ .
elngaatall _ taghtughsagh qu na an _ meghnaali li _ . _ ”
nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ aviite ut _ , _ kameg t llu _ taakut _ aviite ut _ .
taagken _ igleghte laatagh uq _ esghagh laatagh ai _ sa u aat _ , _ enraq _ naayvagh m _ esne ani _ .
piyaqminiki _ kii _ iqallug lghute _ , _ afta llghite ngughk _ qenwat _ asiliit _ unegh ii aghte luteng _ .
aqume luni _ aftalaghteghumakangi _ agaghte aqe luki _ qamagtengngwaaghluki _ .
taaqe luki _ negh luni _ qavagh laatagh uq _ .
tawaten _ me m _ taghtughtaqegkanga _ , _ pi aqe kangat _ “ _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ igamsiqa nagh ghhalek _ nangllegtagh pigte a _ . _ ”
nepiigh nghata _ aqume nghmini _ paaghqite te luni _ .
aqume luni _ igleghte laatagh uq _ .
mangteghagh t _ inga _ esghagh ai _ , _ tazingavek _ aglagh uq _ .
kaate luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh ghhagh _ qama _ nategh mi _ qepghiilugtaqeftuq _ elngaatall _ .
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ upugh tke a _ , _ aapte a _ , _ “ _ kaay _ , _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ ”
uniighyug lunga _ ne mneng _ ukavek _ aghulaqe unga _ .
wasi _ kuuggʼghaghma _ sa aghte aqe aanga _ ughluvghwaaghmineng _ qivghu vike lunga _ anagu kanganga _ , _ tekegh mneng _ petgegh vike luku _ ayemsamkun _ .
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ naqam _ tea- ai _ itegh i _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tunugh _ tuune a _ , _ “ _ ang _ , _ pugnegh iigh i _ elngaatall _ .
iigge ten _ alqimagh yaqunaki _ , _ legan _ alqimaghtequfki _ pugnegh n _ mekelli lleqe an _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ pugnegh iigh uq _ peghqigh kau lghii _ legan _ kukriqe nghite uq _ .
iigge ni _ alqime yukagh gpenaki _ taaqe a _ .
taagken _ taaqe yagu _ aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Iingkunun _ aglagh te gu _ , _ wataghllak _ qiigh negh ke i i sqe kangaten _ qineghte yaqunang _ pi lghaaten _ .
nategh mi _ utaqa i lghaaten _ .
legan _ kanagh luku _ aqupileghnaghqeghngaata _ wata _ qineghte yaqunang _ . _ ”
awaligh i uq _ sagneghpagek _ pugnegh meng _ ulevaghaghte lukek _ .
itegh yan _ qamaken _ aagra neng _ upughasagh aat _ legan _ itegh sqe magh an _ , _ aghnagh aq _ legan _ ighsa u aghte uq _ .
kii _ , _ legannguq _ qama _ lengaaghtu te _ sagnegh k _ piyaqmegtekek _ .
taaqe lukek _ qama _ kete t _ ikighte luki _ piyaqminikek _ sagnegh ghllag k _ sungagh meng _ allaaghiinaghmeng _ imigh ghllag lutek _ .
aghnaghagh m _ tugu lukek _ aane uq _ .
taagken _ itghute yakek _ aghnagh m _ tuune laatagh aa _ enraq _ ivalu lghute meng _ .
“ _ ang _ , _ piighhe ki _ nuvagte yukagh gpenaki _ qamagte luki _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ temngi _ kiyaghsugwigalnguq _ legan _ aqume luni _ tallu luki _ piighhe ai _ nuvagte yukagh gpenaki _ taaqe a _ piighhagh ghrug ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ taaqe yagu _ sagnegh k _ sungagh ghllag meng _ imaleg k _ taake uk _ tuune ak _ , _ “ _ ang _ , _ taagken _ nuvugh a _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ legan _ teghigniqe uq _ nuvugh uq _ , _ nuvugh aa _ uyaqughhmik _ , _ qukaghute kaghqagh _ , _ qenleghwaaghqagh _ , _ tangyeghute _ , _ tukughte te _ iwerngaqun _ sungagh ghllag _ qamagte a _ qiipi aghte te gpenani _ .
taaqe yaki _ aghnagh m _ aatesqughwii _ ellnga nun _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ allakagh ghhagh gpek _ tesqamani _ ungavig ni _ qavagh ghhaaten _ legan _ egtug yug gpenang _ qavagh ghhaaten _ saam _ pi naanghite aaten _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ itegh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ elpeg ke aghte yalghiimi _ mengeghaallghiit _ llangaqa nguq _ napit _ katelghaate lghiit _ ama _ nagate ai _ .
Piiqunnguq _ “ _ kii _ , _ sa u a _ nangllegtagh ghllag _ ukavek _ kaate ma uq _ .
legan _ kameg lghute put _ kiinghwaaghluteng _ amsighqughwaaghluteng _ , _ iqallug lghute put _ aftalaghwaaghluteng _ . _ ”
legan _ elpeg ke aghte luni _ qavagh laatagh uq _ .
qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ teghtugh a _ .
“ _ aghnagh aq _ aamyuq _ aqume i ngam _ , _ tea- ai _ ketfagh a _ . _ ”
makete qaghte luni _ ungavig mineng _ aane yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ yataaghqutngwaaghluku _ .
legan _ aghnagh aq _ neqiinagh uq _ .
taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ yataaghqe i _ atghagh a ngam _ .
aane gkuvek _ tamaa na _ esghagh kan _ alike gpenaan _ pi naagh an _ , _ legan _ atghagh ghhaaten _ ne gpenun _ qiive yaqunang _ qugwinayugngaaghpek _ uteghmun _ , _ legan _ avelghaqiinagh luki _ igleghlleghaaten _ .
iwerngaqun _ legan _ kaate yaghtugh kuvek _ anengagh ghhagh n _ tuqlughwaghnaken _ .
pi naken _ whaten _ , _ ‘ _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ tagite amken _ ’ _ .
Ugwikaghqaghpek _ taku naagh aaten _ alinge gpenang _ atghagh a _ . _ ”
taagken _ me atun _ aane yalghiimi _ uvite mi _ tamaa _ kayngevaghqu _ ila i _ qavaa te t _ .
legan _ atghagh uq _ me atun _ alinge aghte gpenani _ .
pama _ legan _ saam _ malighqagh aa _ tunutanganeng _ kavlegtu te _ , _ siinge aqe luku _ .
legan _ aghnagh m _ pillgha _ neqamike luku _ kakave gpenani _ atghagh uq _ .
qemi meng _ agigte luni _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ tuqlughagh aa _ anengagh ni _ , _ “ _ taawa _ anguyagkagh meng _ elngaatall _ tagite amken _ . _ ”
kii _ , _ uka nguq _ yug lghute _ ketanqu te ghllag _ ellnga nun _ , _ pana meng _ , _ pitegseghameng _ tugumiigh iigh luteng _ .
uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ uka _ kayngeghlagem _ malighqagh aqe a _ .
kaate luteng _ pitegsaqmegteggu _ kaynge ghllag _ tuqute aat _ .
ullegh aghte luni _ , _ kii aneng _ yuug _ nukalpigagh _ aane yalghiimi _ nangaghalqegllak _ , _ yuukegte ghllag _ , _ iknaqe ghllag _ .
uka _ aghnaghagh mun _ tagi uq _ .
taawa _ taananuftuq _ ugwikaghqaa _ .
Qilakaghiilaq _ ugwiiqaghtuq _ .
yuug _ neqengyu ghllag _ , _ aghvenge yu ghllag _ tawani _ kiyaghte ut _ kugweghmini _ .
aga _ navek _ pi nghata _ mughute nghata _ ilughagh ghhagh n _ Ayngaghlingaawetem _ itegh vike aqe kanga _ .
siqni ghllag _ ellnga llu _ ugwiighyugllak _ pi nigh ghllag meng _ .
Aapqughwaaghaqegkanga _ naten _ naqamalla _ ugwiighumatanga _ .
qenwat _ Qilakaghiilaam _ ungipamsug te ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Imatughngam _ ugwiillemtun _ ugwiighlleqsin _ ighsanitagh lghiiten _ .
talwa _ kaki igate ngugh u te n _ .
waran _ piillghaghten _ amsighqe igate keten _ .
Nalqigangilnguuten _ . _ ”
amenam _ aglagh luni _ , _ iitqiinagh luni _ anengagh ghhagh ni _ qinuyug a _ ughluvghaanglliisqelluku _ , _ weni _ qinuyug a _ .
qenwat _ anengagh ghhagh n _ mengilegyagute luku _ amenam _ yataaghqe te uq _ .
“ _ qinu na ghhalek _ una _ , _ wasagh ii te _ taana _ ata ma _ ulimaagh a _ sa llghite ngughk _ salin _ . _ ”
pi msiigh luku _ pegte a _ .
aghnaghagh m _ qinuyug a _ enraq _ qineghte yaghtigh sqe a _ .
qenwat _ aga _ aane uq _ .
kingu aneng _ tekegh ni _ petgegh naqutke a _ petgeghsagh nghminigu _ anagte luku _ qenwat _ itegh yaghtugh uq _ .
Upuupeng _ aghtugh yamigu _ tugu luku _ ketngig luku _ ayemte a _ enraq llu _ ayemlluku _ ughneg llegagh mi _ asi anun _ iigh aa _ .
iigh luku _ kaki sighwaagh uq _ .
anengagh ghhagh a _ itegh luni _ ne mikun _ aqume uq _ .
Waakenghitaa _ ughluvegh ngllaghkagh ni _ .
qenwat _ Ayngaghlingaawetem _ pi a _ , _ “ _ enta _ ughluvegh n _ ivagh ghhu _ ukani llu _ ughneg ma _ asi ani _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ tagivagh ghhu _ liisima kan _ . _ ”
“ _ enta _ nekeve luten _ ivagh ghhu _ . _ ”
qenwat _ nekeve luni _ ivagh aa _ ughneg llegagh a _ ikighte luku _ tugwaa _ ayeme luni _ .
“ _ una _ aghnagh aq _ .
Ayemmnaluku _ ulimatesqughwaaghsinga _ awii _ , _ sa u luku _ . _ ”
egte naqe yagh aa _ , _ aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ enta _ qivghuke gu _ , _ anagu nga _ . _ ”
“ _ sangan _ sapiglleghiistun _ ulimatesqughwaaghlunga _ ayemte an _ , _ enraq llu _ anagusqesin _ ? _ ”
“ _ legan _ anagu nga _ . _ ”
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ yaakestaaghhagh an _ aagute lugh aa _ temngi _ .
qiya ghllag uq _ aqnigh magh mi _ .
kagpag ragkiigh luni _ aga _ aane uq _ nengagh uq _ .
iitek _ pi yagh aa _ kuuggʼghaan _ .
aane luni _ taakwagun _ Qilakaghiilaam _ apegh llegh akun _ igleghte uq _ .
igleghte ghngaaghmi _ kameg lghute _ kaate a _ nuna m _ iimqaghlleghani _ lli luteng _ aghipa ghllag t _ , _ piig aqe luteng _ , _ naatghigh qugh te aqe luteng _ .
aqume luni _ esghapaggiinaq _ qinuyagute ai _ .
sivughtu msiigh luki _ , _ amsighquvyiighluki _ taaqe gpenaki _ pegte aqe luki _ wata _ naafqe ai _ .
naafqe ghllag luki _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ elpeg ke yalghiimi _ mengeghaallghiit _ .
“ _ kii _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh _ una _ qepghallaagmetuq _ .
ima _ kameg put _ wata _ naafqe ma ai _ . _ ” _ nepiigh yata _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
aqume luni _ igleghte uq _ .
inga _ sa u aat _ esghagh ai _ , _ piyaqminiki _ iqallug lghute _ afta ma ite ngugh t _ ila i _ asiliit _ unegh ii aghte luteng _ repall _ .
kaate luni _ sivuke luni _ unegh ii aghtekagh meng _ negh ughtagh u uq _ .
taaqe luni _ afta vyiigh luki _ qinuyagute luki _ mingughhu te ghllag naqe yamiki _ taaqe ai _ .
Qavaamalghi _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ akuzite ghllag t _ “ _ kii _ , _ aghnagh aq _ una _ nalqigangite uq _ elngaatall _ naqam _ naangteghllagumii _ iqallug put _ . _ ”
nepiigh yata _ aghnagh aq _ aqume yalghiimi _ paaghqite uq _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
mangteghagh t _ aliigh luki _ kaate ai _ , _ kaate luni _ mangteghagh mun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh _ qama _ qepghagh aqe uq _ nategh mi _ .
aghnagh m _ esghagh luku _ pi a _ , _ “ _ kay _ , _ aghnagh aq _ uyuq _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ kina u ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Ayngaghlingaawetnguunga _ , _ nengagh u unga _ qayughllak _ kugweghma _ anaguleghyanga _ ukavek _ nengagh unga _ .
tekegh mneng _ ughluvegh a _ ayemtegkegka _ . _ ”
“ _ naqam _ itegh luteng _ una _ tunugh _ kagimlluku _ pugnegh iigh ghhu _ . _ ”
amenam _ iitqiinagh luni _ tunugh _ kagimte a _ .
aghnagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ iigge ten _ alqimagh yaqunaki _ pugnegh n _ mekelli i aghagh lleqe uq _ . _ ”
amenam _ kelenga aghte yagh luni _ iigge ni _ alqimagh qiinagh aqe luki _ legan _ akuute a _ .
Taaqsaqminigu _ pugnegh squghhagh _ sagneghpagem _ qukagh ghhagh ani _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aatak _ iingkunun _ awaligh i _ .
kepsugh te u naanghite uq _ , _ legan _ itegh kuvek _ upugha lleqe aaten _ , _ iitghesqughwaaghlleqaaten _ aagra nun _ .
wataghllak _ avelghaqiinagh naagh aten _ .
wata _ talwa _ qineghte yaqunang _ .
legan _ pugnegh n _ kanaghte luku _ utaqa i lghaaten _ . _ ”
amenam _ aghnaghagh m _ pugnegh llegagh ni _ aglagh te a _ .
itghute a _ legan _ aqupileghnaghhaghmeng _ upughasaqmegteggu _ , _ itegh sqe aat _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ .
Iitegiiguq _ pugnegh ni _ kanaghte luku _ ighsamllegaghyaghtuq _ , _ enraq _ legan _ upughasaqmegteggu _ , _ waran _ qiigh negh ke i i sqellug qu _ .
qenwat _ qiinghaghsalghiimi _ mamleg ghllag _ paaghqilnguq _ .
naqam _ sivugwaghsalghiimi _ qama _ legan _ uglagh ghllag t _ sagnegh kek _ kavlegtu te _ .
maateqwaaqun _ whaa _ sagnegh kek _ nuugte ta gket _ .
Sungaghpak _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ sagnegh an _ qukaa ni _ .
tagi luni _ itegh uq _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ivalu meng _ , _ “ _ ang _ , _ piighhagh ngllagh a _ .
nuvagte yukagh gpenaan _ mekegragh yukagh gpenaan _ . _ ”
amenam _ Ayngaghlingaawen _ aqume luni _ tallu luku _ ivalu ni _ piighhe a _ nuvagragh qaghaqe luku _ .
Taaqsaqminigu _ piighhagh squghhagh _ tan- leg ngestagh ghhagh _ .
aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tuune ak _ .
“ _ ang _ , _ nuvugh a _ sungagh meng _ . _ ”
tugu luku _ sungaghpak _ nuuve te a _ qiipagh mikun _ ataasigh igh ghllag _ .
aghnagh m _ tuune a _ ellnga nun _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taamani _ ayagyu ni _ qavagh ghhaaten _ .
legan _ alinge gpenang _ , _ egtug yug gpenang _ saam _ pi naanghite aaten _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ ivgagh luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ tawaten _ akuzite lghiit _ taghtugh aat _ .
ama nguq _ pi aqe ut _ , _ “ _ kii _ sa u a _ ukavek _ kaate ma a _ elngaatall _ nallekaghnilnguq _ , _ pikraghniilnguq _ , _ ighsanitagh lghii _ , _ nalqigangilnguq _ .
ama nguq _ aghnagh m _ pi aqe ai _ , _ “ _ kaa _ kaa _ , _ ama _ qavaa uq _ . _ ”
tawaten _ qavaa ma luku _ aghnagh m _ ama _ tuqlugh aa _ , _ “ _ Ayngaghlingaawen _ qakun _ taghtugh naqe ziin _ ?
aqume luten _ tea- ai _ . _ ”
aqume qaghte luni _ ivgagh yalghiimi _ aghnagh m _ yataaghqutngwaaghluku _ .
“ _ enta _ neghlutenngam _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ . _ ”
taaqe yan _ aghnagh m _ yataaghqellug qu _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ aane luteng _ aglagh a _ ne gpenun _ .
wataghllak _ alinge gpenang _ aane gkuvek _ pi lghaaten _ .
legan _ aglagh ghhaaten _ uteghmun _ qiive yaqunang _ saam _ maligte ghngaaten _ .
siinge ghngaaten _ avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ igleghte lghaaten _ . _ ”
aane yalghiimi _ tamaa _ kaynge ghllag u uq _ elngaatall _ .
esghagh luki _ tamaakut _ ila i _ nekevgha lghiit _ qugwinayukii _ elngaatall _ .
enraq _ aghnagh m _ alinge snanigh kanga _ .
aghtugh uq _ nuqete nghmeng _ .
alinge uq _ , _ uuvganeng _ aragh magh mi _ ketanqusnaq _ qimag uq _ .
legan _ kingu aneng _ uka _ saam _ malighqagh aa _ , _ qeteghqelluni _ anagniigh uq _ .
araghaatagh magh mi _ legannguq _ taklaghmi _ tekite nghmini _ .
Aaghhwaaragkiighumaghmi _ nekefqaghte luni _ anagniigh aqe lghii _ .
qemi meng _ agigaghteqaghsami _ , _ araghaatagh ghllag ma lghii _ .
Kugweni _ tuqlughwaghllagumaan _ elngaatall _ , _ “ _ taawa _ anguyagkagh _ . _ ”
uka nguq _ legan _ pitegseghalget _ yugwet _ , _ pana leg t _ ketanqusnaq _ ellnga nun _ uka _ .
uteghmun _ qiive nghmini _ uka _ kaynge ghllag m _ malighqagh aqe kanga _ .
Yugwet _ kaate luku _ pitegte aat _ , _ aga _ tuqu luni _ ullegh yan _ kii aneng _ nanevgagh llegagh ghhagh _ aane uq _ .
uka _ tagi uq _ Ayngaghlingaawetmun _ , _ kaate yan _ tawatete ghngaan _ atghagh te a _ ne minun _ , _ ugwikaa _ .
Ayngaghlingaawen _ ighsani ta ghhagh u te mineng _ tawatetaghhaaghngaan _ nanevgagh llegagh ghhagh meng _ ugwiightuq _ ima _ .
tefaay _ naange uq _ .
aliigh neghsigh sigh _ Yagesgu
aasa m _ ungipagh aa
sa u a nguq _ taana _ aghnagh _ , _ wallu _ yuwhaawa _ , _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Yeqaytuq _ aliigh neghsigh kegka _ . _ ”
legan _ aklu aghte gpenani _ whaa _ aanqute i yalghiimi _ :
“ _ Yagesguuuu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Yagesguuuu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Aapaa _ yagesgu _ , _ aapaa _ yagesgu _ ,
Ghhughhughhiiya _ . _ ”
Legannguq _ nepiigh uq _ aliighyaqminigu _ .
Tawatennguq _ kiyaghte ma luku _ , _ nakennguq _ akuzi ghllaget _ nagaqugh ai _ .
tamaani _ esghaqu yalghiimi _ avangite uq _ .
pagavek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ , _ angyannguq _ paga _ .
tespagavek nguq _ esghapag ai _ elngaatall _ .
imani nguq _ , _ “ _ sivuyagta _ uugyuq _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ ”
Llaaghannguq _ legan _ sivuyagtem _ elqiigh ni _ aga _ ateghte luku _ , _ uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ , _ tuute yan _ tazingavek _ taku a _ .
piyaqminigu _ pinighhalek _ .
tugu luku _ legan _ taaggun _ aate ste vig akun _ talligh mig ma kanga _ .
igleghte laatagh uq _ .
iiwen _ uyavaghqagh ughte uq _ , _ eslallugughte ghllag ma kanga _ .
Maatennguq _ aatkagh i _ kiinghwaaqaayalghiit _ , _ whaa _ eslallugughteghllagyaqminigu _ aghitqe ghllag luni _ .
Legannguq _ taakwna _ suumqagh u te aqe kanga _ aliigh neghsigh sigh _ .
“ _ Yagesguuuu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Yagesguuuu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Aapaa _ yagesgu _ , _ aapaa _ yagesgu _ ,
Ghhughhughhiiya _ . _ ”
Leganqunnguq _ aliighlaataghyaqminigu _ , _ aghvaghllug ghllag _ siqi neghllug ghllag _ .
legan _ aatkagh i _ kinegh laatagh ai _ .
tawaten _ pi llegh tun _ akuzite ghllag t _ taakut _ ataasigh t _ angyagh t _ .
pi ma kanga _ angyallightem _ , _ “ _ qukaghte qugh a _ uugyuq _ , _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ ”
legan _ elqiigh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ ifkaghliaataghaa _ .
uka _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ ukig laatagh uq _ , _ tazingagun _ tekite laatagh uq _ .
tazingavek _ taku a _ .
piyaqminigu _ maateghniineng _ pinighataghaq _ , _ up- ke na nga _ qelmegh ghllag _ .
legan _ tugu nghminiki _ aate aqe kangi _ talligh mikun _ .
taawa _ igleghte laatagh uq _ , _ ne mineng _ uyavagh ghllag uq _ .
Legannguq _ palaghhaghmeng _ kiyaghte uq _ , _ eslallug _ kaate laatagh uq _ , _ maateghniineng _ elngaatall _ yaagtu ghllag _ eslallug _ .
Legannguq _ suumqagh u te aqe kanga _ aliigh neghsigh sigh _ ,
“ _ Yagesgiiuuu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Yagesguuuu _ , _ yagesgu _ , _ yagesgu _ .
Aapaayagesgu _ , _ aapaa _ yagesgu _ ,
Ghhughhughhiya _ . _ ”
Legannguq _ aliighaghllaataghyaqminigu _ siqineghluuk _ , _ maaten _ sivuligh meng _ aagken _ elngaatall _ siqinegh _ uguqnagh aghagh luni _ .
elngaatall _ kiinghwaaghii _ aatkagh i _ whaa _ legan _ .
Legannguq _ pi laatagh uq _ meraaghinagh _ naken _ .
Sivuyagtemnguq _ taagwum _ angyallighteni _ pi a _ , _ “ _ angyalligh a _ kiiwyuq _ elpek llu _ elqiigh n _ ateghte gu _ . _ ”
Angyallightemnguq _ pike ta mikun _ taaggun _ ateghte ma kanga _ , _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ .
Aay _ , _ pinigh aghaghtu te _ uka _ ukig yalghiimi _ elqiigh _ .
elngaatall _ utaqa laatagh aa _ uukna _ uki lghii _ .
uka _ ukig uq _ , _ ukig uq _ , _ tekite yan _ tazingavek _ piyaqminigu _ , _ pinighataghaq _ elqiigh _ elngaatall _ .
satuqagh _ qughalkutaghtuqagh _ elngaatall _ .
Pinighataghaq _ taakugneng _ maaten _ , _ legan _ tugu luku _ talligh mig laatagh aa _ .
talligh mig luki _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ “ _ aglagh yagh kuma _ esgha _ ne mnun _ . _ ”
legan _ taakut _ qerngagh ita _ tugumiiqe luki _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ , _ aglagh uq _ .
entaqun _ unuk _ ataasigh _ atugh luku _ , _ aag llegh ani _ whanikumaan _ kaa tuq _ ne minun _ .
eslallugughte na nigh ke aq _ , _ quunpeng _ aligh u iqe aq _ elngaatall _ .
allameng _ eslallugughte gpenani _ ne minun _ kaate tke aq _ .
aneghrengi ghllag _ elqiigh neng _ .
tefaay _ !
iiyagh ghhagh inagh leg
Elqiilaam _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh nkuk nguq _ taake uk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ nenglu mi _ kiyaghte aaghek _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane igate ngughk _ sa luni _ aane li _ aatkagh ite ngughk _ .
Quunpenguq _ aghnelqusiq _ atkuwhani _ aate luku _ maghuyugte luni _ kiyaghtaaghaqelghii _ .
Maghuyugtaaghneng _ sivugte nghmini _ iiyagh ni _ taana nguq _ aghulate luku _ taawa _ almesimitun _ nekegte aqe lghii _ tawaten _ .
quunpeng _ tawaten _ kiyaghte aagh _ elngaatall _ .
sangan _ naqam _ iiyagh ni _ qelpeghte aqe agu _ .
alla nguq _ tawaten _ , _ umiilelguunnguq _ , _ maalghug _ umiilgegket _ aag llegh a _ aklungilnguq _ , _ aag llegh a _ akluumalghii _ .
Angyaghuunnaqennguq _ upenghagh mi _ , _ ellnga llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qakiqniqe ma lghii _ .
qaywa nguq _ nengyugh ghhagh n _ ighleke yagh aa _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ aate luten _ angyagh naqe ziin _ ? _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ nengyugh ni _ , _ “ _ aatkagh ten _ tagivagh ki _ aate naqe anka _ . _ ”
Legannguq _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ aatkagh ghhagh i _ aate luki _ me akun _ taaggun _ aane ma lghii _ .
tawavek _ iquklighpigaghnun _ esnevagh ma lghii _ , _ yaywaalingiighhagh _ , _ “ _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ? _ ”
“ _ weni nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ nenglu m _ yugkwaagh a _ uyuq _ . _ ”
siinge luku nguq _ aga nguq _ kete aqe ut
Tuunglighhitnun _ tawavek _ , _ “ _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ ?
enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ . _ ”
weniqruk nguq _ angyagh lleqe uten _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg _ .
Legannguq _ aga _ unite aqe aat
umiileg ghllag mun _ tawavek _ kaate ma lghii _ , _ aklungilngughmun _ .
kaate luni nguq _ pi a _ , _ “ _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ! _ ”
Legannguq _ yugwem _ taawa _ pi a _ , _ “ _ I-ii _ sivuyagtekaghqaghlluwhaq _ !
elpek _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aate luten _ qalleg vag luten _ weni nguq _ sivuyagtekete lleqe amken _ . _ ”
legan _ miluusaqminigunguq _ kelute mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qiya ma lghii _ .
taakwna _ angyagh _ tawaten _ qamagte a _ .
iwerngaqun _ iquklighpigagh at _ tazinga _ , _ umiileg m _ aag llegh a _ aghnaghaperugwaaghmeng _ panike lghii _ .
Aghnaghaperugwaaghmeng _ yukluni _ kete aqe lghii _ .
tawavek _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ ukughsi _ angyat nge a _ qaa _ , _ enkaam _ qaa _ igu yu aanga _ ? _ ”
“ _ legan _ angyagh naqe lghiiten _ .
taawa _ yuknaqamken _ , _ sivuyagteknaqamken _ . _ ”
kete i aqe ut _ qaake luku _ , _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ .
taana _ aklungilnguq _ aghvengyughlak _ .
Iiwennguq _ ketfaghqaaghaqut _ kaay _ , _ aghvegh m _ puugyaqminikinguq _ legan _ tuune luni _ .
legan _ yaywaali ngiighhagh m _ aghveqsaqminigunguq _ tuqunneqegsaghluku _ .
aawallu nguq _ taana _ aghvenge yiite ghllag _ umiileg _ aghvenge aghte uq _ .
ii _ , _ angyagh m _ qetgegh te ma kangi _ elngaatall _ .
Iiwennguq _ kaalguutagh t _ apeghiigh aqe ait _ legan _ paagkennguq _ anuqe _ atghaghsagh lghii mi _ uka _ legan _ eftugh tun _ , _ kii _ anuqlighllagyaqminigu _ .
“ _ aa _ , _ sa u luku mi _ taana _ yukllaataamazigu _ .
leganqun qun _ tuqu laghate naqe ukut _ whaa _ megh mi _ seghlegh mi _ . _ ”
avelghaqiinagh luku _ legan _ analghuvagteggun _ tugu laghate luni _ angyagh _ .
paagken _ anuqlighllagyaqminigu _ legan _ elngaatall _ pikayuwhaq _ sakayuwhaq _ tamaa na _ naghpaghsiqayuwhaq _ qamaggute uq _ , _ aghtugh aat
Mekelghiighhaghnguq _ taana _ maamtawha _ pi uq _ , _ “ _ Ilengtuq _ ima _ . _ ”
naligh ita _ nagaqugh qagh laatagh luku _ .
“ _ aa _ , _ uumnguq _ pi ligu _ , _ uumnguq _ pi ligu _ ! _ ”
Taamnguq _ aklungilnguum _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ pi ligu _ ellnganpilleqaa _ whaa _ amsanagh ste lleqe a _ pikayugwaaghhaat _ maakut _ mataawi te aat _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qepuughyalghiiminguq _ .
Qalivlugwaghhaghqek _ nengyugh ghhagh mi _ atuqe lukek _ .
Qepuughwaaghluni _ tayeghqagh luni nguq _ ayapegh aatagh ghhaak _ aate lukek _ aanqute i ma lghii _ talligh ghhagh ani _ qule mun _ ayuqe luku _ aghulate magh an _ ,
“ _ A-nuq-li-ii _ , _ na-nge-llu-gu-ngu _ ,
Si-la-mi-ngi _ , _ u-ki-i-nange-llu-gu-ngu _ ,
A-i-ya-i-ya-nga _ , _ ya-i-ya-i-yi-ya _ , _ i-ya-iyi-ya-nga _ ,
Silamit _ ukinaghningit _ aghnit _ payugha _ ,
Uq-ugh-taq _ , _ uq-ugh-taq _ . _ ”
megh _ pateg ma kanga _ inglu aneng _ -- _ “ _ uqughte aq _ ! _ ” _ -- _ maalghug gneng _ .
Maateqwaaqunnguq _ legan _ kaay _ qilag a _ kaagkagh a _ piikna nguq _ ukite aghte luku _ legan _ ukigteghiiyaqminigu _ .
Aay _ , _ amsanaghkwaagh lug ni _ naagu nguq _ maaten _ anuqllighllak _ .
qateghllug ghllag nguq _ taglagh ma lghiit _ aghvenge luteng _ taakut _ .
Taam _ umiileg m _ taana _ umiileg _ aklungilnguq _ pi aqe a _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ esghaghhu _ yaywaali t _ esghapagtelegllaget _ yaywaali m llu _ aghnalqwaagh m _ aatkagh aneng _ aatkagh leg m _ yakugh ke a _ . _ ”
taana nguq _ qallemsuwhaq _ qemall _ umiileg _ .
taawa _ taglagh ma lghiit _ elngaatall _ aghvenge luteng _ .
impite igate kanga _ yugwem _ taam _ aghvenguqam _ , _ avelghagh qumtaagh an _ impite igate kanga _ qamagtengngwaaghluku _ impite qugh ma kanga _ .
Apeghiighlutenguq _ taana _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ ighsa nga kete te _ nenglu ngiighhagh _ ifkaghte luku _ atghagh te luku _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ aatkangllaghyaqmegteggunguq _ mekelghiigh _ pinighhalek _ .
taana _ uyuqligh _ panig ni _ aga _ nulighqestengnginaamaan _ .
taawa nguq _ aghvengyughighllagtuq _ taana _ aghvengyiitepaaghruk _ yuug _ .
mekelghiigh perewaagh meng _ avaqutagh ligh luni _ .
taawa _ naange uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag nkuk _ anipaghllag nkuk
Iteghyaghaam _ anagutagh mete te _ neghigh luku _ apegh llegh a
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ meteghllugwet _ , _ anipa t _ qateg perewaagh u yagh lghiit _ .
anipa nkuk _ meteghllugwenkuk _ piniqe te pigte yagh lghiik _ , _ quunpeng _ qerngaghmetaqelghiik _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghteghngaagmek _ anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ yeqay _ igaqraghwaaghuteltung _ , _ pinighnaghsagh te ltung _ . _ ”
“ _ A-aa _ ! _ ” _ meteghllug ghllag m _ angghaghsimakanga _ .
“ _ elpek _ sivuke laken _ . _ ”
anipa ghrug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
Igaasitaq _ ketfagh ma ka ak _ silugkaaghhaghmengllu _ .
Igaasitaq _ taana _ nanigh m _ ellngagh ta aneng _ , _ qulmesiite m _ puyugh aneng _ akuutekagh meng _ imaleg _ tagnegh pigte lghii meng _ .
anipaghllag nguq _ aghuliighwaaghluni _ igaghtesimalghii _ , _ repall nguq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug ghllag m nguq _ pinighsagh pigte luku _ elngaatall _ igaqragh ma kanga _ .
taaqe luku _ taghtughsimakanga _ .
Anipaghrugwem _ taghneghagh ni _ meghaagh ghhagh mi _ esghaghyaqminigu _ imani nguq _ pinigh uq _ .
Taagkennguq _ ima _ anipa t _ igaghrakguughtekaaftut _ .
anipa m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ “ _ heng _ , _ elpegngam _ . _ ”
“ _ A-aa _ ” _ , _ meteghllug _ angghumalghii _ .
anipa m _ silug _ igaasitamun _ nepte luku _ meteghllug _ agtugh kau ma yagh kanga _ aga nguq _ nalug kau te uq _ qalghigh kau magh mi _ , _ “ _ Qung _ ! _ ”
anipa m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uuk _ , _ aghula i luten _ seghletun _ pi ste lleqe te ni _ ” _ amawha nguq _ agtugh qagh nghatni _ tamaani _ naluumsituq _ qalghigh magh mi _ , _ “ _ Qung _ , _ qung _ , _ qung _ ! _ ”
anipaghllag m nguq _ pi aqe a _ , _ “ _ aghula igh te luten _ qenwat _ naafqe ta n _ igaqragh llegh ka _ ! _ ”
taawa nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ qaprag ghllag _ qalghigh kaqe magh mi _ nalughqutagh ghllag _ tamaani _ .
qenwat llu nguq _ anipaghlagem _ ugumi yagute luku _ igaasitamineng _ meteghllug ghllag _ kuuve ghllag ma kanga _ .
aga nguq _ qalghighrugumaghmi _ tenge qagh uq _ , _ “ _ Qghwaaq _ , _ qghwaaq _ , _ qghwaaq _ ! _ ”
Taagkennguq _ ima _ meteghllugwet _ tagneghtekau ut _ .
enkaam nguq _ allameng llu _ ilakunnaniimaftunnguq _ .
ivisa ngiighhagh
Wamiiyaam _ ungipagh aa
ungipaghagh ni nguq _ imani _ .
ne mi nguq _ tawani _ , _ quunpenguq _ angyaghugh te aqe lghiit _ , _ neqe ngllagh te aqe lghiit _ .
taawa nguq _ tamaanteftuq _ ne mi _ tamaani _ yuug _ ataasigh _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
taawa nguq _ nulighh a _ , _ panike luku _ ataasigh _ .
angyaghugh te ghllag nghata nguq _ yugwisagaqelghii _ qayughllak _ ighnegh ite ngughk _ .
nuliigh ni llu _ , _ panigganillu _ yuklukek _ angyagh aqe lghii _ .
kete aqe lghiit _ paniggani _ taghtugh qaghte nghaani _ .
kingulighpigagh ghhagh u luteng _ kete luteng _ , _ aga _ angyagh t _ upleg te aqe lghiit _ nunavag meng _ elngaatall _ , _ uka nguq _ tagi laghate te nghata _ , _ taawa _ ellngit _ aglat _ .
ayveghagh llghite a nguq _ siipneghkwaagh ghhagh itneng _ saghna aqe lghiit _ ellngit _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawaten _ neqenge vleghagh aqe lghiit _ .
Enkaangamnguq _ uteghnigh aqe lghiit _ unugtagh u ghllag nghaani _ .
pegnem nguq _ neqeteregaghaqelghiit _ .
Ataasimenguq _ aghneghmi _ , _ nunavagpaghqughllagnguq _ nani _ imani _ , _ aruugh yagh luteng _ esghagh luku _ uplegunneqegsaallaataghaat _ .
Leganqunnguq-aa _ , _ atghaghtegh te ragkiighute yalghiimeng _ , _ ellnginnguq _ kingulighpigagh ghhagh u laatagh ut _ .
iwernga nguq _ tawatete ghngaan _ paniggani _ taghtugh qaghte yan _ , _ naqamllu nguq _ taghtughsugwigalkanga _ , _ atghaghtegh luteng _ ellngitllug nge uq _ kete ut _ .
Tawatennguq _ amsanaghllugllak _ , _ qutenge uq _ qantaghanlluku _ wiin _ nallangigh naqe aqe kangi _ teghiget _ , _ angyagh t _ saamkut _ anuqliitqaghtekangatni _ qute _ qantaghante sqe luku _ .
sa kan _ , _ tagitugughuskangatni _ qute _ qantaghante sqellug qu _ .
Taagkennguq _ tawatennguq-aa _ , _ amsanaghllugllak- a _ , _ qute _ paga _ qantaghanlluku _ , _ aagkulghutet _ upleg te te ghllag t _ uyavagh ghllag ke aat _ nalla itnun _ igleghteregaamaluku _ , _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghiit
Taagkennguq _ yugwemnguq _ taam _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Kaa-kaa _ , _ yaavuqugh nghmeng _ uyuq _ aghnagh aq _ taaqe aghten _ , _ kaa-kaa _ nagate aghte tek _ sangaawa _ ? _ ”
yaavuquute ni _ qaake luki _ nasiigh luteng _ nagate yalghiimeng _ , _ sa u a nguq _ .
“ _ Unegkughsii _ , _ nengaakitengngaa _ , _ qaakitengngaa _ , _ ” _ legannguq _ nagaqugh aat _ .
sunanguq _ yugwem _ aquutagh ni _ qiifte agu _ kelute mun _ .
