aghnagh m _ taam _ nulighh an _ qiive qaghte luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa u luku _ pi naqlaatagh zigu _ amyughaagh u aqe yaaghte uq _ . _ ”
avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ kelutmunnguq _ pi luteng _ , _ qute mun _ tenpete luteng _ , _ kayagte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ sangaawa _ uugte luten _ , _ ” _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ .
nulighh a nguq _ uugte luni _ , _ tawavek _ pengugneghwaaghanun _ qaasqagh m _ , _ yugsughwamalghii _ .
Yugsughwaluni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ paaghqite uq _ . _ ”
uugte naqe yaghtugh ngugh _ angyagh mun _ , _ nakennguq _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ whaante unga _ , _ whaante unga _ ! _ ” _ qaghi ite ghllag _ .
taakwavek nguq _ yugsughwaaghaghtaatut _ , _ ivagh i ragkiighute ut _ .
“ _ whaante unga _ meghzeghaaghhaghmi _ . _ ”
“ _ aatak _ meghhagh _ tazigna _ esghagh yaghtuqagh ghhu _ . _ ”
aga nguq _ aghnagh _ aglagh luni _ , _ meghaaghmunnguq _ pi yalghiimi _ , _ avangite uq _ , _ iwerngaqunnguq _ taawa _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa ite uq _ , _ avangite uq _ iwerngaqun _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taawa _ . _ ”
“ _ seghlegh ghhagh meng _ , _ taana _ naqam _ qaake lteggu _ . _ ”
Aghnaghaghnguq _ sa uq _ agniqsuugtuq _ , _ “ _ kimaawi ghllag ukut _ . _ ”
aghnagh m nguq _ tugu luku nguq _ qugwaklaaghpenaan _ , _ angyagh m _ aqume vig akun _ aqnighte naqe pigte luku _ miluute a _ , _ mesaaqguulluku _ .
taagken _ tawaten _ puglegh luteng _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
igleghte ma luki nguq _ .
“ _ Nuliing _ , _ nuliing _ , _ angyagh m _ meghaaghhanun _ kanaghte aghte nga _ . _ ”
avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
iwernga nguq _ ata an _ nagaqugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ seghleghhalek _ sa meng _ taana _ pi aqa _ weni _ , _ pie- ghesnagh aqe luku _ pi aghte gu _ .
sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ ”
“ _ esghaghhu _ angyagh m _ meghaagh anun _ kanaghtesqelluni _ pi lghii _ . _ ”
“ _ kanaghte gu _ . _ ”
tugu luku nguq _ miluute a _ angyagh m _ meghzeghaaghanun _ .
Taagkenaa _ , _ imani nguq _ megh mete luni _ kana _ enraq _ .
“ _ Nuliing _ , _ nuliing _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ ” _ avelghaqiinagh luku nguq _ aghnaghagh m _ ugumi yagute pigtekanga _ .
imani nguq _ , _ “ _ Nuliing _ , _ nuliing _ , _ yaavuquute ten _ taakut _ qaake ki _ . _ ”
avelghaqiinagh yagh luku _ ata an _ aghyuugh laatagh aa _ .
aga _ yaavuquute gni _ agniqe pigte luni _ qaake ma kek _ unake naqe pigte luku _ taana _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ .
Legannguq _ qaake ai _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek nguq _ , _ suqsugh ghhalek _ , _ tawatennguq _ pi yalghiimeng _ sukera kestagh aqe ut _ .
Legannguq _ yuug _ nangllaghqelluni _ , _ aghnagh aq llu _ , _ aghnagh llu _ nangllaghqelluteng _ elngaatall _ , _ upumyeghaamaghmeng _ , _ quyaghllagumaghmenguq _ .
Sukeraghllagyalghiimenguq _ , _ legannguq _ angyat lghute _ kaate qagh i luki _ naghughaghte aqe ait _ .
Teghigmun _ kaate luteng _ , _ ayveghaleghtaaghllagluteng _ taglagh ma luki nguq _ , _ taawa nguq _ angyat lghute _ taagna _ upleg te a _ taagavek _ igleghte aq _ .
Legannguq _ nangllaghqe te luteng _ naghughaghte nghata _ esghapag nghmegteki _ .
saghiigha yug ghllaget _ , _ allaaghlluwhaghyugllaget _ , _ “ _ aagkut _ sukate pigte aat _ ! _ ”
ima nguq _ yuug _ tahna _ ighneghitalghii _ unangyuughqwaaghllagaa _ , _ aklungi igh i ghllag uq _ , _ ayvengyuughqwaaghllagaa _ .
Quunpenguq _ ivisa ngiighhagh _ taana _ aflenga kaqe kangat _ .
tefaay _ !
sikughaagh nkut _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh nkut _ , _ meteghllug ghllag nkut
iyaa-kagh m _ apegh llegh a
Uksuum _ negh ke igh sag ani _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pirughte yaghtugh ma lghii _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ .
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ akmag ke luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg ita _ nenglu anun _ , _ imani _ saaygu an _ amig a _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ nenglagh yug magh mi _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ sikughwaagh t _ umiileg at _ qaamna _ uaten _ eslegkakaa _ . _ ”
akmagtagh ghhagh ni _ mat- aghte luku _ pegnem _ kangsugh ghngaan _ amig kun _ ilu te mun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
aatkagh ni _ mataghte aqe luki _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ kangsugh ghngaaghmi _ .
itegh luni _ saaygu t _ ilu itni _ ilepghaagheg ni _ aate ma kek _ .
atkug ni llu _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ agaghte ma kangi _ .
taaqe luni _ aagra nun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ umiilgannguq _ pika _ kelutangani _ aqume luni _ , _ qenngulliqe ghllag luni _ .
imani nguq _ amestaaghhaaguq _ .
tamaa nguq _ sikughaagh t _ aghnagh ait _ qepghagh te ghllag t _ , _ qaprag te ghllag t _ naqam _ qalleg qagh gpenateng _ .
Upughataghhneghitaannguq _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ qalleg qagh gpenani _ alinge sighwaagh ma lghii _ .
sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ qiigh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Ughhu-ghhuu _ . _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh _ upugh sighwaagh ma lghii _ tupag ghpagte magh mi _ .
umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ sa meng _ pi aghte gpenani _ .
taawa _ kaviigh ghhagh _ tawantuq _ naligh ghhagh inagh ita _ aleghqugh qagh gpenaan _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ itegh yalghiimi _ , _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ atkugwa _ atuqe luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ nenglaghyugllaghngaaghmi _ pegnem _ nuqete ma lghii _ elngaatall _ .
umiileg _ qiighw laatagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Ughhu-ghhuu _ . _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh _ tupag ghpagte sighwaagh aqe lghii _ .
umiileg _ nutaan _ akuzi uq _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ ggaatfaka _ ? _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh _ nenglaghyugllaghngaaghmi _ pi ma kanga _ qusevegte pigte luni _ , _ “ _ uuk _ , _ sangantuq- a _ atkuwhaqa _ aate laatagh zigu _ , _ keluwhii _ avleghruuggnaluki _ . _ ”
umiileg nguq _ temsiyaaghagh uq _ , _ aga _ aane uq _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ enraq _ kaviigh ghhagh m _ temkagh kek _ atuqe lukek _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag lukek _ .
sikughaagh ghhagh _ qiighw ghllag laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ Ughhu-ghhuu _ . _ ”
pi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ ighuvagegka _ ? _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi laatagh aa _ me ni _ alingesugnite naqe pigte luku _ , _ “ _ Uuk-aa _ , _ sangan tuq _ qulliggaagka _ aate laatagh zikek _ keluwhii _ sevuutesqelluki _ . _ ”
umiileg _ aga _ aane laatagh uq _ iqemyaaghagh magh mi _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ iqlighmi _ , _ pinighhalek _ elngaatall _ .
“ _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ aqelqagh _ upugha teggu _ , _ neqlightugh teggu _ ! _ ”
umiileg m _ kayagte ai _ .
nutaan _ upugha te aat _ kaviigh ghhagh _ .
neqe meng _ allaaghiinaghmeng _ ketfagh te aat _ .
kaviigh ghhagh nkuk _ umiileg nkuk _ negh uk _ .
negh te kete luku _ umiileg m _ aapte a _ , _ “ _ Saam _ ukagun-aa _ aagte ta ten _ ? _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ avaqutagh ghhagh nka _ neghesqelluki _ neqellgaanayukavek _ enankin _ , _ aag vike amken _ . _ ”
umiileg m _ aragh ai _ , _ “ _ aghnaghagh t _ , _ yataaghqe te nakesi _ pirughte i uute yaghqagh meng _ . _ ”
taagken _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ , _ “ _ qavagh luten _ unaami _ wetku _ aglagh ghhaaten _ , _ pirughte i lleqe aaten _ . _ ”
unaami _ kaviigh ghhagh _ pi yalghiimi _ akmagtagh ghhagh a _ aw llaag ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ imigh luni _ .
akmagtagh ni _ aane sta _ .
ellnga llu _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aane uq _ , _ kangsugh nghite uq _ .
kaate luni _ iiwenllu _ akmagtagh ni _ mataghte aqe a _ , _ meteghllug ghllag _ whaa _ tagi uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ pi a _ meteghllug ghllag m _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ naqamalla _ naken _ neqete yu igh ziin _ . _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg itnun _ pirughte yaghtugh lunga _ , _ llaaghanwha _ taawa _ . _ ”
meteghllug ghllag _ imani _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ whanga llu _ unaami _ pirughte yaghtuqagh lleqe unga _ . _ ”
Kaviighham _ pi a _ , _ “ _ ii-ii _ pigpengang _ , _ qayngunwhaa _ igiiterug naanghite uten _ .
whaken _ tuune lleqe amken _ . _ ”
imani nguq _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ tunusagh t _ kemnagh u i te ut _ . _ ”
unaami _ meteghllug ghllag _ akmagtaghpagllani _ akmag ke luku _ sikughaaghenkunun _ pi uq _ .
Kaasalghlimi _ imani nguq _ amig at _ kagpestaaghhagh u uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ natenllaam _ qaamna _ umiileg _ eslegkakaa _ ? _ ”
amig m _ paye a _ naafqellug qu _ , _ nuqutughte luku _ itegh ma lghii _ .
nategh kun _ atkug ni _ , _ temkaag ni llu _ mat- aghte luki _ , _ agaghte luki _ itegh ma lghii _ aagra nun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ pika _ kelutangani _ aqumlunl _ , _ imani _ amestaaghhaaguq _ , _ naqam _ qenngu ghllag a _ , _ nulglighllagluni _ .
upugha te aghte nghite aat _ .
qalleg qagh gpenateng _ naqam _ tamaa _ ilangl _ qaprag te ghllag t _ .
sa meng _ pi aghte gpenaan _ meteghllug ghllag _ , _ umiileg _ aga _ aane uq _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ “ _ alike naanghite anka _ , _ akmagtagh ka _ whanga mneng _ imigh lleqe aqa _ . _ ”
umiileg _ itegh yalghiimi _ Meteghllugwem _ atkugwa _ atuqe luku _ , _ angegh lleg ke ghllag luku _ , _ nuqutu lleg ke ghllag luku _ .
Meteghllugwem _ esghagh luku _ , _ nenglagh ghllag ma lghii _ , _ elngaatall _ tuqutngwaagh ma lghii _ .
umiileg m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ ggaatfaka _ ? _ ”
Meteghllugwem _ kiimsigh aa _ , _ “ _ Aa-ha-ha-haa _ , _ sangantuq- a _ akugllaka _ aate laatagh zigu _ .
llangaqa _ atkug ka _ , _ ne mni _ inga _ pellugutaaghmeng _ nuuvekagh _ .
Aa-ha-ha-haa _ . _ ”
“ _ Uguminaqruwhaghmeng _ ! _ ” _ pi magh mi _ aane uq _ umiileg _ .
alla _ itegh yalghiimi _ , _ Meteghllugwem _ temkagh kek _ atuqe lukek _ .
legan _ Meteghllugwem _ esghagh nghminigu _ tuqutngwaagh aqe lghii _ .
umiileg m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh _ , _ qayuq _ ighuvagegka _ ? _ ”
Meteghlugwem _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Aa-ha-ha-haa _ , _ sangan _ qulligegka _ aate laatagh zikek _ ?
llangaqa _ qulligegka _ ne mni _ inga _ nguulghute meng _ nuuvekagh k _ ! _ ”
umiileg _ eggmillgha magh mi _ aga _ aane uq _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ gginagh _ seghlegh _ , _ qenngu ghnaggagh a _ .
aleghquute aghte gpenateng _ ingaghte uute ut _ .
meteghllug ghllag _ ingaghte luni _ qavagh uq _ .
qavagh ghngaaghmi _ isekinam _ , _ suqsugh m _ teghtugh aghte yalghiimi _ , _ qungyaghagneng _ eslate mun _ saaygu neng _ maaqute aqe a _ .
megh kun _ nalugwigalnguq _ , _ alingruugh uq _ .
sa ni te mun _ patimlla luni _ qute mun _ uugg tuq _ .
kaame ngunani _ , _ atkug ngunani _ , _ ilepghaaqiinaghluni _ aghipa ghllag _ aglagh uq _ ne minun _ .
kaviigh ghhagh _ taawa _ manughagh mi _ aqumga aqe uq _ .
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ Kii-ii _ , _ qayugham _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg ita _ pirughte i te aaten _ ? _ ”
Meteghllugwem _ pi a _ , _ “ _ sikughaagh t _ umiileg at _ inglu u nghite uq _ . _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi a _ , _ “ _ qayngun qun _ igiiterug mangite laatagh uten _ ! _ ”
tefaay _ .
piinlillegh
Petuwaam _ igagh llegh a
ungipaghaate t _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ apeghtughiste m _ linguist-em _ Georgiy _ A. _ Menovshchikov-em _ igaqe yuwhaagh kaqe ai _ apeghtughiste u luni _ pamani _ 1930-ni _ .
up-uni _ igagh ni _ qula _ aki mig aq _ siipnegh ke luku _ ungipaghata _ Menovshchikovem _ igaqugh qu ai _ whangkuta _ Sivuqamelngughnim _ atightullemnnu _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ ama _ Laluramketimun _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ .
qamagte luki _ ungipaghaate t _ ukut _ Menovshchikov-em _ 1988-em _ igagh aneng _ , _ Materialy _ i _ issledovaniia _ po _ iazyku _ i _ folʼkloru _ chaplinskikh _ eskimosov _ ( _ Materials _ and _ Analysis _ Concerning _ the _ Language _ and _ Folklore _ of _ the _ Chaplinski _ Eskimos _ ) _ , _ pi u ut _ publishekat _ Ruusemi _ .
una _ qepghaqagh _ allgegh kau uq _ mani nge yama _ grantmeng _ University _ of _ alaska _ Fairbanks-em _ Provost-anganeng _ .
allgegh te llegh kun _ sivugh qagh unga _ ruuseghmii t _ atightullegh itneng _ mumegh igh qugh anka _ whangkunnun _ atightughyugnaghtesqelluki _ kaneghyengesi m _ tanqigh ani _ 2001-mi _ .
piyuwhaaghmun _ 45 _ ungipaghaate t _ 49-eneng _ 1988-em _ igagh aneng _ .
iwernga _ pi yalghiinga _ ila i _ ungipaghaate m _ siingenllu _ apeghkagh t _ , _ ila i llu _ aghsaan _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
pi nghite yaqenka _ , _ yuginagh _ aki mig aq _ siipnegh ke luku _ siipte uq _ mumegh igh qugh yaghqagh nka _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ tawaten _ nanqigte manginagh magh ita _ pi anka _ .
anagngatu pigte lghii _ Menovshchikov-em _ igagh llegh ani _ .
ila i _ atightugh neghllug ghllag t _ repall _ Ruuseghmistun _ ayuqe lghii kun _ mumigte luki _ wetku _ liigikngwaaghanka _ sa u ta i _ ipa _ .
Paamkughmiit _ akuzillegh at _ allakanigh _ ( _ katam _ ellngit a _ ukiniwhangkutestun _ kaki- _ , _ ama _ ellngit ni _ enngaatall _ whangtutestun _ elngaatall _ ) _ , _ tespamkughmiistun _ ayuqe ut _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
ilangakun _ Paamkughmiit _ akuzillegh at _ igagh llegh a _ anagnga sug ni lleqe uq _ ( _ katam _ wengteghaq _ nakaan _ mangteghagh _ ) _ .
enkaam _ ila i _ akuzite m _ whanga _ nalluke kenka _ , _ sivuke luki _ angayuqagh mnun _ Nayghwaaghmiinkugnun _ June-enkugnun _ aapte agka _ sa u ta i _ .
enkaam _ ellngit a _ nallukekagh it _ siivanllegh nun _ aapte yaghtugh anka _ sa u ta i _ .
igamsiqa yug vike anka _ kayusigh kau yatnga _ Kepelgunkut _ , _ Anaggutenkut _ , _ iyagh u kankut _ , _ Uuzagenkut _ , _ Avaalagenkut _ , _ enkaam _ kiyang _ rosa _ .
Rosa-m _ apeghkagh i _ sa u ta i _ naten _ atugh llegh i _ quyilleg t _ akuzite it _ .
UAF-mun _ uteghnigh yama _ qaluvig m _ tanqigh ani _ 2002-mi _ yupig m _ Prufisernga _ Steven _ Jacobson-llu _ yuvghiighaghpung _ qepghagh llegh nka _ yupig stun llu _ laluramke stun llu _ .
amalleqa _ tawani _ upenghagh ani _ recordaanka _ CD-mun _ maligte te nga lghii _ igagh tgun _ .
ama _ nimam _ apegh llegh i _ Igor _ Krupnigmeng _ Smithsonian _ Institution-meng _ allgegh ta put _ tuune ai _ Sivuqaghhmiini _ nallukekagh put _ pamanlenguut _ nuna t _ .
ama _ map- a _ tuune a _ tespamum _ nuna m _ naantulngi _ apegh luteng _ yupig t _ ama _ sighineg mii t _ kiyaghfig kekagh i _ .
UAF _ College _ of _ Liberal _ Arts-em _ umiileg an _ John _ Leipzig-em _ ama _ ANLC-m _ umiileg an _ Lawrence _ Kaplan-em _ mat- ni _ piyaqlegginaaghtaak _ teruwistemeng _ muute i yaghqaa lunga _ Qakginkugneng _ Apughitenkugnun _ Chefaghnaghmeng _ ungipaghaatenun _ ilate yaghqagh lug ke i _ .
David _ Koester _ UAF-em _ Anthropology _ Department-meng _ qepghaghteghyagneng _ kayute kesagh aqa _ Undergraduate _ Research _ Opportunity _ Program-em _ mani nge vig aneng _ .
taagken _ esgha _ una _ qepghaqagh _ allgeghkagh _ .
ama _ igamsiqa yug vike anka _ Nauka _ Publishing _ House-enkut _ St. _ Petersburg _ , _ Russia-melnguut _ aangghutkaangi _ ANLC-nkut _ ukut _ ungipaghaate t _ publish-enkaluki _ whatete luki _ .
ukut _ igagh t _ ama _ CD _ neghyuke te luki _ akuzipig lleg mnnun _ yupig t llu _ kiyaghtaallghanun _ nagnegh te yaghqaa luku _ iglegha lleg mnnun _ iknaqughi sagh u luku llu _ , _ pamanlliimta _ ungipaghaate itneng _ .
Ungipaghaghtet _ : _ ( _ Menovshchikov-meng _ Valentina _ ( _ Yata _ ) _ kunukagh m _ mumegh igh qugh qu ai _ , _ enkaam _ Igor _ Krupnigem _ nallghughqegkii _ ) _ .
1 _ . _ ayvegh ghhagh _ ( _ 1914-1947 _ ) _ .
ungazighmii _ .
ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
Ayaangaghmi _ alleqaq _ , _ enkaam _ yaywaalingughtegkaq _ , _ nuna lgu ta an _ angli stekagh a _ kayusigh iqe a _ .
ayvegh ghhagh _ ungipaghagh u lleg ghllag u yagh lghii _ ama _ ilagagh lleg ghllag u yagh lghii _ nuna lgu ta an _ pi aneng _ .
1940-mi _ ukut _ ungipaghatet _ allgeghtaqngameng _ 26 _ year-ngughtuq _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh u te mineng _ nagate yuneghtu ghllag yagh uq _ ungipaghaate meng llu _ , _ ilagaate meng llu _ alignagh lghiit llu _ ungipaghagh itneng _ .
maakut _ umyugagh anun _ pi luteng _ sumeghtaghaghqelluku _ repall _ .
ayvegh ghhagh _ ungipaghagh nghmini _ apate qugh aqe lghii nguq _ .
Menovshchikov-em _ igaqugh kaqe ai _ ama _ mumegh igh qugh ai _ 30-t _ ungipaghatet _ ayvegh ghhagh meng _ ungazigh mi _ 1940 _ / _ 41em _ uksughani _ , _ Ekaterina _ S. _ Rubstov-am _ 50 _ ungipaghata _ igaqugh u luku _ 1940-mi _ .
pi nga yu neng _ inglulekAyveghhaam _ ungipagatngi _ ukunitut _ igagh ni _ 18-eni _ .
2 _ . _ peter _ tagikagh _ ( _ 1926-1941 _ )
ungazighmii _ mekelghiigh _ .
mughunniighte m _ ungipaghaghtem _ Galmugyim _ ( _ nani _ 1880-1957 _ ) _ ighnegh a _ .
Takigaam _ suilughtekaqaa _ igaghyagh m _ sivulighte negh a _ , _ taagken _ mughuunnightengughsukaq _ .
angayuqagh u kek _ ruuseghmii ii te i igate yagh uk _ .
Tagikaam _ ata an _ Galmugyim _ uglagh _ sa u a _ yuginagh _ sa u a _ siipngaan _ ungipaghagh te a _ liisimake yagh aa _ .
avaqutagh minun _ ila minun _ nuna lgu ta minun _ ungipaghagh aqe lghii _ sa nghite nghmini _ mughunniigh nghite nghmini _ .
Tagikaam _ nagatekagh i _ neqamike te qugh u i _ a ta mi _ ungipaghatangi _ .
ila itnun llu _ laalighqwaagh aqe lghii _ unug nghagu _ vuvallanghatallu _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh aqe lghii _ , _ awtu magh meng _ aghula magh meng _ .
Tagikaam _ piniqumtaagh a _ ineghla ghllag a _ ayvegh ghhagh _ , _ yuug _ nagatngwaaqayuk _ ama _ ungipaghagh lleg ghllag _ .
1940 _ / _ 41 _ em _ uksughani _ Menovshchikovem _ igagh u aghagh ke yagh ai _ sivuligh t _ igagh i _ akuzipig m _ grammarngi _ igaghvig t _ sivulighte negh itnun _ ayuqe lghiit _ .
Kayusingegkaq _ ungazigh m _ igleghutistengitneng _ , _ Chukotkam _ aaghtistengi _ Mayngankugneng _ Mallunkugneng _ .
tagikagh _ tagi aqe lghii _ elkegnun _ igalgusighyaghtughaqegkangek _ .
ataasigh meng _ igagh gni _ kelqellug kek _ ungipaghatem _ ila i _ igaqe ma kangi _ .
taagken _ ima _ Menovshchikov-enkuk _ qepghagh lgutke te ma lghiik _ 30-t _ ungipaghatet _ taaqe te ma ka ak _ .
nukalpigagh _ quyamaghllakTagikaq _ .
tan- ke ta ghhagh mini _ kiyaghtaalleghmini _ liisimakekagh ni _ qamagte luki _ apegh llghite ai _ .
palighvig m _ tanqigh ani _ 1941-mi _ peleghqe kau uq _ suflugagh meng _ pi _ 11 _ gun- ighlliqe luni _ 15 _ year-ngughsimaghmi _ .
Tagikaam _ ungipagh ai _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ 920-metut _ .
3 _ . _ Asuya _ Olga _ mumigtekagh _ ( _ 1930-2001 _ ) _ ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
ugi mini _ kiyaghtekagh _ sighineg mi _ .
pi nga yu neng _ ingluleg neng _ avaqu tke ikagh k _ .
menovshchikov _ qepghaluni _ ungazigh mi _ 1954-mi _ Asuya _ , _ atightugh qagh yu k _ pinaqnelghii _ , _ kayute ke kaqe a _ akuzipig m _ grammarnganeng _ igaqugh u luni _ .
tea- ma ni llu _ naayvaghvig m _ tanqigh aneng _ kaneghyengesi m _ tanqigh anun _ igaqugh kaqe ai _ tawaten _ pilleg mtun _ tallimat _ ungipaghatet _ , _ Menovshchikov-em _ mumegh igh qugh aghtekagh i _ .
1970-nillu _ 1980-nillunursenguluniqepghaaqaaftuq _ Sighingem _ clinicngani _ , _ ama _ aflengakekagh i _ avaqutagh ni _ .
ama _ sighineg mi _ aghula meng _ sa meng _ alngunak _ yupig m _ igleghneghaaneng _ apeghtugh i ikagh _ .
Asuyam _ ungipaghatngi _ 21-enkuk _ 22-nkunguuk _ .
4 _ . _ Alghalek _ ( _ 1920-1965 _ ) _ .
ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
atightugh qagh yu k _ ama _ igagh kayuglluggagh _ yuug _ .
Ruuseghiitikayuk _ ama _ qiteve kayug _ ama _ akuzipig qagh yu k _ .
1955-mun _ kenlanga _ mughunniighte ukagh _ ama _ ivenruutkegsaghtengukaq _ ungazigh mi _ “ _ nutaghagh mi _ kiyaghtaalleghmi _ ” _ .
kingu ani _ egeghagh mete te _ nuugtekau uq _ pinighsagh i ste u luni _ ama _ savikenghaagh meng _ ulima ste u luni _ .
Provideniyam _ seaportngani _ ama _ qepghaqagh _ .
Rubstova _ kayusigh iqe a _ Yupik-Ruuseghmii _ dictorary-ngllalleghmeng _ .
1960-mi _ Alghalgem _ 14 _ ungipaghagh te a _ igaqegkagh a _ Provideniya-mi
Alghalgem _ ungipaghatngi _ 23-31-nguut _ up-uni _ igagh ni _ .
5 _ . _ nanugh ghhagh _ ( _ 1911-1990 _ ? _ ) _ .
ungazigh mi _ allgeghkagh _ .
igagh lleg ite ngughk _ atightugh lleg ite ngughk _ natengiighhaq _ ruuseghmii ii te i kayug _ .
4 _ year-nguluni _ ayaakagh _ trachomaluni _ .
nanugh ghhagh m _ uglagh _ ungipaghagh te a _ ama _ ilaagaata _ liisimake yagh aa _ , _ enkaam _ ungipaghagh u lleg ghllag u yagh lghii _ .
ungipaghaate i _ ilaagaatmeng _ ila tke aat _ .
15 _ imgipaghatet _ allgegh qughkagh t _ nanugh ghhagh meng _ .
nanugh ghhagh m _ ukunun _ igagh nun _ ila tke aat _ 3234-nguut _ .
6 _ . _ Valentina _ Viri _ ( _ Wiri _ ) _ ( _ 1942-mi _ allgeghkagh _ ) _ .
imtugmii _ sighineg meng _ .
liite u aqe aq _ Ruuseghmiitellegllalghii _ .
ima _ aghnaaghaghhaatmineng _ nagate u aqe aq _ , _ ungipaghaate kekagh i _ igaqugh qu ai _ ungipaghaate t _ .
up-uni _ igagh ni _ ungipagh aatnga _ pi sta _ 35-nguuq _ .
Ukamangaan
iimnanguq _ ungazighmii t _ sivuqagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
ila meng _ sivuqagh mii t _ taghnughhaghqagh it _ wayaamaqegket _ maalghuknayakullghiik _ .
aglagh te ma kegket _ ungazigh mun _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ Kaanghu _ , _ uyuqlighpigaq _ .
aghnaghagh ghllag m _ ategh a _ Ukamangaan _ .
aghnaghagh ghllag _ ugi igh yaghqagh stun _ angka lugh u ikagh _ .
ungazigh mun _ kaate luteng _ maalghug gneng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
Aqimalghiit _ Uvingemun1 _ taghnughhagh k _ tuune yaghtugh ma kegket _ quyngigh leg nun _ .
kaate yameng _ Uvingemun _ esghagh ma kangit _ quyilleg ghllag t _ .
aapte ma kangi _ quyilleg m _ , _ “ _ sangafsi _ tagi stek _ ? _ ”
akite ma kangat _ ungazighmii t _ , _ “ _ whangkuta _ tagi ukut _ inqunamen _ taghnughhagh k _ tukfigh sqellug kek _ quyngigh meng _ . _ ”
quyilleg _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ naqam _ ighnegh leg _ aange lghii meng _ . _ ”
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ itupilqun _ ighnegh ka _ nulightugh yagh kuni _ yuginakaghnayaghamsi _ quyngigh meng _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ tuune aqe aat _ Ukamangaan _ aghnaghagh ghllag _ .
Kaanghu _ tuune nghite aat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ .
uteghte ma lghii _ ungazigh mun _ .
Ukamangaan _ ugiigh uq _ quyilleg mun _ Uvingeghmiimeng _ .
ugi a _ yuukegte pigte lghii _ ama _ sukate pigte lghii _ ama _ iknaqe pigte lghii _ .
Ukamangaan _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii _ ama _ sungaghate pigte lghii _ .
Ukamangaan _ meghtagh aqe lghii _ ama _ ukini aqe lghii _ .
meghtagh naqe nghmini _ ugke meng _ qugtuqagh gni _ kevigh igh aqe kek _ .
kiiw gnun _ kaate nghmini _ tamaghhagh an _ aghneq _ ugke meng _ milugh qutagh aqe lghii _ inglu anun _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ .
ilangani _ kameg ngllaghtagh ma lghii _ .
uglagh pigte lghii _ kameg lghute _ ulima ma kanga _ .
taaqegkagh ni _ ugke meng _ imigh aqe luku _ .
kameg _ taaqe ma kanga _ yuginagh _ qula _ siipnegh ke luku _ tumangani _ inqunamen _ aasaghqaluku _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ metngegh ma lghii _ .
kameg lghute _ akmag luku _ aqeftaghaghmun _ kanaghte luku _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
igatagh nghmini _ kameg t _ tugu luki _ ugke meng _ tugu tete luni _ negh aqe lghii _ .
Qavaghyimeghmini _ nuna mi _ temngi _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
kameg i _ naavenghata _ alla neng _ kameg aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ kaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh ghllag kun _ paaghqilngughqun _ .
mengteghagh _ neqetu pigte lghii _ , _ mangtag meng _ ayvegh meng _ neghsagh meng _ ama _ quyngigh meng _ .
amig m _ saaghw ani _ saghumignegh m _ tungangani _ yug m _ negh kanga _ .
Ukamangaan _ aqumgaamaluku _ itegh ma lghii _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ mataqeltaghhaq _ .
uvite _ ’ _ ga _ qategh pigte lghii _ qugintagh pigte lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ Ukamangaan _ , _ “ _ Kakumiy _ , _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ ”
Ukamangatem _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ quyilleg neng _ pi unga _ . _ ”
aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ aleghqugh uq _ , _ “ _ Nakumiinguzin _ ? _ ”
“ _ sivuqagh mii u unga _ . _ ”
“ _ sa qu ma ziin _ Uvingemun _ ? _ ”
“ _ ungazighmii t _ akike ma aatnga _ quyilleg nun _ . _ ”
“ _ negh lta _ !
negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkumta _ ingaghte uute lghaakut _ .
whanga _ qavagh neghtu ghllag unga _ .
unaami _ taghsaghnaaghaghpenga _ .
taake te a _ ayvegh m _ elqunghek _ akite ma _ asi ani _ tugu nakegken _ taagken _ anagu nakevnga _ naasqugh mkun _ .
taghtugh naagh unga _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ negh te ma lghiik _ mangtag meng _ Ukamangaatenkuk _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh nkuk _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unanguluku _ taghtugh ma lghii _ Ukamangaan _ .
taghsagh ma kanga _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh _ , _ “ _ uyuq _ , _ uyuq _ taghtugh a _ ! _ ”
nagaqugh mangite ma lghii _ .
qaywa _ naasqwa _ keveg te ma aqe yagh kanga _ aghulate ma kanga _ wanlegi _ nagaqugh mangite ma lghii _ .
ayvegh m _ naasqugh kek _ tugu lukek _ uqliite ma aqe yagh kanga _ Ukamangaan _ alinge ma aqe lghii _ .
qenwat _ utaqa i luni _ lliigh uq _ .
aghuliigh uq _ taghsagh i nghmeng _ .
iiwenllu _ aghnegh m _ qukaa nun _ lliigh aqe uq _ aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ agniiquq _ , _ “ _ ii- ik _ , _ ii- ik _ , _ ii- ik _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh mi _ whani _ allameng _ taghsagh nghite kuvnga _ neghe lleqe amken _ ! _ ”
aghnagh ghrukutaagh _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ Ukamangaan _ , _ “ _ igatagh unga _ !
tuune nga _ taagken _ yug m _ negh ka aneng _ . _ ”
Ukamangaatem _ tuune ma kanga _ .
aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
Ukamangaatem _ nalluke ma kanga _ natmun _ pi ma ta a _ .
tagi yalghiimi _ unange ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
pi ma kanga _ Ukamangaan _ , _ “ _ enta _ negh lta _ !
unaami _ anagu nakevnga _ taawanginaq _ wata _ .
iiwen _ anagu nghite kuvnga _ neghe lleqe amken _ ! _ ”
neqagh lutek _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unanguluku _ taghtugh ma lghii _ Ukamangaan _ .
Ukamangaatem _ elqunghek _ tugu ma kek _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qaywa _ tuqu langa _ ! _ ”
anag ma kanga _ naasqwakun _ qevuute luku _ .
aghnagh ghrukutaagh ghllag _ aqume ma lghii _ nenglagh magh mi _ , _ “ _ Hahahaha _ !
tawaten _ tawaten _ tawaten _ !
Uveghllunga _ anagu na yaqevnga _ aglaaghhaatenngam _ atkug ka _ una _ aate luku _ .
yugu nghite unga _ , _ kaynge u unga _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ Ukamangaan _ ungazigh mun _ .
igleghte ma lghii _ kaate yaghtugh ma lghii _ ungazigh mun _ sukate luni _ .
igleghte ma luku _ yuggagh m _ esghagh ma kanga _ mengteghaam _ saaghw aneng _ .
aragh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Maakughsiiy _ kaynge ghllag _ taakwa _ ! _ ”
yug lghute t _ ughluvegh teng _ pana teng _ tugulagh luki _ malighqagh aat _ .
Ukamangaan _ aragh uq _ , _ “ _ kaynge u nghite unga _ , _ aghnaghhaguunga _ ! _ ”
yaghlegi _ mulaagh uq _ kaynge stun _ .
Ukamangaan _ aghuliigh uq _ .
nasagh ni _ mataghte a _ .
gginagh a _ aliigh uq _ .
yug t _ esghagh luku _ liisuqe aat _ llaaghan _ Ukamangaan _ .
awenrale nge an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tagi pigesnagh uten _ .
ayumiqun _ itagnatun _ tuune yaghtugh lleqe amken _ quyngigh leg nun _ . _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ negh uq _ manguna meng _ .
qavagh nghite uq _ .
esnagh mun _ piyaa uq _ .
tawani _ qiya ma lghii _ nuna _ tukeghragh magh an _ .
Enkaamam _ iiwenllu _ mamleg a qaa _ Ukamangaan _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
iwernga _ qavangugh ma lghii _ .
angyagh t _ tagi iqe ut _ .
angyagh t _ kaate ut _ .
aragh ma kangat _ , _ “ _ Ukamangaatnguzin _ ? _ ”
“ _ ipapik _ . _ ”
“ _ quneghte luten _ angyagh mun _ uugten _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ uugg tuq _ Ukamangaan _ angyagh mun _ esghagh gpenani _ .
suqsughtagh ut _ suqsughtagh ut _ .
sivuqagh mun _ kaate ut _ .
Qenaghpallaatut _ .
“ _ Esghaghhaatenngamnalugullghaaten _ qute mun _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ sivuke luni _ nalugute uq _ Ukamangaan _ esghagh gpenani _ .
Saaghhwaakun _ miluute ma kangat _ nengigh k _ maalghug _ mangtag _ .
Ukamangaan _ pi ma kangat _ , _ “ _ esgha _ taana _ angyaataghqagh ghhagh n _ !
aglagh naqe gkuvek _ tugu naken _ ! _ ”
qavagh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ angyagh t _ aviite ut _ .
pi yalghiimi _ nuna mi _ alla mi _ liisuqe a _ llangaqa _ sivuqagh mi _ .
naqam _ saaghw ani _ aghvegh ghllag k _ maalghug _ mallu k _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ Ukamangaan _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ipapik _ sivuqagh mun _ kaate mafte unga _ , _ u-u-u-u _ ! _ ”
quya ghllag ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ kaa tuq _ .
aragh ma lghii _ ilu te mun _ , _ “ _ Qamaay _ kenghhaghmeng _ kumaghhutaghtek _ . _ ”
sivuke luku _ nagaqugh nghite aat _ .
qavaa te aqe ut _ .
aragh laatagh ai _ , _ “ _ sukate lusi _ ! _ ”
ata a _ taghtugh uq _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kina u ziin _ ? _ ”
Ukamangaan _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga nge unga _ ! _ ”
nuliigh ni _ taghsagh aa _ , _ “ _ uyuq _ uyuq _ , _ taghtugh a _ sukate luten _ !
llangaqa _ Ukamangaatem _ me a _ nagaqugh aqa _ . _ ”
naange a _ nuug uq _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kina u ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ sa naqe stek _ whanga nge unga _ . _ ”
naa an _ ata a _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ llangaqa _ Ukamangaatem _ me a _ . _ ”
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ llangaqa _ llangaqa _ . _ ”
Ukamangaanpimalghii _ “ _ entaqun _ taananguunga _ ! _ ”
itegh ma lghii _ aagra mun _ .
ata ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe gkufsi _ yuug _ qaagna _ kelgugh luku _ angyaatagh ghhagh nka _ saamkut _ pilag yaghtugh nakesi _ ! _ ”
ata an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa kun _ tagi ma ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ qavangugh lunga _ ungazigh mi _ esnagh mi _ qavangugh ke anka _ angyagh t _ Sivuqaghhmiit _ .
taaggun _ uugte lunga _ tagi nga _ . _ ”
ata a _ ugpegh uq _ panig mineng _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ kelgugh aat _ yuug _ qamagte luku _ .
aghvegh k _ maalghug _ pilag ma kegket _ .
taawa _ nengigh uute ma kangit _ taawanginaq _ .
tefaay _ .
ungipaghagh an _ ukiivag mii t
iimnanguq _ ukiivag mii _ nuliigh leg _ , _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ .
nuliigh ni _ awen _ iiwleng _ qitegh aqe kanga _ .
ama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh _ aane ma lghii _ ugi a _ mughute ma luku _ .
aane luni _ , _ anigusighaqluni _ , _ megh k _ anigu meng _ kevigh ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ itegagh an _ asi i _ aghi ma kangi _ .
taagken _ apeghiigh yami _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yami _ , _ qulmesiite ni _ megh meng _ imigh ma kanga _ .
ama _ ugkelli ma lghii _ .
apeghiigh yami _ ugkelli nghmeng _ , _ qulmesiite ni _ agaghte ma kanga _ .
ama _ nanigh t _ qetngighqumakangi _ .
taagken _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ mulunghituq _ taglaamalghn _ .
kaate luni _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ unange ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ neghsagh _ taawa _ ! _ ”
nulighh a _ angegh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ aa-a _ ! _ ”
aghnagh m _ neghsagh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
ugi a _ efsughluni _ , _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yami _ , _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ , _ itegagh nka _ malliigh ki _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ ugi mi _ itegagh i _ alleg ma kangi _ .
yuug _ ayavisitamun _ aaghhe ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ atkug ni _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
taagken _ amsikaghte uq _ .
nulighh an _ pilugug i _ agaghte qugh ai _ .
apeghiigh yami _ , _ qayugh te aq _ saagllug qu _ , _ ugi ni _ neqlightugh ma kanga _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ , _ nuliigh mi _ kameg kek _ saafte ma kek _ .
saafte yagh ke gni _ , _ aghipate uk _ .
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa yamek _ kameg gken _ aghipate ak _ ?
awituwaq _ yug neng _ alla neng _ ugiigh aqe uten _ ! _ ”
“ _ waniwanllu _ , _ ugiigh igate unga _ !
taawanginaq _ megh k _ anigu meng _ kevigh lukek _ , _ itegh unga _ . _ ”
ugi an _ wanlegi _ nuliigh ni _ qitegh ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yamigu _ ingaghqulluteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ .
taghtugh luteng _ yuug _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghii _ .
kingu aneng _ aghnagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
pilugug luni _ , _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ siku gnun _ .
ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ megh mi _ tuqu yagh kuma _ , _ pinigh nayagh unga _ . _ ”
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
meghnugh nghmini _ aqfaate aqe luni _ , _ qenwat _ puqla yaagh ghqu ma lghii _ .
puqla yagh kete yami _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
meghnaali te kete luku _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ mengteghagh m llu _ esnagh m llu _ akulangani _ .
tawani _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
meghnaali yami _ , _ igleghte laatagh uq _ tumangani _ aqfaate aqe luni _ .
qenwat _ unug yaghtugh aa _ .
taagken _ aghuliigh laatagh uq _ .
esghagh yalghiimi _ neminitaqeftuq _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ kiyaghnegh m _ megh mi _ tuqu ste negh a _ ighleke aanga _ .
itupill _ qute mi _ tuqusqesimakanganga _ . _ ”
taagken _ sumeghtaghagh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ , _ ukiivag mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ alla _ sukate pigte luni _ ukiivag m _ qaye anun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ sagleghaghllak _ .
taaggun _ aghnagh _ aqume ma lghii _ .
tawani _ qiyaamalghii _ , _ nuna _ tukeghragh magh an _ .
nutaan _ ugi ni _ qitelquvinghaa _ neqagh te a _ .
Qiyam _ angtalanganeng _ repall _ aragh ma lghii _ .
qiya ma luku _ sagleghaghllak _ sivutmute _ aghelqute qaghte ma lghii _ .
Qiyaqestaghngaaghmi _ aghuliigh aghte ma lghii _ .
uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ paye k _ esghaghaak _ .
aghnagh _ nekeve luni _ paye gnun _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
qineghte luni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ qaame na nga _ mamleg ghllag uq _ .
tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ ama _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ qamavek _ ifkagh yagh kuma _ , _ tuqu nayagh unga _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ aqume luni _ paye gnun _ ighu gni _ kanaghte uute ma kek _ .
tesqamani _ saafte te naqutkesagh uq _ mingle aneng _ .
aghtugh yami _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ ifkagh langa _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
ifkagh yalghiimi _ kuyapegagh kun _ tuute ma lghii _ .
ifkagh vig a _ taana _ nenglu ghllag u uq _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ kiwatmiighsimalghii _ , _ talligh gni _ saagtaghllukek.aqfaataqluni _ .
qenwat _ egkugh anun _ kaate nghmeng _ aghtugh yami _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ una _ nenglukuniqegkegka _ entaqun _ nunaghllag u uq _ . _ ”
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
Nighuggaq _ aliigh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
Nighuggaq _ taana _ taku ma kanga _ .
Nighuggaq _ angli ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ mengteghagh llu _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
kaate ma lghii _ aghnagh _ mengteghagh ghrukutaaghllag mun _ .
taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nategh mi _ qiighw ma lghii _ .
ungavig ghllag neng _ nukalpigagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug luni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Saam _ aghnaqe aten _ ? _ ”
“ _ ukiivag mii u unga _ ! _ ”
“ _ qaywa _ tughneghaan- nghite ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ tughneghaan- nghite unga _ , _ yupig u unga _ !
Elpeg _ yeqay _ entaqun _ tughneghagh u uten _ . _ ”
yug m _ akite a _ , _ “ _ tughneghaan- nghite unga _ yupiggaagunga _ , _ yupiggaagunga _ !
Elpegngam _ sa qu ziin _ ukavek _ ? _ ”
“ _ ugi ma _ qitegh kanganga _ uglagh pigte luku _ ipagfigun _ tuqu na lunga _ pi yagh unga _ .
tuqu nghmeng _ aghtugh unga _ .
qenwat _ whaa _ tukughqagh leg nun _ ivagh i aqe unga _ . _ ”
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Walenqakun _ , _ taawa _ nulighqelleqamken _ !
enta _ itegh i _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Amsikaghlluten _ neqe meng _ aveg a _ !
negh ltung _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ amsikaghte uq _ .
Amsikaghhneghmeng _ taaqe luni _ qayugh te aq _ ketfagh aa _ .
taagken _ neqe meng _ avegtugh uq _ .
apeghiigh luni _ avegtughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
negh ma lghiik _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ , _ yug m _ aghnagh _ pi a _ , _ “ _ enta _ allighagh t _ saagtiki _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ allighagh t _ saagsimakangi _ .
taagken _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ taghtugh yamek _ , _ aghnagh _ ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ mughute aghte naqe unga _ qaya kun _ aghvegh leg nun _ .
aghvenge lunga _ tagi lleqe unga _ . _ ”
yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
ategh luni _ qaya ni _ ukigsimakanga _ .
ukigllug qu _ , _ aqume ma lghii _ qaya minun _ .
uunghagh ni _ tugu luku _ , _ mingle _ naghulleg yagh kete ni _ mingle _ quupaghte ma lghii _ .
quupaghte yalghiimi _ megh ghllag _ mingle meng _ itegh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ kete ma lghii _ , _ esla mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
Anqaghsan _ quupaghllak _ maame ma lghii _ , _ ama _ nategh _ megh i te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ ugi mi _ kingu aneng _ ukini ma lghii _ kameg neng _ .
iiwenllu _ aghnegh m _ qute kaghagh ke a _ , _ kameg k _ taaqe ma kek _ .
taaqe yamikek _ enraq _ ugkelli ma lghii _ .
gaagh ma lghii _ .
ugke t _ ugute yaki _ aqumesimakangi _ .
mulunghituq _ uvitanganeng _ mengqughte te ma lghii _ , _ ama _ megh ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ awituwaq _ ugi ka _ taglagh uq _ . _ ”
taagken _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ quupaghllagkun _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug yalghiimi _ aghvenge ma lghii _ .
aghvegh _ ii- u na ghllag an _ nategh mun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
Quupaghllak _ taana _ maame ma lghii _ .
nategh mi _ yug m _ aghvegh ghllag _ kagimte ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
aqsa nge luni _ ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ , _ taagken _ taghnughhagh nge ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh nghmini _ tungtu nge aqe lghii _ .
megh mun _ pi nghmini _ megh m _ teghig ke sagh a _ allaghhiinaq _ unake aqe kanga _ .
ama _ awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ tawani _ kiyaghte lghii _ .
taghnughhagh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ angli ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge laatagh uq _ , _ ighni yalghiimi _ aghnaghaghhagh meng _ .
taawa _ maalghugegnengtaghnughhangumalghiik _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ whavek _ tagi aghten _ .
kingunegh ten _ nagate yaghtuqagh ki _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ugi mi _ saaghw anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ nagate ma lghii _ .
nagaqugh te nghmeng _ aghtugh uq _ .
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ nakaa _ nagaquutaghneghhitunga _ . _ ”
“ _ aa-a _ ! _ ”
yug m _ nuliigh mi _ sigute kek _ suupataghaak _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ allamengminglemun _ sigute gken _ mategllug kek _ nagaten _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ sigute gni _ mingle mun _ mategsagh ke gni _ kingunegh ni _ atugh ghllag lghiit _ nagate ma kangi _ .
aghnagh _ qiya ma lghii _ ama _ aragh ma lghiit _ kingunghi _ eslallugughte te ni luteng _ .
taagken _ tawani _ qiya nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ amen _ nuna mnun _ aglagh naanghite unga _ .
luuraq llu _ nuna mnun _ kaate kuma _ ugi ma _ tuqu lleqe anga _ . _ ”
ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ “ _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ ”
akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma _ sa lunga _ pi langa _ ?
Tumanga _ whanga mni _ nallunaghtekanga _ . _ ”
“ _ enta _ kalngaggaak _ kumlu gpetun _ angka lghiik _ maalghug _ ulima kek _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kalngaggaak _ maalghug _ ulima ma kek _ .
apeghiigh yakek _ , _ ugi minun _ kelgute ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ awergha m _ allaghhiinam _ melqugh aneng _ imigh ma kek _ .
imigh nghmeng _ taaqe yamikek _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ piighhagh ngllagh a _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ piighhagh ngllagh ma lghii _ .
taaqe yami _ ugi minun _ kelgute laatagh aa _ .
ugi an _ piigh ghhagh kun _ kalngaggaak _ maalghug _ petug ma kek _ ama _ aghnagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whagun _ nategh m _ qukaa nun _ ukiggnaqamken _ .
enan _ kinguvneng _ mengteghagh llu _ maligte te naagh uq _ . _ ”
taagken _ nategh m _ qukaa nite ngughk _ sagleghaghllak _ awite ma kanga _ .
awite yagh kete ni _ paye ghllag k _ aliigh ma lghiik _ .
qaame na nga _ nighugh pigte lghii _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ pinitun _ negh lta _ aghulaqe vagilgavek _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ negh ma lghiik _ .
negh te kete luku _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taana _ aghnaghaghhagh _ elpek _ keveg aqe lleqe an _ .
whanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ keveg aqe lleqe aqa _ .
ama _ ungipaate naqe amken _ , _ ukiivag mi _ saama _ ugi n _ nulightugh ma uq _ aghnaghagh neng _ maalghug gneng _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii neng _ .
enekiitek _ vuvallaaqut _ , _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
Entaqunngam _ ukiggnaqamken _ .
enan _ mengteghagh _ kinguvneng _ maligte te naagh uq _ .
iiwen _ ugivek _ aapte naagh aaten _ , _ avelghaqiinagh naken _ .
sagiqe gkan _ pi naken _ , _ ‘ _ enan _ unaami _ ungipaate nagh amken _ . _ ’
iiwen _ nategh anun _ kaate kuvek _ uteghmun _ esghagh naagh uten _ .
mengteghagh _ esghagh lleqe an _ .
esghagh kuvgu _ piighhe aq _ ilemqughluku _ panike te lghiitek _ aglagh ghhaatek _ mengteghagh mun _ .
aglagh kuftek _ mengteghagh _ qelpeghtekufsigu _ , _ itegh kuftek _ signegh t _ maalghugneghet _ tugu lleqe aten _ .
tugu kufki _ ila kek _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ avegtugh te aqe lukek _ imigh lleqe agken _ .
Ugivek _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh u lleqe agken _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh at _ neghe lleqe ait _ .
taawa _ qamagte unga _ .
Ukiggnaqamsi _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ paye k _ suupe yagh ke gni _ anglu igh aatagh ma lghiik _ .
taakwagun _ payegnekun _ ukigsimakangit _ .
nuna mun _ tuute ma lghiik _ .
tuute yamek _ kalngag _ esghaghyaqeseng _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh _ tunutagh nge i te nun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
Aghnakpanikullghiik _ , _ qiivlutekaglaamalghiik _ .
kaate lutek _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh lutek _ aghnagh m _ signegh t _ maalghugneghet _ tugumakangek _ .
tugu luki _ ila kek _ quyngigh meng _ imigh ma kek _ , _ ila kek _ mangtag meng _ .
apeghiigh yamikek _ paniggani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ tawani _ utaqa nga _ .
ugi ka _ payugte naqe aqa _ , _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ . _ ”
panig an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ ugi minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ vuvallaaqeftut _ ama _ yugtu ghllagu uq _ .
atugh aqe ut _ aghula magh meng _ .
aghnagh _ aagra mun _ nuug yan _ qallegnanighwaaghusimalghiit _ .
taagken _ tawani _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ quulqite m _ qaye ani _ nuliigqek _ maalghug _ ingaghtaaghutaqeftuk _ .
aghnagh m _ ugi minun _ signegh k _ quyngigh meng _ imaqe lghiik _ tuune ma kek _ .
“ _ ang _ , _ ukuk _ naasiigh kek _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh gneng _ ataasigh _ avegtugh aq _ negh ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ nuliigh minun _ tuune ma kek _ .
sivuke luku _ nuliigh ni _ liisuqe mangite ma kanga _ .
nulighh an _ signegh k _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ yug nun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ uyegte ma kek _ avegtughagh t _ ataasikaghtaan _ .
Taawateghpigaq _ naama ma lghiik _ signegh k _ .
ila kek llu _ signegh k _ tugu ma kek _ mantagmeng _ imaqe lghiik _ .
tanemwha _ ugi minun _ tuunlaataghaak _ .
pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ enta _ ukuk llu _ naasighqek _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ ugi an _ signegh k _ mangtag meng _ imaqe lghiik _ tugu ak _ naasighlaataghaak _ .
avegtugh aq _ ataasigh _ neghe a _ .
taaqe yamigu _ nuliigh minun _ signegh k _ tuune ma kek _ .
nulighh an _ sughukagh nun _ tea- ma ghhagh anun _ uyegte ma kek _ .
tanemwha _ signegh m _ imagh a _ naama laatagh uq _ .
signegh t _ imaa igh te yata _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ mengteghagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ugi an _ yug lghute _ tamana _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Ukughsiy _ , _ entaqun _ aagna _ nulighhqagh ka _ ! _ ”
nuliigh ni _ aag llegh a _ ineqsunagh lleghpigagh a _ tugu ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ elpek _ ataveknaavek _ enngaatall _ panike nakangaten _ ! _ ”
Uwatmun _ ayagaghte ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ quulqite meng _ asitmun _ ifkagh ma lghii _ .
pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane yan _ yuug _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ Ukughsiy _ , _ entaqun _ aagna _ nulighhqagh ka _ , _ llangaqa _ nulighqa _ . _ ”
ila a llu _ nuliigh ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ uyuq _ elpek llu _ naavnun _ atavnun _ aglagh ghhaaten _ ! _ ”
yug m _ siinge ma kanga _ quulqite m _ qaye aneng _ asitmun _ .
ifkaghte laatagh aa _ .
aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ aane ma lghii _ .
yuug _ pilugug ma lghii _ enkaam _ aane ma lghii _ .
nutaghagh _ mengteghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tazingavek _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ nuliigh ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
nulighh an _ quyake ma kanga _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangaawa gmi _ taake uk _ aghnaghagh k _ ? _ ”
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga _ nulighqesaghagka _ . _ ”
yug m _ aapte a _ , _ “ _ elpek _ naken _ pi ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ unaami _ ungipaate naagh amken _ . _ ”
taagken _ aghnagh m _ qayugh te aq _ ketfagh luku _ ugi ni _ neqlightugh ma kanga _ .
ugi a _ negh ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ nulighh a _ alla igh i ma lghii _ nutaghagh u ta ghhagh inagh meng _ .
allighagh igh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ ingaghqulluteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ nulighh an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ pilugug i _ ungipaate naqe amken _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
enkaam _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
aanleghaate lutek _ ukiivag mun _ mayugh ma lghiik _ .
qaye anun _ uugte yalghiimek _ sagleghaghllak _ esghagh ma kangat _ saglegham _ saaghw ani _ maye ghllag t _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taawa _ ungipaate naqe amken _ , _ maye t _ ukut _ angegh qugh lteki _ mengteghagh mun _ . _ ”
ugi an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angegh qugh ait _ mengteghagh mun _ .
awergha _ allaghhiinaq _ amigh _ ila ke te nghite ngughk _ melqwa _ .
Unaghhaaneng _ angaghqugh aat _ unug llegh m _ kenlanga nun _ .
apeghiigh yameng _ aghnagh m _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ unaami _ nunalgutfut _ tamaghhagh an _ awergha meng _ tallimat ke aghtagh te _ uyegte naken _ amig ligh aqe luku _ ataasikaghtaan _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ angegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ iteghaatuk _ .
Iteghaallutek _ negh uk _ .
taagken _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh lutek _ , _ yug m _ nunalgute ni _ qamagte luku _ tuqlughteghumakanga _ .
taagken _ uyegte ma kanga _ amigh meng _ ataasikaghtaan _ awergha neng _ tallimat ke aghtagh te _ .
qamagte ma kanga _ mengteghagh _ tamaghhagh an _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pillugagh nanigh aa _ ama _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ut _ .
yuug _ neqengyughighllagtuq _ , _ ama _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
yaywaalingiighhagh ak
iimnanguq _ , _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ nayakutalghiik _ .
nayag an _ ategh a _ Taykengaawen _ , _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ ategh a _ Taykegergen _ .
nuna mi _ kiyaghte lghiit _ Nuutqami _ .
nunalgutetuqagh t _ ama _ umiileg leg t _ .
umiileg ita _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ piniqe pigte kek _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ igatiqe ma lghiit _ nuna lgu ta it _ .
katamqun _ umiileg at _ neqe leg _ .
taagken _ umiileg m _ nuliigh ni _ pimaqegkanga _ , _ “ _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ neqagh ghhagh meng _ tuunaghtaaqikek _ , _ salin _ esghaghhu _ kayaalnguuk _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nulighh an _ neqe meng _ aglagh te ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ negh kayugu ma lghiik _ igatiqe mangite ma lghiik _ .
nuna lgu ta it _ paneghaasimalghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ naten _ pi yagh kuma _ neqe meng _ tugu tete nayagh zinga _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ unaghsighwaaghmeng _ itghute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ savighhe ma kanga _ .
Tullumkeghlluku _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ neghqwaagh ghhagh _ tugutkuvinghaghhaq _ ulima ma kanga _ tugeghpaggaq _ .
taaqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tapghagh ghhagh meng _ ivagh i ma lghii _ .
naalkute yami _ unaghsighwaaghem _ iqug akun _ petug ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ asi anun _ uyghaggaq _ petug ma kanga _ .
taagken _ Taykegergen _ yataaghqe ma lghii _ .
nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qiiptaasigh meng _ taaqe te unga _ .
qiiptagh yagh naqe unga _ .
aghulaqe gkuma _ elpek _ siklagh yagh naagh uten _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw anun _ piitute leg nun _ . _ ”
taagken _ Taykegergen _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
sigugnegh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ anglaagh _ ukite naqe ma kanga _ .
ukite yamigu _ qiiptaasigh ni _ ateghte luku _ qiiptagh ma lghii _ elqwaagh meng _ .
nayag a _ Taykengaawen _ aane ma lghii _ .
alungutellegh m _ asi ani _ siklagh ma lghii _ .
siklagh luni _ piitute meng _ akugh ke tete te ma lghii _ .
taagken _ saghnaamaluku _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ratamiiragh kek _ qategh lghiik _ .
kaate luni _ Taykengaawen _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taykung _ , _ Taykung _ , _ whanga _ tugu yug aqe yagh amken _ ! _ ”
Taykengaawem _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ elpenun _ sumeghtaghanghitunganulighqesqellunga _ .
enmis _ aghulaqe i _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
pi yalghiimi _ qatelghii u uq _ .
taagken _ yuug _ ila a _ tagi ma lghii _ .
ratamiiragh kek _ kavilngugh k _ .
kaate luni _ yug m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taykuung _ , _ Taykuung _ , _ tugu na luten _ pi aqe yagh amken _ ! _ ”
Taykengaawem _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sumeghtaghagh nghite unga _ elpenun _ nulightugh u lunga _ !
enmis _ aghulaqe i _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
pi yalghiimi _ kaviipiggaaftuq _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
kiyaghte ma luku _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ tagneqegtagh meng _ atkug ke lghii _ .
yug m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taykung _ , _ Taykung _ , _ esghaqagh qu te _ ukavek _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Taykengaawem _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh luku _ iqlighte ma lghii _ .
allameng _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taykung _ , _ Taykung _ , _ ugi ke yukagh nghite zinga _ ? _ ”
Taykengaawen _ yaghlegi _ nenglagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Ete _ , _ ete _ . _ ”
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nengligh sqe nghite amken _ ipapik _ pi amken _ . _ ”
Taykengaawem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taawanginaq _ whanga nge i na nghite unga _ , _ anengagh lgu unga _ .
aamtaam _ ighleke kau yanga _ ugiigh naanghite unga _ .
aamtaam _ angegh kanganga _ ugiigh lleqe unga _ . _ ”
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wiin _ aghulaqe naqe unga _ .
enan _ anengagh an _ tagi kan _ whanga llu _ tagi naagh unga _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
Taykengaawen _ piitute meng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ saghnaamalghii _ .
taaqe luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ Taykegergen _ esnagh meng _ taglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
Qiiptaqengumalghii _ elqwaagh meng _ .
elqwaagh t _ qungangitgun _ maklag _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
itegh luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Qiiptaqengumanga _ elqwaagh meng _ .
elqwaagh t _ qungangitgun _ maklag meng _ qiiptaqengumanga _ . _ ”
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kay _ , _ walenqakun _ !
neghe lleqe ukung _ ighivgaghhaq _ ataasigh ghhagh _ . _ ”
taagken _ Taykengaawem _ maklag _ aflaamakanga _ .
Taykegergempimakanga _ , _ “ _ umiileg ut _ neqe meng _ aglagh te gu _ , _ elqwaagh meng _ unatagh meng _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Taykengaawem _ sagnegh ni _ neqe meng _ imigh ma kek _ elqwaagh meng _ ama _ unatagh meng _ .
taagken _ aglagh te ma kek _ umiileg m _ nulighh anun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ qamaken _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ “ _ kinangaawa _ ? _ ”
Taykengaawem _ akite ma kangi _ , _ “ _ whanga u unga _ , _ taawa _ neghyaghqagh ghhagh t _ . _ ”
umiileg m _ nulighh an _ nuug vike ma kanga _ .
aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kinku t _ neqenge aat _ ? _ ”
“ _ Taykegergen _ maklag meng _ qiiptaqengumalghii _ . _ ”
taagken _ aghnagh m _ sagnegh k _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ niive lukek _ Taykenaawemun _ tuune ma kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ Taykengaawem _ aglagh te ma kek _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ nategh meng _ kavleg u te ma lghii _ .
Taykegergem _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kinangaawa _ ? _ ”
yug m _ nategh meng _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga u unga _ . _ ”
“ _ Iitqaalten _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ aghneghniimna u uq _ .
itegh yan _ Taykegergem _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa qu ghllag ziin _ ? _ ”
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nayag n _ tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ .
Iiteg _ ’ _ qute _ ighleke nghite kuvgu _ enan _ nayag ka _ tugu nayagh an _ . _ ”
Taykengaawem _ Taykegergen _ aksaqe luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taykegur _ , _ angegh nakevnga _ ! _ ”
taagken _ yuug _ Taykegergem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghnagh aq _ umyugaleg u lghii _ angegh yug kuni _ ugiigh lleqe lghii _ . _ ”
taagken _ Taykengaawen _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ taawa _ ugiigh unga _ , _ ighsa nghite unga _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ Taykengaawen _ aglagh te naqe a _ .
Taykegergen _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ wiin _ ataasigh meng _ qavagh a _ .
unaami _ aglagh ghhaaten _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ tawani _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ nuliigh ni _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
yug m _ nayag a _ Taykegergemun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
Taykegergen _ nulightugh uq _ .
Taykegergen _ enngaatall _ unangyupiglleghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ Taykegergemun _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taykegur _ , _ seghleghunayanghista _ mengteghagh put _ qerngughte te yagh kumteki _ . _ ”
Taykegergem _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ pinigh nayagh ukut _ . _ ”
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ mengteghagh teng _ naafqe ma kangat _ .
naafqellug qu _ mesungesag m _ saaghw anun _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ mesungesag t _ tunuqagh itgun _ mengteghagh u ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yuug _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Taykegergen _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Taykegur _ , _ whangkunnun _ aglagh qagh a _ , _ esghapag yaghtuqagh nga _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Taykegergen _ ellngit nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ Taykengaawem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ugi ka _ esghapag ggu _ mughute naqe lghii _ . _ ”
yug m _ kameg ni _ tugu ma kanga _ .
tugu luku _ nuliigh minun _ tuune ma kanga _ .
“ _ Taykengaay _ , _ kaame ka _ piginegh igh ghhu _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Taykengaawem _ maklag m _ ungalghunganeng _ kameg a _ kanaghte vike ma kanga _ .
inglu a _ neghsagh m _ ungalghunganeng _ kanaghte vike ma kanga _ .
taagken _ yuug _ kameg ma lghii _ .
kameg luni _ nekeve yalghiimi _ aghenqignegh a _ itegagh a _ maklag stun _ puug ma lghii _ .
inglu a _ neghsagh stun _ puug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ esnagh mun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqume uq _ .
aqume yan _ maklag _ neghsagh _ nuugleghasimalghii _ .
taagken _ yug m _ savig mineng _ kenuqagh ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ maklag meng _ neghsagh meng _ taglagh qu uute ma lghiik _ mengteghagh megtenun _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
Taykegergenllu _ lli te i yalghiimi _ enngaatall _ unangyuughsimakanga _ .
teghig ke te yameng _ tea- ma ghhagh aneng _ aghtugh nanigh ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yug m _ tagi luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ “ _ unaami _ vuvallate lleqe ukut _ .
Ingluklighhamnneng _ kayaalqe i i ragh yagh ut _ tagi lleqe ut _ sanqutetuumagh meng _ .
tagi lleqe ut _ atungag meng _ tanpeghhmeng _ temkag meng _ tapghaghmeng _ .
ellngit a _ aghula stekaqe aat _ amiqluggaq _ .
aghula nghmini _ taawanginaq _ ilagaate inagh kun _ nalughqutagh aqe uq _ .
kayaalqe gkumikut _ sanqutamnneng _ wayagh lleqe ainkut _ . _ ”
taagken _ yuug _ mengteghagh minun _ aglaamalghn _ .
enngaatall _ Taykegergen _ nagaqugh luni _ qevuute luni _ alinge ma lghii _ inqun _ wayaghnayukangisteng _ .
unug yagu _ Taykegergen _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ uughqa nun _ esghagh yagh ma lghii _ .
agepsughtu aaghet _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
taku ma kangi _ .
kaate yagh kete ni _ nenglu u uq _ .
itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ nanevgagh ghllag llu _ aghnalwaaghllaklu _ esghaamakangek _ .
Nanevghaghllagem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa qu ziin _ ? _ ”
Taykegergem _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Apeghtiisqellunga _ tagi nga _ . _ ”
Nanevgaghllakpimalghii _ , _ “ _ enta _ apeghtugh laken _ !
taawanginaq _ aapte naqe amken _ , _ ingluklighhaghpesi _ aghulastengat _ naten _ pi yaghqau a _ ? _ ”
“ _ taawanginaq _ amiqluggaq _ nalughqutagh yaghqaa uq _ . _ ”
nanevgagh ghllag m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Aghnalqwaay _ , _ enta _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnalqwaam _ saguyaknanevgamun _ tuune ma kek _ .
nanevgagh m _ tugu ma kek _ .
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ nagu _ teghla ghllag _ ?
tea- ai _ whavek _ .
ilagagh te naqe amken _ ! _ ”
teghla ghllag _ nanevgagh m _ kaagkagh akun _ nalug ma lghii _ .
Nanevgaam _ ilagagh te ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ yangiyangaa _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ ”
teghla ghllag m _ yaqugh gni _ saagtaatamaagkenka _ tuye gni _ qapragsimakek _ .
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ qalghiqaamalghi _ .
Taagkennanevgaampimakanga _ , _ “ _ taawa _ apeghtugh amken _ !
aglagh ghhaaten _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Taykegergen _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ amsikaghlluni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unanguluku _ nayag an _ aqfaamakanga _ .
qineghte luni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nagu _ Taykegergen _ ? _ ”
Taykegergem _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whaante unga _ ! _ ”
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Whangkunnun _ aglagh a qaa _ !
ugi ka _ vuvallanaquq _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Taykegergen _ pilugug luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ inglu aneng _ qimugsigh lghute _ kaatqusimalghii _ atungag meng _ tapghaghmeng _ temkag meng _ tanpeghhmeng _ usi lug teng _ .
taagken _ tukugh ita _ itghute te ma kangit _ .
Vuvallalghiit _ sivuke luteng _ ilagagh ma lghiit _ .
taaqe yata _ aqelqagh it _ ilagagh ma lghiit _ .
llaaghanwha _ amiqluggaq _ keftaghluni _ nalughqutagh yalghiimi _ tamaani _ aqelqagh t _ kayaalqe i i ma lghiit _ .
Taykegergen _ ugumi yug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ enta _ saguyagh k _ tagivagh tekek _ !
whanga llu _ ilagagh qagh langa _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ saguyagh k _ tuune ma kegket _ .
Taykegergen _ kallagte ma lghii _ .
ilagaate ni _ puygu ma kanga _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ uuk _ , _ ilagaate ka _ puygu aqa _ !
Natungaawalli _ ? _ ”
nayag an _ aanqute ma kanga _ .
liisimake a _ , _ “ _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ year- nge i yanga _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ , _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ ”
Taykegergen _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ taawa _ taawa _ !
nagu _ aghula stekaghqagh ka _ teghla _ ? _ ”
teghla ghllag _ Taykegergem _ kaagkagh akun _ nalug ma lghii _ .
Taykegergen _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ayag nge i yu a _ , _ yangiyangaa _ , _ ayag nge i nga ai _ , _ yanga igh yu a _ ! _ ”
aga _ tuye gni _ qapragsimakek _ .
ilagaate _ naange yan _ qetgegh kau magh mi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
nanevgagh at _ aragh te ma lghiit _ .
“ _ Taykegergen _ kayaalqe i i uq _ ! _ ”
taagken _ Taykegergen _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghii _ ama _ aklungi igh i ghllag ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
Aghhaghhangaawraq
iimnanguq _ , _ yug t _ tallimat _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ ata leg t _ ama _ naa leg t _ .
maalghug _ mughute lutek _ iilaamalghiik _ .
ila a _ nunivag mun _ aghulaqe luni _ iflaamalghii _ .
ila a _ qayaghtu luni _ iflaamalghii _ .
aminaqe ma lghii _ ataasigh _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ unugmi _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh gpenaan _ qavaghni yami _ itegh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ nutaan _ nighuugtaghaghaqeftaa _ .
ata ni _ taghsasmakanga _ .
ata a _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qaya ghhagh ka _ amiiragh igh qagh ghhu _ ! _ ”
ata an _ yaghlegi _ qayugh a _ ayemqe ughtagh ma kanga _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ qaya ni _ qiyakumakanga _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraq _ uyuqlighpigaq _ .
ata an _ natmun _ pi sqe igate kanga _ , _ qayughllag _ ’ _ qute _ ataasighhaaghte lghii _ ila i _ ifla laghate te lghiit _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraq _ ellnginaghhaghmi _ lliigh lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ allameng _ unug yagu _ qayangllaamalghiil _ .
qayagh _ taaqe luku _ amiiragh igh aa _ .
amiiragh igh nghmeng _ taaqe luku _ a ta mi _ uunghagh i _ awataghpag i _ tegleg luki _ kete ma lghii _ .
kete luni _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ uyavaghqaaghaquq _ tagitug ughte ghllag ma kanga _ .
kete mun _ angwaagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ tagitugisimakanga _ .
tagitug ite yagh kete ni _ pennagh ghllag _ alighumakanga _ .
pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ ighu gni _ kulngaghllug kek _ , _ megh mun _ itegagh ni _ nepte luki _ , _ aqumga ragh aqe uq _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ tuqlumakanga _ , _ “ _ aagyuq _ tagi aghten _ ! _ ”
yuggagh m _ akite aghte mangite ma kanga _ .
yug ghrug qu ta ghllag m _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ iiwen _ evlug ughte ste lleqe aqa _ ! _ ”
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighu gni _ aghulate yagh ke gni _ evlug ughte ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ yuggagh _ alinge luni _ yugrukutaagh ghllag meng _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ .
“ _ yeqay _ iighariighaallutung _ ! _ ”
yuggagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ A-aa-aa _ ! _ ”
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ quneghten _ ! _ ”
yuggagh _ quneghte ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ neveghsimalghii _ .
Neveghsan _ yuggagh m _ ivamakanga _ .
“ _ nagu _ naantaqsin _ ? _ ”
yuggagh _ aqsa anun _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ tukagh ma lghii _ .
yuggagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ naqam _ aqsaute yu gnite a qaa _ . _ ”
yuggagh _ ukig ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ ukig aqe uq _ , _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ aqume ma lghii _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ whaante unga _ . _ ”
yuggagh m _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ quneghten _ . _ ”
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ quneghte ma lghii _ .
quneghte yan _ yuggagh _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ kameg anun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ yeqay _ tengug put _ negh lteki _ ! _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kanga _ “ _ wiintaku _ qaya ghhagh ka _ tugmaghsaghtuqaghlakun _ ! _ ”
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ qaya ghhagh minun _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
ellnga _ tumangani _ neghsaghtekalghii _ .
neghsaghtagh mi _ tengug i _ ighneghagh i _ nusug ma kangi _ .
nusug luki _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ qaligh ghhagh gni _ aate lukek _ atkug ni _ aate luku _ tafsi ma lghii _ .
tafsi luni _ neghsagh m _ ighneghagh ghhagh i _ qumig ma kangi _ .
qumig luki _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh yan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ neveghten _ . _ ”
yuggagh _ neveghsimalghii _ .
Neveghlluni _ utaqa i ma lghii _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ yuggagh m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
tengug i _ aliighte ma kangi _ .
yuggagh m _ atkug mi _ ilu anun _ tengug t _ qumig kaqe kangi _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ liigike mangite ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag _ tengug meng _ negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ yuggagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tengug ten _ llangaqa _ neghsagh m _ tengug i _ . _ ”
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whangkuta _ tengug put _ tawatete ut _ neghsaghpagnite aqe ut _ .
enta _ elpek llu _ neveghten _ !
“ _ llaaghanwha _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ neveghsimalghii _ .
Neveghsan _ yuggagh m _ savig ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ aqsa a _ segge ma kanga _ .
yugrukutaagh ghllag m _ ighneghagh i _ aliigh ma lghiit _ .
Ighsaqghwa _ kukeghqwaaqeftuq _ .
yuggagh m _ ighsaqghwa _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ .
maaten wha _ megh m _ evlug ughte mangite ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qaya ghhagh minun _ aglagh luni _ wata _ taagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
sukate luni _ qiighqagh kun _ tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ghhagh ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ uunghagh ghhagh ni _ awataghpag ni _ tugulagh luki _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ esla mi _ nanigh ghhagh _ kumangalghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
kiyaghte ma luku _ nuna m _ asi aneng _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ aragh magh mi _ tagi ma lghii _ .
nanigh ghhagh kun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ nughqaghsimalghii _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraq _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Aghhaghhangaawraay _ , _ Aghhaghhangaawraay _ qilu ten _ tagivagh ki _ sukate luki _ ! _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ neghsagh m _ qilu i _ tuune ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh _ agitaghte yalghiimi _ talwa _ qamaverugllak _ ggute ghllag _ .
qilu t _ negh luki _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
kalefkaghte luni _ allameng _ nughqaghsimalghii _ .
Nughqaghsan _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ kemagnagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ allamengnuugumalghii _ .
nuug luni _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Aghhaghhangaawraay _ , _ Aghhaghhangaawraay _ , _ ighsaqugh n _ tagivagh ghhu _ . _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangan _ , _ ighsaqugh ka _ tuunaanghitaqa _ !
ighsaqugh ka _ unguva sigh ke aqa _ , _ kiyaghtaaghusiqaqa _ sumeghtaghagh sigh ke aqa _ ! _ ”
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Aghhaghhangaawraay _ ,
Aghhaghhangaawraay _ iiwen _ neghe lleqe amken _ ! _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ agitaghten _ , _ agitaghten _ ! _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ uunghamineng _ naghulleg ma kanga _ .
tughneghagh- ghllag _ kalefkaghte ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t llu _ kalefkaghte ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ tumangakun _ maligte ma kangi _ .
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ malighqagh ma kangi _ awataghpag t _ nuughqaghte luteng _ kalefkaghte aqe luteng _ .
suna _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ mengteghagh mete te _ itqaghta _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ amig m _ saaghw ani _ utaqa ma kanga _ .
aagra mun _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ itegh ma lghii _ .
awataghpag t _ amig m _ eslatangani _ .
itegh luni _ tughneghagh- ghllag _ ngillegte ma lghii _ .
qama _ nulighh an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Natu _ aqnigh aqa _ ? _ ”
tughneghagh ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ aqsaqugh ka _ agrepemaa _ . _ ”
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ ila itnun _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ iightu ma lghii _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ tughneghaghhagek _ maalghug _ esghagh ma kek _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ iiyngitalghiik _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh k _ aapte ma ka ak _ , _ “ _ kaay _ !
kina u ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ whanga u unga _ . _ ”
“ _ kina _ elpek _ ? _ ”
“ _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ . _ ”
“ _ Aaa _ weni _ inga _ umiileg ut _ aqnigh aqe uq _ aqsa mineng _ .
langetaq _ aqfa lleqe aatnga _ . _ ”
nepiigh yan _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ sangaawa _ taana _ uyaqugh gpeni _ kumagllaguyengalghii _ ? _ ”
aghnalqwaagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ esghaqagh ghhu _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ taku ma kanga _ .
kaate luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ qeteghten _ ! _ ”
aghnalqwaagh _ qeteghte ma lghii _ .
qeteghte yan _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ ighsalqagh gkenkun _ nunugh yagh kete ni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ amiiragh ghhagh a _ qapigh ma kanga _ .
qapigh yamigu _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ aate ma kanga _ .
aate luku _ ellnga tun _ qiipimsugumalghii _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ yuug _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ naagu _ taana _ aghnalqwaagh _ ? _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taawa _ ! _ ”
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aqfa amken _ .
umiileg ut _ inga _ aqnigh aqe uq _ .
aglagh qagh a _ . _ ”
“ _ aglagh nayagh unga _ taawanginaq _ kayatepigtunga _ . _ ”
“ _ amagh laken _ . _ ”
“ _ aa-a _ ! _ ”
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ nekeve ma lghii _ .
nekeve yan _ yug m _ amagh ma kanga _ .
amagh yagh kete ni _ uqigtu uq _ .
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangavek _ uqigtughqaagaten _ ? _ ”
“ _ qayughllak _ qugili ghllag lghiinga _ , _ saama _ alignagh m _ . _ ”
yug m _ kaat ute ma kagh nge a _ mengteghagh ghllag mun _ .
itghute ma kanga _ .
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ aghnagh mi _ whani _ enta _ qaagna _ kelgugh ghhu _ .
qamagte luni _ taghnughhagh ke te luni _ tagi laghate li _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ kelgugh aa _ qamagte luku _ .
“ _ Taawaa _ qamagte aqa _ . _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ aqnigh lghii _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ qaanghani _ uunghagh _ ama _ aneghte aqe uq _ kenegh meng _ .
mulunghituq _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ tagi laghate te ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ iteghaatut _ nanevgagh ke te luteng _ aghnalqwaagh ke te luteng _ taghnughhagh ke te luteng _ leganqun _ qamagte luteng _ nuna lgu ta it _ .
Aghhaghhanaawraampimakangi _ , _ “ _ Entananiqqaamteggu _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ nanigh _ qaamllug qu _ nategh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ enta _ kayusigh tengnga _ .
kina _ ilagaate leg _ ilagaate mineng _ ilagagh li _ .
iiwen _ ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ temngi _ aragh li _ .
iiwen _ aanqute kuma _ aanqullghasi _ . _ ”
taagken _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ ilagaate meng _ aanqute uq _ .
tamana _ ellmeng _ ilagaate meggneng _ aanqute uq _ .
ilagagh ta ite ngughk _ aragh te ghllag uq _ .
aragh te ma luki _ Aghhaghhaawraam _ tughneghagh _ aqnigh lghii _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ tuqute ma kanga _ .
tuqute yamigu _ uunghagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ aanqaghte ma lghii _ eslate mun _ .
aanqaghte luni _ taagken _ qimag ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh t _ nepiigh aghtagh te ma lghiit _ .
nepiigh aghtagh te yata _ tughneghagh m _ nulighh an _ nanigh _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itghute luku _ kumaghsimakanga _ .
ugi ni _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tuquma lghii _ .
Anqaghlluteng _ Aghhaghhangawraq _ malighqagh ma kangat _ .
pi ma kangat _ , _ “ _ iitegʼun _ kaate kumken _ neghe lleqe kemken _ .
sangavek _ iqlengiqe ma ziin _ ? _ ”
Iwemga _ Aghhaghhangaawraam _ unite ma kangi _ .
qaya ghhagh ni _ aliigh ma kanga _ , _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qaya ghhagh _ , _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piiften _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ qaya ghhagh _ megh mun _ piifte ma lghii _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraq _ qaya minun _ kaa tuq _ .
uugte luni _ kete uq _ .
taagken _ tughneghagh t _ esnagh mun _ kaat quute ma lghii t _ .
tughneghagh t _ megh mun _ ateyiilnguut _ .
ataasigh m _ tughneghagh m _ megh _ megh ma kanga _ .
megh yagh kete ni _ Aghhaghhangaawraq _ tugneghaam _ qaanghanun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ qayaminilnguq _ tepluggaq _ tugu luku _ megh _ anagutagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ uteghte ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ tughneghagh m _ tugu mangite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nuna mun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tamlag luni _ qaya ni _ sayug ma kanga _ .
sayug luku _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ angayuqagh gni _ esghagh ma kek _ .
qagugh mig te lutek _ aqumga aqe uk _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qenwat _ tuqu ni luten _ pi aqe amken _ . _ ”
Aghhaghhangaawraam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nakaa _ , _ entaqun _ anglegute nka _ nallu te te meggneng _ tuqu laghate te ma ut _ .
maaten _ whanga _ uyavagh nun _ aghulaqe ghngaaghma _ kitum _ tuqute naanghite aanga _ .
whanga _ nanevgagh lunga _ tuqu lleqe unga _ . _ ”
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
ungipaghagh an _ Qigighhmiik
iimnanguq _ , _ Qigighhmiik _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ anglegutkullghiikyaywaalingiighhaak _ .
Qigightaq _ mengteghaghtu pigte lghii _ .
ama _ umiileg leg t _ .
umiileg at _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
awen _ iiwleng _ aghvenge aqe lghiit _ .
Aghvengenghaani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ esnagh mun _ atghaghaghaqelghiik _ .
kaate nghata _ umiileg m _ uqugh mun _ siingwaaghataghaqegkek _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava u na tek _ taglaamaqelghiik _ taawanginaq _ mesiigh mun _ angighte te lutek _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ mengteghagh mun _ taglagh nghaani _ esnagh mun _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ atghaamaqelghiik _ .
kaate negh meggni _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ ikugh qu te ma aqe lghiik _ ama _ kemekrag meng _ .
taglagh lutek _ kaate negh meggni _ nutaanneghumaaqelghiik _ .
ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aanenghani _ umiileg m _ siingwaaghataamaqegkanga _ .
taagken _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ maa nte kumtung _ tuqu lleqe ainkung _ .
upupeng _ qaya ngllagh lutung _ aghulaqelqung _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nayag an _ aanghumakanga _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya ngllagh ma lghii _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii neng _ .
qayagh _ taaqe yamigu _ tanpegh ghhagh ghhagh meng _ qemgughtilutek _ nayag ke te lghiik _ ilaghtuusimakangat _ .
taaqe yamegteki _ qayagh eng _ amigh ma kangat _ .
qaya ghrukutaaghllag _ maalghug gneng _ paye ke lghii _ taaqumakanagt _ .
Mekelghiighhaamnayaggani _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wiin _ maani _ ataasigh meng _ qavaa ltung _ .
unaami _ unanguluku _ mengteghagh ut _ naafqellug qu _ kellghakung _ . _ ”
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
unug yagu _ negh ma lghiik _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te ma lghiik _ .
taagken _ unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ mengteghagh eng _ naafqumakanat _ .
Unangupiglluku _ kete ma lghiik _ .
ukiivag m _ tunganganun _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ aghnelqusiq _ .
unug yagu _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ qalpeghlluku _ angwaagh ma lghiik _ ukiivag mun _ .
meghnugh yamek _ qayagh eng _ uyghigh luku _ angyataghquumalghiik _ .
taagken _ negh ma lghiik _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uyughagh ni _ atugh te ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qaya mini _ nalughqutagh ma lghii _ .
Meghnunghyami _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ angwaagh ltung _ . _ ”
nayag an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ angwaagh uk _ .
unug yagu _ uyghigh laatagh uk _ .
uyghigh lutek _ qayagh eng _ maghqate te luku _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ angwaagh aqe lghiik _ aghnelqusiq _ .
aghnegh m _ qukaghyag u _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ enta _ negh ltung _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghuliigh lutek _ qayagh ek _ uyghigh luku _ negh uk _ .
taaqe yamek _ nayag ni _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ enta _ ataasigh meng _ atugh te nga _ , _ aghula naqe unga _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ atugh te luku _ nayag an _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aghula ma lghii _ .
meghnugh yami _ taaqe luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ uyghin _ amu gu _ .
angwaagh ltung _ ! _ ”
nayag an _ uyghin _ amu ma kanga _ , _ enkaam _ angwaagh uk _ .
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ nuna _ aliigh ma kangat _ .
taagken _ taku ma kangat _ .
sukate luni _ nuna _ angli ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghiik _ .
arekull _ ukiivag mun _ kaate aqe uk _ .
qute mun _ uglleghaasimalghiik _ .
qayagh eng _ sayug ma ka ak _ .
sayug luku _ aawghsimakangak _ .
mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghiik _ .
Sivulighpigaghteggun _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
Iteghaasamekmekelghiighhaq _ qiighw ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ ineqsunagh ghllag lghii _ aagra meng _ nuug ma lghii _ .
aleghqugh yalghiimi _ qaghitumraagllaguftuq _ , _ “ _ Kaaay _ , _ saam _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ ?
maani _ aviite usi _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Qigighhmiinguukung _ . _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ sa kun _ tagi stek _ ? _ ”
“ _ qaya kun _ tagi kung _ .
Qayughllaknunamnni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ , _ enngaatall _ umiileg ut _ seghlegh pigu uq _ , _ naqam _ aghvenge yu pigte uq _ .
Aghvengenghani _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ ama _ uqugh mun _ siingvagataghaqiinkung _ .
llaaghanwha _ ava ngunaamtung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ mengteghagh mnnun _ .
kaate negh mtung _ sa meng _ negh ltung _ .
taawanginaq _ igatagh lutung _ kiyaghte aqe lghiikung _ .
wetku _ umiileg _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aqe lghiikung _ .
pilagkagh meng _ ikugh qu te aqe lghiikung _ .
enkaam _ taglagh aqe lghiikung _ .
taglagh negh mtung _ wetku _ negh aqe lghiikung _ .
Enkaamam _ tea- ma ken _ ukavek _ tagi kung _ tuqute na yu kanginkung _ . _ ”
aghnagh ghllag _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ enkaampimalghii _ , _ “ _ waran wha _ avaqutagh ke lleqe amtek _ .
qamavek _ aagra mun _ itegh tek _ .
asangsi _ ugi ka _ tagi kuni _ qevuute luni _ quya lleqe uq _ . _ ”
Iteghasimalghiik _ aagra mun _ .
aghnagh m _ ugi mineng _ utaqa i te kete luku _ neqlightugh ma kek _ .
negh ma lukek _ sama _ ugi a _ kavleg u uute ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ qelamakanga _ , _ “ _ Av _ ? _ ”
“ _ whaante unga _ . _ ”
yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ esghapag ma kek _ .
yaghlegi _ nuliigh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saam _ ukuk _ taghnughhagh ke akek _ ? _ ”
nulighh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ entaqun _ elpeneng _ aapte aghte kek _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ aapte ma kek _ , _ “ _ Saam _ taghnughhagh ke istek _ ” _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Qigighhmiinguukung _ , _ yaywaali u ukung _ , _ ata ite ukung _ , _ naa ite ukung _ .
ukavek _ tukughqagh ghhagh leg nun _ ivagh i u kung _ nani _ inqun _ pinitun _ kiyaghte na lutung _ .
qayughllak _ nuna mnni _ seghletun _ kiyaghte lghiikung _ .
umiileg ut _ enngaatall _ seghlegh pigu uq _ . _ ”
yug m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ naten _ kiyaghte aqa _ ? _ ”
“ _ Aghvengenghani _ esnagh mun _ atghagh negh mtung _ neqe mun _ mesiigh mun _ siingwaaghataghaqiinkung _ .
llaaghanwha _ avangunamtung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ .
umiileg _ wetku _ taglagh nghaani _ itagnatun _ esnagh mun _ atghagh aqe ukung _ .
atghagh negh mtung _ pilagkagh meng _ ikugh kete te lutung _ taglagh aqe ukung _ .
taglagh negh mtung _ wetku _ tawani _ negh aqe ukung _ .
Aanʼgiimalutungllu _ umiileg m _ esghagh nghminikung _ siingwaaghataghaqiinkung _ .
qenwat _ tuqute na yu kanginkung _ tagi ukung _ . _ ”
nepiigh yan _ yuug llu _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ qiyaghusimalghiik _ .
yug m _ aaplataghii _ , _ “ _ atatagh nge istek _ ama _ asagistek _ ? _ ”
“ _ avangite ukung _ .
taawanginaq _ nunalgutete ukung _ , _ alla u ut _ . _ ”
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ waran wha _ avaqutagh nge ukut _ .
elpek _ angayuqagh ten _ aqfa ki _ ! _ ”
nulighh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nulighh a _ pilugug ma lghii _ , _ aane luni _ angayuqagh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ ugi ma _ aglaqugh ii sqe aisi _ , _ inqun _ ungipaghaghyaghtiisqellusi _ . _ ”
Nanevgaam _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ aglagh naqe ukut _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ aane luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
itegh yan _ ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ ? _ ”
“ _ qaywa _ , _ tagi naqe ut _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulu nghite uk _ nanevgaghhavaklu _ aghnalqwaagh ghllag llu _ iteghaasimalghiik _ .
Iteghaasata _ yug m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ whanga _ tuqlugh aqe amsi _ inqun _ ungipaghiisqellusi _ .
Qigighhmiik _ kaate ma uk _ taghnughhagh k _ naa ite ngugh k _ , _ ata ite ngugh k _ .
enngaatall _ pellagh yug lutek _ aqumga lghiik _ . _ ”
nanevgagh ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ enta _ , _ ungipaghagh langa _ .
iimnanguq _ , _ ukuk _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ naa it _ ata it _ whanga _ uyvala luki _ tuqu qu ma anka _ .
tefaay _ ! _ ”
enkaam _ nanevgagh ghllag llu _ aghnalqwaagh ghllag llu _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
yaghlegi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ milegpagtaasimalghiik _ .
Yugemnuliini _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Awimam _ angayuqagh gken _ nanglleg ke lleqe keten _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga _ iitek _ angayuqagh nka _ nanglleg ke naanghite anka _ .
talwa _ sangighhaghmeng _ mekestaaghhaa luku _ tuunaanghitanka _ .
elpek _ awituwaq _ saki ten _ nanglleg ke lleqe keten _ ? _ ”
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ asangsi _ whanga _ nanglleg ke naanghite anka _ ! _ ”
nuliigh ni _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ “ _ enta _ whanga _ angayuqagh nka _ aqfa aghte ki _ .
Tagighllinnguq _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh lit _ .
Aqelqatnagasugtut _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ pilugug luni _ aane uq _ .
ugi mi _ angayuqagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ ugi mi _ angayuqagh kek _ ungipaate ma kek _ , _ “ _ ugi ma _ aqfa sqe aisi _ aglagh qagh tek nguq _ ungipaghagh yaghtugh tek _ . _ ”
nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghlqwaaghllaklu _ angegh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qaywa _ qaywa _ aglagh naqe ukung _ ! _ ”
aglagh yan _ aghnagh _ ugi an _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ ? _ ”
“ _ tagi naqe uk _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ amsikaghte ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh llu _ nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ iteghaasimalghiik _ .
yug k _ pi te ma lghiik _ , _ “ _ whanga _ aqfa ste aqe amsi _ inqun _ aqelqagh k _ pellagh yug lghiik _ ungipaghagh te sqellug kek _ .
nuliigh ma _ angayuqagh kek _ tagiyagh uk _ .
nanevgagh ghllag m _ yaghlegi _ taghnughhagh ghhagh k _ milegmiqe ak _ .
Ellngannguq _ uyvala lukek _ tuqu qu mafte ak _ angayuqagh kek _ . _ ”
yuug _ nepiigh yan _ nanevgagh ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ enta _ ungipaghagh langa _ . _ ”
“ _ iimnanguq _ , _ nunatagh mii t _ mengteghagh t _ malghugnegh ghhagh t _ .
ataasigh mi _ mengteghagh mi _ kiyaghte lghiik _ yuug llu _ aghnagh llu _ nulighh ghqu te ii na lghiik _ .
ilangani _ mengteghagh ni _ kiyaghte lghiik _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh llu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ nengyugh ke te lghiik _ eltugh aqe te lghiik _ .
yuug _ unangyupiglleghii _ .
naqam _ neqete nghmini _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ neqe meng _ awaligh aqe kanga _ .
