enngaatall _ aghnalwaaghhaqlu _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ pinitun _ yug m _ kiyaghtesimakek _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ .
eltughagh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ ‘ _ aqnigh yagh kuma _ ! _ ’ _ eltughagh ghhagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ ‘ _ sangavek _ ? _ ’ _ ‘ _ qayughllak _ unguva nghmeng _ qinuyagute unga _ .
qemall _ aqnigh lunga _ tuqu yagh kuma _ aghnagh _ iigna _ aqfa nayagh an _ enkaam _ ughvughqennayaghanga _ .
ughvughqe i na ma lunga _ iiggagh aneng _ taagken _ ifla nayagh unga _ .
qemall _ aghnagh kun _ tagi nayagh unga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh u lunga _ . _ ’ _ ‘ _ neghe pigesnagh na luten _ ! _ ’ _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ ‘ _ Qayughllakkiyaghhneghmeng _ qinuyagute unga _ ! _ ’ _ nepiigh luni _ aqniima lghii _ .
Aqniimalghi _ , _ aqniima lghii _ .
maalghug gneng _ qavagh luni _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ tuquma lghii _ .
tuqu yan _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aghnagh _ aqfa yaghtugh ma kanga _ .
aane luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ nunalgute minun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aagra meng _ aghnagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
aapte ma kanga _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ , _ ‘ _ Saqwaaghsin _ ? _ ’
‘ _ nengyugh ghhagh ka _ tuquma uq _ , _ inqun _ ughvughqe aghte sqellug qu _ aqfa amken _ . _ ’
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ ‘ _ qaywa _ aglagh naqe unga _ , _ utaqa nga _ ! _ ’
enkaam _ aglagh ma lghiik _ mengteghagh mun _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aghnagh m _ ughvughqe ma kanga _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aghnagh m _ iiggagh aneng _ kuuve ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ wata _ ughvughqe ma kanga _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ qenwat _ iigge stun _ angkaliigh uq _ .
taawa _ aghnagh m _ ughvughqe a _ .
qenwat _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ iiggagh aneng _ ifla uq _ .
ifla yan _ aghnagh m _ signegh k _ kuuve yaghtugh ma kek _ .
kuuve lukek _ mekelghiigh ghhagh mun _ tuune ma kek _ .
aghnagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
kaate luni _ iiteghluni _ ugi a _ puuru _ aane luni _ mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yug m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ ‘ _ mengteghagh n _ naafqellug qu _ whangkunnun _ aglagh a _ . _ ’ _ mekelghiigh _ yug m _ pillghaatun _ pi ma lghii _ .
mulunghituq _ yug m _ nulighh a _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ atigh ma kanga _ aghnalqwaagh meng _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ qavaghhinaghqun _ angli uq _ .
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aaghwte uq _ .
qavagh luteng _ taghtugh yalghiimeng _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ piyug yaaghte ma lghii _ .
allameng _ qavagh luteng _ taghtugh yalghiimeng _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ akuzi yagute ma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sukate luni _ angli uq _ .
ategh a _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
qenwat _ qawaagte yagute uq _ .
yaywaali ngiighhagh nkuk _ taamllu _ yug m _ ighnegh a _ mughute aqe lghiik _ .
mughute negh megteni _ unange aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ ivagh i nigh ughte ngughte uk _ .
puuru _ yuug _ mughute nanigh uq _ .
ama _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiit _ .
tefaay _ !
taawa _ ungipaghagh unga _ . _ ”
nanevgagh _ ungipaghagh nghmeng _ taaqe yan _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ negh lta _ !
neqnigh lghii meng _ neqe meng _ itghuten _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ neqe meng _ neqnigh lghii meng _ allaghhinaghmeng _ itghute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ negh ma lghiit _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yata _ aghnalghwaaghhaqlu _ nanevgagh ghhagh llu _ aanleghaate ma lghiik _ .
Aglaamalghiikmengteghameggnun _ .
unug yagu _ aghnagh m _ allighagh t _ saagsimakangi _ .
ingaghte uute luteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ taghtughyamengaghnamkalngani _ itghute ma kanga _ .
Itghusamigupiluguget _ maalghugneghet _ nusug ma kangi _ ila i _ agha m _ pilugug i _ , _ ila i _ yug m _ pilugug i _ .
taagken _ mekelghiigh ghhagh llu _ aghnaghaghhagh llu _ pilugug luni _ aane ma lghiik _ .
enngaatall _ yaywaalingiighhagh ak _ pinitun _ lliigh uk _ ama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
angli yata _ yug m _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aghnaghagh meng _ ineqsunagh pigte lghii meng _ nulightughtesimakanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ yuukegte pigte lghii meng _ ugiightesimakanga _ .
taawa _ piitim _ kiyaghte yagute ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ !
ungipaghagh an _ Yaqellengetaq
iimnanguq _ yaqellengetaak _ naa ke te lghiik _ .
nuna m _ asinganilnguuk _ yug stun _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
ighnegh a _ alignagh lghii _ .
aghneq _ tamaghhagh an _ ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ aneghte aqe lghii _ , _ “ _ Iiyhii-hii-hi-hiiy _ , _ Tengagergentuq _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ nulighh igh yaghtugh kegka _ ! _ ”
naa an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tengagergete _ aange ghllag uq _ nagaqugh lleqe aaten _ .
nepiigh i _ !
ellnga n _ ulima aqe ainkut _ whangkuta _ .
naagu mi _ ikiwan _ qaaynganilnguum _ nateghqagh meggnun _ angighhe te aqe kanginkut _ . _ ”
ighnegh an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ gaymaangi _ nuliighhighnaqaqa _ . _ ”
ayumigh _ apegh aqe aat _ angegh ghllag lghii _ ighaleqetaagh ghllag _ aghtaghaam _ tunganganilnguq _ ategh a _ tengagergete _ .
ayumigh _ waamseghaghtet _ yugu na iqe aat _ .
whangkuta nge uq _ Tengagergem _ ulima aqe ainkut _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ yaqellengetaq _ aane luni _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ vegtagh ma lghii _ .
vegtagh luni _ vegaagh t _ ratamiiragnekun _ qantagh luki _ itghute ma kangi _ .
itghute luki _ piighhe ma kangi _ .
apeghiigh yamiki _ akmag ma kangi _ .
akmag luki _ aghulaqumsimakangi _ .
Tengagergemun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
paye gnun _ kaate ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uugte ma lghii _ .
uugte yalghiimi _ mengteghagh t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ .
taagken _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aagra m _ ila aneng _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ “ _ kinangaawa _ ? _ ”
Yaqellengetaam _ akite ma kangi _ , _ “ _ whanga nge unga _ . _ ”
“ _ kina _ elpek _ ? _ ”
“ _ Yaqellengetaq _ . _ ”
Tengagergem _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa qu ziin _ ? _ ”
Yaqellengetaam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nulighh igh yaghtugh amken _ ! _ ”
“ _ Ukaku _ nalleghiite uten _ !
enta _ itegh i _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yaqellengetaq _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Tengagergemnulighqekmaalghuguftuk _ , _ ataasigh _ unugempaniga _ , _ ila a _ siqinghem _ panig a _ .
Yaqellengetaq _ siqinghem _ panig an _ saaghw anun _ ineqsunagh llegh akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
Tengagergem _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ ugi kaghqagh n _ neqlightugh ghhu _ ! _ ”
Siqinghem _ panig a _ sagleghegneng _ tugu tete luni _ nategh mun _ ategh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ siinu mi _ kavlegtagh uq _ .
kavlegtagh luni _ itegh uq _ .
itegh luni _ sagnegh k _ kanagh ak _ .
“ _ taawa _ sagnegh k _ . _ ”
Yaqellengetaam _ sagnegh k _ esghagh yagh ke gni _ melngu meng _ imaqefuk _ .
Yaqellengetaam _ tugu lukek _ megh ma kek _ .
taagken _ tengagergete _ ilagagh naqe ma lghii _ .
unug yagu _ nanigh _ awite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ tengagergete _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh- ni _ qagi t _ tuqlugh ma kangi _ .
tughneghagh i _ qagi t _ tagi ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ amig kun _ itegh ma lghiit _ .
aagra at _ megh ughte ghllag ma lghii _ .
taagken _ aane ma lghiit _ .
aane yata _ tengagergete _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ enta _ nighug u te aghte tek _ .
imatuq llu _ yaqellengetaam _ yaqugh kek _ nevuute akek _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nighug u te ma lghiit _ .
Yaqellengetaq _ qavagh aqe uq _ .
taagken _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ .
tughneghagh- ni _ nanugh _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ .
tagi yalghiimi _ aglu kek _ mengqughtagh ma lghiik _ .
mengqughtagh lutek _ nanugh _ aane ma lghii _ .
tengagergete _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ allameng _ kumagh qagh tek _ . _ ”
kumaghsagh lghii meng _ yaqellengetaq _ qavagh aqe uq _ , _ nanugh m _ negh mangite ma kanga _ .
taagken _ yaqellengetaq _ aqume ma lghii _ ama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ enta _ whanga llu _ ilagagh qagh langa _ . _ ”
taagken _ allameng _ kumaghsagh lghii meng _ tengagergete _ pilugug aqe uq _ .
Yaqellengetaqlu _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tengagergete _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane yan _ yaqellengetaam _ siqinghem _ panig a _ pilugug sqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ aane ma lghiik _ .
Yaqellengetaam _ siqinghem _ panig a _ paye gnun _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
kaat ute te luku _ vegaagh meng _ piighhagh mineng _ uyatu i ma kanga _ .
asitmun _ ukigsimakanga _ .
taagken _ ellnga llu _ ukig ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yaqellengetaq _ nulightugh uq _ .
taagken _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
Unanguluku _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ .
Yaqellengetaq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ tengagergete _ nuliigh leg nun _ tagi naqe uq _ . _ ”
taagken _ negh ma lghiit _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ yaqellengetaq _ aane ma lghii _ esla mun _ .
aane luni _ anigu _ aghnangllagh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ taaqe luku _ siinu mun _ kanaghte ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ iiwen _ tengagergete _ tagi kan _ tuqlugh kumken _ neqe meng _ itghute lghaaten _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ tengagergete _ ukig ma lghii _ .
ukig luni _ yaqellengetaghmun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ “ _ kinangaawa _ ? _ ”
Tengagergem _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga nge unga _ . _ ”
Yaqellengetaam _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ kina _ elpek _ ? _ ”
“ _ tengagergete _ ! _ ”
“ _ Iitqaalten _ ! _ ”
taagken _ tengagergete _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ yaqellengetaq _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ saamyuq _ neqe meng _ tagi te n _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ anigu _ aghnagh _ neqe meng _ iitghute ma lghii _ .
taagken _ negh ma lghiit _ .
Tengagergem _ aghnagh _ esghayaqenni _ nuliigh mineng _ pinigh aghagh lghii _ .
Yaqellengetaampimakanga _ , _ “ _ nulighh n _ aglagh te yu nghite te yagh kuvgu _ nayag ka _ tugu nayagh an _ .
iiwen _ nulighh n _ aglagh te yu kuvgu _ aglagh te gu _ umyugagh gpetun _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ Tengagergem _ anigu kuvinghagh _ aghnagh _ aglagh te naqe a _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe luteng _ Tengagergem _ anigu kuvinghagh _ aghnagh _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
vuvalla a _ Ayapeghyugem
vuvalla m _ sanqutangi _ sivuligh _ qaligh k _ , _ signegh t _ , _ qaltaghwaagh k _ , _ aghqe sigh ghhagh k _ tughneghagh nun _ , _ saguyagh k _ , _ tagnegh lghii _ nanigh ghhagh _ kumangalghii _ .
vuvalla m _ yug a _ unanguluku _ pi nga yu mi _ kellaag gni _ nekegte aqe aat _ vuvalla _ .
taaqe nghmegteggu _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ aane aqe uq _ esla mun _ .
Kiyaghtalleghmun _ kelgute aqe uq _ mumegh meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ nalighmeng _ aquutagh meng _ .
aragh aqe uq _ , _ “ _ Wu-huu-huu-huu-uu _ , _ wu-huu-huu-huu-uu _ , _ wu-huu-uu _ , _ wu-huu-uu _ ! _ ”
taagken _ vuvalla m _ yug a _ ategh aqe uq _ nategh mun _ .
nuliigh ni _ pi aqe a _ , _ “ _ enta _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ ! _ ”
nulighh an _ tuune aqe ak _ .
Kaagtuusimagkenka _ uzive aqe uq _ ilagagh aqe uq _ uzive te kete luku _ .
ilagagh nghmeng _ taaqe nghmini _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ pi aqe ai _ , _ “ _ qaagna _ nanevgagh _ ungipaate qugh teggu _ .
legan _ whaten _ pi nakesi _ , _ ‘ _ Wu-wuu-u-huu-uu _ , _ wu-wu-u-huu-uu _ , _ neghsagh yagh i uute usi _ , _ pugnegh yagh i uute usi _ , _ iqallug yagh i uute usi _ , _ tengug yagh i uute usi _ , _ akutaghyaghiitusi _ .
Ayapeghyuk _ vuvallaaq _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh ghhagh t _ avii yaghtugh aqe ut _ mengteghagh nun _ tamaghhanun _ nanevgagh at _ aghnalqwaagh t _ .
aapte aqe ait _ , _ “ _ navek _ ? _ ”
pi aqe ut _ , _ “ _ Ayapeghyugmun _ ! _ ”
nanevgagh at _ aglagh uute aqe ut _ vuvallalghiinun _ negh na luteng _ qetustaaghhagh meng _ .
tawani _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ kayalqiiraaghutaqut _ saama _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ vuvallamaluki _ alla nun _ neqe meng _ sanqutaaghmeng _ tuune i naagh nghite ngugh t _ .
aghtaghagh nghagu _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
Vuvallalghiit _ ateghaate aqe ut _ nategh mun _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ iiwen _ kinku t _ tawavek _ ila tke aat _ .
ilate naqe negh meggni _ mengteghagh meggneng _ tugutagh ke ut _ tawaqa meng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ivalu meng _ inqun _ vuvallalghiit _ mengteghagh it _ qilleghte vike na luki _ .
Unanguluku _ ungipaghagh te aqe ut _ ungipamsug te aqe ut _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ negh te aqe ut _ siqinghem _ piite llegh anun _ kenle anun _ .
siqinegh _ piite nghaani _ nanevgagh at _ aanleghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t _ unegte aqe ut _ .
nategh mun _ ateghaate aqe ut _ aghnalqwaagh t llu _ vuvallalghiitlu _ .
ateghaate negh meggni _ quyngiiraateng _ tugulagh aqe ait _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqe meng _ ikute uute aqe ut _ .
esla mun _ aane aqe negh meggni _ quyngiiraateng _ llivikughaqiit _ .
aanleghaate luteng _ milugh qutagh aqe ut _ tughneghagh nun _ kiyaghtaalleghmun _ megh m _ yug anun _ .
Taqneghmeggni _ iteghaataqut _ .
Iteghalluteng _ aghnalqwaagh t _ uyegte aqe ai _ ataasigh m _ aghnalqwaagh m _ .
taaqe nghatki _ vuvallaleknuliighminun _ saguyagh gni _ tungsigh aqe ak _ .
nulighh an _ saguyagh k _ tuune aqe ak _ .
vuvalla legte aq _ uzive aqe uq _ .
iiwen _ vuvalla yaghtuqagh t _ iiwen _ avaquti a _ .
ellnga _ vuvalla legte aq _ saguyagtuumaghmi _ uzive aqe uq _ .
Nanevgaam _ ilagagh te aqe a _ utuqa meng _ ilagagh ta meng _ .
vuvalla legte aq _ avii aqe uq _ , _ “ _ Wuhuuuu _ , _ wuhuuuu _ , _ wuhuuuu _ ! _ ”
ilagaate _ naangenghani _ uzive lghiit _ aghuliigh aqe ut _ .
aghuliigh nghata _ vuvalla legtagh m _ kallagte te aqe ai _ .
aghnagh t _ putuugh te aqe ut _ iiwen _ kitum _ ata a _ naten _ pi aqa _ yug a _ .
taana _ aghulasigh ke aqe aat _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tungtu ghllag _ enkaam _ Kavengenghaghhaq
iimnanguq _ , _ tungtu ghllag _ esnagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ kayengenghaghhagh _ .
Kayengenghaghhaamaghivamakanga _ , _ “ _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ amestaghhaak _ , _ talligh kek _ amestaghhaak _ . _ ”
tungtu ghllag m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Kayengenghaghhaay _ , _ kayengenghaaghhaay _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ ”
Kayengeghaghhaq _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ eglleghsimakanga _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ ”
itagnatun _ tungtu ghllag m _ kayengenghaghhagh _ megh mun _ ateghte ma kanga _ .
Kayengenghaghhaam _ tungtu ghllag _ aghiva laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ tungtu _ paagna _ aqsa allugh _ , _ tungtu _ paagna _ sighunegh allugh _ , _ ighu kek _ amestaghhaak _ , _ talligh kek _ amestaghhaak _ . _ ”
tungtu ghllag m _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ “ _ Kayengenghaghhaay _ , _ kayengenghaaghhaay _ ukapighqaagh i _ !
whanga _ nagaqugh nghite unga _ . _ ”
Kayengeghaghhaq _ ukapighqaagh ma lghii _ .
tungtu ghllag m _ ipug aghte ma kanga _ sighunegh mineng _ enkaam _ eglleghsimakanga _ esnagh mun _ .
kayengenghaghhagh _ aragh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ uvinke a _ tukrug a _ , _ papasqugh ka _ tukrug a _ qanegh ka _ tukrug a _ , _ metengtagh nka _ tukrugtagh i _ ! _ ”
tuquma lghii _ tukruughqwaayaqenni _ .
Tukruughq _ waayan _ tungtu ghllag m _ negh ma kanga _ .
tungtu ghllag _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ kayengenghaghhagh _ taana _ neqnirkapiggaq _ . _ ”
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
nuna meng _ uzive ikagh _ paallghu nkuk _ ama _ Qetngalleghyankuk
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ kumag _ umiileg _ qamarilakayuk _ .
ilangani _ kiig m _ kumag m _ nunalgute ni _ pi ma kangi _ paallghu nkut _ , _ qetngalleghyankut _ apayepayiigh nkut _ ama _ melngu nkut _ .
pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Qamarilanaqunga _ !
Qemgughutek _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ kumag m _ mengteghagh an _ saaghw anun _ .
taagken _ qamarila m _ ayaviigh a _ kingutagh leg _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
kumag m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ elpek tek _ qetngalleghyaqlu _ paallghu llu _ nuna _ uzive teggu _ .
elpek tek _ melngu llu _ apayepayiigh llu _ naayghagh _ uzive teggu _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aga _ kilgaquusimalghiik _ qetngalleghyankuk _ paallghu nkuk _ .
pengughqagh meng _ talughte yamek _ meghnaali ma lghiik _ .
meghnaali yamek _ taana _ pengughqagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghiik _ .
legan _ kaate yamek _ aneghte ma lghiik _ pekagh nigh ke utek _ .
apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ naayghagh _ .
qesiqun _ paallghu nkuk _ qetngalleghyankuk _ uyghalqusighhaq _ uzive ma kangat _ .
ama _ apayepayiigh nkuk _ melngu nkuk _ uzive ma kangat _ uyghag ghrukutaaghllag _ .
llaaghanwha _ kumag m _ paallghu _ tuune ma kanga _ avaqutagh mi _ atkug aneng _ qatelghii meng _ , _ enraq _ qetngalleghyaq _ tuune ma kanga _ ayaviigh meng _ .
apayepayiigh _ tuune ma kanga _ negaghpag meng _ enraq _ melngu _ aghyuugh ma kanga _ sumeghnegh ke luku _ .
ellnga _ kumag _ aklungi msuggagh igh te ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tungtu _ Aqanga
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ aghnaanegh _ tungtu _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ighni naqe ma lghii _ .
ighni naqe ma luku _ amaa ghllag k _ maalghug _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
amaa ghllag m _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute lteggu _ ! _ ”
legan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wiin _ ighni aghte li _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ ighni ma lghii _ .
ighni yan _ aghnagh _ taana _ tungtu _ tuqute luku _ negh ma kangat _ qamagte luku _ .
qamagte yatgu _ aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ yeqay _ una _ taghnughhagh a _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ ”
aag llegh an _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wiin _ wetku _ angli kan _ neghnakefut _ .
salin _ maaten _ kemgite uq _ . _ ”
Atimaftaat _ Aqangameng _ .
taagken _ aga _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
aga _ talugh qaghte yaag a _ Aqangangiighhaq _ nekeve luni _ tan- a _ naayghagh _ mayugh ma kanga _ pegnem _ .
qaygeghte yamigu _ ukig luni _ inglu anun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ aghnelqusiq _ ulape ma lghii _ .
nasiqute luku _ tagi yaghqaaghte negh an _ ne mineng _ aglagh luni _ unglegh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ palaghhaghmeng _ kiyaqaatangaa _ tagimalghhk _ amaa k _ taake uk _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
aghneqwaaqun _ aghulaqenghegkeni _ ulape aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ amaa k _ ama _ taana llu _ tungtu _ tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ amaa m _ alegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ yeqay _ una _ tuqute luku _ negh lteggu _ ! _ ”
aag llegh an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
Iwemga _ Aqangam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ egyug usi _ .
wiin _ whanga llu _ nanghiiqu aghte ngnga _ kayaalqiiraaghmeng _ . _ ”
taagken _ Aqangayeng _ amaa k _ malighqughtagh ma ka ak _ .
sivuke luni _ Aqanga _ temngi _ nalumsimeng _ qimag ma lghii _ .
qaygeghte yami _ ukig luni _ naayghagh m _ inglu anun _ tawaten _ qimag ma lghii _ .
amaa k _ malighqugh nghmeng _ pekagh ghllag lutek _ aghuliigh te ma kangat _ .
ila a _ amu a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Taamengwha _ Aqanga _ qugili igate uq _ ! _ ”
taagken _ ila yan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tawa _ ellnga _ alla _ kitum _ qinuyugte naanghite a _ ! _ ”
Aqanga _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
uksugh mi _ ilangani _ teghigagh _ tamagghaghmi _ qemguumalghii _ Aqanga _ naanghagh igh na luku _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ pi aqe yagh kangat _ .
Aqangam _ sighunegh mineng _ egte ma aqe kangi _ .
tamana _ teghigagh _ qamagte luku _ tuqu qu ma kanga _ .
ungleghtagh aqe lghii _ .
legan _ kaynge t _ esghagh luku _ temngi _ quyngigh u ni luku _ taku aqe yagh kangat _ .
liigike nghmegteggu _ negugh aqe kangat _ aleghqugh magh meng _ , _ “ _ Aqangangiighhaq _ qavaghsighaghaqelghii _ . _ ”
Aqanga _ miiwen llu _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ iike te ma uk
kiyaghte ma uq _ ungazigh mi _ aghnagh _ ugi leg _ enkaam _ taghnughhagh llgagh ak _ .
ilangani _ ugingighagh u ma lghii _ .
sighineg mii m _ yug m _ nulighh ite ngugh m _ nagaqugh luku _ ungazigh mun _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ aghnagh _ tugu ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ sighineg mun _ aghvigh te ma kanga _ .
naqam _ taana _ sighineg mii _ yuug _ aklungilnguq _ .
kaa sa mi _ taake uk _ mekelghiigh ghhagh k _ ata an _ ighleke aqe kek _ pi aqe kek _ , _ “ _ qaagkut _ amyuqetagh ghllag ut _ .
amyuutke lleqe aisi _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aag negh megteni _ naayghagh nun _ aghulaqe aqe lghiik _ .
tespagani _ ulapumalghnk _ inqun _ iknaqughi na lutek _ .
ata ita _ waamte ma kek _ ighnegh gni _ inqun _ iknaqughi sqellug kek _ .
llaaghanwha _ iknaqughi ma lghiik _ saama _ angli ma lghiik _ .
ilangani _ uksugh m _ unanguluku _ tungtuqu yagh ma lghiik _ .
tagi yamek _ nagnegh lutek _ esavghagh te lghii nun _ maligte te ma lghiik _ .
tamana _ yuug _ naghughte qugh luku _ awalighpigaalutek _ ketfagh aqe lghiik _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh lutek _ taglagh aqe lghiik _ .
tamana _ taglagh uute lghii _ naghughte qugh luku _ kaate aqe lghiit _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ uksulqusigh _ .
ilangani _ unanguluku _ tungtuqu yagh te ma lghiik _ .
tungtu nge lutek _ atghagh ma lghiik _ aghneghtu ghllag luku _ .
kaate yamek _ tungtu kekagh teng _ lli luki _ nagnegh lutek _ yuug _ tamana _ maligte luku _ esavghagh ma lghiik _ .
naqam _ ata ita _ pi aqe yagh kangit _ inqun _ awalightaghwaaghpenaki _ pisqelluki _ .
taagken _ aaghtuumalghiik _ taanʼgani _ .
tamana _ ila a _ ayveghagh luni _ qamagte luni _ taglagh uute ma lghii _ .
Elkekayveghaghnaqumalghiik _ .
qenwat _ ighivgaamakanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ ayveghagh ma lghiik _ .
iiwenllu _ yataghqaqaat _ uyughagh a _ kelute mun _ qiive yalghiimi _ puyugh ghllag u uq _ .
anengagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ii-i _ , _ iike te ainkut _ ! _ ”
anengagh an _ ayvegh _ pegte luku _ kelute mun _ kilgaquumalghiiknuugem _ esne anun _ siku m _ kaasalghiimeknutem _ ameltughqagh u luni _ .
naqam _ iiwleng _ taanʼgavek _ siku _ saagrukegtaq _ .
tamana _ saagrukegtaq _ siku _ anuqe mi _ qateghmi _ legan _ megh m _ teve yaghqaqe a _ .
taagken _ kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ megh m _ teve yagu _ siku _ anuqligh ma kanga _ uvlugughsimakanga _ , _ umegnegh ughte ma kanga _ qanigtuumagh mi _ .
kete mun _ qimag ma lghiik _ .
uyavagh ghllag lutek _ siku _ kaate ma kangat _ aange pigte lghii _ .
tawavek _ mayugh lutek _ tespamagun _ laag luku _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ “ _ weni _ tuqusiigh naqngu nghite kumta _ sa naqagh ten _ ! _ ”
taagken _ mekelghiigh _ nuyekligh _ tuunaghmineng _ maghuyighluki _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uyuqliimmekelghiighemnagaqumakanga _ uyavaghpaneng _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ .
mekelghiigh m _ nuyekliim _ ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite ziin _ ? _ ”
uyuqligh m _ nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ waniwanllu _ nagaqugh te aghte nghite unga _ ! _ ”
alla _ nuyekligh _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ qalghigh laatagh ma lghii _ uyavaghpaneng _ iwernga _ maateghniineng _ qantaghanlluni _ .
aapte laatagh ma kanga _ iwernga _ nagaqugh ma lghii _ nagaqugh ghngaaghmigu _ ama _ nuyekliimllu _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ tuunagmineng _ saguyagh ke luni _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ alla _ meteghllug _ qalghigh lghii _ nagaqugh ma ka ak _ qantaghanlliighaghluni _ .
ilagaate _ qamagte yamigu _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nagaqugh nghite zigu _ ? _ ”
“ _ nagaqugh nghite aqa _ ! _ ”
iwerngangam _ nagaqugh ma lghiik _ uyughagh n llu _ ama _ anengagh an llu _ .
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ qakma _ uqeghhmi _ qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ quqquqquqquqquq _ .
anengagh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ awi _ , _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ . _ ”
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ anengagh ni _ , _ “ _ Samengpiiqa _ ? _ ”
“ _ pi aqe aaten _ whanga inagh ma _ taglaate na lunga _ . _ ”
alla _ qakma _ qalghigh ma lghii _ meteghllug _ , _ quqquqquqquqquq _ .
anengagh a _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ A-aa-aa _ , _ nanghiiqu naqe i _ ! _ ”
uyughagh n _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ meteghllug _ ? _ ”
“ _ whaten _ pi aqe uq _ nanghiiqu na luta _ maalghug u luta _ .
taawanginaq _ uka _ tume mi _ ataasigh _ siku _ uusqagh lghii _ . _ ”
anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ aanesqe ma kanga _ .
aane ma lghiik _ qemgaagmek _ .
aane lutek _ anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ neveghtesqumakanga _ .
uyughagh a _ neveghsimalghii _ .
Neveghsan _ aqume ma kanga _ .
aqume luku _ gginagh a _ kenigh mineng _ saape ma kanga _ .
saape yamigu _ ghhatagh ma lghiit _ , _ igleghte ma lghiit _ quulvaqun _ .
mulu luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
sivugte yalghiimeng _ siku mi _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
tawani _ meghnaali luteng _ alla _ anengagh an _ uyughagh ni _ neveghtesqumakanga _ .
tawaten _ aqume luku _ anengagh an _ gginagh a _ saape ma kanga _ kenigh mineng _ .
Palaghhaghmeng _ aqumga aghte luteng _ ghhatagh laatagh ma lghiit _ igleghte ma lghiit _ .
mulu luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
esghagh yalghiimeng _ meteghllug m _ meghnaali vig mi _ temngi _ naayghagh mi _ alungutellegh mi _ uyghag mi _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ mayughvig ite uq _ .
anengagh an _ ellmi _ tughneghagh- ni _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ amiqluk _ .
Amiqluk _ qalghigh ma lghii _ .
anengagh a _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ whanga inagh u kuma _ pi naanghite unga _ ! _ ”
uyughagh n _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ? _ ”
“ _ Uum _ pi aqe aanga _ whanga inagh ma _ mayugh te na lunga _ . _ ”
“ _ wetku qun _ whanga _ sivuke lunga _ mayugh u uute kuminga _ tungangighhaani _ elpek _ mayuulliten _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ uyughagh a _ mayugh ma lghii _ tungangighhaani _ anengagh a _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh mii it _ ilagaanneqegsaataqut _ .
qagugh m _ nunalgute meng _ alignalghii ngiighhagh t _ ilagaqayuggaat _ ilagagh te aqe ut _ .
ila ita _ pi aqe kangat _ unʼga _ tuquma ni luki _ , _ ila ita _ pi aqe kangit _ salin _ unguva tete ni luki _ , _ tamana _ ila a _ ilagagh te aqe uq _ temngi _ .
ellngit _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh ma lghiit _ , _ nagate ma lghiit _ .
ata at _ kingulighpigagh u luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
Sagaqestaghngaaghmi _ aghuliigh qagh luni _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ llangaqa _ whaa _ siku m _ ilu anite lunga _ ilagagh unga _ .
iqlengiqe unga _ weni _ ! _ ”
alla _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ilagagh ma lunga _ siku m _ ilu ani _ meteghllug m _ qalghigh llegh a _ nagaqugh aqa _ ! _ ”
ilagagh aqe lghii _ .
nepiigh qagh luni _ akuzi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ ilagagh kestagh ghngaaghma _ nepiigh lunga _ meteghllug m _ pi unga _ , _ ellmi _ ghhatagh te na lunga _ , _ aygugh mun _ aghulaqe unga _ .
igleghte unga _ siku kun _ aghuliigh lunga _ meghnaali lunga _ .
meghnaali nghmeng _ taaqe yama _ aghulaqe laatagh unga _ .
igleghte unga _ .
aghuliigh unga _ ingani _ meteghllug m _ meghnaali vig ani _ .
weni _ iqlengiqe unga _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh k _ nagate ma lghiik _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte lutek _ .
qama _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh aqe luni _ nepiigh aqe luni _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ taagken _ meghnaali lunga _ mayugh unga _ .
mayugh lunga _ tagi nga _ .
kaate yama _ iiyagh mun _ mayugh unga _ ! _ ”
nepiigh ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ nukalpigagh at _ pi ma kangit _ , _ “ _ enta _ qakmavek _ iiyagh mun _ esghagh yaghtuqagh tek _ . _ ”
nukalpigagh at _ aane yalghiimeng _ avangite ut _ .
itegh luteng _ ungipaate ma kangat _ .
qayughllak _ mayugh naqe yata _ awatmun _ ullghiitamaat _ .
uteghte luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu m _ saaghw anun _ .
ata at _ ellmi neng _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
esghagh yamiki _ itegh sqe ma kangi _ .
itegh ma lghiit _ .
quyake ma kangit _ .
ata ita _ pi ma kegket _ , _ “ _ sa lusi mi _ ullegh stek _ ? _ ”
akite ma kangat _ , _ “ _ taanegken _ ima _ takaghpagllelguftuq _ .
Yulleghpagmun _ taaggun _ taglagh ukut _ . _ ”
ata ita _ akite ma kangit _ , _ “ _ anighta qun _ takaghnallghaguusi _ ! _ ”
uyuqligh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ anighta qun _ elpek _ iye ghllag u uten _ ! _ ”
Taam _ kenlanga neng _ awavagh ghllag nanigh ma lghiik _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
Aymangaawen
kiyaghte ma ut _ esnagh mii t _ taawanginaq _ quyilleg t _ maalghug _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ maalghug _ avaqutagh gket _ mekelghiigh k _ .
Allgha _ mekelghiigh m _ nuyekligh _ , _ aag llegh a _ uyuqligh _ .
taawanginaq _ ata an _ taana _ nuyekligh _ amyuutke aqe kanga _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ quyngighqwaagh luni _ quyngigh _ uzimun _ kilgaaqu ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ sukaghi ma lghii _ saama _ iknaqughi ma lghii _ .
atghagh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ naqam _ qavagh igate ngughk _ .
repall _ ata an _ qavaghtesigalkanga _ saama _ neghesigalkanga _ .
nutaan _ negh naqe yagh uq _ ighlegute a _ .
ighlegute yatni _ ingaghte luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
ata an _ qavagh lghii _ esghagh luku _ aki n _ iptag aghte ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh _ upugh te kete luku _ makete qaghte yalghiimi _ aki n _ ayemlluku _ .
ata a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ una _ mekelghiigh _ qavngaq _ iknaqughi a _ ? _ ”
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ “ _ pilugugkagh meng _ ulima te gu _ taawanginaq _ pinigh pigte lghii meng _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ ulima te ma kanga _ .
ata an _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aga _ , _ naalkesaghtugh ghhu _ pinighqe aq _ Aymangaawen _ .
Aymangaawetem _ sakimag anun _ sukate luten _ qavagh yagh a _ .
tawaten _ aghulaqe lghaaten _ ! _ ”
apaate ma kanga _ tume kaghqagh meng _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ mekelghiigh _ ghhatagh ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ pilugug t _ seghlegh pestaagh t _ .
aate ma kangi _ mekelghiigh m _ taagken _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ mengteghagh t _ .
Uqeghhmi _ nanevgagh _ qayugtugh aqe uq _ .
amenam _ mekelghiigh _ igleghte uq _ naaghte ghllag aqe luni _ .
Nanevgaam _ nenglagh qu ma kanga _ .
kaate yan _ aapte a _ , _ “ _ Saam _ yug ke aten _ ? _ ”
akite ma kanga _ mekelghiigh m _ , _ “ _ esnagh m _ yukanga _ ! _ ”
aapte laatagh aa _ nanevgaam _ , _ “ _ Natum _ esnagh m _ ? _ ”
“ _ Maakunmi _ naayvaaghaam _ esne i _ ategh kaqe ai _ tea- ma kut _ esnagh t _ .
maaten _ whangkuta _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ samani _ megh m _ esnagh mi _ .
nagaqugh ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ nagaqugh unga _ . _ ”
nanevgagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ I-i-i _ , _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ ! _ ”
taagken _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ A-a _ , _ itegh i _ negh yagh a _ ! _ ”
“ _ kangsugh lleqe unga _ , _ itegh naqe gkuma _ . _ ”
“ _ tawatete ghngaaghpek _ itegh i _ ! _ ”
“ _ aa-a _ , _ naqam _ itegh langa _ ! _ ”
pegnem _ itegh uq _ .
Nanevgaam _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ gaagh te gu _ quyngigh meng _ una _ esnagh m _ yug a _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ gaagh te luku _ quyngigh t _ ugute ma kangi _ .
negh te ma lghiit _ .
taaqe luteng _ itegh sqe ma yagh kanga _ aagra mun _ .
Ighsaamalghii _ nategh mi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
Nanevgaankuk _ aghnalqwaagh nkuk _ nenglagh qu ma kangat _ .
talughte yami _ kilgaaqumeng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
qemi mun _ kaate laatagh uq _ .
kaate luni _ teve laatagh uq _ .
atghagh uq _ mengteghagh nun _ .
esghagh aa _ nanevgagh _ qayugtugh lghii _ .
Nanevgaam _ esghagh gpenaan _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ tughneghaan- i luku _ .
sivugte te kete luku _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saamyukaten _ ? _ ”
“ _ Esnamyukanga _ ! _ ”
“ _ naten _ esnagh m _ ? _ ”
“ _ Maakunmi _ naayvaaghem _ esne i _ ategh ke ai _ esnagh t _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ megh m _ esne ani _ .
aa-a _ ! _ ”
nanevgagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ “ _ ii- k _ , _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ . _ ”
“ _ naqam _ itegh i _ , _ negh yagh a _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ ighsaamalghii _ inqunamen _ kangsugh na yu ka mi _ .
tawatete ghngaan _ itegh sqe ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ kangsugh ghngaaghmi _ itegh ma lghii _ .
negh ma lghii _ nategh mi _ .
taaqe luni _ nanevgaam _ itegh sqe ma yagh kanga _ inglegh mun _ .
mekelghiigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ itagnagh unga _ whani _ qavagh lleqe unga _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
uusneghwaagh mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ .
nanevgagh _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ nenglaanneqegsaamalghiik _ .
mekelghiigh _ uusneghwaagh mun _ talughte yami _ kilgaaqumeng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
Hanganun _ uusneghwaagh mun _ teve yami _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh at _ ataasigh t _ .
taagken _ uusneghwaagh meng _ atghagh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ enngaatall _ nenglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nanevgaam _ aapte laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ Saamyukaten _ ? _ ”
Mekelghiighemakisimakanga _ , _ “ _ Esnamyukanga _ . _ ”
“ _ naten _ esnagh m _ ? _ ”
“ _ Maakunmi _ naayvaghaaghem _ esne i _ tea- ma kut _ ategh kaqe ai _ esnagh t _ . _ ”
“ _ aa _ , _ navek _ igleghtaazin _ ? _ ”
“ _ taamavek _ nunivag mun _ igleghtaagunga _ .
apegh aqe kangat _ Aymangaawen _ tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ . _ ”
Nanevgaam _ pi a _ nenglagh qu magh an _ , _ “ _ O-ho-hooghh _ , _ kayngusaghallequten _ !
elpetun _ pinightu te kau nghite uq _ ! _ ”
“ _ aa-a _ , _ itagnagh unga _ ! _ ”
“ _ naqam _ itegh i _ .
negh yagh a _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ itegh ma lghii _ amiknaafqevzighluku _ .
Nanevgaampimakanga _ , _ “ _ ii- k _ saqrugtatuq _ taana _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh _ negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ itegherki nghmeng _ tawani _ ingaghtaaghumalghii _ .
wetku _ unug yagu _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ ghhatagh laatagh uq _ .
uusneghwaagh mun _ teve yami _ kilgaaqumeng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
uusnegh u aq _ kaate laatagh aa _ .
teve yami _ piyug meng _ atghagh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ kayaate naqe pigte luni _ .
mekelghiigh m _ esghagh ma kanga _ nanevgagh _ qayugtugh kestagh lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nanevgaam _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saam _ yug ke aten _ ? _ ”
“ _ esnagh m _ yukanga _ ! _ ”
“ _ naten _ esnagh m _ ? _ ”
“ _ Maakunmi _ naayvaaghem _ esne i _ ategh ke ai _ esnagh t _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ megh m _ esne ani _ .
aa-a _ ! _ ”
nanevgagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ “ _ ii- k _ , _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ . _ ”
“ _ aa-a _ , _ naqam _ itegh i _ !
negh yagh a _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ itegh naqe yalghiimi _ kangsugh uq _ .
Iwemga _ pegnem _ itegh uq _ .
itegh luni _ negh ma lghii _ .
negh ma luku _ aapte ma kanga _ nanevgaam _ , _ “ _ navek _ igleghtaazin _ ? _ ”
“ _ nunivag mete ngughk _ paamna _ Aymangaawen _ tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ . _ ”
“ _ upupeng _ nepiighelten _ .
Kayngusaghallequten _ !
iitek llu _ ungipaate naqe amken _ .
Whakenwhaa _ ghhatagh kuvek _ mengteghagh t _ ataasigh t _ kaate lleqe aten _ .
mengteghagh neng _ taagken _ alla _ igleghtekuvek _ kaate lleqe aten _ taawa _ Aymangaawenkut _ .
taawa _ qamagte uq _ .
nagaqugh ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ nagaqugh unga _ ! _ ”
taaqe luteng _ negh nghmeng _ ingaghtaaghumalghii _ mekelghiigh _ .
unug yagu _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ aghulaqe laatagh ma lghii _ .
nenglagh qu ma kangat _ sukangite ni luku _ .
talughte yami _ kilgaaqumeng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ uusnegh u aq _ kaate laatagh aa _ .
kaa sa mi _ uusneghwaagh mun _ piyug meng _ igleghte ma lghii _ .
uusnegh u aq _ teve luku _ atghii yami _ sukangite sighwaagh ma lghii _ .
Nanevgaam _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
kaate yan _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saam _ yug ke aten _ ? _ ”
“ _ esnagh m _ yukanga _ ! _ ”
“ _ naten _ esnagh m _ ? _ ”
“ _ Maakunmi _ naayvaaghem _ esne i _ ategh ke ai _ esnagh t _ .
enkaam _ whangkuta _ kiyaghte aqe ukut _ megh m _ esne ani _ .
aa-a _ ! _ ”
nanevgagh _ sumeghtaghagh uq _ , _ “ _ ii- k _ , _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ esnagh m _ . _ ”
“ _ naqam _ itegh i _ .
negh yagh a _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh _ itegh ma lghii _ .
negh ma lghii _ .
taaqe luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ unaangu luku _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
sivuke luni _ piyuwhaghmeng _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
wetku _ talughte yami _ uusneghwaagh meng _ kilgaaqu ma lghii _ .
alla _ esghagh laatagh aa _ uusnegh u aq _ akugaaghniineng _ aangleghii _ .
tawavek _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye anun _ mayugh yalghiimi _ saama _ esghagh ai _ maalghukmengteghaak _ .
ketligh _ aange lghii _ .
Kelutanganilnguq _ mengteghagh _ mekestaaghhagh _ .
uyavagh ni _ esghagh aa _ quyngigh _ uglagh pigte lghii _ .
quyngigh m _ uvitangani _ yugyag ghllag _ .
tamana _ yuug _ Aymangaawem _ ugi ke aqe a _ .
iwernga _ qavagh igate ngugh t _ ellnga ni _ .
Mengteghaam _ taam _ uuqghaani _ nanevgagh _ esghagh aa _ qayugtagh u lghii _ .
mekelghiigh _ atghagh ma lghii _ naaghte aqe luni _ .
iwernga _ iqlengiqe aqe lghii _ .
taagken _ uusneghwaagh meng _ ukig ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aange lghii kun _ mengteghagh nun _ uqegh itni _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
Nanevgaam _ avelghaqiinagh ma kanga _ qayughllak _ tughneghaan- i luku _ .
naqam _ atkug a _ aange pigte lghii _ .
nanevgagh _ tunute nghaani _ maligte aqe kanga _ .
qenwat _ nanevgaam _ aghuliigh te luku _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saam _ yug ke aten _ ? _ ”
“ _ esnagh m _ yukanga _ ! _ ”
“ _ navek _ igleghtaazin _ ? _ ”
“ _ Aymangaawen _ apegh aqe kangat _ .
tugu yaghtugh aqe aqa _ . _ ”
sunanguq _ nanevgagh _ taana _ agigte luni _ mekestaaghhagh mun _ mengteghagh mun _ aleghqugh a _ , _ “ _ Qamay _ nengagh u aq _ tawa _ ! _ ”
sunanguq _ taana _ aghnagh aq _ qineghte a _ .
ineqsunagh pigte lghii _ pinigh pigte lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghnaghagh m _ , _ “ _ ugi ke naanghite aqa _ .
seghlegh pestaagh u uq _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ uteghte pagte ma lghii _ .
“ _ iitek llu _ kuuve i ste u luten _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh mun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ yugyag ghllaget _ .
qesiqun _ Aymangaawem _ ugi ke aqe ai _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ itegh i _ qullug k _ kuuve yaghtugh kek _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh _ itegh luni _ taake uk _ tugu ma kek _ .
tugu lukek _ ugate mii ii aghte ma lghii _ pegnem _ ullegh aghte vzigh aqe luni _ .
maaten _ alla _ amllugh naqe yalghiimi _ kuuve ma kek _ taagavek _ ugatanganilngughnun _ sanqute nun _ .
allameng _ igleqaghluni _ inglu anun _ enraq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
amig mun _ amllugh luni _ aanaqsalghimi _ manughagh kun _ qamagte lukek _ kuuve ma kek _ .
Aymangaawen _ tapghaghmeng _ eslegalghiimeng _ tugu tete luni _ kagsagpagataamakanga _ mekelghiigh _ .
mekelghiigh _ aqnigh nghite uq _ qayughllak _ atkug a _ umu pigte lghii _ .
Ighivgaghyagu _ iteghaatut _ .
negh luteng _ qavaa te ma lghiit _ .
ellnga _ mekelghiigh _ nategh mi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu na luni _ anqaghtaasimalghii _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ tutqaghtaqluku _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aki naqe ma kangi _ naghughhnaqenghata _ ighu mineng _ itegmig qagh nghminiki _ naghteghllagaqelghiit _ .
yuug _ tamana _ kilgaaqu te ma lghii _ Aymangaawenllu _ maligte te luni _ yuug _ taana llu _ mekelghiigh _ .
ghhatagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh _ taana _ sivuke luni _ piyuggaghmeng _ .
yug m _ tamatum _ nenglagh qu magh an _ naghughte aqe kanga _ .
mekelghiigh _ uusneghwaagh mun _ talughte yami _ pilugug ni _ mat- aghte luki _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
tamana _ yuuknaghughquumakanga _ .
taana _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ tagi ma lghii _ .
tagimun _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh aq _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aagyuq _ utaqa nga _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ utaqa naanghite amken _ ! _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ avelghagh luku _ kaate ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ kaate luni _ tugu luku _ itghute ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ tugu ma kanga _ .
yuug _ tamana _ aglagh uute ma lghii _ ellmeng _ mengteghagh meggnun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ mekelghiigh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata an _ aghnaghaampimakanga _ , _ “ _ siingenllu _ aghnagh _ afta kayugu uq _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ mengteghagh meng _ aveg te luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ mekelghiigh m _ nuna anun _ .
kaate luteng _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ mengteghagh an _ kelutanganun _ mengteghagh u ma lghiit _ .
Mekleghiighem _ naange a _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ esghagh ai _ mengteghagh t _ , _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh t _ .
aghnagh _ quyngigh neng _ alinge luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Aghnamugini _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aane luni _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ ugi minun _ apegh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ sama _ tagi uq _ ! _ ”
ugi an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ negh sqe gu _ ! _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ nuug luni _ negh sqesagh aa _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ aghnagh aq _ esghagh luku _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnaghagh m _ itegh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ mekelghiigh _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ taana _ unaangu luku _ aghnegh m _ qukaa nun _ tuquma lghii _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ wetku _ aghnegh m _ qukaa ni _ unguvagh ma lghii _ .
makete luni _ aatghaamalghii _ .
kaate yan _ ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangavek _ muluugh ziin _ ? _ ”
mekelghiigh ghhagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayughllak _ aghnagh aq _ ineqsunagh pigte uq _ .
enkaam _ whanga _ tazingani _ tuquma yagh unga _ . _ ”
ata an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ whanga _ tuqu yagh langa _ ! _ ”
ata a _ aane luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Qamay _ , _ meghsi aghte ngnga _ . _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ meghute _ imigh luku _ talligh ghhagh inagh mineng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
yug m _ pateg ma kanga _ meghute _ .
aghnaghagh m _ itagnatun _ imigh ma kanga _ .
naqam _ aghnagh aq _ sungaghaghqwaa luni _ nuug luni _ tuune ma kanga _ .
yug m _ esghagh luku _ aghnagh aq _ tuquma lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yan _ unguvagh luni _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
qavagh luni _ unaami _ yug m _ mekeghiighhaq _ kevgaagh qu ma kanga _ mekelghiigh meng _ ankunameng _ ( _ 1 _ ) _ mughute lgute u luku _ .
mekelghiigh _ angegh ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ata ni _ mughute lghii _ maligte ma kanga _ .
unaangu ma lghiit _ .
ata an _ aghillug ni _ inglupigagh _ megh mun _ egte ma kanga _ aksaqe luni _ .
ata a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ uuk _ aghillug ka _ megh mun _ atqaghtuq _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa u luku _ enan _ alla neng _ aghillug igh ghhaaten _ ! _ ”
wanlegi _ ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayughllak _ nuliigh ma _ ukini kaqe a _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh _ qukagh mikun _ qaamqaghte luni _ ugmestaaghhagh mun _ siku mun _ ategh uq _ aqfaghiiq _ aghillug meng _ .
whaa _ aga _ ategh yan _ tapghagh a _ nengpagte yagh kete ni _ megh mun _ atqaghtesluku _ ata an _ sayug luku _ siku meng _ maligte ma kanga _ .
maligte luku _ kaape ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ mengteghagh nun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
( _ 1 _ ) _ ruuseghmii t _ mumigte llegh ani _ qemgaghmenguuniit _ ;
Uuzagem _ pillghani _ atg- ke te nagh u na ai _ , _ atg- qu uute yu i aaghek nguq _ qaliiraaghestun _ ayuqe lghiik _ .
kaa lli mi _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Aymangaawen _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ugi n _ tuquma uq _ qayughllak _ ighleke ghngaamni _ aghillug ka _ aqfaamaa _ .
Wasiinmi _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ qaamlluki _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
yuug _ masisu _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aghnaghagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
yuug _ qulligeg ii ma lghii _ .
qulligeg iigh luni _ uka _ ellnga nun _ tagi ma lghii _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ugi n _ elpek _ tuquma uq _ , _ qayughllak _ iglekeghngaamni _ naa minun _ aghillug _ ulima aqe ni luku _ .
aqfa naqe yagh kete ni _ kaleve uq _ .
Wasiinmi _ whanga _ ugi ke lleqe kevnga _ . _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ nanigh t _ qaamlluki _ ilagaaghnaqumaluku _ yug m _ taam _ akughtugh magh an _ qinunaghqe magh mi _ taku ma kanga _ ellnga _ .
aghnagh aq _ ilagaaghyalghiimi _ yuug _ taana _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qayughllak _ aghnagh aq _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ ilagagh kau luni _ .
aghnagh aq _ taana _ atghaghataamalghii2 _ .
atghaghatagh luni _ ugi mi _ tumanga _ tuumte ma kanga _ .
ategh ma lghii _ siku gnun _ .
ategh yalghiimi _ esghagh aa _ ugi ni _ savig ligh luni _ angvanegh mikun _ .
legan _ savig a _ amu luku _ uiluumakanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ unguvaamalghn _ .
mekelghiigh _ piyug meng _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ atghaghatagh luni _ .
aghnagh aq _ inglegh kun _ aane ma lghii _ .
Aanyalghimi _ yuug _ esghagh aa _ .
Akugteghatalghii _ elqemsighaghmeng _ . _ ( _ ? _ ) _ tawani _ palaghhaghmeng _ kiyaghtaalluteng _ mekelghiigh _ nategh mun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
qiighw ma lghii _ .
ata an _ qiilghwii _ nagaqugh luku _ qulligeg ni _ aate ma yagh kek _ .
aate ma kanga _ inglupigagh _ temkagh m _ ighu a _ inglu anun _ aate ma kanga _ ilepghaaghem _ ighu a _ .
repall _ ata a _ aaghhweregaghmeng _ aane ma lghii _ , _ llangaqa _ pi nga yu neng _ ighu ke lghii _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aane ste nagh u na i ma kanga _ unegte sqellug qu _ .
ata a _ aane ma lghii _ .
Aymangaawenkuk _ ugi ke te lghiik _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ ne meggnun _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
Qayaqsighvik
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma uq _ nimaaq _ Qayaqsighvik _ .
whaa _ salin _ taana _ kiyaghte uq _ nuna _ .
tawani _ nunugh a mi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ yuug _ avaqutaghtuqagh _ .
taawanginaq _ avaquti a _ yug m _ qayaghtugh u luteng _ tuqu laghate tke aat _ qamagte luteng _ .
taagken _ uksugh mi _ ila i _ yugemnulighha _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ ighni ma lghii _ .
Piyaqeseng _ taana _ taghnughhagh _ mekelghiigh u uq _ .
atigh ma kangat _ Qayaqsighvigmeng _ .
taagken _ angli te aatnga _ maligte luku _ quunpeng _ angalqataasigh meng _ petug luku _ .
kiyaghute ma kanga _ inqunamen _ anglegutangitun _ tuqunagh yu kan _ .
qenwat _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aapute ma lghii _ Qayaqsighvik _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ saama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayagh ite uten _ avangite uten _ . _ ”
taagken _ Qayaqsighvik _ angegh ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ esnagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esnagh mi _ naalke ma kanga _ qaya m _ sivuyag a _ .
Qakaqsighvigem _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
kaate luni _ ata ni _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Sangawa _ taana _ ? _ ”
ata an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taana _ qaya m _ sivuyag ke a _ . _ ”
taagken _ Qayaqsighvigem _ ata ni _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qaya meng _ ulima te nga _ whanga _ . _ ”
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sangan _ ulima tete naanghite amken _ . _ ”
Qayaqsighvigem _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ulima te nga _ whanga _ qaya meng _ ! _ ”
taagken _ ata an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
ata a _ llaaghanwha _ ulima te ma lghii _ .
qayagh _ ata an _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taaqe luku _ sivuyag akun _ ama _ angyaleg akun _ ukite ma kanga _ qayugh a _ .
unaami _ Qayaqsighvik _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ aanghumakanga _ .
taagken _ ata an _ angalqataasigh _ saagsimakanga _ .
saagllug qu _ qaya m _ sivuyag akun _ qepute ma kanga _ iqukrug a _ angalqataasigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ Qayaqsighvik _ kete ma lghii _ .
ata an _ tapghagh _ aaghhesimakanga _ .
qenwat _ naayghagh mun _ talughsi ma lghii _ .
taagken _ ata an _ amu ma kanga _ wetku _ aaghte yan _ .
tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag yalghiimi _ unaagh nge ughtagh ma lghii _ neghsagh meng _ .
taagken _ taglaate ma kangit _ mengteghagh meggnun _ neghsagh t _ .
unaami _ Qayaqsighvik _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ alla _ qayaghtugh na luni _ .
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvikkesimalghii _ .
alla _ ata an _ aaghhe ste laatagh ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ temngi _ taagavek _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ talugh qaghte ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ esghagh ma kanga _ puugzagh _ qavagh lghii _ megh m _ qaye ani _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ uyavagh qu te _ puug ma lghii _ .
puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ uyavagh qu te _ puug ma lghii _ .
puug yan _ taku yagh aa _ .
aga _ atghagh laatagh ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ puug laatagh uq _ .
taku kestagh ghngaaghmigu _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ uyavannaqniluku _ .
taagken _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taglagh ma luku _ sukilpagh _ savinagh akun _ qaya m _ nalug uq _ .
nalug luni _ qaanghanun _ itqaghtesimakek _ sugrug gni _ .
Qayaqsighvikggiistusimakanga _ .
taagken _ taglagh ragkiigh ma lghii _ .
Ighleghutkelluku _ aglu kek _ meghnugh ma lghiik _ .
meghnugh yayek _ naallghunnaqsaghaak _ sukilpagh _ wata _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ ggiistullaataamakanga _ inqunamen _ itegh na yu kan _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aglu kek _ meghnugh ma lghiik _ .
naallghute na lukek _ aglu gni _ naallghunnaqsaghaak _ sukilpagh _ itegh aghagh ma lghii _ , _ taawanginaq _ papasqwa _ aliite luni _ unegte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ tamlag ma lghii _ .
tamlag yan _ ata an _ taana _ sukilpagh _ nusug ma kanga _ .
qavaa ma lghiit _ unug yagu _ .
unaami _ Qayaqsighvik _ aapute ma lghii _ ata minun _ , _ “ _ nunivag mun _ pi yaag qagh langa _ ? _ ”
ata an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ sagiqe ma lghii _ .
ata an _ llaaghanwha _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ Qayaqsighvik _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ meghnaali yuguma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ pennagh m _ asi akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
aqumga ma luku _ kaate ma lghii _ yuug _ savikenghaagh meng _ pilugug ke lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ naqam _ naatghigh lleg leg _ .
yug m _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii m _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ itegagh ni _ qanegh _ Qayaqsighvigem _ agitaghpagtagh ai _ .
yug m _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii m _ pi ma kanga _ Qayaqsighvik _ , _ “ _ taana _ sa u a _ agitaghte pagte aghte a _ ? _ ”
Qayaqsighvigem _ ighu ni _ ellnga nun _ qapragsagh kete ni _ yuug _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ pi gpenanga _ pilugug nka _ ukut _ pi lleqe aten _ ! _ ”
Qayaqsighvigem _ taaqe ma kanga _ .
taagken _ yug m _ pilugug ni _ tuune ma kangi _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ aate luki _ nekeve yalghiimi _ aga _ penniigh _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .
qesiqun _ taana _ yuug _ savikenghaagh meng _ pilugug ke lghii _ penniigh u aqe uq _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ tawavek _ mayugh ma lghii _ pennagh mun _ .
uugte yalghiimi _ saama _ pennagh m _ asi ani _ esghagh ma kanga _ negaghpag _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ ukig ma lghii _ .
ukig ma luku _ pika _ pennagh m _ qaye ani _ yuug _ esghagh ma kanga _ savikenghaagh neng _ pilugug ke lghii _ taawanginaq _ aange pigte lghii _ .
Taam _ yugrukutaagh m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ naten _ ukig ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ legan _ ukig lunga _ . _ ”
nutaan _ yugrukutaagh ghllag _ ukig naqe yagh uq _ .
ifkagh ma lghii _ neghqwaagh ni _ ayemqugh luku _ tuqu luni _ .
taagken _ Qayaqsighvik _ ukig ma lghii _ .
naapte ma lghii _ negaghpag kun _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ awite te naqe yagh uq _ .
aghtugh ma lghii _ .
tawani _ aghneghte ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ unug yaghtugh aa _ Qayaqsighvigem _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
saama _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ aleghqughwaaqeftuq _ , _ “ _ Kiiiiii _ , _ unaangu ma unga _ neghsagh meng _ ! _ ”
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ naaptighluku _ taglaate ma kanga _ Qayaqsighvikneghsaq _ .
ellmi ni _ maani _ yupig _ taawanginaq _ tuqu sighwaagh lghii _ .
taglaate kete luku _ itegagh ni _ Qayaqsighvigem _ uqfig kun _ eltughtesaqenni _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ sivutmute _ iqu ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ itegagh ni _ awite qaghte yagh kete ni _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ naghteghllagumalghii _ repall _ gginagh ni _ esnegti ghllag luku _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ ighyaghqelluni _ sivugte ma lghii _ .
taglaate ma kanga _ alla _ Qayaqsighvik _ .
enraq _ ama _ uqfig kun _ nuqnegh yagh lghii _ alla _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ sagiqe ma lghii _ sivutmute _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ peghhe qagh yagh kete ni _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ naghllaataamalghii _ repall _ gginagh ni _ esnightighluku _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
Iteghyannulighhan _ quyake ma kanga _ .
Nanevgaghhaqneghsaq _ ilu anun _ itghute ma kanga _ .
itghute luku _ ughugsigh ma kanga _ .
Qayughllaktaakut _ sumeghtaghagh u lghiit _ kumlama tete ni luku _ .
ellmi ni _ maani _ taakut _ pilugug ita _ savikenghaagh t _ llangaqa _ kumlama lghii stun _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nulighh an _ afta yuguma kanga _ .
nutaan _ ulaagh ni _ tugu luku _ afta naqe yagh aa _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ esteqe ma lghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ salin _ kumlama uq _ .
enan _ unaami _ afta naken _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ qavaghpenam _ taghtuumaamalghii _ inqunamen _ neghsagh _ unguvagh na yu kan _ .
qavaghni yami _ nanevgagh ghhagh _ anagh ma lghii _ kelengake i stekaghqagh meng _ .
anag nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ ellmi _ anagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ anagh mni _ whani _ kelengake nakesi _ neghsagh _ taana _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ Qayaqsighvik _ nutaan _ payugte yagh uq _ qullug gnite ngughk _ anagh _ aragh ghllag ma lghii _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ makete luni _ esghagh luku _ neghsagh _ anagh ni _ ellmi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ anagh ka _ una _ iqlengagh sagh pigu a _ ! _ ”
nanevgagh ghhagh _ ingaghte luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavagh yan _ Qayaqsighvik _ makete qaghte luni _ ghhukaghagh meng _ kuuve yagh kete ni _ anagh m _ iqukrug a _ siipte ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ ingaghaghsimalghii _ .
mulu luni _ nutaan _ Qayaqsighvik _ payugte yagh uq _ anagh _ araghyalghimi _ llangaqa _ sa kun _ ukimallegh kun _ qineghte luni _ alla _ Qayaqsighvigem _ ghhukaghagh meng _ kuuve yagh kete ni _ talugh qaghte ma lghii _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ makete luni _ tuqu qugh luki _ aane ma lghii _ .
aane luni _ temngi _ tespagavek _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
qemi meng _ teve yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ , _ kiiiiii _ mengteghagh lghute ghllag t _ .
ataasigh nun _ mengteghagh nun _ itegh yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ yug lghute ghllag t _ taawanginaq _ ataasigh _ aghnagh aq _ .
qesiqun _ taam _ aghnaghagh m _ kuugkaqeitii _ .
aghnagh m _ taam _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tugu laken _ ! _ ”
naqam _ tea- ma kut _ yungestagh ghhagh t _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ angegh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
ilangani _ aghneghmi _ qaga _ esla mi _ arasimalghiit _ , _ “ _ nanugh yagh uq _ nanughyaghtuuuuq _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ tea- ma _ yuug _ aanleghasimalghii _ qamagte luni _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ nuliigh minun _ aapute yagh uq _ .
nulighh an _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
Qayaqsighvikaanumalghii _ .
aane yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kanga _ esnagh mi _ agigpeghwaaghutaqeftuq _ yug lghute ghllag _ .
ellnga llu _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ saama _ esghagh ma kanga _ kana _ nanugh ghllag _ siku m _ esne ani _ .
nutaan _ naasqugh ni _ ipugte nghagu _ arataqelghiit _ , _ “ _ Uuuuuy _ , _ uuuuuy _ , _ uuuuuy _ , _ uuuuuy _ ! _ ”
ila it _ aleghquumalghemng _ , _ “ _ nanugh _ , _ nanugh _ , _ tanem _ , _ tanem _ ! _ ”
qesiqun _ taana _ siku _ siku u nghite uq _ , _ naayvagh m _ puglluga _ ama _ taana _ nanugh _ nanugh u nghite uq _ , _ ugugnaghagh u uq _ .
Qayaqsighvik _ teskanavek _ ketfagh luni _ ugugnaghagh _ tuute yagh kete ni _ siftaghqumakanga _ .
Tamatum _ aange nghite a _ tamana _ yuug _ aragh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nengagh u aq _ nanughagh uq _ tutqaghlluku _ ! _ ”
taagken _ aglagh te ma kangat _ .
kaat ute te luku _ itghute ma kangat _ .
aghnagh m _ afta ma kanga _ .
afta luku _ gaagh ma kangat _ .
unug yan _ negh te ma lghiit _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ ugugnaghagh m _ tulimagh a _ yug m _ ataasimkepsuutkaqegkanga _ .
aghnagh m _ llilagh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Qayaqsighvikneghi _ . _ ”
Qayaqsighvik _ negh ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ ighu k _ ugugnaghagh m _ ighu kek _ negh ma kek _ .
taagken _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ aqsa a _ kenegraamaan _ , _ “ _ kaay _ aqsa n _ aafkagh lleqe uq _ . _ ”
unug ma kanga _ qavagh luteng _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ Qayaqsighvigem _ nagaqumakangi _ esla mi _ aragh te lghiit _ , _ “ _ tungtuvag _ esghaghaghput _ ! _ ”
taagken _ aanleghaate luteng _ aghulaqe ma lghiit _ naayghagh nun _ .
ama _ Qayaqsighviklu _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kangi _ yug t _ iighagh uute lghiit _ .
legan _ makete kestagh nghaani _ alinge aqe lghiit _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ Qayaqsighvigem _ taana _ tungtu _ tungtu u nghite uq _ , _ kuuniisanguftuq _ .
Qayaqsighvigem _ tuute qaghte ma kanga _ tuqute luku _ .
aragh te ma lghii _ yuug _ tamana _ , _ “ _ tungtuvag _ tuqute a _ nengaawaam _ tuute qaghte luku _ !
yuug _ tamana _ atghagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
ama _ Qayaqsighviklu _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ Qayaqsighvik _ ighnegh nge kau lghii _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ aane yalghiimi _ tamana _ yuug _ aga _ tenge uute ma lghii _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ aqergiigh u uq _ .
aghulaqe ma lghiit _ nuna mun _ ighnegh ke te lghiit _ .
taagken _ kaate yalghiimeng _ Qayaqsighvigmun _ paaghqite uq _ .
esghagh ma kanga _ nanevgagh _ .
mekelghiigh m _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saam _ yug ke aten _ sa u ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ Imanguuuuq _ , _ ayumigh _ anengagh ka _ Qayaqsighvik _ yuqaqaaftuq _ .
whanga _ whaa _ atigh mafte aatnga _ taameng _ ategh meng _ .
saama _ ata put _ naa put _ neghigh pigte luteng _ tuqu kau ut _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
qayuutagh m _ kayusigh iqe a _ aghnagh
Iinmanguq _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nula i kek _ avaqutaghtuqagh _ .
uksugh nghagu _ yuug _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ kiig yagu _ qayaghtugh nghmini _ aghtugh ma lghii _ unange nghmeng _ ama _ ila aneng _ aghnegh neng _ palaghhagh u luku _ unange aqe lghii _ .
uksugh yagu _ amalleqa _ unange nghmeng _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
Hangani _ negh kangit _ palaghhagh ughte yata _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whaa _ pirughte yaghtugh naqe unga _ amavek _ qantaghanlengughnun _ quyilleg nun _ ! _ ”
aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ qamiye gneng _ qamugh luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ , _ Neghesimaan _ alla _ gaagh te magh an _ quyngigh meng _ .
taaqe yami _ aghulaqe naqe ma yagh lghii _ yug m _ quyilleg m _ ighleke ma kanga _ .
sagiqe ma lghii _ ighlekuughte ma kanga _ .
qavaa ma lghiit _ .
tawa _ yuggagh _ aghtugh ma lghii _ qavagh nghmeng _ qayughllagʼqun _ avaquti a _ neqe ite ngugh t _ .
ima _ qavaa ma lghii _ pegnem _ .
unaami _ taghtugh yalghiimeng _ umegnegh ghllag _ tawani _ aghneghte ma lghii _ .
amenam _ taam _ yuggagh m _ mengteghagh mii a _ tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ .
unug aqe a _ iiwenllu _ samakavlegusimalghii _ .
qelagh ma kanga _ aghnagh m _ qalghigh yalghiimi _ tughneghagh u uq _ .
nuug ma lghii _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ amig kun _ tefli mi _ ayuqe uq _ .
aghnagh m _ upugha te ma kanga _ negh sqellug qu _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Igleghtaagunga _ negh na lunga _ taakuneng _ avaqutagh gpeneng _ aghuliigh unga _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Utaqiigi _ , _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ atqaghlluni _ uughqa nun _ sinumun _ ivagh i luni _ tiguynga1 _ tugu luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ anigu _ qaanghaniteghngaan _ nusug ragh aqe zigu _ ? _ ”
itegh ma lghii _ .
saama _ tughneghagh _ tungsighwaaghaquq _ avaquti a _ negh na luki _ .
tiguynge _ aanqute yalghiimi _ ilagaate meng _ imani _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .
llaaghanwha _ qavaa ma lghii _ tughneghagh _ .
tamaani _ ilagagh ma lghii _ iwemgaqun _ ilagaate i _ qamagte ma kangi _ .
qamagte yamiki _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ tungsighwaaghumalghii _ .
Aghnampimakanga _ , _ “ _ Utaqiigi _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ ”
Atqaghlluni _ aywaa nun _ sinumun _ ivgagh i luni _ tugu luki _ neqe mun _ igu qugh sigh _ quyngigh m _ kelpanga _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
aleghqugh magh an _ , _ “ _ enngaatall _ elpek _ sumeghnegh gpetun _ sa luki mi _ uguqnam _ ilunganilnguut _ nusug ragh aqe ziki _ ? _ ”
mulu luni _ taama _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ nunaki luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ unaghsigh _ anegh igh uute ma kanga _ .
Anighqwaamalghii _ iiwenllu _ nepiigh aqe uq _ tughneghagh _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh nghmini _ tungsighwaaghaqelghii _ taghnughhamengneghnaluni _ .
nuug luni _ anighqute ni _ tugu luku _ napaghte ma kanga _ .
anighqute ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ anighqute mi _ whani _ sumeghnegh gpegun _ sa luki mi _ sa u aat _ gaagh aqe ziki _ kukilamaghngata _ . _ ”
anighqute _ ilagagh yalghiimi _ imani _ wata _ nunanigh ghllag uq _ .
talwa _ tughneghagh _ qavaa ma lghii _ umu luku _ .
aghnagh _ atqaghlluni _ vegaagh t _ uygu qu tete luki _ tughneghagh _ amig mun _ qepute ma kanga _ .
anighqute _ naange yalghiimi _ taghtugh ma lghii _ .
taghtugh luni _ qaprag naqe yalghiimi _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ iteme te nga _ !
pi naanghite amken _ ! _ ”
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ iteme te naanghite amken _ .
ugi ka _ utaqa naqe aqa _ tuqutesqelluten _ . _ ”
whaken _ tuune aqe amken _ . _ ”
“ _ enta _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ ”
tughneghagh m _ kelgute ma kanga _ qayuutagh ni _ saama _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enngaatall _ aghtugh sigh ke nghite na yaqen _ sa u a _ neghyuke gkan _ tugu na yaqen _ . _ ”
“ _ enta _ esghapag laken _ .
piigh ten _ . _ ”
Tughneghaampimakanga _ , _ “ _ taawanginaq _ quunpeng _ aaghte luku _ kiyaghtaaghutaqigu _ saama _ whaten _ pi yaghqaa uten _ . _ ”
legan _ mat- ketu te kete luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ quyngigh yug unga _ ! _ ”
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ , _ lli yagh kete ni _ quyngigh _ .
“ _ tawa _ tawaten _ pi aqe i _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ iteme te ma kanga _ .
aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Agum _ waamte aanga _ ! _ ”
qayuutagh ni _ nusug ma kanga _ .
nusug luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ tughneghagh _ aagna _ esghagh yug aqa _ ! _ ”
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
tughneghagh _ uteghtesimakanga _ .
tughneghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga mnun _ pi u luku _ tuune mangite aqa _ ! _ ”
aane luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ megh mun _ nengug te luku _ qayuutagh ni _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ neghsagh yug unga _ ! _ ”
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
ukigsagh kete ni _ neghsagh meng _ .
allameng _ pi laatagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ maklag yug unga _ ! _ ”
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
Ugigsaqenni _ , _ maklag meng _ .
afta luku _ sinumun _ lli ma kanga _ .
unaami _ aghte yagu _ yuggagh _ quyngigh meng _ qamiye gni _ usilukek _ tagi ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ “ _ kayusigh qagh nga _ ! _ ”
aghnagh _ aatqaghte luni _ kayusi ma kanga _ .
taaqe yamigu _ aghnagh _ sinumun _ ivgagh luni _ siqlugighumalghii _ kuyagaghmeng _ .
yuggagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ naqam _ sa meng _ siqlug igh aqe ziin _ , _ avangite aqe luta _ . _ ”
“ _ Kakakakaka _ , _ nepiighelten _ ! _ ”
yuggagh _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ uyuqlighpigaam _ igheghan _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghnagh _ sama _ qayuutaghalguuq _ . _ ”
yuug _ legan _ uqengaghyugsimalghii _ yuuke ma lghii _ quya ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ itegh yami _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
yug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ manguna yug qu a _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ qayuutagh ni _ nengug te luku _ megh m _ tunganganun _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ manguna yug unga _ ! _ ”
uqigtughte te ma lghii _ .
ukigsagh kete ni _ manguna lgu uq _ .
ugi an _ pi laatagh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Aghveghyugigatepigsin _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ megh mun _ qayuutagh ni _ nengug te luku _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qayuutagh mi _ uumi _ mangtag yug unga _ ! _ ”
katag te ma kangi _ mangtag ghllag _ .
taagken _ tawani _ pinitun _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
Yughqutaam _ ighnegh a _ kiighwyagh ughtekagh
kiyaghte ma a _ nalighmeng _ kiyaghte ma ita _ , _ maalghug _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ yug k _ avaqutagh ite ngugh k _ .
ilangani _ yuug _ kiwatmeggnun _ pi ma luku _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh _ ighni naqe lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh meng _ qesiqun _ tuute ma kanga _ yughqutagh _ pi na aqa _ .
taana _ taghnughhagh _ angli ma lghii _ atghagh te yagh kete ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghnegh mun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kiyaghnegh m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ “ _ Saam _ una _ pi kagu _ ? _ ”
“ _ una mi _ yughqutaam _ ighniigha _ . _ ”
Kiyaghneghempimakanga _ taghnughhagh _ , _ “ _ aa _ ingavek _ aglagh a _ kiighwyagh nun _ . _ ”
taghnughhagh _ aglagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh ughte ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ . _ tefaay _ .
kiighwyagh
iimnanguq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ salin _ .
mughunniigh aqe lghii _ naqamunangaqelghii _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ mughute luni _ aghtugh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ unug ma kanga _ .
qule mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ kiighwyagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
esghagh yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh neng _ mengteghagh ite nigh m _ aga _ ifkagh uq _ key- nghhagh _ .
legan _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ iteghyalghnmi _ nulighh a _ aqsanguma lghii _ .
negh te luteng _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ yuug _ mughute ma lghii _ .
unange luni _ neghsagh meng _ tagi yalghiimi _ nulighh a _ ighni i ma lghii _ mekelghiigh meng _ .
ugi an _ aghnagh m _ atigh ma kanga _ , _ kiighwyagh meng _ .
qavagh ghhagh inagh kun _ angli ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ aqsa nge laatagh ma lghii _ .
ighni yalghiimi _ aghnaghagh meng _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ alla _ aghnagh _ aqsa nge nanigh ma lghii _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
tawani _ nunugh a mi _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
qenwat _ aghnagh aq _ angli ghllag ma lghii _ ama _ mekelghiigh llu _ taana _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ ata at _ mughute luni _ iike te ma kanga _ .
ima _ tuquma lghii _ .
Naangatugiminengnagaquulluni _ tuqute ma lghii _ ellmi neng _ .
mekelghiigh m _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ata nka _ naa nka _ tuqu laghate te ut _ .
sumeghtaghagh aqe uten _ entaqun _ temngi _ nuna mete ni luki _ .
whaa _ uum _ kenle aneng _ aqnigh gpenani _ tuqukagh _ kaape luni _ kanagh luni _ meghqe te luni _ taana _ kiighwyagh mun _ mayugh aqe uq _ .
aga _ ata put _ naa put _ may- ma ut _ . _ ”
mekelghiigh _ unug yagu _ aane luni _ tapghagh _ qule mun _ miluute yagh kete ni _ kiighwyagh kun _ agaamalghii _ .
taaggun _ tapghagh qun _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ aghqutaallghiinun1 _ ilate ma lghii _ repall _ teghigniqem _ puygu luku _ nayag ni _ .
qesiqun _ uksugh qugh aqe uq _ .
tea- ma kut _ kiighwyagh t _ taana _ mekelghiigh _ umiilgughtesimakangat _ .
qesiqun _ aane yan _ mengteghagh mineng _ salin _ nuna mete luku _ yug t _ ila ita _ qemite ma ut _ .
llaaghanwha _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
ama _ yuug _ kaapekagh _ , _ qemitekagh _ , _ suflugagh ke aq _ sangami _ tuqu rakegte aqa _ ?
Qayughllagʼqun _ kiighwyagh ni _ aghqe taute lghii ni _ teghigniqem _ puygu aqe lghiit _ yug t _ unguva lleghqagh teng _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
neghsagh m _ vuvalla a
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma uq _ yuug _ nuliigh leg _ saama _ nunalgutetuqagh t _ .
naqam _ mughunniigh aqe lghii _ taana _ yuug _ unaaqute nghagu _ unange gpenani _ .
talwa _ ataasigh ghhagh meng _ akuraasigalnguq _ .
ila i _ unange uute aqe lghiit _ .
ila ngam _ yuug _ taana _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute luni _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate luku _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
Tawansimaluku _ neghsagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
nuug luni _ yuukpimakanga _ , _ “ _ Ramkelasap _ ! _ ” _ legan _ taaqe luni _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
Yuuktaana _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ aagna _ pi a _ ? _ ”
taagken _ yug m _ kengagni _ tenglug lukek _ kakeghqughyami _ itegagh mi _ asi i _ kanuughqe ma kangi _ .
sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ nuliigh ni _ waamnnaluku _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yami _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ unange ma yagh unga _ ima _ sefkagh te ma uq _ . _ ”
Llaaghnawha _ nulighh an _ ugpeqe ma kanga _ ugi ni _ .
taagken _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ unangupiglluku _ taghtugh luni _ negh luni _ mughute ma lghii _ .
mughute yalghiimi _ anglu _ kaate ma kanga _ .
kaate yamigu _ saaghw akun _ aqume ma lghii _ .
mulu luni _ neghsagh _ nuug ma lghii _ .
yug m _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ ighivgaghniimna u uq _ .
neghsagh m _ taam _ pilataamakanga _ , _ “ _ Ramkelasap _ ! _ ”
aga _ mughyug aghte ma lghii _ .
taagken _ yuug _ nekeve luni _ maligte te ma lghii _ neghsagh mun _ .
megh mun _ ategh yalghiimi _ teghhanun _ pesugh yug qagh nghite uq _ .
masisu _ esghagh ma kanga _ aga _ yuggagh _ talligh leg llu _ ighu leg llu _ takestaaghhagh meng _ naqam _ yugusigh a _ aange pigte lghii _ .
qesiqun _ neghsagh u uq _ .
yug m _ taana _ yuggagh _ maligsimakanganenglumun _ .
itegh yan _ iteghvig anun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ esghagh ma kanga _ yug m _ taam _ neghsagh t _ vuvallalghiit _ .
tesqamaken _ neghsagh t _ nanevgagh ita _ yuug _ taana _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ itegh i _ esghapag yagh a _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ esghapag ma kangi _ .
Nanevgaam _ neghsagh m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ saguyagh gka _ tagivagh kek _ !
ilagagh naqe unga _ . _ ”
nulighh an _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ tuune ma kek _ ugi minun _ .
ugi an _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Qulighhamtaanguq _ paaaa-aamkut _ , _ qulighhaamtaanguq _ paaaa-aamut _ , _ Iyngighhaput _ mesiighpag llaagllug qu ai _ neqniqe aqe ait _ ! _ ”
qalghigh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Qagisavisavisavii _ , _ qagisavisavisavii _ ! _ ”
taagken _ nanevgagh at _ neghsagh t _ aghnaghagh t _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ aghnaghagh t _ putughutek _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh _ neghsagh _ aanqute ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Iquyelqutaa _ iyaaaa _ , _ qaghpa lug ke a _ iyaa- a _ , _ manuqelleghaaqaa _ iyaa- a _ ! _ ”
tawa _ vuvalla _ qamagte ma lghii _ .
Nanevgaam _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ “ _ una _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune gu _ . _ ”
nulighh an _ yuug _ elqwaagh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
Nanevgaam _ neghsagh m _ yuug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qaa _ uggnaqegkuvek _ quunqagh magh gpek _ qesigh u qagh magh gpek _ uugte lghaaten _ .
ima _ naten _ pi naagh ut _ elqwaagh t _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yuug _ aane luni _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
Uggnaqsami _ quunqagh magh mi _ uugte ma lghii _ saama _ elqwaagh t _ lli ma kangi _ .
esghagh ma kangi _ neghsagh lghute t _ .
yug m _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate luku _ angaghqugh ma kangit _ qamagte luki _ .
taawa _ taam _ kenle aneng _ yuug _ taana _ unangyughighllagumalghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
meteghllug _ nulighhtuqagh _ ayuqligh t _ aghnagh itneng
iimnanguq _ , _ kiyaghte ma ut _ tallimat _ mengteghagh t _ .
taakut _ mengteghagh t _ yug i _ anglegute ke te lghiit _ .
naqam _ kelulighneghhitni _ kiyaghte lghiik _ meteghllug nkuk _ nenge yu qutagh lghiik _ .
ilangani _ nuyekliimpaniga _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .
Meteghllugempimakanga _ , _ “ _ Meqpakpayay _ , _ meqpakpayay _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
meteghllug _ megh naqe yalghiimi _ megh _ nuna mun _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
Aghnaghaampimakanga _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ “ _ saa _ una _ megh _ imighutaa _ piqpigutaa _ . _ ”
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Piyaqtaqpenguyoy _ , _ piyaqtelqen _ taana _ miqiitiguu _ ! _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Miqiningilak _ , _ taskwigu _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ ama _ meteghllug _ ellmeggnun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ kaate luni _ nengyugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfaqugh ghhu _ . _ ”
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aane luni _ mengteghagh nun _ sivulighpigaghnun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ “ _ sa aqe ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnalqwaagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ ”
yug m _ llilasimakanga _ ngepeghakun _ savig meng _ pilag sqellug qu _ .
pilag ma kangat _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
unaami _ uyuqligh m _ yug m _ panig a _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ kaate ma lghii _ megheghlluk _ ighivgaghtaq _ .
meteghllug m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Meqpakpayay _ , _ meqpakpayay _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ “ _ saa _ una _ megh _ imnghuta _ piqpigutaa _ . _ ”
“ _ Piyaqtaqpenguyoy _ , _ piyaqtelqen _ taana _ miqiitiguu _ ! _ ”
“ _ Miqinningilaqa _ taskwigu _ ! _ ”
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
Metelghlluk _ taglagh ma lghii _ ellmeggnun _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nengyugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfa qu gu _ . _ ”
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
Tunglighhiitgun _ manteghanun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ “ _ sa aqe ziin _ sangavek _ tagi ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ “ _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ ”
akite ma kangat _ , _ “ _ Uquklukuughaquq _ , _ anaqlukaguq _ mekesitaghaguq _ . _ ”
saama _ savig meng _ nepeghhakek _ pilag ma gkek _ , _ saama _ ketngig kek _ pilag ma kegket _ .
qiya magh mi _ aghnalqwaagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
qenwat _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ qengakekpuuvumakek _ .
unaami _ enraq _ pi nga yiite a _ mengteghagh at _ aghnaghagh t _ meghtagh a _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Meqpakpayay _ , _ meqpakpayay _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ “ _ saa _ una _ megh _ imighutaa _ piqpigutaa _ . _ ”
“ _ Piyaqtaqpenguyoy _ , _ piyaqtelqen _ taana _ miqiitiguu _ ! _ ”
“ _ Miqinningilaqa _ taskwigu _ ! _ ”
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ taglagh ma lghii _ ellmeggnun _ .
itegh luni _ aghnalqwaagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfa qu gu _ . _ ”
ighsa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ pingayut ii te nun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uyatu luni _ amig meng _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ ”
Anqaghlluteng _ savig meng _ qengagh kek _ pilag ma kegket _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ unug yagu _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ estamat ii te a _ mengteghagh at _ aghnagh aq _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Meqpakpayay _ , _ meqpakpayay _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ “ _ saa _ una _ megh _ imighutaa _ piqpigutaa _ . _ ”
“ _ Piyaqtaqpenguyoy _ , _ piyaqtelqen _ taana _ miqiitiguu _ ! _ ”
“ _ Miqinningilaqa _ taskwigu _ ! _ ”
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ taglagh ma lghii _ ellmeggnun _ .
itegh luni _ aghnalqwaagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfa qu gu _ . _ ”
ighsa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ estamat ii te nun _ mengteghagh nun _ .
kaate luni _ uyatu luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ ”
taakut _ malighqagh luku _ qengagh kek _ savig meng _ pilag ma kegket _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh _ qiya magh mi _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
unug ma kanga _ .
qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ taghtugh ma lghiit _ taam _ nuna m _ yug i _ .
taagken _ enraq _ tallimat ii te a _ mengteghagh at _ aghnagh aq _ meghtagh ma lghii _ .
imigh i ma luku _ meteghllug _ kaate ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ meghsi ngllagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Meqpakpayay _ , _ meqpakpayay _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ meghsi ma kanga _ .
taawanginaq _ kuuve ma kanga _ .
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ pateg magh an _ , _ “ _ saa _ una _ megh _ imighutaa _ piiqpigutaa _ . _ ”
“ _ Piyaqtaqpenguyoy _ , _ piyaqtelqen _ taana _ miqiitiguu _ ! _ ”
“ _ Miqinningilaqa _ taskwigu _ ! _ ”
aghnagh aq _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
meteghllug _ taglagh ma lghii _ ellmeggnun _ .
itegh luni _ aghnalqwaagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ukaagh nge uten _ ukaagh n _ aqfa qu gu _ . _ ”
ighsa ma lghii _ .
meteghllug m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ amig meng _ uyatu pigte luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ eltughagh ma _ ukaagh nge ni lunga _ pi yagh aanga _ . _ ”
talwa _ akuzi magh mi _ qimag ma lghii _ .
iwernga _ aghnaghagh m _ ata an _ panig ni _ angegh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh aq _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yalghiimi _ kagpestaaghhagh u ut _ .
taagken _ aghnagh aq _ qiya ma lghii _ .
Aghaghaq _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ aghnagh aq _ qiya lghii _ esghagh luku _ atugh magh mi _ aghula yalghiimi _ mengteghagh ni _ angli te ma kanga _ saama _ iqa nge i tesi ma kanga _ .
taana _ eltugh aa _ yupig ughte ma lghii _ ama _ taana llu _ aghnalqwaagh _ .
aghnagh aq _ unaami _ taghtugh yalghiimi _ imani _ enngaatall _ pinigh pigte ut _ .
taagken _ aghnalqwaagh ghhagh m _ awaligh ta ii sqe ma kanga _ quyngigh meng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh aq _ awalightugh ma lghii _ .
Tuuneghminiki _ aghnaghagh t _ ila i _ pi aqe lghiit _ , _ “ _ ipa _ whanga _ piksaghaqa _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aklungi igh i ma lghiit _ saama _ yupig ughte ma lghiit _ .
qamagte uq _ , _ tefaay _ .
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte aagh _ quurkeli _ meteghllug
iimnanguq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ tannge t _ umiileg at _ quyngightu pigte lghii _ .
quyngigh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ .
naqam _ taana _ umiileg _ ighnegh leg _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ umiileg m _ quyngigh a _ aveg luni _ iilaamalghii _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ qevuute pigte luni _ .
naayghagh mi _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ quurkeli _ ighnegh leg _ maalghug gneng _ , _ nuyekligh _ ighnegh a _ aghnaasigh _ , _ uyughagh a _ itagnagh lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aane yalghiimi _ nuyekligh _ esghaate ma lghii _ quyngigh meng _ uglagh pigte lghii meng _ .
itegh luni _ ata ni _ quurkeli _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saam _ qakemna _ quyngigh ke agu _ ? _ ”
“ _ enta _ amig mun _ aliighte aghte gu _ . _ ”
ata ni _ pi yatni _ nuyekliim _ igheghan _ ivgagh te ma kanga _ .
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ tannge t _ umiileg ita _ quyngigh ke aat _ . _ ”
uyuqligh _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aa _ , _ naqam _ Tengagergemun _ pi a _ , _ whaten _ pi naken _ , _ ‘ _ saamnguq _ una _ quyngigh ke agu _ ? _ ’
ungipaate kangaten _ ukig ggaaten _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ uyuqligh _ mayugh ma lghii _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
qaygeghte yamigu _ tamana _ mengteghaam _ kiwatangitni _ negh niigh ma lghii _ .
Tengagergem _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ weni _ esghapag qaghaqe luten _ sa u aat _ tagi yaaghte ut _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ aane luni _ esghagh ma kanga _ meteghllug _ .
aghnagh aq _ itegh luni _ tengagergete _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taawanginaq _ inga _ esghagh aqa _ meteghllug _ . _ ”
“ _ aqfa gu _ tagi li nguq _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh m _ aqfa ma kanga _ .
kaate luni _ aghnaghagh m _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ata ma _ whanga _ agligh sqe aaten _ . _ ”
meteghllug m _ qule mun _ esghaqagh luku _ uugte luni _ negh ma lghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh luni _ ata ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Avelghaqinaghaanga _ . _ ”
ata an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Kevgaangukuninguq _ tagi li _ sukate luni _ ! _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ taku luku _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ , _ “ _ Kevgaangukuvegnguq _ aglagh a _ sukate luten _ ! _ ”
“ _ whaten _ pi gu _ saamna nguq _ saam _ quyngigh ke agu _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ aglagh luni _ pi ma kanga _ ata ni _ , _ “ _ pi uten _ whaten _ , _ saamna nguq _ saam _ quyngigh ke agu _ . _ ”
ata an _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wanlegi _ whaten _ pi gu _ , _ tagi li nguq _ ellmi neng _ . _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ aglagh luni _ meteghllug _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Aglanguq _ sukate luten _ ! _ ”
meteghllug _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ kiyaghnegh m _ Tengagergem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa u a mi _ pi aqe zigu _ ? _ ”
“ _ Saam _ saamna _ quyngigh ke agu _ . _ ”
Tengagergem _ nanigh _ awite luku _ esghagh yalghiimi _ meteghllug _ asitmun _ esghagh ma kangi _ mengteghagh m _ saaghw ani _ quyngigh t _ ama _ tannge t _ .
Tengagergem _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ esgha _ taakusta _ tannge t _ taana _ quyngigh ke aat _ . _ ”
meteghllug _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aane luni _ ukig ma lghii _ .
uugte luni _ ellmegteggun _ , _ pi ma kanga _ ata ni _ , _ “ _ whangkuta nge uq _ pikagh ut _ . _ ”
ata ita _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ naqam _ tuqutagh igh tek _ ! _ ”
uyughagh ke te lghiik _ aane lutek _ tuqutagh igh ma lghiik _ .
tuqute ma kegket _ angepaaghrugllagek _ .
itghute luki _ negh ma kangat _ .
taaqe yamek _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ aane ma lghiik _ .
aane lutek _ quyngigh mi _ nayugh i ma lghiik _ .
tannge t _ qemguumalghiit _ .
Qaghlughimalghiit _ sughug i na luteng _ .
taaqe yameng _ tannge t _ ghhatagh ma lghiit _ .
ivagh i ma lghiit _ .
taawanginaq _ taananginaghhaq _ mayugh igate kangat _ .
umiileg _ mayugh ma lghii _ tume iigh aqe luni _ .
uugte luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
