umiileg m _ quyngigh t _ esghagh naqe te inagh _ liisuqe ma kangi _ .
esghaate lutek _ mekelghiigh k _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ ata eng _ pi ma kangat _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh _ qakma _ ! _ ”
“ _ weni _ itegh sqe i uute ggu _ ! _ ”
Aanyagʼta _ tannge t _ umiileg ita _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Saam _ una _ quyngigh ke agu _ ? _ ”
“ _ whangkuta _ ! _ ”
alla _ aapte laatagh ma kangi _ , _ “ _ waniwanllu _ , _ esghaate aghte aqe i te n _ quyngigh meng _ ? _ ”
“ _ waniwanllu _ ! _ ”
tannge t _ aga _ qiive luteng _ ukig yalghiimeng _ aga _ quyngigh eng _ ukig sigh u ma kangat _ qamagaghlluku _ .
taawanginaq _ ellngit a _ quyngigh gket _ siipte ma lghiik _ .
mekelghiigh k _ taake uk _ amigughimalghiik _ iwernga _ paninang _ ukig te ma kangi _ .
uyuqligh _ itegh aghte luni _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
qukaghte yamigu _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ .
atghagh aatagh luni _ anuqe _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ qanigpagtuumagh mi _ umegneghtuumagh an _ .
tannge t _ naqam _ umegnegh ughte yagu _ quyngigh teng _ sighunghitgun _ qepe ma kangit _ .
mekelghiigh m _ quurkeli m _ ighnegh an _ taana _ quyngigh _ mayugh te ma kanga _ naayghagh m _ nangaghte te llegh anun _ .
Uuggusamigu _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ anuqe _ umegneghtuumagh an _ qanig ite ngughk _ .
anuqligh yagh kete ni _ taana _ nangaghte llegh _ anigu _ suupe ma kanga _ .
tannge t _ umiileg ita _ ilagagh luni _ taana _ naayghagh _ kaavesimakanga _ .
kaave yan _ quynighteng _ veghte ma kangat _ .
veghte nghmeng _ taaqe yamigu _ taana _ naayghagh _ naagh llegh u tesi ma kanga _ nekegneghagh tun _ .
ima _ quurkeli nkut _ avangite te ma lghiit _ quyngigh igh te ma lghiit _ .
quurkeli _ ungipaate ma kangat _ , _ “ _ quyngigh ut _ aga _ ukig te ma ut _ ! _ ”
quurkeli _ nuug luni _ tengagergete _ kiyaghnegh _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ .
ukig ma lghii _ .
quurkeli m _ pi ma ke aanga _ , _ “ _ saamkut _ sama _ quyngigh ut _ ellngit a _ pi naqe aat _ .
Kayusiqaghkut _ . _ ”
“ _ kayusigh naanghite amsi _ .
tawaten _ pi nghite amsi _ elpenun _ quyngigh ke ni luku _ ! _ ”
aga _ ima _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
legan _ quurkeli _ pilugug uq _ .
ukig ma lghii _ .
taawa _ yugtu ut _ .
umiileg m _ llilasimakangat _ piigigh sqellug qu _ .
llaaghanwha _ piigugh kaqe ma kangat _ iwernga _ tuqute gpenaan _ .
legan _ taaqe yatni _ taghnughhagh _ qavagh lghii _ puvug yagh kete ni _ tuqute luku _ .
umiileg m _ esghagh luku _ tuqu lghii _ taghnughhagh ni _ quurkeli _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ilagagh a _ maame ste gu _ . _ ”
“ _ pi naanghite unga _ . _ ”
“ _ tuqute i tete nayagh amken _ . _ ”
“ _ wetku _ quyngigh i _ aveg luku _ tagivagh kufsigu _ taawa _ unguvagh lleqe aqa _ . _ ”
pi ma kangat _ , _ “ _ yeghrat _ tawaatesigatut _ alignagh ghngaaghmeng _ ! _ ”
quurkeli _ angegh ma lghii _ .
“ _ Aaaa _ , _ naqam _ ilagagh langa _ . _ ”
ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh luni _ atghagha aghagh ma lghii _ .
atghagh aatagh luni _ mayugh ma lghii _ .
mayugh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sama _ quyngimatiinkut _ . _ ”
aane lutek _ ukig lutek _ esghaghyaqeseng _ quyngigh _ aveg luni _ ayuqe uq _ palaghhagh _ ila a _ , _ ila a _ uglagh lghii _ .
uyuqligh m _ pi ma kanga _ nuyekligh _ , _ “ _ uglagh llegh a _ tugu lteggu _ ! _ ”
angegh ma lghii _ .
naqam _ paghqiteftut _ .
yug ite uq _ .
legan _ mayugh te ma kangat _ .
mayugh ma luki _ umiileg m _ ighnegh an _ malighqagh ma kangi _ .
meteghllug k _ utaqa ma kangat _ .
kaate yan _ tuqute ma kangat _ .
umiileg m _ esghagh luku _ ighnegh ni _ tuqu lghii _ yug ni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Aagkuk _ wayagh tekek _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ kaate luki _ wayagh luki _ quyngigh teng _ piigughtamakangat _ tuqute gpenaki _ .
naqam _ anuqligh ma kanga _ umegnegh ughte ma lghii _ qevuute luni _ .
mayugh naqe yalghiimek _ aghtugh ma lghiik _ .
mayugh negh megteni _ , _ nagnegh aqe lghiik _ amavek _ naayghagh m _ awata anun _ mengteghagh eng _ naghughte luku _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma lghiik _ .
ivgagh negh megteni _ nagnegh aqe luteng _ .
Iwemga _ pegnem _ uugte ma lghiik _ .
Nuyekliim _ ata ni llu _ uyughagh ni llu _ pimakangek _ , _ “ _ yeghrat _ elpesi neng _ naafqestaghpesinga _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nuyekligh _ tuquma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
afsengagh ghhagh
iimnanguq _ , _ afsengagh ghhagh _ meqsaghtugh ma lghii _ naayvagh m _ qukaa nun _ .
megh ma lghii _ anglaagh ghhagh _ ukite luku _ .
megh nghmeng _ taaqe luni _ aqume ma lghii _ anglaagh m _ saaghw ani _ .
meghnaali ma lghii _ tawani _ .
meghnaali ma luku _ papeg a _ kumlatusimakanga _ .
ilagagh ma lghii _ inqunamen _ papeg ni _ ghhataghtesqelluku _ , _ “ _ Kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ ukigem _ talate anga _ !
Kiyayuvaghluktungaaaa _ !
Amiqluk _ pikrungaaaaaa _ , _ taymanalukaa _ , _ kalalikaaaa _ , _ taymanalukaa _ , _ kalalikaaaa _ . _ ”
taaqe ma lghii _ ilagagh nghmeng _ .
sunanguq _ taana _ amiqluggaq _ ketfagh aghte a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ awite te n _ !
uuynite uten _ ! _ ”
Amiqluggaq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ ukigem _ talate anga _ !
Kiyayuvaghluktungaaaa _ , _ sikig _ pikrungaaaaaa _ , _ taymanalukaa _ , _ kalalikaaaa _ . _ ”
sunanguq _ taana _ sikiggaq _ ketfagh a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ awite te n _ !
papegtu uten _ ! _ ”
Sikiggaq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ Kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ ukigem _ talate anga _ !
Kiyayuvaghluktungaaaa _ , _ ukazigh _ pikrungaaaaaa _ , _ taymanalukaa _ , _ kalalikaaaa _ . _ ”
sunanguq _ taana _ ukazigh ghhagh _ ketfagh a _ .
afsengagh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ awite te n _ !
papeg n _ mekestaaghhaa uq _ ! _ ”
ukazigh ghhagh _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
allameng _ ilagagh laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ Kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ kanakiii _ , _ ukigem _ talate anga _ !
Kiyayuvaghluktungaaaa _ , _ kaynge _ pikrungaaaaaa _ , _ taymanalukaa _ , _ kalalikaaaa _ . _ ”
sunanguq _ taana _ kaynge ghllag _ ketfagh aghte a _ .
ketfagh te kete luku _ afsengagh ghhagh _ pateg ma kanga _ .
papeg a _ kepkagh ma kanga _ .
tawaten _ kaynge m _ afsengagh ghhagh _ kayusigh ma kanga _ .
qamagte uq _ tefaay _ .
mayeraaghpag
aghnaghaghhagh t _ tallimat _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ esghagh luki _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luki _ ratamiiregnun _ kanaghte uute ma kangi _ .
unaghsigh ghllag mun _ petug ma kangi _ .
taaqe luki _ pi yagh kete ni _ , _ “ _ Unaqekaa _ ! _ ”
unaghsigh _ taklaaghaghsimalghii _ .
unite luku _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
tawaten _ kiyaghte ma luki _ aga _ kaynge ghllag _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
“ _ kaynge ghllag _ aagyuq _ llaghan _ yuggayengaalghiiten _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ ”
“ _ Neghniimsugumaluta _ yug gpesi _ unake naqe aqe ainkut _ . _ ”
“ _ sa qrugte aqe uq _ aagna _ ! _ ”
aga nguq _ meteghlluruk _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
“ _ Meteghlluruk _ aagyuq _ llaghanyuggayengaalghiiten _ , _ iteme teqaghti kut _ . _ ”
“ _ iteme teqaghte naanghite amsi _ .
aantagh ni _ neghniimsunemta _ milughpagaataghaqaghpesikut _ . _ ”
aga _ kaviigh ghhagh _ naghughte ma lghii _ .
“ _ kaviigh ghhagh _ aagyuq _ llaaghan _ yuggayengaalghiiten _ iteme teqaghti kut _ ! _ ”
“ _ iteme teqaghte na aqe amsi _ . _ ”
taku luki _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ “ _ naten _ pi aqe isi _ ? _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh t _ apeghtugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ pi gu _ uqfig _ , _ unaqekaa _ ! _ ”
kaviigh ghhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Unaqekaa _ ! _ ”
unaghsigh igh ghllag _ agughaghsimalghii _ .
iteme te ma kangi _ .
aanleghaate ma lghiit _ .
Tallimaghteng _ taghsaneghemng _ aghtugh luku _ aligh ni nguq _ unite ma kangat _ .
taake uk _ ratamiirek _ qilevri meng _ kevigh lukek _ qimag te ma lghiit _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ ulaagh ni _ ipegsagh luku _ taku ma kangi _ .
kaate luni _ aligh an _ inglu a _ pilag ma kanga _ .
pagunghagh t _ ifaquusimalghiit _ .
“ _ Iyeruuget _ , _ iyeruuget _ ! _ ”
inglu a _ pilag yagh kete ni _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ iqelqwa _ kepe qaghte ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ qiya ma lghii _ , _ “ _ keka _ keka _ kumaghqughtekelleqaghpenga _ ! _ ”
“ _ sangan _ uvegte luten _ ungipannaaghsinga _ . _ ”
aglagh te luku _ itghute ma kanga _ .
“ _ Apay _ , _ aane aghte langa _ . _ ”
“ _ sa meng qun _ kameg luten _ atkug luten _ ? _ ”
“ _ kameg ghllag gken _ atkug ghllag n _ aate lukek _ . _ ”
Aanesimakanga _ uqeghhmun _ uyatagh igh luku _ .
aane luni _ tawansimaluku _ yuggagh k _ tapghagh mi _ esghagh ma kek _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Yuggagka _ aliighhaghtuk _ aaaa _ tapghagh meng _ aaaa _ aligh kaghte uq _ aaaa _ aag llegh a _ pana leg _ aag llegh a _ pitegsitalek _ ! _ ”
“ _ Panikellemaay _ sa meng _ pi aqe ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ aatak _ naghuyaqellaankuk _ meteghlluglliqellaankuk _ pi aqe agka _ ! _ ”
taagken _ yug k _ kaate lutek _ itemlluku _ qimag te ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ .
mayeraaghpag m _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Panikellemaay _ , _ panikellemaay _ . _ ”
qalleg kau mangite uq _ .
aane yalghiimi _ aga _ uyavagh utu te ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ .
taagken _ malighqagh ma kangi _ .
“ _ Iitegʼqun _ kaate kumsi _ neghe lleqe kemsi _ ! _ ”
qimag inagh ma luki _ kaate yaghtu ma kangi _ .
“ _ aghnaghaghhagh u aagh mi _ siingenllu _ tughneghaaghtekalghiiten _ sa naqe i _ ! _ ”
uyghag meng _ tugu tete luni _ napaghte yagh kete ni _ naayghagh ghllag _ taaqe a _ aghvigh vig ite ngughk _ ava ite ngughk _ .
pegnem _ mayeraaghpag m _ mayugh luku _ malighqagh takagh nge i _ kaasaghtughyateng _ , _ “ _ aghnaghaghhagh _ siingenllu _ tughneghagh ughtekau uten _ , _ sa naqe i _ ! _ ”
iqelqugh ghhagh ni _ tawekenga _ qiipe ma lghii _ suupe magh an _ nuna _ teregh yagh kete ni _ kiiw ghllag k _ taaqe ma kek _ .
“ _ Panikellemaay _ naten _ aghvighlagngek _ ? _ ”
“ _ megh lukek _ ! _ ”
megh yagh ke gni _ megh yagh ke gni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ iitek _ tawa _ naangsaghtughagken _ ! _ ”
qamagte lukek _ nekeve ma lghii _ aqsa ghllag ni _ qamugh ke luku _ esleqem _ angtalanganeng _ .
pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ , _ “ _ Apay _ sangan _ pikavek _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye anun _ putughyanghisin _ ? _ ”
mayeraaghpag _ mayugh luni _ nutaan _ talligh gni _ qule mun _ nengugusaghaak _ aqsa a _ quupeaghaghte ma uq _ .
quupeaghaghte yalghiimi _ qayungllaasigh _ , _ qayusiq _ , _ signegh u aq _ , _ qaltagh _ legan _ allaghhiinaq _ sanqutraagh _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tallimat _ ngelqagh t
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ yug nkuk _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
taghnughhagh ite ngugh k _ ava ite ngugh k _ .
ugi a _ quyngigh ni _ esghapag yaghtugh aqe kanga _ .
ilangani _ maaten _ piyaa ma lghii _ quyngigh minun _ .
tallimat _ ngelqagh t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
taku yagh kete ni _ tenge nghite ut _ .
kaate luki _ tugu luki _ atghagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nulighh a _ quya ma lghii _ .
itghute ma kangi _ .
ugi a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ .
llaaghanwha _ taglagh yalghiimi _ saghnaamalghii _ .
llaaghanwha _ negh te ma lghiit _ ngelqagh t _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luteng _ unite luki _ ngelqagh teng _ aane ma lghiik _ .
nulighh a _ esnagh mun _ pi ma lghii _ kingu vzeghagh nun _ iqallugagh nun _ .
taglagh ma lghii _ .
iiwenllu _ mengteghagh mun _ kaate yaghtugh aqe uq _ atugh ghllag meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ .
“ _ Pagellegraay _ , _ pagellegraay _ , _ singtseraay _ , _ niquraangaangaaaa _ aange a _ iyaa- na nga a _ . _ ”
Iitqestaghluni _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ mekelghiigh t _ estamat _ atugh aqe ut _ ataasigh _ aghula aqe uq _ amiiragh teng _ mat- aghte luki _ .
Itqaghlluni _ amiiragh itgun _ aqume qaghte ma lghii _ .
Pngighsiimakangi _ .
llaaghanwha _ ugi a _ taaqe ma lghii _ quyngigh mun _ pi nghmeng _ .
taakut _ mekelghiigh t _ ellngit a _ taghnughhagh ke ma kangit _ .
yuggagh _ Unangyiilnguq _ enkaam _ nanugh
iimnanguq _ yuggagh _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ nunaagh mi _ enngaatall _ unange yiite pigte lghii _ .
ila i _ mughu ta lgu ta i _ unange aqe lghiit _ ellnga _ mughute luni _ taglagh nghmini _ ava ngunani _ .
nulighh a _ qagani _ nunalgute meggnun _ tungsigh niigh aqe lghii _ .
nuna lgu ta ita _ unange kaqe kangat _ neghsagh _ , _ maklag _ , _ ayvegh _ , _ nanugh _ .
ellnga _ yuggagh _ sakenge igate ngughk _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ mughute luteng _ taanʼganlluki _ anuqligh te ma kangi _ .
mughute aat _ nanughagh luteng _ amiiragh igh qiinagh luku _ anuqliisisteng _ taglagh ma lghiit _ .
enraq _ alla _ yuggagh _ unange yu i aatagh lghii _ iike te ma kanga _ .
aghtugh luni _ aghvigh naqe nghmeng _ inglu anun _ tungemeggnun _ ellmeng _ , _ kete mun _ anag ma lghii _ iighwillghaanun _ .
kaa sa mi _ angalghunun _ aglagh luni _ tawani _ nenglu ngllagh luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
tesqamani _ aqumgaamaluku _ nagaqugh te ma lghii _ uka _ alighumalghii _ ghhuu naqe ghllag _ sa u a _ .
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ uuk _ , _ enraq _ alla _ ifla ma yalghiinga _ .
sa u a _ uukna _ tagi a _ ? _ ”
uka nguq _ legan _ pi aqe uq _ , _ “ _ Ghuutaanga _ ghuutepigtaanga _ ! _ ”
iiwen _ yuggagh _ qineghte naqe aqe uq _ suna _ taana _ nanugh ghllag _ amiiragh ite ngughk _ , _ enngaatall _ ghhuu naqe aqe uq _ .
nanugh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ yuggagh _ uyuq _ navghitaghtinga _ pilugug gpeneng _ ghhuute pigte aanga _ . _ ”
yuggagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa meng qun _ navghillaken _ ? _ ”
“ _ Esghaataakuk _ atkugken _ ” _ “ _ Ukuuk _ ? _ ”
“ _ nakaa _ ila a _ ! _ ”
“ _ Ukuuk _ ? _ ”
kenigh ma kek _ atkuggaagni _ iluklighpigaghhaak _ aligh u aatagh lghiik _ nanugh m _ amiiragh aneng _ ulimaagh k _ .
nanugh m _ aanghumakanga _ .
yuggagh m _ mat- aghte lukek _ tuune ma kek _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ ! _ ”
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ .
quupute gnun _ kaate lutek _ yuggagh m _ atugh kuvinghagh u kek _ nanugh m _ megh mun _ nepte lukek _ nusug yagh ke gni _ ellngaate meng _ maaqumalghnk _ mesiighllug meng _ nuyiigh llegh _ maligte te luni _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayughllak _ unange aqe i _ nulighh n _ ukini aqe lghii _ ellngagh sigh u magh mi _ nuyiigh magh mi _ llaaghanwha _ ukini uq _ taaqe kanga _ nukeggnagh _ maligte te luku _ . _ ”
qafsina neng _ nepte aghte lukek _ ukmangigh u sagte a _ alla _ nepte lukek _ nusug yagh ke gni _ nanugh m _ amiiragh ghllag a _ nusug ma kanga _ .
taagken _ nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ wiin _ mengteghagh mnun _ maligte nga _ !
enan _ taglaate naagh amken _ . _ ”
nanugh m _ amu i ragh ghllag _ aate luku _ yuggagh nkuk _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
ketmiighte ma lghiik _ .
quupute t _ kaate nghmegteki _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ amagh luku _ aghvigh te aqe kanga _ .
iiwen _ maamlegtaqaa _ nanugh m _ ne anun _ kaate ma lghiik _ .
nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tawa _ kaate ukut _ itegh ghhaaten _ . _ ”
itegh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe lutek _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ qakma _ tenglugtugh ma kangit _ , _ “ _ naagu _ qaamna _ ? _ ”
“ _ taawa _ ” _ “ _ Aaam _ aane lghaaten _ . _ ”
“ _ qaywa _ aane aqe unga _ . _ ”
yuggagh _ nanugh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enngaatall _ esgha _ qakmun _ amyuutke aqe kanganga _ aqnigh qugh lunga _ .
maame ste gpenanga _ itagnatun _ aqfaqegkanganga _ tughumgha lgute u lunga _ . _ ”
yuggagh m _ aane aqe yan _ ipegsagh llegh meng _ igagh ma kanga _ qenleghwaagh akun _ .
nanugh _ aane ma lghii _ .
tagi gpenani _ mulu yan _ yuggagh _ agipanegh kun _ qineghte ma lghii _ .
maalghug _ nanugh k _ enngaatall _ tugutagh ke uk _ .
nutem _ aag llegh a _ pekagh ma lghii _ igaqe a _ aqume luni _ lliigh ma lghii _ .
aag llegh an _ pategpagataghaqeftaa _ .
yuggagh m _ ughlufghani _ yataghqelluku _ pitegsagh kete ni _ unake ma kanga _ aag llegh a _ .
nanugh _ pategmig kestagh ghngaaghmi _ ullghaghsimalghii _ .
ullegh aghte yan _ aag llegh an _ esghapagtugh ma kanga _ .
“ _ saa _ una _ ? _ ”
esghapagtugh kestagh ghngaaghmigu _ esghagh ma kek _ aaygu m _ taghrughhakek _ uunghaneng _ aliite lutek _ .
aagtuqagh ke uq llu _ kii mineng _ .
yuggagh _ aane luni _ tazingavek _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ nanugh m _ tukugh an _ aapte ma kanga _ yuggagh _ , _ “ _ sa zigu _ ? _ ”
“ _ sa nghite aqa _ ! _ ”
“ _ taawa _ amyuqetaghteke _ unake an _ .
whaken _ kenlanga _ pinitun _ kiyaghte yagute naqe unga _ .
maame gkuma _ nunavnun _ aglagh u lleqe amken _ saama _ unangyughisleqamken _ . _ ”
nanugh ghllag _ nekeve luni _ pegnem _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
yuggagh m _ maligte ma kanga _ .
itegh yan _ tea- ma kut _ amiiragh an _ makreg aghtagh llegh i _ saghnaamakangi _ .
yuggagh m _ mategtaqluki _ ukinighteghumakangi _ .
apeghiigh yamigu _ aane luni _ yuggagh m _ tuqutekagh ni _ nanugh _ afta ma kanga _ .
negh ka aneng _ neqekumalghii _ maame neghsigh te kete luku _ tukugh ni _ .
llaaghanwha _ maame yami _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
Aghvighyat _ kaate nghmegteki _ nanugh m _ amagh aqe kanga _ yuggagh _ .
Yugaam _ nuna anun _ qute mun _ kaate yaghtugh yamek _ unug neghsi ma kangat _ .
wetku _ unug yagu _ nanugh m _ yuggagh _ qute mun _ maallgute ma kanga _ .
uugte yan _ yuggagh _ nanugh _ qiive luni _ ketmiighte ma lghii _ .
yuggagh _ mengteghagh minun _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ yuggagh _ unangyiitkuvinghaaq _ unangyughqaamakanga _ .
qamagte uq _ .
yuug _ Napaqutaghhmii
yuug _ Napaqutaghhmii _ qayaghtugh ma lghii _ pennagh m _ tunganganun _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ esghagh ma kangi _ angyagh t _ kaalgugh lghiit _ aghvegh meng _ .
kaate luki _ esghaghte yagh ke yagh uq _ .
esghagh nghite aat _ .
yuggagh _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ nagun tuq _ aghvegh eng _ maallgute nagh katgu _ ?
esgha _ maligte yagh kumki _ . _ ”
yuggagh m _ kaalgugh lghiit _ kingu itneng _ maligte ma kangi _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luteng _ yuggagh _ esghapag yalghiimi _ nunaq _ allaq _ nuna ke nghitekagh minun _ tamlag uq _ .
esnagh mun _ uugte luni _ qaya ni _ sayug luku _ esghapag yalghiimi _ atghagh uute lghiit _ yug t _ nutaan _ esghagh ai _ .
aghvegh _ pilag ma kangat _ .
qepghagh lghiit _ akulangitni _ yuug _ esghapag ma lghii _ .
Kituraaggaam _ kiimsigh iqe igate kau nga _ .
aagute ghngaaghmegteggu _ esghagh igate kangat _ .
aghnagh m _ taghnughhagh leg m _ ugi ni _ tuqlugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ panig n _ atalughagh u te aghte gu _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ yug m _ panmi _ atalughagh u uute luku _ atalughagh t _ miluute ma kangi _ nuliigh mi _ manu anun _ .
atalughagh t _ tuute yata _ yug m _ tuute ma kangi _ .
aghnagh m _ ii- ligh u ai _ atalughagh t _ .
ivagh ma kangi _ uvite mini _ .
maaten _ agavek _ sa yan _ isekiyugesqelluku _ aghnagh _ yug m _ , _ atalughagh t _ tugu luki _ ggatmeghrug anun _ lli yagh ai _ .
aga _ atalughagh t _ amighregagh nun _ kii igh i te ma lghiit _ .
aghnagh _ aragh ma lghii _ agrepeni lug ni _ ggatmeghrug mikun _ .
ugi an _ tagi luni _ qamiye gnegun _ qaake luku _ taglaate ma kanga _ .
kingu itneng _ yuug _ maligte te luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
tumangani _ kaate ma kanga _ aghnagh _ qamiye gnegun _ mangtag meng _ usi lug ni _ qamugh meng _ taglagh aqe uq _ .
yug m _ kaate yamigu _ aqume ma lghii _ qamiye gnegun _ .
aghnagh _ igleghte nghmeng _ aghtugh yagute ma lghii _ .
pi uq _ aghnagh _ , _ “ _ sa yamek _ qamugh ke agka _ qamiye k _ sangyaghqwaagakek _ ?
agnepa _ meghnughyingalghiinga _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ aghuliigh luni _ meghnaali ma lghii _ .
yuug _ qamiye gneng _ nekeve luni _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh nun _ kaate luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ aghnagh _ gaaghaqeftuqneqmeng _ .
taawa _ saaghw ani _ qayutam _ qaye ani _ ugke t _ ugimneghhat _ .
Yuukpimalghii _ , _ “ _ aghnagh _ uyuq _ ugkevneng _ tuune aghte nga _ .
igatagh pigte unga _ . _ ”
“ _ kaay _ ava ii aanga _ , _ ” _ aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ .
Uraamra _ ugke meng _ tungsigh lghii _ .
yuug _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ tawani _ avii i _ ! _ ”
Qayutameng _ tugu te ma lghii _ ugke meng _ .
aghnagh _ pi laatagh uq _ , _ “ _ Kaaaay _ sulleve na ghhalek _ avii laatagh aanga _ aleghqupigmeng _ !
weni _ ugke ka _ aga _ tenguq _ ima _ aga _ aane uq _ !
Kaaaay _ entaqun _ imgagh unga _ ! _ ”
yug m _ ugke _ aane te luku _ uqeghhmi _ negh ma kanga _ .
ugke _ qamagte yamigu _ ila itnun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqume ma lghii _ amig m _ iiqngaakun _ .
maalghug _ aghnaghagh k _ neqe meng _ inglugtaalghiik _ esnagh meng _ kaate lutek _ mengteghagh mun _ neqe _ itghututkelluku _ aghnaghagh k _ kangsugh aatagh ma lghiik _ amig mi _ .
pi ma lghiik _ , _ “ _ sangami _ amig ut _ kagpellighaghta _ ? _ ”
yuug _ esghaghsaqneghmeng _ mataawi uq _ .
taagken _ mengteghagh neng _ aglagh ma lghii _ aqnightelget _ mengteghagh itnun _ .
kaate luni _ uqegh itni _ nagate ma lghii _ paninang _ aghnagh _ qama _ enngaatall _ ngillegte aqe uq _ .
alignagh lghiit _ qanemsug kayug t _ mataawi te ma kangat _ naallghute nghmeng _ .
qama _ yuukpimalghii _ , _ “ _ enta _ enraq _ iigna _ aqfa aghte gu _ .
Enannguq _ aki ligh nagh aqa _ ellnga n _ nakmikegkagh neng _ . _ ”
yuug _ uqeghhmi _ nekevgha lghii _ naghughtam _ kiimsigh qagh igate kanga _ qayughllagʼqun _ esghagh igate kangat _ .
tawani _ uqeghhmi _ nekevghaamaluku _ yug m _ kinguligh u luku _ aqfa stekagh a _ uka _ tagi ma lghii _ .
yuug _ tiigmeraaghmeng _ pilugug ke lghii _ kaate yaghtugh te ni _ maligte luku _ yug mun _ uqeghhmi _ nekevgha lghii mun _ ayuqe luni _ tagi ma lghii _ .
kaa sa mi _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Saam _ yug ke aten _ nakuminguzin _ sangavek _ itegh igate ziin _ ? _ ”
yug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghvegh meng _ kaalgugh lghii tgun _ maligte te lunga _ tagi kau unga _ .
whanga _ Napaqutaghhmiinguunga _ .
nalluke aqa _ naansinga _ .
Esghaghsaqneghmeng _ aghtugh unga _ .
esghagh igate aatnga _ .
Ellngiinaghhaghpek _ whaa _ esghaghaghpenga _ .
aghneq _ esnagh mi _ esghaate lunga _ isekiyukuni _ aghnagh m _ ggatmeghrug anun _ lli ma yagh anka _ atalughagh t _ .
taakut _ esgha _ agrepe siigh ke kangi _ . _ ”
“ _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ qamavek _ itegh ltung _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yan _ yuuknutaan _ esghagh ma kangat _ .
yuug _ aqfa stekagh at _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ esgha _ taana _ aqelqagh _ maame ste i nghmeng _ aghtugh igate ngughk _ .
wetku _ enraq _ nuna anun _ napaqutagh mun _ aglagh te yaghqaqe gkufsigu _ temeghte negh yaghqagh u uq _ . _ ”
aqnigh lghii m _ aghnagh m _ ugina _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ametall _ aglaatepestaaghlleqaghput _ .
Nulighqa _ ikfiqe pigte uq _ .
temeghte na qaghte ligu _ . _ ”
katam _ taananguftuq _ aghvengekagh t _ angyaleg at _ .
yuug _ aqelqagh _ aghnagh mun _ aqnigh lghii mun _ aglagh luni _ tunute ste luku _ atalughagh t _ aghneq _ llikagh ni _ agha m _ ggatmeghrug anun _ amighregagh an _ kiigh aneng _ nusug luki _ nanigh m _ manu akun _ lli ma kangi _ .
aghnagh _ igighiyagumalghii _ .
Mengteghalegtaam _ yug m _ aghneq _ atalughaqani _ liisuqe ma kangi _ .
unaami _ yug m _ tukugh an _ yug ni _ kelgugh luki _ angyagh eng _ kete luku _ mangtag meng _ usiluku _ yuug llu _ aqelqagh _ qaake luku _ aglagh te ma kangat _ nuna anun _ qayugh a _ qamugh ke luku _ .
kaat ute te luku _ napaqutagh mun _ yuug _ esnagh mun _ uugte yan _ angyagh eng _ usingigh luku _ kete ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ kelute mun _ esghagh luni _ kete mun _ qiive luni _ angyagh t _ esghagh naqe yagh kete ni _ aviite ut _ .
katam _ mesungesag t _ esghagh ma kangi _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ !
meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii nkuk
kiyaghte ma lghiik _ qemgaagmek _ meteghllug nkuk _ qatelghii ngiighhagh nkuk _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ igagh te iqe ma lghiik _ .
Unugmi _ qategh lghii _ aqume luni _ piluguglum _ aane ma lghii _ .
manaate i _ tugu luki _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
anglaagh mun _ kaate luni _ manaate i _ ateghte luki _ managh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ manaate i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ amu ma kangi _ manaate i _ .
uka nguq _ qiya lghii _ amu ma kanga _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ “ _ Engaaenga _ , _ aqsa ka _ seggiguu _ ! _ ”
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ qaygeghte yagh kete ni _ taghnughhagh ghrukutaaghllag _ .
naqam _ aqsa ghllag a _ .
savig ni _ nusug luku _ aqsa a _ segge yagh kete ni _ iqallugagh ghllag _ aqsanganisimalghii _ .
akmagtagh ni _ tugu luku _ iqallugagh meng _ imigh ma kanga _ eslemkaghaghlluku _ .
imigh i nghmeng _ apeghiigh yami _ taghnughhagh _ ateghte luku _ megh mun _ manaate i _ imeg luki _ akmag aatagh luni _ taglaamalghn _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yami _ meteghllug _ taghsagh luku _ negh ma lghiik _ .
unaami _ aghneghte lutek _ unug luku _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ qavagh yan _ meteghllug m _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ manaate i _ tegleg luki _ aane luni _ managh yagh ma lghii _ .
managh ma luku _ managh ta i _ sama _ eltugh ghpagte te ma lghiit _ .
amu ma kangi _ .
amu ma luki _ uka nguq _ taghnughhagh _ qiya lghii _ nagaqugh ma kanga _ .
meteghllug m _ manaate i _ pegte luki _ qimag ma lghii _ .
ilangani _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ managh yagh naqe yalghiimi _ managh ta i _ ima _ aviite ut _ .
meteghllug _ aapte yagh kete ni _ kalefsimaniluki _ pi ma kangi _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ tapghagh mun _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
esghaate ma lghii _ mengteghagh neng _ .
kaate luni _ mengteghagh mun _ , _ mayugh luni _ iiyagh kun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ quyngigh _ uzive aqe uq _ .
nughagh ghhagh _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ tugu luku _ nughagh ghhagh _ eslate mun _ egte ma kanga _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ ukig luni _ akmag luku _ aglagh te ma kanga _ .
unaami _ enraq _ meteghllug _ tapghamim _ piyaa ma lghii _ .
mengteghagh meng _ esghaate luni _ aglagh luni _ iiyagh anun _ mayugh luni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ quyngigh _ uzive lghii _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
aange lghii ii ghllag _ qesigh yagh kete ni _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
aghnagh m _ aanesimakanga _ .
meteghllug _ ukig luni _ mengteghagh meng _ akmag naqe yagh kete ni _ tapghi uute uq _ .
quyngigh m _ qilegyingi _ nusug luki _ akmagite ngllagh naqe yagh uq _ enraq _ amawha _ kepe qagh ut _ .
aghtugh luni _ akmag nghmeng _ qineghte luni _ mengteghagh mun _ tungsigh ma yagh lghii _ aghnagh mun _ akmagitkaghaghhaghmeng _ .
yaghlegi _ aghnagh m _ yaqiiraag ni _ akuqagh lukek _ aane luni _ meteghllug _ anaguleghtaamakanga _ pi magh mi _ , _ “ _ Uumlleqa _ quyngigh ghhagh nka _ tuqu qugh aqe kangi _ . _ ”
meteghllug _ ava ngunani _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ pi ma kanga _ meteghllug _ , _ “ _ kii _ sa luten _ esnegte iqe ughtagh u ziin _ ? _ ”
meteghllug m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghnagh mun _ akmagite kaghqagh niigh naqe lunga _ quyngigh ke kaqe a _ tagite na luku _ yaghlegi _ aanqaghte luni _ anaguleghtaagaanga _ . _ ”
“ _ Uum _ nangllekistengiighhaanka _ seghleghqe aqe ai _ . _ ”
Neqseng _ naange yan _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ piyaa ma lghii _ pennagh m _ tunganganun _ .
taagani _ mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh ma kanga _ nuliigh leg _ .
nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ amelengestaaghhaak _ .
yug m _ upugha te ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uuk _ enankinam _ aqelqagh _ !
nategh mun _ tawavek _ itegh i _ ! _ ”
Yugemnuliini _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ gaagh te gu _ aqelqagh _ qallallukuneghnaqelghii _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ atkug ni _ mat- aghte luku _ itegh ma lghiik _ tukuqe te lghiik _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ aghnagh m _ itghute luki _ negh ma lghiit _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ pi ma lghii _ tukugh _ , _ “ _ aane aghte naqe unga _ qakmavek _ .
sukate lunga _ itegh naagh unga _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aga _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Qamay _ aqelqagh _ ukavek _ nuug qu a _ ! _ ”
qatelghii ngiighhagh _ nuug yalghiimi _ atkug a _ aate ma kanga _ tukugh an _ .
llangaqa nguq _ atkug a _ unaghsiighwaaghmeng _ nuuvekagh _ .
Qatelghiingiighhaampimakanga _ , _ “ _ Uukpiiglleqan _ !
sangan _ aate zigu _ ?
sagiqe ste pigte an _ !
esleqeaghaghte an _ ! _ ”
taakut _ tukugh i _ qatelghii ngiighhagh m _ sikughwaagh u aqe ut _ .
llaaghanwha _ sikughwaam _ yuuke magh mi _ atkug a _ aqelqagh m _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
Sikughwaaghemnuliini _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh _ aghulaqe naqe gkan _ pirughte i tete naken _ iwerngam _ kepsugh llegh anun _ . _ ”
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ qatelghii ngiighhagh _ aghulaqe naqe yan _ sikughwaam _ nulighh an _ pirughte i te ma kanga _ aqelqaghtengneqmeng _ iwerngamkepsullghanun _ .
Qatelghiihgiighhaq _ akmag aatagh luni _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate yan _ mengteghagh mun _ meteghllug m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Kii-i _ , _ naken _ pimghqughtazin _ ? _ ”
“ _ aagken _ pennagh m _ tunganganeng _ . _ ”
unaami _ meteghllug _ piyaa ma lghii _ taagavek _ .
mengteghagh _ kaate luku _ itegh yalghiimi _ yuug _ esghagh aa _ nuliigh leg _ amelengestaaghhaak _ .
qesiqun _ kaate aqe uq _ sikughwaankunun _ .
Sikughwaam _ tukugh an _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ ilu anun _ .
asanut _ atkug ni _ unite luku _ nategh mi _ , _ nuliigh ni _ gaaghesqumaan _ .
ugke t _ ugute yata _ negh ma lghiit _ .
taaqe luteng _ sikughwaagh _ aane ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ meteghllug m _ atkug a _ aate luku _ sama _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Qamay _ aqelqagh _ ukaveknuukaa _ ! _ ”
Meteghlluknuugumalghii _ .
esghagh luku _ sikughwaagh _ nenglaghqwaamalghii _ , _ “ _ Hahaha _ , _ llangaqa _ elpekkanaqaruk _ ! _ ”
Sikughwaam _ aqelqagh mi _ atkug a _ mat- aghte luku _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ taana _ aqelqagh _ aane ste gu _ !
aglagh li _ !
pirughte i te aghte gpenaan _ pi naken _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh m _ meteghllug _ aanesimakanga _ .
aglagh ma lghii _ ava ngunani _ pirughtangunani _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ qatelghii m _ unite ma kanga _ meteghllug _ alla _ kiyaghte lgutesaghqagh u gpenaan _ .
qamagte uq _ .
egeghagh mii
yuug _ egeghagh mii _ nukaghagh leg _ .
nuliigh pig a _ avaqutagh ite ngughk _ nukaghagh a _ maalghug neng _ mekelghiigh staghhiinagh neng _ avaqutagh leg _ .
nukaghagh a _ taana _ Angetequghhmii _ .
angyaghtugh aqe lghii _ yuug _ nuliigh pig ni _ kelqellug qu _ .
yuug _ angyagh nghmini _ aghvenge aqe lghii _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ nukaghagh ni _ miite i stekaqe kanga _ .
aghvenge nghmini _ ataasigh t _ pilagkagh t _ tuune aqe kangi _ negh yaghqaa luki _ nukaghaghminun _ .
elkek _ nuliigh pig ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ quyngigh meng _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ angyagh yata _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh ni _ nuyekligh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ angyat put _ taglagh yaghqagh t _ esghapag ki _ .
uka _ aliigh kata _ ungipite nakevnga _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ siighnagh m _ aqeftaghaa _ imigh ma kanga _ megh meng _ .
ila a _ mangtag meng _ avegtugh te luku _ saama _ ugi mi _ ila yan _ nuliigh pig an _ iighagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ tugu tete luni _ avegtugh luni _ ila ma kangi _ mangtag t _ avegtughagh ni _ .
enkaam _ uyuqligh m _ taghnughhagh mi _ ila a _ maka a _ imigh ma kanga _ peqagh meng _ tukrug lghii meng _ sii ma i te u luku _ .
iiwen _ unug yaghtugh aqe a _ ighnegh an _ nuyekliim _ ungipaate ma kanga _ uka _ taglagh ni luki _ angyagh t _ .
itegh sqe ma kanga _ ighnegh ni _ .
itegh yan _ neghe ste luku _ taagken _ atghii sqe ma kanga _ esnagh mun _ .
angyagh t _ tamlag yalghiimeng _ aghvenge ma lghiit _ .
angyaleg ita _ yug ni _ llilamakanga _ nukaghagh ni _ aqfa sqellug qu _ , _ “ _ Aghvengumakunnguq _ , _ miite i yaghtugh li nguq _ . _ ”
Kevgaaq _ taglagh luni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ ugi anun _ aqfa ste ni luku _ miite i yaghtigh sqellug qu _ .
“ _ Aaa _ atghagh naqe unga _ . _ ”
utaqa ma kangat _ .
naagu _ ?
atghagh nghite uq _ .
itagnatun _ yug m _ aqfate ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sukate luni nguq _ atghagh li _ .
ghhuute ai nguq _ . _ ”
Kevgaaq _ taglagh luni _ ungipaasikaanga _ aghnagh _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ kevgaaq _ , _ “ _ enraq _ taghnughhagh ka _ qiyaaqe uq _ , _ atghagh aqe nayagh unga _ . _ ”
Kevgaaq _ atghagh luni _ angyaleg _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
angyaleg m _ nulighh pig an _ ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga _ puughte isaghtugh lakun _ miite i yaghtugh naqe lghii _ . _ ”
angegh ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
Nukaghaam _ aksaqe luni _ esghapag ma kanga _ taglagh lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nutaan _ qineghte yan _ anaguumakanga _ naasqwakun _ tuqute luku _ .
tuqute yamigu _ angyaatagh ni _ akmag luki _ avaqutagh ni _ tugu luku _ qimag ma lghii _ Mayeghagnekun _ .
qaygeghte yami _ uyghag m _ akulanganun _ iigh ma lghii _ .
siingenllu _ unug kanga _ .
aghvengekagh t _ utaqa i yagh luteng _ esnagh mi _ utaqakagh eng _ aviite yan _ yuug _ taglagh yalghiimi _ nuliigh pig ni _ esghagh ma kanga _ tuqu luni _ amig mi _ naqam _ nukaghagh a _ aviite uq _ .
yuug _ atghagh luni _ yug ni _ llilamakangi _ ivaghiyaghtiisqelluki _ .
Ivaghyaqeseng _ mamleg mi _ esghagh nghite aat _ .
aviite uq _ .
aviite yan _ uteghqaasimalghiit _ .
aghnagh _ angyataghqelluni _ apeghiigh yami _ ukig ma lghii _ esnagh mun _ .
esnagh mun _ kaate luni _ meghnaali te kete luku _ tulughagh ma lghii _ .
tulughagh te kete luku _ nagaqugh ma kangi _ suqsughtagh lghiit _ .
enkaam _ kana _ nalla akun _ qenaaghtallasimalghiit _ .
pi ma lghiit _ , _ “ _ piiksuq _ !
sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ ”
aghnagh m _ akite ma kangi _ , _ “ _ angetequgh mun _ aglagh yug aqe yagh unga _ , _ iwemganaten _ aglagh langa _ . _ ”
“ _ tea- ai _ uugten _ !
Angetequghhmiinguukut _ , _ aglagh te naqe amken _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ angyagh mun _ uugte ma lghii _ .
“ _ quneghte lghaaten _ ! _ ”
taagken _ itagnatun _ suqsughtagh meng _ aghnagh _ nagate ma lghii _ .
maateqwaaqun _ pilataghaat _ , _ “ _ Aaam _ esghagh ghhaaten _ aga _ uugten _ ! _ ”
aghnagh _ uugte luni _ pi yalghiimi _ angetequgh u nghite ngughk _ allaq _ nuna _ .
maaten _ angyagh ke vig ni _ uteghmun _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ aga _ mesungesag t _ puugleghaataqeftut _ .
taagken _ aghnagh _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ nenglu ghrukutaagh _ pika _ esghagh ma kanga _ tunuqligh ke luku _ nenglu squghhagh _ .
nenglu ghllag m _ qaye ani _ nekevgha aqe uq _ yuug _ kapesegaghluni _ .
Kapesegakek _ ghhuu ghllag lutek _ nasagh ni _ , _ aligh ni _ , _ kenigh ni _ tughqughluki _ .
aghnagh mun _ esnamelngughmun _ ayuqe luku _ talligh ni _ , _ aligh n _ inglu a _ ilemaghaqsaqenni _ anuqligh ghllag ma kanga _ eslallugpagtuumaghmi _ .
aghnagh _ taghnughhaghtuumagh an _ tengsimakanga _ qagi t _ tunutangitgun _ tuute ste luku _ .
naqam _ anuqe _ alpag ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ itagnatun _ uugte aqe uq _ .
yug m _ enraq _ inglu a _ aligh mi _ ilemeaghaghte yagh kete ni _ itagnatun _ anuqligh ghllag laatagh aa _ eslallugpagtuumaghmi _ .
aghnagh _ tengtaqegkanga _ qagi t _ tungangitgun _ tuute ste luku _ .
tawatestaghhiinaq _ alpag nghaani _ anuqe ghllag _ uugneghani _ yug m _ nasagh ni _ enkaam _ kenigh ni _ itemqugh yagh kete ni _ aghnagh _ itagnatun _ tengtaqluku _ qenwat _ taghnughhagh ke te lghiik _ aghnaa nkuk _ mataghqe uk _ pilugug i uute uk _ .
wetku _ yuug _ ukig luni _ nenglu mineng _ uka _ atghagh ma lghii _ pilugug meng _ tugumiigh iigh luni _ .
aghnagh mun _ kaate luni _ pi ma kanga _ yug m _ , _ “ _ taawa _ pilugug meng _ tagite amtek _ qayughllak _ pilugug si _ nukeggnagh pigte ut _ .
whanga _ elpek _ aqfa ste aqe amken _ nanglleg yagute luten _ .
pilugug tek _ .
apeghiigh kufsi _ taglagh ghhaakut _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ pilugug nghmeng _ taaqsagʼta _ taglagh ma lghiit _ nenglu anun _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ tungtuqu yagh aqe lghii _ , _ aghnagh m _ aftaqegkangi _ .
qenwat _ mekelghiigh ghhagh _ angli uq _ aghnagh m _ ighnegh a _ .
ellmi neng _ igleghte yaaghte uq _ .
mekelghiigh ghhagh _ aag nghmini _ aghnelqusiq _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
tespamani _ aghneghte aqe lghii _ nenglu squghhagh mi _ .
Ighivgaamaan _ tagi nghmini _ igaghtu pigte lghii meng _ pilugug luni _ .
Kiyaghtaallghem _ tagtala ani _ aghnagh _ ighni ma lghii _ mekelghiigh ghhagh meng _ .
taana llu _ angli ma lghii _ qenwat _ .
taana llu _ uyuqligh _ ellmi neng _ igleghte yagute ma lghii _ .
anengagh ke te lghiik _ aaneghmegm _ aghneghte aqe lghiik _ nenglu ngiighhagh mi _ .
tagi negh megteni _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ pilugug lutek _ igaghtupiglleghiimeng _ .
tagi negh megteni _ legan _ neghe gpenatek _ ingaghte uute lutek _ qavaa te aqe lghiik _ .
yug m _ pi aqe kanga _ aghnagh _ , _ “ _ Asanutelpek _ espamavek _ tunuqligh ghhagh mnnun _ aglagh gpenang _ pi aqe i _ ! _ ”
maaten _ ilangani _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Sanganllaam _ pamavek _ pisnaanighaqanga _ .
enta _ esghagh yaghtuqagh lakun _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ nenglu squghhagh mun _ iiyagh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ ilu te mun _ avaqutagh kek _ quulqite m _ qaye akun _ aqume lutek _ ighu teng _ aghulate magh ita _ naghaghutaqeftuk _ .
taawa _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ gaagh magh mi _ ukini magh mi _ pellugtuumagh mi _ enngaatall _ aveniqe aqe uq _ .
aghnagh m _ iiyagh meng _ esqamavek _ kayaghumayaqaanga _ .
aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ ullegh aghte ma lghii _ .
avaqutagh kek _ ullghaghsan _ qiyaghwaasimalghiik _ .
aghnagh _ iiwen _ nekeve aqe uq _ yuug _ uka _ aliigh aqe uq _ qefliqe magh mi _ , _ “ _ Kiii _ aghnagh _ pineghllug ghllag pigu a _ .
imamta _ ineghte aqe yu i kete te _ ! _ ”
nenglu mun _ itegh luni _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ aglagh luni _ tespamavek _ aghnagh ghhagh _ quupnegh ghhagh _ kallagaghyaqenni _ saguyagh gmineng _ unguvaghsimakanga _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnagh _ aglagh nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghii _ .
enraq _ nenglu m _ tekerkaanitaqelghiik _ maalghug _ kalngag sngwaaghagh ghhagh k _ ila a _ aywaa n _ tunganani _ ila a _ uughqa n _ .
taake uk llu _ kalngasngaaghaghhaak _ yug m _ iinghute aqe kek _ saafte sqe gpenakek _ .
kiyaghte luteng _ maaten _ tungtuqu yagh yan _ aghnagh _ sumeghtaghagh yalghiimi _ , _ “ _ Sanganllaam _ kalngaggaak _ ukuk _ iinghute aqe akek _ ?
enta _ ila a _ esghaqagh lakun _ ! _ ”
ketfagh luku _ aghnagh m _ nusug ragh yagh kete ni _ awergha m _ amiiragh a _ uglagh pigte lghii _ nusug ragh aa _ .
Saaghwamikun _ may- ughte ghllag aa _ .
iiwen _ wata _ asi anun _ kaaw aqe uq _ , _ ugu qagh ma lghii _ .
asi a _ kalngag m _ kenghuftuq _ .
iiwen _ talligh ni _ sayuwaghtaqaa _ yuug _ qefliqe magh mi _ qakma _ kaate aqe uq _ .
“ _ ugumi nagh ghhalek _ aghnaqsa _ qaamnapineghllugllapiwaa _ ! _ ”
iitghute kete luku _ saguyagh gni _ tugu lukek _ kallagaghyaqenni _ uteghte luni _ umyugaghmineng _ awergha _ kanaghte uute ma lghii _ kalngaggaghmun _ .
taana llu _ aghnagh m _ tallu i _ kallagaghyaqenni _ saguyagh gmineng _ uguqe llghite te yu i ma kanga _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnagh _ nagate luni _ yug meng _ lliigh uq _ .
pineghlliqe nagh u nighte uq _ .
kiyaghte ma lghiit _ pinitun _ .
ilangani _ yug m _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghyuqe igate ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ pi langa _ ! _ ”
yug m _ pilate- aghagh a _ , _ “ _ Whavegʼqun _ tagi aghten _ ! _ ”
yug m _ nenglu m _ qukaa nite ngughk _ sagleghaq _ pakig ma kanga _ .
aghnagh _ agigte yalghiimi _ sama _ egeghagh _ esghagh ma kanga _ enkaam _ mengteghagh _ nayugh kuvinghagh ani _ masisu _ allighagh t _ taawa _ mengteghagh m _ qaye akun _ mateghqughluteng _ .
ighnegh a _ aghnagh m _ nuyekligh _ aane ma lghii _ mengteghagh meng _ .
atkug a _ negig llegh ghllag _ saama _ iqa ghllag _ .
aghnagh _ qiya yagh uq _ .
sama _ pi ma lghiit _ , _ “ _ eslallugughte a _ .
allighagh t _ iteghqughtekii _ ! _ ”
yug m _ aghnagh _ tuye akun _ pakig ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Tawatenngam _ ! _ ”
enkaam _ sagleghaq _ ne anun _ lli ma kanga _ .
yug m _ aghnagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aane luten _ yughqutagh meng _ ghhiitagh luten _ ighnegh gpenun _ pamavek _ aglaatesqennaketen _ uyguquutesqelluki _ .
uygu te uute nghmeng _ apeghiigh kaki _ tagitesqennaketen _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
uygu te uute luki _ tagite ma kangit _ .
yug m _ pi laatagh aa _ , _ “ _ Maalghum _ quyngigh m _ sigutangi _ paasqute te ki _ .
enkaam _ ataasigh _ allaghhiinam _ awergha m _ melqwaneng _ ikute luten _ imeg naken _ ila a _ tungtu m _ amigh aneng _ .
aligh gpek _ inglu a _ quyngigh m _ unguva lghii m _ melqwaneng _ ikute aqe luku _ imigh naken _ .
enkaam _ ama _ inglu a _ enraq _ mengteghagh meng _ savighhe uute aqe luku _ imigh naken _ . _ ”
laagh an wha _ aghnagh _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ .
apeghiigh yan _ aghnagh _ yug m _ sagleghaq _ aw ite u te kete luku _ pi a _ , _ “ _ taana _ elpek _ tagite kan _ ighnegh n _ kelqennaken _ .
una _ uyughagh a _ whanga mni _ unegte lleqe uq _ .
ukig lusi _ nateqlite kufsi _ quneghte luten _ aligh gpek _ inglu a _ efsug te naken _ enkaam _ inglu a llu _ .
enkaam _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh kuvek _ taake uk _ maalghug _ sigute k _ paasqute te nga lghiik _ ama _ quneghte luten _ efsug te nakegken _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh n _ nuyekligh _ taglagh kan _ uqughutaghqaghhaq _ esghaghyaghtiisqennaken _ tekeghagh m _ awata anun _ uyughagh ke te lghii gnun _ anengagh a _ sivulii luku _ . _ ”
taagken _ yug m _ naa ke te lghiik _ ukigsimakek _ .
tuute ma lghiit _ egeghagh m _ kelutangani _ .
tuute yameng _ aghnagh m _ qimeghlluni _ aligh gni _ efsug te lukek _ esghagh yalghiimi _ mengteghagh _ , _ ama _ saaghw itni _ quyngigh _ .
itegh luni _ qunaghmi _ paasqute te nga lghiit _ quyngigh m _ maalghum _ sigutangi _ efsug te luki _ esghagh yalghiimi _ awergha ghllag _ allaghhnnaq _ amigh ghllag _ mingllite qugh ma kanga _ .
egeghagh mii _ yuggagh _ aane luni _ unanguluku _ kelute mun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ pika _ esghagh ai _ quyilleg t _ .
amenam _ yuggagh _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ itegh yalghiimi _ iflakagh _ nunalgute mi _ nulighh a _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
itegh yan _ aghnagh m _ ungipaghsugh ma kanga _ ighnegh mineng _ nuyeklighmeng _ enkaam _ ugi mineng _ .
yuggagh m _ ungipaate ma kanga _ .
negh luni _ aane aqe yan _ quyngigh meng _ tuune ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ ighnegh ni _ lipeghsagh ma kanga _ taglagh qigh sqellug qu _ .
llaaghanwha _ ighnegh a _ taglagh ma lghii _ .
naa an _ neghe ste luku _ alla neng _ pilugug luku _ nutaghagh u ta ghhagh inagh meng _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ llilagh ma kek _ amavek _ tapghagh m _ awata anun _ esnighqwigh sqellug kek _ asanut _ anegh nge aq _ sivulii luku _ .
nagaqugh luni _ ugi a _ aghnagh m _ nutaghagh _ nuliigh ni _ enngaatall _ agligh sqellug qu _ angayuqagh itnun _ aanesimakanga _ .
taagken _ yuug _ taglagh ma lghii _ tespikavek _ utuqa mun _ nuliigh minun _ .
Esnighqwak _ taglagh yalghiimek _ aghvegh meng _ mallu u ma lghiik _ .
nunalgute teng _ kelgugh luki _ pilag ma kangat _ aghvegh _ .
taagken _ aghnagh m _ quyngigh mineng _ amig ligh aqe luki _ awergha ligh aqe luki _ awalightugh ai _ nunalgute ni _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ iwerngam _ aghyugh llegh itnun _ .
qamagte uq _ .
tefaay _ .
esnagh mii _ enkaam _ quyilleg
kiyaghte ma uq _ qigi mi _ yuug _ neqengyuqagh _ .
kiig te nghagu _ qayaghtugh nghmini _ unake aqe kanga _ masingka _ uksugh mi _ naama te kaghqagh _ neqe _ .
ayumigh ite nghagu _ uksaagh mi _ nutaan _ siku ligh nghagu _ Yagrakenutaghmii _ quyilleg _ yuug _ pirughte yaghtugh aqe lghii _ qigi mun _ .
Aglagnaqenghani _ quyilleg ni _ esnagh mii an _ iwemgam _ usitutala atun _ tuune aqe kanga _ neqe meng _ .
naqam _ uksaagh mi _ tuqutiighvig _ kaate nghaani _ qigi mi _ yuug _ quyillegte nghaani _ angyagh ni _ neqe meng _ usiluku _ quyilleg an _ esnagh mii ni _ tuune aqe kanga _ inglu t _ ataasigh t _ amig ligh luki _ qallukaghmeng _ .
naqam _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ “ _ enan _ ayumiqun _ tuqute i tete nagh amken _ . _ ”
ayumigh ite nghagu _ tawatestaghhiinaq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ qigi mi _ yuukuksaaghmi _ quyillegte yan _ emta _ quyilleg an _ tawaten _ uglaghqakaan _ tuune luku _ angyaghhutameng _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Sikulighaku _ pirughte yaghtugh lleqe unga _ elpenun _ .
tenge ta ghhagh meng _ yataghqutaghhnakevnga _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ esnagh mii an _ angegh ma kanga _ .
qigi mun _ aglagh yami _ amsakaghtagh m _ amiiqagh a _ sa iqe luku _ esne a _ amiiqagh m _ tuughlluku _ siqlugagh m _ paye anun _ petugteghuumakanga _ .
taagken _ ayvegh m _ tengug aneng _ imigh ma kanga _ iwemgam _ esleqeaghaghte luku _ .
enkaam _ megh _ kumlate luni _ lliigh yan _ siqlugagh m _ tenge ta m _ paye a _ megh meng _ kuvughtagh ma kanga _ .
llaaghanwha _ siqlugagh _ imaghtuumagh an _ kumlaghqumakanga _ .
qigi mi _ yuug _ mengteghamesimaluku _ qakma _ kaate ma lghii _ quyilleg a _ pirughte yagh uq _ .
yug m _ aane vike ma kanga _ aqelqagh ni _ atkug ngunani _ naqam _ nasaperagh luni _ aghillug luni _ .
quyilleg m _ aqelqagh an _ esnagh mii ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aqlagha ghhalek _ matagh gpek _ sa qu ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ Sangwaqun _ aate lakun _ !
naken _ atkugkagh meng _ amu i igate ngugh u nga _ .
elpek _ amiilitaqegkevnga _ qallukaghmeng _ . _ ”
taagken _ itegh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taqsameng _ quyilleg m _ esnagh mii _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ nagu te uq _ uksaagh _ tengutightesqelluten _ pi yaqemken _ ? _ ”
“ _ legan _ teskana _ kiyaghte uq _ .
Ulimasimamken _ .
enmis _ aqfa lteggu _ . _ ”
Llaaghangwha _ aane lutek _ siqlugagh anun _ atghagh ma lghiik _ .
siqlugagh mun _ kaate yamek _ esnagh mii m _ pi ma kanga _ quyilleg _ , _ “ _ esgha _ taana _ sa aqe zigu _ nusug ggu _ . _ ”
siqlugagh m _ paye a _ ilangqullaq _ katam _ amiiqagh m _ putu i _ aliite luteng _ .
quyilleg m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uuk _ kaku _ sa ma m _ ! _ ”
quyilleg _ sivughagh u ma lghii _ tenge ta meng _ nusug te nghmeng _ .
Sivughaghyan _ quyilleg _ esnagh mii m _ atghileg mineng _ putu nge i kete te _ amaa iqe aq _ kagu luku _ sayug aghte yagh kete ni _ siqlugaghtuumagh an _ piiksigaghlluku _ tenge te aq _ amaa iqe aq _ nusug aghte ma kanga _ .
quyilleg m _ esnagh mii _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uuk _ kaku _ nalleghitaquten _ ! _ ”
taagken _ quyilleg _ tengug meng _ usiligh i luni _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
ayumiqun _ uksaagh yagu _ awen _ quyillegte llegh meng _ kingute aghagh lutek _ ata ke te lghiik _ Yagrakenutamun _ quyillegsi ma lghiik _ .
kaate yalghiimeng _ quyillegtaghyag ghllag _ qemgughusimalghii _ .
quyilleg ita _ esnevagh vike luki _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ kii _ nalleghitaqusi _ !
sangafsi _ mulughtaastek _ ?
Utaqaqiimsi _ . _ ”
legan _ tawaten _ aghneghmi _ quyilleg _ tuqutagh igh ma lghii _ .
Sivulighpigaluku _ esnagh mii ni _ qigi mii _ tuqlugh ma kanga _ .
pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ elpek u u vag lghii meng _ aghnagh meng _ ataasigh meng _ sigutanginnaqamken _ saama _ tallimaneng _ tuqute i lleqe amken _ ugmestaaghhagh meng _ pilugugkagh meng _ amiilighluki _ . _ ”
taagken _ yuug _ ata ke te lghiik _ kete lutek _ aglagh ma lghiik _ qigi mun _ .
uksughte luteng _ upenghagh mi _ quyngigh m _ ighni llegh an _ kingu aneng _ suna _ taana _ kaa ta _ quyilleg at _ qigi mun _ .
kaate luni _ ungipagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ quyngigh ghhagh i _ pama _ maalghug ii ma uq _ .
whangkuta _ quyilleg ni _ quyngigh put _ malghugegneng _ ighni nghata _ aag llegh i _ tuqute aqe aput _ . _ ”
yug m _ qigi mii m _ ata an _ nanevgaghhaampimakanga _ , _ “ _ quyngigh t _ malghi ghngaita _ whangkunni _ esnagh mii ni _ avangite ut _ aglegh ite ut _ qayugh ghllag mi _ whangkuta _ qikmigh t _ saghligagh put _ ighni aqe lghiit _ uglagh pigte luku _ tuqu qagh igate ke put _ .
maaten _ quyngigh ghhagh ut _ malghi ghngaan _ nepighulluku _ tuqute gpenaan _ aag llegh a _ ighni ghngaan _ .
elpek _ quyngigh ke nghite te an _ esnagh mii t _ pi ke aat _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ quyilleg _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
qigi mii t _ quyillegte nghmeng _ taaqe ma lghiit _ .
yuug _ qigi mii _ aghvenge yagute uq _ ukileghyag meng _ .
maaten _ ila ngam _ uksaagh mi _ quyilleg at _ pirughte yaghtugh luni _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ quyngigh i _ pama _ nula aqe uq _ sukate luni _ naqam _ pinigh pigte uq _ ukileghyaperuwaaq _ . _ ”
taagken _ qafsina t _ uksugh t _ atugh luki _ tagi laatagh ma lghii _ quyilleg at _ .
enkaam _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Agmangam3 _ esnametegpenasi _ .
quungvagh ghhagh si _ .
masingka _ pama _ quyngigh i _ uglaghi ma uq _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ qigi mii t _ qamilgugh ma lghiit _ Yagrakenutam _ kelutanganun _ .
nekegte ma lghiit _ awen _ quyilleg eng _ sivu liqe luku _ ellngit _ esnagh mii kuvinghagh at _ tunuqligh u luteng _ .
quyngigh eng _ mengteghagh mun _ tagite yatgu _ esghaghyaqeseng _ imani nguq _ inglaminaghtuq _ ukileghyaperuwaaq _ .
tawani _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ Qigimiikuvinghaam _ nanevgagh a _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ nuliigh ni _ Dimakanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ ighnegh ut _ pamavek _ quungvagh nun _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ vaghisaghtuulteggu _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nutaghagh t _ pilugug teng _ meteghllug meng _ qaspiqutighluki _ yataghqellutek _ aghulaqe ma lghiik _ .
tespagani _ quungvagh ni _ igleghllutekmengteghatmaalghugneghet _ esghagh ma kangit _ .
sivuligh tgun _ mengteghagh tgun _ kaate lutek _ itegh gpenatek _ uughqu ii te ni _ qavaa ma lghiik _ .
qesiqun _ kaate vike aqe aat _ quyilleg _ ighnegh leg _ panig leg _ .
taake uk _ avaqutagh kek _ tespamantaqeftuk _ aag llegh ani _ mengteghagh m _ .
unaami _ mekelghiigh _ quyngigh meng _ atghagh luni _ a ta mi _ mengteghagh anun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ uqeghhmi _ esghagh ma kek _ aqelqagh k _ maalghug _ .
qavagh aqe uk _ .
pilugug ke lghiik _ meteghllug m _ amighqwaagh aneng _ .
qaprag qagh negh megteni _ meteghllug m _ melqwa _ anuqataghaam _ tengqataqegkanga _ .
itegh luni _ mekelghiigh _ a ta mi _ mengteghagh anun _ ungipasimakanga _ ata ni _ tawaten _ ayuqe lghii neng _ aqelqagh neng _ .
ata an _ mekelghiigh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ itegh sqe ki _ !
Saqungwaat _ ? _ ”
aane luni _ mekelghiigh m _ itegagh mineng _ taghsagh ma kek _ aqelqagh k _ .
itegh uk nguq _ .
itegh yata _ yug m _ aapte ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Kiii _ natmun _ igleghtaastek _ ? _ ”
“ _ arekull _ taawa _ taawangiinaghhaq _ whamighput _ tukughqagh ghhagh anun _ ivaghitngwaaghput _ . _ ”
“ _ uuk _ legan _ tawa _ panilegpigunga _ .
Tukightughtilleqamsi _ . _ ”
yug m _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aglagh te ki _ elpesi nun _ .
negh yagh uute ki _ . _ ”
aane luteng _ aglagh ma lghiit _ .
sivu itni _ mekelghiigh _ kaate luni _ nayag ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enngaatall _ ata mta _ aanghutaaten _ seghlegh pestaagh nun _ .
saki ghhaghqagh ten _ kaate kata _ esghagh lleqe aten _ .
Aklumasipigut _ .
talwa _ meteghllug m _ amighqwaagh aneng _ pilugug ke uk _ . _ ”
aqelqagh k _ kaate lutek _ iteghyagʼta _ aghnaghagh m _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ imani _ ukuk _ pilugugllug ghllag uk _ .
utuqa _ alla igh aq _ saagllug qu _ taaggun _ aqume sqe ma kegket _ .
neghyaghqagh meng _ ketfaasaqmegtekek _ quyngigh m _ nefkuuragh a _ taagkaghtagh _ tukruughqwaaghllakaq _ iqlugte lutek _ aghtugh lutek _ negh nghmeng _ taaqe te ma lghiik _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ yataghqesata _ aqelqagh t _ mekelghiigh m _ ata an _ ighnegh minun _ atghagh te sqe ma kangit _ quyngilegtimeng _ .
enkaam _ yug m _ panig ni _ ighsaghwaaghngaan _ qiya ghngaan _ angegh te naqe ni luni _ wanlegi _ maligte te sqe ma kanga _ .
aghtugh yamigu _ ellmi neng _ qaghlughiluni _ panig ni _ qaake luku _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
iiwen _ esnagh mun _ tunganganilngughnun _ quyilleg nun _ aliigh aqe ut _ uka _ quyngilegti _ payegh i _ aliigh aqe uq _ .
kaate yalghiimi _ imaniguq _ quyngigh kek _ pinigh uk _ ukileghyag kegte ta ghhagh inagh k _ .
yug a _ imani nguq _ atkug kegte uq _ nughaghmeng _ ukileghyakegtaameng _ saama _ mekelghiigh _ nukalpigaqsa _ seghleghu qagh a _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh _ pilugugllugalghii _ qaake luku _ aga _ uteghte ma lghii _ .
quyilleg m _ panig ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ wasaq _ ighsa aqe uten _ .
langetaq _ aagna _ ugi kaghqagh ke an _ . _ ”
panig an _ akite ma kanga _ iqlighte magh mi _ , _ “ _ imatuq _ ! _ ”
quyngigh mun _ kaate luteng _ aghuliigh ma lghiit _ .
quungvagh m _ quyilleg ita _ quyngigh _ esghapagyaqeseng _ imani _ uglagh uq _ naqam _ ukileghyaperuwaaghllak _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ mekelghiigh _ una _ elpegun _ kaatesqennaqaqa _ .
itegh kan _ allighaghllug kun _ aqume ste naagh an _ .
enkaam _ ketfagh te naagh an _ upenghaghtagh m _ ayvegh m _ tukighuggneq _ qasiqagh m _ nefkuuragh aneng _ .
enkaam _ negh nghmeng _ aghtugh kagu _ pi naken _ , _ ‘ _ wasaq _ elpek _ nanevgagh t _ neqlightugh aqe aten _ ggutangigh tke aat _ tukrug ghllag meng _ .
whangkuta llu _ esnagh m _ negh ka aneng _ tukrugsigh kayugu kut _ .
ikiwan _ elpek _ ggute kegte aq _ wha _ aghtugh uten _ . _ ’ _ wetku _ kinguvaqun _ pinitun _ neghe ste naken _ .
una _ ata a _ panike te lghiik _ whangamninnaaghtuk _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ nanevgagh ghhagh m _ ighnegh a _ tawaten _ pi ma lghii _ a ta mi _ apeghtuusagh tun _ .
nanevgagh ghhagh m _ quungvagh m _ quyilleg a _ qevuute luku _ upugha te ma kanga _ piniqe te lghiik _ .
unaami _ aghulaqe naqe yata _ aghnagh aq _ unegte ma lghii _ enngaatall _ awen _ aghnaqe luni _ .
taakut _ quungvagh m _ quyilleg i _ usimakangat _ esnagh m _ negh ka aneng _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ .
kiyaghte ma lghiit _ iwemgam _ aghyugh i na llegh mun _ .
tefaay _ !
qamagte uq _ .
yuug _ enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh
yuug nguq _ iimna _ aghvenge yu pigte lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuliigh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ tanpeghhmeng _ akmagutagh ngllagh a _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ tusaqe i nagh gpenani _ nulighh a _ akmagutagh ngllagh ma lghii _ tanpeghhmeng _ .
taaqe yakek _ akmagutagh k _ tanpeghhek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ akuqagh luku _ kanaghte luku _ tesqamavek _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ keveg aqe naqe amken _ anguyag mnun _ sughugisqelluten _ . _ ”
taagken _ tanpeghhek _ akmagutagh k _ miluullukekmeghmun _ kete ma kek _ .
anuqe m _ akmagutagh k _ tengsimakek _ iwemgam _ natmun _ .
megh m _ itegh gpenakek _ uvlugem _ qapragsagh ke gni _ up- llghite aghte yagh ke gni _ akmagutagh k _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ akmagutagh m _ nukeggnagh anun _ .
tagtalmi _ tepe ma kanga _ esnagh kun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ akmagutagh m _ allungag a _ vuveghte qugh yagh kete ni _ reghighsimakanga _ .
taagken _ aane yalghiimi _ tepe ma kanga _ tapghaghte lakun _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ taglagh luni _ tapghagh m _ qaye anun _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ yuug _ .
yug m _ kaate luku _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ nenglagh qu ma kanga _ .
Pimakanaga _ , _ “ _ kii _ , _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ nani _ nukeggnaaghqeghllagsin _ ? _ ”
“ _ sughug u unga _ elpenun _ . _ ”
yug m _ nenglaqluku _ unite ma kanga _ .
mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ nuliigh ni _ ungipaate ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ tapghagh m _ qaye ani _ vegaagh kun _ aviightu te aqe uq _ .
legan _ nukeggnagh ghllagu uq _ .
aapte yaqegka _ whangamnunnguq _ sughug u uq _ . _ ”
Nenglaqlaataamakangat _ nulighh ghqu te lghiik _ .
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ taglaghlum _ ungavig itnun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
itegh luni _ nanugh ita _ mesiigh anun _ mingughhu te ma lghii _ .
melqugh ni _ mesiighqe ghllag yamigu _ ungavig neng _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ sugerngengitgun _ kavirrakegtagh tgun _ aviigh uute ma lghii _ .
iwerngaqun _ sugemgit _ mesiighqe ughtagh u luki _ ugatanganun _ aglagh luni _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
unaami _ yuug _ nategh mun _ ategh luni _ qefliqe ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Kiii _ , _ qamay _ ungavig mta _ sugerngangi _ seghleghu ut _ whaa _ legan _ mesag igh ghllagu ut _ .
ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ enankinam _ saam _ yeghrat _ nukeggnaaghqeghllagumaa _ . _ ”
Uganguq _ uwatanganeng _ aleghqugh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ pi yagh amken ta _ sughug u unga _ ! _ ”
“ _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ una _ ! _ ” _ yuug _ pi ma lghii _ .
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ malighqaghataghluku _ tugu yamigu _ piigugh luku _ eslate mun _ egte ma kanga _ , _ whaten _ pi magh mi _ , _ “ _ enngaatall _ aglagh a _ sughug ggaaten _ ! _ ”
unug yagu _ qavagh te yata _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ iighwiighluni _ unguvagh yalghiimi _ jaighqutameng _ ghhitaghluki _ uygu qugh utagh ma lghii _ .
masingka _ takuyaqminiki _ yug m _ mengteghagh anun _ mayugh luni _ qaakgit _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mineng _ yughqutagh meng _ kenle nge i kete te _ qamqaghsimakangi _ .
iqug a _ tapghagh ngllaghkagh mi _ qamutighluku _ aate ma kanga _ .
enkaam _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ unug llegh ke sigh _ mengteghagh _ qule mun _ yaqii te ma kanga _ .
iiwen _ unugem _ qukaa neng _ aghvigh aqe uq _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ mengqughtagh luku _ llaag igh aqe a _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ sagiqe te ma kanga _ .
qenwat llu _ kenle akun _ mengteghagh _ ghhatagh aghte ma kanga _ .
ghhatagh aghte yamigu _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ atghagh te ma kanga _ megh m _ qula anun _ .
taagken _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ mengteghagh _ megh kun _ lli kestagh ma kanga _ .
qama nguq _ yug m _ pi ma kanga _ nuliigh ni _ , _ “ _ Uuugg _ naken _ enraq _ megh m _ itegh inkut _ ?
enta _ qiigh negh ke a _ ! _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnagh _ atqaghlluni _ qineghte yalghiimi _ uzimun _ megh ghllag _ esghagh aa _ .
ugi ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ megh mun _ llighumakut _ .
uzimun _ meghllag u uq _ . _ ”
iiwen _ aghnagh _ nepiigh aqe uq _ qakma nguq _ kaakeggneng _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ pi aqe yagh amken _ , _ sughug u unga _ ! _ ”
yug m _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ naten _ pi ligu _ aanvig ite ngughk _ .
qateghyiighagh ghhagh m _ lli yagh kete ni _ mengteghagh _ aga _ kaleve ma lghii _ .
megh mun _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ qateghyiighagh ghhagh _ makugte naqe yagh uq _ .
aghtugh ma lghii _ .
ellnga llu _ mengteghagh mun _ maligte te luni _ kaleve ma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ angayuqagh ite ngughk
Aghnaghaghhaghnguq _ iimna _ kiyaghte ma uq _ angayuqagh ite ngughk _ .
Taawangiinaq _ apa leg _ enkaam _ nengyugh llgagh _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ nuna lgu ta ita _ aghnaghagh t _ keleg ma kangat _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aghulaghqugh naqe ni luteng _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapute ma lghii _ nengyugh ghhagh minun _ .
angegh ma kanga _ ellnga llu _ maligte te sqellug qu _ aghulaghqunun _ .
taagken _ aghulaghqugh ma lghiit _ aghnaghaghyaget _ .
tespagani _ unatagh ma luki _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ piitekagh meng _ tagitug ughte te ma kangi _ .
Atghamun _ aghnaghaghhagh _ piyaqeseng _ aviite uq _ .
taagken _ aghnaghagh t _ alinge luteng _ angayuqagh meggneng _ aghnaghaghhagh _ tuqlughaghaataghyaqeseng _ akite nghite te i _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ .
ima _ aviite uq _ .
aghtugh luku _ tuqlughagh aatagh nghmeng _ miiwen _ sivu meggni _ atghagh ma na yu kan _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh mun _ atghagh ma lghiit _ .
kaate luteng _ aghnaghagh t _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ aviite uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ ila i _ aviilngaghyamiki _ qiyaaghwagh ma lghii _ ivagh ma yagh kangi _ aviite ma lghiit _ .
yaghlegi nguq _ suna _ taake uk _ paye k _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ paye m _ saaghw ani _ qiya kestagh ghngaaghmi _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
qavaa ma luku _ iwemga _ taghsagh ma kanga _ .
taghtugh yalghiimi _ aghnaghaghnguq _ suna _ taana _ nunalgute ke nghite kau nga _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ sa aqe ziin _ tawani _ ? _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aghulaghqugh u yagh lunga _ tagitughughsagu _ ila nka _ iflaamaanka _ .
entaqun _ unite lunga _ atghagh ma ut _ .
ifla u iqe lunga _ ila nka _ aghtugh luki _ ivagh nghmeng _ whani _ qavaa ma lghiinga _ . _ ”
Aghnampilaataghaa _ , _ “ _ tea- ai _ maligte nga _ .
qamavek _ itegh ltung _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ itegh ma lghiik _ .
itegh yalghiimek _ imani nguq _ aghnagh m _ nenge lunga _ qetngigh uq _ naqam _ nenglu an _ ugate anga _ alla ghhagh inagh meng _ neqetu uq _ .
aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ neghesimakanga _ mangtag meng _ enkaam _ quyngigh meng _ .
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ , _ “ _ wiin _ whani _ kiyaghten _ .
unaaqute aqe gkagu _ aane aqe gkuma _ whani _ utaqa aqe nga _ .
igatagh aqe gkuvek _ neghyukekagh gpeneng _ negh aqe i _ utaqa gpenanga _ . _ ”
qavagh lutek _ unaami _ taghtugh negh megteni _ aghnagh _ aane aqe lghii _ .
Aghnelqusiq _ aviite aqe lghii _ .
wetku _ unug yaghtugh magh an _ tagi nghmini _ itghute aqe lghii _ tungtu meng _ ilangani _ pilagkagh meng _ mangtag meng _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ apa an _ enkaam _ nuna lgu ta ita _ ivagh yagh luku _ aghtugh yamegteggu _ aviite yan _ qenwat _ wisqaawi te ma kangat _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Elpeknegpenun _ aghyuqe aghte igate ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ aghyuqe ghngaaghma qun _ naten _ aglagh langa _ .
Naantat _ apa nka _ nalluke kenka _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whaa _ qavagh yaghtugh unga _ .
qavagh kuma _ angatumeng _ taghtugh naanghite unga _ .
qemall _ elpek _ aghyuqe lleqe uten _ pellagh yug lleqe uten _ .
apa gpek _ sama _ suumqenneghmeng _ elpek _ qavagh _ palaghhagh _ atuqe aqe aat _ .
repall _ iye igh qagh ta iigh ma ut _ .
Ighivganghagu _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavagh naqutke aqe uk _ . _ ”
“ _ wetku qun _ elpek _ maligte nakevnga _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ angegh ma kanga _ .
“ _ whaa _ apeghtugh naqe amken _ vuvalla mi _ egmightagh tate kumeng _ kayaalqennayukangaten _ . _ ”
aghnagh m _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ alignaghtaghumalghii _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ esghapag ma kanga _ .
apeghiigh yami _ aghnagh m _ aghnaghaghhagh _ aapte ma kanga _ , _ “ _ qayugham _ liite ziin _ ? _ ”
“ _ Aaa _ liite unga _ . _ ”
“ _ legan _ atghagh luten _ vuvallakufsi _ tawaten _ pi lghaaten _ .
ahaam _ pilugug i _ .
Atghannaqamken _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghaghhagh _ pilugug ma lghii _ .
taagken _ aane yalghiimek _ nutaan _ uksaagh aqe a _ .
atghagh ma lghiik _ .
atghagh ma lutek _ unug ma kanga _ .
kaate yaghtugh yameng _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mengteghagh anun _ aghnagh m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ uteghte naqe unga _ whanga _ .
Ellnginaghpekkaallghaten _ . _ ”
aghnagh _ aga _ uteghte yan _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ uteghmun _ qiive yagh kete ni _ kaynge _ aga _ maaten _ tumangitgun _ pangaleg aqe uq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ kaate luni _ amig m _ reghillegh akun _ qineghte yalghiimi _ qama _ apa kek _ qagugh mig te lutek _ qavaa te aqe uk _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ tenglugtugh magh an _ amigh k _ qamayaghmighyaqenni _ taghtughsimakek _ .
qama _ pi ma lghiik _ , _ “ _ kaay _ llangaqa _ eltughagh ghhagh mta _ me a _ ! _ ”
“ _ aaqun _ whanga nge unga _ tagi nga _ .
enmis _ sukate luku _ qalpeghutengnga _ ! _ ”
“ _ kaay _ eltughagh ut _ tea- uq _ ! _ ”
Qalpeghusimakangat _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ apa ita _ iye it _ qavaghlaaghigallgjiem _ iqeghtiigh luteng _ .
eltughagh eng _ neghe ste luku _ qavaa ma lghiit _ .
unaami _ aapqughaghyaghaat _ apa gkenka llu _ enkaam _ aghnaghagh t llu _ tagi luteng _ aghulaghqulgutangita _ , _ naken _ pitanga.Aghnaghaghhaq _ aksaqngwaaghumalghii _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghaam _ apa a _ vuvallamalghii _ .
sughu ke aq _ tagi laghate te luni _ negh te nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ ungipaghagh te ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ apa a _ vuvallamalghii _ .
taagken _ alla _ negh te luteng _ enraq _ egmiightataasimalghiit _ alignaghtaagh te ma lghiit _ .
ila ita _ sungat _ kagimlluki _ saguyagh meggnun _ qaake luki _ saguyagh teng _ kallagneghmegteki _ sungat _ iighwigh aqe ut _ .
enraq _ ila ita _ tugu ta i _ ayvegh m _ mengqugh tun _ ulqaghtaaghaqegkangit _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga llu tuq _ egmightu aatagh qagh lghiinga _ . _ ”
nutem nguq _ apa a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ sa meng _ pi aqa _ ?
sa naqe aqa _ ? _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh m _ nengyugh ghhagh a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Ellngallutughnguq _ egmightu aatagh qagh lghii _ . _ ”
“ _ legan mi _ sa aqa _ ! _ ”
nutem nguq _ ila i _ sughukagh m _ aghnalqwaagh it _ pi ma lghiit _ yakugh ke luteng _ , _ “ _ Aghnaghaqraaggaq _ agghiyugnepiwaa _ !
kimaawi ta ii naqe uq _ ila itneng _ alignaghtaagh naqe lghii neng _ . _ ”
aghnaghaghhagh _ ketfagh luni _ saguyagh k _ tugu lukek _ ilagagh ma lghii _ .
ilagagh ma luku _ uka nguq _ suksug ghllag _ aliigh ma lghii _ .
iiwen _ pi aqe ut _ amig kun _ uga _ qagi t _ kasug te ma lghiit _ ilu te mun _ nategh mun _ .
aghnaghaghhagh m _ saguyagh gni _ kallagaghyaqenni _ qagi t _ ighhusalghiimeng _ nategh mi _ siipte ma lghii _ tepe aq _ allaghhiinaq _ .
aghnaghaghhagh _ nekeve luni _ signegh gneng _ tugu tete luni _ tea- ma ken _ tepagh meng _ imigh lukek _ signegh gneng _ sughu ke aq _ tunqugh ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ tunqugh nghmeng _ enraq _ siklagh meng _ tungsimalghii _ .
tuune yatni _ uwatanganun _ aglagh luni _ mingle _ siklagh yagh kete ni _ allaghhiinaq _ tangegh iqe aq _ peksigaghte ma kanga _ .
itagnatun _ signegh k _ tugu lukek _ imigh aqe lukek _ tea- ma ken _ tangighkagh meng _ sughu ke aq _ uyegte ma kanga _ .
qamagte yamigu _ mumegh _ tugu luku _ aghnaghaghhagh m _ mingle _ kenuqagh yagh kete ni _ megh _ meghe rakegte pigte lghii _ maaqe ma lghii _ mingle aneng _ .
meghute meng _ tugu tete luni _ meqsilaamakanga _ tamaghhagh an _ sughu ke aq _ .
taagken _ kenlanga _ aghnaghaghhagh _ ugpeqsalitaat _ .
Vuvallaneghmeggni _ aqfaqegkangat _ nuna lgu ta ita _ .
qamagte uq _ .
qatelghii nkuk _ amaa nkuk
qategh lghii _ tapghagh m _ qukaa ni _ mallu nge luni _ ayvegh meng _ negh ma luku _ sunanguq _ taana _ amu a _ .
kaate luni _ amaa m _ qategh lghii _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whanga llu _ neqagh langa _ .
igatagh pigte unga _ . _ ”
“ _ legan _ negh i _ .
uglagh ghllag uq _ .
Whangangingaghma _ naangnnaanghitaqa _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ amu a llu _ negh ma lghii _ .
Iwemgaqun _ kepsugh lutek _ negh lutek _ tapghagh m _ kelutanganilngughmun _ uusneghwaagh mun _ mayugh ma lghiik _ .
qaygeghte yamek _ qatelghii m _ amu a _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whani _ yeqay _ meghnaali ltung _ .
wiin _ qavaa ltung _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ amu a _ aanghumalghii _ .
tawani _ uusneghwaagh m _ qaye ani _ ingaghte uute ma lghiik _ .
qategh lghii _ qavagh gpenani _ teghhumaamalghii _ .
amu a _ qavagh yan _ whaa _ tungunghaqasan _ qategh lghii _ nekeve luni _ tamaani _ qemgughtimalghii _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh aneng _ .
qafsina t _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh i _ nuuve te luki _ amaa m _ papeg akun _ qilleghte ma kangi _ .
enkaam _ amu a _ taghsagh ma ke aanga _ .
qatelghii m _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ anguyag t _ sughuget _ whaa _ kaate yaghtugh u ngestagh ma i kung _ .
uusneghwaagh mun _ maye ii aqe ut _ .
whanga _ qimag naqe unga _ .
elpek _ sa aqe ziin _ ? _ ”
amu a _ qavaa i na ma te te kun _ nekefqaghte luni _ pangaleg yalghiimi _ kelute mun _ uka _ tunganganeng _ kavleggalek _ .
naqam _ papeg a _ aqnigh magh mi _ .
amu a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ Seghleghhalekkaannaqaatnga _ anguyag t _ .
tuqute naqe aatnga _ .
Awitwuwaqlu _ papeg mkun _ kiitegte aatnga _ .
sangami _ papeg ka _ aqnigh aqa _ ? _ ”
amu a _ iwemgaqun _ qevuute luni _ qimagkagh _ tuqunnayukangatni _ .
qimagugh kestagh ghngaaghmi _ kinguminilnguq _ kavleg _ almesiqe nga i nagh yagu _ saama _ pekagh pigte yami _ amu a _ sumeghtaghagh ma lghii _ , _ “ _ qaywaam _ tuqu langa _ . _ ”
aghuliigh te kete luku _ uteghmun _ qiive yalghiimi _ sughu meng _ esghaate nghite uq _ .
katam _ taawa _ papeg akun _ qilleghte luteng _ qafsina t _ ayvegh m _ kuyapegagh i _ .
amu a _ pi ma lghii _ , _ “ _ ugumi nagh na ghhalek _ qatelghii penaagh _ pekaghtepigtaanga _ .
kergam _ taawa _ esghagh qaghtekumken _ unguva lleqe uten _ . _ ”
qatelghii m _ kiiw k _ kaate lukek _ aki mun _ ayuqe lghiik _ maligte ma kek _ iwemgam _ esnagh mun _ .
tawani _ esnagh mi _ tepagh meng _ neghemsuglimi _ taglagh ma lghii _ esnagh m _ kelutanganun _ .
Pengughaghhaghmun _ kaate luni _ tawani _ qavagh naqe yami _ iye gni _ nusug ragh lukek _ saaghw mikun _ lli lukek _ qavaa ma lghii _ .
taagken _ amaa m _ ugumi yagute luku _ qategh lghii _ tea- ma ghhagh ani _ ivaghtagh u yagh kete ni _ .
qenwat llu _ naalke qaghte ma kanga _ .
qategh lghii _ qavagh aqe uq _ enngaatall _ umu luku _ naqam _ saaghw ani _ iye k _ .
Amaamtaghsaghpenaan _ iiskekqatelghiimtutmaghtaalukek _ qageghqugh lukek _ unite ma kanga _ .
kingu aneng _ amaa m _ qatelghii m _ iwemgaqun _ qavagh gni _ nusug lukek _ taghtugh yami _ iye gni _ tugu naqe yagh ke gni _ aviite uk _ .
Katamnaalkumakekqageghqughlleraaghinaak _ .
qategh lghii _ ayaa luni _ panegh luni _ tuquma lghii _ .
qamagte uq _ .
aghnagh aq _ uyughagh leg
aghnagh aq _ kiyaghte ma lghii _ uyughagh leg _ .
mekelghiigh _ aane igate ngughk _ quunpeng _ itghumaghllak _ .
nayag a _ quyngighqwaagh aqe lghii _ .
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh luni _ uyughagh ke te lghiik _ negh aqe lghiik _ .
aghnagh aq _ quyngigh mun _ aghulaqe nghmini _ quyngighqwaagh te kete luku _ ulape aqe lghii _ .
atghagh nghmini _ gaagh niigh aqe lghii _ saama _ pilugug meng _ ukini aqe lghii _ .
uyughagh ni _ qelegh aqe yagh kanga _ waran _ uughqaghmun _ aane aghte aqe luku _ pi sqellug qu _ .
iwernga llu _ mekelghiigh _ aanigalgnuq _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ aghaghaam _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ whaa _ unite naqe amken _ .
miite ta lgigh a _ seghleghu lghiiten _ .
taawa _ whaa _ sinumiggaan _ ifla naqngu uq _ .
saama _ elpek _ langetaq _ mengteghagh igh te naqe uten _ .
Aatagʼqun _ tukughqaghhanun _ i _ vaghiyaghnaqunga _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ aghnagh aq _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
igleghte ma lghii _ qafsina t _ aghnegh t _ .
unug nghagu _ aghuliigh luni _ ayaviigh ni _ napaghte luku _ angyataghqelluni _ qavagh aqe lghii _ .
unaami _ taghtugh luni _ ayaviigh ni _ esghagh nghminigu _ iqunighte ma aqe lghii _ .
tawaten _ iqunighlleghamun _ aghnagh aq _ aghulaqe aqe lghii _ .
maaten _ ilangani _ iiwen _ siqinegh _ tevigh yaghtugh aqe uq _ qemi meng _ agigte yalghiimi _ kana _ negh ghllag _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
ne m _ akulangani _ aangqateghllagaqeftuq _ taam _ nuna m _ yug a _ .
aghnagh _ kilgaaqumeng _ ukig ma lghii _ qemi meng _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ qungangitgun _ aag ma lghii _ enkaam _ nagnegh ma lghii _ ingavek _ sivulighpigaghnun _ mengteghagh minun _ .
kaa sa mi _ nagnegh luni _ nategh mun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
taawa _ esghagh ma kangi _ malghugnegh t _ ungavig t _ aywaa n _ tunganganilnguut _ meketaghalghiit _ .
tawavek _ ungavig nun _ aywaa n _ tunganganilngughnun _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ lengaagh meng _ nagaqugh te ma lghiit _ taagken _ alingyug luteng _ taaqe te ma lghiit _ .
nuna m _ amatum _ sukate lleghpigagh a _ aghnagh aq _ talwa _ nukalpigagh neng _ aglagh ma lghii _ mengteghagh minun _ .
taana _ sukate ngughk _ aghnagh aq _ tugu naqute kaqsagh kangat _ aghtugh aqe kangat _ .
aghnaghagh m _ kayalqiiraghmi _ kayalqaqegkangi _ nukalpigagh at _ .
wetku _ kina _ kayalqiilghii _ taana _ nulightugh yaghqagh _ sukate ngugh meng _ aghnaghagh meng _ .
aghnagh aq _ mengteghagh minun _ kaate luni _ itegh ma lghii _ .
ungavig minun _ aglagh luni _ suugemgeni _ ikighte yagh kete ni _ kelutangani _ iggasightaghaqeftuq _ nukalpigaqsa _ seghleghu qagh a _ .
aghnaghagh m _ naa ni _ tuqlugh luku _ pi ma kanga _ ,
“ _ yeqay _ whanga _ gaagh langa _ ! _ ”
naa an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ imukun _ sangavek _ gaagh yug ghllag ziin _ ? _ ”
panig an _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Iwemgallu _ whanga mneng _ gaagh yug unga _ ! _ ”
taana _ aghnagh aq _ gaagh igate yagh lghii _ .
naange a _ gaaghtengwaaqsalghii _ .
aghnagh aq _ ugkelli ma lghii _ tunughtu llegh inagh aneng _ quyngigh meng _ .
ugute yami _ angayuqagh ni _ mani ste vike luki _ ugke meng _ ellmi _ allakagh mi _ taagken _ itegh ma lghii _ .
aqelqagh ke te lghiik _ negh lutek _ taaqe yamek _ ungipamsug te ma lghiik _ .
tukugh an _ aghnaghagh m _ uyguma lgute kete na luku _ atkugiisqughaghaqegkanga _ .
aqelqagh an _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ “ _ aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ wetku _ tawani _ mat- aghte naagh unga _ . _ ”
Qayughllagʼqun _ kayngu yug aqe lghii _ mat- aghte nghmeng _ .
ellnga llu _ aghnagh u lghii _ .
qenwat _ pilugugtugh ma lghii _ ingaghte ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ , _ qavaghni pigte ni li mi _ .
unaami _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh an _ nuna lgu ta ita _ nagaqugh luku _ aqelqagh _ kaate ma ni luku _ keleg ma kangat _ aqelqaghniigh naqe na i luku _ .
llaaghanwha _ aghnaghagh nkuk _ aqelqagh ke te lghiik _ aglagh ma lghiik _ aqelqaghniigh naqe lghii nun _ .
taagken _ kilgaaqu uute ma lghiit _ .
kelgute ma kangat _ naayghagh _ sungaghyuggiinaq _ aligh ite ngughk _ .
taana _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ uteghte yaghqagh at _ .
taagken _ aghulaqe te ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ aghnagh aq _ igleghte ma lghii _ aqfaalaameng _ .
leganqun _ aga _ sivungagh ni _ kilgaaqu lghii nun _ ugleghutaquq _ sivulighpigaluni _ tukagh a _ aghnagh aq _ .
naayghagh _ aliighwaaghyamegteggu _ qevuullighaamalghii _ .
taakwna _ kilgaaqu te lghii _ aghnaghagh m _ naghughte qugh ma kanga _ .
iiwen _ naayghagh mun _ kaate aqe uq _ sivulighpigaq _ tukugh ni _ kaate ma kanga _ .
taagken _ qerngagh egmek _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ sivu liqe luku _ naayghagh _ uzive luku _ uteghte ma lghiik _ .
igleghte ma lghiik _ .
whaa _ mengteghagh t _ aliighwaaghyayegteki _ aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enta _ ingavek _ mengteghagh nun _ kaate ragkiighute aghte luteng _ ! _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ tukugh ni _ naghughte luku _ qevuute luni _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ taam _ nunaagh m _ sukallgha _ tukugh ni _ naghughte luku _ qevuute luni _ kilgaate qugh ma lghii _ .
kaate luni _ aqelqagh _ uteghmun _ esghagh yalghiimi _ taam _ nunaagh m _ sukallgha _ tukugh ni _ aghnagh aq _ unite ghllag ma kanga _ , _ nutem nguq _ tea- ma kut _ esghapag lghiit _ aapte ma kangat _ , _ “ _ naken _ uteghsin _ ? _ ”
Aqelqaam _ akite ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enan _ kinguligh ghhagh ma _ kaate kumeng _ ungipaate naagh aisi _ . _ ”
tukagh a _ aghnagh aq _ kaate luni _ pi ma kangi _ esghapag lghiit _ nunalgute ni _ , _ “ _ aqelqagh _ pi yagh ka iitagh i _ .
Matum _ nunaagh m _ yug a _ kayalqughtaagaa _ .
sukate ghllag pigte uq _ .
kitum _ inglu ke naanghite a _ .
Qemgaamtung _ naayghagh _ uzivaghpung _ .
tagimun _ unite ghllag aanga _ . _ ”
kilgaaqu te tke aq _ kaat quute te yan _ qamagte luni _ qemgughusan _ enraq _ tughumgha tete na aqe ma lghiit _ .
taagken _ yug t _ mat- aghte luteng _ tughumgha te ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ ketfagh yan _ atkugtuumagh mi _ pi ma kangat _ tawaten _ tughumgha naanghite ni luku _ mataghte sqellug qu _ .
Aqelqaam _ akite ma kangi _ , _ “ _ whangkuta _ ima _ sivimemnneng _ kenlanga _ nunaagh nun _ nutaan _ pi yuggaagh negh mta _ mataghte igate ukut _ .
wetku _ alghigh luku _ tawavek _ nunaagh mun _ pinegh mta _ taawa _ mat- aghte yaghqaaghte aqe ainkut _ .
aglagh lunga _ alla _ tagi kuma _ esghaghlleqaghsi _ uvinke a _ .
enngaatall _ tawani _ mataghte lleqe unga _ . _ ”
laagh an wha _ ugpeghsimakangi _ aqelqaam _ tea- ma kut _ yug t _ mataghtesqughwaalghiit _ .
tughumgha ma kangat _ yug t _ aqelqagh at _ atkugtugh ma ghngaan _ .
aqelqagh _ imani _ iknaqe ghllag uq _ .
ila i _ tunuvagh nghata _ ila ita _ atg- ghhagh ke luku _ mataawi te aat _ iqute nghmeng _ .
Aqelqaam _ kayalqughtagaa _ nunaagh m _ tamatum _ yug a _ iknaqe llegh a _ .
aqelqaghniigh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ tukugh minun _ aglagh ma lghii _ .
itegh yan _ tukugh an _ aghnaghagh m _ qevuute luku _ upugha te ma kanga _ itegh sqe magh an _ ungavig t _ ilu itnun _ .
negh nghmeng _ taaqe yameng _ aghnaghagh m _ tukagh a _ itegh luni _ atkugiisqughaaghumakanga _ aqelqagh ni _ .
aqelqagh an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ ungipaate amken _ leganiitek _ sagiqutaghpenga _ .
mat- aghte naanghite unga _ .
aglagh lunga _ tagi kuma _ yugusigh ka _ esghaghlleqannatetulnga _ . _ ”
aqelqagh _ tukugh mi _ uygumalqiinaghnaqenghatni _ pi aqe kanga _ , _ “ _ qavaghni pigte aanga _ .
ingaghte naqe unga _ . _ ”
atkugtuumagh mi _ ingaghte te kete luku _ qavaa sighwaagh aqe lghii _ qavagh nghite ghngaaghmi _ .
unaami _ tukugh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ aglagh naqe unga _ .
Sukallungatagillequnga _ .
utaqa nakevnga _ . _ ”
aghulaqe ma lghii _ aqelqagh _ .
igleghte te kete luku _ aghnagh aq _ sumeghtaghagh aqe lghii _ , _ “ _ miiwen _ inga _ quyngigh ghhagh ut _ uglafqe uq _ .
naagu _ inga _ uyughagh ka _ ighsanitagh lghii _ , _ panegh luni _ tuqu uq _ . _ ”
uusnegh u aq _ quyngighqwaaghvikumtaani _ kaate luku _ agigte yagh kete ni _ iitekkana _ quynighteng _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
quyngigh m _ awatangani _ guughngaghmi _ yuug _ kameg gni _ piginghi _ sivughtugh aqe ai _ .
aghnaghagh m _ igkaghaghluku _ kaate yaghtugh yamigu _ up- ughte naqe pigte luku _ waakestegpenaan _ teskanavek _ metngeqagh vike yagh kete ni _ iiwennguq _ ama _ quyngigh m _ awatangani _ .
taagken _ aghnaghagh m _ pi yagh kete ni _ uyughagh ni _ liisuqe ma kanga _ .
piyug meng _ taku luku _ nayag an _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ tawaten _ pisqelluten _ pi aqe yagh amken _ .
ahaam _ atghagh luten _ negh yaghtugh ltung _ . _ ”
“ _ inga _ qantagha m _ tungtuute ma kanga _ .
taana _ aag vike lteggu _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ tungtutagh mikun _ uyughagh n _ nayag ni _ aagute ma kanga _ .
mekelghiigh m _ tungtutagh ani _ iisqaghmiigumakanga _ .
nayag an _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ gaagh te yaghtugh naqe amken _ .
sivullgaagh naqe amken _ . _ ”
aghnagh aq _ uuvganeng _ taagken _ kilgaaqumeng _ ghhatagh ma lghii _ .
Mengteghamim _ kaate yaghtugh yami _ uteghmun _ uyughagh ni _ iisqagh mig leg _ tungtu meng _ esghagh yagh kete ni _ tungtu aneng _ maligsaagh aqe a _ uyughagh n _ .
aghnagh aq _ piyug ma lghii _ enkaam _ uyughagh ni _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ enankin _ yugu lghiiten _ .
inglu ke te yagute yaghqaaghte ma uten _ yulgutevnun _ . _ ”
kaate lutek _ aghnagh aq _ afta uute kete luku _ tungtu meng _ gaagh ma lghii _ .
ugute yami _ negh te kete luku _ uyughagh ni _ ungipamsug te ma kanga _ aqelqaghniigh llegh mineng _ ataasigh mi _ nunaagh mi _ .
pi ma kanga _ uyughagh ni _ , _ “ _ iitek _ tazinga _ aghnagh nge te ma yagh amken _ .
miitalgi _ mengteghagh at _ sivulighpigaaguq _ .
ayumigh ani _ kaate kuvek _ wiin _ itegh gpenang _ .
Uqeghhmi _ mat- aghte naagh uten _ .
atkug igh kuvek _ upag te lghiit _ pinagh aaten _ , _ ‘ _ Atkugiisqughaghaqaghpesinga _ .
taawa _ yugusigh ka _ esghaghte ggu _ ! _ ’
enkaam _ mengteghagh mun _ itegh kuvek _ esghagh naagh an _ aghnaghqagh n _ .
ungavig anun _ itegh kuftek _ aghnagh aq _ pi naken _ , _ ‘ _ Amsikaghtesqughaghaqegkevnga _ .
enngaatall _ amsikaghhnaqunga _ . _ ’ _ naqamllu _ aqelqaghniigh naanghite aaten _ .
whanga _ apeghiigh kaqe aatnga _ .
ikiwan _ whanga _ aghnagh _ kayalqesimangitunga _ . _ ”
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ mekelghiigh m _ nayag mi _ ayaviigh a _ wanitagh leg _ tugu luku _ nayag mi _ apaate llegh atun _ aghulaqe ma lghii _ .
wata _ palaghhagh at _ qavagh t _ atugh luki _ qemigh _ agigte yaghqagh ni _ kaate ma kanga _ .
agigte yagh kete ni _ negh ghllag _ esghagh ma kanga _ .
tawani _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
Whanikuneghsiimakanga _ .
iiwen _ siqinegh _ ikaliiqaa _ , _ akule mi _ nunaagh m _ yug a _ qemgughuteghllagumalghii _ .
taagken _ aangqagh te ma lghiit _ .
katam _ siqinegh _ tevigh yan _ mekelghiigh _ qemi meng _ ukig ma lghii _ kilgaaqumeng _ .
angqagh u te lghiit _ akulangitgun _ igleghaamalghii _ ingavek _ sivulighpigaanun _ mengteghagh nun _ .
kaa sa mi _ mengteghagh mun _ uqeghhmi _ aghuliigh ma lghii _ .
aangqagh te lghiit _ lengaghmeng _ nagaqugh te yameng _ taaqe te ma lghiit _ .
pi ma lghiit _ , _ “ _ awituwaq _ aqelqagh _ akuwaaghniimna _ kaa tuq _ . _ ”
enkaam _ tazingavek _ sivuligh nun _ mengteghagh nun _ aglagh uute ma lghiit _ .
aqelqagh _ kaate lghii _ upag ma kangat _ .
Upagut _ tagi laghate te yata _ mekelghiigh m _ aqelqagh m _ pi ma kangi _ , _ “ _ Atkugiisqaqaghpesinga _ .
taawa _ yugusigh ka _ esghaghte ggu _ . _ ”
atkug ni _ mataghte ma kanga _ .
Upagut _ whaten _ pi inagh ai _ , _ “ _ ahaam _ aghulaqe utek _ . _ ”
Uvinʼganeng _ esghaate luteng _ nukalpigagh t _ aghulaqe te ma lghiit _ .
aghulaqe te yata _ mekelghiigh _ atkug luni _ itegh ma lghii _ nategh mun _ .
itegh yalghiimi _ nategh mun _ esghagh ma kanga _ aghnagh aq _ gaagh aqe uq _ neqe meng _ .
imagh m nguq _ ineqsunagh uq _ .
“ _ kaay _ tagi ziin _ ? _ ”
aghnaghagh m _ pi ma kanga _ .
“ _ qamavek _ ungavig nun _ itegh i _ .
gaagh aqe unga _ .
sukate luteng _ ugu lleqe ai _ ugke t _ . _ ”
llaaghanwha _ mekelghiigh _ itegh ma lghii _ ungavig mun _ .
ugute yami _ aghnaghagh m _ angayuqagh ni _ ugke meng _ mani ste vike luki _ itegh ma lghii _ ungavig mun _ .
itegh yan _ mekelghiigh m _ aghnagh aq _ pi ma kanga _ , _ “ _ Amsikaghtesqughaghaqegkevnga _ enngaatall _ amsikaghhnaqunga _ . _ ”
Amsikaghhneghmeng _ taaqe yan _ mekelghiigh _ , _ negh ma lghiik _ aleghquusimaghmek _ aghnaghagh nkuk _ .
qavagh luteng _ unaami _ aghnelqusiq _ yataghqumalghiik _ .
unaami _ aghulaqe yaghqagh k _ .
naqamllu _ naagu _ aqelqaghniigh yug nghite te aat _ aqelqagh _ .
llaaghanwha _ qavagh luteng _ unaami _ quyngilegtimeng _ atghagh ma lghiik _ mekelghiigh m _ mengteghagh anun _ .
kaate lutek _ mekelghiigh m _ nayag an _ upugha te ma kanga _ ukaagh ni _ .
aghnaghagh m _ ukuk _ esghapag yagh ke gni _ nayag ke te lghiik _ gginagh ik _ ataasiistukanik _ .
taagken _ kiyaghte ma lghiit _ .
